 ---
book	text	lemmata
11	agnim īLe purohitam	agni īḍ purohita
11	yajñasya devam ṛtvijam	yajña deva ṛtvij
11	hotāram ratnadhātamam	hotṛ ratna dhātama
11	agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ	agni pūrva ṛṣi
11	īḍyaḥ nūtanaiḥ uta	īḍ nūtana uta
11	sa devān ā iha vakṣati	tad deva ā iha vah
11	agninā rayim aśnavat	agni rayi aś
11	poṣam eva divedive	poṣa eva diva diva
11	yaśasam vīravattamam	yaśas vīravattama
11	agne yam yajñam adhvaram	agni yad yajña adhvara
11	viśvataḥ paribhūḥ asi	viśvatas paribhū as
11	saḥ it deveṣu gacchati	tad id deva gam
11	agniḥ hotā kavikratuḥ	agni hotṛ kavi kratu
11	satyaḥ citraśravastamaḥ	satya citraśravastama
11	devaḥ devebhiḥ ā gamat	deva deva ā gam
11	yat aṅga dāśuṣe tvam	yat aṅga dāś tvad
11	agne bhadram kariṣyasi	agni bhadra kṛ
11	tava it tat satyam aṅgiraḥ	tvad id tad satya aṅgiras
11	upa tvā agne divedive	upa tvad agni diva diva
11	doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam	doṣāvastṛ dhī mad
11	namaḥ bharantaḥ ā imasi	namas bhṛ ā i
11	rājantam adhvarāṇām	rāj adhvara
11	gopām ṛtasya dīdivim	gopā ṛta dīdivi
11	vardhamānam sve dame	vṛdh sva dama
11	sa naḥ pitā iva sūnave	tad mad pitṛ iva sūnu
11	agne sūpāyanaḥ bhava	agni su upāyana bhū
11	sacasvā naḥ svastaye	sac mad svasti
 ---
12	vāyo ā yāhi darśata	vāyu ā yā darśata
12	ime somāḥ araṁkṛtāḥ	idam soma alaṃkṛ
12	teṣām pāhi śrudhī havam	tad pā śru hava
12	vāyo ukthebhiḥ jarante	vāyu uktha jṛ
12	tvām acchā jaritāraḥ	tvad acchā jaritṛ
12	sutasomāḥ aharvidaḥ	su soma ahar vid
12	vāyo tava prapṛñcatī	vāyu tvad prapṛc
12	dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe	dhenā gā dāś
12	urūcī somapītaye	uruvyañc soma pīti
12	indravāyū ime sutāḥ	indra vāyu idam suta
12	upa prayobhiḥ ā gatam	upa prayas ā gam
12	indavaḥ vām uśanti hi	indu tvad vaś hi
12	vāyo indraḥ ca cetathaḥ	vāyu indra ca cit
12	sutānām vājinīvasū	suta vājinī vasu
12	tau ā yātam upa dravat	tad ā yā upa dru
12	vāyo indraḥ ca sunvataḥ	vāyu indra ca su
12	ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam	ā yā upa niṣkṛta
12	makṣū itthā dhiyā narā	makṣū itthā dhī nara
12	mitram huve pūtadakṣam	mitra hvā pū dakṣa
12	varuṇam ca riśādasam	varuṇa ca riśādas
12	dhiyam ghṛtācīm sādhantā	dhī ghṛtāñc sādh
12	ṛtena mitrāvaruṇau	ṛta mitrāvaruṇa
12	ṛtāvṛdhau ṛtaspṛśā	ṛtāvṛdh ṛta spṛś
12	kratum bṛhantam āśāthe	kratu bṛhat aś
12	kavī naḥ mitrāvaruṇā	kavi mad mitrāvaruṇa
12	tuvijātau urukṣayā	tuvi jan uru kṣaya
12	dakṣam dadhāte apasam	dakṣa dhā apas
 ---
13	aśvinā yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ	aśvin yajvan iṣ
13	dravatpāṇī śubhaḥ patī	dru pāṇi śubh pati
13	purubhujā canasyatam	puru bhuj canasy
13	aśvinā purudaṁsasā	aśvin puru daṃsas
13	narā śavīrayā dhiyā	nara śavīra dhī
13	dhiṣṇyā vanatam giraḥ	dhiṣṇya van gir
13	dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutāḥ	dasra yuvāku suta
13	nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	nāsatya vṛj barhis
13	ā yātam rudravartanī	ā yā rudravartani
13	indra ā yāhi citrabhāno	indra ā yā citra bhānu
13	sutāḥ ime tvāyavaḥ	suta idam tvāyu
13	aṇvībhiḥ tanā pūtāsaḥ	aṇu tan pū
13	indra ā yāhi dhiyā iṣitaḥ	indra ā yā dhī iṣay
13	viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ	vipra jū sutāvat
13	upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ	upa brahman vāghant
13	indra ā yāhi tūtujānaḥ	indra ā yā tuj
13	upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ	upa brahman harivat
13	sute dadhiṣva naḥ canaḥ	suta dhā mad canas
13	ā ūmāsaḥ carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ	oma carṣaṇī dhṛt
13	viśve devāsaḥ ā gata	viśva deva ā gam
13	dāśvāṁsaḥ dāśuṣaḥ sutam	dāś dāś suta
13	viśve devāsaḥ apturaḥ	viśva deva aptur
13	sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ	suta ā gam tūrṇi
13	usrāḥ iva svasarāṇi	usrā iva svasara
13	viśve devāsaḥ asridhaḥ	viśva deva asridh
13	ehimāyāsaḥ adruhaḥ	ehimāya adruh
13	medham juṣanta vahnayaḥ	medha juṣ vahni
13	pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī	pāvaka mad sarasvatī
13	vājebhiḥ vājinīvatī	vāja vājinīvat
13	yajñam vaṣTu dhiyāvasuḥ	yajña vaś dhiyāvasu
13	codayitrī sūnṛtānām	codayitṛ sūnṛta
13	cetantī sumatīnām	cit sumati
13	yajñam dadhe sarasvatī	yajña dhā sarasvatī
13	mahaḥ arṇaḥ sarasvatī	mah arṇas sarasvatī
13	pra cetayati ketunā	pra cetay ketu
13	dhiyaḥ viśvāḥ vi rājati	dhī viśva vi rāj
 ---
14	surūpakṛtnum ūtaye	su rūpa kṛtnu ūti
14	sudughām iva goduhe	su dugha iva goduh
14	juhūmasi dyavidyavi	hvā div div
14	upa naḥ savanā ā gahi	upa mad savana gam
14	somasya somapāḥ piba	soma soma pā pā
14	godāḥ it revataḥ madaḥ	go dā id revat mada
14	athā te antamānām	atha tvad antama
14	vidyāma sumatīnām	vid sumati
14	mā naḥ ati khyaḥ ā gahi	mā mad ati khyā ā gam
14	parā ihi vigram astṛtam	pare vigra astṛta
14	indram pṛcchā vipaścitam	indra pracch vipaścit
14	yaḥ te sakhibhyaḥ ā varam	yad tvad sakhi ā vara
14	uta bruvantu naḥ nidaḥ	uta brū mad nid
14	niḥ anyataḥ cit ārata	niḥ anyatas cit ṛch
14	dadhānāḥ indre it duvaḥ	dhā indra id duvas
14	uta naḥ subhagān ariḥ	uta mad subhaga ari
14	voceyuḥ dasma kṛṣTayaḥ	vac dasma kṛṣṭi
14	syāma it indrasya śarmaṇi	as id indra śarman
14	ā īm āśum āśave bhara	ā īṃ āśu āśu bhṛ
14	yajñaśriyam nṛmādanam	yajña śrī nṛ mādana
14	patayat mandayatsakham	patay manday sakha
14	asya pītvā śatakrato	idam pā śatakratu
14	ghanaḥ vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ	ghana vṛtra bhū
14	pra āvaḥ vājeṣu vājinam	prāv vāja vājin
14	tam tvā vājeṣu vājinam	tad tvad vāja vājin
14	vājayāmaḥ śatakrato	vājay śatakratu
14	dhanānām indra sātaye	dhana indra sāti
14	yaḥ rāyaḥ avaniḥ mahān	yad rai avani mahat
14	supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā	su pāra su sakhi
14	tasmai indrāya gāyata	tad indra gā
 ---
15	ā tu ā itā ni sīdata	ā tu i ni sad
15	indram abhi pra gāyata	indra abhi pra gā
15	sakhāyaḥ stomavāhasaḥ	sakhi stoma vāhas
15	purūtamam purūṇām	purutama puru
15	īśānam vāryāṇām	īś vārya
15	indram some sacā sute	indra soma sacā su
15	sa ghā naḥ yoge ā bhuvat	tad gha mad yoga ā bhū
15	sa rāye sa puraṁdhyām	tad rai tad puraṃdhi
15	gamat vājebhiḥ ā sa naḥ	gam vāja ā tad mad
15	yasya saṁsthe na vṛṇvate	yad saṃstha na vṛ
15	harī samatsu śatravaḥ	hari samad śatru
15	tasmai indrāya gāyata	tad indra gā
15	sutapāvne sutāḥ ime	suta pāvan su idam
15	śucayaḥ yanti vītaye	śuci i vīti
15	somāsaḥ dadhyāśiraḥ	soma dadhi āśir
15	tvam sutasya pītaye	tva suta pā
15	sadyaḥ vṛddhaḥ ajāyathāḥ	sadyas vṛdh jan
15	indra jyaiṣThyāya sukrato	indra jyaiṣṭhya sukratu
15	ā tvā viśantu āśavaḥ	ā tvad viś āśu
15	somāsaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ	soma indra girvaṇas
15	śam te santu pracetase	śam tvad as pracetas
15	tvām stomāḥ avīvṛdhan	tvad stoma vṛdh
15	tvām ukthā śatakrato	tvad uktha śatakratu
15	tvām vardhantu naḥ giraḥ	tvad vṛdh mad gir
15	akṣitotiḥ sanet imam	akṣitoti san idam
15	vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam	vāja indra sahasrin
15	yasmin viśvāni pauṁsyā	yad viśva pauṃsya
15	mā naḥ martāḥ abhi druhan	mā mad marta abhi druh
15	tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ	tanu indra girvaṇas
15	īśānaḥ yavayā vadham	īś yavay vadha
 ---
16	yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣam	yuj bradhna aruṣa
16	carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ	car pari sthā
16	rocante rocanā divi	ruc rocana div
16	yuñjanti asya kāmyā	yuj idam kāmya
16	harī vipakṣasā rathe	hari vipakṣas ratha
16	śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhasā	śoṇa dhṛṣṇu nṛ vāhas
16	ketum kṛṇvan aketave	ketu kṛ aketu
16	peśaḥ maryāḥ apeśase	peśas marya apeśas
16	sam uṣadbhiḥ ajāyathāḥ	sam uṣas jan
16	āt aha svadhām anu	āt aha svadhā anu
16	punar garbhatvam erire	punar garbha tva er
16	dadhānāḥ nāma yajñiyam	dhā nāman yajñiya
16	vīLu cit ārujatnubhiḥ	vīḍu cit ārujatnu
16	guhā cit indra vahnibhiḥ	guhā cit indra vahni
16	avindaḥ usriyāḥ anu	vid usriyā anu
16	devayantaḥ yathā matim	devay yathā mati
16	acchā vidadvasum giraḥ	acchā vidadvasu gir
16	mahām anūṣata śrutam	mah nū śruta
16	indreṇa sam hi dṛkṣase	indra sam hi dṛś
16	saṁjagmānaḥ abibhyuṣā	saṃgam a bhī
16	mandū samānavarcasā	mandu samāna varcas
16	anavadyaiḥ abhidyubhiḥ	anavadya abhidyu
16	makhaḥ sahasvat arcati	makha sahasvat arc
16	gaṇaiḥ indrasya kāmyaiḥ	gaṇa indra kāmya
16	ataḥ parijman ā gahi	atas parijman ā gam
16	divaḥ vā rocanāt adhi	div vā rocana adhi
16	sam asmin ṛñjate giraḥ	sam idam ṛj gir
16	itaḥ vā sātim īmahe	itas vā sāti ī
16	divaḥ vā pārthivāt adhi	div vā pārthiva adhi
16	indram mahaḥ vā rajasaḥ	indra mah vā rajas
 ---
17	indram it gāthinaḥ bṛhat	indra id gāthin bṛhat
17	indram arkebhiḥ arkiṇaḥ	indra arka arkin
17	indram vāṇīḥ anūṣata	indra vāṇī nū
17	indraḥ it haryoḥ sacā	indra id hari sacā
17	sammiślaḥ ā vacoyujā	sammiśla ā vacas yuj
17	indraḥ vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ	indra vajrin hiraṇyaya
17	indraḥ dīrghāya cakṣase	indra dīrgha cakṣas
17	ā sūryam rohayat divi	ā sūrya rohay div
17	vi gobhiḥ adrim airayat	vi go adri īray
17	indra vājeṣu naḥ ava	indra vāja mad av
17	sahasrapradhaneṣu ca	sahasra pradhana ca
17	ugraḥ ugrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	ugra ugra ūti
17	indram vayam mahādhane	indra mad mahādhana
17	indram arbhe havāmahe	indra arbha hvā
17	yujam vṛtreṣu vajriṇam	yuj vṛtra vajrin
17	sa naḥ vṛṣan amum carum	tad mad vṛṣan adas caru
17	satrādāvan apā vṛdhi	satrādāvan apa vṛ
17	asmabhyam apratiṣkutaḥ	mad apratiṣkuta
17	tuñjetuñje ye uttare	tuñja tuñja yad uttara
17	stomāḥ indrasya vajriṇaḥ	stoma indra vajrin
17	na vindhe asya suṣTutim	na vidh idam suṣṭuti
17	vṛṣā yūthā iva vaṁsagaḥ	vṛṣan yūtha iva vaṃsaga
17	kṛṣTīḥ iyarti ojasā	kṛṣṭi ṛch ojas
17	īśānaḥ apratiṣkutaḥ	īś apratiṣkuta
17	yaḥ ekaḥ carṣaṇīnām	yad eka carṣaṇi
17	vasūnām irajyati	vasu irajy
17	indraḥ pañca kṣitīnām	indra pañcan kṣiti
17	indram vaḥ viśvataḥ pari	indra tvad viśvatas pari
17	havāmahe janebhyaḥ	hvā jana
17	asmākam astu kevalaḥ	mad as kevala
 ---
18	ā indra sānasim rayim	ā indra sānasi rayi
18	sajitvānam sadāsaham	sa jitvan sadāsah
18	varṣiṣTham ūtaye bhara	varṣiṣṭha ūti bhṛ
18	ni yena muṣTihatyayā	ni yad muṣṭi hatyā
18	ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai	ni vṛtra rudh
18	tvotāsaḥ ni arvatā	tvota ni arvant
18	indra tvotāsaḥ ā vayam	indra tvota ā mad
18	vajram ghanāḥ dadīmahi	vajra ghana dā
18	jayema sam yudhi spṛdhaḥ	ji sam yudh spṛdh
18	vayam śūrebhiḥ astṛbhiḥ	mad śūra astṛ
18	indra tvayā yujā vayam	indra tvad yuj mad
18	sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ	sah pṛtany
18	mahān indraḥ paraḥ ca nu	mahat indra paras ca nu
18	mahitvam astu vajriṇe	mahi tva as vajrin
18	dyauḥ na prathinā śavaḥ	div na prathiman śavas
18	samohe vā ye āśata	samoha vā yad aś
18	naraḥ tokasya sanitau	nṛ toka saniti
18	viprāsaḥ vā dhiyāyavaḥ	vipra vā dhiyāyu
18	yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ	yad kukṣi soma pātama
18	samudraḥ iva pinvate	samudra iva pinv
18	urvīḥ āpaḥ na kākudaḥ	uru ap na kākud
18	evā hi asya sūnṛtā	eva hi idam sūnṛtā
18	virapśī gomatī mahī	virapśa gomat mah
18	pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe	pakva śākhā na dāś
18	evā hi te vibhūtayaḥ	eva hi tvad vibhūti
18	ūtayaḥ indra māvate	ūti indra māvat
18	sadyaḥ cit santi dāśuṣe	sadyas cit as dāś
18	evā hi asya kāmyā	eva hi idam kāmya
18	stomaḥ uktham ca śaṁsyā	stoma uktha ca śaṃs
18	indrāya somapītaye	indra soma pīti
 ---
19	indra ā ihi matsi andhasaḥ	indra i mad andhas
19	viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ	viśva soma parvan
19	mahān abhiṣTiḥ ojasā	mahat abhiṣṭi ojas
19	ā īm enam sṛjatā sute	ā īṃ enad sṛj suta
19	mandim indrāya mandine	mandi indra mandin
19	cakrim viśvāni cakraye	cakri viśva cakri
19	matsvā suśipra mandibhiḥ	mad su śiprā mandin
19	stomebhiḥ viśvacarṣaṇe	stoma viśvacarṣaṇi
19	sacā eṣu savaneṣu ā	sacā idam savana ā
19	asṛgram indra te giraḥ	sṛj indra tvad gir
19	prati tvām ut ahāsata	prati tvad ud hā
19	ajoṣāḥ vṛṣabham patim	ajoṣa vṛṣabha pati
19	sam codaya citram arvāk	sam coday citra arvāk
19	rādhaḥ indra vareṇyam	rādhas indra vareṇya
19	asat it te vibhu prabhu	as id tvad vibhu prabhu
19	asmān su tatra codaya	mad su tatra coday
19	indra rāye rabhasvataḥ	indra rai rabhasvat
19	tuvidyumna yaśasvataḥ	tuvi dyumna yaśasvat
19	sam gomat indra vājavat	sam gomant indra vājavat
19	asme pṛthu śravaḥ bṛhat	mad pṛthu śravas bṛhat
19	viśvāyuḥ dhehi akṣitam	viśva āyus dhā akṣita
19	asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat	mad dhā śravas bṛhat
19	dyumnam sahasrasātamam	dyumna sahasra sātama
19	indra tāḥ rathinīḥ iṣaḥ	indra tad rathin iṣ
19	vasoḥ indram vasupatim	vasu indra vasu pati
19	gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ ṛgmiyam	gir gṛ ṛgmiya
19	homa gantāram ūtaye	homa gantṛ ūti
19	sutesute nyokase	suta suta nyokas
19	bṛhat bṛhate ā it ariḥ	bṛhat bṛhat ā id ari
19	indrāya śūṣam arcati	indra śūṣa arc
 ---
110	gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇaḥ	gā tvad gāyatrin
110	arcanti arkam arkiṇaḥ	arc arka arkin
110	brahmāṇaḥ tvā śatakrato	brahman tvad śatakratu
110	ut vaṁśam iva yemire	ud vaṃśa iva yam
110	yat sānoḥ sānum ā aruhat	yat sānu sānu āruh
110	bhūri aspaṣTa kartvam	bhūri paś kṛ
110	tat indraḥ artham cetati	tad indra artha cit
110	yūthena vṛṣṇiḥ ejati	yūtha vṛṣṇi ej
110	yukṣvā hi keśinā harī	yuj hi keśin hari
110	vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā	vṛṣaṇa kakṣya prā
110	athā naḥ indra somapāḥ	atha mad indra soma pā
110	girām upaśrutim cara	gir upaśruti car
110	ā ihi stomān abhi svara	e stoma abhi svar
110	abhi gṛṇīhi ā ruva	abhi gṛ ā ru
110	brahma ca naḥ vaso sacā	brahman ca mad vasu sacā
110	indra yajñam ca vardhaya	indra yajña ca vardhay
110	uktham indrāya śaṁsyam	uktha indra śaṃs
110	vardhanam puruniṣṣidhe	vardhana puru niṣṣidh
110	śakraḥ yathā suteṣu naḥ	śakra yathā suta mad
110	rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca	ran sakhya ca
110	tam it sakhitve īmahe	tad id sakhi tva ī
110	tam rāye tam suvīrye	tad rai tad su vīrya
110	sa śakraḥ uta naḥ śakat	tad śakra uta mad śak
110	indraḥ vasu dayamānaḥ	indra vasu day
110	suvivṛtam sunirajam	suvivṛt suniraja
110	indra tvādātam it yaśaḥ	indra tvādāta id yaśas
110	gavām apa vrajam vṛdhi	go apa vraja vṛ
110	kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivaḥ	kṛ rādhas adrivat
110	nahi tvā rodasī ubhe	nahi tvad rodas ubh
110	ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ	ṛghāy inv
110	jeṣaḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ	ji svarvat ap
110	sam gāḥ asmabhyam dhūnuhi	sam go mad dhū
110	āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havam	āśrut karṇa śru hava
110	nū cit dadhiṣva me giraḥ	nu cit dhā mad gir
110	indra stomam imam mama	indra stoma idam mad
110	kṛṣvā yujaḥ cit antaram	kṛ yuj cit antara
110	vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamam	vid hi tvad vṛṣantama
110	vājeṣu havanaśrutam	vāja havana śrut
110	vṛṣantamasya hūmahe	vṛṣantama hvā
110	ūtim sahasrasātamām	ūti sahasra sātama
110	ā tū naḥ indra kauśika	ā tu mad indra kauśika
110	mandasānaḥ sutam piba	mand suta pā
110	navyam āyuḥ pra sū tira	navya āyus pra su tṛ
110	kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim	kṛ sahasra sā ṛṣi
110	pari tvā girvaṇaḥ giraḥ	pari tvad girvaṇas gir
110	imāḥ bhavantu viśvataḥ	idam bhū viśvatas
110	vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayaḥ	vṛdh āyu anu vṛddhi
110	juṣTāḥ bhavantu juṣTayaḥ	juṣ bhū juṣṭi
 ---
111	indram viśvāḥ avīvṛdhan	indra viśva vṛdh
111	samudravyacasam giraḥ	samudra vyacas gir
111	rathītamam rathīnām	rathītama rathin
111	vājānām satpatim patim	vāja satpati pati
111	sakhye te indra vājinaḥ	sakhya tvad indra vājin
111	mā bhema śavasaḥ pate	mā bhī śavas pati
111	tvām abhi pra nonumaḥ	tvad abhi pra nonāv
111	jetāram aparājitam	jetṛ aparājita
111	pūrvīḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	puru indra rāti
111	na vi dasyanti ūtayaḥ	na vi das ūti
111	yadī vājasya gomataḥ	yadi vāja gomat
111	stotṛbhyaḥ maṁhate magham	stotṛ mah magha
111	purām bhinduḥ yuvā kaviḥ	pur bhindu yuvan kavi
111	amitaujāḥ ajāyata	amita ojas jan
111	indraḥ viśvasya karmaṇaḥ	indra viśva karman
111	dhartā vajrī puruṣTutaḥ	dhartṛ vajrin puruṣṭuta
111	tvam valasya gomataḥ	tvad vala gomat
111	apa āvar adrivaḥ bilam	apavṛ adrivat bila
111	tvām devāḥ abibhyuṣaḥ	tvad deva a bhī
111	tujyamānāsaḥ āviṣuḥ	tuj av
111	tava aham śūra rātibhiḥ	tvad mad śūra rāti
111	prati āyam sindhum āvadan	prati i sindhu āvad
111	upa atiṣThanta girvaṇaḥ	upasthā girvaṇas
111	viduḥ te tasya kāravaḥ	vid tvad tad kāru
111	māyābhiḥ indra māyinam	māyā indra māyin
111	tvam śuṣṇam ava atiraḥ	tvad śuṣṇa avatṛ
111	viduḥ te tasya medhirāḥ	vid tvad tad medhira
111	teṣām śravāṁsi ut tira	tad śravas ud tṛ
111	indram īśānam ojasā	indra īś ojas
111	abhi stomāḥ anūṣata	abhi stoma nū
111	sahasram yasya rātayaḥ	sahasra yad rāti
111	uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ	uta vā as bhūyas
 ---
112	agnim dūtam vṛṇīmahe	agni dūta vṛ
112	hotāram viśvavedasam	hotṛ viśva vedas
112	asya yajñasya sukratum	idam yajña sukratu
112	agnimagnim havīmabhiḥ	agni agni havīman
112	sadā havanta viśpatim	sadā hvā viśpati
112	havyavāham purupriyam	havya vāha puru priya
112	agne devān iha ā vaha	agni deva iha ā vah
112	jajñānaḥ vṛktabarhiṣe	jan vṛktabarhis
112	asi hotā naḥ īḍyaḥ	as hotṛ mad īḍ
112	tān uśataḥ vi bodhaya	tad vaś vi bodhay
112	yat agne yāsi dūtyam	yat agni yā dūtya
112	devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi	deva ā sad barhis
112	ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ	ghṛtāhavana dīdī
112	prati sma riṣataḥ daha	prati sma riṣ dah
112	agne tvam rakṣasvinaḥ	agni tvad rakṣasvin
112	agninā agniḥ sam idhyate	agni agni sam indh
112	kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā	kavi gṛhapati yuvan
112	havyavāT juhvāsyaḥ	havyavah juhū āsya
112	kavim agnim upa stuhi	kavi agni upa stu
112	satyadharmāṇam adhvare	satya dharman adhvara
112	devam amīvacātanam	deva amīva cātana
112	yaḥ tvām agne haviṣpatiḥ	yad tvad agni haviṣpati
112	dūtam deva saparyati	dūta deva sapary
112	tasya sma prāvitā bhava	tad sma pra avitṛ bhū
112	yaḥ agnim devavītaye	yad agni deva vīti
112	haviṣmān āvivāsati	haviṣmat āvivās
112	tasmai pāvaka mṛLaya	tad pāvaka mṛḍay
112	sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivaḥ	tad mad pāvaka dīdī
112	agne devān iha ā vaha	agni deva iha ā vah
112	upa yajñam haviḥ ca naḥ	upa yajña havis ca mad
112	sa naḥ stavānaḥ ā bhara	tad mad stu ā bhṛ
112	gāyatreṇa navīyasā	gāyatra navīyas
112	rayim vīravatīm iṣam	rayi vīravat iṣ
112	agne śukreṇa śociṣā	agni śukra śocis
112	viśvābhiḥ devahūtibhiḥ	viśva deva hūti
112	imam stomam juṣasva naḥ	idam stoma juṣ mad
 ---
113	susamiddhaḥ naḥ ā vaha	su samindh mad ā vah
113	devān agne haviṣmate	deva agni haviṣmat
113	hotar pāvaka yakṣi ca	hotṛ pāvaka yaj ca
113	madhumantam tanūnapāt	madhumat tanūnapāt
113	yajñam deveṣu naḥ kave	yajña deva mad kavi
113	adyā kṛṇuhi vītaye	adya kṛ vīti
113	narāśaṁsam iha priyam	narāśaṃsa iha priya
113	asmin yajñe upa hvaye	idam yajña upa hvā
113	madhujihvam haviṣkṛtam	madhu jihvā haviṣkṛta
113	agne sukhatame rathe	agni sukhatama ratha
113	devān īLitaḥ ā vaha	deva īḍ ā vah
113	asi hotā manurhitaḥ	as hotṛ manus dhā
113	stṛṇīta barhiḥ ānuṣak	stṛ barhis ānuṣak
113	ghṛtapṛṣTham manīṣiṇaḥ	ghṛta pṛṣṭha manīṣin
113	yatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam	yatra amṛta cakṣaṇa
113	vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	vi śri ṛtāvṛdh
113	dvāraḥ devīḥ asaścataḥ	dvār deva asaścat
113	adyā nūnam ca yaṣTave	adya nūnam ca yaj
113	naktoṣāsā supeśasā	naktoṣāsā supeśas
113	asmin yajñe upa hvaye	idam yajña upa hvā
113	idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade	idam mad barhis āsad
113	tā sujihvau upa hvaye	tad su jihvā upa hvā
113	hotārā daivyā kavī	hotṛ daivya kavi
113	yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam	yajña mad yaj idam
113	iLā sarasvatī mahī	iḍā sarasvatī mahī
113	tisraḥ devīḥ mayobhuvaḥ	tri devī mayobhu
113	barhiḥ sīdantu asridhaḥ	barhis sad asridh
113	iha tvaṣTāram agriyam	iha tvaṣṭṛ agriya
113	viśvarūpam upa hvaye	viśva rūpa upa hvā
113	asmākam astu kevalaḥ	mad as kevala
113	ava sṛjā vanaspate	ava sṛj vanaspati
113	deva devebhyaḥ haviḥ	deva deva havis
113	pra dātuḥ astu cetanam	pra dātṛ as cetana
113	svāhā yajñam kṛṇotana	svāhā yajña kṛ
113	indrāya yajvanaḥ gṛhe	indra yajvan gṛha
113	tatra devān upa hvaye	tatra deva upa hvā
 ---
114	ā ebhiḥ agne duvaḥ giraḥ	ā idam agni duvas gir
114	viśvebhiḥ somapītaye	viśva soma pīti
114	devebhiḥ yāhi yakṣi ca	deva yā yaj ca
114	ā tvā kaṇvāḥ ahūṣata	ā tvad kaṇva hvā
114	gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ	gṛ vipra tvad dhī
114	devebhiḥ agne ā gahi	deva agni ā gam
114	indravāyū bṛhaspatim	indra vāyu bṛhaspati
114	mitrā agnim pūṣaṇam bhagam	mitra agni pūṣan bhaga
114	ādityān mārutam gaṇam	āditya māruta gaṇa
114	pra vaḥ bhriyante indavaḥ	pra tvad bhṛ indu
114	matsarāḥ mādayiṣṇavaḥ	matsara mādayiṣṇu
114	drapsāḥ madhvaḥ camūṣadaḥ	drapsa madhu camūṣad
114	īLate tvām avasyavaḥ	īḍ tvad avasyu
114	kaṇvāsaḥ vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	kaṇva vṛj barhis
114	haviṣmantaḥ araṁkṛtaḥ	haviṣmat araṃkṛt
114	ghṛtapṛṣThāḥ manoyujaḥ	ghṛta pṛṣṭha manas yuj
114	ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ	yad tvad vah vahni
114	ā devān somapītaye	ā deva soma pīti
114	tān yajatrān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	tad yajatra ṛtāvṛdh
114	agne patnīvataḥ kṛdhi	agni patnīvat kṛ
114	madhvaḥ sujihva pāyaya	madhu su jihvā pāyay
114	ye yajatrāḥ ye īḍyāḥ	yad yajatra yad īḍ
114	te te pibantu jihvayā	tad tvad pā jihvā
114	madhoḥ agne vaṣaTkṛti	madhu agni vaṣaṭ kṛt
114	ākīm sūryasya rocanāt	sūrya rocana
114	viśvān devān uṣarbudhaḥ	viśva deva uṣarbudh
114	vipraḥ hotā iha vakṣati	vipra hotṛ iha vah
114	viśvebhiḥ somyam madhu	viśva somya madhu
114	agne indreṇa vāyunā	agni indra vāyu
114	pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ	pā mitra dhāman
114	tvam hotā manurhitaḥ	tvad hotṛ manus dhā
114	agne yajñeṣu sīdasi	agni yajña sad
114	sa imam naḥ adhvaram yaja	tad idam mad adhvara yaj
114	yukṣvā hi aruṣīḥ rathe	yuj hi aruṣa ratha
114	haritaḥ deva rohitaḥ	harit deva rohit
114	tābhiḥ devān iha ā vaha	tad deva iha ā vah
 ---
115	indra somam piba ṛtunā	indra soma pā ṛtu
115	ā tvā viśantu indavaḥ	tvad viś indu
115	matsarāsaḥ tadokasaḥ	matsara tad oka
115	marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā	marut pā ṛtu
115	potrāt yajñam punītana	potra yajña pū
115	yūyam hi sthā sudānavaḥ	tvad hi as sudānu
115	abhi yajñam gṛṇīhi naḥ	abhi yajña gṛ mad
115	gnāvaḥ neṣTar piba ṛtunā	gnāvat neṣṭṛ pā ṛtu
115	tvam hi ratnadhāḥ asi	tvad hi ratna dhā as
115	agne devān iha ā vaha	agni deva iha ā vah
115	sādayā yoniṣu triṣu	sāday yoni tri
115	pari bhūṣa piba ṛtunā	pari bhūṣ pā ṛtu
115	brāhmaṇāt indra rādhasaḥ	brāhmaṇa indra rādhas
115	pibā somam ṛtūn anu	pā soma ṛtu anu
115	tava it hi sakhyam astṛtam	tvad id hi sakhya astṛta
115	yuvam dakṣam dhṛtavratā	tvad dakṣa dhṛ vrata
115	mitrāvaruṇā dūLabham	mitrāvaruṇa dūḍabha
115	ṛtunā yajñam āśāthe	ṛtu yajña aś
115	draviṇodāḥ draviṇasaḥ	draviṇas dā draviṇas
115	grāvahastāsaḥ adhvare	grāvan hasta adhvara
115	yajñeṣu devam īLate	yajña deva īḍ
115	draviṇodāḥ dadātu naḥ	draviṇas dā dā mad
115	vasūni yāni śṛṇvire	vasu yad śru
115	deveṣu tā vanāmahe	deva tad van
115	draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati	draviṇas dā pipīṣ
115	juhota pra ca tiṣThata	hu pra ca sthā
115	neṣTrāt ṛtubhiḥ iṣyata	neṣṭra ṛtu iṣ
115	yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhiḥ	yat tvad turīya ṛtu
115	draviṇodaḥ yajāmahe	draviṇas dā yaj
115	adha smā naḥ dadiḥ bhava	adha sma mad dadi bhū
115	aśvinā pibatam madhu	aśvin pā madhu
115	dīdyagnī śucivratā	dīdi agni śuci vrata
115	ṛtunā yajñavāhasā	ṛtu yajña vāhas
115	gārhapatyena santya	gārhapatya santya
115	ṛtunā yajñanīḥ asi	ṛtu yajñanī as
115	devān devayate yaja	deva devay yaj
 ---
116	ā tvā vahantu harayaḥ	ā tvad vah hari
116	vṛṣaṇam somapītaye	vṛṣan soma pīti
116	indra tvā sūracakṣasaḥ	indra tvad sūra cakṣas
116	imāḥ dhānāḥ ghṛtasnuvaḥ	idam dhānā ghṛtasnu
116	harī iha upa vakṣataḥ	hari iha upa vah
116	indram sukhatame rathe	indra sukhatama ratha
116	indram prātar havāmahe	indra prātar hvā
116	indram prayati adhvare	indra pre adhvara
116	indram somasya pītaye	indra soma pīti
116	upa naḥ sutam ā gahi	upa mad su ā gam
116	haribhiḥ indra keśibhiḥ	hari indra keśin
116	sute hi tvā havāmahe	su hi tvad hvā
116	sa imam naḥ stomam ā gahi	tad idam mad stoma ā gam
116	upa idam savanam sutam	upa idam savana su
116	gauraḥ na tṛṣitaḥ piba	gaura na tṛṣita pā
116	ime somāsaḥ indavaḥ	idam soma indu
116	sutāsaḥ adhi barhiṣi	su adhi barhis
116	tān indra sahase piba	tad indra sahas pā
116	ayam te stomaḥ agriyaḥ	idam tvad stoma agriya
116	hṛdispṛk astu śaṁtamaḥ	hṛdispṛś as śaṃtama
116	athā somam sutam piba	atha soma su pā
116	viśvam it savanam sutam	viśva id savana su
116	indraḥ madāya gacchati	indra mada gam
116	vṛtrahā somapītaye	vṛtrahan soma pīti
116	sa imam naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa	tad idam mad kāma ā pṛṇ
116	gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ śatakrato	go aśva śatakratu
116	stavāma tvā svādhyaḥ	stu tvad su ādhī
 ---
117	indrāvaruṇayoḥ aham	indrāvaruṇa mad
117	samrājoḥ avaḥ ā vṛṇe	samrāj avas ā vṛ
117	tā naḥ mṛLātaḥ īdṛśe	tad mad mṛḍ īdṛś
117	gantārā hi sthaḥ avase	gantṛ hi as avas
117	havam viprasya māvataḥ	hava vipra māvat
117	dhartārā carṣaṇīnām	dhartṛ carṣaṇi
117	anukāmam tarpayethām	anukāma tarpay
117	indrāvaruṇā rāyaḥ ā	indrāvaruṇa rai ā
117	tā vām nediṣTham īmahe	tad tvad nediṣṭha ī
117	yuvāku hi śacīnām	yuvāku hi śacī
117	yuvāku sumatīnām	yuvāku sumati
117	bhūyāma vājadāvnām	bhū vāja dāvan
117	indraḥ sahasradāvnām	indra sahasra dāvan
117	varuṇaḥ śaṁsyānām	varuṇa śaṃs
117	kratuḥ bhavati ukthyaḥ	kratu bhū ukthya
117	tayoḥ it avasā vayam	tad id avas mad
117	sanema ni ca dhīmahi	san ni ca dhā
117	syāt uta prarecanam	as uta prarecana
117	indrāvaruṇā vām aham	indrāvaruṇa tvad mad
117	huve citrāya rādhase	hvā citra rādhas
117	asmān su jigyuṣaḥ kṛtam	mad su ji kṛ
117	indrāvaruṇā nū nu vām	indrāvaruṇa nu nu tvad
117	siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣu ā	siṣās dhī ā
117	asmabhyam śarma yacchatam	mad śarman yam
117	pra vām aśnotu suṣTutiḥ	pra tvad aś suṣṭuti
117	indrāvaruṇā yām huve	indrāvaruṇa yad hvā
117	yām ṛdhāthe sadhastutim	yad ṛdh sadhastuti
 ---
118	somānam svaraṇam	soman svaraṇa
118	kṛṇuhi brahmaṇaḥ pate	kṛ brahman pati
118	kakṣīvantam yaḥ auśijaḥ	kakṣīvant yad auśija
118	yaḥ revān yaḥ amīvahā	yad revat yad amīva han
118	vasuvit puṣTivardhanaḥ	vasu vid puṣṭi vardhana
118	sa naḥ siṣaktu yaḥ turaḥ	tad mad sac yad tura
118	mā naḥ śaṁsaḥ araruṣaḥ	mā mad śaṃsa a rā
118	dhūrtiḥ praṇak martyasya	dhūrti praṇaś martya
118	rakṣā naḥ brahmaṇaḥ pate	rakṣ mad brahman pati
118	sa ghā vīraḥ na riṣyati	tad gha vīra na riṣ
118	yam indraḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad indra brahman pati
118	somaḥ hinoti martyam	soma hi martya
118	tvam tam brahmaṇaḥ pate	tvad tad brahman pati
118	somaḥ indraḥ ca martyam	soma indra ca martya
118	dakṣiṇā pātu aṁhasaḥ	dakṣiṇā pā aṃhas
118	sadasaḥ patim adbhutam	sadas pati adbhuta
118	priyam indrasya kāmyam	priya indra kāmya
118	sanim medhām ayāsiṣam	sani medhā yā
118	yasmāt ṛte na sidhyati	yad ṛte na sidh
118	yajñaḥ vipaścitaḥ cana	yajña vipaścit cana
118	sa dhīnām yogam invati	tad dhī yoga inv
118	āt ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim	āt ṛdh haviṣkṛti
118	prāñcam kṛṇoti adhvaram	prāñc kṛ adhvara
118	hotrā deveṣu gacchati	hotrā deva gam
118	narāśaṁsam sudhṛṣTamam	narāśaṃsa sudhṛṣṭama
118	apaśyam saprathastamam	paś saprathastama
118	divaḥ na sadmamakhasam	div na sadmamakhas
 ---
119	prati tyam cārum adhvaram	prati tya cāru adhvara
119	gopīthāya pra hūyase	gopītha pra hvā
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	nahi devaḥ na martyaḥ	nahi deva na martya
119	mahaḥ tava kratum paraḥ	mah tvad kratu para
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ye mahaḥ rajasaḥ viduḥ	yad mah rajas vid
119	viśve devāsaḥ adruhaḥ	viśva deva adruh
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ye ugrāḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ	yad ugra arka arc
119	anādhṛṣTāsaḥ ojasā	anādhṛṣṭa ojas
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ye śubhrāḥ ghoravarpasaḥ	yad śubhra ghora varpas
119	sukṣatrāsaḥ riśādasaḥ	su kṣatra riśādas
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ye nākasya adhi rocane	yad nāka adhi rocana
119	divi devāsaḥ āsate	div deva ās
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ye īṅkhayanti parvatān	yad īṅkhay parvata
119	tiraḥ samudram arṇavam	tiras samudra arṇava
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	ā ye tanvanti raśmibhiḥ	ā yad tan raśmi
119	tiraḥ samudram ojasā	tiras samudra ojas
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
119	abhi tvā pūrvapītaye	abhi tvad pūrva pīti
119	sṛjāmi somyam madhu	sṛj somya madhu
119	marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi	marut agni ā gam
 ---
120	ayam devāya janmane	idam deva janman
120	stomaḥ viprebhiḥ āsayā	stoma vipra āsayā
120	akāri ratnadhātamaḥ	kṛ ratna dhātama
120	ye indrāya vacoyujā	yad indra vacas yuj
120	tatakṣuḥ manasā harī	takṣ manas hari
120	śamībhiḥ yajñam āśata	śamī yajña aś
120	takṣan nāsatyābhyām	takṣ nāsatya
120	parijmānam sukham ratham	parijman sukha ratha
120	takṣan dhenum sabardughām	takṣ dhenu sabardugha
120	yuvānā pitarā punar	yuvan pitṛ punar
120	satyamantrāḥ ṛjūyavaḥ	satya mantra ṛjūyu
120	ṛbhavaḥ viṣTī akrata	ṛbhu viṣṭi kṛ
120	sam vaḥ madāsaḥ agmata	sam tvad mada gam
120	indreṇa ca marutvatā	indra ca marutvat
120	ādityebhiḥ ca rājabhiḥ	āditya ca rājan
120	uta tyam camasam navam	uta tya camasa nava
120	tvaṣTuḥ devasya niṣkṛtam	tvaṣṭṛ deva niṣkṛ
120	akarta caturaḥ punar	kṛ catur punar
120	te naḥ ratnāni dhattana	tad mad ratna dhā
120	triḥ ā sāptāni sunvate	tris ā sāpta su
120	ekamekam suśastibhiḥ	eka eka su śasti
120	adhārayanta vahnayaḥ	dhāray vahni
120	abhajanta sukṛtyayā	bhaj su kṛtyā
120	bhāgam deveṣu yajñiyam	bhāga deva yajñiya
 ---
121	iha indrāgnī upa hvaye	iha indra agni upa hvā
121	tayoḥ it stomam uśmasi	tad id stoma vaś
121	tā somam somapātamā	tad soma soma pātama
121	tā yajñeṣu pra śaṁsata	tad yajña pra śaṃs
121	indrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ	indra agni śubh nṛ
121	tā gāyatreṣu gāyata	tad gāyatra gā
121	tā mitrasya praśastaye	tad mitra praśasti
121	indrāgnī tā havāmahe	indra agni tad hvā
121	somapā somapītaye	soma pā soma pīti
121	ugrā santā havāmahe	ugra as hvā
121	upa idam savanam sutam	upa idam savana su
121	indrāgnī ā iha gacchatām	indra agni ā iha gam
121	tā mahāntā sadaspatī	tad mahat sadaspati
121	indrāgnī rakṣaḥ ubjatam	indra agni rakṣas ubj
121	aprajāḥ santu atriṇaḥ	apraja as atrin
121	tena satyena jāgṛtam	tad satya jāgṛ
121	adhi pracetune pade	adhi pracetuna pada
121	indrāgnī śarma yacchatam	indra agni śarman yam
 ---
122	prātaryujā vi bodhaya	prātar yuj vi bodhay
122	aśvinau ā iha gacchatām	aśvin ā iha gam
122	asya somasya pītaye	idam soma pīti
122	yā surathā rathītamā	yad su ratha rathītama
122	ubhā devā divispṛśā	ubh deva divispṛś
122	aśvinā tā havāmahe	aśvin tad hvā
122	yā vām kaśā madhumatī	yad tvad kaśā madhumat
122	aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī	aśvin sūnṛtāvat
122	tayā yajñam mimikṣatam	tad yajña mikṣ
122	nahi vām asti dūrake	nahi tvad as dūraka
122	yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ	yatra ratha gam
122	aśvinā sominaḥ gṛham	aśvin somin gṛha
122	hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaye	hiraṇya pāṇi ūti
122	savitāram upa hvaye	savitṛ upa hvā
122	sa cettā devatā padam	tad cit devatā pada
122	apām napātam avase	ap napāt av
122	savitāram upa stuhi	savitṛ upa stu
122	tasya vratāni uśmasi	tad vrata vaś
122	vibhaktāram havāmahe	vibhaktṛ hvā
122	vasoḥ citrasya rādhasaḥ	vasu citra rādhas
122	savitāram nṛcakṣasam	savitṛ nṛ cakṣas
122	sakhāyaḥ ā ni sīdata	sakhi ā ni sad
122	savitā stomyaḥ nu naḥ	savitṛ stomya nu mad
122	dātā rādhāṁsi śumbhati	dātṛ rādhas śubh
122	agne patnīḥ iha ā vaha	agni patnī iha ā vah
122	devānām uśatīḥ upa	deva vaś upa
122	tvaṣTāram somapītaye	tvaṣṭṛ soma pīti
122	ā gnāḥ agne iha avase	ā gnā agni iha av
122	hotrām yaviṣTha bhāratīm	hotrā yaviṣṭha bhāratī
122	varūtrīm dhiṣaṇām vaha	varūtṛ dhiṣaṇā vah
122	abhī naḥ devīḥ avasā	abhi mad devī avas
122	mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ	mah śarman nṛ patnī
122	acchinnapatrāḥ sacantām	acchinna pattra sac
122	iha indrāṇīm upa hvaye	iha indrāṇī upa hvā
122	varuṇānīm svastaye	varuṇānī svasti
122	agnāyīm somapītaye	agnāyī soma pīti
122	mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca naḥ	mahi div pṛthivī ca mad
122	imam yajñam mimikṣatām	idam yajña mikṣ
122	pipṛtām naḥ bharīmabhiḥ	pṛ mad bharīman
122	tayoḥ it ghṛtavat payaḥ	tad id ghṛtavat payas
122	viprāḥ rihanti dhītibhiḥ	vipra rih dhīti
122	gandharvasya dhruve pade	gandharva dhruva pada
122	syonā pṛthivi bhava	syona pṛthivī bhū
122	anṛkṣarā niveśanī	anṛkṣara niveśana
122	yacchā naḥ śarma saprathaḥ	yam mad śarman saprathas
122	ataḥ devāḥ avantu naḥ	atas deva av mad
122	yataḥ viṣṇuḥ vicakrame	yatas viṣṇu vikram
122	pṛthivyāḥ sapta dhāmabhiḥ	pṛthivī saptan dhāman
122	idam viṣṇuḥ vi cakrame	idam viṣṇu vi kram
122	tredhā ni dadhe padam	tredhā ni dhā pada
122	samūLham asya pāṁsure	saṃvah idam pāṃsura
122	trīṇi padā vi cakrame	tri pada vi kram
122	viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ adābhyaḥ	viṣṇu gopā adābhya
122	ataḥ dharmāṇi dhārayan	atas dharma dhāray
122	viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata	viṣṇu karman paś
122	yataḥ vratāni paspaśe	yatas vrata paś
122	indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā	indra yujya sakhi
122	tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam	tad viṣṇu parama pada
122	sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ	sadā paś sūri
122	divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam	div iva cakṣus ātan
122	tat viprāsaḥ vipanyavaḥ	tad vipra vipanyu
122	jāgṛvāṁsaḥ sam indhate	jāgṛ sam indh
122	viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam	viṣṇu yad parama pada
 ---
123	tīvrāḥ somāsaḥ ā gahi	tīvra soma ā gam
123	āśīrvantaḥ sutāḥ ime	āśīrvat suta idam
123	vāyo tān prasthitān piba	vāyu tad prasthā pā
123	ubhā devā divispṛśā	ubh deva divispṛś
123	indravāyū havāmahe	indra vāyu hvā
123	asya somasya pītaye	idam soma pīti
123	indravāyū manojuvā	indra vāyu manas jū
123	viprāḥ havante ūtaye	vipra hvā ūti
123	sahasrākṣā dhiyaḥ patī	sahasra akṣa dhī pati
123	mitram vayam havāmahe	mitra mad hvā
123	varuṇam somapītaye	varuṇa soma pīti
123	jajñānā pūtadakṣasā	jan pū dakṣas
123	ṛtena yau ṛtāvṛdhau	ṛta yad ṛtāvṛdh
123	ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patī	ṛta jyotis pati
123	tā mitrāvaruṇā huve	tad mitrāvaruṇa hvā
123	varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvat	varuṇa prāvitṛ bhū
123	mitraḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	mitra viśva ūti
123	karatām naḥ surādhasaḥ	kṛ mad surādhas
123	marutvantam havāmahe	marutvat hvā
123	indram ā somapītaye	indra ā soma pīti
123	sajūḥ gaṇena tṛmpatu	sajūs gaṇa tṛp
123	indrajyeṣThāḥ marudgaṇāḥ	indra jyeṣṭha marut gaṇa
123	devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ	deva pūṣarāti
123	viśve mama śrutā havam	viśva mad śru hava
123	hata vṛtram sudānavaḥ	han vṛtra sudānu
123	indreṇa sahasā yujā	indra sahas yuj
123	mā naḥ duḥśaṁsaḥ īśata	mā mad duḥśaṃsa īś
123	viśvān devān havāmahe	viśva deva hvā
123	marutaḥ somapītaye	marut soma pīti
123	ugrāḥ hi pṛśnimātaraḥ	ugra hi pṛśni mātṛ
123	jayatām iva tanyatuḥ	ji iva tanyatu
123	marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā	marut i dhṛṣṇuyā
123	yat śubham yāthanā naraḥ	yad śubha yā nṛ
123	haskārāt vidyutaḥ pari	haskāra vidyut pari
123	ataḥ jātāḥ avantu naḥ	atas jan av mad
123	marutaḥ mṛLayantu naḥ	marut mṛḍay mad
123	ā pūṣan citrabarhiṣam	ā pūṣan citra barhis
123	āghṛṇe dharuṇam divaḥ	āghṛṇi dharuṇa div
123	ā ajā naṣTam yathā paśum	āj naś yathā paśu
123	pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇiḥ	pūṣan rājan āghṛṇi
123	apagūLham guhā hitam	apaguh guhā dhā
123	avindat citrabarhiṣam	vid citra barhis
123	uta u sa mahyam indubhiḥ	uta u tad mad indu
123	ṣaT yuktān anuseṣidhat	ṣaṣ yuj anuseṣidh
123	gobhiḥ yavam na carkṛṣat	go yava na carkṛṣ
123	ambayaḥ yanti adhvabhiḥ	ambi i adhvan
123	jāmayaḥ adhvarīyatām	jāmi adhvarīy
123	pṛñcatīḥ madhunā payaḥ	pṛc madhu payas
123	amūḥ yāḥ upa sūrye	adas yad upa sūrya
123	yābhiḥ vā sūryaḥ saha	yad vā sūrya saha
123	tāḥ naḥ hinvantu adhvaram	tad mad hi adhvara
123	apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye	ap devī upa hvā
123	yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ	yatra go pā mad
123	sindhubhyaḥ kartvam haviḥ	sindhu kṛ havis
123	apsu antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam	ap antar amṛta ap bheṣaja
123	apām uta praśastaye	ap uta praśasti
123	devāḥ bhavata vājinaḥ	deva bhū vājin
123	apsu me somaḥ abravīt	ap mad soma brū
123	antar viśvāni bheṣajā	antar viśva bheṣaja
123	agnim ca viśvaśambhuvam	agni ca viśva śambhu
123	āpaḥ ca viśvabheṣajīḥ	ap ca viśva bheṣaja
123	āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajam	ap pṛ bheṣaja
123	varūtham tanve mama	varūtha tanū mad
123	jyok ca sūryam dṛśe	jyok ca sūrya dṛś
123	idam āpaḥ pra vahata	idam ap pra vah
123	yat kim ca duritam mayi	yad ka ca durita mad
123	yat vā aham abhidudroha	yad vā mad abhidruh
123	yat vā śepe uta anṛtam	yad vā śap uta anṛta
123	āpaḥ adya anu acāriṣam	ap adya anu car
123	rasena sam agasmahi	rasa sam gam
123	payasvān agne ā gahi	payasvat agni ā gam
123	tam mā sam sṛja varcasā	tad mad sam sṛj varcas
123	sam mā agne varcasā sṛja	sam mad agni varcas sṛj
123	sam prajayā sam āyuṣā	sam prajā sam āyus
123	vidyuḥ me asya devāḥ	vid mad idam deva
123	indraḥ vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ	indra vid saha ṛṣi
 ---
124	kasya nūnam katamasya amṛtānām	ka nūnam katama amṛta
124	manāmahe cāru devasya nāma	man cāru deva nāman
124	kaḥ naḥ mahyai aditaye punar dāt	ka mad mahi aditi punar dā
124	pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca	pitṛ ca dṛś mātṛ ca
124	agneḥ vayam prathamasya amṛtānām	agni mad prathama amṛta
124	manāmahe cāru devasya nāma	man cāru deva nāman
124	sa naḥ mahyai aditaye punar dāt	tad mad mahi aditi punar dā
124	pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca	pitṛ ca dṛś mātṛ ca
124	abhi tvā deva savitar	abhi tvad deva savitṛ
124	īśānam vāryāṇām	īś vārya
124	sadā avan bhāgam īmahe	sadā av bhāga i
124	yaḥ cit hi te itthā bhagaḥ	yad cit hi tvad itthā bhaga
124	śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ	śam purā nid
124	adveṣaḥ hastayoḥ dadhe	a dveṣa hasta dhā
124	bhagabhaktasya te vayam	bhaga bhaj tad mad
124	ut aśema tava avasā	ud aś tvad avas
124	mūrdhānam rāyaḥ ārabhe	mūrdhan rai ārabh
124	nahi te kṣatram na sahaḥ na manyum	nahi tvad kṣatra na sahas na manyu
124	vayaḥ cana amī patayantaḥ āpuḥ	vayas cana adas patay āp
124	na imāḥ āpaḥ animiṣam carantīḥ	na idam ap animiṣa car
124	na ye vātasya praminanti abhvam	na yad vāta pramī abhva
124	abudhne rājā varuṇaḥ vanasya	abudhna rājan varuṇa vana
124	ūrdhvam stūpam dadate pūtadakṣaḥ	ūrdhva stūpa dā pū dakṣa
124	nīcīnāḥ sthuḥ upari budhnaḥ eṣām	nīcīna sthā upari budhna idam
124	asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ syuḥ	mad antar nidhā ketu as
124	urum hi rājā varuṇaḥ cakāra	uru hi rājan varuṇa kṛ
124	sūryāya panthām anvetavai u	sūrya pathin anvi u
124	apade pādā pratidhātave kar	a pad pāda pratidhā kṛ
124	uta apavaktā hṛdayāvidhaḥ cit	uta apavaktṛ hṛdayāvidh cit
124	śatam te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram	śata tvad rājan bhiṣaj sahasra
124	urvī gabhīrā sumatiḥ te astu	uru gabhīra sumati tvad as
124	bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācaiḥ	bādh dūra nirṛti parācais
124	kṛtam cit enaḥ pra mumugdhi asmat	kṛ cit enas pra muc mad
124	amī ye ṛkṣāḥ nihitāsaḥ uccā	adas yad ṛkṣa nidhā uccā
124	naktam dadṛśre kuha cit divā īyuḥ	nakta dṛś kuha cit divā i
124	adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni	adabdha varuṇa vrata
124	vicākaśat candramāḥ naktam eti	vicākaś candramas nakta i
124	tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ	tad tvad yā brahman vand
124	tat ā śāste yajamānaḥ havirbhiḥ	tad ā śās yajamāna havis
124	aheLamānaḥ varuṇa iha bodhi	a hīḍ varuṇa iha bhū
124	uruśaṁsa mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ	uru śaṃsa mā mad āyus pra muṣ
124	tat it naktam tat divā mahyam āhuḥ	tad id nakta tad divā mad ah
124	tat ayam ketaḥ hṛdaḥ ā vi caṣTe	tad idam keta hṛd ā vi cakṣ
124	śunaḥśepaḥ yam ahvat gṛbhītaḥ	śunaḥśepa yad hvā grah
124	saḥ asmān rājā varuṇaḥ mumoktu	tad mad rājan varuṇa muc
124	śunaḥśepaḥ hi ahvat gṛbhītaḥ	śunaḥśepa hi hvā grah
124	triṣu ādityam drupadeṣu baddhaḥ	tri āditya dru pada bandh
124	ava enam rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyāt	ava enad rājan varuṇa sṛj
124	vidvān adabdhaḥ vi mumoktu pāśān	vid adabdha vi muc pāśa
124	ava te heLaḥ varuṇa namobhiḥ	ava tvad heḍas varuṇa namas
124	ava yajñebhiḥ īmahe havirbhiḥ	ava yajña i havis
124	kṣayan asmabhyam asura pracetaḥ	kṣi mad asura pracetas
124	rājan enāṁsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni	rājan enas śrath kṛ
124	ut uttamam varuṇa pāśam asmat	ud uttama varuṇa pāśa mad
124	ava adhamam vi madhyamam śrathāya	ava adhama vi madhyama śrathāy
124	athā vayam āditya vrate tava	atha mad āditya vrata tvad
124	anāgasaḥ aditaye syāma	anāgas aditi as
 ---
125	yat cit hi te viśaḥ yathā	yat cit hi tvad viś yathā
125	pra deva varuṇa vratam	pra deva varuṇa vrata
125	minīmasi dyavidyavi	mī div div
125	mā naḥ vadhāya hatnave	mā mad vadha hatnu
125	jihīLānasya rīradhaḥ	hīḍ radh
125	mā hṛṇānasya manyave	mā hṛ manyu
125	vi mṛLīkāya te manaḥ	vi mṛḍīka tvad manas
125	rathīḥ aśvam na saṁditam	rathī aśva na saṃdo
125	gīrbhiḥ varuṇa sīmahi	gir varuṇa sā
125	parā hi me vimanyavaḥ	parā hi mad vimanyu
125	patanti vasyaiṣTaye	pat vasyas iṣṭi
125	vayaḥ na vasatīḥ upa	vi na vasati upa
125	kadā kṣatraśriyam naram	kadā kṣatra śrī nara
125	ā varuṇam karāmahe	ā varuṇa kṛ
125	mṛLīkāya urucakṣasam	mṛḍīka uru cakṣas
125	tat it samānam āśāte	tad id samāna aś
125	venantā na pra yucchataḥ	ven na pra yu
125	dhṛtavratāya dāśuṣe	dhṛ vrata dāś
125	vedā yaḥ vīnām padam	vid yad vi pada
125	antarikṣeṇa patatām	antarikṣa pat
125	veda nāvaḥ samudriyaḥ	vid nau samudriya
125	veda māsaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ	vid mās dhṛ vrata
125	dvādaśa prajāvataḥ	dvādaśan prajāvat
125	vedā yaḥ upajāyate	vid yad upajan
125	veda vātasya vartanim	vid vāta vartani
125	uroḥ ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ	uru ṛṣva bṛhat
125	vedā ye adhyāsate	vid yad adhyās
125	ni sasāda dhṛtavrataḥ	ni sad dhṛ vrata
125	varuṇaḥ pastyāsu ā	varuṇa pastyā ā
125	sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ	sāmrājya su kratu
125	ataḥ viśvāni adbhutā	atas viśva adbhuta
125	cikitvān abhi paśyati	cit abhi paś
125	kṛtāni yā ca kartvā	kṛ yad ca kṛ
125	sa naḥ viśvāhā sukratuḥ	tad mad viśvāhā su kratu
125	ādityaḥ supathā karat	āditya su patha kṛ
125	pra naḥ āyūṁṣi tāriṣat	pra mad āyus tṛ
125	bibhrat drāpim hiraṇyayam	bhṛ drāpi hiraṇyaya
125	varuṇaḥ vasta nirṇijam	varuṇa vas nirṇij
125	pari spaśaḥ ni sedire	pari spaś ni sad
125	na yam dipsanti dipsavaḥ	na yad dips dipsu
125	na druhvāṇaḥ janānām	na druhvan jana
125	na devam abhimātayaḥ	na deva abhimāti
125	uta yaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā	uta yad mānuṣa ā
125	yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā	yaśas kṛ asāmi ā
125	asmākam udareṣu ā	mad udara ā
125	parā me yanti dhītayaḥ	parā mad i dhīti
125	gāvaḥ na gavyūtīḥ anu	go na gavyūti anu
125	icchantīḥ urucakṣasam	iṣ uru cakṣas
125	sam nu vocāvahai punar	sam nu vac punar
125	yataḥ me madhu ābhṛtam	yatas mad madhu ābhṛ
125	hotā iva kṣadase priyam	hotṛ iva kṣad priya
125	darśam nu viśvadarśatam	dṛś nu viśva darśata
125	darśam ratham adhi kṣami	dṛś ratha adhi kṣam
125	etāḥ juṣata me giraḥ	etad juṣ mad gir
125	imam me varuṇa śrudhī	idam mad varuṇa śru
125	havam adyā ca mṛLaya	hava adya ca mṛḍay
125	tvām avasyuḥ ā cake	tvad avasyu ā kan
125	tvam viśvasya medhira	tvad viśva medhira
125	divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca rājasi	div ca gam ca rāj
125	sa yāmani prati śrudhi	tad yāman prati śru
125	ut uttamam mumugdhi naḥ	ud uttama muc mad
125	vi pāśam madhyamam cṛta	vi pāśa madhyama cṛt
125	ava adhamāni jīvase	ava adhama jīv
 ---
126	vasiṣvā hi miyedhya	vas hi miyedhya
126	vastrāṇi ūrjām pate	vastra ūrj pati
126	sa imam naḥ adhvaram yaja	tad idam mad adhvara yaj
126	ni naḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ	ni mad hotṛ vareṇya
126	sada yaviṣTha manmabhiḥ	sadā yaviṣṭha manman
126	agne divitmatā vacaḥ	agni divitmat vacas
126	ā hi smā sūnave pitā	ā hi sma sūnu pitṛ
126	āpiḥ yajati āpaye	āpi yaj āpi
126	sakhā sakhye vareṇyaḥ	sakhi sakhi vareṇya
126	ā naḥ barhiḥ riśādasaḥ	ā mad barhis riśādas
126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
126	sīdantu manuṣaḥ yathā	sad manus yathā
126	pūrvya hotar asya naḥ	pūrvya hotṛ idam mad
126	mandasva sakhyasya ca	mand sakhya ca
126	imāḥ u su śrudhī giraḥ	idam u su śru gir
126	yat cit hi śaśvatā tanā	yat cit hi śaśvat tan
126	devaṁdevam yajāmahe	deva deva yaj
126	tve it hūyate haviḥ	tvad id hu havis
126	priyaḥ naḥ astu viśpatiḥ	priya mad as viśpati
126	hotā mandraḥ vareṇyaḥ	hotṛ mandra vareṇya
126	priyāḥ svagnayaḥ vayam	priya su agni mad
126	svagnayaḥ hi vāryam	su agni hi vārya
126	devāsaḥ dadhire ca naḥ	deva dhā ca mad
126	svagnayaḥ manāmahe	su agni man
126	athā naḥ ubhayeṣām	atha mad ubhaya
126	amṛta martyānām	amṛta martya
126	mithaḥ santu praśastayaḥ	mithas as praśasti
126	viśvebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ	viśva agni agni
126	imam yajñam idam vacaḥ	idam yajña idam vacas
126	canaḥ dhāḥ sahasaḥ yaho	canas dhā sahas yahu
 ---
127	aśvam na tvā vāravantam	aśva na tvad vāravat
127	vandadhyai agnim namobhiḥ	vand agni namas
127	samrājantam adhvarāṇām	saṃrāj adhvara
127	sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā	tad gha mad sūnu śavas
127	pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ	pṛthu pragāman su śeva
127	mīḍhvān asmākam babhūyāt	mīḍhvas mad bhū
127	sa naḥ dūrāt ca āsāt ca	tad mad dūrāt ca āsāt ca
127	ni martyāt aghāyoḥ	ni martya aghāyu
127	pāhi sadam it viśvāyuḥ	pā sadam id viśvāyu
127	imam ū su tvam asmākam	idam u su tvad mad
127	sanim gāyatram navyāṁsam	sani gāyatra navyas
127	agne deveṣu pra vocaḥ	agni deva pra vac
127	ā naḥ bhaja parameṣu	ā mad bhaj parama
127	ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu	ā vāja madhyama
127	śikṣā vasvaḥ antamasya	śikṣ vasu antama
127	vibhaktā asi citrabhāno	vibhaktṛ as citrabhānu
127	sindhoḥ ūrmau upāke ā	sindhu ūrmi upāka ā
127	sadyaḥ dāśuṣe kṣarasi	sadyas dāś kṣar
127	yam agne pṛtsu martyam	yad agni pṛt martya
127	avāḥ vājeṣu yam junāḥ	av vāja yad jū
127	sa yantā śaśvatīḥ iṣaḥ	tad yam śaśvat iṣ
127	nakiḥ asya sahantya	nakir idam sahantya
127	paryetā kayasya cit	parī kaya cit
127	vājaḥ asti śravāyyaḥ	vāja as śravāyya
127	sa vājam viśvacarṣaṇiḥ	tad vāja viśvacarṣaṇi
127	arvadbhiḥ astu tarutā	arvant as tarutṛ
127	viprebhiḥ astu sanitā	vipra as sanitṛ
127	jarābodha tat viviḍḍhi	jarā bodha tad viṣ
127	viśeviśe yajñiyāya	viś viś yajñiya
127	stomam rudrāya dṛśīkam	stoma rudra dṛśīka
127	sa naḥ mahān animānaḥ	tad mad mahat animāna
127	dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ	dhūmaketu puru ścandra
127	dhiye vājāya hinvatu	dhī vāja hi
127	sa revān iva viśpatiḥ	tad revat iva viśpati
127	daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ	daivya ketu śru mad
127	ukthaiḥ agniḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ	uktha agni bṛhadbhānu
127	namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ namaḥ arbhakebhyaḥ	namas mahat namas arbhaka
127	namaḥ yuvabhyaḥ namaḥ āśinebhyaḥ	namas yuvan namas āśina
127	yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma	yaj deva yadi śak
127	mā jyāyasaḥ śaṁsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ	mā jyāyas śaṃsa ā vṛj deva
 ---
128	yatra grāvā pṛthubudhnaḥ	yatra grāvan pṛthu budhna
128	ūrdhvaḥ bhavati sotave	ūrdhva bhū su
128	ulūkhalasutānām	ulūkhala su
128	ava it u indra jalgulaḥ	ava id u indra jargur
128	yatra dvau iva jaghanā	yatra dvi iva jaghana
128	adhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā	adhiṣavaṇya kṛ
128	ulūkhalasutānām	ulūkhala su
128	ava it u indra jalgulaḥ	ava id u indra jargur
128	yatra nārī apacyavam	yatra nārī apacyava
128	upacyavam ca śikṣate	upacyava ca śikṣ
128	ulūkhalasutānām	ulūkhala su
128	ava it u indra jalgulaḥ	ava id u indra jargur
128	yatra manthām vibadhnate	yatra manthā vibandh
128	raśmīn yamitavai iva	raśmi yam iva
128	ulūkhalasutānām	ulūkhala su
128	ava it u indra jalgulaḥ	ava id u indra jargur
128	yat cit hi tvam gṛhegṛhe	yat cit hi tvad gṛha gṛha
128	ulūkhalaka yujyase	ulūkhalaka yuj
128	iha dyumattamam vada	iha dyumattama vad
128	jayatām iva dundubhiḥ	ji iva dundubhi
128	uta sma te vanaspate	uta sma tvad vanaspati
128	vātaḥ vi vāti agram it	vāta vi vā agra id
128	atha u indrāya pātave	atha u indra pā
128	sunu somam ulūkhala	su soma ulūkhala
128	āyajī vājasātamā	āyaji vāja sātama
128	tā hi uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ	tad hi uccā vibharibhṛ
128	harī iva andhāṁsi bapsatā	hari iva andhas bhas
128	tā naḥ adya vanaspatī	tad mad adya vanaspati
128	ṛṣvau ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ	ṛṣva ṛṣva sotṛ
128	indrāya madhumat sutam	indra madhumat su
128	ut śiṣTam camvoḥ bhara	ucchiṣṭa camū bhṛ
128	somam pavitre ā sṛja	soma pavitra ā sṛj
128	ni dhehi goḥ adhi tvaci	ni dhā go adhi tvac
 ---
129	yat cit hi satya somapāḥ	yat cit hi satya soma pā
129	anāśastāḥ iva smasi	an āśaṃs iva as
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	śiprin vājānām pate	śiprin vāja pati
129	śacīvaḥ tava daṁsanā	śacīvat tvad daṃsanā
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	ni svāpayā mithūdṛśā	ni svāpay mithūdṛś
129	sastām abudhyamāne	sas a budh
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	sasantu tyāḥ arātayaḥ	sas tya arāti
129	bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ	budh śūra rāti
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	sam indra gardabham mṛṇa	sam indra gardabha mṛṇ
129	nuvantam pāpayā amuyā	nū pāpa adas
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā	pat kuṇḍṛṇācī
129	dūram vātaḥ vanāt adhi	dūram vāta vana adhi
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
129	sarvam parikrośam jahi	sarva parikrośa han
129	jambhayā kṛkadāśvam	jambhay kṛkadāśū
129	ā tū naḥ indra śaṁsaya	ā tu mad indra śaṃsay
129	goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu	go aśva śubhri
129	sahasreṣu tuvīmagha	sahasra tuvīmagha
 ---
130	ā vaḥ indram krivim yathā	ā tvad indra krivi yathā
130	vājayantaḥ śatakratum	vājay śatakratu
130	maṁhiṣTham siñce indubhiḥ	maṃhiṣṭha sic indu
130	śatam vā yaḥ śucīnām	śata vā yad śuci
130	sahasram vā samāśirām	sahasra vā samāśir
130	ā it u nimnam na rīyate	ā id u nimna na ri
130	sam yat madāya śuṣmiṇe	sam yat mada śuṣmin
130	enā hi asya udare	enā hi idam udara
130	samudraḥ na vyacaḥ dadhe	samudra na vyacas dhā
130	ayam u te sam atasi	idam u tvad sam at
130	kapotaḥ iva garbhadhim	kapota iva garbhadhi
130	vacaḥ tat cit naḥ ohase	vacas tad cit mad ūh
130	stotram rādhānām pate	stotra rādhā pati
130	girvāhaḥ vīra yasya te	girvāhas vīra yad tvad
130	vibhūtiḥ astu sūnṛtā	vibhūti as sūnṛta
130	ūrdhvaḥ tiṣThā naḥ ūtaye	ūrdhva sthā mad ūti
130	asmin vāje śatakrato	idam vāja śatakratu
130	sam anyeṣu bravāvahai	sam anya brū
130	yogeyoge tavastaram	yoga yoga tavastara
130	vājevāje havāmahe	vāja vāja hvā
130	sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye	sakhi indra ūti
130	ā ghā gamat yadi śravat	ā gha gam yadi śru
130	sahasriṇībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	sahasrin ūti
130	vājebhiḥ upa naḥ havam	vāja upa mad hava
130	anu pratnasya okasaḥ	anu pratna oka
130	huve tuvipratim naram	hvā tuviprati nṛ
130	yam te pūrvam pitā huve	yad tvad pūrvam pitṛ hvā
130	tam tvā vayam viśvavāra	tad tvad mad viśva vāra
130	ā śāsmahe puruhūta	śās puruhūta
130	sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ	sakhi vasu jaritṛ
130	asmākam śipriṇīnām	mad śiprin
130	somapāḥ somapāvnām	soma pā soma pāvan
130	sakhe vajrin sakhīnām	sakhi vajrin sakhi
130	tathā tat astu somapāḥ	tathā tad as soma pā
130	sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu	sakhi vajrin tathā kṛ
130	yathā te uśmasi iṣTaye	yathā tvad vaś iṣṭi
130	revatīḥ naḥ sadhamāde	revat mad sadhamāda
130	indre santu tuvivājāḥ	indra as tuvi vāja
130	kṣumantaḥ yābhiḥ madema	kṣumat yad mad
130	ā gha tvāvān tmanā āptaḥ	ā gha tvāvat tman āp
130	stotṛbhyaḥ dhṛṣṇo iyānaḥ	stotṛ dhṛṣṇu i
130	ṛṇoḥ akṣam na cakryoḥ	ṛch akṣa na cakrī
130	ā yat duvaḥ śatakrato	ā yat duvas śatakratu
130	ā kāmam jaritṛṛṇām	ā kāma jaritṛ
130	ṛṇoḥ akṣam na śacībhiḥ	ṛch akṣa na śacī
130	śaśvat indraḥ popruthadbhiḥ jigāya	śaśvat indra popruth ji
130	nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhiḥ dhanāni	nānad śāśvas dhana
130	sa naḥ hiraṇyaratham daṁsanāvān	tad mad hiraṇya ratha daṃsanāvat
130	sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa naḥ dāt	tad mad san sani tad mad dā
130	ā aśvinau aśvāvatyā	āśvina aśvāvat
130	iṣā yātam śavīrayā	iṣ yā śavīra
130	gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat	gomant dasra hiraṇyavat
130	samānayojanaḥ hi vām	samāna yojana hi tvad
130	rathaḥ dasrau amartyaḥ	ratha dasra amartya
130	samudre aśvinā īyate	samudra aśvin i
130	ni aghnyasya mūrdhani	ni aghnya mūrdhan
130	cakram rathasya yemathuḥ	cakra ratha yam
130	pari dyām anyat īyate	pari div anya i
130	kaḥ te uṣaḥ kadhapriye	ka tvad uṣas kadhapriya
130	bhuje martaḥ amartye	bhuj marta amartya
130	kam nakṣase vibhāvari	ka nakṣ vibhāvarī
130	vayam hi te amanmahi	mad hi tvad man
130	ā antāt ā parākāt	ā anta ā parāka
130	aśve na citre aruṣi	aśvā na citra aruṣī
130	tvam tyebhiḥ ā gahi	tvad tya ā gam
130	vājebhiḥ duhitar divaḥ	vāja duhitṛ div
130	asme rayim ni dhāraya	mad rayi ni dhāray
 ---
131	tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirāḥ ṛṣiḥ	tvad agni prathama aṅgiras ṛṣi
131	devaḥ devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā	deva deva bhū śiva sakhi
131	tava vrate kavayaḥ vidmanāpasaḥ	tvad vrata kavi vidmana apas
131	ajāyanta marutaḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	jan marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi
131	tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ	tvad agni prathama aṅgirastama
131	kaviḥ devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam	kavi deva pari bhūṣ vrata
131	vibhuḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiraḥ	vibhu viśva bhuvana medhira
131	dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cit āyave	dvi mātṛ śayu katidhā cit āyu
131	tvam agne prathamaḥ mātariśvane	tvad agni prathama mātariśvan
131	āviḥ bhava sukratūyā vivasvate	āvis bhū sukratūyā vivasvant
131	arejetām rodasī hotṛvūrye	rej rodas hotṛ vūrya
131	asaghnoḥ bhāram ayajaḥ mahaḥ vaso	sagh bhāra yaj mah vasu
131	tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ	tvad agni manu div vāśay
131	purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ	purūravas su kṛt sukṛttara
131	śvātreṇa yat pitroḥ mucyase pari	śvātra yat pitṛ muc pari
131	ā tvā pūrvam anayan ā aparam punar	ā tvad pūrva nī ā apara punar
131	tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣTivardhanaḥ	tvad agni vṛṣabha puṣṭi vardhana
131	udyatasruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ	udyam sruc bhū śravāyya
131	yaḥ āhutim pari vedā vaṣaTkṛtim	yad āhuti pari vid vaṣaṭkṛti
131	ekāyuḥ agre viśaḥ āvivāsasi	eka āyu agra viś āvivās
131	tvam agne vṛjinavartanim naram	tvad agni vṛjina vartani nara
131	sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe	sakman pṛ vidatha vicarṣaṇi
131	yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane	yad śūrasāti paritakmya dhana
131	dabhrebhiḥ cit samṛtā haṁsi bhūyasaḥ	dabhra cit samṛti han bhūyas
131	tvam tam agne amṛtatve uttame	tvad tad agni amṛta tva uttama
131	martam dadhāsi śravase divedive	marta dhā śravas diva diva
131	yaḥ tātṛṣāṇaḥ ubhayāya janmane	yad tṛṣ ubhaya janman
131	mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi prayaḥ ā ca sūraye	mayas kṛ prayas ā ca sūri
131	tvam naḥ agne sanaye dhanānām	tvad mad agni sani dhana
131	yaśasam kārum kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ	yaśas kāru kṛ stu
131	ṛdhyāma karma apasā navena	ṛdh karman apas nava
131	devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pra avatam naḥ	deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad
131	tvam naḥ agne pitroḥ upasthe ā	tvad mad agni pitṛ upastha ā
131	devaḥ deveṣu anavadya jāgṛviḥ	deva deva anavadya jāgṛvi
131	tanūkṛt bodhi pramatiḥ ca kārave	tanū kṛt bhū pramati ca kāru
131	tvam kalyāṇa vasu viśvam ā ūpiṣe	tvad kalyāṇa vasu viśva āvap
131	tvam agne pramatiḥ tvam pitā asi naḥ	tvad agni pramati tvad pitṛ as mad
131	tvam vayaskṛt tava jāmayaḥ vayam	tvad vayaskṛt tvad jāmi mad
131	sam tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ sam sahasriṇaḥ	sam tvad rai śatin sam sahasrin
131	suvīram yanti vratapām adābhya	su vīra i vratapā adābhya
131	tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave	tvad agni prathama āyu āyu
131	devāḥ akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim	deva kṛ nahuṣa viśpati
131	iLām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm	iḍā kṛ manuṣa śāsanī
131	pituḥ yat putraḥ mamakasya jāyate	pitṛ yat putra mamaka jan
131	tvam naḥ agne tava deva pāyubhiḥ	tvad mad agni tvad deva pāyu
131	maghonaḥ rakṣa tanvaḥ ca vandya	maghavan rakṣ tanū ca vand
131	trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asi	trātṛ toka tanaya go as
131	animeṣam rakṣamāṇaḥ tava vrate	animeṣa rakṣ tvad vrata
131	tvam agne yajyave pāyuḥ antaraḥ	tvad agni yajyu pāyu antara
131	aniṣaṅgāya caturakṣaḥ idhyase	aniṣaṅga catur akṣa indh
131	yaḥ rātahavyaḥ avṛkāya dhāyase	yad rā havya avṛka dhāyas
131	kīreḥ cit mantram manasā vanoṣi tam	kīri cit mantra manas van tad
131	tvam agne uruśaṁsāya vāghate	tvad agni uru śaṃsa vāghant
131	spārham yat rekṇaḥ paramam vanoṣi tat	spārha yad rekṇas parama van tad
131	ādhrasya cit pramatiḥ ucyase pitā	ādhra cit pramati vac pitṛ
131	pra pākam śāssi pra diśaḥ viduṣTaraḥ	pra pāka śās pra diś viduṣṭara
131	tvam agne prayatadakṣiṇam naram	tvad agni prayam dakṣiṇā nṛ
131	varma iva syūtam pari pāsi viśvataḥ	varman iva sīv pari pā viśvatas
131	svādukṣadmā yaḥ vasatau syonakṛt	svādu kṣadman yad vasati syona kṛt
131	jīvayājam yajate sa upamā divaḥ	jīva yāja yaj tad upama div
131	imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ	idam agni śaraṇi mṛṣ mad
131	imam adhvānam yam agāma dūrāt	idam adhvan yad gā dūrāt
131	āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām	āpi pitṛ pramati somya
131	bhṛmiḥ asi ṛṣikṛt martyānām	bhṛmi as ṛṣi kṛt martya
131	manuṣvat agne aṅgirasvat aṅgiraḥ	manuṣvat agni aṅgirasvat aṅgiras
131	yayātivat sadane pūrvavat śuce	yayāti vat sadana pūrvavat śuci
131	accha yāhi ā vahā daivyam janam	acchā yā ā vah daivya jana
131	ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam	ā sāday barhis yaj ca priya
131	etena agne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva	etad agni brahman vṛdh
131	śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā	śakti vā yad tvad kṛ vid vā
131	uta pra neṣi abhi vasyaḥ asmān	uta pra nī abhi vasyas mad
131	sam naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā	sam mad sṛj sumati vājavat
 ---
132	indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocam	indra nu vīrya pra vac
132	yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī	yad kṛ prathama vajrin
132	ahan ahim anu apaḥ tatarda	han ahi anu ap tṛd
132	pra vakṣaṇāḥ abhinat parvatānām	pra vakṣaṇā bhid parvata
132	ahan ahim parvate śiśriyāṇam	han ahi parvata śri
132	tvaṣTā asmai vajram svaryam tatakṣa	tvaṣṭṛ idam vajra svarya takṣ
132	vāśrāḥ iva dhenavaḥ syandamānāḥ	vāśra iva dhenu syand
132	añjaḥ samudram ava jagmuḥ āpaḥ	añjas samudra ava gam ap
132	vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ avṛṇīta somam	vṛṣāy vṛ soma
132	trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya	trikadruka pā suta
132	ā sāyakam maghavā adatta vajram	ā sāyaka maghavan dā vajra
132	ahan enam prathamajām ahīnām	han enad prathama jā ahi
132	yat indra ahan prathamajām ahīnām	yat indra han prathama jā ahi
132	āt māyinām amināḥ pra uta māyāḥ	āt māyin mī pra uta māyā
132	āt sūryam janayan dyām uṣāsam	āt sūrya janay div uṣas
132	tādītnā śatrum na kilā vivitse	tādītnā śatru na kila vid
132	ahan vṛtram vṛtrataram vyaṁsam	han vṛtra vṛtratara vyaṃsa
132	indraḥ vajreṇa mahatā vadhena	indra vajra mahat vadha
132	skandhāṁsi iva kuliśenā vivṛkṇā	skandhas iva kuliśa vivraśc
132	ahiḥ śayate upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ	ahi śī upapṛc pṛthivī
132	ayoddhā iva durmadaḥ ā hi juhve	ayoddhṛ iva durmada ā hi hvā
132	mahāvīram tuvibādham ṛjīṣam	mahat vīra tuvi bādha ṛjīṣa
132	na atārīt asya samṛtim vadhānām	na tṛ idam samṛti vadha
132	sam rujānāḥ pipiṣe indraśatruḥ	sam rujānā piṣ indra śatru
132	apāt ahastaḥ apṛtanyat indram	a pād a hasta pṛtany indra
132	ā asya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna	ā idam vajra adhi sānu han
132	vṛṣṇaḥ vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan	vṛṣan vadhri pratimāna bubhūṣ
132	purutrā vṛtraḥ aśayat vyastaḥ	purutrā vṛtra śī vyas
132	nadam na bhinnam amuyā śayānam	nada na bhid adas śī
132	manoḥ uhānāḥ ati yanti āpaḥ	manu ruh ati i ap
132	yāḥ cit vṛtraḥ mahinā paryatiṣThat	yad cit vṛtra mahina pariṣṭhā
132	tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīḥ babhūva	tad ahi patsutaḥśī bhū
132	nīcāvayāḥ abhavat vṛtraputrā	nīcāvayas bhū vṛtra putra
132	indraḥ asyāḥ ava vadhar jabhāra	indra idam ava vadhar bhṛ
132	uttarā sūḥ adharaḥ putraḥ āsīt	uttara sū adhara putra as
132	dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ	dānu śī saha vatsa na dhenu
132	atiṣThantīnām aniveśanānām	a sthā a niveśana
132	kāṣThānām madhye nihitam śarīram	kāṣṭhā madhya nidhā śarīra
132	vṛtrasya niṇyam vi caranti āpaḥ	vṛtra niṇya vi car ap
132	dīrgham tamaḥ ā aśayat indraśatruḥ	dīrgha tamas āśī indra śatru
132	dāsapatnīḥ ahigopāḥ atiṣThan	dāsa patnī ahi gopā sthā
132	niruddhāḥ āpaḥ paṇinā iva gāvaḥ	nirudh ap paṇi iva go
132	apām bilam apihitam yat āsīt	ap bila apidhā yad as
132	vṛtram jaghanvān apa tat vavāra	vṛtra han apa tad vṛ
132	aśvyaḥ vāraḥ abhavaḥ tat indra	aśvya vāra bhū tad indra
132	sṛke yat tvā pratyahan devaḥ ekaḥ	sṛka yat tvad pratihan deva eka
132	ajayaḥ gāḥ ajayaḥ śūra somam	ji go ji śūra soma
132	ava asṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn	avasṛj sṛ saptan sindhu
132	na asmai vidyut na tanyatuḥ siṣedha	na idam vidyut na tanyatu sidh
132	na yām miham akirat hrādunim ca	na yad mih kṛ hrāduni ca
132	indraḥ ca yat yuyudhāte ahiḥ ca	indra ca yat yudh ahi ca
132	uta aparībhyaḥ maghavā vi jigye	uta aparī maghavan vi ji
132	aheḥ yātāram kam apaśyaḥ indra	ahi yātṛ ka paś indra
132	hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣaḥ bhīḥ agacchat	hṛd yat tvad han bhī gam
132	nava ca yat navatim ca sravantīḥ	navan ca yat navati ca sravantī
132	śyenaḥ na bhītaḥ ataraḥ rajāṁsi	śyena na bhī tṛ rajas
132	indraḥ yātaḥ avasitasya rājā	indra yā avasā rājan
132	śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇaḥ vajrabāhuḥ	śama ca śṛṅgin vajra bāhu
132	sa it u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām	tad id u rājan kṣi carṣaṇi
132	arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva	ara na nemi pari tad bhū
 ---
133	ā ita ayāma upa gavyantaḥ indram	e āyā upa gavyat indra
133	asmākam su pramatim vāvṛdhāti	mad su pramati vṛdh
133	anāmṛṇaḥ kuvit āt asya rāyaḥ	anāmṛṇa kuvid āt idam rai
133	gavām ketam param āvarjate naḥ	go keta para āvṛj mad
133	upa it aham dhanadām apratītam	upa id mad dhana dā apratīta
133	juṣTām na śyenaḥ vasatim patāmi	juṣ na śyena vasati pat
133	indram namasyan upamebhiḥ arkaiḥ	indra namasy upama arka
133	yaḥ stotṛbhyaḥ havyaḥ asti yāman	yad stotṛ hvā as yāman
133	ni sarvasenaḥ iṣudhīn asakta	ni sarva senā iṣudhi sañj
133	sam aryaḥ gāḥ ajati yasya vaṣTi	sam ari go aj yad vaś
133	coṣkūyamāṇaḥ indra bhūri vāmam	coṣkūy indra bhūri vāma
133	mā paṇiḥ bhūḥ asmat adhi pravṛddha	mā paṇi bhū mad adhi pravṛdh
133	vadhīḥ hi dasyum dhaninam ghanena	vadh hi dasyu dhanin ghana
133	ekaḥ caran upaśākebhiḥ indra	eka car upaśāka indra
133	dhanoḥ adhi viṣuṇak te vi āyan	dhanū adhi viṣuṇak tad vi i
133	ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ	ayajvan sanaka preti i
133	parā cit śīrṣā vavṛjuḥ te indra	parā cit śīrṣa vṛj tad indra
133	ayajvānaḥ yajvabhiḥ spardhamānāḥ	ayajvan yajvan spṛdh
133	pra yat divaḥ harivaḥ sthātar ugra	pra yat div harivat sthātṛ ugra
133	niḥ avratān adhamaḥ rodasyoḥ	niḥ avrata dham rodasī
133	ayuyutsan anavadyasya senām	yuyuts anavadya senā
133	ayātayanta kṣitayaḥ navagvāḥ	yātay kṣiti navagva
133	vṛṣāyudhaḥ na vadhrayaḥ niraṣTāḥ	vṛṣāyudh na vadhri niraṣṭa
133	pravadbhiḥ indrāt citayantaḥ āyan	pravat indra citay e
133	tvam etān rudataḥ jakṣataḥ ca	tvad etad rud jakṣ ca
133	ayodhayaḥ rajasaḥ indra pāre	yodhay rajas indra pāra
133	ava adahaḥ divaḥ ā dasyum uccā	avadah div ā dasyu uccā
133	pra sunvataḥ stuvataḥ śaṁsam āvaḥ	pra su stu śaṃsa av
133	cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyāḥ	kṛ parīṇah pṛthivī
133	hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ	hiraṇya maṇi śubh
133	na hinvānāsaḥ titiruḥ te indram	na hi tṛ tad indra
133	pari spaśaḥ adadhāt sūryeṇa	pari spaś dhā sūrya
133	pari yat indra rodasī ubhe	pari yat indra rodas ubh
133	abubhojīḥ mahinā viśvataḥ sīm	bhuj mahina viśvatas sīm
133	amanyamānān abhi manyamānaiḥ	a man abhi man
133	niḥ brahmabhiḥ adhamaḥ dasyum indra	niḥ brahman dham dasyu indra
133	na ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ antam āpuḥ	na yad div pṛthivī anta āp
133	na māyābhiḥ dhanadām paryabhūvan	na māyā dhana dā paribhū
133	yujam vajram vṛṣabhaḥ cakre indraḥ	yuj vajra vṛṣabha kṛ indra
133	niḥ jyotiṣā tamasaḥ gāḥ adukṣat	niḥ jyotis tamas go duh
133	anu svadhām akṣaran āpaḥ asya	anu svadhā kṣar ap idam
133	avardhata madhye ā nāvyānām	vṛdh madhya ā nāvyā
133	sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indraḥ	sadhrīcīna manas tad indra
133	ojiṣThena hanmanā ahan abhi dyūn	ojiṣṭha hanman han abhi div
133	ni āvidhyat ilībiśasya dṛLhā	ni āvyadh ilībiśa dṛḍha
133	vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinat śuṣṇam indraḥ	vi śṛṅgin bhid śuṣṇa indra
133	yāvat taraḥ maghavan yāvat ojaḥ	yāvat taras maghavan yāvat ojas
133	vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum	vajra śatru vadh pṛtanyu
133	abhi sidhmaḥ ajigāt asya śatrūn	abhi sidhma gā idam śatru
133	vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puraḥ abhet	vi tigma vṛṣabha pur bhid
133	sam vajreṇa asṛjat vṛtram indraḥ	sam vajra sṛj vṛtra indra
133	pra svām matim atirat śāśadānaḥ	pra sva mati tṛ śad
133	āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmin cākan	av kutsa indra yad kan
133	pra āvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum	prāv yudh vṛṣabha daśadyu
133	śaphacyutaḥ reṇuḥ nakṣata dyām	śapha cyu reṇu nakṣ div
133	ut śvaitreyaḥ nṛṣāhyāya tasthau	ud śvaitreya nṛṣāhya sthā
133	āvaḥ śamam vṛṣabham tugryāsu	av śama vṛṣabha tugrya
133	kṣetrajeṣe maghavan śvitryam gām	kṣetra jeṣa maghavan śvitrya go
133	jyok cit atra tasthivāṁsaḥ akran	jyok cit atra sthā kṛ
133	śatrūyatām adharā vedanā akar	śatrūy adhara vedana kṛ
 ---
134	triḥ cit naḥ adyā bhavatam navedasā	tris cit mad adya bhū navedas
134	vibhuḥ vām yāmaḥ uta rātiḥ aśvinā	vibhu tvad yāma uta rāti aśvin
134	yuvoḥ hi yantram himyā iva vāsasaḥ	tvad hi yantra himyā iva vāsas
134	abhyāyaṁsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ	abhyāyam bhū manīṣin
134	trayaḥ pavayaḥ madhuvāhane rathe	tri pavi madhu vāhana ratha
134	somasya venām anu viśve it viduḥ	soma venā anu viśva id vid
134	trayaḥ skambhāsaḥ skabhitāsaḥ ārabhe	tri skambha skambh ārabh
134	triḥ naktam yāthaḥ triḥ u aśvinā divā	tris nakta yā tris u aśvin div
134	samāne ahan triḥ avadyagohanā	samāna ahar tris avadya gohana
134	triḥ adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam	tris adya yajña madhu mikṣ
134	triḥ vājavatīḥ iṣaḥ aśvinā yuvam	tris vājavat iṣ aśvin tvad
134	doṣāḥ asmabhyam uṣasaḥ ca pinvatam	doṣā mad uṣas ca pinv
134	triḥ vartiḥ yātam triḥ anuvrate jane	tris vartis yā tris anuvrata jana
134	triḥ suprāvye tredhā iva śikṣatam	tris suprāvya tredhā iva śikṣ
134	triḥ nāndyam vahatam aśvinā yuvam	tris nāndī vah aśvin tvad
134	triḥ pṛkṣaḥ asme akṣarā iva pinvatam	tris pṛkṣ mad akṣara iva pinv
134	triḥ naḥ rayim vahatam aśvinā yuvam	tris mad rayi vah aśvin tvad
134	triḥ devatātā triḥ uta avatam dhiyaḥ	tris devatāti tris uta av dhī
134	triḥ saubhagatvam triḥ uta śravāṁsi naḥ	tris saubhaga tva tris uta śravas mad
134	triṣTham vām sūre duhitā ruhat ratham	triṣṭha tvad svar duhitṛ ruh ratha
134	triḥ naḥ aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā	tris mad aśvin divya bheṣaja
134	triḥ pārthivāni triḥ u dattam adbhyaḥ	tris pārthiva tris u dā ap
134	omānam śaṁyoḥ mamakāya sūnave	oman śam yos mamaka sūnu
134	tridhātu śarma vahatam śubhaḥ patī	tri dhātu śarman vah śubh pati
134	triḥ naḥ aśvinā yajatā divedive	tris mad aśvin yajata diva diva
134	pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam	pari tri dhātu pṛthivī śī
134	tisraḥ nāsatyā rathyā parāvataḥ	tri nāsatya rathya parāvat
134	ātmā iva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam	ātman iva vāta svasara gam
134	triḥ aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhiḥ	tris aśvin sindhu saptan mātṛ
134	trayaḥ āhāvāḥ tredhā haviḥ kṛtam	tri āhāva tredhā havis kṛ
134	tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ upari pravā divaḥ	tri pṛthivī upari prava div
134	nākam rakṣethe dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ hitam	nāka rakṣ div aktu dhā
134	kva trī cakrā trivṛtaḥ rathasya	kva tri cakra trivṛt ratha
134	kva trayaḥ vandhuraḥ ye sanīLāḥ	kva tri vandhur yad sanīḍa
134	kadā yogaḥ vājinaḥ rāsabhasya	kadā yoga vājin rāsabha
134	yena yajñam nāsatyā upayāthaḥ	yad yajña nāsatya upayā
134	ā nāsatyā gacchatam hūyate haviḥ	ā nāsatya gam hu havis
134	madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhiḥ āsabhiḥ	madhu pā madhupa āsan
134	yuvoḥ hi pūrvam savitā uṣasaḥ ratham	tvad hi pūrvam savitṛ uṣas ratha
134	ṛtāya citram ghṛtavantam iṣyati	ṛta citra ghṛtavat iṣ
134	ā nāsatyā tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha	ā nāsatya tri ekādaśa iha
134	devebhiḥ yātam madhupeyam aśvinā	deva yā madhu peya aśvin
134	pra āyuḥ tāriṣTam niḥ rapāṁsi mṛkṣatam	pra āyus tṛ niḥ rapas mṛś
134	sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā	sidh dveṣas bhū sacābhū
134	ā naḥ aśvinā trivṛtā rathena	ā mad aśvin trivṛt ratha
134	arvāñcam rayim vahatam suvīram	arvāñc rayi vah su vīra
134	śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi	śru tvad av johav
134	vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau	vṛdh ca mad bhū vājasāti
 ---
135	hvayāmi agnim prathamam svastaye	hvā agni prathamam svasti
135	hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇau iha avase	hvā mitrāvaruṇa iha avas
135	hvayāmi rātrīm jagataḥ niveśanīm	hvā rātri jagant niveśana
135	hvayāmi devam savitāram ūtaye	hvā deva savitṛ ūti
135	ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ	ā kṛṣṇa rajas vṛt
135	niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca	niveśay amṛta martya ca
135	hiraṇyayena savitā rathena	hiraṇyaya savitṛ ratha
135	ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan	ā deva yā bhuvana paś
135	yāti devaḥ pravatā yāti udvatā	yā deva pravat yā udvat
135	yāti śubhrābhyām yajataḥ haribhyām	yā śubhra yajata hari
135	ā devaḥ yāti savitā parāvataḥ	ā deva yā savitṛ parāvat
135	apa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ	apa viśva durita bādh
135	abhīvṛtam kṛśanaiḥ viśvarūpam	abhivṛ kṛśana viśva rūpa
135	hiraṇyaśamyam yajataḥ bṛhantam	hiraṇya śamyā yajata bṛhat
135	ā asthāt ratham savitā citrabhānuḥ	āsthā ratha savitṛ citra bhānu
135	kṛṣṇā rajāṁsi taviṣīm dadhānaḥ	kṛṣṇa rajas taviṣī dhā
135	vi janān śyāvāḥ śitipādaḥ akhyan	vi jana śyāva śiti pād khyā
135	ratham hiraṇyapraugam vahantaḥ	ratha hiraṇya prauga vah
135	śaśvat viśaḥ savituḥ daivyasya	śaśvat viś savitṛ daivya
135	upasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ	upastha viśva bhuvana sthā
135	tisraḥ dyāvaḥ savituḥ dvau upasthā	tri div savitṛ dvi upastha
135	ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāT	eka yama bhuvana virāṣah
135	āṇim na rathyam amṛtā adhi tasthuḥ	āṇi na rathya amṛta adhi sthā
135	iha bravītu yaḥ u tat ciketat	iha brū yad u tad cit
135	vi suparṇaḥ antarikṣāṇi akhyat	vi suparṇa antarikṣa khyā
135	gabhīravepāḥ asuraḥ sunīthaḥ	gabhīra vepas asura su nītha
135	kva idānīm sūryaḥ kaḥ ciketa	kva idānīm sūrya ka cit
135	katamām dyām raśmiḥ asya ā tatāna	katama div raśmi idam tan
135	aṣTau vi akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	aṣṭan vi khyā kakubh pṛthivī
135	trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn	tri dhanvan yojana saptan sindhu
135	hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā devaḥ ā agāt	hiraṇya akṣa savitṛ deva āgā
135	dadhat ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi	dhā ratna dāś vārya
135	hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇiḥ	hiraṇya pāṇi savitṛ vicarṣaṇi
135	ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate	ubh dyāvāpṛthivī antar i
135	apa amīvām bādhate veti sūryam	apa amīvā bādh vī sūrya
135	abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti	abhi kṛṣṇa rajas div ṛch
135	hiraṇyahastaḥ asuraḥ sunīthaḥ	hiraṇya hasta asura su nītha
135	sumṛLīkaḥ svavān yātu arvāṅ	su mṛḍīka svavat yā arvāñc
135	apasedhan rakṣasaḥ yātudhānān	apasidh rakṣas yātudhāna
135	asthāt devaḥ pratidoṣam gṛṇānaḥ	sthā deva pratidoṣam gṛ
135	ye te panthāḥ savitar pūrvyāsaḥ	yad tvad pathin savitṛ pūrvya
135	areṇavaḥ sukṛtāḥ antarikṣe	areṇu su kṛ antarikṣa
135	tebhiḥ naḥ adya pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ	tad mad adya pathin su ga
135	rakṣā ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva	rakṣ ca mad adhi ca brū deva
 ---
136	pra vaḥ yahvam purūṇām	pra tvad yahva puru
136	viśām devayatīnām	viś devay
136	agnim sūktebhiḥ vacobhiḥ īmahe	agni sūkta vacas ī
136	yam sīm it anye īLate	yad sīm id anya īḍ
136	janāsaḥ agnim dadhire sahovṛdham	jana agni dhā sahas vṛdh
136	haviṣmantaḥ vidhema te	haviṣmat vidh tvad
136	sa tvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ iha avitā	tad tvad mad adya sumanas iha avitṛ
136	bhavā vājeṣu santya	bhū vāja santya
136	pra tvā dūtam vṛṇīmahe	pra tvad dūta vṛ
136	hotāram viśvavedasam	hotṛ viśva vedas
136	mahaḥ te sataḥ vi caranti arcayaḥ	mah tvad as vi car arci
136	divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ	div spṛś bhānu
136	devāsaḥ tvā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	deva tvad varuṇa mitra aryaman
136	sam dūtam pratnam indhate	sam dūta pratna indh
136	viśvam saḥ agne jayati tvayā dhanam	viśva tad agni ji tvad dhana
136	yaḥ te dadāśa martyaḥ	yad tvad dāś martya
136	mandraḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ	mandra hotṛ gṛha pati
136	agne dūtaḥ viśām asi	agni dūta viś as
136	tve viśvā saṁgatāni vratā dhruvā	tvad viśva saṃgam vrata dhruva
136	yāni devāḥ akṛṇvata	yad deva kṛ
136	tve it agne subhage yaviṣThya	tvad id agni subhaga yaviṣṭhya
136	viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ	viśva ā hu havis
136	sa tvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ uta aparam	tad tvad mad adya sumanas uta apara
136	yakṣi devān suvīryā	yaj deva su vīrya
136	tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ	tad gha īṃ itthā namasvin
136	upa svarājam āsate	upa svarāj ās
136	hotrābhiḥ agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate	hotrā agni manus sam indh
136	titirvāṁsaḥ ati sridhaḥ	tṛ ati sridh
136	ghnantaḥ vṛtram ataran rodasī apaḥ	han vṛtra tṛ rodas ap
136	uru kṣayāya cakrire	uru kṣaya kṛ
136	bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumnī āhutaḥ	bhū kaṇva vṛṣan dyumnin āhu
136	krandat aśvaḥ gaviṣTiṣu	krand aśva gaviṣṭi
136	sam sīdasva mahān asi	sam sad mahat as
136	śocasva devavītamaḥ	śuc deva vītama
136	vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya	vi dhūma agni aruṣa miyedhya
136	sṛja praśasta darśatam	sṛj praśaṃs darśata
136	yam tvā devāsaḥ manave dadhuḥ iha	yad tvad deva manu iha
136	yajiṣTham havyavāhana	yajiṣṭha havyavāhana
136	yam kaṇvaḥ medhyātithiḥ dhanaspṛtam	yad kaṇva medhyātithi dhana spṛt
136	yam vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ	yad vṛṣan yad upastuta
136	yam agnim medhyātithiḥ	yad agni medhyātithi
136	kaṇvaḥ īdhe ṛtāt adhi	kaṇva indh ṛta adhi
136	tasya pra iṣaḥ dīdiyuḥ tam imāḥ ṛcaḥ	tad pra iṣ dīdī tad idam ṛc
136	tam agnim vardhayāmasi	tad agni vardhay
136	rāyaḥ pūrdhi svadhāvaḥ asti hi te	rai pṛ svadhāvat as hi tvad
136	agne deveṣu āpyam	agni deva āpya
136	tvam vājasya śrutyasya rājasi	tvad vāja śrutya rāj
136	sa naḥ mṛLa mahān asi	tad mad mṛḍ mahat as
136	ūrdhvaḥ ū su naḥ ūtaye	ūrdhva u su mad ūti
136	tiṣThā devaḥ na savitā	sthā deva na savitṛ
136	ūrdhvaḥ vājasya sanitā yat añjibhiḥ	ūrdhva vāja sanitṛ yat añji
136	vāghadbhiḥ vihvayāmahe	vāghant vihvā
136	ūrdhvaḥ naḥ pāhi aṁhasaḥ ni ketunā	ūrdhva mad pā aṃhas ni ketu
136	viśvam sam atriṇam daha	viśva sam atrin dah
136	kṛdhī naḥ ūrdhvān carathāya jīvase	kṛ mad ūrdhva caratha jīv
136	vidāḥ deveṣu naḥ duvaḥ	vid deva mad duvas
136	pāhi naḥ agne rakṣasaḥ	pā mad agni rakṣas
136	pāhi dhūrteḥ arāvṇaḥ	pā dhūrti arāvan
136	pāhi rīṣataḥ uta vā jighāṁsataḥ	pā riṣ uta vā jighāṃs
136	bṛhadbhāno yaviṣThya	bṛhadbhānu yaviṣṭhya
136	ghanā iva viṣvak vi jahi arāvṇaḥ	ghana iva viṣvañc vi han arāvan
136	tapurjambha yaḥ asmadhruk	tapus jambha yad asmadruh
136	yaḥ martyaḥ śiśīte ati aktubhiḥ	yad martya śā ati aktu
136	mā naḥ sa ripuḥ īśata	mā mad tad ripu īś
136	agniḥ vavne suvīryam	agni van su vīrya
136	agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam	agni kaṇva saubhaga
136	agniḥ pra āvat mitrā uta medhyātithim	agni prāv mitra uta medhyātithi
136	agniḥ sātau upastutam	agni sāti upastuta
136	agninā turvaśam yadum parāvataḥ	agni turvaśa yadu parāvat
136	ugrādevam havāmahe	ugrādeva hvā
136	agniḥ nayat navavāstvam bṛhadratham	agni nī navavāstva bṛhat ratha
136	turvītim dasyave sahaḥ	turvīti dasyu sahas
136	ni tvām agne manuḥ dadhe	ni tvad agni manu dhā
136	jyotiḥ janāya śaśvate	jyotis jana śaśvat
136	dīdetha kaṇve ṛtajātaḥ ukṣitaḥ	dīdī kaṇva ṛta jan ukṣ
136	yam namasyanti kṛṣTayaḥ	yad namasy kṛṣṭi
136	tveṣāsaḥ agneḥ amavantaḥ arcayaḥ	tveṣa agni amavat arci
136	bhīmāsaḥ na pratītaye	bhīma na pratīti
136	rakṣasvinaḥ sadam it yātumāvataḥ	rakṣasvin sadam id yātumāvat
136	viśvam sam atriṇam daha	viśva sam atrin dah
 ---
137	krīLam vaḥ śardhaḥ mārutam	krīḍa tvad śardhas māruta
137	anarvāṇam ratheśubham	anarvan ratheśubh
137	kaṇvāḥ abhi pra gāyata	kaṇva abhi pra gā
137	ye pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣTibhiḥ	yad pṛṣatī ṛṣṭi
137	sākam vāśībhiḥ añjibhiḥ	sākam vāśī añji
137	ajāyanta svabhānavaḥ	jan sva bhānu
137	iha iva śṛṇve eṣām	iha iva śru idam
137	kaśāḥ hasteṣu yat vadān	kaśā hasta yat vad
137	ni yāman citram ṛñjate	ni yāman citra ṛj
137	pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye	pra tvad śardha ghṛṣvi
137	tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe	tveṣa dyumna śuṣmin
137	devattam brahma gāyata	devatta brahman gā
137	pra śaṁsā goṣu aghnyam	pra śaṃs go aghnya
137	krīLam yat śardhaḥ mārutam	krīḍa yad śardhas māruta
137	jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe	jambha rasa vṛdh
137	kaḥ vaḥ varṣiṣThaḥ ā naraḥ	ka tvad varṣiṣṭha ā nṛ
137	divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca dhūtayaḥ	div ca gam ca dhūti
137	yat sīm antam na dhūnutha	yat sīm anta na dhū
137	ni vaḥ yāmāya mānuṣaḥ	ni tvad yāma mānuṣa
137	dadhre ugrāya manyave	dhṛ ugra manyu
137	jihīta parvataḥ giriḥ	hā parvata giri
137	yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī	yad ajma pṛthivī
137	jujurvān iva viśpatiḥ	jṛ iva viśpati
137	bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate	bhī yāma rej
137	sthiram hi jānam eṣām	sthira hi jāna idam
137	vayaḥ mātuḥ niretave	vayas mātṛ niri
137	yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ	yat sīm anu dvitā śavas
137	ut u tye sūnavaḥ giraḥ	ud u tya sūnu gir
137	kāṣThāḥ ajmeṣu atnata	kāṣṭhā ajma tan
137	vāśrāḥ abhijñu yātave	vāśra abhijñu yā
137	tyam cit ghā dīrgham pṛthum	tya cit gha dīrgha pṛthu
137	mihaḥ napātam amṛdhram	mih napāt amṛdhra
137	pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ	pra cyāvay yāman
137	marutaḥ yat ha vaḥ balam	marut yad ha tvad bala
137	janān acucyavītana	jana cyu
137	girīn acucyavītana	giri cyu
137	yat ha yānti marutaḥ	yat ha yā marut
137	sam ha bruvate adhvan ā	sam ha brū adhvan ā
137	śṛṇoti kaḥ cit eṣām	śru kaścit idam
137	pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ	pra yā śībham āśu
137	santi kaṇveṣu vaḥ duvaḥ	as kaṇva tvad dū
137	tatra u su mādayādhvai	tatra u su māday
137	asti hi smā madāya vaḥ	as hi sma mada tvad
137	smasi smā vayam eṣām	as sma mad idam
137	viśvam cit āyuḥ jīvase	viśva cit āyus jīv
 ---
138	kat ha nūnam kadhapriyaḥ	ka ha nūnam kadhapriya
138	pitā putram na hastayoḥ	pitṛ putra na hasta
138	dadhidhve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	dhā vṛj barhis
138	kva nūnam kat vaḥ artham	kva nūnam ka tvad artha
138	gantā divaḥ na pṛthivyāḥ	gam div na pṛthivī
138	kva vaḥ gāvaḥ na raṇyanti	kva tvad go na raṇ
138	kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṁsi	kva tvad sumna navyas
138	marutaḥ kva suvitā	marut kva suvita
138	kva u viśvāni saubhagā	kva u viśva saubhaga
138	yat yūyam pṛśnimātaraḥ	yat tvad pṛśni mātṛ
138	martāsaḥ syātana	marta as
138	stotā vaḥ amṛtaḥ syāt	stotṛ tvad amṛta as
138	mā vaḥ mṛgaḥ na yavase	mā tvad mṛga na yavasa
138	jaritā bhūt ajoṣyaḥ	jaritṛ bhū ajoṣya
138	pathā yamasya gāt upa	pathin yama gā upa
138	mā ū su naḥ parāparā	mā u su mad parā parā
138	nirṛtiḥ durhaṇā vadhīt	nirṛti durhaṇā vadh
138	padīṣTa tṛṣṇayā saha	pad tṛṣṇā saha
138	satyam tveṣāḥ amavantaḥ	satya tveṣa amavat
138	dhanvan cit ā rudriyāsaḥ	dhanvan cit ā rudriya
138	miham kṛṇvanti avātām	mih kṛ avāta
138	vāśrā iva vidyut mimāti	vāśrā iva vidyut mā
138	vatsam na mātā siṣakti	vatsa na mātṛ sac
138	yat eṣām vṛṣTiḥ asarji	yat idam vṛṣṭi sṛj
138	divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti	divā cit tamas kṛ
138	parjanyena udavāhena	parjanya uda vāha
138	yat pṛthivīm vyundanti	yat pṛthivī vyund
138	adha svanāt marutām	adha svana marut
138	viśvam ā sadma pārthivam	viśva ā sadman pārthiva
138	arejanta pra mānuṣāḥ	rej pra mānuṣa
138	marutaḥ vīLupāṇibhiḥ	marut vīḍu pāṇi
138	citrāḥ rodhasvatīḥ anu	citra rodhasvatī anu
138	yāta īm akhidrayāmabhiḥ	yā īṃ akhidra yāman
138	sthirāḥ vaḥ santu nemayaḥ	sthira tvad as nemi
138	rathāḥ aśvāsaḥ eṣām	ratha aśva idam
138	susaṁskṛtāḥ abhīśavaḥ	su saṃskṛ abhīśu
138	acchā vadā tanā girā	acchā vad tan giri
138	jarāyai brahmaṇaḥ patim	jarā brahmaṇaspati
138	agnim mitram na darśatam	agni mitra na darśata
138	mimīhi ślokam āsye	mā śloka āsya
138	parjanyaḥ iva tatanaḥ	parjanya iva tan
138	gāya gāyatram ukthyam	gā gāyatra ukthya
138	vandasva mārutam gaṇam	vand māruta gaṇa
138	tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam	tveṣa panasyu arkin
138	asme vṛddhāḥ asan iha	mad vṛdh as iha
 ---
139	pra yat itthā parāvataḥ	pra yat itthā parāvat
139	śociḥ na mānam asyatha	śocis na māna as
139	kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā	ka kratu marut ka varpas
139	kam yātha kam ha dhūtayaḥ	ka yā ka ha dhūti
139	sthirā vaḥ santu āyudhā parāṇude	sthira tvad as āyudha parāṇud
139	vīLū uta pratiṣkabhe	vīḍu uta pratiṣkambh
139	yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī	tvad as taviṣī panīyas
139	mā martyasya māyinaḥ	mā martya māyin
139	parā ha yat sthiram hatha	parā ha yad sthira han
139	naraḥ vartayathā guru	nṛ vartay guru
139	vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	vi yā vanin pṛthivī
139	vi āśāḥ parvatānām	vi āśā parvata
139	nahi vaḥ śatruḥ vivide adhi dyavi	nahi tvad śatru vid adhi div
139	na bhūmyām riśādasaḥ	na bhūmi riśādas
139	yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā	tvad as taviṣī tan yuj
139	rudrāsaḥ nū cit ādhṛṣe	rudra nu cit ādhṛṣ
139	pra vepayanti parvatān	pra vepay parvata
139	vi viñcanti vanaspatīn	vi vic vanaspati
139	pra u ārata marutaḥ durmadāḥ iva	pra u ṛch marut durmada iva
139	devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā	deva sarva viś
139	upa u ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam	upa u ratha pṛṣatī yuj
139	praṣTiḥ vahati rohitaḥ	praṣṭi vah rohita
139	ā vaḥ yāmāya pṛthivī cit aśrot	ā tvad yāma pṛthivī cit śru
139	abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ	bhī mānuṣa
139	ā vaḥ makṣū tanāya kam	ā tvad makṣū tana kaṃ
139	rudrāḥ avaḥ vṛṇīmahe	rudra avas vṛ
139	gantā nūnam naḥ avasā yathā purā	gam nūnam mad avas yathā purā
139	itthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe	itthā kaṇva bhī
139	yuṣmeṣitaḥ marutaḥ martyeṣitaḥ	yuṣmeṣita marut martya iṣ
139	ā yaḥ naḥ abhvaḥ īṣate	ā yad mad abhva iṣ
139	vi tam yuyota śavasā vi ojasā	vi tad yu śavas vi ojas
139	vi yuṣmākābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	vi yuṣmāka ūti
139	asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ	asāmi hi prayajyu
139	kaṇvam dada pracetasaḥ	kaṇva dā pracetas
139	asāmibhiḥ marutaḥ ā naḥ ūtibhiḥ	asāmi marut ā mad ūti
139	gantā vṛṣTim na vidyutaḥ	gam vṛṣṭi na vidyut
139	asāmi ojaḥ bibhṛthā sudānavaḥ	asāmi ojas bhṛ sudānu
139	asāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ	asāmi dhūti śavas
139	ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyave	ṛṣi dviṣ marut parimanyu
139	iṣum na sṛjata dviṣam	iṣu na sṛj dviṣ
 ---
140	ut tiṣTha brahmaṇaḥ pate	ud sthā brahmaṇaspati
140	devayantaḥ tvā īmahe	devay tvad i
140	upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānavaḥ	upa pra i marut sudānu
140	indra prāśūḥ bhavā sacā	indra prāśū bhū sacā
140	tvām it hi sahasaḥ putra martyaḥ	tvad id hi sahas putra martya
140	upabrūte dhane hite	upabrū dhana dhā
140	suvīryam marutaḥ ā svaśvyam	su vīrya marut ā su aśvya
140	dadhīta yaḥ vaḥ ācake	dhā yad tvad ākan
140	pra etu brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	pre brahmaṇaspati
140	pra devī etu sūnṛtā	pra devī i sūnṛtā
140	acchā vīram naryam paṅktirādhasam	acchā vīra narya paṅkti rādhas
140	devāḥ yajñam nayantu naḥ	deva yajña nī mad
140	yaḥ vāghate dadāti sūnaram vasu	yad vāghant dā sūnara vasu
140	sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ	tad dhā akṣiti śravas
140	tasmai iLām suvīrām ā yajāmahe	tad iḍā su vīra ā yaj
140	supratūrtim anehasam	su pratūrti anehas
140	pra nūnam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	pra nūnam brahmaṇaspati
140	mantram vadati ukthyam	mantra vad ukthya
140	yasmin indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	yad indra varuṇa mitra aryaman
140	devāḥ okāṁsi cakrire	deva oka kṛ
140	tam it vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvam	tad id vac vidatha śambhu
140	mantram devāḥ anehasam	mantra deva anehas
140	imām ca vācam pratiharyathā naraḥ	idam ca vāc pratihary nṛ
140	viśvā it vāmā vaḥ aśnavat	viśva id vāma tvad aś
140	kaḥ devayantam aśnavat	ka devay aś
140	janam kaḥ vṛktabarhiṣam	jana ka vṛj barhis
140	prapra dāśvān pastyābhiḥ asthita	pra pra dāś pastyā sthā
140	antarvāvat kṣayam dadhe	antarvāvat kṣaya dhā
140	upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhiḥ	upa kṣatra pṛc han rājan
140	bhaye cit sukṣitim dadhe	bhaya cit su kṣiti dhā
140	na asya vartā na tarutā mahādhane	na idam vartṛ na tarutṛ mahat dhana
140	na arbhe asti vajriṇaḥ	na arbha as vajrin
 ---
141	yam rakṣanti pracetasaḥ	yad rakṣ pracetas
141	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
141	nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ	nu cit tad dabh jana
141	yam bāhutā iva piprati	yad bāhutā iva pṛ
141	pānti martyam riṣaḥ	pā martya riṣ
141	ariṣTaḥ sarvaḥ edhate	ariṣṭa sarva edh
141	vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puraḥ	vi durga vi dviṣ puras
141	ghnanti rājānaḥ eṣām	han rājan idam
141	nayanti duritā tiraḥ	nī durita tiras
141	sugaḥ panthāḥ anṛkṣaraḥ	su ga pathin anṛkṣara
141	ādityāsaḥ ṛtam yate	āditya ṛta i
141	na atra avakhādaḥ asti vaḥ	na atra avakhāda as tvad
141	yam yajñam nayathā naraḥ	yad yajña nī nṛ
141	ādityāḥ ṛjunā pathā	āditya ṛju pathin
141	pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat	pra tvad tad dhīti naś
141	sa ratnam martyaḥ vasu	sa ratna martya vasu
141	viśvam tokam uta tmanā	viśva toka uta tman
141	acchā gacchati astṛtaḥ	acchā gam astṛta
