141	kathā rādhāma sakhāyaḥ	kathā rādh sakhi
141	stomam mitrasya aryamṇaḥ	stoma mitra aryaman
141	mahi psaraḥ varuṇasya	mahi psaras varuṇa
141	mā vaḥ ghnantam mā śapantam	mā tvad han mā śap
141	prati voce devayantam	prati vac devay
141	sumnaiḥ it vaḥ ā vivāse	sumna id tvad ā vivās
141	caturaḥ cit dadamānāt	catur cit dā
141	bibhīyāt ā nidhātoḥ	bhī ā nidhā
141	na duruktāya spṛhayet	na durukta spṛhay
 ---
142	sam pūṣan adhvanaḥ tira	sam pūṣan adhvan tṛ
142	vi aṁhaḥ vimucaḥ napāt	vi aṃhas vimuc napāt
142	sakṣvā deva pra naḥ puraḥ	sac deva pra mad puras
142	yaḥ naḥ pūṣan aghaḥ vṛkaḥ	yad mad pūṣan agha vṛka
142	duḥśevaḥ ādideśati	duḥśeva ādiś
142	apa sma tam pathaḥ jahi	apa sma tad pathin hā
142	apa tyam paripanthinam	apa tya paripanthin
142	muṣīvāṇam huraścitam	muṣīvan huraścit
142	dūram adhi sruteḥ aja	dūram adhi sruti aj
142	tvam tasya dvayāvinaḥ	tvad tad dvayāvin
142	aghaśaṁsasya kasya cit	agha śaṃsa kaścit
142	padā abhi tiṣTha tapuṣim	pad abhi sthā tapuṣi
142	ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ	ā tad tvad dasra mantumat
142	pūṣan avaḥ vṛṇīmahe	pūṣan avas vṛ
142	yena pitṛṛn acodayaḥ	yad pitṛ coday
142	adhā naḥ viśvasaubhaga	adha mad viśva saubhaga
142	hiraṇyavāśīmattama	hiraṇya vāśīmattama
142	dhanāni suṣaṇā kṛdhi	dhana suṣaṇa kṛ
142	ati naḥ saścataḥ naya	ati mad saścant nī
142	sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu	su ga mad su patha kṛ
142	pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ	pūṣan iha kratu vid
142	abhi sūyavasam naya	abhi su yavasa nī
142	na navajvāraḥ adhvane	na nava jvāra adhvan
142	pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ	pūṣan iha kratu vid
142	śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṁsi ca	śak pṛ pra yam ca
142	śiśīhi prāsi udaram	śā prā udara
142	pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ	pūṣan iha kratu vid
142	na pūṣaṇam methāmasi	na pūṣan mith
142	sūktaiḥ abhi gṛṇīmasi	sūkta abhi gṛ
142	vasūni dasmam īmahe	vasu dasma ī
 ---
143	kat rudrāya pracetase	ka rudra pracetas
143	mīLhuṣTamāya tavyase	mīḍhuṣṭama tavyas
143	vocema śaṁtamam hṛde	vac śaṃtama hṛd
143	yathā naḥ aditiḥ karat	yathā mad aditi kṛ
143	paśve nṛbhyaḥ yathā gave	paśu nṛ yathā go
143	yathā tokāya rudriyam	yathā toka rudriya
143	yathā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ	yathā mad mitra varuṇa
143	yathā rudraḥ ciketati	yathā rudra cit
143	yathā viśve sajoṣasaḥ	yathā viśva sajoṣas
143	gāthapatim medhapatim	gātha pati medha pati
143	rudram jalāṣabheṣajam	rudra jalāṣa bheṣaja
143	tat śaṁyoḥ sumnam īmahe	tad śaṃyu sumna ī
143	yaḥ śukraḥ iva sūryaḥ	yad śukra iva sūrya
143	hiraṇyam iva rocate	hiraṇya iva ruc
143	śreṣThaḥ devānām vasuḥ	śreṣṭha deva vasu
143	śam naḥ karati arvate	śam mad kṛ arvant
143	sugam meṣāya meṣye	suga meṣa meṣī
143	nṛbhyaḥ nāribhyaḥ gave	nṛ nārī go
143	asme soma śriyam adhi	mad soma śrī adhi
143	ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām	ni dhā śata nṛ
143	mahi śravaḥ tuvinṛmṇam	mahi śravas tuvi nṛmṇa
143	mā naḥ somaparibādhaḥ	mā mad soma paribādh
143	mā arātayaḥ juhuranta	mā arāti hvṛ
143	ā naḥ indo vāje bhaja	ā mad indu vāja bhaj
143	yāḥ te prajāḥ amṛtasya	yad tvad prajā amṛta
143	parasmin dhāman ṛtasya	para dhāman ṛta
143	mūrdhā nābhā soma venaḥ	mūrdhan nābhi soma ven
143	ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ	ābhūṣ soma vid
 ---
144	agne vivasvat uṣasaḥ	agni vivasvat uṣas
144	citram rādhaḥ amartya	citra rādhas amartya
144	ā dāśuṣe jātavedaḥ vahā tvam	ā dāś jātavedas vah tvad
144	adyā devān uṣarbudhaḥ	adya deva uṣarbudh
144	juṣTaḥ hi dūtaḥ asi havyavāhanaḥ	juṣ hi dūta as havyavāhana
144	agne rathīḥ adhvarāṇām	agni rathī adhvara
144	sajūḥ aśvibhyām uṣasā suvīryam	sajūs aśvin uṣas su vīrya
144	asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat	mad dhā śravas bṛhat
144	adyā dūtam vṛṇīmahe	adya dūta vṛ
144	vasum agnim purupriyam	vasu agni puru priya
144	dhūmaketum bhāṛjīkam vyuṣTiṣu	dhūma ketu bhāṛjīka vyuṣṭi
144	yajñānām adhvaraśriyam	yajña adhvara śrī
144	śreṣTham yaviṣTham atithim svāhutam	śreṣṭha yaviṣṭha atithi su āhu
144	juṣTam janāya dāśuṣe	juṣ jana dāś
144	devān acchā yātave jātavedasam	deva acchā yā jātavedas
144	agnim īLe vyuṣTiṣu	agni īḍ vyuṣṭi
144	staviṣyāmi tvām aham	stu tvad mad
144	viśvasya amṛta bhojana	viśva amṛta bhojana
144	agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya	agni trātṛ amṛta miyedhya
144	yajiṣTham havyavāhana	yajiṣṭha havyavāhana
144	suśaṁsaḥ bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣThya	su śaṃsa bhū gṛ yaviṣṭhya
144	madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ	madhu jihvā su āhu
144	praskaṇvasya pratiran āyuḥ jīvase	praskaṇva pratṛ āyus jīv
144	namasyā daivyam janam	namasy daivya jana
144	hotāram viśvavedasam	hotṛ viśva vedas
144	sam hi tvā viśaḥ indhate	sam hi tvad viś indh
144	saḥ ā vaha puruhūta pracetasaḥ	tad ā vah puru hvā pracetas
144	agne devān iha dravat	agni deva iha dru
144	savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam	savitṛ uṣas aśvin bhaga
144	agnim vyuṣTiṣu kṣapaḥ	agni vyuṣṭi kṣap
144	kaṇvāsaḥ tvā sutasomāsaḥ indhate	kaṇva tvad su soma indh
144	havyavāham svadhvara	havyavāha su adhvara
144	patiḥ hi adhvarāṇām	pati hi adhvara
144	agne dūtaḥ viśām asi	agni dūta viś as
144	uṣarbudhaḥ ā vaha somapītaye	uṣarbudh ā vah soma pīti
144	devān adya svardṛśaḥ	deva adya svar dṛś
144	agne pūrvāḥ anu uṣasaḥ vibhāvaso	agni pūrva anu uṣas vibhāvasu
144	dīdetha viśvadarśataḥ	dīdī viśva darśata
144	asi grāmeṣu avitā purohitaḥ	as grāma avitṛ purohita
144	asi yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ	as yajña mānuṣa
144	ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam	ni tvad yajña sādhana
144	agne hotāram ṛtvijam	agni hotṛ ṛtvij
144	manuṣvat deva dhīmahi pracetasam	manuṣvat deva dhā pracetas
144	jīram dūtam amartyam	jīra dūta amartya
144	yat devānām mitramahaḥ purohitaḥ	yat deva mitra mahas purohita
144	antaraḥ yāsi dūtyam	antara yā dūtya
144	sindhoḥ iva prasvanitāsaḥ ūrmayaḥ	sindhu iva prasvan ūrmi
144	agneḥ bhrājante arcayaḥ	agni bhrāj arci
144	śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhiḥ	śru śrut karṇa vahni
144	devaiḥ agne sayāvabhiḥ	deva agni sa yāvan
144	ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitraḥ aryamā	ā sad barhis mitra aryaman
144	prātaryāvāṇaḥ adhvaram	prātar yāvan adhvara
144	śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavaḥ	śru stoma marut sudānu
144	agnijihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	agni jihvā ṛtāvṛdh
144	pibatu somam varuṇaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ	pā soma varuṇa dhṛ vrata
144	aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ	aśvin uṣas sajūs
 ---
145	tvam agne vasūn iha	tvad agni vasu iha
145	rudrān ādityān uta	rudra āditya uta
145	yajā svadhvaram janam	yaj su adhvara jana
145	manujātam ghṛtapruṣam	manu jan ghṛta pruṣ
145	śruṣTīvānaḥ hi dāśuṣe	śruṣṭīvan hi dāś
145	devāḥ agne vicetasaḥ	deva agni vicetas
145	tān rohidaśva girvaṇaḥ	tad rohit aśva girvaṇas
145	trayastriṁśatam ā vaha	trayastriṃśat ā vah
145	priyamedhavat atrivat	priyamedha vat atri vat
145	jātavedaḥ virūpavat	jātavedas virūpa vat
145	aṅgirasvat mahivrata	aṅgiras vat mahi vrata
145	praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam	praskaṇva śru hava
145	mahikeravaḥ ūtaye	mahikeru ūti
145	priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata	priyamedha hvā
145	rājantam adhvarāṇām	rāj adhvara
145	agnim śukreṇa śociṣā	agni śukra śocis
145	ghṛtāhavana santya	ghṛtāhavana santya
145	imāḥ u su śrudhī giraḥ	idam u su śru gir
145	yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavaḥ	yad kaṇva sūnu
145	havante avase tvā	hvā av tvad
145	tvām citraśravastama	tvad citraśravastama
145	havante vikṣu jantavaḥ	hvā viś jantu
145	śociṣkeśam purupriya	śociṣkeśa puru priya
145	agne havyāya voLhave	agni havya vah
145	ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijam	ni tvad hotṛ ṛtvij
145	dadhire vasuvittamam	dhā vasu vittama
145	śrutkarṇam saprathastamam	śrut karṇa saprathastama
145	viprāḥ agne diviṣTiṣu	vipra agni diviṣṭi
145	ā tvā viprāḥ acucyavuḥ	ā tvad vipra cyu
145	sutasomāḥ abhi prayaḥ	su soma abhi prayas
145	bṛhat bhāḥ bibhrataḥ haviḥ	bṛhat bhās bhṛ havis
145	agne martāya dāśuṣe	agni marta dāś
145	prātaryāvṇaḥ sahaskṛta	prātar yāvan sahaskṛta
145	somapeyāya santya	soma peya santya
145	iha adya daivyam janam	iha adya daivya jana
145	barhiḥ ā sādayā vaso	barhis ā sāday vasu
145	arvāñcam daivyam janam	arvāñc daivya jana
145	agne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ	agni yaj sahūti
145	ayam somaḥ sudānavaḥ	idam soma sudānu
145	tam pāta tiroahnyam	tad pā tiroahnya
 ---
146	eṣā u uṣāḥ apūrvyā	etad u uṣas apūrvya
146	vi ucchati priyā divaḥ	vi vas priya div
146	stuṣe vām aśvinā bṛhat	stu tvad aśvin bṛhat
146	yā dasrā sindhumātarā	yad dasra sindhu mātṛ
146	manotarā rayīṇām	manotṛ rayi
146	dhiyā devā vasuvidā	dhī deva vasu vid
146	vacyante vām kakuhāsaḥ	vañc tvad kakuha
146	jūrṇāyām adhi viṣTapi	jṛ adhi viṣṭap
146	yat vām rathaḥ vibhiḥ patāt	yat tvad ratha vi pat
146	haviṣā jāraḥ apām	havis jāra ap
146	piparti papuriḥ narā	pṛ papuri nara
146	pitā kuTasya carṣaṇiḥ	pitṛ kuṭa carṣaṇi
146	ādāraḥ vām matīnām	ādāra tvad mati
146	nāsatyā matavacasā	nāsatya man vacas
146	pātam somasya dhṛṣṇuyā	pā soma dhṛṣṇuyā
146	yā naḥ pīparat aśvinā	yad mad pṛ aśvin
146	jyotiṣmatī tamaḥ tiraḥ	jyotiṣmat tamas tiras
146	tām asme rāsāthām iṣam	tad mad rā iṣ
146	ā naḥ nāvā matīnām	ā mad nau mati
146	yātam pārāya gantave	yā pāra gam
146	yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham	yuj aśvin ratha
146	aritram vām divaḥ pṛthu	aritra tvad div pṛthu
146	tīrthe sindhūnām rathaḥ	tīrtha sindhu ratha
146	dhiyā yuyujre indavaḥ	dhī yuj indu
146	divaḥ kaṇvāsaḥ indavaḥ	div kaṇva indu
146	vasu sindhūnām pade	vasu sindhu pada
146	svam vavrim kuha dhitsathaḥ	sva vavri kuha dhits
146	abhūt u bhāḥ u aṁśave	bhū u bhās u aṃśu
146	hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ	hiraṇya prati sūrya
146	vi akhyat jihvayā asitaḥ	vi khyā jihvā asita
146	abhūt u pāram etave	bhū u pāra i
146	panthāḥ ṛtasya sādhuyā	pathin ṛta sādhuyā
146	adarśi vi srutiḥ divaḥ	dṛś vi sruti div
146	tattat it aśvinoḥ avaḥ	tad tad id aśvin avas
146	jaritā prati bhūṣati	jaritṛ prati bhūṣ
146	made somasya pipratoḥ	mada soma pṛ
146	vāvasānā vivasvati	vas vivasvant
146	somasya pītyā girā	soma pīti gir
146	manuṣvat śambhū ā gatam	manuṣvat śambhu ā gam
146	yuvoḥ uṣāḥ anu śriyam	tvad uṣas anu śrī
146	parijmanoḥ upācarat	parijman upacar
146	ṛtā vanathaḥ aktubhiḥ	ṛta van aktu
146	ubhā pibatam aśvinā	ubh pā aśvin
146	ubhā naḥ śarma yacchatam	ubh mad śarman yam
146	avidriyābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	avidriya ūti
 ---
147	ayam vām madhumattamaḥ	idam tvad madhumattama
147	sutaḥ somaḥ ṛtāvṛdhā	su soma ṛtāvṛdh
147	tam aśvinā pibatam tiroahnyam	tad aśvin pā tiroahnya
147	dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe	dhā ratna dāś
147	trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā	tri vandhura trivṛt su peśas
147	rathena ā yātam aśvinā	ratha ā yā aśvin
147	kaṇvāsaḥ vām brahma kṛṇvanti adhvare	kaṇva tvad brahman kṛ adhvara
147	teṣām su śṛṇutam havam	tad su śru hava
147	aśvinā madhumattamam	aśvin madhumattama
147	pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā	pā soma ṛtāvṛdh
147	atha adya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe	atha adya dasra vasu bhṛ ratha
147	dāśvāṁsam upa gacchatam	dāś upa gam
147	triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā	triṣadhastha barhis viśva vedas
147	madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam	madhu yajña mikṣ
147	kaṇvāsaḥ vām sutasomāḥ abhidyavaḥ	kaṇva tvad su soma abhidyu
147	yuvām havante aśvinā	tvad hvā aśvin
147	yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣTibhiḥ	yad kaṇva abhiṣṭi
147	pra āvatam yuvam aśvinā	prāv tvad aśvin
147	tābhiḥ su asmān avatam śubhaḥ patī	tad su mad av śubh pati
147	pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā	pā soma ṛtāvṛdh
147	sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe	sudās dasra vasu bhṛ ratha
147	pṛkṣaḥ vahatam aśvinā	pṛkṣ vah aśvin
147	rayim samudrāt uta vā divaḥ pari	rayi samudra uta vā div pari
147	asme dhattam puruspṛham	mad dhā puruspṛh
147	yat nāsatyā parāvati	yat nāsatya parāvat
147	yat vā sthaḥ adhi turvaśe	yat vā as adhi turvaśa
147	ataḥ rathena suvṛtā naḥ ā gatam	atas ratha suvṛt mad ā gam
147	sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ	sākam sūrya raśmi
147	arvāñcā vām saptayaḥ adhvaraśriyaḥ	arvāñc tvad sapti adhvara śrī
147	vahantu savanā it upa	vah savana id upa
147	iṣam pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānavaḥ	iṣ pṛc su kṛt sudānu
147	ā barhiḥ sīdatam narā	ā barhis sad nṛ
147	tena nāsatyā ā gatam	tad nāsatya gam
147	rathena sūryatvacā	ratha sūrya tvac
147	yena śaśvat ūhathuḥ dāśuṣe vasu	yad śaśvat vah dāś vasu
147	madhvaḥ somasya pītaye	madhu soma pīti
147	ukthebhiḥ arvāk avase purūvasū	uktha arvāk av purūvasu
147	arkaiḥ ca ni hvayāmahe	arka ca ni hvā
147	śaśvat kaṇvānām sadasi priye hi kam	śaśvat kaṇva sadas priya hi kaṃ
147	somam papathuḥ aśvinā	soma pā aśvin
 ---
148	saha vāmena naḥ uṣaḥ	saha vāma mad uṣas
148	vi ucchā duhitar divaḥ	vi vas duhitṛ div
148	saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari	saha dyumna bṛhat vibhāvarī
148	rāyā devi dāsvatī	rai devī dāsvat
148	aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ viśvasuvidaḥ	aśvāvat gomat viśva su vid
148	bhūri cyavanta vastave	bhūri cyu vas
148	ut īraya prati mā sūnṛtāḥ uṣaḥ	ud īray prati mad sūnṛta uṣas
148	coda rādhaḥ maghonām	cud rādhas maghavan
148	uvāsa uṣāḥ ucchāt ca nu	vas uṣas vas ca nu
148	devī jīrā rathānām	devī jīra ratha
148	ye asyāḥ ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire	yad idam ācaraṇa dhṛ
148	samudre na śravasyavaḥ	samudra na śravasyu
148	uṣaḥ ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate	uṣas yad tvad pra yāma yuj
148	manaḥ dānāya sūrayaḥ	manas dāna sūri
148	atra aha tat kaṇvaḥ eṣām kaṇvatamaḥ	atra aha tad kaṇva idam kaṇvatama
148	nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām	nāman gṛ nṛ
148	ā ghā yoṣā iva sūnarī	ā gha yoṣā iva sūnara
148	uṣāḥ yāti prabhuñjatī	uṣas yā prabhuj
148	jarayantī vṛjanam padvat īyate	jaray vṛjana padvat i
148	ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ	ud pātay pakṣin
148	vi yā sṛjati samanam vi arthinaḥ	vi yad sṛj samana vi arthin
148	padam na veti odatī	pada na vī odatī
148	vayaḥ nakiḥ te paptivāṁsaḥ āsate	vi nakir tad pat ās
148	vyuṣTau vājinīvati	vyuṣṭi vājinīvat
148	eṣā ayukta parāvataḥ	etad yuj parāvat
148	sūryasya udayanāt adhi	sūrya udayana adhi
148	śatam rathebhiḥ subhagā uṣāḥ iyam	śata ratha subhaga uṣas idam
148	vi yāti abhi mānuṣān	vi yā abhi mānuṣa
148	viśvam asyāḥ nānāma cakṣase jagat	viśva idam nam cakṣ jagant
148	jyotiḥ kṛṇoti sūnarī	jyotis kṛ sūnara
148	apa dveṣaḥ maghonī duhitā divaḥ	apa dveṣas maghavan duhitṛ div
148	uṣāḥ ucchat apa sridhaḥ	uṣas vas apa sridh
148	uṣaḥ ā bhāhi bhānunā	uṣā ā bhā bhānu
148	candreṇa duhitar divaḥ	candra duhitṛ div
148	āvahantī bhūri asmabhyam saubhagam	āvah bhūri mad saubhaga
148	vyucchantī diviṣTiṣu	vivas diviṣṭi
148	viśvasya hi prāṇanam jīvanam tve	viśva hi prāṇana jīvana tvad
148	vi yat ucchasi sūnari	vi yat vas sūnara
148	sā naḥ rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari	tad mad ratha bṛhat vibhāvarī
148	śrudhi citrāmaghe havam	śru citrāmagha hava
148	uṣaḥ vājam hi vaṁsva	uṣas vāja hi van
148	yaḥ citraḥ mānuṣe jane	yad citra mānuṣa jana
148	tena ā vaha sukṛtaḥ adhvarān upa	tad ā vah su kṛt adhvara upa
148	ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ	yad tvad gṛ vahni
148	viśvān devān ā vaha somapītaye	viśva deva ā vah soma pīti
148	antarikṣāt uṣaḥ tvam	antarikṣa uṣas tvad
148	sa asmāsu dhāḥ gomat aśvāvat ukthyam	tad mad dhā gomat aśvāvat ukthya
148	uṣaḥ vājam suvīryam	uṣas vāja su vīrya
148	yasyāḥ ruśantaḥ arcayaḥ	yad ruśat arci
148	prati bhadrāḥ adṛkṣata	prati bhadra dṛś
148	sā naḥ rayim viśvavāram supeśasam	tad mad rayi viśva vāra su peśas
148	uṣāḥ dadātu sugmyam	uṣas dā sugmya
148	ye cit hi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrve ūtaye	yad cit hi tvad ṛṣi pūrva ūti
148	juhūre avase mahi	hvā av mahi
148	sā naḥ stomān abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasā	tad mad stoma abhi gṛ rādhas
148	uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā	uṣas śukra śocis
148	uṣaḥ yat adya bhānunā	uṣas yat adya bhānu
148	vi dvārau ṛṇavaḥ divaḥ	vi dvār ṛch div
148	pra naḥ yacchatāt avṛkam pṛthu chardiḥ	pra mad yam avṛka pṛthu chardis
148	pra devi gomatīḥ iṣaḥ	pra devī gomat iṣ
148	sam naḥ rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā	sam mad rai bṛhat viśva peśas
148	mimikṣvā sam iLābhiḥ ā	mikṣ sam iḍā ā
148	sam dyumnena viśvaturā uṣaḥ mahi	sam dyumna viśva tura uṣas mahi
148	sam vājaiḥ vājinīvati	sam vāja vājinīvat
 ---
149	uṣaḥ bhadrebhiḥ ā gahi	uṣas bhadra ā gam
149	divaḥ cit rocanāt adhi	div cit rocana adhi
149	vahantu aruṇapsavaḥ	vah aruṇapsu
149	upa tvā sominaḥ gṛham	upa tvad somin gṛha
149	supeśasam sukham ratham	su peśas sukha ratha
149	yam adhyasthāḥ uṣaḥ tvam	yad adhiṣṭhā uṣas tvad
149	tenā suśravasam janam	tad su śravas jana
149	pra ava adya duhitar divaḥ	prāv adya duhitṛ div
149	vayaḥ cit te patatriṇaḥ	vi cit tvad patatrin
149	dvipat catuṣpat arjuni	dvipad catuṣpada arjunī
149	uṣaḥ pra āran ṛtūn anu	uṣas prarch ṛtu anu
149	divaḥ antebhyaḥ pari	div anta pari
149	vyucchantī hi raśmibhiḥ	vivas hi raśmi
149	viśvam ābhāsi rocanam	viśva ābhā rocana
149	tām tvām uṣar vasūyavaḥ	tad tvad uṣas vasūyu
149	gīrbhiḥ kaṇvāḥ ahūṣata	gir kaṇva hvā
 ---
150	ut u tyam jātavedasam	ud u tya jātavedas
150	devam vahanti ketavaḥ	deva vah ketu
150	dṛśe viśvāya sūryam	dṛś viśva sūrya
150	apa tye tāyavaḥ yathā	apa tya tāyu yathā
150	nakṣatrā yanti aktubhiḥ	nakṣatra i aktu
150	sūrāya viśvacakṣase	sūra viśva cakṣas
150	adṛśram asya ketavaḥ	dṛś idam ketu
150	vi raśmayaḥ janān anu	vi raśmi jana anu
150	bhrājantaḥ agnayaḥ yathā	bhrāj agni yathā
150	taraṇiḥ viśvadarśataḥ	taraṇi viśva darśata
150	jyotiṣkṛt asi sūrya	jyotiṣkṛt as sūrya
150	viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam	viśva ā bhā rocana
150	pratyaṅ devānām viśaḥ	pratyañc deva viś
150	pratyaṅ ut eṣi mānuṣān	pratyañc ud i mānuṣa
150	pratyaṅ viśvam svar dṛśe	pratyañc viśva svar dṛś
150	yenā pāvaka cakṣasā	yad pāvaka cakṣas
150	bhuraṇyantam janān anu	bhuraṇy jana anu
150	tvam varuṇa paśyasi	tvad varuṇa paś
150	vi dyām eṣi rajaḥ pṛthu	vi div i rajas pṛthu
150	ahā mimānaḥ aktubhiḥ	aha mā aktu
150	paśyan janmāni sūrya	paś janman sūrya
150	sapta tvā haritaḥ rathe	saptan tvad harit ratha
150	vahanti deva sūrya	vah deva sūrya
150	śociṣkeśam vicakṣaṇa	śociṣkeśa vicakṣaṇa
150	ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ	yuj saptan śundhyu
150	sūraḥ rathasya naptyaḥ	sūra ratha naptī
150	tābhiḥ yāti svayuktibhiḥ	tad yā sva yukti
150	ut vayam tamasaḥ pari	ud mad tamas pari
150	jyotiḥ paśyantaḥ uttaram	jyotis paś uttara
150	devam devatrā sūryam	deva devatrā sūrya
150	aganma jyotiḥ uttamam	gam jyotis uttama
150	udyan adya mitramahaḥ	udi adya mitra maha
150	ārohan uttarām divam	āruh uttara div
150	hṛdrogam mama sūrya	hṛd roga mad sūrya
150	harimāṇam ca nāśaya	hariman ca nāśay
150	śukeṣu me harimāṇam	śuka mad hariman
150	ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi	ropaṇākā dhā
150	atha u hāridraveṣu me	atho hāridrava mad
150	harimāṇam ni dadhmasi	hariman ni dhā
150	ut agāt ayam ādityaḥ	ud gā idam āditya
150	viśvena sahasā saha	viśva sahas saha
150	dviṣantam mahyam randhayan	dviṣ mad randhay
150	mā u aham dviṣate radham	mā u mad dviṣ radh
 ---
151	abhi tyam meṣam puruhūtam ṛgmiyam	abhi tya meṣa puruhūta ṛgmiya
151	indram gīrbhiḥ madatā vasvaḥ arṇavam	indra gir mad vasu arṇava
151	yasya dyāvaḥ na vicaranti mānuṣā	yad div na vicar mānuṣa
151	bhuje maṁhiṣTham abhi vipram arcata	bhuj maṃhiṣṭha abhi vipra arc
151	abhi īm avanvan svabhiṣTim ūtayaḥ	abhi īṃ van su abhiṣṭi ūti
151	antarikṣaprām taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam	antarikṣa prā taviṣī āvṛ
151	indram dakṣāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ madacyutam	indra dakṣa ṛbhu mada cyut
151	śatakratum javanī sūnṛtā ā aruhat	śatakratu javana sūnṛtā āruh
151	tvam gotram aṅgirobhyaḥ avṛṇoḥ apa	tvad gotra aṅgiras vṛ apa
151	uta atraye śatadureṣu gātuvit	uta atri śata dura gātu vid
151	sasena cit vimadāya avahaḥ vasu	sasa cit vimada vah vasu
151	ājau adrim vāvasānasya nartayan	āji adri vas nartay
151	tvam apām apidhānā avṛṇoḥ apa	tvad ap apidhāna vṛ
151	adhārayaḥ parvate dānumat vasu	apadhāray parvata dānumat vasu
151	vṛtram yat indra śavasā avadhīḥ ahim	vṛtra yat indra śavas vadh ahi
151	āt it sūryam divi ā arohayaḥ dṛśe	āt id sūrya div ārohay dṛś
151	tvam māyābhiḥ apa māyinaḥ adhamaḥ	tvad māyā apa māyin dham
151	svadhābhiḥ ye adhi śuptau ajuhvata	svadhā yad adhi śupti hu
151	tvam piproḥ nṛmaṇaḥ pra arujaḥ puraḥ	tvad pipru nṛmaṇas praruj pur
151	pra ṛjiśvānam dasyuhatyeṣu āvitha	pra ṛjiśvan dasyu hatya av
151	tvam kutsam śuṣṇahatyeṣu āvitha	tvad kutsa śuṣṇa hatya av
151	arandhayaḥ atithigvāya śambaram	randhay atithigva śambara
151	mahāntam cit arbudam ni kramīḥ padā	mahat cit arbuda ni kram pad
151	sanāt eva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe	sanāt eva dasyu hatya jan
151	tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryak hitā	tvad viśva taviṣī sadhryañc dhā
151	tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate	tvad rādhas soma pītha hṛṣ
151	tava vajraḥ cikite bāhvoḥ hitaḥ	tvad vajra cit bāhu dhā
151	vṛścā śatroḥ ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā	vraśc śatru ava viśva vṛṣṇya
151	vi jānīhi āryān ye ca dasyavaḥ	vi jñā ārya yad ca dasyu
151	barhiṣmate randhayā śāsat avratān	barhiṣmant randhay śās avrata
151	śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā	śākin bhū yajamāna coditṛ
151	viśvā it tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana	viśva id tad tvad sadhamāda kan
151	anuvratāya randhayan apavratān	anuvrata randhay apavrata
151	ābhūbhiḥ indraḥ śnathayan anābhuvaḥ	ābhū indra śnathay an ābhū
151	vṛddhasya cit vardhataḥ dyām inakṣataḥ	vṛdh cit vṛdh div inakṣ
151	stavānaḥ vamraḥ vi jaghāna saṁdihaḥ	stu vamra vi han saṃdih
151	takṣat yat te uśanā sahasā sahaḥ	takṣ yat tvad uśanas sahas sahas
151	vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ	vi rodas majman bādh śavas
151	ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇaḥ manoyujaḥ	ā tvad vāta nṛmaṇas manas yuj
151	ā pūryamāṇam avahan abhi śravaḥ	ā pṛ vah abhi śravas
151	mandiṣTa yat uśane kāvye sacā	mand yat uśanas kāvya saca
151	indraḥ vaṅkū vaṅkutarā adhi tiṣThati	indra vaṅku vaṅkutara adhi sthā
151	ugraḥ yayim niḥ apaḥ srotasā asṛjat	ugra yayi niḥ ap srotas sṛj
151	vi śuṣṇasya dṛṁhitāḥ airayat puraḥ	vi śuṣṇa dṛṃhay īray pur
151	ā smā ratham vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣThasi	ā sma ratha vṛṣan pāna sthā
151	śāryātasya prabhṛtāḥ yeṣu mandase	śāryāta prabhṛ yad mad
151	indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākanaḥ	indra yathā su soma kan
151	anarvāṇam ślokam ā rohase divi	anarvan śloka ā ruh div
151	adadāḥ arbhām mahate vacasyave	dā arbha mahat vacasyu
151	kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate	kakṣīvant vṛcayā indra su
151	menā abhavaḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato	menā bhū vṛṣaṇaśva su kratu
151	viśvā it tā te savaneṣu pravācyā	viśva id tad tvad savana pravac
151	indraḥ aśrāyi sudhyaḥ nireke	indra śri su dhī nireka
151	pajreṣu stomaḥ duryaḥ na yūpaḥ	pajra stoma durya na yūpa
151	aśvayuḥ gavyuḥ rathayuḥ vasūyuḥ	aśvayu gavyu rathayu vasūyu
151	indraḥ it rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā	indra id rai kṣi prayantṛ
151	idam namaḥ vṛṣabhāya svarāje	idam namas vṛṣabha sva rāj
151	satyaśuṣmāya tavase avāci	satya śuṣma tavas vac
151	asmin indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ	idam indra vṛjana sarva vīra
151	smat sūribhiḥ tava śarman syāma	smat sūri tvad śarman as
 ---
152	tyam su meṣam mahayā svarvidam	tya su meṣa mahay svar vid
152	śatam yasya subhvaḥ sākam īrate	śata yad su bhū sākam īr
152	atyam na vājam havanasyadam ratham	atya na vāja havanasyad ratha
152	ā indram vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ	ā indra vṛt av suvṛkti
152	sa parvataḥ na dharuṇeṣu acyutaḥ	tad parvata na dharuṇa acyuta
152	sahasramūtiḥ taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe	sahasra ūti taviṣī vṛdh
152	indraḥ yat vṛtram avadhīt nadīvṛtam	indra yat vṛtra vadh nadīvṛt
152	ubjan arṇāṁsi jarhṛṣāṇaḥ andhasā	ubj arṇas jarhṛṣ andhas
152	sa hi dvaraḥ dvariṣu vavraḥ ūdhani	tad hi dvara dvarin vavra ūdhas
152	candrabudhnaḥ madavṛddhaḥ manīṣibhiḥ	candra budhna mada vṛdh manīṣin
152	indram tam ahve svapasyayā dhiyā	indra tad hvā svapasyā dhī
152	maṁhiṣTharātim sa hi papriḥ andhasaḥ	maṃhiṣṭha rāti tad hi papri andhas
152	ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ	ā yad pṛ div sadman barhis
152	samudram na subhvaḥ svāḥ abhiṣTayaḥ	samudra na su bhū sva abhiṣṭi
152	tam vṛtrahatye anu tasthuḥ ūtayaḥ	tad vṛtra hatya anu sthā ūti
152	śuṣmāḥ indram avātāḥ ahrutapsavaḥ	śuṣma indra avāta ahrutapsu
152	abhi svavṛṣTim made asya yudhyataḥ	abhi sva vṛṣṭi mada idam yudh
152	raghvīḥ iva pravaṇe sasruḥ ūtayaḥ	raghu iva pravaṇa sṛ ūti
152	indraḥ yat vajrī dhṛṣamāṇaḥ andhasā	indra yat vajrin dhṛṣ andhas
152	bhinat valasya paridhīn iva tritaḥ	bhid vala paridhi iva trita
152	pari īm ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavaḥ	pari īṃ ghṛṇā car tviṣ śavas
152	apaḥ vṛtvī rajasaḥ budhnam ā aśayat	ap vṛ rajas budhna āśī
152	vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvanaḥ	vṛtra yat pravaṇa durgṛbhiśvan
152	nijaghantha hanvoḥ indra tanyatum	nihan hanu indra tanyatu
152	hradam na hi tvā nyṛṣanti ūrmayaḥ	hrada na hi tvad nyṛṣ ūrmi
152	brahmāṇi indra tava yāni vardhanā	brahman indra tvad yad vardhana
152	tvaṣTā cit te yujyam vāvṛdhe śavaḥ	tvaṣṭṛ cit tvad yujya vṛdh śavas
152	tatakṣa vajram abhibhūtyojasam	takṣ vajra abhibhūti ojas
152	jaghanvān u haribhiḥ sambhṛtakrato	han u hari sambhṛta kratu
152	indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyan apaḥ	indra vṛtra manus gātuy ap
152	ayacchathāḥ bāhvoḥ vajram āyasam	yam bāhu vajra āyasa
152	adhārayaḥ divi ā sūryam dṛśe	dhāray div ā sūrya dṛś
152	bṛhat svaścandram amavat yat ukthyam	bṛhat svaścandra amavat yat ukthya
152	akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇam divaḥ	kṛ bhiyas rohaṇa div
152	yat mānuṣapradhanāḥ indram ūtayaḥ	yat mānuṣa pradhana indra ūti
152	svar nṛṣācaḥ marutaḥ amadan anu	svar nṛṣāc marut mad anu
152	dyauḥ cit asya amavān aheḥ svanāt	div cit idam amavat ahi svana
152	ayoyavīt bhiyasā vajraḥ indra te	yoyu bhiyas vajra indra tvad
152	vṛtrasya yat badbadhānasya rodasī*	vṛtra yat badbadh rodas
152	made sutasya śavasā abhinat śiraḥ	mada suta śavas bhid śiras
152	yat it nu indra pṛthivī daśabhujiḥ	yat id nu indra pṛthivī daśabhuji
152	ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣTayaḥ	ahar viśva tan kṛṣṭi
152	atra aha te maghavan viśrutam sahaḥ	atra ha tvad maghavan viśru sahas
152	dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat	div anu śavas barhaṇā bhū
152	tvam asya pāre rajasaḥ vyomanaḥ	tvad idam pāra rajas vyoman
152	svabhūtyojāḥ avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ	sva bhūti ojas av dhṛṣ manas
152	cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojasaḥ	kṛ bhūmi pratimāna ojas
152	apaḥ svar paribhūḥ eṣi ā divam	ap svar paribhū i ā div
152	tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ	tvad bhū pratimāna pṛthivī
152	ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patiḥ bhūḥ	ṛṣva vīra bṛhat pati bhū
152	viśvam ā prāḥ antarikṣam mahitvā	viśva āprā antarikṣa mahitva
152	satyam addhā nakiḥ anyaḥ tvāvān	satya addhā nakir anya tvāvat
152	na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyacaḥ	na yad dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyacas
152	na sindhavaḥ rajasaḥ antam ānaśuḥ	na sindhu rajas anta aś
152	na uta svavṛṣTim made asya yudhyataḥ	na uta sva vṛṣṭi mada idam yudh
152	ekaḥ anyat cakṛṣe viśvam ānuṣak	eka anya kṛ viśva ānuṣak
152	ārcan atra marutaḥ sasmin ājau	arc atra marut tad āji
152	viśve devāsaḥ amadan anu tvā	viśva deva mad anu tvad
152	vṛtrasya yat bhṛṣTimatā vadhena	vṛtra yat bhṛṣṭimat vadha
152	ni tvam indra prati ānam jaghantha	ni tvad indra prati āna han
 ---
153	ni ū su vācam pra mahe bharāmahe	ni u su vāc pra mah bhṛ
153	giraḥ indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ	gir indra sadana vivasvant
153	nū cit hi ratnam sasatām iva avidat	nu cit hi ratna sas iva vid
153	na duṣTutiḥ draviṇodeṣu śasyate	na duṣṭuti draviṇas da śaṃs
153	duraḥ aśvasya duraḥ indra goḥ asi	dura aśva dura indra go as
153	duraḥ yavasya vasunaḥ inaḥ patiḥ	dura yava vasu ina pati
153	śikṣānaraḥ pradivaḥ akāmakarśanaḥ	śikṣā nara pradiv a kāma karśana
153	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ tam idam gṛṇīmasi	sakhi sakhi tad idam gṛ
153	śacīvaḥ indra purukṛt dyumattama	śacīvat indra puru kṛt dyumattama
153	tava it idam abhitaḥ cekite vasu	tvad id idam abhitas cekit vasu
153	ataḥ saṁgṛbhya abhibhūte ā bhara	atas saṃgrah abhibhū ā bhṛ
153	mā tvāyataḥ jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ	mā tvāyat jaritṛ kāma ūnay
153	ebhiḥ dyubhiḥ sumanāḥ ebhiḥ indubhiḥ	idam div sumanas idam indu
153	nirundhānaḥ amatim gobhiḥ aśvinā	nirudh amati go aśvin
153	indreṇa dasyum darayantaḥ indubhiḥ	indra dasyu daray indu
153	yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi	yu dveṣas sam iṣ rabh
153	sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi	sam indra rai sam iṣ rabh
153	sam vājebhiḥ puruścandraiḥ abhidyubhiḥ	sam vāja puru ścandra abhidyu
153	sam devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā	sam devī pramati vīra śuṣma
153	goagrayā aśvāvatyā rabhemahi	go agra aśvāvat rabh
153	te tvā madāḥ amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā	tad tvad mada mad tad vṛṣṇya
153	te somāsaḥ vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate	tad soma vṛtra hatya satpati
153	yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇi aprati	yat kāru daśan vṛtra aprati
153	barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ	barhiṣmant ni sahasra barhay
153	yudhā yudham upa gha it eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā	yudh yudh upa gha id i dhṛṣṇuyā
153	purā puram sam idam haṁsi ojasā	pur pur sam idam han ojas
153	namyā yat indra sakhyā parāvati	nami yat indra sakhi parāvat
153	nibarhayaḥ namucim nāma māyinam	nibarhay namuci nāma māyin
153	tvam karañjam uta parṇayam vadhīḥ	tvad karañja uta parṇaya vadh
153	tejiṣThayā atithigvasya vartanī	tejiṣṭha atithigva vartani
153	tvam śatā vaṅgṛdasya abhinat puraḥ	tvad śata vaṅgṛda bhid pur
153	anānudaḥ pariṣūtāḥ ṛjiśvanā	anānuda pariṣū ṛjiśvan
153	tvam etān janarājñaḥ dviḥ daśa	tvad etad jana rājan dvis daśan
153	abandhunā suśravasā upajagmuṣaḥ	abandhu suśravas upagam
153	ṣaṣTim sahasrā navatim nava śrutaḥ	ṣaṣṭi sahasra navati navan śru
153	ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadā avṛṇak	ni cakra rathya duṣpad vṛj
153	tvam āvitha suśravasam tava ūtibhiḥ	tvad av suśravas tvad ūti
153	tava trāmabhiḥ indra tūrvayāṇam	tvad trāman indra tūrvayāṇa
153	tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum	tvad idam kutsa atithigva āyu
153	mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ	mah rājan yuvan randhanāy
153	ye udṛci indra devagopāḥ	yad udṛc indra deva gopa
153	sakhāyaḥ te śivatamāḥ asāma	sakhi tvad śivatama as
153	tvām stoṣāma tvayā suvīrāḥ	tvad stu tvad su vīra
153	drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ	drāghīyas āyus pratara dhā
 ---
154	mā naḥ asmin maghavan pṛtsu aṁhasi	mā mad idam maghavan pṛt aṃhas
154	nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe	nahi tvad anta śavas parīṇaś
154	akrandayaḥ nadyaḥ roruvat vanā	kranday nadī roro vana
154	kathā na kṣoṇīḥ bhiyasā sam ārata	kathā na kṣoṇī bhiyas sam ṛch
154	arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate	arc śakra śākina śacīvat
154	śṛṇvantam indram mahayan abhi stuhi	śru indra mahay abhi stu
154	yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe	yad dhṛṣṇu śavas rodas ubh
154	vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabhaḥ nyṛñjate	vṛṣan vṛṣan tva vṛṣabha nyṛj
154	arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyam vacaḥ	arc div bṛhat śūṣya vacas
154	svakṣatram yasya dhṛṣataḥ dhṛṣat manaḥ	svakṣatra yad dhṛṣ dhṛṣ manas
154	bṛhacchravāḥ asuraḥ barhaṇā kṛtaḥ	bṛhat śravas asura barhaṇā kṛ
154	puraḥ haribhyām vṛṣabhaḥ rathaḥ hi saḥ	puras hari vṛṣabha ratha hi tad
154	tvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ sānu kopayaḥ	tvad div bṛhat sānu kopay
154	ava tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat	ava tman dhṛṣ śambara bhid
154	yat māyinaḥ vrandinaḥ mandinā dhṛṣat	yat māyin vrandin mandin dhṛṣ
154	śitām gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi	śā gabhasti aśani pṛtany
154	ni yat vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani	ni yat vṛj śvasana mūrdhan
154	śuṣṇasya cit vrandinaḥ roruvat vanā	śuṣṇa cit vrandin roro vana
154	prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā	prācīna manas barhaṇāvat
154	yat adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kaḥ tvā pari	yat adya cit kṛ ka tvad pari
154	tvam āvitha naryam turvaśam yadum	tvad av narya turvaśa yadu
154	tvam turvītim vayyam śatakrato	tvad turvīti vayya śatakratu
154	tvam ratham etaśam kṛtvye dhane	tvad ratha etaśa kṛtvya dhana
154	tvam puraḥ navatim dambhayaḥ nava	tvad pur navati dambhay navan
154	sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvat janaḥ	tad gha rājan sat pati śvi jana
154	rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati	rā havya prati yad śāsa inv
154	ukthā vā yaḥ abhigṛṇāti rādhasā	uktha vā yad abhigṛ rādhas
154	dānuḥ asmai uparā pinvate divaḥ	dānu idam upara pinv div
154	asamam kṣatram asamā manīṣā	asama kṣatra asama manīṣā
154	pra somapāḥ apasā santu neme	pra soma pā apas as nema
154	ye te indra daduṣaḥ vardhayanti	yad tvad indra dā vardhay
154	mahi kṣatram sthaviram vṛṣṇyam ca	mahi kṣatra sthavira vṛṣṇya ca
154	tubhya it ete bahulāḥ adridugdhāḥ	tvad id etad bahula adri duh
154	camūṣadaḥ camasāḥ indrapānāḥ	camūṣad camasa indra pāna
154	vi aśnuhi tarpayā kāmam eṣām	vi aś tarpay kāma idam
154	athā manaḥ vasudeyāya kṛṣva	atha manas vasu deya kṛ
154	apām atiṣThat dharuṇahvaram tamaḥ	ap sthā dharuṇahvara tamas
154	antar vṛtrasya jaThareṣu parvataḥ	antar vṛtra jaṭhara parvata
154	abhi īm indraḥ nadyaḥ vavriṇā hitāḥ	abhi īṃ indra nadī vavri dhā
154	viśvāḥ anuṣThāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate	viśva anuṣṭhā pravaṇa han
154	sa śevṛdham adhi dhāḥ dyumnam asme	tad śevṛdha adhi dhā dyumna mad
154	mahi kṣatram janāṣāT indra tavyam	mahi kṣatra janāṣah indra tavya
154	rakṣā ca naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn	rakṣ ca mad maghavan pā sūri
154	rāye ca naḥ svapatyai iṣe dhāḥ	rai ca mad su apatya iṣ dhā
 ---
155	divaḥ cit asya varimā vi paprathe	div cit idam variman vi prath
155	indram na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati	indra na mahan pṛthivī cana prati
155	bhīmaḥ tuviṣmān carṣaṇibhyaḥ ātapaḥ	bhīma tuviṣmat carṣaṇi ātapa
155	śiśīte vajram tejase na vaṁsagaḥ	śā vajra tij na vaṃsaga
155	saḥ arṇavaḥ na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ	tad arṇava na nadī samudriya
155	prati gṛbhṇāti viśritāḥ varīmabhiḥ	prati grah viśri varīman
155	indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate	indra soma pā vṛṣāy
155	sanāt sa yudhmaḥ ojasā panasyate	sanāt tad yudhma ojas panasy
155	tvam tam indra parvatam na bhojase	tvad tad indra parvata na bhuj
155	mahaḥ nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām irajyasi	mah nṛmṇa dharman irajy
155	pra vīryeṇa devatā ati cekite	pra vīrya devatāti cekit
155	viśvasmai ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ	viśva ugra karman purodhā
155	saḥ it vane namasyubhiḥ vacasyate	tad id vana namasyu vacasy
155	cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇaḥ indriyam	cāru jana prabrū indriya
155	vṛṣā chanduḥ bhavati haryataḥ vṛṣā	vṛṣan chandu bhū haryata vṛṣan
155	kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yat invati	kṣema dhenā maghavan yat inv
155	saḥ it mahāni samithāni majmanā	tad id maha samitha majman
155	kṛṇoti yudhmaḥ ojasā janebhyaḥ	kṛ yudhma ojas jana
155	adhā cana śrat dadhati tviṣīmate	adha cana śraddhā tviṣīmat
155	indrāya vajram nighanighnate vadham	indra vajra nijaṅghan vadha
155	sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā	tad hi śravasyu sadana kṛtrima
155	kṣmayā vṛdhānaḥ ojasā vināśayan	kṣmā vṛdh ojas vināśay
155	jyotīṁṣi kṛṇvan avṛkāṇi yajyave	jyotis kṛ avṛka yajyu
155	ava sukratuḥ sartavai apaḥ sṛjat	ava su kratu sṛ ap sṛj
155	dānāya manaḥ somapāvan astu te	dāna manas soma pāvan as tvad
155	arvāñcā harī vandanaśrut ā kṛdhi	arvāñc hari vandana śrut ā kṛ
155	yamiṣThāsaḥ sārathayaḥ ye indra te	yamiṣṭha sārathi yad indra tvad
155	na tvā ketāḥ ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ	na tvad keta ā dabh bhūrṇi
155	aprakṣitam vasu bibharṣi hastayoḥ	a prakṣi vasu bhṛ hasta
155	aṣāLham sahaḥ tanvī śrutaḥ dadhe	a sah sahas tanū śru dhā
155	āvṛtāsaḥ avatāsaḥ na kartṛbhiḥ	āvṛ avata na kartṛ
155	tanūṣu te kratavaḥ indra bhūrayaḥ	tanū tvad kratu indra bhūri
 ---
156	eṣa pra pūrvīḥ ava tasya camriṣaḥ	etad pra pūrva ava tad camriṣ
156	atyaḥ na yoṣām ut ayaṁsta bhurvaṇiḥ	atya na yoṣā ud yam bhurvaṇi
156	dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayam	dakṣa mah pāyay hiraṇyaya
156	ratham āvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam	ratha āvṛt hari yoga ṛbhvas
156	tam gūrtayaḥ nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ	tad gūrti nemanniṣ parīṇas
156	samudram na saṁcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ	samudra na saṃcaraṇa saniṣyu
156	patim dakṣasya vidathasya nū sahaḥ	pati dakṣa vidatha nu sahas
156	girim na venāḥ adhi roha tejasā	giri na vena adhi ruh tejas
156	sa turvaṇiḥ mahān areṇu pauṁsye	tad turvaṇi mahat areṇu pauṃsya
156	gireḥ bhṛṣTiḥ na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ	giri bhṛṣṭi na bhrāj tuj śavas
156	yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyasaḥ made	yad śuṣṇa māyin āyasa mada
156	dudhraḥ ābhūṣu rāmayat ni dāmani	dudhra ābhū rāmay ni dāman
156	devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhā ūtaye	deva yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdha ūti
156	indram siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ	indra sac uṣas na sūrya
156	yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tamaḥ	yad dhṛṣṇu śavas bādh tamas
156	iyarti reṇum bṛhat arhariṣvaṇiḥ	ṛch reṇu bṛhat arhariṣvaṇi
156	vi yat tiraḥ dharuṇam acyutam rajaḥ	vi yat tiras dharuṇa acyuta rajas
156	atiṣThipaḥ divaḥ ātāsu barhaṇā	sthāpay div ātā barhaṇā
156	svarmīLhe yat made indra harṣyā	svar mīḍha yat mada indra harṣay
156	ahan vṛtram niḥ apām aubjaḥ arṇavam	han vṛtra niḥ ap ubj arṇava
156	tvam divaḥ dharuṇam dhiṣe ojasā	tvad div dharuṇa dhā ojas
156	pṛthivyāḥ indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ	pṛthivī indra sadana māhina
156	tvam sutasya made ariṇāḥ apaḥ	tva suta mada ri ap
156	vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyā arujaḥ	vi vṛtra samayā pāṣya ruj
 ---
157	pra maṁhiṣThāya bṛhate bṛhadraye	pra maṃhiṣṭha bṛhat bṛhadri
157	satyaśuṣmāya tavase matim bhare	satya śuṣma tavas mati bhṛ
157	apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharam	ap iva pravaṇa yad durdhara
157	rādhaḥ viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam	rādhas viśvāyu śavas apāvṛ
157	adha te viśvam anu ha asat iṣTaye	adha tvad viśva anu ha as iṣṭi
157	āpaḥ nimnā iva savanā haviṣmataḥ	ap nimna iva savana haviṣmat
157	yat parvate na samaśīta haryataḥ	yat parvata na saṃśā haryata
157	indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ	indra vajra śnath hiraṇyaya
157	asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvare	idam bhīma namas sam adhvara
157	uṣaḥ na śubhre ā bharā panīyase	uṣa na śubhra ā bhṛ panīyas
157	yasya dhāma śravase nāma indriyam	yad dhāman śravas nāman indriya
157	jyotiḥ akāri haritaḥ na ayase	jyotis kṛ harit na i
157	ime te indra te vayam puruṣTuta	idam tvad indra tad mad puruṣṭuta
157	ye tvā ārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso	yad tvad ārabh car prabhūvasu
157	nahi tvat anyaḥ girvaṇaḥ giraḥ saghat	nahi tvad anya girvaṇas gir sagh
157	kṣoṇīḥ iva prati naḥ harya tat vacaḥ	kṣoṇī iva prati mad hary tad vacas
157	bhūri te indra vīryam tava smasi	bhūri tvad indra vīrya tvad as
157	asya stotuḥ maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa	idam stotṛ maghavan kāma ā pṛṇ
157	anu te dyauḥ bṛhatī vīryam mame	anu tvad div bṛhat vīrya mā
157	iyam ca te pṛthivī neme ojase	idam ca tvad pṛthivī nam ojas
157	tvam tam indra parvatam mahām urum	tvad tad indra parvata mahat uru
157	vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaḥ cakartitha	vajra vajrin parvaśas kṛt
157	ava asṛjaḥ nivṛtāḥ sartavai apaḥ	avasṛj nivṛ sṛ ap
157	satrā viśvam dadhiṣe kevalam sahaḥ	satrā viśva dhā kevala sahas
 ---
158	nū cit sahojāḥ amṛtaḥ ni tundate	nu cit sahas jā amṛta ni tud
158	hotā yat dūtaḥ abhavat vivasvataḥ	hotṛ yat dūta bhū vivasvant
158	vi sādhiṣThebhiḥ pathibhiḥ rajaḥ mame	vi sādhiṣṭha pathin rajas mā
158	ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati	ā devatāti havis vivās
158	ā svam adma yuvamānaḥ ajaraḥ	ā sva adman yu ajara
158	tṛṣu aviṣyan ataseṣu tiṣThati	tṛṣu aviṣy atasa sthā
158	atyaḥ na pṛṣTham pruṣitasya rocate	atya na pṛṣṭha pruṣ ruc
158	divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat	div na sānu stanay krand
158	krāṇā rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ purohitaḥ	krāṇā rudra vasu purodhā
158	hotā niṣattaḥ rayiṣāT amartyaḥ	hotṛ niṣad rayiṣah amartya
158	rathaḥ na vikṣu ṛñjasānaḥ āyuṣu	ratha na viś ṛj āyu
158	vi ānuṣak vāryā devaḥ ṛṇvati	vi ānuṣak vārya deva ṛch
158	vi vātajūtaḥ ataseṣu tiṣThate	vi vāta jū atasa sthā
158	vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ	vṛthā juhū sṛṇi tuviṣvaṇi
158	tṛṣu yat agne vaninaḥ vṛṣāyase	tṛṣu yat agni vanin vṛṣāy
158	kṛṣṇam te ema ruśadūrme ajara	kṛṣṇa tvad eman ruśat ūrmi ajara
158	tapurjambhaḥ vane ā vātacoditaḥ	tapus jambha vana ā vāta coday
158	yūthe na sāhvān ava vāti vaṁsagaḥ	yūtha na sah ava vā vaṃsaga
158	abhivrajan akṣitam pājasā rajaḥ	abhivraj akṣita pājas rajas
158	sthātuḥ caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ	sthātṛ caratha bhī patatrin
158	dadhuḥ tvā bhṛgavaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā	tvad bhṛgu mānuṣa ā
158	rayim na cārum suhavam janebhyaḥ	rayi na cāru su hava jana
158	hotāram agne atithim vareṇyam	hotṛ agni atithi vareṇya
158	mitram na śevam divyāya janmane	mitra na śeva divya janman
158	hotāram sapta juhvaḥ yajiṣTham	hotṛ saptan juhū yajiṣṭha
158	yam vāghataḥ vṛṇate adhvareṣu	yad vāghant vṛ adhvara
158	agnim viśveṣām aratim vasūnām	agni viśva arati vasu
158	saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam	sapary prayas yā ratna
158	acchidrā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya	acchidra sūnu sahas mad adya
158	stotṛbhyaḥ mitramahaḥ śarma yaccha	stotṛ mitra mahat śarman yam
158	agne gṛṇantam aṁhasaḥ uruṣya	agni gṛ aṃhas uruṣy
158	ūrjaḥ napāt pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ	ūrj napāt pur āyasa
158	bhavā varūtham gṛṇate vibhāvaḥ	bhū varūtha gṛ vibhāva
158	bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma	bhū maghavan maghavan śarman
158	uruṣya agne aṁhasaḥ gṛṇantam	uruṣy agni aṃhas gṛ
158	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
159	vayāḥ it agne agnayaḥ te anye	vayā id agni agni tvad anya
159	tve viśve amṛtāḥ mādayante	tvad viśva amṛta māday
159	vaiśvānara nābhiḥ asi kṣitīnām	vaiśvānara nābhi as kṣiti
159	sthūṇā iva janān upamit yayantha	sthūṇā iva jana upamit yam
159	mūrdhā divaḥ nābhiḥ agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ	mūrdhan div nābhi agni pṛthivī
159	atha abhavat aratiḥ rodasyoḥ	atha bhū arati rodasī
159	tam tvā devāsaḥ janayanta devam	tad tvad deva janay deva
159	vaiśvānara jyotiḥ it āryāya	vaiśvānara jyotis id ārya
159	ā sūrye na raśmayaḥ dhruvāsaḥ	ā sūrya na raśmi dhruva
159	vaiśvānare dadhire agnā vasūni	vaiśvānara dhā agni vasu
159	yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu	yad parvata oṣadhī ap
159	yā mānuṣeṣu asi tasya rājā	yad mānuṣa as tad rājan
159	bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī	bṛhat iva sūnu rodas
159	giraḥ hotā manuṣyaḥ na dakṣaḥ	gir hotṛ manuṣya na dakṣa
159	svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīḥ	svarvat satya śuṣma puru
159	vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ	vaiśvānara nṛtama yahvī
159	divaḥ cit te bṛhataḥ jātavedaḥ	div cit tvad bṛhat jātavedas
159	vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam	vaiśvānara pra ric mahi tva
159	rājā kṛṣTīnām asi mānuṣīṇām	rājan kṛṣṭi as mānuṣa
159	yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha	yudh deva varivas kṛ
159	pra nū mahitvam vṛṣabhasya vocam	pra nu mahi tva vṛṣabha vac
159	yam pūravaḥ vṛtrahaṇam sacante	yad pūru vṛtra han sac
159	vaiśvānaraḥ dasyum agniḥ jaghanvān	vaiśvānara dasyu agni han
159	adhūnot kāṣThāḥ ava śambaram bhet	dhū kāṣṭhā ava śambara bhid
159	vaiśvānaraḥ mahimnā viśvakṛṣTiḥ	vaiśvānara mahiman viśva kṛṣṭi
159	bharadvājeṣu yajataḥ vibhāvā	bharadvāja yajata vibhāvan
159	śātavaneye śatinībhiḥ agniḥ	śātavaneya śatin agni
159	puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān	puruṇītha jṛ sūnṛtāvat
 ---
160	vahnim yaśasam vidathasya ketum	vahni yaśas vidatha ketu
160	suprāvyam dūtam sadyoartham	suprāvya dūta sadyoartha
160	dvijanmānam rayim iva praśastam	dvijanman rayi iva praśaṃs
160	rātim bharat bhṛgave mātariśvā	rāti bhṛ bhṛgu mātariśvan
160	asya śāsuḥ ubhayāsaḥ sacante	idam śāsus ubhaya sac
160	haviṣmantaḥ uśijaḥ ye ca martāḥ	haviṣmat uśij yad ca marta
160	divaḥ cit pūrvaḥ ni asādi hotā	div cit pūrva ni sad hotṛ
160	āpṛchyaḥ viśpatiḥ vikṣu vedhāḥ	āpṛcchya viśpati viś vedhas
160	tam navyasī hṛdaḥ ā jāyamānam	tad navīyas hṛd ā jan
160	asmat sukīrtiḥ madhujihvam aśyāḥ	mad su kīrti madhu jihvā aś
160	yam ṛtvijaḥ vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ	yad ṛtvij vṛjana mānuṣa
160	prayasvantaḥ āyavaḥ jījananta	prayasvat āyu hā
160	uśik pāvakaḥ vasuḥ mānuṣeṣu	uśij pāvaka vasu mānuṣa
160	vareṇyaḥ hotā adhāyi vikṣu	vareṇya hotṛ dhā viś
160	damūnāḥ gṛhapatiḥ dame ā	damūnas gṛhapati dama ā
160	agniḥ bhuvat rayipatiḥ rayīṇām	agni bhū rayi pati rayi
160	tam tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām	tad tvad mad pati agni rayi
160	pra śaṁsāmaḥ matibhiḥ gotamāsaḥ	pra śaṃs mati gotama
160	āśum na vājambharam marjayantaḥ	āśu na vājambhara marjay
160	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
161	asmai it u pra tavase turāya	idam id u pra tavas tura
161	prayaḥ na harmi stomam māhināya	prayas na hṛ stoma māhina
161	ṛcīṣamāya adhrigave oham	ṛcīṣama adhrigu oha
161	indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā	indra brahman rātatama
161	asmai it u prayaḥ iva pra yaṁsi	idam id u prayas iva pra yam
161	bharāmi āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti	bhṛ āṅgūṣa bādh suvṛkti
161	indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā	indra hṛd manas manīṣā
161	pratnāya patye dhiyaḥ marjayanta	pratna pati dhī marjay
161	asmai it u tyam upamam svarṣām	idam id u tya upama svarṣā
161	bharāmi āṅgūṣam āsyena	bhṛ āṅgūṣa āsya
161	maṁhiṣTham acchoktibhiḥ matīnām	maṃhiṣṭha acchokti mati
161	suvṛktibhiḥ sūrim vāvṛdhadhyai	suvṛkti sūri vṛdh
161	asmai it u stomam sam hinomi	idam id u stoma sam hi
161	ratham na taṣTā iva tatsināya	ratha na taṣṭṛ iva tatsina
161	giraḥ ca girvāhase suvṛkti	gir ca girvāhas suvṛkti
161	indrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya	indra viśvaminva medhira
161	asmai it u saptim iva śravasyā	idam id u sapti iva śravasya
161	indrāya arkam juhvā sam añje	indra arka juhū sam añj
161	vīram dānaukasam vandadhyai	vīra dāna oka vand
161	purām gūrtaśravasam darmāṇam	pur gur śravas darman
161	asmai it u tvaṣTā takṣat vajram	idam id u tvaṣṭṛ takṣ vajra
161	svapastamam svaryam raṇāya	su apastama svarya raṇa
161	vṛtrasya cit vidat yena marma	vṛtra cit vid yad marman
161	tujan īśānaḥ tujatā kiyedhāḥ	tuj īś tuj kiyedhā
161	asya it u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyaḥ	idam id u mātṛ savana sadyas
161	mahaḥ pitum papivān cāru annā	mah pitu pā cāru anna
161	muṣāyat viṣṇuḥ pacatam sahīyān	muṣāy viṣṇu pacata sahīyas
161	vidhyat varāham tiraḥ adrim astā	vyadh varāha tiras adri as
161	asmai it u gnāḥ cit devapatnīḥ	idam id u gnā cit deva patnī
161	indrāya arkam ahihatye ūvuḥ	indra arka ahi hatya ve
161	pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhre urvī	pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhṛ uru
161	na asya te mahimānam pari staḥ	na idam tad mahiman pari as
161	asya it eva pra ririce mahitvam	idam id eva pra ric mahi tva
161	divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt	div pṛthivī pari antarikṣa
161	svarāT indraḥ dame ā viśvagūrtaḥ	svarāj indra dama ā viśva gur
161	svariḥ amatraḥ vavakṣe raṇāya	svari amatra vakṣ raṇa
161	asya it eva śavasā śuṣantam	idam id eva śavas śuṣ
161	vi vṛścat vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ	vi vraśc vajra vṛtra indra
161	gāḥ na vrāṇāḥ avanīḥ amuñcat	go na vṛ avani muc
161	abhi śravaḥ dāvane sacetāḥ	abhi śravas dā sacetas
161	asya it u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ	idam id u tveṣas ram sindhu
161	pari yat vajreṇa sīm ayacchat	pari yat vajra sīm yam
161	īśānakṛt dāśuṣe daśasyan	īśāna kṛt dāś daśasy
161	turvītaye gādham turvaṇiḥ kar	turvīti gādha turvaṇi kṛ
161	asmai it u pra bharā tūtujānaḥ	idam id u pra bhṛ tuj
161	vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ	vṛtra vajra īś kiyedhā
161	goḥ na parva vi radā tiraścā	go na parvan vi rad tiryañc
161	iṣyan arṇāṁsi apām caradhyai	iṣ arṇas ap car
161	asya it u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi	idam id u pra brū pūrvya
161	turasya karmāṇi navyaḥ ukthaiḥ	tura karman navyas uktha
161	yudhe yat iṣṇānaḥ āyudhāni	yudh yat iṣ āyudha
161	ṛghāyamāṇaḥ niriṇāti śatrūn	ṛghāy nirī śatru
161	asya it u bhiyā girayaḥ ca dṛLhāḥ	idam id u bhī giri ca dṛh
161	dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣaḥ tujete	div ca bhūmi janus tuj
161	upa u venasya joguvānaḥ oṇim	upa u vena joguv oṇi
161	sadyaḥ bhuvat vīryāya nodhāḥ	sadyas bhū vīrya nodhas
161	asmai it u tyat anu dāyi eṣām	idam id u tya anu dā idam
161	ekaḥ yat vavne bhūreḥ īśānaḥ	eka yad van bhūri īś
161	pra etaśam sūrye paspṛdhānam	pra etaśa sūrya spṛdh
161	sauvaśvye suṣvim āvat indraḥ	sauvaśvya suṣvi av indra
161	evā te hāriyojanā suvṛkti	eva tvad hāriyojana suvṛkti
161	indra brahmāṇi gotamāsaḥ akran	indra brahman gotama kṛ
161	ā eṣu viśvapeśasam dhiyam dhāḥ	ā idam viśva peśas dhī dhā
161	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
162	pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam	pra man śavasāna śūṣa
162	āṅgūṣam girvaṇase aṅgirasvat	āṅgūṣa girvaṇas aṅgirasvat
162	suvṛktibhiḥ stuvate ṛgmiyāya	suvṛkti stu ṛgmiya
162	arcāma arkam nare viśrutāya	arc arka nṛ viśru
162	pra vaḥ mahe mahi namaḥ bharadhvam	pra tvad mah mahi namas bhṛ
162	āṅgūṣyam śavasānāya sāma	āṅgūṣya śavasāna sāman
162	yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ	yad mad pūrva pitṛ pada jña
162	arcantaḥ aṅgirasaḥ gāḥ avindan	arc aṅgiras go vid
162	indrasya aṅgirasām ca iṣTau	indra aṅgiras ca iṣṭi
162	vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim	vid saramā tanaya dhāsi
162	bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ	bṛhaspati bhid adri vid go
162	sam usriyābhiḥ vāvaśanta naraḥ	sam usriyā vāś nṛ
162	sa suṣTubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ	tad suṣṭubh tad stubh saptan vipra
162	svareṇa adrim svaryaḥ navagvaiḥ	svara adri svarya navagva
162	saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra	saraṇyu phaliga indra śakra
162	valam raveṇa darayaḥ daśagvaiḥ	vala rava daray daśagva
162	gṛṇānaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ dasma vi var	gṛ aṅgiras dasma vi vṛ
162	uṣasā sūryeṇa gobhiḥ andhaḥ	uṣas sūrya go andhas
162	vi bhūmyāḥ aprathayaḥ indra sānu	vi bhūmi prathay indra sānu
162	divaḥ rajaḥ uparam astabhāyaḥ	div rajas upara stabhāy
162	tat u prayakṣatamam asya karma	tad u prayakṣatama idam karman
162	dasmasya cārutamam asti daṁsaḥ	dasma cārutama as daṃsas
162	upahvare yat uparāḥ apinvat	upahvara yat upara pinv
162	madhvarṇasaḥ nadyaḥ catasraḥ	madhu arṇas nadī catur
162	dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīLe	dvitā vi vṛ sanajā sanīḍa
162	ayāsyaḥ stavamānebhiḥ arkaiḥ	ayāsya stu arka
162	bhagaḥ na mene parame vyoman	bhaga na menā parama vyoman
162	adhārayat rodasī sudaṁsāḥ	dhāray rodas su daṃsas
162	sanāt divam pari bhūmā virūpe	sanāt div pari bhūman virūpa
162	punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhiḥ evaiḥ	punarbhū yuvatī sva eva
162	kṛṣṇebhiḥ aktā uṣāḥ ruśadbhiḥ	kṛṣṇa aktā uṣas ruśat
162	vapurbhiḥ ā carataḥ anyānyā	vapus ā car anya anya
162	sanemi sakhyam svapasyamānaḥ	sanemi sakhya svapasy
162	sūnuḥ dādhāra śavasā sudaṁsāḥ	sūnu dhṛ śavas su daṃsas
162	āmāsu cit dadhiṣe pakvam antar	āma cit dhā pakva antar
162	payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśat rohiṇīṣu	payas kṛṣṇa ruśat rohin
162	sanāt sanīLāḥ avanīḥ avātāḥ	sanāt sanīḍa avani a van
162	vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ	vrata rakṣ amṛta sahas
162	purū sahasrā janayaḥ na patnīḥ	puru sahasra jani na patnī
162	duvasyanti svasāraḥ ahrayāṇam	duvasy svasṛ ahrayāṇa
162	sanāyuvaḥ namasā navyaḥ arkaiḥ	sanāyu namas navyas arka
162	vasūyavaḥ matayaḥ dasma dadruḥ	vasūyu mati dasma drā
162	patim na patnīḥ uśatīḥ uśantam	pati na patnī vaś vaś
162	spṛśanti tvā śavasāvan manīṣāḥ	spṛś tvad śavasāvat manīṣā
162	sanāt eva tava rāyaḥ gabhastau	sanāt eva tvad rai gabhasti
162	na kṣīyante na upa dasyanti dasma	na kṣi na upa das dasma
162	dyumān asi kratumān indra dhīraḥ	dyumat as kratumat indra dhīra
162	śikṣā śacīvaḥ tava naḥ śacībhiḥ	śikṣ śacīvat tvad mad śacī
162	sanāyate gotamaḥ indra navyam	sanāy gotama indra navya
162	atakṣat brahma hariyojanāya	takṣ brahman hariyojana
162	sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ	su nītha mad śavasāna nodhas
162	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
163	tvam mahān indra yaḥ ha śuṣmaiḥ	tvad mahat indra yad ha śuṣma
163	dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ	div jan pṛthivī ama dhā
163	yat ha te viśvā girayaḥ cit abhvā	yat ha tvad viśva giri cit abhva
163	bhiyā dṛLhāsaḥ kiraṇāḥ na ejan	bhī dṛḍha kiraṇa na ej
163	ā yat harī indra vivratā veḥ	ā yat hari indra vivrata vī
163	ā te vajram jaritā bāhvoḥ dhāt	ā tvad vajra jaritṛ bāhu dhā
163	yena aviharyatakrato amitrān	yad a viharyata kratu amitra
163	puraḥ iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ	pur iṣ puruhūta puru
163	tvam satyaḥ indra dhṛṣṇuḥ etān	tvad satya indra dhṛṣṇu etad
163	tvam ṛbhukṣāḥ naryaḥ tvam ṣāT	tvad ṛbhukṣan narya tvad sah
163	tvam śuṣṇam vṛjane pṛkṣe āṇau	tvad śuṣṇa vṛjana pṛkṣ āṇi
163	yūne kutsāya dyumate sacā han	yuvan kutsa dyumat sacā han
163	tvam ha tyat indra codīḥ sakhā	tvad ha tya indra cud sakhi
163	vṛtram yat vajrin vṛṣakarman ubhnāḥ	vṛtra yat vajrin vṛṣan karman ubh
163	yat ha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācaiḥ	yat ha śūra vṛṣamaṇas parācais
163	vi dasyūn yonau akṛtaḥ vṛthāṣāT	vi dasyu yoni kṛt vṛthāṣah
163	tvam ha tyat indra ariṣaṇyan	tvad ha tya indra a riṣaṇy
163	dṛLhasya cit martānām ajuṣTau	dṛḍha cit marta ajuṣṭi
163	vi asmat ā kāṣThāḥ arvate var	vi mad ā kāṣṭhā arvant vṛ
163	ghanā iva vajrin śnathihi amitrān	ghana iva vajrin śnath amitra
163	tvām ha tyat indra arṇasātau	tvad ha tya indra arṇa sāti
163	svarmīLhe naraḥ ājā havante	svar mīḍha nṛ āji hvā
163	tava svadhāvaḥ iyam ā samarye	tvad svadhāvat idam ā samarya
163	ūtiḥ vājeṣu atasāyyā bhūt	ūti vāja atasāyya bhū
163	tvam ha tyat indra sapta yudhyan	tvad ha tya indra saptan yudh
163	puraḥ vajrin purukutsāya dardar	pur vajrin purukutsa dardar
163	barhiḥ na yat sudāse vṛthā vark	barhis na yat sudās vṛthā vṛj
163	aṁhoḥ rājan varivaḥ pūrave kar	aṃh rājan varivas pūru kṛ
163	tvam tyām naḥ indra deva citrām	tvad tya mad indra deva citra
163	iṣam āpaḥ na pīpayaḥ parijman	iṣ ap na pyā parijman
163	yayā śūra prati asmabhyam yaṁsi	yad śūra prati mad yam
163	tmanam ūrjam na viśvadha kṣaradhyai	tman ūrj na viśvadha kṣar
163	akāri te indra gotamebhiḥ	kṛ tvad indra gotama
163	brahmāṇi oktā namasā haribhyām	brahman āvac namas hari

163	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
164	vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase	vṛṣan śardha su makha vedhas
164	nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bharā marudbhyaḥ	nodhas suvṛkti pra bhṛ marut
164	apaḥ na dhīraḥ manasā suhastyaḥ	apas na dhīra manas suhastya
164	giraḥ sam añje vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ	gir sam añj vidatha ābhū
164	te jajñire divaḥ ṛṣvāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ	tad jan div ṛṣva ukṣan
164	rudrasya maryāḥ asurāḥ arepasaḥ	rudra marya asura arepas
164	pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryāḥ iva	pāvaka śuci sūrya iva
164	satvānaḥ na drapsinaḥ ghoravarpasaḥ	satvan na drapsin ghora varpas
164	yuvānaḥ rudrāḥ ajarāḥ abhogghanaḥ	yuvan rudra ajara abhoj han
164	vavakṣuḥ adhrigāvaḥ parvatāḥ iva	vakṣ adhrigu parvata iva
164	dṛLhā cit viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā	dṛh cit viśva bhuvana pārthiva
164	pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā	pra cyāvay divya majman
164	citraiḥ añjibhiḥ vapuṣe vi añjate	citra añji vapus vi añj
164	vakṣassu rukmān adhi yetire śubhe	vakṣas rukma adhi yat śubh
164	aṁseṣu eṣām ni mimikṣuḥ* ṛṣTayaḥ	aṃsa idam ni mṛkṣ ṛṣṭi
164	sākam jajñire svadhayā divaḥ naraḥ	sākam jan svadhā div nṛ
164	īśānakṛtaḥ dhunayaḥ riśādasaḥ	īśāna kṛt dhuni riśādas
164	vātān vidyutaḥ taviṣībhiḥ akrata	vāta vidyut taviṣī kṛ
164	duhanti ūdhar divyāni dhūtayaḥ	duh ūdhas divya dhūti
164	bhūmim pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ	bhūmi pinv payas parijri
164	pinvanti apaḥ marutaḥ sudānavaḥ	pinv ap marut sudānu
164	payaḥ ghṛtavat vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ	payas ghṛtavat vidatha ābhū
164	atyam na mihe vi nayanti vājinam	atya na mih vi nī vājin
164	utsam duhanti stanayantam akṣitam	utsa duh stanay a kṣi
164	mahiṣāsaḥ māyinaḥ citrabhānavaḥ	mahiṣa māyin citra bhānu
164	girayaḥ na svatavasaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ	giri na sva tavas raghuṣyad
164	mṛgāḥ iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā	mṛga iva hastin khād vana
164	yat āruṇīṣu taviṣīḥ ayugdhvam	yat āruṇī taviṣī yuj
164	siṁhāḥ iva nānadati pracetasaḥ	siṃha iva nānad pracetas
164	piśāḥ iva supiśaḥ viśvavedasaḥ	piśa iva supiś viśva vedas
164	kṣapaḥ jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣTibhiḥ	kṣap jinv pṛṣat ṛṣṭi
164	sam it sabādhaḥ śavasā ahimanyavaḥ	sam id sabādh śavas ahi manyu
164	rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyaḥ	rodas ā vad gaṇa śrī
164	nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasā ahimanyavaḥ	nṛṣāc śūra śavas ahi manyu
164	ā vandhureṣu amatiḥ na darśatā	ā vandhura amati na darśata
164	vidyut na tasthau marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ	vidyut na sthā marut ratha tvad
164	viśvavedasaḥ rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ	viśva vedas rayi samokas
164	sammiślāsaḥ taviṣībhiḥ virapśinaḥ	sammiśla taviṣī virapśin
164	astāraḥ iṣum dadhire gabhastyoḥ	astṛ iṣu dhā gabhasti
164	anantaśuṣmāḥ vṛṣakhādayaḥ naraḥ	ananta śuṣma vṛṣan khādi nṛ
164	hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdhaḥ	hiraṇyaya pavi payas vṛdh
164	ut jighnante āpathyaḥ na parvatān	uddhan āpathi na parvata
164	makhāḥ ayāsaḥ svasṛtaḥ dhruvacyutaḥ	makha ayās svasṛt dhruva cyut
164	dudhrakṛtaḥ marutaḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	dudhra kṛt marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi
164	ghṛṣum pāvakam vaninam vicarṣaṇim	ghṛṣu pāvaka vanin vicarṣaṇi
164	rudrasya sūnum havasā gṛṇīmasi	rudra sūnu havas gṛ
164	rajasturam tavasam mārutam gaṇam	rajastur tavas māruta gaṇa
164	ṛjīṣiṇam vṛṣaṇam saścata śriye	ṛjīṣin vṛṣan sac śrī
164	pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janān ati	pra nu tad marta śavas jana ati
164	tasthau vaḥ ūtī marutaḥ yam āvata	sthā tvad ūti marut yad av
164	arvadbhiḥ vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ	arvant vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ
164	āpṛchyam kratum ā kṣeti puṣyati	āpṛcchya kratu ā kṣi puṣ
164	carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣTaram	carkar marut pṛt duṣṭara
164	dyumantam śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana	dyumat śuṣma maghavan dhā
164	dhanaspṛtam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim	dhana spṛt ukthya viśvacarṣaṇi
164	tokam puṣyema tanayam śatam himāḥ	toka puṣ tanaya śata himā
164	nū sthiram marutaḥ vīravantam	nu sthira marut vīravat

164	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam

165	paśvā na tāyum guhā catantam	paśu na tāyu guhā cat
165	namaḥ yujānam namaḥ vahantam	namas yuj namas vah
165	sajoṣāḥ dhīrāḥ padaiḥ anu gman	sa joṣa dhīra pada anu gam
165	upa tvā sīdan viśve yajatrāḥ	upa tvad sad viśva yajatra
165	ṛtasya devāḥ anu vratā guḥ	ṛta deva anu vrata gā
165	bhuvat pariṣTiḥ dyauḥ na bhūma	bhū pariṣṭi div na bhūman
165	vardhanti īm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim	vṛdh īṃ ap panū suśiśvi
165	ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam	ṛta yoni garbha su jan
165	puṣTiḥ na raṇvā kṣitiḥ na pṛthvī	puṣṭi na raṇva kṣiti na pṛthu
165	giriḥ na bhujma kṣodaḥ na śambhu	giri na bhujman kṣodas na śambhu
165	atyaḥ na ajman sargaprataktaḥ	atya na ajman sarga pratak
165	sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ kaḥ īm varāte	sindhu na kṣodas ka īṃ vṛ
165	jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrātā iva svasrām	jāmi sindhu bhrātṛ iva svasṛ
165	ibhyān na rājā vanāni atti	ibhya na rājan vana ad
165	yat vātajūtaḥ vanā vi asthāt	yat vāta jū vana vi sthā
165	agniḥ ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ	agni ha dā roman pṛthivī
165	śvasiti apsu haṁsaḥ na sīdan	śvas ap haṃsa na sad
165	kratvā cetiṣThaḥ viśām uṣarbhut	kratu cetiṣṭha viś uṣarbudh
165	somaḥ na vedhāḥ ṛtaprajātaḥ	soma na vedhas ṛta prajan
165	paśuḥ na śiśvā vibhuḥ dūrebhāḥ	paśu na śiśu vibhu dūrebhā
 ---
166	rayiḥ na citrā sūraḥ na saṁdṛk	rayi na citra svar na saṃdṛś
166	āyuḥ na prāṇaḥ nityaḥ na sūnuḥ	āyu na prāṇa nitya na sūnu
166	takvā na bhūrṇiḥ vanā siṣakti	takvan na bhūrṇi vana sac
166	payaḥ na dhenuḥ śuciḥ vibhāvā	payas na dhenu śuci vibhāvan
166	dādhāra kṣemam okaḥ na raṇvaḥ	dhṛ kṣema oka na raṇva
166	yavaḥ na pakvaḥ jetā janānām	yava na pakva ji jana
166	ṛṣiḥ na stubhvā vikṣu praśastaḥ	ṛṣi na stubhvan viś praśaṃs
166	vājī na prītaḥ vayaḥ dadhāti	vājin na prī vayas dhā
166	durokaśociḥ kratuḥ na nityaḥ	duroka śocis kratu na nitya
166	jāyā iva yonau aram viśvasmai	jāyā iva yoni aram viśva
166	citraḥ yat abhrāT śvetaḥ na vikṣu	citra yat bhrāj śveta na viś
166	rathaḥ na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu	ratha na rukmin tveṣa samad
166	senā iva sṛṣTā amam dadhāti	senā iva sṛj ama dhā
166	astuḥ na didyut tveṣapratīkā	astṛ na didyut tveṣa pratīka
166	yamaḥ ha jātaḥ yamaḥ janitvam	yama ha jan yama jan
166	jāraḥ kanīnām patiḥ janīnām	jāra kanī pati jani
166	tam vaḥ carāthā vayam vasatyā	tad tvad car mad vasati
166	astam na gāvaḥ nakṣante iddham	asta na go nakṣ indh
166	sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīḥ ainot	sindhu na kṣodas pra nyāñc i
166	navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke	nū go svar dṛśīka
 ---
167	vaneṣu jāyuḥ marteṣu mitraḥ	vana jāyu marta mitra
167	vṛṇīte śruṣTim rājā iva ajuryam	vṛ śruṣṭi rājan iva ajurya
167	kṣemaḥ na sādhuḥ kratuḥ na bhadraḥ	kṣema na sādhu kratu na bhadra
167	bhuvat svādhīḥ hotā havyavāT	bhū svādhī hotṛ havyavah
167	haste dadhānaḥ nṛmṇā viśvāni	hasta dhā nṛmṇa viśva
167	ame devān dhāt guhā niṣīdan	ama deva dhā guhā niṣad
167	vidanti īm atra naraḥ dhiyaṁdhāḥ	vid īṃ atra nṛ dhiyaṃdhā
167	hṛdā yat taṣTān mantrān aśaṁsan	hṛd yat takṣ mantra śaṃs
167	ajaḥ na kṣām dādhāra pṛthivīm	aja na kṣā dhṛ pṛthivī
167	tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ	stambh div mantra satya
167	priyā padāni paśvaḥ ni pāhi	priya pada paśu ni pā
167	viśvāyuḥ agne guhā guham gāḥ	viśvāyu agni guhā guha gā
167	yaḥ īm ciketa guhā bhavantam	yad īṃ cit guhā bhū
167	ā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya	ā yad sad dhārā ṛta
167	vi ye cṛtanti ṛtā sapantaḥ	vi yad cṛt ṛta sap
167	āt it vasūni pra vavāca asmai	āt id vasu pra vac idam
167	vi yaḥ vīrutsu rodhat mahitvā	vi yad vīrudh rudh mahi tva
167	uta prajāḥ uta prasūṣu antar	uta prajā uta prasū antar
167	cittiḥ apām dame viśvāyuḥ	citti ap dama viśvāyu
167	sadma iva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ	sadman iva dhīra saṃmā kṛ
 ---
168	śrīṇan upa sthāt divam bhuraṇyuḥ	śrī upa sthā div bhuraṇyu
168	sthātuḥ caratham aktūn vi ūrṇot	sthātṛ caratha aktu vi vṛ
168	pari yat eṣām ekaḥ viśveṣām	pari yat idam eka viśva
168	bhuvat devaḥ devānām mahitvā	bhū deva deva mahi tva
168	āt it te viśve kratum juṣanta	āt id tvad viśva kratu juṣ
168	śuṣkāt yat deva jīvaḥ janiṣThāḥ	śuṣka yat deva jīva jan
168	bhajanta viśve devatvam nāma	bhaj viśva deva tva nāman
168	ṛtam sapantaḥ amṛtam evaiḥ	ṛta sap amṛta eva
168	ṛtasya preṣāḥ ṛtasya dhītiḥ	ṛta preṣa ṛta dhīti
168	viśvāyuḥ viśve apāṁsi cakruḥ	viśva āyus viśva apas kṛ
168	yaḥ tubhyam dāśāt yaḥ vā te śikṣāt	yad tvad dāś yad vā tvad śikṣ
168	tasmai cikitvān rayim dayasva	tad cit rayi day
168	hotā niṣattaḥ manoḥ apatye	hotṛ niṣad manu apatya
168	sa cit nu āsām patiḥ rayīṇām	tad cit nu idam pati rayi
168	icchanta retaḥ mithaḥ tanūṣu	iṣ retas mithas tanū
168	sam jānata svaiḥ dakṣaiḥ amūrāḥ	sam jñā sva dakṣa amūra
168	pituḥ na putrāḥ kratum juṣanta	pitṛ na putra kratu juṣ
168	śroṣan ye asya śāsam turāsaḥ	śruṣ yad idam śās tura
168	vi rāyaḥ aurṇot duraḥ purukṣuḥ	vi rai vṛ dvār purukṣu
168	pipeśa nākam stṛbhiḥ damūnāḥ	piś nāka star damūnas
 ---
169	śukraḥ śuśukvān uṣaḥ na jāraḥ	śukra śuc uṣ na jāra
169	paprā samīcī divaḥ na jyotiḥ	prā samyañc div na jyotis
169	pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha	pari prajan kratu bhū
169	bhuvaḥ devānām pitā putraḥ san	bhū deva pitṛ putra as
169	vedhāḥ adṛptaḥ agniḥ vijānan	vedhas a dṛp agni vijñā
169	ūdhar na gonām svādmā pitūnām	ūdhas na go svādman pitu
169	jane na śevaḥ āhūryaḥ san	jana na śeva āhūrya as
169	madhye niṣattaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe	madhya niṣad raṇva duroṇa
169	putraḥ na jātaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe	putra na jan raṇva duroṇa
169	vājī na prītaḥ viśaḥ vi tārīt	vājin na prī viś vi tṛ
169	viśaḥ yat ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīLāḥ	viś yat hvā nṛ sanīḍa
169	agniḥ devatvā viśvāni aśyāḥ	agni deva tva viśva aś
169	nakiḥ te etā vratā minanti	nakir tvad etad vrata mī
169	nṛbhyaḥ yat ebhyaḥ śruṣTim cakartha	nṛ yat idam śruṣṭi kṛ
169	tat tu te daṁsaḥ yat ahan samānaiḥ	tad tu tvad daṃsas yat ahar samāna
169	nṛbhiḥ yat yuktaḥ viveḥ apāṁsi	nṛ yat yuj vī rapas
169	uṣaḥ na jāraḥ vibhāvā usraḥ	uṣas na jāra vibhāvan usra
169	saṁjñātarūpaḥ ciketat asmai	saṃjñā rūpa cit idam
169	tmanā vahantaḥ duraḥ vi ṛṇvan	tman vah dvār vi ṛch
169	navanta viśve svar dṛśīke	nū viśva svar dṛśīka
 ---
170	vanema pūrvīḥ aryaḥ manīṣā	van puru ari manīṣā
170	agniḥ suśokaḥ viśvāni aśyāḥ	agni su śoka viśva aś
170	ā daivyāni vratā cikitvān	ā daivya vrata cit
170	ā mānuṣasya janasya janma	ā mānuṣa jana janman
170	garbhaḥ yaḥ apām garbhaḥ vanānām	garbha yad ap garbha vana
170	garbhaḥ ca sthātām garbhaḥ carathām	garbha ca sthā garbha caratha
170	adrau cit asmai antar duroṇe	adri cit idam antar duroṇa
170	viśām na viśvaḥ amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ	viś na viśva amṛta svādhī
170	sa hi kṣapāvān agniḥ rayīṇām	tad hi kṣapāvant agni rayi
170	dāśat yaḥ asmai aram sūktaiḥ	dāś yad idam aram sūkta
170	etā cikitvaḥ bhūmā ni pāhi	etad cit bhūman ni pā
170	devānām janma martān ca vidvān	deva janman marta ca vid
170	vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapaḥ virūpāḥ	vṛdh yad puru kṣap virūpa
170	sthātuḥ caratham ṛtapravītam	sthātṛ ca ratha ṛta pravye
170	arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ	rādh hotṛ svar niṣad
170	kṛṇvan viśvāni apāṁsi satyā	kṛ viśva apas satya
170	goṣu praśastim vaneṣu dhiṣe	go praśasti vana dhā
170	bharanta viśve balim svar naḥ	bhṛ viśva bali svar mad
170	vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan	vi tvad nṛ purutrā sapary
170	pituḥ na jivreḥ vi vedaḥ bharanta	pitṛ na jivri vi vedas bhṛ
170	sādhuḥ na gṛdhnuḥ astā iva śūraḥ	sādhu na gṛdhnu astṛ iva śūra
170	yātā iva bhīmaḥ tveṣaḥ samatsu	yātṛ iva bhīma tveṣa samad
 ---
171	upa pra jinvan uśatīḥ uśantam	upa pra jinv vaś vaś
171	patim na nityam janayaḥ sanīLāḥ	pati na nitya jani sanīḍa
171	svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣran	svasṛ śyāva aruṣa juṣ
171	citram ucchantīm uṣasam na gāvaḥ	citra vas uṣas na go
171	vīLu cit dṛLhā pitaraḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ	vīḍu cit dṛḍha pitṛ mad uktha
171	adrim rujan aṅgirasaḥ raveṇa	adri ruj aṅgiras rava
171	cakruḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ gātum asme	kṛ div bṛhat gātu mad
171	ahar svar vividuḥ ketum usrāḥ	ahar svar vid ketu usṛ
171	dadhan ṛtam dhanayan asya dhītim	dhā ṛta dhanay idam dhīti
171	āt it aryaḥ didhiṣvaḥ vibhṛtrāḥ	āt id ari didhiṣū vibhṛtra
171	atṛṣyantīḥ apasaḥ yanti acchā	a tṛṣ apas i acchā
171	devān janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ	deva janman prayas vardhay
171	mathīt yat īm vibhṛtaḥ mātariśvā	math yat īṃ vibhṛ mātariśvan
171	gṛhegṛhe śyetaḥ jenyaḥ bhūt	gṛha gṛha śyeta jenya bhū
171	āt īm rājñe na sahīyase sacā san	āt īṃ rājan na sahīyas sacā as
171	ā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇaḥ vivāya	ā dūtya bhṛgavāṇa vī
171	mahe yat pitre īm rasam dive kar	mah yat pitṛ īṃ rasa div kṛ
171	ava tsarat pṛśanyaḥ cikitvān	ava tsar pṛśana cit
171	sṛjat astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai	sṛj astṛ dhṛṣ didyu idam
171	svāyām devaḥ duhitari tviṣim dhāt	sva deva duhitṛ tviṣi dhā
171	sve ā yaḥ tubhyam dame ā vibhāti	sva ā yad tvad dama ā vibhā
171	namaḥ vā dāśāt uśataḥ anu dyūn	namas vā dāś vaś anu div
171	vardha u agne vayaḥ asya dvibarhāḥ	vṛdh u agni vayas idam dvibarhas
171	yāsat rāyā saratham yam junāsi	yā rai sa ratha yad jū
171	agnim viśvāḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante	agni viśva abhi pṛkṣ sac
171	samudram na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ	samudra na sravat saptan yahva
171	na jāmibhiḥ vi cikite vayaḥ naḥ	na jāmi vi cit vayas mad
171	vidāḥ deveṣu pramatim cikitvān	vid deva pramati cit
171	ā yat iṣe nṛpatim tejaḥ ānaT	ā yat iṣ nṛpati tejas naś
171	śuci retaḥ niṣiktam dyauḥ abhīke	śuci retas niṣic div abhīka
171	agniḥ śardham anavadyam yuvānam	agni śardha anavadya yuvan
171	svādhyam janayat sūdayat ca	svādhī janay sūday ca
171	manaḥ na yaḥ adhvanaḥ sadyaḥ eti	manas na yad adhvan sadyas i
171	ekaḥ satrā sūraḥ vasvaḥ īśe	eka satrā sūra vasu īś
171	rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī	rājan mitrāvaruṇa su pāṇi
171	goṣu priyam amṛtam rakṣamāṇā	go priya amṛta rakṣ
171	mā naḥ agne sakhyā pitryāṇi	mā mad agni sakhya pitrya
171	pra marṣiṣThāḥ abhi viduḥ kaviḥ san	pra mṛṣ abhi vidu kavi as
171	nabhaḥ na rūpam jarimā mināti	nabhas na rūpa jariman mī
171	purā tasyāḥ abhiśasteḥ adhi ihi	purā tad abhiśasti adhī
 ---
172	ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvataḥ kar	ni kāvya vedhas śaśvat kṛ
172	haste dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi	hasta dhā narya puru
172	agniḥ bhuvat rayipatiḥ rayīṇām	agni bhū rayi pati rayi
172	satrā cakrāṇaḥ amṛtāni viśvā	satrā kṛ amṛta viśva
172	asme vatsam pari santam na vindan	mad vatsa pari as na vid
172	icchantaḥ viśve amṛtāḥ amūrāḥ	iṣ viśva amṛta amūra
172	śramayuvaḥ padavyaḥ dhiyaṁdhāḥ	śramayu padavī dhiyaṃdhā
172	tasthuḥ pade parame cāru agneḥ	sthā pada parama cāru agni
172	tisraḥ yat agne śaradaḥ tvām it	tri yat agni śarad tvad id
172	śucim ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān	śuci ghṛta śuci sapary
172	nāmāni cit dadhire yajñiyāni	nāman cit dhā yajñiya
172	asūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ	sūday tanū su jan
172	ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ	ā rodas bṛhat vevid
172	pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ	pra rudriya bhṛ yajñiya
172	vidat martaḥ nemadhitā cikitvān	vid marta nemadhiti cit
172	agnim pade parame tasthivāṁsam	agni pada parama sthā
172	saṁjānānāḥ upa sīdan abhijñu	saṃjñā upa sad abhijñu
172	patnīvantaḥ namasyam namasyan	patnīvat namasya namasy
172	ririkvāṁsaḥ tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ	ric tanū kṛ sva
172	sakhā sakhyuḥ nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ	sakhi sakhi nimiṣ rakṣ
172	triḥ sapta yat guhyāni tve it	tris saptan yat guhya tvad id
172	padā avidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ	pada vid nidhā yajñiya
172	tebhiḥ rakṣante amṛtam sajoṣāḥ	tad rakṣ amṛta sa joṣa
172	paśūn ca sthātṛṛn caratham ca pāhi	paśu ca sthātṛ caratha ca pā
172	vidvān agne vayunāni kṣitīnām	vid agni vayuna kṣiti
172	vi ānuṣak śurudhaḥ jīvase dhāḥ	vi ānuṣak śurudh jīv dhā
172	antarvidvān adhvanaḥ devayānān	antar vid adhvan deva yāna
172	atandraḥ dūtaḥ abhavaḥ havirvāT	atandra dūta bhū havis vāh
172	svādhyaḥ divaḥ ā sapta yahvīḥ	su ādhī div ā saptan yahvī
172	rāyaḥ duraḥ vi ṛtajñāḥ ajānan	rai dvār vi ṛta jña jñā
172	vidat gavyam saramā dṛLham ūrvam	vid gavya saramā dṛḍha ūrva
172	yenā nu kam mānuṣī bhojate viT	yad ā nu kaṃ mānuṣa bhuj viś
172	ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ	ā yad viśva su apatya sthā
172	kṛṇvānāsaḥ amṛtatvāya gātum	kṛ amṛta tva gātu
172	mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe	mahan mahat pṛthivī vi sthā
172	mātā putraiḥ aditiḥ dhāyase veḥ	mātṛ putra aditi dhāyas vi
172	adhi śriyam ni dadhuḥ cārum asmin	adhi śrī ni cāru idam
172	divaḥ yat akṣī amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan	div yat akṣi amṛta kṛ
172	adha kṣaranti sindhavaḥ na sṛṣTāḥ	adha kṣar sindhu na sṛj
172	pra nīcīḥ agne aruṣīḥ ajānan	pra nyāñc agni aruṣa jñā
 ---
173	rayiḥ na yaḥ pitṛvittaḥ vayodhāḥ	rayi na yad pitṛ vid vayodhas
173	supraṇītiḥ cikituṣaḥ na śāsuḥ	su praṇīti cit na śāsus
173	syonaśīḥ atithiḥ na prīṇānaḥ	syonaśī atithi na prī
173	hotā iva sadma vidhataḥ vi tārīt	hotṛ iva sadman vidh vi tṛ
173	devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā	deva na yad savitṛ satya manman
173	kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā	kratu nipā vṛjana viśva
173	purupraśastaḥ amatiḥ na satyaḥ	puru praśaṃs amati na satya
173	ātmā iva śevaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt	ātman iva śeva didhiṣ bhū
173	devaḥ na yaḥ pṛthivīm viśvadhāyāḥ	deva na yad pṛthivī viśvadhā
173	upakṣeti hitamitraḥ na rājā	upakṣi hita mitra na rājan
173	puraḥsadaḥ śarmasadaḥ na vīrāḥ	puraḥsad śarman sad na vīra
173	anavadyā patijuṣTā iva nārī	anavadya pati juṣ iva nārī
173	tam tvā naraḥ dame ā nityam iddham	tad tvad nṛ dama ā nityam indh
173	agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu	agni sac kṣiti dhruva
173	adhi dyumnam ni dadhuḥ bhūri asmin	adhi dyumna ni bhūri idam
173	bhavā viśvāyuḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām	bhū viśvāyu dharuṇa rayi
173	vi pṛkṣaḥ agne maghavānaḥ aśyuḥ	vi pṛkṣ agni maghavan aś
173	vi sūrayaḥ dadataḥ viśvam āyuḥ	vi sūri dā viśva āyus
173	sanema vājam samitheṣu aryaḥ	san vāja samitha ari
173	bhāgam deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ	bhāga deva śravas dhā
173	ṛtasya hi dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ	ṛta hi dhenu vaś
173	smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ	smadūdhan pyā div bhaj
173	parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ	parāvat sumati bhikṣ
173	vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasruḥ adrim	vi sindhu samayā sṛ adri
173	tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ	tvad agni sumati bhikṣ
173	divi śravaḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ	div śravas dhā yajñiya
173	naktā ca cakruḥ uṣasā virūpe	nakta ca kṛ uṣas virūpa
173	kṛṣṇam ca varṇam aruṇam ca sam dhuḥ	kṛṣṇa ca varṇa aruṇa ca sam dhā
173	yān rāye martān suṣūdaḥ agne	yad rai marta sūd agni
173	te syāma maghavānaḥ vayam ca	tad as maghavan mad ca
173	chāyā iva viśvam bhuvanam sisakṣi	chāyā iva viśva bhuvana sac
173	āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam	āprā rodas antarikṣa
173	arvadbhiḥ agne arvataḥ nṛbhiḥ nṛṛn	arvant agni arvant nṛ nṛ
173	vīraiḥ vīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ	vīra vīra van tvota
173	īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyaḥ	īś pitṛ vid rai
173	vi sūrayaḥ śatahimāḥ naḥ aśyuḥ	vi sūri śata hima mad aś
173	etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ	etad tvad agni ucatha vedhas
173	juṣTāni santu manase hṛde ca	juṣ as manas hṛd ca
173	śakema rāyaḥ sudhuraḥ yamam te	śak rai su dhur yam tvad
173	adhi śravaḥ devabhaktam dadhānāḥ	adhi śravas deva bhaj dhā
 ---
174	upaprayantaḥ adhvaram	upapre adhvara
174	mantram vocema agnaye	mantra vac agni
174	āre asme ca śṛṇvate	āre mad ca śru
174	yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ	yad snīhiti pūrvya
174	saṁjagmānāsu kṛṣTiṣu	saṃgam kṛṣṭi
174	arakṣat dāśuṣe gayam	rakṣ dāś gaya
174	uta bruvantu jantavaḥ	uta brū jantu
174	ut agniḥ vṛtrahā ajani	ud agni vṛtra han jan
174	dhanaṁjayaḥ raṇeraṇe	dhanaṃjaya raṇa raṇa
174	yasya dūtaḥ asi kṣaye	yad dūta as kṣaya
174	veṣi havyāni vītaye	vī havya vīti
174	dasmat kṛṇoṣi adhvaram	dasmat kṛ adhvara
174	tam it suhavyam aṅgiraḥ	tad id su hu aṅgiras
174	sudevam sahasaḥ yaho	su deva sahas yahu
174	janāḥ āhuḥ subarhiṣam	jan ah su barhis
174	ā ca vahāsi tān iha	ā ca vah tad iha
174	devān upa praśastaye	deva upa praśasti
174	havyā suścandra vītaye	havya su ścandra vī
174	na yoḥ upabdiḥ aśvyaḥ	na upabdi aśvya
174	śṛṇve rathasya kat cana	śru ratha kat cana
174	yat agne yāsi dūtyam	yat agni yā dūtya
174	tvotaḥ vājī ahrayaḥ	tvota vājin ahraya
174	abhi pūrvasmāt aparaḥ	abhi pūrva apara
174	pra dāśvān agne asthāt	pra dāś agni sthā
174	uta dyumat suvīryam	uta dyumat su vīrya
174	bṛhat agne vivāsasi	bṛhat agni vivās
174	devebhyaḥ deva dāśuṣe	deva deva dāś
 ---
175	juṣasva saprathastamam	juṣ saprathastama
175	vacaḥ devapsarastamam	vacas deva psarastama
175	havyā juhvānaḥ āsani	havya hu āsan
175	athā te aṅgirastama	atha tvad aṅgirastama
175	agne vedhastama priyam	agni vedhastama priya
175	vocema brahma sānasi	vac brahman sānasi
175	kaḥ te jāmiḥ janānām	ka tvad jāmi jana
175	agne kaḥ dāśvadhvaraḥ	agni ka dāśvadhvara
175	kaḥ ha kasmin asi śritaḥ	ka ha ka as śri
175	tvam jāmiḥ janānām	tvad jāmi jana
175	agne mitraḥ asi priyaḥ	agni mitra as priya
175	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ	sakhi sakhi īḍ
175	yajā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā	yaj mad mitrāvaruṇa
175	yajā devān ṛtam bṛhat	yaj deva ṛta bṛhat
175	agne yakṣi svam damam	agni yaj sva dama
 ---
176	kā te upetiḥ manasaḥ varāya	ka tvad upeti manas vara
176	bhuvat agne śaṁtamā kā manīṣā	bhū agni śaṃtama ka manīṣā
176	kaḥ vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣam te āpa	ka vā yajña pari dakṣa tvad āp
176	kena vā te manasā dāśema	ka vā tvad manas dāś
176	ā ihi agne iha hotā ni sīda	e agni iha hotṛ ni sad
176	adabdhaḥ su puraetā bhavā naḥ	adabdha su puraetṛ bhū mad
176	avatām tvā rodasī viśvaminve	av tvad rodas viśvaminva
176	yajā mahe saumanasāya devān	yaj mah saumanasa deva
176	pra su viśvān rakṣasaḥ dhakṣi agne	pra su viśva rakṣas dah agni
176	bhavā yajñānām abhiśastipāvā	bhū yajña abhiśasti pāvan
176	atha ā vaha somapatim haribhyām	atha ā vah soma pati hari
176	ātithyam asmai cakṛmā sudāvne	ātithya idam kṛ su dāvan
176	prajāvatā vacasā vahniḥ āsā	prajāvat vacas vahni ās
176	ā ca huve ni ca satsi iha devaiḥ	ca hvā ni ca sad iha deva
176	veṣi hotram uta potram yajatra	vī hotra uta potra yajatra
176	bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām	bhū prayantṛ janitṛ vasu
176	yathā viprasya manuṣaḥ havirbhiḥ	yathā vipra manus havis
176	devān ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san	deva yaj kavi kavi as
176	evā hotar satyatara tvam adya	eva hotṛ satyatara tvad adya
176	agne mandrayā juhvā yajasva	agni mandra juhū yaj
 ---
177	kathā dāśema agnaye kā asmai	kathā dāś agni ka idam
177	devajuṣTā ucyate bhāmine gīḥ	deva juṣ vac bhāmin gir
177	yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā	yad martya amṛta ṛtāvan
177	hotā yajiṣThaḥ it kṛṇoti devān	hotṛ yajiṣṭha id kṛ deva
177	yaḥ adhvareṣu śaṁtamaḥ ṛtāvā	yad adhvara śaṃtama ṛtāvan
177	hotā tam ū namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam	hotṛ tad u namas ā kṛ
177	agniḥ yat veḥ martāya devān	agni yat vī marta deva
177	sa cā bodhāti manasā yajāti	tad ca ā budh manas yaj
177	sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhuḥ	tad hi kratu tad marya tad sādhu
177	mitraḥ na bhūt adbhutasya rathīḥ	mitra na bhū adbhuta rathī
177	tam medheṣu prathamam devayantīḥ	tad medha prathama devay
177	viśaḥ upa bruvate dasmam ārīḥ	viś upa brū dasma ārya
177	sa naḥ nṛṇām nṛtamaḥ riśādāḥ	tad mad nṛ nṛtama riśādas
177	agniḥ giraḥ avasā vetu dhītim	agni gir avas vī dhīti
177	tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣThāḥ	tan ca yad maghavan śaviṣṭha
177	vājaprasūtāḥ iṣayanta manma	vāja prasū iṣay manman
177	eva agniḥ gotamebhiḥ ṛtāvā	eva agni gotama ṛtāvan
177	viprebhiḥ astoṣTa jātavedāḥ	vipra stu jātavedas
177	saḥ eṣu dyumnam pīpayat sa vājam	tad idam dyumna pyā tad vāja
177	sa puṣTim yāti joṣam ā cikitvān	tad puṣṭi yā joṣa ā cit
 ---
178	abhi tvā gotamāḥ girā	abhi tvad gotama gir
178	jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe	jātavedas vicarṣaṇi
178	dyumnaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ	dyumna abhi pra nonāv
178	tam u tvā gotamaḥ girā	tad u tvad gotama gir
178	rāyaskāmaḥ duvasyati	rāyaskāma duvasy
178	dyumnaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ	dyumna abhi pra nonāv
178	tam u tvā vājasātamam	tad u tvad vāja sātama
178	aṅgirasvat havāmahe	aṅgirasvat hvā
178	dyumnaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ	dyumna abhi pra nonāv
178	tam u tvā vṛtrahantamam	tad u tvad vṛtra hantama
178	yaḥ dasyūn avadhūnuṣe	yad dasyu avadhū
178	dyumnaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ	dyumna abhi pra nonāv
178	avocāma rahūgaṇāḥ	vac rahūgaṇa
178	agnaye madhumat vacaḥ	agni madhumat vacas
178	dyumnaiḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ	dyumna abhi pra nonāv
 ---
179	hiraṇyakeśaḥ rajasaḥ visāre	hiraṇya keśa rajas visāra
179	ahiḥ dhuniḥ vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān	ahi dhuni vāta iva dhrajīmat
179	śucibhrājāḥ uṣasaḥ navedāḥ	śuci bhrājas uṣas navedas
179	yaśasvatīḥ apasyuvaḥ na satyāḥ	yaśasvat apasyu na satya
179	ā te suparṇāḥ aminanta evaiḥ	ā tvad suparṇa mī eva
179	kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam	kṛṣṇa nonāv vṛṣabha yadi idam
179	śivābhiḥ na smayamānābhiḥ ā agāt	śiva na smi āgā
179	patanti mihaḥ stanayanti abhrā	pat mih stanay abhra
179	yat īm ṛtasya payasā piyānaḥ	yat īṃ ṛta payas pyā
179	nayan ṛtasya pathibhiḥ rajiṣThaiḥ	nī ṛta pathin rajiṣṭha
179	aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ parijmā	aryaman mitra varuṇa parijman
179	tvacam pṛñcanti uparasya yonau	tvac pṛc upara yoni
179	agne vājasya gomataḥ	agni vāja gomat
179	īśānaḥ sahasaḥ yaho	īś sahas yahu
179	asme dhehi jātavedaḥ mahi śravaḥ	mad dhā jātavedas mahi śravas
179	saḥ idhānaḥ vasuḥ kaviḥ	tad indh vasu kavi
179	agniḥ īLenyaḥ girā	agni īḍ gir
179	revat asmabhyam purvaṇīka dīdihi	revat mad purvaṇīka dīdī
179	kṣapaḥ rājan uta tmanā	kṣap rājan uta tman
179	agne vastoḥ uta uṣasaḥ	agni vastu uta uṣas
179	sa tigmajambha rakṣasaḥ daha prati	tad tigma jambha rakṣas dah prati
179	avā naḥ agne ūtibhiḥ	av mad agni ūti
179	gāyatrasya prabharmaṇi	gāyatra prabharman
179	viśvāsu dhīṣu vandya	viśva dhī vand
179	ā naḥ agne rayim bhara	ā mad agni rayi bhṛ
179	satrāsāham vareṇyam	satrāsāh vareṇya
179	viśvāsu pṛtsu duṣTaram	viśva pṛt duṣṭara
179	ā naḥ agne sucetunā	ā mad agni su cetu
179	rayim viśvāyupoṣasam	rayi viśvāyu poṣas
179	mārḍīkam dhehi jīvase	mārḍīka dhā jīv
179	pra pūtāḥ tigmaśociṣe	pra pū tigma śocis
179	vācaḥ gotama agnaye	vāc gotama agni
179	bharasva sumnayuḥ giraḥ	bhṛ sumnayu gir
179	yaḥ naḥ agne abhidāsati	yad mad agni abhidās
179	anti dūre padīṣTa saḥ	anti dūra pad tad
179	asmākam it vṛdhe bhava	mad id vṛdh bhū
179	sahasrākṣaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	sahasra akṣa vicarṣaṇi
179	agniḥ rakṣāṁsi sedhati	agni rakṣas sidh
179	hotā gṛṇīte ukthyaḥ	hotṛ gṛ ukthya
 ---
180	itthā hi some it made	itthā hi soma id mada
180	brahmā cakāra vardhanam	brahman kṛ vardhana
180	śaviṣTha vajrin ojasā	śaviṣṭha vajrin ojas
180	pṛthivyāḥ niḥ śaśāḥ ahim	pṛthivī niḥ śās ahi
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	sa tvā amadat vṛṣā madaḥ	tad tvad mad vṛṣan mada
180	somaḥ śyenābhṛtaḥ sutaḥ	soma śyena ābhṛ su
180	yenā vṛtram niḥ adbhyaḥ	yad vṛtra niḥ ap
180	jaghantha vajrin ojasā	han vajrin ojas
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	pra ihi abhi ihi dhṛṣṇuhi	pre abhī dhṛṣ
180	na te vajraḥ ni yaṁsate	na tvad vajra ni yam
180	indra nṛmṇam hi te śavaḥ	indra nṛmṇa hi tvad śavas
180	hanaḥ vṛtram jayāḥ apaḥ	han vṛtra ji ap
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	niḥ indra bhūmyāḥ adhi	niḥ indra bhūmi adhi
180	vṛtram jaghantha niḥ divaḥ	vṛtra han niḥ div
180	sṛjā marutvatīḥ ava	sṛj marutvat ava
180	jīvadhanyāḥ imāḥ apaḥ	jīva dhanya idam ap
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	indraḥ vṛtrasya dodhataḥ	indra vṛtra dudh
180	sānum vajreṇa hīLitaḥ	sānu vajra hīḍ
180	abhikramya ava jighnate	abhikram ava han
180	apaḥ sarmāya codayan	ap sarma coday
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	adhi sānau ni jighnate	adhi sānu ni han
180	vajreṇa śataparvaṇā	vajra śata parvan
180	mandānaḥ indraḥ andhasaḥ	mad indra andhas
180	sakhibhyaḥ gātum icchati	sakhi gātu iṣ
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	indra tubhyam it adrivaḥ	indra tvad id adrivat
180	anuttam vajrin vīryam	anutta vajrin vīrya
180	yat ha tyam māyinam mṛgam	yat ha tya māyin mṛga
180	tam u tvam māyayā avadhīḥ	tad u tvad māyā vadh
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	vi te vajrāsaḥ asthiran	vi tvad vajra sthā
180	navatim nāvyāḥ anu	navati nāvyā anu
180	mahat te indra vīryam	mahat tvad indra vīrya
180	bāhvoḥ te balam hitam	bāhu tvad bala dhā
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	sahasram sākam arcata	sahasra sākam arc
180	pari stobhata viṁśatiḥ	pari stubh viṃśati
180	śatā enam anu anonavuḥ	śata enad anu nonāv
180	indrāya brahma udyatam	indra brahman udyam
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	indraḥ vṛtrasya taviṣīm	indra vṛtra taviṣī
180	niḥ ahan sahasā sahaḥ	niḥ han sahas sahas
180	mahat tat asya pauṁsyam	mahat tad idam pauṃsya
180	vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat	vṛtra han sṛj
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	ime cit tava manyave	idam cit tvad manyu
180	vepete bhiyasā mahī	vip bhiyas mahī
180	yat indra vajrin ojasā	yat indra vajrin ojas
180	vṛtram marutvān avadhīḥ	vṛtra marutvat vadh
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	na vepasā na tanyatā	na vepas na tanyatā
180	indram vṛtraḥ vi bībhayat	indra vṛtra vi bhī
180	abhi enam vajraḥ āyasaḥ	abhi enad vajra āyasa
180	sahasrabhṛṣTiḥ āyata	sahasra bhṛṣṭi i
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	yat vṛtram tava ca aśanim	yat vṛtra tvad ca aśani
180	vajreṇa samayodhayaḥ	vajra saṃyodhay
180	ahim indra jighāṁsataḥ	ahi indra jighāṃs
180	divi te badbadhe śavaḥ	div tvad badbadh śavas
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	abhiṣTane te adrivaḥ	abhiṣṭana tvad adrivat
180	yat sthāḥ jagat ca rejate	yad sthā jagat ca rej
180	tvaṣTā cit tava manyave	tvaṣṭṛ cit tvad manyu
180	indra vevijyate bhiyā	indra vevij bhī
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	nahi nu yāt adhīmasi	nahi nu yāt adhī
180	indram kaḥ vīryā paraḥ	indra ka vīrya para
180	tasmin nṛmṇam uta kratum	tad nṛmṇa uta kratu
180	devāḥ ojāṁsi sam dadhuḥ	deva ojas sam arc
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
180	yām atharvā manuḥ pitā	yad atharvan manu pitṛ
180	dadhyaṅ dhiyam atnata	dadhyac dhī tan
180	tasmin brahmāṇi pūrvathā	tad brahman pūrvathā
180	indre ukthā sam agmata	indra uktha sam gam
180	arcan anu svarājyam	arc anu sva rājya
 ---
181	indraḥ madāya vāvṛdhe	indra mada vṛdh
181	śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ	śavas vṛtrahan nṛ
181	tam it mahatsu ājiṣu	tad id mahat āji
181	uta īm arbhe havāmahe	uta īṃ arbha hvā
181	sa vājeṣu pra naḥ aviṣat	tad vāja pra mad av
181	asi hi vīra senyaḥ	as hi vīra senya
181	asi bhūri parādadiḥ	as bhūri parādadi
181	asi dabhrasya cit vṛdhaḥ	as dabhra cit vṛdha
181	yajamānāya śikṣasi	yaj śikṣ
181	sunvate bhūri te vasu	su bhūri tvad vasu
181	yat udīrate ājayaḥ	yat udīr āji
181	dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā	dhṛṣṇu dhā dhana
181	yukṣvā madacyutā harī	yuj madacyut hari
181	kam hanaḥ kam vasau dadhaḥ	ka han ka vasu dhā
181	asmān indra vasau dadhaḥ	mad indra vasu dhā
181	kratvā mahān anuṣvadham	kratu mahat anuṣvadham
181	bhīmaḥ ā vāvṛdhe śavaḥ	bhīma ā vṛdh śavas
181	śriye ṛṣvaḥ upākayoḥ	śrī ṛṣva upāka
181	ni śiprī harivān dadhe	ni śiprin harivat dhā
181	hastayoḥ vajram āyasam	hasta vajra āyasa
181	ā paprau pārthivam rajaḥ	ā prā pārthiva rajas
181	badbadhe rocanā divi	badbadh rocana div
181	na tvāvān indra kaḥ cana	na tvāvat indra kaścana
181	na jātaḥ na janiṣyate	na jan na jan
181	ati viśvam vavakṣitha	ati viśva vakṣ
181	yaḥ aryaḥ martabhojanam	yad ari marta bhojana
181	parādadāti dāśuṣe	parādā dāś
181	indraḥ asmabhyam śikṣatu	indra mad śikṣ
181	vi bhajā bhūri te vasu	vi bhaj bhūri tvad vasu
