181	bhakṣīya tava rādhasaḥ	bhakṣ tvad rādhas
181	mademade hi naḥ dadiḥ	mada mada hi mad dadi
181	yūthā gavām ṛjukratuḥ	yūtha go ṛju kratu
181	sam gṛbhāya purū śatā	sam gṛbhāy puru śata
181	ubhayāhastyā vasu	ubhayāhastyā vasu
181	śiśīhi rāyaḥ ā bhara	śā rai ā bhṛ
181	mādayasva sute sacā	māday suta sacā
181	śavase śūra rādhase	śavas śūra rādhas
181	vidmā hi tvā purūvasum	vid hi tvad purūvasu
181	upa kāmān sasṛjmahe	upa kāma sṛj
181	athā naḥ avitā bhava	atha mad av bhū
181	ete te indra jantavaḥ	etad tvad indra jantu
181	viśvam puṣyanti vāryam	viśva puṣ vārya
181	antar hi khyaḥ janānām	antar hi khyā jana
181	aryaḥ vedaḥ adāśuṣām	ari vedas a dāś
181	teṣām naḥ vedaḥ ā bhara	tad mad vedas ā bhṛ
 ---
182	upa u su śṛṇuhī giraḥ	upa u su śru gir
182	maghavan mā atathāḥ iva	maghavan mā atathā iva
182	yadā naḥ sūnṛtāvataḥ	yadā mad sūnṛtāvat
182	karaḥ āt arthayāse it	kṛ āt arthay id
182	yojā nu indra te harī	yuj nu indra tvad hari
182	akṣan amīmadanta hi	ghas mad hi
182	ava priyāḥ adhūṣata	ava priya dhū
182	astoṣata svabhānavaḥ	stu sva bhānu
182	viprāḥ naviṣThayā matī	vipra naviṣṭha mati
182	yojā nu indra te harī	yuj nu indra tvad hari
182	susaṁdṛśam tvā vayam	su saṃdṛś tvad mad
182	maghavan vandiṣīmahi	maghavan vand
182	pra nūnam pūrṇavandhuraḥ	pra nūnam pṛ vandhura
182	stutaḥ yāhi vaśān anu	stu yā vaśa anu
182	yojā nu indra te harī	yuj nu indra tvad hari
182	sa ghā tam vṛṣaṇam ratham	tad gha tad vṛṣan ratha
182	adhi tiṣThāti govidam	adhi sthā go vid
182	yaḥ pātram hāriyojanam	yad pātra hāriyojana
182	pūrṇam indra ciketati	pṛ indra cit
182	yojā nu indra te harī	yuj nu indra tvad hari
182	yuktaḥ te astu dakṣiṇaḥ	yuj tvad as dakṣiṇa
182	uta savyaḥ śatakrato	uta savya śatakratu
182	tena jāyām upa priyām	tad jāyā upa priya
182	mandānaḥ yāhi andhasaḥ	mad yā andhas
182	yojā nu indra te harī	yuj nu indra tvad hari
182	yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī	yuj tvad brahman keśin hari
182	upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ	upa pra yā dhā gabhasti
182	ut tvā sutāsaḥ rabhasāḥ amandiṣuḥ	ud tvad suta rabhasa mad
182	pūṣaṇvān vajrin sam u patnyā amadaḥ	pūṣaṇvat vajrin sam u patnī mad
 ---
183	aśvāvati prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati	aśvāvat prathama go gam
183	suprāvīḥ indra martyaḥ tava ūtibhiḥ	su prāvī indra martya tvad ūti
183	tam it pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā	tad id pṛc vasu bhavīyas
183	sindhum āpaḥ yathā abhitaḥ vicetasaḥ	sindhu ap yathā abhitas vicetas
183	āpaḥ na devīḥ upa yanti hotriyam	ap na deva upa i hotriya
183	avaḥ paśyanti vitatam yathā rajaḥ	avas paś vitan yathā rajas
183	prācaiḥ devāsaḥ pra nayanti devayum	prācais deva pra nī devayu
183	brahmapriyam joṣayante varāḥ iva	brahman priya joṣay vara iva
183	adhi dvayoḥ adadhāḥ ukthyam vacaḥ	adhi dvi dhā ukthya vacas
183	yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ	yam sruc mithuna yad sapary
183	asaṁyattaḥ vrate te kṣeti puṣyati	a saṃyat vrata tvad kṣi puṣ
183	bhadrā śaktiḥ yajamānāya sunvate	bhadra śakti yaj su
183	āt aṅgirāḥ prathamam dadhire vayaḥ	āt aṅgiras prathama dhā vayas
183	iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā ye sukṛtyayā	indh agni śamī yad su kṛtyā
183	sarvam paṇeḥ sam avindanta bhojanam	sarva paṇi sam vid bhojana
183	aśvāvantam gomantam ā paśum naraḥ	aśvāvat gomat ā paśu nṛ
183	yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ pathaḥ tate	yajña atharvan prathama pathin tan
183	tataḥ sūryaḥ vratapāḥ venaḥ ā ajani	tatas sūrya vrata pā vena ājan
183	ā gāḥ ājat uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā	ā go aj uśanas kāvya sacā
183	yamasya jātam amṛtam yajāmahe	yama jāta amṛta yaj
183	barhiḥ vā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate	barhis vā yat su apatya vṛj
183	arkaḥ vā ślokam āghoṣate divi	arka vā śloka āghuṣ div
183	grāvā yatra vadati kāruḥ ukthyaḥ	grāvan yatra vad kāru ukthya
183	tasya it indraḥ abhipitveṣu raṇyati	tad id indra abhipitva raṇ
 ---
184	asāvi somaḥ indra te	su soma indra tvad
184	śaviṣTha dhṛṣṇo ā gahi	śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇu ā gam
184	ā tvā pṛṇaktu indriyam	ā tvad pṛc indriya
184	rajaḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ	rajas sūrya na raśmi
184	indram it harī vahataḥ	indra id hari vah
184	apratidhṛṣTaśavasam	apratidhṛṣṭa śavas
184	ṛṣīṇām ca stutīḥ upa	ṛṣi ca stuti upa
184	yajñam ca mānuṣāṇām	yajña ca mānuṣa
184	ā tiṣTha vṛtrahan ratham	ā sthā vṛtrahan ratha
184	yuktā te brahmaṇā harī	yuj tvad brahman hari
184	arvācīnam su te manaḥ	arvācīna su tvad manas
184	grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā	grāvan kṛ vagnu
184	imam indra sutam piba	idam indra su pā
184	jyeṣTham amartyam madam	jyeṣṭha amartya mada
184	śukrasya tvā abhi akṣaran	śukra tvad abhi kṣar
184	dhārāḥ ṛtasya sādane	dhārā ṛta sādana
184	indrāya nūnam arcata	indra nūnam arc
184	ukthāni ca bravītana	uktha ca brū
184	sutāḥ amatsuḥ indavaḥ	su mad indu
184	jyeṣTham namasyatā sahaḥ	jyeṣṭha namasy sahas
184	nakiḥ tvat rathītaraḥ	nakir tvad rathītara
184	harī yat indra yacchase	hari yat indra yam
184	nakiḥ tvā anu majmanā	nakir tvad anu majman
184	nakiḥ svaśvaḥ ānaśe	nakir su aśva aś
184	yaḥ ekaḥ it vidayate	yad eka id viday
184	vasu martāya dāśuṣe	vasu marta dāś
184	īśānaḥ apratiṣkutaḥ	īś apratiṣkuta
184	indraḥ aṅga	indra aṅga
184	kadā martam arādhasam	kadā marta arādhas
184	padā kṣumpam iva sphurat	pad kṣumpa iva sphur
184	kadā naḥ śuśravat giraḥ	kadā mad śru gir
184	indraḥ aṅga	indra aṅga
184	yaḥ cit hi tvā bahubhyaḥ ā	yad cit hi tvad bahu ā
184	sutāvān āvivāsati	sutāvat āvivās
184	ugram tat patyate śavaḥ	ugra tad paty śavas
184	indraḥ aṅga	indra aṅga
184	svādoḥ itthā viṣūvataḥ	svādu itthā viṣūvat
184	madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ	madhu pā gaurī
184	yāḥ indreṇa sayāvarīḥ	yad indra sa yāvan
184	vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase	vṛṣan mad śubh
184	vasvīḥ anu svarājyam	vasu anu sva rājya
184	tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ	tad idam pṛśanāyu
184	somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ	soma śrī pṛśni
184	priyāḥ indrasya dhenavaḥ	priya indra dhenu
184	vajram hinvanti sāyakam	vajra hi sāyaka
184	vasvīḥ anu svarājyam	vasu anu sva rājya
184	tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ	tad idam namas sahas
184	saparyanti pracetasaḥ	sapary pracetas
184	vratāni asya saścire	vrata idam sac
184	purūṇi pūrvacittaye	puru pūrva citti
184	vasvīḥ anu svarājyam	vasu anu sva rājya
184	indraḥ dadhīcaḥ asthabhiḥ	indra dadhyac asthi
184	vṛtrāṇi apratiṣkutaḥ	vṛtra apratiṣkuta
184	jaghāna navatīḥ nava	han navati navan
184	icchan aśvasya yat śiraḥ	iṣ aśva yat śiras
184	parvateṣu apaśritam	parvata apaśri
184	tat vidat śaryaṇāvati	tad vid śaryaṇāvant
184	atra aha goḥ amanvata	atra ah go man
184	nāma tvaṣTuḥ apīcyam	nāman tvaṣṭṛ apīcya
184	itthā candramasaḥ gṛhe	itthā candramas gṛha
184	kaḥ adya yuṅkte dhuri gāḥ ṛtasya	ka adya yuj dhur go ṛta
184	śimīvataḥ bhāminaḥ durhṛṇāyūn	śimīvat bhāmin durhṛṇāyu
184	āsanniṣūn hṛtsvasaḥ mayobhūn	āsanniṣu hṛtsvas mayobhu
184	yaḥ eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt	yad idam bhṛtyā ṛdh tad jīv
184	kaḥ īṣate tujyate kaḥ bibhāya	ka īṣ tuj ka bhī
184	kaḥ maṁsate santam indram kaḥ anti	ka man as indra ka anti
184	kaḥ tokāya kaḥ ibhāya uta rāye	ka toka ka ibha uta rai
184	adhi bravat tanve kaḥ janāya	adhi brū tanū ka jana
184	kaḥ agnim īTTe haviṣā ghṛtena	ka agni īḍ havis ghṛta
184	srucā yajātai ṛtubhiḥ dhruvebhiḥ	sruc yaj ṛtu dhruva
184	kasmai devāḥ ā vahān āśu homa	ka deva ā vah āśu homa
184	kaḥ maṁsate vītihotraḥ sudevaḥ	ka man vītihotra su deva
184	tvam aṅga pra śaṁsiṣaḥ	tvad aṅga pra śaṃs
184	devaḥ śaviṣTha martyam	deva śaviṣṭha martya
184	na tvat anyaḥ maghavan asti marḍitā	na tvad anya maghavan as marḍitṛ
184	indra bravīmi te vacaḥ	indra brū tvad vacas
184	mā te rādhāṁsi mā te ūtayaḥ vaso	mā tvad rādhas mā tvad ūti vas
184	asmān kadā canā dabhan	mad kadācana ā dabh
184	viśvā ca naḥ upamimīhi mānuṣa	viśva ca mad upamā mānuṣa
184	vasūni carṣaṇibhyaḥ ā	vasu carṣaṇi ā
 ---
185	pra ye śumbhante janayaḥ na saptayaḥ	pra yad śubh jani na sapti
185	yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ sudaṁsasaḥ	yāman rudra sūnu su daṃsas
185	rodasī hi marutaḥ cakrire vṛdhe	rodas hi marut kṛ vṛdh
185	madanti vīrāḥ vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ	mad vīra vidatha ghṛṣvi
185	te ukṣitāsaḥ mahimānam āśata	tad vakṣ mahiman aś
185	divi rudrāsaḥ adhi cakrire sadaḥ	div rudra adhi kṛ sadas
185	arcantaḥ arkam janayantaḥ indriyam	arc arka janay indriya
185	adhi śriyaḥ dadhire pṛśnimātaraḥ	adhi śrī dhā pṛśni mātṛ
185	gomātaraḥ yat śubhayante añjibhiḥ	go mātṛ yat śubhay añji
185	tanūṣu śubhrāḥ dadhire virukmataḥ	tanū śubhra dhā virukmant
185	bādhante viśvam abhimātinam apa	bādh viśva abhimātin apa
185	vartmāni eṣām anu rīyate ghṛtam	vartman idam anu ri ghṛta
185	vi ye bhrājante sumakhāsaḥ ṛṣTibhiḥ	vi yad bhrāj su makha ṛṣṭi
185	pracyāvayantaḥ acyutā cit ojasā	praccyāvay acyuta cit ojas
185	manojuvaḥ yat marutaḥ ratheṣu ā	manas jū yat marut ratha ā
185	vṛṣavrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam	vṛṣan vrāta pṛṣatī yuj
185	pra yat ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam	pra yat ratha pṛṣatī yuj
185	vāje adrim marutaḥ raṁhayantaḥ	vāja adri marut raṃhay
185	uta aruṣasya vi syanti dhārāḥ	uta aruṣa vi sā dhārā
185	carma iva udabhiḥ vi undanti bhūma	carman iva udan vi und bhūman
185	ā vaḥ vahantu saptayaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ	ā tvad vah sapti raghuṣyad
185	raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ	raghu patvan pra gā bāhu
185	sīdata ā barhiḥ uru vaḥ sadaḥ kṛtam	sad ā barhis uru tvad sadas kṛ
185	mādayadhvam marutaḥ madhvaḥ andhasaḥ	māday marut madhu andhas
185	te avardhanta svatavasaḥ mahitvanā	tad vṛdh sva tavas mahitvana
185	ā nākam tasthuḥ uru cakrire sadaḥ	nāka sthā uru kṛ sadas
185	viṣṇuḥ yat ha āvat vṛṣaṇam madacyutam	viṣṇu yat dhāv vṛṣan mada cyut
185	vayaḥ na sīdan adhi barhiṣi priye	vi na sad adhi barhis priya
185	śūrāḥ iva it yuyudhayaḥ na jagmayaḥ	śūra iva id yuyudhi na jagmi
185	śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanāsu yetire	śravasyu na pṛtanā yat
185	bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyaḥ	bhī viśva bhuvana marut
185	rājānaḥ iva tveṣasaṁdṛśaḥ naraḥ	rājan iva tveṣa saṃdṛś nṛ
185	tvaṣTā yat vajram sukṛtam hiraṇyayam	tvaṣṭṛ yat vajra su kṛ hiraṇyaya
185	sahasrabhṛṣTim svapāḥ avartayat	sahasra bhṛṣṭi su apas vartay
185	dhatte indraḥ nari apāṁsi kartave	dhā indra apas kṛ
185	ahan vṛtram niḥ apām aubjat arṇavam	han vṛtra niḥ ap ubj arṇava
185	ūrdhvam nunudre avatam te ojasā	ūrdhva nud avata tad ojas
185	dādṛhāṇam cit bibhiduḥ vi parvatam	dṛh cit bhid vi parvata
185	dhamantaḥ vāṇam marutaḥ sudānavaḥ	dham vāṇa marut sudānu
185	made somasya raṇyāni cakrire	mada soma raṇya kṛ
185	jihmam nunudre avatam tayā diśā	jihma nud avata tad diś
185	asiñcan utsam gotamāya tṛṣṇaje	sic utsa gotama tṛṣṇaj
185	ā gacchanti īm avasā citrabhānavaḥ	ā gam īṃ avas citra bhānu
185	kāmam viprasya tarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ	kāma vipra tarpay dhāman
185	yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi	yad tvad śarman śam as
185	tridhātūni dāśuṣe yacchata adhi	tri dhātu dāś yam adhi
185	asmabhyam tāni marutaḥ vi yanta	mad tad marut vi yam
185	rayim naḥ dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram	rayi mad dhā vṛṣan su vīra
 ---
186	marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye	marut yad hi kṣaya
186	pāthā divaḥ vimahasaḥ	pā div vimahas
186	sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ	tad sugopātama jana
186	yajñaiḥ vā yajñavāhasaḥ	yajña vā yajña vāhas
186	viprasya vā matīnām	vipra vā mati
186	marutaḥ śṛṇutā havam	marut śru hava
186	uta vā yasya vājinaḥ	uta vā yad vājin
186	anu vipram atakṣata	anu vipra takṣ
186	sa gantā gomati vraje	tad gam gomat vraja
186	asya vīrasya barhiṣi	idam vīra barhis
186	sutaḥ somaḥ diviṣTiṣu	su soma diviṣṭi
186	uktham madaḥ ca śasyate	uktha mada ca śaṃs
186	asya śroṣantu ā bhuvaḥ	idam śruṣ ā bhū
186	viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi	viśva yad carṣaṇi abhi
186	sūram cit sasruṣīḥ iṣaḥ	sūra cit sṛ iṣ
186	pūrvībhiḥ hi dadāśima	puru hi dāś
186	śaradbhiḥ marutaḥ vayam	śarad marut mad
186	avobhiḥ carṣaṇīnām	avas carṣaṇi
186	subhagaḥ sa prayajyavaḥ	subhaga tad prayajyu
186	marutaḥ astu martyaḥ	marut as martya
186	yasya prayāṁsi parṣatha	yad prayas pṛ
186	śaśamānasya vā naraḥ	śam vā nṛ
186	svedasya satyaśavasaḥ	sveda satya śavas
186	vidā kāmasya venataḥ	vid kāma ven
186	yūyam tat satyaśavasaḥ	tvad tad satya śavas
186	āviḥ karta mahitvanā	āvis kṛ mahitvana
186	vidhyatā vidyutā rakṣaḥ	vyadh vidyut rakṣas
186	gūhatā guhyam tamaḥ	guh guh tamas
186	vi yāta viśvam atriṇam	vi yā viśva atrin
186	jyotiḥ kartā yat uśmasi	jyotis kṛ yad vaś
 ---
187	pratvakṣasaḥ pratavasaḥ virapśinaḥ	pratvakṣas pratavas virapśin
187	anānatāḥ avithurāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ	an ānam a vithura ṛjīṣin
187	juṣTatamāsaḥ nṛtamāsaḥ añjibhiḥ	juṣṭatama nṛtama añji
187	vi ānajre ke cit usrāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ	vi añj kaścit usra iva star
187	upahvareṣu yat acidhvam yayim	upahvara yat ci yayi
187	vayaḥ iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā	vi iva marut kaścit pathin
187	ścotanti kośāḥ upa vaḥ ratheṣu ā	ścut kośa upa tvad ratha ā
187	ghṛtam ukṣatā madhuvarṇam arcate	ghṛta ukṣ madhu varṇa arc
187	pra eṣām ajmeṣu vithurā iva rejate	pra idam ajma vithura iva rej
187	bhūmiḥ yāmeṣu yat ha yuñjate śubhe	bhūmi yāma yat ha yuj śubh
187	te krīLayaḥ dhunayaḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	tad krīḍi dhuni bhrāj ṛṣṭi
187	svayam mahitvam panayanta dhūtayaḥ	svayam mahitva panay dhūti
187	sa hi svasṛt pṛṣadaśvaḥ yuvā gaṇaḥ	tad hi svasṛt pṛṣat aśva yuvan gaṇa
187	ayāḥ īśānaḥ taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtaḥ	gaṇa īś taviṣī āvṛ
187	asi satyaḥ ṛṇayāvā anedyaḥ	as satya ṛṇayāvan anedya
187	asyāḥ dhiyaḥ prāvitā athā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ	idam dhī prāvitṛ atha vṛṣan gaṇa
187	pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi	pitṛ pratna janman vad
187	somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā	soma jihvā pra gā cakṣas
187	yat īm indram śami ṛkvāṇaḥ āśata	yat īṃ indra śamī ṛkvan aś
187	āt it nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire	āt id nāman yajñiya dhā
187	śriyase kam bhānubhiḥ sam mimikṣire	śrī kaṃ bhānu sam mikṣ
187	te raśmibhiḥ te ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ	tad raśmi tad ṛkvan su khādi
187	te vāśīmantaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ abhīravaḥ	tad vāśīmat iṣmin abhīru
187	vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ	vid priya māruta dhāman
 ---
188	ā vidyunmadbhiḥ marutaḥ	ā vidyunmat marut
188	svarkaiḥ rathebhiḥ yāta	su arka ratha yā
188	ṛṣTimadbhiḥ aśvaparṇaiḥ	ṛṣṭimat aśva parṇa
188	ā varṣiṣThayā naḥ iṣā	ā varṣiṣṭha mad iṣ
188	vayaḥ na paptatā sumāyāḥ	vi na pat su māyā
188	te aruṇebhiḥ varam ā piśaṅgaiḥ	tad aruṇa vara ā piśaṅga
188	śubhe kam yānti rathatūrbhiḥ aśvaiḥ	śubh kaṃ yā rathatur aśva
188	rukmaḥ na citraḥ svadhitīvān	rukma na citra svadhitīvat
188	pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma	pavi ratha jaṅghan bhūman
188	śriye kam vaḥ adhi tanūṣu vāśīḥ	śrī kaṃ tvad adhi tanū vāśī
188	medhāḥ vanā na kṛṇavante ūrdhvā	medhā vana na kṛ ūrdhva
188	yuṣmabhyam kam marutaḥ sujātāḥ	tvad kaṃ marut su jan
188	tuvidyumnāsaḥ dhanayante adrim	tuvidyumna dhanay adri
188	ahāni gṛdhrāḥ pari ā vaḥ ā aguḥ	ahar gṛdhra pari ā tvad āgā
188	imām dhiyam vārkāryām ca devīm	idam dhī vārkārya ca devī
188	brahma kṛṇvantaḥ gotamāsaḥ arkaiḥ	brahman kṛ gotama arka
188	ūrdhvam nunudre utsadhim pibadhyai	ūrdhvam nud utsadhi pā
188	etat tyat na yojanam aceti	etad tya na yojana cit
188	sasvar ha yat marutaḥ gotamaḥ vaḥ	sasvar ha yat marut gotama tvad
188	paśyan hiraṇyacakrān	paś hiraṇya cakra
188	ayodaṁṣTrān vidhāvataḥ varāhūn	ayas daṃṣṭra vidhāv varāhu
188	eṣā syā vaḥ marutaḥ anubhartrī	etad tya tvad marut anubhartṛ
188	prati stobhati vāghataḥ na vāṇī	prati stubh vāghant na vāṇī
188	astobhayat vṛthā āsām	stobhay vṛthā idam
188	anu svadhām gabhastyoḥ	anu svadhā gabhasti
 ---
189	ā naḥ bhadrāḥ kratavaḥ yantu viśvataḥ	ā mad bhadra kratu i viśvatas
189	adabdhāsaḥ aparītāsaḥ udbhidaḥ	adabdha aparīta udbhid
189	devāḥ naḥ yathā sadam it vṛdhe asan	deva mad yathā sadam id vṛdh as
189	aprāyuvaḥ rakṣitāraḥ divedive	aprāyu rakṣ diva diva
189	devānām bhadrā sumatiḥ ṛjūyatām	deva bhadra sumati ṛjūy
189	devānām rātiḥ abhi naḥ ni vartatām	deva rāti abhi mad ni vṛt
189	devānām sakhyam upa sedimā vayam	deva sakhya upa sad mad
189	devāḥ naḥ āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase	deva mad āyus pra tṛ jīv
189	tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayam	tad pūrva nivid hvā mad
189	bhagam mitram aditim dakṣam asridham	bhaga mitra aditi dakṣa asridh
189	aryamaṇam varuṇam somam aśvinā	aryaman varuṇa soma aśvin
189	sarasvatī naḥ subhagā mayaḥ karat	sarasvatī mad subhaga mayas kṛ
189	tat naḥ vātaḥ mayobhu vātu bheṣajam	tad mad vāta mayobhu vā bheṣaja
189	tat mātā pṛthivī tat pitā dyauḥ	tad mātṛ pṛthivī tad pitṛ div
189	tat grāvāṇaḥ somasutaḥ mayobhuvaḥ	tad grāvan soma sut mayobhu
189	tat aśvinā śṛṇutam dhiṣṇyā yuvam	tad aśvin śru dhiṣṇya tvad
189	tam īśānam jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ patim	tad īś jagat sthā pati
189	dhiyaṁjinvam avase hūmahe vayam	dhiyaṃjinva av hvā mad
189	pūṣā naḥ yathā vedasām asat vṛdhe	pūṣan mad yathā vedas as vṛdh
189	rakṣitā pāyuḥ adabdhaḥ svastaye	rakṣ pāyu adabdha svasti
189	svasti naḥ indraḥ vṛddhaśravāḥ	svasti mad indra vṛdh śravas
189	svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ	svasti mad pūṣan viśva vedas
189	svasti naḥ tārkṣyaḥ ariṣTanemiḥ	svasti mad tārkṣya ariṣṭa nemi
189	svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu	svasti mad bṛhaspati dhā
189	pṛṣadaśvāḥ marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ	pṛṣat aśva marut pṛśni mātṛ
189	śubhaṁyāvānaḥ vidatheṣu jagmayaḥ	śubhaṃyāvan vidatha jagmi
189	agnijihvāḥ manavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ	agni jihvā manu sūra cakṣas
189	viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā ā gaman iha	viśva mad deva avas gam iha
189	bhadram karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ	bhadra karṇa śru deva
189	bhadram paśyema akṣabhiḥ yajatrāḥ	bhadra paś akṣa yajatra
189	sthiraiḥ aṅgaiḥ tuṣTuvāṁsaḥ tanūbhiḥ	sthira aṅga stu tanū
189	vi aśema devahitam yat āyuḥ	vi aś deva dhā yad āyus
189	śatam it nu śaradaḥ anti devāḥ	śata id nu śarad anti deva
189	yatrā naḥ cakrā jarasam tanūnām	yatra mad kṛ jaras tanū
189	putrāsaḥ yatra pitaraḥ bhavanti	putra yatra pitṛ bhū
189	mā naḥ madhyā rīriṣata āyuḥ gantoḥ	mā mad madhyā riṣ āyus gantu
189	aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam	aditi div aditi antarikṣa
189	aditiḥ mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ	aditi mātṛ tad pitṛ tad putra
189	viśve devāḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ	viśva deva aditi pañcan jana
189	aditiḥ jātam aditiḥ janitvam	aditi jan aditi janitva
 ---
190	ṛjunītī naḥ varuṇaḥ	ṛju nīti mad varuṇa
190	mitraḥ nayatu vidvān	mitra nī vid
190	aryamā devaiḥ sajoṣāḥ	aryaman deva sajoṣas
190	te hi vasvaḥ vasavānāḥ	tad hi vasu vasavāna
190	te apramūrāḥ mahobhiḥ	tad apramūra mahas
190	vratā rakṣante viśvāhā	vrata rakṣ viśvāhā
190	te asmabhyam śarma yaṁsan	tad mad śarman yam
190	amṛtāḥ martyebhyaḥ	amṛta martya
190	bādhamānāḥ apa dviṣaḥ	bādh apa dviṣ
190	vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya	vi mad pathin suvita
190	ciyantu indraḥ marutaḥ	ci indra marut
190	pūṣā bhagaḥ vandyāsaḥ	pūṣan bhaga vand
190	uta naḥ dhiyaḥ goagrāḥ	uta mad dhī go agra
190	pūṣan viṣṇo evayāvaḥ	pūṣan viṣṇu eva yāvan
190	kartā naḥ svastimataḥ	kṛ mad svastimat
190	madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate	madhu vāta ṛtāy
190	madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ	madhu kṣar sindhu
190	mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ	mādhvī mad as oṣadhī
190	madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ	madhu nakta uta uṣas
190	madhumat pārthivam rajaḥ	madhumat pārthiva rajas
190	madhu dyauḥ astu naḥ pitā	madhu div as mad pitṛ
190	madhumān naḥ vanaspatiḥ	madhumat mad vanaspati
190	madhumān astu sūryaḥ	madhumat as sūrya
190	mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ	mādhvī go bhū mad
190	śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ	śam mad mitra śam varuṇa
190	śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā	śam mad bhū aryaman
190	śam naḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ	śam mad indra bṛhaspati
190	śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ urukramaḥ	śam mad viṣṇu uru krama
 ---
191	tvam soma pra cikitaḥ manīṣā	tvad soma pra cit manīṣā
191	tvam rajiṣTham anu neṣi panthām	tvad rajiṣṭha anu nī pathin
191	tava praṇītī pitaraḥ naḥ indo	tvad praṇīti pitṛ mad indu
191	deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ	deva ratna bhaj dhīra
191	tvam soma kratubhiḥ sukratuḥ bhūḥ	tvad soma kratu su kratu bhū
191	tvam dakṣaiḥ sudakṣaḥ viśvavedāḥ	tvad dakṣa su dakṣa viśva vedas
191	tvam vṛṣā vṛṣatvebhiḥ mahitvā	tvad vṛṣan vṛṣan tva mahitva
191	dyumnebhiḥ dyumnī abhavaḥ nṛcakṣāḥ	dyumna dyumnin bhū nṛ cakṣas
191	rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni	rājan nu tvad varuṇa vrata
191	bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma	bṛhat gabhīra tvad soma dhāman
191	śuciḥ tvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ	śuci tvad as priya na mitra
191	dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma	dakṣāyya aryaman iva as soma
191	yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyām	yad tvad dhāman div yad pṛthivī
191	yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu	yad parvata oṣadhī ap
191	tebhiḥ naḥ viśvaiḥ sumanāḥ aheLan	tad mad viśva sumanas a hīḍ
191	rājan soma prati havyā gṛbhāya	rājan soma prati havya gṛbhāy
191	tvam soma asi satpatiḥ	tvad soma as sat pati
191	tvam rājā uta vṛtrahā	tvad rājan uta vṛtra han
191	tvam bhadraḥ asi kratuḥ	tvad bhadra as kratu
191	tvam ca soma naḥ vaśaḥ	tvad ca soma mad vaś
191	jīvātum na marāmahe	jīvātu na mṛ
191	priyastotraḥ vanaspatiḥ	priya stotra vanaspati
191	tvam soma mahe bhagam	tvad soma mah bhaga
191	tvam yūnaḥ ṛtāyate	tvad yuvan ṛtāy
191	dakṣam dadhāsi jīvase	dakṣa dhā jīv
191	tvam naḥ soma viśvataḥ	tvad mad soma viśvatas
191	rakṣā rājan aghāyataḥ	rakṣ rājan aghāy
191	na riṣyet tvāvataḥ sakhā	na riṣ tvāvat sakhi
191	soma yāḥ te mayobhuvaḥ	soma yad tvad mayobhu
191	ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe	ūti as dāś
191	tābhiḥ naḥ avitā bhava	tad mad av bhū
191	imam yajñam idam vacaḥ	idam yajña idam vacas
191	jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi	juṣ upāgam
191	soma tvam naḥ vṛdhe bhava	soma tvad mad vṛdh bhū
191	soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam	soma gir tvad mad
191	vardhayāmaḥ vacovidaḥ	vardhay vacas vid
191	sumṛLīkaḥ naḥ ā viśa	su mṛḍīka mad ā viś
191	gayasphānaḥ amīvahā	gayasphāna amīva han
191	vasuvit puṣTivardhanaḥ	vasu vid puṣṭi vardhana
191	sumitraḥ soma naḥ bhava	su mitra soma mad bhū
191	soma rārandhi naḥ hṛdi	soma ran mad hṛd
191	gāvaḥ na yavaseṣu ā	go na yavasa ā
191	maryaḥ iva sve okye	marya iva sva okya
191	yaḥ soma sakhye tava	yad soma sakhya tvad
191	rāraṇat deva martyaḥ	ran deva martya
191	tam dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ	tad dakṣa sac kavi
191	uruṣyā naḥ abhiśasteḥ	uruṣy mad abhiśasti
191	soma ni pāhi aṁhasaḥ	soma ni pā aṃhas
191	sakhā suśevaḥ edhi naḥ	sakhi su śeva as mad
191	ā pyāyasva sam etu te	ā pyā sam i tvad
191	viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam	viśvatas soma vṛṣṇya
191	bhavā vājasya saṁgathe	bhū vāja saṃgatha
191	ā pyāyasva madintama	ā pyā madintama
191	soma viśvebhiḥ aṁśubhiḥ	soma viśva aṃśu
191	bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe	bhū mad suśravastama sakhi vṛdh
191	sam te payāṁsi sam u yantu vājāḥ	sam tvad payas sam u i vāja
191	sam vṛṣṇyāni abhimātiṣāhaḥ	sam vṛṣṇya abhimātiṣāh
191	āpyāyamānaḥ amṛtāya soma	āpyā amṛta soma
191	divi śravāṁsi uttamāni dhiṣva	div śravas uttama dhā
191	yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti	yad tvad dhāman havis yaj
191	tā te viśvā paribhūḥ astu yajñam	tad tvad viśva paribhū as yajña
191	gayasphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ	gaya sphāna prataraṇa su vīra
191	avīrahā pra carā soma duryān	avīra han pra car soma durya
191	somaḥ dhenum somaḥ arvantam āśum	soma dhenu soma arvant āśu
191	somaḥ vīram karmaṇyam dadāti	soma vīra karmaṇya dā
191	sādanyam vidathyam sabheyam	sādanya vidathya sabheya
191	pitṛśravaṇam yaḥ dadāśat asmai	pitṛ śravaṇa yad dāś idam
191	aṣāLham yutsu pṛtanāsu paprim	aṣāḍha yudh pṛtanā papri
191	svarṣām apsām vṛjanasya gopām	svarṣā ap sā vṛjana gopā
191	bhareṣujām sukṣitim suśravasam	bhareṣujā su kṣiti suśravas
191	jayantam tvām anu madema soma	ji tvad anu mad soma
191	tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma viśvāḥ	tvad idam oṣadhi soma viśva
191	tvam apaḥ ajanayaḥ tvam gāḥ	tvad ap janay tvad go
191	tvam ā tatantha uru antarikṣam	tvad ā tan uru antarikṣa
191	tvam jyotiṣā vi tamaḥ vavartha	tvad jyotis vi tamas vṛ
191	devena naḥ manasā deva soma	deva mad manas deva soma
191	rāyaḥ bhāgam sahasāvan abhi yudhya	rai bhāga sahasāvat abhi yudh
191	mā tvā ā tanat īśiṣe vīryasya	mā tvad tan īś vīrya
191	ubhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsā gaviṣTau	ubhaya pra cikits gaviṣṭi
 ---
192	etāḥ u tyāḥ uṣasaḥ ketum akrata	etad u tya uṣas ketu kṛ
192	pūrve ardhe rajasaḥ bhānum añjate	pūrva ardha rajas bhānu añj
192	niṣkṛṇvānāḥ āyudhāni iva dhṛṣṇavaḥ	niṣkṛ āyudha iva dhṛṣṇu
192	prati gāvaḥ aruṣīḥ yanti mātaraḥ	prati go aruṣa i mātṛ
192	ut apaptan aruṇāḥ bhānavaḥ vṛthā	ud pat aruṇa bhānu vṛthā
192	svāyujaḥ aruṣīḥ gāḥ ayukṣata	su āyuj aruṣa go yuj
192	akran uṣāsaḥ vayunāni pūrvathā	kṛ uṣa vayuna pūrvathā
192	ruśantam bhānum aruṣīḥ aśiśrayuḥ	ruśat bhānu aruṣa śri
192	arcanti nārīḥ apasaḥ na viṣTibhiḥ	arc nārī apas na viṣṭi
192	samānena yojanena ā parāvataḥ	samāna yojana ā parāvat
192	iṣam vahantīḥ sukṛte sudānave	iṣ vah su kṛt sudānu
192	viśvā it aha yajamānāya sunvate	viśva id ahar yaj su
192	adhi peśāṁsi vapate nṛtūḥ iva	adhi peśas vap nṛtū iva
192	apa ūrṇute vakṣaḥ usrā iva barjaham	apavṛ vakṣas usrā iva barjaha
192	jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī	jyotis viśva bhuvana kṛ
192	gāvaḥ na vrajam vi uṣāḥ āvar tamaḥ	go na vraja vi uṣas vṛ tamas
192	prati arciḥ ruśat asyāḥ adarśi	prati arcis ruśat idam dṛś
192	vi tiṣThate bādhate kṛṣṇam abhvam	vi sthā bādh kṛṣṇa abhva
192	svarum na peśaḥ vidatheṣu añjan	svaru na peśa vidatha añj
192	citram divaḥ duhitā bhānum aśret	citra div duhitṛ bhānu śri
192	atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya	tṛ tamas pāra idam
192	uṣāḥ ucchantī vayunā kṛṇoti	uṣā vas vayuna kṛ
192	śriye chandaḥ na smayate vibhātī	śrī chanda na smi vibhā
192	supratīkā saumanasāya ajīgar	su pratīka saumanasa jāgṛ
192	bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām	bhāsvat netṛ sūnṛtā
192	divaḥ stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ	div stu duhitṛ gotama
192	prajāvataḥ nṛvataḥ aśvabudhyān	prajāvat nṛvat aśva budhya
192	uṣaḥ goagrān upa māsi vājān	uṣas go agra upa mā vāja
192	uṣaḥ tam aśyām yaśasam suvīram	uṣas tad aś yaśas su vīra
192	dāsapravargam rayim aśvabudhyam	dāsa pravarga rayi aśva budhya
192	sudaṁsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi	su daṃsas śravas yad vibhā
192	vājaprasūtā subhage bṛhantam	vāja prasū subhaga bṛhat
192	viśvāni devī bhuvanā abhicakṣyā	viśva devī bhuvana abhicakṣ
192	pratīcī cakṣuḥ urviyā vi bhāti	pratyañc cakṣus urviyā vi bhā
192	viśvam jīvam carase bodhayantī	viśva jīva car bodhay
192	viśvasya vācam avidat manāyoḥ	viśva vāc vid manāyu
192	punaḥpunar jāyamānā purāṇī	punar punar jan purāṇa
192	samānam varṇam abhi śumbhamānā	samāna varṇa abhi śubh
192	śvaghnī iva kṛtnuḥ vijaḥ āminānā	śvaghnin iva kṛtnu vij āmī
192	martasya devī jarayantī āyuḥ	marta devī jaray āyus
192	vyūrṇvatī divaḥ antān abodhi	vivṛ div anta budh
192	apa svasāram sanutar yuyoti	apa svasṛ sanutar yu
192	praminatī manuṣyā yugāni	pramī manuṣya yuga
192	yoṣā jārasya cakṣasā vi bhāti	yoṣā jāra cakṣas vi bhā
192	paśūn na citrā subhagā prathānā	paśu na citra subhaga prath
192	sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ urviyā vi aśvait	sindhu na kṣodas urviyā vi śvit
192	aminatī daivyāni vratāni	a mī daivya vrata
192	sūryasya ceti raśmibhiḥ dṛśānā	sūrya cit raśmi dṛś
192	uṣaḥ tat citram ā bhara	uṣa tad citra ā bhṛ
192	asmabhyam vājinīvati	mad vājinīvat
192	yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe	yad toka ca tanaya ca dhā
192	uṣaḥ adya iha gomati	uṣas adya iha gomat
192	aśvāvati vibhāvari	aśvāvat vibhāvan
192	revat asme vi uccha sūnṛtāvati	revat mad vi vas sūnṛtāvat
192	yukṣvā hi vājinīvati	yuj hi vājinīvat
192	aśvān adya aruṇān uṣaḥ	aśva adya aruṇa uṣa
192	athā naḥ viśvā saubhagāni ā vaha	atha mad viśva saubhaga ā vah
192	aśvinā vartiḥ asmat ā	aśvin vartis mad ā
192	gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat	gomat dasra hiraṇyavat
192	arvāk ratham samanasā ni yacchatam	arvāk ratha samanas ni yam
192	yau itthā ślokam ā divaḥ	yad itthā śloka ā div
192	jyotiḥ janāya cakrathuḥ	jyotis jana kṛ
192	ā naḥ ūrjam vahatam aśvinā yuvam	ā mad ūrj vah aśvin tvad
192	ā iha devā mayobhuvā	ā iha deva mayobhu
192	dasrā hiraṇyavartanī	dasra hiraṇya vartani
192	uṣarbudhaḥ vahantu somapītaye	uṣarbudh vah soma pīti
 ---
193	agnīṣomau imam su me	agnīṣoma idam su mad
193	śṛṇutam vṛṣaṇā havam	śru vṛṣan hava
193	prati sūktāni haryatam	prati sūkta hary
193	bhavatam dāśuṣe mayaḥ	bhū dāś mayas
193	agnīṣomā yaḥ adya vām	agnīṣoma yad adya tvad
193	idam vacaḥ saparyati	idam vacas sapary
193	tasmai dhattam suvīryam	tad dhā su vīrya
193	gavām poṣam svaśvyam	go poṣa su aśvya
193	agnīṣomā yaḥ āhutim	agnīṣoma yad āhuti
193	yaḥ vām dāśāt haviṣkṛtim	yad tvad dāś haviṣkṛti
193	sa prajayā suvīryam	tad prajā su vīrya
193	viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavat	viśva āyus vi aś
193	agnīṣomā ceti tat vīryam vām	agnīṣoma cit tad vīrya tvad
193	yat amuṣṇītam avasam paṇim gāḥ	yat muṣ avasa paṇi go
193	ava atiratam bṛsayasya śeṣaḥ	avatṛ bṛsaya śeṣas
193	avindatam jyotiḥ ekam bahubhyaḥ	vid jyotis eka bahu
193	yuvam etāni divi rocanāni	tvad etad div rocana
193	agniḥ ca soma sakratū adhattam	agni ca soma sakratu dhā
193	yuvam sindhūn abhiśasteḥ avadyāt	tvad sindhu abhiśasti avadya
193	agnīṣomau amuñcatam gṛbhītān	agnīṣoma muc grah
193	ā anyam divaḥ mātariśvā jabhāra	ā anya div mātariśvan bhṛ
193	amathnāt anyam pari śyenaḥ adreḥ	math anya pari śyena adri
193	agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā	agnīṣoma brahman vṛdh
193	urum yajñāya cakrathuḥ ulokam	uru yajña kṛ u loka
193	agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya	agnīṣoma havis prasthā
193	vītam haryatam vṛṣaṇā juṣethām	vī hary vṛṣan juṣ
193	suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam	su śarman su avas hi bhū
193	athā dhattam yajamānāya śam yoḥ	atha ā dhā yaj śam yos
193	yaḥ agnīṣomā haviṣā saparyāt	yad agnīṣoma havis sapary
193	devadrīcā manasā yaḥ ghṛtena	devadryañc manas yad ghṛta
193	tasya vratam rakṣatam pātam aṁhasaḥ	tad vrata rakṣ pā aṃhas
193	viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam	viś jana mahi śarman yam
193	agnīṣomā savedasā	agnīṣoma sa vedas
193	sahūtī vanatam giraḥ	sa hūti van gir
193	sam devatrā babhūvathuḥ	sam devatrā bhū
193	agnīṣomau anena vām	agnīṣoma idam tvad
193	yaḥ vām ghṛtena dāśati	yad tvad ghṛta dāś
193	tasmai dīdayatam bṛhat	tad dīdī bṛhat
193	agnīṣomau imāni naḥ	agnīṣoma idam mad
193	yuvam havyā jujoṣatam	tvad havya juṣ
193	ā yātam upa naḥ sacā	ā yā upa mad sacā
193	agnīṣomā pipṛtam arvataḥ naḥ	agnīṣoma pṛ arvant mad
193	ā pyāyantām usriyāḥ havyasūdaḥ	ā pyā usriyā havyasūd
193	asme balāni maghavatsu dhattam	mad bala maghavan dhā
193	kṛṇutam naḥ adhvaram śruṣTimantam	kṛ mad adhvara śruṣṭimat
 ---
194	imam stomam arhate jātavedase	idam stoma arh jātavedas
194	ratham iva sam mahemā manīṣayā	ratha iva sam mah manīṣā
194	bhadrā hi naḥ pramatiḥ asya saṁsadi	bhadra hi mad pramati idam saṃsad
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhati	yad tvad āyaj tad sādh
194	anarvā kṣeti dadhate suvīryam	anarvan kṣi dhā su vīrya
194	sa tūtāva na enam aśnoti aṁhatiḥ	tad tu na enad aś aṃhati
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	śakema tvā samidham sādhayā dhiyaḥ	śak tvad samindh sādhay dhī
194	tve devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam	tvad deva havis ad āhu
194	tvam ādityān ā vaha tān hi uśmasi	tvad āditya ā vah tad hi vaś
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	bharāma idhmam kṛṇavāmā havīṁṣi te	bhṛ idhma kṛ havis tvad
194	citayantaḥ parvaṇāparvaṇā vayam	citay parvan parvan mad
194	jīvātave prataram sādhayā dhiyaḥ	jīvātu prataram sādhay dhī
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	viśām gopāḥ asya caranti jantavaḥ	viś gopā idam car jantu
194	dvipat ca yat uta catuṣpat aktubhiḥ	dvipad ca yad uta catuṣpada aktu
194	citraḥ praketaḥ uṣasaḥ mahān asi	citra praketa uṣas mahat as
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	tvam adhvaryuḥ uta hotā asi pūrvyaḥ	tvad adhvaryu uta hotṛ as pūrvya
194	praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ	praśāstṛ potṛ janus purohita
194	viśvā vidvān ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasi	viśva vid ārtvijya dhīra puṣ
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhi mā riṣ mad tvad
194	yaḥ viśvataḥ supratīkaḥ sadṛṅ asi	yad viśvatas su pratīka sadṛś as
194	dūre cit san taLit iva ati rocase	dūra cit as taḍit iva ati ruc
194	rātryāḥ cit andhaḥ ati deva paśyasi	rātri cit andhas ati deva paś
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	pūrvaḥ devāḥ bhavatu sunvataḥ rathaḥ	pūrva deva bhū su ratha
194	asmākam śaṁsaḥ abhi astu dūḍhyaḥ	mad śaṃsa abhi as dūḍhī
194	tat ā jānīta uta puṣyatā vacaḥ	tad ā jñā uta puṣ vacas
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	vadhaiḥ duḥśaṁsān apa dūḍhyaḥ jahi	vadha duḥśaṃsa apa dūḍhī hā
194	dūre vā ye anti vā ke cit atriṇaḥ	dūra vā yad anti vā kaścit atrin
194	athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugam kṛdhi	atha yajña gṛ suga kṛ
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	yat ayukthāḥ aruṣā rohitā rathe	yat yuj aruṣa rohita ratha
194	vātajūtā vṛṣabhasya iva te ravaḥ	vāta jū vṛṣabha iva tvad rava
194	āt invasi vaninaḥ dhūmaketunā	āt inv vanin dhūma ketu
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	adha svanāt uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇaḥ	adha svana uta bhī patatrin
194	drapsāḥ yat te yavasādaḥ vi asthiran	drapsa yat tvad yavasād vi sthā
194	sugam tat te tāvakebhyaḥ rathebhyaḥ	suga tad tvad tāvaka ratha
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	ayam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāyase	idam mitra varuṇa dhāyas
194	avayātām marutām heLaḥ adbhutaḥ	dhāyas marut heḍa adbhuta
194	mṛLā su naḥ bhūtu eṣām manaḥ punar	mṛḍ su mad bhū idam manas punar
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	devaḥ devānām asi mitraḥ adbhutaḥ	deva deva as mitra adbhuta
194	vasuḥ vasūnām asi cāruḥ adhvare	vasu vasu as cāru adhvara
194	śarman syāma tava saprathastame	śarman as tvad saprathastama
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	tat te bhadram yat samiddhaḥ sve dame	tad tvad bhadra yat samindh sva dama
194	somāhutaḥ jarase mṛLayattamaḥ	soma āhu jṛ mṛḍayattama
194	dadhāsi ratnam draviṇam ca dāśuṣe	dhā ratna draviṇa ca dāś
194	agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava	agni sakhya mā riṣ mad tvad
194	yasmai tvam sudraviṇaḥ dadāśaḥ	yad tvad su draviṇas dāś
194	anāgāstvam adite sarvatātā	anāgāstva aditi sarvatāti
194	yam bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi	yad bhadra śavas coday
194	prajāvatā rādhasā te syāma	prajāvat rādhas tad as
194	sa tvam agne saubhagatvasya vidvān	tad tvad agni saubhaga tva vid
194	asmākam āyuḥ pra tira iha deva	mad āyus pra tṛ iha deva
194	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
194	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
195	dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe	dvi virūpa car su artha
195	anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete	anya anya vatsa upa dhāpay
195	hariḥ anyasyām bhavati svadhāvān	hari anya bhū svadhāvat
195	śukraḥ anyasyām dadṛśe suvarcāḥ	śukra anya dṛś su varcas
195	daśa imam tvaṣTuḥ janayanta garbham	daśan idam tvaṣṭṛ janay garbha
195	atandrāsaḥ yuvatayaḥ vibhṛtram	atandra yuvati vibhṛtra
195	tigmānīkam svayaśasam janeṣu	tigma anīka sva yaśas jana
195	virocamānam pari sīm nayanti	viruc pari sīm nī
195	trīṇi jānā pari bhūṣanti asya	tri jāna pari bhūṣ idam
195	samudre ekam divi ekam apsu	samudra eka div eka ap
195	pūrvām anu pra diśam pārthivānām	pūrva anu pra diś pārthiva
195	ṛtūn praśāsat vi dadhau anuṣThu	ṛtu praśās vi anuṣṭhu
195	kaḥ imam vaḥ niṇyam ā ciketa	ka idam tvad niṇya ā cit
195	vatsaḥ mātṛṛḥ janayata svadhābhiḥ	vatsa mātṛ janay svadhā
195	bahvīnām garbhaḥ apasām upasthāt	bahu garbha apas upastha
195	mahān kaviḥ niḥ carati svadhāvān	mahat kavi niḥ car svadhāvat
195	āviṣTyaḥ vardhate cāruḥ āsu	āviṣṭya vṛdh cāru idam
195	jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ svayaśāḥ upasthe	jihma ūrdhva sva yaśas upastha
195	ubhe tvaṣTuḥ bibhyatuḥ jāyamānāt	ubh tvaṣṭṛ bhī jan
195	pratīcī siṁham prati joṣayete	pratyañc siṃha prati joṣay
195	ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene	ubh bhadra joṣay na menā
195	gāvaḥ na vāśrāḥ upa tasthuḥ evaiḥ	go na vāśra upa sthā eva
195	sa dakṣāṇām dakṣapatiḥ babhūva	tad dakṣa dakṣa pati bhū
195	añjanti yam dakṣiṇataḥ havirbhiḥ	añj yad dakṣiṇatas havis
195	ut yaṁyamīti savitā iva bāhū	ud yaṃyam savitṛ iva bāhu
195	ubhe sicau yatate bhīmaḥ ṛñjan	ubh sic yat bhīma ṛj
195	ut śukram atkam ajate simasmāt	ud śukra atka aj sima
195	navā mātṛbhyaḥ vasanā jahāti	nava mātṛ vasana hā
195	tveṣam rūpam kṛṇute uttaram yat	tveṣa rūpa kṛ uttara yad
195	sampṛñcānaḥ sadane gobhiḥ adbhiḥ	sampṛc sadana go ap
195	kaviḥ budhnam pari marmṛjyate dhīḥ	kavi budhna pari marmṛj dhī
195	sā devatātā samitiḥ babhūva	tad devatāti samiti bhū
195	uru te jrayaḥ pari eti budhnam	uru tvad jrayas pari i budhna
195	virocamānam mahiṣasya dhāma	viruc mahiṣa dhāman
195	viśvebhiḥ agne svayaśobhiḥ iddhaḥ	viśva agni sva yaśas indh
195	adabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi asmān	adabdha pāyu pā mad
195	dhanvan srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmim	dhanvan srotas kṛ gātu ūrmi
195	śukraiḥ ūrmibhiḥ abhi nakṣati kṣām	śukra ūrmi abhi nakṣ kṣā
195	viśvā sanāni jaThareṣu dhatte	viśva sana jaṭhara dhā
195	antar navāsu carati prasūṣu	antar nava car prasū
195	evā naḥ agne samidhā vṛdhānaḥ	eva mad agni samidh vṛdh
195	revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi	revat pāvaka śravas vi bhā
195	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
195	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
196	sa pratnathā sahasā jāyamānaḥ	tad pratnathā sahas jan
196	sadyaḥ kāvyāni baT adhatta viśvā	sadyas kāvya baṭ dhā viśva
196	āpaḥ ca mitram dhiṣaṇā ca sādhan	ap ca mitra dhiṣaṇā ca sādh
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	sa pūrvayā nividā kavyatā āyoḥ	tad pūrva nivid kavya tā āyu
196	imāḥ prajāḥ ajanayat manūnām	idam prajā janay manu
196	vivasvatā cakṣasā dyām apaḥ ca	vivasvant cakṣas div ap ca
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	tam īLata prathamam yajñasādham	tad īḍ prathama yajñasādh
196	viśaḥ ārīḥ āhutam ṛñjasānam	viś ārya āhu ṛj
196	ūrjaḥ putram bharatam sṛpradānum	ūrj putra bharata sṛpra dānu
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	sa mātariśvā puruvārapuṣTiḥ	tad mātariśvan puru vāra puṣṭi
196	vidat gātum tanayāya svarvit	vid gātu tanaya svar vid
196	viśām gopāḥ janitā rodasyoḥ	viś gopā janitṛ rodasī
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	naktoṣāsā varṇam āmemyāne	naktoṣāsā varṇa āmemy
196	dhāpayete śiśum ekam samīcī	dhāpay śiśu eka samyañc
196	dyāvākṣāmā rukmaḥ antar vi bhāti	dyāvākṣam rukma antar vi bhā
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṁgamanaḥ vasūnām	rai budhna saṃgamana vasu
196	yajñasya ketuḥ manmasādhanaḥ veḥ	yajña ketu manman sādhana vi
196	amṛtatvam rakṣamāṇāsaḥ enam	amṛta tva rakṣ enad
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	nū ca purā ca sadanam rayīṇām	nu ca pura ca sadana rayi
196	jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām	jan ca jan ca kṣā
196	sataḥ ca gopām bhavataḥ ca bhūreḥ	as ca gopā bhū ca bhūri
196	devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇodām	deva agni dhāray draviṇas dā
196	draviṇodāḥ draviṇasaḥ turasya	draviṇas dā draviṇas tura
196	draviṇodāḥ sanarasya pra yaṁsat	draviṇas dā sa nara pra yam
196	draviṇodāḥ vīravatīm iṣam naḥ	draviṇas dā vīravat iṣ mad
196	draviṇodāḥ rāsate dīrgham āyuḥ	draviṇas dā rā dīrgha āyus
196	evā naḥ agne samidhā vṛdhānaḥ	eva mad agni samidh vṛdh
196	revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi	revat pāvaka śravas vi bhā
196	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
196	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	agne śuśugdhi ā rayim	agni śuc ā rayi
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	sukṣetriyā sugātuyā	sukṣetriyā sugātuyā
197	vasūyā ca yajāmahe	vasūyā ca yaj
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	pra yat bhandiṣThaḥ eṣām	pra yat bhandiṣṭha idam
197	pra asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ	pra asmāka ca sūri
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	pra yat te agne sūrayaḥ	pra yat tad agni sūri
197	jāyemahi pra te vayam	jan pra tad mad
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	pra yat agneḥ sahasvataḥ	pra yat agni sahasvat
197	viśvataḥ yanti bhānavaḥ	viśvatas i bhānu
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	tvam hi viśvatomukha	tvad hi viśvatomukha
197	viśvataḥ paribhūḥ asi	viśvatas paribhū as
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	dviṣaḥ naḥ viśvatomukha	dviṣ mad viśvatomukha
197	ati nāvā iva pāraya	ati nau iva pāray
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
197	sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvayā	tad mad sindhu iva nāvā
197	ati parṣā svastaye	ati pṛ svasti
197	apa naḥ śośucat agham	apa mad śośuc agha
 ---
198	vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma	vaiśvānara sumati as
198	rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ	rājan hi kaṃ bhuvana abhiśrī
198	itaḥ jātaḥ viśvam idam vi caṣTe	itas jan viśva idam vi cakṣ
198	vaiśvānaraḥ yatate sūryeṇa	vaiśvānara yat sūrya
198	pṛṣTaḥ divi pṛṣTaḥ agniḥ pṛthivyām	pracch div pracch agni pṛthivī
198	pṛṣTaḥ viśvāḥ oṣadhīḥ ā viveśa	pracch viśva oṣadhi ā viś
198	vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣTaḥ agniḥ	vaiśvānara sahas pracch agni
198	sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam	tad mad divā tad riṣ pā nakta
198	vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astu	vaiśvānara tvad tad satya as
198	asmān rāyaḥ maghavānaḥ sacantām	mad rai maghavan sac
198	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
198	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
199	jātavedase sunavāma somam	jātavedas su soma
199	arātīyataḥ ni dahāti vedaḥ	arātīy ni dah vedas
199	sa naḥ parṣat ati durgāṇi viśvā	tad mad pṛ ati durga viśva
199	nāvā iva sindhum duritā ati agniḥ	nau iva sindhu durita ati agni
 ---
1100	sa yaḥ vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokāḥ	tad yad vṛṣan vṛṣṇya samokas
1100	mahaḥ divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ca samrāT	mah div pṛthivī ca samrāj
1100	satīnasatvā havyaḥ bhareṣu	satīna satvan hu bhara
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	yasya anāptaḥ sūryasya iva yāmaḥ	yad an āp sūrya iva yāma
1100	bharebhare vṛtrahā śuṣmaḥ asti	bhara bhara vṛtra han śuṣma as
1100	vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhiḥ evaiḥ	vṛṣantama sakhi sva eva
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	divaḥ na yasya retasaḥ dughānāḥ	div na yad retas duh
1100	panthāsaḥ yanti śavasā aparītāḥ	pathin i śavas a parī
1100	taraddveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ pauṁsyebhiḥ	tṛ dveṣas sāsahi pauṃsya
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	saḥ aṅgirobhiḥ aṅgirastamaḥ bhūt	tad aṅgiras aṅgirastama bhū
1100	vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san	vṛṣan vṛṣan sakhi sakhi as
1100	ṛgmibhiḥ ṛgmī gātubhiḥ jyeṣThaḥ	ṛgmin ṛgmin gātu jyeṣṭha
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa sūnubhiḥ na rudrebhiḥ ṛbhvā	tad sūnu na rudra ṛbhvas
1100	nṛṣāhye sāsahvān amitrān	nṛṣāhya sah amitra
1100	sanīLebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan	sanīḍa śravasya tūrv
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartā	tad manyumī samadana kṛ
1100	asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ sūryam sanat	asmāka nṛ sūrya san
1100	asmin ahan satpatiḥ puruhūtaḥ	idam ahar satpati puru hvā
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	tam ūtayaḥ raṇayan śūrasātau	tad ūti raṇay śūrasāti
1100	tam kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām	tad kṣema kṣiti kṛ trā
1100	sa viśvasya karuṇasya īśe ekaḥ	tad viśva karuṇa īś eka
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	tam apsanta śavasaḥ utsaveṣu	tad śavas utsava
1100	naraḥ naram avase tam dhanāya	nṛ nṛ avas tad dhana
1100	saḥ andhe cit tamasi jyotiḥ vidat	tad andha cit tamas jyotis vid
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa savyena yamati vrādhataḥ cit	tad savya yam vrādh cit
1100	sa dakṣiṇe saṁgṛbhītā kṛtāni	tad dakṣiṇa saṃgrah kṛta
1100	sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni	tad kīri cit san dhana
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhiḥ	tad grāma san tad ratha
1100	vide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣTibhiḥ nu adya	vid viśva kṛṣṭi nu adya
1100	sa pauṁsyebhiḥ abhibhūḥ aśastīḥ	tad pauṃsya abhibhū aśasti
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa jāmibhiḥ yat samajāti mīLhe	tad jāmi yat samaj mīḍha
1100	ajāmibhiḥ vā puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ	a jāmi vā puruhūta eva
1100	apām tokasya tanayasya jeṣe	ap toka tanaya jeṣa
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	sa vajrabhṛt dasyuhā bhīmaḥ ugraḥ	tad vajrabhṛt dasyu han bhīma ugra
1100	sahasracetāḥ śatanīthaḥ ṛbhvā	sahasra cetas śata nīthā ṛbhvan
1100	camrīṣaḥ na śavasā pāñcajanyaḥ	camrīṣa na śavas pāñcajanya
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣāḥ	tad vajra krand smat svarṣā
1100	divaḥ na tveṣaḥ ravathaḥ śimīvān	div na tveṣa ravatha śimīvat
1100	tam sacante sanayaḥ tam dhanāni	tad sac sani tad dhana
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvat mad bhū indra ūti
1100	yasya ajasram śavasā mānam uktham	yad ajasra śavas māna uktha
1100	paribhujat rodasī viśvataḥ sīm	paribhuj rodas viśvatas sīm
1100	sa pāriṣat kratubhiḥ mandasānaḥ	tad pṛ kratu mand
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvant mad bhū indra ūti
1100	na yasya devāḥ devatā na martāḥ	na yad deva devatā na marta
1100	āpaḥ cana śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ	ap cana śavas anta āp
1100	sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmaḥ divaḥ ca	tad prarikvan tvakṣas kṣam div ca
1100	marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī	marutvant mad bhū indra ūti
1100	rohit śyāvā sumadaṁśuḥ lalāmīḥ	rohit śyāva sumat aṃśu lalāma
1100	dyukṣā rāye ṛjarāśvasya	dyukṣa rai ṛjrāśva
1100	vṛṣaṇvantam bibhratī dhūrṣu ratham	vṛṣaṇvat bhṛ dhur ratha
1100	mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu	mandra cit nāhuṣa viś
1100	etat tyat te indra vṛṣṇe uktham	etad tya tvad indra vṛṣan uktha
1100	vārṣāgirāḥ abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ	vārṣāgira abhi gṛ rādhas
1100	ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣTibhiḥ ambarīṣaḥ	ṛjrāśva praṣṭi ambarīṣa
1100	sahadevaḥ bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ	sahadeva bhayamāna surādhas
1100	dasyūn śimyūn ca puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ	dasyu śimyu ca puruhūta eva
1100	hatvā pṛthivyām śarvā ni barhīt	han pṛthivī śaru ni bṛṃh
1100	sanat kṣetram sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ	san kṣetra sakhi śvitnya
1100	sanat sūryam sanat apaḥ suvajraḥ	san sūrya san ap su vajra
1100	viśvāhā indraḥ adhivaktā naḥ astu	viśvāhā indra adhivaktṛ mad as
1100	aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam	aparihvṛta san vāja
1100	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1100	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1101	pra mandine pitumat arcatā vacaḥ	pra mandin pitumat arc vacas
1101	yaḥ kṛṣṇagarbhāḥ nirahan ṛjiśvanā	yad kṛṣṇa garbha nirhan ṛjiśvan
1101	avasyavaḥ vṛṣaṇam vajradakṣiṇam	avasyu vṛṣan vajra dakṣiṇa
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yaḥ vyaṁsam jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā	yad vyaṃsa hṛṣ manyu
1101	yaḥ śambaram yaḥ ahan piprum avratam	yad śambara yad han pipru avrata
1101	indraḥ yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣam ni āvṛṇak	indra yad śuṣṇa aśuṣa ni āvṛj
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṁsyam mahat	yad dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsya mahat
1101	yasya vrate varuṇaḥ yasya sūryaḥ	yad vrata varuṇa yad sūrya
1101	yasya indrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vratam	yad indra sindhu sac vrata
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yaḥ aśvānām yaḥ gavām gopatiḥ vaśī	yad aśva yad go gopati vaśin
1101	yaḥ āritaḥ karmaṇikarmaṇi sthiraḥ	yad ār karman karman sthira
1101	vīLoḥ cit indraḥ yaḥ asunvataḥ vadhaḥ	vīḍu cit indra yad a su vadha
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇataḥ patiḥ	yad viśva jagant prāṇ pati
1101	yaḥ brahmaṇe prathamaḥ gāḥ avindat	yad brahman prathama go vid
1101	indraḥ yaḥ dasyūn adharān avātirat	indra yad dasyu adhara avatṛ
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yaḥ śūrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhīrubhiḥ	yad śūra hvā yad ca bhīru
1101	yaḥ dhāvadbhiḥ hūyate yaḥ ca jigyubhiḥ	yad dhāv hvā yad ca jigyu
1101	indram yam viśvā bhuvanā abhi saṁdadhuḥ	indra yad viśva bhuvana abhi saṃdhā
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	rudrāṇām eti pradiśā vicakṣaṇaḥ	rudra i pradiś vicakṣaṇa
1101	rudrebhiḥ yoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ	rudra yoṣā tan pṛthu jrayas
1101	indram manīṣā abhi arcati śrutam	indra manīṣā abhi arc śru
1101	marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe	marutvant sakhya hvā
1101	yat vā marutvaḥ parame sadhasthe	yat vā marutvat parama sadhastha
1101	yat vā avame vṛjane mādayāse	yat vā avama vṛjana māday
1101	ataḥ ā yāhi adhvaram naḥ acchā	atas ā yā adhvara mad acchā
1101	tvāyā haviḥ cakṛmā satyarādhaḥ	tvāyā havis kṛ satya rādhas
1101	tvāyā indra somam suṣumā sudakṣa	tvāyā indra soma su su dakṣa
1101	tvāyā haviḥ cakṛmā brahmavāhaḥ	tvāyā havis kṛ brahman vāhas
1101	adhā niyutvaḥ sagaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ	adha niyutvat sa gaṇa marut
1101	asmin yajñe barhiṣi mādayasva	idam yajña barhis māday
1101	mādayasva haribhiḥ ye te indra	māday hari yad tvad indra
1101	vi syasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene	vi sā śiprā vi sṛj dhenā
1101	ā tvā suśipra harayaḥ vahantu	ā tvad su śiprā hari vah
1101	uśan havyāni prati naḥ juṣasva	vaś havya prati mad juṣ
1101	marutstotrasya vṛjanasya gopāḥ	marut stotra vṛjana gopā
1101	vayam indreṇa sanuyāma vājam	mad indra san vāja
1101	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1101	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1102	imām te dhiyam pra bhare mahaḥ mahīm	idam tvad dhī pra bhṛ mah mah
1102	asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat te ānaje	idam stotra dhiṣaṇā yat tvad añj
1102	tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim	tad utsava ca prasava ca sāsahi
1102	indram devāsaḥ śavasā amadan anu	indra deva śavas mad anu
1102	asya śravaḥ nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati	idam śravas nadī saptan bhṛ
1102	dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśatam vapuḥ	dyāvākṣam pṛthivī darśata vapus
1102	asme sūryācandramasā abhicakṣe	mad sūryācandramas abhicakṣ
1102	śraddhe kam indra carataḥ vitarturam	śraddhā kaṃ indra car vitarturam
1102	tam smā ratham maghavan pra ava sātaye	tad sma ratha maghavan prāv sāti
1102	jaitram yam te anumadāma saṁgame	jaitra yad tad anumad saṃgama
1102	ājā naḥ indra manasā puruṣTuta	āji mad indra manas puruṣṭuta
1102	tvāyadbhyaḥ maghavan śarma yaccha naḥ	tvāyat maghavan śarman yam mad
1102	vayam jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam	mad ji tvad yuj vṛ
1102	asmākam aṁśam ut avā bharebhare	mad aṃśa ud av bhara bhara
1102	asmabhyam indra varivaḥ sugam kṛdhi	mad indra varivas su ga kṛ
1102	pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja	pra śatru maghavan vṛṣṇya ruj
1102	nānā hi tvā havamānāḥ janāḥ ime	nānā hi tvad hvā jana idam
1102	dhanānām dhartar avasā vipanyavaḥ	dhana dhartṛ avas vipanyu
1102	asmākam smā ratham ā tiṣTha sātaye	mad sma ratha ā sthā sāti
1102	jaitram hi indra nibhṛtam manaḥ tava	jaitra hi indra nibhṛta manas tvad
1102	gojitā bāhū amitakratuḥ simaḥ	go jit bāhu amita kratu sima
1102	karmankarman śatamūtiḥ khajaṁkaraḥ	karman karman śatamūti khajaṃkara
1102	akalpaḥ indraḥ pratimānam ojasā	akalpa indra pratimāna ojas
1102	athā janāḥ vi hvayante siṣāsavaḥ	atha jana vi hvā siṣāsu
1102	ut te śatāt maghavan ut ca bhūyasaḥ	ud tvad śata maghavan ud ca bhūyas
1102	ut sahasrāt ririce kṛṣTiṣu śravaḥ	ud sahasra ric kṛṣṭi śravas
1102	amātram tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahī	amātra tvad dhiṣaṇā tviṣ mah
1102	adhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase puraṁdara	adha vṛtra han puraṃdara
1102	triviṣTidhātu pratimānam ojasaḥ	triviṣṭi dhātu pratimāna ojas
1102	tisraḥ bhūmīḥ nṛpate trīṇi rocanā	tri bhūmi nṛpati tri rocana
1102	ati idam viśvam bhuvanam vavakṣitha	ati idam viśva bhuvana vakṣ
1102	aśatruḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi	a śatru indra janus sanāt as
1102	tvām deveṣu prathamam havāmahe	tvad deva prathama hvā
1102	tvam babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ	tvad bhū pṛtanā sāsahi
1102	sa imam naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam	tad idam mad kāru upamanyu udbhid
1102	indraḥ kṛṇotu prasave ratham puraḥ	indra kṛ prasava ratha puras
1102	tvam jigetha na dhanā rurodhitha	tvad ji na dhana rudh
1102	arbheṣu ājā maghavan mahatsu ca	arbha āji maghavan mahat ca
1102	tvām ugram avase sam śiśīmasi	tvad ugra av sam śā
1102	athā naḥ indra havaneṣu codaya	atha mad indra havana coday
1102	viśvāhā indraḥ adhivaktā naḥ astu	viśvāhā indra adhivaktṛ mad as
1102	aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam	aparihvṛta san vāja
1102	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1102	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1103	tat te indriyam paramam parācaiḥ	tad tvad indriya parama parācais
1103	adhārayanta kavayaḥ purā idam	dhāray kavi purā idam
1103	kṣamā idam anyat divi anyat asya	kṣamā idam anya div anya idam
1103	sam ī pṛcyate samanā iva ketuḥ	sam ī pṛc samanā iva ketu
1103	sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathat ca	tad dhāray pṛthivī prath ca
1103	vajreṇa hatvā niḥ apaḥ sasarja	vajra han niḥ ap sṛj
1103	ahan ahim abhinat rauhiṇam vi	han ahi bhid rauhiṇa vi
1103	ahan vyaṁsam maghavā śacībhiḥ	han vyaṃsa maghavan śacī
1103	sa jātūbharmā śraddadhānaḥ ojaḥ	tad jātūbharman śraddhā ojas
1103	puraḥ vibhindan acarat vi dāsīḥ	pur vibhid car vi dāsa
1103	vidvān vajrin dasyave hetim asya	vid vajrin dasyu heti as
1103	āryam sahaḥ vardhayā dyumnam indra	ārya sahas vardhay dyumna indra
1103	tat ūcuṣe mānuṣā imā yugāni	tad uc mānuṣa idam yuga
1103	kīrtenyam maghavā nāma bibhrat	kīrtenya maghavan nāman bhṛ
1103	upaprayan dasyuhatyāya vajrī	upapre dasyu hatya vajrin
1103	yat ha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe	yat ha sūnu śravas nāman dhā
1103	tat asya idam paśyatā bhūri puṣTam	tad idam idam paś bhūri puṣṭa
1103	śrat indrasya dhattana vīryāya	śrath indra dhā vīrya
1103	sa gāḥ avindat saḥ avindat aśvān	tad go vid tad vid aśva
1103	saḥ oṣadhīḥ saḥ apaḥ sa vanāni	tad oṣadhi tad ap tad vana
1103	bhūrikarmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe	bhūri karman vṛṣabha vṛṣan
1103	satyaśuṣmāya sunavāma somam	satya śuṣma su soma
1103	yaḥ ādṛtyā paripanthī iva śūraḥ	yad ādṛ paripanthin iva śūra
1103	ayajvanaḥ vibhajan eti vedaḥ	ayajvan vibhaj i vedas
1103	tat indra pra iva vīryam cakartha	tad indra pra iva vīrya kṛ
1103	yat sasantam vajreṇa abodhayaḥ ahim	yat sas vajra bodhay ahi
1103	anu tvā patnīḥ hṛṣitam vayaḥ ca	anu tvad patnī hṛṣ vayas ca
1103	viśve devāsaḥ amadan anu tvā	viśva deva mad anu tvad
1103	śuṣṇam piprum kuyavam vṛtram indra	śuṣṇa pipru kuyava vṛtra indra
1103	yadā avadhīḥ vi puraḥ śambarasya	yadā vadh vi pur śambara
1103	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1103	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1104	yoniḥ te indra niṣade akāri	yoni tvad indra niṣad kṛ
1104	tam ā ni sīda svānaḥ na arvā	tad ā ni sad sū na arvan
1104	vimucyā vayaḥ avasāya aśvān	vimuc vayas avasā aśva
1104	doṣā vastoḥ vahīyasaḥ prapitve	doṣā vastu vahīyas prapitva
1104	ā u tye naraḥ indram ūtaye guḥ	ā u tya nṛ indra ūti gā
1104	nū cit tān sadyaḥ adhvanaḥ jagamyāt	nu cit tad sadyas adhvan gam
1104	devāsaḥ manyum dāsasya ścamnan	deva manyu dāsa ścam
1104	te naḥ ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam	tad mad ā vah suvita varṇa
1104	ava tmanā bharate ketavedāḥ	ava tman bhṛ keta vedas
1104	ava tmanā bharate phenam udan	ava tman bhṛ phena udan
1104	kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe	kṣīra snā kuyava yoṣā
1104	hate te syātām pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ	han tad as pravaṇa śiphā
1104	yuyopa nābhiḥ uparasya āyoḥ	yup nābhi upara āyu
1104	pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate rāṣTi śūraḥ	pra pūrva tṛ rāj śūra
1104	añjasī kuliśī vīrapatnī	añjasī kuliśī vīrapatnī
1104	payaḥ hinvānāḥ udabhiḥ bharante	payas hi uda bhṛ
1104	prati yat syā nīthā adarśi dasyoḥ	prati yat tya nīthā dṛś dasyu
1104	okaḥ na acchā sadanam jānatī gāt	oka na acchā sadana jñā gā
1104	adha smā naḥ maghavan carkṛtāt it	adha sma mad maghavan carkar id
1104	mā naḥ maghā iva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ	mā mad magha iva niṣṣapin parā dā
1104	sa tvam naḥ indra sūrye saḥ apsu	tad tvad mad indra sūrya tad ap
1104	anāgāstve ā bhaja jīvaśaṁse	anāgāstva ā bhaj jīva śaṃsa
1104	mā antarām bhujam ā rīriṣaḥ naḥ	mā antara bhuj ā riṣ mad
1104	śraddhitam te mahate indriyāya	śraddhā tvad mahat indriya
1104	adhā manye śrat te asmai adhāyi	adha man śrath tvad idam dhā
1104	vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya	vṛṣan cud mahat dhana
1104	mā naḥ akṛte puruhūta yonau	mā mad a kṛ puruhūta yoni
1104	indra kṣudhyadbhyaḥ vayaḥ āsutim dāḥ	indra kṣudh vayas āsuti dā
1104	mā naḥ vadhīḥ indra mā parā dāḥ	mā mad vadh indra mā parā dā
1104	mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ	mā mad priya bhojana pra muṣ
1104	āṇḍā mā naḥ maghavan śakra niḥ bhet	āṇḍa mā mad maghavan śakra niḥ bhid
1104	mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi	mā mad pātra bhid sahajānuṣa
1104	arvāṅ ā ihi somakāmam tvā āhuḥ	arvāñc e soma kāma tvad ah
1104	ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya	idam suta tad pā mada
1104	uruvyacā jaThare ā vṛṣasva	uruvyañc jaṭhara ā vṛṣ
1104	pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ	pitṛ iva mad śru hvā
 ---
1105	candramāḥ apsu antar ā	candramas ap antar ā
1105	suparṇaḥ dhāvate divi	su parṇa dhāv div
1105	na vaḥ hiraṇyanemayaḥ	na tvad hiraṇya nemi
1105	padam vindanti vidyutaḥ	pada vid vidyut
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	artham it vai u arthinaḥ	artha id vai u arthin
1105	ā jāyā yuvate patim	ā jāyā yu pati
1105	tuñjāte vṛṣṇyam payaḥ	tuj vṛṣṇya payas
1105	paridāya rasam duhe	paridā rasa duh
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	mā u su devāḥ adaḥ svar	mā u su deva adas svar
1105	ava pādi divaḥ pari	ava pad div pari
1105	mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ	mā somya śambhu
1105	śūne bhūma kadā cana	śūna bhū kadācana
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	yajñam pṛcchāmi avamam	yajña pracch avama
1105	sa tat dūtaḥ vi vocati	tad tad dūta vi vac
1105	kva ṛtam pūrvyam gatam	kva ṛta pūrvya gam
1105	kaḥ tat bibharti nūtanaḥ	ka tad bhṛ nūtana
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	amī ye devāḥ sthana	adas yad deva as
1105	triṣu ā rocane divaḥ	tri ā rocana div
1105	kat vaḥ ṛtam kat anṛtam	ka tvad ṛta ka anṛta
1105	kva pratnā vaḥ āhutiḥ	kva pratna tvad āhuti
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	kat vaḥ ṛtasya dharṇasi	ka tvad ṛta dharṇasi
1105	kat varuṇasya cakṣaṇam	ka varuṇa cakṣaṇa
1105	kat aryamṇaḥ mahaḥ pathā	kad aryaman mah pathin
1105	ati krāmema dūḍhyaḥ	ati kram dūḍhī
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	aham saḥ asmi yaḥ purā	mad tad as yad purā
1105	sute vadāmi kāni cit	suta vad kaścit
1105	tam mā vyanti ādhyaḥ	tad mad vī ādhī
1105	vṛkaḥ na tṛṣṇajam mṛgam	vṛka na tṛṣṇaj mṛga
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	sam mā tapanti abhitaḥ	sam mad tap abhitas
1105	sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ	sapatnī iva parśu
1105	mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vi adanti mā ādhyaḥ	mūṣ na śiśna vi ad mad ādhī
1105	stotāram te śatakrato	stotṛ tvad śatakratu
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	amī ye sapta raśmayaḥ	adas yad saptan raśmi
1105	tatrā me nābhiḥ ātatā	tatra mad nābhi ātan
1105	tritaḥ tat veda āptyaḥ	trita tad vid āptya
1105	sa jāmitvāya rebhati	tad jāmi tva ribh
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	amī ye pañca ukṣaṇaḥ	adas yad pañcan ukṣan
1105	madhye tasthuḥ mahaḥ divaḥ	madhya sthā mah div
1105	devatrā nu pravācyam	devatrā nu pravac
1105	sadhrīcīnāḥ ni vāvṛtuḥ	sadhrīcīna ni vṛt
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	suparṇāḥ ete āsate	su parṇa etad ās
1105	madhye ārodhane divaḥ	madhya ārodhana div
1105	te sedhanti pathaḥ vṛkam	tad sidh pathin vṛka
1105	tarantam yahvatīḥ apaḥ	tṛ yahvat ap
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	navyam tat ukthyam hitam	navya tad ukthya hita
1105	devāsaḥ supravācanam	deva su pravācana
1105	ṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ	ṛta ṛṣ sindhu
1105	satyam tātāna sūryaḥ	satya tan sūrya
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	agne tava tyat ukthyam	agni tvad tya ukthya
1105	deveṣu asti āpyam	deva as āpya
1105	sa naḥ sattaḥ manuṣvat ā	tad mad sad manuṣvat ā
1105	devān yakṣi viduṣTaraḥ	deva yaj viduṣṭara
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	sattaḥ hotā manuṣvat ā	sad hotṛ manuṣvat ā
1105	devān acchā viduṣTaraḥ	deva acchā viduṣṭara
1105	agniḥ havyā suṣūdati	agni havya sūd
1105	devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ	deva deva medhira
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇaḥ	brahman kṛ varuṇa
1105	gātuvidam tam īmahe	gātu vid tad ī
1105	vi ūrṇoti hṛdā matim	vi vṛ hṛd mati
1105	navyaḥ jāyatām ṛtam	navyas jan ṛta
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	asau yaḥ panthāḥ ādityaḥ	adas yad pathin āditya
1105	divi pravācyam kṛtaḥ	div pravac kṛ
1105	na sa devāḥ atikrame	na tad deva atikram
1105	tam martāsaḥ na paśyatha	tad marta na paś
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	tritaḥ kūpe avahitaḥ	trita kūpa avadhā
1105	devān havate ūtaye	deva hvā ūti
1105	tat śuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ	tad śru bṛhaspati
1105	kṛṇvan aṁhūraṇāt uru	kṛ aṃhūraṇa uru
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	aruṇaḥ mā sakṛt vṛkaḥ	aruṇa mad sakṛt vṛka
1105	pathā yantam dadarśa hi	pathin i dṛś hi
1105	ut jihīte nicāyyā	ud hā nicāy
1105	taṣTā iva pṛṣTyāmayī	taṣṭṛ iva pṛṣṭi āmayin
1105	vittam me asya rodasī	vid mad idam rodas
1105	enā āṅgūṣeṇa vayam indravantaḥ	idam āṅgūṣa mad indravat
1105	abhi syāma vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ	abhi as vṛjana sarva vīra
1105	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1105	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1106	indram mitram varuṇam agnim ūtaye	indra mitra varuṇa agni ūti
1106	mārutam śardhaḥ aditim havāmahe	māruta śardhas aditi hvā
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	te ādityāḥ ā gatā sarvatātaye	tad āditya ā gam sarvatāti
1106	bhūta devāḥ vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ	bhū deva vṛtratūrya śambhu
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanāḥ	av mad pitṛ su pravācana
1106	uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā	uta devī deva putra ṛtāvṛdh
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	narāśaṁsam vājinam vājayan iha	narāśaṃsa vājin vājay iha
1106	kṣayadvīram pūṣaṇam sumnaiḥ īmahe	kṣi vīra pūṣan sumna ī
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	bṛhaspate sadam it naḥ sugam kṛdhi	bṛhaspati sadam id mad suga kṛ
1106	śam yoḥ yat te manurhitam tat īmahe	śam yos yad tvad manus hita tad ī
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	indram kutsaḥ vṛtrahaṇam śacīpatim	indra kutsa vṛtrahan śacīpati
1106	kāTe nibāLhaḥ ṛṣiḥ ahvat ūtaye	kāṭa nibāḍha ṛṣi hvā ūti
1106	ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	ratha na durga vasu sudānu
1106	viśvasmāt naḥ aṁhasaḥ niḥ pipartana	viśva mad aṃhas niḥ pṛ
1106	devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu	deva mad devī aditi ni pā
1106	devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayucchan	deva trā trā aprayucchat
1106	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1106	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1107	yajñaḥ devānām prati eti sumnam	yajña deva prati i sumna
1107	ādityāsaḥ bhavatā mṛLayantaḥ	āditya bhū mṛḍay
1107	ā vaḥ arvācī sumatiḥ vavṛtyāt	ā tvad arvāñc sumati vṛt
1107	aṁhoḥ cit yā varivovittarā asat	aṃhu cit yad varivas vittara as
1107	upa naḥ devāḥ avasā ā gamantu	upa mad deva avas gam
1107	aṅgirasām sāmabhiḥ stūyamānāḥ	aṅgiras sāman stu
1107	indraḥ indriyaiḥ marutaḥ marudbhiḥ	indra indriya marut marut
1107	ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yaṁsat	āditya mad aditi śarman yam
1107	tat naḥ indraḥ tat varuṇaḥ tat agniḥ	tad mad indra tad varuṇa tad agni
1107	tat aryamā tat savitā canaḥ dhāt	tad aryaman tad savitṛ canas dhā
1107	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1107	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1108	yaḥ indrāgnī citratamaḥ rathaḥ vām	yad indra agni citratama ratha tvad
1108	abhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣTe	abhi viśva bhuvana cakṣ
1108	tena ā yātam saratham tasthivāṁsā	tad ā yā sa ratha sthā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yāvat idam bhuvanam viśvam asti	yāvat idam bhuvana viśva as
1108	uruvyacā varimatā gabhīram	uruvyañc varimant gabhīra
1108	tāvān ayam pātave somaḥ astu	tāvat idam pā soma as
1108	aram indrāgnī manase yuvabhyām	aram indra agni manas yuvan
1108	cakrāthe hi sadhryak nāma bhadram	kṛ hi sadhryañc nāman bhadra
1108	sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇau uta sthaḥ	sadhrīcīna vṛtra han uta as
1108	tau indrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā	tad indra agni sadhryañc niṣad
1108	vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā ā vṛṣethām	vṛṣan soma vṛṣan vṛṣ
1108	samiddheṣu agniṣu ānajānā	samindh agni añj
1108	yatasrucā barhiḥ u tistirāṇā	yam sruc barhis u stṛ
1108	tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhiḥ arvāk	tīvra soma pariṣic arvāk
1108	ā indrāgnī saumanasāya yātam	ā indra agni saumanasa yā
1108	yāni indrāgnī cakrathuḥ vīryāṇi	yad indra agni kṛ vīrya
1108	yāni rūpāṇi uta vṛṣṇyāni	yad rūpa uta vṛṣṇya
1108	yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni	yad tvad pratna sakhya śiva
1108	tebhiḥ somasya pibatam sutasya	tad soma pā su
1108	yat abravam prathamam vām vṛṇānaḥ	yad brū prathama tvad vṛ
1108	ayam somaḥ asuraiḥ naḥ vihavyaḥ	idam soma asura mad vihvā
1108	tām satyām śraddhām abhi ā hi yātam	tad satya śraddhā abhi ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe	yat indra agni mad sva duroṇa
1108	yat brahmaṇi rājani vā yajatrā	yat brahman rājan vā yajatra
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu	yat indra agni yadu turvaśa
1108	yat druhyuṣu anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ	yat druhyu anu pūru as
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī avamasyām pṛthivyām	yat indra agni avama pṛthivī
1108	madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ	madhyama parama uta as
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī paramasyām pṛthivyām	yat indra agni parama pṛthivī
1108	madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ	madhyama avama uta as
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī divi sthaḥ yat pṛthivyām	yad indra agni div as yat pṛthivī
1108	yat parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu	yat parvata oṣadhī ap
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	yat indrāgnī uditā sūryasya	yat indra agni uditi sūrya
1108	madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe	madhya div svadhā māday
1108	ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam	atas pari vṛṣan ā hi yā
1108	athā somasya pibatam sutasya	atha soma pā su
1108	eva indrāgnī papivāṁsā sutasya	eva indra agni pā suta
1108	viśvā asmabhyam sam jayatam dhanāni	viśva mad sam ji dhana
1108	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1108	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1109	vi hi akhyam manasā vasyaḥ icchan	vi hi khyā manas vasyas iṣ
1109	indrāgnī jñāsaḥ uta vā sajātān	indra agni jñās uta vā sajāta
1109	na anyā yuvat pramatiḥ asti mahyam	na anya tvad pramati as mad
1109	sa vām dhiyam vājayantīm atakṣam	tad tvad dhī vājay takṣ
1109	aśravam hi bhūridāvattarā vām	śru hi bhūri dāvattara tvad
1109	vijāmātuḥ uta vā ghā syālāt	vijāmātṛ uta vā gha syāla
1109	athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām	atha soma prayati tvad
1109	indrāgnī stomam janayāmi navyam	indra agni stoma janay navya
1109	mā chedma raśmīn iti nādhamānāḥ	mā chid raśmi iti nādh
1109	pitṛṛṇām śaktīḥ anuyacchamānāḥ	pitṛ śakti anuyam
1109	indrāgnibhyām kam vṛṣaṇaḥ madanti	indra agni kaṃ vṛṣan mad
1109	tā hi adrī dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthe	tad hi adri dhiṣaṇā upastha
1109	yuvābhyām devī dhiṣaṇā madāya	tvad devī dhiṣaṇā mada
1109	indrāgnī somam uśatī sunoti	indra agni soma vaś su
1109	tau aśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī	tad aśvin bhadra hasta su pāṇi
1109	ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu	ā dhāv madhu pṛc ap
1109	yuvām indrāgnī vasunaḥ vibhāge	tvad indra agni vasu vibhāga
1109	tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye	tavastama śru vṛtra hatya
1109	tau āsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin	tad āsad barhis yajña idam
1109	pra carṣaṇī mādayethām sutasya	pra carṣaṇi māday su
1109	pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu	pra carṣaṇi pṛtanā āhava
1109	pra pṛthivyāḥ riricāthe divaḥ ca	pra pṛthivī ric div ca
1109	pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyaḥ mahitvā	pra sindhu pra giri mahitva
1109	pra indrāgnī viśvā bhuvanā ati anyā	pra indra agni viśva bhuvana ati anya
1109	ā bharatam śikṣatam vajrabāhū	ā bhṛ śikṣ vajra bāhu
1109	asmān indrāgnī avatam śacībhiḥ	mad indra agni av śacī
1109	ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya	idam nu tad raśmi sūrya
1109	yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaraḥ naḥ āsan	yad sapitva pitṛ mad as
1109	puraṁdarā śikṣatam vajrahastā	puraṃdara śikṣ vajra hasta
1109	asmān indrāgnī avatam bhareṣu	mad indra agni av bhara
1109	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1109	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1110	tatam me apaḥ tat u tāyate punar	tan mad apas tad u tan punar
1110	svādiṣThā dhītiḥ ucathāya śasyate	svādiṣṭha dhīti ucatha śaṃs
1110	ayam samudraḥ iha viśvadevyaḥ	idam samudra iha viśvadevya
1110	svāhākṛtasya sam u tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ	svāhākṛta sam u tṛp ṛbhu
1110	ābhogayam pra yat icchantaḥ aitana	ābhogaya pra yat iṣ i
1110	apākāḥ prāñcaḥ mama ke cit āpayaḥ	apāka prāñc mad kaścit āpi
1110	saudhanvanāsaḥ caritasya bhūmanā	saudhanvana carita bhūman
1110	agacchata savituḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛham	gam savitṛ dāś gṛha
1110	tat savitā vaḥ amṛtatvam ā asuvat	tad savitṛ tvad amṛta tva āsu
1110	agohyam yat śravayantaḥ aitana	agohya yat śravay i
1110	tyam cit camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam	tya cit camasa asura bhakṣaṇa
1110	ekam santam akṛṇutā caturvayam	eka as kṛ caturvaya
1110	viṣTvī śamī taraṇitvena vāghataḥ	viṣ śamī taraṇi tva vāghant
1110	martāsaḥ santaḥ amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ	marta as amṛta tva aś
1110	saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ	saudhanvana ṛbhu sūra cakṣas
1110	saṁvatsare sam apṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ	saṃvatsara sam pṛc dhīti
1110	kṣetram iva vi mamuḥ tejanena	kṣetra iva vi mā tejana
1110	ekam pātram ṛbhavaḥ jehamānam	eka pātra ṛbhu jeh
1110	upastutāḥ upamam nādhamānāḥ	upastu upama nādh
1110	amartyeṣu śravaḥ icchamānāḥ	amartya śravas iṣ
1110	ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ	ā manīṣā antarikṣa nṛ
1110	srucā iva ghṛtam juhavāma vidmanā	sruc iva ghṛta hu vidman
1110	taraṇitvā ye pituḥ asya saścire	taraṇi tva yad pitṛ idam sac
1110	ṛbhavaḥ vājam aruhan divaḥ rajaḥ	ṛbhu vāja ruh div rajas
1110	ṛbhuḥ naḥ indraḥ śavasā navīyān	ṛbhu mad indra śavas navīyas
1110	ṛbhuḥ vājebhiḥ vasubhiḥ vasuḥ dadiḥ	ṛbhu vāja vasu vasu dadi
1110	yuṣmākam devāḥ avasā ahani priye	tvad deva avas ahar priya
1110	abhi tiṣThema pṛtsutīḥ asunvatām	abhi sthā pṛtsuti a su
1110	niḥ carmaṇaḥ ṛbhavaḥ gām apiṁśata	niḥ carman ṛbhu go piś
1110	sam vatsena asṛjatā mātaram punar	sam vatsa sṛj mātṛ punar
1110	saudhanvanāsaḥ svapasyayā naraḥ	saudhanvana su apasyā nṛ
1110	jivrī yuvānā pitarā akṛṇotana	jivri yuvan pitṛ kṛ
1110	vājebhiḥ naḥ vājasātau aviḍḍhi	vāja mad vājasāti av
1110	ṛbhumān indra citram ā darṣi rādhaḥ	ṛbhumat indra citra ā dṛ rādhas
1110	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1110	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1111	takṣan ratham suvṛtam vidmanāpasaḥ	takṣ ratha suvṛt vidman apas
1111	takṣan harī indravāhā vṛṣaṇvasū	takṣ hari indra vāha vṛṣaṇvasu
1111	takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavaḥ yuvat vayaḥ	takṣ pitṛ ṛbhu yuvat vayas
1111	takṣan vatsāya mātaram sacābhuvam	takṣ vatsa mātṛ sacābhū
1111	ā naḥ yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumat vayaḥ	ā mad yajña takṣ ṛbhumat vayas
1111	kratve dakṣāya suprajāvatīm iṣam	kratu dakṣa su prajāvat iṣ
1111	yathā kṣayāma sarvavīrayā viśā	yathā kṣi sarva vīra viś
1111	tat naḥ śardhāya dhāsathā su indriyam	tad mad śardha dhā su indriya
1111	ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ	ā takṣ sāti mad ṛbhu
1111	sātim rathāya sātim arvate naraḥ	sāti ratha sāti arvant nṛ
1111	sātim naḥ jaitrīm sam maheta viśvahā	sāti mad jaitra sam mah viśvahā
1111	jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim	jāmi ajāmi pṛtanā sakṣaṇi
1111	ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huve ūtayaḥ	ṛbhukṣan indra ā hvā ūti
1111	ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ somapītaye	ṛbhu vāja marut soma pīti
1111	ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā	ubh mitrāvaruṇa nūnam aśvin
1111	te naḥ hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe	tad mad hi sāti dhī ji
1111	ṛbhuḥ bharāya sam śiśātu sātim	ṛbhu bhara sam śā sāti
1111	samaryajit vājaḥ asmān aviṣTu	samarya jit vāja mad av
1111	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1111	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1112	īLe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvacittaye	īḍ dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva citti
1112	agnim gharmam surucam yāman iṣTaye	agni gharma su ruc yāman iṣṭi
1112	yābhiḥ bhare kāram aṁśāya jinvathaḥ	yad bhara kāra aṃśa jinv
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yuvoḥ dānāya subharāḥ asaścataḥ	tvad dāna subhara asaścat
1112	ratham ā tasthuḥ vacasam na mantave	ratha ā sthā vacasa na mantu
1112	yābhiḥ dhiyaḥ avathaḥ karman iṣTaye	yad dhī av karman iṣṭi
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yuvam tāsām divyasya praśāsane	tvad tad divya praśāsana
1112	viśām kṣayathaḥ amṛtasya majmanā	viś kṣi amṛta majman
1112	yābhiḥ dhenum asvam pinvathaḥ narā	yad dhenu a sū pinv nara
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā	yad parijman tanaya majman
1112	dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇiḥ vibhūṣati	dvimātṛ tur taraṇi vibhūṣ
1112	yābhiḥ trimantuḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ	yad trimantu bhū vicakṣaṇa
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ rebham nivṛtam sitam adbhyaḥ	yad rebha nivṛ sā ap
1112	ut vandanam airayatam svar dṛśe	ud vandana īray svar dṛś
1112	yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvatam	yad kaṇva pra siṣās av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ antakam jasamānam āraṇe	yad antaka jas āraṇa
1112	bhujyum yābhiḥ avyathibhiḥ jijinvathuḥ	bhujyu yad avyathi jinv
1112	yābhiḥ karkandhum vayyam ca jinvathaḥ	yad karkandhu vayya ca jinv
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ śucantim dhanasām suṣaṁsadam	yad śucanti dhanasā suṣaṃsad
1112	taptam gharmam omyāvantam atraye	tap gharma omyāvat atri
1112	yābhiḥ pṛśnigum purukutsam āvatam	yad pṛśnigu purukutsa av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ śacībhiḥ vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam	yad śacī vṛṣan parāvṛj
1112	pra andham śroṇam cakṣase etave kṛthaḥ	pra andha śroṇa cakṣas i kṛ
1112	yābhiḥ vartikām grasitām amuñcatam	yad vartikā gras muc
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścatam	yad sindhu madhumat asaścat
1112	vasiṣTham yābhiḥ ajarau ajinvatam	vasiṣṭha yad ajara jinv
1112	yābhiḥ kutsam śrutaryam naryam āvatam	yad kutsa śrutarya narya av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ viśpalām dhanasām atharvyam	yad viśpalā dhanasā atharvī
1112	sahasramīLhe ājau ajinvatam	sahasra mīḍha āji jinv
1112	yābhiḥ vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvatam	yad vaśa aśvya preṇi av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije	yad sudānu auśija vaṇij
1112	dīrghaśravase madhu kośaḥ akṣarat	dīrghaśravas madhu kośa kṣar
1112	kakṣīvantam stotāram yābhiḥ āvatam	kakṣīvant stotṛ yad av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ rasām kṣodasā udnaḥ pipinvathuḥ	yad rasā kṣodas udan pinv
1112	anaśvam yābhiḥ ratham āvatam jiṣe	an aśva yad ratha av ji
1112	yābhiḥ triśokaḥ usriyāḥ udājata	yad triśoka usriyā udaj
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati	yad sūrya pariyā parāvat
1112	mandhātāram kṣaitrapatyeṣu āvatam	mandhātṛ kṣaitrapatya av
1112	yābhiḥ vipram pra bharadvājam āvatam	yad vipra pra bharadvāja av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ mahām atithigvam kaśojuvam	yad mahat atithigva kaśojū
1112	divodāsam śambarahatye āvatam	divodāsa śambara hatya av
1112	yābhiḥ pūrbhidye trasadasyum āvatam	yad pur bhidya trasadasyu av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ vamram vipipānam upastutam	yad vamra vipā upastuta
1112	kalim yābhiḥ vittajānim duvasyathaḥ	kali yad vid jānī duvasy
1112	yābhiḥ vyaśvam uta pṛthim āvatam	yad vyaśva uta pṛthi av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ narā śayave yābhiḥ atraye	yad nṛ śayu yad atri
1112	yābhiḥ purā manave gātum īṣathuḥ	yad purā manu gātu iṣ
1112	yābhiḥ śārīḥ ājatam syūmaraśmaye	yad śārī aj syūmaraśmi
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ paTharvā jaTharasya majmanā	yad paṭharvan jaṭhara majman
1112	agniḥ na adīdet citaḥ iddhaḥ ajman ā	agni na dīdī ci indh ajman ā
1112	yābhiḥ śaryātam avathaḥ mahādhane	yad śaryāta av mahat dhana
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ aṅgiraḥ manasā niraṇyathaḥ	yad aṅgiras manas niran
1112	agram gacchathaḥ vivare goarṇasaḥ	agra gam vivara go arṇas
1112	yābhiḥ manum śūram iṣā samāvatam	yad manu śūra iṣ samav
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ patnīḥ vimadāya nyūhathuḥ	yad patnī vimada nivah
1112	ā gha vā yābhiḥ aruṇīḥ aśikṣatam	ā gha vā yad aruṇī śikṣ
1112	yābhiḥ sudāse ūhathuḥ sudevyam	yad sudās vah su devya
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ śaṁtātī bhavathaḥ dadāśuṣe	yad śaṃtāti bhū dāś
1112	bhujyum yābhiḥ avathaḥ yābhiḥ adhrigum	bhujyu yad av yad adhrigu
1112	omyāvatīm subharām ṛtastubham	omyāvat subhara ṛta stubh
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyathaḥ	yad kṛśānu asana duvasy
1112	jave yābhiḥ yūnaḥ arvantam āvatam	java yad yuvan arvant av
1112	madhu priyam bharathaḥ yat saraḍbhyaḥ	madhu priya bhṛ yat saraḍ
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ naram goṣuyudham nṛṣāhye	yad nara goṣuyudh nṛṣāhya
1112	kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ	kṣetra sāti tanaya jinv
1112	yābhiḥ rathān avathaḥ yābhiḥ arvataḥ	yad ratha av yad arvant
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyam śatakratū	yad kutsa ārjuneya śata kratu
1112	pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam	pra turvīti pra ca dabhīti av
1112	yābhiḥ dhvasantim puruṣantim āvatam	yad dhvasanti puruṣanti av
1112	tābhiḥ ū su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā ā gatam	tad u su ūti aśvin gam
1112	apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme	apnasvat aśvin vāc mad
1112	kṛtam naḥ dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām	kṛ mad dasra vṛṣan manīṣā
1112	adyūtye avase ni hvaye vām	a dyūtya av ni hvā tvad
1112	vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau	vṛdh ca mad bhū vājasāti
1112	dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān	div aktu pari pā mad
1112	ariṣTebhiḥ aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ	ariṣṭa aśvin saubhaga
1112	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
1112	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
1113	idam śreṣTham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ ā agāt	idam śreṣṭha jyotis jyotis āgā
1113	citraḥ praketaḥ ajaniṣTa vibhvā	citra praketa jan vibhvan
1113	yathā prasūtā savituḥ savāya	yathā prasūti savitṛ eva
1113	evā rātrī uṣase yonim āraik	eva rātri uṣas yoni ric
1113	ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyā ā agāt	ruśat vatsa ruśat śvetya āgā
1113	āraik u kṛṣṇā sadanāni asyāḥ	ric u kṛṣṇa sadana idam
1113	samānabandhū amṛte anūcī	samāna bandhu amṛta anvañc
1113	dyāvā varṇam carataḥ āmināne	div varṇa car āmī
1113	samānaḥ adhvā svasroḥ anantaḥ	samāna adhvan svasṛ ananta
1113	tam anyānyā carataḥ devaśiṣTe	tad anya anya car deva śās
1113	na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke	na mith na sthā sumeka
1113	naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe	naktoṣāsā samanas virūpa
1113	bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām	bhāsvat netṛ sūnṛtā
1113	aceti citrā vi duraḥ naḥ āvar	cit citra vi dvār mad vṛ
1113	prārpyā jagat vi u naḥ rāyaḥ akhyat	prārpay jagant vi u mad rai khyā
1113	uṣāḥ ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā	uṣas jāgṛ bhuvana viśva
1113	jihmaśye caritave maghonī	jihmaśī car maghavan
1113	ābhogaye iṣTaye rāye u tvam	ābhogi iṣṭi rai u tva
1113	dabhram paśyadbhyaḥ urviyā vicakṣe	dabhra dṛś urviyā vicakṣ
1113	uṣāḥ ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā	uṣas jāgṛ bhuvana viśva
1113	kṣatrāya tvam śravase tvam mahīyai	kṣatra tva śravas tva mahīy
1113	iṣTaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai	iṣṭi tva artha iva tva i
1113	visadṛśā jīvitā abhipracakṣe	visadṛśa jīvita abhipracakṣ
1113	uṣāḥ ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā	uṣas jāgṛ bhuvana viśva
1113	eṣā divaḥ duhitā prati adarśi	etad div duhitṛ prati dṛś
1113	vyucchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ	vivas yuvati śukra vāsas
1113	viśvasya īśānā pārthivasya vasvaḥ	viśva īś pārthiva vasu
1113	uṣaḥ adya iha subhage vi uccha	uṣas adya iha subhaga vi vas
1113	parāyatīnām anu eti pāthaḥ	pare anu i pāthas
1113	āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām	e prathama śaśvat
1113	vyucchantī jīvam udīrayanti	vivas jīva udīray
1113	uṣāḥ mṛtam kam cana bodhayantī	uṣas mṛ ka cana bodhay
1113	uṣaḥ yat agnim samidhe cakartha	uṣas yat agni samindh kṛ
1113	vi yat āvaḥ cakṣasā sūryasya	vi yat vas cakṣas sūrya
1113	yat mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇān ajīgar	yat mānuṣa yaj jāgṛ
1113	tat deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ	tad deva kṛ bhadra apnas
1113	kiyāti ā yat samayā bhavāti	kiyat ā yat samayā bhū
1113	yāḥ vyūṣuḥ yāḥ ca nūnam vyucchān	yad vivas yad ca nūnam vivas
1113	anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā	anu pūrva kṛp vaś
1113	pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhiḥ eti	pradhī joṣa anya i
1113	īyuḥ te ye pūrvatarām apaśyan	i tad yad pūrvatara paś
1113	vyucchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ	vivas uṣas martya
1113	asmābhiḥ ū nu praticakṣyā abhūt	mad u nu praticakṣ bhū
1113	ā u te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān	ā u tad i yad aparī paś
1113	yāvayaddveṣāḥ ṛtapāḥ ṛtejāḥ	yāvay dveṣas ṛta pā ṛtejā
1113	sumnāvarī sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī	sumnāvarī sūnṛta īray
1113	sumaṅgalīḥ bibhratī devavītim	su maṅgala bhṛ deva vīti
1113	iha adya uṣaḥ śreṣThatamā vi uccha	iha adya uṣas śreṣṭhatama vi vas
1113	śaśvat purā uṣāḥ vi uvāsa devī	śaśvat purā uṣas vi vas devī
1113	atha u adya idam vi āvar maghonī	atho adya idam vi vas maghavan
1113	atha u vi ucchāt uttarān anu dyūn	atho vi vas uttara anu div
1113	ajarā amṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ	ajara amṛta car svadhā
1113	vi añjibhiḥ divaḥ ātāsu adyaut	vi añji div ātā dyut
1113	apa kṛṣṇām nirṇijam devī āvar	apa kṛṣṇa nirṇij devī vṛ
1113	prabodhayantī aruṇebhiḥ aśvaiḥ	prabodhay aruṇa aśva
