1140	rathāya nāvam uta naḥ gṛhāya	ratha nau uta mad gṛha
1140	nityāritrām padvatīm rāsi agne	nitya aritra padvat rā agni
1140	asmākam vīrān uta naḥ maghonaḥ	mad vīra uta mad maghavan
1140	janān ca yā pārayāt śarma yā ca	jana ca yad pāray śarman yad ca
1140	abhī naḥ agne uktham it juguryāḥ	abhi mad agni uktha id gur
1140	dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaḥ ca svagūrtāḥ	dyāvākṣam sindhu ca sva gur
1140	gavyam yavyam yantaḥ dīrghā ahā	gavya yavya i dīrgha aha
1140	iṣam varam aruṇyaḥ varanta	iṣ vara aruṇī vṛ
 ---
1141	baT itthā tat vapuṣe dhāyi darśatam	baṭ itthā tad vapus dhā darśata
1141	devasya bhargaḥ sahasaḥ yataḥ jani	deva bhargas sahas yatas jan
1141	yat īm upa hvarate sādhate matiḥ	yat īṃ upa hvṛ sādh mati
1141	ṛtasya dhenāḥ anayanta sasrutaḥ	ṛta dhenā nī sasrut
1141	pṛkṣaḥ vapuḥ pitumān nityaḥ ā śaye	pṛkṣa vapus pitumat nitya ā śī
1141	dvitīyam ā saptaśivāsu mātṛṣu	dvitīya ā saptan śiva mātṛ
1141	tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase	tṛtīya idam vṛṣabha duh
1141	daśapramatim janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ	daśan pramati janay yoṣan
1141	niḥ yat īm budhnāt mahiṣasya varpasaḥ	niḥ yat īṃ budhna mahiṣa varpas
1141	īśānāsaḥ śavasā kranta sūrayaḥ	īś śavas sūri
1141	yat īm anu pradivaḥ madhvaḥ ādhave	yat īṃ anu pradiv madhu ādhava
1141	guhā santam mātariśvā mathāyati	guhā as mātariśvan mathāy
1141	pra yat pituḥ paramāt nīyate pari	pra yat pitṛ parama nī pari
1141	ā pṛkṣudhaḥ vīrudhaḥ daṁsu rohati	ā pṛkṣudh vīrudh daṃsu ruh
1141	ubhā yat asya januṣam yat invataḥ	ubh yat idam janus yat inv
1141	āt it yaviṣThaḥ abhavat ghṛṇā śuciḥ	āt id yaviṣṭha bhū ghṛṇā śuci
1141	āt it mātṛṛḥ ā aviśat yāsu ā śuciḥ	āt id mātṛ āviś yad ā śuci
1141	ahiṁsyamānaḥ urviyā vi vāvṛdhe	a hiṃs urviyā vi vṛdh
1141	anu yat pūrvāḥ aruhat sanājuvaḥ	anu yat pūrva ruh tad na jū
1141	ni navyasīṣu avarāsu dhāvate	ni navyas avara dhāv
1141	āt it hotāram vṛṇate diviṣTiṣu	āt id hotṛ vṛ diviṣṭi
1141	bhagam iva papṛcānāsaḥ ṛñjate	bhaga iva pṛc ṛj
1141	devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣTutaḥ	deva yat kratu majman puruṣṭuta
1141	martam śaṁsam viśvadhā veti dhāyase	marta śaṃsa viśvadhā vī dhāyas
1141	vi yat asthāt yajataḥ vātacoditaḥ	vi yat sthā yajata vāta coday
1141	hvāraḥ na vakvā jaraṇāḥ anākṛtaḥ	hvāra na vakvan jaraṇa an ākṛ
1141	tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṁhasaḥ	tad patman kṛṣṇa jaṃhas
1141	śucijanmanaḥ rajaḥ ā vyadhvanaḥ	śuci janman rajas ā vyadhvan
1141	rathaḥ na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛtaḥ	ratha na yā śikvan kṛ
1141	dyām aṅgebhiḥ aruṣebhiḥ īyate	div aṅga aruṣa i
1141	āt asya te kṛṣṇāsaḥ dakṣi sūrayaḥ	āt idam tad kṛṣṇa sūri
1141	śūrasya iva tveṣathāt īṣate vayaḥ	śūra iva tveṣatha īṣ vayas
1141	tvayā hi agne varuṇaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ	tvad hi agni varuṇa dhṛ vrata
1141	mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ	mitra śad aryaman sudānu
1141	yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhuḥ	yat sīm anu kratu viśvathā vibhu
1141	arān na nemiḥ paribhūḥ ajāyathāḥ	ara na nemi paribhū jan
1141	tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate	tvad agni śam su
1141	ratnam yaviṣTha devatātim invasi	ratna yaviṣṭha devatāti inv
1141	tam tvā nu navyam sahasaḥ yuvan vayam	tad tvad nu navya sahas yuvan mad
1141	bhagam na kāre mahiratna dhīmahi	bhaga na kāra mahi ratna dhā
1141	asme rayim na svartham damūnasam	mad rayi na su artha damūnas
1141	bhagam dakṣam na papṛcāsi dharṇasim	bhaga dakṣa na pṛc dharṇasi
1141	raśmīn iva yaḥ yamati janmanī ubhe	raśmi iva yad yam janman ubh
1141	devānām śaṁsam ṛte ā ca sukratuḥ	deva śaṃsa ṛta ā ca su kratu
1141	uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvaḥ	uta mad sudyotman jīra aśva
1141	hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavat candrarathaḥ	hotṛ mandra śru candra ratha
1141	sa naḥ neṣat neṣatamaiḥ amūraḥ	tad mad nī neṣatama amūra
1141	agniḥ vāmam suvitam vasyaḥ accha	agni vāma suvita vasyas acchā
1141	astāvi agniḥ śimīvadbhiḥ arkaiḥ	stu agni śimīvat arka
1141	sāmrājyāya prataram dadhānaḥ	sāmrājya prataram dhā
1141	amī ca ye maghavānaḥ vayam ca	adas ca yad maghavan mad ca
1141	miham na sūraḥ ati niḥ tatanyuḥ	mih na sūra ati niḥ tan
 ---
1142	samiddhaḥ agne ā vaha	samindh agni ā vah
1142	devān adya yatasruce	deva adya yam sruc
1142	tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam	tantu tan pūrvya
1142	sutasomāya dāśuṣe	su soma dāś
1142	ghṛtavantam upa māsi	ghṛtavat upa mā
1142	madhumantam tanūnapāt	madhumat tanūnapāt
1142	yajñam viprasya māvataḥ	yajña vipra māvat
1142	śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ	śam dāś
1142	śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ	śuci pāvaka adbhuta
1142	madhvā yajñam mimikṣati	madhu yajña mikṣ
1142	narāśaṁsaḥ triḥ ā divaḥ	narāśaṃsa tris ā div
1142	devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ	deva deva yajñiya
1142	īLitaḥ agne ā vaha	īḍ agni ā vah
1142	indram citram iha priyam	indra citra iha priya
1142	iyam hi tvā matiḥ mama	idam hi tvad mati mad
1142	acchā sujihva vacyate	acchā su jihvā vañc
1142	stṛṇānāsaḥ yatasrucaḥ	stṛ yam sruc
1142	barhiḥ yajñe svadhvare	barhis yajña su adhvara
1142	vṛñje devavyacastamam	vṛj deva vyacastama
1142	indrāya śarma saprathaḥ	indra śarman saprathas
1142	vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	vi śri ṛtāvṛdh
1142	prayai devebhyaḥ mahīḥ	prayā deva mahi
1142	pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛhaḥ	pāvaka puruspṛh
1142	dvāraḥ devīḥ asaścataḥ	dvār deva asaścat
1142	ā bhandamāne upāke	ā bhand upāka
1142	naktoṣāsā supeśasā	naktoṣāsā supeśas
1142	yahvī ṛtasya mātarā	yahvī ṛta mātṛ
1142	sīdatām barhiḥ ā sumat	sad barhis ā sumat
1142	mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī	mandra jihvā jugurvaṇi
1142	hotārā daivyā kavī	hotṛ daivya kavi
1142	yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam	yajña mad yaj idam
1142	sidhram adya divispṛśam	sidhra adya divispṛś
1142	śuciḥ deveṣu arpitā	śuci deva arpay
1142	hotrā marutsu bhāratī	hotrā marut bhāratī
1142	iLā sarasvatī mahī	iḍā sarasvatī mah
1142	barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ	barhis sad yajñiya
1142	tat naḥ turīpam adbhutam	tad mad turīpa adbhuta
1142	puru vāram puru tmanā	puru vāra puru tman
1142	tvaṣTā poṣāya vi syatu	tvaṣṭṛ poṣa vi sā
1142	rāye nābhā naḥ asmayuḥ	rai nābhi mad asmayu
1142	avasṛjan upa tmanā	avasṛj upa tman
1142	devān yakṣi vanaspate	deva yaj vanaspati
1142	agniḥ havyā suṣūdati	agni havya sūd
1142	devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ	deva deva medhira
1142	pūṣaṇvate marutvate	pūṣaṇvat marutvat
1142	viśvadevāya vāyave	viśva deva vāyu
1142	svāhā gāyatravepase	svāhā gāyatra vepas
1142	havyam indrāya kartana	havya indra kṛ
1142	svāhākṛtāni ā gahi	svāhākṛta ā gam
1142	upa havyāni vītaye	upa havya vīti
1142	indra ā gahi śrudhī havam	indra ā gam śru hava
1142	tvām havante adhvare	tvad hvā adhvara
 ---
1143	pra tavyasīm navyasīm dhītim agnaye	pra tavyas navyas dhīti agni
1143	vācaḥ matim sahasaḥ sūnave bhare	vāc mati sahas sūnu bhṛ
1143	apām napāt yaḥ vasubhiḥ saha priyaḥ	ap napāt yad vasu saha priya
1143	hotā pṛthivyām ni asīdat ṛtviyaḥ	hotṛ pṛthivī ni sad ṛtviya
1143	sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani	tad jan parama vyoman
1143	āviḥ agniḥ abhavat mātariśvane	āvis agni bhū mātariśvan
1143	asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā	idam kratu samindh majman
1143	pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat	pra div śocis pṛthivī rocay
1143	asya tveṣāḥ ajarāḥ asya bhānavaḥ	idam tveṣa ajara idam bhānu
1143	susaṁdṛśaḥ supratīkasya sudyutaḥ	su saṃdṛś su pratīka su dyut
1143	bhātvakṣasaḥ ati aktuḥ na sindhavaḥ	bhā tvakṣas ati aktu na sindhu
1143	agneḥ rejante asasantaḥ ajarāḥ	agni rej a sas ajara
1143	yam erire bhṛgavaḥ viśvavedasam	yad er bhṛgu viśva vedas
1143	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ bhuvanasya majmanā	nābhi pṛthivī bhuvana majman
1143	agnim tam gīrbhiḥ hinuhi sve ā dame	agni tad gir hi sva ā dama
1143	yaḥ ekaḥ vasvaḥ varuṇaḥ na rājati	yad eka vasu varuṇa na rāj
1143	na yaḥ varāya marutām iva svanaḥ	na yad vara marut iva svana
1143	senā iva sṛṣTā divyā yathā aśaniḥ	senā iva sṛj divya yathā aśani
1143	agniḥ jambhaiḥ tigitaiḥ atti bharvati	agni jambha tigita ad bharv
1143	yodhaḥ na śatrūn sa vanā ni ṛñjate	yodha na śatru tad vana ni ṛj
1143	kuvit naḥ agniḥ ucathasya vīḥ asat	kuvid mad agni ucatha vī as
1143	vasuḥ kuvit vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat	vasu kuvid vasu kāma āvṛ
1143	codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ	coda kuvid tuj sāti dhī
1143	śucipratīkam tam ayā dhiyā gṛṇe	śuci pratīka tad idam dhī gṛ
1143	ghṛtapratīkam vaḥ ṛtasya dhūrṣadam	ghṛta pratīka tvad ṛta dhūrṣad
1143	agnim mitram na samidhānaḥ ṛñjate	agni mitra na samindh ṛj
1143	indhānaḥ akraḥ vidatheṣu dīdyat	indh akra vidatha dīdī
1143	śukravarṇām ut u naḥ yaṁsate dhiyam	śukra varṇa ud u mad yam dhī
1143	aprayucchan aprayucchadbhiḥ agne	aprayucchat aprayucchat agni
1143	śivebhiḥ naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ	śiva mad pāyu pā śagma
1143	adabdhebhiḥ adṛpitebhiḥ iṣTe	adabdha a dṛp iṣṭa
1143	animiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi naḥ jāḥ	a nimiṣ pari pā mad jā
 ---
1144	eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayā	i pra hotṛ vrata idam māyā
1144	ūrdhvām dadhānaḥ śucipeśasam dhiyam	ūrdhva dhā śuci peśas dhī
1144	abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛtaḥ	abhi sruc kram dakṣiṇa āvṛt
1144	yāḥ asya dhāma prathamam ha niṁsate	yad idam dhāman prathamam ha niṃs
1144	abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata	abhi īṃ ṛta dohana nū
1144	yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ	yoni deva sadana parīvṛ
1144	apām upasthe vibhṛtaḥ yat ā avasat	ap upastha vibhṛ yat āvas
1144	adha svadhāḥ adhayat yābhiḥ īyate	adha svadhā dhā yad ī
1144	yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tat it vapuḥ	yuyūṣ savayas tad id vapus
1144	samānam artham vitaritratā mithaḥ	samāna artha vitartar mithas
1144	āt īm bhagaḥ na havyaḥ sam asmat ā	āt īṃ bhaga na hvā sam mad ā
1144	voLhuḥ na raśmīn sam ayaṁsta sārathiḥ	voḍhṛ na raśmi sam yam sārathi
1144	yam īm dvā savayasā saparyataḥ	yad īṃ dvi savayas sapary
1144	samāne yonā mithunā samokasā	samāna yoni mithuna samokas
1144	divā na naktam palitaḥ yuvā ajani	divā na nakta palita yuvan jan
1144	purū caran ajaraḥ mānuṣā yugā	puru car ajara mānuṣa yuga
1144	tam īm hinvanti dhītayaḥ daśa vriśaḥ	tad īṃ hi dhīti daśan vriś
1144	devam martāsaḥ ūtaye havāmahe	deva marta ūti hvā
1144	dhanoḥ adhi pravataḥ ā saḥ ṛṇvati	dhanū adhi pravat ā tad ṛch
1144	abhivrajadbhiḥ vayunā nava adhita	abhivraj vayuna nava dhā
1144	tvam hi agne divyasya rājasi	tvad hi agni divya rāj
1144	tvam pārthivasya paśupāḥ iva tmanā	tvad pārthiva paśu pā iva tman
1144	enī te ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā	ena tad etad bṛhat abhiśrī
1144	hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhiḥ āśāte	hiraṇyaya vakvan barhis aś
1144	agne juṣasva prati harya tat vacaḥ	agni juṣ prati hary tad vacas
1144	mandra svadhāvaḥ ṛtajāta sukrato	mandra svadhāvat ṛta jan sukratu
1144	yaḥ viśvataḥ pratyaṅ asi darśataḥ	yad viśvatas pratyañc as darśata
1144	raṇvaḥ saṁdṛṣTau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ	raṇva saṃdṛṣṭi pitumat iva kṣaya
 ---
1145	tam pṛcchatā sa jagāmā sa veda	tad pracch tad gam tad vid
1145	sa cikitvān īyate sā nu īyate	tad cit ī tad nu ī
1145	tasmin santi praśiṣaḥ tasmin iṣTayaḥ	tad as praśis tad iṣṭi
1145	sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ patiḥ	tad vāja śavas śuṣmin pati
1145	tam it pṛcchanti na simaḥ vi pṛcchati	tad id pracch na sima vi pracch
1145	svena iva dhīraḥ manasā yat agrabhīt	sva iva dhīra manas yad grah
1145	na mṛṣyate prathamam na aparam vacaḥ	na mṛṣ prathama na apara vacas
1145	asya kratvā sacate apradṛpitaḥ	idam kratu sac a pradṛp
1145	tam it gacchanti juhvaḥ tam arvatīḥ	tad id gam juhū tad arvatī
1145	viśvāni ekaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṁsi me	viśva eka śru vacas mad
1145	purupraiṣaḥ taturiḥ yajñasādhanaḥ	puru praiṣa taturi yajña sādhana
1145	acchidrotiḥ śiśuḥ ā adatta sam rabhaḥ	acchidra ūti śiśu ādā sam rabhas
1145	upasthāyam carati yat samārata	upasthāyam car yat samṛch
1145	sadyaḥ jātaḥ tatsāra yujyebhiḥ	sadyas jan tsar yujya
1145	abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude	abhi śvānta mṛś nāndī mud
1145	yat īm gacchanti uśatīḥ apiṣThitam	yat īṃ gam vaś apiṣṭhā
1145	saḥ īm mṛgaḥ apyaḥ vanarguḥ	tad īṃ mṛga apya vanargu
1145	upa tvaci upamasyām ni dhāyi	upa tvac upama ni dhā
1145	vi abravīt vayunā martyebhyaḥ	vi brū vayuna martya
1145	agniḥ vidvān ṛtacit hi satyaḥ	agni vid ṛta cit hi satya
 ---
1146	trimūrdhānam saptaraśmim gṛṇīṣe	tri mūrdhan saptan raśmi gṛ
1146	anūnam agnim pitroḥ upasthe	anūna agni pitṛ upastha
1146	niṣattam asya carataḥ dhruvasya	niṣad idam car dhruva
1146	viśvā divaḥ rocanā āpaprivāṁsam	viśva div rocana āprā
1146	ukṣā mahān abhi vavakṣe ene	ukṣan mahat abhi vakṣ enad
1146	ajaraḥ tasthau itaūtiḥ ṛṣvaḥ	ajara sthā itaūti ṛṣva
1146	urvyāḥ padaḥ ni dadhāti sānau	urvī pad ni dhā sānu
1146	rihanti ūdhaḥ aruṣāsaḥ asya	rih ūdhas aruṣa idam
1146	samānam vatsam abhi saṁcarantī	samāna vatsa abhi saṃcar
1146	viṣvak dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke	viṣvañc dhenu vi car sumeka
1146	anapavṛjyān adhvanaḥ mimāne	anapavṛjya adhvan mā
1146	viśvān ketān adhi mahaḥ dadhāne	viśva keta adhi mah dhā
1146	dhīrāsaḥ padam kavayaḥ nayanti	dhīra pada kavi nī
1146	nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇāḥ ajuryam	nānā hṛd rakṣ ajurya
1146	siṣāsantaḥ pari apaśyanta sindhum	siṣās pari paś sindhu
1146	āviḥ ebhyaḥ abhavat sūryaḥ nṛṛn	āvis idam bhū sūrya nṛ
1146	didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣThāsu jenyaḥ	didṛkṣeṇya pari kāṣṭhā jenya
1146	īLenyaḥ mahaḥ arbhāya jīvase	īḍ mah arbha jīv
1146	purutrā yat abhavat sūḥ aha ebhyaḥ	purutrā yat bhū sū aha idam
1146	garbhebhyaḥ maghavā viśvadarśataḥ	garbha maghavan viśva darśata
 ---
1147	kathā te agne śucayantaḥ āyoḥ	kathā tvad agni śocay āyu
1147	dadāśuḥ vājebhiḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ	dāś vāja āśuṣ
1147	ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānāḥ	ubh yat toka tanaya dhā
1147	ṛtasya sāman raṇayanta devāḥ	ṛta sāman raṇay deva
1147	bodhā me asya vacasaḥ yaviṣTha	budh mad idam vacas yaviṣṭha
1147	maṁhiṣThasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ	maṃhiṣṭha prabhṛ svadhāvat
1147	pīyati tvaḥ anu tvaḥ gṛṇāti	pī tva anu tva gṛ
1147	vandāruḥ te tanvam vande agne	vandāru tvad tanū vand agni
1147	ye pāyavaḥ māmateyam te agne	yad pāyu māmateya tad agni
1147	paśyantaḥ andham duritāt arakṣan	paś andha durita rakṣ
1147	rarakṣa tān sukṛtaḥ viśvavedāḥ	rakṣ tad su kṛt viśva vedas
1147	dipsantaḥ it ripavaḥ na aha debhuḥ	dips id ripu na aha dabh
1147	yaḥ naḥ agne ararivān aghāyuḥ	yad mad agni a rā aghāyu
1147	arātīvā marcayati dvayena	arātīvan marcay dvaya
1147	mantraḥ guruḥ punar astu saḥ asmai	mantra guru punar as tad idam
1147	anu mṛkṣīṣTa tanvam duruktaiḥ	anu mṛc tanū durukta
1147	uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān	uta vā yad sahasya pravid
1147	martaḥ martam marcayati dvayena	marta marta marcay dvaya
1147	ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantam	atas pā stu stu
1147	agne mākiḥ naḥ duritāya dhāyīḥ	agni mākir mad durita
 ---
1148	mathīt yat īm viṣTaḥ mātariśvā	math yat īṃ viṣ mātariśvan
1148	hotāram viśvāpsum viśvadevyam	hotṛ viśvāpsu viśvadevya
1148	ni yam dadhuḥ manuṣyāsu vikṣu	ni yad manuṣya viś
1148	svar na citram vapuṣe vibhāvam	svar na citra vapus vibhāva
1148	dadānam it na dadabhanta manma	dā id na dabh manman
1148	agniḥ varūtham mama tasya cākan	agni varūtha mad tad kan
1148	juṣanta viśvāni asya karma	juṣ viśva idam karman
1148	upastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ	upastuti bhṛ kāru
1148	nitye cit nu yam sadane jagṛbhre	nitya cit nu yad sadana grah
1148	praśastibhiḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ	praśasti dhā yajñiya
1148	pra sū nayanta gṛbhayantaḥ iṣTau	pra sū nī gṛbhay iṣṭi
1148	aśvāsaḥ na rathyaḥ rārahāṇāḥ	aśva na rathī raṃh
1148	purūṇi dasmaḥ ni riṇāti jambhaiḥ	puru dasma ni ri jambha
1148	āt rocate vane ā vibhāvā	āt ruc vana ā vibhāvan
1148	āt asya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ	āt idam vāta anu vā śocis
1148	astuḥ na śaryām asanām anu dyūn	astṛ na śaryā asana anu div
1148	na yam ripavaḥ na riṣaṇyavaḥ	na yad ripu na riṣaṇyu
1148	garbhe santam reṣaṇāḥ reṣayanti	garbha as reṣaṇa reṣay
1148	andhāḥ apaśyāḥ na dabhan abhikhyā	andha apaśya na dabh abhikhyā
1148	nityāsaḥ īm pretāraḥ arakṣan	nitya īṃ pretṛ rakṣ
 ---
1149	mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ ā īṣate patiḥ dan	mah tad rai īṣ pati dan
1149	inaḥ inasya vasunaḥ pade ā	ina ina vasu pada ā
1149	upa dhrajantam adrayaḥ vidhan it	upa dhraj adri vidh id
1149	sa yaḥ vṛṣā narām na rodasyoḥ	tad yad vṛṣan nṛ na rodasī
1149	śravobhiḥ asti jīvapītasargaḥ	śravas as jīva pā sarga
1149	pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau	pra yad sṛ śri yoni
1149	ā yaḥ puram nārmiṇīm adīdet	ā yad pur nārmiṇī dīdī
1149	atyaḥ kaviḥ nabhanyaḥ na arvā	atya kavi nabhanya na arvan
1149	sūraḥ na rurukvān śatātmā	sūra na ruc śata ātman
1149	abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni	abhi dvi janman tri rocana
1149	viśvā rajāṁsi śuśucānaḥ asthāt	viśva rajas śuc sthā
1149	hotā yajiṣThaḥ apām sadhasthe	hotṛ yajiṣṭha ap sadhastha
1149	ayam sa hotā yaḥ dvijanmā	idam tad hotṛ yad dvijanman
1149	viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā	viśva dhā vārya śravasya
1149	martaḥ yaḥ asmai sutukaḥ dadāśa	marta yad idam sutuka dāś
 ---
1150	puru tvā dāśvān voce	puru tvad dāś vac
1150	ariḥ agne tava svit ā	ari agni tvad svid ā
1150	todasya iva śaraṇe ā mahasya	toda iva śaraṇa ā maha
1150	vi aninasya dhaninaḥ	vi anina dhanin
1150	prahoṣe cit araruṣaḥ	prahoṣa cit a rā
1150	kadā cana prajigataḥ adevayoḥ	kadā cana pragā a devayu
1150	sa candraḥ vipra martyaḥ	sa candra vipra martya
1150	mahaḥ vrādhantamaḥ divi	maha vrādhantama div
1150	prapra it te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma	pra pra id tvad agni vanus as
 ---
1151	mitram na yam śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ	mitra na yad śimī go gavyu
1151	svādhyaḥ vidathe apsu jījanan	svādhī vidatha ap jan
1151	arejetām rodasī pājasā girā	rej rodas pājas gir
1151	prati priyam yajatam januṣām avaḥ	prati priya yajata janus avas
1151	yat ha tyat vām purumīLhasya sominaḥ	yat ha tya tvad purumīḍha somin
1151	pra mitrāsaḥ na dadhire svābhuvaḥ	pra mitra na dhā su ābhū
1151	adha kratum vidatam gātum arcate	adha kratu vid gātu arc
1151	uta śrutam vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ	uta śru vṛṣan pastyāvat
1151	ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayaḥ janma rodasyoḥ	ā tvad bhūṣ kṣiti janman rodasī
1151	pravācyam vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe	pravac vṛṣan dakṣas mah
1151	yat īm ṛtāya bharathaḥ yat arvate	yat īṃ ṛta bhṛ yat arvant
1151	pra hotrayā śimyā vīthaḥ adhvaram	pra hotrā śimī vī adhvara
1151	pra sā kṣitiḥ asura yā mahi priyā	pra tad kṣiti asura yad mahi priya
1151	ṛtāvānau ṛtam ā ghoṣathaḥ bṛhat	ṛtāvan ṛta ā ghuṣ bṛhat
1151	yuvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ dakṣam ābhuvam	tvad div bṛhat dakṣa ābhū
1151	gām na dhuri upa yuñjāthe apaḥ	go na dhur upa yuj ap
1151	mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvathaḥ	mahī atra mahina vāra ṛch
1151	areṇavaḥ tujaḥ ā sadman dhenavaḥ	areṇu tuj ā sadman dhenu
1151	svaranti tāḥ uparatāti sūryam	svar tad uparatāti sūrya
1151	ā nimrucaḥ uṣasaḥ takvavīḥ iva	ā nimruc uṣas takvavī iva
1151	ā vām ṛtāya keśinīḥ anūṣata	ā tvad ṛta keśin nū
1151	mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ	mitra yatra varuṇa gātu arc
1151	ava tmanā sṛjatam pinvatam dhiyaḥ	ava tman sṛj pinv dhī
1151	yuvam viprasya manmanām irajyathaḥ	tvad vipra manman irajy
1151	yaḥ vām yajñaiḥ śaśamānaḥ ha dāśati	yad tvad yajña śam ha dāś
1151	kaviḥ hotā yajati manmasādhanaḥ	kavi hotṛ yaj manman sādhana
1151	upa aha tam gacchathaḥ vīthaḥ adhvaram	upa aha tad gam vī adhvara
1151	acchā giraḥ sumatim gantam asmayū	acchā gir sumati gam asmayu
1151	yuvām yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhiḥ añjate	tvad yajña prathama go añj
1151	ṛtāvānā manasaḥ na prayuktiṣu	ṛtāvan manas na prayukti
1151	bharanti vām manmanā saṁyatā giraḥ	bhṛ tvad manman saṃyam gir
1151	adṛpyatā manasā revat āśāthe	a dṛp manas revat aś
1151	revat vayaḥ dadhāthe revat āśāthe	revat vayas dhā revat aś
1151	narā māyābhiḥ itaūti māhinam	nṛ māyā itaūti māhina
1151	na vām dyāvaḥ ahabhiḥ na uta sindhavaḥ	na tvad div aha na uta sindhu
1151	na devatvam paṇayaḥ na ānaśuḥ magham	na deva tva paṇi na aś magha
 ---
1152	yuvam vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe	tvad vastra pīvasa vas
1152	yuvoḥ acchidrāḥ mantavaḥ ha sargāḥ	tvad acchidra mantu ha sarga
1152	ava atiratam anṛtāni viśvā	avatṛ anṛta viśva
1152	ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe	ṛta mitrāvaruṇa sac
1152	etat cana tvaḥ vi ciketat eṣām	etad cana tva vi cit idam
1152	satyaḥ mantraḥ kaviśastaḥ ṛghāvān	satya mantra kavi śaṃs ṛghāvat
1152	triraśrim hanti caturaśriḥ ugraḥ	triraśri han catur asra ugra
1152	devanidaḥ ha prathamāḥ ajūryan	deva nid ha prathama jṛ
1152	apāt eti prathamā padvatīnām	a pād i prathama padvat
1152	kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ā ciketa	ka tad tvad mitrāvaruṇa cit
1152	garbhaḥ bhāram bharati ā cit asya	garbha bhāra bhṛ ā cit idam
1152	ṛtam piparti anṛtam ni tārīt	ṛta pṛ anṛta ni tṛ
1152	prayantam it pari jāram kanīnām	pre id pari jāra kanī
1152	paśyāmasi na upanipadyamānam	paś na upanipad
1152	anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānam	an avapṛc vitan vas
1152	priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma	priya mitra varuṇa dhāman
1152	anaśvaḥ jātaḥ anabhīśuḥ arvā	an aśva jan an abhīśu arvan
1152	kanikradat patayat ūrdhvasānuḥ	kanikrad patay ūrdhva sānu
1152	acittam brahma jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ	acitta brahman juṣ yuvan
1152	pra mitre dhāma varuṇe gṛṇantaḥ	pra mitra dhāman varuṇa gṛ
1152	ā dhenavaḥ māmateyam avantīḥ	ā dhenu māmateya av
1152	brahmapriyam pīpayan sasmin ūdhan	brahman priya pyā tad ūdhas
1152	pitvaḥ bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān	pitu bhikṣ vayuna vid
1152	āsā āvivāsan aditim uruṣyet	ās āvivās aditi uruṣy
1152	ā vām mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣTim	ā tvad mitrāvaruṇa havya juṣṭi
1152	namasā devau avasā vavṛtyām	namas deva avas vṛt
1152	asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyāḥ	mad brahman pṛtanā sah
1152	asmākam vṛṣTiḥ divyā supārā	mad vṛṣṭi divya su pāra
 ---
1153	yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣāḥ	yaj tvad mah sajoṣas
1153	havyebhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ	havya mitrāvaruṇa namas
1153	ghṛtaiḥ ghṛtasnū adha yat vām asme	ghṛta ghṛtasnu adha yad tvad mad
1153	adhvaryavaḥ na dhītibhiḥ bharanti	adhvaryu na dhīti bhṛ
1153	prastutiḥ vām dhāma na prayuktiḥ	prastuti tvad dhāman na prayukti
1153	ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ	yam mitrāvaruṇa suvṛkti
1153	anakti yat vām vidatheṣu hotā	añj yat tvad vidatha hotṛ
1153	sumnam vām sūriḥ vṛṣaṇau iyakṣan	sumna tvad sūri vṛṣan iyakṣ
1153	pīpāya dhenuḥ aditiḥ ṛtāya	pyā dhenu aditi ṛta
1153	janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde	jana mitrāvaruṇa havis dā
1153	hinoti yat vām vidathe saparyan	hi yat tvad vidatha sapary
1153	sa rātahavyaḥ mānuṣaḥ na hotā	tad rā havya mānuṣa na hotṛ
1153	uta vām vikṣu madyāsu andhaḥ	uta tvad viś mad andhas
1153	gāvaḥ āpaḥ ca pīpayanta devīḥ	go ap ca pyā deva
1153	uta u naḥ asya pūrvyaḥ patiḥ dan	uta u mad idam pūrvya pati
1153	vītam pātam payasaḥ usriyāyāḥ	vī pā payas usriyā
 ---
1154	viṣṇoḥ nu kam vīryāṇi pra vocam	viṣṇu nu kaṃ vīrya pra vac
1154	yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṁsi	yad pārthiva vimā rajas
1154	yaḥ askabhāyat uttaram sadhastham	yad skabhāy uttara sadhastha
1154	vicakramāṇaḥ tredhā urugāyaḥ	vikram tredhā uru gāya
1154	pra tat viṣṇuḥ stavate vīryeṇa	pra tad viṣṇu stu vīrya
1154	mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣThāḥ	mṛga na bhīma kucara giriṣṭhā
1154	yasya uruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣu	yad uru tri vikramaṇa
1154	adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā	adhikṣi bhuvana viśva
1154	pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma	pra viṣṇu śūṣa i manman
1154	girikṣite urugāyāya vṛṣṇe	giri kṣit uru gāya vṛṣan
1154	yaḥ idam dīrgham prayatam sadhastham	yad idam dīrgha prayam sadhastha
1154	ekaḥ vimame tribhiḥ it padebhiḥ	eka vimā tri id pada
1154	yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāni	yad tri pṛ madhu pada
1154	akṣīyamāṇā svadhayā madanti	a kṣi svadhā mad
1154	yaḥ u tridhātu pṛthivīm uta dyām	yad u tridhātu pṛthivī uta div
1154	ekaḥ dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā	eka dhṛ bhuvana viśva
1154	tat asya priyam abhi pāthaḥ aśyām	tad idam priya abhi pāthas aś
1154	naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti	nṛ yatra devayu mad
1154	urukramasya sa hi bandhuḥ itthā	urukrama tad hi bandhu itthā
1154	viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhvaḥ utsaḥ	viṣṇu pada parama madhu utsa
1154	tā vām vāstūni uśmasi gamadhyai	tad tvad vāstu vaś gam
1154	yatra gāvaḥ bhūriśṛṅgāḥ ayāsaḥ	yatra go bhūri śṛṅga ayās
1154	atra aha tat urugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ	atra aha tad uru gāya vṛṣan
1154	paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri	parama pada ava bhā bhūri
 ---
1155	pra vaḥ pāntam andhasaḥ dhiyāyate	pra tvad andhas dhiyāy
1155	mahe śūrāya viṣṇave ca arcata	mah śūra viṣṇu ca arc
1155	yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā	yad sānu parvata adābhya
1155	mahaḥ tasthatuḥ arvatā iva sādhunā	mah sthā arvant iva sādhu
1155	tveṣam itthā samaraṇam śimīvatoḥ	tveṣa itthā samaraṇa śimīvat
1155	indrāviṣṇū sutapāḥ vām uruṣyati	indrāviṣṇu suta pā tvad uruṣy
1155	yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam it	yad martya pratidhā id
1155	kṛśānoḥ astuḥ asanām uruṣyathaḥ	kṛśānu astṛ asanā uruṣy
1155	tāḥ īm vardhanti mahi asya pauṁsyam	tad īṃ vṛdh mahi idam pauṃsya
1155	ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje	ni mātṛ nī retas bhuj
1155	dadhāti putraḥ avaram param pituḥ	dhā putra avara para pitṛ
1155	nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ	nāman tṛtīya adhi rocana div
1155	tattat it asya pauṁsyam gṛṇīmasi	tad tad id idam pauṃsya gṛ
1155	inasya trātuḥ avṛkasya mīLhuṣaḥ	ina trātṛ avṛka mīḍhvas
1155	yaḥ pārthivāni tribhiḥ it vigāmabhiḥ	yad pārthiva tri id vigāman
1155	uru kramiṣTa urugāyāya jīvase	uru kram uru gāya jīv
1155	dve it asya kramaṇe svardṛśaḥ	dvi id idam kramaṇa svar dṛś
1155	abhikhyāya martyaḥ bhuraṇyati	abhikhyā martya bhuraṇy
1155	tṛtīyam asya nakiḥ ā dadharṣati	tṛtīya idam nakir ā dhṛṣ
1155	vayaḥ cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ	vi cana patay patatrin
1155	caturbhiḥ sākam navatim ca nāmabhiḥ	catur sākam navati ca nāman
1155	cakram na vṛttam vyatīn avīvipat	cakra na vṛt vyati vip
1155	bṛhaccharīraḥ vimimānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	bṛhat śarīra vimā ṛkvan
1155	yuvā akumāraḥ prati eti āhavam	yuvan a kumāra prati i āhava
 ---
1156	bhavā mitraḥ na śevyaḥ ghṛtāsutiḥ	bhū mitra na śevya ghṛta āsuti
1156	vibhūtadyumnaḥ evayāḥ u saprathāḥ	vibhū dyumna eva yā u saprathas
1156	adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cit ardhyaḥ	adha tvad viṣṇu vid cit ṛdh
1156	stomaḥ yajñaḥ ca rādhyaḥ haviṣmatā	stoma yajña ca rādh haviṣmat
1156	yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase	yad pūrvya vedhas navīyas
1156	sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati	sumat jānī viṣṇu dāś
1156	yaḥ jātam asya mahataḥ mahi bravat	yad jāta idam mahat mahi brū
1156	sa it u śravobhiḥ yujyam cit abhi asat	tad id u śravas yujya cit abhi as
1156	tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyam yathā vidaḥ	tad u stu pūrvya yathā vid
1156	ṛtasya garbham januṣā pipartana	ṛta garbha janus pṛ
1156	ā asya jānantaḥ nāma cit vivaktana	ā idam jñā nāman cit vac
1156	mahaḥ te viṣṇo sumatim bhajāmahe	mah tvad viṣṇu sumati bhaj
1156	tam asya rājā varuṇaḥ tam aśvinā	tad idam rājan varuṇa tad aśvin
1156	kratum sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ	kratu sac māruta vedhas
1156	dādhāra dakṣam uttamam aharvidam	dhṛ dakṣa uttama ahar vid
1156	vrajam ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivān aporṇute	vraja ca viṣṇu sakhivat apavṛ
1156	ā yaḥ vivāya sacathāya daivyaḥ	ā yad vī sacatha daivya
1156	indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ	indra viṣṇu su kṛt sukṛttara
1156	vedhāḥ ajinvat triṣadhasthaḥ āryam	vedhas jinv triṣadhastha ārya
1156	ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ā abhajat	ṛta bhāga yaj ābhaj
 ---
1157	abodhi agniḥ jmaḥ ut eti sūryaḥ	budh agni jm ud i sūrya
1157	vi uṣāḥ candrā mahī āvaḥ arciṣā	vi uṣas candra mah vas arcis
1157	āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham	āyuj aśvin yā ratha
1157	pra asāvīt devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak	prasū deva savitṛ jagant pṛthak
1157	yat yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā ratham	yat yuj vṛṣan aśvin ratha
1157	ghṛtena naḥ madhunā kṣatram ukṣatam	ghṛta mad madhu kṣatra ukṣ
1157	asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvatam	mad brahman pṛtanā jinv
1157	vayam dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi	mad dhana śūrasāti bhaj
1157	arvāṅ tricakraḥ madhuvāhanaḥ rathaḥ	arvāñc tri cakra madhu vāhana ratha
1157	jīrāśvaḥ aśvinoḥ yātu suṣTutaḥ	jīra aśva aśvin yā suṣṭuta
1157	trivandhuraḥ maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ	tri vandhura maghavan viśva saubhaga
1157	śam naḥ ā vakṣat dvipade catuṣpade	śam mad ā vah dvipad catuṣpada
1157	ā naḥ ūrjam vahatam aśvinā yuvam	ā mad ūrj vah aśvin tvad
1157	madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam	madhumat mad kaśā mikṣ
1157	pra āyuḥ tāriṣTam niḥ rapāṁsi mṛkṣatam	pra āyus tṛ niḥ rapas mṛj
1157	sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā	sidh dveṣas bhū sacābhū
1157	yuvam ha garbham jagatīṣu dhatthaḥ	tvad ha garbha jagatī dhā
1157	yuvam viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar	tvad viśva bhuvana antar
1157	yuvam agnim ca vṛṣaṇau apaḥ ca	tvad agni ca vṛṣan ap ca
1157	vanaspatīn aśvinau airayethām	vanaspati aśvin īray
1157	yuvam ha sthaḥ bhiṣajā bheṣajebhiḥ	tvad ha as bhiṣaj bheṣaja
1157	atha u ha sthaḥ rathyā rāthyebhiḥ	atho ha as rathya rāthya
1157	atha u ha kṣatram adhi dhatthaḥ ugrā	atho ha kṣatra adhi dhā ugra
1157	yaḥ vām haviṣmān manasā dadāśa	yad tvad haviṣmat manas dāś
 ---
1158	vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā	vasu rudra puru mantu vṛdh
1158	daśasyatam naḥ vṛṣaṇau abhiṣTau	daśasy mad vṛṣan abhiṣṭi
1158	dasrā ha yat rekṇaḥ aucathyaḥ vām	dasra ha yat rekṇas aucathya tvad
1158	pra yat sasrāthe akavābhiḥ ūtī	pra yat sṛ akava ūti
1158	kaḥ vām dāśat sumataye cit asyai	ka tvad dāś sumati cit idam
1158	vasū yat dhethe namasā pade goḥ	vasu yat dhā namas pada go
1158	jigṛtam asme revatīḥ puraṁdhīḥ	jāgṛ mad revat puraṃdhi
1158	kāmapreṇa iva manasā carantā	kāmapra iva manas car
1158	yuktaḥ ha yat vām taugryāya peruḥ	yuj ha yat tvad taugrya peru
1158	vi madhye arṇasaḥ dhāyi pajraḥ	vi madhya arṇas dhā pajra
1158	upa vām avaḥ śaraṇam gameyam	upa tvad avas śaraṇa gam
1158	śūraḥ na ajma patayadbhiḥ evaiḥ	śūra na ajman patay eva
1158	upastutiḥ aucathyam uruṣyet	upastuti aucathya uruṣy
1158	mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām	mā mad idam patatrin vi duh
1158	mā mām edhaḥ daśatayaḥ citaḥ dhāk	mā mad edha daśataya ci dah
1158	pra yat vām baddhaḥ tmani khādati kṣām	pra yat tvad bandh tman khād kṣā
1158	na mā garan nadyaḥ mātṛtamāḥ	na mad gṛ nadī mātṛtama
1158	dāsāḥ yat īm susamubdham avādhuḥ	dāsa yat īṃ su samubh avadhā
1158	śiraḥ yat asya traitanaḥ vitakṣat	śiras yat idam traitana vitakṣ
1158	svayam dāsaḥ uraḥ aṁsau api gdha	svayam dāsa uras aṃsa api
1158	dīrghatamāḥ māmateyaḥ	dīrghatamas māmateya
1158	jujurvān daśame yuge	jṛ daśama yuga
1158	apām artham yatīnām	ap artha i
1158	brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ	brahman bhū sārathi
 ---
1159	pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā	pra div yajña pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdh
1159	mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā	mahi stu vidatha pracetas
1159	devebhiḥ ye devaputre sudaṁsasā	deva yad deva putra su daṃsas
1159	itthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ	itthā dhī vārya prabhūṣ
1159	uta manye pituḥ adruhaḥ manaḥ	uta man pitṛ adruh manas
1159	mātuḥ mahi svatavaḥ tat havīmabhiḥ	mātṛ mahi sva tavas tad havīman
1159	suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratuḥ	su retas pitṛ bhūman kṛ
1159	uru prajāyāḥ amṛtam varīmabhiḥ	uru prajā amṛta varīman
1159	te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṁsasaḥ	tad sūnu su apas su daṃsas
1159	mahī jajñuḥ mātarā pūrvacittaye	mahi jan mātṛ pūrvacitti
1159	sthātuḥ ca satyam jagataḥ ca dharmaṇi	sthātṛ ca satya jagat ca dharman
1159	putrasya pāthaḥ padam advayāvinaḥ	putra pā pada a dvayāvin
1159	te māyinaḥ mamire supracetasaḥ	tad māyin mā su pracetas
1159	jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā	jāmi sayoni mithuna samokas
1159	navyaṁnavyam tantum ā tanvate divi	navya navya tantu ā tan div
1159	samudre antar kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ	samudra antar kavi su dīti
1159	tat rādhaḥ adya savituḥ vareṇyam	tad rādhas adya savitṛ vareṇya
1159	vayam devasya prasave manāmahe	mad deva prasava man
1159	asmabhyam dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā	mad dyāvāpṛthivī su cetu
1159	rayim dhattam vasumantam śatagvinam	rayi dhā vasumat śatagvin
 ---
1160	te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuvā	tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśva śambhu
1160	ṛtāvarī rajasaḥ dhārayatkavī	ṛtāvan rajas dhāray kavi
1160	sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antar īyate	su janman dhiṣaṇā antar i
1160	devaḥ devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ	deva devī dharman sūrya śuci
1160	uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā	uru vyacas mahin asaścat
1160	pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ	pitṛ mātṛ ca bhuvana rakṣ
1160	sudhṛṣTame vapuṣye na rodasī	sudhṛṣṭama vapuṣya na rodasī
1160	pitā yat sīm abhi rūpaiḥ avāsayat	pitṛ yat sīm abhi rūpa vāsay
1160	sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān	tad vahni putra pitṛ pavitravat
1160	punāti dhīraḥ bhuvanāni māyayā	pū dhīra bhuvana māyā
1160	dhenum ca pṛśnim vṛṣabham suretasam	dhenu ca pṛśni vṛṣabha su retas
1160	viśvāhā śukram payaḥ asya dukṣata	viśvāhā śukra payas idam duh
1160	ayam devānām apasām apastamaḥ	idam deva apas apastama
1160	yaḥ jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā	yad jan rodasī viśva śambhu
1160	vi yaḥ mame rajasī sukratūyayā	vi yad mā rajas sukratūyā
1160	ajarebhiḥ skambhanebhiḥ sam ānṛce	ajara skambhana sam arc
1160	te naḥ gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ	tad mad gṛ mahin mahi śravas
1160	kṣatram dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsathaḥ bṛhat	kṣatra dyāvāpṛthivī dhā bṛhat
1160	yena abhi kṛṣTīḥ tatanāma viśvahā	yad abhi kṛṣṭi tan viśvahā
1160	panāyyam ojaḥ asme sam invatam	panāyya ojas mad sam inv
 ---
1161	kim u śreṣThaḥ kim yaviṣThaḥ naḥ ā ajagan	kim u śreṣṭha kim yaviṣṭha mad āgam
1161	kim īyate dūtyam kat yat ūcima	ka i dūtya ka yad vac
1161	na nindima camasam yaḥ mahākulaḥ	na nind camasa yad mahat kula
1161	agne bhrātar druṇaḥ it bhūtim ūdima	agni bhrātṛ dru id bhūti vad
1161	ekam camasam caturaḥ kṛṇotana	eka camasa catur kṛ
1161	tat vaḥ devāḥ abruvan tat vaḥ ā agamam	tad tvad deva brū tad tvad āgam
1161	saudhanvanāḥ yadi evā kariṣyatha	saudhanvana yadi eva kṛ
1161	sākam devaiḥ yajñiyāsaḥ bhaviṣyatha	sākam deva yajñiya bhū
1161	agnim dūtam prati yat abravītana	agni dūta prati yad brū
1161	aśvaḥ kartvaḥ rathaḥ uta iha kartvaḥ	aśva kṛ ratha uta iha kṛ
1161	dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā	dhenu kṛ yuvaśa kṛ dvi
1161	tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvī ā imasi	tad bhrātṛ anu tvad kṛ e
1161	cakṛvāṁsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata	kṛ ṛbhu tad pracch
1161	kva it abhūt yaḥ sya dūtaḥ naḥ ā ajagan	kva id bhū yad tya dūta mad āgam
1161	yadā avākhyat camasān caturaḥ kṛtān	yadā avakhyā camasa catur kṛ
1161	āt it tvaṣTā gnāsu antar ni ānaje	āt id tvaṣṭṛ gnā antar ni añj
1161	hanāma enān iti tvaṣTā yat abravīt	han enad iti tvaṣṭṛ yat brū
1161	camasam ye devapānam anindiṣuḥ	camasa yad deva pāna nind
1161	anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacā	anya nāman kṛ suta saca
1161	anyaiḥ enān kanyā nāmabhiḥ sparat	anya enad kanyā nāman spṛ
1161	indraḥ harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham	indra hari yuj aśvin ratha
1161	bṛhaspatiḥ viśvarūpām upa ājata	bṛhaspati viśvarūpā upāj
1161	ṛbhuḥ vibhvā vājaḥ devān agacchata	ṛbhu vibhvan vāja deva gam
1161	svapasaḥ yajñiyam bhāgam aitana	su apas yajñiya bhāga i
1161	niḥ carmaṇaḥ gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ	niḥ carman go ri dhīti
1161	yā jarantā yuvaśā tā akṛṇotana	yad jaranta yuvaśa tad kṛ
1161	saudhanvanāḥ aśvāt aśvam atakṣata	saudhanvana aśva aśva takṣ
1161	yuktvā ratham upa devān ayātana	yuj ratha upa deva yā
1161	idam udakam pibata iti abravītana	idam udaka pā iti brū
1161	idam vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam	idam vā gha pā muñja nejana
1161	saudhanvanāḥ yadi tat na iva haryatha	saudhanvana yadi tad na iva hary
1161	tṛtīye ghā savane mādayādhvai	tṛtīya gha savana māday
1161	āpaḥ bhūyiṣThāḥ iti ekaḥ abravīt	ap bhūyiṣṭha iti eka brū
1161	agniḥ bhūyiṣThaḥ iti anyaḥ abravīt	agni bhūyiṣṭha iti anya brū
1161	vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ pra ekaḥ abravīt	vadhary bahu pra eka brū
1161	ṛtā vadantaḥ camasān apiṁśata	ṛta vad camasa piś
1161	śroṇām ekaḥ udakam gām ava ajati	śroṇa eka udaka go avāj
1161	māṁsam ekaḥ piṁśati sūnayā ābhṛtam	māṃsa eka piś sūnā ābhṛ
1161	ā nimrucaḥ śakṛt ekaḥ apa abharat	ā nimruc śakṛt eka apabhṛ
1161	kim svit putrebhyaḥ pitarau upa āvatuḥ	ka svid putra pitṛ upāv
1161	udvatsu asmai akṛṇotanā tṛṇam	udvat idam kṛ tṛṇa
1161	nivatsu apaḥ svapasyayā naraḥ	nivat ap svapasyā nṛ
1161	agohyasya yat asastanā gṛhe	agohya yat sas gṛha
1161	tat adya idam ṛbhavaḥ na anu gacchatha	tad adya idam ṛbhu na anu gam
1161	sammīlya yat bhuvanā paryasarpata	sammīlay yat bhuvana parisṛp
1161	kva svit tātyā pitarā vaḥ āsatuḥ	kva svid tātya pitṛ tvad as
1161	aśapata yaḥ karasnam vaḥ ādade	śap yad karasna tvad ādā
1161	yaḥ pra abravīt pra u tasmai abravītana	yad prabrū pra u tad brū
1161	suṣupvāṁsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata	svap ṛbhu tad pracch
1161	agohya kaḥ idam naḥ abūbudhat	agohya ka idam mad budh
1161	śvānam bastaḥ bodhayitāram abravīt	śvan basta bodhayitṛ brū
1161	saṁvatsare idam adyā vi akhyata	saṃvatsara idam adya vi khyā
1161	divā yānti marutaḥ bhūmyā agniḥ	div yā marut bhūmi agni
1161	ayam vātaḥ antarikṣeṇa yāti	idam vāta antarikṣa yā
1161	adbhiḥ yāti varuṇaḥ samudraiḥ	ap yā varuṇa samudra
1161	yuṣmān icchantaḥ śavasaḥ napātaḥ	tvad iṣ śavas napāt
 ---
1162	mā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ	mā mad mitra varuṇa aryaman āyu
1162	indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ pari khyan	indra ṛbhukṣan marut pari khyā
1162	yat vājinaḥ devajātasya sapteḥ	yat vājin deva jan sapti
1162	pravakṣyāmaḥ vidathe vīryāṇi	pravac vidatha vīrya
1162	yat nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya	yat nirṇij rekṇas prāvṛ
1162	rātim gṛbhītām mukhataḥ nayanti	rāti grah mukhatas nī
1162	suprāṅ ajaḥ memyat viśvarūpaḥ	su prāñc aja memy viśva rūpa
1162	indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam api eti pāthaḥ	indra pūṣan priya api i pāthas
1162	eṣa chāgaḥ puraḥ aśvena vājinā	etad chāga puras aśva vājin
1162	pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ nīyate viśvadevyaḥ	pūṣan bhāga nī viśvadevya
1162	abhipriyam yat puroLāśam arvatā	abhi priya yat puroḍāś arvant
1162	tvaṣTā it enam sauśravasāya jinvati	tvaṣṭṛ id enad sauśravasa jinv
1162	yat haviṣyam ṛtuśaḥ devayānam	yat haviṣya ṛtuśas deva yāna
1162	triḥ mānuṣāḥ pari aśvam nayanti	tris mānuṣa pari aśva nī
1162	atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamaḥ bhāgaḥ eti	atra pūṣan prathama bhāga i
1162	yajñam devebhyaḥ prativedayan ajaḥ	yajña deva prativeday aja
1162	hotā adhvaryuḥ āvayāḥ agnimindhaḥ	hotṛ adhvaryu āvayas agnimindha
1162	grāvagrābhaḥ uta śaṁstā suvipraḥ	grāvagrābha uta śaṃstṛ su vipra
1162	tena yajñena svaraṁkṛtena	tad yajña su alaṃkṛ
1162	svīṣTena vakṣaṇāḥ ā pṛṇadhvam	su yaj vakṣaṇā ā pṛṇ
1162	yūpavraskāḥ uta ye yūpavāhāḥ	yūpavraska uta yad yūpa vāha
1162	caṣālam ye aśvayūpāya takṣati	caṣāla yad aśva yūpa takṣ
1162	ye ca arvate pacanam sambharanti	yad ca arvant pacana sambhṛ
1162	uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu	uta u tad abhigūrti mad inv
1162	upa pra agāt sumat me adhāyi manma	upa pragā sumat mad dhā manman
1162	devānām āśāḥ upa vītapṛṣThaḥ	deva āśā upa vī pṛṣṭha
1162	anu enam viprāḥ ṛṣayaḥ madanti	anu enad vipra ṛṣi mad
1162	devānām puṣTe cakṛmā subandhum	deva puṣṭa kṛ su bandhu
1162	yat vājinaḥ dāma saṁdānam arvataḥ	yad vājin dāman saṃdāna arvant
1162	yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjuḥ asya	yad śīrṣaṇya raśanā rajju idam
1162	yat vā gha asya prabhṛtam āsye tṛṇam	yad vā gha idam prabhṛ āsya tṛṇa
1162	sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu	sarva tad tvad api deva as
1162	yat aśvasya kraviṣaḥ makṣikā āśa	yad aśva kravis makṣikā aś
1162	yat vā svarau svadhitau riptam asti	yad vā svaru svadhiti rip as
1162	yat hastayoḥ śamituḥ yat nakheṣu	yad hasta śamitṛ yad nakha
1162	sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu	sarva tad tvad api deva as
1162	yat ūvadhyam udarasya apavāti	yad ūvadhya udara apavā
1162	yaḥ āmasya kraviṣaḥ gandhaḥ asti	yad āma kravis gandha as
1162	sukṛtā tat śamitāraḥ kṛṇvantu	su kṛ tad śamitṛ kṛ
1162	uta medham śṛtapākam pacantu	uta medha śrī pāka pac
1162	yat te gātrāt agninā pacyamānāt	yad tvad gātra agni pac
1162	abhi śūlam nihatasya avadhāvati	abhi śūla nihan avadhāv
1162	mā tat bhūmyām ā śriṣat mā tṛṇeṣu	mā tad bhūmi ā śriṣ mā tṛṇa
1162	devebhyaḥ tat uśadbhyaḥ rātam astu	deva tad vaś rā as
1162	ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvam	yad vājin paripaś pakva
1162	ye īm āhuḥ surabhiḥ niḥ hara iti	yad īṃ ah surabhi niḥ hṛ iti
1162	ye ca arvataḥ māṁsabhikṣām upāsate	yad ca arvant māṃsa bhikṣā upās
1162	uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu	uta u tad abhigūrti mad inv
1162	yat nīkṣaṇam māWspacanyāḥ ukhāyāḥ	yad nīkṣaṇa māṃspacana ukhā
1162	yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇaḥ āsecanāni	yad pātra yūṣan āsecana
1162	ūṣmaṇyā apidhānā carūṇām	ūṣmaṇya apidhāna caru
1162	aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanti aśvam	aṅka sūnā pari bhūṣ aśva
1162	nikramaṇam niṣadanam vivartanam	nikramaṇa niṣadana vivartana
1162	yat ca paḍbīśam arvataḥ	yad ca paḍvīśa arvant
1162	yat ca papau yat ca ghāsim jaghāsa	yad ca pā yad ca ghāsi ghas
1162	sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu	sarva tad tvad api deva as
1162	mā tvā agniḥ dhvanayīt dhūmagandhiḥ	mā tvad agni dhvanay dhūma gandhi
1162	mā ukhā bhrājantī abhi vikta jaghriḥ	mā ukhā bhrāj abhi vij jaghri
1162	iṣTam vītam abhigūrtam vaṣaTkṛtam	yaj vī abhigur vaṣaṭkṛ
1162	tam devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanti aśvam	tad deva prati grah aśva
1162	yat aśvāya vāsaḥ upastṛṇanti	yad aśva vāsas upastṛ
1162	adhīvāsam yā hiraṇyāni asmai	adhīvāsa yad hiraṇya idam
1162	saṁdānam arvantam paḍbīśam	saṃdāna arvant paḍvīśa
1162	priyā deveṣu ā yāmayanti	priya deva ā yāmay
1162	yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya	yad tvad sāda mahas śūkṛta
1162	pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda	pārṣṇi vā kaśā vā tud
1162	srucā iva tā haviṣaḥ adhvareṣu	sruc iva tad havis adhvara
1162	sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi	sarva tad tvad brahman sūday
1162	catustriṁśat vājinaḥ devabandhoḥ	catustriṃśat vājin deva bandhu
1162	vaṅkrīḥ aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti	vaṅkri aśva svadhiti sam i
1162	acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota	acchidra gātra vayuna kṛ
1162	paruṣparuḥ anughuṣyā vi śasta	parus parus anughuṣ vi śaṃs
1162	ekaḥ tvaṣTuḥ aśvasyā viśastā	eka tvaṣṭṛ aśva viśastṛ
1162	dvā yantārā bhavataḥ tathā ṛtuḥ	dvi yantṛ bhū tathā ṛtu
1162	yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi	yad tvad gātra ṛtuthā kṛ
1162	tātā piṇḍanām pra juhomi agnau	tad tad piṇḍa pra hu agni
1162	mā tvā tapat priyaḥ ātmā apiyantam	mā tvad tap priya ātman apī
1162	mā svadhitiḥ tanvaḥ ā tiṣThipat te	mā svadhiti tanū ā sthāpay tvad
1162	mā te gṛdhnuḥ aviśastā atihāya	mā tvad gṛdhnu aviśastṛ atihā
1162	chidrā gātrāṇi asinā mithū kar	chidra gātra asi mithū kṛ
1162	na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi	na vai u etad mṛ na riṣ
1162	devān it eṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ	deva id i pathin su ga
1162	harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtām	hari tvad pṛṣatī bhū
1162	upa asthāt vājī dhuri rāsabhasya	upasthā vājin dhur rāsabha
1162	sugavyam naḥ vājī svaśvyam	su gavyā mad vājin su aśvya
1162	puṁsaḥ putrān uta viśvāpuṣam rayim	puṃs putra uta viśvāpuṣ rayi
1162	anāgāstvam naḥ aditiḥ kṛṇotu	anāgāstva mad aditi kṛ
1162	kṣatram naḥ aśvaḥ vanatām haviṣmān	kṣatra mad aśva van haviṣmat
 ---
1163	yat akrandaḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ	yat krand prathamam jan
1163	udyan samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt	udi samudra uta vā purīṣa
1163	śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū	śyena pakṣa hariṇa bāhu
1163	upastutyam mahi jātam te arvan	upastu mahi jāta tvad arvant
1163	yamena dattam tritaḥ enam āyunak	yama dā trita enad āyuj
1163	indraḥ enam prathamaḥ adhi atiṣThat	indra eṇa prathama adhi sthā
1163	gandharvaḥ asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt	gandharva idam raśanā grah
1163	sūrāt aśvam vasavaḥ niḥ ataṣTa	sūra aśva vasu niḥ takṣ
1163	asi yamaḥ asi ādityaḥ arvan	as yama as āditya arvant
1163	asi tritaḥ guhyena vratena	as trita guhya vrata
1163	asi somena samayā vipṛktaḥ	as soma samayā vipṛc
1163	āhuḥ te trīṇi divi bandhanāni	ah tvad tri div bandhana
1163	trīṇi te āhuḥ divi bandhanāni	tri tvad ah div bandhana
1163	trīṇi apsu trīṇi antar samudre	tri ap tri antar samudra
1163	uta iva me varuṇaḥ chantsi arvan	uta iva mad varuṇa chand arvant
1163	yatrā te āhuḥ paramam janitram	yatra tvad ah parama janitra
1163	imā te vājin avamārjanāni	idam tvad vājin avamārjana
1163	imā śaphānām sanituḥ nidhānā	idam śapha sanitṛ nidhāna
1163	atrā te bhadrāḥ raśanāḥ apaśyam	atra tvad bhadra raśanā paś
1163	ṛtasya yāḥ abhirakṣanti gopāḥ	ṛta yad abhirakṣ gopā
1163	ātmānam te manasā ārāt ajānām	ātman tvad manas ārāt jñā
1163	avaḥ divā patayantam pataṁgam	avas div patay pataṃga
1163	śiraḥ apaśyam pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ	śiras paś pathin su ga
1163	areṇubhiḥ jehamānam patatri	areṇu jeh patatrin
1163	atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyam	atra tvad rūpa uttama paś
1163	jigīṣamāṇam iṣaḥ ā pade goḥ	jigīṣ iṣ ā pada go
1163	yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaT	yadā tvad marta anu bhoga naś
1163	āt it grasiṣThaḥ oṣadhīḥ ajīgar	āt id grasiṣṭha oṣadhi jāgṛ
1163	anu tvā rathaḥ anu maryaḥ arvan	anu tvad ratha anu marya arvant
1163	anu gāvaḥ anu bhagaḥ kanīnām	anu go anu bhaga kanī
1163	anu vrātāsaḥ tava sakhyam īyuḥ	anu vrāta tvad sakhya i
1163	anu devāḥ mamire vīryam te	anu deva mā vīrya tvad
1163	hiraṇyaśṛṅgaḥ ayaḥ asya pādāḥ	hiraṇya śṛṅga ayas idam pāda
1163	manojavāḥ avaraḥ indraḥ āsīt	manas javas avara indra as
1163	devāḥ it asya haviradyam āyan	deva id idam havis adya i
1163	yaḥ arvantam prathamaḥ adhyatiṣThat	yad arvant prathama adhiṣṭhā
1163	īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ	īrmānta silikamadhyama
1163	sam śūraṇāsaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ	sam śūraṇa divya atya
1163	haṁsāḥ iva śreṇiśaḥ yatante	haṃsa iva śreṇiśas yat
1163	yat ākṣiṣuḥ divyam ajmam aśvāḥ	yat akṣ divya ajma aśva
1163	tava śarīram patayiṣṇu arvan	tvad śarīra patayiṣṇu arvant
1163	tava cittam vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān	tvad citta vāta iva dhrajīmat
1163	tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣThitā purutrā	tvad śṛṅga viṣṭhā purutrā
1163	araṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti	araṇya jarbhur car
1163	upa pra agāt śasanam vājī arvā	upa pragā śasana vājin arvan
1163	devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ	devadryañc manas dhī
1163	ajaḥ puraḥ nīyate nābhiḥ asya	aja puras nī nābhi idam
1163	anu paścāt kavayaḥ yanti rebhāḥ	anu paścāt kavi i rebha
1163	upa pra agāt paramam yat sadhastham	upa pragā parama yad sadhastha
1163	arvān acchā pitaram mātaram ca	arvant acchā pitṛ mātṛ ca
1163	adyā devān juṣTatamaḥ hi gamyāḥ	adya deva juṣṭatama hi gam
1163	atha ā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi	atha śās dāś vārya
 ---
1164	asya vāmasya palitasya hotuḥ	idam vāma palita hotṛ
1164	tasya bhrātā madhyamaḥ asti aśnaḥ	tad bhrātṛ madhyama as aśna
1164	tṛtīyaḥ bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣThaḥ asya	tṛtīya bhrātṛ ghṛta pṛṣṭha idam
1164	atra apaśyam viśpatim saptaputram	atra paś viśpati saptan putra
1164	sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram	saptan yuj ratha eka cakra
1164	ekaḥ aśvaḥ vahati saptanāmā	eka aśva vah saptan nāman
1164	trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvam	tri nābhi cakra ajara anarva
1164	yatra imā viśvā bhuvanā adhi tasthuḥ	yatra idam viśva bhuvana adhi sthā
1164	imam ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ	idam ratha adhi yad saptan sthā
1164	saptacakram sapta vahanti aśvāḥ	saptan cakra saptan vah aśva
1164	sapta svasāraḥ abhi sam navante	saptan svasṛ abhi sam nū
1164	yatra gavām nihitā sapta nāma	yatra go nidhā saptan nāman
1164	kaḥ dadarśa prathamam jāyamānam	ka dṛś prathama jan
1164	asthanvantam yat anasthā bibharti	asthanvat yat anastha bhṛ
1164	bhūmyāḥ asuḥ asṛk ātmā kva svit	bhūmi asu asṛj ātman kva svid
1164	kaḥ vidvāṁsam upa gāt praṣTum etat	ka vid upa gā pracch etad
1164	pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasā avijānan	pāka pracch manas a vijñā
1164	devānām enā nihitā padāni	deva enā nidhā pada
1164	vatse baṣkaye adhi sapta tantūn	vatsa baṣkaya adhi saptan tantu
1164	vi tatnire kavayaḥ otavai u	vi tan kavi ve u
1164	acikitvān cikituṣaḥ cit atra	a cit cit cit atra
1164	kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān	kavi pracch vid na vid
1164	vi yaḥ tastambha ṣaT imā rajāṁsi	vi yad stambh ṣaṣ idam rajas
1164	ajasya rūpe kim api svit ekam	aja rūpa ka api svid eka
1164	iha bravītu yaḥ īm aṅga veda	iha brū yad īṃ aṅga vid
1164	asya vāmasya nihitam padam veḥ	idam vāma nidhā pada vi
1164	śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīram duhrate gāvaḥ asya	śīrṣan kṣīra duh go idam
1164	vavrim vasānāḥ udakam padā apuḥ	vavri vas udaka pad pā
1164	mātā pitaram ṛte ā babhāja	mātṛ pitṛ ṛta ā bhaj
1164	dhītī agre manasā sam hi jagme	dhīti agra manas sam hi gam
1164	sā bībhatsuḥ garbharasā nividdhā	tad bībhatsu garbha rasa nivyadh
1164	namasvantaḥ it upavākam īyuḥ	namasvat id upavāka i
1164	yuktā mātā āsīt dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ	yuj mātṛ as dhur dakṣiṇā
1164	atiṣThat garbhaḥ vṛjanīṣu antar	sthā garbha vṛjanī antar
1164	amīmet vatsaḥ anu gām apaśyat	mā vatsa anu go paś
1164	viśvarūpyam triṣu yojaneṣu	viśvarūpī tri yojana
1164	tisraḥ mātṛṛḥ trīn pitṛṛn bibhrat ekaḥ	tri mātṛ tri pitṛ bhṛ eka
1164	ūrdhvaḥ tasthau na īm ava glāpayanti	ūrdhva sthā na īṃ ava glāpay
1164	mantrayante divaḥ amuṣya pṛṣThe	mantray div adas pṛṣṭha
1164	viśvavidam vācam aviśvaminvām	viśva vid vāc a viśvaminva
1164	dvādaśāram nahi tat jarāya	dvādaśan ara nahi tad jara
1164	varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya	varvṛt cakra pari div ṛta
1164	ā putrāḥ agne mithunāsaḥ atra	ā putra agni mithuna atra
1164	sapta śatāni viṁśatiḥ ca tasthuḥ	saptan śata viṃśati ca sthā
1164	pañcapādam pitaram dvādaśākṛtim	pañcan pāda pitṛ dvādaśan ākṛti
1164	divaḥ āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam	div ah para ardha purīṣin
1164	atha ime anye upare vicakṣaṇam	atha idam anya upara vicakṣaṇa
1164	saptacakre ṣaLare āhuḥ arpitam	saptan cakra ṣaṣ ara ah arpay
1164	pañcāre cakre parivartamāne	pañcan ara cakra parivṛt
1164	tasmin ā tasthuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā	tad ā sthā bhuvana viśva
1164	tasya na akṣaḥ tapyate bhūribhāraḥ	tad na akṣa tap bhūri bhāra
1164	sanāt eva na śīryate sanābhiḥ	sanāt eva na śṛ sa nābhi
1164	sanemi cakram ajaram vi vāvṛte	sa nemi cakra ajara vi vṛt
1164	uttānāyām daśa yuktāḥ vahanti	uttāna daśan yuj vah
1164	sūryasya cakṣuḥ rajasā eti āvṛtam	sūrya cakṣus rajas i āvṛ
1164	tasmin ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā	tad ā arpay bhuvana viśva
1164	sākaṁjānām saptatham āhuḥ ekajam	sākaṃja saptatha ah ekaja
1164	ṣaT it yamāḥ ṛṣayaḥ devajāḥ iti	ṣaṣ id yama ṛṣi deva ja iti
1164	teṣām iṣTāni vihitāni dhāmaśaḥ	tad iṣ vidhā dhāmaśas
1164	sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ	sthātra rej vikṛ rūpaśas
1164	striyaḥ satīḥ tān u me puṁsaḥ āhuḥ	strī as tad u mad puṃs ah
1164	paśyat akṣaṇvān na vi cetat andhaḥ	paś akṣaṇvat na vi cit andha
1164	kaviḥ yaḥ putraḥ saḥ īm ā ciketa	kavi yad putra tad īṃ ā cit
1164	yaḥ tā vijānāt sa pituḥ pitā asat	yad tad vijñā tad pitṛ pitṛ as
1164	avaḥ pareṇa paraḥ enā avareṇa	avas para paras idam avara
1164	padā vatsam bibhratī gauḥ ut asthāt	pad vatsa bhṛ go ud sthā
1164	sā kadrīcī kam svit ardham parā agāt	tad kadryañc ka svid ardha parāgā
1164	kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antar	kva svid sū nahi yūtha antar
1164	avaḥ pareṇa pitaram yaḥ asya	avas para pitṛ yad idam
1164	anuveda paraḥ enā avareṇa	anuvid paras idam avara
1164	kavīyamānaḥ kaḥ iha pra vocat	kavīy ka iha pra vac
1164	devam manaḥ kutaḥ adhi prajātam	deva manas kutas adhi prajan
1164	ye arvāñcaḥ tān u parācaḥ āhuḥ	yad arvāñc tad u parāñc ah
1164	ye parāñcaḥ tān u arvācaḥ āhuḥ	yad parāñc tad u arvāñc ah
1164	indraḥ ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni	indra ca yad kṛ soma tad
1164	dhurā na yuktāḥ rajasaḥ vahanti	dhur na yuj rajas vah
1164	dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā	dvi suparṇa sayuj sakhi
1164	samānam vṛkṣam pari sasvajāte	samāna vṛkṣa pari svaj
1164	tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti	tad anya pippala svādu ad
1164	anaśnan anyaḥ abhi cākaśīti	an aś anya abhi cākaś
1164	yatrā suparṇāḥ amṛtasya bhāgam	yatra suparṇa amṛta bhāga
1164	animeṣam vidathā abhisvaranti	animeṣa vidatha abhisvar
1164	inaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ	ina viśva bhuvana gopā
1164	sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atra ā viveśa	tad mad dhīra pāka atra ā viś
1164	yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇāḥ	yad vṛkṣa madhvad suparṇa
1164	niviśante suvate ca adhi viśve	niviś sū ca adhi viśva
1164	tasya it āhuḥ pippalam svādu agre	tad id ah pippala svādu agra
1164	tat na ut naśat yaḥ pitaram na veda	tad na ud naś yad pitṛ na vid
1164	yat gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitam	yat gāyatra adhi gāyatra ādhā
1164	traiṣTubhāt vā traiṣTubham niratakṣata	traiṣṭubha vā traiṣṭubha nistakṣ
1164	yat vā jagat jagati āhitam padam	yat vā jagant jagant ādhā pada
1164	ye it tat viduḥ te amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ	yad id tad vid tad amṛta tva aś
1164	gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam	gāyatra prati mā arka
1164	arkeṇa sāma traiṣTubhena vākam	arka sāman traiṣṭubha vāka
1164	vākena vākam dvipadā catuṣpadā	vāka vāka dvipad catuṣpada
1164	akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ	akṣara mā saptan vāṇī
1164	jagatā sindhum divi astabhāyat	jagant sindhu div stabhāy
1164	rathaṁtare sūryam pari apaśyat	rathaṃtara sūrya pari paś
1164	gāyatrasya samidhaḥ tisraḥ āhuḥ	gāyatra samidh tri ah
1164	tataḥ mahnā pra ririce mahitvā	tatas mahan pra ric mahi tva
1164	upa hvaye sudughām dhenum etām	upa hvā su dugha dhenu etad
1164	suhastaḥ godhuk uta dohat enām	su hasta go duh uta duh enad
1164	śreṣTham savam savitā sāviṣat naḥ	śreṣṭha sava savitṛ sū mad
1164	abhīddhaḥ gharmaḥ tat u su pra vocam	abhīndh gharma tad u su pra vac
1164	hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnām	hiṃkṛ vasu patnī vasu
1164	vatsam icchantī manasā abhi ā agāt	vatsa iṣ manas abhi āgā
1164	duhām aśvibhyām payaḥ aghnyā iyam	duh aśvin payas aghnyā idam
1164	sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya	tad vṛdh mahat saubhaga
1164	gauḥ amīmet anu vatsam miṣantam	go mā anu vatsa miṣ
1164	mūrdhānam hiṅ akṛṇot mātavai u	mūrdhan hiṃ kṛ mā u
1164	sṛkvāṇam gharmam abhi vāvaśānā	sṛkvan gharma abhi vaś
1164	mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ	mā māyu pyā payas
1164	ayam sa śiṅkte yena gauḥ abhīvṛtā	idam tad śiñj yad go abhivṛ
1164	mimāti māyum dhvasanau adhi śritā	mā māyu dhvasani adhi śri
1164	sā cittibhiḥ ni hi cakāra martyam	tad citti ni hi kṛ martya
1164	vidyut bhavantī prati vavrim auhata	vidyut bhū prati vavri ūh
1164	anat śaye turagātu jīvam	an śī tura gātu jīva
1164	ejat dhruvam madhye ā pastyānām	ej dhruva madhya ā pastyā
1164	jīvaḥ mṛtasya carati svadhābhiḥ	jīva mṛ car svadhā
1164	amartyaḥ martyenā sayoniḥ	amartya martya sayoni
1164	apaśyam gopām anipadyamānam	paś gopā a nipad
1164	ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam	ā ca parā ca pathin car
1164	sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ	tad sadhryañc tad viṣvañc vas
1164	ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar	ā varvṛt bhuvana antar
1164	yaḥ īm cakāra na saḥ asya veda	yad īṃ kṛ na tad idam vid
1164	yaḥ īm dadarśa hiruk it nu tasmāt	yad īṃ dṛś hiruk id nu tad
1164	sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar	tad mātṛ yoni parivye antar
1164	bahuprajāḥ nirṛtim ā viveśa	bahuprajas nirṛti ā viś
1164	dyauḥ me pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra	div mad pitṛ janitṛ nābhi atra
1164	bandhuḥ me mātā pṛthivī mahī iyam	bandhu mad mātṛ pṛthivī mah idam
1164	uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antar	uttāna camū yoni antar
1164	atrā pitā duhituḥ garbham ā adhāt	atra pitṛ duhitṛ garbha ādhā
1164	pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ	pracch tvad para anta pṛthivī
1164	pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ	pracch yatra bhuvana nābhi
1164	pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ	pracch tvad vṛṣan aśva retas
1164	pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma	pracch vāc parama vyoman
1164	iyam vediḥ paraḥ antaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	idam vedi para anta pṛthivī
1164	ayam yajñaḥ bhuvanasya nābhiḥ	idam yajña bhuvana nābhi
1164	ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ	idam soma vṛṣan aśva retas
1164	brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma	brahman idam vāc parama vyoman
1164	sapta ardhagarbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ	saptan ardha garbha bhuvana retas
1164	viṣṇoḥ tiṣThanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi	viṣṇu sthā pradiś vidharman
1164	te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ	tad dhīti manas tad vipaścit
1164	paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ	paribhū pari bhū viśvatas
1164	na vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi	na vi jñā yad iva idam as
1164	niṇyaḥ saṁnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi	niṇya saṃnah manas car
1164	yadā mā ā agan prathamajāḥ ṛtasya	yadā mad gam prathama jā ṛta
1164	āt it vācaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ	āt id vāc aś bhāga idam
1164	apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ	apāñc prāñc i svadhā grah
1164	amartyaḥ martyenā sayoniḥ	amartya martya sayoni
1164	tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā	tad śaśvat viṣūcīna vī
1164	ni anyam cikyuḥ na ni cikyuḥ anyam	ni anya ci na ni ci anya
1164	ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman	ṛc akṣara parama vyoman
1164	yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ	yad deva adhi viśva niṣad
1164	yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati	yad tad na vid ka ṛc kṛ
1164	ye it tat viduḥ te ime sam āsate	yad id tad vid tad idam sam ās
1164	sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ	su yavasa bhagavat hi bhū
1164	atha u vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma	atho mad bhagavat as
1164	addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm	ad tṛṇa aghnyā viśvadānīm
1164	piba śuddham udakam ācarantī	pā śudh udaka ācar
1164	gaurīḥ mimāya salilāni takṣatī	gaurī mā salila takṣ
1164	ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī	ekapada dvipada tad catuṣpada
1164	aṣTāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī	aṣṭāpada navapada bhū
1164	sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman	sahasra akṣara parama vyoman
1164	tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti	tad samudra adhi vi kṣar
1164	tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ	tena jīv pradiś catur
1164	tataḥ kṣarati akṣaram	tatas kṣar akṣara
1164	tat viśvam upa jīvati	tad viśva upa jīv
1164	śakamayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam	śaka maya dhūma ārāt paś
1164	viṣūvatā paraḥ enā avareṇa	viṣūvat paras idam avara
1164	ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrāḥ	ukṣan pṛśni pac vīra
1164	tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan	tad dharman prathama as
1164	trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate	tri keśin ṛtuthā vi cakṣ
1164	saṁvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām	saṃvatsara vap eka idam
1164	viśvam ekaḥ abhi caṣTe śacībhiḥ	viśva eka abhi cakṣ śacī
1164	dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam	dhrāji eka dṛś na rūpa
1164	catvāri vāk parimitā padāni	catur vāc parimā pada
1164	tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ	tad vid brāhmaṇa yad manīṣin
1164	guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti	guhā tri nidhā na iṅgay
1164	turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti	turīya vāc manuṣya vad
1164	indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ	indra mitra varuṇa agni ah
1164	atha u divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān	atho divya tad suparṇa garutmant
1164	ekam sat viprā bahudhā vadanti	eka as vipra bahudhā vad
1164	agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ	agni yama mātariśvan ah
1164	kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ	kṛṣṇa niyāna hari suparṇa
1164	apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ut patanti	ap vas div ud pat
1164	te ā avavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya	tad āvṛt sadana ṛta
1164	āt it ghṛtena pṛthivī vi udyate	āt id ghṛta pṛthivī vi und
1164	dvādaśa pradhayaḥ cakram ekam	dvādaśan pradhi cakra eka
1164	trīṇi nabhyāni kaḥ u tat ciketa	tri nabhya ka u tad cit
1164	tasmin sākam triśatā na śaṅkavaḥ	tad sākam tri śata na śaṅku
1164	arpitāḥ ṣaṣTiḥ na calācalāsaḥ	arpay ṣaṣṭi na calācala
1164	yaḥ te stanaḥ śaśayaḥ yaḥ mayobhūḥ	yad tvad stana śaśaya yad mayas bhū
1164	yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi	yad viśva puṣ vārya
1164	yaḥ ratnadhāḥ vasuvit yaḥ sudatraḥ	yad ratna dhā vasu vid yad su dattra
1164	sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar	sarasvatī tad iha dhā kṛ
1164	yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ	yajña yajña yaj deva
1164	tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan	tad dharman prathama as
1164	te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta	tad ha nāka mahiman sac
1164	yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ	yatra pūrva sādhya as deva
1164	samānam etat udakam	samāna etad udaka
1164	ut ca eti ava ca ahabhiḥ	ud ca i ava ca aha
1164	bhūmim parjanyāḥ jinvanti	bhūmi parjanya jinv
1164	divam jinvanti agnayaḥ	div jinv agni
1164	divyam suparṇam vāyasam bṛhantam	divya suparṇa vāyasa bṛhat
1164	apām garbham darśatam oṣadhīnām	ap garbha darśata oṣadhi
1164	abhīpataḥ vṛṣTibhiḥ tarpayantam	abhīpatas vṛṣṭi tarpay
1164	sarasvantam avase johavīmi	sarasvant av johav
 ---
1165	kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīLāḥ	ka śubh savayas sanīḍa
1165	samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ	samānyā marut sam mikṣ
1165	kayā matī kutaḥ etāsaḥ ete	ka mati kutas e etad
1165	arcanti śuṣmam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasūyā	arc śuṣma vṛṣan vasūyā
1165	kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ	ka brahman juṣ yuvan
1165	kaḥ adhvare marutaḥ ā vavarta	ka adhvara marut ā vṛt
1165	śyenān iva dhrajataḥ antarikṣe	śyena iva dhraj antarikṣa
1165	kena mahā manasā rīramāma	ka mah manas ram
1165	kutaḥ tvam indra māhinaḥ san	kutas tvad indra māhina as
1165	ekaḥ yāsi satpate kim te itthā	eka yā satpati ka tvad itthā
1165	sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānaiḥ	sam pracch samṛch śubhāna
1165	voceḥ tat naḥ harivaḥ yat te asme	vac tad mad harivat yad tvad mad
1165	brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śam sutāsaḥ	brahman mad mati śam suta
1165	śuṣmaḥ iyarti prabhṛtaḥ me adriḥ	śuṣma ṛch prabhṛ mad adri
1165	ā śāsate prati haryanti ukthā	ā śās prati hary uktha
1165	imā harī vahataḥ tā naḥ accha	idam hari vah tad mad acchā
1165	ataḥ vayam antamebhiḥ yujānāḥ	atas mad antama yuj
1165	svakṣatrebhiḥ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ	svakṣatra tanū śubh
1165	mahobhiḥ etān upa yujmahe nu	mahas e upa yuj nu
1165	indra svadhām anu hi naḥ babhūtha	indra svadhā anu hi mad bhū
1165	kva syā vaḥ marutaḥ svadhā āsīt	kva tya tvad marut svadhā as
1165	yat mām ekam samadhatta ahihatye	yat mad eka saṃdhā ahi hatya
1165	aham hi ugraḥ taviṣaḥ tuviṣmān	mad hi ugra taviṣa tuviṣmat
1165	viśvasya śatroḥ anamam vadhasnaiḥ	viśva śatru nam vadhasna
1165	bhūri cakartha yujyebhiḥ asme	bhūri kṛ yujya mad
1165	samānebhiḥ vṛṣabha pauṁsyebhiḥ	samāna vṛṣabha pauṃsya
1165	bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣTha	bhūri hi kṛ śaviṣṭha
1165	indra kratvā marutaḥ yat vaśāma	indra kratu marut yat vaś
1165	vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ indriyeṇa	vadh vṛtra marut indriya
1165	svena bhāmena taviṣaḥ babhūvān	sva bhāma taviṣa bhū
1165	aham etāḥ manave viśvaścandrāḥ	mad etad manu viśva ścandra
1165	sugāḥ apaḥ cakara vajrabāhuḥ	su ga ap kṛ vajra bāhu
1165	anuttam ā te maghavan nakiḥ nu	anutta ā tvad maghavan nakir nu
1165	na tvāvān asti devatā vidānaḥ	na tvāvat as devatā vid
1165	na jāyamānaḥ naśate na jātaḥ	na jan naś na jan
1165	yāni kariṣyāḥ* kṛṇuhi pravṛddha	yad kṛ kṛ pravṛdh
1165	ekasya cit me vibhu astu ojaḥ	eka cit mad vibhu as ojas
1165	yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā	yad nu dhṛṣ kṛ manīṣā
1165	aham hi ūgraḥ marutaḥ vidānaḥ	mad hi ugra marut vid
1165	yāni cyavam indraḥ it īśe eṣām	yad cyu indra id īś idam
1165	amandat mā marutaḥ stomaḥ atra	mad mad marut stoma atra
1165	yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra	yad mad nṛ śrutya brahman kṛ
1165	indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyam	indra vṛṣan su makha mad
1165	sakhye sakhāyaḥ tanve tanūbhiḥ	sakhi sakhi tanū tanū
1165	eva it ete prati mā rocamānāḥ	eva id etad prati mad ruc
1165	anedyaḥ śravaḥ ā iṣaḥ dadhānāḥ	anedya śravas ā iṣ dhā
1165	saṁcakṣyā marutaḥ candravarṇāḥ	saṃcakṣ marut candra varṇa
1165	acchānta me chadayāthā ca nūnam	chand mad chaday ca nūnam
1165	kaḥ nu atra marutaḥ māmahe vaḥ	kṛ nu atra marut mah tvad
1165	pra yātana sakhīn acchā sakhāyaḥ	pra yā sakhi acchā sakhi
1165	manmāni citrāḥ apivātayantaḥ	manman citra apivātay
1165	eṣām bhūta navedāḥ me ṛtānām	idam bhū naveda mad ṛta
1165	ā yat duvasyāt duvase na kāruḥ	ā yat duvasy duvas na kāru
1165	asmān cakre mānyasya medhā	mad kṛ mānya medhā
1165	ā u su vartta marutaḥ vipram accha	ā u su vṛt marut vipra acchā
1165	imā brahmāṇi jaritā vaḥ arcat	idam brahman jaritṛ tvad arc
1165	eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ	etad tvad stoma marut idam gir
1165	māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ	māndārya mānya kāru
1165	ā iṣā yāsīṣTa tanve vayām	ā iṣ tanū vayā
1165	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1166	tat nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane	tad nu vac rabhasa janman
1166	pūrvam mahitvam vṛṣabhasya ketave	pūrva mahitva vṛṣabha ketu
1166	aidhā iva yāman marutaḥ tuviṣvaṇaḥ	aidha iva yāman marut tuviṣvan
1166	yudhā iva śakrāḥ taviṣāṇi kartana	yudh iva śakra taviṣa kṛ
1166	nityam na sūnum madhu bibhrataḥ upa	nitya na sūnu madhu bhṛ upa
1166	krīLanti krīLāḥ vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ	krīḍ krīḍa vidatha ghṛṣvi
1166	nakṣanti rudrāḥ avasā namasvinam	nakṣ rudra avas namasvin
1166	na mardhanti svatavasaḥ haviṣkṛtam	na mṛdh sva tavas haviṣkṛt
1166	yasmai ūmāsaḥ amṛtāḥ arāsata	yad ūma amṛta rā
1166	rāyaḥ poṣam ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe	rai poṣa ca havis dāś
1166	ukṣanti asmai marutaḥ hitāḥ iva	ukṣ idam marut hita iva
1166	purū rajāṁsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ	puru rajas payas mayobhu
1166	ā ye rajāṁsi taviṣībhiḥ avyata	ā yad rajas taviṣī vye
1166	pra vaḥ evāsaḥ svayatāsaḥ adhrajan	pra tvad eva sva yam dhraj
1166	bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā	bhī viśva bhuvana harmya
1166	citraḥ vaḥ yāmaḥ prayatāsu ṛṣTiṣu	citra tvad yāma prayam ṛṣṭi
1166	yat tveṣayāmāḥ nadayanta parvatān	yat tveṣa yāma naday parvata
1166	divaḥ vā pṛṣTham naryāḥ acucyavuḥ	div vā pṛṣṭha narya cyu
1166	viśvaḥ vaḥ ajman bhayate vanaspatiḥ	viśva tvad ajman bhī vanaspati
1166	rathīyantī iva pra jihīte oṣadhiḥ	rathīy iva pra hā oṣadhi
1166	yūyam naḥ ugrāḥ marutaḥ sucetunā	tvad mad ugra marut sucetunā
1166	ariṣTagrāmāḥ sumatim pipartana	ariṣṭa grāma sumati pṛ
1166	yatrā vaḥ didyut radati krivirdatī	yatra tvad didyut rad krivirdat
1166	riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhitā iva barhaṇā	ri paśu sudhita iva barhaṇā
1166	pra skambhadeṣṇāḥ anavabhrarādhasaḥ	pra skambha deṣṇa anavabhra rādhas
1166	alātṛṇāsaḥ vidatheṣu suṣTutāḥ	alātṛṇa vidatha suṣṭuta
1166	arcanti arkam madirasya pītaye	arc arka madira pā
1166	viduḥ vīrasya prathamāni pauṁsyā	vid vīra prathama pauṃsya
1166	śatabhujibhiḥ tam abhihruteḥ aghāt	śata bhuji tad abhihruti agha
1166	pūrbhiḥ rakṣatā marutaḥ yam āvata	pur rakṣ marut yad av
1166	janam yam ugrāḥ tavasaḥ virapśinaḥ	jana yad ugra tavas virapśin
1166	pāthanā śaṁsāt tanayasya puṣTiṣu	pā śaṃsa tanaya puṣṭi
1166	viśvāni bhadrā marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ	viśva bhadra marut ratha tvad
1166	mithaspṛdhyā iva taviṣāṇi āhitā	mithaspṛdhya iva taviṣa ādhā
1166	aṁseṣu ā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayaḥ	aṃsa ā tvad prapatha khādi
1166	akṣaḥ vaḥ cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte	akṣa tvad cakra samayā vi vṛt
1166	bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu	bhūri bhadra narya bāhu
1166	vakṣassu rukmāḥ rabhasāsaḥ añjayaḥ	vakṣas rukma rabhasa añji
1166	aṁseṣu etāḥ paviṣu kṣurāḥ adhi	aṃsa eta pavi kṣura adhi
1166	vayaḥ na pakṣān vi anu śriyaḥ dhire	vi na pakṣa vi anu śrī
1166	mahāntaḥ mahnā vibhvaḥ vibhūtayaḥ	mahat mahan vibhu vibhūti
1166	dūredṛśaḥ ye divyāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ	dūredṛś yad divya iva star
1166	mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāraḥ āsabhiḥ	mandra su jihvā svaritṛ āsan
1166	sammiślāḥ indre marutaḥ pariṣTubhaḥ	sammiśla indra marut pariṣṭubh
1166	tat vaḥ sujātāḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam	tad tvad su jan marut mahitvana
1166	dīrgham vaḥ dātram aditeḥ iva vratam	dīrgha tvad dātra aditi iva vrata
1166	indraḥ cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti tat	indra cana tyajas vi hvṛ tad
1166	janāya yasmai sukṛte arādhvam	jana yad su kṛt rā
1166	tat vaḥ jāmitvam marutaḥ pare yuge	tad tvad jāmi tva marut para yuga
1166	purū yat śaṁsam amṛtāsaḥ āvata	puru yat śaṃsa amṛta av
1166	ayā dhiyā manave śruṣTim āvyā	idam dhī manu śruṣṭi āvi
1166	sākam naraḥ daṁsanaiḥ ā cikitrire	sākam nṛ daṃsana ā cit
1166	yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma	yad dīrgha marut śvi
1166	yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ	yuṣmāka parīṇas tura
1166	ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsaḥ	ā yad tan vṛjana jana
1166	ebhiḥ yajñebhiḥ tat abhi iṣTim aśyām	idam yajña tad abhīṣṭi aś
1166	eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ	etad tvad stoma marut idam gir
1166	māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ	māndārya mānya kāru
1166	ā iṣā yāsīṣTa tanve vayām	ā iṣ tanū vayā
1166	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1167	sahasram te indra ūtayaḥ naḥ	sahasra tvad indra ūti mad
1167	sahasram iṣaḥ harivaḥ gūrtatamāḥ	sahasra iṣ harivat gūrtatama
1167	sahasram rāyaḥ mādayadhyai	sahasra rai māday
1167	sahasriṇaḥ upa naḥ yantu vājāḥ	sahasrin upa mad i vāja
1167	ā naḥ avobhiḥ marutaḥ yāntu acchā	ā mad avas marut yā acchā
1167	jyeṣThebhiḥ vā bṛhaddivaiḥ sumāyāḥ	jyeṣṭha vā bṛhaddiva su māyā
1167	adha yat eṣām niyutaḥ paramāḥ	adha yat idam niyut parama
1167	samudrasya cit dhanayanta pāre	samudra cit dhanay pāra
1167	mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī	myakṣ yad sudhita ghṛtāñc
1167	hiraṇyanirṇik uparā na ṛṣTiḥ	hiraṇya nirṇij upara na ṛṣṭi
1167	guhā carantī manuṣaḥ na yoṣā	guhā car manus na yoṣā
1167	sabhāvatī vidathyā iva sam vāk	sabhāvat vidathya iva sam vāc
1167	parā śubhrāḥ ayāsaḥ yavyā	parā śubhra ayās yavyā
1167	sādhāraṇyā iva marutaḥ mimikṣuḥ	sādhāraṇa iva marut myakṣ
1167	na rodasī apa nudanta ghorāḥ	na rodasī apa nud ghora
1167	juṣanta vṛdham sakhyāya devāḥ	juṣ vṛdh sakhya deva
1167	joṣat yat īm asuryā sacadhyai	juṣ yat īṃ asurya sac
1167	viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ	viṣā stukā rodasī nṛmaṇas
1167	ā sūryā iva vidhataḥ ratham gāt	ā sūrya iva vidh ratha gā
1167	tveṣapratīkā nabhasaḥ na ityā	tveṣa pratīka nabhas na ityā
1167	ā sthāpayanta yuvatim yuvānaḥ	āsthāpay yuvati yuvan
1167	śubhe nimiṣlām vidatheṣu pajrām	śubha nimiśla vidatha pajra
1167	arkaḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ haviṣmān	arka yat tvad marut haviṣmat
1167	gāyat gātham sutasomaḥ duvasyan	gā gātha su soma duvasy
1167	pra tam vivakmi vakmyaḥ yaḥ eṣām	pra tad vac vakmya yad idam
1167	marutām mahimā satyaḥ asti	marut mahiman satya as
1167	sacā yat īm vṛṣamaṇāḥ ahaṁyuḥ	sacā yat īṃ vṛṣamaṇas ahaṃyu
1167	sthirā cit janīḥ vahate subhāgāḥ	sthira cit janī vah subhāga
1167	pānti mitrāvaruṇau avadyāt	pā mitrāvaruṇa avadya
1167	cayate īm aryamā u apraśastān	ci īṃ aryaman u apraśasta
1167	uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi	uta cyu acyuta dhruva
1167	vāvṛdhe īm marutaḥ dātivāraḥ	vṛdh īṃ marut dāti vāra
1167	nahī nu vaḥ marutaḥ anti asme	nahi nu tvad marut anti mad
1167	ārāttāt cit śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ	ārāttāt cit śavas anta āp
1167	te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṁsaḥ	tad dhṛṣṇu śavas śvi
1167	arṇaḥ na dveṣaḥ dhṛṣatā pari sthuḥ	arṇas na dveṣas dhṛṣat pari sthā
1167	vayam adya indrasya preṣThāḥ	mad adya indra preṣṭha
1167	vayam śvaḥ vocemahi samarye	mad śvas vac samarya
1167	vayam purā mahi ca naḥ anu dyūn	mad purā mahi ca mad anu div
1167	tat naḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ narām anu syāt	tad mad ṛbhukṣan nṛ anu as
1167	eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ	etad tvad stoma marut idam gir
1167	māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ	māndārya mānya kāru

1167	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1168	yajñāyajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇiḥ	yajña yajña tvad samanā tuturvaṇi
1168	dhiyaṁdhiyam vaḥ devayāḥ u dadhidhve	dhī dhī tvad deva yā u dhā
1168	ā vaḥ arvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyoḥ	ā tvad arvāñc suvita rodasī
1168	mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ	mah vṛt avas suvṛkti
1168	vavrāsaḥ na ye svajāḥ svatavasaḥ	vavra na yad sva ja sva tavas
1168	iṣam svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ	iṣ svar abhijan dhūti
1168	sahasriyāsaḥ apām na ūrmayaḥ	sahasriya ap na ūrmi
1168	āsā gāvaḥ vandyāsaḥ na ukṣaṇaḥ	ās go vand na ukṣan
1168	somāsaḥ na ye sutāḥ tṛptāṁśavaḥ	soma na yad su tṛp aṃśu
1168	hṛtsu pītāsaḥ duvasaḥ na āsate	hṛd pā duvas na ās
1168	ā eṣām aṁseṣu rambhiṇī iva rārabhe	ā idam aṃsa rambhiṇī iva rabh
1168	hasteṣu khādiḥ ca kṛtiḥ ca sam dadhe	hasta khādi ca kṛti ca sam dhā
1168	ava svayuktāḥ divaḥ ā vṛthā yayuḥ	ava sva yuj div ā vṛthā yā
1168	amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā	amartya kaśā cud tman
1168	areṇavaḥ tuvijātāḥ acucyavuḥ	areṇu tuvi jan cyu
1168	dṛLhāni cit marutaḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	dṛḍha cit marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi
1168	kaḥ vaḥ antar marutaḥ ṛṣTividyutaḥ	ka tvad antar marut ṛṣṭi vidyut
1168	rejati tmanā hanvā iva jihvayā	rej tman hanu iva jihvā
1168	dhanvacyutaḥ iṣām na yāmani	dhanvan cyut iṣ na yāman
1168	purupraiṣāḥ ahanyaḥ na etaśaḥ	puru praiṣa ahanya na etaśa
1168	kva svit asya rajasaḥ mahaḥ param	kva svid idam rajas mah para
1168	kva avaram marutaḥ yasmin āyaya	kva avara marut yad āyā
1168	yat cyāvayatha vithurā iva saṁhitam	yat cyāvay vithura iva saṃdhā
1168	vi adriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam	vi adri pat tveṣa arṇava
1168	sātiḥ na vaḥ amavatī svarvatī	sāti na tvad amavat svarvat
1168	tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī	tveṣa vipāka marut pipiṣvat
1168	bhadrā vaḥ rātiḥ pṛṇataḥ na dakṣiṇā	bhadra tvad rāti pṛṇ na dakṣiṇā
1168	pṛthujrayī asuryā iva jañjatī	pṛthujraya asurya iva jañj
1168	prati stobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyaḥ	prati stubh sindhu pavi
1168	yat abhriyām vācam udīrayanti	yat abhriya vāc udīray
1168	ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyām	ava smi vidyut pṛthivī
1168	yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti	yadi ghṛta marut pruṣ
1168	asūta pṛśniḥ mahate raṇāya	sū pṛśni mahat raṇa
1168	tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam	tveṣa ayās marut anīka
1168	te sapsarāsaḥ janayanta abhvam	tad sapsara janay abhva
1168	āt it svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan	āt id svadhā iṣira pari paś
1168	eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ	etad tvad stoma marut idam gir
1168	māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ	māndārya mānya kāru
1168	ā iṣā yāsīṣTa tanve vayām	ā iṣ yā tanū vayā
1168	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1169	mahaḥ cit tvam indra yataḥ etān	mah cit tvad indra i etad
1169	mahaḥ cit asi tyajasaḥ varūtā	mah cit as tyajas varūtṛ
1169	sa naḥ vedhaḥ marutām cikitvān	tad mad vedhas marut cit
1169	sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣThā	sumna van tvad hi preṣṭha
1169	ayujran te indra viśvakṛṣTīḥ	yuj tad indra viśvakṛṣṭi
1169	vidānāsaḥ niṣṣidhaḥ martyatrā	vid niṣṣidh martyatrā
1169	marutām pṛtsutiḥ hāsamānā	marut pṛtsuti hās
1169	svarmīLhasya pradhanasya sātau	svarmīḍha pradhana sāti
1169	amyak sā te indra ṛṣTiḥ asme	myakṣ tad tvad indra ṛṣṭi mad
1169	sanemi abhvam marutaḥ junanti	sanemi abhva marut jū
1169	agniḥ cit hi sma atase śuśukvān	agni cit hi sma atasa śuc
1169	āpaḥ na dvīpam dadhati prayāṁsi	ap na dvīpa dhā prayas
1169	tvam tū naḥ indra tam rayim dāḥ	tvad tu mad indra tad rayi dā
1169	ojiṣThayā dakṣiṇayā iva rātim	ojiṣṭha dakṣiṇā iva rāti
1169	stutaḥ ca yāḥ te cakananta vāyoḥ	stut ca yad tvad vāyu
1169	stanam na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ	stana na madhu pyā vāja
1169	tve rāyaḥ indra tośatamāḥ	tvad rai indra tośatama
1169	praṇetāraḥ kasya cit ṛtāyoḥ	praṇī ka cit ṛtāyu
1169	te su naḥ marutaḥ mṛLayantu	tad su mad marut mṛḍay
1169	ye smā purā gātūyanti iva devāḥ	yad sma purā gātuy iva deva
1169	prati pra yāhi indra mīLhuṣaḥ nṛṛn	prati pra yā indra mih nṛ
1169	mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva	mah pārthiva sadana yat
1169	adha yat eṣām pṛthubudhnāsaḥ etāḥ	adha yat idam pṛthu budhna eta
1169	tīrthe na aryaḥ pauṁsyāni tasthuḥ	tīrtha na ari pauṃsya sthā
1169	prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām	prati ghora eta ayās
1169	marutām śṛṇve āyatām upabdiḥ	marut śru e upabdi
1169	ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmaiḥ	yad martya pṛtanāy ūma
1169	ṛṇāvānam na patayanta sargaiḥ	ṛṇāvan na patay sarga
1169	tvam mānebhyaḥ indra viśvajanyāḥ	tvad māna indra viśvajanya
1169	radā marudbhiḥ śurudhaḥ goagrāḥ	rad marut śurudh go agra
1169	stavānebhiḥ stavase deva devaiḥ	stu stu deva deva
1169	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1170	na nūnam asti na u śvaḥ	na nūnam as na u śvas
1170	kaḥ tat veda yat adbhutam	ka tad vid yad adbhuta
1170	anyasya cittam abhi saṁcareṇyam	anya citta abhi saṃcar
1170	uta ādhītam vi naśyati	uta adhī vi naś
1170	kim naḥ indra jighāṁsasi	kim mad indra jighāṃs
1170	bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava	bhrātṛ marut tvad
1170	tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā	tad kﾱp sādhuyā
1170	mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ	mā mad samaraṇa vadh
1170	kim naḥ bhrātar agastya	kim mad bhrātṛ agastya
1170	sakhā san ati manyase	sakhi as ati man
1170	vidmā hi te yathā manaḥ	vid hi tvad yathā manas
1170	asmabhyam it na ditsasi	mad id na dits
1170	aram kṛṇvantu vedim	aram kṛ vedi
1170	sam agnim indhatām puraḥ	sam agni indh puras
1170	tatra amṛtasya cetanam	tatra amṛta cetana
1170	yajñam te tanavāvahai	yajña tvad tan
1170	tvam īśiṣe vasupate vasūnām	tvad īś vasu pati vasu
1170	tvam mitrāṇām mitrapate dheṣThaḥ	tvad mitra mitra pati dheṣṭha
1170	indra tvam marudbhiḥ sam vadasva	indra tvad marut sam vad
1170	adha pra aśāna ṛtuthā havīṁṣi	adha prāś ṛtuthā havis
 ---
1171	prati vaḥ enā namasā aham emi	prati tvad idam namas mad i
1171	sūktena bhikṣe sumatim turāṇām	sūkta bhikṣ sumati tura
1171	rarāṇatā marutaḥ vedyābhiḥ	ran marut vedyā
1171	ni heLaḥ dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān	ni heḍas dhā vi muc aśva
1171	eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ namasvān	etad tvad stoma marut namasvat
1171	hṛdā taṣTaḥ manasā dhāyi devāḥ	hṛd takṣ manas dhā deva
1171	upa īm ā yāta manasā juṣāṇāḥ	upa īṃ ā yā manas juṣ
1171	yūyam hi sthā namasaḥ it vṛdhāsaḥ	tvad hi as namas id vṛdha
1171	stutāsaḥ naḥ marutaḥ mṛLayantu	stu mad marut mṛḍay
1171	uta stutaḥ maghavā śambhaviṣThaḥ	uta stu maghavan śambhaviṣṭha
1171	ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāni	ūrdhva mad as komya vana
1171	ahāni viśvā marutaḥ jigīṣā	ahar viśva marut jigīṣā
1171	asmāt aham taviṣāt īṣamāṇaḥ	idam mad taviṣa īṣ
1171	indrāt bhiyā marutaḥ rejamānaḥ	indra bhī marut rej
1171	yuṣmabhyam havyā niśitāni āsan	tvad havya niśā as
1171	tāni āre cakṛmā mṛLatā naḥ	tad āre kṛ mṛḍ mad
1171	yena mānāsaḥ citayante usrāḥ	yad māna citay usrā
1171	vyuṣTiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām	vyuṣṭi śavas śaśvat
1171	sa naḥ marudbhiḥ vṛṣabha śravaḥ dhāḥ	tad mad marut vṛṣabha śravas dhā
1171	ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ sthaviraḥ sahodāḥ	ugra ugra sthavira sahas dā
1171	tvam pāhi indra sahīyasaḥ nṛṛn	tvad pā indra sahīyas nṛ
1171	bhavā marudbhiḥ avayātaheLāḥ	bhū marut avayā heḍas
1171	supraketebhiḥ sāsahiḥ dadhānaḥ	su praketa sāsahi dhā
1171	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1172	citraḥ vaḥ astu yāmaḥ	citra tvad as yāma
1172	citraḥ ūtī sudānavaḥ	citra ūti sudānu
1172	marutaḥ ahibhānavaḥ	marut ahi bhānu
1172	āre sā vaḥ sudānavaḥ	āre tad tvad sudānu
1172	marutaḥ ṛñjatī śaruḥ	marut ṛj śaru
1172	āre aśmā yam asyatha	āre aśman yad as
1172	tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ	tṛṇaskanda nu viś
1172	pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ	pari vṛj sudānu
1172	ūrdhvān naḥ karta jīvase	ūrdhva mad kṛ jīv
 ---
1173	gāyat sāma nabhanyam yathā veḥ	gā sāman nabhanya yathā vi
1173	arcāma tat vāvṛdhānam svarvat	arc tad vṛdh svarvat
1173	gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ barhiṣi adabdhāḥ	go dhenu barhis adabdha
1173	ā yat sadmānam divyam vivāsān	ā yat sadman divya vivās
1173	arcat vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyaiḥ	arc vṛṣan vṛṣan sveduhavya
1173	mṛgaḥ na aśnaḥ ati yat juguryāt	mṛga na aśna ati yat gur
1173	pra mandayuḥ manām gūrta hotā	pra mandayu manā gur hotṛ
1173	bharate maryaḥ mithunā yajatraḥ	bhṛ marya mithuna yajatra
1173	nakṣat hotā pari sadma mitā yan	nakṣ hotṛ pari sadman mā i
1173	bharat garbham ā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	bhṛ garbha ā śarad pṛthivī
1173	krandat aśvaḥ nayamānaḥ ruvat gauḥ	krand aśva nī ru go
1173	antar dūtaḥ na rodasī carat vāk	antar dūta na rodas car vāc
1173	tā karma aṣatarā asmai	tad kṛ aṣatara idam
1173	pra cyautnāni devayantaḥ bharante	pra cyautna devay bhṛ
1173	jujoṣat indraḥ dasmavarcāḥ	juṣ indra dasma varcas
1173	nāsatyā iva sugmyaḥ ratheṣThāḥ	nāsatya iva sugmya ratheṣṭhā
1173	tam u stuhi indram yaḥ ha satvā	tad u stu indra yad ha satvan
1173	yaḥ śūraḥ maghavā yaḥ ratheṣThāḥ	yad śūra maghavan yad ratheṣṭhā
1173	pratīcaḥ cit yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān	pratyañc cit yodhīyas vṛṣaṇvat
1173	vavavruṣaḥ cit tamasaḥ vihantā	varīvar cit tamas vihantṛ
1173	pra yat itthā mahinā nṛbhyaḥ asti	pra yat itthā mahina nṛ as
1173	aram rodasī kakṣye na asmai	aram rodas kakṣyā na idam
1173	sam vivye indraḥ vṛjanam na bhūmā	sam vye indra vṛjana na bhūman
1173	bharti svadhāvān opaśam iva dyām	bhṛ svadhāvat opaśa iva div
1173	samatsu tvā śūra satām urāṇam	samad tvad śūra as vṛ
1173	prapathintamam paritaṁsayadhyai	prapathintama paritaṃsay
1173	sajoṣasaḥ indram made kṣoṇīḥ	sajoṣas indra mada kṣoṇī
1173	sūrim cit ye anumadanti vājaiḥ	sūri cit yad anumad vāja
1173	evā hi te śam savanā samudre	eva hi tvad śam savana samudra
1173	āpaḥ yat te āsu madanti devīḥ	ap yat tvad idam mad deva
1173	viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūt gauḥ	viśva tvad anu joṣya bhū go
1173	sūrīn cit yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān	sūri cit yadi dhiṣā vī jana
1173	asāma yathā suṣakhāyaḥ ena	as yathā su sakhi idam
1173	svabhiṣTayaḥ narām na śaṁsaiḥ	su abhiṣṭi nṛ na śaṃsa
1173	asat yathā naḥ indraḥ vandaneṣThāḥ	as yathā mad indra vandaneṣṭhā
1173	turaḥ na karma nayamānaḥ ukthā	tura na karman nī uktha
1173	viṣpardhasaḥ narām na śaṁsaiḥ	viṣpardhas nṛ na śaṃsa
1173	asmāka asat indraḥ vajrahastaḥ	asmāka as indra vajra hasta
1173	mitrāyuvaḥ na pūrpatim suśiṣTau	mitrāyu na pūrpati su śiṣṭi
1173	madhyāyuvaḥ upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ	madhyāyu upa śikṣ yajña
1173	yajñaḥ hi sma indram kaḥ cit ṛndhan	yajña hi sma indra kaścit ṛdh
1173	juhurāṇaḥ cit manasā pariyan	hvṛ cit manas parī
1173	tīrthe na acchā tātṛṣāṇam okaḥ	tīrtha na acchā tṛṣ oka
1173	dīrghaḥ na sidhram ā kṛṇoti adhvā	dīrgha na sidhra ā kṛ adhvan
1173	mā u sū naḥ indra atra pṛtsu devaiḥ	mā u su mad indra atra pṛt deva
1173	asti hi smā te śuṣmin avayāḥ	as hi sma tvad śuṣmin avayāj
1173	mahaḥ cit yasya mīLhuṣaḥ yavyā	mah cit yad mih yavyā
1173	haviṣmataḥ marutaḥ vandate gīḥ	haviṣmat marut vand gir
1173	eṣa stomaḥ indra tubhyam asme	etad stoma indra tvad mad
1173	etena gātum harivaḥ vidaḥ naḥ	etad gātu harivat vid mad
1173	ā naḥ vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva	ā mad vṛt suvita deva
1173	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1174	tvam rājā indra ye ca devāḥ	tvad rājan indra yad ca deva
1174	rakṣā nṛṛn pāhi asura tvam asmān	rakṣ nṛ pā asura tvad mad
1174	tvam satpatiḥ maghavā naḥ tarutraḥ	tvad satpati maghavan mad tarutra
1174	tvam satyaḥ vasavānaḥ sahodāḥ	tvad satya vasavāna sahas dā
1174	danaḥ viśaḥ indra mṛdhravācaḥ	dan viś indra mṛdhravāc
1174	sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīḥ dart	saptan yat pur śarman śārada dṛ
1174	ṛṇoḥ apaḥ anavadya arṇāḥ	ṛch ap anavadya arṇa
1174	yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ	yuvan vṛtra purukutsa radh
1174	ajā vṛtaḥ indra śūrapatnīḥ	aj vṛt indra śūra patnī
1174	dyām ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam	div ca yad puruhūta nūnam
1174	rakṣa u agnim aśuṣam tūrvayāṇam	rakṣ agni aśuṣa tūrvayāṇa
1174	siṁhaḥ na dame apāṁsi vastoḥ	siṃha na dama apas vastu
1174	śeṣan nu te indra sasmin yonau	śī nu tad indra tad yoni
1174	praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā	praśasti pavīrava mahan
1174	sṛjat arṇāṁsi ava yat yudhā gāḥ	sṛj arṇas ava yat yudh go
1174	tiṣThat harī dhṛṣatā mṛṣTa vājān	sthā hari dhṛṣ mṛj vāja
1174	vaha kutsam indra yasmin cākan	vah kutsa indra yad kan
1174	syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasya aśvā	syūmanyu ṛjra vāta aśva
1174	pra sūraḥ cakram vṛhatāt abhīke	pra svar cakra vṛh abhīka
1174	abhi spṛdhaḥ yāsiṣat vajrabāhuḥ	abhi spṛdh yā vajra bāhu
1174	jaghanvān indra mitrerūn	han indra mitreru
1174	codapravṛddhaḥ harivaḥ adāśūn	coda pravṛdh harivat a dāśu
1174	pra ye paśyan aryamaṇam sacā āyoḥ	pra yad paś aryaman sacā āyu
1174	tvayā śūrtāḥ vahamānāḥ apatyam	tvad śṛ vah apatya
1174	rapat kaviḥ indra arkasātau	rap kavi indra arka sāti
1174	kṣām dāsāya upabarhaṇīm kar	kṣā dāsa upabarhaṇī kṛ
1174	karat tisraḥ maghavā dānucitrāḥ	kṛ tri maghavan dānu citra
1174	ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhi śret	ni duryoṇa kuyavāc mṛdh śri
1174	sanā tā te indra navyāḥ ā aguḥ	sana tad tvad indra navya āgā
1174	sahaḥ nabhaḥ aviraṇāya pūrvīḥ	sah nabh aviraṇa puru
1174	bhinat puraḥ na bhidaḥ adevīḥ	bhid pur na bhid adeva
1174	nanamaḥ vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ	nam vadhar adeva pīyu
1174	tvam dhuniḥ indra dhunimatīḥ	tvad dhuni indra dhunimat
1174	ṛṇoḥ apaḥ sīrāḥ na sravantīḥ	ṛch ap sīrā na sru
1174	pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi	pra yat samudra ati śūra pṛ
1174	pārayā turvaśam yadum svasti	pāray turvaśa yadu svasti
1174	tvam asmākam indra viśvadha syāḥ	tvad mad indra viśvadha as
1174	avṛkatamaḥ narām nṛpātā	avṛkatama nṛ nṛ pātṛ
1174	sa naḥ viśvāsām spṛdhām sahodāḥ	tad mad viśva spṛdh sahas dā
1174	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1175	matsi apāyi te mahaḥ	mad pā tvad mah
1175	pātrasya iva harivaḥ matsaraḥ madaḥ	pātra iva harivat matsara mada
1175	vṛṣā te vṛṣṇe induḥ	vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan indu
1175	vājī sahasrasātamaḥ	vājin sahasra sātama
1175	ā naḥ te gantu matsaraḥ	ā mad tvad gam matsara
1175	vṛṣā madaḥ vareṇyaḥ	vṛṣan mada vareṇya
1175	sahāvān indra sānasiḥ	sahāvat indra sānasi
1175	pṛtanāṣāT amartyaḥ	pṛtanāṣāh amartya
1175	tvam hi śūraḥ sanitā	tvad hi śūra san
1175	codayaḥ manuṣaḥ ratham	coday manus ratha
1175	sahāvān dasyum avratam	sahāvat dasyu avrata
