1175	oṣaḥ pātram na śociṣā	uṣ pātra na śocis
1175	muṣāya sūryam kave	muṣāy sūrya kavi
1175	cakram īśānaḥ ojasā	cakra īś ojas
1175	vaha śuṣṇāya vadham	vah śuṣṇa vadha
1175	kutsam vātasya aśvaiḥ	kutsa vāta aśva
1175	śuṣmintamaḥ hi te madaḥ	śuṣmintama hi tvad mada
1175	dyumnintamaḥ uta kratuḥ	dyumnintama uta kratu
1175	vṛtraghnā varivovidā	vṛtra han varivas vid
1175	maṁsīṣThāḥ aśvasātamaḥ	man aśva sātama
1175	yathā pūrvebhyaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ indra	yathā pūrva jaritṛ indra
1175	mayaḥ iva āpaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha	mayas iva ap na tṛṣ bhū
1175	tām anu tvā nividam johavīmi	tad anu tvad nivid johav
1175	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1176	matsi naḥ vasyaiṣTaye	mad mad vasyaiṣṭi
1176	indram indo vṛṣā ā viśa	indra indu vṛṣan viś
1176	ṛghāyamāṇaḥ invasi	ṛghāy inv
1176	śatrum anti na vindasi	śatru anti na vid
1176	tasmin ā veśayā giraḥ	tad ā veśay gir
1176	yaḥ ekaḥ carṣaṇīnām	yad eka carṣaṇi
1176	anu svadhā yam upyate	anu svadhā yad vap
1176	yavam na carkṛṣat vṛṣā	yava na carkṛṣ vṛṣan
1176	yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ	yad viśva hasta
1176	pañca kṣitīnām vasu	pañcan kṣiti vasu
1176	spāśayasva yaḥ asmadhruk	spāśay yad asmadruh
1176	divyā iva aśaniḥ jahi	divya iva aśani han
1176	asunvantam samam jahi	a su sama hā
1176	dūṇāśam yaḥ na te mayaḥ	dūṇāśa yad na tvad mayas
1176	asmabhyam asya vedanam	mad idam vedana
1176	daddhi sūriḥ cit ohate	dā sūri cit ūh
1176	āvaḥ yasya dvibarhasaḥ	av yad dvibarhas
1176	arkeṣu sānuṣak asat	arka sānuṣak as
1176	ājau indrasya indo	āji indra indu
1176	pra āvaḥ vājeṣu vājinam	prāv vāja vājin
1176	yathā pūrvebhyaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ indra	yathā pūrva jaritṛ indra
1176	mayaḥ iva āpaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha	mayas iva ap na tṛṣ bhū
1176	tām anu tvā nividam johavīmi	tad anu tvad nivid johav
1176	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1177	ā carṣaṇiprāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ janānām	ā carṣaṇi prā vṛṣabha jana
1177	rājā kṛṣTīnām puruhūtaḥ indraḥ	rājan kṛṣṭi puruhūta indra
1177	stutaḥ śravasyan avasā upa madrik	stu śravasy avas upa madrik
1177	yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā ā yāhi arvāṅ	yuj hari vṛṣan yā arvāñc
1177	ye te vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣabhāsaḥ indra	yad tvad vṛṣan vṛṣabha indra
1177	brahmayujaḥ vṛṣarathāsaḥ atyāḥ	brahman yuj vṛṣan ratha atya
1177	tān ā tiṣTha tebhiḥ ā yāhi arvāṅ	tad ā sthā tad ā yā arvāñc
1177	havāmahe tvā sute indra some	hvā tvad su indra soma
1177	ā tiṣTha ratham vṛṣaṇam vṛṣā te	ā sthā ratha vṛṣan vṛṣan tvad
1177	sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni	su soma pariṣic madhu
1177	yuktvā vṛṣabhyām vṛṣabha kṣitīnām	yuj vṛṣan vṛṣabha kṣiti
1177	haribhyām yāhi pravatā upa madrik	hari yā pravat upa madrik
1177	ayam yajñaḥ devayāḥ ayam miyedhaḥ	idam yajña deva yā idam miyedha
1177	imā brahmāṇi ayam indra somaḥ	idam brahman idam indra soma
1177	stīrṇam barhiḥ ā tu śakra pra yāhi	stṛ barhis ā tu śakra pra yā
1177	pibā niṣadya vi mucā harī iha	pā niṣad vi muc hari iha
1177	ā u suṣTutaḥ indra yāhi arvāṅ	ā u suṣṭuta indra yā arvāñc
1177	upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ	upa brahman mānya kāru
1177	vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ	vid vastu avas gṛ
1177	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1178	yat ha syā te indra śruṣTiḥ asti	yat ha tvad indra śruṣṭi as
1178	yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhyaḥ ūtī	yad bhū jaritṛ ūti
1178	mā naḥ kāmam mahayantam ā dhak	mā mad kāma mahay ā dagh
1178	viśvā te aśyām pari āpaḥ āyoḥ	viśva tvad aś pari āp āyu
1178	na ghā rājā indraḥ ā dabhat naḥ	na gha rājan indra ā dabh mad
1178	yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau	yad nu svasṛ kṛ yoni
1178	āpaḥ cit asmai sutukāḥ aveṣan	ap cit idam sutuka viṣ
1178	gamat naḥ indraḥ sakhyā vayaḥ ca	gam mad indra sakhya vayas ca
1178	jetā nṛbhiḥ indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ	ji nṛ indra pṛt śūra
1178	śrotā havam nādhamānasya kāroḥ	śru hava nādh kāru
1178	prabhartā ratham dāśuṣaḥ upāke	prabhṛ ratha dāś upāka
1178	udyantā giraḥ yadi ca tmanā bhūt	udyam gir yadi ca tman bhū
1178	evā nṛbhiḥ indraḥ suśravasyā	eva nṛ indra su śravasyā
1178	prakhādaḥ pṛkṣaḥ abhi mitriṇaḥ bhūt	prakhāda pṛkṣa abhi mitrin bhū
1178	samarye iṣaḥ stavate vivāci	samarya iṣ stu vivāc
1178	satrākaraḥ yajamānasya śaṁsaḥ	satrākara yaj śaṃsa
1178	tvayā vayam maghavan indra śatrūn	tvad mad maghavan indra śatru
1178	abhi syāma mahataḥ manyamānān	abhi as mahat man
1178	tvam trātā tvam u naḥ vṛdhe bhūḥ	tvad trā tvad u mad vṛdh bhū
1178	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1179	pūrvīḥ aham śaradaḥ śaśramāṇā	puru mad śarad śram
1179	doṣāḥ vastoḥ uṣasaḥ jarayantīḥ	doṣā vastu uṣas jaray
1179	mināti śriyam jarimā tanūnām	mī śrī jariman tanū
1179	api ū nu patnīḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ jagamyuḥ	api u nu patnī vṛṣan gam
1179	ye cit hi pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ āsan	yad cit hi pūrva ṛtasāp as
1179	sākam devebhiḥ avadan ṛtāni	sākam deva vad ṛta
1179	te cit ava asuḥ nahi antam āpuḥ	tad cit ava as nahi anta āp
1179	sam ū nu patnīḥ vṛṣabhiḥ jagamyuḥ	sam u nu patnī vṛṣan gam
1179	na mṛṣā śrāntam yat avanti devāḥ	na mṛṣā śrānta yad av deva
1179	viśvāḥ it spṛdhaḥ abhi aśnavāva	viśva id spṛdh abhi aś
1179	jayāva it atra śatanītham ājim	ji id atra śata nīthā āji
1179	yat samyañcā mithunau abhi ajāva	yat samyañc mithuna abhi aj
1179	nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāmaḥ ā agan	nada mad rudh kāma āgam
1179	itaḥ ājātaḥ amutaḥ kutaḥ cit	itas ājan amutas kutaścid
1179	lopāmudrā vṛṣaṇam niḥ riṇāti	lopāmudrā vṛṣan niḥ ri
1179	dhīram adhīrā dhayati śvasantam	dhīra adhīra dhā śvas
1179	imam nu somam antitaḥ	idam nu soma antitas
1179	hṛtsu pītam upa bruve	hṛd pā upa brū
1179	yat sīm āgaḥ cakṛmā tat su mṛLatu	yat sīm āgas kṛ tad su mṛḍ
1179	pulukāmaḥ hi martyaḥ	pulu kāma hi martya
1179	agastyaḥ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ	agastya khan khanitra
1179	prajām apatyam balam icchamānaḥ	prajā apatya bala iṣ
1179	ubhau varṇau ṛṣiḥ ugraḥ pupoṣa	ubh varṇa ṛṣi ugra puṣ
1179	satyāḥ deveṣu āśiṣaḥ jagāma	satya deva āśis gam
 ---
1180	yuvoḥ rajāṁsi suyamāsaḥ aśvāḥ	tvad rajas su yama aśva
1180	rathaḥ yat vām pari arṇāṁsi dīyat	ratha yat tvad pari arṇas dī
1180	hiraṇyayāḥ vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan	hiraṇyaya tvad pavi pruṣāy
1180	madhvaḥ pibantau uṣasaḥ sacethe	madhu pā uṣas sac
1180	yuvam atyasya ava nakṣathaḥ yat	tvad atya ava nakṣ yad
1180	vipatmanaḥ naryasya prayajyoḥ	vipatman narya prayajyu
1180	svasā yat vām viśvagūrtī bharāti	svasṛ yat tvad viśva gūrti bhṛ
1180	vājāya īTTe madhupau iṣe ca	vāja īḍ madhu pā iṣ ca
1180	yuvam payaḥ usriyāyām adhattam	tvad payas usriyā dhā
1180	pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvyam goḥ	pakva āma ava pūrvya go
1180	antar yat vaninaḥ vām ṛtapsū	antar yad vanin tvad ṛtapsu
1180	hvāraḥ na śuciḥ yajate haviṣmān	hvāra na śuci yaj haviṣmat
1180	yuvam ha gharmam madhumantam atraye	tvad ha gharma madhumat atri
1180	apaḥ na kṣodaḥ avṛṇītam eṣe	apas na kṣodas vṛ eṣa
1180	tat vām narau aśvinā paśvaiṣTiḥ	tad tvad nara aśvin paśvaiṣṭi
1180	rathyā iva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ	rathyā iva cakra prati i madhu
1180	ā vām dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā	ā tvad dāna vṛt dasra
1180	goḥ ohena taugryaḥ na jivriḥ	go oha taugrya na jivri
1180	apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vām	ap kṣoṇī sac māhina tvad
1180	jūrṇaḥ vām akṣuḥ aṁhasaḥ yajatrā	jṛ tvad akṣu aṃhas yajatra
1180	ni yat yuvethe niyutaḥ sudānū	ni yat yu niyut su dānu
1180	upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ puraṁdhim	upa svadhā sṛj puraṃdhi
1180	preṣat veṣat vātaḥ na sūriḥ	vī vāta na sūri
1180	ā mahe dade suvrataḥ na vājam	ā mah dā suvrata na vāja
1180	vayam cit hi vām jaritāraḥ satyāḥ	mad cit hi tvad jaritṛ satya
1180	vipanyāmahe vi paṇiḥ hitāvān	vipan vi paṇi hitāvat
1180	adhā cit hi sma aśvinau anindyā	adha cit hi sma aśvin anindya
1180	pāthaḥ hi smā vṛṣaṇau antidevam	pā hi sma vṛṣan antideva
1180	yuvam cit hi sma aśvinau anu dyūn	tvad cit hi sma aśvin anu div
1180	virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau	virudra prasravaṇa sāti
1180	agastyaḥ narām nṛṣu praśastaḥ	agastya nṛ nṛ praśaṃs
1180	kārādhunī iva citayat sahasraiḥ	kārādhunī iva citay sahasra
1180	pra yat vahethe mahinā rathasya	pra yat vah mahina ratha
1180	pra syandrā yāthaḥ manuṣaḥ na hotā	pra syandra yā manus na hotṛ
1180	dhattam sūribhyaḥ uta vā svaśvyam	dhā sūri uta vā su aśvya
1180	nāsatyā rayiṣācaḥ syāma	nāsatya rayiṣac as
1180	tam vām ratham vayam adyā huvema	tad tvad ratha mad adya hu
1180	stomaiḥ aśvinā suvitāya navyam	stoma aśvin suvita navya
1180	ariṣTanemim pari dyām iyānam	ariṣṭa nemi pari div i
1180	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1181	kat u preṣThau iṣām rayīṇām	ka u preṣṭha iṣ rayi
1181	adhvaryantā yat unninīthaḥ apām	adhvary yad unnī ap
1181	ayam vām yajñaḥ akṛta praśastim	idam tvad yajña kṛ praśasti
1181	vasudhitī avitārā janānām	vasu dhiti avitṛ jana
1181	ā vām aśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspāḥ	ā tvad aśva śuci payaspā
1181	vātaraṁhasaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ	vāta raṃhas divya atya
1181	manojuvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vītapṛṣThāḥ	manas jū vṛṣan vīta pṛṣṭha
1181	ā iha svarājaḥ aśvinā vahantu	ā iha svarāj aśvin vah
1181	ā vām rathaḥ avaniḥ na pravatvān	ā tvad ratha avani na pravatvat
1181	sṛpravandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ	sṛpra vandhura suvita gam
1181	vṛṣṇaḥ sthātārā manasaḥ javīyān	vṛṣan sthātṛ manas javīyas
1181	ahampūrvaḥ yajataḥ dhiṣṇyā yaḥ	ahampūrva yajata dhiṣṇya yad
1181	iheha jātā sam avāvaśītām	iha iha jan sam vāś
1181	arepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ	arepas tanū nāman sva
1181	jiṣṇuḥ vām anyaḥ sumakhasya sūriḥ	jiṣṇu tvad anya su makha sūri
1181	divaḥ anyaḥ subhagaḥ putraḥ ūhe	div anya subhaga putra ūh
1181	pra vām niceruḥ kakuhaḥ vaśān anu	pra tvad niceru kakuha vaśa anu
1181	piśaṅgarūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ	piśaṅga rūpa sadana gam
1181	harī anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ	hari anya pyā vāja
1181	mathrā rajāṁsi aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ	mathra rajas aśvin vi ghoṣa
1181	pra vām śaradvān vṛṣabhaḥ na niṣṣāT	pra tvad śaradvat vṛṣabha na niṣṣāh
1181	pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ carati madhvaḥ iṣṇan	puru iṣ car madhu iṣ
1181	evaiḥ anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ	eva anya pyā vāja
1181	veṣantīḥ ūrdhvāḥ nadyaḥ naḥ ā aguḥ	viṣ ūrdhva nadī mad āgā
1181	asarji vām sthavirā vedhasā gīḥ	sṛj tvad sthavira vedhas gir
1181	bāLhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī	bāḍha aśvin tredhā kṣar
1181	upastutau avatam nādhamānam	upastu av nādh
1181	yāman ayāman śṛṇutam havam me	yāman a yāman śru hava mad
1181	uta syā vām ruśataḥ vapsasaḥ gīḥ	uta tya tvad ruśat vapsas gir
1181	tribarhiṣi sadasi pinvate nṛṛn	tri barhis sadas pinv nṛ
1181	vṛṣā vām meghaḥ vṛṣaṇā pīpāya	vṛṣan tvad megha vṛṣan pyā
1181	goḥ na seke manuṣaḥ daśasyan	go na seka manus daśasy
1181	yuvām pūṣā iva aśvinā puraṁdhiḥ	tvad pūṣan iva aśvin purandhi
1181	agnim uṣām na jarate haviṣmān	agni uṣā na jṛ haviṣmat
1181	huve yat vām varivasyā gṛṇānaḥ	hvā yat tvad varivasyā gṛ
1181	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1182	abhūt idam vayunam ā u su bhūṣatā	bhū idam vayuna ā u su bhūṣ
1182	rathaḥ vṛṣaṇvān madatā manīṣiṇaḥ	ratha vṛṣaṇvat mad manīṣin
1182	dhiyaṁjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalāvasū	dhiyaṃjinva dhiṣṇya viśpalā vasu
1182	divaḥ napātā sukṛte śucivratā	div napāt sukṛt śuci vrata
1182	indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā	indratama hi dhiṣṇya maruttama
1182	dasrā daṁsiṣThā rathyā rathītamā	dasra daṃsiṣṭha rathya rathītama
1182	pūrṇam ratham vahethe madhvaḥ ācitam	pṛ ratha vah madhu āci
1182	tena dāśvāṁsam upa yāthaḥ aśvinā	tad dāś upa yā aśvin
1182	kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe	ka atra dasra kṛ ka ās
1182	janaḥ yaḥ kaḥ cit ahaviḥ mahīyate	jana yad ka cit a havis mahīy
1182	ati kramiṣTam juratam paṇeḥ asum	ati kram jṛ paṇi asu
1182	jyotiḥ viprāya kṛṇutam vacasyave	jyotis vipra kṛ vacasyu
1182	jambhayatam abhitaḥ rāyataḥ śunaḥ	jambhay abhitas śvan
1182	hatam mṛdhaḥ vidathuḥ tāni aśvinā	han mṛdh vid tad aśvin
1182	vācaṁvācam jarituḥ ratninīm kṛtam	vāc vāc jaritṛ ratnin kṛ
1182	ubhā śaṁsam nāsatyā avatam mama	ubh śaṃsa nāsatya av mad
1182	yuvam etam cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam	tvad etad kṛ sindhu plava
1182	ātmanvantam pakṣiṇam taugryāya kam	ātmanvat pakṣin taugrya kaṃ
1182	yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ	yad devatrā manas nirvah
1182	supaptanī petathuḥ kṣodasaḥ mahaḥ	supaptani pat kṣodas mah
1182	avaviddham taugryam apsu antar	avavyadh taugrya ap antar
1182	anārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham	anārambhaṇa tamas pravyadh
1182	catasraḥ nāvaḥ jaThalasya juṣTāḥ	catur nau jaṭhala juṣ
1182	ut aśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti	ud aśvin iṣ pāray
1182	kaḥ svit vṛkṣaḥ niṣThitaḥ madhye arṇasaḥ	ka svid vṛkṣa niṣṭhā madhya arṇas
1182	yam taugryaḥ nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat	yad taugrya nādh pariṣvaj
1182	parṇā mṛgasya pataroḥ iva ārabhe	parṇa mṛga pataru iva ārabh
1182	ut aśvinau ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam	ud aśvin vah śromata kaṃ
1182	tat vām narā nāsatyau anu syāt	tad tvad nara nāsatya anu as
1182	yat vām mānāsaḥ ucatham avocan	yad tvad māna ucatha vac
1182	asmāt adya sadasaḥ somyāt ā	idam adya sadas somya ā
1182	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1183	tam yuñjāthām manasaḥ yaḥ javīyān	tad yuj manas yad javīyas
1183	trivandhuraḥ vṛṣaṇā yaḥ tricakraḥ	tri vandhura vṛṣan yad tri cakra
1183	yena upayāthaḥ sukṛtaḥ duroṇam	yad upayā su kṛt duroṇa
1183	tridhātunā patathaḥ viḥ na parṇaiḥ	tri dhātu pat vi na parṇa
1183	suvṛt rathaḥ vartate yan abhi kṣām	suvṛt ratha vṛt i abhi kṣā
1183	yat tiṣThathaḥ kratumantā anu pṛkṣe	yat sthā kratumat anu pṛkṣ
1183	vapuḥ vapuṣyā sacatām iyam gīḥ	vapus vapuṣyā sac idam gir
1183	divaḥ duhitrā uṣasā sacethe	div duhitṛ uṣas sac
1183	ā tiṣThatam suvṛtam yaḥ rathaḥ vām	ā sthā suvṛt yad ratha tvad
1183	anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān	anu vrata vṛt haviṣmat
1183	yena narā nāsatyā iṣayadhyai	yad nṛ nāsatya iṣay
1183	vartiḥ yāthaḥ tanayāya tmane ca	vartis yā tanaya tman ca
1183	mā vām vṛkaḥ mā vṛkīḥ ā dadharṣīt	mā tvad vṛka mā vṛkī ā dhṛṣ
1183	mā pari varktam uta mā ati dhaktam	mā pari vṛj uta mā ati dagh
1183	ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ iyam gīḥ	idam tvad bhāga nidhā idam gir
1183	dasrau ime vām nidhayaḥ madhūnām	dasra idam tvad nidhi madhu
1183	yuvām gotamaḥ purumīLhaḥ atriḥ	tvad gotama purumīḍha atri
1183	dasrā havate avase haviṣmān	dasra hvā av haviṣmat
1183	diśam na diṣTām ṛjūyā iva yantā	diś na diś ṛjūyā iva i
1183	ā me havam nāsatyā upa yātam	mad hava nāsatya upa yā
1183	atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya	tṛ tamas pāra idam
1183	prati vām stomaḥ aśvinau adhāyi	prati tvad stoma aśvin dhā
1183	ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ devayānaiḥ	ā iha yā pathin deva yāna
1183	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1184	tā vām adya tau aparam huvema	tad tvad adya tad apara hu
1184	ucchantyām uṣasi vahniḥ ukthaiḥ	vas uṣas vahni uktha
1184	nāsatyā kuha cit santau aryaḥ	nāsatya kuha cit as ari
1184	divaḥ napātā sudāstarāya	div napāt sudāstara
1184	asme ū su vṛṣaṇā mādayethām	mad u su vṛṣan māday
1184	ut paṇīn hatam ūrmyā madantā	ud paṇi han ūrmi mad
1184	śrutam me acchoktibhiḥ matīnām	śru mad acchokti mati
1184	eṣTā narā nicetārā ca karṇaiḥ	āyaj nṛ nicetṛ ca karṇa
1184	śriye pūṣan iṣukṛtā iva devā	śrī pūṣan iṣukṛt iva deva
1184	nāsatyā vahatum sūryāyāḥ	nāsatya vahatu sūryā
1184	vacyante vām kakuhāḥ apsu jātāḥ	vañc tvad kakuha ap jan
1184	yugā jūrṇā iva varuṇasya bhūreḥ	yuga jṛ iva varuṇa bhūri
1184	asme sā vām mādhvī rātiḥ astu	mad tad tvad mādhvī rāti as
1184	stomam hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ	stoma hi mānya kāru
1184	anu yat vām śravasyā sudānū	anu yat tvad śravasya su dānu
1184	suvīryāya carṣaṇayaḥ madanti	su vīrya carṣaṇi mad
1184	eṣa vām stomaḥ aśvinau akāri	etad tvad stoma aśvin kṛ
1184	mānebhiḥ maghavānā suvṛkti	māna maghavan suvṛkti
1184	yātam vartiḥ tanayāya tmane ca	yā vartis tanaya tman ca
1184	agastye nāsatyā madantā	agastya nāsatya mad
1184	atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya	tṛ tamas pāra idam
1184	prati vām stomaḥ aśvinau adhāyi	prati tvad stoma aśvin dhā
1184	ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ devayānaiḥ	ā iha yā pathin deva yāna
1184	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1185	katarā pūrvā katarā aparā ayoḥ	katara pūrva katara apara idam
1185	kathā jāte kavayaḥ kaḥ vi veda	kathā jan kavi ka vi vid
1185	viśvam tmanā bibhṛtaḥ yat ha nāma	viśva tman bhṛ yad ha nāman
1185	vi vartete ahanī cakriyā iva	vi vṛt ahar cakriya iva
1185	bhūrim dve acarantī carantam	bhūri dvi a car car
1185	padvantam garbham apadī dadhāte	padvat garbha apada dhā
1185	nityam na sūnum pitroḥ upasthe	nitya na sūnu pitṛ upastha
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	anehaḥ dātram aditeḥ anarvam	anehas dātra aditi anarva
1185	huve svarvat avadham namasvat	hvā svarvat avadha namasvat
1185	tat rodasī janayatam jaritre	tad rodas janay jaritṛ
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	atapyamāne avasā avantī	a tap avas av
1185	anu syāma rodasī devaputre	anu as rodas deva putra
1185	ubhe devānām ubhayebhiḥ ahnām	ubh deva ubhaya ahar
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	saṁgacchamāne yuvatī samante	saṃgam yuvatī samanta
1185	svasārā jāmī pitroḥ upasthe	svasṛ jāmi pitṛ upastha
1185	abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhim	abhighrā bhuvana nābhi
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena	urvī sadman bṛhat ṛta
1185	huve devānām avasā janitrī	hvā deva avas janitrī
1185	dadhāte ye amṛtam supratīke	dhā yad amṛta su pratīka
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante	urvī pṛthvī bahula dūreanta
1185	upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin	upa brū namas yajña idam
1185	dadhāte ye subhage supratūrtī	dhā yad subhaga su pratūrti
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	devān vā yat cakṛmā kat cit āgaḥ	deva vā yad kṛ kaścit āgas
1185	sakhāyam vā sadam it jāspatim vā	sakhi vā sadam id jāspati vā
1185	iyam dhīḥ bhūyāḥ avayānam eṣām	idam dhī bhū avayāna idam
1185	dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt	div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva
1185	ubhā śaṁsā naryā mām aviṣTām	ubh śaṃsa narya mad av
1185	ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām	ubh mad ūti avas sac
1185	bhūri cit aryaḥ sudāstarāya	bhūri cit ari sudāstara
1185	iṣā madantaḥ iṣayema devāḥ	iṣ mad iṣay deva
1185	ṛtam dive tat avocam pṛthivyai	ṛta div tad vac pṛthivī
1185	abhiśrāvāya prathamam sumedhāḥ	abhiśrāva prathama sumedhas
1185	pātām avadyāt duritāt abhīke	pā avadya durita abhīka
1185	pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ	pitṛ mātṛ ca rakṣ avas
1185	idam dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu	idam dyāvāpṛthivī satya as
1185	pitar mātar yat iha upabruve vām	pitṛ mātṛ yad iha upabrū tvad
1185	bhūtam devānām avame avobhiḥ	bhū deva avama avas
1185	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1186	ā naḥ iLābhiḥ vidathe suśasti	ā mad iḍā vidatha su śasti
1186	viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ etu	viśvānara savitṛ deva i
1186	api yathā yuvānaḥ matsathā naḥ	api yathā yuvan mad mad
1186	viśvam jagat abhipitve manīṣā	viśva jagant abhipitva manīṣā
1186	ā naḥ viśve āskrāḥ gamantu devāḥ	ā mad viśva āskra gam deva
1186	mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ	mitra aryaman varuṇa sajoṣas
1186	bhuvan yathā naḥ viśve vṛdhāsaḥ	bhū yathā mad viśva vṛdha
1186	karan suṣāhā vithuram na śavaḥ	kṛ vithura na śavas
1186	preṣTham vaḥ atithim gṛṇīṣe	preṣṭha tvad atithi gṛ
1186	agnim śastibhiḥ turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ	agni śasti turvaṇi sajoṣas
1186	asat yathā naḥ varuṇaḥ sukīrtiḥ	as yathā mad varuṇa su kīrti
1186	iṣaḥ ca parṣat arigūrtaḥ sūriḥ	iṣ ca pṛ ari gur sūri
1186	upa vaḥ ā īṣe namasā jigīṣā	upa tvad iṣ namas jigīṣā
1186	uṣāsānaktā sudughā iva dhenuḥ	uṣāsānaktā su dugha iva dhenu
1186	samāne ahan vimimānaḥ arkam	samāna ahar vimā arka
1186	viṣurūpe payasi sasmin ūdhan	viṣurūpa payas tad ūdhas
1186	uta naḥ ahiḥ budhnyaḥ mayaḥ kar	uta mad ahi budhnya mayas kṛ
1186	śiśum na pipyuṣī iva veti sindhuḥ	śiśu na pyā iva vī sindhu
1186	yena napātam apām junāma	yad napāt ap jū
1186	manojuvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yam vahanti	manas jū vṛṣan yad vah
1186	uta naḥ īm tvaṣTā ā gantu acchā	uta mad īṃ tvaṣṭṛ gam acchā
1186	smat sūribhiḥ abhipitve sajoṣāḥ	smat sūri abhipitva sajoṣas
1186	ā vṛtrahā indraḥ carṣaṇiprāḥ	ā vṛtrahan indra carṣaṇi prā
1186	tuviṣTamaḥ narām naḥ iha gamyāḥ	tuviṣṭama nṛ mad iha gam
1186	uta naḥ īm matayaḥ aśvayogāḥ	uta mad īṃ mati aśva yoga
1186	śiśum na gāvaḥ taruṇam rihanti	śiśu na go taruṇa rih
1186	tam īm giraḥ janayaḥ na patnīḥ	tad īṃ gir jani na patnī
1186	surabhiṣTamam narām nasanta	surabhiṣṭama nṛ nas
1186	uta naḥ īm marutaḥ vṛddhasenāḥ	uta mad īṃ marut vṛdh senā
1186	smat rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu	smat rodas samanas sad
1186	pṛṣadaśvāsaḥ avanayaḥ na rathāḥ	pṛṣat aśva avani na ratha
1186	riśādasaḥ mitrayujaḥ na devāḥ	riśādas mitra yuj na deva
1186	pra nu yat eṣām mahinā cikitre	pra nu yat idam mahina cit
1186	pra yuñjate prayujaḥ te suvṛkti	pra yuj prayuj tad suvṛkti
1186	adha yat eṣām sudine na śaruḥ	adha yat idam sudina na śaru
1186	viśvam ā iriṇam pruṣāyanta senāḥ	viśva ā iriṇa pruṣāy senā
1186	pra u aśvinau avase kṛṇudhvam	pra u aśvin av kṛ
1186	pra pūṣaṇam svatavasaḥ hi santi	pra pūṣan sva tavas hi as
1186	adveṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ vātaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ	a dveṣa viṣṇu vāta ṛbhukṣan
1186	acchā sumnāya vavṛtīya devān	acchā sumna vṛt deva
1186	iyam sā vaḥ asme dīdhitiḥ yajatrāḥ	idam tad tvad mad dīdhiti yajatra
1186	apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyāḥ	apiprāṇa ca sadana ca bhū
1186	ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyuḥ	ni yad deva yat vasūyu
1186	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1187	pitum nu stoṣam	pitu nu stu
1187	mahaḥ dharmāṇam taviṣīm	mah dharman taviṣī
1187	yasya tritaḥ vi ojasā	yad trita vi ojas
1187	vṛtram viparvam ardayat	vṛtra viparva arday
1187	svādo pito madho pito	svādu pitṛ madhu pitṛ
1187	vayam tvā vavṛmahe	mad tvad vṛ
1187	asmākam avitā bhava	mad av bhū
1187	upa naḥ pito ā cara	upa mad pitu ā car
1187	śivaḥ śivābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	śiva śiva ūti
1187	mayobhuḥ adviṣeṇyaḥ	mayobhu adviṣeṇya
1187	sakhā suśevaḥ advayāḥ	sakhi su śeva advayas
1187	tava tye pito rasāḥ	tvad tya pitu rasa
1187	rajāṁsi anu viṣThitāḥ	rajas anu viṣṭhā
1187	divi vātāḥ iva śritāḥ	div vāta iva śri
1187	tava tye pito dadataḥ	tvad tya pitu dā
1187	tava svādiṣTha te pito	tvad svādiṣṭha tad pitu
1187	pra svādmānaḥ rasānām	pra svādman rasa
1187	tuvigrīvāḥ iva īrate	tuvi grīvā iva īr
1187	tve pito mahānām	tvad pitu maha
1187	devānām manaḥ hitam	deva manas dhā
1187	akāri cāru ketunā	kṛ cāru ketu
1187	tava ahim avasā avadhīt	tvad ahi avas vadh
1187	yat adaḥ pito ajagan	yat adas pitu gam
1187	vivasva parvatānām	vivasvan parvata
1187	atrā cit naḥ madho pito	atra cit mad madhu pitu
1187	aram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ	aram bhakṣa gam
1187	yat apām oṣadhīnām	yat ap oṣadhi
1187	pariṁśam āriśāmahe	pariṃśa āriś
1187	vātāpe pīvaḥ it bhava	vāta āpi pīvas id bhū
1187	yat te soma gavāśiraḥ	yat tvad soma go āśir
1187	yavāśiraḥ bhajāmahe	yava āśir bhaj
1187	vātāpe pīvaḥ it bhava	vāta āpi pīvas id bhū
1187	karambhaḥ oṣadhe bhava	karambha oṣadhi bhū
1187	pīvaḥ vṛkkaḥ udārathiḥ	pīvas vṛkka udārathi
1187	vātāpe pīvaḥ it bhava	vāta āpi pīvas id bhū
1187	tam tvā vayam pito	tad tvad mad pitu
1187	vacobhiḥ gāvaḥ na havyā suṣūdima	vacas go na havya sūd
1187	devebhyaḥ tvā sadhamādam	deva tvad sadhamāda
1187	asmabhyam tvā sadhamādam	mad tvad sadhamāda
 ---
1188	samiddhaḥ adya rājasi	samindh adya rāj
1188	devaḥ devaiḥ sahasrajit	deva deva sahasra jit
1188	dūtaḥ havyā kaviḥ vaha	dūta havya kavi vah
1188	tanūnapāt ṛtam yate	tanūnapāt ṛta i
1188	madhvā yajñaḥ sam ajyate	madhu yajña sam añj
1188	dadhat sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ	dhā sahasrin iṣ
1188	ājuhvānaḥ naḥ īḍyaḥ	āhu mad īḍ
1188	devān ā vakṣi yajñiyān	deva ā vah yajñiya
1188	agne sahasrasāḥ asi	agni sahasra sā as
1188	prācīnam barhiḥ ojasā	prācīna barhis ojas
1188	sahasravīram astṛṇan	sahasra vīra stṛ
1188	yatra ādityāḥ virājatha	yatra āditya virāj
1188	virāT samrāT vibhvīḥ prabhvīḥ	virāj samrāj vibhu prabhu
1188	bahvīḥ ca bhūyasīḥ ca yāḥ	bahu ca bhūyas ca yad
1188	duraḥ ghṛtāni akṣaran	dvār ghṛta kṣar
1188	surukme hi supeśasā	su rukma hi supeśas
1188	adhi śriyā virājataḥ	adhi śrī virāj
1188	uṣāsau ā iha sīdatām	uṣas ā iha sad
1188	prathamā hi suvācasā	prathama hi suvācas
1188	hotārā daivyā kavī	hotṛ daivya kavi
1188	yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam	yajña mad yaj idam
1188	bhārati iLe sarasvati	bhāratī iḍā sarasvatī
1188	yāḥ vaḥ sarvāḥ upabruve	yad tvad sarva upabrū
1188	tāḥ naḥ codayata śriye	tad mad coday śrī
1188	tvaṣTā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ	tvaṣṭṛ rūpa hi prabhu
1188	paśūn viśvān samānaje	paśu viśva samañj
1188	teṣām naḥ sphātim ā yaja	tad mad sphāti ā yaj
1188	upa tmanyā vanaspate	upa tmanī vanaspati
1188	pāthaḥ devebhyaḥ sṛja	pāthas deva sṛj
1188	agniḥ havyāni siṣvadat	agni havya svad
1188	purogāḥ agniḥ devānām	purogā agni deva
1188	gāyatreṇa sam ajyate	gāyatra sam añj
1188	svāhākṛtīṣu rocate	svāhākṛtī ruc
 ---
1189	agne naya supathā rāye asmān	agni nī su pathin rai mad
1189	viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān	viśva deva vayuna vid
1189	yuyodhi asmat juhurāṇam enaḥ	yu mad hvṛ enas
1189	bhūyiṣThām te namauktim vidhema	bhūyiṣṭha tvad namaukti vidh
1189	agne tvam pārayā navyaḥ asmān	agni tvad pāray navyas mad
1189	svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā	svasti ati durga viśva
1189	pūḥ ca pṛthvī bahulā naḥ urvī	pur ca pṛthu bahula mad uru
1189	bhavā tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ	bhū toka tanaya śam yos
1189	agne tvam asmat yuyodhi amīvāḥ	agni tvad mad yu amīvā
1189	anagnitrāḥ abhi amanta kṛṣTīḥ	an agni trā abhi am kṛṣṭi
1189	punar asmabhyam suvitāya deva	punar mad suvita deva
1189	kṣām viśvebhiḥ amṛtebhiḥ yajatra	kṣā viśva amṛta yajatra
1189	pāhi naḥ agne pāyubhiḥ ajasraiḥ	pā mad agni pāyu ajasra
1189	uta priye sadane ā śuśukvān	uta priya sadana ā śuc
1189	mā te bhayam jaritāram yaviṣTha	mā tvad bhaya jaritṛ yaviṣṭha
1189	nūnam vidat mā aparam sahasvaḥ	nūnam vid mā apara sahasvat
1189	mā naḥ agne ava sṛjaḥ aghāya	mā mad agni ava sṛj agha
1189	aviṣyave ripave ducchunāyai	aviṣyu ripu ducchunā
1189	mā datvate daśate mā adate naḥ	mā datvat daṃś mā ad mad
1189	mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ	mā riṣ sahasāvat parā dā
1189	vi gha tvāvān ṛtajāta yaṁsat	vi gha tvāvat ṛta jan yam
1189	gṛṇānaḥ agne tanve varūtham	gṛ agni tanū varūtha
1189	viśvāt ririkṣoḥ uta vā ninitsoḥ	viśva ririkṣu uta vā ninitsu
1189	abhihrutām asi hi deva viṣpaT	abhihrut as hi deva viṣpaś
1189	tvam tān agne ubhayān vi vidvān	tvad tad agni ubhaya vi vid
1189	veṣi prapitve manuṣaḥ yajatra	vī prapitva manus yajatra
1189	abhipitve manave śāsyaḥ bhūḥ	abhipitva manu śās bhū
1189	marmṛjenyaḥ uśigbhiḥ na akraḥ	marmṛjenya uśij na akra
1189	avocāma nivacanāni asmin	vac nivacana idam
1189	mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau	māna sūnu sah agni
1189	vayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema	mad sahasra ṛṣi san
1189	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1190	anarvāṇam vṛṣabham mandrajihvam	anarvan vṛṣabha mandra jihvā
1190	bṛhaspatim vardhayā navyam arkaiḥ	bṛhaspati vardhay navya arka
1190	gāthānyaḥ surucaḥ yasya devāḥ	gāthānī su ruc yad deva
1190	āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ	āśru nū marta
1190	tam ṛtviyāḥ upa vācaḥ sacante	tad ṛtviya upa vāc sac
1190	sargaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji	sarga na yad devay sṛj
1190	bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi añjaḥ varāṁsi	bṛhaspati tad hi añjas varas
1190	vibhvā abhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā	vibhvan bhū sam ṛta mātariśvan
1190	upastutim namasaḥ udyatim ca	upastuti namas udyati ca
1190	ślokam yaṁsat savitā iva pra bāhū	śloka yam savitṛ iva pra bāhu
1190	asya kratvā ahanyaḥ yaḥ asti	idam kratu ahanya yad as
1190	mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ arakṣasaḥ tuviṣmān	mṛga na bhīma arakṣas tuviṣmat
1190	asya ślokaḥ divi īyate pṛthivyām	idam śloka div i pṛthivī
1190	atyaḥ na yaṁsat yakṣabhṛt vicetāḥ	atya na yam yakṣa bhṛt vicetas
1190	mṛgāṇām na hetayaḥ yanti ca imāḥ	mṛga na heti i ca idam
1190	bṛhaspateḥ ahimāyān abhi dyūn	bṛhaspati ahi māyā abhi div
1190	ye tvā deva usrikam manyamānāḥ	yad tvad deva usrika man
1190	pāpāḥ bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ	pāpa bhadra upajīv pajra
1190	na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam	na dūḍhī anu dā vāma
1190	bṛhaspate cayase it piyārum	bṛhaspati ci id piyāru
1190	supraituḥ sūyavasaḥ na panthāḥ	supraitu su yavasa na pathin
1190	durniyantuḥ pariprītaḥ na mitraḥ	durniyantu pariprī na mitra
1190	anarvāṇaḥ abhi ye cakṣate naḥ	anarvan abhi yad cakṣ mad
1190	apīvṛtāḥ aporṇuvantaḥ asthuḥ	apivṛ apavṛ sthā
1190	sam yam stubhaḥ avanayaḥ na yanti	sam yad stubh avani na i
1190	samudram na sravataḥ rodhacakrāḥ	samudra na sravat rodha cakra
1190	sa vidvān ubhayam caṣTe antar	sa vid ubhaya cakṣ antar
1190	bṛhaspatiḥ taraḥ āpaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ	bṛhaspati taras ap ca gṛdhra
1190	evā mahaḥ tuvijātaḥ tuviṣmān	eva maha tuvi jan tuviṣmat
1190	bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ dhāyi devaḥ	bṛhaspati vṛṣabha dhā deva
1190	sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat	tad mad stu vīravat dhā gomat
1190	vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīradānum	vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu
 ---
1191	kaṅkataḥ na kaṅkataḥ	kaṅkata na kaṅkata
1191	atha u satīnakaṅkataḥ	atho satīna kaṅkata
1191	dvau iti pluṣī iti	dvi iti pluṣi iti
1191	ni adṛṣTāḥ alipsata	ni adṛṣṭa lip
1191	adṛṣTān hanti āyatī	adṛṣṭa han e
1191	atha u hanti parāyatī	atho han pare
1191	atha u avaghnatī hanti	atho avahan han
1191	atha u pinaṣTi piṁṣatī	atho piṣ piṣ
1191	śarāsaḥ kuśarāsaḥ	śara kuśara
1191	darbhāsaḥ sairyāḥ uta	darbha sairya uta
1191	mauñjāḥ adṛṣTāḥ vairiṇāḥ	mauñja adṛṣṭa vairiṇa
1191	sarve sākam ni alipsata	sarva sākam ni lip
1191	ni gāvaḥ goṣThe asadan	ni go goṣṭha sad
1191	ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata	ni mṛga viś
1191	ni ketavaḥ janānām	ni ketu jana
1191	ni adṛṣTāḥ alipsata	ni adṛṣṭa lip
1191	ete u tye prati adṛśran	etad u tya prati dṛś
1191	pradoṣam taskarāḥ iva	pradoṣa taskara iva
1191	adṛṣTāḥ viśvadṛṣTāḥ	adṛṣṭa viśva dṛś
1191	pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana	pratibudh bhū
1191	dyauḥ vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā	div tvad pitṛ pṛthivī mātṛ
1191	somaḥ bhrātā aditiḥ svasā	soma bhrātṛ aditi svasṛ
1191	adṛṣTāḥ viśvadṛṣTāḥ	adṛṣṭa viśva dṛś
1191	tiṣThata ilayatā su kam	sthā ilay su kaṃ
1191	ye aṁsyāḥ ye aṅgyāḥ	yad aṃsya yad aṅgya
1191	sūcīkāḥ ye prakaṅkatāḥ	sūcīka yad prakaṅkata
1191	adṛṣTāḥ kim cana iha vaḥ	adṛṣṭa ka cana iha tvad
1191	sarve sākam ni jasyata	sarva sākam ni jas
1191	ut purastāt sūryaḥ eti	ud purastāt sūrya i
1191	viśvadṛṣTaḥ adṛṣTahā	viśva dṛś adṛṣṭa han
1191	adṛṣTān sarvān jambhayan	adṛṣṭa sarva jambhay
1191	sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ	sarva ca yātudhānī
1191	ut apaptat asau sūryaḥ	ud pat adas sūrya
1191	puru viśvāni jūrvan	puru viśva jūrv
1191	ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ	āditya parvata
1191	viśvadṛṣTaḥ adṛṣTahā	viśva dṛś adṛṣṭa han
1191	sūrye viṣam ā sajāmi	sūrya viṣa ā sañj
1191	dṛtim surāvataḥ gṛhe	dṛti surāvat gṛha
1191	sa u cit nu na marāti	tad u cit nu na mṛ
1191	na u vayam marāma	na u mad mṛ
1191	āre asya yojanam	āre idam yojana
1191	hariṣThāḥ madhu tvā	hariṣṭhā madhu tvad
1191	madhulā cakāra	madhula kṛ
1191	iyattikā śakuntikā	iyattaka śakuntikā
1191	sakā jaghāsa te viṣam	saka ghas tvad viṣa
1191	sa u cit nu na marāti	tad u cit nu na mṛ
1191	na u vayam marāma	na u mad mṛ
1191	āre asya yojanam	āre idam yojana
1191	hariṣThāḥ madhu tvā	hariṣṭhā madhu tvad
1191	madhulā cakāra	madhula kṛ
1191	triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakāḥ	tris saptan viṣpuliṅgaka
1191	viṣasya puṣyam akṣan	viṣa puṣya ghas
1191	tāḥ cit nu na maranti	tad cit nu na mṛ
1191	na u vayam marāma	na u mad mṛ
1191	āre asya yojanam	āre idam yojana
1191	hariṣThāḥ madhu tvā	hariṣṭhā madhu tvad
1191	madhulā cakāra	madhula kṛ
1191	navānām navatīnām	navan navati
1191	viṣasya ropuṣīṇām	viṣa ropuṣī
1191	sarvāsām agrabham nāma	sarva grah nāman
1191	āre asya yojanam	āre idam yojana
1191	hariṣThāḥ madhu tvā	hariṣṭhā madhu tvad
1191	madhulā cakāra	madhula kṛ
1191	triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ	tris saptan mayūrī
1191	sapta svasāraḥ agruvaḥ	saptan svasṛ agru
1191	tāḥ te viṣam vi jabhrire	tad tvad viṣa vi bhṛ
1191	udakam kumbhinīḥ iva	udaka kumbhin iva
1191	iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakaḥ	iyattaka kuṣumbhaka
1191	takam bhinadmi aśmanā	taka bhid aśman
1191	tataḥ viṣam pra vāvṛte	tatas viṣa pra vṛt
1191	parācīḥ anu saṁvataḥ	parāñc anu saṃvat
1191	kuṣumbhakaḥ tat abravīt	kuṣumbhaka tad brū
1191	gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ	giri pravartamānaka
1191	vṛścikasya arasam viṣam	vṛścika arasa viṣa
1191	arasam vṛścika te viṣam	arasa vṛścika tvad viṣa
21	tvam agne dyubhiḥ tvam āśuśukṣaṇiḥ	tvad agni div tvad āśuśukṣaṇi
21	tvam adbhyaḥ tvam aśmanaḥ pari	tvad ap tvad aśman pari
21	tvam vanebhyaḥ tvam oṣadhībhyaḥ	tvad vana tvad oṣadhī
21	tvam nṛṇām nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ	tvad nṛ nṛpati jan śuci
21	tava agne hotram tava potram ṛtviyam	tvad agni hotra tvad potra ṛtviya
21	tava neṣTram tvam agnit ṛtāyataḥ	tvad neṣṭra tvad agnidh ṛtāy
21	tava praśāstram tvam adhvarīyasi	tvad praśāstra tvad adhvarīy
21	brahmā ca asi gṛhapatiḥ ca naḥ dame	brahman ca as gṛhapati ca mad dama
21	tvam agne indraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ satām asi	tvad agni indra vṛṣabha as as
21	tvam viṣṇuḥ urugāyaḥ namasyaḥ	tvad viṣṇu urugāya namasya
21	tvam brahmā rayivit brahmaṇaḥ pate	tvad brahman rayi vid brahmaṇaspati
21	tvam vidhartar sacase puraṁdhyā	tvad vidhartṛ sac puraṃdhi
21	tvam agne rājā varuṇaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ	tvad agni rājan varuṇa dhṛ vrata
21	tvam mitraḥ bhavasi dasmaḥ īḍyaḥ	tvad mitra bhū dasma īḍ
21	tvam aryamā satpatiḥ yasya sambhujam	tvad aryaman sat pati yad sambhuj
21	tvam aṁśaḥ vidathe deva bhājayuḥ	tvad aṃśa vidatha deva bhājayu
21	tvam agne tvaṣTā vidhate suvīryam	tvad agni tvaṣṭṛ vidh su vīrya
21	tava gnāvaḥ mitramahaḥ sajātyam	tvad gnāvat mitra mahat sajātya
21	tvam āśuhemā rariṣe svaśvyam	tvad āśuheman rā su aśvya
21	tvam narām śardhaḥ asi purūvasuḥ	tvad nṛ śardhas as purūvasu
21	tvam agne rudraḥ asuraḥ mahaḥ divaḥ	tvad agni rudra asura mah div
21	tvam śardhaḥ mārutam pṛkṣaḥ īśiṣe	tvad śardhas māruta pṛkṣ īś
21	tvam vātaiḥ aruṇaiḥ yāsi śaṁgayaḥ	tvad vāta aruṇa yā śaṃgaya
21	tvam pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā	tvad pūṣan vidh pā nu tman
21	tvam agne draviṇodāḥ araṁkṛte	tvad agni draviṇas dā araṃkṛt
21	tvam devaḥ savitā ratnadhāḥ asi	tvad deva savitṛ ratna dhā as
21	tvam bhagaḥ nṛpate vasvaḥ īśiṣe	tvad bhaga nṛpati vasu īś
21	tvam pāyuḥ dame yaḥ te avidhat	tvad pāyu dama yad tvad vidh
21	tvām agne dame ā viśpatim viśaḥ	tvad agni dama ā viśpati viś
21	tvām rājānam suvidatram ṛñjate	tvad rājan suvidatra ṛj
21	tvam viśvāni svanīka patyase	tvad viśva su anīka paty
21	tvam sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati	tvad sahasra śata daśan prati
21	tvām agne pitaram iṣTibhiḥ naraḥ	tvad agni pitṛ iṣṭi nṛ
21	tvām bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam	tvad bhrātra śamī tanūruc
21	tvam putraḥ bhavasi yaḥ te avidhat	tvad putra bhū yad tvad vidh
21	tvam sakhā suśevaḥ pāsi ādhṛṣaḥ	tvad sakhi su śeva pā ādhṛṣ
21	tvam agne ṛbhuḥ āke namasyaḥ	tvad agni ṛbhu āke namasya
21	tvam vājasya kṣumataḥ rāyaḥ īśiṣe	tvad vāja kṣumat rai īś
21	tvam vi bhāsi anu dakṣi dāvane	tvad vi bhā anu dā
21	tvam viśikṣuḥ asi yajñam ātaniḥ	tvad viśikṣu as yajña ātani
21	tvam agne aditiḥ deva dāśuṣe	tvad agni aditi deva dāś
21	tvam hotrā bhāratī vardhase girā	tvad hotṛ bhāratī vṛdh gir
21	tvam iLā śatahimā asi dakṣase	tvad iḍ śata hima as dakṣ
21	tvam vṛtrahā vasupate sarasvatī	tvad vṛtra han vasu pati sarasvatī
21	tvam agne subhṛtaḥ uttamam vayaḥ	tvad agni su bhṛ uttama vayas
21	tava spārhe varṇe ā saṁdṛśi śriyaḥ	tvad spārha varṇa ā saṃdṛś śrī
21	tvam vājaḥ prataraṇaḥ bṛhan asi	tvad vāja prataraṇa bṛhat as
21	tvam rayiḥ bahulaḥ viśvataḥ pṛthuḥ	tvad rayi bahula viśvatas pṛthu
21	tvām agne ādityāsaḥ āsyam	tvad agni āditya āsya
21	tvām jihvām śucayaḥ cakrire kave	tvad jihvā śuci kṛ kavi
21	tvām rātiṣācaḥ adhvareṣu saścire	tvad rātiṣāc adhvara sac
21	tve devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam	tvad deva havis ad āhu
21	tve agne viśve amṛtāsaḥ adruhaḥ	tvad agni viśva amṛta adruh
21	āsā devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam	ās deva havis ad āhu
21	tvayā martāsaḥ svadante āsutim	tvad marta svad āsuti
21	tvam garbhaḥ vīrudhām jajñiṣe śuciḥ	tvad garbha vīrudh jan śuci
21	tvam tān sam ca prati ca asi majmanā	tvad tad sam ca prati ca as majman
21	agne sujāta pra ca deva ricyase	agni su jan pra ca deva ric
21	pṛkṣaḥ yat atra mahinā vi te bhuvat	pṛkṣ yat atra mahina vi tvad bhū
21	anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubhe	anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubh
21	ye stotṛbhyaḥ goagrām aśvapeśasam	yad stotṛ go agra aśva peśas
21	agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ	agni rāti upasṛj sūri
21	asmān ca tān ca pra hi neṣi vasyaḥ ā	mad ca tad ca pra hi nī vasyas ā
21	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
22	yajñena vardhata jātavedasam	yajña vṛdh jātavedas
22	agnim yajadhvam haviṣā tanā girā	agni yaj havis tan gir
22	samidhānam suprayasam svarṇaram	samindh su prayas svarṇara
22	dyukṣam hotāram vṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam	dyukṣa hotṛ vṛjana dhūrṣad
22	abhi tvā naktīḥ uṣasaḥ vavāśire	abhi tvad nakti uṣas vāś
22	agne vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ	agni vatsa na svasara dhenu
22	divaḥ iva it aratiḥ mānuṣā yugā	div iva id arati mānuṣa yuga
22	ā kṣapaḥ bhāsi puruvāra saṁyataḥ	kṣap bhā puru vāra saṃyam
22	tam devāḥ budhne rajasaḥ sudaṁsasam	tad deva budhna rajas su daṃsas
22	divaspṛthivyoḥ aratim ni erire	divaspṛthivī arati ni er
22	ratham iva vedyam śukraśociṣam	ratha iva vid śukra śocis
22	agnim mitram na kṣitiṣu praśaṁsyam	agni mitra na kṣiti praśaṃs
22	tam ukṣamāṇam rajasi sve ā dame	tad vakṣ rajas sva ā dama
22	candram iva surucam hvāre ā dadhuḥ	candra iva su ruc hvāra ā
22	pṛśnyāḥ pataram citayantam akṣabhiḥ	pṛśni patara citay akṣa
22	pāthaḥ na pāyum janasī ubhe anu	pāthas na pāyu janas ubh anu
22	sa hotā viśvam pari bhūtu adhvaram	tad hotṛ viśva pari bhū adhvara
22	tam u havyaiḥ manuṣaḥ ṛñjate girā	tad u havya manus ṛj gir
22	hiriśipraḥ vṛdhasānāsu jarbhurat	hiriśipra jarbhur
22	dyauḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayat rodasī anu	div na star citay rodas anu
22	sa naḥ revat samidhānaḥ svastaye	tad mad revat samindh svasti
22	saṁdadasvān rayim asmāsu dīdihi	saṃdas rayi mad dīdī
22	ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva suvitāya rodasī	ā mad kṛ suvita rodas
22	agne havyā manuṣaḥ deva vītaye	agni havya manus deva vī
22	dāḥ naḥ agne bṛhataḥ dāḥ sahasriṇaḥ	dā mad agni bṛhat dā sahasrin
22	duraḥ na vājam śrutyai apā vṛdhi	dvār na vāja śruti apa vṛ
22	prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi	prāñc dyāvāpṛthivī brahman kṛ
22	svar na śukram uṣasaḥ vi didyutaḥ	svar na śukra uṣas vi dyut
22	saḥ idhānaḥ uṣasaḥ rāmyāḥ anu	tad indh uṣas rāmyā anu
22	svar na dīdet aruṣeṇa bhānunā	svar na dīdī aruṣa bhānu
22	hotrābhiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ	hotrā agni manus su adhvara
22	rājā viśām atithiḥ cāruḥ āyave	rājan viś atithi cāru āyu
22	evā naḥ agne amṛteṣu pūrvya	eva mad agni amṛta pūrvya
22	dhīḥ pīpāya bṛhaddiveṣu mānuṣā	dhī pyā bṛhat diva mānuṣa
22	duhānā dhenuḥ vṛjaneṣu kārave	duh dhenu vṛjana kāru
22	tmanā śatinam pururūpam iṣaṇi	tman śatin puru rūpa iṣan
22	vayam agne arvatā vā suvīryam	mad agni arvant vā su vīrya
22	brahmaṇā vā citayemā janān ati	brahman vā citay jana ati
22	asmākam dyumnam adhi pañca kṛṣTiṣu	mad dyumna adhi pañcan kṛṣṭi
22	uccā svar na śuśucīta duṣTaram	uccā svar na śuc duṣṭara
22	sa naḥ bodhi sahasya praśaṁsyaḥ	tad mad bhū sahasya praśaṃs
22	yasmin sujātāḥ iṣayanta sūrayaḥ	yad su jan iṣay sūri
22	yam agne yajñam upayanti vājinaḥ	yad agni yajña upe vājin
22	nitye toke dīdivāṁsam sve dame	nitya toka dīdī sva dama
22	ubhayāsaḥ jātavedaḥ syāma te	ubhaya jātavedas as tvad
22	stotāraḥ agne sūrayaḥ ca śarmaṇi	stotṛ agni sūri ca śarman
22	vasvaḥ rāyaḥ puruścandrasya bhūyasaḥ	vasu rai puru ścandra bhūyas
22	prajāvataḥ svapatyasya śagdhi naḥ	prajāvat su apatya śak mad
22	ye stotṛbhyaḥ goagrām aśvapeśasam	yad stotṛ go agra aśva peśas
22	agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ	agni rāti upasṛj sūri
22	asmān ca tān ca pra hi neṣi vasyaḥ ā	mad ca tad ca pra hi nī vasyas ā
22	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
23	samiddhaḥ agniḥ nihitaḥ pṛthivyām	samindh agni nidhā pṛthivī
23	pratyaṅ viśvāni bhuvanāni asthāt	pratyañc viśva bhuvana sthā
23	hotā pāvakaḥ pradivaḥ sumedhāḥ	hotṛ pāvaka pradiv su medhas
23	devaḥ devān yajatu agniḥ arhan	deva deva yaj agni arh
23	narāśaṁsaḥ prati dhāmāni añjan	narāśaṃsa prati dhāman añj
23	tisraḥ divaḥ prati mahnā svarciḥ	tri div prati mahan su arcis
23	ghṛtapruṣā manasā havyam undan	ghṛta pruṣ manas havya und
23	mūrdhan yajñasya sam anaktu devān	mūrdhan yajña sam añj deva
23	īLitaḥ agne manasā naḥ arhan	īḍ agni manas mad arh
23	devān yakṣi mānuṣāt pūrvaḥ adya	deva yaj mānuṣa pūrva adya
23	saḥ ā vaha marutām śardhaḥ acyutam	tad ā vah marut śardhas acyuta
23	indram naraḥ barhiṣadam yajadhvam	indra nṛ barhiṣad yaj
23	deva barhiḥ vardhamānam suvīram	deva barhis vṛdh su vīra
23	stīrṇam rāye subharam vedī asyām	stṛ rai subhara vedi idam
23	ghṛtena aktam vasavaḥ sīdata idam	ghṛta añj vasu sad idam
23	viśve devāḥ ādityāḥ yajñiyāsaḥ	viśva deva āditya yajñiya
23	vi śrayantām urviyā hūyamānāḥ	vi śri urviyā hvā
23	dvāraḥ devīḥ suprāyaṇāḥ namobhiḥ	dvār deva su prāyaṇa namas
23	vyacasvatīḥ vi prathantām ajuryāḥ	vyacasvat vi prath ajurya
23	varṇam punānāḥ yaśasam suvīram	varṇa pū yaśas su vīra
23	sādhu apāṁsi sanatā naḥ ukṣite	sādhu apas sanatā mad vakṣ
23	uṣāsānaktā vayyā iva raṇvite	uṣāsānaktā vayī iva raṇvita
23	tantum tatam saṁvayantī samīcī	tantu tan saṃve samyañc
23	yajñasya peśaḥ sudughe payasvatī	yajña peśas sudughā payasvat
23	daivyā hotārā prathamā viduṣTarā	daivya hotṛ prathama viduṣṭara
23	ṛju yakṣataḥ sam ṛcā vapuṣTarā	ṛju yaj sam ṛc vapuṣṭara
23	devān yajantau ṛtuthā sam añjataḥ	deva yaj ṛtuthā sam añj
23	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānuṣu triṣu	nābhi pṛthivī adhi sānu tri
23	sarasvatī sādhayantī dhiyam naḥ	sarasvatī sādhay dhī mad
23	iLā devī bhāratī viśvatūrtiḥ	iḍā devī bhāratī viśvatūrti
23	tisraḥ devīḥ svadhayā barhiḥ ā idam	tri devī svadhā barhis ā idam
23	acchidram pāntu śaraṇam niṣadya	acchidra pā śaraṇa niṣad
23	piśaṅgarūpaḥ subharaḥ vayodhāḥ	piśaṅga rūpa subhara vayodhas
23	śruṣTī vīraḥ jāyate devakāmaḥ	śruṣṭi vīra jan deva kāma
23	prajām tvaṣTā vi syatu nābhim asme	prajā tvaṣṭṛ vi sā nābhi mad
23	athā devānām api etu pāthaḥ	atha deva api i pāthas
23	vanaspatiḥ avasṛjan upa sthāt	vanaspati avasṛj upa sthā
23	agniḥ haviḥ sūdayāti pra dhībhiḥ	agni havis sūday pra dhī
23	tridhā samaktam nayatu prajānan	tridhā samañj nī prajñā
23	devebhyaḥ daivyaḥ śamitā upa havyam	deva daivya śamitṛ upa havya
23	ghṛtam mimikṣe ghṛtam asya yoniḥ	ghṛta mikṣ ghṛta idam yoni
23	ghṛte śritaḥ ghṛtam ū asya dhāma	ghṛta śri ghṛta u idam dhāman
23	anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva	anuṣvadham ā vah māday
23	svāhākṛtam vṛṣabha vakṣi havyam	svāhākṛta vṛṣabha vah havya
 ---
24	huve vaḥ sudyotmānam suvṛktim	hvā tvad sudyotman suvṛkti
24	viśām agnim atithim suprayasam	viś agni atithi su prayas
24	mitraḥ iva yaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt	mitra iva yad didhiṣ bhū
24	devaḥ ādeve jane jātavedāḥ	deva ādeva jana jātavedas
24	imam vidhantaḥ apām sadhasthe	idam vidh ap sadhastha
24	dvitā adadhuḥ bhṛgavaḥ vikṣu āyoḥ	dvitā dhā bhṛgu viś āyu
24	eṣa viśvāni abhi astu bhūmā	etad viśva abhi as bhūman
24	devānām agniḥ aratiḥ jīrāśvaḥ	deva agni arati jīra aśva
24	agnim devāsaḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu	agni deva mānuṣa viś
24	priyam dhuḥ kṣeṣyantaḥ na mitram	priya dhā kṣi na mitra
24	sa dīdayat uśatīḥ ūrmyāḥ ā	tad dīdī vaś ūrmyā ā
24	dakṣāyyaḥ yaḥ dāsvate dame ā	dakṣāyya yad dāsvat dama ā
24	asya raṇvā svasya iva puṣTiḥ	idam raṇva sva iva puṣṭi
24	saṁdṛṣTiḥ asya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ	saṃdṛṣṭi idam hi dakṣu
24	vi yaḥ bharibhrat oṣadhīṣu jihvām	vi yad bharibhṛ oṣadhī jihvā
24	atyaḥ na rathyaḥ dodhavīti vārān	atya na rathya dodhav vāra
24	ā yat me abhvam vanadaḥ pananta	ā yad mad abhva vanad pan
24	uśigbhyaḥ na amimīta varṇam	uśij na mā varṇa
24	sa citreṇa cikite raṁsu bhāsā	sa citra cit raṃsu bhās
24	jujurvān yaḥ muhuḥ ā yuvā bhūt	jṛ yad muhur ā yuvan bhū
24	ā yaḥ vanā tātṛṣāṇaḥ na bhāti	ā yad vana tṛṣ na bhā
24	vār na pathā rathyā iva svānīt	vār na pathin rathyā iva svan
24	kṛṣṇādhvā tapuḥ raṇvaḥ ciketa	kṛṣṇa adhvan tapu raṇva cit
24	dyauḥ iva smayamānaḥ nabhobhiḥ	div iva smi nabhas
24	sa yaḥ vi asthāt abhi dakṣat urvīm	tad yad vi sthā abhi dah urvī
24	paśuḥ na eti svayuḥ agopāḥ	paśu na i svayu a gopā
24	agniḥ śociṣmān atasāni uṣṇan	agni śociṣmat atasa uṣ
24	kṛṣṇavyathiḥ asvadayan na bhūma	kṛṣṇa vyathis svaday na bhūman
24	nū te pūrvasya avasaḥ adhītau	nu tvad pūrva avas adhīti
24	tṛtīye vidathe manma śaṁsi	tṛtīya vidatha manman śaṃs
24	asme agne saṁyadvīram bṛhantam	mad agni saṃyat vīra bṛhat
24	kṣumantam vājam svapatyam rayim dāḥ	kṣumat vāja su apatya rayi dā
24	tvayā yathā gṛtsamadāsaḥ agne	tvad yathā gṛtsamada agni
24	guhā vanvantaḥ uparān abhi syuḥ	guhā van upara abhi as
24	suvīrāsaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ	su vīra abhimātiṣāh
24	smat sūribhyaḥ gṛṇate tat vayaḥ dhāḥ	smat sūri gṛ tad vayas dhā
 ---
25	hotā ajaniṣTa cetanaḥ	hotṛ jan cetana
25	pitā pitṛbhyaḥ ūtaye	pitṛ pitṛ ūti
25	prayakṣan jenyam vasu	prayakṣ jenya vasu
25	śakema vājinaḥ yamam	śak vājin yam
25	ā yasmin sapta raśmayaḥ	ā yad saptan raśmi
25	tatāḥ yajñasya netari	tan yajña netṛ
25	manuṣvat daivyam aṣTamam	manuṣvat daivya aṣṭama
25	potā viśvam tat invati	potṛ viśva tad inv
25	dadhanve vā yat īm anu	dhanv vā yat īṃ anu
25	vocat brahmāṇi veḥ u tat	vac brahman vī u tad
25	pari viśvāni kāvyā	pari viśva kāvya
25	nemiḥ cakram iva abhavat	nemi cakra iva bhū
25	sākam hi śucinā śuciḥ	sākam hi śuci śuci
25	praśāstā kratunā ajani	praśāstṛ kratu jan
25	vidvān asya vratā dhruvā	vid idam vrata dhruva
25	vayāḥ iva anu rohate	vayā iva anu ruh
25	tāḥ asya varṇam āyuvaḥ	tad idam varṇa āyu
25	neṣTuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ	neṣṭṛ sac dhenu
25	kuvit tisṛbhyaḥ ā varam	kuvid tri ā vara
25	svasāraḥ yāḥ idam yayuḥ	svasṛ yad idam yā
25	yadī mātuḥ upa svasā	yadi mātṛ upa svasṛ
25	ghṛtam bharantī asthita	ghṛta bhṛ sthā
25	tāsām adhvaryuḥ āgatau	tad adhvaryu āgati
25	yavaḥ vṛṣTī iva modate	yava vṛṣṭi iva mud
25	svaḥ svāya dhāyase	sva sva dhāyas
25	kṛṇutām ṛtvik ṛtvijam	kṛ ṛtvij ṛtvij
25	stomam yajñam ca āt aram	stoma yajña ca āt aram
25	vanemā rarimā vayam	van rā mad
25	yathā vidvān aram karat	yathā vid aram kṛ
25	viśvebhyaḥ yajatebhyaḥ	viśva yajata
25	ayam agne tve api	idam agni tvad api
25	yam yajñam cakṛmā vayam	yad yajña kṛ mad
 ---
26	imām me agne samidham	idam mad agni samidh
26	imām upasadam vaneḥ	idam upasad van
26	imāḥ u su śrudhī giraḥ	idam u su śru gir
26	ayā te agne vidhema	idam tvad agni vidh
26	ūrjaḥ napāt aśvamiṣTe	ūrj napāt aśvamiṣṭi
26	enā sūktena sujāta	idam sūkta su jan
26	tam tvā gīrbhiḥ girvaṇasam	tad tvad gir girvaṇas
26	draviṇasyum draviṇodaḥ	draviṇasyu draviṇas
26	saparyema saparyavaḥ	sapary saparyu
26	sa bodhi sūriḥ maghavā	tad bhū sūri maghavan
26	vasupate vasudāvan	vasu pati vasu dāvan
26	yuyodhi asmat dveṣāṁsi	yu mad dveṣas
26	sa naḥ vṛṣTim divaḥ pari	tad mad vṛṣṭi div pari
26	sa naḥ vājam anarvāṇam	tad mad vāja anarvan
26	sa naḥ sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ	tad mad sahasrin iṣ
26	īLānāya avasyave	īḍ avasyu
26	yaviṣTha dūta naḥ girā	yaviṣṭha dūta mad giri
26	yajiṣTha hotar ā gahi	yajiṣṭha hotṛ ā gam
26	antar hi agne īyase	antar hi agni i
26	vidvān janma ubhayā kave	vid janman ubhaya kavi
26	dūtaḥ janyā iva mitryaḥ	dūta janya iva mitrya
26	sa vidvān ā ca piprayaḥ	tad vid ā ca prī
26	yakṣi cikitvaḥ ānuṣak	yaj cit ānuṣak
26	ā ca asmin satsi barhiṣi	ā ca idam sad barhis
 ---
27	śreṣTham yaviṣTha bhārata	śreṣṭha yaviṣṭha bhārata
27	agne dyumantam ā bhara	agni dyumat ā bhṛ
27	vaso puruspṛham rayim	vasu puruspṛh rayi
27	mā naḥ arātiḥ īśata	mā mad arāti īś
27	devasya martyasya ca	deva martya ca
27	parṣi tasyāḥ uta dviṣaḥ	pṛ tad uta dviṣ
27	viśvāḥ uta tvayā vayam	viśva uta tvad mad
27	dhārāḥ udanyāḥ iva	dhārā udanya iva
27	ati gāhemahi dviṣaḥ	ati gāh dviṣ
27	śuciḥ pāvaka vandyaḥ	śuci pāvaka vand
27	agne bṛhat vi rocase	agni bṛhat vi ruc
27	tvam ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ	tvad ghṛta āhu
27	tvam naḥ asi bhārata	tvad mad as bhārata
27	agne vaśābhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ	agni vaśā ukṣan
27	aṣTāpadībhiḥ āhutaḥ	aṣṭāpada āhu
27	drvannaḥ sarpirāsutiḥ	dru anna sarpis āsuti
27	pratnaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ	pratna hotṛ vareṇya
27	sahasaḥ putraḥ adbhutaḥ	sahas putra adbhuta
 ---
28	vājayan iva nū rathān	vājay iva nu ratha
28	yogān agneḥ upa stuhi	yoga agni upa stu
28	yaśastamasya mīLhuṣaḥ	yaśastama mīḍhvas
28	yaḥ sunīthaḥ dadāśuṣe	yad su nītha dāś
28	ajuryaḥ jarayan arim	ajurya jaray ari
28	cārupratīkaḥ āhutaḥ	cāru pratīka āhu
28	yaḥ u śriyā dameṣu ā	yad u śrī dama ā
28	doṣā uṣasi praśasyate	doṣā uṣas praśaṃs
28	yasya vratam na mīyate	yad vrata na mī
28	ā yaḥ svar na bhānunā	ā yad svar na bhānu
28	citraḥ vibhāti arciṣā	citra vibhā arcis
28	añjānaḥ ajaraiḥ abhi	añj ajara abhi
28	atrim anu svarājyam	atri anu sva rājya
28	agnim ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ	agni uktha vṛdh
28	viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dadhe	viśva adhi śrī dhā
28	agneḥ indrasya somasya	agni indra soma
28	devānām ūtibhiḥ vayam	deva ūti mad
28	ariṣyantaḥ sacemahi	a riṣ sac
28	abhi syāma pṛtanyataḥ	abhi as pṛtany
 ---
29	ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānaḥ	ni hotṛ hotṛṣadana vid
29	tveṣaḥ dīdivān asadat sudakṣaḥ	tveṣa dīdī sad su dakṣa
29	adabdhavratapramatiḥ vasiṣThaḥ	adabdha vrata pramati vasiṣṭha
29	sahasrambharaḥ śucijihvaḥ agniḥ	sahasrambhara śuci jihvā agni
29	tvam dūtaḥ tvam u naḥ paraspāḥ	tvad dūta tvad u mad paraspā
29	tvam vasyaḥ ā vṛṣabha praṇetā	tvad vasyas ā vṛṣabha praṇī
29	agne tokasya naḥ tane tanūnām	agni toka mad tan tanu
29	aprayucchan dīdyat bodhi gopāḥ	aprayucchat dīdī bhū gopā
29	vidhema te parame janman agne	vidh tvad parama janman agni
29	vidhema stomaiḥ avare sadhasthe	vidh stoma avara sadhastha
29	yasmāt yoneḥ udārithā yaje tam	yad yoni udṛch yaj tad
29	pra tve havīṁṣi juhure samiddhe	pra tvad havis hu samindh
29	agne yajasva haviṣā yajīyān	agni yaj havis yajīyas
29	śruṣTī deṣṇam abhi gṛṇīhi rādhaḥ	śruṣṭi deṣṇa abhi gṛ rādhas
29	tvam hi asi rayipatiḥ rayīṇām	tvad hi as rayi pati rayi
29	tvam śukrasya vacasaḥ manotā	tvad śukra vacas manotṛ
29	ubhayam te na kṣīyate vasavyam	ubhaya tvad na kṣi vasavya
29	divedive jāyamānasya dasma	diva diva jan dasma
29	kṛdhi kṣumantam jaritāram agne	kṛ kṣumat jaritṛ agni
29	kṛdhi patim svapatyasya rāyaḥ	kṛ pati su apatya rai
29	sa enā anīkena suvidatraḥ asme	sainānīka suvidatra mad
29	yaṣTā devān āyajiṣThaḥ svasti	yaj deva āyajiṣṭha svasti
29	adabdhaḥ gopāḥ uta naḥ paraspāḥ	adabdha gopā uta mad paraspā
29	agne dyumat uta revat didīhi	agni dyumat uta revat dīdī
 ---
210	johūtraḥ agniḥ prathamaḥ pitā iva	johūtra agni prathama pada
210	iLaḥ pade manuṣā yat samiddhaḥ	pada manus yat samindh
210	śriyam vasānaḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ	śrī vas amṛta vicetas
210	marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥ sa vājī	marmṛjenya śravasya tad vājin
210	śrūyāḥ agniḥ citrabhānuḥ havam me	śru agni citrabhānu hava mad
210	viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ	viśva gir amṛta vicetas
210	śyāvā ratham vahataḥ rohitā vā	śyāva ratha vah rohita
210	uta aruṣā aha cakre vibhṛtraḥ	rohita kṛ vibhṛtra
210	uttānāyām ajanayan suṣūtam	uttāna janay suṣūta
210	bhuvat agniḥ purupeśāsu garbhaḥ	bhū agni puru peśa garbha
210	śiriṇāyām cit aktunā mahobhiḥ	śiriṇā cit aktu mahas
210	aparīvṛtaḥ vasati pracetāḥ	a parīvṛ vas pracetas
210	jigharmi agnim haviṣā ghṛtena	ghṛ agni havis ghṛta
210	pratikṣiyantam bhuvanāni viśvā	pratikṣi bhuvana viśva
210	pṛthum tiraścā vayasā bṛhantam	pṛthu vayas bṛhat
210	vyaciṣTham annaiḥ rabhasam dṛśānam	vyaciṣṭha anna rabhasa dṛś
210	ā viśvataḥ pratyañcam jigharmi	viśvatas pratyañc ghṛ
210	arakṣasā manasā tat juṣeta	arakṣas manas tad juṣ
210	maryaśrīḥ spṛhayadvarṇaḥ agniḥ	marya śrī spṛhay varṇa agni
210	na abhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ	na abhimṛś tanu jarbhur
210	jñeyāḥ bhāgam sahasānaḥ vareṇa	jñā bhāga sah vara
210	tvādūtāsaḥ manuvat vadema	tvādūta manu vat vad
210	anūnam agnim juhvā vacasyā	anūna agni juhū vacasyā
210	madhupṛcam dhanasāḥ johavīmi	madhupṛc dhanasā johav
 ---
211	śrudhī havam indra mā riṣaṇyaḥ	śru hava indra mā riṣaṇy
211	syāma te dāvane vasūnām	as tvad dā vasu
211	imāḥ hi tvām ūrjaḥ vardhayanti	idam hi tvad ūrj vardhay
211	vasūyavaḥ sindhavaḥ na kṣarantaḥ	vasūyu sindhu na kṣar
211	sṛjaḥ mahīḥ indra yāḥ apinvaḥ	sṛj mahi indra yad pinv
211	pariṣThitāḥ ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ	pariṣṭhā ahi śūra puru
211	amartyam cit dāsam manyamānam	amartya cit dāsa man
211	ava abhinat ukthaiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ	avabhid uktha vṛdh
211	uktheṣu it nu śūra yeṣu cākan	uktha id nu śūra yad kan
211	stomeṣu indra rudriyeṣu ca	stoma indra rudriya ca
211	tubhya it etāḥ yāsu mandasānaḥ	tvad id etad yad mand
211	pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ	pra vāyu sṛ na śubhra
211	śubhram nu te śuṣmam vardhayantaḥ	śubhra nu tvad śuṣma vardhay
211	śubhram vajram bāhvoḥ dadhānāḥ	śubhra vajra bāhu dhā
211	śubhraḥ tvam indra vāvṛdhānaḥ asme	śubhra tvad indra vṛdh mad
211	dāsīḥ viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ	dāsa viś sūrya sah
211	guhā hitam guhyam gūLham apsu	guhā dhā guh guh ap
211	apīvṛtam māyinam kṣiyantam	apivṛ māyin kṣi
211	uta u apaḥ dyām tastabhvāṁsam	uta u ap div stambh
211	ahan ahim śūra vīryeṇa	han ahi śūra vīrya
211	stavā nu te indra pūrvyā mahāni	stu nu tvad indra pūrvya maha
211	uta stavāma nūtanā kṛtāni	uta stu nūtana kṛ
211	stavā vajram bāhvoḥ uśantam	stu vajra bāhu vaś
211	stavā harī sūryasya ketū	stu hari sūrya ketu
211	harī nu te indra vājayantā	hari nu tvad indra vājay
211	ghṛtaścutam svāram asvārṣTām	ghṛtaścut svāra svar
211	vi samanā bhūmiḥ aprathiṣTa	vi samanā bhūmi prath
211	araṁsta parvataḥ cit sariṣyan	ram parvata cit sṛ
211	ni parvataḥ sādi aprayucchan	ni parvata sad aprayucchat
211	sam mātṛbhiḥ vāvaśānaḥ akrān	sam mātṛ vaś krand
211	dūre pāre vāṇīm vardhayantaḥ	dūra pāra vāṇī vardhay
211	indreṣitām dhamanim paprathan ni	indra iṣay dhamani prath ni
211	indraḥ mahām sindhum āśayānam	indra mahat sindhu āśī
211	māyāvinam vṛtram asphurat niḥ	māyāvin vṛtra sphur niḥ
211	arejetām rodasī bhiyāne	rej rodas bhī
211	kanikradataḥ vṛṣṇaḥ asya vajrāt	kanikrad vṛṣan idam vajra
211	aroravīt vṛṣṇaḥ asya vajraḥ	roro vṛṣan idam vajra
211	amānuṣam yat mānuṣaḥ nijūrvāt	amānuṣa yat mānuṣa nijūrv
211	ni māyinaḥ dānavasya māyāḥ	ni māyin dānava māyā
211	apādayat papivān sutasya	pāday pā suta
211	pibāpiba it indra śūra somam	pā pā id indra śūra soma
211	mandantu tvā mandinaḥ sutāsaḥ	mad tvad mandin suta
211	pṛṇantaḥ te kukṣī vardhayantu	pṛ tvad kukṣi vardhay
211	itthā sutaḥ pauraḥ indram āva	itthā su paura indra av
211	tve indra api abhūma viprāḥ	tvad indra api bhū vipra
211	dhiyam vanema ṛtayā sapantaḥ	dhī van ṛtayā sap
211	avasyavaḥ dhīmahi praśastim	avasyu dhā praśasti
211	sadyaḥ te rāyaḥ dāvane syāma	sadyas tvad rai dā as
211	syāma te te indra ye te ūtī	as tad tvad indra yad tvad ūti
211	avasyavaḥ ūrjam vardhayantaḥ	avasyu ūrj vardhay
211	śuṣmintamam yam cākanāma deva	śuṣmintama yad kan deva
211	asme rayim rāsi vīravantam	mad rayi rā vīravat
211	rāsi kṣayam rāsi mitram asme	rā kṣaya rā mitra mad
211	rāsi śardhaḥ indra mārutam naḥ	rā śardhas indra māruta mad
211	sajoṣasaḥ ye ca mandasānāḥ	sajoṣas yad ca mand
211	pra vāyavaḥ pānti agraṇītim	pra vāyu pā agraṇīti
211	vyantu it nu yeṣu mandasānaḥ	vī id nu yad mand
211	tṛpat somam pāhi drahyat indra	tṛp soma pā drahyat indra
211	asmān su pṛtsu ā tarutra	mad su pṛt ā tarutra
211	avardhayaḥ dyām bṛhadbhiḥ arkaiḥ	vardhay div bṛhat arka
211	bṛhantaḥ it nu ye te tarutra	bṛhat id nu yad tad tarutra
211	ukthebhiḥ vā sumnam āvivāsān	uktha vā sumna āvivās
211	stṛṇānāsaḥ barhiḥ pastyāvat	stṛ barhis pastyāvat
211	tvotāḥ it indra vājam agman	tvota id indra vāja gam
211	ugreṣu it nu śūra mandasānaḥ	ugra id nu śūra mand
211	trikadrukeṣu pāhi somam indra	trikadruka pā soma indra
211	pradodhuvat śmaśruṣu prīṇānaḥ	pradodhu śmaśru prī
211	yāhi haribhyām sutasya pītim	yā hari suta pīti
211	dhiṣvā śavaḥ śūra yena vṛtram	dhā śavas śūra yad vṛtra
211	avābhinat dānum aurṇavābham	avabhid dānu aurṇavābha
211	apa avṛṇoḥ jyotiḥ āryāya	apāvṛ jyotis ārya
211	ni savyataḥ sādi dasyuḥ indra	ni savyatas sad dasyu indra
211	sanema ye te ūtibhiḥ tarantaḥ	san yad tvad ūti tṛ
211	viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ āryeṇa dasyūn	viśva spṛdh ārya dasyu
211	asmabhyam tat tvāṣTram viśvarūpam	mad tad tvāṣṭra viśvarūpa
211	arandhayaḥ sākhyasya tritāya	randhay sākhya trita
211	asya suvānasya mandinaḥ tritasya	idam su mandin trita
211	ni arbudam vāvṛdhānaḥ astar	ni arbuda vṛdh stṛ
211	avartayat sūryaḥ na cakram	vartay sūrya na cakra
211	bhinat valam indraḥ aṅgirasvān	bhid vala indra aṅgirasvat
211	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
211	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
211	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
211	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
212	yaḥ jātaḥ eva prathamaḥ manasvān	yad jan eva prathama manasvat
212	devaḥ devān kratunā paryabhūṣat	deva deva kratu paribhūṣ
212	yasya śuṣmāt rodasī abhyasetām	yad śuṣma rodas abhyas
212	nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	nṛmṇa mahan tad jana indra
212	yaḥ pṛthivīm vyathamānām adṛṁhat	yad pṛthivī vyath dṛh
212	yaḥ parvatān prakupitān aramṇāt	yad parvata prakup ram
212	yaḥ antarikṣam vimame varīyaḥ	yad antarikṣa vimā varīyas
212	yaḥ dyām astabhnāt sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad div stambh tad jana indra
212	yaḥ hatvā ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn	yad han ahi ri saptan sindhu
212	yaḥ gāḥ udājat apadhā valasya	yad go udaj apadhā vala
212	yaḥ aśmanoḥ antar agnim jajāna	yad aśman antar agni jan
212	saṁvṛk samatsu sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	saṃvṛj samad tad jana indra
212	yena imā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni	yad idam viśva cyavana kṛ
212	yaḥ dāsam varṇam adharam guhā akar	yad dāsa varṇa adhara guhā kṛ
212	śvaghnī iva yaḥ jigīvān lakṣam ā adat	śvaghnin iva yad ji lakṣa ādā
212	aryaḥ puṣTāni sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	ari puṣṭa tad jana indra
212	yam smā pṛcchanti kuha sa iti ghoram	yad sma pracch kuha tad iti ghora
212	uta īm āhuḥ na eṣaḥ asti iti enam	uta īṃ ah na etad as iti enad
212	saḥ aryaḥ puṣTīḥ vijaḥ iva ā mināti	tad ari puṣṭi vij iva mī
212	śrat asmai dhatta sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	śrath idam dhā tad jana indra
212	yaḥ radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya	yad radhra coditṛ yad kṛśa
212	yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nādhamānasya kīreḥ	yad brahman nādh kīri
212	yuktagrāvṇaḥ yaḥ avitā suśipraḥ	yuj grāvan yad av su śiprā
212	sutasomasya sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	su soma tad jana indra
212	yasya aśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvaḥ	yad aśva pradiś yad go
212	yasya grāmāḥ yasya viśve rathāsaḥ	yad grāma yad viśva ratha
212	yaḥ sūryam yaḥ uṣasam jajāna	yad sūrya yad uṣas jan
212	yaḥ apām netā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad ap netṛ tad jana indra
212	yam krandasī saṁyatī vihvayete	yad krandas sami vihvā
212	pare avare ubhayāḥ amitrāḥ	para avara ubhaya amitra
212	samānam cit ratham ātasthivāṁsā	samāna cit ratha āsthā
212	nānā havete sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	nānā hvā tad jana indra
212	yasmāt na ṛte vijayante janāsaḥ	yad na ṛte viji jana
212	yam yudhyamānāḥ avase havante	yad yudh av hvā
212	yaḥ viśvasya pratimānam babhūva	yad viśva pratimāna bhū
212	yaḥ acyutacyut sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad acyuta cyut tad jana indra
212	yaḥ śaśvataḥ mahi enaḥ dadhānān	yad śaśvat mahi enas dhā
212	amanyamānān śarvā jaghāna	a man śaru han
212	yaḥ śardhate na anudadāti śṛdhyām	yad śṛdh na anudā śṛdhyā
212	yaḥ dasyoḥ hantā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad dasyu han tad jana indra
212	yaḥ śambaram parvateṣu kṣiyantam	yad śambara parvata kṣi
212	catvāriṁśyām śaradi anvavindat	catvāriṃśa śarad anuvid
212	ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghāna	ojāy yad ahi han
212	dānum śayānam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	dānu śī tad jana indra
212	yaḥ saptaraśmiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān	yad saptan raśmi vṛṣabha tuviṣmat
212	avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn	avasṛj sṛ saptan sindhu
212	yaḥ rauhiṇam asphurat vajrabāhuḥ	yad rauhiṇa sphur vajra bāhu
212	dyām ārohantam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	div āruh tad jana indra
212	dyāvā cit asmai pṛthivī namete	div cit idam pṛthivī nam
212	śuṣmāt cit asya parvatāḥ bhayante	śuṣma cit idam parvata bhī
212	yaḥ somapāḥ nicitaḥ vajrabāhuḥ	yad soma pā nici vajra bāhu
212	yaḥ vajrahastaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad vajra hasta tad jana indra
212	yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantam	yad su av yad pac
212	yaḥ śaṁsantam yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī	yad śaṃs yad śam ūti
212	yasya brahma vardhanam yasya somaḥ	yad brahman vardhana yad soma
212	yasya idam rādhaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ	yad idam rādhas tad jana indra
212	yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhraḥ ā cit	yad su pac dudhra ā cit
212	vājam dardarṣi sa kila asi satyaḥ	vāja dardar tad kila as satya
212	vayam te indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ	mad tvad indra viśvaha priya
212	suvīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema	su vīra vidatha ā vad
 ---
213	ṛtuḥ janitrī tasyāḥ apaḥ pari	ṛtu janitrī tad ap pari
213	makṣū jātaḥ ā aviśat yāsu vardhate	makṣū jan āviś yad vṛdh
213	tat āhanāḥ abhavat pipyuṣī payaḥ	tad āhanas bhū pyā payas
213	aṁśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamam tat ukthyam	aṃśu pīyūṣa prathama tad ukthya
213	sadhrī īm ā yanti pari bibhratīḥ payaḥ	sadhri ā i pari bhṛ payas
213	viśvapsnyāya pra bharanta bhojanam	viśvapsnya pra bhṛ bhojana
213	samānaḥ adhvā pravatām anuṣyade	samāna adhvan pravat anuṣyand
213	yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ	yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya
213	anu ekaḥ vadati yat dadāti tat	anu eka vad yad dā tad
213	rūpā minan tadapāḥ ekaḥ īyate	rūpa mī tad apas eka i
213	viśvāḥ ekasya vinudaḥ titikṣate	viśva eka vinud titikṣ
213	yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ	yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya
213	prajābhyaḥ puṣTim vibhajantaḥ āsate	prajā puṣṭi vibhaj ās
213	rayim iva pṛṣTham prabhavantam āyate	rayi iva pṛṣṭha prabhū e
213	asinvan daṁṣTraiḥ pituḥ atti bhojanam	asinvat daṃṣṭra pitṛ ad bhojana
213	yaḥ tā akṛṇoḥ prathamam sa asi ukthyaḥ	yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya
213	adha akṛṇoḥ pṛthivīm saṁdṛśe dive	adha kṛ pṛthivī saṃdṛś div
213	yaḥ dhautīnām ahihan āriṇak pathaḥ	yad dhauti ahi han āric pathin
213	tam tvā stomebhiḥ udabhiḥ na vājinam	tad tvad stoma uda na vājin
213	devam devāḥ ajanan sa asi ukthyaḥ	deva deva jan tad as ukthya
213	yaḥ bhojanam ca dayase ca vardhanam	yad bhojana ca day ca vardhana
213	ārdrāt ā śuṣkam madhumat dudohitha	ārdra ā śuṣka madhumat duh
213	sa śevadhim ni dadhiṣe vivasvati	tad śevadhi ni dhā vivasvant
213	viśvasya ekaḥ īśiṣe sa asi ukthyaḥ	viśva eka īś tad as ukthya
213	yaḥ puṣpiṇīḥ ca prasvaḥ ca dharmaṇā	yad puṣpin ca prasū ca dharman
213	adhi dāne vi avanīḥ adhārayaḥ	adhi dāna vi avanī dhāray
213	yaḥ ca asamāḥ ajanaḥ didyutaḥ divaḥ	yad ca asama jan didyut div
213	uruḥ ūrvān abhitaḥ sa asi ukthyaḥ	uru ūrva abhitas tad as ukthya
213	yaḥ nārmaram sahavasum nihantave	yad nārmara sahavasu nihan
213	pṛkṣāya ca dāsaveśāya ca avahaḥ	pṛkṣa ca dāsaveśa ca vah
213	ūrjayantyāḥ apariviṣTam āsyam	ūrjay apariviṣṭa āsya
213	uta eva adya purukṛt sa asi ukthyaḥ	uta eva adya puru kṛt tad as ukthya
213	śatam vā yasya daśa sākam ā adyaḥ	śata vā yad daśan sākam ādo
213	ekasya śruṣTau yat ha codam āvitha	eka śruṣṭi yat ha coda av
213	arajjau dasyūn sam unap dabhītaye	a rajju dasyu sam ubh dabhīti
213	suprāvyaḥ abhavaḥ sa asi ukthyaḥ	suprāvya bhū tad as ukthya
213	viśve it anu rodhanā asya pauṁsyam	viśva id anu rodhana idam pauṃsya
213	daduḥ asmai dadhire kṛtnave dhanam	dā idam dhā kṛtnu dhana
213	ṣaT astabhnāḥ viṣTiraḥ pañca saṁdṛśaḥ	ṣaṣ stambh viṣṭir pañcan saṃdṛś
213	pari paraḥ abhavaḥ sa asi ukthyaḥ	pari paras bhū tad as ukthya
213	supravācanam tava vīra vīryam	su pravācana tvad vīra vīrya
213	yat ekena kratunā vindase vasu	yat eka kratu vid vasu
213	jātūṣThirasya pra vayaḥ sahasvataḥ	jātūṣṭhira pra vayas sahasvat
213	yā cakartha sa indra viśvā asi ukthyaḥ	yad kṛ tad indra viśva as ukthya
213	aramayaḥ sarapasaḥ tarāya kam	ramay sarapas tara kaṃ
213	turvītaye ca vayyāya ca srutim	turvīti ca vayya ca sruti
213	nīcā santam ut anayaḥ parāvṛjam	nīcā as ud nī parāvṛj
213	pra andham śroṇam śravayan sa asi ukthyaḥ	pra andha śroṇa śravay tad as ukthya
213	asmabhyam tat vaso dānāya rādhaḥ	mad tad vasu dāna rādhas
213	sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam	sam arthay bahu tvad vasavya
213	indra yat citram śravasyāḥ anu dyūn	indra yad citra śravasy anu div
213	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
214	adhvaryavaḥ bharata indrāya somam	adhvaryu bhṛ indra soma
214	ā amatrebhiḥ siñcatā madyam andhaḥ	ā amatra sic mad andhas
214	kāmī hi vīraḥ sadam asya pītim	kāmin hi vīra sadam idam pīti
214	juhota vṛṣṇe tat it eṣa vaṣTi	hu vṛṣan tad id etad vaś
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ apaḥ vavrivāṁsam	adhvaryu yad ap vṛ
214	vṛtram jaghāna aśanyā iva vṛkṣam	vṛtra han aśani iva vṛkṣa
214	tasmai etam bharata tadvaśāya	tad etad bhṛ etad
214	eṣaḥ indraḥ arhati pītim asya	etad indra arh pīti idam
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ dṛbhīkam jaghāna	adhvaryu yad dṛbhīka han
214	yaḥ gāḥ udājat apa hi valam var	yad go udaj apa hi vala vṛ
214	tasmai etam antarikṣe na vātam	tad etad antarikṣa na vāta
214	indram somaiḥ ā ūrṇuta jūḥ na vastraiḥ	indra soma ā vṛ jū na vastra
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ uraṇam jaghāna	adhvaryu yad uraṇa han
214	nava cakhvāṁsam navatim ca bāhūn	navan cakhvas navati ca bāhu
214	yaḥ arbudam ava nīcā babādhe	yad arbuda ava nīcā bādh
214	tam indram somasya bhṛthe hinota	tad indra soma bhṛtha hi
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ su aśnam jaghāna	adhvaryu yad su aśna han
214	yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣam yaḥ vyaṁsam	yad śuṣṇa aśuṣa yad vyaṃsa
214	yaḥ piprum namucim yaḥ rudhikrām	yad pipru namuci yad rudhikrā
214	tasmai indrāya andhasaḥ juhota	tad indra andhas hu
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam śambarasya	adhvaryu yad śata śambara
214	puraḥ bibheda aśmanā iva pūrvīḥ	pur bhid aśman iva puru
214	yaḥ varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram	yad varcin śata indra sahasra
214	apāvapat bharatā somam asmai	apavap bhṛ soma idam
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ śatam ā sahasram	adhvaryu yad śata ā sahasra
214	bhūmyāḥ upasthe avapat jaghanvān	bhūmi upastha vap han
214	kutsasya āyoḥ atithigvasya vīrān	kutsa āyu atithigva vīra
214	ni āvṛṇak bharatā somam asmai	ni āvṛj bhṛ soma idam
214	adhvaryavaḥ yat naraḥ kāmayādhve	adhvaryu yad nṛ kāmay
214	śruṣTī vahantaḥ naśathā tat indre	śruṣṭi vah naś tad indra
214	gabhastipūtam bharata śrutāya	gabhasti pū bhṛ śru
214	indrāya somam yajyavaḥ juhota	indra soma yajyu hu
214	adhvaryavaḥ kartanā śruṣTim asmai	adhvaryu kṛ śruṣṭi idam
214	vane nipūtam vane ut nayadhvam	vana nipū vana ud nī
214	juṣāṇaḥ hastyam abhi vāvaśe vaḥ	juṣ hastya abhi vaś tvad
214	indrāya somam madiram juhota	indra soma madira hu
214	adhvaryavaḥ payasā ūdhar yathā goḥ	adhvaryu payas udhan yathā go
214	somebhiḥ īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram	soma īṃ pṛṇ bhoja indra
214	veda aham asya nibhṛtam me etat	vid mad idam nibhṛta mad etad
214	ditsantam bhūyaḥ yajataḥ ciketa	dits bhūyas yajata cit
214	adhvaryavaḥ yaḥ divyasya vasvaḥ	adhvaryu yad divya vasu
214	yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā	yad pārthiva kṣamya rājan
214	tam ūrdaram na pṛṇatā yavena	tad ūrdara na pṛṇ yava
214	indram somebhiḥ tat apaḥ vaḥ astu	indra soma tad apas tvad as
214	asmabhyam tat vaso dānāya rādhaḥ	mad tad vasu dāna rādhas
214	sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam	sam arthay bahu tvad vasavya
214	indra yat citram śravasyāḥ anu dyūn	indra yad citra śravasy anu div
214	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
215	pra ghā nu asya mahataḥ mahāni	pra gha nu idam mahat maha
215	satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam	satya satya karaṇa vac
215	trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya	trikadruka pā suta
215	asya made ahim indraḥ jaghāna	idam mada ahi indra han
215	avaṁśe dyām astabhāyat bṛhantam	avaṃśa div stabhāy bṛhat
215	ā rodasī apṛṇat antarikṣam	ā rodas pṛṇ antarikṣa
215	sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathat ca	tad dhāray pṛthivī prath ca
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	sadma iva prācaḥ vi mimāya mānaiḥ	sadman iva prāñc vi mi māna
215	vajreṇa khāni atṛṇat nadīnām	vajra kha tṛd nadī
215	vṛthā asṛjat pathibhiḥ dīrghayāthaiḥ	vṛthā sṛj pathin dīrghayātha
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	sa pravoLhṛṛn parigatyā dabhīteḥ	tad pravoḍhṛ parigam dabhīti
215	viśvam adhāk āyudham iddhe agnau	viśva dah āyudha indh agni
215	sam gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ asṛjat rathebhiḥ	sam go aśva sṛj ratha
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	saḥ īm mahīm dhunim etoḥ aramṇāt	tad īṃ mah dhunī i ram
215	saḥ asnātṛṛn apārayat svasti	tad asnātṛ pāray svasti
215	te utsnāya rayim abhi pra tasthuḥ	tad utsnā rayi abhi pra sthā
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	sa udañcam sindhum ariṇāt mahitvā	tad udañc sindhu ri mahitva
215	vajreṇa anaḥ uṣasaḥ sam pipeṣa	vajra anas uṣas sam piṣ
215	ajavasaḥ javinībhiḥ vivṛścan	ajavas javin vivraśc
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	sa vidvān apagoham kanīnām	tad vid apagoha kanī
215	āviḥ bhavan ut atiṣThat parāvṛk	āvis bhū ud sthā parāvṛj
215	prati śroṇaḥ sthāt vi anak acaṣTa	prati śroṇa sthā vi anakṣ cakṣ
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	bhinat valam aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ	bhid vala aṅgiras gṛ
215	vi parvatasya dṛṁhitāni airat	vi parvata dṛṃhita īr
215	riṇak rodhāṁsi kṛtrimāṇi eṣām	ric rodhas kṛtrima idam
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	svapnena abhyupyā cumurim dhunim ca	svapna abhivap cumuri dhuni ca
215	jaghantha dasyum pra dabhītim āvaḥ	han dasyu pra dabhīti av
215	rambhī cit atra vivide hiraṇyam	rambhin cit atra vid hiraṇya
215	somasya tā made indraḥ cakāra	soma tad mada indra kṛ
215	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
215	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
215	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
215	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
216	pra vaḥ satām jyeṣThatamāya suṣTutim	pra tvad as jyeṣṭhatama suṣṭuti
216	agnau iva samidhāne haviḥ bhare	agni iva samindh havis bhṛ
216	indram ajuryam jarayantam ukṣitam	indra ajurya jaray ukṣ
216	sanāt yuvānam avase havāmahe	sanāt yuvan av hvā
216	yasmāt indrāt bṛhataḥ kim cana īm ṛte	yad indra bṛhat kaścana īṃ ṛte
216	viśvāni asmin sambhṛtā adhi vīryā	viśva idam sambhṛ adhi vīrya
216	jaThare somam tanvī sahaḥ mahaḥ	jaṭhara soma tanū sahas mahas
216	haste vajram bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum	hasta vajra bhṛ śīrṣan kratu
216	na kṣoṇībhyām paribhve te indriyam	na kṣoṇī paribhū tvad indriya
216	na samudraiḥ parvataiḥ indra te rathaḥ	na samudra parvata indra tvad ratha
216	na te vajram anu aśnoti kaḥ cana	na tvad vajra anu aś kaścana
216	yat āśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru	yat āśu pat yojana puru
216	viśve hi asmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave	viśva hi idam yajata dhṛṣṇu
216	kratum bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate	kratu bhṛ vṛṣabha saścant
216	vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣTaraḥ	vṛṣan yaj havis viduṣṭara
216	piba indra somam vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā	pā indra soma vṛṣabha bhānu
216	vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhvaḥ ūrmiḥ	vṛṣan kośa pū madhu ūrmi
216	vṛṣabhānnāya vṛṣabhāya pātave	vṛṣabha anna vṛṣabha pā
216	vṛṣaṇā adhvaryū vṛṣabhāsaḥ adrayaḥ	vṛṣan adhvaryu vṛṣabha adri
216	vṛṣaṇam somam vṛṣabhāya suṣvati	vṛṣan soma vṛṣabha
216	vṛṣā te vajraḥ uta te vṛṣā rathaḥ	vṛṣan tvad vajra uta tvad vṛṣan ratha
216	vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇi āyudhā	vṛṣan hari vṛṣabha āyudha
216	vṛṣṇaḥ madasya vṛṣabha tvam īśiṣe	vṛṣan mada vṛṣabha tvad īś
216	indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi	indra soma vṛṣabha tṛp
216	pra te nāvam na samane vacasyuvam	pra tvad nau na samana vacasyu
216	brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣu dādhṛṣiḥ	brahman yā savana dādhṛṣi
216	kuvit naḥ asya vacasaḥ nibodhiṣat	kuvid mad idam vacas nibudh
216	indram utsam na vasunaḥ sicāmahe	indra utsa na vasu sic
216	purā sambādhāt abhi ā vavṛtsva naḥ	purā sambādha abhi ā vṛt mad
216	dhenuḥ na vatsam yavasasya pipyuṣī	dhenu na vatsa yavasa pyā
216	sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato	sakṛt su tvad sumati śatakratu
216	sam patnībhiḥ na vṛṣaṇaḥ nasīmahi	sam patnī na vṛṣan nas
216	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
216	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
216	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
216	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
217	tat asmai navyam aṅgirasvat arcata	tad idam navya aṅgirasvat arc
217	śuṣmāḥ yat asya pratnathā udīrate	śuṣma yat idam pratnathā udīr
217	viśvā yat gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā	viśva yat gotra sahas parīvṛ
217	made somasya dṛṁhitāni airayat	mada soma dṛṃhay īray
217	sa bhūtu yaḥ ha prathamāya dhāyase	tad bhū yad ha prathama dhāyas
217	ojaḥ mimānaḥ mahimānam ā atirat	ojas mā mahiman ātṛ
217	śūraḥ yaḥ yutsu tanvam parivyata	śūra yad yudh tanū parivye
217	śīrṣaṇi dyām mahinā prati amuñcata	śīrṣan div mahina prati muc
217	adha akṛṇoḥ prathamam vīryam mahat	adha kṛ prathama vīrya mahat
217	yat asya agre brahmaṇā śuṣmam airayaḥ	yad idam agra brahman śuṣma īray
217	ratheṣThena haryaśvena vicyutāḥ	ratheṣṭha hari aśva vicyu
217	pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak	pra jīri sṛ sadhryañc pṛthak
217	adhā yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā abhi majmanā	adha yad viśva bhuvana abhi majman
217	īśānakṛt pravayāḥ abhi avardhata	īśāna kṛt pravayas abhi vṛdh
217	āt rodasī jyotiṣā vahniḥ ā atanot	āt rodas jyotis vahni ātan
217	sīvyan tamāṁsi dudhitā sam avyayat	sīv tamas dudhita sam vye
217	sa prācīnān parvatān dṛṁhat ojasā	tad prācīna parvata dṛh ojas
217	adharācīnam akṛṇot apām apaḥ	adharācīna kṛ ap apas
217	adhārayat pṛthivīm viśvadhāyasam	dhāray pṛthivī viśva dhāyas
217	astabhnāt māyayā dyām avasrasaḥ	stambh māyā div avasraṃs
217	sa asmai aram bāhubhyām yam pitā akṛṇot	tad idam aram bāhu yad pitṛ kṛ
217	viśvasmāt ā januṣaḥ vedasaḥ pari	viśva ā janus vedas pari
217	yenā pṛthivyām ni krivim śayadhyai	yad pṛthivī ni krivi śī
217	vajreṇa hatvī avṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ	vajra han vṛj tuviṣvaṇi
217	amājūḥ iva pitroḥ sacā satī	amājur iva pitṛ sacā as
217	samānāt ā sadasaḥ tvām iye bhagam	samāna ā sadas tvad i bhaga
217	kṛdhi praketam upa māsi ā bhara	kṛ praketa upa mā ā bhṛ
217	daddhi bhāgam tanvaḥ yena māmahaḥ	dā bhāga tanū yad mah
217	bhojam tvām indra vayam huvema	bhoja tvad indra mad hvā
217	dadiḥ tvam indra apāṁsi vājān	dadi tvad indra apas vāja
217	aviḍḍhi indra citrayā naḥ ūtī	av indra citra mad ūti
217	kṛdhi vṛṣan indra vasyasaḥ naḥ	kṛ vṛṣan indra vasyas mad
217	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
217	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
217	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
217	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
218	prātar rathaḥ navaḥ yoji sasniḥ	prātar ratha nava yuj sasni
218	caturyugaḥ trikaśaḥ saptaraśmiḥ	catur yuga tri kaśā saptan raśmi
218	daśāritraḥ manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ	daśan aritra manuṣya svarṣā
218	saḥ iṣTibhiḥ matibhiḥ raṁhyaḥ bhūt	tad iṣṭi mati raṃh bhū
218	sa asmai aram prathamam sa dvitīyam	tad idam aram prathama tad dvitīya
218	uta u tṛtīyam manuṣaḥ sa hotā	uta u tṛtīya manus tad hotṛ
218	anyasyāḥ garbham anye ū jananta	anya garbha anya u jan
218	saḥ anyebhiḥ sacate jenyaḥ vṛṣā	tad anya sac jenya vṛṣan
218	harī nu kam rathaḥ indrasya yojam	hari nu kaṃ ratha indra yuj
218	āyai sūktena vacasā navena	e su vac vacas nava
218	mā u su tvām atra bahavaḥ hi viprāḥ	mā u su tvad atra bahu hi vipra
218	ni rīraman yajamānāsaḥ anye	ni ram yajamāna anya
218	ā dvābhyām haribhyām indra yāhi	ā dvi hari indra yā
218	ā caturbhiḥ ā ṣaḍbhiḥ hūyamānaḥ	ā catur ā ṣaṣ hvā
218	ā aṣTābhiḥ daśabhiḥ somapeyam	ā aṣṭan daśan soma peya
218	ayam sutaḥ sumakha mā mṛdhaḥ kar	idam su su makha mā mṛdhas kṛ
218	ā viṁśatyā triṁśatā yāhi arvāṅ	ā viṃśati triṃśat yā arvāñc
218	ā catvāriṁśatā haribhiḥ yujānaḥ	ā catvāriṃśat hari yuj
218	ā pañcāśatā surathebhiḥ indra	ā pañcāśat su ratha indra
218	ā ṣaṣTyā saptatyā somapeyam	ā ṣaṣṭi saptati soma peya
218	ā aśītyā navatyā yāhi arvāṅ	ā aśīti navati yā arvāñc
218	ā śatena haribhiḥ uhyamānaḥ	ā śata hari vah
218	ayam hi te śunahotreṣu somaḥ	idam hi tvad śunahotra soma
218	indra tvāyā pariṣiktaḥ madāya	indra tvāyā pariṣic mada
218	mama brahma indra yāhi acchā	mad brahman indra yā acchā
218	viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya	viśva hari dhur dhā ratha
218	purutrā hi vihavyaḥ babhūtha	purutrā hi vihvā bhū
218	asmin śūra savane mādayasva	idam śūra savana māday
218	na me indreṇa sakhyam vi yoṣat	na mad indra sakhya vi yu
218	asmabhyam asya dakṣiṇā duhīta	mad idam dakṣiṇā duh
218	upa jyeṣThe varūthe gabhastau	upa jyeṣṭha varūtha gabhasti
218	prāyeprāye jigīvāṁsaḥ syāma	prāya prāya ji as
218	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
218	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
218	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
218	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
219	apāyi asya andhasaḥ madāya	pā idam andhas mada
219	manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ	manīṣin su prayas
219	yasmin indraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhānaḥ	yad indra pradiv vṛdh
219	okaḥ dadhe brahmaṇyantaḥ ca naraḥ	oka dhā brahmaṇy ca nṛ
219	asya mandānaḥ madhvaḥ vajrahastaḥ	idam mad madhu vajrahasta
219	ahim indraḥ arṇovṛtam vi vṛścat	ahi indra arṇovṛt vi vraśc
219	pra yat vayaḥ na svasarāṇi acchā	pra yat vi na svasara acchā
219	prayāṁsi ca nadīnām cakramanta	prayas ca nadī kram
219	sa māhinaḥ indraḥ arṇaḥ apām	tad māhina indra arṇas ap
219	pra airayat ahihā acchā samudram	preray ahi han acchā samudra
219	ajanayat sūryam vidat gāḥ	janay sūrya vid go
219	aktunā ahnām vayunāni sādhat	aktu ahar vayuna sādh
219	saḥ apratīni manave purūṇi	tad aprati manu puru
219	indraḥ dāśat dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram	indra dāś dāś han vṛtra
219	sadyaḥ yaḥ nṛbhyaḥ atasāyyaḥ bhūt	sadyas yad nṛ atasāyya bhū
219	paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau	spṛdh sūrya sāti
219	sa sunvate indraḥ sūryam	tad su indra sūrya
219	ā devaḥ riṇak martyāya stavān	ā deva ric martya stava
219	ā yat rayim guhadavadyam asmai	ā yat rayi guh avadya idam
219	bharat aṁśam na etaśaḥ daśasyan	bhṛ aṃśa na etaśa daśasy
219	sa randhayat sadivaḥ sārathaye	tad randhay sadivas sārathi
219	śuṣṇam aśuṣam kuyavam kutsāya	śuṣṇa aśuṣa kuyava kutsa
219	divodāsāya navatim ca nava	divodāsa navati ca navan
219	indraḥ puraḥ vi airat śambarasya	indra pur vi īr śambara
219	evā te indra ucatham ahema	eva tvad indra ucatha hi
219	śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ	śravasyā na tman vājay
219	aśyāma tat sāptam āśuṣāṇāḥ	aś tad sāpta āśuṣ
219	nanamaḥ vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ	nam vadhar a deva pīyu
219	evā te gṛtsamadāḥ śūra manma	eva tvad gṛtsamada śūra manman
219	avasyavaḥ na vayunāni takṣuḥ	avasyu na vayuna takṣ
219	brahmaṇyantaḥ indra te navīyaḥ	brahmaṇy indra tvad navīyas
219	iṣam ūrjam sukṣitim sumnam aśyuḥ	iṣ ūrj su kṣiti sumna aś
219	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
219	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
219	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
219	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
220	vayam te vayaḥ indra viddhi su naḥ	mad tvad vayas indra vid su mad
220	pra bharāmahe vājayuḥ na ratham	pra bhṛ vājayu na ratha
220	vipanyavaḥ dīdhyataḥ manīṣā	vipanyu dhī manīṣā
220	sumnam iyakṣantaḥ tvāvataḥ nṛṛn	sumna iyakṣ tvāvat nṛ
220	tvam naḥ indra tvābhiḥ ūtī	tvad mad indra ūti
220	tvāyataḥ abhiṣTipāḥ asi janān	tvāyat abhiṣṭi pā as jana
220	tvam inaḥ dāśuṣaḥ varūtā	tvad ina dāś varūtṛ
220	itthādhīḥ abhi yaḥ nakṣati tvā	itthā dhī abhi yad nakṣ tvad
220	sa naḥ yuvā indraḥ johūtraḥ	tad mad yuvan indra johūtra
220	sakhā śivaḥ narām astu pātā	sakhi śiva nṛ as pā
220	yaḥ śaṁsantam yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī	yad śaṃs yad śam ūti
220	pacantam ca stuvantam ca praṇeṣat	pac ca stu ca praṇī
220	tam u stuṣe indram tam gṛṇīṣe	tad u stu indra tad gṛ
220	yasmin purā vāvṛdhuḥ śāśaduḥ ca	yad purā vṛdh śad ca
220	sa vasvaḥ kāmam pīparat iyānaḥ	tad vasu kāma pṛ i
220	brahmaṇyataḥ nūtanasya āyoḥ	brahmaṇy nūtana āyu
220	saḥ aṅgirasām ucathā jujuṣvān	tad aṅgiras ucatha juṣ
220	brahmā tūtot indraḥ gātum iṣṇan	brahman tu indra gā iṣ
220	muṣṇan uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa stavān	muṣ uṣas sūrya stavat
220	aśnasya cit śiśnathat pūrvyāṇi	aśna cit śnath pūrvya
220	sa ha śrutaḥ indraḥ nāma devaḥ	tad ha śru indra nāma deva
220	ūrdhvaḥ bhuvat manuṣe dasmatamaḥ	ūrdhva bhū manus dasmatama
220	ava priyam arśasānasya sāhvān	ava priya arśasāna sah
220	śiraḥ bharat dāsasya svadhāvān	śiras bhṛ dāsa svadhāvat
220	sa vṛtrahā indraḥ kṛṣṇayonīḥ	tad vṛtrahan indra kṛṣṇa yoni
220	puraṁdaraḥ dāsīḥ airayat vi	puraṃdara dāsa īray vi
220	ajanayat manave kṣām apaḥ ca	janay manu kṣā ap ca
220	satrā śaṁsam yajamānasya tūtot	satrā śaṃsa yajamāna tu
220	tasmai tavasyam anu dāyi satrā	tad tavasya anu dā satrā
220	indrāya devebhiḥ arṇasātau	indra deva arṇa sāti
220	prati yat asya vajram bāhvoḥ dhuḥ	prati yat idam vajra bāhu dhā
220	hatvī dasyūn puraḥ āyasīḥ ni tārīt	han dasyu pur āyasa ni tṛ
220	nūnam sā te prati varam jaritre	nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ
220	duhīyat indra dakṣiṇā maghonī	duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan
220	śikṣā stotṛbhyaḥ mā ati dhak bhagaḥ naḥ	śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad
220	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
221	viśvajite dhanajite svarjite	viśva jit dhana jit svar jit
221	satrājite nṛjite urvarājite	satrā jit nṛ jit urvarā jit
221	aśvajite gojite abjite bhara	aśva jit go jit ap jit bhṛ
221	indrāya somam yajatāya haryatam	indra soma yajata haryata
221	abhibhuve abhibhaṅgāya vanvate	abhibhū abhibhaṅga van
221	aṣāLhāya sahamānāya vedhase	a sah sah vedhas
221	tuvigraye vahnaye duṣTarītave	tuvigri vahni duṣṭarītu
221	satrāsāhe namaḥ indrāya vocata	satrā sāh namas indra vac
221	satrāsāhaḥ janabhakṣaḥ janaṁsahaḥ	satrā sāha jana bhakṣa janaṃsaha
221	cyavanaḥ yudhmaḥ anu joṣam ukṣitaḥ	cyavana yudhma anu joṣa vakṣ
221	vṛtaṁcayaḥ sahuriḥ vikṣu āritaḥ	vṛtaṃcaya sahuri viś ār
221	indrasya vocam pra kṛtāni vīryā	indra vac pra kṛ vīrya
221	anānudaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ dodhataḥ vadhaḥ	anānuda vṛṣabha dudh vadha
221	gambhīraḥ ṛṣvaḥ asamaṣTakāvyaḥ	gambhīra ṛṣva a samaś kāvya
221	radhracodaḥ śnathanaḥ vīLitaḥ pṛthuḥ	radhra coda śnathana vīḍay pṛthu
221	indraḥ suyajñaḥ uṣasaḥ svar janat	indra su yajña uṣas svar jan
221	yajñena gātum apturaḥ vividrire	yajña gātu aptur vid
221	dhiyaḥ hinvānāḥ uśijaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	dhī hi uśij manīṣin
221	abhisvarā niṣadā gāḥ avasyavaḥ	abhisvara niṣad go avasyu
221	indre hinvānāḥ draviṇāni āśata	indra hi draviṇa aś
221	indra śreṣThāni draviṇāni dhehi	indra śreṣṭha draviṇa dhā
221	cittim dakṣasya subhagatvam asme	citti dakṣa subhaga tva mad
221	poṣam rayīṇām ariṣTim tanūnām	poṣa rayi ariṣṭi tanu
221	svādmānam vācaḥ sudinatvam ahnām	svādman vāc sudina tva ahar
 ---
222	trikadrukeṣu mahiṣaḥ yavāśiram	trikadruka mahiṣa yava āśir
222	tuviśuṣmaḥ	tuvi śuṣma
