222	tṛpat somam apibat viṣṇunā sutam	tṛp soma pā viṣṇu su
222	yathā avaśat	yathā vaś
222	saḥ īm mamāda mahi karma kartave	tad īṃ mad mahi karman kṛ
222	mahām urum	mah uru
222	sa enam saścat devaḥ devam satyam indram	tad enad sac deva deva satya indra
222	satyaḥ induḥ	satya indu
222	adha tviṣīmān abhi ojasā krivim	adha tviṣīmat abhi ojas krivi
222	yudhā abhavat	yudh bhū
222	ā rodasī apṛṇat asya majmanā	ā rodas pṛṇ idam majman
222	pra vāvṛdhe	pra vṛdh
222	adhatta anyam jaThare pra īm aricyata	dhā anya jaṭhara pra īṃ ric
222	sa enam saścat devaḥ devam satyam indram	tad enad sac deva deva satya indra
222	satyaḥ induḥ	satya indu
222	sākam jātaḥ kratunā sākam ojasā	sākam jan kratu sākam ojas
222	vavakṣitha	vakṣ
222	sākam vṛddhaḥ vīryaīḥ sāsahiḥ mṛdhaḥ	sākam vṛdh vīrya sāsahi mṛdh
222	vicarṣaṇiḥ	vicarṣaṇi
222	dātā rādhaḥ stuvate kāmyam vasu	dā rādhas stu kāmya vasu
222	sa enam saścat devaḥ devam satyam indram	tad enad sac deva deva satya indra
222	satyaḥ induḥ	satya indu
222	tava tyat naryam nṛto	tvad tya narya nṛtu
222	apa indra prathamam pūrvyam divi	apas indra prathama pūrvya div
222	pravācyam kṛtam	pravac kṛ
222	yat devasya śavasā pra ariṇāḥ asum	yat deva śavas prari asu
222	riṇan apaḥ	ri ap
222	bhuvat viśvam abhi ādevam ojasā	bhū viśva abhi ā a deva ojas
222	vidāt ūrjam śatakratuḥ	vid ūrj śatakratu
222	vidāt iṣam	vid iṣ
 ---
223	gaṇānām tvā gaṇapatim havāmahe	gaṇa tvad gaṇapati hvā
223	kavim kavīnām upamaśravastamam	kavi kavi upamaśravastama
223	jyeṣTharājam brahmaṇām brahmaṇaḥ pate	jyeṣṭha rāj brahman brahmaṇaspati
223	ā naḥ śṛṇvan ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam	ā mad śru ūti sad sādana
223	devāḥ cit te asurya pracetasaḥ	deva cit tvad asurya pracetas
223	bṛhaspate yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśuḥ	bṛhaspati yajñiya bhāga aś
223	usrā iva sūryaḥ jyotiṣā mahaḥ	usrā iva sūrya jyotis maha
223	viśveṣām it janitā brahmaṇām asi	viśva id jan brahman as
223	ā vibādhyā parirāpaḥ tamāṁsi ca	ā vibādh parirāp tamas ca
223	jyotiṣmantam ratham ṛtasya tiṣThasi	jyotiṣmat ratha ṛta sthā
223	bṛhaspate bhīmam amitradambhanam	bṛhaspati bhīma amitra dambhana
223	rakṣohaṇam gotrabhidam svarvidam	rakṣas han gotra bhid svar vid
223	sunītibhiḥ nayasi trāyase janam	sunīti nī trā jana
223	yaḥ tubhyam dāśāt na tam aṁhaḥ aśnavat	yad tvad dāś na tad aṃhas aś
223	brahmadviṣaḥ tapanaḥ manyumīḥ asi	brahman dviṣ tapana manyumī as
223	bṛhaspate mahi tat te mahitvanam	bṛhaspati mahi tad tvad mahitvana
223	na tam aṁhaḥ na duritam kutaḥ cana	na tad aṃhas na durita kutaścana
223	na arātayaḥ titiruḥ na dvayāvinaḥ	na arāti tṛ na dvayāvin
223	viśvā it asmāt dhvarasaḥ vi bādhase	viśva id idam dhvaras vi bādh
223	yam sugopāḥ rakṣasi brahmaṇaḥ pate	yad su gopā rakṣ brahmaṇaspati
223	tvam naḥ gopāḥ pathikṛt vicakṣaṇaḥ	tvad mad gopā pathikṛt vicakṣaṇa
223	tava vratāya matibhiḥ jarāmahe	tvad vrata mati jṛ
223	bṛhaspate yaḥ naḥ abhi hvaraḥ dadhe	bṛhaspati yad mad abhi hvaras dhā
223	svā tam marmartu ducchunā harasvatī	sva tad mamar ducchunā harasvat
223	uta vā yaḥ naḥ marcayāt anāgasaḥ	uta vā yad mad marcay anāgas
223	arātīvā martaḥ sānukaḥ vṛkaḥ	arātīvan marta sānuka vṛka
223	bṛhaspate apa tam vartayā pathaḥ	bṛhaspati apa tad vartay pathin
223	sugam naḥ asyai devavītaye kṛdhi	suga mad idam deva vīti kṛ
223	trātāram tvā tanūnām havāmahe	trātṛ tvad tanu hvā
223	avaspartar adhivaktāram asmayum	avaspartṛ adhivaktṛ asmayu
223	bṛhaspate devanidaḥ ni barhaya	bṛhaspati deva nid ni barhay
223	mā durevāḥ uttaram sumnam ut naśan	mā dureva uttara sumna ud naś
223	tvayā vayam suvṛdhā brahmaṇaḥ pate	tvad mad su vṛdh brahmaṇaspati
223	spārhā vasu manuṣyā ā dadīmahi	spārha vasu manuṣya dā
223	yāḥ naḥ dūre taLitaḥ yāḥ arātayaḥ	yad mad dūra taḍitas yad arāti
223	abhi santi jambhayā tāḥ anapnasaḥ	abhi as jambhay tad anapnas
223	tvayā vayam uttamam dhīmahe vayaḥ	tvad mad uttama vayas
223	bṛhaspate papriṇā sasninā yujā	bṛhaspati papri sasni yuj
223	mā naḥ duḥśaṁsaḥ abhidipsuḥ īśata	mā mad duḥśaṃsa abhidipsu īś
223	pra suśaṁsāḥ matibhiḥ tāriṣīmahi	pra su śaṃsa mati tṛ
223	anānudaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jagmiḥ āhavam	anānuda vṛṣabha jagmi āhava
223	niṣTaptā śatrum pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ	niṣṭap śatru pṛtanā sāsahi
223	asi satyaḥ ṛṇayāḥ brahmaṇaḥ pate	as satya ṛṇayā brahmaṇaspati
223	ugrasya cit damitā vīLuharṣiṇaḥ	ugra cit dam vīḍu harṣin
223	adevena manasā yaḥ riṣaṇyati	a deva manas yad riṣaṇy
223	śāsām ugraḥ manyamānaḥ jighāṁsati	śās ugra man jighāṃs
223	bṛhaspate mā praṇak tasya naḥ vadhaḥ	bṛhaspati mā praṇaś tad mad vadha
223	ni karma manyum durevasya śardhataḥ	ni karman manyu dureva śṛdh
223	bhareṣu havyaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ	bhara hu namas upasad
223	gantā vājeṣu sanitā dhanaṁdhanam	gam vāja san dhana dhana
223	viśvā it aryaḥ abhidipsvaḥ mṛdhaḥ	viśva id ari abhidipsu mṛdh
223	bṛhaspatiḥ vi vavarhā rathān iva	bṛhaspati vi vṛh ratha iva
223	tejiṣThayā tapanī rakṣasaḥ tapa	tejiṣṭha tapanī rakṣas tap
223	ye tvā nide dadhire dṛṣTavīryam	yad tvad nid dhā dṛś vīrya
223	āviḥ tat kṛṣva yat asat te ukthyam	āvis tad kṛ yad as tvad ukthya
223	bṛhaspate vi parirāpaḥ ardaya	bṛhaspati vi parirāp arday
223	bṛhaspate ati yat aryaḥ arhāt	bṛhaspati ati yad ari arh
223	dyumat vibhāti kratumat janeṣu	dyumat vibhā kratumat jana
223	yat dīdayat śavasā ṛtaprajāta	yad dīdī śavas ṛta prajan
223	tat asmāsu draviṇam dhehi citram	tad mad draviṇa dhā citra
223	mā naḥ stenebhyaḥ ye abhi druhaḥ pade	mā mad stena yad abhi druh pada
223	nirāmiṇaḥ ripavaḥ anneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ	nirāmin ripu anna gṛdh
223	ā devānām ohate vi vrayaḥ hṛdi	ā deva ūh vi vrayas hṛd
223	bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmnaḥ viduḥ	bṛhaspati na paras sāman vid
223	viśvebhyaḥ hi tvā bhuvanebhyaḥ pari	viśva hi tvad bhuvana pari
223	tvaṣTā ajanat sāmnaḥsāmnaḥ kaviḥ	tvaṣṭṛ jan sāman sāman kavi
223	saḥ ṛṇacit ṛṇayāḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	tad ṛṇacit ṛṇayā brahmaṇaspati
223	druhaḥ hantā mahaḥ ṛtasya dhartari	druh han mah ṛta dhartṛ
223	tava śriye vi ajihīta parvataḥ	tvad śrī vi hā parvata
223	gavām gotram udasṛjaḥ yat aṅgiraḥ	go gotra utsṛj yat aṅgiras
223	indreṇa yujā tamasā parīvṛtam	indra yuj tamas parīvṛ
223	bṛhaspate niḥ apām aubjaḥ arṇavam	bṛhaspati niḥ ap ubj arṇava
223	brahmaṇaḥ pate tvam asya yantā	brahmaṇaspati tvad idam yam
223	sūktasya bodhi tanayam ca jinva	sūkta bhū tanaya ca jinv
223	viśvam tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ	viśva tad bhadra yad av deva
223	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
224	sa imām aviḍḍhi prabhṛtim yaḥ īśiṣe	tad idam av prabhṛti yad īś
224	ayā vidhema navayā mahā girā	idam vidh nava maha gir
224	yathā naḥ mīḍhvān stavate sakhā tava	yathā mad mīḍhvas stu sakhi tvad
224	bṛhaspate sīṣadhaḥ sa uta naḥ matim	bṛhaspati sādh tad uta mad mati
224	yaḥ nantvāni anamat ni ojasā	yad nantva nam ni ojas
224	uta adardar manyunā śambarāṇi vi	uta dardar manyu śambara vi
224	pra acyāvayat acyutā brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	praccyāvay acyuta brahmaṇaspati
224	ā ca aviśat vasumantam vi parvatam	ā ca viś vasumat vi parvata
224	tat devānām devatamāya kartvam	tad deva devatama kartva
224	aśrathnan dṛLhā avradanta vīLitā	śrath dṛḍha vrad vīḍay
224	ut gāḥ ājat abhinat brahmaṇā valam	ud go aj bhid brahman vala
224	agūhat tamaḥ vi acakṣayat svar	guh tamas vi cakṣay svar
224	aśmāsyam avatam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	aśman āsya avata brahmaṇaspati
224	madhudhāram abhi yam ojasā atṛṇat	madhu dhārā abhi yad ojas tṛd
224	tam eva viśve papire svardṛśaḥ	tad eva viśva pā svar dṛś
224	bahu sākam sisicuḥ utsam udriṇam	bahu sākam sic utsa udrin
224	sanā tā kā cit bhuvanā bhavītvā	sana tad kaścit bhuvana bhavītva
224	mādbhiḥ śaradbhiḥ duraḥ varanta vaḥ	mās śarad dvār vṛ tvad
224	ayatantā carataḥ anyadanyat it	a yat car anya anya id
224	yā cakāra vayunā brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad kṛ vayuna brahmaṇaspati
224	abhinakṣantaḥ abhi ye tam ānaśuḥ	abhinakṣ abhi yad tad aś
224	nidhim paṇīnām paramam guhā hitam	nidhi paṇi parama guhā dhā
224	te vidvāṁsaḥ praticakṣya anṛtā punar	tad vid praticakṣ anṛta punar
224	yataḥ u āyan tat ut īyuḥ āviśam	yatas u i tad ud i āviś
224	ṛtāvānaḥ praticakṣya anṛtā punar	ṛtāvan praticakṣ anṛta punar
224	ā ataḥ ā tasthuḥ kavayaḥ mahaḥ pathaḥ	ā atas ā sthā kavi mah pathin
224	te bāhubhyām dhamitam agnim aśmani	tad bāhu dham agni aśman
224	nakiḥ saḥ asti araṇaḥ jahuḥ hi tam	nakir tad as araṇa hā hi tad
224	ṛtajyena kṣipreṇa brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	ṛta jyā kṣipra brahmaṇaspati
224	yatra vaṣTi pra tat aśnoti dhanvanā	yatra vaś pra tad aś dhanvan
224	tasya sādhvīḥ iṣavaḥ yābhiḥ asyati	tad sādhu iṣu yad as
224	nṛcakṣasaḥ dṛśaye karṇayonayaḥ	nṛ cakṣas dṛś karṇa yoni
224	sa saṁnayaḥ sa vinayaḥ purohitaḥ	tad saṃnaya tad vinaya purohita
224	sa suṣTutaḥ sa yudhi brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	tad suṣṭuta tad yudh brahmaṇaspati
224	cākṣmaḥ yat vājam bharate matī dhanā	cākṣma yat vāja bhṛ mati dhana
224	āt it sūryaḥ tapati tapyatuḥ vṛthā	id sūrya tap tapyatu vṛthā
224	vibhu prabhu prathamam mehanāvataḥ	vibhu prabhu prathama mehanāvat
224	bṛhaspateḥ suvidatrāṇi rādhyā	bṛhaspati suvidatra rādhya
224	imā sātāni venyasya vājinaḥ	idam sāta venya vājin
224	yena janāḥ ubhaye bhuñjate viśaḥ	yad jana ubhaya bhuj viś
224	yaḥ avare vṛjane viśvathā vibhuḥ	yad avara vṛjana viśvathā vibhu
224	mahām u raṇvaḥ śavasā vavakṣitha	mahat u raṇva śavas vakṣ
224	sa devaḥ devān prati paprathe pṛthu	tad deva deva prati prath pṛthu
224	viśvā it u tā paribhūḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	viśva id u tad paribhū brahmaṇaspati
224	viśvam satyam maghavānā yuvoḥ it	viśva satya maghavan tvad id
224	āpaḥ cana pra minanti vratam vām	ap cana pra mī vrata tvad
224	accha indrābrahmaṇaspatī haviḥ naḥ	acchā indrābrahmaṇaspati havis mad
224	annam yujā iva vājinā jigātam	anna yuj eva vājin gā
224	uta āśiṣThāḥ anu śṛṇvanti vahnayaḥ	uta āśiṣṭha anu śru vahni
224	sabheyaḥ vipraḥ bharate matī dhanā	sabheya vipra bhṛ mati dhana
224	vīLudveṣāḥ anu vaśā ṛṇam ādadiḥ	vīḍu dveṣas anu vaśa ṛṇa ādadi
224	sa ha vājī samithe brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	tad ha vājin samitha brahmaṇaspati
224	brahmaṇaḥ pateḥ abhavat yathāvaśam	brahmaṇaspati bhū yathāvaśam
224	satyaḥ manyuḥ mahi karmā kariṣyataḥ	satya manyu mahi karman kṛ
224	yaḥ gāḥ udājat sa dive vi ca abhajat	yad go udaj tad div vi ca bhaj
224	mahī iva rītiḥ śavasā asarat pṛthak	mah iva rīti śavas sṛ pṛthak
224	brahmaṇaḥ pate suyamasya viśvahā	brahmaṇaspati su yama viśvahā
224	rāyaḥ syāma rathyaḥ vayasvataḥ	rai as rathī vayasvat
224	vīreṣu vīrān upa pṛṅdhi naḥ tvam	vīra vīra upa pṛc mad tvad
224	yat īśānaḥ brahmaṇā veṣi me havam	yat īś brahman vī mad hava
224	brahmaṇaḥ pate tvam asya yantā	brahmaṇaspati tvad idam yam
224	sūktasya bodhi tanayam ca jinva	sūkta bhū tanaya ca jinv
224	viśvam tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ	viśva tad bhadra yad av deva
224	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
225	indhānaḥ agnim vanavat vanuṣyataḥ	indh agni van vanuṣy
225	kṛtabrahmā śūśuvat rātahavyaḥ it	kṛ brahman śvi rā havya id
225	jātena jātam ati sa pra sarsṛte	jan jan ati tad pra sarsṛ
225	yaṁyam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati
225	vīrebhiḥ vīrān vanavat vanuṣyataḥ	vīra vīra van vanuṣy
225	gobhiḥ rayim paprathat bodhati tmanā	go rayi prath budh tman
225	tokam ca tasya tanayam ca vardhate	toka ca tad tanaya ca vṛdh
225	yaṁyam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati
225	sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ śimīvān ṛghāyataḥ	sindhu na kṣodas śimīvat ṛghāy
225	vṛṣā iva vadhrīn abhi vaṣTi ojasā	vṛṣan iva vadhri abhi vaś ojas
225	agneḥ iva prasitiḥ na aha vartave	agni iva prasiti na aha vṛ
225	yaṁyam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati
225	tasmai arṣanti divyāḥ asaścataḥ	tad ṛṣ divya asaścat
225	sa satvabhiḥ prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati	tad satvan prathama go gam
225	anibhṛṣTataviṣiḥ hanti ojasā	a nibhraṃś taviṣī han ojas
225	yaṁyam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati
225	tasmai it viśve dhunayanta sindhavaḥ	tad id viśva dhunay sindhu
225	acchidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi	acchidra śarman dhā puru
225	devānām sumne subhagaḥ saḥ edhate	deva sumna subhaga tad edh
225	yaṁyam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati
 ---
226	ṛjuḥ it śaṁsaḥ vanavat vanuṣyataḥ	ṛju id śaṃsa van vanuṣy
226	devayan it adevayantam abhi asat	devay id a devay abhi as
226	suprāvīḥ it vanavat pṛtsu duṣTaram	su prāvī id van pṛt duṣṭara
226	yajvā it ayajyoḥ vi bhajāti bhojanam	yajvan id a yajyu vi bhaj bhojana
226	yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyataḥ	yaj vīra pra vī manāy
226	bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye	bhadra manas kṛ vṛtratūrya
226	haviḥ kṛṇuṣva subhagaḥ yathā asasi	havis kṛ subhaga yathā as
226	brahmaṇaḥ pateḥ ava ā vṛṇīmahe	brahmaṇaspati avas vṛ
226	saḥ it janena sa viśā sa janmanā	tad id jana tad viś tad janman
226	sa putraiḥ vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ	tad putra vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ
226	devānām yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati	deva yad pitṛ āvivās
226	śraddhāmanāḥ haviṣā brahmaṇaḥ patim	śraddhā manas havis brahmaṇaspati
226	yaḥ asmai havyaiḥ ghṛtavadbhiḥ avidhat	yad idam havya ghṛtavat vidh
226	pra tam prācā nayati brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	pra tad prāñc nī brahmaṇaspati
226	uruṣyati īm aṁhasaḥ rakṣatī riṣaḥ	uruṣy īṃ aṃhas rakṣ riṣ
226	aṁhoḥ cit asmai urucakriḥ adbhutaḥ	aṃhu cit idam uru cakri adbhuta
 ---
227	imāḥ giraḥ ādityebhyaḥ ghṛtasnūḥ	idam gir āditya ghṛtasnu
227	sanāt rājabhyaḥ juhvā juhomi	sanāt rājan juhū hu
227	śṛṇotu mitraḥ aryamā bhagaḥ naḥ	śru mitra aryaman bhaga mad
227	tuvijātaḥ varuṇaḥ dakṣaḥ aṁśaḥ	tuvi jan varuṇa dakṣa aṃśa
227	imam stomam sakratavaḥ me adya	idam stoma sa kratu mad adya
227	mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ juṣanta	mitra aryaman varuṇa juṣ
227	ādityāsaḥ śucayaḥ dhārapūtāḥ	āditya śuci dhāra pū
227	avṛjināḥ anavadyāḥ ariṣTāḥ	a vṛjina anavadya ariṣṭa
227	te ādityāsaḥ uravaḥ gabhīrāḥ	tad āditya uru gabhīra
227	adabdhāsaḥ dipsantaḥ bhūryakṣāḥ	adabdha dips bhūri akṣa
227	antar paśyanti vṛjinā uta sādhu	antar paś vṛjina uta sādhu
227	sarvam rājabhyaḥ paramā cit anti	sarva rājan parama cit antī
227	dhārayantaḥ ādityāsaḥ jagat sthāḥ	dhāray āditya jagat sthā
227	devāḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ	deva viśva bhuvana gopā
227	dīrghādhiyaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ asuryam	dīrgha ādhī rakṣ asurya
227	ṛtāvānaḥ cayamānāḥ ṛṇāni	ṛtāvan ci ṛṇa
227	vidyām ādityāḥ avasaḥ vaḥ asya	vid āditya avas tvad idam
227	yat aryaman bhaye ā cit mayobhu	yad aryaman bhaya ā cit mayobhu
227	yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau	tvad mitrāvaruṇa praṇīti
227	pari śvabhrā iva duritāni vṛjyām	pari śvabhra iva durita vṛj
227	sugaḥ hi vaḥ aryaman mitra panthāḥ	su ga hi tvad aryaman mitra pathin
227	anṛkṣaraḥ varuṇa sādhuḥ asti	anṛkṣara varuṇa sādhu as
227	tena ādityāḥ adhi vocatā naḥ	tad āditya adhi vac mad
227	yacchatā naḥ duṣparihantu śarma	yam mad duṣparihantu śarman
227	pipartu naḥ aditiḥ rājaputrā	pṛ mad aditi rājan putra
227	ati dveṣāṁsi aryamā sugebhiḥ	ati dveṣas aryaman su ga
227	bṛhat mitrasya varuṇasya śarma	bṛhat mitra varuṇa śarman
227	upa syāma puruvīrāḥ ariṣTāḥ	upa as puru vīra ariṣṭa
227	tisraḥ bhūmīḥ dhārayan trīn uta dyūn	tri bhūmi dhāray tri uta div
227	trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām	tri vrata vidatha antar idam
227	ṛtena ādityāḥ mahi vaḥ mahitvam	ṛta āditya mahi tvad mahi tva
227	tat aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru	tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru
227	trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta	tri rocana divya dhāray
227	hiraṇyayāḥ śucayaḥ dhārapūtāḥ	hiraṇyaya śuci dhāra pū
227	asvapnajaḥ animiṣāḥ adabdhāḥ	a svapnaj animiṣa adabdha
227	uruśaṁsāḥ ṛjave martyāya	uru śaṃsa ṛju martya
227	tvam viśveṣām varuṇa asi rājā	tvad viśva varuṇa as rājan
227	ye ca devāḥ asura ye ca martāḥ	yad ca deva asura yad ca marta
227	śatam naḥ rāsva śaradaḥ vicakṣe	śata mad rā śarad vicakṣ
227	aśyāma āyūṁṣi sudhitāni pūrvā	aś āyus sudhita pūrva
227	na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā	na dakṣiṇa vi cit na savya
227	na prācīnam ādityāḥ na uta paścā	na prācīna āditya na uta paśca
227	pākyā cit vasavaḥ dhīryā cit	pākyā cit vasu dhīrya cit
227	yuṣmānītaḥ abhayam jyotiḥ aśyām	yuṣmānīta abhaya jyotis aś
227	yaḥ rājabhyaḥ ṛtanibhyaḥ dadāśa	yad rājan ṛta ni bhī dāś
227	yam vardhayanti puṣTayaḥ ca nityāḥ	yad vardhay puṣṭi ca nitya
227	sa revān yāti prathamaḥ rathena	tad revat yā prathama ratha
227	vasudāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ	vasu dāvan vidatha praśaṃs
227	śuciḥ apaḥ sūyavasāḥ adabdhaḥ	śuci ap su yavasa adabdha
227	upa kṣeti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ	upa kṣi vṛdh vayas su vīra
227	nakiḥ tam ghnanti antitaḥ na dūrāt	nakir tad han antitas na dūrāt
227	yaḥ ādityānām bhavati praṇītau	yad āditya bhū praṇīti
227	adite mitra varuṇa uta mṛLa	aditi mitra varuṇa uta mṛḍ
227	yat vaḥ vayam cakṛmā kat cit āgaḥ	yat tvad mad kṛ kaścit āgas
227	uru aśyām abhayam jyotiḥ indra	uru aś abhaya jyotis indra
227	mā naḥ dīrghāḥ abhi naśan tamisrāḥ	mā mad dīrgha abhi naś tamisrā
227	ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī	ubh idam pyā samyañc
227	divaḥ vṛṣTim subhagaḥ nāma puṣyan	div vṛṣṭi subhaga nāma puṣ
227	ubhā kṣayau ājayan yāti pṛtsu	ubh kṣaya āji yā pṛt
227	ubhau ardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai	ubh ardha bhū sādhu idam
227	yāḥ vaḥ māyāḥ abhidruhe yajatrāḥ	yad tvad māyā abhidruh yajatra
227	pāśāḥ ādityāḥ ripave vicṛttāḥ	pāśa āditya ripu vicṛt
227	aśvī iva tān ati yeṣam rathena	aśvin iva tad ati yā ratha
227	ariṣTāḥ urau ā śarman syāma	ariṣṭa uru ā śarman as
227	mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya	mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya
227	bhūridāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ	bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi
227	mā rāyaḥ rājan suyamāt ava sthām	mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā
227	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
228	idam kaveḥ ādityasya svarājaḥ	idam kavi āditya sva rāj
228	viśvāni sānti abhi astu mahnā	viśva as abhi as mahan
228	ati yaḥ mandraḥ yajathāya devaḥ	ati yad mandra yajatha deva
228	sukīrtim bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ	su kīrti bhikṣ varuṇa bhūri
228	tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma	tvad vrata subhaga as
228	svādhyaḥ varuṇa tuṣTuvāṁsaḥ	su ādhī varuṇa stu
228	upāyane uṣasām gomatīnām	upāyana uṣas gomat
228	agnayaḥ na jaramāṇāḥ anu dyūn	agni na jṛ anu div
228	tava syāma puruvīrasya śarman	tvad as puru vīra śarman
228	uruśaṁsasya varuṇa praṇetar	uru śaṃsa varuṇa praṇetṛ
228	yūyam naḥ putrāḥ aditeḥ adabdhāḥ	tvad mad putra aditi adabdha
228	abhi kṣamadhvam yujyāya devāḥ	abhi kṣam yujya deva
228	pra sīm ādityaḥ asṛjat vidhartā	pra sīm āditya sṛj vidhartṛ
228	ṛtam sindhavaḥ varuṇasya yanti	ṛta sindhu varuṇa i
228	na śrāmyanti na vi mucanti ete	na śram na vi muc etad
228	vayaḥ na paptuḥ raghuyā parijman	vi na pat raghuyā parijman
228	vi mat śrathāya raśanām iva āgaḥ	vi mad śrathāy raśanā iva āgas
228	ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya	ṛdh tvad varuṇa khā ṛta
228	mā tantuḥ chedi vayataḥ dhiyam me	mā tantu chid ve dhī mad
228	mā mātrā śāri apasaḥ purā ṛtoḥ	mā mātrā śṛ apas puras ṛtu
228	apa u su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat	apa u su myakṣ varuṇa bhiyas mad
228	samrāT ṛtāvaḥ anu mā gṛbhāya	samrāj ṛtāvan anu mad gṛbhāy
228	dāma iva vatsāt vi mumugdhi aṁhaḥ	dāman iva vatsa vi muc aṃhas
228	nahi tvat āre nimiṣaḥ cana īśe	nahi tvad āre nimiṣ cana īś
228	mā naḥ vadhaiḥ varuṇa ye te iṣTau	mā mad vadha varuṇa yad tvad iṣṭi
228	enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti	enas kṛ asura bhrī
228	mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma	mā jyotis pravasatha gam
228	vi sū mṛdhaḥ śiśrathaḥ jīvase naḥ	vi su mṛdh śrath jīv mad
228	namaḥ purā te varuṇa uta nūnam	namas purā tvad varuṇa uta nūnam
228	uta aparam tuvijāta bravāma	uta apara tuvi jan brū
228	tve hi kam parvate na śritāni	tvad hi kaṃ parvata na śri
228	apracyutāni dūLabha vratāni	a pracyu dūḍabha vrata
228	parā ṛṇā sāvīḥ adha matkṛtāni	paras ṛṇa sū adha mad kṛ
228	mā aham rājan anyakṛtena bhojam	mā mad rājan anya kṛ bhuj
228	avyuṣTāḥ it nu bhūyasīḥ uṣāsaḥ	a vivas id nu bhūyas uṣa
228	ā naḥ jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi	ā mad jīva varuṇa tad śās
228	yaḥ me rājan yujyaḥ vā sakhā vā	yad mad rājan yujya vā sakhi vā
228	svapne bhayam bhīrave mahyam āha	svapna bhaya bhīru mad ah
228	stenaḥ vā yaḥ dipsati naḥ vṛkaḥ vā	stena vā yad dips mad vṛka vā
228	tvam tasmāt varuṇa pāhi asmān	tvad tad varuṇa pā mad
228	mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya	mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya
228	bhūridāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ	bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi
228	mā rāyaḥ rājan suyamāt ava sthām	mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā
228	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
229	dhṛtavratāḥ ādityāḥ iṣirāḥ	dhṛ vrata āditya iṣira
229	āre mat karta rahasūḥ iva āgaḥ	āre mad kṛ raha sū iva āgas
229	śṛṇvataḥ vaḥ varuṇa mitra devāḥ	śru tvad varuṇa mitra deva
229	bhadrasya vidvān avase huve vaḥ	bhadra vid av hvā tvad
229	yūyam devāḥ pramatiḥ yūyam ojaḥ	tvad deva pramati tvad ojas
229	yūyam dveṣāṁsi sanutar yuyota	tvad dveṣas sanutar yu
229	abhikṣattāraḥ abhi ca kṣamadhvam	abhikṣattṛ abhi ca kṣam
229	adyā ca naḥ mṛLayata aparam ca	adya ca mad mṛḍay apara ca
229	kim ū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāma apareṇa	ka u nu tvad kṛ apara
229	kim sanena vasavaḥ āpyena	ka sana vasu āpya
229	yūyam naḥ mitrāvaruṇā adite ca	tvad mad mitrāvaruṇa aditi ca
229	svastim indrāmarutaḥ dadhāta	svasti indrāmarut dhā
229	haye devāḥ yūyam it āpayaḥ stha	haye deva tvad id āpi as
229	te mṛLata nādhamānāya mahyam	tad mṛḍ nādh mad
229	mā vaḥ rathaḥ madhyamavāT ṛte bhūt	mā tvad ratha madhyama vāh ṛte bhū
229	mā yuṣmāvatsu āpiṣu śramiṣma	mā yuṣmāvat āpi śram
229	pra vaḥ ekaḥ mimaya bhūri āgaḥ	pra tvad eka mī bhūri āgas
229	yat mā pitā iva kitavam śaśāsa	yad mad pitṛ iva kitava śās
229	āre pāśāḥ āre aghāni devāḥ	āre pāśa āre agha deva
229	mā mā adhi putre vim iva grabhīṣTa	mā mad adhi putra vi iva grah
229	arvāñcaḥ adyā bhavatā yajatrāḥ	arvāñc adya bhū yajatra
229	ā vaḥ hārdi bhayamānaḥ vyayeyam	ā tvad hārdi bhī vye
229	trādhvam naḥ devāḥ nijuraḥ vṛkasya	trā mad deva nijur vṛka
229	trādhvam kartāt avapadaḥ yajatrāḥ	trā karta avapad yajatra
229	mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya	mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya
229	bhūridāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ	bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi
229	mā rāyaḥ rājan suyamāt ava sthām	mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā
229	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
230	ṛtam devāya kṛṇvate savitre	ṛta deva kṛ savitṛ
230	indrāya ahighne na ramante āpaḥ	indra ahi han na ram ap
230	aharahar yāti aktuḥ apām	ahar ahar yā aktu ap
230	kiyāti ā prathamaḥ sargaḥ āsām	kiyat ā prathama sarga idam
230	yaḥ vṛtrāya sinam atra abhariṣyat	yad vṛtra sina atra ābhṛ
230	pra tam janitrī viduṣe uvāca	pra tad janitrī vid vac
230	pathaḥ radantīḥ anu joṣam asmai	pathin rad anu joṣa idam
230	divedive dhunayaḥ yanti artham	diva diva dhunī i artha
230	ūrdhvaḥ hi asthāt adhi antarikṣe	ūrdhva hi sthā adhi antarikṣa
230	adhā vṛtrāya pra vadham jabhāra	adha vṛtra pra vadha bhṛ
230	miham vasānaḥ upa hi īm adudrot	mih vas upa hi īṃ dru
230	tigmāyudhaḥ ajayat śatrum indraḥ	tigma āyudha ji śatru indra
230	bṛhaspate tapuṣā aśnā iva vidhya	bṛhaspati tapus aśan iva vyadh
230	vṛkadvarasaḥ asurasya vīrān	vṛkadvaras asura vīra
230	yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cit	yathā han dhṛṣat purā cit
230	evā jahi śatrum asmākam indra	eva hā śatru mad indra
230	ava kṣipa divaḥ aśmānam uccā	ava kṣip div aśman uccā
230	yena śatrum mandasānaḥ nijūrvāḥ	yad śatru mand nijūrv
230	tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūreḥ	toka sāti tanaya bhūri
230	asmān ardham kṛṇutāt indra gonām	mad ardha kṛ indra go
230	pra hi kratum vṛhathaḥ yam vanuthaḥ	pra hi kratu vṛh yad van
230	radhrasya sthaḥ yajamānasya codau	radhra as yaj coda
230	indrāsomā yuvam asmān aviṣTam	indrāsoma tvad mad av
230	asmin bhayasthe kṛṇutam ulokam	idam bhayastha kṛ u loka
230	na mā tamat na śramat na uta tandrat	na mad tam na śram na uta tand
230	na vocāma mā sunota iti somam	na vac mā su iti soma
230	yaḥ me pṛṇāt yaḥ dadat yaḥ nibodhāt	yad mad pṛ yad dā yad nibudh
230	yaḥ mā sunvantam upa gobhiḥ ā ayat	yad mad su upa go e
230	sarasvati tvam asmān aviḍḍhi	sarasvatī tvad mad av
230	marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn	marutvat dhṛṣ ji śatru
230	tyam cit śardhantam taviṣīyamāṇam	tya cit śṛdh taviṣīy
230	indraḥ hanti vṛṣabham śaṇḍikānām	indra han vṛṣabha śaṇḍika
230	yaḥ naḥ sanutyaḥ uta vā jighatnuḥ	yad mad sanutya uta vā jighatnu
230	abhikhyāya tam tigitena vidhya	abhikhyā tad tigita vyadh
230	bṛhaspate āyudhaiḥ jeṣi śatrūn	bṛhaspati āyudha ji śatru
230	druhe rīṣantam pari dhehi rājan	druh riṣ pari dhā rājan
230	asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūraiḥ	asmāka satvan śūra śūra
230	vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni	vīrya kṛ yad tvad kṛ
230	jyok abhūvan anudhūpitāsaḥ	jyok bhū anudhūpay
230	hatvī teṣām ā bharā naḥ vasūni	han tad ā bhṛ mad vasu
230	tam vaḥ śardham mārutam sumnayuḥ girā	tad tvad śardha māruta sumnayu gir
230	upa bruve namasā daivyam janam	upa brū namas daivya jana
230	yathā rayim sarvavīram naśāmahai	yathā rayi sarva vīra naś
230	apatyasācam śrutyam divedive	apatyasāc śrutya diva diva
 ---
231	asmākam mitrāvaruṇā avatam ratham	mad mitrāvaruṇa av ratha
231	ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā	āditya rudra vasu sacābhū
231	pra yat vayaḥ na paptan vasmanaḥ pari	pra yat vi na pat vasman pari
231	śravasyavaḥ hṛṣīvantaḥ vanarṣadaḥ	śravasyu hṛṣīvat vanarṣad
231	adha smā naḥ ut avatā sajoṣasaḥ	adha sma mad ud av sajoṣas
231	ratham devāsaḥ abhi vikṣu vājayum	ratha deva abhi viś vājayu
231	yat āśavaḥ padyābhiḥ titrataḥ rajaḥ	yat āśu padyā tṛ rajas
231	pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ	pṛthivī sānu jaṅghan pāṇi
231	uta sya naḥ indraḥ viśvacarṣaṇiḥ	uta tya mad indra viśvacarṣaṇi
231	divaḥ śardhena mārutena sukratuḥ	div śardha māruta su kratu
231	anu nu sthāti avṛkābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	anu nu sthā avṛka ūti
231	ratham mahe sanaye vājasātaye	ratha mah sani vāja sāti
231	uta sya devaḥ bhuvanasya sakṣaṇiḥ	uta tya deva bhuvana sakṣaṇi
231	tvaṣTā gnābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ jūjuvat ratham	tvaṣṭṛ gnā sajoṣas jū ratha
231	iLā bhagaḥ bṛhaddivā uta rodasī	iḍā bhaga bṛhaddiva uta rodas
231	pūṣā puraṁdhiḥ aśvinau adhā patī	pūṣan purandhi aśvin adha pati
231	uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśā	uta tya devī subhaga mithūdṛś
231	uṣāsānaktā jagatām apījuvā	uṣāsānaktā jagant
231	stuṣe yat vām pṛthivi navyasā vacaḥ	stu yat tvad pṛthivī navyas
231	sthātuḥ ca vayaḥ trivayāḥ upastire	sthātṛ ca vayas trivayas upastir
231	uta vaḥ śaṁsam uśijām iva śmasi	uta tvad śaṃsa uśij iva vaś
231	ahiḥ budhnyaḥ ajaḥ ekapāt uta	ahirbudhnya aja eka pād uta
231	tritaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā canaḥ dadhe	trita ṛbhukṣan savitṛ canas dhā
231	apām napāt āśuhemā dhiyā śami	ap napāt āśu heman dhī
231	etā vaḥ vaśmi udyatā yajatrāḥ	etad tvad vaś udyam yajatra
231	atakṣan āyavaḥ navyase sam	takṣ āyu navyas sam
231	śravasyavaḥ vājam cakānāḥ	śravasyu vāja kan
231	saptiḥ na rathyaḥ aha dhītim aśyāḥ	sapti na rathya aha dhīti aś
 ---
232	asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyataḥ	idam mad dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāy
232	bhūtam avitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ	bhū avitṛ vacas siṣās
232	yayoḥ āyuḥ prataram te idam puraḥ	yad āyus prataram tad idam puras
232	upastute vasūyuḥ vām mahaḥ dadhe	upastu vasūyu tvad mahas dhā
232	mā naḥ guhyāḥ ripaḥ āyoḥ ahan dabhan	mā mad guhya rip āyu ahar dabh
232	mā naḥ ābhyaḥ rīradhaḥ ducchunābhyaḥ	mā mad idam radh ducchunā
232	mā naḥ vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ	mā mad vi yu sakhya vid tad mad
232	sumnāyatā manasā tat tvā īmahe	sumnāy manas tad tvad ī
232	aheLatā manasā śruṣTim ā vaha	a hīḍ manas śruṣṭi ā vah
232	duhānām dhenum pipyuṣīm asaścatam	duh dhenu pyā asaścat
232	padyābhiḥ āśum vacasā ca vājinam	padyā āśu vacas ca vājin
232	tvām hinomi puruhūta viśvahā	tvad hi puruhūta viśvahā
232	rākām aham suhavām suṣTutī huve	rākā mad su hava suṣṭuti hvā
232	śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā	śru mad subhaga budh tman
232	sīvyatu apaḥ sūcyā acchidyamānayā	sīv apas sūci a chid
232	dadātu vīram śatadāyam ukthyam	dā vīra śata dāya ukthya
232	yāḥ te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśasaḥ	yad tvad rākā sumati supeśas
232	yābhiḥ dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni	yad dā dāś vasu
232	tābhiḥ naḥ adya sumanāḥ upāgahi	tad mad adya sumanas upāgam
232	sahasrapoṣam subhage rarāṇā	sahasra poṣa subhaga rā
232	sinīvāli pṛthuṣTuke	sinīvālī pṛthuṣṭuka
232	yā devānām asi svasā	yad deva as svasṛ
232	juṣasva havyam āhutam	juṣ havya āhu
232	prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ	prajā devī diś mad
232	yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ	yad su bāhu su aṅguri
232	suṣūmā bahusūvarī	suṣūmā bahusūvarī
232	tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ	tad viś patnī havis
232	sinīvālyai juhotana	sinīvālī hu
232	yā guṅgūḥ yā sinīvālī	yad guṅgū yad sinīvālī
232	yā rākā yā sarasvatī	yad rākā yad sarasvatī
232	indrāṇīm ahve ūtaye	indrāṇī hvā ūti
232	varuṇānīm svastaye	varuṇānī svasti
 ---
233	ā te pitar marutām sumnam etu	ā tvad pitṛ marut sumna i
233	mā naḥ sūryasya saṁdṛśaḥ yuyothāḥ	mā mad sūrya saṃdṛś yu
233	abhi naḥ vīraḥ arvati kṣameta	abhi mad vīra arvant kṣam
233	pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ	pra jan rudra prajā
233	tvādattebhiḥ rudra śaṁtamebhiḥ	tvādatta rudra śaṃtama
233	śatam himāḥ aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ	śata hima aś bheṣaja
233	vi asmat dveṣaḥ vitaram vi aṁhaḥ	vi mad dveṣas vitaram vi aṃhas
233	vi amīvāḥ cātayasvā viṣūcīḥ	vi amīvā cātay viṣvañc
233	śreṣThaḥ jātasya rudra śriyā asi	śreṣṭha jan rudra śrī as
233	tavastamaḥ tavasām vajrabāho	tavastama tavas vajra bāhu
233	parṣi naḥ pāram aṁhasaḥ svasti	pṛ mad pāra aṃhas svasti
233	viśvāḥ abhītīḥ rapasaḥ yuyodhi	viśva abhīti rapas yu
233	mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhiḥ	mā tvad rudra krudh namas
233	mā duṣTutī vṛṣabha mā sahūtī	mā duṣṭuti vṛṣabha mā sahūti
233	ut naḥ vīrān arpaya bheṣajebhiḥ	ud mad vīra arpay bheṣaja
233	bhiṣaktamam tvā bhiṣajām śṛṇomi	bhiṣaktama tvad bhiṣaj śru
233	havīmabhiḥ havate yaḥ havirbhiḥ	havīman hvā yad havis
233	ava stomebhiḥ rudram diṣīya	ava stoma rudra dā
233	ṛdūdaraḥ suhavaḥ mā naḥ asyai	ṛdūdara su hava mā mad idam
233	babhruḥ suśipraḥ rīradhat manāyai	babhru su śiprā radh manā
233	ut mā mamanda vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān	ud mad mad vṛṣabha marutvat
233	tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam	tvakṣīyas vayas nādh
233	ghṛṇī iva chāyām arapāḥ aśīya	ghṛṇin iva chāyā arapas aś
233	ā vivāseyam rudrasya sumnam	vivās rudra sumna
233	kva sya te rudra mṛLayākuḥ	kva tya tvad rudra mṛḍayāku
233	hastaḥ yaḥ asti bheṣajaḥ jalāṣaḥ	hasta yad as bheṣaja jalāṣa
233	apabhartā rapasaḥ daivyasya	apabhṛ rapas daivya
233	abhī nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ	abhi nu mad vṛṣabha kṣam
233	pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce	pra babhru vṛṣabha śvityañc
233	mahaḥ mahīm suṣTutim īrayāmi	mah mah suṣṭuti īray
233	namasyā kalmalīkinam namobhiḥ	namasy kalmalīkin namas
233	gṛṇīmasi tveṣam rudrasya nāma	gṛ tveṣa rudra nāman
233	sthirebhiḥ aṅgaiḥ pururūpaḥ ugraḥ	sthira aṅga puru rūpa ugra
233	babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśe hiraṇyaiḥ	babhru śukra piś hiraṇya
233	īśānāt asya bhuvanasya bhūreḥ	īśāna idam bhuvana bhūri
233	na vai u yoṣat rudrāt asuryam	na vai u yu rudra asurya
233	arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanva	arh bhṛ sāyaka dhanvan
233	arhan niṣkam yajatam viśvarūpam	arh niṣka yajata viśva rūpa
233	arhan idam dayase viśvam abhvam	arh idam day viśva abhva
233	na vai ojīyaḥ rudra tvat asti	na vai ojīyas rudra tvad as
233	stuhi śrutam gartasadam yuvānam	stu śru garta sad yuvan
233	mṛgam na bhīmam upahatnum ugram	mṛga na bhīma upahatnu ugra
233	mṛLā jaritre rudra stavānaḥ	mṛḍ jaritṛ rudra stu
233	anyam te asmat ni vapantu senāḥ	anya tvad mad ni vap senā
233	kumāraḥ cit pitaram vandamānam	kumāra cit pitṛ vand
233	prati nānāma rudra upayantam	prati nam rudra upe
233	bhūreḥ dātāram satpatim gṛṇīṣe	bhūri dātṛ sat pati gṛ
233	stutaḥ tvam bheṣajā rāsi asme	stu tvad bheṣaja rā mad
233	yā vaḥ bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni	yad tvad bheṣaja marut śuci
233	yā śaṁtamā vṛṣaṇaḥ yā mayobhu	yad śaṃtama vṛṣan yad mayobhu
233	yāni manuḥ avṛṇītā pitā naḥ	yad manu vṛ ā pitṛ mad
233	tā śam ca yoḥ ca rudrasya vaśmi	tad śam ca yos ca rudra vaś
233	pari naḥ hetiḥ rudrasya vṛjyāḥ	pari mad heti rudra vṛj
233	pari tveṣasya durmatiḥ mahī gāt	pari tveṣa durmati mah gā
233	ava sthirā maghavadbhyaḥ tanuṣva	ava sthira maghavan tan
233	mīḍhvaḥ tokāya tanayāya mṛLa	mīḍhvas toka tanaya mṛḍ
233	evā babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna	eva babhru vṛṣabha cekit
233	yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṁsi	yathā deva na hṛ na han
233	havanaśrut naḥ rudra iha bodhi	havana śrut mad rudra iha bhū
233	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
234	dhārāvarāḥ marutaḥ dhṛṣṇvojasaḥ	dhārā vara marut dhṛṣṇu ojas
234	mṛgāḥ na bhīmāḥ taviṣībhiḥ arcinaḥ	mṛga na bhīma taviṣī arcin
234	agnayaḥ na śuśucānāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ	agni na śuc ṛjīṣin
234	bhṛmim dhamantaḥ apa gāḥ avṛṇvata	bhṛmi dham apa go vṛ
234	dyāvaḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayanta khādinaḥ	div na star citay khādin
234	vi abhriyāḥ na dyutayanta vṛṣTayaḥ	vi abhriya na dyutay vṛṣṭi
234	rudraḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ rukmavakṣasaḥ	rudra yat tvad marut rukma vakṣas
234	vṛṣā ajani pṛśnyāḥ śukraḥ ūdhani	vṛṣan jan pṛśni śukra ūdhas
234	ukṣante aśvān atyān iva ājiṣu	ukṣ aśva atya iva āji
234	nadasya karṇaiḥ turayante āśubhiḥ	nada karṇa turay āśu
234	hiraṇyaśiprāḥ marutaḥ davidhvataḥ	hiraṇya śiprā marut dodhu
234	pṛkṣam yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ	pṛkṣa yā pṛṣatī samanyu
234	pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire	pṛkṣ tad viśva bhuvana vakṣ
234	mitrāya vā sadam ā jīradānavaḥ	mitra vā sadam ā jīra dānu
234	pṛṣadaśvāsaḥ anavabhrarādhasaḥ	pṛṣat aśva anavabhra rādhas
234	ṛjipyāsaḥ na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ	ṛjipya na vayuna dhūrṣad
234	indhanvabhiḥ dhenubhiḥ rapśadūdhabhiḥ	indhanvan dhenu rapś ūdhas
234	adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhiḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	adhvasman pathin bhrāj ṛṣṭi
234	ā haṁsāsaḥ na svasarāṇi gantana	ā haṃsa na svasara gam
234	madhoḥ madāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ	madhu mada marut samanyu
234	ā naḥ brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavaḥ	ā mad brahman marut samanyu
234	narām na śaṁsaḥ savanāni gantana	nṛ na śaṃsa savana gam
234	aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani	aśvā iva pyā dhenu ūdhas
234	kartā dhiyam jaritre vājapeśasam	kṛ dhī jaritṛ vāja peśas
234	tam naḥ dāta marutaḥ vājinam rathe	tad mad dā marut vājin ratha
234	āpānam brahma citayat divedive	āp brahman citay diva diva
234	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ vṛjaneṣu kārave	iṣ stotṛ vṛjana kāru
234	sanim medhām ariṣTam duṣTaram sahaḥ	sani medhā ariṣṭa duṣṭara sahas
234	yat yuñjate marutaḥ rukmavakṣasaḥ	yat yuj marut rukma vakṣas
234	aśvān ratheṣu bhage ā sudānavaḥ	aśva ratha bhaga ā sudānu
234	dhenuḥ na śiśve svasareṣu pinvate	dhenu na śiśu svasara pinv
234	janāya rātahaviṣe mahīm iṣam	jana rā havis mah iṣ
234	yaḥ naḥ marutaḥ vṛkatāti martyaḥ	yad mad marut vṛkatāti martya
234	ripuḥ dadhe vasavaḥ rakṣatā riṣaḥ	ripu dhā vasu rakṣ riṣ
234	vartayata tapuṣā cakriyā abhi tam	vartay tapus cakrī abhi tad
234	ava rudrā aśasaḥ hantanā vadhar	ava rudra aśas han vadhar
234	citram tat vaḥ marutaḥ yāma cekite	citra tad tvad marut yāman cekit
234	pṛśnyāḥ yat ūdhar api āpayaḥ duhuḥ	pṛśni yat ūdhas api āpi duh
234	yat vā nide navamānasya rudriyāḥ	yat vā nid nū rudriya
234	tritam jarāya juratām adābhyāḥ	trita jara adābhya
234	tān vaḥ mahaḥ marutaḥ evayāvnaḥ	tad tvad mah marut eva yāvan
234	viṣṇoḥ eṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe	viṣṇu eṣa prabhṛtha hvā
234	hiraṇyavarṇān kakuhān yatasrucaḥ	hiraṇya varṇa kakuha yam sruc
234	brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṁsyam rādhaḥ īmahe	brahmaṇy śaṃs rādhas i
234	te daśagvāḥ prathamāḥ yajñam ūhire	tad daśagva prathama yajña vah
234	te naḥ hinvantu uṣasaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	tad mad hi uṣas vyuṣṭi
234	uṣāḥ na rāmīḥ aruṇaiḥ apa ūrṇute	uṣas na rāmī aruṇa apa vṛ
234	mahaḥ jyotiṣā śucatā goarṇasā	mah u jyotis śuc go arṇas
234	te kṣoṇībhiḥ aruṇebhiḥ na añjibhiḥ	tad kṣoṇī aruṇa na añji
234	rudrāḥ ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ	rudra ṛta sadana vṛdh
234	nimeghamānāḥ atyena pājasā	nimih atya pājas
234	suścandram varṇam dadhire supeśasam	su ścandra varṇa dhā su peśas
234	tān iyānaḥ mahi varūtham ūtaye	tad i mahi varūtha ūti
234	upa gha it enā namasā gṛṇīmasi	upa gha id idam namas gṛ
234	tritaḥ na yān pañca hotṛṛn abhiṣTaye	trita na yad pañcan hotṛ abhiṣṭi
234	āvavartat avarān cakriyā avase	āvṛt avara cakrī av
234	yayā radhram pārayatha ati aṁhaḥ	yad radhra pāray ati aṃhas
234	yayā nidaḥ muñcatha vanditāram	yad nid muc vanditṛ
234	arvācī sā marutaḥ yā vaḥ ūtiḥ	arvāñc tad marut yad tvad ūti
234	ā u su vāśrā iva sumatiḥ jigātu	ā u su vāśrā iva sumati gā
 ---
235	upa īm asṛkṣi vājayuḥ vacasyām	upa īṃ sṛj vājayu vacasyā
235	canaḥ dadhīta nādyaḥ giraḥ me	canas dhā nādya gir mad
235	apām napāt āśuhemā kuvit sa	ap napāt āśu heman kuvid tad
235	supeśasaḥ karati joṣiṣat hi	su peśas kṛ juṣ hi
235	imam su asmai hṛdaḥ ā sutaṣTam	idam su idam hṛd ā su takṣ
235	mantram vocema kuvit asya vedat	mantra vac kuvid idam vid
235	apām napāt asuryasya mahnā	ap napāt asurya mahan
235	viśvāni aryaḥ bhuvanā jajāna	viśva arya bhuvana jan
235	sam anyāḥ yanti upa yanti anyāḥ	sam anya i upa i anya
235	samānam ūrvam nadyaḥ pṛṇanti	samāna ūrva nadī pṛ
235	tam ū śucim śucayaḥ dīdivāṁsam	tad u śuci śuci dīdī
235	apām napātam pari tasthuḥ āpaḥ	ap napāt pari sthā ap
235	tam asmerāḥ yuvatayaḥ yuvānam	tad a smera yuvati yuvan
235	marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yanti āpaḥ	marmṛj pari i ap
235	sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhiḥ revat asme	tad śukra śikvan revat mad
235	dīdāya anidhmaḥ ghṛtanirṇik apsu	dīdī anidhma ghṛta nirṇij ap
235	asmai tisraḥ avyathyāya nārīḥ	idam tri avyathya nārī
235	devāya devīḥ didhiṣanti annam	deva devī didhiṣ anna
235	kṛtāḥ iva upa hi prasarsre apsu	kṛ iva upa hi prasarsṛ ap
235	sa pīyūṣam dhayati pūrvasūnām	tad pīyūṣa dhā pūrva sū
235	aśvasya atra janima asya ca svar	aśva atra janiman idam ca svar
235	druhaḥ riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhi sūrīn	druh riṣ sampṛc pā sūri
235	āmāsu pūrṣu paraḥ apramṛṣyam	āma pur paras a pramṛṣ
235	na arātayaḥ vi naśan na anṛtāni	na arāti vi naś na anṛta
235	sve ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ	sva ā dama su dugha yad dhenu
235	svadhām pīpāya subhu annam atti	svadhā pyā su bhū anna ad
235	saḥ apām napāt ūrjayan apsu antar	tad ap napāt ūrjay ap antar
235	vasudeyāya vidhate vi bhāti	vasu deya vidh vi bhā
235	yaḥ apsu ā śucinā daivyena	yad ap ā śuci daivya
235	ṛtāvā ajasraḥ urviyā vibhāti	ṛtāvan ajasra urviyā vibhā
235	vayāḥ it anyā bhuvanāni asya	vayā id anya bhuvana idam
235	pra jāyante vīrudhaḥ ca prajābhiḥ	pra jan vīrudh ca prajā
235	apām napāt ā hi asthāt upastham	ap napāt ā hi sthā upastha
235	jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ vidyutam vasānaḥ	jihma ūrdhva vidyut vas
235	tasya jyeṣTham mahimānam vahantīḥ	tad jyeṣṭha mahiman vah
235	hiraṇyavarṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ	hiraṇya varṇa pari i yahva
235	hiraṇyarūpaḥ sa hiraṇyasaṁdṛk	hiraṇya rūpa tad hiraṇya saṃdṛś
235	apām napāt sa it u hiraṇyavarṇaḥ	ap napāt tad id u hiraṇya varṇa
235	hiraṇyayāt pari yoneḥ niṣadyā	hiraṇyaya pari yoni niṣad
235	hiraṇyadāḥ dadati annam asmai	hiraṇya dā dā anna idam
235	tat asya anīkam uta cāru nāma	tad idam anīka uta cāru nāman
235	apīcyam vardhate naptuḥ apām	apīcya vṛdh naptṛ ap
235	yam indhate yuvatayaḥ sam itthā	yad indh yuvati sam itthā
235	hiraṇyavarṇam ghṛtam annam asya	hiraṇya varṇa ghṛta anna idam
235	asmai bahūnām avamāya sakhye	idam bahu avama sakhi
235	yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ	yajña vidh namas havis
235	sam sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmaiḥ	sam sānu mṛj didhiṣ bilma
235	dadhāmi annaiḥ pari vande ṛgbhiḥ	dhā anna pari vand ṛc
235	saḥ īm vṛṣā janayat tāsu garbham	tad īṃ vṛṣan janay tad garbha
235	saḥ īm śiśuḥ dhayati tam rihanti	tad īṃ śiśu dhā tad rih
235	saḥ apām napāt anabhimlātavarṇaḥ	tad ap napāt an abhimlā varṇa
235	anyasya iva iha tanvā viveṣa	anya iva iha tanū viṣ
235	asmin pade parame tasthivāṁsam	idam pada parama sthā
235	adhvasmabhiḥ viśvahā dīdivāṁsam	adhvasman viśvahā dīdī
235	āpaḥ naptre ghṛtam annam vahantīḥ	ap naptṛ ghṛta anna vah
235	svayam atkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ	svayam atka pari dī yahvī
235	ayāṁsam agne sukṣitim janāya	yam agni su kṣiti jana
235	ayāṁsam u maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim	yam u maghavan suvṛkti
235	viśvam tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ	viśva tad bhadra yad av deva
235	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
236	tubhyam hinvānaḥ avasiṣTa gāḥ apaḥ	tvad hi vas go ap
236	adhukṣan sīm avibhiḥ adribhiḥ naraḥ	duh sīm avi adri nṛ
236	piba indra svāhā prahutam vaṣaTkṛtam	pā indra svāhā prahu vaṣaṭkṛ
236	hotrāt ā somam prathamaḥ yaḥ īśiṣe	hotra ā soma prathama yad īś
236	yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣTibhiḥ	yajña sammiśla pṛṣatī ṛṣṭi
236	yāman śubhrāsaḥ añjiṣu priyāḥ uta	yāman śubhra añji priya uta
236	āsadyā barhiḥ bharatasya sūnavaḥ	āsad barhis bharata sūnu
236	potrāt ā somam pibatā divaḥ naraḥ	potra ā soma pā div nṛ
236	amā iva naḥ suhavāḥ ā hi gantana	amā iva mad su hava ā hi gam
236	ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣTana	ni barhis sad ran
236	athā mandasva jujuṣāṇaḥ andhasaḥ	atha mand juṣ andhas
236	tvaṣTar devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ	tvaṣṭṛ deva jani sumadgaṇa
236	ā vakṣi devān iha vipra yakṣi ca	ā vah deva iha vipra yaj ca
236	uśan hotar ni sadā yoniṣu triṣu	vaś hotṛ ni sad yoni tri
236	prati vīhi prasthitam somyam madhu	prati vī prasthā somya madhu
236	piba āgnīdhrāt tava bhāgasya tṛpṇuhi	pā āgnīdhra tvad bhāga tṛp
236	eṣa sya te tanvaḥ nṛmṇavardhanaḥ	etad tya tvad tanū nṛmṇa vardhana
236	sahaḥ ojaḥ pradivi bāhvoḥ hitaḥ	sahas ojas pradiv bāhu dhā
236	tubhyam sutaḥ maghavan tubhyam ābhṛtaḥ	tvad su maghavan tvad ābhṛ
236	tvam asya brāhmaṇāt ā tṛpat piba	tvad idam brāhmaṇa ā tṛp pā
236	juṣethām yajñam bodhatam havasya me	juṣ yajña budh hava mad
236	sattaḥ hotā nividaḥ pūrvyāḥ anu	sad hotṛ nivid pūrvya anu
236	acchā rājānā namaḥ eti āvṛtam	acchā rājan namas i āvṛt
236	praśāstrāt ā pibatam somyam madhu	praśāstra ā pā somya madhu
 ---
237	mandasva hotrāt anu joṣam andhasaḥ	mand hotra anu joṣa andhas
237	adhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇām vaṣTi āsicam	adhvaryu tad pṛ vaś āsic
237	tasmai etam bharata tadvaśaḥ dadiḥ	tad etad bhṛ tad vaśa dadi
237	hotrāt somam draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ	hotra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu
237	yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idam huve	yad u pūrvam hvā tad idam hvā
237	sa it u havyaḥ dadiḥ yaḥ nāma patyate	tad id u hvā dadi yad nāman paty
237	adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitam somyam madhu	adhvaryu prasthā somya madhu
237	potrāt somam draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ	potra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu
237	medyantu te vahnayaḥ yebhiḥ īyase	med tvad vahni yad ī
237	ariṣaṇyan vīLayasvā vanaspate	a riṣaṇy vīḍay vanaspati
237	āyūyā dhṛṣṇo abhigūryā tvam	āyu dhṛṣṇu abhigur tvad
237	neṣTrāt somam draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ	neṣṭra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu
237	apāt hotrāt uta potrāt amatta	apa āt hotra uta potra mad
237	uta neṣTrāt ajuṣata prayaḥ hitam	uta neṣṭra juṣ prayas dhā
237	turīyam pātram amṛktam amartyam	turīya pātra amṛkta amartya
237	draviṇodāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ	draviṇas dā pā drāviṇodasa
237	arvāñcam adya yayyam nṛvāhaṇam	arvāñc adya yayya nṛvāhaṇa
237	ratham yuñjāthām iha vām vimocanam	ratha yuj iha tvad vimocana
237	pṛṅktam havīṁṣi madhunā ā hi kam gatam	pṛc havis madhu hi kaṃ gam
237	athā somam pibatam vājinīvasū	atha soma pā vājinīvasu
237	joṣi agne samidham joṣi āhutim	juṣ agni samidh juṣ āhuti
237	joṣi brahma janyam joṣi suṣTutim	juṣ brahman janya juṣ suṣṭuti
237	viśvebhiḥ viśvān ṛtunā vaso mahaḥ	viśva viśva ṛtu vasu mah
237	uśan devān uśataḥ pāyayā haviḥ	vaś deva vaś pāyay havis
 ---
238	ut u sya devaḥ savitā savāya	ud u tya deva savitṛ sava
238	śaśvattamam tadapāḥ vahniḥ asthāt	śaśvattama tad apas vahni sthā
238	nūnam devebhyaḥ vi hi dhāti ratnam	nūnam deva vi hi dhā ratna
238	atha ā abhajat vītihotram svastau	atha bhaj vīti hotra svasti
238	viśvasya hi śruṣTaye devaḥ ūrdhvaḥ	viśva hi śruṣṭi deva ūrdhva
238	pra bāhavā pṛthupāṇiḥ sisarti	pra bāhu ā pṛthu pāṇi sṛ
238	āpaḥ cit asya vrate ā nimṛgrāḥ	ap cit idam vrata ā nimṛgra
238	ayam cit vātaḥ ramate parijman	idam cit vāta ram parijman
238	āśubhiḥ cit yān vi mucāti nūnam	āśu cit i vi muc nūnam
238	arīramat atamānam cit etoḥ	ram at cit i
238	ahyarṣūṇām cit ni ayān aviṣyām	ahyarṣu cit ni yam aviṣyā
238	anu vratam savituḥ mokī ā agāt	anu vrata savitṛ mokī āgā
238	punar sam avyat vitatam vayantī	punar sam vye vitan ve
238	madhyā kartoḥ ni adhāt śakma dhīraḥ	madhyā kartu ni dhā śakman dhīra
238	ut saṁhāya asthāt vi ṛtūn adardhar	ud saṃhā sthā vi ṛtu dhardhṛ
238	aramatiḥ savitā devaḥ ā agāt	aramati savitṛ deva āgā
238	nānā okāṁsi duryaḥ viśvam āyuḥ	nānā oka durya viśva āyus
238	vi tiṣThate prabhavaḥ śokaḥ agneḥ	vi sthā prabhava śoka agni
238	jyeṣTham mātā sūnave bhāgam ā adhāt	jyeṣṭha mātṛ sūnu bhāga ādhā
238	anu asya ketam iṣitam savitrā	anu idam keta iṣ savitṛ
238	samāvavarti viṣThitaḥ jigīṣuḥ	samāvṛt viṣṭhā jigīṣu
238	viśveṣām kāmaḥ caratām amā abhūt	viśva kāma car amā bhū
238	śaśvān apaḥ vikṛtam hitvī ā agāt	śaśvat apas vikṛ hā āgā
238	anu vratam savituḥ daivyasya	anu vrata savitṛ daivya
238	tvayā hitam apyam apsu bhāgam	tvad dhā apya ap bhāga
238	dhanva anu ā mṛgayasaḥ vi tasthuḥ	dhanvan anu ā mṛgayas vi sthā
238	vanāni vibhyaḥ nakiḥ asya tāni	vana vi nakir idam tad
238	vratā devasya savituḥ minanti	vrata deva savitṛ mī
238	yādrādhyam varuṇaḥ yonim apyam	yādrādhyam varuṇa yoni apya
238	aniśitam nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ	aniśita nimiṣ jarbhur
238	viśvaḥ mārtāṇḍaḥ vrajam ā paśuḥ gāt	viśva mārtāṇḍa vraja ā paśu gā
238	sthaśaḥ janmāni savitā vi ā akar	sthaśas janman savitṛ vi ākṛ
238	na yasya indraḥ varuṇaḥ na mitraḥ	na yad indra varuṇa na mitra
238	vratam aryamā na minanti rudraḥ	vrata aryaman na mī rudra
238	na arātayaḥ tam idam svasti	na arāti tad idam svasti
238	huve devam savitāram namobhiḥ	hvā deva savitṛ namas
238	bhagam dhiyam vājayantaḥ puraṁdhim	bhaga dhī vājay puraṃdhi
238	narāśaṁsaḥ gnāspatiḥ naḥ avyāḥ	narāśaṃsa gnāspati mad av
238	āye vāmasya saṁgathe rayīṇām	āya vāma saṃgatha rayi
238	priyāḥ devasya savituḥ syāma	priya deva savitṛ as
238	asmabhyam tat divaḥ adbhyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	mad tad div ap pṛthivī
238	tvayā dattam kāmyam rādhaḥ ā gāt	tvad dā kāmya rādhas ā gā
238	śam yat stotṛbhyaḥ āpaye bhavāti	śam yad stotṛ āpi bhū
238	uruśaṁsāya savitar jaritre	uru śaṃsa savitṛ jaritṛ
 ---
239	grāvāṇā iva tat it atham jarethe	grāvan iva tad id artha jṛ
239	gṛdhrā iva vṛkṣam nidhimantam accha	gṛdhra iva vṛkṣa nidhimat acchā
239	brahmāṇā iva vidathe ukthaśāsā	brahman iva vidatha uktha śās
239	dūtā iva havyā janyā purutrā	dūta iva hu janya purutrā
239	prātaryāvāṇā rathyā iva vīrā	prātar yāvan rathya iva vīra
239	ajā iva yamā varam ā sacethe	aja iva yama vara ā sac
239	mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne	menā iva tanū śubh
239	dampatī iva kratuvidā janeṣu	dampati iva kratu vid jana
239	śṛṅge iva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk	śṛṅga iva mad prathama gam arvāk
239	śaphau iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ	śapha iva jarbhur taras
239	cakravākā iva prati vastoḥ usrā	cakravāka iva prati vastu usra
239	arvāñcā yātam rathyā iva śakrā	arvāñc yā rathya iva śakra
239	nāvā iva naḥ pārayatam yuge iva	nau iva mad pāray yuga iva
239	nabhye iva naḥ upadhī iva pradhī iva	nabhya iva mad upadhi iva pradhi iva
239	śvānā iva naḥ ariṣaṇyā tanūnām	śvan iva mad ariṣaṇya tanū
239	khṛgalā iva visrasaḥ pātam asmān	khṛgala iva visraṃs pā mad
239	vātā iva ajuryā nadyā iva rītiḥ	vāta iva ajurya nadī iva rīti
239	akṣī iva cakṣuṣā ā yātam arvāk	akṣi iva cakṣus yā arvāk
239	hastau iva tanve śambhaviṣThā	hasta iva tanū śambhaviṣṭha
239	pādā iva naḥ nayatam vasyaḥ accha	pāda iva mad nī vasyas acchā
239	oṣThau iva madhu āsne vadantā	oṣṭha iva madhu āsan vad
239	stanau iva pipyatam jīvase naḥ	stana iva pyā jīv mad
239	nāsā iva naḥ tanvaḥ rakṣitārā	nāsā iva mad tanū rakṣitṛ
239	karṇau iva suśrutā bhūtam asme	karṇa iva su śrut bhū mad
239	hastā iva śaktim abhi saṁdadī naḥ	hasta iva śakti abhi saṃdadi mad
239	kṣāma iva naḥ sam ajatam rajāṁsi	kṣam iva mad sam aj rajas
239	imāḥ giraḥ aśvinā yuṣmayantīḥ	idam gir aśvin yuṣmayat
239	kṣṇotreṇa iva svadhitim sam śiśītam	kṣṇotra iva svadhiti sam śā
239	etāni vām aśvinā vardhanāni	etad tvad aśvin vardhana
239	brahma stomam gṛtsamadāsaḥ akran	brahman stoma gṛtsamada kṛ
239	tāni narā jujuṣāṇā upa yātam	tad nṛ juṣ upa yā
239	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
240	somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇām	somāpūṣan janana rayi
240	jananā divaḥ jananā pṛthivyāḥ	janana div janana pṛthivī
240	jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau	jan viśva bhuvana gopa
240	devāḥ akṛṇvan amṛtasya nābhim	deva kṛ amṛta nābhi
240	imau devau jāyamānau juṣanta	idam deva jan juṣ
240	imau tamāṁsi gūhatām ajuṣTā	idam tamas guh ajuṣṭa
240	ābhyām indraḥ pakvam āmāsu antar	idam indra pakva āma antar
240	somāpūṣabhyām janat usriyāsu	somāpūṣan jan usriyā
240	somāpūṣaṇā rajasaḥ vimānam	somāpūṣan rajas vimā
240	saptacakram ratham aviśvaminvam	saptan cakra ratha a viśvaminva
240	viṣūvṛtam manasā yujyamānam	viṣūvṛt manas yuj
240	tam jinvathaḥ vṛṣaṇā pañcaraśmim	tad jinv vṛṣan pañcan raśmi
240	divi anyaḥ sadanam cakre uccā	div anya sadana kṛ uccā
240	pṛthivyām anyaḥ adhi antarikṣe	pṛthivī anya adhi antarikṣa
240	tau asmabhyam puruvāram purukṣum	tad mad puru vāra purukṣu
240	rāyaḥ poṣam vi syatām nābhim asme	rai poṣa vi sā nābhi mad
240	viśvāni anyaḥ bhuvanā jajāna	viśva anya bhuvana jan
240	viśvam anyaḥ abhicakṣāṇaḥ eti	viśva anya abhicakṣ i
240	somāpūṣaṇau avatam dhiyam me	somāpūṣan av dhī mad
240	yuvābhyām viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayema	tvad viśva pṛtanā ji
240	dhiyam pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvaḥ	dhī pūṣan jinv viśvaminva
240	rayim somaḥ rayipatiḥ dadhātu	rayi soma rayi pati dhā
240	avatu devī aditiḥ anarvā	av devī aditi anarvan
240	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
241	vāyo ye te sahasriṇaḥ	vāyu yad tvad sahasrin
241	rathāsaḥ tebhiḥ ā gahi	ratha tad ā gam
241	niyutvān somapītaye	niyutvat soma pīti
241	niyutvān vāyo ā gahi	niyutvat vāyu ā gam
241	ayam śukraḥ ayāmi te	idam śukra yam tvad
241	gantā asi sunvataḥ gṛham	gam su gṛha
241	śukrasya adya gavāśiraḥ	śukra adya gavāśir
241	indravāyū niyutvataḥ	indra vāyu niyutvat
241	ā yātam pibatam narā	ā yā pā nṛ
241	ayam vām mitrāvaruṇā	idam tvad mitrāvaruṇa
241	sutaḥ somaḥ ṛtāvṛdhā	su soma ṛtāvṛdh
241	mama it iha śrutam havam	mad id iha śru hava
241	rājānau anabhidruhā	rājan an abhidruh
241	dhruve sadasi uttame	dhruva sadas uttama
241	sahasrasthūṇe āsāte	sahasra sthūṇa ās
241	tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī	tad samrāj ghṛta āsuti
241	ādityā dānunaḥ patī	āditya dānu pati
241	sacete anavahvaram	sac anavahvara
241	gomat ū su nāsatyā	gomat u su nāsatya
241	aśvāvat yātam aśvinā	aśvāvat yā aśvin
241	vartiḥ rudrā nṛpāyyam	vartis rudra nṛpāyya
241	na yat paraḥ na antaraḥ	na yad paras na antare
241	ādadharṣat vṛṣaṇvasū	ādhṛṣ vṛṣaṇvasu
241	duḥśaṁsaḥ martyaḥ ripuḥ	duḥśaṃsa martya ripu
241	tā naḥ ā voLham aśvinā	tad mad ā vah aśvin
241	rayim piśaṅgasaṁdṛśam	rayi piśaṅga saṃdṛś
241	dhiṣṇyā varivovidam	dhiṣṇya varivas vid
241	indraḥ aṅga mahat bhayam	indra aṅga mahat bhaya
241	abhī sat apa cucyavat	abhi as apa cyu
241	sa hi sthiraḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	tad hi sthira vicarṣaṇi
241	indraḥ ca mṛLayāti naḥ	indra ca mṛḍay mad
241	na naḥ paścāt agham naśat	na mad paścāt agha naś
241	bhadram bhavāti naḥ puraḥ	bhadra bhū mad puras
241	indraḥ āśābhyaḥ pari	indra āśā pari
241	sarvābhyaḥ abhayam karat	sarva abhaya kṛ
241	jetā śatrūn vicarṣaṇiḥ	ji śatru vicarṣaṇi
241	viśve devāsaḥ ā gata	viśva deva ā gam
241	śṛṇutā me imam havam	śru mad idam hava
241	ā idam barhiḥ ni sīdata	ā idam barhis ni sad
241	tīvraḥ vaḥ madhumān ayam	tīvra tvad madhumat idam
241	śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ	śunahotra matsara
241	etam pibata kāmyam	etad pā kāmya
241	indrajyeṣThāḥ marudgaṇāḥ	indra jyeṣṭha marut gaṇa
241	devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ	deva pūṣan rāti
241	viśve mama śrutā havam	viśva mad śru hava
241	ambitame nadītame	ambitamā nadītamā
241	devitame sarasvati	devitamā sarasvatī
241	apraśastāḥ iva smasi	apraśasta iva as
241	praśastim amba naḥ kṛdhi	praśasti ambā mad kṛ
241	tve viśvā sarasvati	tvad viśva sarasvatī
241	śritā āyūṁṣi devyām	śri āyus devī
241	śunahotreṣu matsva	śunahotra mad
241	prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ	prajā devī diś mad
241	imā brahma sarasvati	idam brahman sarasvatī
241	juṣasva vājinīvati	juṣ vājinīvat
241	yā te manma gṛtsamadāḥ ṛtāvari	yad tvad manman gṛtsamada ṛtāvan
241	priyā deveṣu juhvati	priya deva hu
241	pra itām yajñasya śambhuvā	pre yajña śambhu
241	yuvām it ā vṛṇīmahe	tvad id ā vṛ
241	agnim ca havyavāhanam	agni ca havyavāhana
241	dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī imam	div mad pṛthivī idam
241	sidhram adya divispṛśam	sidhra adya divispṛś
241	yajṇam deveṣu yacchatām	yajña deva yam
241	ā vām upastham adruhā	ā tvad upastha adruh
241	devāḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ	deva sad yajñiya
241	iha adya somapītaye	iha adya soma pīti
 ---
242	kanikradat januṣam prabruvāṇaḥ	kanikrad janus prabrū
242	iyarti vācam aritā iva nāvam	ṛch vāc aritṛ iva nau
242	sumaṅgalaḥ ca śakune bhavāsi	su maṅgala ca śakuni bhū
242	mā tvā kā cit abhibhā viśvyā vidat	mā tvad kaścit abhibhā viśvyā vid
242	mā tvā śyenaḥ ut vadhīt mā suparṇaḥ	mā tvad śyena ud vadh mā suparṇa
242	mā tvā vidat iṣumān vīraḥ astā	mā tvad vid iṣumat vīra astṛ
242	pitryām anu pradiśam kanikradat	pitrya anu pradiś kanikrad
242	sumaṅgalaḥ bhadravādī vada iha	su maṅgala bhadra vādin vad iha
242	ava kranda dakṣiṇataḥ gṛhāṇām	ava krand dakṣiṇatas gṛha
242	sumaṅgalaḥ bhadravādī śakunte	su maṅgala bhadra vādin śakunti
242	mā naḥ stenaḥ īśata mā aghaśaṁsaḥ	mā mad stena īś mā agha śaṃsa
242	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
243	pradakṣiṇit abhi gṛṇanti kāravaḥ	pradakṣiṇit abhi gṛ kāru
243	vayaḥ vadantaḥ ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ	vi vad ṛtuthā śakunti
243	ubhe vācau vadati sāmagāḥ iva	ubh vāc vad sāman gā iva
243	gāyatram ca traiṣTubham ca anu rājati	gāyatra ca traiṣṭubha ca anu rāj
243	udgātā iva śakune sāma gāyasi	udgātṛ iva śakuni sāman gā
243	brahmaputraḥ iva savaneṣu śaṁsasi	brahman putra iva savana śaṃs
243	vṛṣā iva vājī śiśumatīḥ apītyā	vṛṣan iva vājin śiśumat apī
243	sarvataḥ naḥ śakune bhadram ā vada	sarvatas mad śakuni bhadra ā vad
243	viśvataḥ naḥ śakune puṇyam ā vada	viśvatas mad śakuni puṇya ā vad
243	āvadan tvam śakune bhadram ā vada	āvad tvad śakuni bhadra ā vad
243	tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatim cikiddhi naḥ	tūṣṇīm ās sumati cit mad
243	yat utpatan vadasi karkariḥ yathā	yat utpat vad karkari yathā
243	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
31	somasya mā tavasam vakṣi agne	soma mad tavas vaś agni
31	vahnim cakartha vidathe yajadhyai	vahni kṛ vidatha yaj
31	devān acchā dīdyat yuñje adrim	deva acchā dīdī yuj adri
31	śamāye agne tanvam juṣasva	śamāy agni tanū juṣ
31	prāñcam yajñam cakṛma vardhatām gīḥ	prāñc yajña kṛ vṛdh gir
31	samidbhiḥ agnim namasā duvasyan	samidh agni namas duvasy
31	divaḥ śaśāsuḥ vidathā kavīnām	div śās vidatha kavi
31	gṛtsāya cit tavase gātum īṣuḥ	gṛtsa cit tavas gātu iṣ
31	mayaḥ dadhe medhiraḥ pūtadakṣaḥ	mayas dhā medhira pū dakṣa
31	divaḥ subandhuḥ januṣā pṛthivyāḥ	div su bandhu janus pṛthivī
31	avindan u darśatam apsu antar	vid u darśata ap antar
31	devāsaḥ agnim apasi svasṛṛṇām	deva agni apas svasṛ
31	avardhayan subhagam sapta yahvīḥ	vardhay subhaga saptan yahvī
31	śvetam jajñānam aruṣam mahitvā	śveta jan aruṣa mahitva
31	śiśum na jātam abhi āruḥ aśvāḥ	śiśu na jan abhi ṛch aśvā
31	devāsaḥ agnim janiman vapuṣyan	deva agni janiman vapuṣy
31	śukrebhiḥ aṅgaiḥ rajaḥ ātatanvān	śukra aṅga rajas ātan
31	kratum punānaḥ kavibhiḥ pavitraiḥ	kratu pū kavi pavitra
31	śociḥ vasānaḥ pari āyuḥ apām	śocis vas pari āyus ap
31	śriyaḥ mimīte bṛhatīḥ anūnāḥ	śrī mā bṛhat anūna
31	vavrājā sīm anadatīḥ adabdhāḥ	vraj ā sīm an ad adabdha
31	divaḥ yahvīḥ avasānāḥ anagnāḥ	div yahvī a vas a nagna
31	sanāḥ atra yuvatayaḥ sayonīḥ	sana atra yuvati sa yoni
31	ekam garbham dadhire sapta vāṇīḥ	eka garbha dhā saptan vāṇī
31	stīrṇāḥ asya saṁhataḥ viśvarūpāḥ	stṛ idam saṃhan u viśva rūpa
31	ghṛtasya yonau sravathe madhūnām	ghṛta yoni sravatha madhu
31	asthuḥ atra dhenavaḥ pinvamānāḥ	sthā atra dhenu pinv
31	mahī dasmasya mātarā samīcī	mahī dasma mātṛ samyañc
31	babhrāṇaḥ sūno sahasaḥ vi adyaut	bhṛ sūnu sahas vi dyut
31	dadhānaḥ śukrā rabhasā vapūṁṣi	dhā śukra rabhasa vapus
31	ścotanti dhārāḥ madhunaḥ ghṛtasya	ścut dhārā madhu ghṛta
31	vṛṣā yatra vāvṛdhe kāvyena	vṛṣan yatra vṛdh kāvya
31	pituḥ cit ūdhar januṣā viveda	pitṛ cit ūdhas janus vid
31	vi asya dhārāḥ asṛjat vi dhenāḥ	vi idam dhārā sṛj vi dhenā
31	guhā carantam sakhibhiḥ śivebhiḥ	guhā car sakhi śiva
31	divaḥ yahvībhiḥ na guhā babhūva	div yahvī na guhā bhū
31	pituḥ ca garbham janituḥ ca babhre	pitṛ ca garbha janitṛ ca bhṛ
31	pūrvīḥ ekaḥ adhayat pīpyānāḥ	puru eka dhā pyā
31	vṛṣṇe sapatnī śucaye sabandhū	vṛṣan sapatnī śuci sabandhu
31	ubhe asmai manuṣye ni pāhi	ubh idam manuṣya ni pā
31	urau mahān anibādhe vavardha	uru mahat anibādha vṛdh
31	āpaḥ agnim yaśasaḥ sam hi pūrvīḥ	ap agni yaśas sam hi puru
31	ṛtasya yonau aśayat damūnāḥ	ṛta yoni śī damūnas
31	jāmīnām agniḥ apasi svasṛṛṇām	jāmi agni apas svasṛ
31	akraḥ na babhriḥ samithe mahīnām	akra na babhri samitha mahī
31	didṛkṣeyaḥ sūnave bhāṛjīkaḥ	didṛkṣeya sūnu bhāṛjīka
31	ut usriyāḥ janitā yaḥ jajāna	ud usriyā janitṛ yad jan
31	apām garbhaḥ nṛtamaḥ yahvaḥ agniḥ	ap garbha nṛtama yahva agni
31	apām garbham darśatam oṣadhīnām	ap garbha darśata oṣadhi
31	vanā jajāna subhagā virūpam	vana jan subhaga virūpa
31	devāsaḥ cit manasā sam hi jagmuḥ	deva cit manas sam hi gam
31	paniṣTham jātam tavasam duvasyan	paniṣṭha jan tavas duvasy
31	bṛhantaḥ it bhānavaḥ bhāṛjīkam	bṛhat id bhānu bhāṛjīka
31	agnim sacanta vidyutaḥ na śukrāḥ	agni sac vidyut na śukra
31	guhā iva vṛddham sadasi sve antar	guhā iva vṛdh sadas sva antar
31	apāre ūrve amṛtam duhānāḥ	apāra ūrva amṛta duh
31	īLe ca tvā yajamānaḥ havirbhiḥ	īḍ ca tvad yaj havis
31	īLe sakhitvam sumatim nikāmaḥ	īḍ sakhī tva sumati nikāma
31	devaiḥ avaḥ mimīhi sam jaritre	deva avas mā sam jaritṛ
31	rakṣā ca naḥ damyebhiḥ anīkaiḥ	rakṣ ca mad damya anīka
31	upakṣetāraḥ tava supraṇīte	upakṣetṛ tvad su praṇīti
31	agne viśvāni dhanyā dadhānāḥ	agni viśva dhanya dhā
31	suretasā śravasā tuñjamānāḥ	su retas śravas tuj
31	abhi syāma pṛtanāyūn adevān	abhi as pṛtanāyu a deva
31	ā devānām abhavaḥ ketuḥ agne	ā deva bhū ketu agni
31	mandraḥ viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān	mandra viśva kāvya vid
31	prati martān avāsayaḥ damūnāḥ	prati marta vāsay damūnas
31	anu devān rathiraḥ yāsi sādhan	anu deva rathira yā sādh
31	ni duroṇe amṛtaḥ martyānām	ni duroṇa amṛta martya
31	rājā sasāda vidathāni sādhan	rājan sad vidatha sādh
31	ghṛtapratīkaḥ urviyā vi adyaut	ghṛta pratīka urviyā vi dyut
31	agniḥ viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān	agni viśva kāvya vid
31	ā naḥ gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhiḥ	ā mad gam sakhya śiva
31	mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan	mahat mahi ūti saraṇy
31	asme rayim bahulam saṁtarutram	mad rayi bahula saṃtarutra
31	suvācam bhāgam yaśasam kṛdhī naḥ	su vāc bhāga yaśas kṛ mad
31	etā te agne janimā sanāni	etad tvad agni janiman sana
31	pra pūrvyāya nūtanāni vocam	pra pūrvya nūtana vac
31	mahānti vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtā imā	mahat vṛṣan savana kṛ idam
31	janmañjanman nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ	janman janman nidhā jātavedas
31	janmañjanman nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ	janman janman nidhā jātavedas
31	viśvāmitrebhiḥ idhyate ajasraḥ	viśvāmitra indh ajasra
31	tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya	tad mad sumati yajñiya
31	api bhadre saumanase syāma	api bhadra saumanasa as
31	imam yajñam sahasāvan tvam naḥ	idam yajña sahasāvat tvad mad
31	devatrā dhehi sukrato rarāṇaḥ	devatrā dhā sukratu rā
31	pra yaṁsi hotar bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ naḥ	pra yam hotṛ bṛhatī iṣ mad
31	agne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva	agni mahi draviṇa ā yaj
31	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
31	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
31	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
31	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
32	vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe	vaiśvānara dhiṣaṇā ṛtāvṛdh
32	ghṛtam na pūtam agnaye janāmasi	ghṛta na pū agni jan
32	dvitā hotāram manuṣaḥ ca vāghataḥ	dvitā hotṛ manus ca vāghant
32	dhiyā ratham na kuliśaḥ sam ṛṇvati	dhī ratha na kuliśa sam ṛch
32	sa rocayat januṣā rodasī ubhe	tad rocay janus rodas ubh
32	sa mātroḥ abhavat putraḥ īḍyaḥ	tad mātṛ bhū putra īḍ
32	havyavāT agniḥ ajaraḥ canohitaḥ	havyavah agni ajara canohita
32	dūLabhaḥ viśām atithiḥ vibhāvasuḥ	dūḍabha viś atithi vibhāvasu
32	kratvā dakṣasya taruṣaḥ vidharmaṇi	kratu dakṣa tarus vidharman
32	devāsaḥ agnim janayanta cittibhiḥ	deva agni janay citti
32	rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām	ruc bhānu jyotis mah
32	atyam na vājam saniṣyan upa bruve	atya na vāja san upa brū
32	ā mandrasya saniṣyantaḥ vareṇyam	ā mandra san vareṇya
32	vṛṇīmahe ahrayam vājam ṛgmiyam	vṛ ahraya vāja ṛgmiya
32	rātim bhṛgūṇām uśijam kavikratum	rāti bhṛgu uśij kavi kratu
32	agnim rājantam divyena śociṣā	agni rāj divya śocis
32	agnim sumnāya dadhire puraḥ janāḥ	agni sumna dhā puras jana
32	vājaśravasam iha vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	vāja śravas iha vṛj barhis
32	yatasrucaḥ surucam viśvadevyam	yam sruc su ruc viśvadevya
32	rudram yajñānām sādhadiṣTim apasām	rudra yajña sādh iṣṭi apas
32	pāvakaśoce tava hi kṣayam pari	pāvaka śoci tvad hi kṣaya pari
32	hotar yajñeṣu vṛktabarhiṣaḥ naraḥ	hotṛ yajña vṛj barhis nṛ
32	agne duvaḥ icchamānāsaḥ āpyam	agni duvas iṣ āpya
32	upa āsate draviṇam dhehi tebhyaḥ	upās draviṇa dhā tad
32	ā rodasī apṛṇat ā svar mahat	ā rodas pṛṇ ā svar mahat
32	jātam yat enam apasaḥ adhārayan	jan yat enad apas dhāray
32	saḥ adhvarāya pari nīyate kaviḥ	tad adhvara pari nī kavi
32	atyaḥ na vājasātaye canohitaḥ	atya na vāja sāti canohita
32	namasyata havyadātim svadhvaram	namasy havyadāti su adhvara
32	duvasyata damyam jātavedasam	duvasy damya jātavedas
32	rathīḥ ṛtasya bṛhataḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	rathī ṛta bṛhat vicarṣaṇi
32	agniḥ devānām abhavat purohitaḥ	agni deva bhū purohita
32	tisraḥ yahvasya samidhaḥ parijmanaḥ	tri yahva samidh parijman
32	agneḥ apunan uśijaḥ amṛtyavaḥ	agni pū uśij amṛtyu
32	tāsām ekām adadhuḥ martye bhujam	tad eka dhā martya bhuj
32	ulokam u dve upa jāmim īyatuḥ	u loka u dvi upa jāmi i
32	viśām kavim viśpatim mānuṣīḥ iṣaḥ	viś kavi viśpati mānuṣa iṣ
32	sam sīm akṛṇvan svadhitim na tejase	sam sīm kṛ svadhiti na tij
32	saḥ udvataḥ nivataḥ yāti veviṣat	tad udvat nivat yā veviṣ
32	sa garbham eṣu bhuvaneṣu dīdharat	tad garbha idam bhuvana dhṛ
32	sa jinvate jaThareṣu prajajñivān	tad jinv jaṭhara prajan
32	vṛṣā citreṣu nānadat na siṁhaḥ	vṛṣan citra nānad na siṃha
32	vaiśvānaraḥ pṛthupājāḥ amartyaḥ	vaiśvānara pṛthu pājas amartya
32	vasu ratnā dayamānaḥ vi dāśuṣe	vasu ratna day vi dāś
32	vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam ā aruhat	vaiśvānara pratnathā nāka āruh
32	divaḥ pṛṣTham bhandamānaḥ sumanmabhiḥ	div pṛṣṭha bhand su manman
32	sa pūrvavat janayan jantave dhanam	sa pūrvavat janay jantu dhana
32	samānam ajmam pari eti jāgṛviḥ	samāna ajma pari i jāgṛvi
32	ṛtāvānam yajñiyam vipram ukthyam	ṛtāvan yajñiya vipra ukthya
32	ā yam dadhe mātariśvā divi kṣayam	ā yad dhā mātariśvan div kṣaya
32	tam citrayāmam harikeśam īmahe	tad citra yāma hari keśa ī
32	sudītim agnim suvitāya navyase	su dīti agni suvita navyas
32	śucim na yāman iṣiram svardṛśam	śuci na yāman iṣira svar dṛś
32	ketum divaḥ rocanasthām uṣarbudham	ketu div rocana sthā uṣarbudh
32	agnim mūrdhānam divaḥ apratiṣkutam	agni mūrdhan div apratiṣkuta
32	tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat	tad ī namas vājin bṛhat
32	mandram hotāram śucim advayāvinam	mandra hotṛ śuci a dvayāvin
32	damūnasam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim	damūnas ukthya viśvacarṣaṇi
32	ratham na citram vapuṣāya darśatam	ratha na citra vapuṣa darśata
32	manurhitam sadam it rāyaḥ īmahe	manus hita sadam id rai ī
 ---
33	vaiśvānarāya pṛthupājase vipaḥ	vaiśvānara pṛthu pājas vip
33	ratnā vidhanta dharuṇeṣu gātave	ratna vidh dharuṇa gā
33	agniḥ hi devān amṛtaḥ duvasyati	agni hi deva amṛta duvasy
33	athā dharmāṇi sanatā na dūduṣat	atha dharma sanatā na duṣ
33	antar dūtaḥ rodasī dasmaḥ īyate	antar dūta rodas dasma ī
33	hotā niṣattaḥ manuṣaḥ purohitaḥ	hotṛ niṣad manus purohita
33	kṣayam bṛhantam pari bhūṣati dyubhiḥ	kṣaya bṛhat pari bhūṣ div
33	devebhiḥ agniḥ iṣitaḥ dhiyāvasuḥ	deva agni iṣ dhiyāvasu
33	ketum yajñānām vidathasya sādhanam	ketu yajña vidatha sādhana
33	viprāsaḥ agnim mahayanta cittibhiḥ	vipra agni mahay citti
33	apāṁsi yasmin adhi saṁdadhuḥ giraḥ	apas yad adhi saṃdhā gir
33	tasmin sumnāni yajamānaḥ ā cake	tad sumna yaj ā kan
33	pitā yajñānām asuraḥ vipaścitām	pitṛ yajña asura vipaścit
33	vimānam agniḥ vayunam ca vāghatām	vimāna agni vayuna ca vāghant
33	ā viveśa rodasī bhūrivarpasā	ā viś rodasī bhūri varpas
33	purupriyaḥ bhandate dhāmabhiḥ kaviḥ	puru priya bhand dhāman kavi
33	candram agnim candraratham harivratam	candra agni candra ratha hari vrata
33	vaiśvānaram apsuṣadam svarvidam	vaiśvānara apsuṣad svar vid
33	vigāham tūrṇim taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam	vigāha tūrṇi taviṣī āvṛ
33	bhūrṇim devāsaḥ iha suśriyam dadhuḥ	bhūrṇi deva iha su śrī
33	agniḥ devebhiḥ manuṣaḥ ca jantubhiḥ	agni deva manus ca jantu
33	tanvānaḥ yajñam purupeśasam dhiyā	tan yajña puru peśas dhī
33	rathīḥ antar īyate sādhadiṣTibhiḥ	rathī antar ī sādh iṣṭi
33	jīraḥ damūnāḥ abhiśasticātanaḥ	jīra damūnas abhiśasti cātana
33	agne jarasva svapatye āyuni	agni jṛ su apatya āyu
33	ūrjā pinvasva sam iṣaḥ didīhi naḥ	ūrj pinv sam iṣ dīdī mad
33	vayāṁsi jinva bṛhataḥ ca jāgṛve	vayas jinv bṛhat ca jāgṛ
33	uśik devānām asi sukratuḥ vipām	uśij deva as su kratu vip
33	viśpatim yahvam atithim naraḥ sadā	viśpati yahva atithi nṛ sadā
33	yantāram dhīnām uśijam ca vāghatām	yantṛ dhī uśij ca vāghant
33	adhvarāṇām cetanam jātavedasam	adhvara cetana jātavedas
33	pra śaṁsanti namasā jūtibhiḥ vṛdhe	pra śaṃs namas jūti vṛdh
33	vibhāvā devaḥ suraṇaḥ pari kṣitīḥ	vibhāvan deva su raṇa pari kṣiti
33	agniḥ babhūva śavasā sumadrathaḥ	agni bhū śavas sumat ratha
33	tasya vratāni bhūripoṣiṇaḥ vayam	tad vrata bhūri poṣin mad
33	upa bhūṣema dame ā suvṛktibhiḥ	upa bhūṣ dama ā suvṛkti
33	vaiśvānara tava dhāmāni ā cake	vaiśvānara tvad dhāman ā kan
33	yebhiḥ svarvit abhavaḥ vicakṣaṇa	yad svar vid bhū vicakṣaṇa
33	jātaḥ ā apṛṇaḥ bhuvanāni rodasī	jan āpṛṇ bhuvana rodasī
33	agne tā viśvā paribhūḥ asi tmanā	agni tad viśva paribhū as tman
33	vaiśvānarasya daṁsanābhyaḥ bṛhat	vaiśvānara daṃsanā bṛhat
33	ariṇāt ekaḥ svapasyayā kaviḥ	ri eka su apasyā kavi
33	ubhā pitarā mahayan ajāyata	ubh pitṛ mahay jan
33	agniḥ dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā	agni dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retas
 ---
34	samitsamit sumanāḥ bodhi asme	samidh samidh sumanas bhū mad
34	śucāśucā sumatim rāsi vasvaḥ	śuc śuc sumati rā vasu
34	ā deva devān yajathāya vakṣi	ā deva deva yajatha vah
34	sakhā sakhīn sumanāḥ yakṣi agne	sakhi sakhi sumanas yaj agni
34	yam devāsaḥ triḥ ahan āyajante	yad deva tris ahar āyaj
34	divedive varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ	diva diva varuṇa mitra agni
34	sa imam yajñam madhumantam kṛdhī naḥ	tad idam yajña madhumat kṛ mad
34	tanūnapāt ghṛtayonim vidhantam	tanūnapāt ghṛta yoni vidh
34	pra dīdhitiḥ viśvavārā jigāti	pra dīdhiti viśva vāra gā
34	hotāram iLaḥ prathamam yajadhyai	hotṛ iḍ prathama yaj
34	acchā namobhiḥ vṛṣabham vandadhyai	acchā namas vṛṣabha vand
34	sa devān yakṣat iṣitaḥ yajīyān	tad deva yaj iṣay yajīyas
34	ūrdhvaḥ vām gātuḥ adhvare akāri	ūrdhva tvad gātu adhvara kṛ
34	ūrdhvā śocīṁṣi prasthitā rajāṁsi	ūrdhva śocis prasthā rajas
34	divaḥ vā nābhā ni asādi hotā	div vā nābhi ni sad hotṛ
34	stṛṇīmahi devavyacāḥ vi barhiḥ	stṛ deva vyacas vi barhis
34	sapta hotrāṇi manasā vṛṇānāḥ	saptan hotra manas vṛ
34	invantaḥ viśvam prati yan ṛtena	inv viśva prati i ṛta
34	nṛpeśasaḥ vidatheṣu pra jātāḥ	nṛ peśas vidatha pra jan
34	abhi imam yajñam vi caranta pūrvīḥ	abhi idam yajña vi car puru
34	ā bhandamāne uṣasau upāke	ā bhand uṣas upāka
34	uta smayete tanvā virūpe	uta smi tanū virūpa
34	yathā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ jujoṣat	yathā mad mitra varuṇa juṣ
34	indraḥ marutvān uta vā mahobhiḥ	indra marutvat uta vā mahas
34	daivyā hotārā prathamā ni ṛñje	daivya hotṛ prathama ni ṛj
34	sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti	saptan pṛkṣa svadhā mad
34	ṛtam śaṁsantaḥ ṛtam it te āhuḥ	ṛta śaṃs ṛta id tad ah
34	anu vratam vratapāḥ dīdhyānāḥ	anu vrata vrata pā dhī
34	ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	ā bhāratī bhāratī sajoṣas
34	iLā devaiḥ manuṣyebhiḥ agniḥ	iḍā deva manuṣya agni
34	sarasvatī sārasvatebhiḥ arvāk	sarasvatī sārasvata arvāk
34	tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam sadantu	tri devī barhis ā idam sad
34	tat naḥ turīpam adha poṣayitnu	tad mad turīpa adha poṣayitnu
34	deva tvaṣTar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva	deva tvaṣṭṛ vi rā sā
34	yataḥ vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣaḥ	yatas vīra karmaṇya su dakṣa
34	yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ	yuj grāvan jan deva kāma
34	vanaspate ava sṛja upa devān	vanaspati ava sṛj upa deva
34	agniḥ haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti	agni havis śamitṛ sūday
34	sa it u hotā satyataraḥ yajāti	tad id u hotṛ satyatara yaj
34	yathā devānām janimāni veda	yathā deva janiman vid
34	ā yāhi agne samidhānaḥ arvāṅ	ā yā agni samindh arvāñc
34	indreṇa devaiḥ saratham turebhiḥ	indra deva sa ratha tura
34	barhiḥ naḥ āstām aditiḥ suputrā	barhis mad ās aditi su putra
34	svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām	svāhā deva amṛta māday
 ---
35	prati agniḥ uṣasaḥ cekitānaḥ	prati agni uṣas cekit
35	abodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām	budh vipra padavī kavi
35	pṛthupājāḥ devayadbhiḥ samiddhaḥ	pṛthu pājas devay samindh
35	apa dvārā tamasaḥ vahniḥ āvar	apa dvāra tamas vahni vṛ
35	pra it u agniḥ vāvṛdhe stomebhiḥ	pra id u agni vṛdh stoma
35	gīrbhiḥ stotṛṛṇām namasyaḥ ukthaiḥ	gir stotṛ namasya uktha
35	pūrvīḥ ṛtasya saṁdṛśaḥ cakānaḥ	puru ṛta saṃdṛś kan
35	sam dūtaḥ adyaut uṣasaḥ viroke	sam dūta dyut uṣas viroka
35	adhāyi agniḥ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu	dhā agni mānuṣa viś
35	apām garbhaḥ mitraḥ ṛtena sādhan	ap garbha mitra ṛta sādh
35	ā haryataḥ yajataḥ sānu asthāt	ā haryata yajata sānu sthā
35	abhūt u vipraḥ havyaḥ matīnām	bhū u vipra hu mati
35	mitraḥ agniḥ bhavati yat samiddhaḥ	mitra agni bhū yat samindh
35	mitraḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ	mitra hotṛ varuṇa jātavedas
35	mitraḥ adhvaryuḥ iṣiraḥ damūnāḥ	mitra adhvaryu iṣira damūnas
35	mitraḥ sindhūnām uta parvatānām	mitra sindhu uta parvata
35	pāti priyam ripaḥ agram padam veḥ	pā priya rip agra pada vi
35	pāti yahvaḥ caraṇam sūryasya	pā yahva caraṇa sūrya
35	pāti nābhā saptaśīrṣāṇam agniḥ	pā nābhi saptan śīrṣan agni
35	pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ	pā deva upamāda ṛṣva
35	ṛbhuḥ cakre īḍyam cāru nāma	ṛbhu kṛ īḍ cāru nāma
35	viśvāni devaḥ vayunāni vidvān	viśva deva vayuna vid
35	sasasya carma ghṛtavat padam veḥ	sasa carman ghṛtavat pada vi
35	tat it agniḥ rakṣati aprayucchan	tad id agni rakṣ aprayucchat
35	ā yonim agniḥ ghṛtavantam asthāt	ā yoni agni ghṛtavat sthā
35	pṛthupragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ	pṛthu pragāṇa vaś vaś
35	dīdyānaḥ śuciḥ ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ	dīdī śuci ṛṣva pāvaka
35	punaḥpunar mātarā navyasī kar	punar punar mātṛ navyas kṛ
35	sadyaḥ jātaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ vavakṣe	sadyas jan oṣadhī vakṣ
35	yadī vardhanti prasvaḥ ghṛtena	yadi vṛdh prasū ghṛta
35	āpaḥ iva pravatā śumbhamānāḥ	ap iva pravat śubh
35	uruṣyat agniḥ pitroḥ upasthe	uruṣy agni pitṛ upastha
35	ut u stutaḥ samidhā yahvaḥ adyaut	ud u stu samidh yahva dyut
35	varṣman divaḥ adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ	varṣman div adhi nābhi pṛthivī
35	mitraḥ agniḥ īḍyaḥ mātariśvā	mitra agni īḍ mātariśvan
35	ā dūtaḥ vakṣat yajathāya devān	dūta vah yajatha deva
35	ut astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvaḥ	ud stambh samidh nāka ṛṣva
35	agniḥ bhavan uttamaḥ rocanānām	agni bhū uttama rocana
35	yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ pari mātariśvā	yadi bhṛgu pari mātariśvan
35	guhā santam havyavāham samīdhe	guhā as havyavāha samindh
35	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
35	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
35	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
35	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
36	pra kāravaḥ mananā vacyamānāḥ	pra kāru manana vañc
36	devadrīcīm nayata devayantaḥ	devadryañc nī devay
36	dakṣiṇāvāT vājinī prācī eti	dakṣiṇāvah vājin prāñc i
36	haviḥ bharantī agnaye ghṛtācī	havis bhṛ agni ghṛtācī
36	ā rodasī apṛṇāḥ jāyamānaḥ	ā rodas pṛ jan
36	uta pra rikthāḥ adha nu prayajyo	uta pra ric adha nu prayajyu
36	divaḥ cit agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ	div cit agni mahina pṛthivī
36	vacyantām te vahnayaḥ saptajihvāḥ	vañc tvad vahni saptan jihvā
36	dyauḥ ca tvā pṛthivī yajñiyāsaḥ	div ca tvad pṛthivī yajñiya
36	ni hotāram sādayante damāya	ni hotṛ sāday dama
36	yadī viśaḥ mānuṣīḥ devayantīḥ	yadi viś mānuṣa devay
36	prayasvatīḥ īLate śukram arciḥ	prayasvat īḍ śukra arcis
36	mahān sadhasthe dhruvaḥ ā niṣattaḥ	mahat sadhastha dhruva ā niṣad
36	antar dyāvā māhine haryamāṇaḥ	antar div māhina hary
36	āskre sapatnī ajare amṛkte	āskra sapatnī ajara amṛkta
36	sabardughe urugāyasya dhenū	sabardugha urugāya dhenu
36	vratā te agne mahataḥ mahāni	vrata tvad agni mahat maha
36	tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha	tvad kratu rodas ā tan
36	tvam dūtaḥ abhavaḥ jāyamānaḥ	tvad dūta bhū jan
36	tvam netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām	tva nī vṛṣabha carṣaṇi
36	ṛtasya vā keśinā yogyābhiḥ	ṛta vā keśin yogyā
36	ghṛtasnuvā rohitā dhuri dhiṣva	ghṛtasnu rohita dhur dhā
36	atha ā vaha devān deva viśvān	atha ā vah deva deva viśva
36	svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ	su adhvara kṛ jātavedas
36	divaḥ cit ā te rucayanta rokāḥ	div cit ā tvad rucay roka
36	uṣaḥ vibhātīḥ anu bhāsi pūrvīḥ	uṣas vibhā anu bhā puru
36	apaḥ yat agne uśadhak vaneṣu	apas yat agni uśadhak vana
36	hotuḥ mandrasya panayanta devāḥ	hotṛ mandra panay deva
36	urau vā ye antarikṣe madanti	uru vā yad antarikṣa mad
36	divaḥ vā ye rocane santi devāḥ	div vā yad rocana as deva
36	ūmāḥ vā ye suhavāsaḥ yajatrāḥ	ūma vā yad su hava yajatra
36	āyemire rathyaḥ agne aśvāḥ	āyam rathī agni aśva
36	ā ebhiḥ agne saratham yāhi arvāṅ	ā idam agni sa ratha yā arvāñc
36	nānāratham vā vibhavaḥ hi aśvāḥ	nānā ratha vā vibhu hi aśva
36	patnīvataḥ triṁśatam trīn ca devān	patnīvat triṃśat tri ca deva
36	anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva	anuṣvadham ā vah māday
36	sa hotā yasya rodasī cit urvī	tad hotṛ yad rodas cit urvī
36	yajñaṁyajñam abhi vṛdhe gṛṇītaḥ	yajña yajña abhi vṛdh gṛ
36	prācī adhvarā iva tasthatuḥ sumeke	prāñc adhvara iva sthā sumeka
36	ṛtāvarī ṛtajātasya satye	ṛtāvan ṛta jan satya
36	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
36	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
36	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
36	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
37	pra ye āruḥ śitipṛṣThasya dhāseḥ	pra yad ṛch śiti pṛṣṭha dhāsi
37	ā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta vāṇīḥ	ā mātṛ viś saptan vāṇī
37	parikṣitā pitarā sam carete	parikṣi pitṛ sam car
37	pra sarsrāte dīrgham āyuḥ prayakṣe	pra sarsṛ dīrgha āyus prayakṣ
37	divakṣasaḥ dhenavaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvāḥ	divakṣas dhenu vṛṣan aśvā
37	devīḥ ā tasthau madhumat vahantīḥ	deva ā sthā madhumat vah
37	ṛtasya tvā sadasi kṣemayantam	ṛta tvad sadas kṣemayat
37	pari ekā carati vartanim gauḥ	pari eka car vartani go
37	ā sīm arohat suyamāḥ bhavantīḥ	ā sīm ruh su yama bhū
37	patiḥ cikitvān rayivit rayīṇām	pati cit rayi vid rayi
37	pra nīlapṛṣThaḥ atasasya dhāseḥ	pra nīla pṛṣṭha atasa dhāsi
37	tāḥ avāsayat purudhapratīkaḥ	tad vāsay purudhā pratīka
37	mahi tvāṣTram ūrjayantīḥ ajuryam	mahi tvāṣṭra ūrjay ajurya
37	stabhūyamānam vahataḥ vahanti	stabhūy vahat vah
37	vi aṅgebhiḥ didyutānaḥ sadhasthe	vi aṅga dyut sadhastha
37	ekām iva rodasī ā viveśa	eka iva rodas ā viś
37	jānanti vṛṣṇaḥ aruṣasya śevam	jñā vṛṣan aruṣa śeva
37	uta bradhnasya śāsane raṇanti	uta bradhna śāsana raṇ
37	divorucaḥ surucaḥ rocamānāḥ	divoruc su ruc ruc
37	iLā yeṣām gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ	iḍā yad gaṇya māhina gir
37	uta u pitṛbhyām pravidā anu ghoṣam	uta u pitṛ pravid anu ghoṣa
37	mahaḥ mahadbhyām anayanta śūṣam	mahas mahat nī śūṣa
37	ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānam aktoḥ	ukṣan ha yatra pari dhāna aktu
37	anu svam dhāma jarituḥ vavakṣa	anu sva dhāman jaritṛ vakṣ
37	adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sapta viprāḥ	adhvaryu pañcan saptan vipra
37	priyam rakṣante nihitam padam veḥ	priya rakṣ nidhā pada vi
37	prāñcaḥ madanti ukṣaṇaḥ ajuryāḥ	prāñc mad ukṣan ajurya
37	devāḥ devānām anu hi vratā guḥ	deva deva anu hi vrata gā
37	daivyā hotārā prathamā ni ṛñje	daivya hotṛ prathama ni ṛj
37	sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti	saptan pṛkṣa svadhā mad
37	ṛtam śaṁsantaḥ ṛtam it te āhuḥ	ṛta śaṃs ṛta id tad ah
37	anu vratam vratapāḥ dīdhyānāḥ	anu vrata vrata pā dhī
37	vṛṣāyante mahe atyāya pūrvīḥ	vṛṣāy mah atya puru
37	vṛṣṇe citrāya raśmayaḥ suyāmāḥ	vṛṣan citra raśmi su yāma
37	deva hotar mandrataraḥ cikitvān	deva hotṛ mandratara cit
37	mahaḥ devān rodasī ā iha vakṣi	mah deva rodas ā iha vah
37	pṛkṣaprayajaḥ draviṇaḥ suvācaḥ	pṛkṣa prayaj draviṇas su vāc
37	suketavaḥ uṣasaḥ revat ūṣuḥ	su ketu uṣas revat vas
37	uta u cit agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ	uta u cit agni mahina pṛthivī
37	kṛtam cit enaḥ sam mahe daśasya	kṛ cit enas sam mah daśasy
37	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
37	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
37	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
37	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
38	añjanti tvām adhvare devayantaḥ	añj tvad adhvara devay
38	vanaspate madhunā daivyena	vanaspati madhu daivya
38	yat ūrdhvaḥ tiṣThāḥ draviṇā iha dhattāt	yat ūrdhva sthā draviṇa iha dhā
38	yat vā kṣayaḥ mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthe	yat vā kṣi mātṛ idam upastha
38	samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastāt	samindh śri purastāt
38	brahma vanvānaḥ ajaram suvīram	brahman van ajara su vīra
38	āre asmat amatim bādhamānaḥ	āre mad amati bādh
38	ut śrayasva mahate saubhagāya	ud śri mahat saubhaga
38	ut śrayasva vanaspate	ud śri vanaspati
38	varṣman pṛthivyāḥ adhi	varṣman pṛthivī adhi
38	sumitī mīyamānaḥ	su miti mā
38	varcaḥ dhāḥ yajñavāhase	varcas dhā yajña vāhas
38	yuvā suvāsāḥ parivītaḥ ā agāt	yuvan su vāsas parivye āgā
38	saḥ u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ	tad u śreyas bhū jan
38	tam dhīrāsaḥ kavayaḥ ut nayanti	tad dhīra kavi ud nī
38	svādhyaḥ manasā devayantaḥ	su ādhī manas devay
38	jātaḥ jāyate sudinatve ahnām	jan jan su su dina dina tvad
38	samarye ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ	samarya ā vidatha vṛdh
38	punanti dhīrāḥ apasaḥ manīṣā	pū dhīra apas manīṣā
38	devayāḥ vipraḥ ut iyarti vācam	deva yā vipra ud ṛch vāc
38	yān vaḥ naraḥ devayantaḥ nimimyuḥ	yad tvad nṛ devay nimi
38	vanaspate svadhitiḥ vā tatakṣa	vanaspati svadhiti vā takṣ
38	te devāsaḥ svaravaḥ tasthivāṁsaḥ	tad deva svaru sthā
38	prajāvat asme didhiṣantu ratnam	prajāvat mad didhiṣ ratna
38	ye vṛkṇāsaḥ adhi kṣami	yad vraśc adhi kṣam
38	nimitāsaḥ yatasrucaḥ	nimā yam sruc
38	te naḥ vyantu vāryam	tad mad vī vārya
38	devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ	devatrā kṣetrasādhas
38	ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ sunīthāḥ	āditya rudra vasu su nītha
38	dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam	dyāvākṣam pṛthivī antarikṣa
38	sajoṣasaḥ yajñam avantu devāḥ	sajoṣas yajña av deva
38	ūrdhvam kṛṇvantu adhvarasya ketum	ūrdhva kṛ adhvara ketu
38	haṁsāḥ iva śreṇiśaḥ yatānāḥ	haṃsa iva śreṇiśas yat
38	śukrā vasānāḥ svaravaḥ naḥ ā aguḥ	śukra vas svaru mad āgā
38	unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastāt	unnī kavi purastāt
38	devā devānām api yanti pāthaḥ	deva deva api i pāthas
38	śṛṅgāṇi iva it śṛṅgiṇām sam dadṛśre	śṛṅga iva id śṛṅgin sam dṛś
38	caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām	caṣālavat svaru pṛthivī
38	vāghadbhiḥ vā vihave śroṣamāṇāḥ	vāghant vā vihava śruṣ
38	asmān avantu pṛtanājyeṣu	mad av pṛtanājya
38	vanaspate śatavalśaḥ vi roha	vanaspati śata valśa vi ruh
38	sahasravalśāḥ vi vayam ruhema	sahasra valśa vi mad ruh
38	yam tvām ayam svadhitiḥ tejamānaḥ	yad tvad idam svadhiti tij
38	praṇināya mahate saubhagāya	praṇī mahat saubhaga
 ---
39	sakhāyaḥ tvā vavṛmahe	sakhi tvad vṛ
39	devam martāsaḥ ūtaye	deva marta ūti
39	apām napātam subhagam sudīditim	ap napāt subhaga su dīditi
39	supratūrtim anehasam	su pratūrti anehas
39	kāyamānaḥ vanā tvam	kan vana tvad
39	yat mātṛṛḥ ajagan apaḥ	yat mātṛ gam ap
39	na tat te agne pramṛṣe nivartanam	na tad tvad agni pramṛṣ nivartana
39	yat dūre san iha abhavaḥ	yat dūra as iha bhū
39	ati tṛṣTam vavakṣitha	ati tṛṣṭa vakṣ
39	atha eva sumanāḥ asi	atha eva su manas as
39	prapra anye yanti pari anye āsate	pra pra anya i pari anya ās
39	yeṣām sakhye asi śritaḥ	yad sakhya as śri
39	īyivāṁsam ati sridhaḥ	i ati sridh
39	śaśvatīḥ ati saścataḥ	śaśvat ati saścant
39	anu īm avindan nicirāsaḥ adruhaḥ	anu īṃ vid nicira adruh
39	apsu siṁham iva śritam	ap siṃha iva śri
39	sasṛvāṁsam iva tmanā	sṛ iva tman
39	agnim itthā tirohitam	agni itthā tirodhā
39	ā enam nayat mātariśvā parāvataḥ	ā enad nī mātariśvan parāvat
39	devebhyaḥ mathitam pari	deva math pari
39	tam tvā martāḥ agṛbhṇata	tad tvad marta grah
39	devebhyaḥ havyavāhana	deva havya vāhana
39	viśvān yat yajñān abhipāsi mānuṣa	viśva yat yajña abhipā mānuṣa
39	tava kratvā yaviṣThya	tvad kratu yaviṣṭhya
39	tat bhadram tava daṁsanā	tad bhadra tvad daṃsanā
39	pākāya cit chadayati	pāka cit chaday
39	tvām yat agne paśavaḥ samāsate	tvad yat agni paśu samās
39	samiddham apiśarvare	samindh apiśarvara
39	ā juhotā svadhvaram	ā hu su adhvara
39	śīram pāvakaśociṣam	śīra pāvaka śocis
39	āśum dūtam ajiram pratnam īḍyam	āśu dūta ajira pratna īḍ
39	śruṣTī devam saparyata	śruṣṭi deva sapary
39	trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim	tri śata tri sahasra agni
39	triṁśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan	triṃśat ca deva navan ca sapary
39	aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai	ukṣ ghṛta stṛ barhis idam
39	āt it hotāram ni asādayanta	āt id hotṛ ni sāday
 ---
310	tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ	tvad agni manīṣin
310	samrājam carṣaṇīnām	samrāj carṣaṇi
310	devam martāsaḥ indhate	deva marta indh
310	sam adhvare	sam adhvara
310	tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam	tvad yajña ṛtvij
310	agne hotāram īLate	agni hotṛ īḍ
310	gopāḥ ṛtasya dīdihi	gopā ṛta dīdī
310	sve dame	sva dama
310	sa ghā yaḥ te dadāśati	tad gha yad tvad dāś
310	samidhā jātavedase	samidh jātavedas
310	saḥ agne dhatte suvīryam	tad agni dhā su vīrya
310	sa puṣyati	tad puṣ
310	sa ketuḥ adhvarāṇām	tad ketu adhvara
310	agniḥ devebhiḥ ā gamat	agni deva ā gam
310	añjānaḥ sapta hotṛbhiḥ	añj saptan hotṛ
310	haviṣmate	haviṣmat
310	pra hotre pūrvyam vacaḥ	pra hotṛ pūrvya vacas
310	agnaye bharatā bṛhat	agni bhṛ bṛhat
310	vipām jyotīṁṣi bibhrate	vip jyotis bhṛ
310	na vedhase	na vedhas
310	agnim vardhantu naḥ giraḥ	agni vṛdh mad gir
310	yataḥ jāyate ukthyaḥ	yatas jan ukthya
310	mahe vājāya draviṇāya darśataḥ	mah vāja draviṇa darśata
310	agne yajiṣThaḥ adhvare	agni yajiṣṭha adhvara
310	devān devayate yaja	deva devay yaj
310	hotā mandraḥ vi rājasi	hotṛ mandra vi rāj
310	ati sridhaḥ	ati sridh
310	sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi	tad mad pāvaka dīdī
310	dyumat asme suvīryam	dyumat mad su vīrya
310	bhavā stotṛbhyaḥ antamaḥ	bhū stotṛ antama
310	svastaye	svasti
310	tam tvā viprāḥ vipanyavaḥ	tad tvad vipra vipanyu
310	jāgṛvāṁsaḥ sam indhate	jāgṛ sam indh
