310	havyavāham amartyam	havyavāha amartya
310	sahovṛdham	sahas vṛdh
 ---
311	agniḥ hotā purohitaḥ	agni hotṛ purohita
311	adhvarasya vicarṣaṇiḥ	adhvara vicarṣaṇi
311	sa veda yajñam ānuṣak	tad vid yajña ānuṣak
311	sa havyavāT amartyaḥ	tad havyavah amartya
311	uśik dūtaḥ canohitaḥ	uśij dūta canohita
311	agniḥ dhiyā sam ṛṇvati	agni dhī sam ṛch
311	agniḥ dhiyā sa cetati	agni dhī tad cit
311	ketuḥ yajñasya pūrvyaḥ	ketu yajña pūrvya
311	artham hi asya taraṇi	artha hi idam taraṇi
311	agnim sūnum sanaśrutam	agni sūnu sana śru
311	sahasaḥ jātavedasam	sahas jātavedas
311	vahnim devāḥ akṛṇvata	vahni deva kṛ
311	adābhyaḥ puraetā	adābhya puraetṛ
311	viśām agniḥ mānuṣīṇām	viś agni mānuṣa
311	tūrṇiḥ rathaḥ sadā navaḥ	tūrṇi ratha sadā nava
311	sāhvān viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ	sah viśva abhiyuj
311	kratuḥ devānām amṛktaḥ	kratu deva amṛkta
311	agniḥ tuviśravastamaḥ	agni tuvi śravastama
311	abhi prayāṁsi vāhasā	abhi prayas vāhas
311	dāśvān aśnoti martyaḥ	dāś aś martya
311	kṣayam pāvakaśociṣaḥ	kṣaya pāvaka śocis
311	pari viśvāni sudhitā	pari viśva sudhita
311	agneḥ aśyāma manmabhiḥ	agni aś manman
311	viprāsaḥ jātavedasaḥ	vipra jātavedas
311	agne viśvāni vāryā	agni viśva vārya
311	vājeṣu saniṣāmahe	vāja san
311	tve devāsaḥ ā īrire	tvad deva er
 ---
312	indrāgnī ā gatam sutam	indra agni ā gam suta
312	gīrbhiḥ nabhaḥ vareṇyam	gir nabhas vareṇya
312	asya pātam dhiyā iṣitā	idam pā dhī iṣ
312	indrāgnī jarituḥ sacā	indra agni jaritṛ sacā
312	yajñaḥ jigāti cetanaḥ	yajña gā cetana
312	ayā pātam imam sutam	idam pā idam suta
312	indram agnim kavicchadā	indra agni kavicchad
312	yajñasya jūtyā vṛṇe	yajña jūti vṛ
312	tā somasya iha tṛmpatām	tad soma iha tṛp
312	tośā vṛtrahaṇā huve	tośa vṛtra han hvā
312	sajitvānā aparājitā	sa jitvan aparājita
312	indrāgnī vājasātamā	indra agni vāja sātama
312	pra vām arcanti ukthinaḥ	pra tvad arc ukthin
312	nīthāvidaḥ jaritāraḥ	nīthāvid jaritṛ
312	indrāgnī iṣaḥ ā vṛṇe	indra agni iṣ ā vṛ
312	indrāgnī navatim puraḥ	indra agni navati pur
312	dāsapatnīḥ adhūnutam	dāsa patnī dhū
312	sākam ekena karmaṇā	sākam eka karman
312	indrāgnī apasaḥ pari	indra agni apas pari
312	upa pra yanti dhītayaḥ	upa pra i dhīti
312	ṛtasya pathyāḥ anu	ṛta pathyā anu
312	indrāgnī taviṣāṇi vām	indra agni taviṣa tvad
312	sadhasthāni prayāṁsi ca	sadhastha prayas ca
312	yuvoḥ aptūryam hitam	tvad aptūrya dhā
312	indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ	indra agni rocana div
312	pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ	pari vāja bhūṣ
312	tat vām ceti pra vīryam	tad tvad cit pra vīrya
 ---
313	pra vaḥ devāya agnaye	pra tvad deva agni
313	barhiṣTham arca asmai	barhiṣṭha arc idam
313	gamat devebhiḥ ā sa naḥ	gam deva ā tad mad
313	yajiṣThaḥ barhiḥ ā sadat	yajiṣṭha barhis ā sad
313	ṛtāvā yasya rodasī	ṛtāvan yad rodas
313	dakṣam sacante ūtayaḥ	dakṣa sac ūti
313	haviṣmantaḥ tam īLate	haviṣmant tad īḍ
313	tam saniṣyantaḥ avase	tad san av
313	sa yantā vipraḥ eṣām	tad yantṛ vipra idam
313	sa yajñānām athā hi saḥ	tad yajña atha hi tad
313	agnim tam vaḥ duvasyata	agni tad tvad duvasy
313	dātā yaḥ vanitā magham	dā yad van magha
313	sa naḥ śarmāṇi vītaye	tad mad śarman vīti
313	agniḥ yacchatu śaṁtamā	agni yam śaṃtama
313	yataḥ naḥ pruṣṇavat vasu	yatas mad pruṣ vasu
313	divi kṣitibhyaḥ apsu ā	div kṣiti ap ā
313	dīdivāṁsam apūrvyam	dīdī apūrvya
313	vasvībhiḥ asya dhītibhiḥ	vasu idam dhīti
313	ṛkvāṇaḥ agnim indhate	ṛkvan agni indh
313	hotāram viśpatim viśām	hotṛ viśpati viś
313	uta naḥ brahman aviṣaḥ	uta mad brahman av
313	uktheṣu devahūtamaḥ	uktha devahūtama
313	śam naḥ śocā marudvṛdhaḥ	śam mad śuc marut vṛdha
313	agne sahasrasātamaḥ	agni sahasra sātama
313	nū naḥ rāsva sahasravat	nu u mad rā sahasravat
313	tokavat puṣTimat vasu	tokavat puṣṭimat vasu
313	dyumat agne suvīryam	dyumat agni su vīrya
313	varṣiṣTham anupakṣitam	varṣiṣṭha an upakṣi
 ---
314	ā hotā mandraḥ vidathāni asthāt	ā hotṛ mandra vidatha sthā
314	satyaḥ yajvā kavitamaḥ sa vedhāḥ	satya yajvan kavitama tad vedhas
314	vidyudrathaḥ sahasaḥ putraḥ agniḥ	vidyut ratha sahas putra agni
314	śociṣkeśaḥ pṛthivyām pājaḥ aśret	śociṣkeśa pṛthivī pājas śri
314	ayāmi te namauktim juṣasva	yam tvad namaukti juṣ
314	ṛtāvaḥ tubhyam cetate sahasvaḥ	ṛtāvan tvad cit sahasvat
314	vidvān ā vakṣi viduṣaḥ ni satsi	vid ā vah vid ni sad
314	madhye ā barhiḥ ūtaye yajatra	madhya ā barhis ūti yajatra
314	dravatām te uṣasā vājayantī	dru tvad uṣas vājay
314	agne vātasya pathyābhiḥ accha	agni vāta pathyā acchā
314	yat sīm añjanti pūrvyam havirbhiḥ	yat sīm añj pūrvya havis
314	ā vandhurā iva tasthatuḥ duroṇe	ā vandhur iva sthā duroṇa
314	mitraḥ ca tubhyam varuṇaḥ sahasvaḥ	mitra ca tvad varuṇa sahasvat
314	agne viśve marutaḥ sumnam arcan	agni viśva marut sumna arc
314	yat śociṣā sahasaḥ putra tiṣThāḥ	yat śocis sahas putra sthā
314	abhi kṣitīḥ prathayan sūryaḥ nṛṛn	abhi kṣiti prathay sūrya nṛ
314	vayam te adya rarimā hi kāmam	mad tvad adya rā hi kāma
314	uttānahastāḥ namasā upasadya	uttāna hasta namas upasad
314	yajiṣThena manasā yakṣi devān	yajiṣṭha manas yaj deva
314	asredhatā manmanā vipraḥ agne	a sridh manman vipra agni
314	tvat hi putra sahasaḥ vi pūrvīḥ	tvad hi putra sahas vi puru
314	devasya yanti ūtayaḥ vi vājāḥ	deva i ūti vi vāja
314	tvam dehi sahasriṇam rayim naḥ	tvad dā sahasrin rayi mad
314	adrogheṇa vacasā satyam agne	adrogha vacas satya agni
314	tubhyam dakṣa kavikrato yāni imā	tvad dakṣa kavi kratu yad idam
314	deva martāsaḥ adhvare akarma	deva marta adhvara kṛ
314	tvam viśvasya surathasya bodhi	tvad viśva su ratha budh
314	sarvam tat agne amṛta svada iha	sarva tad agni amṛta svad iha
 ---
315	vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucānaḥ	vi pājas pṛthu śośuc
315	bādhasva dviṣaḥ rakṣasaḥ amīvāḥ	bādh dviṣ rakṣas amīvā
315	suśarmaṇaḥ bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām	su śarman bṛhat śarman as
315	agneḥ aham suhavasya praṇītau	agni mad su hava praṇīti
315	tvam naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	tvad mad idam uṣas vyuṣṭi
315	tvam sūre udite bodhi gopāḥ	tvad sūra udi bhū gopā
315	janma iva nityam tanayam juṣasva	janman iva nitya tanaya juṣ
315	stomam me agne tanvā sujāta	stoma mad agni tanū su jan
315	tvam nṛcakṣāḥ vṛṣabha anu pūrvīḥ	tvad nṛ cakṣas vṛṣabha anu puru
315	kṛṣṇāsu agne aruṣaḥ vi bhāhi	kṛṣṇa agni aruṣa vi bhā
315	vaso neṣi ca parṣi ca ati aṁhaḥ	vasu nī ca pṛ ca ati aṃhas
315	kṛdhī naḥ rāye uśijaḥ yaviṣTha	kṛ mad rai uśij yaviṣṭha
315	aṣāLhaḥ agne vṛṣabhaḥ didīhi	aṣāḍha agni vṛṣabha dīdī
315	puraḥ viśvāḥ saubhagā saṁjigīvān	pur viśva saubhaga ā saṃji
315	yajñasya netā prathamasya pāyoḥ	yajña nī prathama pāyu
315	jātavedaḥ bṛhataḥ supraṇīte	jātavedas bṛhat su praṇīti
315	acchidrā śarma jaritar purūṇi	acchidra śarman jaritṛ puru
315	devān acchā dīdyānaḥ sumedhāḥ	deva acchā dīdī sumedhas
315	rathaḥ na sasniḥ abhi vakṣi vājam	ratha na sasni abhi vah vāja
315	agne tvam rodasī naḥ sumeke	agni tvad rodas mad sumeka
315	pra pīpaya vṛṣabha jinva vājān	pra pyā vṛṣabha jinv vāja
315	agne tvam rodasī naḥ sudoghe	agni tvad rodas mad su dogha
315	devebhiḥ deva surucā rucānaḥ	deva deva su ruc ruc
315	mā naḥ martasya durmatiḥ pari sthāt	mā mad marta durmati pari sthā
315	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
315	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
315	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
315	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
316	ayam agniḥ suvīryasya	idam agni su vīrya
316	īśe mahaḥ saubhagasya	īś mah saubhaga
316	rāyaḥ īśe svapatyasya gomataḥ	rai īś su apatya gomat
316	īśe vṛtrahathānām	īś vṛtra hatha
316	imam naraḥ marutaḥ saścatā vṛdham	idam nṛ marut sac vṛdh
316	yasmin rāyaḥ śevṛdhāsaḥ	yad rai śevṛdha
316	abhi ye santi pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ	abhi yad as pṛtanā dūḍhī
316	viśvāhā śatrum ādabhuḥ	viśvāhā śatru ādabh
316	sa tvam naḥ rāyaḥ śiśīhi	tad tvad mad rai śā
316	mīḍhvaḥ agne suvīryasya	mīḍhvas agni su vīrya
316	tuvidyumna varṣiṣThasya prajāvataḥ	tuvi dyumna varṣiṣṭha prajāvat
316	anamīvasya śuṣmiṇaḥ	anamīva śuṣmin
316	cakriḥ yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā abhi sāsahiḥ	cakri yad viśva bhuvana abhi sāsahi
316	cakriḥ deveṣu ā duvaḥ	cakri deva ā duvas
316	ā deveṣu yatate ā suvīrye	ā deva yat ā su vīrya
316	ā śaṁse uta nṛṇām	ā śaṃsa uta nṛ
316	mā naḥ agne amataye	mā mad agni amati
316	mā avīratāyai rīradhaḥ	mā a vīra tā radh
316	mā agotāyai sahasaḥ putra mā nide	mā a go tā sahas putra mā nid
316	apa dveṣāṁsi ā kṛdhi	apa dveṣas ā kṛ
316	śagdhi vājasya subhaga prajāvataḥ	śak vāja subhaga prajāvat
316	agne bṛhataḥ adhvare	agni bṛhat adhvara
316	sam rāyā bhūyasā sṛja mayobhunā	sam rai bhūyas sṛj mayobhu
316	tuvidyumna yaśasvatā	tuvi dyumna yaśasvat
 ---
317	samidhyamānaḥ prathamā anu dharmā	samindh prathama anu dharma
317	sam aktubhiḥ ajyate viśvavāraḥ	sam aktu añj viśva vāra
317	śociṣkeśaḥ ghṛtanirṇik pāvakaḥ	śociṣkeśa ghṛta nirṇij pāvaka
317	suyajñaḥ agniḥ yajathāya devān	su yajña agni yajatha deva
317	yathā ayajaḥ hotram agne pṛthivyāḥ	yathā yaj hotra agni pṛthivī
317	yathā divaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān	yathā div jātavedas cit
317	eva anena haviṣā yakṣi devān	eva idam havis yaj deva
317	manuṣvat yajñam pra tira imam adya	manuṣvat yajña pra tṛ idam adya
317	trīṇi āyūṁṣi tava jātavedaḥ	tri āyus tvad jātavedas
317	tisraḥ ājānīḥ uṣasaḥ te agne	tri ājāni uṣas tvad agni
317	tābhiḥ devānām avaḥ yakṣi vidvān	tad deva avas yaj vid
317	athā bhava yajamānāya śam yoḥ	atha bhū yaj śam yos
317	agnim sudītim sudṛśam gṛṇantaḥ	agni su dīti su dṛś gṛ
317	namasyāmaḥ tvā īḍyam jātavedaḥ	namasy tvad īḍ jātavedas
317	tvām dūtam aratim havyavāham	tvad dūta arati havyavāha
317	devāḥ akṛṇvan amṛtasya nābhim	deva kṛ amṛta nābhi
317	yaḥ tvat hotā pūrvaḥ agne yajīyān	yad tvad hotṛ pūrva agni yajīyas
317	dvitā ca sattā svadhayā ca śambhuḥ	dvitā ca sattṛ svadhā ca śambhu
317	tasya anu dharma pra yajā cikitvaḥ	tad anu dharman pra yaj cit
317	athā naḥ dhāḥ adhvaram devavītau	atha mad dhā adhvara deva vīti
 ---
318	bhavā naḥ agne sumanāḥ upetau	bhū mad agni sumanas upeti
318	sakhā iva sakhye pitarā iva sādhuḥ	sakhi iva sakhi pitṛ iva sādhu
318	purudruhaḥ hi kṣitayaḥ janānām	puru druh hi kṣiti jana
318	prati pratīcīḥ dahatāt arātīḥ	prati pratyañc dah arāti
318	tapa u su agne antarān amitrān	tap u su agni antara amitra
318	tapā śaṁsam araruṣaḥ parasya	tap śaṃsa a rā para
318	tapa u vaso cikitānaḥ acittān	tap u vasu cit a cit
318	vi te tiṣThantām ajarāḥ ayāsaḥ	vi tvad sthā ajara ayās
318	idhmena agne icchamānaḥ ghṛtena	idhma agni iṣ ghṛta
318	juhomi havyam tarase balāya	hu havya taras bala
318	yāvat īśe brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ	yāvat īś brahman vand
318	imām dhiyam śataseyāya devīm	idam dhī śata seya deva
318	ut śociṣā sahasaḥ putra stutaḥ	ud śocis sahas putra stu
318	bṛhat vayaḥ śaśamāneṣu dhehi	bṛhat vayas śam dhā
318	revat agne viśvāmitreṣu śam yoḥ	revat agni viśvāmitra śam yos
318	marmṛjmā te tanvam bhūri kṛtvaḥ	marmṛj tvad tanū bhūri kṛtvas
318	kṛdhi ratnam susanitar dhanānām	kṛ ratna su sanitṛ dhana
318	sa gha it agne bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ	tad gha id agni bhū yat samindh
318	stotuḥ duroṇe subhagasya revat	stotṛ duroṇa subhaga revat
318	sṛprā karasnā dadhiṣe vapūṁṣi	sṛpra karasna dhā vapus
 ---
319	agnim hotāram pra vṛṇe miyedhe	agni hotṛ pra vṛ miyedha
319	gṛtsam kavim viśvavidam amūram	gṛtsa kavi viśva vid amūra
319	sa naḥ yakṣat devatātā yajīyān	tad mad yaj devatāti yajīyas
319	rāye vājāya vanate maghāni	rai vāja van magha
319	pra te agne haviṣmatīm iyarmi	pra tvad agni haviṣmat ṛch
319	acchā sudyumnām rātinīm ghṛtācīm	acchā su dyumna rātin ghṛtāñc
319	pradakṣiṇit devatātim urāṇaḥ	pradakṣiṇit devatāti vṛ
319	sam rātibhiḥ vasubhiḥ yajñam aśret	sam rāti vasu yajña śri
319	sa tejīyasā manasā tvotaḥ	tad tejīyas manas tvota
319	uta śikṣa svapatyasya śikṣoḥ	uta śikṣ su apatya śikṣu
319	agne rāyaḥ nṛtamasya prabhūtau	agni rai nṛtama prabhūti
319	bhūyāma te suṣTutayaḥ ca vasvaḥ	bhū tvad suṣṭuti ca vasu
319	bhūrīṇi hi tve dadhire anīkā	bhūri hi tvad dhā anīka
319	agne devasya yajyavaḥ janāsaḥ	agni deva yajyu jana
319	saḥ ā vaha devatātim yaviṣTha	tad ā vah devatāti yaviṣṭha
319	śardhaḥ yat adya divyam yajāsi	śardhas yat adya divya yaj
319	yat tvā hotāram anajan miyedhe	yat tvad hotṛ añj miyedha
319	niṣādayantaḥ yajathāya devāḥ	niṣāday yajatha deva
319	sa tvam naḥ agne avitā iha bodhi	tad tvad mad agni av iha bhū
319	adhi śravāṁsi dhehi naḥ tanūṣu	adhi śravas dhā mad tanū
 ---
320	agnim uṣasam aśvinā dadhikrām	agni uṣas aśvin dadhikrā
320	vyuṣTiṣu havate vahniḥ ukthaiḥ	vyuṣṭi hvā vahni uktha
320	sujyotiṣaḥ naḥ śṛṇvantu devāḥ	su jyotis mad śru deva
320	sajoṣasaḥ adhvaram vāvaśānāḥ	sajoṣas adhvara vaś
320	agne trī te vājinā trī sadhasthā	agni tri tvad vājina tri sadhastha
320	tisraḥ te jihvāḥ ṛtajāta pūrvīḥ	tri tvad jihvā ṛta jan puru
320	tisraḥ u te tanvaḥ devavātāḥ	tri u tvad tanū deva van
320	tābhiḥ naḥ pāhi giraḥ aprayucchan	tad mad pā gir aprayucchat
320	agne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedaḥ	agni bhūri tvad jātavedas
320	deva svadhāvaḥ amṛtasya nāma	deva svadhāvat amṛta nāman
320	yāḥ ca māyāḥ māyinām viśvaminva	yad ca māyā māyin viśvaminva
320	tve pūrvīḥ saṁdadhuḥ pṛṣTabandho	tvad puru saṃdhā pracch bandhu
320	agniḥ netā bhagaḥ iva kṣitīnām	agni netṛ bhaga iva kṣiti
320	daivīnām devaḥ ṛtupāḥ ṛtāvā	daiva deva ṛtu pā ṛtāvan
320	sa vṛtrahā sanayaḥ viśvavedāḥ	tad vṛtra han sanaya viśva vedas
320	parṣat viśvā ati duritā gṛṇantam	pṛ viśva ati durita gṛ
320	dadhikrām agnim uṣasam ca devīm	dadhikrā agni uṣas ca devī
320	bṛhaspatim savitāram ca devam	bṛhaspati savitṛ ca deva
320	aśvinā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam ca	aśvin mitrāvaruṇa bhaga ca
320	vasūn rudrān ādityān iha huve	vasu rudra āditya iha hvā
 ---
321	imam naḥ yajñam amṛteṣu dhehi	idam mad yajña amṛta dhā
321	imā havyā jātavedaḥ juṣasva	idam havya jātavedas juṣ
321	stokānām agne medasaḥ ghṛtasya	stoka agni medas ghṛta
321	hotar pra aśāna prathamaḥ niṣadya	hotṛ prāś prathama niṣad
321	ghṛtavantaḥ pāvaka te	ghṛtavat pāvaka tvad
321	stokāḥ ścotanti medasaḥ	stoka ścut medas
321	svadharman devavītaye	sva dharman deva vīti
321	śreṣTham naḥ dhehi vāryam	śreṣṭha mad dhā vārya
321	tubhyam stokāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ	tvad stoka ghṛtaścut
321	agne viprāya santya	agni vipra santya
321	ṛṣiḥ śreṣThaḥ sam idhyase	ṛṣi śreṣṭha sam indh
321	yajñasya prāvitā bhava	yajña prāvitṛ bhū
321	tubhyam ścotanti adhrigo śacīvaḥ	tvad ścut adhrigu śacīvat
321	stokāsaḥ agne medasaḥ ghṛtasya	stoka agni medas ghṛta
321	kaviśastaḥ bṛhatā bhānunā ā agāḥ	kavi śaṃs bṛhat bhānu gā
321	havyā juṣasva medhira	havya juṣ medhira
321	ojiṣTham te madhyataḥ medaḥ udbhṛtam	ojiṣṭha tvad madhya medas udbhṛ
321	pra te vayam dadāmahe	pra tvad mad dā
321	ścotanti te vaso stokāḥ adhi tvaci	ścut tvad vasu stoka adhi tvac
321	prati tān devaśaḥ vihi	prati tad devaśas vī
 ---
322	ayam saḥ agniḥ yasmin somam indraḥ	idam tad agni yad soma indra
322	sutam dadhe jaThare vāvaśānaḥ	su dhā jaṭhara vaś
322	sahasriṇam vājam atyam na saptim	sahasrin vāja atya na sapti
322	sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ	san as stu jātavedas
322	agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyām	agni yad tvad div varcas pṛthivī
322	yat oṣadhīṣu apsu ā yajatra	yad oṣadhī ap ā yajatra
322	yena antarikṣam uru ātatantha	yad antarikṣa uru ātan
322	tveṣaḥ sa bhānuḥ arṇavaḥ nṛcakṣāḥ	tveṣa tad bhānu arṇava nṛ cakṣas
322	agne divaḥ arṇam acchā jigāsi	agni div arṇa acchā gā
322	acchā devān ūciṣe dhiṣṇyāḥ ye	acchā deva vac dhiṣṇya yad
322	yāḥ rocane parastāt sūryasya	yad rocana parastāt sūrya
322	yāḥ ca avastāt upatiṣThante āpaḥ	yad ca avastāt upasthā ap
322	purīṣyāsaḥ agnayaḥ	purīṣya agni
322	prāvaṇebhiḥ sajoṣasaḥ	prāvaṇa sajoṣas
322	juṣantām yajñam adruhaḥ	juṣ yajña adruh
322	anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ mahīḥ	anamīva iṣ mahi
322	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
322	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
322	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
322	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
323	nirmathitaḥ sudhitaḥ ā sadhasthe	nirmath sudhita ā sadhastha
323	yuvā kaviḥ adhvarasya praṇetā	yuvan kavi adhvara praṇī
323	jūryatsu agniḥ ajaraḥ vaneṣu	jṛ agni ajara vana
323	atrā dadhe amṛtam jātavedāḥ	atra ā dhā amṛta jātavedas
323	amanthiṣTām bhāratā revat agnim	math bhārata revat agni
323	devaśravāḥ devavātaḥ sudakṣam	devaśravas devavāta su dakṣa
323	agne vi paśya bṛhatā abhi rāyā	agni vi paś bṛhat abhi rai
323	iṣām naḥ netā bhavatāt anu dyūn	iṣ mad nī bhū anu div
323	daśa kṣipaḥ pūrvyam sīm ajījanan	daśan kṣip pūrvya sīm jan
323	sujātam mātṛṣu priyam	su jan mātṛ priya
323	agnim stuhi daivavātam devaśravaḥ	agni stu daivavāta devaśravas
323	yaḥ janānām asat vaśī	yad jana as vaśin
323	ni tvā dadhe vare ā pṛthivyāḥ	ni tvad dhā vara ā pṛthivī
323	iLāyāḥ pade sudinatve ahnām	iḍā pada su dina tva ahar
323	dṛṣadvatyām mānuṣe āpayāyām	dṛṣadvatī mānuṣa āpayā
323	sarasvatyām revat agne didīhi	sarasvatī revat agni dīdī
323	iLām agne purudaṁsam sanim goḥ	iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go
323	śaśvattamam havamānāya sādha	śaśvattama hvā sādh
323	syāt naḥ sūnuḥ tanayaḥ vijāvā	as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan
323	agne sā te sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad
 ---
324	agne sahasva pṛtanāḥ	agni sah pṛtanā
324	abhimātīḥ apa asya	abhimāti apās
324	duṣTaraḥ taran arātīḥ	duṣṭara tṛ arāti
324	varcaḥ dhāḥ yajñavāhase	varcas dhā yajña vāhas
324	agne iLā sam idhyase	agni iḍā sam indh
324	vītihotraḥ amartyaḥ	vītihotra amartya
324	juṣasva sū naḥ adhvaram	juṣ su u mad adhvara
324	agne dyumnena jāgṛve	agni dyumna jāgṛvi
324	sahasaḥ sūno āhuta	sahas sūnu āhu
324	ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama	ā idam barhis sad u mad
324	agne viśvebhiḥ agnibhiḥ	agni viśva agni
324	devebhiḥ mahayā giraḥ	deva mahay gir
324	yajñeṣu ye u cāyavaḥ	yajña yad u cāyu
324	agne dāḥ dāśuṣe rayim	agni dā dāś rayi
324	vīravantam parīṇasam	vīravat parīṇas
324	śiśīhi naḥ sūnumataḥ	śā mad sūnumat
 ---
325	agne divaḥ sūnuḥ asi pracetāḥ	agni div sūnu as pracetas
325	tanā pṛthivyāḥ uta viśvavedāḥ	tan pṛthivī uta viśva vedas
325	ṛdhak devān iha yajā cikitvaḥ	ṛdhak deva iha yaj ā cit
325	agniḥ sanoti vīryāṇi vidvān	agni san vīrya vid
325	sanoti vājam amṛtāya bhūṣan	san vāja amṛta bhūṣ
325	sa naḥ devān ā iha vahā purukṣo	tad mad deva ā iha vah purukṣu
325	agniḥ dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanye	agni dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanya
325	ā bhāti devī amṛte amūraḥ	ā bhā devī amṛta amūra
325	kṣayan vājaiḥ puruścandraḥ namobhiḥ	kṣi vāja puru ścandra namas
325	agne indraḥ ca dāśuṣaḥ duroṇe	agni indra ca dāś duroṇa
325	sutāvataḥ yajñam iha upa yātam	sutāvat yajña iha upa yā
325	amardhantā somapeyāya devā	amardhat soma peya deva
325	agne apām sam idhyase duroṇe	agni ap sam indh duroṇa
325	nityaḥ sūno sahasaḥ jātavedaḥ	nitya sūnu sahas jātavedas
325	sadhasthāni mahayamānaḥ ūtī	sadhastha mahay ūti
 ---
326	vaiśvānaram manasā agnim nicāyyā	vaiśvānara manas agni nicāy
326	haviṣmantaḥ anuṣatyam svarvidam	haviṣmat anuṣatya svar vid
326	sudānum devam rathiram vasūyavaḥ	sudānu deva rathira vasūyu
326	gīrbhiḥ raṇvam kuśikāsaḥ havāmahe	gir raṇva kuśika hvā
326	tam śubhram agnim avase havāmahe	tad śubhra agni av hvā
326	vaiśvānaram mātariśvānam ukthyam	vaiśvānara mātariśvan ukthya
326	bṛhaspatim manuṣaḥ devatātaye	bṛhaspati manus devatāti
326	vipram śrotāram atithim raghuṣyadam	vipra śrotṛ atithi raghuṣyad
326	aśvaḥ na krandan janibhiḥ sam idhyate	aśva na krand jani sam indh
326	vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhiḥ yugeyuge	vaiśvānara kuśika yuga yuga
326	sa naḥ agniḥ suvīryam svaśvyam	tad mad agni su vīrya su aśvya
326	dadhātu ratnam amṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ	dhā ratna amṛta jāgṛvi
326	pra yantu vājāḥ taviṣībhiḥ agnayaḥ	pra i vāja taviṣī agni
326	śubhe sammiślāḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayukṣata	śubh sammiśla pṛṣatī yuj
326	bṛhadukṣaḥ marutaḥ viśvavedasaḥ	bṛhadukṣ marut viśva vedas
326	pra vepayanti parvatān adābhyāḥ	pra vepay parvata adābhya
326	agniśriyaḥ marutaḥ viśvakṛṣTayaḥ	agni śrī marut viśvakṛṣṭi
326	ā tveṣam ugram avaḥ īmahe vayam	ā tveṣa ugra avas i mad
326	te svāninaḥ rudriyāḥ varṣanirṇijaḥ	tad svānin rudriya varṣa nirṇij
326	siṁhāḥ na heṣakratavaḥ sudānavaḥ	siṃha na heṣa kratu sudānu
326	vrātaṁvrātam gaṇaṁgaṇam suśastibhiḥ	vrāta vrāta gaṇa gaṇa su śasti
326	agneḥ bhāmam marutām ojaḥ īmahe	agni bhāma marut ojas i
326	pṛṣadaśvāsaḥ anavabhrarādhasaḥ	pṛṣat aśva anavabhra rādhas
326	gantāraḥ yajñam vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ	gam yajña vidatha dhīra
326	agniḥ asmi janmanā jātavedāḥ	agni as janman jātavedas
326	ghṛtam me cakṣuḥ amṛtam me āsan	ghṛta mad cakṣus amṛta mad āsan
326	arkaḥ tridhātuḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ	arka tri dhātu rajas vimā
326	ajasraḥ gharmaḥ haviḥ asmi nāma	ajasra gharma havis as nāma
326	tribhiḥ pavitraiḥ apupot hi arkam	tri pavitra pū hi arka
326	hṛdā matim jyotiḥ anu prajānan	hṛd mati jyotis anu prajñā
326	varṣiṣTham ratnam akṛta svadhābhiḥ	varṣiṣṭha ratna kṛ svadhā
326	āt it dyāvāpṛthivī pari apaśyat	āt id dyāvāpṛthivī pari paś
326	śatadhāram utsam akṣīyamāṇam	śata dhārā utsa a kṣi
326	vipaścitam pitaram vaktvānām	vipaścit pitṛ vaktva
326	meLim madantam pitroḥ upasthe	meḍi mad pitṛ upastha
326	tam rodasī pipṛtam satyavācam	tad rodas pṛ satya vāc
 ---
327	pra vaḥ vājāḥ abhidyavaḥ	pra tvad vāja abhidyu
327	haviṣmantaḥ ghṛtācyā	haviṣmat ghṛtācī
327	devān jigāti sumnayuḥ	deva gā sumnayu
327	īLe agnim vipaścitam	īḍ agni vipaścit
327	girā yajñasya sādhanam	giri yajña sādhana
327	śruṣTīvānam dhitāvānam	śruṣṭīvan dhitāvan
327	agne śakema te vayam	agni śak tvad mad
327	yamam devasya vājinaḥ	yam deva vājin
327	ati dveṣāṁsi tarema	ati dveṣas tṛ
327	samidhyamānaḥ adhvare	samindh adhvara
327	agniḥ pāvakaḥ īḍyaḥ	agni pāvaka īḍ
327	śociṣkeśaḥ tam īmahe	śociṣkeśa tad i
327	pṛthupājāḥ amartyaḥ	pṛthu pājas amartya
327	ghṛtanirṇik svāhutaḥ	ghṛta nirṇij su āhu
327	agniḥ yajñasya havyavāT	agni yajña havyavah
327	tam sabādhaḥ yatasrucaḥ	tad sabādh yam sruc
327	itthā dhiyā yajñavantaḥ	itthā dhī yajñavat
327	ā cakruḥ agnim ūtaye	ā kṛ agni ūti
327	hotā devaḥ amartyaḥ	hotṛ deva amartya
327	purastāt eti māyayā	purastāt i māyā
327	vidathāni pracodayan	vidatha pracoday
327	vājī vājeṣu dhīyate	vājin vāja dhā
327	adhvareṣu pra nīyate	adhvara pra nī
327	vipraḥ yajñasya sādhanaḥ	vipra yajña sādhana
327	dhiyā cakre vareṇyaḥ	dhī kṛ vareṇya
327	bhūtānām garbham ā dadhe	bhūta garbha ā dhā
327	dakṣasya pitaram tanā	dakṣa pitṛ tan
327	ni tvā dadhe vareṇyam	ni tvad dhā vareṇya
327	dakṣasya iLā sahaskṛta	dakṣa iḍā sahaskṛta
327	agne sudītim uśijam	agni su dīti uśij
327	agnim yanturam apturam	agni yantur ap tura
327	ṛtasya yoge vanuṣaḥ	ṛta yoga
327	viprāḥ vājaiḥ sam indhate	vipra vāja sam indh
327	ūrjaḥ napātam adhvare	ūrj napāt adhvara
327	dīdivāṁsam upa dyavi	dīdī upa div
327	agnim īLe kavikratum	agni īḍ kavi kratu
327	īLenyaḥ namasyaḥ	īḍ namasya
327	tiraḥ tamāṁsi darśataḥ	tiras tamas darśata
327	sam agniḥ idhyate vṛṣā	sam agni indh vṛṣan
327	vṛṣā u agniḥ sam idhyate	vṛṣa agni sam indh
327	aśvaḥ na devavāhanaḥ	aśva na deva vāhana
327	tam haviṣmantaḥ īLate	tad haviṣmat īḍ
327	vṛṣaṇam tvā vayam vṛṣan	vṛṣan tvad mad vṛṣan
327	vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi	vṛṣan sam indh
327	agne dīdyatam bṛhat	agni dīdī bṛhat
 ---
328	agne juṣasva naḥ haviḥ	agni juṣ mad havis
328	puroLāśam jātavedaḥ	puroḍāś jātavedas
328	prātaḥsāve dhiyāvaso	prātaḥsāva dhiyāvasu
328	puroLāḥ agne pacataḥ	puroḍāś agni pacata
328	tubhyam vā ghā pariṣkṛtaḥ	tvad vā gha pariṣkṛ
328	tam juṣasva yaviṣThya	tad juṣ yaviṣṭhya
328	agne vīhi puroLāśam	agni vī puroḍāś
328	āhutam tiroahnyam	āhu tiroahnya
328	sahasaḥ sūnuḥ asi adhvare hitaḥ	sahas sūnu as adhvara dhā
328	mādhyaṁdine savane jātavedaḥ	mādhyaṃdina savana jātavedas
328	puroLāśam iha kave juṣasva	puroḍāś iha kavi juṣ
328	agne yahvasya tava bhāgadheyam	agni yahva tvad bhāgadheya
328	na pra minanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ	na pra mī vidatha dhīra
328	agne tṛtīye savane hi kāniṣaḥ	agni tṛtīya savana hi kan
328	puroLāśam sahasaḥ sūno āhutam	puroḍāś sahas sūnu āhu
328	athā deveṣu adhvaram vipanyayā	atha deva adhvara vipanyayā
328	dhāḥ ratnavantam amṛteṣu jāgṛvim	dhā ratnavat amṛta jāgṛvi
328	agne vṛdhānaḥ āhutim	agni vṛdh āhuti
328	puroLāśam jātavedaḥ	puroḍāś jātavedas
328	juṣasva tiroahnyam	juṣ tiroahnya
 ---
329	asti idam adhimanthanam	as idam adhimanthana
329	asti prajananam kṛtam	as prajanana kṛ
329	etām viśpatnīm ā bhara	etad viś patnī ā bhṛ
329	agnim manthāma pūrvathā	agni math pūrvathā
329	araṇyoḥ nihitaḥ jātavedāḥ	araṇi nidhā jātavedas
329	garbhaḥ iva sudhitaḥ garbhiṇīṣu	garbha iva sudhita garbhiṇī
329	divedive īḍyaḥ jāgṛvadbhiḥ	diva diva īḍ jāgṛ
329	haviṣmadbhiḥ manuṣyebhiḥ agniḥ	haviṣmat manuṣya agni
329	uttānāyām ava bharā cikitvān	uttāna ava bhṛ cit
329	sadyaḥ pravītā vṛṣaṇam jajāna	sadyas pravye vṛṣan jan
329	aruṣastūpaḥ ruśat asya pājaḥ	aruṣa stūpa ruśat idam pājas
329	iLāyāḥ putraḥ vayune ajaniṣTa	iḍā putra vayuna jan
329	iLāyāḥ tvā pade vayam	iḍā tvad pada mad
329	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi	nābhi pṛthivī adhi
329	jātavedaḥ ni dhīmahi	jātavedas ni dhā
329	agne havyāya voLhave	agni havya vah
329	manthatā naraḥ kavim advayantam	math nṛ kavi advayat
329	pracetasam amṛtam supratīkam	pracetas amṛta su pratīka
329	yajñasya ketum prathamam purastāt	yajña ketu prathama purastāt
329	agnim naraḥ janayatā suśevam	agni nṛ janay su śeva
329	yadī manthanti bāhubhiḥ vi rocate	yadi math bāhu vi ruc
329	aśvaḥ na vājī aruṣaḥ vaneṣu ā	aśva na vājin aruṣa vana ā
329	citraḥ na yāman aśvinoḥ anivṛtaḥ	citra na yāman aśvin a nivṛ
329	pari vṛṇakti aśmanaḥ tṛṇā dahan	pari vṛj aśman tṛṇa dah
329	jātaḥ agniḥ rocate cekitānaḥ	jan agni ruc cekit
329	vājī vipraḥ kaviśastaḥ sudānuḥ	vājin vipra kavi śaṃs sudānu
329	yam devāsaḥ īḍyam viśvavidam	yad deva īḍ viśva vid
329	havyavāham adadhuḥ adhvareṣu	havyavāha dhā adhvara
329	sīda hotar sve uloke cikitvān	sad hotṛ sva u loka cit
329	sādayā yajñam sukṛtasya yonau	sāday yajña sukṛta yoni
329	devāvīḥ devān haviṣā yajāsi	devāvī deva havis yaj
329	agne bṛhat yajamāne vayaḥ dhāḥ	agni bṛhat yaj vayas dhā
329	kṛṇota dhūmam vṛṣaṇam sakhāyaḥ	kṛ dhūma vṛṣan sakhi
329	asredhantaḥ itana vājam accha	a sridh i vāja acchā
329	ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāT suvīraḥ	idam agni pṛtanāṣāh su vīra
329	yena devāsaḥ asahanta dasyūn	yad deva sah dasyu
329	ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ	idam tvad yoni ṛtviya
329	yataḥ jātaḥ arocathāḥ	yatas jan ruc
329	tam jānan agne ā sīda	tad jñā agni ā sad
329	athā naḥ vardhayā giraḥ	atha ā mad vardhay gir
329	tanūnapāt ucyate garbhaḥ āsuraḥ	tanūnapāt vac garbha āsura
329	narāśaṁsaḥ bhavati yat vijāyate	narāśaṃsa bhū yat vijan
329	mātariśvā yat amimīta mātari	mātariśvan yat mā mātṛ
329	vātasya sargaḥ abhavat sarīmaṇi	vāta sarga bhū sarīman
329	sunirmathā nirmathitaḥ	sunirmatha nirmath
329	sunidhā nihitaḥ kaviḥ	sunidha nidhā kavi
329	agne svadhvarā kṛṇu	agni su adhvara kṛ
329	devān devayate yaja	deva devay yaj
329	ajījanan amṛtam martyāsaḥ	jan amṛta martya
329	asremāṇam taraṇim vīLujambham	asreman taraṇi vīḍu jambha
329	daśa svasāraḥ agruvaḥ samīcīḥ	daśan svasṛ agru samyañc
329	pumāṁsam jātam abhi sam rabhante	puṃs jan abhi sam rabh
329	pra saptahotā sanakāt arocata	pra saptan hotṛ sanaka ruc
329	mātuḥ upasthe yat aśocat ūdhani	mātṛ upastha yat śuc ūdhas
329	na ni miṣati suraṇaḥ divedive	na ni miṣ suraṇa diva diva
329	yat asurasya jaTharāt ajāyata	yat asura jaṭhara jan
329	amitrāyudhaḥ marutām iva prayāḥ	amitrāyudh marut iva prayā
329	prathamajāḥ brahmaṇaḥ viśvam it viduḥ	prathama jā brahman viśva id vid
329	dyumnavat brahma kuśikāsaḥ ā īrire	dyumnavat brahman kuśika er
329	ekaekaḥ dame agnim sam īdhire	eka eka dama agni sam indh
329	yat adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin	yat adya tvad pre yajña idam
329	hotar cikitvaḥ avṛṇīmahi iha	hotṛ cit vṛ iha
329	dhruvam ayāḥ dhruvam uta aśamiṣThāḥ	dhruva yaj dhruva uta śam
329	prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam	prajñā vid upa yā soma
 ---
330	icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ	iṣ tvad somya sakhi
330	sunvanti somam dadhati prayāṁsi	su soma dhā prayas
330	titikṣante abhiśastim janānām	titikṣ abhiśasti jana
330	indra tvat ā kaḥ cana hi praketaḥ	indra tvad ā kaścana hi praketa
330	na te dūre paramā cit rajāṁsi	na tvad dūra parama cit rajas
330	ā tu pra yāhi harivaḥ haribhyām	ā tu pra yā harivat hari
330	sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtā imā	sthira vṛṣan savana kṛ idam
330	yuktāḥ grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau	yuj grāvan samindh agni
330	indraḥ suśipraḥ maghavā tarutraḥ	indra su śiprā maghavan tarutra
330	mahāvrātaḥ tuvikūrmiḥ ṛghāvān	mahat vrāta tuvikūrmi ṛghāvat
330	yat ugraḥ dhāḥ bādhitaḥ martyeṣu	yad ugra dhā bādh martya
330	kva tyā te vṛṣabha vīryāṇi	kva tya tvad vṛṣabha vīrya
330	tvam hi smā cyāvayan acyutāni	tvad hi sma ā cyāvay acyuta
330	ekaḥ vṛtrā carasi jighnamānaḥ	eka vṛtra car han
330	tava dyāvāpṛthivī parvatāsaḥ	tvad dyāvāpṛthivī parvata
330	anu vratāya nimitā iva tasthuḥ	anu vrata nimā iva sthā
330	uta abhaye puruhūta śravobhiḥ	uta abhaya puruhūta śravas
330	ekaḥ dṛLham avadaḥ vṛtrahā san	eka dṛḍha vad vṛtrahan as
330	ime cit indra rodasī apāre	idam cit indra rodas apāra
330	yat saṁgṛbhṇāḥ maghavan kāśiḥ it te	yat saṃgrah maghavan kāśi id tvad
330	pra sū te indra pravatā haribhyām	pra su u tvad indra pravat hari
330	pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn	pra tvad vajra pramṛ i śatru
330	jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ	hā pratyañc anvañc parāñc
330	viśvam satyam kṛṇuhi viṣTam astu	viśva satya kṛ viṣ as
330	yasmai dhāyuḥ adadhāḥ martyāya	yad dhāyu dhā martya
330	abhaktam cit bhajate gehyam saḥ	a bhaj cit bhaj gehya tad
330	bhadrā te indra sumatiḥ ghṛtācī	bhadra tvad indra sumati ghṛtāñc
330	sahasradānā puruhūta rātiḥ	sahasra dāna puruhūta rāti
330	sahadānum puruhūta kṣiyantam	saha dānu puruhūta kṣi
330	ahastam indra sam piṇak kuṇārum	ahasta indra sam piṣ kuṇāru
330	abhi vṛtram vardhamānam piyārum	abhi vṛtra vṛdh piyāru
330	apādam indra tavasā jaghantha	a pāda indra tavas han
330	ni sāmanām iṣirām indra bhūmim	ni sāmana iṣira indra bhūmi
330	mahīm apārām sadane sasattha	mah apāra sadana sad
330	astabhnāt dyām vṛṣabhaḥ antarikṣam	stambh div vṛṣabha antarikṣa
330	arṣantu āpaḥ tvayā iha prasūtāḥ	ṛṣ ap tvad iha prasū
330	alātṛṇaḥ valaḥ indra vrajaḥ goḥ	alātṛṇa vala indra vraja go
330	purā hantoḥ bhayamānaḥ vi āra	purā hantu bhī vi ṛch
330	sugān pathaḥ akṛṇot niraje gāḥ	su ga pathin kṛ niraj go
330	pra āvan vāṇīḥ puruhūtam dhamantīḥ	prāv vāṇī puruhūta dham
330	ekaḥ dve vasumatī samīcī	eka dvi vasumat samyañc
330	indraḥ ā paprau pṛthivīm uta dyām	indra ā prā pṛthivī uta div
330	uta antarikṣāt abhi naḥ samīke	uta antarikṣa abhi mad samīka
330	iṣaḥ rathīḥ sayujaḥ śūra vājān	iṣ rathī sayuj śūra vāja
330	diśaḥ sūryaḥ na mināti pradiṣTāḥ	diś sūrya na mī pradiś
330	divedive haryaśvaprasūtāḥ	diva diva haryaśva prasū
330	sam yat ānaT adhvanaḥ āt it aśvaiḥ	sam yat naś adhvan āt id aśva
330	vimocanam kṛṇute tat tu asya	vimocana kṛ tad tu idam
330	didṛkṣante uṣasaḥ yāman aktoḥ	didṛkṣ uṣas yāman aktu
330	vivasvatyāḥ mahi citram anīkam	vivasvat mahi citra anīka
330	viśve jānanti mahinā yat ā agāt	viśva jñā mahi yat āgā
330	indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi	indra karman su kṛ puru
330	mahi jyotiḥ nihitam vakṣaṇāsu	mahi jyotis nidhā vakṣaṇā
330	āmā pakvam carati bibhratī gauḥ	āma pakva car bhṛ go
330	viśvam svādma sambhṛtam usriyāyām	viśva svādman sambhṛ usriyā
330	yat sīm indraḥ adadhāt bhojanāya	yat sīm indra dhā bhojana
330	indra dṛhya yāmakośāḥ abhūvan	indra dṛh yāma kośa bhū
330	yajñāya śikṣa gṛṇate sakhibhyaḥ	yajña śikṣ gṛ sakhi
330	durmāyavaḥ durevāḥ martyāsaḥ	durmāyu dureva martya
330	niṣaṅgiṇaḥ ripavaḥ hantvāsaḥ	niṣaṅgin ripu han
330	sam ghoṣaḥ śṛṇve avamaiḥ amitraiḥ	sam ghoṣa śru avama amitra
330	jahī ni eṣu aśanim tapiṣThām	hā ni idam aśani tapiṣṭha
330	vṛśca īm adhastāt vi rujā sahasva	vraśc īṃ adhastāt vi ruj sah
330	jahi rakṣaḥ maghavan randhayasva	hā rakṣas maghavan randhay
330	ut vṛha rakṣaḥ sahamūlam indra	ud vṛh rakṣas saha mūla indra
330	vṛścā madhyam prati agram śṛṇīhi	vraśc madhya prati agra śṛ
330	ā kīvataḥ salalūkam cakartha	ā kīvat salalūka kṛ
330	brahmadviṣe tapuṣim hetim asya	brahman dviṣ tapuṣi heti as
330	svastaye vājibhiḥ ca praṇetar	svasti vājin ca praṇetṛ
330	sam yat mahīḥ iṣaḥ āsatsi pūrvīḥ	sam yat mahi iṣ āsad puru
330	rāyaḥ vantāraḥ bṛhataḥ syāma	rai vantṛ bṛhat as
330	asme astu bhagaḥ indra prajāvān	mad as bhaga indra prajāvat
330	ā naḥ bhara bhagam indra dyumantam	ā mad bhṛ bhaga indra dyumat
330	ni te deṣṇasya dhīmahi prareke	ni tvad deṣṇa dhā prareka
330	ūrvaḥ iva paprathe kāmaḥ asme	ūrva iva prath kāma mad
330	tam ā pṛṇa vasupate vasūnām	tad ā pṛṇ vasu pati vasu
330	imam kāmam mandayā gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ	idam kāma manday go aśva
330	candravatā rādhasā paprathaḥ ca	candravat rādhas prath ca
330	svaryavaḥ matibhiḥ tubhyam viprāḥ	svaryu mati tvad vipra
330	indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāsaḥ akran	indra vāhas kuśika kṛ
330	ā naḥ gotrā dardṛhi gopate gāḥ	ā mad gotra dardar gopati go
330	sam asmabhyam sanayaḥ yantu vājāḥ	sam mad sani i vāja
330	divakṣāḥ asi vṛṣabha satyaśuṣmaḥ	divakṣas as vṛṣabha satya śuṣma
330	asmabhyam su maghavan bodhi godāḥ	mad su maghavan bhū go dā
330	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
330	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vāja sāti
330	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
330	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
331	śāsat vahniḥ duhituḥ naptyam gāt	śās vahni duhitṛ naptī gā
331	vidvān ṛtasya dīdhitim saparyan	vid ṛta dīdhiti sapary
331	pitā yatra duhituḥ sekam ṛñjan	pitṛ yatra duhitṛ seka ṛj
331	sam śagmyena manasā dadhanve	sam śagmya manas dhanv
331	na jāmaye tānvaḥ riktham āraik	na jāmi tānva riktha ric
331	cakāra garbham sanituḥ nidhānam	kṛ garbha sanitṛ nidhāna
331	yadī mātaraḥ janayanta vahnim	yadi mātṛ janay vahni
331	anyaḥ kartā sukṛtoḥ anyaḥ ṛndhan	anya kṛ su kṛt anya ṛdh
331	agniḥ jajñe juhvā rejamānaḥ	agni jan juhū rej
331	mahaḥ putrān aruṣasya prayakṣe	mah putra aruṣa prayakṣ
331	mahān garbhaḥ mahi ā jātam eṣām	mahat garbha mahi ā jāta idam
331	mahī pravṛt haryaśvasya yajñaiḥ	mah pravṛdh haryaśva yajña
331	abhi jaitrīḥ asacanta spṛdhānam	abhi jaitra sac spṛdh
331	mahi jyotiḥ tamasaḥ niḥ ajānan	mahi jyotis tamas niḥ jñā
331	tam jānatīḥ prati ut āyan uṣāsaḥ	tad jñā prati ud i uṣa
331	patiḥ gavām abhavat ekaḥ indraḥ	pati go bhū eka indra
331	vīLau satīḥ abhi dhīrāḥ atṛndan	vīḍu as abhi dhīra tṛd
331	prācā ahinvan manasā sapta viprāḥ	prāñc hi manas saptan vipra
331	viśvām avindan pathyām ṛtasya	viśva vid pathyā ṛta
331	prajānan it tā namasā ā viveśa	prajñā id tad namas viś
331	vidat yadī saramā rugṇam adreḥ	vid yadi saramā rugṇa adri
331	mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyam sadhryak kar	mahi pāthas pūrvya sadhryañc kṛ
331	agram nayat supadī akṣarāṇām	agra nī su padin akṣara
331	acchā ravam prathamā jānatī gāt	acchā rava prathama jñā gā
331	agacchat u vipratamaḥ sakhīyan	gam u vipratama sakhīy
331	asūdayat sukṛte garbham adriḥ	sūday su kṛt garbha adri
331	sasāna maryaḥ yuvabhiḥ makhasyan	san marya yuvan makhasy
331	atha abhavat aṅgirāḥ sadyaḥ arcan	atha bhū aṅgiras sadyas arc
331	sataḥsataḥ pratimānam purobhūḥ	as as pratimāna purobhū
331	viśvā veda janimā hanti śuṣṇam	viśva vid janiman han śuṣṇa
331	pra naḥ divaḥ padavīḥ gavyuḥ arcan	pra mad div padavī gavyu arc
331	sakhā sakhīn amuñcat niḥ avadyāt	sakhi sakhi muc niḥ avadya
331	ni gavyatā manasā seduḥ arkaiḥ	ni gavyat manas sad arka
331	kṛṇvānāsaḥ amṛtatvāya gātum	kṛ amṛta tva gātu
331	idam cit nu sadanam bhūri eṣām	idam cit nu sadana bhūri idam
331	yena māsān asiṣāsan ṛtena	yad māsa siṣās ṛta
331	sampaśyamānāḥ amadan abhi svam	saṃpaś mad abhi sva
331	payaḥ pratnasya retasaḥ dughānāḥ	payas pratna retas duh
331	vi rodasī atapat ghoṣaḥ eṣām	vi rodasī tap ghoṣa idam
331	jāte niṣThām adadhuḥ goṣu vīrān	jan niṣṭhā dhā go vīra
331	sa jātebhiḥ vṛtrahā sa it u havyaiḥ	tad jan vṛtrahan tad id u havya
331	ut usriyāḥ asṛjat indraḥ arkaiḥ	ud usriyā sṛj indra arka
331	urūcī asmai ghṛtavat bharantī	uruvyañc idam ghṛtavat bhṛ
331	madhu svādma duduhe jenyā gauḥ	madhu svādman duh jenya go
331	pitre cit cakruḥ sadanam sam asmai	pitṛ cit kṛ sadana sam idam
331	mahi tviṣīmat sukṛtaḥ vi hi khyan	mahi tviṣīmat su kṛt vi hi khyā
331	viṣkabhnantaḥ skambhanenā janitrī	viṣkambh skambhana ā janitrī
331	āsīnāḥ ūrdhvam rabhasam vi minvan	ās ūrdhva rabhasa vi mi
331	mahī yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnathe dhāt	mah yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnatha dhā
331	sadyovṛdham vibhvam rodasyoḥ	sadyovṛdh vibhu rodasī
331	giraḥ yasmin anavadyāḥ samīcīḥ	gir yad anavadya samyañc
331	viśvāḥ indrāya taviṣīḥ anuttāḥ	viśva indra taviṣī anutta
331	mahi ā te sakhyam vaśmi śaktīḥ	mahi ā tvad sakhya vaś śakti
331	ā vṛtraghne niyutaḥ yanti pūrvīḥ	ā vṛtra han niyut i puru
331	mahi stotram avaḥ ā aganma sūreḥ	mahi stotra avas āgam sūri
331	asmākam su maghavan bodhi gopāḥ	mad su maghavan bhū gopā
331	mahi kṣetram puru ścandram vividvān	mahi kṣetra puru ścandra vid
331	āt it sakhibhyaḥ caratham sam airat	āt id sakhi caratha sam īr
331	indraḥ nṛbhiḥ ajanat dīdyānaḥ	indra nṛ jan dīdī
331	sākam sūryam uṣasam gātum agnim	sākam sūrya uṣas gātu agni
331	apaḥ cit eṣa vibhvaḥ damūnāḥ	ap cit etad vibhu damūnas
331	pra sadhrīcīḥ asṛjat viśvaścandrāḥ	pra sadhryañc sṛj viśva ścandra
331	madhvaḥ punānāḥ kavibhiḥ pavitraiḥ	madhu pū kavi pavitra
331	dyubhiḥ hinvanti aktubhiḥ dhanutrīḥ	div hi aktu dhanutṛ
331	anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī jihāte	anu kṛṣṇa vasudhiti hā
331	ubhe sūryasya maṁhanā yajatre	ubh sūrya maṃhanā yajatra
331	pari yat te mahimānam vṛjadhyai	pari yat tvad mahiman vṛj
331	sakhāyaḥ indra kāmyāḥ ṛjipyāḥ	sakhi indra kāmya ṛjipya
331	patiḥ bhava vṛtrahan sūnṛtānām	pati bhū vṛtrahan sūnṛtā
331	girām viśvāyuḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vayodhāḥ	gir viśvāyu vṛṣabha vayodhas
331	ā naḥ gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhiḥ	ā mad gam sakhya śiva
331	mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan	mahat mahi ūti saraṇy
331	tam aṅgirasvat namasā saparyan	tad aṅgirasvat namas sapary
331	navyam kṛṇomi sanyase purājām	navya kṛ sanyas purājā
331	druhaḥ vi yāhi bahulāḥ adevīḥ	druh vi yā bahula a deva
331	svar ca naḥ maghavan sātaye dhāḥ	svar ca mad maghavan sāti dhā
331	mihaḥ pāvakāḥ pratatāḥ abhūvan	mih pāvaka pratan bhū
331	svasti naḥ pipṛhi pāram āsām	svasti mad pṛ pāra idam
331	indra tvam rathiraḥ pāhi naḥ riṣaḥ	indra tvad rathira pā mad riṣ
331	makṣūmakṣū kṛṇuhi gojitaḥ naḥ	makṣū makṣū kṛ go jit mad
331	adediṣTa vṛtrahā gopatiḥ gāḥ	dediś vṛtrahan go pati go
331	antar kṛṣṇān aruṣaiḥ dhāmabhiḥ gāt	antar kṛṣṇa aruṣa dhāman gā
331	pra sūnṛtāḥ diśamānaḥ ṛtena	pra sūnṛtā diś ṛta
331	duraḥ ca viśvāḥ avṛṇot apa svāḥ	dvār ca viśva vṛ apa sva
331	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
331	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vāja sāti
331	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
331	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
332	indra somam somapate piba imam	indra soma soma pati pā idam
332	mādhyaṁdinam savanam cāru yat te	mādhyaṃdina savana cāru yad tvad
332	prapruthyā śipre maghavan ṛjīṣin	prapruth śiprā maghavan ṛjīṣin
332	vimucyā harī iha mādayasva	vimuc hari iha māday
332	gavāśiram manthinam indra śukram	gavāśir manthin indra śukra
332	pibā somam rarimā te madāya	pā soma rā tvad mada
332	brahmakṛtā mārutenā gaṇena	brahman kṛt māruta gaṇa
332	sajoṣāḥ rudraiḥ tṛpat ā vṛṣasva	sajoṣas rudra tṛp ā vṛṣ
332	ye te śuṣmam ye taviṣīm avardhan	yad tvad śuṣma yad taviṣī vṛdh
332	arcantaḥ indra marutaḥ te ojaḥ	arc indra marut tvad ojas
332	mādhyaṁdine savane vajrahasta	mādhyaṃdina savana vajrahasta
332	pibā rudrebhiḥ sagaṇaḥ suśipra	pā rudra sa gaṇa su śiprā
332	te it nu asya madhumat vivipre	tad id nu idam madhumat vip
332	indrasya śardhaḥ marutaḥ ye āsan	indra śardhas marut yad as
332	yebhiḥ vṛtrasya iṣitaḥ viveda	yad vṛtra iṣay vid
332	amarmaṇaḥ manyamānasya marma	amarman man marman
332	manuṣvat indra savanam juṣāṇaḥ	manuṣvat indra savana juṣ
332	pibā somam śaśvate vīryāya	pā soma śaśvat vīrya
332	saḥ ā vavṛtsva haryaśva yajñaiḥ	tad ā vṛt haryaśva yajña
332	saraṇyubhiḥ apaḥ arṇā sisarṣi	saraṇyu ap arṇa sṛ
332	tvam apaḥ yat ha vṛtram jaghanvān	tvad ap yat ha vṛtra han
332	atyān iva pra asṛjaḥ sartavai ājau	atya iva prasṛj sṛ āji
332	śayānam indra caratā vadhena	śī indra car vadha
332	vavrivāṁsam pari devīḥ adevam	vṛ pari deva a deva
332	yajāmaḥ it namasā vṛddham indram	yaj id namas vṛdh indra
332	bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaram yuvānam	bṛhat ṛṣva ajara yuvan
332	yasya priye mamatuḥ yajñiyasya	yad priya mā yajñiya
332	na rodasī mahimānam mamāte	na rodas mahiman mā
332	indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi	indra karman su kṛ puru
332	vratāni devāḥ na minanti viśve	vrata deva na mī viśva
332	dādhāra yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām	dhṛ yad pṛthivī div uta idam
332	jajāna sūryam uṣasam sudaṁsāḥ	jan sūrya uṣas su daṃsas
332	adrogha satyam tava tat mahitvam	adrogha satya tvad tad mahitva
332	sadyaḥ yat jātaḥ apibaḥ ha somam	sadyas yat jan pā ha soma
332	na dyāvaḥ indra tavasaḥ te ojaḥ	na div indra tavas tvad ojas
332	na ahā na māsāḥ śaradaḥ varanta	na aha na māsa śarad vṛ
332	tvam sadyaḥ apibaḥ jātaḥ indra	tvad sadyas pā jan indra
332	madāya somam parame vyoman	mada soma parama vyoman
332	yat ha dyāvāpṛthivī ā aviveśīḥ	yat ha dyāvāpṛthivī āviś
332	atha abhavaḥ pūrvyaḥ kārudhāyāḥ	atha bhū pūrvya kāru dhāyas
332	ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ	han ahi pariśī arṇas
332	ojāyamānam tuvijāta tavyān	ojāy tuvi jan tavyas
332	na te mahitvam anu bhūt adha dyauḥ	na tvad mahitva anu bhū adha div
332	yat anyayā sphigyā kṣām avasthāḥ	yat anya sphigī kṣā vas
332	yajñaḥ hi te indra vardhanaḥ bhūt	yajña hi tvad indra vardhana bhū
332	uta priyaḥ sutasomaḥ miyedhaḥ	uta priya su soma miyedha
332	yajñena yajñam ava yajñiyaḥ san	yajña yajña av yajñiya as
332	yajñaḥ te vajram ahihatye āvat	yajña tvad vajra ahi hatya av
332	yajñena indram avasā ā cakre arvāk	yajña indra avas kṛ arvāk
332	ā enam sumnāya navyase vavṛtyām	ā enad sumna navyas vṛt
332	yaḥ stomebhiḥ vāvṛdhe pūrvyebhiḥ	yad stoma vṛdh pūrvya
332	yaḥ madhyamebhiḥ uta nūtanebhiḥ	yad madhyama uta nūtana
332	viveṣa yat mā dhiṣaṇā jajāna	viṣ yat mad dhiṣaṇā jan
332	stavai purā pāryāt indram ahnaḥ	stu purā pārya indra ahar
332	aṁhasaḥ yatra pīparat yathā naḥ	aṃhas yatra pṛ yathā mad
332	nāvā iva yāntam ubhaye havante	nau iva yā ubhaya hvā
332	āpūrṇaḥ asya kalaśaḥ svāhā	āp￞ idam kalaśa svāhā
332	sektā iva kośam sisice pibadhyai	sektṛ iva kośa sic pā
332	sam u priyāḥ ā avavṛtran madāya	sam u priya āvṛt mada
332	pradakṣiṇit abhi somāsaḥ indram	pradakṣiṇit abhi soma indra
332	na tvā gabhīraḥ puruhūta sindhuḥ	na tvad gabhīra puruhūta sindhu
332	na adrayaḥ pari santaḥ varanta	na adri pari as vṛ
332	itthā sakhibhyaḥ iṣitaḥ yat indra	itthā sakhi iṣay yat indra
332	ā dṛLham cit arujaḥ gavyam ūrvam	ā dṛḍha cit ruj gavya ūrva
332	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
332	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
332	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
332	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
333	pra parvatānām uśatī upasthāt	pra parvata vaś upastha
333	aśve iva viṣite hāsamāne	aśvā iva viṣita hā
333	gāvā iva śubhre mātarā rihāṇe	go iva śubhra mātṛ rih
333	vipāT śutudrī payasā javete	vipāś śutudrī payas jū
333	indreṣite prasavam bhikṣamāṇe	indra iṣay prasava bhikṣ
333	acchā samudram rathyā iva yāthaḥ	acchā samudra rathya iva yā
333	samārāṇe ūrmibhiḥ pinvamāne	samṛch ūrmi pinv
333	anyā vām anyām api eti śubhre	anya tvad anya api i śubhra
333	acchā sindhum mātṛtamām ayāsam	acchā sindhu mātṛtama yā
333	vipāśam urvīm subhagām aganma	vipāś uru subhaga gam
333	vatsam iva mātarā saṁrihāṇe	vatsa iva mātṛ saṃrih
333	samānam yonim anu saṁcarantī	samāna yoni anu saṃcar
333	enā vayam payasā pinvamānāḥ	enā mad payas pinv
333	anu yonim devakṛtam carantīḥ	anu yoni deva kṛ car
333	na vartave prasavaḥ sargataktaḥ	na vṛ prasava sarga tak
333	kiṁyuḥ vipraḥ nadyaḥ johavīti	kiṃyu vipra nadī johav
333	ramadhvam me vacase somyāya	ram mad vacas somya
333	ṛtāvarīḥ upa muhūrtam evaiḥ	ṛtāvan upa muhūrta eva
333	pra sindhum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā	pra sindhu acchā bṛhat manīṣā
333	avasyuḥ ahve kuśikasya sūnuḥ	avasyu hvā kuśika sūnu
333	indraḥ asmān aradat vajrabāhuḥ	indra mad rad vajra bāhu
333	apa ahan vṛtram paridhim nadīnām	apahan vṛtra paridhi nadī
333	devaḥ anayat savitā supāṇiḥ	deva nī savitṛ su pāṇi
333	tasya vayam prasave yāmaḥ urvīḥ	tad mad prasava yā uru
333	pravācyam śaśvadhā vīryam tat	pravac śaśvadhā vīrya tad
333	indrasya karma yat ahim vivṛścat	indra karman yat ahi vivraśc
333	vi vajreṇa pariṣadaḥ jaghāna	vi vajra pariṣad han
333	āyan āpaḥ ayanam icchamānāḥ	e ap ayana iṣ
333	etat vacaḥ jaritar mā api mṛṣThāḥ	etad vacas jaritṛ mā api mṛṣ
333	ā yat te ghoṣān uttarā yugāni	ā yad tvad ghuṣ uttara yuga
333	uktheṣu kāro prati naḥ juṣasva	uktha kāru prati mad juṣ
333	mā naḥ ni kar puruṣatrā namaḥ te	mā mad ni kṛ puruṣatrā namas tvad
333	ā u su svasāraḥ kārave śṛṇota	ā u su svasṛ kāru śru
333	yayau vaḥ dūrāt anasā rathena	yā tvad dūra anas ratha
333	ni sū namadhvam bhavatā supārāḥ	ni su nam bhū su pāra
333	adhoakṣāḥ sindhavaḥ srotyābhiḥ	adhoakṣa sindhu srotyā
333	ā te kāro śṛṇavāmā vacāṁsi	ā tvad kāru śru vacas
333	yayātha dūrāt anasā rathena	yā dūra anas ratha
333	ni te naṁsai pīpyānā iva yoṣā	ni tvad nam pyā iva yoṣā
333	maryāya iva kanyā śaśvacai te	marya iva kanyā tvad
333	yat aṅga tvā bharatāḥ saṁtareyuḥ	yat aṅga tvad bharata saṃtṛ
333	gavyan grāmaḥ iṣitaḥ indrajūtaḥ	gavyat grāma iṣay indra jū
333	arṣāt aha prasavaḥ sargataktaḥ	aha prasava sarga tak
333	ā vaḥ vṛṇe sumatim yajñiyānām	ā tvad vṛ sumati yajñiya
333	atāriṣuḥ bharatāḥ gavyavaḥ sam	tṛ bharata gavyu sam
333	abhakta vipraḥ sumatim nadīnām	bhaj vipra sumati nadī
333	pra pinvadhvam iṣayantīḥ surādhāḥ	pra pinv iṣay su rādhā
333	ā vakṣaṇāḥ pṛṇadhvam yāta śībham	ā vakṣaṇā pṛṇ yā śībham
333	ut vaḥ ūrmiḥ śamyāḥ hantu	ud tvad ūrmi śamyā han
333	āpaḥ yoktrāṇi muñcata	ap yoktra muc
333	mā aduṣkṛtau vyenasā	mā a duṣkṛt vyenas
333	aghnyau śūnam ā aratām	aghnya śūna ārch
 ---
334	indraḥ pūrbhit ā atirat dāsam arkaiḥ	indra pūrbhid ātṛ dāsa arka
334	vidadvasuḥ dayamānaḥ vi śatrūn	vidadvasu day vi śatru
334	brahmajūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ	brahman jū tanū vṛdh
334	bhūridātraḥ ā apṛṇat rodasī ubhe	bhūri dātra āpṛṇ rodas ubh
334	makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim	makha tvad taviṣa pra jūti
334	iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan	ṛch vāc amṛta bhūṣ
334	indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇām	indra kṣiti as mānuṣa
334	viśām daivīnām uta pūrvayāvā	viś daiva uta pūrva yāvan
334	indraḥ vṛtram avṛṇot śardhanītiḥ	indra vṛtra vṛ śardha nīti
334	pra māyinām amināt varpaṇītiḥ	pra māyin mī varpaṇīti
334	ahan vyaṁsam uśadhak vaneṣu	han vyaṃsa uśadhak vana
334	āviḥ dhenāḥ akṛṇot rāmyāṇām	āvis dhenā kṛ rāmyā
334	indraḥ svarṣāḥ janayan ahāni	indra svarṣā janay ahar
334	jigāya uśigbhiḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣTiḥ	ji uśij pṛtanā abhiṣṭi
334	pra arocayat manave ketum ahnām	prarocay manu ketu ahar
334	avindat jyotiḥ bṛhate raṇāya	vid jyotis bṛhat raṇa
334	indraḥ tujaḥ barhaṇāḥ ā viveśa	indra tuj barhaṇā ā viś
334	nṛvat dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi	nṛ vat dhā narya puru
334	acetayat dhiyaḥ imāḥ jaritre	cetay dhī idam jaritṛ
334	pra imam varṇam atirat śukram āsām	pra idam varṇa tṛ śukra idam
334	mahaḥ mahāni panayanti asya	mah maha panay idam
334	indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi	indra karman su kṛ puru
334	vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa	vṛjana vṛjina sam piṣ
334	māyābhiḥ dasyūn abhibhūtyojāḥ	māyā dasyu abhibhūti ojas
334	yudhā indraḥ mahnā varivaḥ cakāra	yudh indra mahan varivas kṛ
334	devebhyaḥ satpatiḥ carṣaṇiprāḥ	deva satpati carṣaṇi prā
334	vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni	vivasvant sadana idam tad
334	viprāḥ ukthebhiḥ kavayaḥ gṛṇanti	vipra uktha kavi gṛ
334	satrāsāham vareṇyam sahodām	satrāsāh vareṇya sahas dā
334	sasavāṁsam svar apaḥ ca devīḥ	san svar ap ca deva
334	sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīm dyām uta imām	san yad pṛthivī div uta idam
334	indram madanti anu dhīraṇāsaḥ	indra mad anu dhīraṇa
334	sasāna atyān uta sūryam sasāna	san atya uta sūrya san
334	indraḥ sasāna purubhojasam gām	indra san purubhojas go
334	hiraṇyayam uta bhogam sasāna	hiraṇyaya uta bhoga san
334	hatvī dasyūn pra āryam varṇam āvat	han dasyu pra ārya varṇa av
334	indraḥ oṣadhīḥ asanot ahāni	indra oṣadhi san ahar
334	vanaspatīn asanot antarikṣam	vanaspati san antarikṣa
334	bibheda valam nunude vivācaḥ	bhid vala nud vivāc
334	atha abhavat damitā abhikratūnām	atha bhū dam abhikratu
334	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
334	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
334	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
334	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
335	tiṣThā harī rathe ā yujyamānā	sthā hari ratha ā yuj
335	yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ accha	yā vāyu na niyut mad acchā
335	pibāsi andhaḥ abhisṛṣTaḥ asme	pā andhas abhisṛj mad
335	indra svāhā rarimā te madāya	indra svāhā rā tvad mada
335	upa ajirā puruhūtāya saptī	upa ajira puruhūta sapti
335	harī rathasya dhūrṣu ā yunajmi	hari ratha dhur ā yuj
335	dravat yathā sambhṛtam viśvataḥ cit	dru yathā sambhṛta viśvatas cit
335	upa imam yajñam ā vahātaḥ indram	upa idam yajña ā vah indra
335	upa u nayasva vṛṣaṇā tapuṣpā	upa u nī vṛṣan tapuṣpā
335	uta īm ava tvam vṛṣabha svadhāvaḥ	uta īṃ av tvad vṛṣabha svadhāvat
335	grasetām aśvā vi muca iha śoṇā	gras aśva vi muc iha śoṇa
335	divedive sadṛśīḥ addhi dhānāḥ	diva diva sadṛśa ad dhānā
335	brahmaṇā te brahmayujā yunajmi	brahman tvad brahman yuj yuj
335	harī sakhāyā sadhamāde āśū	hari sakhi sadhamāda āśu
335	sthiram ratham sukham indra adhitiṣThan	sthira ratha sukha indra adhiṣṭhā
335	prajānan vidvān upa yāhi somam	prajñā vid upa yā soma
335	mā te harī vṛṣaṇā vītapṛṣThā	mā tvad hari vṛṣaṇa vīta pṛṣṭha
335	ni rīraman yajamānāsaḥ anye	ni ram yaj anya
335	atyāyāhi śaśvataḥ vayam te	ati āyā śaśvat mad tvad
335	aram sutebhiḥ kṛṇavāma somaiḥ	aram su kṛ soma
335	tava ayam somaḥ tvam ā ihi arvāṅ	tvad idam soma tvad e arvāñc
335	śaśvattamam sumanāḥ asya pāhi	śaśvattama sumanas idam pā
335	asmin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadyā	idam yajña barhis ā niṣad
335	dadhiṣva imam jaThare indum indra	dhā idam jaṭhara indu indra
335	stīrṇam te barhiḥ sutaḥ indra somaḥ	stṛ tvad barhis su indra soma
335	kṛtāḥ dhānāḥ attave te haribhyām	kṛ dhānā ad tvad hari
335	tadokase puruśākāya vṛṣṇe	tad oka puru śāka vṛṣan
335	marutvate tubhyam rātā havīṁṣi	marutvant tvad rā havis
335	imam naraḥ parvatāḥ tubhyam āpaḥ	idam nṛ parvata tvad ap
335	sam indra gobhiḥ madhumantam akran	sam indra go madhumat kṛ
335	tasya āgatyā sumanāḥ ṛṣva pāhi	tad āgam sumanas ṛṣva pā
335	prajānan vidvān pathyāḥ anu svāḥ	prajñā vid pathyā anu sva
335	yān ā abhajaḥ marutaḥ indra some	yad ābhaj marut indra soma
335	ye tvām avardhan abhavan gaṇaḥ te	yad tvad vṛdh bhū gaṇa tvad
335	tebhiḥ etam sajoṣāḥ vāvaśānaḥ	tad etad sajoṣas vaś
335	agneḥ piba jihvayā somam indra	agni pā jihvā soma indra
335	indra piba svadhayā cit sutasya	indra pā svadhā cit suta
335	agneḥ vā pāhi jihvayā yajatra	agni vā pā jihvā yajatra
335	adhvaryoḥ vā prayatam śakra hastāt	adhvaryu vā pre śakra hasta
335	hotuḥ vā yajñam haviṣaḥ juṣasva	hotṛ vā yajña havis juṣ
335	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
335	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
335	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
335	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
336	imām ū su prabhṛtim sātaye dhāḥ	idam u su prabhṛti sāti dhā
336	śaśvacchaśvat ūtibhiḥ yādamānaḥ	śaśvat śaśvat ūti yād
336	sutesute vāvṛdhe vardhanebhiḥ	suta suta vṛdh vardhana
336	yaḥ karmabhiḥ mahadbhiḥ suśrutaḥ bhūt	yad karman mahat su śru bhū
336	indrāya somāḥ pradivaḥ vidānāḥ	indra soma pradiv vid
336	ṛbhuḥ yebhiḥ vṛṣaparvā vihāyāḥ	ṛbhu yad vṛṣan parvan vihāyas
336	prayamyamānān prati sū gṛbhāya	prayam prati su gṛbhāy
336	indra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ	indra pā vṛṣan dhū vṛṣan
336	pibā vardhasva tava ghā sutāsaḥ	pā vṛdh tvad gha su
336	indra somāsaḥ prathamāḥ uta ime	indra soma prathama uta idam
336	yathā apibaḥ pūrvyān indra somān	yathā pā pūrvya indra soma
336	evā pāhi panyaḥ adyā navīyān	eva pā panya adya navīyas
336	mahān amatraḥ vṛjane virapśī	mahat amatra vṛjana virapśin
336	ugram śavaḥ patyate dhṛṣṇu ojaḥ	ugra śavas pat dhṛṣṇu ojas
336	na aha vivyāca pṛthivī cana enam	na aha vyac pṛthivī cana enad
336	yat somāsaḥ haryaśvam amandan	yat soma haryaśva mad
336	mahān ugraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāya	mahat ugra vṛdh vīrya
336	samācakre vṛṣabhaḥ kāvyena	samākṛ vṛṣabha kāvya
336	indraḥ bhagaḥ vājadāḥ asya gāvaḥ	indra bhaga vāja dā idam go
336	pra jāyante dakṣiṇāḥ asya pūrvīḥ	pra jan dakṣiṇā idam puru
336	pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavam yathā āyan	pra yat sindhu prasava yathā i
336	āpaḥ samudram rathyā iva jagmuḥ	ap samudra rathyā iva gam
336	ataḥ cit indraḥ sadasaḥ varīyān	atas cit indra sadas varīyas
336	yat īm somaḥ pṛṇati dugdhaḥ aṁśuḥ	yat īṃ soma pṛṇ duh aṃśu
336	samudreṇa sindhavaḥ yādamānāḥ	samudra sindhu yād
336	indrāya somam suṣutam bharantaḥ	indra soma suṣuta bhṛ
336	aṁśum duhanti hastinaḥ bharitraiḥ	aṃśu duh hastin bharitra
336	madhvaḥ punanti dhārayā pavitraiḥ	madhu pū dhārā pavitra
336	hradāḥ iva kukṣayaḥ somadhānāḥ	hrada iva kukṣi soma dhāna
336	sam ī vivyāca savanā purūṇi	sam ī vyac savana puru
336	annā yat indraḥ prathamā vi āśa	anna yat indra prathama vi aś
336	vṛtram jaghanvān avṛṇīta somam	vṛtra han vṛ soma
336	ā tū bhara mākiḥ etat pari sthāt	ā tu bhṛ mākir etad pari sthā
336	vidmā hi tvā vasupatim vasūnām	vid hi tvad vasu pati vasu
336	indra yat te māhinam datram asti	indra yad tvad māhina dattra as
336	asmabhyam tat haryaśva pra yandhi	mad tad haryaśva pra yam
336	asme pra yandhi maghavan ṛjīṣin	mad pra yam maghavan ṛjīṣin
336	indra rāyaḥ viśvavārasya bhūreḥ	indra rai viśva vāra bhūri
336	asme śatam śaradaḥ jīvase dhāḥ	mad śata śarad jīv dhā
336	asme vīrān śaśvataḥ indra śiprin	mad vīra śaśvat indra śiprin
336	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
336	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
336	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
336	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
337	vārtrahatyāya śavase	vārtrahatya śavas
337	pṛtanāṣāhyāya ca	pṛtanāṣāhya ca
337	indra tvā ā vartayāmasi	indra tvad vartay
337	arvācīnam su te manaḥ	arvācīna su tvad manas
337	uta cakṣuḥ śatakrato	uta cakṣus śatakratu
337	indra kṛṇvantu vāghataḥ	indra kṛ vāghant
337	nāmāni te śatakrato	nāman tvad śatakratu
337	viśvābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ īmahe	viśva gir ī
337	indra abhimātiṣāhye	indra abhimātiṣāhya
337	puruṣTutasya dhāmabhiḥ	puruṣṭuta dhāman
337	śatena mahayāmasi	śata mahay
337	indrasya carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ	indra carṣaṇī dhṛt
337	indram vṛtrāya hantave	indra vṛtra han
337	puruhūtam upa bruve	puruhūta upa brū
337	bhareṣu vājasātaye	bhara vājasāti
337	vājeṣu sāsahiḥ bhava	vāja sāsahi bhū
337	tvām īmahe śatakrato	tvad ī śatakratu
337	indra vṛtrāya hantave	indra vṛtra han
337	dyumneṣu pṛtanājye	dyumna pṛtanājya
337	pṛtsutūrṣu śravassu ca	pṛtsutur śravas ca
337	indra sākṣva abhimātiṣu	indra sah abhimāti
337	śuṣmintamam naḥ ūtaye	śuṣmintama mad ūti
337	dyumninam pāhi jāgṛvim	dyumnin pā jāgṛvi
337	indra somam śatakrato	indra soma śatakratu
337	indriyāṇi śatakrato	indriya śatakratu
337	yā te janeṣu pañcasu	yad tvad jana pañcan
337	indra tāni te ā vṛṇe	indra tad tvad ā vṛ
337	agan indra śravaḥ bṛhat	gam indra śravas bṛhat
337	dyumnam dadhiṣva duṣTaram	dyumna dhā duṣṭara
337	ut te śuṣmam tirāmasi	ud tvad śuṣma tṛ
337	arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi	arvāvat mad ā gam
337	atha u śakra parāvataḥ	atho śakra parāvat
337	ulokaḥ yaḥ te adrivaḥ	u loka yad tvad adrivat
337	indra iha tataḥ ā gahi	indra iha tatas ā gam
 ---
338	abhi taṣTā iva dīdhayā manīṣām	abhi taṣṭṛ iva dhī manīṣā
338	atyaḥ na vājī sudhuraḥ jihānaḥ	atya na vājin sudhura hā
338	abhi priyāṇi marmṛśat parāṇi	abhi priya marmṛś para
338	kavīn icchāmi saṁdṛśe sumedhāḥ	kavi iṣ saṃdṛś sumedhas
338	inā uta pṛccha janimā kavīnām	ina uta pracch janiman kavi
338	manodhṛtaḥ sukṛtaḥ takṣata dyām	manodhṛt su kṛt takṣ div
338	imāḥ u te praṇyaḥ vardhamānāḥ	idam u tvad praṇī vṛdh
338	manovātāḥ adha nu dharmaṇi gman	manas van adha nu dharman gam
338	ni sīm it atra guhyā dadhānāḥ	ni sīm id atra guhya dhā
338	uta kṣatrāya rodasī sam añjan	uta kṣatra rodas sam añj
338	sam mātrābhiḥ mamire yemuḥ urvī	sam mātrā mā yam urvī
338	antar mahī samṛte dhāyase dhuḥ	antar mahī samṛch dhāyas dhā
338	ātiṣThantam pari viśve abhūṣan	āsthā pari viśva bhūṣ
338	śriyaḥ vasānaḥ carati svarociḥ	śrī vas car sva rocis
338	mahat tat vṛṣṇaḥ asurasya nāma	mahat tad vṛṣan asura nāman
338	ā viśvarūpaḥ amṛtāni tasthau	viśva rūpa amṛta sthā
338	asūta pūrvaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jyāyān	sū pūrva vṛṣabha jyāyas
338	imāḥ asya śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ	idam idam śurudh as puru
338	divaḥ napātā vidathasya dhībhiḥ	div napāt vidatha dhī
338	kṣatram rājānā pradivaḥ dadhāthe	kṣatra rājan pradiv dhā
338	trīṇi rājānā vidathe purūṇi	tri rājan vidatha puru
338	pari viśvāni bhūṣathaḥ sadāṁsi	pari viśva bhūṣ sadas
338	apaśyam atra manasā jaganvān	paś atra manas gam
338	vrate gandharvān api vāyukeśān	vrata gandharva api vāyu keśa
338	tat it nu asya vṛṣabhasya dhenoḥ	tad id nu idam vṛṣabha dhenu
338	ā nāmabhiḥ mamire sakmyam goḥ	ā nāman mā sakmya go
338	anyadanyat asuryam vasānāḥ	anya anya asurya vas
338	ni māyinaḥ mamire rūpam asmin	ni māyin mā rūpa idam
338	tat it nu asya savituḥ nakiḥ me	tad id nu idam savitṛ nakir mad
338	hiraṇyayīm amatim yām aśiśret	hiraṇyaya amati yad śri
338	ā suṣTutī rodasī viśvaminve	ā suṣṭuti rodas viśvaminva
338	api iva yoṣā janimāni vavre	api iva yoṣā janiman vṛ
338	yuvam pratnasya sādhathaḥ mahaḥ yat	tvad pratna sādh mah yad
338	daivī svastiḥ pari naḥ syātam	daiva svasti pari mad as
338	gopājihvasya tasthuṣaḥ virūpā	gopā jihvā sthā virūpa
338	viśve paśyanti māyinaḥ kṛtāni	viśva paś māyin kṛta
338	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
338	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
338	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
338	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
339	indram matiḥ hṛdaḥ ā vacyamānā	indra mati hṛd ā vañc
339	acchā patim stomataṣTā jigāti	acchā pati stoma takṣ gā
339	yā jāgṛviḥ vidathe śasyamānā	yad jāgṛvi vidatha śaṃs
339	indra yat te jāyate viddhi tasya	indra yad tvad jan vid tad
339	divaḥ cit ā pūrvyā jāyamānā	div cit ā pūrvya jan
339	vi jāgṛviḥ vidathe śasyamānā	vi jāgṛvi vidatha śaṃs
339	bhadrā vastrāṇi arjunā vasānā	bhadra vastra arjuna vas
339	sā iyam asme sanajā pitryā dhīḥ	tad idam mad sana jā pitrya dhī
339	yamā cit atra yamasūḥ asūta	yama cit atra yama sū sū
339	jihvāyāḥ agram patat ā hi asthāt	jihvā agra pat as hi sthā
339	vapūṁṣi jātā mithunā sacete	vapus jan mithuna sac
339	tamohanā tapuṣaḥ budhne etā	tamas han tapus budhna e
339	nakiḥ eṣām ninditā martyeṣu	nakir idam nind martya
339	ye asmākam pitaraḥ goṣu yodhāḥ	yad mad pitṛ go yodha
339	indraḥ eṣām dṛṁhitā māhināvān	indra idam dṛṃhitṛ māhināvat
339	ut gotrāṇi sasṛje daṁsanāvān	ud gotra sṛj daṃsanāvat
339	sakhā ha yatra sakhibhiḥ navagvaiḥ	sakhi ha yatra sakhi navagva
339	abhijñu ā satvabhiḥ gāḥ anugman	abhijñu ā satvan go anugam
339	satyam tat indraḥ daśabhiḥ daśagvaiḥ	satya tad indra daśan daśagva
339	sūryam viveda tamasi kṣiyantam	sūrya vid tamas kṣi
339	indraḥ madhu sambhṛtam usriyāyām	indra madhu sambhṛ usriyā
339	padvat viveda śaphavat name goḥ	padvat vid śaphavat nama go
339	guhā hitam guhyam gūLham apsu	guhā dhā guh guh ap
339	haste dadhe dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāvān	hasta dhā dakṣiṇa dakṣiṇāvat
339	jyotiḥ vṛṇīta tamasaḥ vijānan	jyotis vṛ tamas vijñā
339	āre syāma duritāt abhīke	āre as durita abhīka
339	imāḥ giraḥ somapāḥ somavṛddha	idam gir soma pā soma vṛdh
339	juṣasva indra purutamasya kāroḥ	juṣ indra purutama kāru
339	jyotiḥ yajñāya rodasī anu syāt	jyotis yajña rodas anu as
339	āre syāma duritasya bhūreḥ	āre as durita bhūri
339	bhūri cit hi tujataḥ martyasya	bhūri cit hi tuj martya
339	supārāsaḥ vasavaḥ barhaṇāvat	su pāra vasu barhaṇāvat
339	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
339	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
339	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
339	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
340	indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam	indra tvad vṛṣabha mad
340	sute some havāmahe	su soma hvā
340	sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ	tad pā madhu andhas
340	indra kratuvidam sutam	indra kratu vid su
340	somam harya puruṣTuta	soma hary puruṣṭuta
340	piba ā vṛṣasva tātṛpim	pā vṛṣ tātṛpi
340	indra pra naḥ dhitāvānam	indra pra mad dhitāvan
340	yajñam viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ	yajña viśva deva
340	tira stavāna viśpate	tṛ stu viśpati
340	indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime	indra soma su idam
340	tava pra yanti satpate	tvad pra i satpati
340	kṣayam candrāsaḥ indavaḥ	kṣaya candra indu
340	dadhiṣvā jaThare sutam	dhā ā jaṭhara su
340	somam indra vareṇyam	soma indra vareṇya
340	tava dyukṣāsaḥ indavaḥ	tvad dyukṣa indu
340	girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam	girvaṇas pā mad suta
340	madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ajyase	madhu dhārā añj
340	indra tvādātam it yaśaḥ	indra tvādāta id yaśas
340	abhi dyumnāni vaninaḥ	abhi dyumna vanin
340	indram sacante akṣitā	indra sac akṣita
340	pītvī somasya vāvṛdhe	pā soma vṛdh
340	arvāvataḥ naḥ ā gahi	arvāvat mad ā gam
340	parāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan	parāvat ca vṛtrahan
340	imāḥ juṣasva naḥ giraḥ	idam juṣ mad gir
340	yat antarā parāvatam	yat antarā parāvat
340	arvāvatam ca hūyase	arvāvat ca hvā
340	indra iha tataḥ ā gahi	indra iha tatas ā gam
 ---
341	ā tū naḥ indra madryak	ā tu mad indra madryañc
341	huvānaḥ somapītaye	hvā soma pīti
341	haribhyām yāhi adrivaḥ	hari yā adrivat
341	sattaḥ hotā naḥ ṛtviyaḥ	sad hotṛ mad ṛtviya
341	tistire barhiḥ ānuṣak	stṛ barhis ānuṣak
341	ayujran prātar adrayaḥ	yuj prātar adri
341	imā brahma brahmavāhaḥ	idam brahman brahman vāhas
341	kriyante ā barhiḥ sīda	kṛ ā barhis sad
341	vīhi śūra puroLāśam	vī śūra puroḍāś
341	rārandhi savaneṣu naḥ	ran savana mad
341	eṣu stomeṣu vṛtrahan	idam stoma vṛtrahan
341	uktheṣu indra girvaṇaḥ	uktha indra girvaṇas
341	matayaḥ somapām urum	mati soma pā uru
341	rihanti śavasaḥ patim	rih śavas pati
341	indram vatsam na mātaraḥ	indra vatsa na mātṛ
341	sa mandasvā hi andhasaḥ	tad mand hi andhas
341	rādhase tanvā mahe	rādhas tanū mah
341	na stotāram nide karaḥ	na stotṛ nid kṛ
341	vayam indra tvāyavaḥ	mad indra tvāyu
341	haviṣmantaḥ jarāmahe	haviṣmat jṛ
341	uta tvam asmayuḥ vaso	uta tvad asmayu vasu
341	mā āre asmat vi mumucaḥ	mā āre mad vi muc
341	haripriya arvāṅ yāhi	hari priya arvāñc yā
341	indra svadhāvaḥ matsva iha	indra svadhāvat mad iha
341	arvāñcam tvā sukhe rathe	arvāñc tvad sukha ratha
341	vahatām indra keśinā	vah indra keśin
341	ghṛtasnū barhiḥ āsade	ghṛta snu barhis āsad
 ---
342	upa naḥ sutam ā gahi	upa mad su ā gam
342	somam indra gavāśiram	soma indra gavāśir
342	haribhyām yaḥ te asmayuḥ	hari yad tvad asmayu
342	tam indra madam ā gahi	tad indra mada ā gam
342	barhiṣThām grāvabhiḥ sutam	gam grāvan su
342	kuvit nu asya tṛpṇavaḥ	kuvid nu idam tṛp
342	indram itthā giraḥ mama	indra itthā gir mad
342	accha aguḥ iṣitāḥ itaḥ	acchā gā iṣay itas
342	āvṛte somapītaye	āvṛt soma pīti
342	indram somasya pītaye	indra soma pīti
342	stomaiḥ iha havāmahe	stoma iha hvā
342	ukthebhiḥ kuvit āgamat	uktha kuvid āgam
342	indra somāḥ sutāḥ ime	indra soma su idam
342	tān dadhiṣva śatakrato	tad dhā śatakratu
342	jaThare vājinīvaso	jaṭhara vājinīvasu
342	vidmā hi tvā dhanaṁjayam	vid hi tvad dhanaṃjaya
342	vājeṣu dadhṛṣam kave	vāja dadhṛṣ kavi
342	adhā te sumnam īmahe	adha tvad sumna ī
342	imam indra gavāśiram	idam indra gavāśir
342	yavāśiram ca naḥ piba	yava āśir ca mad pā
342	āgatyā vṛṣabhiḥ sutam	āgam vṛṣan suta
342	tubhya it indra sve okye	tvad id indra sva okya
342	somam codāmi pītaye	soma cud pā
342	eṣa rārantu te hṛdi	etad ran tvad hṛd
342	tvām sutasya pītaye	tvad suta pīti
342	pratnam indra havāmahe	pratna indra hvā
342	kuśikāsaḥ avasyavaḥ	kuśika avasyu
 ---
343	ā yāhi arvāṅ upa vandhureṣThāḥ	ā yā arvāñc upa vandhureṣṭhā
343	tava it anu pradivaḥ somapeyam	tvad id anu pradiv soma peya
343	priyā sakhāyā vi muca upa barhiḥ	priya sakhi vi muc upa barhis
343	tvām ime havyavāhaḥ havante	tvad idam havya vāh hvā
343	ā yāhi pūrvīḥ ati carṣaṇīḥ ā	ā yā puru ati carṣaṇi
343	aryaḥ āśiṣaḥ upa naḥ haribhyām	ari āśis upa mad hari
343	imāḥ hi tvā matayaḥ stomataṣTāḥ	idam hi tvad mati stoma takṣ
343	indra havante sakhyam juṣāṇāḥ	indra hvā sakhya juṣ
343	ā naḥ yajñam namovṛdham sajoṣāḥ	ā mad yajña namas vṛdh sajoṣas
343	indra deva haribhiḥ yāhi tūyam	indra deva hari yā tūya
343	aham hi tvā matibhiḥ johavīmi	mad hi tvad mati johav
343	ghṛtaprayāḥ sadhamāde madhūnām	ghṛta prayas sadhamāda madhu
343	ā ca tvām etā vṛṣaṇā vahātaḥ	ā ca tvad etad vṛṣan vah
343	harī sakhāyā sudhurā svaṅgā	hari sakhi su dhur su aṅga
343	dhānāvat indraḥ savanam juṣāṇaḥ	dhānāvat indra savana juṣ
343	sakhā sakhyuḥ śṛṇavat vandanāni	sakhi sakhi śru vandana
343	kuvit mā gopām karase janasya	kuvid mad gopā kṛ jana
343	kuvit rājānam maghavan ṛjīṣin	kuvid rājan maghavan ṛjīṣin
343	kuvit mā ṛṣim papivāṁsam sutasya	kuvid mad ṛṣi pā suta
343	kuvit me vasvaḥ amṛtasya śikṣāḥ	kuvid mad vasu amṛta śikṣ
343	ā tvā bṛhantaḥ harayaḥ yujānāḥ	ā tvad bṛhat hari yuj
343	arvāk indra sadhamādaḥ vahantu	arvāk indra sadhamād vah
343	pra ye dvitā divaḥ ṛñjanti ātāḥ	pra yad dvitā div ṛj ātā
343	susammṛṣTāsaḥ vṛṣabhasya mūrāḥ	su sammṛj vṛṣabha mūra
343	indra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ	indra pā vṛṣan dhū vṛṣan
343	ā yam te śyenaḥ uśate jabhāra	ā yad tvad śyena vaś bhṛ
343	yasya made cyāvayasi pra kṛṣTīḥ	yad mada cyāvay pra kṛṣṭi
343	yasya made apa gotrā vavartha	yad mada apa gotra vṛ
343	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hvā maghavan indra
343	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
343	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
343	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
344	ayam te astu haryataḥ	idam tvad as haryata
344	somaḥ ā haribhiḥ sutaḥ	soma ā hari su
344	juṣāṇaḥ indra haribhiḥ naḥ ā gahi	juṣ indra hari mad ā gam
344	ā tiṣTha haritam ratham	ā sthā harit ratha
344	haryan uṣasam arcayaḥ	hary uṣas arcay
344	sūryam haryan arocayaḥ	sūrya hary rocay
344	vidvān cikitvān haryaśva vardhase	vid cit haryaśva vṛdh
344	indra viśvāḥ abhi śriyaḥ	indra viśva abhi śrī
344	dyām indraḥ haridhāyasam	div indra hari dhāyas
344	pṛthivīm harivarpasam	pṛthivī hari varpas
344	adhārayat haritoḥ bhūri bhojanam	dhāray harit bhūri bhojana
344	yayoḥ antar hariḥ carat	yad antar hari car
344	jajñānaḥ haritaḥ vṛṣā	jan harita vṛṣan
344	viśvam ā bhāti rocanam	viśva ā bhā rocana
344	haryaśvaḥ haritam dhatte āyudham	haryaśva harita dhā āyudha
344	ā vajram bāhvoḥ harim	ā vajra bāhu hari
344	indraḥ haryantam arjunam	indra hary arjuna
344	vajram śukraiḥ abhīvṛtam	vajra śukra abhivṛ
344	apa avṛṇot haribhiḥ adribhiḥ sutam	apāvṛ hari adri su
344	ut gāḥ haribhiḥ ājata	ud go hari āj
 ---
345	ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ	ā mandra indra hari
345	yāhi mayūraromabhiḥ	yā mayūra roman
345	mā tvā ke cit ni yaman vim na pāśinaḥ	mā tvad kaścit ni yam vi na pāśin
345	ati dhanva iva tān ihi	ati dhanvan iva tad i
345	vṛtrakhādaḥ valaṁrujaḥ	vṛtra khāda valaṃruja
345	purām darmaḥ apām ajaḥ	pur darma ap aja
345	sthātā rathasya haryoḥ abhisvare	sthātṛ ratha hari abhisvara
345	indraḥ dṛLhā cit ārujaḥ	indra dṛḍha cit āruja
345	gambhīrān udadhīn iva	gambhīra udadhi iva
345	kratum puṣyasi gāḥ iva	kratu puṣ go iva
345	pra sugopāḥ yavasam dhenavaḥ yathā	pra su gopā yavasa dhenu yathā
345	hradam kulyāḥ iva āśata	hrada kulyā iva aś
345	ā naḥ tujam rayim bhara	ā mad tuj rayi bhṛ
345	aṁśam na pratijānate	aṃśa na pratijñā
345	vṛkṣam pakvam phalam aṅkī iva dhūnuhi	vṛkṣa pakva phala aṅkin iva dhū
345	indra sampāraṇam vasu	indra sampāraṇa vasu
345	svayuḥ indra svarāT asi	svayu indra svarāj as
345	smaddiṣTiḥ svayaśastaraḥ	smaddiṣṭi sva yaśastara
345	sa vāvṛdhānaḥ ojasā puruṣTuta	tad vṛdh ojas puruṣṭuta
345	bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ	bhū mad su śravastama
 ---
346	yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarājaḥ	yudhma tvad vṛṣabha svarāj
346	ugrasya yūnaḥ sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ	ugra yuvan sthavira ghṛṣvi
346	ajūryataḥ vajriṇaḥ vīryāṇi	a jṛ vajrin vīrya
346	indra śrutasya mahataḥ mahāni	indra śru mahat maha
346	mahān asi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhiḥ	mahat as mahiṣa vṛṣṇya
346	dhanaspṛt ugra sahamānaḥ anyān	dhana spṛt ugra sah anya
346	ekaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā	eka viśva bhuvana rājan
346	sa yodhayā ca kṣayayā ca janān	tad yodhay ca kṣayay ca jana
346	pra mātrābhiḥ ririce rocamānaḥ	pra mātrā ric ruc
346	pra devebhiḥ viśvataḥ apratītaḥ	pra deva viśvatas apratīta
346	pra majmanā divaḥ indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ	pra majman div indra pṛthivī
346	pra uroḥ mahaḥ antarikṣāt ṛjīṣī	pra uru mah antarikṣa ṛjīṣin
346	urum gabhīram januṣā abhi ugram	uru gabhīra janus abhi ugra
346	viśvavyacasam avatam matīnām	viśva vyacas avata mati
346	indram somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ	indra soma pradiv su
346	samudram na sravataḥ ā viśanti	samudra na sravat ā viś
346	yam somam indra pṛthivīdyāvā	yad soma indra pṛthivī div
346	garbham na mātā bibhṛtaḥ tvāyā	garbha na mātṛ bhṛ tvāyā
346	tam te hinvanti tam u te mṛjanti	tad tad hi tad u tad mṛj
346	adhvaryavaḥ vṛṣabha pātavai u	adhvaryu vṛṣabha pā u
 ---
347	marutvān indra vṛṣabhaḥ raṇāya	marutvat indra vṛṣabha raṇa
347	pibā somam anuṣvadham madāya	pā soma anuṣvadham mada
347	ā siñcasva jaThare madhvaḥ ūrmim	ā sic jaṭhara madhu ūrmi
347	tvam rājā asi pradivaḥ sutānām	tvad rājan as pradiv suta
347	sajoṣāḥ indra sagaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ	sajoṣas indra sa gaṇa marut
347	somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān	soma pā vṛtrahan śūra vid
347	jahi śatrūn apa mṛdhaḥ nudasva	han śatru apa mṛdh nud
347	atha abhayam kṛṇuhi viśvataḥ naḥ	atha abhaya kṛ viśvatas mad
347	uta ṛtubhiḥ ṛtupāḥ pāhi somam	uta ṛtu ṛtu pā pā soma
347	indra devebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sutam naḥ	indra deva sakhi su mad
347	yān ā abhajaḥ marutaḥ ye tvā anu	yad ābhaj marut yad tvad anu
347	ahan vṛtram adadhuḥ tubhyam ojaḥ	han vṛtra dhā tvad ojas
347	ye tvā ahihatye maghavan avardhan	yad tvad ahi hatya maghavan vṛdh
347	ye śāmbare harivaḥ ye gaviṣTau	yad śāmbara harivat yad gaviṣṭi
347	ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ	yad tvad nūnam anumad vipra
347	piba indra somam sagaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ	pā indra soma sa gaṇa marut
347	marutvantam vṛṣabham vāvṛdhānam	marutvat vṛṣabha vṛdh
347	akavārim divyam śāsam indram	a kavāri divya śās indra
347	viśvāsāham avase nūtanāya	viśvāsah avas nūtana
347	ugram sahodām iha tam huvema	ugra sahas dā iha tad hvā
 ---
348	sadyaḥ ha jātaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kanīnaḥ	sadyas ha jan vṛṣabha kanīna
348	prabhartum āvat andhasaḥ sutasya	prabhṛ av andhas su
348	sādhoḥ piba pratikāmam yathā te	sādhu pā pratikāma yathā tvad
348	rasāśiraḥ prathamam somyasya	rasa āśir prathamam somya
348	yat jāyathāḥ tat ahar asya kāme	yad jan tad ahar idam kāma
348	aṁśoḥ pīyūṣam apibaḥ giriṣThām	aṃśu pīyūṣa pā giriṣṭhā
348	tam te mātā pari yoṣā janitrī	tad tvad mātṛ pari yoṣā janitrī
348	mahaḥ pituḥ dame ā asiñcat agre	mah pitṛ dama āsic agra
348	upasthāya mātaram annam aiTTa	upasthā mātṛ anna tigma
348	tigmam apaśyat abhi somam ūdhar	tigma paś abhi soma ūdhas
348	prayāvayan acarat gṛtsaḥ anyān	prayāvay car gṛtsa anya
348	mahāni cakre purudhapratīkaḥ	maha kṛ purudhā pratīka
348	ugraḥ turāṣāT abhibhūtyojāḥ	ugra turāṣāh abhibhūti ojas
348	yathāvaśam tanvam cakre eṣaḥ	yathāvaśam tanū kṛ etad
348	tvaṣTāram indraḥ januṣā abhibhūya	tvaṣṭṛ indra janus abhibhū
348	āmuṣyā somam apibat camūṣu	adas ā soma pā camū
348	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
348	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
348	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
348	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
349	śaṁsā mahām indram yasmin viśvāḥ	śaṃs mahat indra yad viśva
349	ā kṛṣTayaḥ somapāḥ kāmam avyan	ā kṛṣṭi soma pā kāma vye
349	yam sukratum dhiṣaṇe vibhvataṣTam	yad su kratu dhiṣaṇā vibhvan takṣ
349	ghanam vṛtrāṇām janayanta devāḥ	ghana vṛtra janay deva
349	yam nu nakiḥ pṛtanāsu svarājam	yad nu nakir pṛtanā svarāj
349	dvitā tarati nṛtamam hariṣThām	dvitā tṛ nṛtama hariṣṭhā
349	inatamaḥ satvabhiḥ yaḥ ha śūṣaiḥ	inatama satvan yad ha śūṣa
349	pṛthujrayāḥ amināt āyuḥ dasyoḥ	pṛthu jrayas mī āyus dasyu
349	sahāvā pṛtsu taraṇiḥ na arvā	sahāvan pṛt taraṇi na arvan
349	vyānaśiḥ rodasī mehanāvān	vyānaśin rodas mehanāvat
349	bhagaḥ na kāre havyaḥ matīnām	bhaga na kāra hu mati
349	pitā iva cāruḥ suhavaḥ vayodhāḥ	pitṛ iva cāru su hava vayodhas
349	dhartā divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛṣTaḥ ūrdhvaḥ	dhartṛ div rajas pracch ūrdhva
349	rathaḥ na vāyuḥ vasubhiḥ niyutvān	ratha na vāyu vasu niyutvat
349	kṣapām vastā janitā sūryasya	kṣap vas jan sūrya
349	vibhaktā bhāgam dhiṣaṇā iva vājam	vibhaj bhāga dhiṣaṇā iva vāja
349	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
349	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
349	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
349	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
350	indraḥ svāhā pibatu yasya somaḥ	indra svāhā pā yad soma
350	āgatyā tumraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān	āgam tumra vṛṣabha marutvat
350	ā uruvyacāḥ pṛṇatām ebhiḥ annaiḥ	ā uru vyacas pṛ idam anna
350	ā asya haviḥ tanvaḥ kāmam ṛdhyāḥ	ā idam havis tanū kāma ṛdh
350	ā te saparyū javase yunajmi	ā tvad saparyu javas yuj
350	yayoḥ anu pradivaḥ śruṣTim āvaḥ	yad anu pradiv śruṣṭi av
350	iha tvā dheyuḥ harayaḥ suśipra	iha tvad dhā hari su śiprā
350	pibā tu asya suṣutasya cāroḥ	pā tu idam suṣuta cāru
350	gobhiḥ mimikṣum dadhire supāram	go mimikṣu dhā su pāra
350	indram jyaiṣThyāya dhāyase gṛṇānāḥ	indra jyaiṣṭhya dhāyas gṛ
350	mandānaḥ somam papivān ṛjīṣin	mad soma pā ṛjīṣin
350	sam asmabhyam purudhā gāḥ iṣaṇya	sam mad purudhā go iṣaṇy
350	imam kāmam mandayā gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ	idam kāma manday go aśva
350	candravatā rādhasā paprathaḥ ca	candravat rādhas prath ca
350	svaryavaḥ matibhiḥ tubhyam viprāḥ	svaryu mati tvad vipra
350	indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāsaḥ akran	indra vāhas kuśika kṛ
350	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
350	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
350	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
350	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
351	carṣaṇīdhṛtam maghavānam ukthyam	carṣaṇī dhṛt maghavan ukthya
351	indram giraḥ bṛhatīḥ abhi anūṣata	indra gir bṛhatī abhi nū
351	vāvṛdhānam puruhūtam suvṛktibhiḥ	vṛdh puruhūta suvṛkti
351	amartyam jaramāṇam divedive	amartya jṛ diva diva
351	śatakratum arṇavam śākinam naram	śatakratu arṇava śākina nṛ
351	giraḥ me indram upa yanti viśvataḥ	gir mad indra upa i viśvatas
351	vājasanim pūrbhidam tūrṇim apturam	vāja sani pur bhid tūrṇi ap tura
351	dhāmasācam abhiṣācam svarvidam	dhāmasāc abhiṣāc svar vid
351	ākare vasoḥ jaritā panasyate	ākara vasu jaritṛ panasy
351	anehasaḥ stubhaḥ indraḥ duvasyati	an ehas stubh indra duvasy
351	vivasvataḥ sadane ā hi pipriye	vivasvant sadana ā hi prī
351	satrāsāham abhimātihanam stuhi	satrāsāh abhimāti han stu
351	nṛṇām u tvā nṛtamam gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ	nṛ u tvad nṛtama gir uktha
351	abhi pra vīram arcatā sabādhaḥ	abhi pra vīra arc sabādh
351	sam sahase purumāyaḥ jihīte	sam sahas puru māyā hā
351	namaḥ asya pradivaḥ ekaḥ īśe	namas idam pradiv eka īś
351	pūrvīḥ asya niṣṣidhaḥ martyeṣu	puru idam niṣṣidh martya
351	purū vasūni pṛthivī bibharti	puru vasu pṛthivī bhṛ
351	indrāya dyāvaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta āpaḥ	indra div oṣadhī uta ap
351	rayim rakṣanti jīrayaḥ vanāni	rayi rakṣ jīri vana
351	tubhyam brahmāṇi giraḥ indra tubhyam	tvad brahman gir indra tvad
351	satrā dadhire harivaḥ juṣasva	satrā dhā harivat juṣ
351	bodhi āpiḥ avasaḥ nūtanasya	bhū āpi avas nūtana
351	sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ vayaḥ dhāḥ	sakhi vasu jaritṛ vayas dhā
351	indra marutvaḥ iha pāhi somam	indra marutvat iha pā soma
351	yathā śāryāte apibaḥ sutasya	yathā śāryāta pā suta
351	tava praṇītī tava śūra śarman	tvad praṇīti tvad śūra śarman
351	ā vivāsanti kavayaḥ suyajñāḥ	ā vivās kavi su yajña
351	sa vāvaśānaḥ iha pāhi somam	tad vaś iha pā soma
351	marudbhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ sutam naḥ	marut indra sakhi su mad
351	jātam yat tvā pari devāḥ abhūṣan	jan yat tvad pari deva bhūṣ
351	mahe bharāya puruhūta viśve	mah bhara puruhūta viśva
351	aptūrye marutaḥ āpiḥ eṣaḥ	aptūrya marut āpi etad
351	amandan indram anu dātivārāḥ	mad indra anu dāti vāra
351	tebhiḥ sākam pibatu vṛtrakhādaḥ	tad sākam pā vṛtra khāda
351	sutam somam dāśuṣaḥ sve sadhasthe	su soma dāś sva sadhastha
351	idam hi anu ojasā	idam hi anu ojas
351	sutam rādhānām pate	su rādha pati
351	pibā tu asya girvaṇaḥ	pā tu idam girvaṇas
351	yaḥ te anu svadhām asat	yad tvad anu svadhā as
351	sute ni yaccha tanvam	suta ni yam tanū
351	sa tvā mamattu somyam	tad tvad mad somya
351	pra te aśnotu kukṣyoḥ	pra tvad aś kukṣi
351	pra indra brahmaṇā śiraḥ	pra indra brahman śiras
351	pra bāhū śūra rādhase	pra bāhu śūra rādhas
 ---
352	dhānāvantam karambhiṇam	dhānāvat karambhin
352	apūpavantam ukthinam	apūpavat ukthin
352	indra prātar juṣasva naḥ	indra prātar juṣ mad
352	puroLāśam pacatyam	puroḍāś pacatya
352	juṣasva indra ā gurasva ca	juṣ indra ā gur ca
352	tubhyam havyāni sisrate	tvad havya sṛ
352	puroLāśam ca naḥ ghasaḥ	puroḍāś ca mad ghas
352	joṣayāse giraḥ ca naḥ	joṣay gir ca mad
352	vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām	vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā
352	puroLāśam sanaśruta	puroḍāś sana śru
352	prātaḥsāve juṣasva naḥ	prātaḥsāva juṣ mad
352	indra kratuḥ hi te bṛhan	indra kratu hi tvad bṛhat
352	mādhyaṁdinasya savanasya dhānāḥ	mādhyaṃdina savana dhānā
352	puroLāśam indra kṛṣva iha cārum	puroḍāś indra kṛ iha cāru
352	pra yat stotā jaritā tūrṇyarthaḥ	pra yat stotṛ jaritṛ tūrṇi artha
352	vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ upa gīrbhiḥ īTTe	vṛṣāy upa gir īḍ
352	tṛtīye dhānāḥ savane puruṣTuta	tṛtīya dhānā savana puruṣṭuta
352	puroLāśam āhutam māmahasva naḥ	puroḍāś āhu mah mad
352	ṛbhumantam vājavantam tvā kave	ṛbhumat vājavat tvad kavi
352	prayasvantaḥ upa śikṣema dhītibhiḥ	prayasvat upa śikṣ dhīti
352	pūṣaṇvate te cakṛmā karambham	pūṣaṇvat tvad kṛ karambha
352	harivate haryaśvāya dhānāḥ	harivat haryaśva dhānā
352	apūpam addhi sagaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ	apūpa ad sa gaṇa marut
352	somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān	soma pā vṛtrahan śūra vid
352	prati dhānāḥ bharata tūyam asmai	prati dhānā bhṛ tūya idam
352	puroLāśam vīratamāya nṛṇām	puroḍāś vīratama nṛ
352	divedive sadṛśīḥ indra tubhyam	diva diva sadṛśa indra tvad
352	vardhantu tvā somapeyāya dhṛṣṇo	vṛdh tvad soma peya dhṛṣṇu
 ---
353	indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena	indrāparvata bṛhat ratha
353	vāmīḥ iṣaḥ ā vahatam suvīrāḥ	vāma iṣ ā vah su vīra
353	vītam havyāni adhvareṣu devā	vī havya adhvara deva
353	vardhethām gīrbhiḥ iLayā madantā	vṛdh gir iḍā mad
353	tiṣThā su kam maghavan mā parā gāḥ	sthā su kaṃ maghavan mā parā gā
353	somasya nu tvā suṣutasya yakṣi	soma nu tvad suṣuta yaj
353	pituḥ na putraḥ sicam ā rabhe te	pitṛ na putra sic ā rabh tvad
353	indra svādiṣThayā girā śacīvaḥ	indra svādiṣṭha gir śacīvat
353	śaṁsāva adhvaryo prati me gṛṇīhi	śaṃs adhvaryu prati mad gṛ
353	indrāya vāhaḥ kṛṇavāva juṣTam	indra vāhas kṛ juṣ
353	ā idam barhiḥ yajamānasya sīda	ā idam barhis yaj sad
353	athā ca bhūt uktham indrāya śastam	atha ca bhū uktha indra śaṃs
353	jāyā it astam maghavan sā it u yoniḥ	jāyā id asta maghavan tad id u yoni
353	tat it tvā yuktāḥ harayaḥ vahantu	tad id tvad yuj hari vah
353	yadā kadā ca sunavāma somam	yadā kadā ca su soma
353	agniḥ tvā dūtaḥ dhanvāti accha	agni tvad dūta dhanv acchā
353	parā yāhi maghavan ā ca yāhi	parā yā maghavan ā ca yā
353	indra bhrātar ubhayatrā te artham	indra bhrātṛ ubhayatra tvad artha
353	yatrā rathasya bṛhataḥ nidhānam	yatra ratha bṛhat nidhāna
353	vimocanam vājinaḥ rāsabhasya	vimocana vājin rāsabha
353	apāḥ somam astam indra pra yāhi	pā soma asta indra pra yā
353	kalyāṇīḥ jāyā suraṇam gṛhe te	kalyāṇa jāyā suraṇa gṛha tvad
353	yatrā rathasya bṛhataḥ nidhānam	yatra ratha bṛhant nidhāna
353	vimocanam vājinaḥ dakṣiṇāvat	vimocana vājin dakṣiṇāvat
353	ime bhojāḥ aṅgirasaḥ virūpāḥ	idam bhoja aṅgiras virūpa
353	divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ	div putra asura vīra
353	viśvāmitrāya dadataḥ maghāni	viśvāmitra dā magha
353	sahasrasāve pra tirante āyuḥ	sahasra sāva pra tṛ āyus
353	rūpaṁrūpam maghavā bobhavīti	rūpa rūpa maghavan bobhav
353	māyāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ tanvam pari svām	māyā kṛ tanū pari sva
353	triḥ yat divaḥ pari muhūrtam ā agāt	tris yat div pari muhūrta āgā
353	svaiḥ mantraiḥ anṛtupāḥ ṛtāvā	sva mantra anṛtu pā ṛtāvan
353	mahān ṛṣiḥ devajāḥ devajūtaḥ	mahat ṛṣi deva jā deva jū
353	astabhnāt sindhum arṇavam nṛcakṣāḥ	stambh sindhu arṇava nṛ cakṣas
353	viśvāmitraḥ yat avahat sudāsam	viśvāmitra yat vah sudās
353	apriyāyata kuśikebhiḥ indraḥ	priyāy kuśika indra
353	haṁsāḥ iva kṛṇutha ślokam adribhiḥ	haṃsa iva kṛ śloka adri
353	madantaḥ gīrbhiḥ adhvare sute sacā	mad gir adhvara su sacā
353	devebhiḥ viprāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nṛcakṣasaḥ	deva vipra ṛṣi nṛ cakṣas
353	vi pibadhvam kuśikāḥ somyam madhu	vi pā kuśika somya madhu
353	upa pra ita kuśikāḥ cetayadhvam	upa pre kuśika cetay
353	aśvam rāye pra muñcatā sudāsaḥ	aśva rai pra muc sudās
353	rājā vṛtram jaṅghanat prāk apāk udak	rājan vṛtra jaṅghan prāñc apāñc udañc
353	athā yajāte vare ā pṛthivyāḥ	atha yaj vara ā pṛthivī
353	yaḥ ime rodasī ubhe	yad idam rodas ubh
353	aham indram atuṣTavam	mad indra stu
353	viśvāmitrasya rakṣati	viśvāmitra rakṣ
353	brahma idam bhāratam janam	brahman idam bhārata jana
353	viśvāmitrāḥ arāsata	viśvāmitra rā
353	brahma indrāya vajriṇe	brahman indra vajrin
353	karat it naḥ surādhasaḥ	kṛ id mad su rādhas
353	kim te kṛṇvanti kīkaTeṣu gāvaḥ	ka tvad kṛ kīkaṭa go
353	na āśiram duhre na tapanti gharmam	na āśir duh na tap gharma
353	ā naḥ bhara pramagandasya vedaḥ	ā mad bhṛ pramaganda vedas
353	naicāśākham maghavan randhayā naḥ	naicāśākha maghavan randhay mad
353	sasarparīḥ amatim bādhamānā	sasarparī amati bādh
353	bṛhat mimāya jamadagnidattā	bṛhat mā jamadagni dā
353	ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna	ā sūrya duhitṛ tan
353	śravaḥ deveṣu amṛtam ajuryam	śravas deva amṛta ajurya
