353	sasarparīḥ abharat tūyam ebhyaḥ	sasarparī bhṛ tūya idam
353	adhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣTiṣu	adhi śravas pāñcajanya kṛṣṭi
353	sā pakṣyā navyam āyuḥ dadhānā	tad pakṣya navya āyus dhā
353	yām me palastijamadagnayaḥ daduḥ	yad mad palasti jamadagni dā
353	sthirau gāvau bhavatām vīLuḥ akṣaḥ	sthira go bhū vīḍu akṣa
353	mā īṣā vi varhi mā yugam vi śāri	mā īṣā vi vṛh mā yuga vi śṛ
353	indraḥ pātalye dadatām śarītoḥ	indra pātalya dā śṛ
353	ariṣTaneme abhi naḥ sacasva	ariṣṭa nemi abhi mad sac
353	balam dhehi tanūṣu naḥ	bala dhā tanū mad
353	balam indra anaLutsu naḥ	bala indra anaḍuh mad
353	balam tokāya tanayāya jīvase	bala toka tanaya jīv
353	tvam hi baladāḥ asi	tvad hi bala dā as
353	abhi vyayasva khadirasya sāram	abhi vye khadira sāra
353	ojaḥ dhehi spandane śiṁśapāyām	ojas dhā spandana śiṃśapā
353	akṣa vīLo vīLita vīLayasva	akṣa vīḍu vīḍay vīḍay
353	mā yāmāt asmāt ava jīhipaḥ naḥ	mā yāma idam ava hāpay mad
353	ayam asmān vanaspatiḥ	idam mad vanaspati
353	mā ca hāḥ mā ca rīriṣat	mā ca hā mā ca riṣ
353	svasti ā gṛhebhyaḥ ā	svasti ā gṛha
353	avasai ā vimocanāt	āvas ā vimocana
353	indra ūtibhiḥ bahulābhiḥ naḥ adya	indra ūti bahula mad adya
353	yācchreṣThābhiḥ maghavan śūra jinva	yācchreṣṭha maghavan śūra jinv
353	yaḥ naḥ dveṣTi adharaḥ saḥ padīṣTa	yad mad dviṣ adhara tad pad
353	yam u dviṣmaḥ tam u prāṇaḥ jahātu	yad u dviṣ tad u prāṇa hā
353	paraśum cit vi tapati	paraśu cit vi tap
353	śimbalam cit vi vṛścati	śimbala cit vi vraśc
353	ukhā cit indra yeṣantī	ukhā cit indra yeṣ
353	prayastā phenam asyati	prayasta phena as
353	na sāyakasya cikite janāsaḥ	na sāyaka cit jana
353	lodham nayanti paśu manyamānāḥ	lodha nī paśu man
353	na avājinam vājinā hāsayanti	na a vājin vājin hāsay
353	na gardabham puraḥ aśvāt nayanti	na gardabha puras aśva nī
353	ime indra bharatasya putrāḥ	idam indra bharata putra
353	apapitvam cikituḥ na prapitvam	apapitva cit na prapitva
353	hinvanti aśvam araṇam na nityam	hi aśva araṇa na nitya
353	jyāvājam pari nayanti ājau	jyā vāja pari nī āji
 ---
354	imam mahe vidathyāya śūṣam	idam mah vidathya śūṣa
354	śaśvat kṛtvaḥ īḍyāya pra jabhruḥ	śaśvat kṛtvas īḍ pra bhṛ
354	śṛṇotu naḥ damyebhiḥ anīkaiḥ	śru mad damya anīka
354	śṛṇotu agniḥ divyaiḥ ajasraḥ	śru agni divya ajasra
354	mahi mahe dive arcā pṛthivyai	mahi mah div arc pṛthivī
354	kāmaḥ me icchan carati prajānan	kāma mad iṣ car prajñā
354	yayoḥ ha stome vidatheṣu devāḥ	yad ha stoma vidatha deva
354	saparyavaḥ mādayante sacā ayoḥ	saparyu māday sacā idam
354	yuvoḥ ṛtam rodasī satyam astu	tvad ṛta rodas satya as
354	mahe su naḥ suvitāya pra bhūtam	mah su mad suvita pra bhū
354	idam dive namaḥ agne pṛthivyai	idam div namas agni pṛthivī
354	saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam	sapary prayas yā ratna
354	uta u hi vām pūrvyāḥ āvividre	uta u hi tvad pūrvya āvid
354	ṛtāvarī rodasī satyavācaḥ	ṛtāvan rodas satyavāc
354	naraḥ cit vām samithe śūrasātau	nṛ cit tvad samitha śūrasāti
354	vavandire pṛthivi vevidānāḥ	vand pṛthivī vevid
354	kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat	ka addhā vid ka iha pra vac
354	devān acchā pathyā kā sam eti	deva acchā pathyā ka sam i
354	dadṛśre eṣām avamā sadāṁsi	dṛś idam avama sadas
354	pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu	para yad guhya vrata
354	kaviḥ nṛcakṣāḥ abhi sīm acaṣTa	kavi nṛ cakṣas abhi sīm cakṣ
354	ṛtasya yonā vighṛte madantī	ṛta yoni vighṛta mad
354	nānā cakrāte sadanam yathā veḥ	nānā kṛ sadana yathā vi
354	samānena kratunā saṁvidāne	samāna kratu saṃvid
354	samānyā viyute dūreante	samānyā viyu dūreanta
354	dhruve pade tasthatuḥ jāgarūke	dhruva pada sthā jāgarūka
354	uta svasārā yuvatī bhavantī	uta svasṛ yuvatī bhavantī
354	āt u bruvāte mithunāni nāma	āt u brū mithuna nāman
354	viśvā it ete janimā sam viviktaḥ	viśva id etad janiman sam vyac
354	mahaḥ devān bibhratī na vyathete	mah deva bhṛ na vyath
354	ejat dhruvam patyate viśvam ekam	ej dhruva pat viśva eka
354	carat patatri viṣuṇam vi jātam	car patatrin viṣuṇa vi jan
354	sanā purāṇam adhi emi ārāt	sanā purāṇa adhi i ārāt
354	mahaḥ pituḥ janituḥ jāmi tat naḥ	mah pitṛ janitṛ jāmi tad mad
354	devāsaḥ yatra panitāraḥ evaiḥ	deva yatra panitṛ eva
354	urau pathi vyute tasthuḥ antar	uru pathin vyuta sthā antar
354	imam stomam rodasī pra bravīmi	idam stoma rodas pra brū
354	ṛdūdarāḥ śṛṇavan agnijihvāḥ	ṛdūdara śru agni jihvā
354	mitraḥ samrājaḥ varuṇaḥ yuvānaḥ	mitra samrāj varuṇa yuvan
354	ādityāsaḥ kavayaḥ paprathānāḥ	āditya kavi prath
354	hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā sujihvaḥ	hiraṇya pāṇi savitṛ su jihvā
354	triḥ ā divaḥ vidathe patyamānaḥ	tris ā div vidatha paty
354	deveṣu ca savitar ślokam aśreḥ	deva ca savitṛ śloka śri
354	āt asmabhyam ā suva sarvatātim	āt mad ā sū sarvatāti
354	sukṛt supāṇiḥ svavān ṛtāvā	su kṛt su pāṇi svavat ṛtāvan
354	devaḥ tvaṣTā avase tāni naḥ dhāt	deva tvaṣṭṛ avas tad mad dhā
354	pūṣaṇvantaḥ ṛbhavaḥ mādayadhvam	pūṣaṇvat ṛbhu māday
354	ūrdhvagrāvāṇaḥ adhvaram ataṣTa	ūrdhva grāvan adhvara takṣ
354	vidyudrathāḥ marutaḥ ṛṣTimantaḥ	vidyut ratha marut ṛṣṭimat
354	divaḥ maryāḥ ṛtajātāḥ ayāsaḥ	div marya ṛta jan ayās
354	sarasvatī śṛṇavan yajñiyāsaḥ	sarasvatī śru yajñiya
354	dhātā rayim sahavīram turāsaḥ	dhā rayi saha vīra tura
354	viṣṇum stomāsaḥ purudasmam arkāḥ	viṣṇu stoma puru dasma arka
354	bhagasya iva kāriṇaḥ yāmani gman	bhaga iva kārin yāman gam
354	urukramaḥ kakuhaḥ yasya pūrvīḥ	uru krama kakuha yad puru
354	na mardhanti yuvatayaḥ janitrīḥ	na mṛdh yuvati janitrī
354	indraḥ viśvaiḥ vīryaīḥ patyamānaḥ	indra viśva vīrya paty
354	ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā	ubh ā prā rodas mahitva
354	puraṁdaraḥ vṛtrahā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ	puraṃdara vṛtrahan dhṛṣṇuṣeṇa
354	saṁgṛbhyā naḥ ā bharā bhūri paśvaḥ	saṃgrah mad ā bhṛ bhūri paśu
354	nāsatyā me pitarā bandhupṛcchā	nāsatya mad pitṛ bandhu pṛcchā
354	sajātyam aśvinoḥ cāru nāma	sajātya aśvin cāru nāman
354	yuvam hi sthaḥ rayidau naḥ rayīṇām	tvad hi as rayi dā mad rayi
354	dātram rakṣethe akavaiḥ adabdhā	dātra rakṣ akava adabdha
354	mahat tat vaḥ kavayaḥ cāru nāma	mahat tad tvad kavi cāru nāman
354	yat ha devāḥ bhavatha viśve indre	yat ha deva bhū viśva indra
354	sakhā ṛbhubhiḥ puruhūta priyebhiḥ	sakha ṛbhu puruhūta priya
354	imām dhiyam sātaye takṣatā naḥ	idam dhī sāti takṣ mad
354	aryamā naḥ aditiḥ yajñiyāsaḥ	aryaman mad aditi yajñiya
354	adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni	a dabh varuṇa vrata
354	yuyota naḥ anapatyāni gantoḥ	yu mad anapatya gam
354	prajāvān naḥ paśumān astu gātuḥ	prajāvat mad paśumat as gātu
354	devānām dūtaḥ purudha prasūtaḥ	deva dūta purudhā prasū
354	anāgān naḥ vocatu sarvatātā	anāga mad vac sarvatāti
354	śṛṇotu naḥ pṛthivī dyauḥ uta āpaḥ	śru mad pṛthivī div uta ap
354	sūryaḥ nakṣatraiḥ uru antarikṣam	sūrya nakṣatra uru antarikṣa
354	śṛṇvantu naḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ parvatāsaḥ	śru mad vṛṣan parvata
354	dhruvakṣemāsaḥ iLayā madantaḥ	dhruva kṣema iḍā mad
354	ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śṛṇotu	āditya mad aditi śru
354	yacchantu naḥ marutaḥ śarma bhadram	yam mad marut śarman bhadra
354	sadā sugaḥ pitumān astu panthāḥ	sadā su ga pitumat as pathin
354	madhvā devāḥ oṣadhīḥ sam pipṛkta	madhu deva oṣadhī sam pṛc
354	bhagaḥ me agne sakhye na mṛdhyāḥ	bhaga mad agni sakhya na mṛdh
354	ut rāyaḥ aśyām sadanam purukṣoḥ	ud rai aś sadana purukṣu
354	svadasva havyā sam iṣaḥ didīhi	svad havya sam iṣ dīdī
354	asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṁsi	asmadryañc sam mā śravas
354	viśvān agne pṛtsu tān jeṣi śatrūn	viśva agni pṛt tad ji śatru
354	ahā viśvā sumanāḥ dīdihī naḥ	aha viśva sumanas dīdī mad
 ---
355	uṣasaḥ pūrvāḥ adha yat vyūṣuḥ	uṣas pūrva adha yat vivas
355	mahat vi jajñe akṣaram pade goḥ	mahat vi jan akṣara pada go
355	vratā devānām upa nu prabhūṣan	vrata deva upa nu prabhūṣ
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	mā u sū naḥ atra juhuranta devāḥ	mā u su mad atra hvṛ deva
355	mā pūrve agne pitaraḥ padajñāḥ	mā pūrva agni pitṛ pada jña
355	purāṇyoḥ sadmanoḥ ketuḥ antar	purāṇa sadman ketu antar
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	vi me purutrā patayanti kāmāḥ	vi mad purutrā patay kāma
355	śami acchā dīdye pūrvyāṇi	śamī acchā dīdī pūrvya
355	samiddhe agnau ṛtam it vadema	samindh agni ṛta id vad
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	samānaḥ rājā vibhṛtaḥ purutrā	samāna rājan vibhṛ purutrā
355	śaye śayāsu prayutaḥ vanā anu	śī śaya prayuta vana anu
355	anyā vatsam bharati kṣeti mātā	anya vatsa bhṛ kṣi mātṛ
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	ākṣit pūrvāsu aparāḥ anūrut	ākṣit pūrva apara anūrudh
355	sadyaḥ jātāsu taruṇīṣu antar	sadyas jan taruṇa antar
355	antarvatīḥ suvate apravītāḥ	antarvat sū a pravye
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	śayuḥ parastāt adha nu dvimātā	śayu parastāt adha nu dvi mātṛ
355	abandhanaḥ carati vatsaḥ ekaḥ	bandhana car vatsa eka
355	mitrasya tā varuṇasya vratāni	mitra tad varuṇa vrata
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	dvimātā hotā vidatheṣu samrāT	dvi mātṛ hotṛ vidatha samrāj
355	anu agram carati kṣeti budhnaḥ	anu agra car kṣi budhna
355	pra raṇyāni raṇyavācaḥ bharante	pra raṇya raṇya vāc bhṛ
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	śūrasya iva yudhyataḥ antamasya	śūra iva yudh antama
355	pratīcīnam dadṛśe viśvam āyat	pratīcīna dṛś viśva e
355	antar matiḥ carati niṣṣidham goḥ	antar mati car niṣṣidh go
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	ni veveti palitaḥ dūtaḥ āsu	ni vevīy palita dūta idam
355	antar mahān carati rocanena	antar mahat car rocana
355	vapūṁṣi bibhrat abhi naḥ vi caṣTe	vapus bhṛ abhi mad vi cakṣ
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ paramam pāti pāthaḥ	viṣṇu gopā parama pā pāthas
355	priyā dhāmāni amṛtā dadhānaḥ	priya dhāman amṛta dhā
355	agniḥ tā viśvā bhuvanāni veda	agni tad viśva bhuvana vid
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	nānā cakrāte yamyā vapūṁṣi	nānā kṛ yamya vapus
355	tayoḥ anyat rocate kṛṣṇam anyat	tad anya ruc kṛṣṇa anya
355	śyāvī ca yat aruṣī ca svasārau	śyāva ca yad aruṣa ca svasṛ
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	mātā ca yatra duhitā ca dhenū	mātṛ ca yatra duhitṛ ca dhenu
355	sabardughe dhāpayete samīcī	sabardugha dhāpay samyañc
355	ṛtasya te sadasi īLe antar	ṛta tad sadas īḍ antar
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya	anya vatsa rih mā
355	kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenuḥ ūdhar	ka bhū ni dhā dhenu ūdhas
355	ṛtasya sā payasā apinvata iLā	ṛta tad payas pinv iḍā
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	padyā vaste pururūpā vapūṁṣi	padya vas puru rūpa vapus
355	ūrdhvā tasthau tryavim rerihāṇā	ūrdhva sthā tryavi rerih
355	ṛtasya sadma vi carāmi vidvān	ṛta sadman vi car vid
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	pade iva nihite dasme antar	pada iva nidhā dasma antar
355	tayoḥ anyat guhyam āviḥ anyat	tad anya guhya āvis anya
355	sadhrīcīnā pathyā sā viṣūcī	sadhrīcīna pathyā tad viṣvañc
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	ā dhenavaḥ dhunayantām aśiśvīḥ	ā dhenu dhunay aśiśu
355	sabardughāḥ śaśayāḥ apradugdhāḥ	sabardugha śaśaya a praduh
355	navyānavyāḥ yuvatayaḥ bhavantīḥ	navya navya yuvati bhū
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	yat anyāsu vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti	yat anya vṛṣabha roro
355	saḥ anyasmin yūthe ni dadhāti retaḥ	tad anya yūtha ni dhā retas
355	sa hi kṣapāvān sa bhagaḥ sa rājā	tad hi kṣapāvant tad bhaga tad rājan
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	vīrasya nu svaśvyam janāsaḥ	vīra nu su aśvya jana
355	pra nu vocāma viduḥ asya devāḥ	pra nu vac vid idam deva
355	ṣoLhā yuktāḥ pañcapañca ā vahanti	ṣoḍhā yuj pañcan pañcan vah
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	devaḥ tvaṣTā savitā viśvarūpaḥ	deva tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ viśva rūpa
355	pupoṣa prajāḥ purudhā jajāna	puṣ prajā purudhā jan
355	imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni asya	idam ca viśva bhuvana idam
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	mahī sam airat camvā samīcī	mahi sam īr camū samyañc
355	ubhe te asya vasunā nyṛṣTe	ubh tad idam vasu nyṛṣ
355	śṛṇve vīraḥ vindamānaḥ vasūni	śru vīra vid vasu
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	imām ca naḥ pṛthivīm viśvadhāyāḥ	idam ca mad pṛthivī viśva dhāyas
355	upa kṣeti hitamitraḥ na rājā	upa kṣi hita mitra na rājan
355	puraḥsadaḥ śarmasadaḥ na vīrāḥ	puraḥsad śarman sad na vīra
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
355	niṣṣidhvarīḥ te oṣadhīḥ uta āpaḥ	niṣṣidhvan tvad oṣadhī uta ap
355	rayim te indra pṛthivī bibharti	rayi tvad indra pṛthivī bhṛ
355	sakhāyaḥ te vāmabhājaḥ syāma	sakhi tvad vāma bhāj as
355	mahat devānām asuratvam ekam	mahat deva asura tva eka
 ---
356	na tā minanti māyinaḥ na dhīrāḥ	na tad mī māyin na dhīra
356	vratā devānām prathamā dhruvāṇi	vrata deva prathama dhruva
356	na rodasī adruhā vedyābhiḥ	na rodas adruh vedyā
356	na parvatāḥ niname tasthivāṁsaḥ	na parvata ninam sthā
356	ṣaT bhārān ekaḥ acaran bibharti	ṣaṣ bhāra eka a car bhṛ
356	ṛtam varṣiṣTham upa gāvaḥ ā aguḥ	ṛta varṣiṣṭha upa go āgā
356	tisraḥ mahīḥ uparāḥ tasthuḥ atyāḥ	tri mahī upara sthā atya
356	guhā dve nihite darśi ekā	guhā dvi nidhā dṛś eka
356	tripājasyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ viśvarūpaḥ	tri pājasya vṛṣabha viśva rūpa
356	uta tryudhā purudha prajāvān	uta tri udhan purudhā prajāvat
356	tryanīkaḥ patyate māhināvān	tri anīka paty māhināvat
356	sa retodhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām	tad retodhā vṛṣabha śaśvat
356	abhīke āsām padavīḥ abodhi	abhīka idam padavī budh
356	ādityānām ahve cāru nāma	āditya hvā cāru nāman
356	āpaḥ cit asmai aramanta devīḥ	ap cit idam ram deva
356	pṛthak vrajantīḥ pari sīm avṛñjan	pṛthak vraj pari sīm vṛj
356	trī sadhasthā sindhavaḥ triḥ kavīnām	tri sadhastha sindhu tris kavi
356	uta trimātā vidatheṣu samrāT	uta tri mātṛ vidatha samrāj
356	ṛtāvarīḥ yoṣaṇāḥ tisraḥ apyāḥ	ṛtāvan yoṣaṇā tri apya
356	triḥ ā divaḥ vidathe patyamānāḥ	tris ā div vidatha paty
356	triḥ ā divaḥ savitar vāryāṇi	tris ā div savitṛ vārya
356	divedive ā suva triḥ naḥ ahnaḥ	diva diva ā sū tris mad ahar
356	tridhātu rāyaḥ ā suvā vasūni	tri dhātu rai ā sū ā vasu
356	bhaga trātar dhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ	bhaga trātṛ dhiṣaṇā sāti dhā
356	triḥ ā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti	tris ā div savitṛ soṣav
356	rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī	rājan mitrāvaruṇa su pāṇi
356	āpaḥ cit asya rodasī cit urvī	ap cit idam rodas cit uru
356	ratnam bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya	ratna bhikṣ savitṛ sava
356	triḥ uttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni	tris uttama dūṇaśa rocana
356	trayaḥ rājanti asurasya vīrāḥ	tri rāj asura vīra
356	ṛtāvānaḥ iṣirāḥ dūLabhāsaḥ	ṛtāvan iṣira dūḍabha
356	triḥ ā divaḥ vidathe santu devāḥ	tris ā div vidatha as deva
 ---
357	pra me vivikvān avidat manīṣām	pra mad vic vid manīṣā
357	dhenum carantīm prayutām agopām	dhenu car prayuta agopa
357	sadyaḥ cit yā duduhe bhūri dhāseḥ	sadyas cit yad duh bhūri dhāsi
357	indraḥ tat agniḥ panitāraḥ asyāḥ	indra tad agni pan idam
357	indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā suhastā	indra su pūṣan vṛṣan su hasta
357	divaḥ na prītāḥ śaśayam duduhre	div na prī śaśaya duh
357	viśve yat asyām raṇayanta devāḥ	viśva yat idam raṇay deva
357	pra vaḥ atra vasavaḥ sumnam aśyām	pra tvad atra vasu sumna aś
357	yāḥ jāmayaḥ vṛṣṇe icchanti śaktim	yad jāmi vṛṣan iṣ śakti
357	namasyantīḥ jānate garbham asmin	namasy jñā garbha idam
357	acchā putram dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ	acchā putra dhenu vāś
357	mahaḥ caranti bibhratam vapūṁṣi	mahas car bhṛ vapus
357	acchā vivakmi rodasī sumeke	acchā vac rodas sumeka
357	grāvṇaḥ yujānaḥ adhvare manīṣā	grāvan yuj adhvara manīṣā
357	imāḥ u te manave bhūrivārāḥ	idam u tvad manu bhūri vāra
357	ūrdhvāḥ bhavanti darśatāḥ yajatrāḥ	ūrdhva bhū darśata yajatra
357	yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhāḥ	yad tvad jihvā madhumat sumedhas
357	agne deveṣu ucyate urūcī	agni deva vac uruvyañc
357	tayā iha viśvān avase yajatrān	tad iha viśva avas yajatra
357	ā sādaya pāyayā cā madhūni	ā sāday pāyay ca madhu
357	yā te agne parvatasya iva dhārā	yad tvad agni parvata iva dhārā
357	asaścantī pīpayat deva citrā	sac pyā deva citra
357	tām asmabhyam pramatim jātavedaḥ	tad mad pramati jātavedas
357	vaso rāsva sumatim viśvajanyām	vasu rā sumati viśvajanya
 ---
358	dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyam duhānā	dhenu pratna kāmya duh
358	antar putraḥ carati dakṣiṇāyāḥ	antar putra car dakṣiṇā
358	ā dyotanim vahati śubhrayāmā	ā dyotani vah śubhra yāma
358	uṣasaḥ stomaḥ aśvinau ajīgar	uṣas stoma aśvin jāgṛ
358	suyuk vahanti prati vām ṛtena	su yuj vah prati tvad ṛta
358	ūrdhvāḥ bhavanti pitarā iva medhāḥ	ūrdhva bhū pitṛ iva medha
358	jarethām asmat vi paṇeḥ manīṣām	jṛ mad vi paṇi manīṣā
358	yuvoḥ avaḥ cakṛma ā yātam arvāk	tvad avas kṛ yā arvāk
358	suyugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena	su yuj aśva suvṛt ratha
358	dasrau imam śṛṇutam ślokam adreḥ	dasra idam śru śloka adri
358	kim aṅga vām prati avartim gamiṣThā	kim aṅga tvad prati avarti gamiṣṭha
358	āhuḥ viprāsaḥ aśvinā purājāḥ	ah vipra aśvin purājā
358	ā manyethām ā gatam kat cit evaiḥ	ā man ā gam kaccit eva
358	viśve janāsaḥ aśvinā havante	viśva jana aśvin hvā
358	imā hi vām goṛjīkā madhūni	idam hi tvad go ṛjīka madhu
358	pra mitrāsaḥ na daduḥ usraḥ agre	pra mitra na dā usṛ agra
358	tiraḥ purū cit aśvinā rajāṁsi	tiras puru cit aśvin rajas
358	āṅgūṣaḥ vām maghavānā janeṣu	āṅgūṣa tvad maghavan jana
358	ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ devayānaiḥ	ā iha yā pathin deva yāna
358	dasrau ime vām nidhayaḥ madhūnām	dasra idam tvad nidhi madhu
358	purāṇam okaḥ sakhyam śivam vām	purāṇa oka sakhya śiva tvad
358	yuvoḥ narā draviṇam jahnāvyām	tvad nṛ draviṇa jahnāvī
358	punar kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni	punar kṛ sakhya śiva
358	madhvā madema saha nū samānāḥ	madhu mad saha nu samāna
358	aśvinā vāyunā yuvam sudakṣā	aśvin vāyu tvad su dakṣa
358	niyudbhiḥ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā	niyut ca sajoṣas yuvan
358	nāsatyā tiroahnyam juṣāṇā	nāsatya tiroahnya juṣ
358	somam pibatam asridhā sudānū	soma pā asridh sudānu
358	aśvinā pari vām iṣaḥ purūcīḥ	aśvin pari tvad iṣ purūcī
358	īyuḥ gīrbhiḥ yatamānāḥ amṛdhrāḥ	i gir yat amṛdhra
358	rathaḥ ha vām ṛtajāḥ adrijūtaḥ	ratha ha tvad ṛta jā adri jū
358	pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyaḥ	pari dyāvāpṛthivī yā sadyas
358	aśvinā madhuṣuttamaḥ yuvākuḥ	aśvin madhuṣuttama yuvāku
358	somaḥ tam pātam ā gatam duroṇe	soma tad pā ā gam duroṇa
358	rathaḥ ha vām bhūri varpaḥ karikrat	ratha ha tvad bhūri varpas karikṛ
358	sutāvataḥ niṣkṛtam āgamiṣThaḥ	sutāvat niṣkṛta āgamiṣṭha
 ---
359	mitraḥ janān yātayati bruvāṇaḥ	mitra jana yātay brū
359	mitraḥ dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām	mitra dhṛ pṛthivī uta div
359	mitraḥ kṛṣTīḥ animiṣā abhi caṣTe	mitra kṛṣṭi animiṣa abhi cakṣ
359	mitrāya havyam ghṛtavat juhota	mitra havya ghṛtavat hu
359	pra sa mitra martaḥ astu prayasvān	pra tad mitra marta as prayasvat
359	yaḥ te āditya śikṣati vratena	yad tvad āditya śikṣ vrata
359	na hanyate na jīyate tvotaḥ	na han na ji tvota
359	na enam aṁhaḥ aśnoti antitaḥ na dūrāt	na enad aṃhas aś antitas na dūrāt
359	anamīvāsaḥ iLayā madantaḥ	anamīva iḍā mad
359	mitajñavaḥ variman ā pṛthivyāḥ	mitajñu variman ā pṛthivī
359	ādityasya vratam upakṣiyantaḥ	āditya vrata upakṣi
359	vayam mitrasya sumatau syāma	mad mitra sumati as
359	ayam mitraḥ namasyaḥ suśevaḥ	idam mitra namasya su śeva
359	rājā sukṣatraḥ ajaniṣTa vedhāḥ	rājan su kṣatra jan vedhas
359	tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya	tad mad sumati yajñiya
359	api bhadre saumanase syāma	api bhadra saumanasa as
359	mahān ādityaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ	mahat āditya namas upasad
359	yātayajjanaḥ gṛṇate suśevaḥ	yātay jana gṛ su śeva
359	tasmai etat panyatamāya juṣTam	tad etad panyatama juṣ
359	agnau mitrāya haviḥ ā juhota	agni mitra havis ā hu
359	mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ	mitra carṣaṇī dhṛt
359	avaḥ devasya sānasi	avas deva sānasi
359	dyumnam citraśravastamam	dyumna citraśravastama
359	abhi yaḥ mahinā divam	abhi yad mahina div
359	mitraḥ babhūva saprathāḥ	mitra bhū sa prathas
359	abhi śravobhiḥ pṛthivīm	abhi śravas pṛthivī
359	mitrāya pañca yemire	mitra pañcan yam
359	janāḥ abhiṣTiśavase	jana abhiṣṭi śavas
359	sa devān viśvān bibharti	tad deva viśva bhṛ
359	mitraḥ deveṣu āyuṣu	mitra deva āyu
359	janāya vṛktabarhiṣe	jana vṛj barhis
359	iṣaḥ iṣTavratāḥ akar	iṣ iṣ vrata kṛ
 ---
360	iheha vaḥ manasā bandhutā naraḥ	iha iha tvad manas bandhu tā nṛ
360	uśijaḥ jagmuḥ abhi tāni vedasā	uśij gam abhi tad vedas
360	yābhiḥ māyābhiḥ pratijūtivarpasaḥ	yad māyā prati jūti varpas
360	saudhanvanāḥ yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśa	saudhanvana yajñiya bhāga aś
360	yābhiḥ śacībhiḥ camasān apiṁśata	yad śacī camasa piś
360	yayā dhiyā gām ariṇīta carmaṇaḥ	yad dhī go ri carman
360	yena harī manasā niratakṣata	yad hari manas nistakṣ
360	tena devatvam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśa	tad deva tva ṛbhu sam aś
360	indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśuḥ	indra sakhya ṛbhu sam aś
360	manoḥ napātaḥ apasaḥ dadhanvire	manu napāt apas dhanv
360	saudhanvanāsaḥ amṛtatvam ā īrire	saudhanvana amṛta tva er
360	viṣTvī śamībhiḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā	viṣ śamī su kṛt su kṛtyā
360	indreṇa yātha saratham sute sacā	indra yā sa ratha suta sacā
360	atha u vaśānām bhavathā saha śriyā	atho vaśa bhū saha śrī
360	na vaḥ pratimai sukṛtāni vāghataḥ	na tvad pratimā su kṛ vāghant
360	saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ vīryāṇi ca	saudhanvana ṛbhu vīrya ca
360	indra ṛbhubhiḥ vājavadbhiḥ samukṣitam	indra ṛbhu vājavat samukṣ
360	sutam somam ā vṛṣasvā gabhastyoḥ	su soma ā vṛṣ gabhasti
360	dhiyā iṣitaḥ maghavan dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	dhī iṣay maghavan dāś gṛha
360	saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsvā nṛbhiḥ	saudhanvana saha mad nṛ
360	indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsva iha naḥ	indra ṛbhumat vājavat mad iha mad
360	asmin savane śacyā puruṣTuta	idam savana śacī puruṣṭuta
360	imāni tubhyam svasarāṇi yemire	idam tvad svasara yam
360	vratā devānām manuṣaḥ ca dharmabhiḥ	vrata deva manus ca dharman
360	indra ṛbhubhiḥ vājibhiḥ vājayan iha	indra ṛbhu vājin vājay iha
360	stomam jarituḥ upa yāhi yajñiyam	stoma jaritṛ upa yā yajñiya
360	śatam ketebhiḥ iṣirebhiḥ āyave	śata keta iṣira āyu
360	sahasraṇīthaḥ adhvarasya homani	sahasraṇītha adhvara homan
 ---
361	uṣaḥ vājena vājini pracetāḥ	uṣas vāja vājin praceta
361	stomam juṣasva gṛṇataḥ maghoni	stoma juṣ gṛ maghavan
361	purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ puraṁdhiḥ	purāṇa devī yuvati puraṃdhi
361	anu vratam carasi viśvavāre	anu vrata car viśva vāra
361	uṣaḥ devi amartyā vi bhāhi	uṣas devī amartya vi bhā
361	candrarathā sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī	candra ratha sūnṛtā īray
361	ā tvā vahantu suyamāsaḥ aśvāḥ	ā tvad vah su yama aśva
361	hiraṇyavarṇām pṛthupājasaḥ ye	hiraṇya varṇa pṛthu pājas yad
361	uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvā	uṣas pratyañc bhuvana viśva
361	ūrdhvā tiṣThasi amṛtasya ketuḥ	ūrdhva sthā amṛta ketu
361	samānam artham caraṇīyamānā	samāna artha caraṇīy
361	cakram iva navyasi ā vavṛtsva	cakra iva navyas ā vṛt
361	ava syūma iva cinvatī maghonī	ava syūman iva ci maghavan
361	uṣāḥ yāti svasarasya patnī	uṣas yā svasara patnī
361	svar janantī subhagā sudaṁsāḥ	svar jan subhaga su daṃsas
361	ā antāt divaḥ paprathe ā pṛthivyāḥ	ā anta div prath ā pṛthivī
361	acchā vaḥ devīm uṣasam vibhātīm	acchā tvad devī uṣas vibhā
361	pra vaḥ bharadhvam namasā suvṛktim	pra tvad bhṛ namas suvṛkti
361	ūrdhvam madhudhā divi pājaḥ aśret	ūrdhva madhu dhā div pājas śri
361	pra rocanā ruruce raṇvasaṁdṛk	pra rocana ruc raṇva saṃdṛś
361	ṛtāvarī divaḥ arkaiḥ abodhi	ṛtāvan div arka budh
361	ā revatī rodasī citram asthāt	ā revat rodas citra sthā
361	āyatīm agne uṣasam vibhātīm	e agni uṣas vibhā
361	vāmam eṣi draviṇam bhikṣamāṇaḥ	vāma i draviṇa bhikṣ
361	ṛtasya budhne uṣasām iṣaṇyan	ṛta budhna uṣas iṣaṇy
361	vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa	vṛṣan mah rodas ā viś
361	mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā	mah mitra varuṇa māyā
361	candrā iva bhānum vi dadhe purutrā	candra iva bhānu vi dhā purutrā
 ---
362	imāḥ u vām bhṛmayaḥ manyamānāḥ	idam u tvad bhṛmi man
362	yuvāvate na tujyāḥ abhūvan	yuvāvat na tujya bhū
362	kva tyat indrāvaruṇā yaśaḥ vām	kva tya indrāvaruṇa yaśas tvad
362	yena smā sinam bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ	yad sma sina bhṛ sakhi
362	ayam u vām purutamaḥ rayīyan	idam u tvad purutama rayīyat
362	śaśvattamam avase johavīti	śaśvattama avas johav
362	sajoṣau indrāvaruṇā marudbhiḥ	sa joṣa indrāvaruṇa marut
362	divā pṛthivyā śṛṇutam havam me	div pṛthivī śru hava mad
362	asme tat indrāvaruṇā vasu syāt	mad tad indrāvaruṇa vasu as
362	asme rayiḥ marutaḥ sarvavīraḥ	mad rayi marut sarva vīra
362	asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇaiḥ avantu	mad varūtṛ śaraṇa av
362	asmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ	mad hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇā
362	bṛhaspate juṣasva naḥ	bṛhaspati juṣ mad
362	havyāni viśvadevya	havya viśvadevya
362	rāsva ratnāni dāśuṣe	rā ratna dāś
362	śucim arkaiḥ bṛhaspatim	śuci arka bṛhaspati
362	adhvareṣu namasyata	adhvara namasy
362	anāmi ojaḥ ā cake	anāmin ojas ā kan
362	vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām	vṛṣabha carṣaṇi
362	viśvarūpam adābhyam	viśva rūpa adābhya
362	bṛhaspatim vareṇyam	bṛhaspati vareṇya
362	iyam te pūṣan āghṛṇe	idam tvad pūṣan āghṛṇi
362	suṣTutiḥ deva navyasī	suṣṭuti deva navīyas
362	asmābhiḥ tubhyam śasyate	mad tvad śaṃs
362	tām juṣasva giram mama	tad juṣ gir mad
362	vājayantīm avā dhiyam	vājay av dhī
362	vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām	vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā
362	yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati	yad viśva abhi vipaś
362	bhuvanā sam ca paśyati	bhuvana sam ca paś
362	sa naḥ pūṣā avitā bhuvat	tad mad pūṣan av bhū
362	tat savituḥ vareṇyam	tad savitṛ vareṇya
362	bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi	bhargas deva dhā
362	dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt	dhī yad mad pracoday
362	devasya savituḥ vayam	deva savitṛ mad
362	vājayantaḥ puraṁdhyā	vājay puraṃdhi
362	bhagasya rātim īmahe	bhaga rāti ī
362	devam naraḥ savitāram	deva nṛ savitṛ
362	viprāḥ yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ	vipra yajña suvṛkti
362	namasyanti dhiyā iṣitāḥ	namasy dhī iṣ
362	somaḥ jigāti gātuvit	soma gā gātu vid
362	devānām eti niṣkṛtam	deva i niṣkṛta
362	ṛtasya yonim āsadam	ṛta yoni āsad
362	somaḥ asmabhyam dvipade	soma mad dvipad
362	catuṣpade ca paśave	catuṣpada ca paśu
362	anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ karat	anamīva iṣ kṛ
362	asmākam āyuḥ vardhayan	mad āyus vardhay
362	abhimātīḥ sahamānaḥ	abhimāti sah
362	somaḥ sadhastham ā asadat	soma sadhastha āsad
362	ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā	ā mad mitrāvaruṇa
362	ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam	ghṛta gavyūti ukṣ
362	madhvā rajāṁsi sukratū	madhu rajas su kratu
362	uruśaṁsā namovṛdhā	uru śaṃsa namas vṛdh
362	mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ	mahan dakṣa rāj
362	drāghiṣThābhiḥ śucivratā	drāghiṣṭha śuci vrata
362	gṛṇānā jamadagninā	gṛ jamadagni
362	yonau ṛtasya sīdatam	yoni ṛta sad
362	pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā	pā soma ṛtāvṛdh
41	tvām hi agne sadam it samanyavaḥ	tvad hi agni sadam id samanyu
41	devāsaḥ devam aratim nyerire	deva deva arati nyer
41	iti kratvā nyerire	iti kratu nyer
41	amartyam yajata martyeṣu ā	amartya yaj martya ā
41	devam ādevam janata pracetasam	deva ādeva jan pracetas
41	viśvam ādevam janata pracetasam	viśva ādeva jan pracetas
41	sa bhrātaram varuṇam agne ā vavṛtsva	sa bhrātṛ varuṇa agni ā vṛt
41	devān acchā sumatī yajñavanasam	deva acchā sumati yajña vanas
41	jyeṣTham yajñavanasam	jyeṣṭha yajña vanas
41	ṛtāvānam ādityam carṣaṇīdhṛtam	ṛtāvan āditya carṣaṇī dhṛt
41	rājānam carṣaṇīdhṛtam	rājan carṣaṇī dhṛt
41	sakhe sakhāyam abhi ā vavṛtsva	sakhi sakhi abhi ā vṛt
41	āśum na cakram rathyā iva raṁhyā	āśu na cakra rathyā iva raṃhi
41	asmabhyam dasma raṁhyā	mad dasma raṃhi
41	agne mṛLīkam varuṇe sacā vidaḥ	agni mṛḍīka varuṇa sacā vid
41	marutsu viśvabhānuṣu	marut viśva bhānu
41	tokāya tuje śuśucāna śam kṛdhi	toka tuj śuc śam kṛ
41	asmabhyam dasma śam kṛdhi	mad dasma śam kṛ
41	tvam naḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān	tvad mad agni varuṇa vid
41	devasya heLaḥ ava yāsisīṣThāḥ	deva heḍas ava yā
41	yajiṣThaḥ vahnitamaḥ śośucānaḥ	yajiṣṭha vahnitama śośuc
41	viśvā dveṣāṁsi pra mumugdhi asmat	viśva dveṣas pra muc mad
41	sa tvam naḥ agne avamaḥ bhava ūtī	tad tvad mad agni avama bhū ūti
41	nediṣThaḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	nediṣṭha idam uṣas vyuṣṭi
41	ava yakṣva naḥ varuṇam rarāṇaḥ	ava yaj mad varuṇa rā
41	vīhi mṛLīkam suhavaḥ naḥ edhi	vī mṛḍīka su hava mad as
41	asya śreṣThā subhagasya saṁdṛk	idam śreṣṭha subhaga saṃdṛś
41	devasya citratamā martyeṣu	deva citratama martya
41	śuci ghṛtam na taptam aghnyāyāḥ	śuci ghṛta na tap aghnyā
41	spārhā devasya maṁhanā iva dhenoḥ	spārha deva maṃhanā iva dhenu
41	triḥ asya tā paramā santi satyā	tris idam tad parama as satya
41	spārhā devasya janimāni agneḥ	spārha deva janiman agni
41	anante antar parivītaḥ ā agāt	ananta antar parivye āgā
41	śuciḥ śukraḥ aryaḥ rorucānaḥ	śuci śukra arya roruc
41	sa dūtaḥ viśvā it abhi vaṣTi sadmā	tad dūta viśva id abhi vaś sadman
41	hotā hiraṇyarathaḥ raṁsujihvaḥ	hotṛ hiraṇya ratha raṃsu jihvā
41	rohidaśvaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā	rohit aśva vapuṣya vibhāvan
41	sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatī iva saṁsat	sadā raṇva pitumat iva saṃsad
41	sa cetayat manuṣaḥ yajñabandhuḥ	tad cetay manus yajña bandhu
41	pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti	pra tad mahi raśanā nī
41	sa kṣeti asya duryāsu sādhan	tad kṣi idam durya sādh
41	devaḥ martasya sadhanitvam āpa	deva marta sa dhanin tva āp
41	sa tū naḥ agniḥ nayatu prajānan	tad tu u mad agni nī prajñā
41	acchā ratnam devabhaktam yat asya	acchā ratna deva bhaj yad idam
41	dhiyā yat viśve amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan	dhī yad viśva amṛta kṛ
41	dyauḥ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan	div pitṛ janitṛ satya ukṣan
41	sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu	tad jan prathama pastyā
41	mahaḥ budhne rajasaḥ asya yonau	mah budhna rajas idam yoni
41	apāt aśīrṣā guhamānaḥ antā	a pād a śīrṣan guh anta
41	āyoyuvānaḥ vṛṣabhasya nīLe	yoyu vṛṣabha nīḍa
41	pra śardhaḥ ārta prathamam vipanyā	pra śardha ṛch prathamam vipanyā
41	ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīLe	ṛta yoni vṛṣabha nīḍa
41	spārhaḥ yuvā vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā	spārha yuvan vapuṣya vibhāvan
41	sapta priyāsaḥ janayanta vṛṣṇe	saptan priya janay vṛṣan
41	asmākam atra pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ	mad atra pitṛ manuṣya
41	abhi pra seduḥ ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ	abhi pra sad ṛta āśuṣ
41	aśmavrajāḥ sudughāḥ vavre antar	aśman vraja su dugha vavra antar
41	ut usrāḥ ājan uṣasaḥ huvānāḥ	ud usrā aj uṣas hvā
41	te marmṛjata dadṛvāṁsaḥ adrim	tad marmṛj dṛ adri
41	tat eṣām anye abhitaḥ vi vocan	tad idam anya abhitas vi vac
41	paśvayantrāsaḥ abhi kāram arcan	paśu ayantra abhi kārā arc
41	vidanta jyotiḥ cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ	vid jyotis kṛp dhī
41	te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdham	tad gavyat manas dṛdhra ubh
41	gāḥ yemānam pari santam adrim	go yam pari as adri
41	dṛLham naraḥ vacasā daivyena	dṛḍha nṛ vacas daivya
41	vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ	vraja gomat uśij vi vṛ
41	te manvata prathamam nāma dhenoḥ	tad man prathama nāman dhenu
41	triḥ sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan	tris saptan mātṛ parama vid
41	tat jānatīḥ abhi anūṣata vrāḥ	tad jñā abhi nū vrā
41	āviḥ bhuvat aruṇīḥ yaśasā goḥ	āvis bhū aruṇī yaśas go
41	neśat tamaḥ dudhitam rocata dyauḥ	naś tamas dudhita ruc div
41	ut devyāḥ uṣasaḥ bhānuḥ arta	ud deva uṣas bhānu ṛch
41	ā sūryaḥ bṛhataḥ tiṣThat ajrān	ā sūrya bṛhat sthā ajra
41	ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan	ṛju marta vṛjina ca paś
41	āt it paścā bubudhānāḥ vi akhyan	āt id paścā budh vi khyā
41	āt it ratnam dhārayanta dyubhaktam	āt id ratna dhāray div bhaj
41	viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devāḥ	viśva viśva durya deva
41	mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu	mitra dhī varuṇa satya as
41	acchā voceya śuśucānam agnim	acchā vac śuc agni
41	hotāram viśvabharasam yajiṣTham	hotṛ viśva bharas yajiṣṭha
41	śuci ūdhaḥ atṛṇat na gavām	śuci ūdhas tṛd na go
41	andhaḥ na pūtam pariṣiktam aṁśoḥ	andhas na pū pariṣic aṃśu
41	viśveṣām aditiḥ yajñiyānām	viśva aditi yajñiya
41	viśveṣām atithiḥ mānuṣāṇām	viśva atithi mānuṣa
41	agniḥ devānām avaḥ āvṛṇānaḥ	agni deva avas āvṛ
41	sumṛLīkaḥ bhavatu jātavedāḥ	su mṛḍīka bhū jātavedas
 ---
42	yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā	yad martya amṛta ṛtāvan
42	devaḥ deveṣu aratiḥ nidhāyi	deva deva arati nidhā
42	hotā yajiṣThaḥ mahnā śucadhyai	hotṛ yajiṣṭha mahan śuc
42	havyaiḥ agniḥ manuṣaḥ īrayadhyai	havya agni manus īray
42	iha tvam sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya	iha tvad sūnu sahas mad adya
42	jātaḥ jātān ubhayān antar agne	jan jan ubhaya antar agni
42	dūtaḥ īyase yuyujānaḥ ṛṣva	dūta ī yuj ṛṣva
42	ṛjumuṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrān ca	ṛju muṣka vṛṣan śukra ca
42	atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū	atya vṛdha snu rohita ghṛtasnu
42	ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣThā	ṛta man manas javiṣṭha
42	antar īyase aruṣā yujānaḥ	antar ī aruṣa yuj
42	yuṣmān ca devān viśaḥ ā ca martān	tvad ca deva viś ā ca marta
42	aryamaṇam varuṇam mitram eṣām	aryaman varuṇa mitra idam
42	indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ aśvinā uta	indrāviṣṇu marut aśvin uta
42	svaśvaḥ agne surathaḥ surādhāḥ	su aśva agni su ratha su rādhas
42	ā it u vaha suhaviṣe janāya	ā id u vah su havis jana
42	gomān agne avimān aśvī yajñaḥ	gomat agni avimat aśvin yajña
42	nṛvatsakhā sadam it apramṛṣyaḥ	nṛvat sakhi sadam id apramṛṣya
42	iLāvān eṣaḥ asura prajāvān	iḍāvat etad asura prajāvat
42	dīrghaḥ rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān	dīrgha rayi pṛthu budhna sabhāvat
42	yaḥ te idhmam jabharat siṣvidānaḥ	yad tvad idhma bhṛ svid
42	mūrdhānam vā tatapate tvāyā	mūrdhan vā tap tvāyā
42	bhuvaḥ tasya svatavān pāyuḥ agne	bhū tad svatavas pāyu agni
42	viśvasmāt sīm aghāyataḥ uruṣya	viśva sīm aghāy uruṣy
42	yaḥ te bharāt anniyate cit annam	yad tvad bhṛ anniy cit anna
42	niśiṣat mandram atithim udīrat	niśās mandra atithi udīr
42	ā devayuḥ inadhate duroṇe	ā devayu indh duroṇa
42	tasmin rayiḥ dhruvaḥ astu dāsvān	tad rayi dhruva as dāsvat
42	yaḥ tvā doṣā yaḥ uṣasi praśaṁsāt	yad tvad doṣā yad uṣas praśaṃs
42	priyam vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān	priya vā tvad kṛ haviṣmat
42	aśvaḥ na sve dame ā hemyāvān	aśva na sva dama ā hemyāvat
42	tam aṁhasaḥ pīparaḥ dāśvāṁsam	tad aṃhas pṛ dāś
42	yaḥ tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśat	yad tvad agni amṛta dāś
42	duvaḥ tve kṛṇavate yatasruk	duvas tvad kṛ yam sruc
42	na sa rāyā śaśamānaḥ vi yoṣat	na tad rai śam vi yu
42	na enam aṁhaḥ pari varat aghāyoḥ	na enad aṃhas pari aghāyu
42	yasya tvam agne adhvaram jujoṣaḥ	yad tvad agni adhvara juṣ
42	devaḥ martasya sudhitam rarāṇaḥ	deva marta sudhita rā
42	prītā it asat hotrā sā yaviṣTha	prī id as hotrā tad yaviṣṭha
42	asāma yasya vidhataḥ vṛdhāsaḥ	as yad vidh vṛdha
42	cittim acittim cinavat vi vidvān	citti acitti ci vi vid
42	pṛṣThā iva vītā vṛjinā ca martān	pṛṣṭha iva vīta vṛjina ca marta
42	rāye ca naḥ svapatyāya deva	rai ca mad su apatya deva
42	ditim ca rāsva aditim uruṣya	diti ca rā aditi uruṣy
42	kavim śaśāsuḥ kavayaḥ adabdhāḥ	kavi śās kavi adabdha
42	nidhārayantaḥ duryāsu āyoḥ	nidhāray durya āyu
42	ataḥ tvam dṛśyān agne etān	atas tvad dṛśya agni etad
42	paḍbhiḥ paśyeḥ adbhutān aryaḥ evaiḥ	pad paś adbhuta ari eva
42	tvam agne vāghate supraṇītiḥ	tvad agni vāghant su praṇīti
42	sutasomāya vidhate yaviṣTha	su soma vidh yaviṣṭha
42	ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve	ratna bhṛ śam ghṛṣvi
42	pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇiprāḥ	pṛthu ścandra av carṣaṇi prā
42	adhā ha yat vayam agne tvāyā	adha ha yad mad agni tvāyā
42	paḍbhiḥ hastebhiḥ cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ	pad hasta kṛ tanū
42	ratham na krantaḥ apasā bhurijoḥ	ratha na kṛ apas bhurij
42	ṛtam yemuḥ sudhyaḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ	ṛta yam sudhī āśuṣ
42	adhā mātuḥ uṣasaḥ sapta viprāḥ	adha mātṛ uṣas saptan vipra
42	jāyemahi prathamāḥ vedhasaḥ nṛṛn	jan prathama vedhas nṛ
42	divaḥ putrāḥ aṅgirasaḥ bhavema	div putra aṅgiras bhū
42	adrim rujema dhaninam śucantaḥ	adri ruj dhanin śuc
42	adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ	adha yathā mad pitṛ para
42	pratnāsaḥ agne ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ	pratna agni ṛta āśuṣ
42	śuci it ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ	śuci id i dīdhiti uktha śās
42	kṣāmā bhindantaḥ aruṇīḥ apa vran	kṣam bhid aruṇī apa vṛ
42	sukarmāṇaḥ surucaḥ devayantaḥ	su karman su ruc devay
42	ayaḥ na devāḥ janimā dhamantaḥ	ayas na deva janiman dham
42	śucantaḥ agnim vavṛdhantaḥ indram	śuc agni vṛdh indra
42	ūrvam gavyam pariṣadantaḥ agman	ūrva gavya pariṣad gam
42	ā yūthā iva kṣumati paśvaḥ akhyat	ā yūtha iva kṣumat paśu khyā
42	devānām yat janima anti ugra	deva yat janiman anti ugra
42	martānām cit urvaśīḥ akṛpran	marta cit urvaśī kṛp
42	vṛdhe cit aryaḥ uparasya āyoḥ	vṛdh cit ari upara āyu
42	akarma te svapasaḥ abhūma	kṛ tvad su apas bhū
42	ṛtam avasran uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ	ṛta vas uṣas vibhā
42	anūnam agnim purudhā suścandram	anūna agni purudhā su ścandra
42	devasya marmṛjataḥ cāru cakṣuḥ	deva marmṛj cāru cakṣus
42	etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ	etad tvad agni ucatha vedhas
42	avocāma kavaye tā juṣasva	vac kavi tad juṣ
42	ut śocasva kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ	ucchuc kṛ vasyas mad
42	mahaḥ rāyaḥ puruvāra pra yandhi	mah rai puru vāra pra yam
 ---
43	ā vaḥ rājānam adhvarasya rudram	ā tvad rājan adhvara rudra
43	hotāram satyayajam rodasyoḥ	hotṛ satya yaj rodasī
43	agnim purā tanayitnoḥ acittāt	agni purā tanayitnu acitta
43	hiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam	hiraṇya rūpa av kṛ
43	ayam yoniḥ cakṛmā yam vayam te	idam yoni kṛ yad mad tvad
43	jāyā iva patye uśatī suvāsāḥ	jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas
43	arvācīnaḥ parivītaḥ ni sīda	arvācīna parivye ni
43	imāḥ u te svapāka pratīcīḥ	u tvad svapāka pratyañc
43	āśṛṇvate adṛpitāya manma	a śru a dṛp manman
43	nṛcakṣase sumṛLīkāya vedhaḥ	nṛ cakṣas su mṛḍīka vedhas
43	devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṁsa	deva śasti amṛta śaṃs
43	grāvā iva sotā madhuṣut yam īLe	grāvan iva sotṛ madhuṣut yad īḍ
43	tvam cit naḥ śamyāḥ agne asyāḥ	tvad cit mad śamī agni idam
43	ṛtasya bodhi ṛtacit svādhīḥ	ṛta budh ṛta cit svādhī
43	kadā te ukthā sadhamādyāni	kadā tvad uktha sadhamādya
43	kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te	kadā bhū sakhya gṛha tvad
43	kathā ha tat varuṇāya tvam agne	kathā ha tad varuṇa tvad agni
43	kathā dive garhase kat naḥ āgaḥ	kathā div garh ka mad āgas
43	kathā mitrāya mīLhuṣe pṛthivyai	kathā mitra mīḍhvas pṛthivī
43	bravaḥ kat aryamṇe kat bhagāya	brū ka aryaman ka bhaga
43	kat dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasānaḥ agne	ka dhiṣṇyā vṛdh agni
43	kat vātāya pratavase śubhaṁye	ka vāta pratavas śubhaṃyā
43	parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe	parijman nāsatya kṣā
43	bravaḥ kat agne rudrāya nṛghne	brū ka agni rudra nṛ han
43	kathā mahe puṣTimbharāya pūṣṇe	kathā mah puṣṭimbhara pūṣan
43	kat rudrāya sumakhāya havirde	ka rudra su makha havis dā
43	kat viṣṇave urugāyāya retaḥ	ka viṣṇu urugāya retas
43	bravaḥ kat agne śarave bṛhatyai	brū ka agni śaru bṛhat
43	kathā śardhāya marutām ṛtāya	kathā śardha marut ṛta
43	kathā sūre bṛhate pṛchyamānaḥ	kathā svar bṛhat pracch
43	prati bravaḥ aditaye turāya	prati brū aditi tura
43	sādhā divaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān	sādh div jātavedas cit
43	ṛtena ṛtam niyatam īLe ā goḥ	ṛta ṛta niyam īḍ ā go
43	āmā sacā madhumat pakvam agne	āma sacā madhumat pakva agni
43	kṛṣṇā satī ruśatā dhāsinā eṣā	kṛṣṇa as ruśat dhāsi etad
43	jāmaryeṇa payasā pīpāya	jāmarya payas pyā
43	ṛtena hi smā vṛṣabhaḥ cit aktaḥ	ṛta hi sma vṛṣabha cit añj
43	pumān agniḥ payasā pṛṣThyena	puṃs agni payas pṛṣṭhya
43	aspandamānaḥ acarat vayodhāḥ	a spand car vayodhas
43	vṛṣā śukram duduhe pṛśniḥ ūdhar	vṛṣan śukra duh pṛśni ūdhas
43	ṛtena adrim vi asan bhidantaḥ	ṛta adri vi as bhid
43	sam aṅgirasaḥ navanta gobhiḥ	sam aṅgiras nū go
43	śunam naraḥ pari sadan uṣāsam	śuna nṛ pari sad uṣas
43	āviḥ svar abhavat jāte agnau	āvis svar bhū jan agni
43	ṛtena devīḥ amṛtāḥ amṛktāḥ	ṛta deva amṛta amṛkta
43	arṇobhiḥ āpaḥ madhumadbhiḥ agne	arṇas ap madhumat agni
43	vājī na sargeṣu prastubhānaḥ	vājin na sarga prastubh
43	pra sadam it sravitave dadhanyuḥ	pra sadam id sru dhan
43	mā kasya yakṣam sadam it huraḥ gāḥ	mā ka yakṣa sadam id huras gā
43	mā veśasya praminataḥ mā āpeḥ	mā veśa pramī mā āpi
43	mā bhrātuḥ agne anṛjoḥ ṛṇam veḥ	mā bhrātṛ agni anṛju ṛṇa vī
43	mā sakhyuḥ dakṣam ripoḥ bhujema	mā sakhi dakṣa ripu bhuj
43	rakṣā naḥ agne tava rakṣaṇebhiḥ	rakṣ mad agni tvad rakṣaṇa
43	rārakṣāṇaḥ sumakha prīṇānaḥ	rakṣ su makha prī
43	prati sphura vi ruja vīLu aṁhaḥ	prati sphur vi ruj vīḍu aṃhas
43	jahi rakṣaḥ mahi cit vāvṛdhānam	hā rakṣas mahi cit vṛdh
43	ebhiḥ bhava sumanāḥ agne arkaiḥ	idam bhū sumanas agni arka
43	imān spṛśa manmabhiḥ śūra vājān	idam spṛś manman śūra vāja
43	uta brahmāṇi aṅgiraḥ juṣasva	uta brahman aṅgiras juṣ
43	sam te śastiḥ devavātā jareta	sam tvad śasti deva van jṛ
43	etā viśvā viduṣe tubhyam vedhaḥ	etad viśva vid tvad vedhas
43	nīthāni agne niṇyā vacāṁsi	nītha agni niṇya vacas
43	nivacanā kavaye kāvyāni	nivacana kavi kāvya
43	aśaṁsiṣam matibhiḥ vipraḥ ukthaiḥ	śaṃs mati vipra uktha
 ---
44	kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitim na pṛthvīm	kṛ pājas prasiti na pṛthu
44	yāhi rājā iva amavān ibhena	yā rājan iva amavat ibha
44	tṛṣvīm anu prasitim drūṇānaḥ	tṛṣu anu prasiti drū
44	astā asi vidhya rakṣasaḥ tapiṣThaiḥ	as as vyadh rakṣas tapiṣṭha
44	tava bhramāsaḥ āśuyā patanti	tvad bhrama āśuyā pat
44	anu spṛśa dhṛṣatā śośucānaḥ	anu spṛś dhṛṣat śośuc
44	tapūṁṣi agne juhvā pataṁgān	tapus agni juhū pataṃga
44	asaṁditaḥ vi sṛja viṣvak ulkāḥ	a saṃdo vi sṛj viṣvañc ulkā
44	prati spaśaḥ vi sṛja tūrṇitamaḥ	prati spaś vi sṛj tūrṇitama
44	bhavā pāyuḥ viśaḥ asyāḥ adabdhaḥ	bhū pāyu viś idam adabdha
44	yaḥ naḥ dūre aghaśaṁsaḥ yaḥ anti	yad mad dūra agha śaṃsa yad anti
44	agne mākiḥ te vyathiḥ ā dadharṣīt	agni mākir tvad vyathis ā dhṛṣ
44	ut agne tiṣTha prati ā tanuṣva	ud agni sthā prati ā tan
44	ni amitrān oṣatāt tigmahete	ni amitra uṣ tigma heti
44	yaḥ naḥ arātim samidhāna cakre	yad mad arāti samindh kṛ
44	nīcā tam dhakṣi atasam na śuṣkam	nīcā tad dah atasa na śuṣka
44	ūrdhvaḥ bhava prati vidhya adhi asmat	ūrdhva bhū prati vyadh adhi mad
44	āviḥ kṛṇuṣva daivyāni agne	āvi kṛ daivya agni
44	ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnām	ava sthira tan jāmi
44	jāmim ajāmim pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn	jāmi ajāmi pra mṛ śatru
44	sa te jānāti sumatim yaviṣTha	tad tvad jñā sumati yaviṣṭha
44	yaḥ īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat	yad īvat brahman gā īr
44	viśvāni asmai sudināni rāyaḥ	viśva idam su dina rai
44	dyumnāni aryaḥ vi duraḥ abhi dyaut	dyumna ari vi dvār abhi dyut
44	sa it agne astu subhagaḥ sudānuḥ	tad id agni as subhaga sudānu
44	yaḥ tvā nityena haviṣā yaḥ ukthaiḥ	yad tvad nitya havis yad uktha
44	piprīṣati sve āyuṣi duroṇe	piprīṣ sva āyus duroṇa
44	viśvā it asmai sudinā sā asat iṣTiḥ	viśva id idam su dina tad as iṣṭi
44	arcāmi te sumatim ghoṣi arvāk	arc tvad sumati ghuṣ arvāk
44	sam te vāvātā jaratām iyam gīḥ	sam tvad vāvātā jṛ idam gir
44	svaśvāḥ tvā surathāḥ marjayema	su aśva tvad su ratha marjay
44	asme kṣatrāṇi dhārayeḥ anu dyūn	mad kṣatra dhāray anu div
44	iha tvā bhūri ā caret upa tman	iha tvad bhūri ā car upa tman
44	doṣāvastar dīdivāṁsam anu dyūn	doṣā vastṛ dīdī anu div
44	krīLantaḥ tvā sumanasaḥ sapema	krīḍ tvad sumanas sap
44	abhi dyumnā tasthivāṁsaḥ janānām	abhi dyumna sthā jana
44	yaḥ tvā svaśvaḥ suhiraṇyaḥ agne	yad tvad su aśva su hiraṇya agni
44	upayāti vasumatā rathena	upayā vasumat ratha
44	tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā	tad trā bhū tad sakhi
44	yaḥ te ātithyam ānuṣak jujoṣat	yad tvad ātithya ānuṣak juṣ
44	mahaḥ rujāmi bandhutā vacobhiḥ	mah ruj bandhu tā vacas
44	tat mā pituḥ gotamāt anu iyāya	tad mad pitṛ gotama anu i
44	tvam naḥ asya vacasaḥ cikiddhi	tvad mad idam vacas cit
44	hotar yaviṣTha sukrato damūnāḥ	hotṛ yaviṣṭha su kratu damūnas
44	asvapnajaḥ taraṇayaḥ suśevāḥ	a svapnaj taraṇi su śeva
44	atandrāsaḥ avṛkāḥ aśramiṣThāḥ	atandra avṛka aśramiṣṭha
44	te pāyavaḥ sadhryañcaḥ niṣadya	tvad pāyu sadhryañc niṣad
44	agne tava naḥ pāntu amūra	agni tvad mad pā amūra
44	ye pāyavaḥ māmateyam te agne	yad pāyu māmateya tvad agni
44	paśyantaḥ andham duritāt arakṣan	paś andha durita rakṣ
44	rarakṣa tān sukṛtaḥ viśvavedāḥ	rakṣ tad su kṛt viśva vedas
44	dipsantaḥ it ripavaḥ na aha debhuḥ	dips id ripu na aha dabh
44	tvayā vayam sadhanyaḥ tvotāḥ	tvad mad sadhanī tvota
44	tava praṇītī aśyāma vājān	tvad praṇīti aś vāja
44	ubhā śaṁsā sūdaya satyatāte	ubh śaṃsa sūday satyatāti
44	anuṣThuyā kṛṇuhi ahrayāṇa	anuṣṭhuyā kṛ ahrayāṇa
44	ayā te agne samidhā vidhema	idam tvad agni samidh vidh
44	prati stomam śasyamānam gṛbhāya	prati stoma śaṃs gṛbhāy
44	daha aśasaḥ rakṣasaḥ pāhi asmān	dah aśas rakṣas pā mad
44	druhaḥ nidaḥ mitramahaḥ avadyāt	druh nid mitra mahat avadya
 ---
45	vaiśvānarāya mīLhuṣe sajoṣāḥ	vaiśvānara mīḍhvas sa joṣa
45	kathā dāśema agnaye bṛhat bhāḥ	kathā dāś agni bṛhat bhās
45	anūnena bṛhatā vakṣathena	anūna bṛhat vakṣatha
45	upa stabhāyat upamit na rodhaḥ	upa stabhāy upamit na rodhas
45	mā nindata yaḥ imām mahyam rātim	mā nind yad idam mad rāti
45	devaḥ dadau martyāya svadhāvān	deva dā martya svadhāvat
45	pākāya gṛtsaḥ amṛtaḥ vicetāḥ	pāka gṛtsa amṛta vicetas
45	vaiśvānaraḥ nṛtamaḥ yahvaḥ agniḥ	vaiśvānara nṛtama yahva agni
45	sāma dvibarhāḥ mahi tigmabhṛṣTiḥ	sāman dvibarhas mahi tigma bhṛṣṭi
45	sahasraretāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān	sahasra retas vṛṣabha tuviṣmat
45	padam na goḥ apagūLham vividvān	pada na go apaguh vid
45	agniḥ mahyam pra it u vocat manīṣām	agni mad pra id u vac manīṣā
45	pra tān agniḥ babhasat tigmajambhaḥ	pra tad agni bhas tigma jambha
45	tapiṣThena śociṣā yaḥ surādhāḥ	tapiṣṭha śocis yad su rādhas
45	pra ye minanti varuṇasya dhāma	pra yad mī varuṇa dhāman
45	priyā mitrasya cetataḥ dhruvāṇi	priya mitra cit dhruva
45	abhrātaraḥ na yoṣaṇaḥ vyantaḥ	a bhrātṛ na yoṣan vī
45	patiripaḥ na janayaḥ durevāḥ	pati rip na jani dureva
45	pāpāsaḥ santaḥ anṛtāḥ asatyāḥ	pāpa as anṛta asatya
45	idam padam ajanatā gabhīram	idam pada jan gabhīra
45	idam me agne kiyate pāvaka	idam mad agni kiyat pāvaka
45	aminate gurum bhāram na manma	a mī guru bhāra na manman
45	bṛhat dadhātha dhṛṣatā gabhīram	bṛhat dhṛṣ gabhīra
45	yahvam pṛṣTham prayasā saptadhātu	yahva pṛṣṭha prayas saptan dhātu
45	tam it nu eva samanā samānam	tad id nu eva samanā samāna
45	abhi kratvā punatī dhītiḥ aśyāḥ	abhi kratu pū dhīti aś
45	sasasya carman adhi cāru pṛśneḥ	sasa carman adhi cāru pṛśni
45	agre rupaḥ ārupitam jabāru	agra rup ārupita jabāru
45	pravācyam vacasaḥ kim me asya	pravac vacas ka mad idam
45	guhā hitam upa niṇik vadanti	guhā dhā upa niṇik vad
45	yat usriyāṇām apa vār iva vran	yad usriyā apa iva vṛ
45	pāti priyam rupaḥ agram padam veḥ	pā priya rup agra pada vi
45	idam u tyat mahi mahām anīkam	idam u tya mahi mah anīka
45	yat usriyā sacata pūrvyam gauḥ	yad usriyā sac pūrvya go
45	ṛtasya pade adhi dīdyānam	ṛta pada adhi dīdī
45	guhā raghuṣyat raghuyat viveda	guhā raghuṣyad raghu i vid
45	adha dyutānaḥ pitroḥ sacā āsā	adha dyut pitṛ sacā ās
45	amanuta guhyam cāru pṛśneḥ	man guh cāru pṛśni
45	mātuḥ pade parame anti sat goḥ	mātṛ pada parama anti as go
45	vṛṣṇaḥ śociṣaḥ prayatasya jihvā	vṛṣan śocis prayam jihvā
45	ṛtam voce namasā pṛchyamānaḥ	ṛta vac namas pracch
45	tava āśasā jātavedaḥ yadi idam	tvad āśas jātavedas yadi idam
45	tvam asya kṣayasi yat ha viśvam	tvad idam kṣi yad ha viśva
45	divi yat u draviṇam yat pṛthivyām	div yad u draviṇa yad pṛthivī
45	kim naḥ asya draviṇam kat ha ratnam	ka mad idam draviṇa ka ha ratna
45	vi naḥ vocaḥ jātavedaḥ cikitvān	vi mad vac jātavedas cit
45	guhā adhvanaḥ paramam yat naḥ asya	guhā adhvan parama yat mad idam
45	reku padam na nidānāḥ aganma	reku pada na nind gam
45	kā maryādā vayunā kat ha vāmam	ka maryādā vayuna ka ha vāma
45	acchā gamema raghavaḥ na vājam	acchā gam raghu na vāja
45	kadā naḥ devīḥ amṛtasya patnīḥ	kadā mad deva amṛta patnī
45	sūraḥ varṇena tatanan uṣāsaḥ	svar varṇa tan uṣas
45	anireṇa vacasā phalgvena	anira vacas phalgva
45	pratītyena kṛdhunā atṛpāsaḥ	pratītya kṛdhu atṛpa
45	adhā te agne kim ihā vadanti	adha tad agni ka iha vad
45	anāyudhāsaḥ āsatā sacantām	anāyudha ā asat sac
45	asya śriye samidhānasya vṛṣṇaḥ	idam śrī samindh vṛṣan
45	vasoḥ anīkam dame ā ruroca	vasu anīka dama ā ruc
45	ruśat vasānaḥ sudṛśīkarūpaḥ	ruśat vas sudṛśīka rūpa
45	kṣitiḥ na rāyā puruvāraḥ adyaut	kṣiti na rai puru vāra dyut
 ---
46	ūrdhvaḥ ū su naḥ adhvarasya hotar	ūrdhva u su mad adhvara hotṛ
46	agne tiṣTha devatātā yajīyān	agni sthā devatāti yajīyas
46	tvam hi viśvam abhi asi manma	tvad hi viśva abhi as manman
46	pra vedhasaḥ cit tirasi manīṣām	pra vedhas cit tṛ manīṣā
46	amūraḥ hotā ni asādi vikṣu	amūra hotṛ ni sad viś
46	agniḥ mandraḥ vidatheṣu pracetāḥ	agni mandra vidatha pracetas
46	ūrdhvam bhānum savitā iva aśret	ūrdhva bhānu savitṛ iva śri
46	metā iva dhūmam stabhāyat upa dyām	metṛ iva dhūma stabhāy upa div
46	yatā sujūrṇī rātinī ghṛtācī	yam su jūrṇi rātin ghṛtāñc
46	pradakṣiṇit devatātim urāṇaḥ	pradakṣiṇit devatāti vṛ
46	ut u svaruḥ navajāḥ na akraḥ	ud u svaru nava jā na akra
46	paśvaḥ anakti sudhitaḥ sumekaḥ	paśu añj sudhita sumeka
46	stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau	stṛ barhis samindh agni
46	ūrdhvaḥ adhvaryuḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ asthāt	ūrdhva adhvaryu juṣ sthā
46	pari agniḥ paśupāḥ na hotā	pari agni paśu pā na hotṛ
46	triviṣTi eti pradivaḥ urāṇaḥ	triviṣṭi i pradiv vṛ
46	pari tmanā mitadruḥ eti hotā	pari tman mitadru i hotṛ
46	agniḥ mandraḥ madhuvacāḥ ṛtāvā	agni mandra madhu vacas ṛtāvan
46	dravanti asya vājinaḥ na śokāḥ	dru idam vājin na śoka
46	bhayante viśvā bhuvanā yat abhrāT	bhī viśva bhuvana yat bhrāj
46	bhadrā te agne svanīka saṁdṛk	bhadra tvad agni su anīka saṃdṛś
46	ghorasya sataḥ viṣuṇasya cāruḥ	ghora as viṣuṇa cāru
46	na yat te śociḥ tamasā varanta	na yat tvad śocis tamas vṛ
46	na dhvasmānaḥ tanvī repaḥ ā dhuḥ	na dhvasman tanū repas ā dhā
46	na yasya sātuḥ janitoḥ avāri	na yad sātu jan vṛ
46	na mātarāpitarā nū cit iṣTau	na mātṛ pitṛ nu cit iṣṭi
46	adhā mitraḥ na sudhitaḥ pāvakaḥ	adha mitra na sudhita pāvaka
46	agniḥ dīdāya mānuṣīṣu vikṣu	agni dīda mānuṣa viś
46	dviḥ yam pañca jījanan saṁvasānāḥ	dvis yad pañcan jan saṃvas
46	svasāraḥ agnim mānuṣīṣu vikṣu	svasṛ agni mānuṣa viś
46	uṣarbudham atharyaḥ na dantam	uṣarbudh atharya na danta
46	śukram svāsam paraśum na tigmam	śukra svās paraśu na tigma
46	tava tye agne haritaḥ ghṛtasnāḥ	tvad tya agni harit ghṛta snā
46	rohitāsaḥ ṛjvañcaḥ svañcaḥ	rohita ṛjvañc svañc
46	aruṣāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ ṛjumuṣkāḥ	aruṣa vṛṣan ṛju muṣka
46	ā devatātim ahvanta dasmāḥ	ā devatāti hvā dasma
46	ye ha tye te sahamānāḥ ayāsaḥ	yad ha tya tvad sah ayās
46	tveṣāsaḥ agne arcayaḥ caranti	tveṣa agni arci car
46	śyenāsaḥ na duvasanāsaḥ artham	śyena na duvasana artha
46	tuviṣvaṇasaḥ mārutam na śardhaḥ	tuviṣvaṇas māruta na śardhas
46	akāri brahma samidhāna tubhyam	kṛ brahman samindh tvad
46	śaṁsāti uktham yajate vi ū dhāḥ	śaṃs uktha yaj vi ū dhā
46	hotāram agnim manuṣaḥ ni seduḥ	hotṛ agni manus ni sad
46	namasyantaḥ uśijaḥ śaṁsam āyoḥ	namasy uśij śaṃsa āyu
 ---
47	ayam iha prathamaḥ dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ	idam iha prathama dhā dhātṛ
47	hotā yajiṣThaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ	hotṛ yajiṣṭha adhvara īḍ
47	yam apnavānaḥ bhṛgavaḥ virurucuḥ	yad apnavāna bhṛgu viruc
47	vaneṣu citram vibhvam viśeviśe	vana citra vibhu viś viś
47	agne kadā te ānuṣak	agni kadā tvad ānuṣak
47	bhuvat devasya cetanam	bhū deva cetana
47	adhā hi tvā jagṛbhrire	adha hi tvad grah
47	martāsaḥ vikṣu īḍyam	marta viś īḍ
47	ṛtāvānam vicetasam	ṛtāvan vicetas
47	paśyantaḥ dyām iva stṛbhiḥ	paś div iva star
47	viśveṣām adhvarāṇām	viśva adhvara
47	haskartāram damedame	haskartṛ dama dama
47	āśum dūtam vivasvataḥ	āśu dūta vivasvant
47	viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi	viśva yad carṣaṇi abhi
47	ā jabhruḥ ketum āyavaḥ	ā bhṛ ketu āyu
47	bhṛgavāṇam viśeviśe	bhṛgavāṇa viś viś
47	tam īm hotāram ānuṣak	tad īṃ hotṛ ānuṣak
47	cikitvāṁsam ni sedire	cit ni sad
47	raṇvam pāvakaśociṣam	raṇva pāvaka śocis
47	yajiṣTham sapta dhāmabhiḥ	yajiṣṭha saptan dhāman
47	tam śaśvatīṣu mātṛṣu	tad śaśvat mātṛ
47	vane ā vītam aśritam	vana ā vye a śri
47	citram santam guhā hitam	citra as guhā dhā
47	suvedam kūcidarthinam	su veda kūcid arthin
47	sasasya yat viyutā sasmin ūdhan	sasa yat viyuti ūdhas
47	ṛtasya dhāman raṇayanta devāḥ	ṛta dhāman raṇay deva
47	mahān agniḥ namasā rātahavyaḥ	mahat agni namas rā havya
47	veḥ adhvarāya sadam it ṛtāvā	vī adhvara sadam id ṛtāvan
47	veḥ adhvarasya dūtyāni vidvān	vī adhvara dūtya vid
47	ubhe antar rodasī saṁcikitvān	ubh antar rodas saṃcit
47	dūtaḥ īyase pradivaḥ urāṇaḥ	dūta ī pradiv vṛ
47	viduṣTaraḥ divaḥ ārodhanāni	viduṣṭara div ārodhana
47	kṛṣṇam te ema ruśataḥ puraḥ bhāḥ	kṛṣṇa tvad eman ruśat puras bhās
47	cariṣṇu arciḥ vapuṣām it ekam	cariṣṇu arcis vapus id eka
47	yat apravītā dadhate ha garbham	yat a pravye dhā ha garbha
47	sadyaḥ cit jātaḥ bhavasi it u dūtaḥ	sadyas cit jan bhū id u dūta
47	sadyaḥ jātasya dadṛśānam ojaḥ	sadyas jan dṛś ojas
47	yat asya vātaḥ anuvāti śociḥ	yat idam vāta anuvā śocis
47	vṛṇakti tigmām ataseṣu jihvām	vṛj tigma atasa jihvā
47	sthirā cit annā dayate vi jambhaiḥ	sthira cit anna day vi jambha
47	tṛṣu yat annā tṛṣuṇā vavakṣa	tṛṣu yat anna tṛṣu vakṣ
47	tṛṣum dūtam kṛṇute yahvaḥ agniḥ	tṛṣu dūta kṛ yahva agni
47	vātasya meLim sacate nijūrvan	vāta meḍi sac nijūrv
47	āśum na vājayate hinve arvā	āśu na vājay hi arvan
 ---
48	dūtam vaḥ viśvavedasam	dūta tvad viśva vedas
48	havyavāham amartyam	havyavāha amartya
48	yajiṣTham ṛñjase girā	yajiṣṭha ṛj gir
48	sa hi vedā vasudhitim	tad hi vid vasu dhiti
48	mahān ārodhanam divaḥ	mahat ārodhana div
48	sa devān ā iha vakṣati	tad deva ā iha vah
48	sa veda devaḥ ānamam	tad vid deva ānam
48	devān ṛtāyate dame	deva ṛtāy dama
48	dāti priyāṇi cit vasu	dā priya cit vasu
48	sa hotā sa it u dūtyam	tad hotṛ tad id u dūtya
48	cikitvān antar īyate	cit antar i
48	vidvān ārodhanam divaḥ	vid ārodhana div
48	te syāma ye agnaye	tad as yad agni
48	dadāśuḥ havyadātibhiḥ	dāś havya dāti
48	ye īm puṣyantaḥ indhate	yad īṃ puṣ indh
48	te rāyā te suvīryaiḥ	tad rai tad su vīrya
48	sasavāṁsaḥ vi śṛṇvire	san vi śru
48	ye agnā dadhire duvaḥ	yad agni dhā duvas
48	asme rāyaḥ divedive	mad rai diva diva
48	sam carantu puruspṛhaḥ	sam car puruspṛh
48	asme vājāsaḥ īratām	mad vāja īr
48	sa vipraḥ carṣaṇīnām	tad vipra carṣaṇi
48	śavasā mānuṣāṇām	śavas mānuṣa
48	ati kṣiprā iva vidhyati	ati kṣipra iva vyadh
 ---
49	agne mṛLa mahān asi	agni mṛḍ mahat as
49	yaḥ īm ā devayum janam	yad īṃ ā devayu jana
49	iyetha barhiḥ āsadam	i barhis āsad
49	sa mānuṣīṣu dūLabhaḥ	tad mānuṣa dūḍabha
49	vikṣu prāvīḥ amartyaḥ	viś prāvī amartya
49	dūtaḥ viśveṣām bhuvat	dūta viśva bhū
49	sa sadma pari nīyate	tad sadman pari nī
49	hotā mandraḥ diviṣTiṣu	hotṛ mandra diviṣṭi
49	uta potā ni sīdati	uta potṛ ni sad
49	uta gnāḥ agniḥ adhvare	uta gnā agni adhvara
49	uta u gṛhapatiḥ dame	uta u gṛhapati dama
49	uta brahmā ni sīdati	uta brahman ni sad
49	veṣi hi adhvarīyatām	vī hi adhvarīy
49	upavaktā janānām	upavaktṛ jana
49	havyā ca mānuṣāṇām	havya ca mānuṣa
49	veṣi it u asya dūtyam	vī id u idam dūtya
49	yasya jujoṣaḥ adhvaram	yad juṣ adhvara
49	havyam martasya voLhave	havya marta vah
49	asmākam joṣi adhvaram	mad juṣ adhvara
49	asmākam yajñam aṅgiraḥ	mad yajña aṅgiras
49	asmākam śṛṇudhī havam	mad śru hava
49	pari te dūLabhaḥ rathaḥ	pari tvad dūḍabha ratha
49	asmān aśnotu viśvataḥ	mad aś viśvatas
49	yena rakṣasi dāśuṣaḥ	yad rakṣ dāś
 ---
410	agne tam adya	agni tad adya
410	aśvam na stomaiḥ	aśva na stoma
410	kratum na bhadram	kratu na bhadra
410	hṛdispṛśam ṛdhyāmā te ohaiḥ	ṛdh tvad oha
410	adhā hi agne	adha hi agni
410	kratoḥ bhadrasya	kratu bhadra
410	dakṣasya sādhoḥ	dakṣa sādhu
410	rathīḥ ṛtasya bṛhataḥ babhūtha	rathī ṛta bṛhat bhū
410	ebhiḥ naḥ arkaiḥ	idam mad arka
410	bhavā naḥ arvāṅ	bhū mad arvāñc
410	svar na jyotiḥ	svar na jyotis
410	agne viśvebhiḥ sumanāḥ anīkaiḥ	agni viśva sumanas anīka
410	ābhiḥ te adya	idam tvad adya
410	gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ	gir gṛ
410	agne dāśema	agni dāś
410	pra te divaḥ na stanayanti śuṣmāḥ	pra tvad div na stanay śuṣma
410	tava svādiṣThā	tvad svādiṣṭha
410	agne saṁdṛṣTiḥ	agni saṃdṛṣṭi
410	idā cit ahnaḥ	idā cit ahar
410	idā cit aktoḥ	idā cit aktu
410	śriye rukmaḥ na rocate upāke	śrī rukma na ruc upāka
410	ghṛtam na pūtam	ghṛta na pū
410	tanūḥ arepāḥ	tanū arepas
410	śuci hiraṇyam	śuci hiraṇya
410	tat te rukmaḥ na rocata svadhāvaḥ	tad tvad rukma na ruc svadhāvat
410	kṛtam cit hi smā	kṛ cit hi sma
410	sanemi dveṣaḥ	sanemi dveṣas
410	agne inoṣi	agni i
410	martāt itthā yajamānāt ṛtāvaḥ	itthā yaj ṛtāvan
410	śivā naḥ sakhyā	śiva mad sakhya
410	santu bhrātrā agne	as bhrātra agni
410	deveṣu yuṣme	deva tvad
410	sā naḥ nābhiḥ sadane sasmin ūdhan	tad mad nābhi sadana tad ūdhas
 ---
411	bhadram te agne sahasin anīkam	bhadra tvad agni sahasin anīka
411	upāke ā rocate sūryasya	upāka ā ruc sūrya
411	ruśat dṛśe dadṛśe naktayā cit	ruśat dṛś dṛś naktayā cit
411	arūkṣitam dṛśe ā rūpe annam	arūkṣita dṛś ā rūpa anna
411	vi sāhi agne gṛṇate manīṣām	vi sā agni gṛ manīṣā
411	kham vepasā tuvijāta stavānaḥ	kha vepas tuvi jan stu
411	viśvebhiḥ yat vāvanaḥ śukra devaiḥ	viśva yad van śukra deva
411	tat naḥ rāsva sumahaḥ bhūri manma	tad mad rā su mahat bhūri manman
411	tvat agne kāvyā tvat manīṣāḥ	tvad agni kāvya tvad manīṣā
411	tvat ukthā jāyante rādhyāni	tvad uktha jan rādh
411	tvat eti draviṇam vīrapeśāḥ	tvad i draviṇa vīra peśas
411	itthādhiye dāśuṣe martyāya	itthā dhī dāś martya
411	tvat vājī vājambharaḥ vihāyāḥ	tvad vājin vājambhara vihāyas
411	abhiṣTikṛt jāyate satyaśuṣmaḥ	abhiṣṭi kṛt jan satya śuṣma
411	tvat rayiḥ devajūtaḥ mayobhuḥ	tvad rayi deva jū mayobhu
411	tvat āśuḥ jūjuvān agne arvā	tvad āśu jū agni arvan
411	tvām agne prathamam devayantaḥ	tvad agni prathama devay
411	devam martāḥ amṛta mandrajihvam	deva marta amṛta mandra jihvā
411	dveṣoyutam ā vivāsanti dhībhiḥ	dveṣas yut ā vivās dhī
411	damūnasam gṛhapatim amūram	damūnas gṛha pati amūra
411	āre asmat amatim āre aṁhaḥ	āre mad amati āre aṃhas
411	āre viśvām durmatim yat nipāsi	āre viśva durmati yat nipā
411	doṣā śivaḥ sahasaḥ sūno agne	doṣā śiva sahas sūnu agni
411	yam devaḥ ā cit sacase svasti	yad deva ā cit sac svasti
 ---
412	yaḥ tvām agne inadhate yatasruk	yad tvad agni indh yam sruc
412	triḥ te annam kṛṇavat sasmin ahan	tris tvad anna kṛ tad ahar
412	sa su dyumnaiḥ abhi astu prasakṣat	tad su dyumna abhi as prasah
412	tava kratvā jātavedaḥ cikitvān	tvad kratu jātavedas cit
412	idhmam yaḥ te jabharat śaśramāṇaḥ	idhma yad tvad bhṛ śram
412	mahaḥ agne anīkam ā saparyan	mah agni anīka ā sapary
412	saḥ idhānaḥ prati doṣām uṣāsam	tad indh prati doṣā uṣas
412	puṣyan rayim sacate ghnan amitrān	puṣ rayi sac han amitra
412	agniḥ īśe bṛhataḥ kṣatriyasya	agni īś bṛhat kṣatriya
412	agniḥ vājasya paramasya rāyaḥ	agni vāja parama rai
412	dadhāti ratnam vidhate yaviṣThaḥ	dhā ratna vidh yaviṣṭha
412	vi ānuṣak martyāya svadhāvān	vi ānuṣak martya svadhāvat
412	yat cit hi te puruṣatrā yaviṣTha	yat cit hi tvad puruṣatrā yaviṣṭha
412	acittibhiḥ cakṛmā kat cit āgaḥ	acitti kṛ ka cit āgas
412	kṛdhī su asmān aditeḥ anāgān	kṛ su mad aditi anāga
412	vi enāṁsi śiśrathaḥ viṣvak agne	vi enas śrath viṣvañc agni
412	mahaḥ cit agne enasaḥ abhīke	mah cit agni enas abhīka
412	ūrvāt devānām uta martyānām	ūrva deva uta martya
412	mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam it riṣāma	mā tvad sakhi sadam id riṣ
412	yacchā tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ	yam toka tanaya śam yos
412	yathā ha tyat vasavaḥ gauryam cit	yathā ha tya vasu gaurī cit
412	padi sitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ	pad sā muc yajatra
412	eva u su asmat muñcatā vi aṁhaḥ	eva u su mad muc vi aṃhas
412	pra tāri agne prataram naḥ āyuḥ	pra tṛ agni prataram mad āyus
 ---
413	prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat	prati agni uṣas agra khyā
413	vibhātīnām sumanāḥ ratnadheyam	vibhā sumanas ratna dheya
413	yātam aśvinā sukṛtaḥ duroṇam	yā aśvin su kṛt duroṇa
413	ut sūryaḥ jyotiṣā devaḥ eti	ud sūrya jyotis deva i
413	ūrdhvam bhānum savitā devaḥ aśret	ūrdhva bhānu savitṛ deva śri
413	drapsam davidhvat gaviṣaḥ na satvā	drapsa dodhu gaviṣa na satvan
413	anu vratam varuṇaḥ yanti mitraḥ	anu vrata varuṇa i mitra
413	yat sūryam divi ārohayanti	yat sūrya div ārohay
413	yam sīm akṛṇvan tamase vipṛce	yad sīm kṛ tamas vipṛc
413	dhruvakṣemāḥ anavasyantaḥ artham	dhruva kṣema an avasā artha
413	tam sūryam haritaḥ sapta yahvīḥ	tad sūrya harit saptan yahva
413	spaśam viśvasya jagataḥ vahanti	spaś viśva jagant vah
413	vahiṣThebhiḥ viharan yāsi tantum	vahiṣṭha vihṛ yā tantu
413	avavyayan asitam deva vasma	avavye asita deva vasman
413	davidhvataḥ raśmayaḥ sūryasya	dodhu raśmi sūrya
413	carma iva ava adhuḥ tamaḥ apsu antar	carman iva avadhā tamas ap antar
413	anāyataḥ anibaddhaḥ kathā ayam	an āyam a nibandh kathā idam
413	nyaṅ uttānaḥ ava padyate na	nyāñc uttāna ava pad na
413	kayā yāti svadhayā kaḥ dadarśa	ka yā svadhā ka dṛś
413	divaḥ skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam	div skambha samṛch pā nāka
 ---
414	prati agniḥ uṣasaḥ jātavedāḥ	prati agni uṣas jātavedas
414	akhyat devaḥ rocamānā mahobhiḥ	khyā deva ruc mahas
414	ā nāsatyā urugāyā rathena	ā nāsatya uru gāya ratha
414	imam yajñam upa naḥ yātam accha	idam yajña upa mad yā acchā
414	ūrdhvam ketum savitā devaḥ aśret	ūrdhva ketu savitṛ deva śri
414	jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvan	jyotis viśva bhuvana kṛ
414	ā aprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam	āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣa
414	vi sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ cekitānaḥ	vi sūrya raśmi cekit
414	āvahantī aruṇīḥ jyotiṣā ā agāt	āvah aruṇī jyotis āgā
414	mahī citrā raśmibhiḥ cekitānā	mah citra raśmi cekit
414	prabodhayantī suvitāya devī	prabodhay suvita devī
414	uṣāḥ īyate suyujā rathena	uṣas ī su yuj ratha
414	ā vām vahiṣThāḥ iha te vahantu	ā tvad vahiṣṭha iha tad vah
414	rathāḥ aśvāśaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	ratha aśva uṣas vyuṣṭi
414	ime hi vām madhupeyāya somāḥ	idam hi tvad madhu peya soma
414	asmin yajñe vṛṣaṇā mādayethām	idam yajña vṛṣan māday
414	anāyataḥ anibaddhaḥ kathā ayam	an āyam a nibandh kathā idam
414	nyaṅ uttānaḥ ava padyate na	nyāñc uttāna ava pad na
414	kayā yāti svadhayā kaḥ dadarśa	ka yā svadhā ka dṛś
414	divaḥ skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam	div skambha samṛch pā nāka
 ---
415	agniḥ hotā naḥ adhvare	agni hotṛ mad adhvara
415	vājī san pari nīyate	vājin as pari nī
415	devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ	deva deva yajñiya
415	pari triviṣTi adhvaram	pari tri viṣṭi adhvara
415	yāti agniḥ rathīḥ iva	yā agni rathī iva
415	ā deveṣu prayaḥ dadhat	ā deva prayas dhā
415	pari vājapatiḥ kaviḥ	pari vāja pati kavi
415	agniḥ havyāni akramīt	agni havya kram
415	dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe	dhā ratna dāś
415	ayam yaḥ sṛñjaye puraḥ	idam yad sṛñjaya puras
415	daivavāte samidhyate	daivavāta samindh
415	dyumān amitradambhanaḥ	dyumat amitra dambhana
415	asya ghā vīraḥ īvataḥ	idam gha vīra īvat
415	agneḥ īśīta martyaḥ	agni īś martya
415	tigmajambhasya mīLhuṣaḥ	tigma jambha mīḍhvas
415	tam arvantam na sānasim	tad arvant na sānasi
415	aruṣam na divaḥ śiśum	aruṣa na div śiśu
415	marmṛjyante divedive	marmṛj diva diva
415	bodhat yat mā haribhyām	budh yat mad hari
415	kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ	kumāra sāhadevya
415	acchā na hūtaḥ ut aram	acchā na hvā ud ṛch
415	uta tyā yajatā harī	uta tya yajata hari
415	kumārāt sāhadevyāt	kumāra sāhadevya
415	prayatā sadyaḥ ā dade	prayam sadyas ā dā
415	eṣa vām devau aśvinā	etad tvad deva aśvin
415	kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ	kumāra sāhadevya
415	dīrghāyuḥ astu somakaḥ	dīrgha āyus as somaka
415	tam yuvam devau aśvinā	tad tvad deva aśvin
415	kumāram sāhadevyam	kumāra sāhadevya
415	dīrghāyuṣam kṛṇotana	dīrgha āyus kṛ
 ---
416	ā satyaḥ yātu maghavān ṛjīṣī	ā satya yā maghavan ṛjīṣin
416	dravantu asya harayaḥ upa naḥ	dru idam hari upa mad
416	tasmai it andhaḥ suṣumā sudakṣam	tad id andhas su su dakṣa
416	iha abhipitvam karate gṛṇānaḥ	iha abhipitva kṛ gṛ
416	ava sya śūra adhvanaḥ na ante	ava sā śūra adhvan na anta
416	asmin naḥ adya savane mandadhyai	idam mad adya savana mand
416	śaṁsāti uktham uśanā iva vedhāḥ	śaṃs uktha uśanas iva vedhas
416	cikituṣe asuryāya manma	cit asurya manman
416	kaviḥ na niṇyam vidathāni sādhan	kavi na niṇya vidatha sādh
416	vṛṣā yat sekam vipipānaḥ arcāt	vṛṣan yat seka vipā arc
416	divaḥ itthā jījanat sapta kārūn	div itthā jan saptan kāru
416	ahnā cit cakruḥ vayunā gṛṇantaḥ	ahar cit kṛ vayuna gṛ
416	svar yat vedi sudṛśīkam arkaiḥ	svar yat vid sudṛśīka arka
416	mahi jyotiḥ rurucuḥ yat ha vastoḥ	mahi jyotis ruc yat ha vastu
416	andhā tamāṁsi dudhitā vicakṣe	andha tamas dudhita vicakṣ
416	nṛbhyaḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ abhiṣTau	nṛ kṛ nṛtama abhiṣṭi
416	vavakṣe indraḥ amitam ṛjīṣī	vakṣ indra amita ṛjīṣin
416	ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā	ubh ā prā rodas mahitva
416	ataḥ cit asya mahimā vi reci	atas cit idam mahiman vi ric
416	abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanā babhūva	abhi yad viśva bhuvana bhū
416	viśvāni śakraḥ naryāṇi vidvān	viśva śakra narya vid
416	apaḥ rireca sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ	ap ric sakhi nikāma
416	aśmānam cit ye bibhiduḥ vacobhiḥ	aśman cit yad bhid vacas
416	vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ	vraja gomat uśij vi vṛ
416	apaḥ vṛtram vavrivāṁsam parā ahan	ap vṛtra vṛ parāhan
416	pra āvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ	prāv tvad vajra pṛthivī sacetas
416	pra arṇāṁsi samudriyāṇi ainoḥ	pra arṇas samudriya i
416	patiḥ bhavan śavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo	pati bhū śavas śūra dhṛṣṇu
416	apaḥ yat adrim puruhūta dardar	apa u yat adri puruhūta dardar
416	āviḥ bhuvat saramā pūrvyam te	āvis bhū saramā pūrvya tvad
416	sa naḥ netā vājam ā darṣi bhūrim	tad mad netṛ vāja ā dṛ bhūri
416	gotrā rujan aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ	gotra ruj aṅgiras gṛ
416	acchā kavim nṛmaṇaḥ gāḥ abhiṣTau	acchā kavi nṛmaṇas go abhiṣṭi
416	svarṣātā maghavan nādhamānam	svarṣāti maghavan nādh
416	ūtibhiḥ tam iṣaṇaḥ dyumnahūtau	ūti tad iṣan dyumna hūti
416	ni māyāvān abrahmā dasyuḥ arta	ni māyāvat abrahman dasyu ṛch
416	ā dasyughnā manasā yāhi astam	ā dasyu han manas yā asta
416	bhuvat te kutsaḥ sakhye nikāmaḥ	bhū tvad kutsa sakhya nikāma
416	sve yonau ni sadatam sarūpā	sva yoni ni sad sarūpa
416	vi vām cikitsat ṛtacit ha nārī	vi tvad cikits ṛta cit ha nārī
416	yāsi kutsena saratham avasyuḥ	yā kutsa sa ratha avasyu
416	todaḥ vātasya haryoḥ īśānaḥ	toda vāta hari īś
416	ṛjrā vājam na gadhyam yuyūṣan	ṛjra vāja na gadhya yuyūṣ
416	kaviḥ yat ahan pāryāya bhūṣāt	kavi yat ahar pārya bhūṣ
416	kutsāya śuṣṇam aśuṣam ni barhīḥ	kutsa śuṣṇa aśuṣa ni bṛṃh
416	prapitve ahnaḥ kuyavam sahasrā	prapitva ahar kuyava sahasra
416	sadyaḥ dasyūn pra mṛṇa kutsyena	sadyas dasyu pra mṛṇ kutsya
416	pra sūraḥ cakram vṛhatāt abhīke	pra svar cakra vṛh abhīka
416	tvam piprum mṛgayam śūśuvāṁsam	tvad pipru mṛgaya śvi
416	ṛjiśvane vaidathināya randhīḥ	ṛjiśvan vaidathina radh
416	pañcāśat kṛṣṇā ni vapaḥ sahasrā	pañcāśat kṛṣṇa ni vap sahasra
416	atkam na puraḥ jarimā vi dardar	atka na pur jariman vi dardar
416	sūraḥ upāke tanvam dadhānaḥ	svar upāka tanū dhā
416	vi yat te ceti amṛtasya varpaḥ	vi yat tvad cit amṛta varpas
416	mṛgaḥ na hastī taviṣīm uṣāṇaḥ	mṛga na hastin taviṣī vas
416	siṁhaḥ na bhīmaḥ āyudhāni bibhrat	siṃha na bhīma āyudha bhṛ
416	indram kāmāḥ vasūyantaḥ agman	indra kāma vasūy gam
416	svarmīLhe na savane cakānāḥ	svarmīḍha na savana kan
416	śravasyavaḥ śaśamānāsaḥ ukthaiḥ	śravasyu śam uktha
416	okaḥ na raṇvā sudṛśī iva puṣTiḥ	oka na raṇva sudṛś iva puṣṭi
416	tam it vaḥ indram suhavam huvema	tad id tvad indra su hava hvā
416	yaḥ tā cakāra naryā purūṇi	yad tad kṛ narya puru
416	yaḥ māvate jaritre gadhyam cit	yad māvat jaritṛ gadhya cit
416	makṣū vājam bharati spārharādhāḥ	makṣū vāja bhṛ spārha rādhas
416	tigmā yat antar aśaniḥ patāti	tigma yat antar aśani pat
416	kasmin cit śūra muhuke janānām	ka cit śūra muhuka jana
416	ghorā yat arya samṛtiḥ bhavāti	ghora yat arya samṛti bhū
416	adha smā naḥ tanvaḥ bodhi gopāḥ	adha sma mad tanū bhū gopā
416	bhuvaḥ avitā vāmadevasya dhīnām	bhū avitṛ vāmadeva dhī
416	bhuvaḥ sakhā avṛkaḥ vājasātau	bhū sakhi avṛka vājasāti
416	tvām anu pramatim ā jaganma	tvad anu pramati ā gam
416	uruśaṁsaḥ jaritre viśvadha syāḥ	uru śaṃsa jaritṛ viśvadha as
416	ebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ indra tvāyubhiḥ tvā	idam nṛ indra tvāyu tvad
416	maghavadbhiḥ maghavan viśve ājau	maghavan maghavan viśva āji
416	dyāvaḥ na dyumnaiḥ abhi santaḥ aryaḥ	div na dyumna abhi as ari
416	kṣapaḥ madema śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ	kṣap mad śarad ca puru
416	eva it indrāya vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe	eva id indra vṛṣabha vṛṣan
416	brahma akarma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham	brahman kṛ bhṛgu na ratha
416	nū cit yathā naḥ sakhyā viyoṣat	nu cit yathā mad sakhya viyu
416	asat naḥ ugraḥ avitā tanūpāḥ	as mad ugra avitṛ tanū pā
416	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
416	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
416	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
416	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
417	tvam mahān indra tubhyam ha kṣāḥ	tvad mahat indra tvad ha kṣā
417	anu kṣatram maṁhanā manyata dyauḥ	anu kṣatra maṃhanā man div
417	tvam vṛtram śavasā jaghanvān	tvad vṛtra śavas han
417	sṛjaḥ sindhūn ahinā jagrasānān	sṛj sindhu ahi gras
417	tava tviṣaḥ janiman rejata dyauḥ	tvad tviṣ janiman rej div
417	ejat bhūmiḥ bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ	rej bhūmi bhiyas sva manyu
417	ṛghāyanta subhvaḥ parvatāsaḥ	ṛghāy su bhū parvata
417	ārdan dhanvāni sarayante āpaḥ	ṛd dhanvan saray ap
417	bhinat girim śavasā vajram iṣṇan	bhid giri śavas vajra iṣ
417	āviṣkṛṇvānaḥ sahasānaḥ ojaḥ	āviṣkṛ sah ojas
417	vadhīt vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ	vadh vṛtra vajra mand
417	saran āpaḥ javasā hatavṛṣṇīḥ	sṛ ap javas han vṛṣṇi
417	suvīraḥ te janitā manyata dyauḥ	su vīra tvad janitṛ man div
417	indrasya kartā svapastamaḥ bhūt	indra kartṛ su apastama bhū
417	yaḥ īm jajāna svaryam suvajram	yad īṃ jan svarya su vajra
417	anapacyutam sadasaḥ na bhūma	an apacyu sadas na bhūman
417	yaḥ ekaḥ it cyāvayati pra bhūmā	yad eka id cyāvay pra bhūman
417	rājā kṛṣTīnām puruhūtaḥ indraḥ	rājan kṛṣṭi puruhūta indra
417	satyam enam anu viśve madanti	satya enad anu viśva mad
417	rātim devasya gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ	rāti deva gṛ maghavan
417	satrā somāḥ abhavan asya viśve	satrā soma bhū idam viśva
417	satrā madāsaḥ bṛhataḥ madiṣThāḥ	satrā mada bṛhat madiṣṭha
417	satrā abhavaḥ vasupatiḥ vasūnām	satrā bhū vasu pati vasu
417	datre viśvāḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣTīḥ	dattra viśva dhā indra kṛṣṭi
417	tvam adha prathamam jāyamānaḥ	tvad adha prathamam jan
417	ame viśvāḥ adhithāḥ indra kṛṣTīḥ	ama viśva dhā indra kṛṣṭī
417	tvam prati pravataḥ āśayānam	tva prati pravat āśī
417	ahim vajreṇa maghavan vi vṛścaḥ	ahi vajra maghavan vi vraśc
417	satrāhaṇam dādhṛṣim tumram indram	satrāhan dādhṛṣi tumra indra
417	mahām apāram vṛṣabham suvajram	mahat apāra vṛṣabha su vajra
417	hantā yaḥ vṛtram sanitā uta vājam	han yad vṛtra san uta vāja
417	dātā maghāni maghavā surādhāḥ	dā magha maghavan su rādhas
417	ayam vṛtaḥ cātayate samīcīḥ	idam vṛt cātay samyañc
417	yaḥ ājiṣu maghavā śṛṇve ekaḥ	yad āji maghavan śru eka
417	ayam vājam bharati yam sanoti	idam vāja bhṛ yad san
417	asya priyāsaḥ sakhye syāma	idam priya sakhya as
417	ayam śṛṇve adha jayan uta ghnan	idam śru adha ji uta han
417	ayam uta pra kṛṇute yudhā gāḥ	idam uta pra kṛ yudh go
417	yadā satyam kṛṇute manyum indraḥ	yadā satya kṛ manyu indra
417	viśvam dṛLham bhayate ejat asmāt	viśva dṛḍha bhī ej idam
417	sam indraḥ gāḥ ajayat sam hiraṇyā	sam indra go ji sam hiraṇya
417	sam aśviyā maghavā yaḥ ha pūrvīḥ	sam aśviya maghavan yad ha puru
417	ebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ nṛtamaḥ asya śākaiḥ	idam nṛ nṛtama idam śāka
417	rāyaḥ vibhaktā sambharaḥ ca vasvaḥ	rai vibhaj sambhara ca vasu
417	kiyat svit indraḥ adhi eti mātuḥ	kiyat svid indra adhi i mātṛ
417	kiyat pituḥ janituḥ yaḥ jajāna	kiyat pitṛ janitṛ yad jan
417	yaḥ asya śuṣmam muhukaiḥ iyarti	yad idam śuṣma muhuka ṛch
417	vātaḥ na jūtaḥ stanayadbhiḥ abhraiḥ	vāta na jū stanay abhra
417	kṣiyantam tvam akṣiyantam kṛṇoti	kṣi tvad a kṣi kṛ
417	iyarti reṇum maghavā samoham	ṛch reṇu maghavan sa moha
417	vibhañjanuḥ aśanimān iva dyauḥ	vibhañjanu aśanimat iva div
417	uta stotāram maghavā vasau dhāt	uta stotṛ maghavan vasu dhā
417	ayam cakram iṣaṇat sūryasya	idam cakra iṣ sūrya
417	ni etaśam rīramat sasṛmāṇam	ni etaśa ram sṛ
417	ā kṛṣṇaḥ īm juhurāṇaḥ jigharti	ā kṛṣṇa īṃ hvṛ ghṛ
417	tvacaḥ budhne rajasaḥ asya yonau	tvac budhna rajas idam yoni
417	asiknyām yajamānaḥ na hotā	asiknī yaj na hotṛ
417	gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ	gavyat indra sakhya vipra
417	aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ	aśvāyat vṛṣan vājay
417	janīyantaḥ janidām akṣitotim	janīy jani dā akṣitoti
417	ā cyāvayāmaḥ avate na kośam	ā cyāvay avata na kośa
417	trātā naḥ bodhi dadṛśānaḥ āpiḥ	trā mad bhū dṛś āpi
417	abhikhyātā marḍitā somyānām	abhikhyātṛ marḍitṛ somya
417	sakhā pitā pitṛtamaḥ pitṛṛṇām	sakhi pitṛ pitṛtama pitṛ
417	kartā īm ulokam uśate vayodhāḥ	kṛ īṃ u loka vaś vayas dhā
417	sakhīyatām avitā bodhi sakhā	sakhīy av bhū sakhi
417	gṛṇānaḥ indra stuvate vayaḥ dhāḥ	gṛ indra stu vayas dhā
417	vayam hi ā te cakṛmā sabādhaḥ	mad hi ā tvad kṛ sabādh
417	ābhiḥ śamībhiḥ mahayantaḥ indra	idam śamī mahay indra
417	stutaḥ indraḥ maghavā yat ha vṛtrā	stu indra maghavan yat ha vṛtra
417	bhūrīṇi ekaḥ apratīni hanti	bhūri eka aprati han
417	asya priyaḥ jaritā yasya śarman	idam priya jaritṛ yad śarman
417	nakiḥ devāḥ vārayante na martāḥ	nakir deva vāray na marta
417	evā naḥ indraḥ maghavā virapśī	eva mad indra maghavan virapśin
417	karat satyā carṣaṇīdhṛt anarvā	kṛ satya carṣaṇī dhṛt anarvan
417	tvam rājā januṣām dhehi asme	tvad rājan janus dhā mad
417	adhi śravaḥ māhinam yat jaritre	adhi śravas māhina yad jaritṛ
417	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
417	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
417	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
417	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
418	ayam panthāḥ anuvittaḥ purāṇaḥ	idam pathin anuvid purāṇa
418	yataḥ devāḥ udajāyanta viśve	yatas deva ujjan viśva
418	ataḥ cit ā janiṣīṣTa pravṛddhaḥ	atas cit ā jan pravṛdh
418	mā mātaram amuyā pattave kar	mā mātṛ adas pat kṛ
418	na aham ataḥ niḥ ayā durgahā etat	na mad atas niḥ i durgaha etad
418	tiraścatā pārśvāt niḥ gamāni	tiraścatā pārśva niḥ gam
418	bahūni me akṛtā kartvāni	bahu mad a kṛ kṛ
418	yudhyai tvena sam tvena pṛcchai	yudh tva sam tva pracch
418	parāyatīm mātaram anu acaṣTa	pare mātṛ anu cakṣ
418	na na anu gāni anu nū gamāni	na na anu gā anu nu gam
418	tvaṣTuḥ gṛhe apibat somam indraḥ	tvaṣṭṛ gṛha pā soma indra
418	śatadhanyam camvoḥ sutasya	śata dhanya camū su
418	kim saḥ ṛdhak kṛṇavat yam sahasram	kim tad ṛdhak kṛ yad sahasra
418	māsaḥ jabhāra śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ	mās bhṛ śarad ca puru
418	nahī nu asya pratimānam asti	nahi nu idam pratimāna as
418	antar jāteṣu uta ye janitvāḥ	antar jan uta yad jan
418	avadyam iva manyamānā guhā akar	avadya iva man guhā kṛ
418	indram mātā vīryeṇā nyṛṣTam	indra mātṛ vīrya ā nyṛṣ
418	atha ut asthāt svayam atkam vasānaḥ	atha ud sthā svayam atka vas
418	ā rodasī apṛṇāt jāyamānaḥ	ā rodas pṛ jan
418	etāḥ arṣanti alalābhavantīḥ	etad ṛṣ alalābhavat
418	ṛtāvarīḥ iva saṁkrośamānāḥ	ṛtāvan iva saṃkruś
418	etāḥ vi pṛccha kim idam bhananti	etad vi pracch ka idam bhan
418	kam āpaḥ adrim paridhim rujanti	ka ap adri paridhi ruj
418	kim u svit asmai nividaḥ bhananta	ka u svid idam nivid bhan
418	indrasya avadyam didhiṣante āpaḥ	indra avadya didhiṣ ap
418	mama etān putraḥ mahatā vadhena	mad etad putra mahat vadha
418	vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat vi sindhūn	vṛtra han sṛj vi sindhu
418	mamat cana tvā yuvatiḥ parāsa	mamat cana tvad yuvati parās
418	mamat cana tvā kuṣavā jagāra	mamat cana tvad kuṣavā gṛ
418	mamat cit āpaḥ śiśave mamṛḍyuḥ	mamat cit ap śiśu mṛḍ
418	mamat cit indraḥ sahasā ut atiṣThat	mamat cit indra sahas ud sthā
418	mamat cana te maghavan vyaṁsaḥ	mamat cana tvad maghavan vyaṃsa
418	nivividhvān apa hanū jaghāna	nivyadh apa hanu han
418	adhā nividdhaḥ uttaraḥ babhūvān	adha nivyadh uttara bhū
418	śiraḥ dāsasya sam piṇak vadhena	śiras dāsa sam piṣ vadha
418	gṛṣTiḥ sasūva sthaviram tavāgām	gṛṣṭi sū sthavira tavāgā
418	anādhṛṣyam vṛṣabham tumram indram	anādhṛṣya vṛṣabha tumra indra
418	arīLham vatsam carathāya mātā	a rih vatsa caratha mātṛ
418	svayam gātum tanve icchamānam	svayam gā tanū iṣ
418	uta mātā mahiṣam anu avenat	uta mātṛ mahiṣa anu ven
418	amī tvā jahati putra devāḥ	adas tvad hā putra deva
418	atha abravīt vṛtram indraḥ haniṣyan	atha brū vṛtra indra han
418	sakhe viṣṇo vitaram vi kramasva	sakhi viṣṇu vitaram vi kram
418	kaḥ te mātaram vidhavām acakrat	ka tvad mātṛ vidhavā kṛ
418	śayum kaḥ tvām ajighāṁsat carantam	śayu ka tvad jighāṃs car
418	kaḥ te devaḥ adhi mārḍīke āsīt	ka tvad deva adhi mārḍīka as
418	yat pra akṣiṇāḥ pitaram pādagṛhya	yat prakṣi pitṛ pādagṛhya
418	avartyā śunaḥ āntrāṇi pece	avarti śvan āntra pac
418	na deveṣu vivide marḍitāram	na deva vid marḍitṛ
418	apaśyam jāyām amahīyamānām	paś jāyā a mahīy
418	adhā me śyenaḥ madhu ā jabhāra	adha mad śyena madhu ā bhṛ
 ---
419	evā tvām indra vajrin atra	eva tvad indra vajrin atra
419	viśve devāsaḥ suhavāsaḥ ūmāḥ	viśva deva su hava ūma
419	mahām ubhe rodasī vṛddham ṛṣvam	mahat ubh rodas vṛdh ṛṣva
419	niḥ ekam it vṛṇate vṛtrahatye	niḥ eka id vṛ vṛtra hatya
419	ava asṛjanta jivrayaḥ na devāḥ	avasṛj jivri na deva
419	bhuvaḥ samrāT indra satyayoniḥ	bhū samrāj indra satya yoni
419	ahan ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ	han ahi pariśī arṇas
419	pra vartanīḥ aradaḥ viśvadhenāḥ	pra vartani rad viśvadhena
419	atṛpṇuvantam viyatam abudhyam	a tṛp viyam a budh
419	abudhyamānam suṣupāṇam indra	a budh svap indra
419	sapta prati pravataḥ āśayānam	saptan prati pravat āśī
419	ahim vajreṇa vi riṇāḥ aparvan	ahi vajra vi ri a parvan
419	akṣodayat śavasā kṣāma budhnam	kṣoday śavas kṣāman budhna
419	vār na vātaḥ taviṣībhiḥ indraḥ	vār na vāta taviṣī indra
419	dṛLhāni aubhnāt uśamānaḥ ojaḥ	dṛḍha ubh vaś ojas
419	ava abhinat kakubhaḥ parvatānām	avabhid kakubh parvata
419	abhi pra dadruḥ janayaḥ na garbham	abhi pra dṛ jani na garbha
419	rathāḥ iva pra yayuḥ sākam adrayaḥ	ratha iva pra yā sākam adri
419	atarpayaḥ visṛtaḥ ubjaḥ ūrmīn	tarpay visṛt ubj ūrmi
419	tvam vṛtān ariṇāḥ indra sindhūn	tvad vṛ ri indra sindhu
419	tvam mahīm avanim viśvadhenām	tvad mah avani viśvadhena
419	turvītaye vayyāya kṣarantīm	turvīti vayya kṣar
419	aramayaḥ namasā ejat arṇaḥ	ramay namas ej arṇas
419	sutaraṇān akṛṇoḥ indra sindhūn	su taraṇa kṛ indra sindhu
419	pra agruvaḥ nabhanvaḥ na vakvāḥ	pra agru nabhanu na vakva
419	dhvasrāḥ apinvat yuvatīḥ ṛtajñāḥ	dhvasra pinv yuvatī ṛta jña
419	dhanvāni ajrān apṛṇak tṛṣāṇān	dhanvan ajra pṛc tṛṣ
419	adhok indraḥ staryaḥ daṁsupatnīḥ	duh indra starī daṃsu patnī
419	pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ śaradaḥ ca gūrtāḥ	puru uṣas śarad ca gur
419	vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat vi sindhūn	vṛtra han sṛj vi sindhu
419	pariṣThitāḥ atṛṇat badbadhānāḥ	pariṣṭhā tṛd badbadh
419	sīrāḥ indraḥ sravitave pṛthivyā	sīrā indra sru pṛthivī
419	vamrībhiḥ putram agruvaḥ adānam	vamra putra agru ad
419	niveśanāt harivaḥ ā jabhartha	niveśana harivat ā bhṛ
419	vi andhaḥ akhyat ahim ādadānaḥ	vi andha khyā ahi ādā
419	niḥ bhūt ukhacchit sam aranta parva	niḥ bhū ukha chid sam ṛch parvan
419	pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vipra	pra tvad pūrva karaṇa vipra
419	āvidvān āha viduṣe karāṁsi	a vid ah vid karas
419	yathāyathā vṛṣṇyāni svagūrtā	yathā yathā vṛṣṇya sva gur
419	apāṁsi rājan naryā aviveṣīḥ	apas rājan narya viṣ
419	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
419	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
419	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
419	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
420	ā naḥ indraḥ dūrāt ā naḥ āsāt	ā mad indra dūrāt ā mad āsāt
420	abhiṣTikṛt avase yāsat ugraḥ	abhiṣṭi kṛt av yā ugra
420	ojiṣThebhiḥ nṛpatiḥ vajrabāhuḥ	ojiṣṭha nṛpati vajra bāhu
420	saṁge samatsu turvaṇiḥ pṛtanyūn	saṃga samad turvaṇi pṛtanyu
420	ā naḥ indraḥ haribhiḥ yātu accha	ā mad indra hari yā acchā
420	arvācīnaḥ avase rādhase ca	arvācīna avas rādhas ca
420	tiṣThāti vajrī maghavā virapśī	sthā vajrin maghavan virapśin
420	imam yajñam anu naḥ vājasātau	idam yajña anu mad vājasāti
420	imam yajñam tvam asmākam indra	idam yajña tvad mad indra
420	puraḥ dadhat saniṣyasi kratum naḥ	puras dhā san kratu mad
420	śvaghnī iva vajrin sanaye dhanānām	śvaghnin iva vajrin sani dhana
420	tvayā vayam aryaḥ ājim jayema	tvad mad ari āji ji
420	uśan u su naḥ sumanāḥ upāke	vaś u su mad sumanas upāka
420	somasya nu suṣutasya svadhāvaḥ	soma nu su su svadhāvat
420	pāḥ indra pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ	pā indra pratibhṛ madhu
420	sam andhasā mamadaḥ pṛṣThyena	sam andhas mad pṛṣṭhya
420	vi yaḥ rarapśe ṛṣibhiḥ navebhiḥ	vi yad rapś ṛṣi nava
420	vṛkṣaḥ na pakvaḥ sṛṇyaḥ na jetā	vṛkṣa na pakva sṛṇya na jetṛ
420	maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi manyamānaḥ	marya na yoṣā abhi man
420	acchā vivakmi puruhūtam indram	acchā vac puruhūta indra
420	giriḥ na yaḥ svatavān ṛṣvaḥ indraḥ	giri na yad svatavas ṛṣva indra
420	sanāt eva sahase jātaḥ ugraḥ	sanāt eva sahas jan ugra
420	ādartā vrajam* sthaviram na bhīmaḥ	ādṛ vajra sthavira na bhīma
420	udnā iva kośam vasunā nyṛṣTam	udan iva kośa vasu nyṛṣ
420	na yasya vartā januṣā nu asti	na yad vartṛ janus nu as
420	na rādhasaḥ āmarītā maghasya	na rādhas āmarītṛ magha
420	udvāvṛṣāṇaḥ taviṣīvaḥ ugra	udvṛṣ taviṣīvat ugra
420	asmabhyam daddhi puruhūta rāyaḥ	mad dā puruhūta rai
420	īkṣe rāyaḥ kṣayasya carṣaṇīnām	īś rai kṣaya carṣaṇi
420	uta vrajam apavartā asi gonām	uta vraja apavṛ go
420	śikṣānaraḥ samitheṣu prahāvān	śikṣā nara samitha prahāvat
420	vasvaḥ rāśim abhinetā asi bhūrim	vasu rāśi abhinī bhūri
420	kayā tat śṛṇve śacyā śaciṣThaḥ	ka tad śru śacī śaciṣṭha
420	yayā kṛṇoti muhu kā cit ṛṣvaḥ	yad kṛ muhu ka cit ṛṣva
420	puru dāśuṣe vicayiṣThaḥ aṁhaḥ	puru dāś vicayiṣṭha aṃhas
420	athā dadhāti draviṇam jaritre	atha dhā draviṇa jaritṛ
420	mā naḥ mardhīḥ ā bharā daddhi tat naḥ	mā mad mṛdh ā bhṛ dā tad mad
420	pra dāśuṣe dātave bhūri yat te	pra dāś dā bhūri yad tvad
420	navye deṣṇe śaste asmin te ukthe	navya deṣṇa śaṃs idam tvad uktha
420	pra bravāma vayam indra stuvantaḥ	pra brū mad indra stu
420	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
420	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
420	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
420	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
421	ā yātu indraḥ avase upa naḥ	ā yā indra av upa mad
421	iha stutaḥ sadhamāt astu śūraḥ	iha stu sadhamād as śūra
421	vāvṛdhānaḥ taviṣīḥ yasya pūrvīḥ	vṛdh taviṣī yad puru
421	dyauḥ na kṣatram abhibhūti puṣyāt	div na kṣatra abhibhūti puṣ
421	tasya it iha stavatha vṛṣṇyāni	tad id iha stu vṛṣṇya
421	tuvidyumnasya tuvirādhasaḥ nṛṛn	tuvi dyumna tuvi rādhas nṛ
421	yasya kratuḥ vidathyaḥ na samrāT	yad kratu vidathya na samrāj
421	sāhvān tarutraḥ abhi asti kṛṣTīḥ	sah tarutra abhi as kṛṣṭi
421	ā yātu indraḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ	ā yā indra div ā pṛthivī
421	makṣū samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt	makṣū samudra uta vā purīṣa
421	svarṇarāt avase naḥ marutvān	svarṇara av mad marutvat
421	parāvataḥ vā sadanāt ṛtasya	parāvat vā sadana ṛta
