421	sthūrasya rāyaḥ bṛhataḥ yaḥ īśe	sthūra rai bṛhat yad īś
421	tam u stavāma vidatheṣu indram	tad u stu vidatha indra
421	yaḥ vāyunā jayati gomatīṣu	yad vāyu ji gomatī
421	pra dhṛṣṇuyā nayati vasyaḥ accha	pra dhṛṣṇuyā nī vasyas acchā
421	upa yaḥ namaḥ namasi stabhāyan	upa yad namas namas stabhāy
421	iyarti vācam janayan yajadhyai	ṛch vāc janay yaj
421	ṛñjasānaḥ puruvāraḥ ukthaiḥ	ṛj puru vāra uktha
421	ā indram kṛṇvīta sadaneṣu hotā	ā indra kṛ sadana hotṛ
421	dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇyantaḥ saraṇyān	dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇy saraṇy
421	sadantaḥ adrim auśijasya gohe	sad adri auśija goha
421	ā duroṣāḥ pāstyasya hotā	ā duroṣas pāstya hotṛ
421	yaḥ naḥ mahān saṁvaraṇeṣu vahniḥ	yad mad mahat saṃvaraṇa vahni
421	satrā yat īm bhārvarasya vṛṣṇaḥ	satrā yat īṃ bhārvara vṛṣan
421	siṣakti śuṣmaḥ stuvate bharāya	sac śuṣman stu bhara
421	guhā yat īm auśijasya gohe	guhā yat īṃ auśija goha
421	pra yat dhiye pra ayase madāya	pra yat dhī prāyas mada
421	vi yat varāṁsi parvatasya vṛṇve	vi yat varas parvata vṛ
421	payobhiḥ jinve apām javāṁsi	payas jinv ap javas
421	vidat gaurasya gavayasya gohe	vid gaura gavaya goha
421	yadī vājāya sudhyaḥ vahanti	yadi vāja sudhī vah
421	bhadrā te hastā sukṛtā uta pāṇī	bhadra tvad hasta su kṛ uta pāṇi
421	prayantārā stuvate rādhaḥ indra	prayantṛ stu rādhas indra
421	kā te niṣattiḥ kim u na u mamatsi	ka tvad niṣatti kim u na u mad
421	kim na udut u harṣase dātavai u	kim na ud ud u hṛṣ dā u
421	evā vasvaḥ indraḥ satyaḥ samrāT	eva vasu indra satya samrāj
421	hantā vṛtram varivaḥ pūrave kar	han vṛtra varivas pūru kṛ
421	puruṣTuta kratvā naḥ śagdhi rāyaḥ	puruṣṭuta kratu mad śak rai
421	bhakṣīya te avasaḥ daivyasya	bhakṣ tvad avas daivya
421	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
421	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
421	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
421	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
422	yat naḥ indraḥ jujuṣe yat ca vaṣTi	yad mad indra juṣ yad ca vaś
422	tat naḥ mahān karati śuṣmī ā cit	tad mad mahat kṛ śuṣmin ā cit
422	brahma stomam maghavā somam ukthā	brahman stoma maghavan soma uktha
422	yaḥ aśmānam śavasā bibhrat eti	yad aśman śavas bhṛ i
422	vṛṣā vṛṣandhim caturaśrim asyan	vṛṣan vṛṣaṃdhi catur asra as
422	ugraḥ bāhubhyām nṛtamaḥ śacīvān	ugra bāhu nṛtama śacīvat
422	śriye paruṣṇīm uṣamāṇaḥ ūrṇām	śrī paruṣṇī vas ūrṇā
422	yasyāḥ parvāṇi sakhyāya vivye	yad parvan sakhya vī
422	yaḥ devaḥ devatamaḥ jāyamānaḥ	yad deva devatama jan
422	mahaḥ vājebhiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca śuṣmaiḥ	maha vāja mahat ca śuṣma
422	dadhānaḥ vajram bāhvoḥ uśantam	dhā vajra bāhu vaś
422	dyām amena rejayat pra bhūma	div ama rejay pra bhūman
422	viśvā rodhāṁsi pravataḥ ca pūrvīḥ	viśva rodhas pravat ca puru
422	dyauḥ ṛṣvāt janiman rejata kṣāḥ	div ṛṣva janiman rej kṣā
422	ā mātarā bharati śuṣmī ā goḥ	ā mātṛ bhṛ śuṣmin ā go
422	nṛvat parijman nonuvanta vātāḥ	nṛvat parijman nonāv vāta
422	tā tū te indra mahataḥ mahāni	tad tu tvad indra mahat maha
422	viśveṣu it savaneṣu pravācyā	viśva id savana pravac
422	yat śūra dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā dadhṛṣvān	yat śūra dhṛṣṇu dhṛṣ dhṛṣ
422	ahim vajreṇa śavasā aviveṣīḥ	ahi vajra śavas viṣ
422	tā tū te satyā tuvinṛmṇa viśvā	tad tu tvad satya tuvi nṛmṇa viśva
422	pra dhenavaḥ sisrate vṛṣṇaḥ ūdhnaḥ	pra dhenu sṛ vṛṣan ūdhas
422	adhā ha tvat vṛṣamaṇaḥ bhiyānāḥ	adha ha tvad vṛṣamaṇas bhī
422	pra sindhavaḥ javasā cakramanta	pra sindhu javas kram
422	atra aha te harivaḥ tāḥ u devīḥ	atra aha tvad harivat tad u deva
422	avobhiḥ indra stavanta svasāraḥ	avas indra stu svasṛ
422	yat sīm anu pra mucaḥ badbadhānāḥ	yat sīm anu pra muc badbadh
422	dīrghām anu prasitim syandayadhyai	dīrgha anu prasiti syanda ya dhī
422	pipīLe aṁśuḥ madyaḥ na sindhuḥ	pīḍ aṃśu mad na sindhu
422	ā tvā śamī śaśamānasya śaktiḥ	ā tvad śamī śam śakti
422	asmadryak śuśucānasya yamyāḥ	asmadryañc śuc yam
422	āśuḥ na raśmim tuvyojasam goḥ	āśu na raśmi tuvi ojas go
422	asme varṣiṣThā kṛṇuhi jyeṣThā	mad varṣiṣṭha kṛ jyeṣṭha
422	nṛmṇāni satrā sahure sahāṁsi	nṛmṇa satrā sahuri sahas
422	asmabhyam vṛtrā suhanāni randhi	mad vṛtra su hana radh
422	jahi vadhar vanuṣaḥ martyasya	han vadhar vanus martya
422	asmākam it su śṛṇuhi tvam indra	mad id su śru tvad indra
422	asmabhyam citrān upa māhi vājān	mad citra upa mā vāja
422	asmabhyam viśvāḥ iṣaṇaḥ puraṁdhīḥ	mad viśva puraṃdhi
422	asmākam su maghavan bodhi godāḥ	mad su maghavan bhū go dā
422	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
422	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
422	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
422	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
423	kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotuḥ	kathā mahat vṛdh ka hotṛ
423	yajñam juṣāṇaḥ abhi somam ūdhar	yajña juṣ abhi soma ūdhas
423	piban uśānaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ andhaḥ	pā vaś juṣ andhas
423	vavakṣe ṛṣvaḥ śucate dhanāya	vakṣ ṛṣva śuc dhana
423	kaḥ asya vīraḥ sadhamādam āpa	ka idam vīra sadhamād āp
423	sam ānaṁśa sumatibhiḥ kaḥ asya	sam aś sumati ka idam
423	kat asya citram cikite kat ūtī	kad idam citra cit kad ūti
423	vṛdhe bhuvat śaśamānasya yajyoḥ	vṛdh bhū śam yajyu
423	kathā śṛṇoti hūyamānam indraḥ	kathā śru hvā indra
423	kathā śṛṇvan avasām asya veda	kathā śru avas idam vid
423	kāḥ asya pūrvīḥ upamātayaḥ ha	ka idam puru upamāti ha
423	kathā enam āhuḥ papurim jaritre	kathā enad ah papuri jaritṛ
423	kathā sabādhaḥ śaśamānaḥ asya	kathā sabādhas śam idam
423	naśat abhi draviṇam dīdhyānaḥ	naś abhi draviṇa dhī
423	devaḥ bhuvat navedāḥ me ṛtānām	deva bhū navedas mad ṛta
423	namaḥ jagṛbhvān abhi yat jujoṣat	namas grah abhi yad juṣ
423	kathā kat asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	kathā ka idam uṣas vyuṣṭi
423	devaḥ martasya sakhyam jujoṣa	deva marta sakhya juṣ
423	kathā kat asya sakhyam sakhibhyaḥ	kathā ka idam sakhya sakhi
423	ye asmin kāmam suyujam tatasre	yad idam kāma su yuj taṃs
423	kim āt amatram sakhyam sakhibhyaḥ	kim āt amatra sakhya sakhi
423	kadā nu te bhrātram pra bravāma	kadā nu tvad bhrātra pra brū
423	śriye sudṛśaḥ vapuḥ asya sargāḥ	śrī sudṛś vapus idam sarga
423	svar na citratamam iṣe ā goḥ	svar na citratama iṣ ā go
423	druham jighāṁsan dhvarasam anindrām	druh jighāṃs dhvaras an indra
423	tetikte tigmā tujase anīkā	tetij tigma tuj anīka
423	ṛṇā cit yatra ṛṇayāḥ naḥ ugraḥ	ṛṇa cit yatra ṛṇayā mad ugra
423	dūre ajñātāḥ uṣasaḥ babādhe	dūra ajñāta uṣas bādh
423	ṛtasya hi śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ	ṛta hi śurudh as puru
423	ṛtasya dhītiḥ vṛjināni hanti	ṛta dhīti vṛjina han
423	ṛtasya ślokaḥ badhirā tatarda	ṛta śloka badhira tṛd
423	karṇā budhānaḥ śucamānaḥ āyoḥ	karṇa budh śuc āyu
423	ṛtasya dṛLhā dharuṇāni santi	ṛta dṛḍha dharuṇa as
423	purūṇi candrā vapuṣe vapūṁṣi	puru candra vapus vapus
423	ṛtena dīrgham iṣaṇanta pṛkṣaḥ	ṛta dīrgha iṣaṇ pṛkṣ
423	ṛtena gāvaḥ ṛtam ā viveśuḥ	ṛta go ṛta ā viś
423	ṛtam yemānaḥ ṛtam it vanoti	ṛta yam ṛta id van
423	ṛtasya śuṣmaḥ turayāḥ u gavyuḥ	ṛta śuṣma tura yā u gavyu
423	ṛtāya pṛthvī bahule gabhīre	ṛta pṛthu bahula gabhīra
423	ṛtāya dhenū parame duhāte	ṛta dhenu parama duh
423	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
423	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
423	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
423	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
424	kā suṣTutiḥ śavasaḥ sūnum indram	ka suṣṭuti śavas sūnu indra
424	arvācīnam rādhase ā vavartat	arvācīna rādhas ā vṛt
424	dadiḥ hi vīraḥ gṛṇate vasūni	dadi hi vīra gṛ vasu
424	sa gopatiḥ niṣṣidhām naḥ janāsaḥ	tad go pati niṣṣidh mad jana
424	sa vṛtrahatye havyaḥ saḥ īḍyaḥ	tad vṛtra hatya hvā tad īḍ
424	sa suṣTutaḥ indraḥ satyarādhāḥ	tad suṣṭuta indra satya rādhas
424	sa yāman ā maghavā martyāya	tad yāman ā maghavan martya
424	brahmaṇyate suṣvaye varivaḥ dhāt	brahmaṇy suṣvi varivas dhā
424	tam it naraḥ vi hvayante samīke	tad id nṛ vi hvā samīka
424	ririkvāṁsaḥ tanvaḥ kṛṇvata trām	ric tanū kṛ trā
424	mithaḥ yat tyāgam ubhayāsaḥ agman	mithas yat tyāga ubhaya gam
424	naraḥ tokasya tanayasya sātau	nṛ toka tanaya sāti
424	kratūyanti kṣitayaḥ yoge ugra	kratūy kṣiti yoga ugra
424	āśuṣāṇāsaḥ mithaḥ arṇasātau	āśuṣ mithas arṇa sāti
424	sam yat viśaḥ avavṛtranta yudhmāḥ	sam yat viś vṛt yudhma
424	āt it neme indrayante abhīke	āt id nema indray abhīka
424	āt it ha neme indriyam yajante	āt id ha nema indriya yaj
424	āt it paktiḥ puroLāśam riricyāt	āt id pakti puroḍāś ric
424	āt it somaḥ vi papṛcyāt asuṣvīn	āt id soma vi pṛc a suṣvi
424	āt it jujoṣa vṛṣabham yajadhyai	āt id juṣ vṛṣabha yaj
424	kṛṇoti asmai varivaḥ yaḥ itthā	kṛ idam varivas yad itthā
424	indrāya somam uśate sunoti	indra soma vaś su
424	sadhrīcīnena manasā avivenan	sadhrīcīna manas a viven
424	tam it sakhāyam kṛṇute samatsu	tad id sakhi kṛ samad
424	yaḥ indrāya sunavat somam adya	yad indra su soma adya
424	pacāt paktīḥ uta bhṛjjāti dhānāḥ	pac pakti uta bhṛjj dhānā
424	prati manāyoḥ ucathāni haryan	prati manāyu ucatha hary
424	tasmin dadhat vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indraḥ	tad dhā vṛṣan śuṣma indra
424	yadā samaryam vi acet ṛghāvā	yadā samarya vi cit ṛghāvan
424	dīrgham yat ājim abhi akhyat aryaḥ	dīrgha yat āji abhi khyā ari
424	acikradat vṛṣaṇam patnī acchā	krand vṛṣan patnī acchā
424	duroṇe ā niśitam somasudbhiḥ	duroṇa ā niśā soma sut
424	bhūyasā vasnam acarat kanīyaḥ	bhūyas vasna car kanīyas
424	avikrītaḥ akāniṣam punar yan	a vikrī kan punar i
424	sa bhūyasā kanīyaḥ na arirecīt	tad bhūyas kanīyas na ric
424	dīnāḥ dakṣāḥ vi duhanti pra vāṇam	dīna dakṣa vi duh pra vāṇa
424	kaḥ imam daśabhiḥ mama	ka idam daśan mad
424	indram krīṇāti dhenubhiḥ	indra krī dhenu
424	yadā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat	yadā vṛtra jaṅghan
424	atha enam me punar dadat	atha enad mad punar dā
424	nū stutaḥ indra nū gṛṇānaḥ	nu stu indra nu gṛ
424	iṣam jaritre nadyaḥ na pīpeḥ	iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā
424	akāri te harivaḥ brahma navyam	kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya
424	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
 ---
425	kaḥ adya naryaḥ devakāmaḥ	ka adya narya deva kāma
425	uśan indrasya sakhyam jujoṣa	vaś indra sakhya juṣ
425	kaḥ vā mahe avase pāryāya	ka vā mah avas pārya
425	samiddhe agnau sutasomaḥ īTTe	samindh agni su soma īḍ
425	kaḥ nānāma vacasā somyāya	ka nam vacas somya
425	manāyuḥ vā bhavati vasto usrāḥ	manāyu vā bhū usṛ
425	kaḥ indrasya yujyam kaḥ sakhitvam	ka indra yujya ka sakhi tva
425	kaḥ bhrātram vaṣTi kavaye kaḥ ūtī	ka bhrātra vaś kavi ka ūti
425	kaḥ devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīte	ka deva avas adya vṛ
425	kaḥ ādityān aditim jyotiḥ īTTe	ka āditya aditi jyotis īḍ
425	kasya aśvinau indraḥ agniḥ sutasya	ka aśvin indra agni su
425	aṁśoḥ pibanti manasā avivenam	aṃśu pā manas avivenam
425	tasmai agniḥ bhārataḥ śarma yaṁsat	tad agni bhārata śarman yam
425	jyok paśyāt sūryam uccarantam	jyok paś sūrya uccar
425	yaḥ indrāya sunavāma iti āha	yad indra su iti ah
425	nare naryāya nṛtamāya nṛṇām	nṛ narya nṛtama nṛ
425	na tam jinanti bahavaḥ na dabhrāḥ	na tad jyā bahu na dabhra
425	uru asmai aditiḥ śarma yaṁsat	uru idam aditi śarman yam
425	priyaḥ sukṛt priyaḥ indre manāyuḥ	priya su kṛt priya indra manāyu
425	priyaḥ suprāvīḥ priyaḥ asya somī	priya su prāvī priya idam somin
425	suprāvyaḥ prāśuṣāT eṣa vīraḥ	suprāvya prāśuṣah etad vīra
425	suṣveḥ paktim kṛṇute kevalā indraḥ	suṣvi pakti kṛ kevala indra
425	na asuṣveḥ āpiḥ na sakhā na jāmiḥ	na a suṣvi āpi na sakhi na jāmi
425	duṣprāvyaḥ avahantā it avācaḥ	duṣprāvya avahan id avāc
425	na revatā paṇinā sakhyam indraḥ	na revat paṇi sakhī indra
425	asunvatā sutapāḥ sam gṛṇīte	a su suta pā sam gṛ
425	ā asya vedaḥ khidati hanti nagnam	ā idam vedas khid han nagna
425	vi suṣvaye paktaye kevalaḥ bhūt	vi suṣvi pakti kevala bhū
425	indram pare avare madhyamāsaḥ	indra para avara madhyama
425	indram yāntaḥ avasitāsaḥ indram	indra yā avasā indra
425	indram kṣiyantaḥ uta yudhyamānāḥ	indra kṣi uta yudh
425	indram naraḥ vājayantaḥ havante	indra nṛ vājay hvā
 ---
426	aham manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca	mad manu bhū sūrya ca
426	aham kakṣīvān ṛṣiḥ asmi vipraḥ	mad kakṣīvant ṛṣi as vipra
426	aham kutsam ārjuneyam ni ṛñje	mad kutsa ārjuneya ni ṛj
426	aham kaviḥ uśanā paśyatā mā	mad kavi uśanas paś mad
426	aham bhūmim adadām āryāya	mad bhūmi dā ārya
426	aham vṛṣTim dāśuṣe martyāya	mad vṛṣṭi dāś martya
426	aham apaḥ anayam vāvaśānāḥ	mad ap nī vāś
426	mama devāsaḥ anu ketam āyan	mad deva anu keta i
426	aham puraḥ mandasānaḥ vi airam	mad pur mand vi īr
426	nava sākam navatīḥ śambarasya	navan sākam navati śambara
426	śatatamam veśyam sarvatātā	śatatama veśya sarvatāti
426	divodāsam atithigvam yat āvam	divodāsa atithigva yat av
426	pra su sa vibhyaḥ marutaḥ viḥ astu	pra su tad vi marut vi as
426	pra śyenaḥ śyenebhyaḥ āśupatvā	pra śyena śyena āśu patvan
426	acakrayā yat svadhayā suparṇaḥ	a cakra yat svadhā suparṇa
426	havyam bharat manave devajuṣTam	havya bhṛ manu deva juṣ
426	bharat yadi viḥ ataḥ vevijānaḥ	bhṛ yadi vi atas vevij
426	pathā uruṇā manojavāḥ asarji	pathin uru manas javas sṛj
426	tūyam yayau madhunā somyena	tūya yā madhu somya
426	uta śravaḥ vivide śyenaḥ atra	uta śravas vid śyena atra
426	ṛjīpī śyenaḥ dadamānaḥ aṁśum	ṛjīpin śyena dā aṃśu
426	parāvataḥ śakunaḥ mandram madam	parāvat śakuna mandra mada
426	somam bharat dādṛhāṇaḥ devāvān	soma bhṛ dṛh devāvat
426	divaḥ amuṣmāt uttarāt ādāya	div adas uttara ādā
426	ādāya śyenaḥ abharat somam	ādā śyena bhṛ soma
426	sahasram savān ayutam ca sākam	sahasra sava ayuta ca sākam
426	atrā puraṁdhiḥ ajahāt arātīḥ	atra puraṃdhi hā arāti
426	made somasya mūrāḥ amūraḥ	mada soma mūra a mūra
 ---
427	garbhe nu san anu eṣām avedam	garbha nu as anu idam vid
427	aham devānām janimāni viśvā	mad deva janiman viśva
427	śatam mā puraḥ āyasīḥ arakṣan	śata mad pur āyasa rakṣ
427	adha śyenaḥ javasā niḥ adīyam	adha śyena javas niḥ dī
427	na ghā sa mām apa joṣam jabhāra	na gha tad mad apa joṣam bhṛ
427	abhi īm āsa tvakṣasā vīryeṇa	abhi īṃ as tvakṣas vīrya
427	īrmā puraṁdhiḥ ajahāt arātīḥ	īrmā purandhi hā arāti
427	uta vātān atarat śūśuvānaḥ	uta vāta tṛ śvi
427	ava yat śyenaḥ asvanīt adha dyoḥ	ava yat śyena svan adha div
427	vi yat yadi vā ataḥ ūhuḥ puraṁdhim	vi yat yadi vā atas vah purandhi
427	sṛjat yat asmai ava ha kṣipat jyām	sṛj yat idam ava ha kṣip jyā
427	kṛśānuḥ astā manasā bhuraṇyan	kṛśānu as manas bhuraṇy
427	ṛjipyaḥ īm indrāvataḥ na bhujyum	ṛjipya īṃ indrāvat na bhujyu
427	śyenaḥ jabhāra bṛhataḥ adhi snoḥ	śyena bhṛ bṛhat adhi snu
427	antar patat patatri asya parṇam	antar pat patatrin idam parṇa
427	adha yāmani prasitasya tat veḥ	adha yāman prasita tad vi
427	adha śvetam kalaśam gobhiḥ aktam	adha śveta kalaśa go añj
427	āpipyānam maghavā śukram andhaḥ	āpyā maghavan śukra andhas
427	adhvaryubhiḥ prayatam madhvaḥ agram	adhvaryu prayam madhu agra
427	indraḥ madāya prati dhat pibadhyai	indra mada prati dhā pā
427	śūraḥ madāya prati dhat pibadhyai	śūra mada prati dhā pā
 ---
428	tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhye	tvad yuj tvad tad soma sakhya
428	indraḥ apaḥ manave sasrutaḥ kar	indra ap manu sasrut kṛ
428	ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn	han ahi ri saptan sindhu
428	apa avṛṇot apihitā iva khāni	apāvṛ apidhā iva kha
428	tvā yujā ni khidat sūryasya	tvad yuj ni khid sūrya
428	indraḥ cakram sahasā sadyaḥ indo	indra cakra sahas sadyas indu
428	adhi snunā bṛhatā vartamānam	adhi snu bṛhat vṛt
428	mahaḥ druhaḥ apa viśvāyu dhāyi	mah druh apa viśva āyu dhā
428	ahan indraḥ adahat agniḥ indo	han indra dah agni indu
428	purā dasyūn madhyaṁdināt abhīke	purā dasyu madhyaṃdina abhīka
428	durge duroṇe kratvā na yātām	durga duroṇa kratu na yā
428	purū sahasrā śarvā ni barhīt	puru sahasra śaru ni bṛṃh
428	viśvasmāt sīm adhamān indra dasyūn	viśva sīm adhama indra dasyu
428	viśaḥ dāsīḥ akṛṇoḥ apraśastāḥ	viś dāsa kṛ a praśaṃs
428	abādhethām amṛṇatam ni śatrūn	bādh mṛṇ ni śatru
428	avindethām apacitim vadhatraiḥ	vid apaciti vadhatra
428	evā satyam maghavānā yuvam tat	eva satya maghavan tvad tad
428	indraḥ ca soma ūrvam aśvyam goḥ	indra ca soma ūrva aśvya go
428	ā adardṛtam apihitāni aśnā	ādardar apidhā aśan
428	riricathuḥ kṣāḥ cit tatṛdānā	ric kṣā cit tṛd
 ---
429	ā naḥ stutaḥ upa vājebhiḥ ūtī	ā mad stu upa vāja ūti
429	indra yāhi haribhiḥ mandasānaḥ	indra yā hari mand
429	tiraḥ cit aryaḥ savanā purūṇi	tiras cit ari savana puru
429	āṅgūṣebhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ satyarādhāḥ	āṅgūṣa gṛ satya rādhas
429	ā hi smā yāti naryaḥ cikitvān	ā hi sma yā narya cit
429	hūyamānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ upa yajñam	hvā sotṛ upa yajña
429	svaśvaḥ yaḥ abhīruḥ manyamānaḥ	su aśva yad abhīru man
429	suṣvāṇebhiḥ madati sam ha vīraiḥ	su mad sam ha vīra
429	śrāvaya it asya karṇā vājayadhyai	śrāvay idam karṇa vājay
429	juṣTām anu pra diśam mandayadhyai	juṣ anu pra diś manday
429	udvāvṛṣāṇaḥ rādhase tuviṣmān	udvṛṣ rādhas tuviṣmat
429	karat naḥ indraḥ sutīrthā abhayam ca	kṛ mad indra su tīrtha abhaya ca
429	acchā yaḥ gantā nādhamānam ūtī	acchā yad gam nādh ūti
429	itthā vipram havamānam gṛṇantam	itthā vipra hvā gṛ
429	upa tmani dadhānaḥ dhuri āśūn	upa tman dhā dhur āśu
429	sahasrāṇi śatāni vajrabāhuḥ	sahasra śata vajra bāhu
429	tvotāsaḥ maghavan indra viprāḥ	tvota maghavan indra vipra
429	vayam te syāma sūrayaḥ gṛṇantaḥ	mad tvad as sūri gṛ
429	bhejānāsaḥ bṛhaddivasya rāyaḥ	bhaj bṛhat diva rai
429	ākāyyasya dāvane purukṣoḥ	ākāyya dā purukṣu
 ---
430	nakiḥ indra tvat uttaraḥ	nakir indra tvad uttara
430	na jyāyān asti vṛtrahan	na jyāyas as vṛtrahan
430	nakiḥ evā yathā tvam	nakir eva yathā tvad
430	satrā te anu kṛṣTayaḥ	satrā tvad anu kṛṣṭi
430	viśvā cakrā iva vāvṛtuḥ	viśva cakra iva vṛt
430	satrā mahān asi śrutaḥ	satrā mahat as śru
430	viśve cana it anā tvā	viśva cana id anā tvad
430	devāsaḥ indra yuyudhuḥ	deva indra yudh
430	yat ahā naktam ā atiraḥ	yat aha nakta ātṛ
430	yatra uta bādhitebhyaḥ	yatra uta bādh
430	cakram kutsāya yudhyate	cakra kutsa yudh
430	muṣāyaḥ indra sūryam	muṣāy indra sūrya
430	yatra devān ṛghāyataḥ	yatra deva ṛghāy
430	viśvān ayudhyaḥ ekaḥ it	viśva yudh eka id
430	tvam indra vanūn ahan	tvad indra vanu han
430	yatra uta martyāya kam	yatra uta martya kaṃ
430	ariṇāḥ indra sūryam	ri indra sūrya
430	pra āvaḥ śacībhiḥ etaśam	prāv śacī etaśa
430	kim āt uta asi vṛtrahan	kim āt uta as vṛtrahan
430	maghavan manyumattamaḥ	maghavan manyumattama
430	atra aha dānum ā atiraḥ	atra aha dānu ātṛ
430	etat gha it uta vīryam	etad gha id uta vīrya
430	indra cakartha pauṁsyam	indra kṛ pauṃsya
430	striyam yat durhaṇāyuvam	strī yat durhaṇāyu
430	vadhīḥ duhitaram divaḥ	vadh duhitṛ div
430	divaḥ cit ghā duhitaram	div cit gha duhitṛ
430	mahān mahīyamānām	mahat mahīy
430	uṣāsam indra sam piṇak	uṣas indra sam piṣ
430	apa uṣāḥ anasaḥ sarat	apa uṣas anas sṛ
430	sampiṣTāt aha bibhyuṣī	sampiṣ aha bhī
430	ni yat sīm śiśnathat vṛṣā	ni yat sīm śnath vṛṣan
430	etat asyāḥ anaḥ śaye	etad idam anas śī
430	susampiṣTam vipāśi ā	su sampiṣ vipāś ā
430	sasāra sīm parāvataḥ	sṛ sīm parāvat
430	uta sindhum vibālyam	uta sindhu vibālī
430	vitasthānām adhi kṣami	viṣṭhā adhi kṣam
430	pari sthāḥ indra māyayā	pari as indra māyā
430	uta śuṣṇasya dhṛṣṇuyā	uta śuṣṇa dhṛṣṇuyā
430	pra mṛkṣaḥ abhi vedanam	pra mṛś abhi vedana
430	puraḥ yat asya sampiṇak	pur yat idam sampiṣ
430	uta dāsam kaulitaram	uta dāsa kaulitara
430	bṛhataḥ parvatāt adhi	bṛhat parvata adhi
430	ava ahan indra śambaram	avahan indra śambara
430	uta dāsasya varcinaḥ	uta dāsa varcin
430	sahasrāṇi śatā avadhīḥ	sahasra śata vadh
430	adhi pañca pradhīn iva	adhi pañcan pradhi iva
430	uta tyam putram agruvaḥ	uta tya putra agrū
430	parāvṛktam śatakratuḥ	parāvṛj śatakratu
430	uktheṣu indraḥ ā abhajat	uktha indra ābhaj
430	uta tyā turvaśāyadū	uta tya turvaśa yadu
430	asnātārā śacīpatiḥ	a snātṛ śacīpati
430	indraḥ vidvān apārayat	indra vid pāray
430	uta tyā sadyaḥ āryā	uta tya sadyas ārya
430	sarayoḥ indra pārataḥ	sarayu indra pāratas
430	arṇācitrarathā avadhīḥ	arṇā citraratha vadh
430	anu dvā jahitā nayaḥ	anu dvi hā nī
430	andham śroṇam ca vṛtrahan	andha śroṇa ca vṛtrahan
430	na tat te sumnam aṣTave	na tad tvad sumna aś
430	śatam aśmanmayīnām	śata aśmanmaya
430	purām indraḥ vi āsyat	pur indra vi as
430	divodāsāya dāśuṣe	divodāsa dāś
430	asvāpayat dabhītaye	svāpay dabhīti
430	sahasrā triṁśatam hathaiḥ	sahasra triṃśat hatha
430	dāsānām indraḥ māyayā	dāsa indra māyā
430	sa gha it uta asi vṛtrahan	tad gha id uta as vṛtrahan
430	samānaḥ indra gopatiḥ	samāna indra go pati
430	yaḥ tā viśvāni cicyuṣe	yad tad viśva cyu
430	uta nūnam yat indriyam	uta nūnam yat indriya
430	kariṣyāḥ indra pauṁsyam	kṛ indra pauṃsya
430	adyā nakiḥ tat ā minat	adya nakir tad ā mī
430	vāmaṁvāmam te ādure	vāma vāma tvad āduri
430	devaḥ dadātu aryamā	deva dā aryaman
430	vāmam pūṣā vāmam bhagaḥ	vāma pūṣan vāma bhaga
430	vāmam devaḥ karūLatī	vāma deva karūḍatin
 ---
431	kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat	ka mad citra ā bhū
431	ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā	ūti sadāvṛdha sakhi
431	kayā śaciṣThayā vṛtā	ka śaciṣṭha vṛt
431	kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām	ka tvad satya mada
431	maṁhiṣThaḥ matsat andhasaḥ	maṃhiṣṭha mad andhas
431	dṛLhā cit āruje vasu	dṛḍha cit āruj vasu
431	abhī su naḥ sakhīnām	abhi su mad sakhi
431	avitā jaritṛṛṇām	av jaritṛ
431	śatam bhavāsi ūtibhiḥ	śata bhū ūti
431	abhī naḥ ā vavṛtsva	abhi mad ā vṛt
431	cakram na vṛttam arvataḥ	cakra na vṛt arvant
431	niyudbhiḥ carṣaṇīnām	niyut carṣaṇi
431	pravatā hi kratūnām	pravat hi kratu
431	ā hā padā iva gacchasi	ā ha pad iva gam
431	abhakṣi sūrye sacā	bhaj sūrya sacā
431	sam yat te indra manyavaḥ	sam yat tvad indra manyu
431	sam cakrāṇi dadhanvire	sam cakra dhanv
431	adha tve adha sūrye	adha tvad adha sūrya
431	uta smā hi tvām āhuḥ it	uta sma hi tvad ah id
431	maghavānam śacīpate	maghavan śacīpati
431	dātāram avidīdhayum	dātṛ avidīdhayu
431	uta smā sadyaḥ it pari	uta sma sadyas id pari
431	śaśamānāya sunvate	śam su
431	purū cit maṁhase vasu	puru cit mah vasu
431	nahi smā te śatam cana	na hi sma tvad śata cana
431	rādhaḥ varante āmuraḥ	rādhas vṛ āmur
431	na cyautnāni kariṣyataḥ	na cyautna kṛ
431	asmān avantu te śatam	mad av tvad śata
431	asmān sahasram ūtayaḥ	mad sahasra ūti
431	asmān viśvāḥ abhiṣTayaḥ	mad viśva abhiṣṭi
431	asmān ihā vṛṇīṣva	mad iha ā vṛ
431	sakhyāya svastaye	sakhya svasti
431	mahaḥ rāye divitmate	mah rai divitmat
431	asmān aviḍḍhi viśvahā	mad av viśvahā
431	indra rāyā parīṇasā	indra rai parīṇas
431	asmān viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	mad viśva ūti
431	asmabhyam tān apā vṛdhi	mad tad apa ā vṛ
431	vrajān astā iva gomataḥ	vraja astṛ iva gomat
431	navābhiḥ indra ūtibhiḥ	nava indra ūti
431	asmākam dhṛṣṇuyā rathaḥ	mad dhṛṣṇuyā ratha
431	dyumān indra anapacyutaḥ	dyumat indra an apacyu
431	gavyuḥ aśvayuḥ īyate	gavyu aśvayu i
431	asmākam uttamam kṛdhi	mad uttama kṛ
431	śravaḥ deveṣu sūrya	śravas deva sūrya
431	varṣiṣTham dyām iva upari	varṣiṣṭha div iva upari
 ---
432	ā tū naḥ indra vṛtrahan	ā tu mad indra vṛtrahan
432	asmākam ardham ā gahi	mad ardha ā gam
432	mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	mahat mah ūti
432	bhṛmiḥ cit gha asi tūtujiḥ	bhṛmi cit gha as tūtuji
432	ā citra citriṇīṣu ā	ā citra citrin ā
432	citram kṛṇoṣi ūtaye	citra kṛ ūti
432	dabhrebhiḥ cit śaśīyāṁsam	dabhra cit śaśīyas
432	haṁsi vrādhantam ojasā	han vrādh ojas
432	sakhibhiḥ ye tve sacā	sakhi yad tvad sacā
432	vayam indra tve sacā	mad indra tvad sacā
432	vayam tvā abhi nonumaḥ	mad tvad abhi nonāv
432	asmānasmān it ut ava	mad mad id ud av
432	sa naḥ citrābhiḥ adrivaḥ	tad mad citra adrivat
432	anavadyābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	anavadya ūti
432	anādhṛṣTābhiḥ ā gahi	anādhṛṣṭa ā gam
432	bhūyāma u su tvāvataḥ	bhū u su tvāvat
432	sakhāyaḥ indra gomataḥ	sakhi indra gomat
432	yujaḥ vājāya ghṛṣvaye	yuj vāja ghṛṣvi
432	tvam hi ekaḥ īśiṣe	tvad hi eka īś
432	indra vājasya gomataḥ	indra vāja gomat
432	sa naḥ yandhi mahīm iṣam	tad mad yam mah iṣ
432	na tvā varante anyathā	na tvad vṛ anyathā
432	yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham	yat dits stu magha
432	stotṛbhyaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ	stotṛ indra girvaṇas
432	abhi tvā gotamāḥ girā	abhi tvad gotama gir
432	anūṣata pra dāvane	nū pra dā
432	indra vājāya ghṛṣvaye	indra vāja ghṛṣvi
432	pra te vocāma vīryā	pra tvad vac vīrya
432	yāḥ mandasānaḥ ā arujaḥ	yad mand āruj
432	puraḥ dāsīḥ abhītya	pur dāsa abhī
432	tā te gṛṇanti vedhasaḥ	tad tvad gṛ vedhas
432	yāni cakartha pauṁsyā	yad kṛ pauṃsya
432	suteṣu indra girvaṇaḥ	suta indra girvaṇas
432	avīvṛdhanta gotamāḥ	vṛdh gotama
432	indra tve stomavāhasaḥ	indra tvad stoma vāhas
432	ā eṣu dhāḥ vīravat yaśaḥ	ā idam dhā vīravat yaśas
432	yat cit hi śaśvatām asi	yat cit hi śaśvat as
432	indra sādhāraṇaḥ tvam	indra sādhāraṇa tvad
432	tam tvā vayam havāmahe	tad tvad mad hvā
432	arvācīnaḥ vaso bhava	arvācīna vasu bhū
432	asme su matsva andhasaḥ	mad su mad andhas
432	somānām indra somapāḥ	soma indra soma pā
432	asmākam tvā matīnām	mad tvad mati
432	ā stomaḥ indra yacchatu	ā stoma indra yam
432	arvāk ā vartayā harī	arvāk ā vartay hari
432	puroLāśam ca naḥ ghasaḥ	puroḍāś ca mad ghas
432	joṣayāse giraḥ ca naḥ	joṣay gir ca mad
432	vadhūyuḥ iva yoṣaṇām	vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā
432	sahasram vyatīnām	sahasra vyati
432	yuktānām indram īmahe	yuj indra ī
432	śatam somasya khāryaḥ	śata soma khārī
432	sahasrā te śatā vayam	sahasra tvad śata mad
432	gavām ā cyāvayāmasi	go ā cyāvay
432	asmatrā rādhaḥ etu te	asmatrā rādhas i tvad
432	daśa te kalaśānām	daśan tvad kalaśa
432	hiraṇyānām adhīmahi	hiraṇya dhā
432	bhūridāḥ asi vṛtrahan	bhūri dā as vṛtrahan
432	bhūridāḥ bhūri dehi naḥ	bhūri dā bhūri dā mad
432	mā dabhram bhūri ā bhara	mā dabhra bhūri ā bhṛ
432	bhūri gha it indra ditsasi	bhūri gha id indra dits
432	bhūridāḥ hi asi śrutaḥ	bhūri dā hi as śru
432	purutrā śūra vṛtrahan	purutrā śūra vṛtrahan
432	ā naḥ bhajasva rādhasi	ā mad bhaj rādhas
432	pra te babhrū vicakṣaṇa	pra tvad babhru vicakṣaṇa
432	śaṁsāmi goṣaṇaḥ napāt	śaṃs goṣan napāt
432	mā ābhyām gāḥ anu śiśrathaḥ	mā idam go anu śrath
432	kanīnakā iva vidradhe	kanīnakā iva vidradha
432	nave drupade arbhake	nava drupada arbhaka
432	babhrū yāmeṣu śobhete	babhru yāma śubh
432	aram me usrayāmṇe	aram mad usra yāman
432	aram anusrayāmṇe	aram an usra yāman
432	babhrū yāmeṣu asridhā	babhru yāma asridh
 ---
433	pra ṛbhubhyaḥ dūtam iva vācam iṣye	pra ṛbhu dūta iva vāc iṣ
433	upastire śvaitarīm dhenum īLe	upastir śvaitarī dhenu īḍ
433	ye vātajūtāḥ taraṇibhiḥ evaiḥ	yad vāta jū taraṇi eva
433	pari dyām sadyaḥ apasaḥ babhūvuḥ	pari div sadyas apas bhū
433	yadā aram akran ṛbhavaḥ pitṛbhyām	yadā aram kṛ ṛbhu pitṛ
433	pariviṣTī veṣaṇā daṁsanābhiḥ	pariviṣṭi veṣaṇā daṃsanā
433	āt it devānām upa sakhyam āyan	āt id deva upa sakhya i
433	dhīrāsaḥ puṣTim avahan manāyai	dhīra puṣṭi vah manā
433	punar ye cakruḥ pitarā yuvānā	punar yad kṛ pitṛ yuvan
433	sanā yūpā iva jaraṇā śayānā	sana yūpa iva jaraṇa śī
433	te vājaḥ vibhvān ṛbhuḥ indravantaḥ	tad vāja vibhvan ṛbhu indravat
433	madhupsarasaḥ naḥ avantu yajñam	madhu psaras mad av yajña
433	yat saṁvatsam ṛbhavaḥ gām arakṣan	yat saṃvatsam ṛbhu go rakṣ
433	yat saṁvatsam ṛbhavaḥ māḥ apiṁśan	yat saṃvatsam ṛbhu mās piś
433	yat saṁvatsam abharan bhāsaḥ asyāḥ	yat saṃvatsam bhṛ bhāsas idam
433	tābhiḥ śamībhiḥ amṛtatvam āśuḥ	tad śamī amṛta tva aś
433	jyeṣThaḥ āha camasā dvā karā iti	jyeṣṭha ah camasa dvi kṛ iti
433	kanīyān trīn kṛṇavāma iti āha	kanīyas tri kṛ iti ah
433	kaniṣThaḥ āha caturaḥ karā iti	kaniṣṭha ah catur kṛ iti
433	tvaṣTā ṛbhavaḥ tat panayat vacaḥ vaḥ	tvaṣṭṛ ṛbhu tad panay vacas tvad
433	satyam ūcuḥ naraḥ evā hi cakruḥ	satya vac nṛ eva hi kṛ
433	anu svadhām ṛbhavaḥ jagmuḥ etām	anu svadhā ṛbhu gam etad
433	vibhrājamānān camasān ahā iva	vibhrāj camasa aha iva
433	avenat tvaṣTā caturaḥ dadṛśvān	ven tvaṣṭṛ catur dṛś
433	dvādaśa dyūn yat agohyasya	dvādaśan div yat agohya
433	ātithye raṇan ṛbhavaḥ sasantaḥ	ātithya ran ṛbhu sas
433	sukṣetrā akṛṇvan anayanta sindhūn	su kṣetra kṛ nī sindhu
433	dhanva ā atiṣThan oṣadhīḥ nimnam āpaḥ	dhanvan sthā oṣadhī nimna ap
433	ratham ye cakruḥ suvṛtam nareṣThām	ratha yad kṛ suvṛt nareṣṭhā
433	ye dhenum viśvajuvam viśvarūpām	yad dhenu viśva jū viśva rūpa
433	te ā takṣantu ṛbhavaḥ rayim naḥ	tad ā takṣ ṛbhu rayi mad
433	svavasaḥ svapasaḥ suhastāḥ	su avas su apas su hasta
433	apaḥ hi eṣām ajuṣanta devāḥ	apas hi idam juṣ deva
433	abhi kratvā manasā dīdhyānāḥ	abhi kratu manas dhī
433	vājaḥ devānām abhavat sukarmā	vāja deva bhū sukarman
433	indrasya ṛbhukṣāḥ varuṇasya vibhvā	indra ṛbhukṣan varuṇa vibhvan
433	ye harī medhayā ukthā madantaḥ	yad hari medhā uktha mad
433	indrāya cakruḥ suyujā ye aśvā	indra kṛ su yuj yad aśva
433	te rāyaḥ poṣam draviṇāni asme	tad rai poṣa draviṇa mad
433	dhatta ṛbhavaḥ kṣemayantaḥ na mitram	dhā ṛbhu kṣemay na mitra
433	idā ahnaḥ pītim uta vaḥ madam dhuḥ	idā ahar pīti uta tvad mada dhā
433	na ṛte śrāntasya sakhyāya devāḥ	na ṛte śrānta sakhya deva
433	te nūnam asme ṛbhavaḥ vasūni	tad nūnam mad ṛbhu vasu
433	tṛtīye asmin savane dadhāta	tṛtīya idam savana dhā
 ---
434	ṛbhuḥ vibhvā vājaḥ indraḥ naḥ accha	ṛbhu vibhvan vāja indra mad acchā
434	imam yajñam ratnadheyā upa yāta	idam yajña ratna dheya upa yā
434	idā hi vaḥ dhiṣaṇā devī ahnām	idā hi tvad dhiṣaṇā devī ahar
434	adhāt pītim sam madāḥ agmatā vaḥ	dhā pīti sam mada gam tvad
434	vidānāsaḥ janmanaḥ vājaratnāḥ	vid janman vāja ratna
434	uta ṛtubhiḥ ṛbhavaḥ mādayadhvam	uta ṛtu ṛbhu māday
434	sam vaḥ madāḥ agmata sam puraṁdhiḥ	sam tvad mada gam sam puraṃdhi
434	suvīrām asme rayim ā īrayadhvam	su vīra mad rayi eray
434	ayam vaḥ yajñaḥ ṛbhavaḥ akāri	idam tvad yajña ṛbhu kṛ
434	yam ā manuṣvat pradivaḥ dadhidhve	yad ā manuṣvat pradiv dhā
434	pra vaḥ acchā jujuṣāṇāsaḥ asthuḥ	pra tvad acchā juṣ sthā
434	abhūta viśve agriyā uta vājāḥ	bhū viśva agriya uta vāja
434	abhūt u vaḥ vidhate ratnadheyam	bhū u tvad vidh ratna dheya
434	idā naraḥ dāśuṣe martyāya	idā nṛ dāś martya
434	pibata vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ dade vaḥ	pā vāja ṛbhu dā tvad
434	mahi tṛtīyam savanam madāya	mahi tṛtīya savana mada
434	ā vājāḥ yāta upa naḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ	ā vāja yā upa mad ṛbhukṣan
434	mahaḥ naraḥ draviṇasaḥ gṛṇānāḥ	mah nṛ draviṇas gṛ
434	ā vaḥ pītayaḥ abhipitve ahnām	ā tvad pīti abhipitva ahar
434	imāḥ astam navasvaḥ iva gman	idam asta nava sū iva gam
434	ā napātaḥ śavasaḥ yātana upa	ā napāt śavas yā upa
434	imam yajñam namasā hūyamānāḥ	idam yajña namas hu
434	sajoṣasaḥ sūrayaḥ yasya ca stha	sajoṣas sūri yad ca as
434	madhvaḥ pāta ratnadhāḥ indravantaḥ	madhu pā ratna dhā indravat
434	sajoṣāḥ indra varuṇena somam	sajoṣas indra varuṇa soma
434	sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ	sajoṣas pā girvaṇas marut
434	agrepābhiḥ ṛtupābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	agre pā ṛtu pā sajoṣas
434	gnāspatnībhiḥ ratnadhābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	gnāspatnī ratna dhā sajoṣas
434	sajoṣasaḥ ādityaiḥ mādayadhvam	sajoṣas āditya māday
434	sajoṣasaḥ ṛbhavaḥ parvatebhiḥ	sajoṣas ṛbhu parvata
434	sajoṣasaḥ daivyenā savitrā	sajoṣas daivya savitṛ
434	sajoṣasaḥ sindhubhiḥ ratnadhebhiḥ	sajoṣas sindhu ratna dhā
434	ye aśvinā ye pitarā ye ūtī	yad aśvin yad pitṛ yad ūti
434	dhenum tatakṣuḥ ṛbhavaḥ ye aśvā	dhenu takṣ ṛbhu yad aśva
434	ye aṁsatrā ye ṛdhak rodasī ye	yad aṃsatra yad ṛdhak rodas yad
434	vibhvaḥ naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ	vibhu nṛ su apatya kṛ
434	ye gomantam vājavantam suvīram	yad gomat vājavat su vīra
434	rayim dhattha vasumantam purukṣum	rayi dhā vasumat purukṣu
434	te agrepāḥ ṛbhavaḥ mandasānāḥ	tad agre pā ṛbhu mand
434	asme dhatta ye ca rātim gṛṇanti	mad dhā yad ca rāti gṛ
434	na apa abhūta na vaḥ atītṛṣāma	na apabhū na tvad tṛṣ
434	aniḥśastāḥ ṛbhavaḥ yajñe asmin	a niḥśaṃs ṛbhu yajña idam
434	sam indreṇa madatha sam marudbhiḥ	sam indra mad sam marut
434	sam rājabhiḥ ratnadheyāya devāḥ	sam rājan ratna dheya deva
 ---
435	iha upa yāta śavasaḥ napātaḥ	iha upa yā śavas napāt
435	saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ mā apa bhūta	saudhanvana ṛbhu mā apa bhū
435	asmin hi vaḥ savane ratnadheyam	idam hi tvad savana ratna dheya
435	gamantu indram anu vaḥ madāsaḥ	gam indra anu tvad mada
435	ā agan ṛbhūṇām iha ratnadheyam	āgam ṛbhu iha ratna dheya
435	abhūt somasya suṣutasya pītiḥ	bhū soma suṣuta pīti
435	sukṛtyayā yat svapasyayā ca	su kṛtyā yat su apasyā
435	ekam vicakra camasam caturdhā	eka vikṛ camasa caturdhā
435	vi akṛṇota camasam caturdhā	vi kṛ camasa caturdhā
435	sakhe vi śikṣa iti abravīta	sakhi vi śikṣ iti brū
435	atha aita vājāḥ amṛtasya panthām	atha i vāja amṛta pathin
435	gaṇam devānām ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ	gaṇa deva ṛbhu su hasta
435	kimmayaḥ svit camasaḥ eṣaḥ āsa	kimmaya svid camasa etad as
435	yam kāvyena caturaḥ vicakra	yad kāvya catur vikṛ
435	athā sunudhvam savanam madāya	atha su savana mada
435	pāta ṛbhavaḥ madhunaḥ somyasya	pā ṛbhu madhu somya
435	śacyā akarta pitarā yuvānā	śacī kṛ pitṛ yuvan
435	śacyā akarta camasam devapānam	śacī kṛ camasa deva pāna
435	śacyā harī dhanutarau ataṣTa	śacī hari dhanutṛ takṣ
435	indravāhau ṛbhavaḥ vājaratnāḥ	indra vāha ṛbhu vāja ratna
435	yaḥ vaḥ sunoti abhipitve ahnām	yad tvad su abhipitva ahar
435	tīvram vājāsaḥ savanam madāya	tīvra vāja savana mada
435	tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarvavīram	tad rayi ṛbhu sarva vīra
435	ā takṣata vṛṣaṇaḥ mandasānāḥ	ā takṣ vṛṣan mand
435	prātar sutam apibaḥ haryaśva	prātar suta pā hari aśva
435	mādhyaṁdinam savanam kevalam te	mādhyaṃdina savana kevala tvad
435	sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratnadhebhiḥ	sam ṛbhu pā ratna dhā
435	sakhīn yān indra cakṛṣe sukṛtyā	sakhi yad indra kṛ su kṛtyā
435	ye devāsaḥ abhavatā sukṛtyā	yad deva bhū su kṛtyā
435	śyenāḥ iva it adhi divi niṣeda	śyena iva id adhi div niṣad
435	te ratnam dhāta śavasaḥ napātaḥ	tad ratna dhā śavas napāt
435	saudhanvanāḥ abhavata amṛtāsaḥ	saudhanvana bhū amṛta
435	yat tṛtīyam savanam ratnadheyam	yad tṛtīya savana ratna dheya
435	akṛṇudhvam svapasyā suhastāḥ	kṛ su apasyā su hasta
435	tat ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktam vaḥ etat	tad ṛbhu pariṣic tvad etad
435	sam madebhiḥ indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam	sam mada indriya pā
 ---
436	anaśvaḥ jātaḥ anabhīśuḥ ukthyaḥ	an aśva jan an abhīśu ukthya
436	rathaḥ tricakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ	ratha tri cakra pari vṛt rajas
436	mahat tat vaḥ devyasya pravācanam	mahat tad tvad devya pravācana
436	dyām ṛbhavaḥ pṛthivīm yat ca puṣyatha	div ṛbhu pṛthivī yat ca puṣ
436	ratham ye cakruḥ suvṛtam sucetasaḥ	ratha yad kṛ suvṛt su cetas
436	avihvarantam manasaḥ pari dhyayā	a vihval manas pari dhyā
436	tān ū nu asya savanasya pītaye	tad u nu idam savana pā
436	ā vaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ vedayāmasi	ā tvad vāja ṛbhu veday
436	tat vaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ supravācanam	tad tvad vāja ṛbhu su pravācana
436	deveṣu vibhvaḥ abhavat mahitvanam	deva vibhu bhū mahitvana
436	jivrī yat santā pitarā sanājurā	jivri yat as pitṛ sanā jur
436	punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha	punar yuvan caratha takṣ
436	ekam vi cakra camasam caturvayam	eka vi kṛ camasa caturvaya
436	niḥ carmaṇaḥ gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ	niḥ carman go ri dhīti
436	athā deveṣu amṛtatvam ānaśa	atha deva amṛta tva aś
436	śruṣTī vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat vaḥ ukthyam	śruṣṭi vāja ṛbhu tad tvad ukthya
436	ṛbhutaḥ rayiḥ prathamaśravastamaḥ	ṛbhu rayi prathama śravastama
436	vājaśrutāsaḥ yam ajījanan naraḥ	vāja śru yad jan nṛ
436	vibhvataṣTaḥ vidatheṣu pravācyaḥ	vibhvan takṣ vidatha pravac
436	yam devāsaḥ avathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ	yad deva av tad vicarṣaṇi
436	sa vājī arvā saḥ ṛṣiḥ vacasyayā	tad vājin arvan tad ṛṣi vacasyā
436	sa śūraḥ astā pṛtanāsu duṣTaraḥ	tad śūra as pṛtanā duṣṭara
436	sa rāyaḥ poṣam sa suvīryam dadhe	tad rai poṣa tad su vīrya dhā
436	yam vājaḥ vibhvān ṛbhavaḥ yam āviṣuḥ	yad vāja vibhvan ṛbhu yad av
436	śreṣTham vaḥ peśaḥ adhi dhāyi darśatam	śreṣṭha tvad peśas adhi dhā darśata
436	stomaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhavaḥ tam jujuṣTana	stoma vāja ṛbhu tad juṣ
436	dhīrāsaḥ hi sthā kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ	dhīra hi as kavi vipaścit
436	tān vaḥ enā brahmaṇā ā vedayāmasi	tad tvad idam brahman veday
436	yūyam asmabhyam dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ pari	tvad mad dhiṣaṇā pari
436	vidvāṁsaḥ viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā	vid viśva narya bhojana
436	dyumantam vājam vṛṣaśuṣmam uttamam	dyumat vāja vṛṣan śuṣma uttama
436	ā naḥ rayim ṛbhavaḥ takṣata ā vayaḥ	ā mad rayi ṛbhu takṣ vayas
436	iha prajām iha rayim rarāṇāḥ	iha prajā iha rayi rā
436	iha śravaḥ vīravat takṣatā naḥ	iha śravas vīravat takṣ mad
436	yena vayam citayema ati anyān	yad mad citay ati anya
436	tam vājam citram ṛbhavaḥ dadā naḥ	tad vāja citra ṛbhu dā mad
 ---
437	upa naḥ vājāḥ adhvaram ṛbhukṣāḥ	upa mad vāja adhvara ṛbhukṣan
437	devāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ devayānaiḥ	deva yā pathin deva yāna
437	yathā yajñam manuṣaḥ vikṣu āsu	yathā yajña manus viś idam
437	dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣu ahnām	dhā raṇva sudina ahar
437	te vaḥ hṛde manase santu yajñāḥ	tad tvad hṛd manas as yajña
437	juṣTāsaḥ adya ghṛtanirṇijaḥ guḥ	juṣ adya ghṛta nirṇij gā
437	pra vaḥ sutāsaḥ harayanta pūrṇāḥ	pra tvad suta haray pṛ
437	kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ	kratu dakṣa harṣay pā
437	tryudāyam devahitam yathā vaḥ	tri udāya deva dhā yathā tvad
437	stomaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ dade vaḥ	stoma vāja ṛbhukṣan dā tvad
437	juhve manuṣvat uparāsu vikṣu	hu manuṣvat upara viś
437	yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam	tvad sacā bṛhat diva soma
437	pīvoaśvāḥ śucadrathā hi bhūta	pīvas aśva śuc ratha hi bhū
437	ayaḥśiprā vājinaḥ suniṣkāḥ	ayas śiprā vājin su niṣka
437	indrasya sūno śavasaḥ napātaḥ	indra sūnu śavas napāt
437	anu vaḥ ceti agriyam madāya	anu tvad cit agriya mada
437	ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ rayim	ṛbhu ṛbhukṣan rayi
437	vāje vājintamam yujam	vāja vājintama yuj
437	indrasvantam havāmahe	indrasvat hvā
437	sadāsātamam aśvinam	sadā sātama aśvin
437	sa it ṛbhavaḥ yam avatha	tad id ṛbhu yad av
437	yūyam indraḥ ca martyam	tvad indra ca martya
437	sa dhībhiḥ astu sanitā	tad dhī as san
437	medhasātā saḥ arvatā	medha sāti tad arvant
437	vi naḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ	vi mad vāja ṛbhukṣan
437	pathaḥ citana yaṣTave	pathin ci yaj
437	asmabhyam sūrayaḥ stutāḥ	mad sūri stu
437	viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi	viśva āśā tṛ
437	tam naḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ	tad mad vāja ṛbhukṣan
437	indra nāsatyā rayim	indra nāsatya rayi
437	sam aśvam carṣaṇibhyaḥ ā	sam aśva carṣaṇi ā
437	puru śasta maghattaye	puru śaṃs maghatti
 ---
438	uta u hi vām dātrā santi pūrvā	uta u hi tvad dātra as pūrva
438	yā pūrubhyaḥ trasadasyuḥ nitośe	yad pūru trasadasyu nituś
438	kṣetrāsām dadathuḥ urvarāsām	kṣetrāsā dā urvarā sā
438	ghanam dasyubhyaḥ abhibhūtim ugram	ghana dasyu abhibhūti ugra
438	uta vājinam puruniṣṣidhvānam	uta vājin puru niṣṣidhvan
438	dadhikrām u dadathuḥ viśvakṛṣTim	dadhikrā u dā viśvakṛṣṭi
438	ṛjipyam śyenam pruṣitapsum āśum	ṛjipya śyena pruṣitapsu āśu
438	carkṛtyam aryaḥ nṛpatim na śūram	carkar ari nṛpati na śūra
438	yam sīm anu pravatā iva dravantam	yad sīm anu pravat iva dru
438	viśvaḥ pūruḥ madati harṣamāṇaḥ	viśva pūru mad hṛṣ
438	paḍbhiḥ gṛdhyantam medhayum na śūram	pad gṛdh medhayu na śūra
438	rathaturam vātam iva dhrajantam	rathatur vāta iva dhraj
438	yaḥ sma ārundhānaḥ gadhyā samatsu	yad sma ārudh gadhya samad
438	sanutaraḥ carati goṣu gacchan	sanutara car go gam
438	āvirṛjīkaḥ vidathā nicikyat	āvirṛjīka vidatha nici
438	tiraḥ aratim pari āpaḥ āyoḥ	tiras arati pari āp āyu
438	uta sma enam vastramathim na tāyum	uta sma enad vastramathi na tāyu
438	anu krośanti kṣitayaḥ bhareṣu	anu kruś kṣiti bhara
438	nīcā ayamānam jasurim na śyenam	jasuri na śyena
438	śravaḥ ca acchā paśumat ca yūtham	śravas ca acchā paśumat ca yūtha
438	uta sma āsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan	uta sma idam prathama sṛ
438	ni veveti śreṇibhiḥ rathānām	ni vevīy śreṇi ratha
438	srajam kṛṇvānaḥ janyaḥ na śubhvā	sraj kṛ janya na śubhvan
438	reṇum rerihat kiraṇam dadaśvān	reṇu rerih kiraṇa daṃś
438	uta sya vājī sahuriḥ ṛtāvā	uta tya vājin sahuri ṛtāvan
438	śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye	śuśrūṣ tanū samarya
438	turam yatīṣu turayan ṛjipyaḥ	tura i turay ṛjipya
438	adhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan	adhi bhrū kṛ reṇu ṛj
438	uta sma asya tanyatoḥ iva dyoḥ	uta sma idam tanyatu iva div
438	ṛghāyataḥ abhiyujaḥ bhayante	ṛghāy abhiyuj bhī
438	yadā sahasram abhi sīm ayodhīt	yadā sahasra abhi sīm yudh
438	durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīmaḥ ṛñjan	durvartu sma bhū bhīma ṛj
438	uta sma asya panayanti janāḥ	uta sma idam panay jana
438	jūtim kṛṣTipraḥ abhibhūtim āśoḥ	jūti kṛṣṭi prā abhibhūti āśu
438	uta enam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ	uta enad ah samitha vī
438	parā dadhikrāḥ asarat sahasraiḥ	parā dadhikrā sṛ sahasra
438	ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣTīḥ	ā dadhikrā śavas pañcan kṛṣṭi
438	sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna	sūrya iva jyotis ap tan
438	sahasrasāḥ śatasāḥ vājī arvā	sahasra sā śata sā vājin arvan
438	pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṁsi	pṛc madhu sam idam vacas
 ---
439	āśum dadhikrām tam u nu stavāma	āśu dadhikrā tad u nu stu
439	divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ uta carkirāma	div pṛthivī uta carkar
439	ucchantīḥ mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu	vas mad uṣas sūday
439	ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan	ati viśva durita pṛ
439	mahaḥ carkarmi arvataḥ kratuprāḥ	mah carkar arvant kratu prā
439	dadhikrāvṇaḥ puruvārasya vṛṣṇaḥ	dadhikrāvan puru vāra vṛṣan
439	yam pūrubhyaḥ dīdivāṁsam na agnim	yad pūru dīdī na agni
439	dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā taturim	dā mitrāvaruṇa taturi
439	yaḥ aśvasya dadhikrāvṇaḥ akārīt	yad aśva dadhikrāvan kṛ
439	samiddhe agnau uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	samindh agni uṣas vyuṣṭi
439	anāgasam tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu	anāgas tad aditi kṛ
439	sa mitreṇa varuṇenā sajoṣāḥ	tad mitra varuṇa sajoṣas
439	dadhikrāvṇaḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ mahaḥ yat	dadhikrāvan iṣ ūrj mah yat
439	amanmahi marutām nāma bhadram	man marut nāman bhadra
439	svastaye varuṇam mitram agnim	svasti varuṇa mitra agni
439	havāmahe indram vajrabāhum	hvā indra vajra bāhu
439	indram iva it ubhaye vi hvayante	indra iva id ubhaya vi hvā
439	udīrāṇāḥ yajñam upaprayantaḥ	udīr yajña upapre
439	dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya	dadhikrā u sūdana martya
439	dadathuḥ mitrāvaruṇā naḥ aśvam	dā mitrāvaruṇa mad aśva
439	dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam	dadhikrāvan kṛ
439	jiṣṇoḥ aśvasya vājinaḥ	jiṣṇu aśva vājin
439	surabhi naḥ mukhā karat	surabhi mad mukha kṛ
439	pra naḥ āyūṁṣi tāriṣat	pra mad āyus tṛ
 ---
440	dadhikrāvṇaḥ it u nu carkirāma	dadhikrāvan id u nu carkar
440	viśvāḥ it mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu	viśva id mad uṣas sūday
440	apām agneḥ uṣasaḥ sūryasya	ap agni uṣas sūrya
440	bṛhaspateḥ āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ	bṛhaspati āṅgirasa jiṣṇu
440	satvā bhariṣaḥ gaviṣaḥ duvanyasat	satvan bhariṣa gaviṣa duvanyasad
440	śravasyāt iṣaḥ uṣasaḥ turaṇyasat	śravasy iṣ uṣas turaṇyasad
440	satyaḥ dravaḥ dravaraḥ pataṁgaraḥ	satya drava dravara pataṃgara
440	dadhikrāvā iṣam ūrjam svar janat	dadhikrāvan iṣ ūrj svar jan
440	uta sma asya dravataḥ turaṇyataḥ	uta sma idam dru turaṇy
440	parṇam na veḥ anu vāti pragardhinaḥ	parṇa na vi anu vā pragardhin
440	śyenasya iva dhrajataḥ aṅkasam pari	śyena iva dhraj aṅkasa pari
440	dadhikrāvṇaḥ saha ūrjā taritrataḥ	dadhikrāvan saha ūrj tartar
440	uta sya vājī kṣipaṇim turaṇyati	uta tya vājin kṣipaṇi turaṇy
440	grīvāyām baddhaḥ apikakṣe āsani	grīvā bandh apikakṣa āsan
440	kratum dadhikrāḥ anu saṁtavītvat	kratu dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat
440	pathām aṅkāṁsi anu āpanīphaṇat	pathin aṅkas anu āpanīphaṇ
440	haṁsaḥ śuciṣat vasuḥ antarikṣasat	haṃsa śuci sad vasu antarikṣa sad
440	hotā vediṣat atithiḥ duroṇasat	hotṛ vedi sad atithi duroṇa sad
440	nṛṣat varasat ṛtasat vyomasat	nṛṣad vara sad ṛta sad vyoman sad
440	abjāḥ gojāḥ ṛtajāḥ adrijāḥ ṛtam	ap jā go jā ṛta jā adri jā ṛta
 ---
441	indrā kaḥ vām varuṇā sumnam āpa	indra ka tvad varuṇa sumna āp
441	stomaḥ haviṣmān amṛtaḥ na hotā	stoma haviṣmat amṛta na hotṛ
441	yaḥ vām hṛdi kratumān asmat uktaḥ	yad tvad hṛd kratumat mad vac
441	pasparśat indrāvaruṇā namasvān	spṛś indrāvaruṇa namasvat
441	indrā ha yaḥ varuṇā cakre āpī	indra ha yad varuṇa kṛ āpi
441	devau martaḥ sakhyāya prayasvān	deva marta sakhya prayasvat
441	sa hanti vṛtrā samitheṣu śatrūn	tad han vṛtra samitha śatru
441	avobhiḥ vā mahadbhiḥ sa pra śṛṇve	avas vā mahat tad pra śru
441	indrā ha ratnam varuṇā dheṣThā	indra ha ratna varuṇa dheṣṭha
441	itthā nṛbhyaḥ śaśamānebhyaḥ tā	itthā nṛ śam tad
441	yadī sakhāyā sakhyāya somaiḥ	yadi sakhi sakhya soma
441	sutebhiḥ suprayasā mādayaite	su su prayas māday
441	indrā yuvam varuṇā didyum asmin	indra tvad varuṇa didyu idam
441	ojiṣTham ugrā ni vadhiṣTam vajram	ojiṣṭha ugra ni vadh vajra
441	yaḥ naḥ durevaḥ vṛkatiḥ dabhītiḥ	yad mad dureva vṛkati dabhīti
441	tasmin mimāthām abhibhūti ojaḥ	tad mā abhibhūti ojas
441	indrā yuvam varuṇā bhūtam asyāḥ	indra tvad varuṇa bhū idam
441	dhiyaḥ pretārā vṛṣabhā iva dhenoḥ	dhī pretṛ vṛṣabha iva dhenu
441	sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī	tad mad duh yavasa iva gam
441	sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ	sahasra dhārā payas mah go
441	toke hite tanaye urvarāsu	toka dhā tanaya urvarā
441	sūraḥ dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaḥ ca pauṁsye	svar dṛśīka vṛṣan ca pauṃsya
441	indrā naḥ atra varuṇā syātām	indra mad atra varuṇa as
441	avobhiḥ dasmā paritakmyāyām	avas dasma paritakmyā
441	yuvām it hi avase pūrvyāya	tvad id hi av pūrvya
441	pari prabhūtī gaviṣaḥ svāpī	pari prabhūti gaviṣ su āpi
441	vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya priyāya	vṛ sakhya priya
441	śūrā maṁhiṣThā pitarā iva śambhū	śūra maṃhiṣṭha pitṛ iva śambhu
441	tāḥ vām dhiyaḥ avase vājayantīḥ	tad tvad dhī av vājay
441	ājim na jagmuḥ yuvayūḥ sudānū	āji na gam yuvayu sudānu
441	śriye na gāvaḥ upa somam asthuḥ	śrī na go upa soma sthā
441	indram giraḥ varuṇam me manīṣāḥ	indra gir varuṇa mad manīṣā
441	imāḥ indram varuṇam me manīṣāḥ	idam indra varuṇa mad manīṣā
441	agman upa draviṇam icchamānāḥ	gam upa draviṇa iṣ
441	upa īm asthuḥ joṣTāraḥ iva vasvaḥ	upa īṃ sthā joṣṭṛ iva vasu
441	raghvīḥ iva śravasaḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ	raghu iva śravas bhikṣ
441	aśvyasya tmanā rathyasya puṣTeḥ	aśvya tman rathya puṣṭi
441	nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma	nitya rai pati as
441	tā cakrāṇau ūtibhiḥ navyasībhiḥ	tad kṛ ūti navyas
441	asmatrā rāyaḥ niyutaḥ sacantām	asmatrā rai niyut sac
441	ā naḥ bṛhantā bṛhatībhiḥ ūtī	ā mad bṛhat bṛhat ūti
441	indra yātam varuṇa vājasātau	indra yā varuṇa vājasāti
441	yat didyavaḥ pṛtanāsu prakrīLān	yat didyu pṛtanā prakrīḍ
441	tasya vām syāma sanitāraḥ ājeḥ	tad tvad as san āji
 ---
442	mama dvitā rāṣTram kṣatriyasya	mad dvitā rāṣṭra kṣatriya
442	viśvāyoḥ viśve amṛtāḥ yathā naḥ	viśvāyu viśva amṛta yathā mad
442	kratum sacante varuṇasya devāḥ	kratu sac varuṇa deva
442	rājāmi kṛṣTeḥ upamasya vavreḥ	rāj kṛṣṭi upama vavri
442	aham rājā varuṇaḥ mahyam tāni	mad rājan varuṇa mad tad
442	asuryāṇi prathamā dhārayanta	asurya prathama dhāray
442	kratum sacante varuṇasya devāḥ	kratu sac varuṇa deva
442	rājāmi kṛṣTeḥ upamasya vavreḥ	rāj kṛṣṭi upama vavri
442	aham indraḥ varuṇaḥ te mahitvā	mad indra varuṇa tad mahitva
442	urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke	uru gabhīra rajas sumeka
442	tvaṣTā iva viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān	tvaṣṭṛ iva viśva bhuvana vid
442	sam airayam rodasī dhārayam ca	sam īray rodas dhāray ca
442	aham apaḥ apinvam ukṣamāṇāḥ	mad ap pinv vakṣ
442	dhārayam divam sadane ṛtasya	dhāray div sadana ṛta
442	ṛtena putraḥ aditeḥ ṛtāvā	ṛta putra aditi ṛtāvan
442	uta tridhātu prathayat vi bhūma	uta tridhātu prathay vi bhūman
442	mām naraḥ svaśvāḥ vājayantaḥ	mad nṛ su aśva vājay
442	mām vṛtāḥ samaraṇe havante	mad vṛ samaraṇa hvā
442	kṛṇomi ājim maghavā aham indraḥ	kṛ āji maghavan mad indra
442	iyarmi reṇum abhibhūtyojāḥ	ṛch reṇu abhibhūti ojas
442	aham tā viśvā cakaram nakiḥ mā	mad tad viśva kṛ nakir mad
442	daivyam sahaḥ varate apratītam	daivya sahas vṛ apratīta
442	yat mā somāsaḥ mamadan yat ukthā	yat mad soma mad yat uktha
442	ubhe bhayete rajasī apāre	ubh bhī rajas apāra
442	viduḥ te viśvā bhuvanāni tasya	vid tvad viśva bhuvana tad
442	tā pra bravīṣi varuṇāya vedhaḥ	tad pra brū varuṇa vedhas
442	tvam vṛtrāṇi śṛṇviṣe jaghanvān	tvad vṛtra śru han
442	tvam vṛtān ariṇāḥ indra sindhūn	tvad vṛ ri indra sindhu
442	asmākam atra pitaraḥ te āsan	mad atra pitṛ tad as
442	sapta ṛṣayaḥ daurgahe badhyamāne	saptan ṛṣi daurgaha bandh
442	te ā ayajanta trasadasyum asyāḥ	tad āyaj trasadasyu idam
442	indram na vṛtraturam ardhadevam	indra na vṛtra tura ardha deva
442	purukutsānī hi vām adāśat	purukutsānī hi tvad dāś
442	havyebhiḥ indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ	havya indrāvaruṇa namas
442	athā rājānam trasadasyum asyāḥ	atha rājan trasadasyu idam
442	vṛtrahaṇam dadathuḥ ardhadevam	vṛtra han dā ardha deva
442	rāyā vayam sasavāṁsaḥ madema	rai mad san mad
442	havyena devāḥ yavasena gāvaḥ	havya deva yavasa go
442	tām dhenum indrāvaruṇā yuvam naḥ	tad dhenu indrāvaruṇa tvad mad
442	viśvāhā dhattam anapasphurantīm	viśvāhā dhā an apasphur
 ---
443	kaḥ u śravat katamaḥ yajñiyānām	ka u śru katama yajñiya
443	vandāru devaḥ katamaḥ juṣāte	vandāru deva katama juṣ
443	kasya imām devīm amṛteṣu preṣThām	ka idam devī amṛta preṣṭha
443	hṛdi śreṣāma suṣTutim suhavyām	hṛd śriṣ suṣṭuti su havya
443	kaḥ mṛLāti katamaḥ āgamiṣThaḥ	ka mṛḍ katama āgamiṣṭha
443	devānām u katamaḥ śambhaviṣThaḥ	deva u katama śambhaviṣṭha
443	ratham kam āhuḥ dravadaśvam āśum	ratha ka ah dru aśva āśu
443	yam sūryasya duhitā avṛṇīta	yad sūrya duhitṛ vṛ
443	makṣū hi smā gacchathaḥ īvataḥ dyūn	makṣū hi sma gam īvat div
443	indraḥ na śaktim paritakmyāyām	indra na śakti paritakmyā
443	divaḥ ājātā divyā suparṇā	div ājan divya suparṇa
443	kayā śacīnām bhavathaḥ śaciṣThā	ka śacī bhū śaciṣṭha
443	kā vām bhūt upamātiḥ kayā naḥ	ka tvad bhū upamāti ka mad
443	ā aśvinā gamathaḥ hūyamānā	āśvina gam hu
443	kaḥ vām mahaḥ cit tyajasaḥ abhīke	ka tvad mah cit tyajas abhīka
443	uruṣyatam mādhvī dasrā naḥ ūtī	uruṣy mādhvī dasra mad ūti
443	uru vām rathaḥ pari nakṣati dyām	uru tvad ratha pari nakṣ div
443	ā yat samudrāt abhi vartate vām	ā yat samudra abhi vṛt tvad
443	madhvā mādhvī madhu vām pruṣāyan	madhu mādhvī madhu tvad pruṣāy
443	yat sīm vām pṛkṣaḥ bhurajanta pakvāḥ	yat sīm tvad pṛkṣ bhuraj pakva
443	sindhuḥ ha vām rasayā siñcat aśvān	sindhu ha tvad rasā sic aśva
443	ghṛṇāḥ vayaḥ aruṣāsaḥ pari gman	ghṛṇā vi aruṣa pari gam
443	tat ū su vām ajiram ceti yānam	tad u su tvad ajira cit yāna
443	yena patī bhavathaḥ sūryāyāḥ	yad pati bhū sūryā
443	iheha yat vām samanā papṛkṣe	iha iha yat tvad samanā
443	sā iyam asme sumatiḥ vājaratnā	tad idam mad sumati vāja ratna
443	uruṣyatam jaritāram yuvam ha	uruṣy jaritṛ tvad ha
443	śritaḥ kāmaḥ nāsatyā yuvadrik	śri kāma nāsatya yuvadryañc
 ---
444	tam vām ratham vayam adyā huvema	tad tvad ratha mad adya ā hu
444	pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṁgatim goḥ	pṛthujraya aśvin saṃgati go
444	yaḥ sūryām vahati vandhurāyuḥ	yad sūryā vah vandhurāyu
444	girvāhasam purutamam vasūyum	gir vāhas purutama vasūyu
444	yuvam śriyam aśvinā devatā tām	tvad śrī aśvin devatā tad
444	divaḥ napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ	div napāt van śacī
444	yuvoḥ vapuḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante	tvad vapus abhi pṛkṣ sac
444	vahanti yat kakuhāsaḥ rathe vām	vah yat kakuha ratha tvad
444	kaḥ vām adyā karate rātahavyaḥ	ka tvad adya ā kṛ rā havya
444	ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vā arkaiḥ	ūti vā suta peya vā arka
444	ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya	ṛta vā vanus pūrvya
444	namaḥ yemānaḥ aśvinā ā vavartat	namas yam aśvin vṛt
444	hiraṇyayena purubhū rathena	hiraṇyaya puru bhū ratha
444	imam yajñam nāsatyā upa yātam	idam yajña nāsatya upa yā
444	pibāthaḥ it madhunaḥ somyasya	pā id madhu somya
444	dadhathaḥ ratnam vidhate janāya	dhā ratna vidh jana
444	ā naḥ yātam divaḥ acchā pṛthivyāḥ	ā mad yā div acchā pṛthivī
444	hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena	hiraṇyaya suvṛt ratha
444	mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ	mā tvad anya ni yam devay
444	sam yat dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām	sam yat dā nābhi pūrvya tvad
444	nū naḥ rayim puruvīram bṛhantam	nu mad rayi puru vīra bṛhat
444	dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣu asme	dasra mā ubhaya mad
444	naraḥ yat vām aśvinā stomam āvan	nṛ yat tvad aśvin stoma av
444	sadhastutim ājamīLhāsaḥ agman	sadhastuti ājamīḍha gam
444	iheha yat vām samanā papṛkṣe	iha iha yat tvad samanā
444	sā iyam asme sumatiḥ vājaratnā	tad idam mad sumati vāja ratna
444	uruṣyatam jaritāram yuvam ha	uruṣy jaritṛ tvad ha
444	śritaḥ kāmaḥ nāsatyā yuvadrik	śri kāma nāsatya yuvadryañc
 ---
445	eṣa sya bhānuḥ ut iyarti yujyate	etad tya bhānu ud ṛch yuj
445	rathaḥ parijmā divaḥ asya sānavi	ratha parijman div idam sānu
445	pṛkṣāsaḥ asmin mithunāḥ adhi trayaḥ	pṛkṣa idam mithuna adhi tri
445	dṛtiḥ turīyaḥ madhunaḥ vi rapśate	dṛti turīya madhu vi rapś
445	ut vām pṛkṣāsaḥ madhumantaḥ īrate	ud tvad pṛkṣa madhumat īr
445	rathāḥ aśvāsaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	ratha aśva uṣas vyuṣṭi
445	aporṇuvantaḥ tamaḥ ā parīvṛtam	apavṛ tamas ā parīvṛ
445	svar na śukram tanvantaḥ ā rajaḥ	svar na śukra tan ā rajas
445	madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhiḥ āsabhiḥ	madhu pā madhu pā āsan
445	uta priyam madhune yuñjāthām ratham	uta priya madhu yuj ratha
445	ā vartanim madhunā jinvathaḥ pathaḥ	ā vartani madhu jinv pathin
445	dṛtim vahethe madhumantam aśvinā	dṛti vah madhumat aśvin
445	haṁsāsaḥ ye vām madhumantaḥ asridhaḥ	haṃsa yad tvad madhumat asridh
445	hiraṇyaparṇāḥ uhuvaḥ uṣarbudhaḥ	hiraṇya parṇa uhū uṣarbudh
445	udaprutaḥ mandinaḥ mandinispṛśaḥ	uda prut mandin mandinispṛś
445	madhvaḥ na makṣaḥ savanāni gacchathaḥ	madhu na makṣ savana gam
445	svadhvarāsaḥ madhumantaḥ agnayaḥ	su adhvara madhumat agni
445	usrā jarante prati vastoḥ aśvinā	usṛ jṛ prati vastu aśvin
445	yat niktahastaḥ taraṇiḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	yat nij hasta taraṇi vicakṣaṇa
445	somam suṣāva madhumantam adribhiḥ	soma su madhumat adri
445	ākenipāsaḥ ahabhiḥ davidhvataḥ	ākenipa aha dodhu
445	svar na śukram tanvantaḥ ā rajaḥ	svar na śukra tan ā rajas
445	sūraḥ cit aśvān yuyujānaḥ īyate	sūra cit aśva yuj i
445	viśvān anu svadhayā cetathaḥ pathaḥ	viśva anu svadhā cit pathin
445	pra vām avocam aśvinā dhiyaṁdhāḥ	pra tvad vac aśvin dhiyaṃdhā
445	rathaḥ svaśvaḥ ajaraḥ yaḥ asti	ratha su aśva ajara yad as
445	yena sadyaḥ pari rajāṁsi yāthaḥ	yad sadyas pari rajas yā
445	haviṣmantam taraṇim bhojam accha	haviṣmat taraṇi bhoja acchā
 ---
446	agram pibā madhūnām	agra pā madhu
446	sutam vāyo diviṣTiṣu	su vāyu diviṣṭi
446	tvam hi pūrvapāḥ asi	tvad hi pūrva pā as
446	śatenā naḥ abhiṣTibhiḥ	śata ā mad abhiṣṭi
446	niyutvān indrasārathiḥ	niyutvat indra sārathi
446	vāyo sutasya tṛmpatam	vāyu suta tṛp
446	ā vām sahasram harayaḥ	ā tvad sahasra hari
446	indravāyū abhi prayaḥ	indra vāyu abhi prayas
446	vahantu somapītaye	vah soma pīti
446	ratham hiraṇyavandhuram	ratha hiraṇya vandhura
446	indravāyū svadhvaram	indra vāyu su adhvara
446	ā hi sthāthaḥ divispṛśam	ā hi sthā divispṛś
446	rathena pṛthupājasā	ratha pṛthu pājas
446	dāśvāṁsam upa gacchatam	dāś upa gam
446	indravāyū iha ā gatam	indra vāyu iha ā gam
446	indravāyū ayam sutaḥ	indra vāyu idam suta
446	tam devebhiḥ sajoṣasā	tad deva sajoṣas
446	pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	pā dāś gṛha
446	iha prayāṇam astu vām	iha prayāṇa as tvad
446	indravāyū vimocanam	indra vāyu vimocana
446	iha vām somapītaye	iha tvad soma pīti
 ---
447	vāyo śukraḥ ayāmi te	vāyu śukra yam tvad
447	madhvaḥ agram diviṣTiṣu	madhu agra diviṣṭi
447	ā yāhi somapītaye	ā yā soma pīti
447	spārhaḥ deva niyutvatā	spārha deva niyutvat
447	indraḥ ca vāyo eṣām	indra ca vāyu idam
447	somānām pītim arhathaḥ	soma pīti arh
447	yuvām hi yanti indavaḥ	tvad hi i indu
447	nimnam āpaḥ na sadhryak	nimna ap na sadhryañc
447	vāyo indraḥ ca śuṣmiṇā	vāyu indra ca śuṣmin
447	saratham śavasaḥ patī	sa ratha śavas pati
447	niyutvantā naḥ ūtaye	niyutvat mad ūti
447	ā yātam somapītaye	ā yā soma pīti
447	yāḥ vām santi puruspṛhaḥ	yad tvad as puruspṛh
447	niyutaḥ dāśuṣe narā	niyut dāś nṛ
447	asme tāḥ yajñavāhasā	mad tad yajña vāhas
447	indravāyū ni yacchatam	indra vāyu ni yam
 ---
448	vihi hotrāḥ avītāḥ	vī hotra a vī
448	vipaḥ na rāyaḥ aryaḥ	vip na rai ari
448	vāyo ā candreṇa rathena	vāyu ā candra ratha
448	yāhi sutasya pītaye	yā suta pīti
448	niryuvāṇaḥ aśastīḥ	niryu aśasti
448	niyutvān indrasārathiḥ	niyutvat indra sārathi
448	vāyo ā candreṇa rathena	vāyu ā candra ratha
448	yāhi sutasya pītaye	yā suta pīti
448	anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī	anu kṛṣṇa vasu dhiti
448	yemāte viśvapeśasā	yam viśva peśas
448	vāyo ā candreṇa rathena	vāyu ā candra ratha
448	yāhi sutasya pītaye	yā suta pīti
448	vahantu tvā manoyujaḥ	vah tvad manas yuj
448	yuktāsaḥ navatiḥ nava	yuj navati navan
448	vāyo ā candreṇa rathena	vāyu ā candra ratha
448	yāhi sutasya pītaye	yā suta pīti
448	vāyo śatam harīṇām	vāyu śata hari
448	yuvasva poṣyāṇām	yu puṣ
448	uta vā te sahasriṇaḥ	uta vā tvad sahasrin
448	rathaḥ ā yātu pājasā	ratha ā yā pājas
 ---
449	idam vām āsye haviḥ	idam tvad āsya havis
449	priyam indrābṛhaspatī	priya indrābṛhaspati
449	uktham madaḥ ca śasyate	uktha mada ca śaṃs
449	ayam vām pari sicyate	idam tvad pari sic
449	somaḥ indrābṛhaspatī	soma indrābṛhaspati
449	cāruḥ madāya pītaye	cāru mada pā
449	ā naḥ indrābṛhaspatī	ā mad indrābṛhaspati
449	gṛham indraḥ ca gacchatam	gṛha indra ca gam
449	somapā somapītaye	soma pā soma pīti
449	asme indrābṛhaspatī	mad indrābṛhaspati
449	rayim dhattam śatagvinam	rayi dhā śatagvin
449	aśvāvantam sahasriṇam	aśvāvat sahasrin
449	indrābṛhaspatī vayam	indrābṛhaspati mad
449	sute gīrbhiḥ havāmahe	suta gir hvā
449	asya somasya pītaye	idam soma pā
449	somam indrābṛhaspatī	soma indrābṛhaspati
449	pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	pā dāś gṛha
449	mādayethām tadokasā	māday tad oka
 ---
450	yaḥ tastambha sahasā vi jmaḥ antān	yad stambh sahas vi jm anta
450	bṛhaspatiḥ triṣadhasthaḥ raveṇa	bṛhaspati triṣadhastha rava
450	tam pratnāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dīdhyānāḥ	tad pratna ṛṣi dhī
450	puraḥ viprāḥ dadhire mandrajihvam	puras vipra dhā mandra jihvā
450	dhunetayaḥ supraketam madantaḥ	dhuneti su praketa mad
450	bṛhaspate abhi ye naḥ tatasre	bṛhaspati abhi yad mad taṃs
450	pṛṣantam sṛpram adabdham ūrvam	pṛṣat sṛpra adabdha ūrva
450	bṛhaspate rakṣatāt asya yonim	bṛhaspati rakṣ idam yoni
450	bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvat	bṛhaspati yad parama parāvat
450	ataḥ ā te ṛtaspṛśaḥ ni seduḥ	atas ā tad ṛta spṛś ni sad
450	tubhyam khātāḥ avatāḥ adridugdhāḥ	tvad khan avata adri duh
450	madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitaḥ virapśam	madhu ścut abhitas virapśa
450	bṛhaspatiḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ	bṛhaspati prathama jan
450	mahaḥ jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman	mah jyotis parama vyoman
450	saptāsyaḥ tuvijātaḥ raveṇa	saptan āsya tuvi jan rava
450	vi saptaraśmiḥ adhamat tamāṁsi	vi saptan raśmi dham tamas
450	sa suṣTubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena	tad suṣṭubh tad ṛkvat gaṇa
450	valam ruroja phaligam raveṇa	vala ruj phaliga rava
450	bṛhaspatiḥ usriyāḥ havyasūdaḥ	bṛhaspati usriyā havyasūd
450	kanikradat vāvaśatīḥ ut ājat	kanikrad vāvāś ud aj
450	evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe	eva pitṛ viśva deva vṛṣan
450	yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ	yajña vidh namas havis
450	bṛhaspate suprajāḥ vīravantaḥ	bṛhaspati su prajā vīravat
450	vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām	mad as pati rayi
450	saḥ it rājā pratijanyāni viśvā	tad id rājan pratijanya viśva
450	śuṣmeṇa tasthau abhi vīryeṇa	śuṣma sthā abhi vīrya
450	bṛhaspatim yaḥ subhṛtam bibharti	bṛhaspati yad su bhṛ bhṛ
450	valgūyati vandate pūrvabhājam	valgūy vand pūrvabhāj
450	saḥ it kṣeti sudhitaḥ okasi sve	tad id kṣi sudhita oka sva
450	tasmai iLā pinvate viśvadānīm	tad iḍā pinv viśvadānīm
450	tasmai viśaḥ svayam evā namante	tad viś svayam eva nam
450	yasmin brahmā rājani pūrvaḥ eti	yad brahman rājan pūrva i
450	apratītaḥ jayati sam dhanāni	apratīta ji sam dhana
450	pratijanyāni uta yā sajanyā	pratijanya uta yad sajanya
450	avasyave yaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇoti	avasyu yad varivas kṛ
450	brahmaṇe rājā tam avanti devāḥ	brahman rājan tad av deva
450	indraḥ ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate	indra ca soma pā bṛhaspati
450	asmin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū	idam yajña mand vṛṣaṇvasu
450	ā vām viśantu indavaḥ svābhuvaḥ	ā tvad viś indu su ābhū
450	asme rayim sarvavīram ni yacchatam	mad rayi sarva vīra ni yam
450	bṛhaspate indra vardhatam naḥ	bṛhaspati indra vṛdh mad
450	sacā sā vām sumatiḥ bhūtu asme	sacā tad tvad sumati bhū mad
450	aviṣTam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam puraṁdhīḥ	av dhī jāgṛ puraṃdhi
450	jajastam aryaḥ vanuṣām arātīḥ	jas ari vanus arāti
 ---
451	idam u tyat purutamam purastāt	idam u tya purutama purastāt
451	jyotiḥ tamasaḥ vayunāvat asthāt	jyotis tamas vayunāvat sthā
451	nūnam divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ	nūnam div duhitṛ vibhā
451	gātum kṛṇavan uṣasaḥ janāya	gātu kṛ uṣas jana
451	asthuḥ u citrāḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt	sthā u citra uṣas purastāt
451	mitāḥ iva svaravaḥ adhvareṣu	mā iva svaru adhvara
451	vi ū vrajasya tamasaḥ dvārā	vi ū vraja tamas dvāra
451	ucchantīḥ avran śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ	vas vṛ śuci pāvaka
451	ucchantīḥ adya citayanta bhojān	vas adya citay bhoja
451	rādhodeyāya uṣasaḥ maghonīḥ	rādhas deya uṣas maghavan
451	acitre antar paṇayaḥ sasantu	a citra antar paṇi sas
451	abudhyamānāḥ tamasaḥ vimadhye	a budh tamas vimadhya
451	kuvit sa devīḥ sanayaḥ navaḥ vā	kuvid tad deva sanaya nava vā
451	yāmaḥ babhūyāt uṣasaḥ vaḥ adya	yāma bhū uṣas tvad adya
451	yenā navagve aṅgire daśagve	yad navagva aṅgira daśagva
451	saptāsye revatīḥ revat ūṣa	saptan āsya revat revat vas
451	yūyam hi devīḥ ṛtayugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ	tvad hi devī ṛta yuj aśva
451	pariprayātha bhuvanāni sadyaḥ	pariprayā bhuvana sadyas
451	prabodhayantīḥ uṣasaḥ sasantam	prabodhay uṣas sas
451	dvipāt catuṣpāt carathāya jīvam	dvipa catuṣpād caratha jīva
451	kva svit āsām katamā purāṇī	kva svid idam katama purāṇa
451	yayā vidhānā vidadhuḥ ṛbhūṇām	yad vidhāna vidhā ṛbhu
451	śubham yat śubhrāḥ uṣasaḥ caranti	śubha yat śubhra uṣas car
451	na vi jñāyante sadṛśīḥ ajuryāḥ	na vi jñā sadṛśa ajurya
451	tāḥ ghā tāḥ bhadrāḥ uṣasaḥ purā āsuḥ	tad gha tad bhadra uṣas purā as
451	abhiṣTidyumnāḥ ṛtajātasatyāḥ	abhiṣṭi dyumna ṛta jan satya
451	yāsu ījānaḥ śaśamānaḥ ukthaiḥ	yad yaj śam uktha
451	stuvan śaṁsan draviṇam sadyaḥ āpa	stu śaṃs draviṇa sadyas āp
451	tāḥ ā caranti samanā purastāt	tad ā car samanā purastāt
451	samānataḥ samanā paprathānāḥ	samānatas samanā prath
451	ṛtasya devīḥ sadasaḥ budhānāḥ	ṛta devī sadas budh
451	gavām na sargāḥ uṣasaḥ jarante	go na sarga uṣas jṛ
451	tāḥ it nu eva samanā samānīḥ	tad id nu eva samanā samāna
451	amītavarṇāḥ uṣasaḥ caranti	a mī varṇa uṣas car
451	gūhantīḥ abhvam asitam ruśadbhiḥ	guh abhva asita ruśat
451	śukrāḥ tanūbhiḥ śucayaḥ rucānāḥ	śukra tanū śuci ruc
451	rayim divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ	rayi div duhitṛ vibhā
451	prajāvantam yacchata asmāsu devīḥ	prajāvat yam mad devī
451	syonāt ā vaḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ	syona ā tvad pratibudh
451	suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma	su vīrya pati as
451	tat vaḥ divaḥ duhitaraḥ vibhātīḥ	tad tvad div duhitṛ vibhā
451	upa bruve uṣasaḥ yajñaketuḥ	upa brū uṣas yajña ketu
451	vayam syāma yaśasaḥ janeṣu	mad as yaśas jana
451	tat dyauḥ ca dhattām pṛthivī ca devī	tad div ca dhā pṛthivī ca devī
 ---
452	prati syā sūnarī janī	prati tya sūnara janī
452	vyucchantī pari svasuḥ	vivas pari svasṛ
452	divaḥ adarśi duhitā	div dṛś duhitṛ
452	aśvā iva citrā aruṣī	aśvā iva citra aruṣa
452	mātā gavām ṛtāvarī	mātṛ go ṛtāvan
452	sakhā abhūt aśvinoḥ uṣāḥ	sakhi bhū aśvin uṣas
452	uta sakhā asi aśvinoḥ	uta sakhi as aśvin
452	uta mātā gavām asi	uta mātṛ go as
452	uta uṣaḥ vasvaḥ īśiṣe	uta uṣas vasu īś
452	yāvayaddveṣasam tvā	yāvay dveṣas tvad
452	cikitvit sūnṛtāvari	cikitvit sūnṛtāvarī
452	prati stomaiḥ abhutsmahi	prati stoma budh
452	prati bhadrāḥ adṛkṣata	prati bhadra dṛś
452	gavām sargāḥ na raśmayaḥ	go sarga na raśmi
452	ā uṣāḥ aprāḥ uru jrayaḥ	ā uṣas prā uru jrayas
452	āpapruṣī vibhāvari	āprā vibhāvan
452	vi āvar jyotiṣā tamaḥ	vi vṛ jyotis tamas
452	uṣaḥ anu svadhām ava	uṣas anu svadhā av
452	ā dyām tanoṣi raśmibhiḥ	ā div tan raśmi
452	ā antarikṣam uru priyam	ā antarikṣa uru priya
452	uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā	uṣas śukra śocis
 ---
453	tat devasya savituḥ vāryam mahat	tad deva savitṛ vārya mahat
453	vṛṇīmahe asurasya pracetasaḥ	vṛ asura pracetas
453	chardiḥ yena dāśuṣe yacchati tmanā	chardis yad dāś yam tman
453	tat naḥ mahān ut ayān devaḥ aktubhiḥ	tad mad mahat ud yam deva aktu
453	divaḥ dhartā bhuvanasya prajāpatiḥ	div dhartṛ bhuvana prajāpati
453	piśaṅgam drāpim prati muñcate kaviḥ	piśaṅga drāpi prati muc kavi
453	vicakṣaṇaḥ prathayan āpṛṇan uru	vicakṣaṇa prathay āpṛṇ uru
453	ajījanat savitā sumnam ukthyam	jan savitṛ sumna ukthya
453	ā aprāḥ rajāṁsi divyāni pārthivā	āprā rajas divya pārthiva
453	ślokam devaḥ kṛṇute svāya dharmaṇe	śloka deva kṛ sva dharman
453	pra bāhū asrāk savitā savīmani	pra bāhu sṛj savitṛ savīman
453	niveśayan prasuvan aktubhiḥ jagat	niveśay prasū aktu jagant
453	adābhyaḥ bhuvanāni pracākaśat	adābhya bhuvana pracākaś
453	vratāni devaḥ savitā abhi rakṣate	vrata deva savitṛ abhi rakṣ
453	pra asrāk bāhū bhuvanasya prajābhyaḥ	prasṛj bāhu bhuvana prajā
453	dhṛtavrataḥ mahaḥ ajmasya rājati	dhṛ vrata mah ajma rāj
453	triḥ antarikṣam savitā mahitvanā	tris antarikṣa savitṛ mahitvana
453	trī rajāṁsi paribhūḥ trīṇi rocanā	tri rajas tri rocana
453	tisraḥ divaḥ pṛthivīḥ tisraḥ invati	tri div pṛthivī tri i
453	tribhiḥ vrataiḥ abhi naḥ rakṣati tmanā	tri vrata abhi mad rakṣ tman
453	bṛhatsumnaḥ prasavītā niveśanaḥ	bṛhat sumna prasavītṛ niveśana
453	jagataḥ sthātuḥ ubhayasya yaḥ vaśī	jagat sthātṛ ubhaya yad vaśin
453	sa naḥ devaḥ savitā śarma yacchatu	tad mad deva savitṛ śarman yam
453	asme kṣayāya trivarūtham aṁhasaḥ	mad kṣaya tri varūtha aṃhas
453	ā agan devaḥ ṛtubhiḥ vardhatu kṣayam	āgam deva ṛtu vṛdh kṣaya
453	dadhātu naḥ savitā suprajām iṣam	dhā mad savitṛ su prajā iṣ
453	sa naḥ kṣapābhiḥ ahabhiḥ ca jinvatu	tad mad kṣapā aha ca jinv
453	prajāvantam rayim asme sam invatu	prajāvat rayi mad sam inv
 ---
454	abhūt devaḥ savitā vandyaḥ nu naḥ	bhū deva savitṛ vand nu mad
454	idānīm ahnaḥ upavācyaḥ nṛbhiḥ	idānīm ahar upavac nṛ
454	vi yaḥ ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ	vi yad ratna bhaj mānava
454	śreṣTham naḥ atra draviṇam yathā dadhat	śreṣṭha mad atra draviṇa yathā dhā
454	devebhyaḥ hi prathamam yajñiyebhyaḥ	deva hi prathama yajñiya
454	amṛtatvam suvasi bhāgam uttamam	amṛta tva sū bhāga uttama
454	āt it dāmānam savitar vi ūrṇuṣe	āt id dāman savitṛ vi vṛ
454	anūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ	anūcīna jīvita mānuṣa
454	acittī yat cakṛmā daivye jane	acitti yad kṛ daivya jana
454	dīnaiḥ dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā	dīna dakṣa prabhūti pūruṣatvatā
454	deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca	deva ca savitṛ mānuṣa ca
454	tvam naḥ atra suvatāt anāgasaḥ	tvad mad atra sū anāgas
454	na pramiye savituḥ daivyasya tat	na pramī savitṛ daivya tad
454	yathā viśvam bhuvanam dhārayiṣyati	yathā viśva bhuvana dhāray
454	yat pṛthivyāḥ variman ā svaṅguriḥ	yad pṛthivī variman ā su aṅguri
454	varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam asya tat	varṣman div sū satya idam tad
454	indrajyeṣThān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ	indra jyeṣṭha bṛhat parvata
454	kṣayān ebhyaḥ suvasi pastyāvataḥ	kṣaya idam sū pastyāvat
454	yathāyathā patayantaḥ viyemire	yathā yathā patay viyam
454	eva eva tasthuḥ savitar savāya te	eva eva sthā savitṛ sava tvad
454	ye te triḥ ahan savitar savāsaḥ	yad tvad tris ahar savitṛ sava
454	divedive saubhagam āsuvanti	diva diva saubhaga āsū
454	indraḥ dyāvāpṛthivī sindhuḥ adbhiḥ	indra dyāvāpṛthivī sindhu ap
454	ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yaṁsat	āditya mad aditi śarman yam
 ---
455	kaḥ vaḥ trātā vasavaḥ kaḥ varūtā	ka tvad trā vasu ka varūtṛ
455	dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthām naḥ	dyāvābhūmī aditi trā mad
455	sahīyasaḥ varuṇa mitra martāt	sahīyas varuṇa mitra marta
455	kaḥ vaḥ adhvare varivaḥ dhāti devāḥ	ka tvad adhvara varivas dhā deva
455	pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇi arcān	pra yad dhāman pūrvya arc
455	vi yat ucchān viyotāraḥ amūrāḥ	vi yat vas viyotṛ amūra
455	vidhātāraḥ vi te dadhuḥ ajasrāḥ	vidhātṛ vi tad ajasra
455	ṛtadhītayaḥ rurucanta dasmāḥ	ṛta dhīti ruc dasma
455	pra pastyām aditim sindhum arkaiḥ	pra pastyā aditi sindhu arka
455	svastim īLe sakhyāya devīm	svasti īḍ sakhya devī
455	ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī nipātaḥ	ubh yathā mad ahar nipā
455	uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe	uṣāsānaktā kṛ adabdha
455	vi aryamā varuṇaḥ ceti panthām	vi aryaman varuṇa cit pathin
455	iṣaḥ patiḥ suvitam gātum agniḥ	iṣ pati suvita gātu agni
455	indrāviṣṇū nṛvat u su stavānā	indrāviṣṇu nṛvat u su stu
455	śarma naḥ yantam amavat varūtham	śarman mad yam amavat varūtha
455	ā parvatasya marutām avāṁsi	ā parvata marut avas
455	devasya trātuḥ avri bhagasya	deva trātṛ vṛ bhaga
455	pāt patiḥ janyāt aṁhasaḥ naḥ	pā pati janya aṃhas mad
455	mitraḥ mitriyāt uta naḥ uruṣyet	mitra mitriya uta mad uruṣy
455	nū rodasī ahinā budhnyena	nu rodas ahi budhnya
455	stuvīta devī apyebhiḥ iṣTaiḥ	stu devī apya iṣ
455	samudram na saṁcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ	samudra na saṃcaraṇa saniṣyu
455	gharmasvarasaḥ nadyaḥ apa vran	gharma svaras nadī apa vṛ
455	devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu	deva mad devī aditi ni pā
455	devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayucchan	deva trātṛ trā aprayucchat
455	nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim	nahi mitra varuṇa dhāsi
455	arhāmasi pramiyam sānu agneḥ	arh pramī sānu agni
455	agniḥ īśe vasavyasya	agni īś vasavya
455	agniḥ mahaḥ saubhagasya	agni mah saubhaga
455	tāni asmabhyam rāsate	tad mad rā
455	uṣaḥ maghoni ā vaha	uṣas maghavan ā vah
455	sūnṛte vāryā puru	sūnṛta vārya puru
455	asmabhyam vājinīvati	mad vājinīvat
455	tat su naḥ savitā bhagaḥ	tad su mad savitṛ bhaga
455	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
455	indraḥ naḥ rādhasā ā gamat	indra mad rādhas gam
 ---
456	mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣThe	mahi dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭha
456	rucā bhavatām śucayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ	ruc bhū śocay arka
456	yat sīm variṣThe bṛhatī viminvan	yat sīm variṣṭha bṛhat vimi
456	ruvat ha ukṣā paprathānebhiḥ evaiḥ	ru ha ukṣan prath eva
456	devī devebhiḥ yajate yajatraiḥ	devī deva yajata yajatra
456	aminatī tasthatuḥ ukṣamāṇe	a mī sthā vakṣ
456	ṛtāvarī adruhā devaputre	ṛtāvan adruh deva putra
456	yajñasya netrī śucayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ	yajña netrī śocay arka
456	saḥ it svapāḥ bhuvaneṣu āsa	tad id su apas bhuvana as
456	yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna	yad idam dyāvāpṛthivī jan
456	urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke	uru gabhīra rajas sumeka
456	avaṁśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat	a vaṃśa dhīra śacī sam īr
456	nū rodasī bṛhadbhiḥ naḥ varūthaiḥ	nu rodas bṛhat mad varūtha
456	patnīvadbhiḥ iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ	patnīvat iṣay sajoṣas
456	urūcī viśve yajate ni pātam	uruvyañc viśva yajata ni pā
456	dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ	dhī as rathī sadāsā
456	pra vām mahi dyavī abhi	pra tvad mah abhi
456	upastutim bharāmahe	upastuti bhṛ
456	śucī upa praśastaye	śuci upa praśasti
456	punāne tanvā mithaḥ	pū tanū mithas
456	svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ	sva dakṣa rāj
456	ūhyāthe sanāt ṛtam	ūh sanāt ṛta
456	mahī mitrasya sādhathaḥ	mah mitra sādh
456	tarantī pipratī ṛtam	tṛ pṛ ṛta
456	pari yajñam ni sedathuḥ	pari yajña ni sad
 ---
457	kṣetrasya patinā vayam	kṣetra pati mad
457	hitena iva jayāmasi	hita iva ji
457	gām aśvam poṣayitnu ā	go aśva poṣayitnu ā
457	sa naḥ mṛLāti īdṛśe	tad mad mṛḍ īdṛś
457	kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmim	kṣetra pati madhumat ūrmi
457	dhenuḥ iva payaḥ asmāsu dhukṣva	dhenu iva payas mad duh
457	madhuścutam ghṛtam iva supūtam	madhuścut ghṛta iva su pū
457	ṛtasya naḥ patayaḥ mṛLayantu	ṛta mad pati mṛḍay
457	madhumatīḥ oṣadhīḥ dyāvaḥ āpaḥ	madhumat oṣadhī div ap
457	madhumat naḥ bhavatu antarikṣam	madhumat mad bhū antarikṣa
457	kṣetrasya patiḥ madhumān naḥ astu	kṣetra pati madhumat mad as
457	ariṣyantaḥ anu enam carema	a riṣ anu enad car
457	śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ	śuna vāha śuna nṛ
457	śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam	śuna kṛṣ lāṅgala
457	śunam varatrāḥ badhyantām	śuna varatrā bandh
457	śunam aṣTrām ut iṅgaya	śuna aṣṭrā ud iṅgay
457	śunāsīrau imām vācam juṣethām	śunāsīra idam vāc juṣ
457	yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ	yad div kṛ payas
457	tena imām upa siñcatam	tad idam upa sic
457	arvācī subhage bhava	arvāñc subhaga bhū
457	sīte vandāmahe tvā	sītā vand tvad
457	yathā naḥ subhagā asasi	yathā mad subhaga as
457	yathā naḥ suphalā asasi	yathā mad su phala as
457	indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu	indra sītā ni grah
457	tām pūṣā anu yacchatu	tad pūṣan anu yam
457	sā naḥ payasvatī duhām	tad mad payasvat duh
457	uttarāmuttarām samām	uttara uttara samā
457	śunam naḥ phālāḥ vi kṛṣantu bhūmim	śuna mad phāla vi kṛṣ bhūmi
457	śunam kīnāśāḥ abhi yantu vāhaiḥ	śuna kīnāśa abhi i vāha
457	śunam parjanyaḥ madhunā payobhiḥ	śuna parjanya madhu payas
457	śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam	śunāsīra śuna mad dhā
 ---
458	samudrāt ūrmiḥ madhumān ut ārat	samudra ūrmi madhumat ud ṛch
458	upa aṁśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaT	upāṃśu sam amṛta tva naś
458	ghṛtasya nāma guhyam yat asti	ghṛta nāman guhya yad as
458	jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ	jihvā deva amṛta nābhi
458	vayam nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasya	mad nāman pra brū ghṛta
458	asmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ	idam yajña dhāray namas
458	upa brahmā śṛṇavat śasyamānam	upa brahman śru śaṃs
458	catuḥśṛṅgaḥ avamīt gauraḥ etat	catur śṛṅga vam gaura etad
458	catvāri śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya pādāḥ	catur śṛṅga tri idam pāda
458	dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya	dvi śīrṣa saptan hasta idam
458	tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti	tridhā bandh vṛṣabha roro
458	mahaḥ devaḥ martyān ā viveśa	maha deva martya ā viś
458	tridhā hitam paṇibhiḥ guhyamānam	tridhā dhā paṇi guh
458	gavi devāsaḥ ghṛtam anu avindan	go deva ghṛta anu vid
458	indraḥ ekam sūryaḥ ekam jajāna	indra eka sūrya eka jan
458	venāt ekam svadhayā niḥ tatakṣuḥ	vena eka svadhā niḥ takṣ
458	etāḥ arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāt	etad ṛṣ hṛdya samudra
458	śatavrajāḥ ripuṇā na avacakṣe	śata vraja ripu na avacakṣ
458	ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi cākaśīmi	ghṛta dhārā abhi cākaś
458	hiraṇyayaḥ vetasaḥ madhye āsām	hiraṇyaya vetasa madhya idam
458	samyak sravanti saritaḥ na dhenāḥ	samyañc sru sarit na dhenā
458	antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ	antar hṛd manas pū
458	ete arṣanti ūrmayaḥ ghṛtasya	etad ṛṣ ūrmi ghṛta
458	mṛgāḥ iva kṣipaṇoḥ īṣamāṇāḥ	mṛga iva kṣipaṇu īṣ
458	sindhoḥ iva prādhvane śūghanāsaḥ	sindhu iva prādhvana śūghana
458	vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ	vātapramī patay yahva
458	ghṛtasya dhārāḥ aruṣaḥ na vājī	ghṛta dhārā aruṣa na vājin
458	kāṣThāḥ bhindan ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ	kāṣṭhā bhid ūrmi pinv
458	abhi pravanta samanā iva yoṣāḥ	abhi samanā iva yoṣā
458	kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāsaḥ agnim	kalyāṇa smi agni
458	ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidhaḥ nasanta	ghṛta dhārā samidh nas
458	tāḥ juṣāṇaḥ haryati jātavedāḥ	tad juṣ hary jātavedas
458	kanyāḥ iva vahatum etavai u	kanyā iva vahatu i u
458	añji añjānāḥ abhi cākaśīmi	añji añj abhi cākaś
458	yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajñaḥ	yatra soma su yatra yajña
458	ghṛtasya dhārāḥ abhi tat pavante	ghṛta dhārā abhi tad pū
458	abhi arṣata suṣTutim gavyam ājim	abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti gavya āji
458	asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta	mad bhadra draviṇa dhā
458	imam yajñam nayata devatā naḥ	idam yajña nī devatā mad
458	ghṛtasya dhārāḥ madhumat pavante	ghṛta dhārā madhumat pū
458	dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam	dhāman tvad viśva bhuvana adhi śri
458	antar samudre hṛdi antar āyuṣi	antar samudra hṛd antar āyus
458	apām anīke samithe yaḥ ābhṛtaḥ	ap anīka samitha yad ābhṛ
458	tam aśyāma madhumantam te ūrmim	tad aś madhumat tvad ūrmi
51	abodhi agniḥ samidhā janānām	budh agni samidh jana
51	prati dhenum iva āyatīm uṣāsam	prati dhenu iva e uṣas
51	yahvāḥ iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ	yahva iva pra vayā ujjhā
51	pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam accha	pra bhānu sṛ nāka acchā
51	abodhi hotā yajathāya devān	budh hotṛ yajatha deva
51	ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt	ūrdhva agni sumanas prātar sthā
51	samiddhasya ruśat adarśi pājaḥ	samindh ruśat dṛś pājas
51	mahān devaḥ tamasaḥ niḥ amoci	mahat deva tamas niḥ muc
51	yat īm gaṇasya raśanām ajīgar	yat īṃ gaṇa raśanā jāgṛ
51	śuciḥ aṅkte śucibhiḥ gobhiḥ agniḥ	śuci añj śuci go agni
51	āt dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayantī	āt dakṣiṇā yuj vājay
51	uttānām ūrdhvaḥ adhayat juhūbhiḥ	uttāna ūrdhva dhā juhū
51	agnim acchā devayatām manāṁsi	agni acchā devay manas
51	cakṣūṁṣi iva sūrye sam caranti	cakṣus iva sūrya sam car
51	yat īm suvāte uṣasā virūpe	yat īṃ sū uṣas virūpa
51	śvetaḥ vājī jāyate agre ahnām	śveta vājin jan agra ahar
51	janiṣTa hi jenyaḥ agre ahnām	jan hi jenya agra ahar
51	hitaḥ hiteṣu aruṣaḥ vaneṣu	dhā dhā aruṣa vana
51	damedame sapta ratnā dadhānaḥ	dama dama saptan ratna dhā
51	agniḥ hotā ni sasādā yajīyān	agni hotṛ ni sad ā yajīyas
51	agniḥ hotā ni asīdat yajīyān	agni hotṛ ni sad yajīyas
51	upasthe mātuḥ surabhau uloke	upastha mātṛ surabhi u loka
51	yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣThaḥ ṛtāvā	yuvan kavi puru niṣṭhā ṛtāvan
51	dhartā kṛṣTīnām uta madhye iddhaḥ	dhṛ kṛṣṭi uta madhya indh
51	pra nu tyam vipram adhvareṣu sādhum	pra nu tya vipra adhvara sādhu
51	agnim hotāram īLate namobhiḥ	agni hotṛ īḍ namas
51	ā yaḥ tatāna rodasī ṛtena	ā yad tan rodas ṛta
51	nityam mṛjanti vājinam ghṛtena	nitya mṛj vājin ghṛta
51	mārjālyaḥ mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ	mārjālya mṛj sva damūnas
51	kavipraśastaḥ atithiḥ śivaḥ naḥ	kavi praśaṃs atithi śiva mad
51	sahasraśṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tadojāḥ	sahasra śṛṅga vṛṣabha tad ojas
51	viśvān agne sahasā pra asi anyān	viśva agni sahas prā anya
51	pra sadyaḥ agne ati eṣi anyān	pra sadyas agni ati i anya
51	āviḥ yasmai cārutamaḥ babhūtha	āvis yad cārutama bhū
51	īLenyaḥ vapuṣyaḥ vibhāvā	īḍ vapuṣya vibhāvan
51	priyaḥ viśām atithiḥ mānuṣīṇām	priya viś atithi mānuṣa
51	tubhyam bharanti kṣitayaḥ yaviṣTha	tvad bhṛ kṣiti yaviṣṭha
51	balim agne antitaḥ ā uta dūrāt	bali agni antitas ā uta dūrāt
51	ā bhandiṣThasya sumatim cikiddhi	ā bhandiṣṭha sumati cit
51	bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram	bṛhat tvad agni mahi śarman bhadra
51	ā adya ratham bhānumaḥ bhānumantam	ā adya ratha bhānumat bhānumat
51	agne tiṣTha yajatebhiḥ samantam	agni sthā yajata samanta
51	vidvān pathīnām uru antarikṣam	vid pathin uru antarikṣa
51	ā iha devān haviradyāya vakṣi	ā iha deva havis adya vah
51	avocāma kavaye medhyāya	vac kavi medhya
51	vacaḥ vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe	vacas vandāru vṛṣabha vṛṣan
51	gaviṣThiraḥ namasā stomam agnau	gaviṣṭhira namas stoma agni
51	divi iva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret	div iva rukma uruvyañc śri
 ---
52	kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdham	kumāra mātṛ yuvati samubh
52	guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre	guhā bhṛ na dā pitṛ
52	anīkam asya na minat janāsaḥ	anīka idam na mī jana
52	puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau	puras paś nidhā arati
52	kam etam tvam yuvate kumāram	ka etad tvad yuvati kumāra
52	peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna	peṣī bhṛ mahiṣī jan
52	pūrvīḥ hi garbhaḥ śaradaḥ vavardha	puru hi garbha śarad vṛdh
52	apaśyam jātam yat asūta mātā	paś jan yat sū mātṛ
52	hiraṇyadantam śucivarṇam ārāt	hiraṇyadat śuci varṇa ārāt
52	kṣetrāt apaśyam āyudhā mimānam	kṣetra paś āyudha mā
52	dadānaḥ asmai amṛtam vipṛkvat	dā idam amṛta vipṛkvat
52	kim mām anindrāḥ kṛṇavan anukthāḥ	ka mad anindra kṛ anuktha
52	kṣetrāt apaśyam sanutar carantam	kṣetra paś sanutar car
52	sumat yūtham na puru śobhamānam	sumat yūtha na puru śubh
52	na tāḥ agṛbhran ajaniṣTa hi saḥ	na tad grah jan hi tad
52	paliknīḥ it yuvatayaḥ bhavanti	paliknī id yuvati bhū
52	ke me maryakam vi yavanta gobhiḥ	ka mad maryaka vi yu go
52	na yeṣām gopāḥ araṇaḥ cit āsa	na yad gopā araṇa cit as
52	ye īm jagṛbhuḥ ava te sṛjantu	yad īṃ grah ava tad sṛj
52	ā ajāti paśvaḥ upa naḥ cikitvān	āj paśu upa mad cit
52	vasām rājānam vasatim janānām	vas rājan vasati jana
52	arātayaḥ ni dadhuḥ martyeṣu	arāti ni martya
52	brahmāṇi atreḥ ava tam sṛjantu	brahman atri ava tad sṛj
52	ninditāraḥ nindyāsaḥ bhavantu	ninditṛ nind bhū
52	śunaḥ cit śepam niditam sahasrāt	śvan cit śepa nido sahasra
52	yūpāt amuñcaḥ aśamiṣTa hi saḥ	yūpa muc śam hi tad
52	eva asmat agne vi mumugdhi pāśān	eva mad agni vi muc pāśa
52	hotar cikitvaḥ iha tū niṣadya	hotṛ cit iha tu niṣad
52	hṛṇīyamānaḥ apa hi mat aiyeḥ	hṛṇīy apa hi mad i
52	pra me devānām vratapāḥ uvāca	pra mad deva vrata pā vac
52	indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa	indra vid anu hi tvad cakṣ
52	tena aham agne anuśiṣTaḥ ā agām	tad mad agni anuśās āgā
52	vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāti agniḥ	vi jyotis bṛhant bhā agni
52	āviḥ viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā	āvis viśva kṛ mahitva
52	pra adevīḥ māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ	pra adeva māyā sah dureva
52	śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe	śā śṛṅga rakṣas vinikṣ
52	uta svānāsaḥ divi santu agneḥ	uta svāna div as agni
52	tigmāyudhāḥ rakṣase hantavai u	tigma āyudha rakṣas han u
52	made cit asya pra rujanti bhāmāḥ	mada cit idam pra ruj bhāma
52	na varante paribādhaḥ adevīḥ	na vṛ paribādh adeva
52	etam te stomam tuvijāta vipraḥ	etad tvad stoma tuvi jan vipra
52	ratham na dhīraḥ svapāḥ atakṣam	ratha na dhīra su apas takṣ
52	yadi it agne prati tvam deva haryāḥ	yadi id agni prati tvad deva hary
52	svarvatīḥ apaḥ enā jayema	svarvat ap idam ji
52	tuvigrīvaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ	tuvi grīvā vṛṣabha vṛdh
52	aśatru aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ	aśatru ari sam aj vedas
52	iti imam agnim amṛtāḥ avocan	iti idam agni amṛta vac
52	barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṁsat	barhiṣmat manu śarman yam
52	haviṣmate manave śarma yaṁsat	haviṣmat manu śarman yam
 ---
53	tvam agne varuṇaḥ jāyase yat	tvad agni varuṇa jan yad
53	tvam mitraḥ bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ	tvad mitra bhū yat samindh
53	tve viśve sahasaḥ putra devāḥ	tvad viśva sahas putra deva
53	tvam indraḥ dāśuṣe martyāya	tvad indra dāś martya
53	tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnām	tvad aryaman bhū yat kanī
53	nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi	nāma svadhāvat guhya bhṛ
53	añjanti mitram sudhitam na gobhiḥ	añj mitra sudhita na go
53	yat dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi	yat dampati samanas kṛ
53	tava śriye marutaḥ marjayanta	tvad śrī marut marjay
53	rudra yat te janima cāru citram	rudra yat tvad janiman cāru citra
53	padam yat viṣṇoḥ upamam nidhāyi	pada yad viṣṇu upama nidhā
53	tena pāsi guhyam nāma gonām	tad pā guhya nāman go
53	tava śriyā sudṛśaḥ deva devāḥ	tvad śrī sudṛś deva deva
53	purū dadhānāḥ amṛtam sapanta	puru dhā amṛta sap
53	hotāram agnim manuṣaḥ ni seduḥ	hotṛ agni manus ni sad
53	daśasyantaḥ uśijaḥ śaṁsam āyoḥ	daśasy uśij śaṃsa āyu
53	na tvat hotā pūrvaḥ agne yajīyān	na tvad hotṛ pūrva agni yajīyas
53	na kāvyaiḥ paraḥ asti svadhāvaḥ	na kāvya para as svadhāvat
53	viśaḥ ca yasyāḥ atithiḥ bhavāsi	viś ca yad atithi bhū
53	sa yajñena vanavat deva martān	tad yajña van deva marta
53	vayam agne vanuyāma tvotāḥ	mad agni van tvota
53	vasūyavaḥ haviṣā budhyamānāḥ	vasūyu havis budh
53	vayam samarye vidatheṣu ahnām	mad samarya vidatha ahar
53	vayam rāyā sahasaḥ putra martān	mad rai sahas putra marta
53	yaḥ naḥ āgaḥ abhi enaḥ bharāti	yad mad āgas abhi enas bhṛ
53	adhi it agham aghaśaṁse dadhāta	adhi id agha agha śaṃsa dhā
53	jahī cikitvaḥ abhiśastim etām	han cit abhiśasti etad
53	agne yaḥ naḥ marcayati dvayena	agni yad mad marcay dvaya
53	tvām asyāḥ vyuṣi deva pūrve	tvad idam vyuṣ deva pūrva
53	dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta havyaiḥ	dūta kṛ yaj havya
53	saṁsthe yat agne īyase rayīṇām	saṃstha yat agni ī rayi
53	devaḥ martaiḥ vasubhiḥ idhyamānaḥ	deva marta vasu indh
53	ava spṛdhi pitaram yodhi vidvān	ava spṛ pitṛ yudh vid
53	putraḥ yaḥ te sahasaḥ sūno ūhe	putra yad tvad sahas sūnu ūh
53	kadā cikitvaḥ abhi cakṣase naḥ	kadā cit abhi cakṣ mad
