53	agne kadā ṛtacit yātayāse	agni ṛta cit yātay
53	bhūri nāma vandamānaḥ dadhāti	bhūri nāman vand dhā
53	pitā vaso yadi tat joṣayāse	pitṛ vasu yadi tad joṣay
53	kuvit devasya sahasā cakānaḥ	kuvid deva sahas kan
53	sumnam agniḥ vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ	sumna agni van vṛdh
53	tvam aṅga jaritāram yaviṣTha	tvad aṅga jaritṛ yaviṣṭha
53	viśvāni agne duritā ati parṣi	viśva agni durita ati pṛ
53	stenāḥ adṛśran ripavaḥ janāsaḥ	stena dṛś ripu jana
53	ajñātaketāḥ vṛjināḥ abhūvan	ajñāta keta vṛjina bhū
53	ime yāmāsaḥ tvadrik abhūvan	idam yāma tvadrik bhū
53	vasave vā tat it āgaḥ avāci	vasu vā tad id āgas vac
53	na aha ayam agniḥ abhiśastaye naḥ	na aha idam agni abhiśasti mad
53	na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt	na riṣ vṛdh parā dā
 ---
54	tvām agne vasupatim vasūnām	tvad agni vasu pati vasu
54	abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan	abhi pra mand adhvara rājan
54	tvayā vājam vājayantaḥ jayema	tvad vāja vājay ji
54	abhi syāma pṛtsutīḥ martyānām	abhi as pṛtsuti martya
54	havyavāT agniḥ ajaraḥ pitā naḥ	havyavah agni ajara pitṛ mad
54	vibhuḥ vibhāvā sudṛśīkaḥ asme	vibhu vibhāvan su dṛśīka mad
54	sugārhapatyāḥ sam iṣaḥ didīhi	su gārhapatya sam iṣ dīdī
54	asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṁsi	asmadryañc sam mā śravas
54	viśām kavim viśpatim mānuṣīṇām	viś kavi viśpati mānuṣa
54	śucim pāvakam ghṛtapṛṣTham agnim	śuci pāvaka ghṛta pṛṣṭha agni
54	ni hotāram viśvavidam dadhidhve	ni hotṛ viśva vid dhā
54	sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi	tad deva van vārya
54	juṣasva agne iLayā sajoṣāḥ	juṣ agni iḍā sajoṣas
54	yatamānaḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya	yat raśmi sūrya
54	juṣasva naḥ samidham jātavedaḥ	juṣ mad samidh jātavedas
54	ā ca devān haviradyāya vakṣi	ā ca deva havis adya vah
54	juṣTaḥ damūnāḥ atithiḥ duroṇe	juṣ damūnas atithi duroṇa
54	imam naḥ yajñam upa yāhi vidvān	idam mad yajña upa yā vid
54	viśvāḥ agne abhiyujaḥ vihatyā	viśva agni abhiyuj vihan
54	śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni	śatrūy ā bhṛ bhojana
54	vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva	vadha dasyu pra hi cātay
54	vayaḥ kṛṇvānaḥ tanve svāyai	vayas kṛ tanū sva
54	piparṣi yat sahasaḥ putra devān	pṛ yat sahas putra deva
54	saḥ agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān	tad agni pā nṛtama vāja mad
54	vayam te agne ukthaiḥ vidhema	mad tvad agni uktha vidh
54	vayam havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce	mad havya pāvaka bhadra śoci
54	asme rayim viśvavāram sam inva	mad rayi viśva vāra sam inv
54	asme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi	mad viśva draviṇa dhā
54	asmākam agne adhvaram juṣasva	mad agni adhvara juṣ
54	sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam	sahas sūnu triṣadhastha havya
54	vayam deveṣu sukṛtaḥ syāma	mad deva su kṛt as
54	śarmaṇā naḥ trivarūthena pāhi	śarman mad tri varūtha pā
54	viśvāni naḥ durgahā jātavedaḥ	viśva mad durgaha jātavedas
54	sindhum na nāvā duritā ati parṣi	sindhu na nau durita ati pṛ
54	agne atrivat namasā gṛṇānaḥ	agni atri vat namas gṛ
54	asmākam bodhi avitā tanūnām	mad bhū av tanū
54	yaḥ tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamānaḥ	yad tvad hṛd kīrin man
54	amartyam martyaḥ johavīmi	amartya martya johav
54	jātavedaḥ yaśaḥ asmāsu dhehi	jātavedas yaśas mad dhā
54	prajābhiḥ agne amṛtatvam aśyām	prajā agni amṛta tva aś
54	yasmai tvam sukṛte jātavedaḥ	yad tvad su kṛt jātavedas
54	ulokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam	u loka agni kṛ syona
54	aśvinam sa putriṇam vīravantam	aśvin tad putrin vīravat
54	gomantam rayim naśate svasti	gomat rayi naś svasti
 ---
55	susamiddhāya śociṣe	su samindh śocis
55	ghṛtam tīvram juhotana	ghṛta tīvra hu
55	agnaye jātavedase	agni jātavedas
55	narāśaṁsaḥ suṣūdati	narāśaṃsa sūd
55	imam yajñam adābhyaḥ	idam yajña adābhya
55	kaviḥ hi madhuhastyaḥ	kavi hi madhu hastya
55	īLitaḥ agne ā vaha	īḍ agni ā vah
55	indram citram iha priyam	indra citra iha priya
55	sukhaiḥ rathebhiḥ ūtaye	sukha ratha ūti
55	ūrṇamradāḥ vi prathasva	ūrṇamradas vi prath
55	abhi arkāḥ anūṣata	abhi arka nū
55	bhavā naḥ śubhra sātaye	bhū mad śubhra sāti
55	devīḥ dvāraḥ vi śrayadhvam	devī dvār vi śri
55	suprāyaṇāḥ naḥ ūtaye	su prāyaṇa mad ūti
55	prapra yajñam pṛṇītana	pra pra yajña pṛ
55	supratīke vayovṛdhā	su pratīka vayas vṛdh
55	yahvī ṛtasya mātarā	yahva ṛta mātṛ
55	doṣām uṣāsam īmahe	doṣā uṣas ī
55	vātasya patman īLitā	vāta patman īḍ
55	daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ	daivya hotṛ manus
55	imam naḥ yajñam ā gatam	idam mad yajña ā gam
55	iLā sarasvatī mahī	iḍā sarasvatī mahī
55	tisraḥ devīḥ mayobhuvaḥ	tri devī mayobhu
55	barhiḥ sīdantu asridhaḥ	barhis sad asridh
55	śivaḥ tvaṣTar iha ā gahi	śiva tvaṣṭṛ iha ā gam
55	vibhuḥ poṣe uta tmanā	vibhu poṣa uta tman
55	yajñeyajñe naḥ ut ava	yajña yajña mad ud av
55	yatra vettha vanaspate	yatra vid vanaspati
55	devānām guhyā nāmāni	deva guhya nāman
55	tatra havyāni gāmaya	tatra havya gāmay
55	svāhā agnaye varuṇāya	svāhā agni varuṇa
55	svāhā indrāya marudbhyaḥ	svāhā indra marut
55	svāhā devebhyaḥ haviḥ	svāhā deva havis
 ---
56	agnim tam manye yaḥ vasuḥ	agni tad man yad vasu
56	astam yam yanti dhenavaḥ	asta yad i dhenu
56	astam arvantaḥ āśavaḥ	asta arvant āśu
56	astam nityāsaḥ vājinaḥ	asta nitya vājin
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	saḥ agniḥ yaḥ vasuḥ gṛṇe	tad agni yad vasu gṛ
56	sam yam āyanti dhenavaḥ	sam yad e dhenu
56	sam arvantaḥ raghudruvaḥ	sam arvant raghudru
56	sam sujātāsaḥ sūrayaḥ	sam su jan sūri
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	agniḥ hi vājinam viśe	agni hi vājin viś
56	dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ	dā viśvacarṣaṇi
56	agniḥ rāye svābhuvam	agni rai su ābhū
56	sa prītaḥ yāti vāryam	tad prī yā vārya
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	ā te agne idhīmahi	ā tvad agni indh
56	dyumantam deva ajaram	dyumat deva ajara
56	yat ha syā te panīyasī	yat ha tya tvad panīyas
56	samit dīdayati dyavi	samidh dīdī div
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	ā te agne ṛcā haviḥ	ā tvad agni ṛc havis
56	śukrasya śociṣaḥ pate	śukra śocis pati
56	suścandra dasma viśpate	su ścandra dasma viśpati
56	havyavāT tubhyam hūyate	havyavah tvad hu
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	pra u tye agnayaḥ agniṣu	pra u tya agni agni
56	viśvam puṣyanti vāryam	viśva puṣ vārya
56	te hinvire te invire	tad hi tad i
56	te iṣaṇyanti ānuṣak	tad iṣaṇy ānuṣak
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	tava tye agne arcayaḥ	tvad tya agni arci
56	mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ	mahi vrādh vājin
56	ye patvabhiḥ śaphānām	yad patvan śapha
56	vrajā bhuranta gonām	vraja bhur go
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	navāḥ naḥ agne ā bhara	nava mad agni ā bhṛ
56	stotṛbhyaḥ sukṣitīḥ iṣaḥ	stotṛ su kṣiti iṣ
56	te syāma ye ānṛcuḥ	tad as yad arc
56	tvādūtāsaḥ damedame	tvādūta dama dama
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	ubhe suścandra sarpiṣaḥ	ubh su ścandra sarpis
56	darvī śrīṇīṣe āsani	darvī śrī āsan
56	uta u naḥ ut pupūryāḥ	uta u mad ud pṛ
56	uktheṣu śavasaḥ pate	uktha śavas pati
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
56	evā agnim ajuryamuḥ	eva āṃ agni gir
56	gīrbhiḥ yajñebhiḥ ānuṣak	gir yajña ānuṣak
56	dadhat asme suvīryam	dhā mad su vīrya
56	uta tyat āśvaśvyam	uta tya āśu aśvya
56	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
 ---
57	sakhāyaḥ sam vaḥ samyañcam	sakhi sam tvad samyañc
57	iṣam stomam ca agnaye	iṣ stoma ca agni
57	varṣiṣThāya kṣitīnām	varṣiṣṭha kṣiti
57	ūrjaḥ naptre sahasvate	ūrj naptṛ sahasvat
57	kutrā cit yasya samṛtau	kutra cit yad samṛti
57	raṇvāḥ naraḥ nṛṣadane	raṇva nṛ nṛṣadana
57	arhantaḥ cit yam indhate	arh cit yad indh
57	saṁjanayanti jantavaḥ	saṃjanay jantu
57	sam yat iṣaḥ vanāmahe	sam yat iṣ van
57	sam havyā mānuṣāṇām	sam havya mānuṣa
57	uta dyumnasya śavasā	uta dyumna śavas
57	ṛtasya raśmim ā dade	ṛta raśmi ā dā
57	sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā	tad sma kṛ ketu ā
57	naktam cit dūre ā sate	nakta cit dūra ā as
57	pāvakaḥ yat vanaspatīn	pāvaka yat vanaspati
57	pra smā mināti ajaraḥ	pra sma mī ajara
57	ava sma yasya veṣaṇe	ava sma yad veṣaṇa
57	svedam pathiṣu juhvati	sveda pathin hu
57	abhi īm aha svajenyam	abhi īṃ aha sva jenya
57	bhūmā pṛṣThā iva ruruhuḥ	bhūman pṛṣṭha iva ruh
57	yam martyaḥ puruspṛham	yad martya puruspṛh
57	vidat viśvasya dhāyase	vid viśva dhāyas
57	pra svādanam pitūnām	pra svādana pitu
57	astatātim cit āyave	astatāti cit āyu
57	sa hi smā dhanva ākṣitam	tad hi sma dhanvan akṣita
57	dātā na dāti ā paśuḥ	dātṛ na dā ā paśu
57	hiriśmaśruḥ śucidan	hiriśmaśru śucidat
57	ṛbhuḥ anibhṛṣTataviṣiḥ	ṛbhu a nibhraṃś taviṣī
57	śuciḥ sma yasmai atrivat	śuci sma yad atri vat
57	pra svadhitiḥ iva rīyate	pra svadhiti iva ri
57	suṣūḥ asūta mātā	suṣū sū mātṛ
57	krāṇā yat ānaśe bhagam	kṛ yad aś bhaga
57	ā yaḥ te sarpirāsute	ā yad tvad sarpis āsuta
57	agne śam asti dhāyase	agni śam as dhāyas
57	ā eṣu dyumnam uta śravaḥ	ā idam dyumna uta śravas
57	ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ	ā citta martya dhā
57	iti cit manyum adhrijaḥ	iti cit manyu adhrija
57	tvādātam ā paśum dade	tvādāta ā paśu dā
57	āt agne apṛṇataḥ	āt agni apṛṇat
57	atriḥ sāsahyāt dasyūn	atri sah dasyu
57	iṣaḥ sāsahyāt nṛṛn	iṣ sah nṛ
 ---
58	tvām agne ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire	tvad agni ṛtāyu sam indh
58	pratnam pratnāsaḥ ūtaye sahaskṛta	pratna pratna ūti sahaskṛta
58	puruścandram yajatam viśvadhāyasam	puru ścandra yajata viśva dhāyas
58	damūnasam gṛhapatim vareṇyam	damūnas gṛhapati vareṇya
58	tvām agne atithim pūrvyam viśaḥ	tvad agni atithi pūrvya viś
58	śociṣkeśam gṛhapatim ni sedire	śociṣkeśa gṛhapati ni sad
58	bṛhatketum pururūpam dhanaspṛtam	bṛhat ketu puru rūpa dhana spṛt
58	suśarmāṇam svavasam jaradviṣam	su śarman su avas jaradviṣ
58	tvām agne mānuṣīḥ īLate viśaḥ	tvad agni mānuṣa īḍ viś
58	hotrāvidam vivicim ratnadhātamam	hotrā vid vivici ratna dhātama
58	guhā santam subhaga viśvadarśatam	guhā as subhaga viśva darśata
58	tuviṣvaṇasam suyajam ghṛtaśriyam	tuviṣvaṇas su yaj ghṛta śrī
58	tvām agne dharṇasim viśvadhā vayam	tvad agni dharṇasi viśvadhā mad
58	gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ namasā upa sedima	gir gṛ namas upa sad
58	sa naḥ juṣasva samidhānaḥ aṅgiraḥ	tad mad juṣ samindh aṅgiras
58	devaḥ martasya yaśasā sudītibhiḥ	deva marta yaśas su dīti
58	tvam agne pururūpaḥ viśeviśe	tvad agni puru rūpa viś viś
58	vayaḥ dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣTuta	vayas dhā pratnathā puruṣṭuta
58	purūṇi annā sahasā vi rājasi	puru anna sahas vi rāj
58	tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya na ādhṛṣe	tviṣi tad tvad tviṣ na ādhṛṣ
58	tvām agne samidhānam yaviṣThya	tvad agni samindh yaviṣṭhya
58	devāḥ dūtam cakrire havyavāhanam	deva dūta kṛ havya vāhana
58	urujrayasam ghṛtayonim āhutam	uru jrayas ghṛta yoni āhu
58	tveṣam cakṣuḥ dadhire codayanmati	tveṣa cakṣus dhā coday mati
58	tvām agne pradivaḥ āhutam ghṛtaiḥ	tvad agni pradiv āhu ghṛta
58	sumnāyavaḥ suṣamidhā sam īdhire	sumnāyu su samidh sam indh
58	sa vāvṛdhānaḥ oṣadhībhiḥ ukṣitaḥ	tad vṛdh oṣadhī vakṣ
58	abhi jrayāṁsi pārthivā vi tiṣThase	abhi jrayas pārthiva vi sthā
 ---
59	tvām agne haviṣmantaḥ	tvad agni haviṣmat
59	devam martāsaḥ īLate	deva marta īḍ
59	manye tvā jātavedasam	man tvad jātavedas
59	sa havyā vakṣi ānuṣak	tad havya vah ānuṣak
59	agniḥ hotā dāsvataḥ	agni hotṛ dāsvat
59	kṣayasya vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	kṣaya vṛj barhis
59	sam yajñāsaḥ caranti yam	sam yajña car yad
59	sam vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ	sam vāja śravasyu
59	uta sma yam śiśum yathā	uta sma yad śiśu yathā
59	navam janiṣTa araṇī	nava jan araṇī
59	dhartāram mānuṣīṇām	dhartṛ mānuṣa
59	viśām agnim svadhvaram	viś agni su adhvara
59	uta sma durgṛbhīyase	uta sma durgṛbhīy
59	putraḥ na hvāryāṇām	putra na hvārya
59	purū yaḥ dagdhā asi vanā	puru yad dah vana
59	agne paśuḥ na yavase	agni paśu na yavasa
59	adha sma yasya arcayaḥ	adha sma yad arci
59	samyak saṁyanti dhūminaḥ	samyak sami dhūmin
59	yat īm aha tritaḥ divi	yat īṃ aha trita div
59	upa dhmātā iva dhamati	upa dhmātṛ iva dham
59	śiśīte dhmātarī yathā	śā dhmātṛ yathā
59	tava aham agne ūtibhiḥ	tvad mad agni ūti
59	mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ	mitra ca praśasti
59	dveṣoyutaḥ na duritā	dveṣoyut na durita
59	turyāma martyānām	tur martya
59	tam naḥ agne abhī naraḥ	tad mad agni abhi nara
59	rayim sahasvaḥ ā bhara	rayi sah ā bhṛ
59	sa kṣepayat sa poṣayat	tad kṣepay tad poṣay
59	bhuvat vājasya sātaye	bhū vāja sāti
59	uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe	uta as pṛt mad vṛdh
 ---
510	agne ojiṣTham ā bhara	agni ojiṣṭha ā bhṛ
510	dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo	dyumna mad adhrigu
510	pra naḥ rāyā parīṇasā	pra mad rai parīṇas
510	ratsi vājāya panthām	rad vāja pathin
510	tvam naḥ agne adbhuta	tvad mad agni adbhuta
510	kratvā dakṣasya maṁhanā	kratu dakṣa maṃhanā
510	tve asuryam ā aruhat	tvad asurya āruh
510	krāṇā mitraḥ na yajñiyaḥ	krāṇā mitra na yajñiya
510	tvam naḥ agne eṣām	tvad mad agni idam
510	gayam puṣTim ca vardhaya	gaya puṣṭi ca vardhay
510	ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayaḥ	yad stoma pra sūri
510	naraḥ maghāni ānaśuḥ	nṛ magha aś
510	ye agne candra te giraḥ	yad agni candra tvad gir
510	śumbhanti aśvarādhasaḥ	śubh aśva rādhas
510	śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ naraḥ	śuṣma śuṣmin nṛ
510	divaḥ cit yeṣām bṛhat	div cit yad bṛhat
510	sukīrtiḥ bodhati tmanā	su kīrti budh tman
510	tava tye agne arcayaḥ	tvad tya agni arci
510	bhrājantaḥ yanti dhṛṣṇuyā	bhrāj i dhṛṣṇuyā
510	parijmānaḥ na vidyutaḥ	parijman na vidyut
510	svānaḥ rathaḥ na vājayuḥ	svāna ratha na vājayu
510	nū naḥ agne ūtaye	nu mad agni ūti
510	sabādhasaḥ ca rātaye	sabādhas ca rāti
510	asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ	asmāka ca sūri
510	viśvāḥ āśāḥ tarīṣaṇi	viśva āśā tṛ
510	tvam naḥ agne aṅgiraḥ	tvad mad agni aṅgiras
510	stutaḥ stavānaḥ ā bhara	stu stu ā bhṛ
510	hotar vibhvāsaham rayim	hotṛ vibhvāsah rayi
510	stotṛbhyaḥ stavase ca naḥ	stotṛ stu ca mad
510	uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe	uta as pṛt mad vṛdh
 ---
511	janasya gopāḥ ajaniṣTa jāgṛviḥ	jana gopā jan jāgṛvi
511	agniḥ sudakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase	agni su dakṣa suvita navyas
511	ghṛtapratīkaḥ bṛhatā divispṛśā	ghṛta pratīka bṛhat divispṛś
511	dyumat vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ	dyumat vi bhā bharata śuci
511	yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam	yajña ketu prathama purohita
511	agnim naraḥ triṣadhasthe sam īdhire	agni nṛ triṣadhastha sam indh
511	indreṇa devaiḥ saratham sa barhiṣi	indra deva sa ratha sa barhis
511	sīdat ni hotā yajathāya sukratuḥ	sad ni hotṛ yajatha sukratu
511	asammṛṣTaḥ jāyase mātroḥ śuciḥ	a sammṛj jan mātṛ śuci
511	mandraḥ kaviḥ ut atiṣThaḥ vivasvataḥ	mandra kavi ud sthā vivasvant
511	ghṛtena tvā avardhayan agne āhuta	ghṛta tvad vardhay agni āhu
511	dhūmaḥ te ketuḥ abhavat divi śritaḥ	dhūma tvad ketu bhū div śri
511	agniḥ naḥ yajñam upa vetu sādhuyā	agni mad yajña upa vī sādhuyā
511	agnim naraḥ vi bharante gṛhegṛhe	agni nṛ vi bhṛ gṛha gṛha
511	agniḥ dūtaḥ abhavat havyavāhanaḥ	agni dūta bhū havyavāhana
511	agnim vṛṇānāḥ vṛṇate kavikratum	agni vṛ vṛ kavi kratu
511	tubhya idam agne madhumattamam vacaḥ	tvad idam agni madhumattama vacas
511	tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śam hṛde	tvad manīṣā idam as śam hṛd
511	tvām giraḥ sindhum iva avanīḥ mahīḥ	tvad gir sindhu iva avani mahī
511	ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca	ā pṛṇ śavas vardhay ca
511	tvām agne aṅgirasaḥ guhā hitam	tvad agni aṅgiras guhā dhā
511	anu avindan śiśriyāṇam vanevane	anu vid śri vana vana
511	sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ sahaḥ mahat	tad jan math sahas mahat
511	tvām āhuḥ sahasaḥ putram aṅgiraḥ	tvad ah sahas putra aṅgiras
 ---
512	pra agnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya	pra agni bṛhat yajñiya
512	ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma	ṛta vṛṣan asura manman
512	ghṛtam na yajñe āsye supūtam	ghṛta na yajña āsya su pū
512	giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm	gir bhṛ vṛṣabha pratyañc
512	ṛtam cikitvaḥ ṛtam it cikiddhi	ṛta cit ṛta id cit
512	ṛtasya dhārāḥ anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ	ṛta dhārā anu tṛd puru
512	na aham yātum sahasā na dvayena	na mad yātu sahas na dvaya
512	ṛtam sapāmi aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ	ṛta sap aruṣa vṛṣan
512	kayā naḥ agne ṛtayan ṛtena	ka mad agni ṛtay ṛta
512	bhuvaḥ navedāḥ ucathasya navyaḥ	bhū navedas ucatha navyas
512	vedā me devaḥ ṛtupāḥ ṛtūnām	vid mad deva ṛtu pā ṛtu
512	na aham patim sanituḥ asya rāyaḥ	na mad pati sanitṛ idam rai
512	ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ	ka tvad agni ripu bandhana
512	ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ	ka pāyu san dyumat
512	ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti	ka dhāsi agni anṛta pā
512	ke āsataḥ vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ	ka asat vacas as gopā
512	sakhāyaḥ te viṣuṇāḥ agne ete	sakhi tvad viṣuṇa agni etad
512	śivāsaḥ santaḥ aśivāḥ abhūvan	śiva as aśiva bhū
512	adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhiḥ	dhvṛ svayam etad vacas
512	ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ	ṛjūy vṛjina brū
512	yaḥ te agne namasā yajñam īTTe	yad tvad agni namas yajña īḍ
512	ṛtam sapāti aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ	ṛta tad pā aruṣa vṛṣan
512	tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthuḥ ā sādhuḥ etu	tad kṣaya pṛthu ā sādhu i
512	prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ	prasarsṛ nahuṣa śeṣas
 ---
513	arcantaḥ tvā havāmahe	arc tvad hvā
513	arcantaḥ sam idhīmahi	arc sam indh
513	agne arcantaḥ ūtaye	agni arc ūti
513	agneḥ stomam manāmahe	agni stoma man
513	sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ	sidhra adya divispṛś
513	devasya draviṇasyavaḥ	deva draviṇasyu
513	agniḥ juṣata naḥ giraḥ	agni juṣ mad gir
513	hotā yaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā	hotṛ yad mānuṣa ā
513	sa yakṣat daivyam janam	tad yaj daivya jana
513	tvam agne saprathāḥ asi	tvad agni saprathas as
513	juṣTaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ	juṣ hotṛ vareṇya
513	tvayā yajñam vi tanvate	tvad yajña vi tan
513	tvām agne vājasātamam	tvad agni vāja sātama
513	viprāḥ vardhanti suṣTutam	vipra vṛdh suṣṭuta
513	sa naḥ rāsva suvīryam	tad mad rā su vīrya
513	agne nemiḥ arān iva	agni nemi ara iva
513	devān tvam paribhūḥ asi	deva tvad paribhū as
513	ā rādhaḥ citram ṛñjase	ā rādhas citra ṛj
 ---
514	agnim stomena bodhaya	agni stoma bodhay
514	samidhānaḥ amartyam	samindh amartya
514	havyā deveṣu naḥ dadhat	havya deva mad dhā
514	tam adhvareṣu īLate	tad adhvara īḍ
514	devam martāḥ amartyam	deva marta amartya
514	yajiṣTham mānuṣe jane	yajiṣṭha mānuṣa jana
514	tam hi śaśvantaḥ īLate	tad hi śaśvat īḍ
514	srucā devam ghṛtaścutā	sruc deva ghṛtaścut
514	agnim havyāya voLhave	agni havya vah
514	agniḥ jātaḥ arocata	agni jan ruc
514	ghnan dasyūn jyotiṣā tamaḥ	han dasyu jyotis tamas
514	avindat gāḥ apaḥ svar	vid go ap svar
514	agnim īLenyam kavim	agni īḍ kavi
514	ghṛtapṛṣTham saparyata	ghṛta pṛṣṭha sapary
514	vetu me śṛṇavat havam	vī mad śru hava
514	agnim ghṛtena vāvṛdhuḥ	agni ghṛta vṛdh
514	stomebhiḥ viśvacarṣaṇim	stoma viśvacarṣaṇi
514	svādhībhiḥ vacasyubhiḥ	su ādhī vacasyu
 ---
515	pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya	pra vedhas kavi vid
515	giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya	gir bhara yaśas pūrvya
515	ghṛtaprasattaḥ asuraḥ suśevaḥ	ghṛta prasad asura su śeva
515	rāyaḥ dhartā dharuṇaḥ vasvaḥ agniḥ	rai dhṛ dharuṇa vasu agni
515	ṛtena ṛtam dharuṇam dhārayanta	ṛta ṛta dharuṇa dhāray
515	yajñasya śāke parame vyoman	yajña śāka parama vyoman
515	divaḥ dharman dharuṇe seduṣaḥ nṛṛn	div dharman dharuṇa sad nṛ
515	jātaiḥ ajātān abhi ye nanakṣuḥ	jan a jan abhi yad nakṣ
515	aṁhoyuvaḥ tanvaḥ tanvate vi	aṃhoyu tanū tan vi
515	vayaḥ mahat duṣTaram pūrvyāya	vayas mahat duṣṭara pūrvya
515	sa saṁvataḥ navajātaḥ tuturyāt	tad saṃvat nava jan tur
515	siṁham na kruddham abhitaḥ pari sthuḥ	siṃha na krudh abhitas pari sthā
515	mātā iva yat bharase paprathānaḥ	mātṛ iva yat bhṛ prath
515	janaṁjanam dhāyase cakṣase ca	jana jana dhāyas cakṣ ca
515	vayovayaḥ jarase yat dadhānaḥ	vayas vayas jṛ yat dhā
515	pari tmanā viṣurūpaḥ jigāsi	pari tman viṣurūpa gā
515	vājaḥ nu te śavasaḥ pātu antam	vāja nu tvad śavas pā anta
515	urum dogham dharuṇam deva rāyaḥ	uru dogha dharuṇa deva rai
515	padam na tāyuḥ guhā dadhānaḥ	pada na tāyu guhā dhā
515	mahaḥ rāye citayan atrim aspar	mah rai citay atri spṛ
 ---
516	bṛhat vayaḥ hi bhānave	bṛhat vayas hi bhānu
516	arcā devāya agnaye	arc deva agni
516	yam mitram na praśastibhiḥ	yad mitra na praśasti
516	martāsaḥ dadhire puraḥ	marta dhā puras
516	sa hi dyubhiḥ janānām	tad hi div jana
516	hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ	hotṛ dakṣa bāhu
516	vi havyam agniḥ ānuṣak	vi havya agni ānuṣak
516	bhagaḥ na vāram ṛṇvati	bhaga na vāra ṛch
516	asya stome maghonaḥ	idam stoma maghavan
516	sakhye vṛddhaśociṣaḥ	sakhya vṛdh śocis
516	viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi	viśva yad tuviṣvaṇi
516	sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ	sam arya śuṣma ādhā
516	adhā hi agne eṣām	adha hi agni idam
516	suvīryasya maṁhanā	su vīrya maṃhanā
516	tam it yahvam na rodasī	tad id yahva na rodas
516	pari śravaḥ babhūvatuḥ	pari śravas bhū
516	nū naḥ ā ihi vāryam	nu mad e vārya
516	agne gṛṇānaḥ ā bhara	agni gṛ ā bhṛ
516	ye vayam ye ca sūrayaḥ	yad mad yad ca sūri
516	svasti dhāmahe sacā	svasti dhā sacā
516	uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe	uta as pṛt mad vṛdh
 ---
517	ā yajñaiḥ deva martyaḥ	ā yajña deva martya
517	itthā tavyāṁsam ūtaye	itthā tavyas ūti
517	agnim kṛte svadhvare	agni kṛ su adhvara
517	pūruḥ īLīta avase	pūru īḍ av
517	asya hi svayaśastaraḥ	idam hi sva yaśastara
517	āsā vidharman manyase	ās vidharman man
517	tam nākam citraśociṣam	tad nāka citra śocis
517	mandram paraḥ manīṣayā	mandra paras manīṣā
517	asya vai āsā u arciṣā	idam vā ās u arcis
517	yaḥ āyukta tujā girā	yad āyuj tuj gir
517	divaḥ na yasya retasā	div na yad retas
517	bṛhat śocanti arcayaḥ	bṛhat śuc arci
517	asya kratvā vicetasaḥ	idam kratu vicetas
517	dasmasya vasu rathe ā	dasma vasu ratha ā
517	adhā viśvāsu havyaḥ	adha viśva hu
517	agniḥ vikṣu pra śasyate	agni viś pra śaṃs
517	nū naḥ it hi vāryam	nu mad id hi vārya
517	āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ	ās sac sūri
517	ūrjaḥ napāt abhiṣTaye	ūrj napāt abhiṣṭi
517	pāhi śagdhi svastaye	pā śak svasti
517	uta edhi pṛtsu naḥ vṛdhe	uta as pṛt mad vṛdh
 ---
518	prātar agniḥ purupriyaḥ	prātar agni puru priya
518	viśaḥ staveta atithiḥ	viś stu atithi
518	viśvāni yaḥ amartyaḥ	viśva yad amartya
518	havyā marteṣu raṇyati	havya marta raṇ
518	dvitāya mṛktavāhase	dvita mṛktavāhas
518	svasya dakṣasya maṁhanā	sva dakṣa maṃhanā
518	indum sa dhatte ānuṣak	indu tad dhā ānuṣak
518	stotā cit te amartya	stotṛ cit tvad amartya
518	tam vaḥ dīrghāyuśociṣam	tad tvad dīrgha āyu śocis
518	girā huve maghonām	gir hvā maghavan
518	ariṣTaḥ yeṣām rathaḥ	ariṣṭa yad ratha
518	vi aśvadāvan īyate	vi aśva dāvan i
518	citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitiḥ	citra vā yad dīdhiti
518	āsan ukthā pānti ye	āsan uktha pā yad
518	stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare	stṛ barhis svarṇara
518	śravāṁsi dadhire pari	śravas dhā pari
518	ye me pañcāśatam daduḥ	yad mad pañcāśat dā
518	aśvānām sadhastuti	aśva sadhastuti
518	dyumat agne mahi śravaḥ	dyumat agni mahi śravas
518	bṛhat kṛdhi maghonām	bṛhat kṛ maghavan
518	nṛvat amṛta nṛṇām	nṛvat amṛta nṛ
 ---
519	abhi avasthāḥ pra jāyante	abhi avasthā pra jan
519	pra vavreḥ vavriḥ ciketa	pra vavri vavri cit
519	upasthe mātuḥ vi caṣTe	upastha mātṛ vi cakṣ
519	juhure vi citayantaḥ	hu vi citay
519	animiṣam nṛmṇam pānti	animiṣa nṛmṇa pā
519	ā dṛLhām puram viviśuḥ	ā dṛḍha pur viś
519	ā śvaitreyasya jantavaḥ	ā śvaitreya jantu
519	dyumat vardhanta kṛṣTayaḥ	dyumat vṛdh kṛṣṭi
519	niṣkagrīvaḥ bṛhadukthaḥ	niṣka grīvā bṛhaduktha
519	enā madhvā na vājayuḥ	idam madhu na vājayu
519	priyam dugdham na kāmyam	priya dugdha na kāmya
519	ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā	ajāmi jāmi sacā
519	gharmaḥ na vājajaTharaḥ	gharma na vāja jaṭhara
519	adabdhaḥ śaśvataḥ dabhaḥ	adabdha śaśvat dabha
519	krīLan naḥ raśme ā bhuvaḥ	krīḍ mad raśmi ā bhū
519	sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ	sam bhasman vāyu vevid
519	tāḥ asya san dhṛṣajaḥ na tigmāḥ	tad idam as dhṛṣaj na tigma
519	susaṁśitāḥ vakṣyaḥ vakṣaṇesthāḥ	su saṃśā vakṣi vakṣaṇesthā
 ---
520	yam agne vājasātama	yad agni vāja sātama
520	tvam cit manyase rayim	tvad cit man rayi
520	tam naḥ gīrbhiḥ śravāyyam	tad mad gir śravāyya
520	devatrā panayā yujam	devatrā panay yuj
520	ye agne na īrayanti te	yad agni na īray tvad
520	vṛddhāḥ ugrasya śavasaḥ	vṛdh ugra śavas
520	apa dveṣaḥ apa hvaraḥ	apa dveṣas apa hvaras
520	anyavratasya saścire	anya vrata sac
520	hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe	hotṛ tvad vṛ
520	agne dakṣasya sādhanam	agni dakṣa sādhana
520	yajñeṣu pūrvyam girā	yajña pūrvya gir
520	prayasvantaḥ havāmahe	prayasvat hvā
520	itthā yathā te ūtaye	itthā yathā tvad ūti
520	sahasāvan divedive	sahasāvat diva diva
520	rāye ṛtāya sukrato	rai ṛta su kratu
520	gobhiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ	go as sadhamād
520	vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ	vīra as sadhamād
 ---
521	manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi	manuṣvat tvad ni dhā
521	manuṣvat sam idhīmahi	manuṣvat sam indh
521	agne manuṣvat aṅgiraḥ	agni manuṣvat aṅgiras
521	devān devayate yaja	deva devay yaj
521	tvam hi mānuṣe jane	tvad hi mānuṣa jana
521	agne suprītaḥ idhyase	agni su prī indh
521	srucaḥ tvā yanti ānuṣak	sruc tvad i ānuṣak
521	sujāta sarpirāsute	su jan sarpis āsuti
521	tvām viśve sajoṣasaḥ	tvad viśva sajoṣas
521	devāsaḥ dūtam akrata	deva dūta kṛ
521	saparyantaḥ tvā kave	sapary tvad kavi
521	yajñeṣu devam īLate	yajña deva īḍ
521	devam vaḥ devayajyayā	deva tvad deva yajya
521	agnim īLīta martyaḥ	agni īḍ martya
521	samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihi	samindh śukra dīdī
521	ṛtasya yonim ā asadaḥ	ṛta yoni āsad
521	sasasya yonim ā asadaḥ	sasa yoni āsad
 ---
522	pra viśvasāman atrivat	pra viśvasāman atri vat
522	arcā pāvakaśociṣe	arc pāvaka śocis
522	yaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ	yad adhvara īḍ
522	hotā mandratamaḥ viśi	hotṛ mandratama viś
522	ni agnim jātavedasam	ni agni jātavedas
522	dadhātā devam ṛtvijam	dhā deva ṛtvij
522	pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak	pra yajña i ānuṣak
522	adyā devavyacastamaḥ	adya deva vyacastama
522	cikitvinmanasam tvā	cikitvinmanas tvad
522	devam martāsaḥ ūtaye	deva marta ūti
522	vareṇyasya te avasaḥ	vareṇya tvad avas
522	iyānāsaḥ amanmahi	ī man
522	agne cikiddhi asya naḥ	agni cit idam mad
522	idam vacaḥ sahasya	idam vacas sahasya
522	tam tvā suśipra dampate	tad tvad su śiprā dampati
522	stomaiḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ	stoma vṛdh atri
522	gīrbhiḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ	gir śubh atri
 ---
523	agne sahantam ā bhara	agni sah ā bhṛ
523	dyumnasya prāsahā rayim	dyumna prāsah rayi
523	viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi	viśva yad carṣaṇi abhi
523	āsā vājeṣu sāsahat	ās vāja sah
523	tam agne pṛtanāṣaham	tad agni pṛtanāṣāh
523	rayim sahasvaḥ ā bhara	rayi sahasvat ā bhṛ
523	tvam hi satyaḥ adbhutaḥ	tvad hi satya adbhuta
523	dātā vājasya gomataḥ	dātṛ vāja gomat
523	viśve hi tvā sajoṣasaḥ	viśva hi tvad sajoṣas
523	janāsaḥ vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	jana vṛj barhis
523	hotāram sadmasu priyam	hotṛ sadman priya
523	vyanti vāryā puru	vī vārya puru
523	sa hi smā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ	tad hi sma viśvacarṣaṇi
523	abhimāti sahaḥ dadhe	abhimāti sahas dhā
523	agne eṣu kṣayeṣu ā	agni idam kṣaya ā
523	revat naḥ śukra dīdihi	revat mad śukra dīdī
523	dyumat pāvaka dīdihi	dyumat pāvaka dīdī
 ---
524	agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ	agni tvad no antama
524	uta trātā śivaḥ bhavā varūthyaḥ	uta trātṛ śiva bhū varūthya
524	vasuḥ agniḥ vasuśravāḥ	vasu agni vasu śravas
524	acchā nakṣi dyumattamam rayim dāḥ	acchā naś dyumattama rayi dā
524	sa naḥ bodhi śrudhī havam	tad mad budh śru hava
524	uruṣyā naḥ aghāyataḥ samasmāt	uruṣy mad aghāy sama
524	tam tvā śociṣTha dīdivaḥ	tad tvad śociṣṭha dīdī
524	sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ	sumna nūnam ī sakhi
 ---
525	acchā vaḥ agnim avase	acchā tvad agni avas
525	devam gāsi sa naḥ vasuḥ	deva gā tad mad vasu
525	rāsat putraḥ ṛṣūṇām	rā putra ṛṣu
525	ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ	ṛtāvan pṛ dviṣ
525	sa hi satyaḥ yam pūrve cit	tad hi satya yad pūrva cit
525	devāsaḥ cit yam īdhire	deva cit yad indh
525	hotāram mandrajihvam it	hotṛ mandra jihvā id
525	sudītibhiḥ vibhāvasum	su dīti vibhāvasu
525	sa naḥ dhītī variṣThayā	tad mad dhīti variṣṭha
525	śreṣThayā ca sumatyā	śreṣṭha ca sumati
525	agne rāyaḥ didīhi naḥ	agni rai dīdī mad
525	suvṛktibhiḥ vareṇya	suvṛkti vareṇya
525	agniḥ deveṣu rājati	agni deva rāj
525	agniḥ marteṣu āviśan	agni marta āviś
525	agniḥ naḥ havyavāhanaḥ	agni mad havya vāhana
525	agnim dhībhiḥ saparyata	agni dhī sapary
525	agniḥ tuviśravastamam	agni tuvi śravastama
525	tuvibrahmāṇam uttamam	tuvi brahman uttama
525	atūrtam śrāvayatpatim	a tṛ śrāvay pati
525	putram dadāti dāśuṣe	putra dā dāś
525	agniḥ dadāti satpatim	agni dā sat pati
525	sāsāha yaḥ yudhā nṛbhiḥ	sah yad yudh nṛ
525	agniḥ atyam raghuṣyadam	agni atya raghuṣyad
525	jetāram aparājitam	jetṛ a parāji
525	yat vāhiṣTham tat agnaye	yad vāhiṣṭha tad agni
525	bṛhat arca vibhāvaso	bṛhat arc vibhāvasu
525	mahiṣī iva tvat rayiḥ	mahiṣī iva tvad rayi
525	tvat vājāḥ ut īrate	tvad vāja ud īr
525	tava dyumantaḥ arcayaḥ	tvad dyumat arci
525	grāvā iva ucyate bṛhat	grāvan iva vac bṛhat
525	uta u te tanyatuḥ yathā	uta u tvad tanyatu yathā
525	svānaḥ arta tmanā divaḥ	svāna ṛch tman div
525	evā agnim vasūyavaḥ	eva āṃ agni vasūyu
525	sahasānam vavandima	sah vand
525	sa naḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad viśva ati dviṣ
525	parṣat nāvā iva sukratuḥ	pṛ nau iva su kratu
 ---
526	agne pāvaka rociṣā	agni pāvaka rocis
526	mandrayā deva jihvayā	mandra deva jihvā
526	ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca	ā deva vah yaj ca
526	tam tvā ghṛtasno īmahe	tad tvad ghṛtasnu ī
526	citrabhāno svardṛśam	citrabhānu svar dṛś
526	devān ā vītaye vaha	deva ā vīti vah
526	vītihotram tvā kave	vītihotra tvad kavi
526	dyumantam sam idhīmahi	dyumat sam indh
526	agne bṛhantam adhvare	agni bṛhat adhvara
526	agne viśvebhiḥ ā gahi	agni viśva ā gam
526	devebhiḥ havyadātaye	deva havya dāti
526	hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe	hotṛ tvad vṛ
526	yajamānāya sunvate	yaj su
526	ā agne suvīryam vaha	ā agni su vīrya vah
526	devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi	deva ā sad barhis
526	samidhānaḥ sahasrajit	samindh sahasra jit
526	agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi	agni dharma puṣ
526	devānām dūtaḥ ukthyaḥ	deva dūta ukthya
526	ni agnim jātavedasam	ni agni jātavedas
526	hotravāham yaviṣThyam	hotra vāha yaviṣṭhya
526	dadhātā devam ṛtvijam	dhā deva ṛtvij
526	pra yajñaḥ etu ānuṣak	pra yajña i ānuṣak
526	adyā devavyacastamaḥ	adya deva vyacastama
526	stṛṇīta barhiḥ āsade	stṛ barhis āsad
526	ā idam marutaḥ aśvinā	ā idam marut aśvin
526	mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ	mitra sad varuṇa
526	devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā	deva sarva viś
 ---
527	anasvantā satpatiḥ māmahe me	anasvat sat pati mah mad
527	gāvā cetiṣThaḥ asuraḥ maghonaḥ	go cetiṣṭha asura maghavan
527	traivṛṣṇaḥ agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ	traivṛṣṇa agni daśan sahasra
527	vaiśvānara tryaruṇaḥ ciketa	vaiśvānara tryaruṇa cit
527	yaḥ me śatā ca viṁśatim ca gonām	yad mad śata ca viṃśati ca go
527	harī ca yuktā sudhurā dadāti	hari ca yuj su dhur dā
527	vaiśvānara suṣTutaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ	vaiśvānara suṣṭuta vṛdh
527	agne yaccha tryaruṇāya śarma	agni yam tryaruṇa śarman
527	evā te agne sumatim cakānaḥ	eva tvad agni sumati kan
527	naviṣThāya navamam trasadasyuḥ	naviṣṭha navama trasadasyu
527	yaḥ me giraḥ tuvijātasya pūrvīḥ	yad mad gir tuvi jan puru
527	yuktena abhi tryaruṇaḥ gṛṇāti	yuj abhi tryaruṇa gṛ
527	yaḥ me iti pravocati	yad mad iti pravac
527	aśvamedhāya sūraye	aśvamedha sūri
527	dadat ṛcā sanim yate	dā ṛc sani i
527	dadat medhām ṛtāyate	dā medhā ṛtāy
527	yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam	yad mad paruṣa śata
527	uddharṣayanti ukṣaṇaḥ	uddharṣay ukṣan
527	aśvamedhasya dānāḥ	aśvamedha dāna
527	somāḥ iva tryāśiraḥ	soma iva tri āśir
527	indrāgnī śatadāvni	indra agni śata dāvan
527	aśvamedhe suvīryam	aśvamedha su vīrya
527	kṣatram dhārayatam bṛhat	kṣatra dhāray bṛhat
527	divi sūryam iva ajaram	div sūrya iva ajara
 ---
528	samiddhaḥ agniḥ divi śociḥ aśret	samindh agni div śocis śri
528	pratyaṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti	pratyañc uṣas urviyā vi bhā
528	eti prācī viśvavārā namobhiḥ	i prāñc viśva vāra namas
528	devān īLānā haviṣā ghṛtācī	deva īḍ havis ghṛtāñc
528	samidhyamānaḥ amṛtasya rājasi	samindh amṛta rāj
528	haviḥ kṛṇvantam sacase svastaye	havis kṛ sac svasti
528	viśvam sa dhatte draviṇam yam invasi	viśva tad dhā draviṇa yad inv
528	ātithyam agne ni ca dhatte it puraḥ	ātithya agni ni ca dhā id puras
528	agne śardha mahate saubhagāya	agni śṛdh mahat saubhaga
528	tava dyumnāni uttamāni santu	tvad dyumna uttama as
528	sam jāspatyam suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva	sam jāspatya su yama ā kṛ
528	śatrūyatām abhi tiṣThā mahāṁsi	śatrūy abhi sthā mahas
528	samiddhasya pramahasaḥ	samindh pramahas
528	agne vande tava śriyam	agni vand tvad śrī
528	vṛṣabhaḥ dyumnavān asi	vṛṣabha dyumnavat as
528	sam adhvareṣu idhyase	sam adhvara indh
528	samiddhaḥ agne āhuta	samindh agni āhu
528	devān yakṣi svadhvara	deva yaj su adhvara
528	tvam hi havyavāT asi	tvad hi havyavah as
528	ā juhotā duvasyata	ā hu ā duvasy
528	agnim prayati adhvare	agni pre adhvara
528	vṛṇīdhvam havyavāhanam	vṛ havyavāhana
 ---
529	trī aryamā manuṣaḥ devatātā	tri aryaman manus devatāti
529	trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta	tri rocana divya dhāray
529	arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣāḥ	arc tvad marut pū dakṣa
529	tvam eṣām ṛṣiḥ indra asi dhīraḥ	tvad idam ṛṣi indra as dhīra
529	anu yat īm marutaḥ mandasānam	anu yat īṃ marut mand
529	ārcan indram papivāṁsam sutasya	arc indra pā suta
529	ā adatta vajram abhi yat ahim han	ādā vajra abhi yat ahi han
529	apaḥ yahvīḥ asṛjat sartavai u	ap yahva sṛj sṛ u
529	uta brahmāṇaḥ marutaḥ me asya	uta brahman marut mad idam
529	indraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ	indra soma suṣuta pā
529	tat hi havyam manuṣe gāḥ avindat	tad hi havya manus go vid
529	ahan ahim papivān indraḥ asya	han ahi pā indra idam
529	āt rodasī vitaram vi skabhāyat	āt rodas vitaram vi skabhāy
529	saṁvivyānaḥ cit bhiyase mṛgam kar	saṃvye cit bhiyas mṛga kṛ
529	jigartim indraḥ apajargurāṇaḥ	jigarti indra apajargur
529	prati śvasantam ava dānavam han	prati śvas ava dānava han
529	adha kratvā maghavan tubhyam devāḥ	adha kratu maghavan tvad deva
529	anu viśve adaduḥ somapeyam	anu viśva dā soma peya
529	yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ	yat sūrya harit pat
529	puraḥ satīḥ uparāḥ etaśe kar	puras as upara etaśa kṛ
529	nava yat asya navatim ca bhogān	navan yat idam navati ca bhoga
529	sākam vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat	sākam vajra maghavan vivraśc
529	arcanti indram marutaḥ sadhasthe	arc indra marut sadhastha
529	traiṣTubhena vacasā bādhata dyām	traiṣṭubha vacas bādh div
529	sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agniḥ	sakhi sakhi pac tūya agni
529	asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni	idam kratu mahiṣa tri śata
529	trī sākam indraḥ manuṣaḥ sarāṁsi	tri sākam indra manus saras
529	sutam pibat vṛtrahatyāya somam	su pā vṛtra hatya soma
529	trī yat śatā mahiṣāṇām aghaḥ māḥ	tri yat śata mahiṣa ghas
529	trī sarāṁsi maghavā somyā apāḥ	mās tri saras maghavan somya pā
529	kāram na viśve ahvanta devāḥ	kāra na viśva hvā deva
529	bharam indrāya yat ahim jaghāna	bhara indra yat ahi han
529	uśanā yat sahasyaīḥ ayātam	uśanā yat sahasya yā
529	gṛham indra jūjuvānebhiḥ aśvaiḥ	gṛha indra jū aśva
529	vanvānaḥ atra saratham yayātha	van atra sa ratha yā
529	kutsena devaiḥ avanoḥ ha śuṣṇam	kutsa deva van ha śuṣṇa
529	pra anyat cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya	pra anya cakra vṛh sūrya
529	kutsāya anyat varivaḥ yātave akar	kutsa anya varivas yā kṛ
529	anāsaḥ dasyūn amṛṇaḥ vadhena	an ās dasyu mṛṇ vadha
529	ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhravācaḥ	ni duryoṇa āvṛj mṛdhra vāc
529	stomāsaḥ tvā gaurivīteḥ avardhan	stoma tvad gaurivīti vṛdh
529	arandhayaḥ vaidathināya piprum	randhay vaidathina pipru
529	ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre	ā tvad ṛjiśvan sakhya kṛ
529	pacan paktīḥ apibaḥ somam asya	pac pakti pā soma idam
529	navagvāsaḥ sutasomāsaḥ indram	navagva su soma indra
529	daśagvāsaḥ abhi arcanti arkaiḥ	daśagva abhi arc arka
529	gavyam cit ūrvam apidhānavantam	gavya cit ūrva apidhānavat
529	tam cit naraḥ śaśamānāḥ apa vran	tad cit nṛ śam apa vṛ
529	kathā u nu te pari carāṇi vidvān	kathā u nu tvad pari car vid
529	vīryā maghavan yā cakartha	vīrya maghavan yad kṛ
529	yā ca u nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣTha	yad ca u nu navya kṛ śaviṣṭha
529	pra it u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma	pra id u tad tvad vidatha brū
529	etā viśvā cakṛvān indra bhūri	etad viśva kṛ indra bhūri
529	aparītaḥ januṣā vīryeṇa	aparīta janus vīrya
529	yā cit nu vajrin kṛṇavaḥ dadhṛṣvān	yad cit nu vajrin kṛ dhṛṣ
529	na te vartā taviṣyāḥ asti tasyāḥ	na tvad vartṛ taviṣī as tad
529	indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva	indra brahman kṛ juṣ
529	yā te śaviṣTha navyā akarma	yad tvad śaviṣṭha navya kṛ
529	vastrā iva bhadrā sukṛtā vasūyuḥ	vastra iva bhadra su kṛ vasūyu
529	ratham na dhīraḥ svapāḥ atakṣam	ratha na dhīra su apas takṣ
 ---
530	kva sya vīraḥ kaḥ apaśyat indram	kva tya vīra ka paś indra
530	sukharatham īyamānam haribhyām	sukha ratha i hari
530	yaḥ rāyā vajrī sutasomam icchan	yad rai vajrin su soma iṣ
530	tat okaḥ gantā puruhūtaḥ ūtī	tad oka gam puruhūta ūti
530	ava acacakṣam padam asya sasvar	avacakṣ pada idam sasvar
530	ugram nidhātuḥ anu āyam icchan	ugra nidhātṛ anu i iṣ
530	apṛccham anyān uta te me āhuḥ	pracch anya uta tad mad ah
530	indram naraḥ bubudhānāḥ aśema	indra nṛ budh aś
530	pra nu vayam sute yā te kṛtāni	pra nu mad suta yad tvad kṛta
530	indra bravāma yāni naḥ jujoṣaḥ	indra brū yad mad juṣ
530	vedat avidvān śṛṇavat ca vidvān	vid a vidvas śru ca vid
530	vahate ayam maghavā sarvasenaḥ	vah idam maghavan sarva senā
530	sthiram manaḥ cakṛṣe jātaḥ indra	sthira manas kṛ jan indra
530	veṣi it ekaḥ yudhaye bhūyasaḥ cit	vī id eka yudh bhūyas cit
530	aśmānam cit śavasā didyutaḥ vi	aśman cit śavas didyut vi
530	vidaḥ gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām	vid go ūrva usriya
530	paraḥ yat tvam paramaḥ ājaniṣThāḥ	paras yat tvad parama ājan
530	parāvati śrutyam nāma bibhrat	parāvat śrutya nāman bhṛ
530	ataḥ cit indrāt abhayanta devāḥ	atas cit indra bhī deva
530	viśvāḥ apaḥ ajayat dāsapatnīḥ	viśva ap ji dāsa patnī
530	tubhya it ete marutaḥ suśevāḥ	tvad id etad marut su śeva
530	arcanti arkam sunvanti andhaḥ	arc arka su andhas
530	ahim ohānam apaḥ āśayānam	ahi ūh ap āśī
530	pra māyābhiḥ māyinam sakṣat indraḥ	pra māyā māyin sah indra
530	vi sū mṛdhaḥ januṣā dānam invan	vi su mṛdh janus dāna i
530	ahan gavā maghavan saṁcakānaḥ	han go maghavan saṃkan
530	atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiraḥ yat	atra dāsa namuci śiras yat
530	avartayaḥ manave gātum icchan	vartay manu gātu iṣ
530	yujam hi mām akṛthāḥ āt it indra	yuj hi mad kṛ āt id indra
530	śiraḥ dāsasya namuceḥ mathāyan	śiras dāsa namuci mathāy
530	aśmānam cit svaryam vartamānam	aśman cit svarya vṛt
530	pra cakriyā iva rodasī marudbhyaḥ	pra cakriya iva rodas marut
530	striyaḥ hi dāsaḥ āyudhāni cakre	strī hi dāsa āyudha kṛ
530	kim mā karan abalāḥ asya senāḥ	ka mad kṛ abala idam senā
530	antar hi akhyat ubhe asya dhene	antar hi khyā ubh idam dhenā
530	atha upa pra ait yudhaye dasyum indraḥ	atha upa pre yudh dasyu indra
530	sam atra gāvaḥ abhitaḥ anavanta	sam atra go abhitas nū
530	iheha vatsaiḥ viyutāḥ yat āsan	iha iha vatsa viyu yat as
530	sam tāḥ indraḥ asṛjat asya śākaiḥ	sam tad indra sṛj idam śāka
530	yat īm somāsaḥ suṣutāḥ amandan	yat īṃ soma suṣuta mad
530	yat īm somāḥ babhrudhūtāḥ amandan	yat īṃ soma babhru dhū mad
530	aroravīt vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu	roro vṛṣabha sādana
530	puraṁdaraḥ papivān indraḥ asya	puraṃdara pā indra idam
530	punar gavām adadāt usriyāṇām	punar go dā usriya
530	bhadram idam ruśamāḥ agne akran	bhadra idam ruśama agni kṛ
530	gavām catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā	go catur dā sahasra
530	ṛṇaṁcayasya prayatā maghāni	ṛṇaṃcaya prayam magha
530	prati agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām	prati grah nṛtama nṛ
530	supeśasam mā ava sṛjanti astam	supeśas mad ava sṛj asta
530	gavām sahasraiḥ ruśamāsaḥ agne	go sahasra ruśama agni
530	tīvrāḥ indram amamanduḥ sutāsaḥ	tīvra indra mand suta
530	aktoḥ vyuṣTau paritakmyāyāḥ	aktu vyuṣṭi paritakmya
530	aucchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yā	vas tad rātri paritakmya yad
530	ṛṇaṁcaye rājani ruśamānām	ṛṇaṃcaya rājan ruśamā
530	atyaḥ na vājī raghuḥ ajyamānaḥ	atya na vājin raghu añj
530	babhruḥ catvāri asanat sahasrā	babhru catur san sahasra
530	catuḥsahasram gavyasya paśvaḥ	catur sahasra gavya paśu
530	prati agrabhīṣma ruśameṣu agne	prati grah ruśama agni
530	gharmaḥ cit taptaḥ pravṛje yaḥ āsīt	gharma cit tap pravṛj yad as
530	ayasmayaḥ tam u ā adāma viprāḥ	ayasmaya tad u ādā vipra
 ---
531	indraḥ rathāya pravatam kṛṇoti	indra ratha pravat kṛ
531	yam adhyasthāt maghavā vājayantam	yad adhiṣṭhā maghavan vājay
531	yūthā iva paśvaḥ vi unoti gopāḥ	yūtha iva paśu vi u gopā
531	ariṣTaḥ yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan	ariṣṭa yā prathama siṣās
531	ā pra drava harivaḥ mā vi venaḥ	ā pra dru harivat mā vi ven
531	piśaṅgarāte abhi naḥ sacasva	piśaṅga rāti abhi mad sac
531	nahi tvat indra vasyaḥ anyat asti	nahi tvad indra vasyas anya as
531	amenān cit janivataḥ cakartha	amena cit janivat kṛ
531	ut yat sahaḥ sahasaḥ ā ajaniṣTa	ud yat sahas sahas ājan
531	dediṣTe indraḥ indriyāṇi viśvā	dediś indra indriya viśva
531	pra acodayat sudughāḥ vavre antar	pracoday su dugha vavra antar
531	vi jyotiṣā saṁvavṛtvat tamaḥ avar	vi jyotis saṃvṛt tamas vṛ
531	anavaḥ te ratham aśvāya takṣan	anu tvad ratha aśva takṣ
531	tvaṣTā vajram puruhūta dyumantam	tvaṣṭṛ vajra puruhūta dyumat
531	brahmāṇaḥ indram mahayantaḥ arkaiḥ	brahman indra mahay arka
531	avardhayan ahaye hantavai u	vardhay ahi han u
531	vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇaḥ arkam arcān	vṛṣan yat tvad vṛṣan arka arc
531	indra grāvāṇaḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ	indra grāvan aditi sajoṣas
531	anaśvāsaḥ ye pavayaḥ arathāḥ	an aśva yad pavi a ratha
531	indreṣitāḥ abhi avartanta dasyūn	indra iṣay abhi vṛt dasyu
531	pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam	pra tvad pūrva karaṇa vac
531	pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha	pra nūtana maghavan yad kṛ
531	śaktīvaḥ yat vibharāḥ rodasī ubhe	śaktīvat yat vibhṛ rodas ubh
531	jayan apaḥ manave dānucitrāḥ	ji ap manu dānu citra
531	tat it nu te karaṇam dasma vipra	tad id nu tvad karaṇa dasma vipra
531	ahim yat ghnan ojaḥ atra amimīthāḥ	ahi yat han ojas atra mā
531	śuṣṇasya cit pari māyāḥ agṛbhṇāḥ	śuṣṇa cit pari māyā grah
531	prapitvam yan apa dasyūn asedhaḥ	prapitva i apa dasyu sidh
531	tvam apaḥ yadave turvaśāya	tvad ap yadu turvaśa
531	aramayaḥ sudughāḥ pāraḥ indra	ramay su dugha pāra indra
531	ugram ayātam avahaḥ ha kutsam	ugra yā vah ha kutsa
531	sam ha yat vām uśanā aranta devāḥ	sam ha yat tvad uśanā ram deva
531	indrākutsā vahamānā rathena	indrākutsa vah ratha
531	ā vām atyāḥ api karṇe vahantu	ā tvad atya api karṇa vah
531	niḥ sīm adbhyaḥ dhamathaḥ niḥ sadhasthāt	niḥ sīm ap dham niḥ sadhastha
531	maghonaḥ hṛdaḥ varathaḥ tamāṁsi	maghavan hṛd vṛ tamas
531	vātasya yuktān suyujaḥ cit aśvān	vāta yuj su yuj cit aśva
531	kaviḥ cit eṣaḥ ajagan avasyuḥ	kavi cit etad gam avasyu
531	viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāyaḥ	viśva tvad atra marut sakhi
531	indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan	indra brahman taviṣī vṛdh
531	sūraḥ cit ratham paritakmyāyām	svar cit ratha paritakmyā
531	pūrvam karat uparam jūjuvāṁsam	pūrva kṛ upara jū
531	bharat cakram etaśaḥ sam riṇāti	bhṛ cakra etaśa sam ri
531	puraḥ dadhat saniṣyati kratum naḥ	puras dhā san kratu mad
531	ā ayam janāḥ abhicakṣe jagāma	e jana abhicakṣ gam
531	indraḥ sakhāyam sutasomam icchan	indra sakhi su soma iṣ
531	vadan grāvā ava vedim bhriyāte	vad grāvan ava vedi bhṛ
531	yasya jīram adhvaryavaḥ caranti	yad jīra adhvaryu car
531	ye cākananta cākananta nū te	yad kan kan nu tvad
531	martāḥ amṛta mā u te aṁhaḥ ā aran	marta amṛta mā u tad aṃhas ārch
531	vāvandhi yajyūn uta teṣu dhehi	van yajyu uta tad dhā
531	ojaḥ janeṣu yeṣu te syāma	ojas jana yad tad as
 ---
532	adardar utsam asṛjaḥ vi khāni	dardar utsa sṛj vi kha
532	tvam arṇavān badbadhānān aramṇāḥ	tvad arṇava badbadh ram
532	mahāntam indra parvatam vi yat var	mahat indra parvata vi yat vṛ
532	sṛjaḥ vi dhārāḥ ava dānavam han	sṛj vi dhārā ava dānava han
532	tvam utsān ṛtubhiḥ badbadhānān	tvad utsa ṛtu badbadh
532	araṁhaḥ ūdhar parvatasya vajrin	raṃh ūdhas parvata vajrin
532	ahim cit ugra prayutam śayānam	ahi cit ugra prayuta śī
532	jaghanvān indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ	han indra taviṣī dhā
532	tyasya cit mahataḥ niḥ mṛgasya	tya cit mahat niḥ mṛga
532	vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhiḥ indraḥ	vadhar han taviṣī indra
532	yaḥ ekaḥ it apratiḥ manyamānaḥ	yad eka id aprati man
532	āt asmāt anyaḥ ajaniṣTa tavyān	āt idam anya jan tavyas
532	tyam cit eṣām svadhayā madantam	tya cit idam svadhā mad
532	mihaḥ napātam suvṛdham tamogām	mih napāt suvṛdh tamas gā
532	vṛṣaprabharmā dānavasya bhāmam	vṛṣan prabharman dānava bhāma
532	vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam	vajra vajrin ni han śuṣṇa
532	tyam cit asya kratubhiḥ niṣattam	tya cit idam kratu niṣad
532	amarmaṇaḥ vidat it asya marma	amarman vid id idam marman
532	yat īm sukṣatra prabhṛtā madasya	yat īṃ su kṣatra prabhṛti mada
532	yuyutsantam tamasi harmye dhāḥ	yuyuts tamas harmya dhā
532	tyam cit itthā katpayam śayānam	tya cit itthā katpaya śī
532	asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam	asūrya tamas vṛdh
532	tam cit mandānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ sutasya	tad cit mad vṛṣabha suta
532	uccaiḥ indraḥ apagūryā jaghāna	uccais indra apagur han
532	ut yat indraḥ mahate dānavāya	ud yat indra mahat dānava
532	vadhar yamiṣTa sahaḥ apratītam	vadhar yam sahas apratīta
532	yat īm vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha	yat īṃ vajra prabhṛti dabh
532	viśvasya jantoḥ adhamam cakāra	viśva jantu adhama kṛ
532	tyam cit arṇam madhupam śayānam	tya cit arṇa madhupa śī
532	asinvam vavram mahi ā adat ugraḥ	asinva vavra mahi ādā ugra
532	apādam atram mahatā vadhena	a pāda atra mahat vadha
532	ni duryoṇe āvṛṇak mṛdhravācam	ni duryoṇa āvṛj mṛdhra vāc
532	kaḥ asya śuṣmam taviṣīm varāte	ka idam śuṣma taviṣī vṛ
532	ekaḥ dhanā bharate apratītaḥ	eka dhana bhṛ apratīta
532	ime cit asya jrayasaḥ nu devī	idam cit idam jrayas nu devī
532	indrasya ojasaḥ bhiyasā jihāte	indra ojas bhiyas hā
532	ni asmai devī svadhitiḥ jihīte	ni idam devī svadhiti hā
532	indrāya gātuḥ uśatī iva yeme	indra gātu vaś iva yam
532	sam yat ojaḥ yuvate viśvam ābhiḥ	sam yat ojas yu viśva idam
532	anu svadhāvne kṣitayaḥ namanta	anu svadhāvan kṣiti nam
532	ekam nu tvā satpatim pāñcajanyam	eka nu tvad sat pati pāñcajanya
532	jātam śṛṇomi yaśasam janeṣu	jan śru yaśas jana
532	tam me jagṛbhre āśasaḥ naviṣTham	tad mad grah āśas naviṣṭha
532	doṣā vastoḥ havamānāsaḥ indram	doṣā vastu hvā indra
532	evā hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam	eva hi tvad ṛtuthā yātay
532	maghā viprebhyaḥ dadatam śṛṇomi	magha vipra dā śru
532	kim te brahmāṇaḥ gṛhate sakhāyaḥ	kim tvad brahman sakhi
532	ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra	yad tvāyā nidhā kāma indra
 ---
533	mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṛṛn	mahi mah tavas dhī nṛ
533	indrāya itthā tavase atavyān	indra itthā tavas a tavyas
533	yaḥ asmai sumatim vājasātau	yad idam sumati vājasāti
533	stutaḥ jane samaryaḥ ciketa	stu jana samarya cit
533	sa tvam naḥ indra dhiyasānaḥ arkaiḥ	tad tvad mad indra dhiyasāna arka
533	harīṇām vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ	hari vṛṣan yoktra śri
533	yāḥ itthā maghavan anu joṣam	yā itthā maghavan anu joṣa
533	vakṣaḥ abhi pra aryaḥ sakṣi janān	vah abhi pra ari sah jana
533	na te te indra abhi asmat ṛṣva	na tad tvad indra abhi mad ṛṣva
533	ayuktāsaḥ abrahmatā yat asan	a yuj a brahman tā yat as
533	tiṣThā ratham adhi tam vajrahasta	sthā ratha adhi tad vajra hasta
533	ā raśmim deva yamase svaśvaḥ	ā raśmi deva yam su aśva
533	purū yat te indra santi ukthā	puru yad tvad indra as uktha
533	gave cakartha urvarāsu yudhyan	go kṛ urvarā yudh
533	tatakṣe sūryāya cit okasi sve	takṣ sūrya cit oka sva
533	vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit	vṛṣan samad dāsa nāman cit
533	vayam te te indra ye ca naraḥ	mad tad tvad indra yad ca nṛ
533	śardhaḥ jajñānāḥ yātāḥ ca rathāḥ	śardhas jan yā ca ratha
533	ā asmān jagamyāt ahiśuṣma satvā	ā mad gam ahi śuṣma satvan
533	bhagaḥ na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ	bhaga na hvā prabhṛtha cāru
533	papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hi ojaḥ	papṛkṣeṇya indra tvad hi ojas
533	nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamānaḥ amartaḥ	nṛmṇa ca nṛt amarta
533	sa naḥ enīm vasavānaḥ* rayim dāḥ	tad na ena vasavāna rayi dā
533	pra aryaḥ stuṣe tuvimaghasya dānam	pra arya stu tuvi magha dāna
533	evā naḥ indra ūtibhiḥ ava	eva mad indra ūti ava
533	pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn	pā gṛ śūra kāru
533	uta tvacam dadataḥ vājasātau	uta tvac dā vājasāti
533	piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ	prī madhu suṣuta cāru
533	uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūreḥ	uta tya mad paurukutsya sūri
533	trasadasyoḥ hiraṇinaḥ rarāṇāḥ	trasadasyu hiraṇin rā
533	vahantu mā daśa śyetāsaḥ asya	vah mad daśan śyeta idam
533	gairikṣitasya kratubhiḥ nu saśce	gairikṣita kratu nu sac
533	uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ	uta tya mad mārutāśva śoṇa
533	kratvāmaghāsaḥ vidathasya rātau	kratvāmagha vidatha rāti
533	sahasrā me cyavatānaḥ dadānaḥ	sahasra mad cyavatāna dā
533	ānūkam aryaḥ vapuṣe na ārcat	ānūka arya vapus na arc
533	uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣTāḥ	uta tya mad dhvanya juṣ
533	lakṣmaṇyasya surucaḥ yatānāḥ	lakṣmaṇya su ruc yat
533	mahnā rāyaḥ saṁvaraṇasya ṛṣeḥ	mahan rai saṃvaraṇa ṛṣi
533	vrajam na gāvaḥ prayatāḥ api gman	vraja na go prayam api gam
 ---
534	ajātaśatrum ajarā svarvatī	ajāta śatru ajara svarvat
534	anu svadhā amitā dasmam īyate	anu svadhā amita dasma i
534	sunotana pacata brahmavāhase	su pac brahman vāhas
534	puruṣTutāya prataram dadhātana	puruṣṭuta prataram dhā
534	ā yaḥ somena jaTharam apiprata	ā yad soma jaṭhara pṛ
534	amandata maghavā madhvaḥ andhasaḥ	mand maghavan madhu andhas
534	yat īm mṛgāya hantave mahāvadhaḥ	yat īṃ mṛga han mahat vadha
534	sahasrabhṛṣTim uśanā vadham yamat	sahasra bhṛṣṭi uśanas vadha yam
534	yaḥ asmai ghraṁse uta vā yaḥ ūdhani	yad idam ghraṃsa uta vā yad ūdhas
534	somam sunoti bhavati dyumān aha	soma su bhū dyumat aha
534	apāpa śakraḥ tatanuṣTim ūhati	apa apa śakra tatanuṣṭi ūh
534	tanūśubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ	tanū śubhra maghavan yad kavāsakha
534	yasya avadhīt pitaram yasya mātaram	yad vadh pitṛ yad mātṛ
534	yasya śakraḥ bhrātaram na ataḥ īṣate	yad śakra bhrātṛ na atas īṣ
534	veti it u asya prayatā yataṁkaraḥ	vī id u idam prayam yataṃkara
534	na kilbiṣāt īṣate vasvaḥ ākaraḥ	na kilbiṣa īṣ vasu ākara
534	na pañcabhiḥ daśabhiḥ vaṣTi ārabham	na pañcan daśan vaś ārabh
534	na asunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana	na a su sac puṣ cana
534	jināti vā it amuyā hanti vā dhuniḥ	jyā vā id adas han vā dhuni
534	ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje	ā devayu bhaj gomat vraja
534	vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajaḥ	vitvakṣaṇa samṛti cakramāsaja
534	asunvataḥ viṣuṇaḥ sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ	a su viṣuṇa su vṛdha
534	indraḥ viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇaḥ	indra viśva dam vibhīṣaṇa
534	yathāvaśam nayati dāsam āryaḥ	yathāvaśam nī dāsa ārya
534	sam īm paṇeḥ ajati bhojanam muṣe	sam īṃ paṇi aj bhojana muṣ
534	vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaram vasu	vi dāś bhaj sūnara vasu
534	durge cana dhriyate viśvaḥ ā puru	durga cana dhṛ viśva ā puru
534	janaḥ yaḥ asya taviṣīm acukrudhat	jana yad idam taviṣī krudh
534	sam yat janau sudhanau viśvaśardhasau	sam yat jana su dhana viśva śardhas
534	avet indraḥ maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu	vid indra maghavan go śubhri
534	yujam hi anyam akṛta pravepanī	yuj hi anya kṛ pravepanin
534	ut īm gavyam sṛjate satvabhiḥ dhuniḥ	ud īṃ gavyā sṛj satvan dhuni
534	sahasrasām āgniveśim gṛṇīṣe	sahasra sā āgniveśi gṛ
534	śatrim agne upamām ketum aryaḥ	śatri agni upamā ketu ari
534	tasmai āpaḥ saṁyataḥ pīpayanta	tad ap saṃyat pyā
534	tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu	tad kṣatra amavat tveṣa as
 ---
535	yaḥ te sādhiṣThaḥ avase	yad tvad sādhiṣṭha av
535	indra kratuḥ tam ā bhara	indra kratu tad ā bhṛ
535	asmabhyam carṣaṇīsaham	mad carṣaṇī sah
535	sasnim vājeṣu duṣTaram	sasni vāja duṣṭara
535	yat indra te catasraḥ	yat indra tvad catur
535	yat śūra santi tisraḥ	yat śūra as tri
535	yat vā pañca kṣitīnām	yat vā pañcan kṣiti
535	avaḥ tat su naḥ ā bhara	avas tad su mad ā bhṛ
535	ā te avaḥ vareṇyam	ā tvad avas vareṇya
535	vṛṣantamasya hūmahe	vṛṣantama hvā
535	vṛṣajūtiḥ hi jajñiṣe	vṛṣa jūti hi jan
535	ābhūbhiḥ indra turvaṇiḥ	ābhū indra turvaṇi
535	vṛṣā hi asi rādhase	vṛṣan hi as rādhas
535	jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ	jan vṛṣan tvad śavas
535	svakṣatram te dhṛṣat manaḥ	svakṣatra tvad dhṛṣ manas
535	satrāham indra pauṁsyam	satrāha indra pauṃsya
535	tvam tam indra martyam	tvad tad indra martya
535	amitrayantam adrivaḥ	amitray adrivat
535	sarvarathā śatakrato	sarvarathā śatakratu
535	ni yāhi śavasaḥ pate	ni yā śavas pati
535	tvām it vṛtrahantama	tvad id vṛtra hantama
535	janāsaḥ vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	jana vṛj barhis
535	ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyam	ugra puru pūrvya
535	havante vājasātaye	hvā vājasāti
535	asmākam indra duṣTaram	mad indra duṣṭara
535	puroyāvānam ājiṣu	puras yāvan āji
535	sayāvānam dhanedhane	sa yāvan dhana dhana
535	vājayantam avā ratham	vājay av ratha
535	asmākam indra ā ihi naḥ	mad indra i mad
535	ratham avā puraṁdhyā	ratha av puraṃdhi
535	vayam śaviṣTha vāryam	mad śaviṣṭha vārya
535	divi śravaḥ dadhīmahi	div śravas dhā
535	divi stomam manāmahe	div stoma man
 ---
536	saḥ ā gamat indraḥ yaḥ vasūnām	tad ā gam indra yad vasu
536	ciketat dātum dāmanaḥ rayīṇām	cit dā dāman rayi
536	dhanvacaraḥ na vaṁsagaḥ tṛṣāṇaḥ	dhanvan cara na vaṃsaga tṛṣ
536	cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṁśum	kam pā duh aṃśu
536	ā te hanū harivaḥ śūra śipre	ā tvad hanu harivat śūra śiprā
536	ruhat somaḥ na parvatasya pṛṣThe	ruh soma na parvata pṛṣṭha
536	anu tvā rājan arvataḥ na hinvan	anu tvad rājan arvant na hi
536	gīrbhiḥ madema puruhūta viśve	gir mad puruhūta viśva
536	cakram na vṛttam puruhūta vepate	cakra na vṛt puruhūta vip
536	manaḥ bhiyā me amateḥ it adrivaḥ	manas bhī mad amati id adrivat
536	rathāt adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha	ratha adhi tvad jaritṛ sadāvṛdha
536	kuvit nu stoṣat maghavan purūvasuḥ	kuvid nu stu maghavan purūvasu
536	eṣa grāvā iva jaritā te indra	etad grāvan iva jaritṛ tvad indra
536	iyarti vācam bṛhat āśuṣāṇaḥ	ṛch vāc bṛhat āśuṣ
536	pra savyena maghavan yaṁsi rāyaḥ	pra savya maghavan yam rai
536	pra dakṣiṇit harivaḥ mā vi venaḥ	pra dakṣiṇit harivat mā vi ven
536	vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam vardhatu dyauḥ	vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan vṛdh div
536	vṛṣā vṛṣabhyām vahase haribhyām	vṛṣan vṛṣan vah hari
536	sa naḥ vṛṣā vṛṣarathaḥ suśipra	tad mad vṛṣan vṛṣan ratha su śiprā
536	vṛṣakrato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ	vṛṣan kratu vṛṣa vajrin bhara dhā
536	yaḥ rohitau vājinau vājinīvān	yad rohita vājin vājinīvat
536	tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānau adiṣTa	tri śata sac diś
536	yūne sam asmai kṣitayaḥ namantām	yuvan sam idam kṣiti nam
536	śrutarathāya marutaḥ duvoyā	śru ratha marut duvoyā
 ---
537	sam bhānunā yatate sūryasya	sam bhānu yat sūrya
537	ājuhvānaḥ ghṛtapṛṣThaḥ svañcāḥ	āhu ghṛta pṛṣṭha svañcas
537	tasmai amṛdhrāḥ uṣasaḥ vi ucchān	tad amṛdhra uṣas vi vas
537	yaḥ indrāya sunavāma iti āha	yad indra su iti ah
537	samiddhāgniḥ vanavat stīrṇabarhiḥ	samindh agni van stṛ barhis
537	yuktagrāvā sutasomaḥ jarāte	yuj grāvan su soma jṛ
537	grāvāṇaḥ yasya iṣiram vadanti	grāvan yad iṣira vad
537	ayat adhvaryuḥ haviṣā ava sindhum	i adhvaryu havis ava sindhu
537	vadhūḥ iyam patim icchantī eti	vadhū idam pati iṣ i
537	yaḥ īm vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām	yad īṃ vah mahiṣī iṣira
537	ā asya śravasyāt rathaḥ ā ca ghoṣāt	ā idam śravasy ratha ā ca ghuṣ
537	purū sahasrā pari vartayāte	puru sahasra pari vartay
537	na sa rājā vyathate yasmin indraḥ	na tad rājan vyath yad indra
537	tīvram somam pibati gosakhāyam	tīvra soma pā go sakhi
537	ā satvanaiḥ ajati hanti vṛtram	ā satvana aj han vṛtra
537	kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhagaḥ nāma puṣyan	kṣi kṣiti subhaga nāma puṣ
537	puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāti	puṣ kṣema abhi yoga bhū
537	ubhe vṛtau saṁyatī sam jayāti	ubh vṛt sami sam ji
537	priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti	priya sūrya priya agni bhū
537	yaḥ indrāya sutasomaḥ dadāśat	yad indra su soma dāś
 ---
538	uroḥ te indra rādhasaḥ	uru tvad indra rādhas
538	vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato	vibhu rāti śatakratu
538	adhā naḥ viśvacarṣaṇe	adha mad viśvacarṣaṇi
538	dyumnā sukṣatra maṁhaya	dyumna su kṣatra maṃhay
538	yat īm indra śravāyyam	yad īṃ indra śravāyya
538	iṣam śaviṣTha dadhiṣe	iṣ śaviṣṭha dhā
538	paprathe dīrghaśruttamam	prath dīrghaśruttama
538	hiraṇyavarṇa duṣTaram	hiraṇya varṇa duṣṭara
538	śuṣmāsaḥ ye te adrivaḥ	śuṣma yad tvad adrivat
538	mehanā ketasāpaḥ	mehanā ketasap
538	ubhā devau abhiṣTaye	ubh deva abhiṣṭi
538	divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca rājathaḥ	div ca gam ca rāj
538	uta u naḥ asya kasya cit	uta u mad idam ka cit
538	dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan	dakṣa tvad vṛtrahan
538	asmabhyam nṛmṇam ā bhara	mad nṛmṇa ā bhṛ
538	asmabhyam nṛmaṇasyase	mad nṛmaṇasy
538	nū te ābhiḥ abhiṣTibhiḥ	nu tvad idam abhiṣṭi
538	tava śarman śatakrato	tvad śarman śatakratu
538	indra syāma sugopāḥ	indra as su gopā
538	śūra syāma sugopāḥ	śūra as su gopā
 ---
539	yat indra citra mehanā	yad indra citra mehanā
539	asti tvādātam adrivaḥ	as tvādāta adrivat
539	rādhaḥ tat naḥ vidadvaso	rādhas tad mad vidadvasu
539	ubhayāhasti ā bhara	ubhayāhasti ā bhṛ
539	yat manyase vareṇyam	yad man vareṇya
539	indra dyukṣam tat ā bhara	indra dyukṣa tad ā bhṛ
539	vidyāma tasya te vayam	vid tad tvad mad
539	akūpārasya dāvane	akūpāra dā
539	yat te ditsu prarādhyam	yad tvad ditsu prarādh
539	manaḥ asti śrutam bṛhat	manas as śru bṛhat
539	tena dṛLhā cit adrivaḥ	tad dṛḍha cit adrivat
539	ā vājam darṣi sātaye	ā vāja dṛ sāti
539	maṁhiṣTham vaḥ maghonām	maṃhiṣṭha tvad maghavan
539	rājānam carṣaṇīnām	rājan carṣaṇi
539	indram upa praśastaye	indra upa praśasti
539	pūrvībhiḥ jujuṣe giraḥ	puru juṣ gir
539	asmai it kāvyam vacaḥ	idam id kāvya vacas
539	uktham indrāya śaṁsyam	uktha indra śaṃs
539	tasmai u brahmavāhase	tad u brahman vāhas
539	giraḥ vardhanti atrayaḥ	gir vṛdh atri
539	giraḥ śumbhanti atrayaḥ	gir śubh atri
 ---
540	ā yāhi adribhiḥ sutam	ā yā adri su
540	somam somapate piba	soma soma pati pā
540	vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtrahantama	vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama
540	vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ	vṛṣan grāvan vṛṣan mada
540	vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ	vṛṣan soma idam su
540	vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtrahantama	vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama
540	vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve	vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan hvā
540	vajrin citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	vajrin citra ūti
540	vṛṣan indra vṛṣabhiḥ vṛtrahantama	vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama
540	ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ turāṣāT	ṛjīṣin vajrin vṛṣabha turāṣāh
540	śuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā	śuṣmin rājan vṛtrahan soma pāvan
540	yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsat arvāṅ	yuj hari upa yā arvāñc
540	mādhyaṁdine savane matsat indraḥ	mādhyaṃdina savana mad indra
540	yat tvā sūrya svarbhānuḥ	yat tvad sūrya svarbhānu
540	tamasā avidhyat āsuraḥ	tamas vyadh āsura
540	akṣetravit yathā mugdhaḥ	a kṣetra vid yathā muh
540	bhuvanāni adīdhayuḥ	bhuvana dhī
540	svarbhānoḥ adha yat indra māyāḥ	svarbhānu adha yat indra māyā
540	avaḥ divaḥ vartamānāḥ avāhan	avas div vṛt avahan
540	gūLham sūryam tamasā apavratena	guh sūrya tamas apavrata
540	turīyeṇa brahmaṇā avindat atriḥ	turīya brahman vid atri
540	mā mām imam tava santam atre	mā mad idam tvad as atri
540	irasyā drugdhaḥ bhiyasā ni gārīt	irasyā druh bhiyas ni gṛ
540	tvam mitraḥ asi satyarādhāḥ	tvad mitra as satya rādhas
540	tau mā iha avatam varuṇaḥ ca rājā	tad mad iha av varuṇa ca rājan
540	grāvṇaḥ brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan	grāvan brahman yuj sapary
540	kīriṇā devān namasā upaśikṣan	kīrin deva namas upaśikṣ
540	atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣuḥ ā adhāt	atri sūrya div cakṣus ādhā
540	svarbhānoḥ apa māyāḥ aghukṣat	svarbhānu apa māyā guh
540	yam vai sūryam svarbhānuḥ	yad vai sūrya svarbhānu
540	tamasā avidhyat āsuraḥ	tamas vyadh āsura
540	atrayaḥ tam anu avindan	atri tad anu vid
540	nahi anye aśaknuvan	nahi anya śak
 ---
541	kaḥ nu vām mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāyan	ka nu tvad mitrāvaruṇa ṛtāy
541	divaḥ vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de	div vā mah pārthiva vā dā
541	ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthām naḥ	ṛta vā sadas trā mad
541	yajñāyate vā paśuṣaḥ na vājān	yajñāy vā paśu sā na vāja
541	te naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ	tad mad mitra varuṇa aryaman āyu
541	indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ juṣanta	indra ṛbhukṣan marut juṣ
541	namobhiḥ vā ye dadhate suvṛktim	namas vā yad dhā suvṛkti
541	stomam rudrāya mīLhuṣe sajoṣāḥ	stoma rudra mīḍhvas sa joṣa
541	ā vām yeṣThā aśvinā huvadhyai	ā tvad yeṣṭha aśvin hvā
541	vātasya patman rathyasya puṣTau	vāta patman rathya puṣṭi
541	uta vā divaḥ asurāya manma	uta vā div asura manman
541	pra andhāṁsi iva yajyave bharadhvam	pra andhas iva yajyu bhṛ
541	pra sakṣaṇaḥ divyaḥ kaṇvahotā	pra sakṣaṇa divya kaṇva hotṛ
541	tritaḥ divaḥ sajoṣāḥ vātaḥ agniḥ	trita div sajoṣas vāta agni
541	pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśvabhojāḥ	pūṣan bhaga prabhṛtha viśva bhoja
541	ājim na jagmuḥ āśvaśvatamāḥ	āji na gam āśvaśvatama
541	pra vaḥ rayim yuktāśvam bharadhvam	pra tvad rayi yuj aśva bhṛ
541	rāyaḥ eṣe avase dadhīta dhīḥ	rai eṣa av dhā dhī
541	suśevaḥ evaiḥ auśijasya hotā	su śeva eva auśija hotṛ
541	ye vaḥ evāḥ marutaḥ turāṇām	yad tvad eva marut tura
541	pra vaḥ vāyum rathayujam kṛṇudhvam	pra tvad vāyu ratha yuj kṛ
541	pra devam vipram panitāram arkaiḥ	pra deva vipra panitṛ arka
541	iṣudhyavaḥ ṛtasāpaḥ puraṁdhīḥ	iṣudhyu ṛtasāp puraṃdhi
541	vasvīḥ naḥ atra patnīḥ ā dhiye dhuḥ	vasu mad atra patnī ā dhī dhā
541	upa vaḥ eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ	upa tvad iṣ vand śūṣa
541	pra yahvī divaḥ citayadbhiḥ arkaiḥ	pra yahva div citay arka
541	uṣāsānaktā viduṣī iva viśvam	uṣāsānaktā vid iva viśva
541	ā hā vahataḥ martyāya yajñam	ā ha vah martya yajña
541	abhi vaḥ arce poṣyāvataḥ nṛṛn	abhi tvad arc poṣyāvat nṛ
541	vāstoḥ patim tvaṣTāram rarāṇaḥ	vāstoṣpati tvaṣṭṛ rā
541	dhanyā sajoṣāḥ dhiṣaṇā namobhiḥ	dhanya sajoṣas dhiṣaṇā namas
541	vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ rāyaḥ eṣe	vanaspati oṣadhi rai eṣa
541	tuje naḥ tane parvatāḥ santu	tuj mad tan parvata as
541	svaitavaḥ ye vasavaḥ na vīrāḥ	svaitu yad vasu na vīra
541	panitaḥ āptyaḥ yajataḥ sadā naḥ	pan āptya yajata sadā mad
541	vardhāt naḥ śaṁsam naryaḥ abhiṣTau	vṛdh mad śaṃsa narya abhiṣṭi
541	vṛṣṇaḥ astoṣi bhūmyasya garbham	vṛṣan stu bhūmya garbha
541	tritaḥ napātam apām suvṛkti	trita napāt ap suvṛkti
541	gṛṇīte agniḥ etarī na śūṣaiḥ	gṛ agni etarī na śūṣa
541	śociṣkeśaḥ ni riṇāti vanā	śociṣkeśa ni ri vana
541	kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma	kathā mah rudriya brū
541	kat rāye cikituṣe bhagāya	ka rai cit bhaga
541	āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta naḥ avantu	ap oṣadhī uta mad av
541	dyauḥ vanā girayaḥ vṛkṣakeśāḥ	div vana giri vṛkṣa keśa
541	śṛṇotu naḥ ūrjām patiḥ giraḥ sa	śru mad ūrj pati gir tad
541	nabhaḥ tarīyān iṣiraḥ parijmā	nabhas tarīyas iṣira parijman
541	śṛṇvantu āpaḥ puraḥ na śubhrāḥ	śru ap puras na śubhra
541	pari srucaḥ babṛhāṇasya adreḥ	pari sruc bṛṃh adri
541	vidā cit nu mahāntaḥ ye vaḥ evāḥ	vid cit nu mahat yad tvad eva
541	bravāma dasmāḥ vāryam dadhānāḥ	brū dasma vārya dhā
541	vayaḥ cana subhvaḥ ā ava yanti	vi cana su bhū ava i
541	kṣubhā martam anuyatam vadhasnaiḥ	kṣubh marta anuyam vadhasna
541	ā daivyāni pārthivāni janma	ā daivya pārthiva janman
541	apaḥ ca acchā sumakhāya vocam	ap ca acchā su makha vac
541	vardhantām dyāvaḥ giraḥ candrāgrāḥ	vṛdh div gir candra agra
541	udā vardhantām abhiṣātāḥ arṇāḥ	udan vṛdh abhiṣan arṇa
541	padepade me jarimā ni dhāyi	pada pada mad jariman ni dhā
541	varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiḥ ca	varūtṛ vā śakra yad pāyu ca
541	siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ	sac mātṛ mah rasā mad
541	smat sūribhiḥ ṛjuhastā ṛjuvaniḥ	smat sūri ṛju hasta ṛju vani
541	kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn	kathā dāś namas sudānu
541	evayā marutaḥ acchoktau	eva yā marut acchokti
541	praśravasaḥ marutaḥ acchoktau	praśravas marut acchokti
541	mā naḥ ahiḥ budhnyaḥ riṣe dhāt	mā mad ahi budhnya riṣ dhā
541	asmākam bhūt upamātivaniḥ	mad bhū upamāti vani
541	iti cit nu prajāyai paśumatyai	iti cit nu prajā paśumat
541	devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ	deva van martya tvad
541	ā devāsaḥ vanate martyaḥ vaḥ	ā deva van martya tvad
541	atrā śivām tanvaḥ dhāsim asyāḥ	atra śiva tanū dhāsi idam
541	jarām cit me nirṛtiḥ jagrasīta	jarā cit mad nirṛti gras
541	tām vaḥ devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm	tad tvad deva sumati ūrjay
541	iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ	iṣ aś vasu śasā go
541	sā naḥ sudānuḥ mṛLayantī devī	tad mad sudānu mṛḍay devī
541	prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ	prati dru suvita gam
541	abhi naḥ iLā yūthasya mātā	abhi mad iḍā yūtha mātṛ
541	smat nadībhiḥ urvaśī vā gṛṇātu	smat nadī urvaśī vā gṛ
541	urvaśī vā bṛhaddivā gṛṇānā	urvaśī vā bṛhat diva gṛ
541	abhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasya āyoḥ	abhivṛ prabhṛtha āyu
541	siṣaktu naḥ ūrjavyasya puṣTeḥ	sac mad ūrjavya puṣṭi
 ---
542	pra śaṁtamā varuṇam dīdhitī gīḥ	pra śaṃtama varuṇa dīdhiti gir
542	mitram bhagam aditim nūnam aśyāḥ	mitra bhaga aditi nūnam aś
542	pṛṣadyoniḥ pañcahotā śṛṇotu	pṛṣat yoni pañcan hotṛ śru
542	atūrtapanthāḥ asuraḥ mayobhuḥ	a tṛ pathin asura mayobhu
542	prati me stomam aditiḥ jagṛbhyāt	prati mad stoma aditi grah
542	sūnum na mātā hṛdyam suśevam	sūnu na mātṛ hṛdya su śeva
542	brahma priyam devahitam yat asti	brahman priya deva dhā yad as
542	aham mitre varuṇe yat mayobhu	mad mitra varuṇa yad mayobhu
542	ut īraya kavitamam kavīnām	ud īray kavitama kavi
542	unatta enam abhi madhvā ghṛtena	und enad abhi madhu ghṛta
542	sa naḥ vasūni prayatā hitāni	tad mad vasu prayam dhā
542	candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti	candra deva savitṛ sū
542	sam indra naḥ manasā neṣi gobhiḥ	sam indra mad manas nī go
542	sam sūribhiḥ harivaḥ sam svasti	sam sūri harivat sam svasti
542	sam brahmaṇā devahitam yat asti	sam brahman deva dhā yad as
542	sam devānām sumatyā yajñiyānām	sam deva sumati yajñiya
542	devaḥ bhagaḥ savitā rāyaḥ aṁśaḥ	deva bhaga savitṛ rai aṃśa
542	indraḥ vṛtrasya saṁjitaḥ dhanānām	indra vṛtra saṃji dhana
542	ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ uta vā puraṁdhiḥ	ṛbhukṣan vāja uta vā purandhi
542	avantu naḥ amṛtāsaḥ turāsaḥ	av mad amṛta tura
542	marutvataḥ apratītasya jiṣṇoḥ	marutvat apratīta jiṣṇu
542	ajūryataḥ pra bravāmā kṛtāni	a jṛ pra brū kṛta
542	na te pūrve maghavan na aparāsaḥ	na tvad pūrva maghavan na apara
542	na vīryam nūtanaḥ kaḥ cana āpa	na vīrya nūtana ka cana āp
542	upa stuhi prathamam ratnadheyam	upa stu prathama ratna dheya
542	bṛhaspatim sanitāram dhanānām	bṛhaspati sanitṛ dhana
542	yaḥ śaṁsate stuvate śambhaviṣThaḥ	yad śaṃs stu śambhaviṣṭha
542	purūvasuḥ āgamat johuvānam	purūvasu āgam johav
542	tava ūtibhiḥ sacamānāḥ ariṣTāḥ	tvad ūti sac ariṣṭa
542	bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ suvīrāḥ	bṛhaspati maghavan su vīra
542	ye aśvadāḥ uta vā santi godāḥ	yad aśva dā uta vā as go dā
542	ye vastradāḥ subhagāḥ teṣu rāyaḥ	yad vastra dā subhaga tad rai
542	visarmāṇam kṛṇuhi vittam eṣām	visarman kṛ vitta idam
542	ye bhuñjate apṛṇantaḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ	yad bhuj apṛṇat mad uktha
542	apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān	apavrata prasava vṛdh
542	brahmadviṣaḥ sūryāt yāvayasva	brahman dviṣ sūrya yāvay
542	yaḥ ohate rakṣasaḥ devavītau	yad ūh rakṣas deva vīti
542	acakrebhiḥ tam marutaḥ ni yāta	acakra tad marut ni yā
542	yaḥ vaḥ śamīm śaśamānasya nindāt	yad tvad śamī śam nind
542	tuchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ	tucchya kāma kṛ svid
542	tam u stuhi yaḥ sviṣuḥ sudhanvā	tad u stu yad su iṣu su dhanvan
542	yaḥ viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya	yad viśva kṣi bheṣaja
542	yakṣvā mahe saumanasāya rudram	yaj mah saumanasa rudra
542	namobhiḥ devam asuram duvasya	namas deva asura duvasy
542	damūnasaḥ apasaḥ ye suhastāḥ	damūnas apas yad su hasta
542	vṛṣṇaḥ patnīḥ nadyaḥ vibhvataṣTāḥ	vṛṣan patnī nadī vibhvan takṣ
542	sarasvatī bṛhaddivā uta rākā	sarasvatī bṛhat diva uta rākā
542	daśasyantīḥ varivasyantu śubhrāḥ	daśasy varivasy śubhra
542	pra sū mahe suśaraṇāya medhām	pra su mah su śaraṇa medhā
542	giram bhare navyasīm jāyamānām	gir bhṛ navyas jan
542	yaḥ āhanāḥ duhituḥ vakṣaṇāsu	yad āhanas duhitṛ vakṣaṇā
542	rūpā minānaḥ akṛṇot idam naḥ	rūpa mī kṛ idam mad
542	pra suṣTutiḥ stanayantam ruvantam	pra suṣṭuti stanay ru
542	iLaḥ patim jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ	iḍ pati jaritṛ nūnam aś
542	yaḥ abdimān udanimān iyarti	yad abdimat udanimat ṛch
542	pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ	pra vidyut rodas ukṣ
542	eṣa stomaḥ mārutam śardhaḥ acchā	etad stoma māruta śardhas acchā
542	rudrasya sūnūn yuvanyūn ut aśyāḥ	rudra sūnu yuvanyu ud aś
542	kāmaḥ rāye havate mā svasti	kāma rai hvā mad svasti
542	upa stuhi pṛṣadaśvān ayāsaḥ	upa stu pṛṣat aśva ayās
542	pra eṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣam	pra etad stoma pṛthivī antarikṣa
542	vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ rāye aśyāḥ	vanaspati oṣadhī rai aś
542	devodevaḥ suhavaḥ bhūtu mahyam	deva deva su hava bhū mad
542	mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt	mā mad mātṛ pṛthivī durmati dhā
542	urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma	uru deva anibādha as
542	sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena	sam aśvin avas nūtana
542	mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema	mayobhu su praṇīti gam
542	ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān	ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra
542	ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni	ā viśva amṛta saubhaga
 ---
543	ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇyarthāḥ	ā dhenu payas tūrṇi artha
543	amardhantīḥ upa naḥ yantu madhvā	a mṛdh upa mad i madhu
543	mahaḥ rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipraḥ	mah rai bṛhat saptan vipra
543	mayobhuvaḥ jaritā johavīti	mayobhu jaritṛ johav
543	ā suṣTutī namasā vartayadhyai	ā suṣṭuti namas vartay
543	dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre	div vāja pṛthivī amṛdhra
543	pitā mātā madhuvacāḥ suhastā	pitṛ mātṛ madhu vacas su hasta
543	bharebhare naḥ yaśasau aviṣTām	bhara bhara mad yaśas av
543	adhvaryavaḥ cakṛvāṁsaḥ madhūni	adhvaryu kṛ madhu
543	pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram	pra vāyu bhṛ cāru śukra
543	hotā iva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhi asya	hotṛ iva mad prathama pā idam
543	deva madhvaḥ rarimā te madāya	deva madhu rā tvad mada
543	daśa kṣipaḥ yuñjate bāhū adrim	daśan kṣip yuj bāhu adri
543	somasya yā śamitārā suhastā	soma yad śamitṛ su hasta
543	madhvaḥ rasam sugabhastiḥ giriṣThām	madhu rasa su gabhasti giriṣṭhā
543	caniścadat duduhe śukram aṁśuḥ	giriṣṭhā duh śukra aṃśu
543	asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ	su tvad juṣ soma
543	kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya	kratu dakṣa bṛhat mada
543	harī rathe sudhurā yoge arvāk	hari ratha su dhura yoga arvāk
543	indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ	indra priya kṛ hvā
543	ā naḥ mahīm aramatim sajoṣāḥ	ā mad mah aramati sajoṣas
543	gnām devīm namasā rātahavyām	gnā deva namas rā havya
543	madhoḥ madāya bṛhatīm ṛtajñām	madhu mada bṛhat ṛta jña
543	ā agne vaha pathibhiḥ devayānaiḥ	ā agni vah pathin deva yāna
543	añjanti yam prathayantaḥ na viprāḥ	añj yad prathay na vipra
543	vapāvantam na agninā tapantaḥ	vapāvat na agni tap
543	pituḥ na putraḥ upasi preṣThaḥ	pitṛ na putra upas preṣṭha
543	ā gharmaḥ agnim ṛtayan asādi	ā gharma agni ṛtay sad
543	acchā mahī bṛhatī śaṁtamā gīḥ	acchā mah bṛhat śaṃtama gir
543	dūtaḥ na gantu aśvinā huvadhyai	dūta na gam aśvin hvā
543	mayobhuvā sarathā ā yātam arvāk	mayobhu sa ratha yā arvāk
543	gantam nidhim dhuram āṇiḥ na nābhim	gam nidhi dhur āṇi na nābhi
543	pra tavyasaḥ namauktim turasya	pra tavyas namaukti tura
543	aham pūṣṇaḥ uta vāyoḥ adikṣi	mad pūṣan uta vāyu diś
543	yā rādhasā coditārā matīnām	yad rādhas coditṛ mati
543	yā vājasya draviṇodau uta tman	yad vāja draviṇas dā uta tman
543	ā nāmabhiḥ marutaḥ vakṣi viśvān	ā nāman marut vah viśva
543	ā rūpebhiḥ jātavedaḥ huvānaḥ	ā rūpa jātavedas hvā
543	yajñam giraḥ jarituḥ suṣTutim ca	yajña gir jaritṛ suṣṭuti ca
543	viśve ganta marutaḥ viśve ūtī	viśva gam marut viśva ūti
543	ā naḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāt ā	ā mad div bṛhat parvata ā
543	sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam	sarasvatī yajata gam yajña
543	havam devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī	hava devī juṣ ghṛtāñc
543	śagmām naḥ vācam uśatī śṛṇotu	śagma mad vāc vaś śru
543	ā vedhasam nīlapṛṣTham bṛhantam	ā vedhas nīla pṛṣṭha bṛhat
543	bṛhaspatim sadane sādayadhvam	bṛhaspati sadana sāday
543	sādadyonim dame ā dīdivāṁsam	sādadyoni dama ā dīdī
543	hiraṇyavarṇam aruṣam sapema	hiraṇya varṇa aruṣa sap
543	ā dharṇasiḥ bṛhaddivaḥ rarāṇaḥ	ā dharṇasi bṛhat diva rā
543	viśvebhiḥ gantu omabiḥ huvānaḥ	viśva gam oman hvā
543	gnāḥ vasānaḥ oṣadhīḥ amṛdhraḥ	gnā vas oṣadhi amṛdhra
543	tridhātuśṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vayodhāḥ	tri dhātu śṛṅga vṛṣabha vayodhas
543	mātuḥ pade parame śukre āyoḥ	mātṛ pada parama śukra āyu
543	vipanyavaḥ rāspirāsaḥ agman	vipanyu rāspira gam
543	suśevyam namasā rātahavyāḥ	su śevya namas rā havya
543	śiśum mṛjanti āyavaḥ na vāse	śiśu mṛj āyu na vāsa
543	bṛhat vayaḥ bṛhate tubhyam agne	bṛhat vayas bṛhat tvad agni
543	dhiyājuraḥ mithunāsaḥ sacanta	dhī jur mithuna sac
543	devodevaḥ suhavaḥ bhūtu mahyam	deva deva su hava bhū mad
543	mā naḥ mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt	mā mad mātṛ pṛthivī durmati dhā
543	urau devāḥ anibādhe syāma	uru deva anibādha as
543	sam aśvinoḥ avasā nūtanena	sam aśvin avas nūtana
543	mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema	mayobhu su praṇīti gam
543	ā naḥ rayim vahatam ā uta vīrān	ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra
543	ā viśvāni amṛtā saubhagāni	ā viśva amṛta saubhaga
 ---
544	tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathā imathā	tad pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathā imathā
544	jyeṣTḥatātim barhiṣadam svarvidam	jyeṣṭhatāti barhiṣad svarvid
544	pratīcīnam vṛjanam dohase girā	pratīcīna vṛjana duh
544	āśum jayantam anu yāsu vardhase	ji anu yad vṛdh
544	śriye sudṛśīḥ uparasya yāḥ svar	śrī su dṛśi upara yad svar
544	virocamānaḥ kakubhām acodate	viruc kakubha a cud
544	sugopāḥ asi na dabhāya sukrato	su gopā as na dabh sukratu
544	paraḥ māyābhiḥ ṛte āsa nāma te	paras māyā ṛta as nāman tvad
544	atyam haviḥ sacate sat ca dhātu ca	atya havis sac as ca dhātu ca
544	ariṣTagātuḥ sa hotā sahobhariḥ	ariṣṭa gātu tad hotṛ sahas bhari
544	prasarsrāṇaḥ anu barhiḥ vṛṣā śiśuḥ	prasarsṛ anu barhis vṛṣan śiśu
544	madhye yuvā ajaraḥ visruhā hitaḥ	madhya yuvan ajara visruh dhā
544	pra vaḥ ete suyujaḥ yāman iṣTaye	pra tvad etad su yuj yāman iṣṭi
544	nīcīḥ amuṣmai yamyaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	nyāñc adas yamī ṛtāvṛdh
544	suyantubhiḥ sarvaśāsaiḥ abhīśubhiḥ	suyantu sarva śāsa abhīśu
544	kriviḥ nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati	krivi nāman pravaṇa muṣāy
544	saṁjarbhurāṇaḥ tarubhiḥ sutegṛbham	saṃjarbhur taru sutegṛbh
544	vayākinam cittagarbhāsu susvaruḥ	vayākin cit garbha susvaru
544	dhāravākeṣu ṛjugātha śobhase	dhāravāka ṛju gāthā śubh
544	vardhasva patnīḥ abhi jīvaḥ adhvare	vṛdh patnī abhi jīva adhvara
544	yādṛk eva dadṛśe tādṛk ucyate	yādṛś eva dṛś tādṛś vac
544	sam chāyayā dadhire sidhrayā apsu ā	sam chāyā dhā sidhra ap ā
544	mahīm asmabhyam uruṣām uru jrayaḥ	mahī mad uru sā uru jrayas
544	bṛhat suvīram anapacyutam sahaḥ	bṛhat su vīra an apacyu sahas
544	veti agruḥ janivān vai ati spṛdhaḥ	vī agru janivat vai ati spṛdh
544	samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ	samary manas sūrya kavi
544	ghraṁsam rakṣantam pari viśvataḥ gayam	ghraṃsa rakṣ pari viśvatas gaya
544	asmākam śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ	mad śarman van svāvasu
544	jyāyāṁsam asya yatunasya ketunā	jyāyas idam yatuna ketu
544	ṛṣisvaram carati yāsu nāma te	ṛṣi svara car yad nāman tvad
544	yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidat	yādṛś dhā tad apasyā vid
544	yaḥ u svayam vahate sa u aram karat	yad u svayam vah tad aram kṛ
544	samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā	samudra idam ava sthā agrima
544	na riṣyati savanam yasmin āyatā	na riṣ savana yad āyam
544	atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate	atra na hārdi kravaṇa rej
544	yatrā matiḥ vidyate pūtabandhanī	yatra mati vid pū bandhana
544	sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhiḥ	tad hi kṣatra manasa citti
544	evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ	evāvada yajata sadhri
544	avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ	avatsāra spṛ raṇvan
544	śaviṣTham vājam viduṣā cit ardhyam	śaviṣṭha vāja vid cit ṛdh
544	śyenaḥ āsām aditiḥ kakṣyaḥ madaḥ	śyena idam aditi kakṣya mada
544	viśvavārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ	viśva vāra yajata māyin
544	sam anyamanyam arthayanti etave	sam anya anya arthay i
544	viduḥ viṣāṇam paripānam anti te	vid viṣāṇa paripāna anti tad
544	sadāpṛṇaḥ yajataḥ vi dviṣaḥ vadhīt	sadāpṛṇa yajata vi dviṣ vadh
544	bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavit taryaḥ vaḥ sacā	bāhuvṛkta śrutavid tarya tvad sacā
544	ubhā sa varā prati eti bhāti ca	ubh sa vara prati i bhā ca
544	yat īm gaṇam bhajate suprayāvabhiḥ	yat īṃ gaṇa bhaj suprayāvan
544	sutambharaḥ yajamānasya satpatiḥ	sutambhara yajamāna sat pati
544	viśvāsām ūdhar sa dhiyām udañcanaḥ	viśva ūdhas tad dhī
544	bharat dhenuḥ rasavat śiśriye payaḥ	bhṛ dhenu rasavat śri payas
544	anubruvāṇaḥ adhi eti na svapan	anubrū adhi i na svap
544	yaḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante	yad jāgṛ tad ṛc kāmay
544	yaḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti	yad jāgṛ tad u sāman i
544	yaḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha	yad jāgṛ tad idam soma ah
544	tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ	tvad mad as sakhya nyokas
544	agniḥ jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante	agni jāgṛ tad ṛc kāmay
544	agniḥ jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti	agni jāgṛ tad u sāman i
544	agniḥ jāgāra tam ayam somaḥ āha	agni jāgṛ tad idam soma ah
544	tava aham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ	tvad mad as sakhya nyokas
 ---
545	vidāḥ divaḥ viṣyan adrim ukthaiḥ	vid div viṣā adri uktha
545	āyatyāḥ uṣasaḥ arcinaḥ guḥ	e uṣas arcin gā
545	apa avṛta vrajinīḥ ut svar gāt	apavṛ vrajin ud svar gā
545	vi duraḥ mānuṣīḥ devaḥ āvar	vi dvār mānuṣa deva vṛ
545	vi sūryaḥ amatim na śriyam sāt	vi sūrya amati na śrī sā
545	ā ūrvāt gavām mātā jānatī gāt	ā ūrva go mātṛ jñā gā
545	dhanvarṇasaḥ nadyaḥ khādoarṇāḥ	dhanū arṇas nadī khādoarṇa
545	sthūṇā iva sumitā dṛṁhata dyauḥ	sthūṇā iva su mā dṛh div
545	asmai ukthāya parvatasya garbhaḥ	idam uktha parvata garbha
545	mahīnām januṣe pūrvyāya	mahi janus pūrvya
545	vi parvataḥ jihīta sādhata dyauḥ	vi parvata hā sādh div
545	āvivāsantaḥ dasayanta bhūma	āvivās dasay bhūman
545	sūktebhiḥ vaḥ vacobhiḥ devajuṣTaiḥ	sūkta tvad vacas deva juṣ
545	indrā nu agnī avase huvadhyai	indra nu agni avas hvā
545	ukthebhiḥ hi smā kavayaḥ suyajñāḥ	uktha hi sma kavi su yajña
545	āvivāsantaḥ marutaḥ yajanti	āvivās marut yaj
545	ā ita u nu adya sudhyaḥ bhavāma	nu adya sudhī bhū
545	pra ducchunām inavāma varīyaḥ	pra ducchunā mi varīyas
545	āre dveṣāṁsi sanutar dadhāma	āre dveṣas sanutar dhā
545	ayāma prāñcaḥ yajamānam accha	āyā prāñc yaj acchā
545	ā itā dhiyam kṛṇavāmā sakhāyaḥ	dhī kṛ sakhi
545	apa yā mātā ṛṇuta vrajam goḥ	apa yad mātṛ ṛch vraja go
545	yayā manuḥ viśiśipram jigāya	yad manu viśiśipra ji
545	yayā vaṇik vaṅkuḥ āpā purīṣam	yad vaṇij vaṅku āp purīṣa
545	anūnot atra hastayataḥ adriḥ	nū atra hasta yam adri
545	ārcan yena daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ	arc yad daśan mās navagva
545	ṛtam yatī saramā gāḥ avindat	ṛta i saramā go vid
545	viśvāni satyā aṅgirāḥ cakāra	viśva satya aṅgiras kṛ
545	viśve asyāḥ vyuṣi māhināyāḥ	viśva idam vyuṣ māhina
545	sam yat gobhiḥ aṅgirasaḥ navanta	sam yat go aṅgiras nū
545	utsaḥ āsām parame sadhasthe	utsa idam parama sadhastha
545	ṛtasya pathā saramā vidat gāḥ	ṛta pathin saramā vid go
545	ā sūryaḥ yātu saptāśvaḥ	ā sūrya yā saptan aśva
545	kṣetram yat asya urviyā dīrghayāthe	kṣetra yad idam urviyā dīrgha yātha
545	raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayat andhaḥ acchā	raghu śyena patay andhas acchā
545	yuvā kaviḥ dīdayat goṣu gacchan	yuvan kavi dīdī go gam
545	ā sūryaḥ aruhat śukram arṇaḥ	ā sūrya ruh śukra arṇas
545	ayukta yat haritaḥ vītapṛṣThāḥ	yuj yat harit vīta pṛṣṭha
545	udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrāḥ	udan na nau nī dhīra
545	āśṛṇvatīḥ āpaḥ arvāk atiṣThan	āśru ap arvāk sthā
545	dhiyam vaḥ apsu dadhiṣe svarṣām	dhī tvad ap dhā svarṣā
545	yayā ataran daśa māsaḥ navagvāḥ	yad tṛ daśan mās navagva
545	ayā dhiyā syāma devagopāḥ	idam dhī as deva gopā
545	ayā dhiyā tuturyāma ati aṁhaḥ	idam dhī tur ati aṃhas
 ---
546	hayaḥ na vidvān ayuji svayam dhuri	haya na vid yuj svayam dhur
546	tām vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam	tad vah prataraṇa avasyu
546	na asyāḥ vaśmi vimucam na āvṛtam punar	na idam vaś vimuc na āvṛt punar
546	vidvān pathaḥ puraetā ṛju neṣati	vid pathin puraetṛ ṛju nī
546	agne indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ	agni indra varuṇa mitra deva
546	śardhaḥ pra yanta māruta uta viṣṇo	śardhas pra yam māruta uta viṣṇu
546	ubhā nāsatyā rudraḥ adha gnāḥ	ubh nāsatya rudra adha gnā
546	pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvati juṣanta	pūṣan bhaga sarasvatī juṣ
546	indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇā aditim svar	indra agni mitrāvaruṇa aditi svar
546	pṛthivīm dyām marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ	pṛthivī div marut parvata ap
546	huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim	hvā viṣṇu pūṣan brahmaṇaspati
546	bhagam nu śaṁsam savitāram ūtaye	bhaga nu śaṃsa savitṛ ūti
546	uta naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta vātaḥ asridhaḥ	uta mad viṣṇu uta vāta asridh
546	draviṇodāḥ uta somaḥ mayaḥ karat	draviṇas dā uta soma mayas kṛ
546	uta ṛbhavaḥ uta rāye naḥ aśvinā	uta ṛbhu uta rai mad aśvin
546	uta tvaṣTā uta vibhvā anu maṁsate	uta tvaṣṭṛ uta vibhvan anu man
546	uta tyat naḥ mārutam śardhaḥ ā gamat	uta tya mad māruta śardhas ā gam
546	divikṣayam yajatam barhiḥ āsade	divikṣaya yajata barhis āsad
546	bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣā uta naḥ yamat	bṛhaspati śarman pūṣan uta mad yam
546	varūthyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varūthya varuṇa mitra aryaman
546	uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ suśastayaḥ	uta tya mad parvata su śasti
546	sudītayaḥ nadyaḥ trāmaṇe bhuvan	su dīti nadī trāman bhū
546	bhagaḥ vibhaktā śavasā avasā ā gamat	bhaga vibhaj śavas avas gam
546	uruvyacāḥ aditiḥ śrotu me havam	uru vyacas aditi śru mad hava
546	devānām patnīḥ uśatīḥ avantu naḥ	deva patnī vaś av mad
546	pra avantu naḥ tujaye vājasātaye	prāv mad tuj vājasāti
546	yāḥ pārthivāsaḥ yāḥ apām api vrate	yad pārthiva yad ap api vrata
546	tā naḥ devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yacchata	tad mad devī su hava śarman yam
546	uta gnāḥ vyantu devapatnīḥ	uta gnā vī deva patnī
546	indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāT	indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj
546	ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu	ā rodas varuṇānī śru
546	vyantu devīḥ yaḥ ṛtuḥ janīnām	vī devī yad ṛtu jani
 ---
547	prayuñjatī divaḥ eti bruvāṇā	prayuj div i brū
547	mahī mātā duhituḥ bodhayantī	mah mātṛ duhitṛ bodhay
547	āvivāsantī yuvatiḥ manīṣā	āvivās yuvati manīṣā
547	pitṛbhyaḥ ā sadane johuvānā	pitṛ ā sadana johav
547	ajirāsaḥ tadapaḥ īyamānāḥ	ajira tad apas i
547	ātasthivāṁsaḥ amṛtasya nābhim	āsthā amṛta nābhi
547	anantāsaḥ uravaḥ viśvataḥ sīm	ananta uru viśvatas sīm
547	pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ	pari dyāvāpṛthivī i pathin
547	ukṣā samudraḥ aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ	ukṣan samudra aruṣa suparṇa
547	pūrvasya yonim pituḥ ā viveśa	pūrva yoni pitṛ ā viś
547	madhye divaḥ nihitaḥ pṛśniḥ aśmā	madhya div nidhā pṛśni aśman
547	vi cakrame rajasaḥ pāti antau	vi kram rajas pā anta
547	catvāraḥ īm bibhrati kṣemayantaḥ	catur īṃ bhṛ kṣemay
547	daśa garbham carase dhāpayante	daśan garbha car dhāpay
547	tridhātavaḥ paramāḥ asya gāvaḥ	tri dhātu parama idam go
547	divaḥ caranti pari sadyaḥ antān	div car pari sadyas anta
547	idam vapuḥ nivacanam janāsaḥ	idam vapus nivacana jana
547	caranti yat nadyaḥ tasthuḥ āpaḥ	car yat nadī sthā ap
547	dve yat īm bibhṛtaḥ mātuḥ anye	dvi yat īṃ bhṛ mātṛ anya
547	iheha jāte yamyā sabandhū	iha iha jan yamya sabandhu
547	vi tanvate dhiyaḥ asmai apāṁsi	vi tan dhī idam apas
547	vastrā putrāya mātaraḥ vayanti	vastra putra mātṛ ve
547	upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇaḥ modamānāḥ	upapṛc vṛṣan mud
547	divaḥ pathā vadhvaḥ yanti accha	div pathin vadhū i acchā
547	tat astu mitrāvaruṇā tat agne	tad as mitrāvaruṇa tad agni
547	śam yoḥ asmabhyam idam astu śastam	śam yos mad idam as śaṃs
547	aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣThām	aś gādha uta pratiṣṭhā
547	namaḥ dive bṛhate sādanāya	namas div bṛhat sādana
 ---
548	kat u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe	ka u priya dhāman man
548	svakṣatrāya svayaśase mahe vayam	sva kṣatra sva yaśas mah mad
548	āmenyasya rajasaḥ yat abhre ā	āmenya rajas yat abhra
548	apaḥ vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī	ap vṛ vitan māyin
548	tāḥ atnata vayunam vīravakṣaṇam	tad tan vayuna vīra vakṣaṇa
548	samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ	samāna vṛtā viśva ā rajas
548	apa u apācīḥ aparāḥ apa ījate	apa u apāñc apara apej
548	pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate devayuḥ janaḥ	pra pūrva tṛ devayu jana
