841	asmai ū su prabhūtaye	idam u su prabhūti
841	varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ	varuṇa marut
841	arcā viduṣTarebhyaḥ	arc viduṣṭara
841	yaḥ dhītā mānuṣāṇām	yad dhī mānuṣa
841	paśvaḥ gāḥ iva rakṣati	paśu go iva rakṣ
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	tam ū su samanā girā	tad u su samanā gir
841	pitṛṛṇām ca manmabhiḥ	pitṛ ca manman
841	nābhākasya praśastibhiḥ	nābhāka praśasti
841	yaḥ sindhūnām upa udaye	yad sindhu upodaya
841	saptasvasā sa madhyamaḥ	saptan svasṛ tad madhyama
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	sa kṣapaḥ pari sasvaje	tad kṣap pari svaj
841	ni usraḥ māyayā dadhe	ni usṛ māyā dhā
841	sa viśvam pari darśataḥ	tad viśva pari darśata
841	tasya venīḥ anu vratam	tad vena anu vrata
841	uṣaḥ tisraḥ avardhayan	uṣ tri vardhay
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yaḥ kakubhaḥ nidhārayaḥ	yad kakubh nidhāray
841	pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ	pṛthivī adhi darśata
841	sa mātā pūrvyam padam	tad mātṛ pūrvya pada
841	tat varuṇasya saptyam	tad varuṇa saptya
841	sa hi gopāḥ iva iryaḥ	tad hi gopā iva irya
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yaḥ dhartā bhuvanānām	yad dhartṛ bhuvana
841	yaḥ usrāṇām apīcyā	yad usrā apīcya
841	veda nāmāni guhyā	vid nāman guhya
841	sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru	tad kavi kāvya puru
841	rūpam dyauḥ iva puṣyati	rūpa div iva puṣ
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yasmin viśvāni kāvyā	yad viśva kāvya
841	cakre nābhiḥ iva śritā	cakra nābhi iva śri
841	tritam jūtī saparyata	trita jūti sapary
841	vraje gāvaḥ na saṁyuje	vraja go na saṃyuj
841	yuje aśvān ayukṣata	yuj aśva yuj
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yaḥ āsu atkaḥ āśaye	yad idam atka āśī
841	viśvā jātāni eṣām	viśva jāta idam
841	pari dhāmāni marmṛśat	pari dhāman marmṛś
841	varuṇasya puraḥ gaye	varuṇa puras gaya
841	viśve devāḥ anu vratam	viśva deva anu vrata
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	sa samudraḥ apīcyaḥ	tad samudra apīcya
841	turaḥ dyām iva rohati	tura div iva ruh
841	ni yat āsu yajuḥ dadhe	ni yat idam yajus dhā
841	sa māyāḥ arcinā padā	tad māyā arci pad
841	astṛṇāt nākam ā aruhat	stṛ nāka āruh
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā	yad śveta vicakṣaṇa
841	tisraḥ bhūmīḥ adhikṣitaḥ	tri bhūmi adhikṣi
841	triḥ uttarāṇi papratuḥ	tris uttara prā
841	varuṇasya dhruvam sadaḥ	varuṇa dhruva sadas
841	sa saptānām irajyati	tad saptan irajy
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
841	yaḥ śvetān adhinirṇijaḥ	yad śveta adhinirṇij
841	cakre kṛṣṇān anu vratā	kṛ kṛṣṇa anu vrata
841	sa dhāma pūrvyam mame	tad dhāman pūrvya mā
841	yaḥ skambhena vi rodasī	yad skambha vi rodasī
841	ajaḥ na dyām adhārayat	aja na div dhāray
841	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
 ---
842	astabhnāt dyām asuraḥ viśvavedāḥ	stambh div asura viśva vedas
842	amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ	mā variman pṛthivī
842	ā asīdat viśvā bhuvanāni samrāT	āsad viśva bhuvana samrāj
842	viśvā it tāni varuṇasya vratāni	viśva id tad varuṇa vrata
842	evā vandasva varuṇam bṛhantam	eva vand varuṇa bṛhat
842	namasyā dhīram amṛtasya gopām	namasy dhīra amṛta gopā
842	sa naḥ śarma trivarūtham vi yaṁsat	tad mad śarman tri varūtha vi yam
842	pātam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe	pā mad dyāvāpṛthivī upastha
842	imām dhiyam śikṣamāṇasya deva	idam dhī śikṣ deva
842	kratum dakṣam varuṇa sam śiśādhi	kratu dakṣa varuṇa sam śā
842	yayā ati viśvā duritā tarema	yad ati viśva durita tṛ
842	sutarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruhema	su tarman adhi nau ruh
842	ā vām grāvāṇaḥ aśvinā	ā tvad grāvan aśvin
842	dhībhiḥ viprāḥ acucyavuḥ	dhī vipra cyu
842	nāsatyā somapītaye	nāsatya soma pīti
842	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
842	yathā vām atriḥ aśvinā	yathā tvad atri aśvin
842	gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ ajohavīt	gir vipra johav
842	nāsatyā somapītaye	nāsatya soma pīti
842	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
842	evā vām ahve ūtaye	eva tvad hvā ūti
842	yathā ahuvanta medhirāḥ	yathā hvā medhira
842	nāsatyā somapītaye	nāsatya soma pīti
842	nabhantām anyake same	nabh anyaka sama
 ---
843	ime viprasya vedhasaḥ	idam vipra vedhas
843	agneḥ astṛtayajvanaḥ	agni astṛta yajvan
843	giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate	gir stoma īr
843	asmai te pratiharyate	idam tvad pratihary
843	jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe	jātavedas vicarṣaṇi
843	agne janāmi suṣTutim	agni jan suṣṭuti
843	ārokāḥ iva gha it aha	āroka iva gha id aha
843	tigmāḥ agne tava tviṣaḥ	tigma agni tvad tviṣ
843	dadbhiḥ vanāni bapsati	dat vana bhas
843	harayaḥ dhūmaketavaḥ	hari dhūma ketu
843	vātajūtāḥ upa dyavi	vāta jū upa div
843	yatante vṛthak agnayaḥ	yat vṛthak agni
843	ete tye vṛthak agnayaḥ	etad tya vṛthak agni
843	iddhāsaḥ sam adṛkṣata	indh sam dṛś
843	uṣasām iva ketavaḥ	uṣas iva ketu
843	kṛṣṇā rajāṁsi patsutaḥ	kṛṣṇa rajas patsutas
843	prayāṇe jātavedasaḥ	prayāṇa jātavedas
843	agniḥ yat rodhati kṣami	agni yat rudh kṣam
843	dhāsim kṛṇvānaḥ oṣadhīḥ	dhāsi kṛ oṣadhi
843	bapsat agniḥ na vāyati	bhas agni na vā
843	punar yan taruṇīḥ api	punar i taruṇa api
843	jihvābhiḥ aha nannamat	jihvā aha nannam
843	arciṣā jañjaṇābhavan	arcis jañjaṇābhavat
843	agniḥ vaneṣu rocate	agni vana ruc
843	apsu agne sadhiḥ tava	ap agni sadhis tvad
843	sa oṣadhīḥ anu rudhyase	tad oṣadhī anu rudh
843	garbhe san jāyase punar	garbha as jan punar
843	ut agne tava tat ghṛtāt	ud agni tvad tad ghṛta
843	arciḥ rocate āhutam	arcis ruc āhu
843	niṁsānam juhvaḥ mukhe	niṃs juhū mukha
843	ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya	ukṣan anna vaśā anna
843	somapṛṣThāya vedhase	soma pṛṣṭha vedhas
843	stomaiḥ vidhema agnaye	stoma vidh agni
843	uta tvā namasā vayam	uta tvad namas mad
843	hotar vareṇyakrato	hotṛ vareṇya kratu
843	agne samidbhiḥ īmahe	agni samidh ī
843	uta tvā bhṛguvat śuce	uta tvad bhṛgu vat śuci
843	manuṣvat agne āhuta	manuṣvat agni āhu
843	aṅgirasvat havāmahe	aṅgirasvat hvā
843	tvam hi agne agninā	tvad hi agni agni
843	vipraḥ vipreṇa san satā	vipra vipra as as
843	sakhā sakhyā samidhyase	sakhi sakhi samindh
843	sa tvam viprāya dāśuṣe	tad tvad vipra dāś
843	rayim dehi sahasriṇam	rayi dā sahasrin
843	agne vīravatīm iṣam	agni vīravat iṣ
843	agne bhrātar sahaskṛta	agni bhrātṛ sahaskṛta
843	rohidaśva śucivrata	rohit aśva śuci vrata
843	imam stomam juṣasva me	idam stoma juṣ mad
843	uta tvā agne mama stutaḥ	uta tvad agni mad stut
843	vāśrāya pratiharyate	vāśra pratihary
843	goṣTham gāvaḥ iva āśata	goṣṭha go iva aś
843	tubhyam tāḥ aṅgirastama	tvad tad aṅgirastama
843	viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak	viśva su kṣiti pṛthak
843	agne kāmāya yemire	agni kāma yam
843	agnim dhībhiḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	agni dhī manīṣin
843	medhirāsaḥ vipaścitaḥ	medhira vipaścit
843	admasadyāya hinvire	admasadya hi
843	tam tvām ajmeṣu vājinam	tad tvad ajma vājin
843	tanvānāḥ agne adhvaram	tan agni adhvara
843	vahnim hotāram īLate	vahni hotṛ īḍ
843	purutrā hi sadṛṅ asi	purutrā hi sadṛś as
843	viśaḥ viśvāḥ anu prabhuḥ	viś viśva anu prabhu
843	samatsu tvā havāmahe	samad tvad hvā
843	tam īLiṣva yaḥ āhutaḥ	tad īḍ yad āhu
843	agniḥ vibhrājate ghṛtaiḥ	agni vibhrāj ghṛta
843	imam naḥ śṛṇavat havam	idam mad śru hava
843	tam tvā vayam havāmahe	tad tvad mad hvā
843	śṛṇvantam jātavedasam	śru jātavedas
843	agne ghnantam apa dviṣaḥ	agni han apa dviṣ
843	viśām rājānam adbhutam	viś rājan adbhuta
843	adhyakṣam dharmaṇām imam	adhyakṣa dharman idam
843	agnim īLe saḥ u śravat	agni īḍ tad u śru
843	agnim viśvāyuvepasam	agni viśvāyu vepas
843	maryam na vājinam hitam	marya na vājin hi
843	saptim na vājayāmasi	sapti na vājay
843	ghnan mṛdhrāṇi apa dviṣaḥ	han mṛdhra apa dviṣ
843	dahan rakṣāṁsi viśvahā	dah rakṣas viśvahā
843	agne tigmena dīdihi	agni tigma dīdī
843	yam tvā janāsaḥ indhate	yad tvad jana indh
843	manuṣvat aṅgirastama	manuṣvat aṅgirastama
843	agne sa bodhi me vacaḥ	agni tad budh mad vacas
843	yat agne divijāḥ asi	yat agni divijā as
843	apsujāḥ vā sahaskṛta	apsujā vā sahaskṛta
843	tam tvā gīrbhiḥ havāmahe	tad tvad gir hvā
843	tubhyam gha it te janāḥ ime	tvad gha id tad jana idam
843	viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak	viśva su kṣiti pṛthak
843	dhāsim hinvanti attave	dhāsi hi ad
843	te gha it agne svādhyaḥ	tad gha id agni svādhī
843	ahā viśvā nṛcakṣasaḥ	aha viśva nṛ cakṣas
843	tarantaḥ syāma durgahā	tṛ as durgaha
843	agnim mandram purupriyam	agni mandra puru priya
843	śīram pāvakaśociṣam	śīra pāvaka śocis
843	hṛdbhiḥ mandrebhiḥ īmahe	hṛd mandra ī
843	sa tvam agne vibhāvasuḥ	tad tvad agni vibhāvasu
843	sṛjan sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ	sṛj sūrya na raśmi
843	śardhan tamāṁsi jighnase	śṛdh tamas han
843	tat te sahasvaḥ īmahe	tad tvad sahasvat ī
843	dātram yat na upadasyati	dātra yad na upadas
843	tvat agne vāryam vasu	tvad agni vārya vasu
 ---
844	samidhā agnim duvasyata	samidh agni duvasy
844	ghṛtaiḥ bodhayata atithim	ghṛta bodhay atithi
844	ā asmin havyā juhotana	ā idam havya hu
844	agne stomam juṣasva me	agni stoma juṣ mad
844	vardhasva anena manmanā	vṛdh idam manman
844	prati sūktāni harya naḥ	prati sūkta hary mad
844	agnim dūtam puraḥ dadhe	agni dūta puras dhā
844	havyavāham upa bruve	havyavāha upa brū
844	devān ā sādayāt iha	deva ā sāday iha
844	ut te bṛhantaḥ arcayaḥ	ud tvad bṛhat arci
844	samidhānasya dīdivaḥ	samindh dīdī
844	agne śukrāsaḥ īrate	agni śukra īr
844	upa tvā juhvaḥ mama	upa tvad juhū mad
844	ghṛtācīḥ yantu haryata	ghṛtāñc i haryata
844	agne havyā juṣasva naḥ	agni havya juṣ mad
844	mandram hotāram ṛtvijam	mandra hotṛ ṛtvij
844	citrabhānum vibhāvasum	citra bhānu vibhāvasu
844	agnim īLe saḥ u śravat	agni īḍ tad u śru
844	pratnam hotāram īḍyam	pratna hotṛ īḍ
844	juṣTam agnim kavikratum	juṣ agni kavi kratu
844	adhvarāṇām abhiśriyam	adhvara abhiśrī
844	juṣāṇaḥ aṅgirastama	juṣ aṅgirastama
844	imā havyāni ānuṣak	idam havya ānuṣak
844	agne yajñam naya ṛtuthā	agni yajña nī ṛtuthā
844	samidhānaḥ u santya	samindh u santya
844	śukraśoce iha ā vaha	śukra śoci iha ā vah
844	cikitvān daivyam janam	cit daivya jana
844	vipram hotāram adruham	vipra hotṛ adruh
844	dhūmaketum vibhāvasum	dhūma ketu vibhāvasu
844	yajñānām ketum īmahe	yajña ketu ī
844	agne ni pāhi naḥ tvam	agni ni pā mad tvad
844	prati sma deva rīṣataḥ	prati sma deva riṣ
844	bhindhi dveṣaḥ sahaskṛta	bhid dveṣas sahaskṛta
844	agniḥ pratnena manmanā	agni pratna manman
844	śumbhānaḥ tanvam svām	śubh tanū sva
844	kaviḥ vipreṇa vāvṛdhe	kavi vipra vṛdh
844	ūrjaḥ napātam ā huve	ūrj napāt ā hvā
844	agnim pāvakaśociṣam	agni pāvaka śocis
844	asmin yajñe svadhvare	idam yajña su adhvara
844	sa naḥ mitramahaḥ tvam	tad mad mitra maha tvad
844	agne śukreṇa śociṣā	agni śukra śocis
844	devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi	deva ā sad barhis
844	yaḥ agnim tanvaḥ dame	yad agni tanū dama
844	devam martaḥ saparyati	deva marta sapary
844	tasmai it dīdayat vasu	tad id dīdī vasu
844	agniḥ mūrdhā divaḥ kakut	agni mūrdhan div kakud
844	patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ ayam	pati pṛthivī idam
844	apām retāṁsi jinvati	ap retas jinv
844	ut agne śucayaḥ tava	ud agni śuci tvad
844	śukrāḥ bhrājantaḥ īrate	śukra bhrāj īr
844	tava jyotīṁṣi arcayaḥ	tvad jyotis arci
844	īśiṣe vāryasya hi	īś vārya hi
844	dātrasya agne svarpatiḥ	dātra agni svarpati
844	stotā syām tava śarmaṇi	stotṛ as tvad śarman
844	tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ	tvad agni manīṣin
844	tvām hinvanti cittibhiḥ	tvad hi citti
844	tvām vardhantu naḥ giraḥ	tvad vṛdh mad gir
844	adabdhasya svadhāvataḥ	adabdha svadhāvat
844	dūtasya rebhataḥ sadā	dūta ribh sadā
844	agneḥ sakhyam vṛṇīmahe	agni sakhya vṛ
844	agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ	agni śuci vratatama
844	śuciḥ vipraḥ śuciḥ kaviḥ	śuci vipra śuci kavi
844	śuciḥ rocate āhutaḥ	śuci ruc āhu
844	uta tvā dhītayaḥ mama	uta tvad dhīti mad
844	giraḥ vardhantu viśvahā	gir vṛdh viśvahā
844	agne sakhyasya bodhi naḥ	agni sakhya budh mad
844	yat agne syām aham tvam	yat agni as mad tvad
844	tvam vā ghā syāḥ aham	tvad vā gha as mad
844	syuḥ te satyāḥ iha āśiṣaḥ	as tvad satya iha āśis
844	vasuḥ vasupatiḥ hi kam	vasu vasu pati hi kaṃ
844	asi agne vibhāvasuḥ	as agni vibhāvasu
844	syāma te sumatau api	as tvad sumati api
844	agne dhṛtavratāya te	agni dhṛ vrata tvad
844	samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ	samudra iva sindhu
844	giraḥ vāśrāsaḥ īrate	gir vāśra īr
844	yuvānam viśpatim kavim	yuvan viśpati kavi
844	viśvādam puruvepasam	viśva ad puru vepas
844	agnim śumbhāmi manmabhiḥ	agni śubh manman
844	yajñānām rathye vayam	yajña rathī mad
844	tigmajambhāya vīLave	tigma jambha vīḍu
844	stomaiḥ iṣema agnaye	stoma iṣ agni
844	ayam agne tve api	idam agni tvad api
844	jaritā bhūtu santya	jaritṛ bhū santya
844	tasmai pāvaka mṛLaya	tad pāvaka mṛḍay
844	dhīraḥ hi asi admasat	dhīra hi as adman sad
844	vipraḥ na jāgṛviḥ sadā	vipra na jāgṛvi sadā
844	agne dīdayasi dyavi	agni dīdī div
844	purā agne duritebhyaḥ	purā agni durita
844	purā mṛdhrebhyaḥ kave	purā mṛdhra kavi
844	pra naḥ āyuḥ vaso tira	pra mad āyus vasu tṛ
 ---
845	ā ghā ye agnim indhate	ā gha yad agni indh
845	stṛṇanti barhiḥ ānuṣak	stṛ barhis ānuṣak
845	yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā	yad indra yuvan sakhi
845	bṛhan it idhmaḥ eṣām	bṛhat id idhma idam
845	bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ	bhūri śaṃs pṛthu svaru
845	yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā	yad indra yuvan sakhi
845	ayuddhaḥ it yudhā vṛtam	a yudh id yudh vṛ
845	śūraḥ ā ajati satvabhiḥ	śūra āj satvan
845	yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā	yad indra yuvan sakhi
845	ā bundam vṛtrahā dade	ā bunda vṛtrahan dā
845	jātaḥ pṛcchat vi mātaram	jan pracch vi mātṛ
845	ke ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire	ka ugra ka ha śru
845	prati tvā śavasī vadat	prati tvad śavasī vad
845	girau apsaḥ na yodhiṣat	giri apsas na yudh
845	yaḥ te śatrutvam ācake	yad tvad śatru tva ākan
845	uta tvam maghavan śṛṇu	uta tvad maghavan śru
845	yaḥ te vaṣTi vavakṣi tat	yad tvad vaś vaś tad
845	yat vīLayāsi vīLu tat	yad vīḍay vīḍu tad
845	yat ājim yāti ājikṛt	yat āji yā āji kṛt
845	indraḥ svaśvayuḥ upa	indra su aśvayu upa
845	rathītamaḥ rathīnām	rathītama rathī
845	vi su viśvāḥ abhiyujaḥ	vi su viśva abhiyuj
845	vajrin viṣvak yathā vṛha	vajrin viṣvañc yathā vṛh
845	bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ	bhū mad su śravastama
845	asmākam su ratham puraḥ	mad su ratha puras
845	indraḥ kṛṇotu sātaye	indra kṛ sāti
845	na yam dhūrvanti dhūrtayaḥ	na yad dhūrv dhūrti
845	vṛjyāma te pari dviṣaḥ	vṛj tvad pari dviṣ
845	aram te śakra dāvane	aram tvad śakra dā
845	gamema it indra gomataḥ	gam id indra gomat
845	śanaiḥ cit yantaḥ adrivaḥ	śanais cit i adrivat
845	aśvāvantaḥ śatagvinaḥ	aśvāvat śatagvin
845	vivakṣaṇāḥ anehasaḥ	vivakṣaṇa anehas
845	ūrdhvā hi te divedive	ūrdhva hi tvad diva diva
845	sahasrā sūnṛtā śatā	sahasra sūnṛtā śata
845	jaritṛbhyaḥ vimaṁhate	jaritṛ vimah
845	vidmā hi tvā dhanaṁjayam	vid hi tvad dhanaṃjaya
845	indra dṛLhā cit ārujam	indra dṛḍha cit āruja
845	ādāriṇam yathā gayam	ādārin yathā gaya
845	kakuham cit tvā kave	kakuha cit tvad kavi
845	mandantu dhṛṣṇo indavaḥ	mad dhṛṣṇu indu
845	ā tvā paṇim yat īmahe	ā tvad paṇi yat ī
845	yaḥ te revān adāśuriḥ	yad tvad revā a dāśuri
845	pramamarṣa maghattaye	pramṛṣ maghatti
845	tasya naḥ vedaḥ ā bhara	tad mad vedas ā bhṛ
845	ime u tvā vi cakṣate	idam u tvad vi cakṣ
845	sakhāyaḥ indra sominaḥ	sakhi indra somin
845	puṣTāvantaḥ yathā paśum	puṣṭāvat yathā paśu
845	uta tvā abadhiram vayam	uta tvad a badhira mad
845	śrutkarṇam santam ūtaye	śrut karṇa as ūti
845	dūrāt iha havāmahe	dūrāt iha hvā
845	yat śuśrūyāḥ imam havam	yat śru idam hava
845	durmarṣam cakriyāḥ uta	durmarṣa kṛ uta
845	bhaveḥ āpiḥ naḥ antamaḥ	bhū āpi mad antama
845	yat cit hi te api vyathiḥ	yad cit hi tvad api vyathis
845	jaganvāṁsaḥ amanmahi	gam man
845	godāḥ it indra bodhi naḥ	go dā id indra bhū mad
845	ā tvā rambham na jivrayaḥ	ā tvad rambha na jivri
845	rarabhmā śavasaḥ pate	rabh śavas pati
845	uśmasi tvā sadhasthe ā	vaś tvad sadhastha ā
845	stotram indrāya gāyata	stotra indra gā
845	purunṛmṇāya satvane	puru nṛmṇa satvan
845	nakiḥ yam vṛṇvate yudhi	nakir yad vṛ yudh
845	abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sute	abhi tvad vṛṣabha su
845	sutam sṛjāmi pītaye	su sṛj pā
845	tṛmpā vi aśnuhī madam	tṛp vi aś mada
845	mā tvā mūrāḥ aviṣyavaḥ	mā tvad mūra aviṣyu
845	mā upahasvānaḥ ā dabhan	mā upahasvan ā dabh
845	mākīm brahmadviṣaḥ vanaḥ	mākīm brahman dviṣ van
845	iha tvā goparīṇasā	iha tvad go parīṇas
845	mahe mandantu rādhase	mah mad rādhas
845	saraḥ gauraḥ yathā piba	saras gaura yathā pā
845	yā vṛtrahā parāvati	yad vṛtrahan parāvat
845	sanā navā ca cucyuve	sana nava ca cyu
845	tā saṁsatsu pra vocata	tad saṃsad pra vac
845	apibat kadruvaḥ sutam	pā kadru su
845	indraḥ sahasrabāhve	indra sahasra bāhu
845	atra adediṣTa pauṁsyam	atra dediś pauṃsya
845	satyam tat turvaśe yadau	satya tad turvaśa yadu
845	vidānaḥ ahnavāyyam	vid a hnu
845	vi ānaT turvaṇe śami	vi naś tur śami
845	taraṇim vaḥ janānām	taraṇi tvad jana
845	tradam vājasya gomataḥ	trada vāja gomat
845	samānam u pra śaṁsiṣam	samāna u pra śaṃs
845	ṛbhukṣaṇam na vartave	ṛbhukṣan na vṛ
845	uktheṣu tugryāvṛdham	uktha tugryāvṛdh
845	indram some sacā sute	indra soma sacā su
845	yaḥ kṛntat it vi yonyam	yad kṛt id vi yonya
845	triśokāya girim pṛthum	triśoka giri pṛthu
845	gobhyaḥ gātum niretave	go gātu niri
845	yat dadhiṣe manasyasi	yat dhā manasy
845	mandānaḥ pra it iyakṣasi	mad pra id iyakṣ
845	mā tat kar indra mṛLaya	mā tad kṛ indra mṛḍay
845	dabhram cit hi tvāvataḥ	dabhra cit hi tvāvat
845	kṛtam śṛṇve adhi kṣami	kṛ śru adhi kṣam
845	jigātu indra te manaḥ	gā indra tvad manas
845	tava it u tāḥ sukīrtayaḥ	tvad id u tad su kīrti
845	asan uta praśastayaḥ	as uta praśasti
845	yat indra mṛLayāsi naḥ	yat indra mṛḍay mad
845	mā naḥ ekasmin āgasi	mā mad eka āgas
845	mā dvayoḥ uta triṣu	mā dvi uta tri
845	vadhīḥ mā śūra bhūriṣu	vadh mā śūra bhūri
845	bibhayā hi tvāvataḥ	bhī hi tvāvat
845	ugrāt abhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ	ugra abhiprabhaṅgin
845	dasmāt aham ṛtīṣahaḥ	dasma mad ṛtīṣah
845	mā sakhyuḥ śūnam ā vide	mā sakhi śūna ā vid
845	mā putrasya prabhūvaso	mā putra prabhūvasu
845	āvṛtvat bhūtu te manaḥ	āvṛtvat bhū tvad manas
845	kaḥ nu maryāḥ amithitaḥ	ka nu marya amithita
845	sakhā sakhāyam abravīt	sakhi sakhi brū
845	jahā kaḥ asmat īṣate	ka mad īṣ
845	evāre vṛṣabhā sute	eva are vṛṣabha su
845	asinvan bhūri āvayaḥ	asinvat bhūri āvay
845	śvaghnī iva nivatā caran	śvaghnin iva nivat car
845	ā te etā vacoyujā	ā tvad etad vacas yuj
845	harī gṛbhṇe sumadrathā	hari grah sumat ratha
845	yat īm brahmabhyaḥ it dadaḥ	yat īṃ brahman id dā
845	bhindhi viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ	bhid viśva apa dviṣ
845	pari bādhaḥ jahī mṛdhaḥ	paribādh han mṛdh
845	vasu spārham tat ā bhara	vasu spārha tad ā bhṛ
845	yat vīLau indra yat sthire	yad vīḍu indra yad sthira
845	yat parśāne parābhṛtam	yad parśāna parābhṛ
845	vasu spārham tat ā bhara	vasu spārha tad ā bhṛ
845	yasya te viśvamānuṣaḥ	yad tvad viśva mānuṣa
845	bhūreḥ dattasya vedati	bhūri dā vid
845	vasu spārham tat ā bhara	vasu spārha tad ā bhṛ
 ---
846	tvāvataḥ purūvaso	tvāvat purūvasu
846	vayam indra praṇetar	mad indra praṇetṛ
846	smasi sthātar harīṇām	as sthātṛ hari
846	tvām hi satyam adrivaḥ	tvad hi satya adrivat
846	vidma dātāram iṣām	vid dātṛ iṣ
846	vidma dātāram rayīṇām	vid dātṛ rayi
846	ā yasya te mahimānam	ā yad tvad mahiman
846	śatamūte śatakrato	śatamūti śatakratu
846	gīrbhiḥ gṛṇanti kāravaḥ	gir gṛ kāru
846	sunīthaḥ ghā sa martyaḥ	su nītha gha tad martya
846	yam marutaḥ yam aryamā	yad marut yad aryaman
846	mitraḥ pānti adruhaḥ	mitra pā adruh
846	dadhānaḥ gomat aśvavat suvīryam	dhā gomat aśvavat su vīrya
846	ādityajūtaḥ edhate	āditya jū edh
846	sadā rāyā puruspṛhā	sadā rai puruspṛh
846	tam indram dānam īmahe	tad indra dāna ī
846	śavasānam abhīrvam	śavasāna abhīru
846	īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe	īś rai ī
846	tasmin hi santi ūtayaḥ	tad hi as ūti
846	viśvāḥ abhīravaḥ sacā	viśva abhīru sacā
846	tam ā vahantu saptayaḥ purūvasum	tad ā vah sapti purūvasu
846	madāya harayaḥ sutam	mada hari su
846	yaḥ te madaḥ vareṇyaḥ	yad tvad mada vareṇya
846	yaḥ indra vṛtrahantamaḥ	yad indra vṛtra hantama
846	yaḥ ādadiḥ svar nṛbhiḥ	yad ādadi svar nṛ
846	yaḥ pṛtanāsu duṣTaraḥ	yad pṛtanā duṣṭara
846	yaḥ duṣTaraḥ viśvavāra śravāyyaḥ	yad duṣṭara viśva vāra śravāyya
846	vājeṣu asti tarutā	vāja as tarutṛ
846	sa naḥ śaviṣTha savanā ā vaso gahi	tad mad śaviṣṭha savana vasu gam
846	gamema gomati vraje	gam gomat vraja
846	gavyā u su naḥ yathā purā	gavyu su mad yathā purā
846	aśvayā uta rathayā	aśvayā uta rathayā
846	varivasya mahāmaha	varivasy mahat maha
846	nahi te śūra rādhasaḥ	nahi tvad śūra rādhas
846	antam vindāmi satrā	anta vid satrā
846	daśasyā naḥ maghavan nū cit adrivaḥ	daśasy mad maghavan nu cit adrivat
846	dhiyaḥ vājebhiḥ āvitha	dhī vāja av
846	yaḥ ṛṣvaḥ śrāvayatsakhā	yad ṛṣva śrāvay sakhi
846	viśvā it sa veda janimā puruṣTutaḥ	viśva id tad vid janiman puruṣṭuta
846	tam viśve mānuṣā yugā	tad viśva mānuṣa yuga
846	indram havante taviṣam yatasrucaḥ	indra hvā taviṣa yam sruc
846	sa naḥ vājeṣu avitā purūvasuḥ	tad mad vāja avitṛ purūvasu
846	purasthātā maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat	pura sthātṛ maghavan vṛtrahan bhū
846	abhi vaḥ vīram andhasaḥ	abhi tvad vīra andhas
846	madeṣu gāya	mada gā
846	girā mahā vicetasam	gir mah vicetas
846	indram nāma śrutyam śākinam vacaḥ yathā	indra nāma śrutya śākina vacas yathā
846	dadiḥ rekṇaḥ tanve dadiḥ vasu	dadi rekṇas tanū dadi vasu
846	dadiḥ vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam	dadi vāja puruhūta vājin
846	nūnam atha	nūnam atha
846	viśveṣām irajyantam vasūnām	viśva irajy vasu
846	sāsahvāṁsam cit asya varpasaḥ	sah cit idam varpas
846	kṛpayataḥ nūnam ati atha	kṛpay nūnam ati atha
846	mahaḥ su vaḥ aram iṣe	mah su tvad aram iṣ
846	stavāmahe	stu
846	mīLhuṣe araṁgamāya jagmaye	mīḍhvas araṃgama jagmi
846	yajñebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ	yajña gir
846	viśvamanuṣām marutām iyakṣasi	viśva manus marut iyakṣ
846	gāye tvā namasā girā	gā tvad namas gir
846	ye pātayante ajmabhiḥ	yad pātay ajman
846	girīṇām snubhiḥ eṣām	giri snu idam
846	yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnām	yajña mahiṣvaṇi
846	sumnam tuviṣvaṇīnām	sumna tuviṣvaṇi
846	pra adhvare	pra adhvara
846	prabhaṅgam durmatīnām	prabhaṅga durmati
846	indra śaviṣTha ā bhara	indra śaviṣṭha ā bhṛ
846	rayim asmabhyam yujyam codayanmate	rayi mad yujya coday mati
846	jyeṣTham codayanmate	jyeṣṭha coday mati
846	sanitar susanitar ugra	sanitṛ su sanitṛ ugra
846	citra cetiṣTha sūnṛta	citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta
846	prāsahā samrāT sahurim sahantam	prāsah samrāj sahuri sah
846	bhujyum vājeṣu pūrvyam	bhujyu vāja pūrvya
846	ā saḥ etu yaḥ īvat ā	ā tad i yad īvat
846	adevaḥ pūrtam ādade	adeva pūrta ādā
846	yathā cit vaśaḥ aśvyaḥ	yathā cit vaśa aśvya
846	pṛthuśravasi kānīte	pṛthuśravas kānīta
846	asyāḥ vyuṣi ādade	idam vyuṣ ādā
846	ṣaṣTim sahasrā aśvyasya ayutā asanam	ṣaṣṭi sahasra aśvya ayuta āsana
846	uṣTrānām viṁśatim śatā	uṣṭra viṃśati śata
846	daśa śyāvīnām śatā	daśan śyāvī śata
846	daśa tryaruṣīṇām	daśan tri aruṣa
846	daśa gavām sahasrā	daśan go sahasra
846	daśa śyāvāḥ ṛdhadrayaḥ	daśan śyāva ṛdhadrī
846	vītavārāsaḥ āśavaḥ	vīta vāra āśu
846	mathrāḥ nemim ni vāvṛtuḥ	mathra nemi ni vṛt
846	dānāsaḥ pṛthuśravasaḥ	dāna pṛthuśravas
846	kānītasya surādhasaḥ	kānīta surādhas
846	ratham hiraṇyayam dadat	ratha hiraṇyaya dā
846	maṁhiṣThaḥ sūriḥ abhūt	maṃhiṣṭha sūri bhū
846	varṣiṣTham akṛta śravaḥ	varṣiṣṭha kṛ śravas
846	ā naḥ vāyo mahe tane	ā mad vāyu mah tan
846	yāhi makhāya pājase	yā makha pājas
846	vayam hi te cakṛmā bhūri dāvane	mad hi tvad kṛ bhūri dā
846	sadyaḥ cit mahi dāvane	sadyas cit mahi dā
846	yaḥ aśvebhiḥ vahate vasto usrāḥ	yad aśva vah usṛ
846	triḥ sapta saptatīnām	tris saptan saptati
846	ebhiḥ somebhiḥ somasudbhiḥ somapāḥ	idam soma soma sut soma pā
846	dānāya śukrapūtapāḥ	dāna śukra pū pā
846	yaḥ me imam cit u tmanā	yad mad idam cit u tman
846	amandat citram dāvane	mad citra dā
846	araTve akṣe nahuṣe sukṛtvani	araṭva akṣa nahuṣa su kṛtvan
846	sukṛttarāya sukratuḥ	sukṛttara su kratu
846	ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāT	ucathya vapus yad sva rāj
846	uta vāyo ghṛtasnāḥ	uta vāyu ghṛta snā
846	aśveṣitam rajeṣitam śuneṣitam	aśva iṣ raja iṣ śvan iṣ
846	pra ajma tat idam nu tat	pra ajman tad idam nu tad
846	adha priyam iṣirāya	adha priya iṣira
846	ṣaṣTim sahasrā asanam	ṣaṣṭi sahasra āsana
846	aśvānām it na vṛṣṇām	aśva id na vṛṣan
846	gāvaḥ na yūtham upa yanti vadhrayaḥ	go na yūtha upa i vadhri
846	upa mā ā yanti vadhrayaḥ	upa mad i vadhri
846	adha yat cārathe gaṇe	adha yat cāratha gaṇa
846	śatam uṣTrān acikradat	śata krand
846	adha śvitneṣu viṁśatim śatā	adha śvitna viṃśati śata
846	śatam dāse balbūthe	śata dāsa balbūtha
846	vipraḥ tarukṣe ā dade	vipra tarukṣa ā dā
846	te te vāyo ime janāḥ	tad tvad vāyu idam jana
846	madanti indragopāḥ	mad indra gopā
846	madanti devagopāḥ	mad deva gopā
846	adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī	adha tya yoṣaṇā mah
846	pratīcī vaśam aśvyam	pratyañc vaśa aśvya
846	adhirukmā vi nīyate	adhirukma vi nī
 ---
847	mahi vaḥ mahatām avaḥ	mahi tvad mahat avas
847	varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe	varuṇa mitra dāś
847	yam ādityāḥ abhi druhaḥ	yad āditya abhi druh
847	rakṣathā na īm agham naśat	rakṣ na īṃ agha naś
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	vidā devāḥ aghānām	vid deva agha
847	ādityāsaḥ apākṛtim	āditya apākṛti
847	pakṣā vayaḥ yathā upari	pakṣa vi yathā upari
847	vi asme śarma yacchata	vi mad śarman yam
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	vi asme adhi śarma tat	vi mad adhi śarman tad
847	pakṣā vayaḥ na yantana	pakṣa vi na yam
847	viśvāni viśvavedasaḥ	viśva viśva vedas
847	varūthyā manāmahe	varūthya man
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yasmai arāsata kṣayam	yad rā kṣaya
847	jīvātum ca pracetasaḥ	jīvātu ca pracetas
847	manoḥ viśvasya gha it ime	manu viśva gha id idam
847	ādityāḥ rāyaḥ īśate	āditya rai īś
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	pari naḥ vṛṇajan aghā	pari mad vṛj agha
847	durgāṇi rathyaḥ yathā	durga rathī yathā
847	syāma it indrasya śarmaṇi	as id indra śarman
847	ādityānām uta avasi	āditya uta avas
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	parihvṛtā it anā janaḥ	parihvṛt id anā jana
847	yuṣmādattasya vāyati	yuṣmādatta vā
847	devāḥ adabhram āśa vaḥ	deva adabhra aś tvad
847	yam ādityāḥ ahetana	yad āditya hi
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	na tam tigmam cana tyajaḥ	na tad tigma cana tyajas
847	na drāsat abhi tam guru	na drā abhi tad guru
847	yasmai u śarma saprathaḥ	yad u śarman saprathas
847	ādityāsaḥ arādhvam	āditya rā
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yuṣme devāḥ api smasi	tvad deva api as
847	yudhyantaḥ iva varmasu	yudh iva varman
847	yūyam mahaḥ naḥ enasaḥ	tvad mah mad enas
847	yūyam arbhāt uruṣyata	tvad arbha uruṣy
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	aditiḥ naḥ uruṣyatu	aditi mad uruṣy
847	aditiḥ śarma yacchatu	aditi śarman yam
847	mātā mitrasya revataḥ	mātṛ mitra revat
847	aryamṇaḥ varuṇasya ca	aryaman varuṇa ca
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yat devāḥ śarma śaraṇam	yad deva śarman śaraṇa
847	yat bhadram yat anāturam	yad bhadra yad anātura
847	tridhātu yat varūthyam	tri dhātu yad varūthya
847	tat asmāsu vi yantana	tad mad vi yam
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	ādityāḥ ava hi khyata	āditya ava hi khyā
847	adhi kūlāt iva spaśaḥ	adhi kūla iva spaś
847	sutīrtham arvataḥ yathā	su tīrtha arvant yathā
847	anu naḥ neṣathā sugam	anu mad nī suga
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	na iha bhadram rakṣasvine	na iha bhadra rakṣasvin
847	na avayai na upayai uta	na avayā na upayā uta
847	gave ca bhadram dhenave	go ca bhadra dhenu
847	vīrāya ca śravasyate	vīra ca śravasy
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yat āviḥ yat apīcyam	yad āvis yad apīcya
847	devāsaḥ asti duṣkṛtam	deva as duṣkṛta
847	trite tat viśvam āptye	trita tad viśva āptya
847	āre asmat dadhātana	āre mad dhā
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yat ca goṣu duṣvapnyam	yad ca go duḥṣvapnya
847	yat ca asme duhitar divaḥ	yad ca mad duhitṛ div
847	tritāya tat vibhāvari	trita tad vibhāvarī
847	āptyāya parā vaha	āptya parā vah
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	niṣkam vā ghā kṛṇavate	niṣka vā gha kṛ
847	srajam vā duhitar divaḥ	sraj vā duhitṛ div
847	trite duṣvapnyam sarvam	trita duḥṣvapnya sarva
847	āptye pari dadmasi	āptya pari dā
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	tadannāya tadapase	tad anna tad apas
847	tam bhāgam upaseduṣe	tad bhāga upasad
847	tritāya ca dvitāya ca	trita ca dvita ca
847	uṣaḥ duṣvapnyam vaha	uṣas duḥṣvapnya vah
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	yathā kalām yathā śapham	yathā kalā yathā śapha
847	yathā ṛṇam saṁnayāmasi	yathā ṛṇa saṃnī
847	evā duṣvapnyam sarvam	eva duḥṣvapnya sarva
847	āptye sam nayāmasi	āptya sam nī
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti
847	ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca	ji adya san ca
847	abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam	bhū anāgas mad
847	uṣaḥ yasmāt duṣvapnyāt	uṣas yad duḥṣvapnya
847	abhaiṣma apa tat ucchatu	bhī apa tad vas
847	anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	anehas tvad ūti
847	suūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ	su ūti tvad ūti

848	svādoḥ abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ	svādu bhaj vayas su medhas
848	svādhyaḥ varivovittarasya	svādhī varivas vittara
848	viśve yam devāḥ uta martyāsaḥ	viśva yad deva uta martya
848	madhu bruvantaḥ abhi saṁcaranti	madhu brū abhi saṃcar
848	antar ca pra agāḥ aditiḥ bhavāsi	antar ca pragā aditi bhū
848	avayātā harasaḥ daivyasya	avayātṛ haras daivya
848	indo indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ	indu indra sakhya juṣ
848	śrauṣTī iva dhuram anu rāye ṛdhyāḥ	śrauṣṭī iva dhur anu rai ṛdh
848	apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma	pā soma amṛta bhū
848	aganma jyotiḥ avidāma devān	gam jyotis vid deva
848	kim nūnam asmān kṛṇavat arātiḥ	ka nūnam mad kṛ arāti
848	kim u dhūrtiḥ amṛta martyasya	ka u dhūrti amṛta martya
848	śam naḥ bhava hṛde ā pītaḥ indo	śam mad bhū hṛd ā pā indu
848	pitā iva soma sūnave suśevaḥ	pitṛ iva soma sūnu su śeva
848	sakhā iva sakhye uruśaṁsa dhīraḥ	sakhi iva sakhi uru śaṃsa dhīra
848	pra naḥ āyuḥ jīvase soma tārīḥ	pra mad āyus jīv soma tṛ
848	ime mā pītāḥ yaśasaḥ uruṣyavaḥ	idam mad pā yaśas uruṣyu
848	ratham na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu	ratha na go sam parvan
848	te mā rakṣantu visrasaḥ caritrāt	tad mad rakṣ visraṃs caritra
848	uta mā srāmāt yavayantu indavaḥ	uta mā srāma yavay indu
848	agnim na mā mathitam sam didīpaḥ	agni na mad math sam dīp
848	pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ	pra cakṣay kṛ vasyas mad
848	athā hi te made ā soma manye	atha hi tvad mada ā soma man
848	revān iva pra carā puṣTim accha	revat iva pra car puṣṭi acchā
848	iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya	iṣira tvad manas su
848	bhakṣīmahi pitryasya iva rāyaḥ	bhakṣ pitrya iva rai
848	soma rājan pra naḥ āyūṁṣi tārīḥ	soma rājan pra mad āyus tṛ
848	ahāni iva sūryaḥ vāsarāṇi	aha iva sūrya vāsara
848	soma rājan mṛLayā naḥ svasti	soma rājan mṛḍay mad svasti
848	tava smasi vratyāḥ tasya viddhi	tvad as vratya tad vid
848	alarti dakṣaḥ uta manyuḥ indo	alar dakṣa uta manyu indu
848	mā naḥ aryaḥ anukāmam parā dāḥ	mā mad ari anukāma parā dā
848	tvam hi naḥ tanvaḥ soma gopāḥ	tvad hi mad tanū soma gopā
848	gātregātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ	gātra gātra niṣad nṛ cakṣas
848	yat te vayam pramināma vratāni	yat tvad mad pramī vrata
848	sa naḥ mṛLa suṣakhā deva vasyaḥ	tad mad mṛḍ su sakhi deva vasyas
848	ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya	ṛdūdara sakhi sac
848	yaḥ mā na riṣyet haryaśva pītaḥ	yad mad na riṣ hari aśva pā
848	ayam yaḥ somaḥ ni adhāyi asme	idam yad soma ni dhā mad
848	tasmai indram pratiram emi āyuḥ	tad indra pratṛ i āyus
848	apa tyāḥ asthuḥ anirāḥ amīvāḥ	apa tya sthā anirā amīvā
848	niḥ atrasan tamiṣīcīḥ abhaiṣuḥ	niḥ tras tamiṣīci bhī
848	ā somaḥ asmān aruhat vihāyāḥ	ā soma mad ruh vihāyas
848	aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ	gam yatra pratṛ āyus
848	yaḥ naḥ induḥ pitaraḥ hṛtsu pītaḥ	yad mad indu pitṛ hṛd pā
848	amartyaḥ martyān āviveśa	amartya martya āviś
848	tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema	tad soma havis vidh
848	mṛLīke asya sumatau syāma	mṛḍīka idam sumati as
848	tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ saṁvidānaḥ	tvad soma pitṛ saṃvid
848	anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha	anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tan
848	tasmai te indo haviṣā vidhema	tad tvad indu havis vidh
848	vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām	mad as pati rayi
848	trātāraḥ devāḥ adhi vocatā naḥ	trātṛ deva adhi vac mad
848	mā naḥ nidrā īśata mā uta jalpiḥ	mā mad nidrā īś mā uta jalpi
848	vayam somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ	mad soma viśvaha priya
848	suvīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema	su vīra vidatha ā vad
848	tvam naḥ soma viśvataḥ vayodhāḥ	tvad mad soma viśvatas vayas dhā
848	tvam svarvit ā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ	tvad svar vid ā viś nṛ cakṣas
848	tvam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	tvad mad indu ūti sajoṣas
848	pāhi paścātāt uta vā purastāt	pā paścātāt uta vā purastāt
 ---
849	abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam	abhi pra tvad su rādhas
849	indram arca yathā vide	indra arc yathā vid
849	yaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ	yad jaritṛ maghavan purūvasu
849	sahasreṇa iva śikṣati	sahasra iva śikṣ
849	śatānīkā iva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā	śata anīka iva pra gā dhṛṣṇuyā
849	hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe	han vṛtra dāś
849	gireḥ iva pra rasāḥ asya pinvire	giri iva pra rasa idam pyā
849	datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ	dattra puru bhojas
849	ā tvā sutāsaḥ indavaḥ	ā tvad su indu
849	madāḥ ye indra girvaṇaḥ	mada yad indra girvaṇas
849	āpaḥ na vajrin anu okyam saraḥ	ap na vajrin anu okya saras
849	pṛṇanti śūra rādhase	pṛṇ śūra rādhas
849	anehasam prataraṇam vivakṣaṇam	anehas prataraṇa vivakṣaṇa
849	madhvaḥ svādiṣTham īm piba	madhu svādiṣṭha īṃ pā
849	ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ	ā yathā mand kṛ mad
849	pra kṣudrā iva tmanā dhṛṣat	pra kṣudra iva tman dhṛṣ
849	ā naḥ stomam upa dravat	ā mad stoma upa dru
849	hiyānaḥ aśvaḥ na sotṛbhiḥ	hi aśva na sotṛ
849	yam te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenavaḥ	yad tvad svadhāvat svaday dhenu
849	indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ	indra kaṇva rāti
849	ugram na vīram namasā upa sedima	ugra na vīra namas upa sad
849	vibhūtim akṣitāvasum	vibhūti akṣitāvasu
849	udrī iva vajrin avataḥ na siñcate	udrin iva vajrin avata na sic
849	kṣaranti indra dhītayaḥ	kṣar indra dhīti
849	yat ha nūnam yat vā yajñe	yat ha nūnam yat vā yajña
849	yat vā pṛthivyām adhi	yat vā pṛthivī adhi
849	ataḥ naḥ yajñam āśubhiḥ mahemate	atas mad yajña āśu mahemati
849	ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ ā gahi	ugra ugra ā gam
849	ajirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te āśavaḥ	ajira hari yad tvad āśu
849	vātāḥ iva prasakṣiṇaḥ	vāta iva prasakṣin
849	yebhiḥ apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase	yad apatya manus parī
849	yebhiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe	yad viśva svar dṛś
849	etāvataḥ te īmahe	etāvat tvad ī
849	indra sumnasya gomataḥ	indra sumna gomat
849	yathā pra āvaḥ maghavan medhyātithim	yathā prāv maghavan medhyātithi
849	yathā nīpātithim dhane	yathā nīpātithi dhana
849	yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi	yathā kaṇva maghavan trasadasyu
849	yathā pakthe daśavraje	yathā paktha daśavraja
849	yathā gośarye asanoḥ ṛjiśvani	yathā gośarya san ṛjiśvan
849	indra gomat hiraṇyavat	indra gomat hiraṇyavat
 ---
850	pra su śrutam surādhasam	pra su śru su rādhas
850	arcā śakram abhiṣTaye	arc śakra abhiṣṭi
850	yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyam vasu	yad su stu kāmya vasu
850	sahasreṇa iva maṁhate	sahasra iva mah
850	śatānīkāḥ hetayaḥ asya duṣTarāḥ	śata anīka heti idam duṣṭara
850	indrasya samiṣaḥ mahīḥ	indra samiṣ mahi
850	giriḥ na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate	giri na bhujman maghavan pinv
850	yat īm sutāḥ amandiṣuḥ	yat īṃ su mad
850	yat īm sutāsaḥ indavaḥ	yat īṃ su indu
850	abhi priyam amandiṣuḥ	abhi priya mad
850	āpaḥ na dhāyi savanam me ā vaso	ap na dhā savana mad ā vasu
850	dughāḥ iva upa dāśuṣe	dughā iva upa dāś
850	anehasam vaḥ havamānam ūtaye	anehas tvad hvā ūti
850	madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ	madhu kṣar dhīti
850	ā tvā vaso havamānāsaḥ indavaḥ	ā tvad vasu hvā indu
850	upa stotreṣu dadhire	upa stotra dhā
850	ā naḥ some svadhvare	ā mad soma su adhvara
850	iyānaḥ atyaḥ na tośate	ī atya na tuś
850	yam te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ	yad tvad svadāvan svad gūrti
850	paure chandayase havam	paura chanday hava
850	pra vīram ugram vivicim dhanaspṛtam	pra vīra ugra vivici dhana spṛt
850	vibhūtim rādhasaḥ mahaḥ	vibhūti rādhas mah
850	udrī iva vajrin avataḥ vasutvanā	udrin iva vajrin avata vasutvana
850	sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe	sadā pyā dāś
850	yat ha nūnam parāvati	yat ha nūnam parāvat
850	yat vā pṛthivyām divi	yat vā pṛthivī div
850	yujānaḥ indra haribhiḥ mahemate	yuj indra hari mahemati
850	ṛṣvaḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi	ṛṣva ṛṣva ā gam
850	rathirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te asridhaḥ	rathira hari yad tvad asridh
850	ojaḥ vātasya piprati	ojas vāta pṛ
850	yebhiḥ ni dasyum manuṣaḥ nighoṣayaḥ	yad ni dasyu manus nighoṣay
850	yebhiḥ svar parīyase	yad svar parī
850	etāvataḥ te vaso	etāvat tvad vasu
850	vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ	vid śūra navyas
850	yathā pra āvaḥ etaśam kṛtvye dhane	yathā prāv etaśa kṛtvya dhana
850	yathā vaśam daśavraje	yathā vaśa daśavraja
850	yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare	yathā kaṇva maghavan medha adhvara
850	dīrghanīthe damūnasi	dīrghanītha damūnas
850	yathā gośarye asiṣāsaḥ adrivaḥ	yathā gośarya siṣās adrivat
850	mayi gotram hariśriyam	mad gotra hari śrī
 ---
851	yathā manau sāṁvaraṇau	yathā manu sāṃvaraṇi
851	somam indra apibaḥ sutam	soma indra pā su
851	nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau	nīpātithi maghavan medhyātithi
851	puṣTigau śruṣTigau sacā	puṣṭigu śruṣṭigu sacā
851	pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvam sam asādayat	pārṣadvāṇa praskaṇva sam sāday
851	śayānam jivrim uddhitam	śī jivri uddhā
851	sahasrāṇi asiṣāsat gavām ṛṣiḥ	sahasra siṣās go ṛṣi
851	tvotaḥ dasyave vṛkaḥ	tvota dasyu vṛka
851	yaḥ ukthebhiḥ na vindhate	yad uktha na vidh
851	cikit yaḥ ṛṣicodanaḥ	cikit yad ṛṣi codana
851	indram tam acchā vada navyasyā matī	indra tad acchā vad navyas mati
851	ariṣyantam na bhojase	a riṣ na bhuj
851	yasmai arkam saptaśīrṣāṇam ānṛcuḥ	yad arka saptan śīrṣan arc
851	tridhātum uttame pade	tri dhātu uttama pada
851	sa tu imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradat	tad tu idam viśva bhuvana krand
851	āt it janiṣTa pauṁsyam	āt id jan pauṃsya
851	yaḥ naḥ dātā vasūnām	yad mad dā vasu
851	indram tam hūmahe vayam	indra tad hvā mad
851	vidmā hi asya sumatim navīyasīm	vid hi idam sumati navīyas
851	gamema gomati vraje	gam gomat vraja
851	yasmai tvam vaso dānāya śikṣasi	yad tvad vasu dāna śikṣ
851	sa rāyaḥ poṣam aśnute	tad rai poṣa aś
851	tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ	tad tvad mad maghavan indra girvaṇas
851	sutāvantaḥ havāmahe	sutāvat hvā
851	kadā cana starīḥ asi	kadācana starī as
851	na indra saścasi dāśuṣe	na indra sac dāś
851	upopa it nu maghavan bhūyaḥ it nu te	upa upa id nu maghavan bhūyas id nu tvad
851	dānam devasya pṛcyate	dāna deva pṛc
851	pra yaḥ nanakṣe abhi ojasā krivim	pra yad nakṣ abhi ojas krivi
851	vadhaiḥ śuṣṇam nighoṣayan	vadha śuṣṇa nighoṣay
851	yadā it astambhīt prathayan amūm divam	yadā id stambh prathay adas div
851	āt it janiṣTa pārthivaḥ	āt id jan pārthiva
851	yasya ayam viśvaḥ āryaḥ	yad idam viśva ārya
851	dāsaḥ śevadhipāḥ ariḥ	dāsa śevadhi pā ari
851	tiraḥ cit arye ruśame parīravi	tiras cit arya ruśama tvad
851	tubhya it saḥ ajyate rayiḥ	tvad id tad añj rayi
851	turaṇyavaḥ madhumantam ghṛtaścutam	turaṇyu madhumat ghṛtaścut
851	viprāsaḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ	vipra arka arc
851	asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ	mad rayi prath vṛṣṇya śavas
851	asme suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ	mad su indu
 ---
852	yathā manau vivasvati	yathā manu vivasvant
852	somam śakra apibaḥ sutam	soma śakra pā su
852	yathā trite chandaḥ indra jujoṣasi	yathā trita chanda indra juṣ
852	āyau mādayase sacā	āyu māday sacā
852	pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvani	pṛṣadhra medhya mātariśvan
852	indra suvāne amandathāḥ	indra su mand
852	yathā somam daśaśipre daśoṇye	yathā soma daśaśipra daśoṇya
852	syūmaraśmau ṛjūnasi	syūmaraśmi ṛjūnas
852	yaḥ ukthā kevalā dadhe	yad uktha kevala dhā
852	yaḥ somam dhṛṣatā* apibat	yad soma dhṛṣ pā
852	yasmai viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā vicakrame	yad viṣṇu tri pada vikram
852	upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ	upa mitra dharma
852	yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākanaḥ	yad tvad indra stoma kan
852	vāje vājin śatakrato	vāja vājin śatakratu
852	tam tvā vayam sudughām iva goduhaḥ	tad tvad mad sudughā iva go duh
852	juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ	hvā śravasyu
852	yaḥ naḥ dātā sa naḥ pitā	yad mad dā tad mad pitṛ
852	mahān ugraḥ īśānakṛt	mahat ugra īś kṛt
852	ayāman ugraḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ	a yāman ugra maghavan purūvasu
852	goḥ aśvasya pra dātu naḥ	go aśva pra dā mad
852	yasmai tvam vaso dānāya maṁhase	yad tvad vasu dāna mah
852	sa rāyaḥ poṣam invati	tad rai poṣa inv
852	vasūyavaḥ vasupatim śatakratum	vasūyu vasu pati śatakratu
852	stomaiḥ indram havāmahe	stoma indra hvā
852	kadā cana pra yucchasi	kadācana pra yu
852	ubhe ni pāsi janmanī	ubh ni pā janman
852	turīya āditya havanam te indriyam	turīya āditya havana tvad indriya
852	ā tasthau amṛtam divi	ā sthā amṛta div
852	yasmai tvam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ	yad tvad maghavan indra girvaṇas
852	śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe	śikṣu śikṣ dāś
852	asmākam giraḥ uta suṣTutim vaso	mad gir uta suṣṭuti vasu
852	kaṇvavat śṛṇudhī havam	kaṇva vat śru hava
852	astāvi manma pūrvyam	stu manman pūrvya
852	brahma indrāya vocata	brahman indra vac
852	pūrvīḥ ṛtasya bṛhatīḥ anūṣata	puru ṛta bṛhat nū
852	stotuḥ medhāḥ asṛkṣata	stotṛ medhā sṛj
852	sam indraḥ rāyaḥ bṛhatīḥ adhūnuta	sam indra rai bṛhat dhū
852	sam kṣoṇī sam u sūryam	sam kṣoṇī sam u sūrya
852	sam śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ sam gavāśiraḥ	sam śukra śuci sam gavāśir
852	somāḥ indram amandiṣuḥ	soma indra mad
 ---
853	upamam tvā maghonām	upama tvad maghavan
853	jyeṣTham ca vṛṣabhāṇām	jyeṣṭha ca vṛṣabha
853	pūrbhittamam maghavan indra govidam	pūrbhittama maghavan indra go vid
853	īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe	īś rai ī
853	yaḥ āyum kutsam atithigvam ardayaḥ	yad āyu kutsa atithigva arday
853	vāvṛdhānaḥ divedive	vṛdh diva diva
853	tam tvā vayam haryaśvam śatakratum	tad tvad mad haryaśva śatakratu
853	vājayantaḥ havāmahe	vājay hvā
853	ā naḥ viśveṣām rasam	ā mad viśva rasa
853	madhvaḥ siñcantu adrayaḥ	madhu sic adri
853	ye parāvati sunvire janeṣu ā	yad parāvat su jana ā
853	ye arvāvati indavaḥ	yad arvāvat indu
853	viśvā dveṣāṁsi jahi ca ava ca ā kṛdhi	viśva dveṣas han ca ava ca kṛ
853	viśve sanvantu ā vasu	viśva san ā vasu
853	śīṣTeṣu cit te madirāsaḥ aṁśavaḥ	śīṣṭa cit tvad madira aṃśu
853	yatrā somasya tṛmpasi	yatra soma tṛp
853	indra nedīyaḥ ā it ihi	indra nedīyas ā id i
853	mitamedhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	mā medhā ūti
853	ā śaṁtama śaṁtamābhiḥ abhiṣTibhiḥ	ā śaṃtama śaṃtama abhiṣṭi
853	ā svāpe svāpibhiḥ	ā su āpi su āpi
853	ājituram satpatim viśvacarṣaṇim	ājitur satpati viśvacarṣaṇi
853	kṛdhi prajāsu ābhagam	kṛ prajā ābhaga
853	pra sū tirā śacībhiḥ ye te ukthinaḥ	pra su tṛ śacī yad tvad ukthin
853	kratum punate ānuṣak	kratu pū ānuṣak
853	yaḥ te sādhiṣThaḥ avase	yad tvad sādhiṣṭha avas
853	te syāma bhareṣu te	tad as bhara tvad
853	vayam hotrābhiḥ uta devahūtibhiḥ	mad hotrā uta deva hūti
853	sasavāṁsaḥ manāmahe	san man
853	aham hi te harivaḥ brahma vājayuḥ	mad hi tvad harivat brahman vājayu
853	ājim yāmi sadā ūtibhiḥ	āji yā sadā ūti
853	tvām it eva tam ame sam aśvayuḥ	tvad id eva tad ama sam aśvayu
853	gavyuḥ agre mathīnām	gavyu agra mati
 ---
854	etat te indra vīryam	etad tvad indra vīrya
854	gīrbhiḥ gṛṇanti kāravaḥ	gir gṛ kāru
854	te stobhantaḥ ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam	tad stubh ūrj av ghṛtaścut
854	paurāsaḥ nakṣan dhītibhiḥ	paura nakṣ dhīti
854	nakṣante indram avase sukṛtyayā	nakṣ indra av su kṛtyā
854	yeṣām suteṣu mandase	yad su mand
854	yathā saṁvarte amadaḥ yathā kṛśe	yathā saṃvarta mad yathā kṛśa
854	eva asme indra matsva	eva mad indra mad
854	ā naḥ viśve sajoṣasaḥ	ā mad viśva sajoṣas
854	devāsaḥ gantana upa naḥ	deva gam upa mad
854	vasavaḥ rudrāḥ avase naḥ ā gaman	vasu rudra av mad ā gam
854	śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam	śru marut hava
854	pūṣā viṣṇuḥ havanam me sarasvatī	pūṣan viṣṇu havana mad sarasvatī
854	avantu sapta sindhavaḥ	av saptan sindhu
854	āpaḥ vātaḥ parvatāsaḥ vanaspatiḥ	ap vāta parvata vanaspati
854	śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam	śru pṛthivī hava
854	yat indra rādhaḥ asti te	yad indra rādhas as tvad
854	māghonam maghavattama	māghona maghavattama
854	tena naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe	tad mad bhū sadhamādya vṛdh
854	bhagaḥ dānāya vṛtrahan	bhaga dāna vṛtrahan
854	ājipate nṛpate tvam it hi naḥ	āji pati nṛpati tvad id hi mad
854	vāje ā vakṣi sukrato	vāja ā vah sukratu
854	vītī hotrābhiḥ uta devavītibhiḥ	vīti hotrā uta deva vīti
854	sasavāṁsaḥ vi śṛṇvire	san vi śru
854	santi hi arye āśiṣaḥ	as hi ari āśis
854	indre āyuḥ janānām	indra āyus jana
854	asmān nakṣasva maghavan upa avase	mad nakṣ maghavan upāv
854	dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam	duh pyā iṣ
854	vayam te indra stomebhiḥ vidhema	mad tvad indra stoma vidh
854	tvam asmākam śatakrato	tvad mad śatakratu
854	mahi sthūram śaśayam rādhaḥ ahrayam	mahi sthūra śaśaya rādhas ahraya
854	praskaṇvāya ni tośaya	praskaṇva ni tośay
 ---
855	bhūri it indrasya vīryam	bhūri id indra vīrya
855	vi akhyam abhi ā ayati	vi khyā abhi e
855	rādhaḥ te dasyave vṛka	rādhas tvad dasyu vṛka
855	śatam śvetāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ	śata śveta ukṣan
855	divi tāraḥ na rocante	div tṛ na ruc
855	mahnā divam na tastabhuḥ	mahan div na stambh
855	śatam veṇūn śatam śunaḥ	śata veṇu śata śvan
855	śatam carmāṇi mlātāni	śata carman mlā
855	śatam me balbajastukāḥ	śata mad balbaja stukā
855	aruṣīṇām catuḥśatam	aruṣa catur śata
855	sudevāḥ stha kāṇvāyanāḥ	su deva as kāṇvāyana
855	vayovayaḥ vicarantaḥ	vayas vayas vicar
855	aśvāsaḥ na caṅkramata	aśva na caṅkram
855	āt it sāptasya carkiran	āt id sāpta carkar
855	ā anūnasya mahi śravaḥ	anūna mahi śravas
855	śyāvīḥ atidhvasan pathaḥ	śyāva atidhvaṃs pathin
855	cakṣuṣā cana saṁnaśe	cakṣus cana saṃnaś
 ---
856	prati te dasyave vṛka	prati tvad dasyu vṛka
856	rādhaḥ adarśi ahrayam	rādhas dṛś ahraya
856	dyauḥ na prathinā śavaḥ	div na prathiman śavas
856	daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ	daśan mad pautakrata
856	sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ	sahasra dasyu vṛka
856	nityāt rāyaḥ amaṁhata	nitya rai mah
856	śatam me gardabhānām	śata mad gardabha
856	śatam ūrṇāvatīnām	śata ūrṇāvatī
856	śatam dāsān ati srajaḥ	śata dāsa ati sraj
856	tatra u api pra anīyata	tatra u api praṇī
856	pūtakratāyai vyaktā	pūtakratā vyañj
856	aśvānām it na yūthyām	aśva id na yūthyā
856	aceti agniḥ cikituḥ	cit agni cikitu
856	havyavāT sa sumadrathaḥ	havyavah tad sumat ratha
856	agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā	agni śukra śocis
856	bṛhat sūraḥ arocata	bṛhat sūra ruc
856	divi sūryaḥ arocata	div sūrya ruc
 ---
857	yuvam devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa	tvad deva kratu pūrvya
857	yuktā rathena taviṣam yajatrā	yuj ratha taviṣa yajatra
857	ā agacchatam nāsatyā śacībhiḥ	āgam nāsatya śacī
857	idam tṛtīyam savanam pibāthaḥ	idam tṛtīya savana pā
857	yuvām devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ	tvad deva tri ekādaśa
857	satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt	satya satya dṛś purastāt
857	asmākam yajñam savanam juṣāṇā	mad yajña savana juṣ
857	pātam somam aśvinā dīdyagnī	pā soma aśvin dīdi agni
857	panāyyam tat aśvinā kṛtam vām	panāyya tad aśvin kṛ tvad
857	vṛṣabhaḥ divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	vṛṣabha div rajas pṛthivī
857	sahasram śaṁsāḥ uta ye gaviṣTau	sahasra śaṃsa uta yad gaviṣṭi
857	sarvān it tān upa yātā pibadhyai	sarva id tad upa yā pā
857	ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yajatrā	idam tvad bhāga nidhā yajatra
857	imāḥ giraḥ nāsatyā upa yātam	idam gir nāsatya upa yā
857	pibatam somam madhumantam asme	pā soma madhumat mad
857	pra dāśvāṁsam avatam śacībhiḥ	pra dāś av śacī
 ---
858	yam ṛtvijaḥ bahudhā kalpayantaḥ	yad ṛtvij bahudhā kalpay
858	sacetasaḥ yajñam imam vahanti	sacetas yajña idam vah
858	yaḥ anūcānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt	yad anuvac brāhmaṇa yuj as
858	kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṁvit	ka svid tatra yaj saṃvid
858	ekaḥ eva agniḥ bahudhā samiddhaḥ	eka eva agni bahudhā samindh
858	ekaḥ sūryaḥ viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ	eka sūrya viśva anu prabhū
858	ekā eva uṣāḥ sarvam idam vi bhāti	eka eva uṣas sarva idam vi bhā
858	ekam vai idam vi babhūva sarvam	eka vai idam vi bhū sarva
858	jyotiṣmantam ketumantam tricakram	jyotiṣmant ketumat tri cakra
858	sukham ratham suṣadam bhūrivāram	sukha ratha suṣad bhūri vāra
858	citrāmaghā yasya yoge adhijajñe	citrāmagha yad yoga adhijan
858	tam vām huve atiriktam pibadhyai	tad tvad hvā ati ric pā
 ---
859	imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrate	idam tvad bhāgadheya sṛ
859	indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām	indrāvaruṇa pra mah suta tvad
859	yajñeyajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyathaḥ	yajña yajña ha savana bhuraṇy
859	yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ	yat su yaj śikṣ
859	niṣṣidhvarīḥ oṣadhīḥ āpaḥ āstām	niṣṣidhvan oṣadhī ap as
859	indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata	indrāvaruṇa mahiman aś
859	yā sisratuḥ rajasaḥ pāre adhvanaḥ	yad sṛ rajas pāra adhvan
859	yayoḥ śatruḥ nakiḥ ādevaḥ ohate	yad śatru nakir ādeva ūh
859	satyam tat indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām	satya tad indrāvaruṇa kṛśa tvad
859	madhvaḥ ūrmim duhate sapta vāṇīḥ	madhu ūrmi duh saptan vāṇī
859	tābhiḥ dāśvāṁsam avatam śubhaḥ patī	tad dāś av śubh pati
859	yaḥ vām adabdhaḥ abhi pāti cittibhiḥ	yad tvad adabdha abhipā citti
859	ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyāḥ jīradānavaḥ	ghṛta pruṣ saumya jīra dānu
859	sapta svasāraḥ sadane ṛtasya	saptan svasṛ sadana ṛta
859	yāḥ ha vām indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutaḥ	yad ha tvad indrāvaruṇa ghṛtaścut
859	tābhiḥ dhattam yajamānāya śikṣatam	tad dhā yaj śikṣ
859	avocāma mahate saubhagāya	vac mahat saubhaga
859	satyam tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam	satya tveṣa mahiman indriya
859	asmān su indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutaḥ	mad su indrāvaruṇa ghṛtaścut
859	tribhiḥ sāptebhiḥ avatam śubhaḥ patī	tri sāpta av śubh pati
859	indrāvaruṇā yat ṛṣibhyaḥ manīṣām	indrāvaruṇa yat ṛṣi manīṣā
859	vācaḥ matim śrutam adattam agre	vāc mati śruta dā agra
859	yāni sthānāni asṛjanta dhīrāḥ	yad sthāna sṛj dhīra
859	yajñam tanvānāḥ tapasā abhi apaśyam	yajña tan tapas abhi paś
859	indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptam	indrāvaruṇa saumanasa a dṛp
859	rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhattam	rai poṣa yaj dhā
859	prajām puṣTim bhūtim asmāsu dhattam	prajā puṣṭi bhūti mad dhā
859	dīrghāyutvāya pra tiratam naḥ āyuḥ	dīrgha āyu tva pra tṛ mad āyus
 ---
860	agne ā yāhi agnibhiḥ	agni ā yā agni
860	hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe	hotṛ tvad vṛ
860	ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī	ā tvad añj prayam haviṣmat
860	yajiṣTham barhiḥ āsade	yajiṣṭha barhis āsad
860	acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ	acchā hi tvad sahas sūnu aṅgiras
860	srucaḥ caranti adhvare	sruc car adhvara
860	ūrjaḥ napātam ghṛtakeśam īmahe	ūrj napāt ghṛta keśa ī
860	agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam	agni yajña pūrvya
860	agne kaviḥ vedhāḥ asi	agni kavi vedhas as
860	hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ	hotṛ pāvaka yakṣya
860	mandraḥ yajiṣThaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ	mandra yajiṣṭha adhvara īḍ
860	viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ	vipra śukra manman
860	adrogham ā vaha uśataḥ yaviṣThya	adrogha ā vah vaś yaviṣṭhya
860	devān ajasra vītaye	deva ajasra vī
860	abhi prayāṁsi sudhitā ā vaso gahi	abhi prayas sudhita vasu gam
860	mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ	mand dhīti hi
860	tvam it saprathāḥ asi	tvad id saprathas as
860	agne trātar ṛtaḥ kaviḥ	agni trātṛ kavi
860	tvām viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdivaḥ	tvad vipra samindh dīdī
860	ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ	ā vivās vedhas
860	śocā śociṣTha dīdihi viśe mayaḥ	śuc śociṣṭha dīdī viś mayas
860	rāsva stotre mahān asi	rā stotṛ mahat as
860	devānām śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ	deva śarman mad as sūri
860	śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ	śatrūṣah su agni
860	yathā cit vṛddham atasam	yathā cit vṛdh atasa
860	agne saṁjūrvasi kṣami	agni saṃjūrv kṣam
860	evā daha mitramahaḥ yaḥ asmadhruk	eva dah mitra mahat yad asmadruh
860	durmanmā kaḥ ca venati	durmanman ka ca ven
860	mā naḥ martāya ripave rakṣasvine	mā mad marta ripu rakṣasvin
860	mā aghaśaṁsāya rīradhaḥ	mā agha śaṃsa radh
860	asredhadbhiḥ taraṇibhiḥ yaviṣThya	a sridh taraṇi yaviṣṭhya
860	śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ	śiva pā pāyu
860	pāhi naḥ agne ekayā	pā mad agni eka
860	pāhi uta dvitīyayā	pā uta dvitīya
860	pāhi gīrbhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ūrjām pate	pā gir tri ūrj pati
860	pāhi catasṛbhiḥ vaso	pā catur vasu
860	pāhi viśvasmāt rakṣasaḥ arāvṇaḥ	pā viśva rakṣas arāvan
860	pra sma vājeṣu naḥ ava	pra sma vāja mad av
860	tvām it hi nediṣTham devatātaye	tvad id hi nediṣṭha devatāti
860	āpim nakṣāmahe vṛdhe	āpi nakṣ vṛdh
860	ā naḥ agne vayovṛdham	ā mad agni vayas vṛdh
860	rayim pāvaka śaṁsyam	rayi pāvaka śaṃs
860	rāsvā ca naḥ upamāte puruspṛham	rā ca mad upamāti puruspṛh
860	sunītī svayaśastaram	su nīti sva yaśastara
860	yena vaṁsāma pṛtanāsu śardhataḥ	yad van pṛtanā śṛdh
860	tarantaḥ aryaḥ ādiśaḥ	tṛ ari ādiś
860	sa tvam naḥ vardha prayasā śacīvaso	tad tvad mad vṛdh prayas śacī vasu
860	jinvā dhiyaḥ vasuvidaḥ	jinv dhī vasu vid
860	śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yathā	śā vṛṣabha yathā
860	agniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat	agni śṛṅga dodhu
860	tigmāḥ asya hanavaḥ na pratidhṛṣe	tigma idam hanu na pratidhṛṣ
860	sujambhaḥ sahasaḥ yahuḥ	su jambha sahas yahu
860	nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe	nahi tvad agni vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣ
860	jambhāsaḥ yat vitiṣThase	jambha yat viṣṭhā
860	sa tvam naḥ hotar suhutam haviḥ kṛdhi	tad tvad mad hotṛ su hu havis kṛ
860	vaṁsvā naḥ vāryā puru	van mad vārya puru
860	śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ	śī vana mātṛ
860	sam tvā martāsaḥ indhate	sam tvad marta indh
860	atandraḥ havyā vahasi haviṣkṛtaḥ	atandra havya vah haviṣkṛt
860	āt it deveṣu rājasi	āt id deva rāj
860	sapta hotāraḥ tam it īLate tvā	saptan hotṛ tad id īḍ tvad
860	agne sutyajam ahrayam	agni su tyaj ahraya
860	bhinatsi adrim tapasā vi śociṣā	bhid adri tapas vi śocis
860	pra agne tiṣTha janān ati	pra agni sthā jana ati
860	agnimagnim vaḥ adhrigum	agni agni tvad adhrigu
860	huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	hu vṛj barhis
860	agnim hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣu ā	agni dhā prayas śaśvat ā
860	hotāram carṣaṇīnām	hotṛ carṣaṇi
860	ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇi	keta śarman sac suṣāman
860	agne tubhyam cikitvanā	agni tvad cikitvan
860	iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpam ā bhara	iṣaṇyā mad puru rūpa ā bhṛ
860	vājam nediṣTham ūtaye	vāja nediṣṭha ūti
860	agne jaritar viśpatiḥ	agni jaritṛ viśpati
860	tepānaḥ deva rakṣasaḥ	tap deva rakṣas
860	aproṣivān gṛhapatiḥ mahān asi	a pravas gṛhapati mahat as
860	divaḥ pāyuḥ duroṇayuḥ	div pāyu duroṇayu
860	mā naḥ rakṣaḥ ā veśīt āghṛṇīvaso	mā mad rakṣas ā viś āghṛṇīvasu
860	mā yātuḥ yātumāvatām	mā yātu yātumāvat
860	parogavyūti anirām apa kṣudham	parogavyūti anirā apa kṣudh
860	agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ	agni sidh rakṣasvin
 ---
861	ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ	ubhaya śru ca mad
861	indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ	indra arvāk idam vacas
861	satrācyā maghavā somapītaye	satrāc maghavan soma pīti
861	dhiyā śaviṣThaḥ ā gamat	dhī śaviṣṭha ā gam
861	tam hi svarājam vṛṣabham tam ojase	tad hi sva rāj vṛṣabha tad ojas
861	dhiṣaṇe niṣTatakṣatuḥ	dhiṣaṇā nistakṣ
861	uta upamānām prathamaḥ ni sīdasi	uta upama prathama ni sad
861	somakāmam hi te manaḥ	soma kāma hi tvad manas
861	ā vṛṣasva purūvaso	ā vṛṣ purūvasu
861	sutasya indra andhasaḥ	su indra andhas
861	vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahim	vid hi tvad harivat pṛt sāsahi
861	adhṛṣTam cit dadhṛṣvaṇim	adhṛṣṭa cit dadhṛṣvaṇi
861	aprāmisatya maghavan tathā it asat	aprāmi satya maghavan tathā id as
861	indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ	indra kratu yathā vaś
861	sanema vājam tava śiprin avasā	san vāja tvad śiprin avas
861	makṣū cit yantaḥ adrivaḥ	makṣū cit i adrivat
861	śagdhi ū su śacīpate	śak u su śacīpati
861	indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	indra viśva ūti
861	bhagam na hi tvā yaśasam vasuvidam	bhaga na hi tvad yaśas vasu vid
861	anu śūra carāmasi	anu śūra car
861	pauraḥ aśvasya purukṛt gavām asi	paura aśva puru kṛt go as
861	utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ	utsa deva hiraṇyaya
861	nakiḥ hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve	nakir hi dāna parimṛdh tvad
861	yadyat yāmi tat ā bhara	yad yad yā tad ā bhṛ
861	tvam hi ā ihi cerave	tvad hi e ceru
861	vidāḥ bhagam vasuttaye	vid bhaga vasutti
861	ut vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣTaye	ud vṛṣ maghavan gaviṣṭi
861	ut indra aśvamiṣTaye	ud indra aśvamiṣṭi
861	tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca	tvad puru sahasra śata ca
861	yūthā dānāya maṁhase	yūtha dāna mah
861	ā puraṁdaram cakṛma vipravacasaḥ	ā puraṃdara kṛ vipra vacas
861	indram gāyantaḥ avase	indra gā av
861	avipraḥ vā yat avidhat	a vipra vā yat vidh
861	vipraḥ vā indra te vacaḥ	vipra vā indra tvad vacas
861	sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato	tad pra mand tvāyā śatakratu
861	prācāmanyo ahaṁsana	prācāmanyu ahaṃsana
861	ugrabāhuḥ mrakṣakṛtvā puraṁdaraḥ	ugra bāhu mrakṣa kṛtvan puraṃdara
861	yadi me śṛṇavat havam	yadi mad śru hava
861	vasūyavaḥ vasupatim śatakratum	vasūyu vasu pati śatakratu
861	stomaiḥ indram havāmahe	stoma indra hvā
861	na pāpāsaḥ manāmahe	na pāpa man
861	na arāyāsaḥ na jaLhavaḥ	na arāya na jaḍhu
861	yat it nu indram vṛṣaṇam sacā sute	yat id nu indra vṛṣan sacā suta
861	sakhāyam kṛṇavāmahai	sakhi kṛ
861	ugram yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim	ugra yuj pṛtanā sāsahi
861	ṛṇakātim adābhyam	ṛṇakāti adābhya
861	vedā bhṛmam cit sanitā rathītamaḥ	vid bhṛma cit sanitṛ rathītama
861	vājinam yam it ū naśat	vājin yad id u naś
861	yataḥ indra bhayāmahe	yatas indra bhī
861	tataḥ naḥ abhayam kṛdhi	tatas mad abhaya kṛ
861	maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ ūtibhiḥ	maghavan śak tvad tad mad ūti
861	vi dviṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi	vi dviṣ vi mṛdh han
861	tvam hi rādhaspate rādhasaḥ mahaḥ	tvad hi rādhaspati rādhas mah
861	kṣayasya asi vidhataḥ	kṣaya as vidh
861	tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ	tad tvad mad maghavan indra girvaṇas
861	sutāvantaḥ havāmahe	sutāvat hvā
861	indraḥ spaT uta vṛtrahā	indra spaś uta vṛtrahan
861	paraspāḥ naḥ vareṇyaḥ	paraspā mad vareṇya
861	sa naḥ rakṣiṣat caramam sa madhyamam	tad mad rakṣ carama tad madhyama
861	sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ	tad paścāt pā mad puras
861	tvam naḥ paścāt adharāt uttarāt puraḥ	tvad mad paścāt adharāt uttarāt puras
861	indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ	indra ni pā viśvatas
861	āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam	āre mad kṛ daivya bhaya
861	āre hetīḥ adevīḥ	āre heti adeva
861	adyādyā śvaḥśvaḥ	adya adya śvas śvas
861	indra trāsva pare ca naḥ	indra trā para ca mad
861	viśvā ca naḥ jaritṛṛn satpate ahā	viśva ca mad jaritṛ satpati aha
861	divā naktam ca rakṣiṣaḥ	divā nakta ca rakṣ
861	prabhaṅgī śūraḥ maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ	prabhaṅgin śūra maghavan tuvīmagha
861	sammiślaḥ vīryāya kam	sammiśla vīrya kaṃ
861	ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato	ubh tvad bāhu vṛṣan śatakratu
861	ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ	ni yad vajra mikṣ
 ---
862	pra u asmai upastutim	pra u idam upastuti
862	bharatā yat jujoṣati	bhṛ yad juṣ
862	ukthaiḥ indrasya māhinam	uktha indra māhina
862	vayaḥ vardhanti sominaḥ	vayas vṛdh somin
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	ayujaḥ asamaḥ nṛbhiḥ	ayuja asama nṛ
862	ekaḥ kṛṣTīḥ ayāsyaḥ	eka kṛṣṭi ayāsya
862	pūrvīḥ ati pra vāvṛdhe	puru ati pra vṛdh
862	viśvā jātāni ojasā	viśva jāta ojas
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	ahitena cit arvatā	a hi cit arvant
862	jīradānuḥ siṣāsati	jīra dānu siṣās
862	pravācyam indra tat tava	pravac indra tad tvad
862	vīryāṇi kariṣyataḥ	vīrya kṛ
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	ā yāhi kṛṇavāma te	ā yā kṛ tvad
862	indra brahmāṇi vardhanā	indra brahman vardhana
862	yebhiḥ śaviṣTha cākanaḥ	yad śaviṣṭha kan
862	bhadram iha śravasyate	bhadra iha śravasy
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	dhṛṣataḥ cit dhṛṣat manaḥ	dhṛṣ cit dhṛṣ manas
862	kṛṇoṣi indra yat tvam	kṛ indra yat tvad
862	tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyataḥ	tīvra soma sapary
862	namobhiḥ pratibhūṣataḥ	namas pratibhūṣ
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	ava caṣTe ṛcīṣamaḥ	ava cakṣ ṛcīṣama
862	avatān iva mānuṣaḥ	avata iva mānuṣa
862	juṣTvī dakṣasya sominaḥ	juṣ dakṣa somin
862	sakhāyam kṛṇute yujam	sakhi kṛ yuj
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	viśve te indra vīryam	viśva tvad indra vīrya
862	devāḥ anu kratum daduḥ	deva anu kratu dā
862	bhuvaḥ viśvasya gopatiḥ	bhū viśva gopati
862	puruṣTuta	puruṣṭuta
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	gṛṇe tat indra te śavaḥ	gṛ tad indra tvad śavas
862	upamam devatātaye	upama devatāti
862	yat haṁsi vṛtram ojasā	yat han vṛtra ojas
862	śacīpate	śacīpati
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	samanā iva vapuṣyataḥ	samanā iva vapuṣy
862	kṛṇavat mānuṣā yugā	kṛ mānuṣa yuga
862	vide tat indraḥ cetanam	vid tad indra cetana
862	adha śrutaḥ	adha śru
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	ut jātam indra te śavaḥ	ud jan indra tvad śavas
862	ut tvām ut tava kratum	ud tvad ud tvad kratu
862	bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhuḥ	bhūrigu bhūri vṛdh
862	maghavan tava śarmaṇi	maghavan tvad śarman
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	aham ca tvam ca vṛtrahan	mad ca tvad ca vṛtrahan
862	sam yujyāva sanibhyaḥ ā	sam yuj sani ā
862	arātīvā cit adrivaḥ	arātīvan cit adrivat
862	anu nau śūra maṁsate	anu mad śūra man
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
862	satyam it vai u tam vayam	satya id vai u tad mad
862	indram stavāma na anṛtam	indra stu na anṛta
862	mahān asunvataḥ vadhaḥ	mahat a su vadha
862	bhūri jyotīṁṣi sunvataḥ	bhūri jyotis su
862	bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ	bhadra indra rāti
 ---
863	sa pūrvyaḥ mahānām	tad pūrvya maha
863	venaḥ kratubhiḥ ānaje	vena kratu añj
863	yasya dvārā manuḥ pitā	yad dvāra manu pitṛ
863	deveṣu dhiyaḥ ānaje	deva dhī añj
863	divaḥ mānam na ut sadan	div māna na ud sad
863	somapṛṣThāsaḥ adrayaḥ	soma pṛṣṭha adri
863	ukthā brahma ca śaṁsyā	uktha brahman ca śaṃs
863	sa vidvān aṅgirobhyaḥ	tad vid aṅgiras
863	indraḥ gāḥ avṛṇot apa	indra go vṛ apa
863	stuṣe tat asya pauṁsyam	stu tad idam pauṃsya
863	sa pratnathā kavivṛdhaḥ	tad pratnathā kavi vṛdha
863	indraḥ vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ	indra vāka vakṣaṇi
863	śivaḥ arkasya homani	śiva arka homan
863	asmatrā gantu avase	asmatrā gam av
863	āt ū nu te anu kratum	āt u nu tvad anu kratu
863	svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ	svāhā vara yajyu
863	śvātram arkāḥ anūṣata	śvātra arka nū
863	indra gotrasya dāvane	indra gotra dā
863	indre viśvāni vīryā	indra viśva vīrya
863	kṛtāni kartvāni ca	kṛ kṛ ca
863	yam arkāḥ adhvaram viduḥ	yad arka adhvara vid
863	yat pāñcajanyayā viśā	yat pāñcajanya viś
863	indre ghoṣāḥ asṛkṣata	indra ghoṣa sṛj
863	astṛṇāt barhaṇā vipaḥ	stṛ barhaṇā vip
863	aryaḥ mānasya sa kṣayaḥ	ari māna tad kṣaya
863	iyam u te anuṣTutiḥ	idam u tvad anuṣṭuti
863	cakṛṣe tāni pauṁsyā	kṛ tad pauṃsya
863	pra āvaḥ cakrasya vartanim	prāv cakra vartani
863	asya vṛṣṇaḥ vyodane	idam vṛṣan vi odana
863	uru kramiṣTa jīvase	uru kram jīv
863	yavam na paśvaḥ ā dade	yava na paśu ā dā
863	tat dadhānāḥ avasyavaḥ	tad dhā avasyu
863	yuṣmābhiḥ dakṣapitaraḥ	tvad dakṣa pitṛ
863	syāma marutvataḥ vṛdhe	as marutvant vṛdh
863	baT ṛtviyāya dhāmne	baṭ ṛtviya dhāman
863	ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ	ṛkvan śūra nonāv
863	jeṣāma indra tvayā yujā	ji indra tvad yuj
863	asme rudrā mehanā parvatāsaḥ	mad rudra mehanā parvata
863	vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ	vṛtra hatya bhara hūti sajoṣa
863	yaḥ śaṁsate stuvate dhāyi pajraḥ	yad śaṃs stu dhā pajra
863	indrajyeṣThāḥ asmān avantu devāḥ	indra jyeṣṭha mad av deva
 ---
864	ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ	ud tvad mad stoma
864	kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivaḥ	kṛ rādhas adrivat
864	ava brahmadviṣaḥ jahi	ava brahman dviṣ han
864	padā paṇīn arādhasaḥ	pad paṇi arādhas
864	ni bādhasva mahān asi	ni bādh mahat as
864	nahi tvā kaḥ cana prati	nahi tvad kaścana prati
864	tvam īśiṣe sutānām	tvad īś su
864	indra tvam asutānām	indra tvad a su
864	tvam rājā janānām	tvad rājan jana
864	ā ihi pra ihi kṣayaḥ divi	e pre kṣaya div
864	āghoṣan carṣaṇīnām	āghuṣ carṣaṇi
864	ā ubhe pṛṇāsi rodasī	ā ubh pṛ rodasī
864	tyam cit parvatam girim	tya cit parvata giri
864	śatavantam sahasriṇam	śatavat sahasrin
864	vi stotṛbhyaḥ rurojitha	vi stotṛ ruj
864	vayam u tvā divā sute	mad u tvad divā suta
864	vayam naktam havāmahe	mad nakta hvā
864	asmākam kāmam ā pṛṇa	mad kāma ā pṛṇ
864	kva sya vṛṣabhaḥ yuvā	kva tya vṛṣabha yuvan
864	tuvigrīvaḥ anānataḥ	tuvi grīvā an ānam
864	brahmā kaḥ tam saparyati	brahman ka tad sapary
864	kasya svit savanam vṛṣā	ka svid savana vṛṣan
864	jujuṣvān ava gacchati	juṣ ava gam
864	indram kaḥ u svit ā cake	indra ka u svid ā kan
864	kam te dānāḥ asakṣata	ka tvad dāna sañj
864	vṛtrahan kam suvīryā	vṛtrahan ka su vīrya
864	ukthe kaḥ u svit antamaḥ	uktha ka u svid antama
864	ayam te mānuṣe jane	idam tvad mānuṣa jana
864	somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate	soma pūru su
864	tasya ā ihi pra dravā piba	tad i pra dru pā
864	ayam te śaryaṇāvati	idam tvad śaryaṇāvant
864	suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ	suṣomā adhi priya
864	ārjīkīye madintamaḥ	ārjīkīya madintama
864	tam adya rādhase mahe	tad adya rādhas mah
864	cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye	cāru mada ghṛṣvi
864	ā ihi īm indra dravā piba	e iṃ indra dru pā
 ---
865	yat indra prāk apāk udak	yat indra prāñc apāñc udañc
865	nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ	nyāñc vā hvā nṛ
865	ā yāhi tūyam āśubhiḥ	ā yā tūya āśu
865	yat vā prasravaṇe divaḥ	yat vā prasravaṇa div
865	mādayāse svarṇare	māday svarṇara
865	yat vā samudre andhasaḥ	yat vā samudra andhas
865	ā tvā gīrbhiḥ mahām urum	ā tvad gir mahat uru
865	huve gām iva bhojase	hvā go iva bhuj
865	indra somasya pītaye	indra soma pā
865	ā te indra mahimānam	ā tvad indra mahiman
865	harayaḥ deva te mahaḥ	hari deva tvad mahas
865	rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ	ratha vah bhṛ
865	indra gṛṇīṣe u stuṣe	indra gṛ u stu
865	mahān ugraḥ īśānakṛt	mahat ugra īś kṛt
865	ā ihi naḥ sutam piba	e mad suta pā
865	sutāvantaḥ tvā vayam	sutāvat tvad mad
865	prayasvantaḥ havāmahe	prayasvat hvā
865	idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade	idam mad barhis āsad
865	yat cit hi śaśvatām asi	yat cit hi śaśvat as
865	indra sādhāraṇaḥ tvam	indra sādhāraṇa tvad
865	tam tvā vayam havāmahe	tad tvad mad hvā
865	idam te somyam madhu	idam tvad somya madhu
865	adhukṣan adribhiḥ naraḥ	duh adri nṛ
865	juṣāṇaḥ indra tat piba	juṣ indra tad pā
865	viśvān aryaḥ vipaścitaḥ	viśva ari vipaścit
865	ati khyaḥ tūyam ā gahi	ati khyā tūya ā gam
865	asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat	mad dhā śravas bṛhat
865	dātā me pṛṣatīnām	dā mad pṛṣatī
865	rājā hiraṇyavīnām	rājan hiraṇyavī
865	mā devāḥ maghavā riṣat	mā deva maghavan riṣ
865	sahasre pṛṣatīnām	sahasra pṛṣatī
865	adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu	adhi ścandra bṛhat pṛthu
865	śukram hiraṇyam ā dade	śukra hiraṇya ā dā
865	napātaḥ durgahasya me	napāt durgaha mad
865	sahasreṇa surādhasaḥ	sahasra su rādhas
865	śravaḥ deveṣu akrata	śravas deva kṛ
 ---
866	tarobhiḥ vaḥ vidadvasum	taras tvad vidadvasu
866	indram sabādhaḥ ūtaye	indra sabādhas ūti
866	bṛhat gāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare	bṛhat gā su soma adhvara
866	huve bharam na kāriṇam	hvā bhara na kārin
866	na yam dudhrāḥ varante na sthirāḥ muraḥ	na yad dudhra vṛ na sthira mur
866	made suśipram andhasaḥ	mada su śiprā andhas
866	yaḥ ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate	yad ādṛ śam su
866	dātā jaritre ukthyam	dā jaritṛ ukthya
866	yaḥ śakraḥ mṛkṣaḥ aśvyaḥ	yad śakra mṛkṣa aśvya
866	yaḥ vā kījaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ	yad vā kīja hiraṇyaya
866	saḥ ūrvasya rejayati apāvṛtim	tad ūrva rejay apāvṛti
866	indraḥ gavyasya vṛtrahā	indra gavya vṛtrahan
866	nikhātam cit yaḥ purusambhṛtam vasu	nikhan cit yad puru sambhṛ vasu
866	ut it vapati dāśuṣe	ud id vap dāś
866	vajrī suśipraḥ haryaśvaḥ it karat	vajrin su śiprā haryaśva id kṛ
866	indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat	indra kratu yathā vaś
866	yat vāvantha puruṣTuta	yad van puruṣṭuta
866	purā cit śūra nṛṇām	purā cit śūra nṛ
866	vayam tat te indra sam bharāmasi	mad tad tvad indra sam bhṛ
866	yajñam uktham turam vacaḥ	yajña uktha tura vacas
866	sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivaḥ	sacā soma puruhūta vajrivat
866	madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ	mada dyukṣa soma pā
866	tvam it hi brahmakṛte kāmyam vasu	tvad id hi brahman kṛt kāmya vasu
866	deṣThaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ	deṣṭha su bhū
866	vayam enam idā hyaḥ	mad enad idā hyas
866	apīpema iha vajriṇam	pyā iha vajrin
866	tasmai u adya samanā sutam bhara	tad u adya samanā su bhṛ
866	ā nūnam bhūṣata śrute	nūnam bhūṣ śru
866	vṛkaḥ cit asya vāraṇaḥ urāmathiḥ	vṛka cit idam vāraṇa urāmathi
866	ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati	ā vayuna bhūṣ
866	sa imam naḥ stomam jujuṣāṇaḥ ā gahi	tad idam mad stoma juṣ ā gam
866	indra pra citrayā dhiyā	indra pra citra dhī
866	kat ū nu asya akṛtam	ka u nu idam a kṛ
866	indrasya asti pauṁsyam	indra as pauṃsya
866	kena u nu kam śromatena na śuśruve	ka u nu kaṃ śromata na śru
866	januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā	janus pari vṛtrahan
866	kat ū mahīḥ adhṛṣTāḥ asya taviṣīḥ	ka u mahi adhṛṣṭa idam taviṣī
866	kat u vṛtraghnaḥ astṛtam	ka u vṛtra ghna u astṛta
866	indraḥ viśvān bekanāTān ahardṛśaḥ	indra viśva bekanāṭa ahardṛś
866	uta kratvā paṇīn abhi	uta kratu paṇi abhi
866	vayam ghā te apūrvyā	mad gha tvad apūrvya
866	indra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan	indra brahman vṛtrahan
866	purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivaḥ	purutama puruhūta vajrivat
866	bhṛtim na pra bharāmasi	bhṛti na pra bhṛ
866	pūrvīḥ cit hi tve tuvikūrmin āśasaḥ	puru cit hi tvad tuvikūrmin āśas
866	havante indra ūtayaḥ	hvā indra ūti
866	tiraḥ cit aryaḥ savanā ā vaso gahi	tiras cit ari savana vasu gam
866	śaviṣTha śrudhi me havam	śaviṣṭha śru mad hava
866	vayam ghā te tve it u	mad gha tvad tvad id u
866	indra vipra api smasi	indra vipra api as
866	nahi tvat anyaḥ puruhūta kaḥ cana	nahi tvad anya puruhūta kaścana
866	maghavan asti marḍitā	maghavan as marḍitṛ
866	tvam naḥ asyāḥ amateḥ uta kṣudhaḥ	tvad mad idam amati uta kṣudh
866	abhiśasteḥ ava spṛdhi	abhiśasti ava spṛ
866	tvam naḥ ūtī tava citrayā dhiyā	tvad mad ūti tvad citra dhī
866	śikṣā śaciṣTha gātuvit	śikṣ śaciṣṭha gātu vid
866	somaḥ it vaḥ sutaḥ astu	soma id tvad su as
866	kalayaḥ mā bibhītana	kali mā bhī
866	apa it eṣa dhvasmā ayati	apa id etad dhvasman i
866	svayam gha eṣaḥ apa ayati	svayam gha etad ape
 ---
867	tyān nu kṣatriyān avaḥ	tya nu kṣatriya ava
867	ādityān yāciṣāmahe	āditya yāc
867	sumṛLīkān abhiṣTaye	su mṛḍīka abhiṣṭi
867	mitraḥ naḥ ati aṁhatim	mitra mad ati aṃhati
867	varuṇaḥ parṣat aryamā	varuṇa pṛ aryaman
867	ādityāsaḥ yathā viduḥ	āditya yathā vid
867	teṣām hi citram ukthyam	tad hi citra ukthya
867	varūtham asti dāśuṣe	varūtha as dāś
867	ādityānām araṁkṛte	āditya araṃkṛt
867	mahi vaḥ mahatām avaḥ	mahi tvad mahat avas
867	varuṇa mitra aryaman	varuṇa mitra aryaman
867	avāṁsi ā vṛṇīmahe	avas ā vṛ
867	jīvān naḥ abhi dhetana	jīva mad abhi dhā
867	ādityāsaḥ purā hathāt	āditya purā hatha
867	kat ha stha havanaśrutaḥ	ka ha as havana śrut
867	yat vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate	yad tvad śram su
867	varūtham asti yat chardiḥ	varūtha as yad chardis
867	tenā naḥ adhi vocata	tad mad adhi vac
867	asti devāḥ aṁhoḥ uru	as deva aṃhu uru
867	asti ratnam anāgasaḥ	as ratna anāgas
867	ādityāḥ adbhutainasaḥ	āditya adbhuta enas
867	mā naḥ setuḥ siṣet ayam	mā mad setu sā idam
867	mahe vṛṇaktu naḥ pari	mah vṛj mad pari
867	indraḥ it hi śrutaḥ vaśī	indra id hi śru vaśin
867	mā naḥ mṛcā ripūṇām	mā mad mṛc ripu
867	vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ	vṛjina aviṣyu
867	devāḥ abhi pra mṛkṣata	deva abhi pra mṛś
867	uta tvām adite mahi	uta tvad aditi mah
867	aham devi upa bruve	mad devī upa brū
867	sumṛLīkām abhiṣTaye	su mṛḍīka abhiṣṭi
867	parṣi dīne gabhīre ā	pṛ dīna gabhīra
867	ugraputre jighāṁsataḥ	ugra putra jighāṃs
867	mākiḥ tokasya naḥ riṣat	mākir toka mad riṣ
867	anehaḥ naḥ uruvraje	anehas mad uru vraja
867	urūci vi prasartave	uruvyañc vi prasṛ
867	kṛdhi tokāya jīvase	kṛ toka jīv
867	ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām	yad mūrdhan kṣiti
867	adabdhāsaḥ svayaśasaḥ	adabdha sva yaśas
867	vratā rakṣante adruhaḥ	vrata rakṣ adruh
867	te naḥ āsnaḥ vṛkāṇām	tad mad āsan vṛka
867	ādityāsaḥ mumocata	āditya muc
867	stenam baddham iva adite	stena bandh iva aditi
867	apa u su naḥ iyam śaruḥ	apa u su mad idam śaru
867	ādityāḥ apa durmatiḥ	āditya apa durmati
867	asmat etu ajaghnuṣī	mad i a han
867	śaśvat hi vaḥ sudānavaḥ	śaśvat hi tvad sudānu
867	ādityāḥ ūtibhiḥ vayam	āditya ūti mad
867	purā nūnam bubhujmahe	purā nūnam bhuj
867	śaśvantam hi pracetasaḥ	śaśvat hi pracetas
867	pratiyantam cit enasaḥ	pratī cit enas
867	devāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase	deva kṛ jīv
867	tat su naḥ navyam sanyase	tad su mad navya sanyas
867	ādityāḥ yat mumocati	āditya yad muc
867	bandhāt baddham iva adite	bandha bandh iva aditi
867	na asmākam asti tat taraḥ	na mad as tad taras
867	ādityāsaḥ atiṣkade	āditya atiṣkand
867	yūyam asmabhyam mṛLata	tvad mad mṛḍ
867	mā naḥ hetiḥ vivasvataḥ	mā mad heti vivasvant
867	ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ	āditya kṛtrima śaru
867	purā nu jarasaḥ vadhīt	purā nu jaras vadh
867	vi su dveṣaḥ vi aṁhatim	vi su dveṣas vi aṃhati
867	ādityāsaḥ vi saṁhitam	āditya vi saṃdhā
867	viṣvak vi vṛhatā rapaḥ	viṣvañc vi vṛh rapas
 ---
868	ā tvā ratham yathā ūtaye	ā tvad ratha yathā ūti
868	sumnāya vartayāmasi	sumna vartay
868	tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham	tuvikūrmi ṛtīṣah
868	indra śaviṣTha satpate	indra śaviṣṭha satpati
868	tuviśuṣma tuvikrato	tuvi śuṣma tuvi kratu
868	śacīvaḥ viśvayā mate	śacīvat viśva mati
868	ā paprātha mahitvanā	ā prā mahitvana
868	yasya te mahinā mahaḥ	yad tvad mahina mah
868	pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ	pari jmāyat i
868	hastā vajram hiraṇyayam	hasta vajra hiraṇyaya
868	viśvānarasya vaḥ patim	viśvānara tvad pati
868	anānatasya śavasaḥ	an ānam śavas
868	evaiḥ ca carṣaṇīnām	eva ca carṣaṇi
868	ūtī huve rathānām	ūti hvā ratha
868	abhiṣTaye sadāvṛdham	abhiṣṭi sadāvṛdha
868	svarmīLheṣu yam naraḥ	svar mīḍha yad nṛ
868	nānā havante ūtaye	nānā hvā ūti
868	paromātram ṛcīṣamam	paromātra ṛcīṣama
868	indram ugram surādhasam	indra ugra su rādhas
868	īśānam cit vasūnām	īś cit vasu
868	taṁtam it rādhase mahe	tad tad id rādhas mah
868	indram codāmi pītaye	indra cud pā
868	yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣTutim	yad pūrvya anuṣṭuti
868	īśe kṛṣTīnām nṛtuḥ	īś kṛṣṭi nṛtu
868	na yasya te śavasāna	na yad tvad śavasāna
868	sakhyam ānaṁśa martyaḥ	sakhya aś martya
868	nakiḥ śavāṁsi te naśat	nakir śavas tvad naś
868	tvotāsaḥ tvā yujā	tvota tvad yuj
868	apsu sūrye mahat dhanam	ap sūrya mahat dhana
868	jayema pṛtsu vajrivaḥ	ji pṛt vajrivat
868	tam tvā yajñebhiḥ īmahe	tad tvad yajña ī
868	tam gīrbhiḥ girvaṇastama	tad gir girvaṇastama
868	indra yathā cit āvitha	indra yathā cit av
868	vājeṣu purumāyyam	vāja purumāyya
868	yasya te svādu sakhyam	yad tvad svādu sakhya
868	svādvī praṇītiḥ adrivaḥ	svādu praṇīti adrivat
868	yajñaḥ vitantasāyyaḥ	yajña vitantasāyya
868	uru naḥ tanve tane	uru mad tanū tan
868	uru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi	uru kṣaya mad kṛ
868	uru naḥ yandhi jīvase	uru mad yam jīv
868	urum nṛbhyaḥ urum gave	uru nṛ uru go
868	urum rathāya panthām	uru ratha pathin
868	devavītim manāmahe	deva vīti man
868	upa mā ṣaT dvādvā	upa mad ṣaṣ dvi dvi
868	naraḥ somasya harṣyā	nara soma harṣyā
868	tiṣThanti svādurātayaḥ	sthā svādu rāti
868	ṛjrau indrote ā dade	ṛjra indrota ā dā
868	harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi	hari ṛkṣa sūnu
868	āśvamedhasya rohitā	āśvamedha rohita
868	surathān ātithigve	su ratha ātithigva
868	svabhīśūn ārkṣe	su abhīśu ārkṣa
868	āśvamedhe supeśasaḥ	āśvamedha supeśas
868	ṣaT aśvān ātithigve	ṣaṣ aśva ātithigva
868	indrote vadhūmataḥ	indrota vadhūmat
868	sacā pūtakratau sanam	sacā pūtakratu san
868	ā eṣu cetat vṛṣaṇvatī	ā idam cit vṛṣaṇvat
868	antar ṛjreṣu aruṣī	antar ṛjra aruṣa
868	svabhīśuḥ kaśāvatī	su abhīśu kaśāvat
868	na yuṣme vājabandhavaḥ	na tvad vāja bandhu
868	ninitsuḥ cana martyaḥ	ninitsu cana martya
868	avadyam adhi dīdharat	avadya adhi dhṛ
 ---
869	prapra vaḥ triṣTubham iṣam	pra pra tvad triṣṭubh iṣ
869	mandadvīrāya indave	mand vīra indu
869	dhiyā vaḥ medhasātaye	dhī tvad medha sāti
869	puraṁdhyā ā vivāsati	puraṃdhi vivās
869	nadam vaḥ odatīnām	nada tvad odatī
869	nadam yoyuvatīnām	nada yoyu
869	patim vaḥ aghnyānām	pati tvad aghnyā
869	dhenūnām iṣudhyasi	dhenu iṣudhy
869	tāḥ asya sūdadohasaḥ	tad idam sūda dohas
869	somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ	soma śrī pṛśni
869	janman devānām viśaḥ	janman deva viś
869	triṣu ā rocane divaḥ	tri ā rocana div
869	abhi pra gopatim girā	abhi pra go pati gir
869	indram arca yathā vide	indra arc yathā vid
869	sūnum satyasya satpatim	sūnu satya satpati
869	ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire	ā hari sṛj
869	aruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi	aruṣa adhi barhis
869	yatra abhi saṁnavāmahe	yatra abhi saṃnū
869	indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram	indra go āśir
869	duduhre vajriṇe madhu	duh vajrin madhu
869	yat sīm upahvare vidat	yat sīm upahvara vid
869	ut yat bradhnasya viṣTapam	ud yat bradhna viṣṭap
869	gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi	gṛha indra ca gam
869	madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi	madhu pā sac
869	triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade	tris saptan sakhi pada
869	arcata pra arcata	arc prārc
869	priyamedhāsaḥ arcata	priyamedha arc
869	arcantu putrakāḥ uta	arc putraka uta
869	puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata	pura na dhṛṣṇu arc
869	ava svarāti gargaraḥ	ava svar gargara
869	godhā pari saniṣvaṇat	godhā pari saniṣvan
869	piṅgā pari caniṣkadat	piṅgā pari caniṣkad
869	indrāya brahma udyatam	indra brahman udyam
869	ā yat patanti enyaḥ	ā yat pat ena
869	sudughāḥ anapasphuraḥ	su dugha an apasphur
869	apasphuram gṛbhāyata	apasphur gṛbhāy
869	somam indrāya pātave	soma indra pā
869	apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ	pā indra pā agni
869	viśve devāḥ amatsata	viśva deva mad
869	varuṇaḥ it iha kṣayat	varuṇa id iha kṣi
869	tam āpaḥ abhi anūṣata	tad ap abhi nū
869	vatsam saṁśiśvarīḥ iva	vatsa saṃśiśvan iva
869	sudevaḥ asi varuṇa	su deva as varuṇa
869	yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ	yad tvad saptan sindhu
869	anukṣaranti kākudam	anukṣar kākud
869	sūrmyam suṣirām iva	sūrmi suṣira iva
869	yaḥ vyatīn aphāṇayat	yad vyati phāṇay
869	suyuktān upa dāśuṣe	su yuj upa dāś
869	takvaḥ netā tat it vapuḥ	takva netṛ tad id vapus
869	upamā yaḥ amucyata	upamā yad muc
869	ati it u śakraḥ ohate	ati id u śakra ūh
869	indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ	indra viśva ati dviṣ
869	bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam	bhid kanīna odana
869	pacyamānam paraḥ girā	pac paras giri
869	arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ	arbhaka na kumāraka
869	adhi tiṣThat navam ratham	adhi sthā nava ratha
869	sa pakṣat mahiṣam mṛgam	sa pac mahiṣa mṛga
869	pitre mātre vibhukratum	pitṛ mātṛ vibhu kratu
869	ā tū suśipra dampate	ā tu su śiprā dampati
869	ratham tiṣThā hiraṇyayam	ratha sthā hiraṇyaya
869	adha dyukṣam sacevahi	adha dyukṣa sac
869	sahasrapādam aruṣam	sahasra pāda aruṣa
869	svastigām anehasam	svasti gā anehas
869	tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ	tad gha īṃ itthā namasvin
869	upa svarājam āsate	upa svarāj ās
869	artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave	artha cit idam sudhita yat i
869	āvartayanti dāvane	āvartay dā
869	anu pratnasya okasaḥ	anu pratna oka
869	priyamedhāsaḥ eṣām	priyamedha idam
869	pūrvām anu prayatim vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	pūrva anu prayati vṛj barhis
869	hitaprayasaḥ āśata	dhā prayas aś
 ---
870	yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām	yad rājan carṣaṇi
870	yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ	yātṛ ratha adhrigu
870	viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām	viśva tarutṛ pṛtanā
870	jyeṣThaḥ yaḥ vṛtrahā gṛṇe	jyeṣṭha yad vṛtra han gṛ
870	indram tam śumbha puruhanman avase	indra tad śubh puruhanman avas
870	yasya dvitā vidhartari	yad dvitā vidhartṛ
870	hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ	hasta vajra prati dhā darśata
870	mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ	maha diva na sūrya
870	nakiḥ tam karmaṇā naśat	nakir tad karman naś
870	yaḥ cakāra sadāvṛdham	yad kṛ sadāvṛdha
870	indram na yajñaiḥ viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam	indra na yajña viśva gur ṛbhvas
870	adhṛṣTam dhṛṣṇvojasam	adhṛṣṭa dhṛṣṇu ojas
870	aṣāLham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahim	aṣāḍha ugra pṛtanā sāsahi
870	yasmin mahīḥ urujrayaḥ	yad mahī urujri
870	sam dhenavaḥ jāyamāne anonavuḥ	sam dhenu jan nonāv
870	dyāvaḥ kṣāmaḥ anonavuḥ	div kṣam nonāv
870	yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam	yat div indra tvad śata
870	śatam bhūmīḥ uta syuḥ	śata bhūmi uta as
870	na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu	na tvad vajrin sahasra sūrya anu
870	na jātam aṣTa rodasī	na jan aṣṭan rodasī
870	ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan	ā prā mahina vṛṣṇya vṛṣan
870	viśvā śaviṣTha śavasā	viśva śaviṣṭha śavas
870	asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje	mad av maghavan gomat vraja
870	vajrin citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	vajrin citra ūti
870	na sīm adevaḥ āpat	na sīm adeva āp
870	iṣam dīrghāyo martyaḥ	iṣ dīrgha āyu martya
870	etagvā cit yaḥ etaśā yuyojate	etagva cit yad etaśa yuj
870	harī indraḥ yuyojate	hari indra yuj
870	tam vaḥ mahaḥ mahāyyam	tad tvad mahāyya
870	indram dānāya sakṣaṇim	indra dāna sakṣaṇi
870	yaḥ gādheṣu yaḥ āraṇeṣu havyaḥ	yad gādha yad āraṇa hvā
870	vājeṣu asti havyaḥ	vāja as hvā
870	ut ū su naḥ vaso mahe	ud u su mad vasu mah
870	mṛśasva śūra rādhase	mṛś śūra rādhas
870	ut ū su mahyai maghavan maghattaye	ud u su mahi maghavan maghatti
870	ut indra śravase mahe	ud indra śravas mah
870	tvam naḥ indra ṛtayuḥ	tvad mad indra ṛtayu
870	tvānidaḥ ni tṛmpasi	tvānid ni tṛp
870	madhye vasiṣva tuvinṛmṇa ūrvoḥ	madhya vas tuvi nṛmṇa ūru
870	ni dāsam śiśnathaḥ hathaiḥ	ni dāsa śnath hatha
870	anyavratam amānuṣam	anya vrata a mānuṣa
870	ayajvānam adevayum	a yajvan a devayu
870	ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ	ava sva sakhi dhū parvata
870	sughnāya dasyum parvataḥ	su ghna dasyu parvata
870	tvam naḥ indra āsām	tvad mad indra idam
870	haste śaviṣTha dāvane	hasta śaviṣṭha dā
870	dhānānām na sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ	dhānā na sam gṛbhāy asmayu
870	dviḥ sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ	dvis sam gṛbhāy asmayu
870	sakhāyaḥ kratum icchata	sakhi kratu iṣ
870	kathā rādhāma śarasya upastutim	kathā rādh śara
870	bhojaḥ sūriḥ yaḥ ahrayaḥ	bhoja sūri yad ahraya
870	bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhiḥ	bhūri samaha ṛṣi
870	barhiṣmadbhiḥ staviṣyase	barhiṣmat stu
870	yat ittham ekamekam it	yat ittham eka eka id
870	śara vatsān parādadaḥ	śara vatsa parādā
870	karṇagṛhyā maghavā śauradevyaḥ	karṇa grah maghavan śauradevya
870	vatsam naḥ tribhyaḥ ā anayat	vatsa mad tri ānī
870	ajām sūriḥ na dhātave	ajā sūri na dhā
 ---
871	tvam naḥ agne mahobhiḥ	tvad mad agni mahas
871	pāhi viśvasyāḥ arāteḥ	pā viśva arāti
871	uta dviṣaḥ martyasya	uta dviṣ martya
871	nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeyaḥ	nahi manyu pauruṣeya
871	īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta	īś hi tvad priya jan
871	tvam it asi kṣapāvān	tvad id as kṣapāvant
871	sa naḥ viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ	tad mad viśva deva
871	ūrjaḥ napāt bhadraśoce	ūrj napāt bhadra śoci
871	rayim dehi viśvavāram	rayi dā viśva vāra
871	na tam agne arātayaḥ	na tad agni arāti
871	martam yuvanta rāyaḥ	marta yu rai
871	yam trāyase dāśvāṁsam	yad trā dāś
871	yam tvam vipra medhasātau	yad tvad vipra medha sāti
871	agne hinoṣi dhanāya	agni hi dhana
871	sa tava ūtī goṣu gantā	tad tvad ūti go gam
871	tvam rayim puruvīram	tvad rayi puru vīra
871	agne dāśuṣe martāya	agni dāś marta
871	pra naḥ naya vasyaḥ accha	pra mad nī vasyas acchā
871	uruṣyā naḥ mā parā dāḥ	uruṣy mad mā parā dā
871	aghāyate jātavedaḥ	aghāy jātavedas
871	durādhye martāya	durādhī marta
871	agne mākiḥ te devasya	agni mākir tvad deva
