916	viśvāḥ arṣan abhi śriyaḥ	viśva ṛṣ abhi śrī
916	śūraḥ na goṣu tiṣThati	śūra na go sthā
916	divaḥ na sānu pipyuṣī	div na sānu pyā
916	dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ	dhārā su vedhas
916	vṛthā pavitre arṣati	vṛthā pavitra ṛṣ
916	tvam soma vipaścitam	tvad soma vipaścit
916	tanā punānaḥ āyuṣu	tan pū āyu
916	avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvasi	avya vāra vi dhāv
 ---
917	pra nimnena iva sindhavaḥ	pra nimna iva sindhu
917	ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ	han vṛtra bhūrṇi
917	somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ	soma sṛj āśu
917	abhi suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ	abhi su indu
917	vṛṣTayaḥ pṛthivīm iva	vṛṣṭi pṛthivī iva
917	indram somāsaḥ akṣaran	indra soma kṣar
917	atyūrmiḥ matsaraḥ madaḥ	ati ūrmi matsara mada
917	somaḥ pavitre arṣati	soma pavitra ṛṣ
917	vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ	vihan rakṣas devayu
917	ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati	ā kalaśa dhāv
917	pavitre pari sicyate	pavitra pari sic
917	ukthaiḥ yajñeṣu vardhate	uktha yajña vṛdh
917	ati trī soma rocanā	ati tri soma rocana
917	rohan na bhrājase divam	ruh na bhrāj div
917	iṣṇan sūryam na codayaḥ	iṣ sūrya na coday
917	abhi viprāḥ anūṣata	abhi vipra nū
917	mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ	mūrdhan yajña kāru
917	dadhānāḥ cakṣasi priyam	dhā cakṣas priya
917	tam u tvā vājinam naraḥ	tad u tvad vājin nṛ
917	dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ	dhī vipra avasyu
917	mṛjanti devatātaye	mṛj devatāti
917	madhoḥ dhārām anu kṣara	madhu dhārā anu kṣar
917	tīvraḥ sadhastham ā asadaḥ	tīvra sadhastha āsad
917	cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye	cāru ṛta pā
 ---
918	pari suvānaḥ giriṣThāḥ	pari su giriṣṭhā
918	pavitre somaḥ akṣār	pavitra soma kṣar
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	tvam vipraḥ tvam kaviḥ	tvad vipra tvad kavi
918	madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ	madhu pra jan andhas
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	tava viśve sajoṣasaḥ	tvad viśva sajoṣas
918	devāsaḥ pītim āśata	deva pīti aś
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	ā yaḥ viśvāni vāryā	ā yad viśva vārya
918	vasūni hastayoḥ dadhe	vasu hasta dhā
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	yaḥ ime rodasī mahī	yad idam rodasī mahi
918	sam mātarā iva dohate	sam mātṛ iva duh
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	pari yaḥ rodasī ubhe	pari yad rodasī ubh
918	sadyaḥ vājebhiḥ arṣati	sadyas vāja ṛṣ
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
918	sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣu ā	tad śuṣmin kalaśa ā
918	ā punānaḥ acikradat	ā pū krand
918	madeṣu sarvadhāḥ asi	mada sarva dhā as
 ---
919	yat soma citram ukthyam	yad soma citra ukthya
919	divyam pārthivam vasu	divya pārthiva vasu
919	tat naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara	tad mad pū ā bhṛ
919	yuvam hi sthaḥ svarpatī	tvad hi as svarpati
919	indraḥ ca soma gopatī	indra ca soma gopati
919	īśānā pipyatam dhiyaḥ	īś pyā dhī
919	vṛṣā punānaḥ āyuṣu	vṛṣan pū āyu
919	stanayan adhi barhiṣi	stanay adhi barhis
919	hariḥ san yonim ā asadat	hari as yoni āsad
919	avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ	vāś dhīti
919	vṛṣabhasya adhi retasi	vṛṣabha adhi retas
919	sūnoḥ vatsasya mātaraḥ	sūnu vatsa mātṛ
919	kuvit vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ	kuvid vṛṣaṇy
919	punānaḥ garbham ādadhat	pū garbha ādhā
919	yāḥ śukram duhate payaḥ	yad śukra duh payas
919	upa śikṣa apatasthuṣaḥ	upa śikṣ apasthā
919	bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu	bhiyas ā dhā śatru
919	pavamāna vidāḥ rayim	pavamāna vid rayi
919	ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyam	ni śatru soma vṛṣṇya
919	ni śuṣmam ni vayaḥ tira	ni śuṣma ni vayas tṛ
919	dūre vā sataḥ anti vā	dūra vā as anti vā
 ---
920	pra kaviḥ devavītaye	pra kavi deva vīti
920	avyaḥ vārebhiḥ arṣati	avya vāra ṛṣ
920	sāhvān viśvāḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ	sah viśva abhi spṛdh
920	sa hi smā jaritṛbhyaḥ ā	tad hi sma jaritṛ ā
920	vājam gomantam invati	vāja gomat inv
920	pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam	pū sahasrin
920	pari viśvāni cetasā	pari viśva cetas
920	mṛśase pavase matī	mṛś pū mati
920	sa naḥ soma śravaḥ vidaḥ	tad mad soma śravas vid
920	abhi arṣa bṛhat yaśaḥ	abhi ṛṣ bṛhat yaśas
920	maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam rayim	maghavan dhruva rayi
920	iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara	iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ
920	tvam rājā iva suvrataḥ	tvad rājan iva suvrata
920	giraḥ soma ā viveśitha	gir soma ā viś
920	punānaḥ vahne adbhuta	pū vahni adbhuta
920	sa vahniḥ apsu duṣTaraḥ	tad vahni ap duṣṭara
920	mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ	mṛj gabhasti
920	somaḥ camūṣu sīdati	soma camū sad
920	krīLuḥ makhaḥ na maṁhayuḥ	krīḍu makha na maṃhayu
920	pavitram soma gacchasi	pavitra soma gam
920	dadhat stotre suvīryam	dhā stotṛ su vīrya
 ---
921	ete dhāvanti indavaḥ	etad dhāv indu
921	somāḥ indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ	soma indra ghṛṣvi
921	matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ	matsara svar vid
921	pravṛṇvantaḥ abhiyujaḥ	pravṛ abhiyuj
921	suṣvaye varivovidaḥ	suṣvi varivas vid
921	svayam stotre vayaskṛtaḥ	svayam stotra vayaskṛt
921	vṛthā krīLantaḥ indavaḥ	vṛthā krīḍ indu
921	sadhastham abhi ekam it	sadhastha abhi eka id
921	sindhoḥ ūrmā vi akṣaran	sindhu ūrmi vi kṣar
921	ete viśvāni vāryā	etad viśva vārya
921	pavamānāsaḥ āśata	pū aś
921	hitāḥ na saptayaḥ rathe	hi na sapti ratha
921	ā asmin piśaṅgam indavaḥ	ā idam piśaṅga indu
921	dadhātā venam ādiśe	dhā vena ādiś
921	yaḥ asmabhyam arāvā	yad mad arāvan
921	ṛbhuḥ na rathyam navam	ṛbhu na rathya nava
921	dadhātā ketam ādiśe	dhā keta ādiś
921	śukrāḥ pavadhvam arṇasā	śukra pū arṇas
921	ete u tye avīvaśan	etad u tya vāś
921	kāṣThām vājinaḥ akrata	kāṣṭhā vājin kṛ
921	sataḥ pra asāviṣuḥ matim	satas prasū mati
 ---
922	ete somāsaḥ āśavaḥ	etad soma āśu
922	rathāḥ iva pra vājinaḥ	ratha iva pra vājin
922	sargāḥ sṛṣTāḥ aheṣata	sarga sṛj hi
922	ete vātāḥ iva uravaḥ	etad vāta iva uru
922	parjanyasya iva vṛṣTayaḥ	parjanya iva vṛṣṭi
922	agneḥ iva bhramāḥ vṛthā	agni iva bhrama vṛthā
922	ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ	etad pū vipaścit
922	somāsaḥ dadhyāśiraḥ	soma dadhi āśir
922	vipā vi ānaśuḥ dhiyaḥ	vip vi aś dhī
922	ete mṛṣTāḥ amartyāḥ	etad mṛj amartya
922	sasṛvāṁsaḥ na śaśramuḥ	sṛ na śram
922	iyakṣantaḥ pathaḥ rajaḥ	iyakṣ pathin rajas
922	ete pṛṣThāni rodasoḥ	etad pṛṣṭha rodas
922	viprayantaḥ vi ānaśuḥ	vipre vi aś
922	uta idam uttamam rajaḥ	uta idam uttama rajas
922	tantum tanvānam uttamam	tantu tan uttama
922	anu pravataḥ āśata	anu pravat aś
922	uta idam uttamāyyam	uta idam uttamāyya
922	tvam soma paṇibhyaḥ ā	tvad soma paṇi ā
922	vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ	vasu gavya dhāray
922	tatam tantum acikradaḥ	tan tantu krand
 ---
923	somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ	soma sṛj āśu
923	madhoḥ madasya dhārayā	madhu mada dhārā
923	abhi viśvāni kāvyā	abhi viśva kāvya
923	anu pratnāsaḥ āyavaḥ	anu pratna āyu
923	padam navīyaḥ akramuḥ	pada navīyas kram
923	ruce jananta sūryam	ruc jan sūrya
923	ā pavamāna naḥ bhara	ā pū mad bhṛ
923	aryaḥ adāśuṣaḥ gayam	ari a dāś gaya
923	kṛdhi prajāvatīḥ iṣaḥ	kṛ prajāvat iṣ
923	abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ	abhi soma āyu
923	pavante madyam madam	pū mad mada
923	abhi kośam madhuścutam	abhi kośa madhuścut
923	somaḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ	soma ṛṣ dharṇasi
923	dadhānaḥ indriyam rasam	dhā indriya rasa
923	suvīraḥ abhiśastipāḥ	su vīra abhiśasti pā
923	indrāya soma pavase	indra soma pū
923	devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ	deva sadhamādya
923	indo vājam siṣāsasi	indu vāja siṣās
923	asya pītvā madānām	idam pā mada
923	indraḥ vṛtrāṇi aprati	indra vṛtra aprati
923	jaghāna jaghanat ca nu	han han ca nu
 ---
924	pra somāsaḥ adhanviṣuḥ	pra soma dhanv
924	pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ	pū indu
924	śrīṇānāḥ apsu mṛñjata	śrī ap mṛj
924	abhi gāvaḥ adhanviṣuḥ	abhi go dhanv
924	āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ	ap na pravat i
924	punānāḥ indram āśata	pū indra aś
924	pra pavamāna dhanvasi	pra pū dhanv
924	soma indrāya pātave	soma indra pā
924	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase	nṛ yam vi nī
924	tvam soma nṛmādanaḥ	tvad soma nṛ mādana
924	pavasva carṣaṇīsahe	pū carṣaṇī sah
924	sasniḥ yaḥ anumādyaḥ	sasni yad anumad
924	indo yat adribhiḥ sutaḥ	indu yat adri su
924	pavitram paridhāvasi	pavitra paridhāv
924	aram indrasya dhāmne	aram indra dhāman
924	pavasva vṛtrahantama	pū vṛtra hantama
924	ukthebhiḥ anumādyaḥ	uktha anumad
924	śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ	śuci pāvaka adbhuta
924	śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate	śuci pāvaka vac
924	somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ	soma su madhu
924	devāvīḥ aghaśaṁsahā	devāvī agha śaṃsa han
 ---
925	pavasva dakṣasādhanaḥ	pū dakṣa sādhana
925	devebhyaḥ pītaye hare	deva pā hari
925	marudbhyaḥ vāyave madaḥ	marut vāyu mada
925	pavamāna dhiyā hitaḥ	pū dhī hi
925	abhi yonim kanikradat	abhi yoni kanikrad
925	dharmaṇā vāyum ā viśa	dharman vāyu ā viś
925	sam devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā	sam deva śubh vṛṣan
925	kaviḥ yonau adhi priyaḥ	kavi yoni adhi priya
925	vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ	vṛtra han deva vītama
925	viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan	viśva rūpa āviś
925	punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ	pū yā haryata
925	yatra amṛtāsaḥ āsate	yatra amṛta ās
925	aruṣaḥ janayan giraḥ	aruṣa janay gir
925	somaḥ pavate āyuṣak	soma pū āyuṣak
925	indram gacchan kavikratuḥ	indra gam kavi kratu
925	ā pavasva madintama	ā pū madintama
925	pavitram dhārayā kave	pavitra dhārā kavi
925	arkasya yonim āsadam	arka yoni āsad
 ---
926	tam amṛkṣanta vājinam	tad mṛj vājin
926	upasthe aditeḥ adhi	upastha aditi adhi
926	viprāsaḥ aṇvyā dhiyā	vipra aṇu dhī
926	tam gāvaḥ abhi anūṣata	tad go abhi nū
926	sahasradhāram akṣitam	sahasra dhārā akṣita
926	indum dhartāram ā divaḥ	indu dhartṛ ā div
926	tam vedhām medhayā ahyan	tad vedhas medhā hi
926	pavamānam adhi dyavi	pū adhi div
926	dharṇasim bhūridhāyasam	dharṇasi bhūri dhāyas
926	tam ahyan bhurijoḥ dhiyā	tad hi bhurij dhī
926	saṁvasānam vivasvataḥ	saṃvas vivasvant
926	patim vācaḥ adābhyam	pati vāc adābhya
926	tam sānau adhi jāmayaḥ	tad sānu adhi jāmi
926	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
926	haryatam bhūricakṣasam	haryata bhūri cakṣas
926	tam tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ	tad tvad hi vedhas
926	pavamāna girāvṛdham	pū girāvṛdh
926	indo indrāya matsaram	indu indra matsara
 ---
927	eṣa kaviḥ abhiṣTutaḥ	etad kavi abhiṣṭu
927	pavitre adhi tośate	pavitra adhi tuś
927	punānaḥ ghnan apa sridhaḥ	pū han apa sridh
927	eṣaḥ indrāya vāyave	etad indra vāyu
927	svarjit pari sicyate	svar jit pari sic
927	pavitre dakṣasādhanaḥ	pavitra dakṣa sādhana
927	eṣa nṛbhiḥ vi nīyate	etad nṛ vi nī
927	divaḥ mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ	div mūrdhan vṛṣan su
927	somaḥ vaneṣu viśvavit	soma vana viśva vid
927	eṣa gavyuḥ acikradat	etad gavyu krand
927	pavamānaḥ hiraṇyayuḥ	pū hiraṇyayu
927	induḥ satrājit astṛtaḥ	indu satrājit astṛta
927	eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate	etad sūrya hās
927	pavamānaḥ adhi dyavi	pū adhi div
927	pavitre matsaraḥ madaḥ	pavitra matsara mada
927	eṣa śuṣmī asiṣyadat	etad śuṣmin syand
927	antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ	antarikṣa vṛṣan hari
927	punānaḥ induḥ indram ā	pū indu indra ā
 ---
928	eṣa vājī hitaḥ nṛbhiḥ	etad vājin hi nṛ
928	viśvavit manasaḥ patiḥ	viśva vid manas pati
928	avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvati	avya vāra vi dhāv
928	eṣa pavitre akṣarat	etad pavitra kṣar
928	somaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ	soma deva su
928	viśvā dhāmāni āviśan	viśva dhāman āviś
928	eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate	etad deva śubhāy
928	adhi yonau amartyaḥ	adhi yoni amartya
928	vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ	vṛtra han deva vītama
928	eṣa vṛṣā kanikradat	etad vṛṣan kanikrad
928	daśabhiḥ jāmibhiḥ yataḥ	daśan jāmi yam
928	abhi droṇāni dhāvati	abhi droṇa dhāv
928	eṣa sūryam arocayat	etad sūrya rocay
928	pavamānaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	pū vicarṣaṇi
928	viśvā dhāmāni viśvavit	viśva dhāman viśva vid
928	eṣa śuṣmī adābhyaḥ	etad śuṣmin adābhya
928	somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati	soma pū ṛṣ
928	devāvīḥ aghaśaṁsahā	devāvī agha śaṃsa han
 ---
929	pra asya dhārāḥ akṣaran	pra idam dhārā kṣar
929	vṛṣṇaḥ sutasya ojasā	vṛṣan su ojas
929	devān anu prabhūṣataḥ	deva anu prabhūṣ
929	saptim mṛjanti vedhasaḥ	sapti mṛj vedhas
929	gṛṇantaḥ kāravaḥ girā	gṛ kāru giri
929	jyotiḥ jajñānam ukthyam	jyotis jan ukthya
929	suṣahā soma tāni te	suṣaha soma tad tvad
929	punānāya prabhūvaso	pū prabhūvasu
929	vardhā samudram ukthyam	vṛdh samudra ukthya
929	viśvā vasūni saṁjayan	viśva vasu saṃji
929	pavasva soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
929	inu dveṣāṁsi sadhryak	dveṣas sadhryañc
929	rakṣā su naḥ araruṣaḥ	rakṣ su mad a rā
929	svanāt samasya kasya cit	svana sama ka cit
929	nidaḥ yatra mumucmahe	nid yatra muc
929	ā indo pārthivam rayim	ā indu pārthiva rayi
929	divyam pavasva dhārayā	divya pū dhārā
929	dyumantam śuṣmam ā bhara	dyumat śuṣma ā bhṛ
 ---
930	pra dhārāḥ asya śuṣmiṇaḥ	pra dhārā idam śuṣmin
930	vṛthā pavitre akṣaran	vṛthā pavitra kṣar
930	punānaḥ vācam iṣyati	pū vāc iṣ
930	induḥ hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ	indu hi sotṛ
930	mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat	mṛj kanikrad
930	iyarti vagnum indriyam	ṛch vagnu indriya
930	ā naḥ śuṣmam nṛṣāhyam	ā mad śuṣma nṛṣāhya
930	vīravantam puruspṛham	vīravat puruspṛh
930	pavasva soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
930	pra somaḥ ati dhārayā	pra soma ati dhārā
930	pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat	pū syand
930	abhi droṇāni āsadam	abhi droṇa āsad
930	apsu tvā madhumattamam	ap tvad madhumattama
930	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
930	indo indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
930	sunotā madhumattamam	su madhumattama
930	somam indrāya vajriṇe	soma indra vajrin
930	cārum śardhāya matsaram	cāru śardha matsara
 ---
931	pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ	pra soma svādhī
931	pavamānāsaḥ akramuḥ	pū kram
931	rayim kṛṇvanti cetanam	rayi kṛ cetana
931	divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ adhi	div pṛthivī adhi
931	bhava indo dyumnavardhanaḥ	bhū indu dyumna vardhana
931	bhavā vājānām patiḥ	bhū vāja pati
931	tubhyam vātāḥ abhipriyaḥ	tvad vāta abhiprī
931	tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ	tvad ṛṣ sindhu
931	soma vardhanti te mahaḥ	soma vṛdh tvad mahas
931	ā pyāyasva sam etu te	ā pyā sam i tvad
931	viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam	viśvatas soma vṛṣṇya
931	bhavā vājasya saṁgathe	bhū vāja saṃgatha
931	tubhyam gāvaḥ ghṛtam payaḥ	tvad go ghṛta payas
931	babhro duduhre akṣitam	babhru duh akṣita
931	varṣiṣThe adhi sānavi	varṣiṣṭha adhi sānu
931	svāyudhasya te sataḥ	su āyudha tvad as
931	bhuvanasya pate vayam	bhuvana pati mad
931	indo sakhitvam uśmasi	indu sakhi tva vaś
 ---
932	pra somāsaḥ madacyutaḥ	pra soma madacyut
932	śravase naḥ maghonaḥ	śravas mad maghavan
932	sutāḥ vidathe akramuḥ	su vidatha kram
932	āt īm tritasya yoṣaṇaḥ	āt īṃ trita yoṣan
932	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
932	indum indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
932	āt īm haṁsaḥ yathā gaṇam	āt īṃ haṃsa yathā gaṇa
932	viśvasya avīvaśat matim	viśva vāś mati
932	atyaḥ na gobhiḥ ajyate	atya na go añj
932	ubhe soma avacākaśat	ubh soma avacākaś
932	mṛgaḥ na taktaḥ arṣasi	mṛga na tak ṛṣ
932	sīdan ṛtasya yonim ā	sad ṛta yoni ā
932	abhi gāvaḥ anūṣata	abhi go nū
932	yoṣā jāram iva priyam	yoṣā jāra iva priya
932	agan ājim yathā hitam	gam āji yathā hi
932	asme dhehi dyumat yaśaḥ	mad dhā dyumat yaśas
932	maghavadbhyaḥ ca mahyam ca	maghavan ca mad ca
932	sanim medhām uta śravaḥ	sani medhā uta śravas
 ---
933	pra somāsaḥ vipaścitaḥ	pra soma vipaścit
933	apām na yanti ūrmayaḥ	ap na i ūrmi
933	vanāni mahiṣāḥ iva	vana mahiṣa iva
933	abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ	abhi droṇa babhru
933	śukrāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā	śukra ṛta dhārā
933	vājam gomantam akṣaran	vāja gomat kṣar
933	sutāḥ indrāya vāyave	su indra vāyu
933	varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ	varuṇa marut
933	somāḥ arṣanti viṣṇave	soma ṛṣ viṣṇu
933	tisraḥ vācaḥ ut īrate	tri vāc ud īr
933	gāvaḥ mimanti dhenavaḥ	go mā dhenu
933	hariḥ eti kanikradat	hari i kanikrad
933	abhi brahmīḥ anūṣata	abhi brahmī nū
933	yahvīḥ ṛtasya mātaraḥ	yahva ṛta mātṛ
933	marmṛjyante divaḥ śiśum	marmṛj div śiśu
933	rāyaḥ samudrān caturaḥ	rai samudra catur
933	asmabhyam soma viśvataḥ	mad soma viśvatas
933	ā pavasva sahasriṇaḥ	ā pū sahasrin
 ---
934	pra suvānaḥ dhārayā tanā	pra su dhārā tan
934	induḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati	indu hi ṛṣ
934	rujat dṛLhā vi ojasā	ruj dṛḍha vi ojas
934	sutaḥ indrāya vāyave	su indra vāyu
934	varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ	varuṇa marut
934	somaḥ arṣati viṣṇave	soma ṛṣ viṣṇu
934	vṛṣāṇam vṛṣabhiḥ yatam	vṛṣan vṛṣan yam
934	sunvanti somam adribhiḥ	su soma adri
934	duhanti śakmanā payaḥ	duh śakman payas
934	bhuvat tritasya marjyaḥ	bhū trita mṛj
934	bhuvat indrāya matsaraḥ	bhū indra matsara
934	sam rūpaiḥ ajyate hariḥ	sam rūpa añj hari
934	abhi īm ṛtasya viṣTapam	abhi īṃ ṛta viṣṭap
934	duhate pṛśnimātaraḥ	duh pṛśni mātṛ
934	cāru priyatamam haviḥ	cāru priyatama havis
934	sam enam ahrutāḥ imāḥ	sam enad ahruta idam
934	giraḥ arṣanti sasrutaḥ	gir ṛṣ sasrut
934	dhenūḥ vāśraḥ avīvaśat	dhenu vāśra vāś
 ---
935	ā naḥ pavasva dhārayā	ā mad pū dhārā
935	pavamāna rayim pṛthum	pū rayi pṛthu
935	yayā jyotiḥ vidāsi naḥ	yad jyotis vid mad
935	indo samudramīṅkhaya	indu samudramīṅkhaya
935	pavasva viśvamejaya	pū viśvamejaya
935	rāyaḥ dhartā naḥ ojasā	rai dhartṛ mad ojas
935	tvayā vīreṇa vīravaḥ	tvad vīra vīravat
935	abhi syāma pṛtanyataḥ	abhi as pṛtany
935	kṣarā naḥ abhi vāryam	kṣar mad abhi vārya
935	pra vājam induḥ iṣyati	pra vāja indu iṣ
935	siṣāsan vājasāḥ ṛṣiḥ	siṣās vāja sā ṛṣi
935	vratā vidānaḥ āyudhā	vrata vid āyudha
935	tam gīrbhiḥ vācamīṅkhayam	tad gir vācamīṅkhaya
935	punānam vāsayāmasi	pū vāsay
935	somam janasya gopatim	soma jana gopati
935	viśvaḥ yasya vrate janaḥ	viśva yad vrata jana
935	dādhāra dharmaṇaḥ pateḥ	dhṛ dharman pati
935	punānasya prabhūvasoḥ	pū prabhūvasu
 ---
936	asarji rathyaḥ yathā	sṛj rathya yathā
936	pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ	pavitra camū su
936	kārṣman vājī ni akramīt	kārṣman vājin ni kram
936	sa vahniḥ soma jāgṛviḥ	tad vahni soma jāgṛvi
936	pavasva devavīḥ ati	pū deva vī ati
936	abhi kośam madhuścutam	abhi kośa madhuścut
936	sa naḥ jyotīṁṣi pūrvya	tad mad jyotis pūrvya
936	pavamāna vi rocaya	pū vi rocay
936	kratve dakṣāya naḥ hinu	kratu dakṣa mad hi
936	śumbhamānaḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ	śubh ṛtāyu
936	mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ	mṛj gabhasti
936	pavate vāre avyaye	pū vāra avyaya
936	sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu	tad viśva dāś vasu
936	somaḥ divyāni pārthivā	soma divya pārthiva
936	pavatām ā antarikṣyā	pū antarikṣya
936	ā divaḥ pṛṣTham aśvayuḥ	ā div pṛṣṭha aśvayu
936	gavyayuḥ soma rohasi	gavyayu soma ruh
936	vīrayuḥ śavasaḥ pate	vīrayu śavas pati
 ---
937	sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā	sa su pā vṛṣan
937	somaḥ pavitre arṣati	soma pavitra ṛṣ
937	vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ	vihan rakṣas devayu
937	sa pavitre vicakṣaṇaḥ	tad pavitra vicakṣaṇa
937	hariḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ	hari ṛṣ dharṇasi
937	abhi yonim kanikradat	abhi yoni kanikrad
937	sa vājī rocanā divaḥ	tad vājin rocana div
937	pavamānaḥ vi dhāvati	pū vi dhāv
937	rakṣohā vāram avyayam	rakṣas han vāra avyaya
937	sa tritasya adhi sānavi	tad trita adhi sānu
937	pavamānaḥ arocayat	pū rocay
937	jāmibhiḥ sūryam saha	jāmi sūrya saha
937	sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā sutaḥ	tad vṛtra han vṛṣan su
937	varivovit adābhyaḥ	varivas vid adābhya
937	somaḥ vājam iva asarat	soma vāja iva sṛ
937	sa devaḥ kavinā iṣitaḥ	tad deva kavi iṣ
937	abhi droṇāni dhāvati	abhi droṇa dhāv
937	induḥ indrāya maṁhanā	indu indra maṃhanā
 ---
938	eṣaḥ u sya vṛṣā rathaḥ	etad u tya vṛṣan ratha
938	avyaḥ vārebhiḥ arṣati	avya vāra ṛṣ
938	gacchan vājam sahasriṇam	gam vāja sahasrin
938	etam tritasya yoṣaṇaḥ	etad trita yoṣan
938	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
938	indum indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
938	etam tyam haritaḥ daśa	etad tya harit daśan
938	marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ	marmṛj apasyu
938	yābhiḥ madāya śumbhate	yad mada śubh
938	eṣa sya mānuṣīṣu ā	etad tya mānuṣa ā
938	śyenaḥ na vikṣu sīdati	śyena na viś sad
938	gacchan jāraḥ na yoṣitam	gam jāra na yoṣit
938	eṣa sya madyaḥ rasaḥ	etad tya mad rasa
938	ava caṣTe divaḥ śiśuḥ	ava cakṣ div śiśu
938	yaḥ induḥ vāram ā aviśat	yad indu vāra āviś
938	eṣa sya pītaye sutaḥ	etad tya pā su
938	hariḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ	hari ṛṣ dharṇasi
938	krandan yonim abhi priyam	krand yoni abhi priya
 ---
939	āśuḥ arṣa bṛhanmate	āśu ṛṣ bṛhat mati
939	pari priyeṇa dhāmnā	pari priya dhāman
939	yatra devāḥ iti bravan	yatra deva iti brū
939	pariṣkṛṇvan aniṣkṛtam	pariṣkṛ a niṣkṛ
939	janāya yātayan iṣaḥ	jana yātay iṣ
939	vṛṣTim divaḥ pari srava	vṛṣṭi div pari sru
939	sutaḥ eti pavitre ā	su i pavitra ā
939	tviṣim dadhānaḥ ojasā	tviṣi dhā ojas
939	vicakṣāṇaḥ virocayan	vicakṣ virocay
939	ayam sa yaḥ divaḥ pari	idam tad yad div pari
939	raghuyāmā pavitre ā	raghu yāman pavitra ā
939	sindhoḥ ūrmā vi akṣarat	sindhu ūrmi vi kṣar
939	āvivāsan parāvataḥ	āvivās parāvat
939	atha u arvāvataḥ sutaḥ	atho arvāvat su
939	indrāya sicyate madhu	indra sic madhu
939	samīcīnāḥ anūṣata	samīcīna nū
939	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
939	yonau ṛtasya sīdata	yoni ṛta sad
 ---
940	punānaḥ akramīt abhi	pū kram abhi
940	viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	viśva mṛdh vicarṣaṇi
940	śumbhanti vipram dhītibhiḥ	śubh vipra dhīti
940	ā yonim aruṇaḥ ruhat	ā yoni aruṇa ruh
940	gamat indram vṛṣā sutaḥ	gam indra vṛṣan su
940	dhruve sadasi sīdati	dhruva sadas sad
940	nū naḥ rayim mahām indo	nu mad rayi maha indu
940	asmabhyam soma viśvataḥ	mad soma viśvatas
940	ā pavasva sahasriṇam	ā pū sahasrin
940	viśvā soma pavamāna	viśva soma pū
940	dyumnāni indo ā bhara	dyumna indu ā bhṛ
940	vidāḥ sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ	vid sahasrin iṣ
940	sa naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara	tad mad pū ā bhṛ
940	rayim stotre suvīryam	rayi stotra su vīrya
940	jarituḥ vardhayā giraḥ	jaritṛ vardhay gir
940	punānaḥ indo ā bhara	pū indu ā bhṛ
940	soma dvibarhasam rayim	soma dvibarhas rayi
940	vṛṣan indo naḥ ukthyam	vṛṣan indu mad ukthya
 ---
941	pra ye gāvaḥ na bhūrṇayaḥ	pra yad go na bhūrṇi
941	tveṣāḥ ayāsaḥ akramuḥ	tveṣa ayās kram
941	ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam	han kṛṣṇa apa tvac
941	suvitasya manāmahe	suvita man
941	ati setum durāvyam	ati setu durāvya
941	sāhvāṁsaḥ dasyum avratam	sah dasyu avrata
941	śṛṇve vṛṣTeḥ iva svanaḥ	śru vṛṣṭi iva svana
941	pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ	pū śuṣmin
941	caranti vidyutaḥ divi	car vidyut div
941	ā pavasva mahīm iṣam	ā pū mah iṣ
941	gomat indo hiraṇyavat	gomat indu hiraṇyavat
941	aśvāvat vājavat sutaḥ	aśvāvat vājavat su
941	sa pavasva vicarṣaṇe	tad pū vicarṣaṇi
941	ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa	ā mah rodas pṛṇ
941	uṣāḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ	uṣas sūrya na raśmi
941	pari naḥ śarmayantyā	pari mad śarmay
941	dhārayā soma viśvataḥ	dhārā soma viśvatas
941	sarā rasā iva viṣTapam	sṛ rasā iva viṣṭap
 ---
942	janayan rocanā divaḥ	janay rocana div
942	janayan apsu sūryam	janay ap sūrya
942	vasānaḥ gāḥ apaḥ hariḥ	vas go ap hari
942	eṣa pratnena manmanā	etad pratna manman
942	devaḥ devebhyaḥ pari	deva deva pari
942	dhārayā pavate sutaḥ	dhārā pū su
942	vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye	vṛdh tūrvi
942	pavante vājasātaye	pū vājasāti
942	somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ	soma sahasra pājas
942	duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ	duh pratna id payas
942	pavitre pari sicyate	pavitra pari sic
942	krandan devān ajījanat	krand deva jan
942	abhi viśvāni vāryā	abhi viśva vārya
942	abhi devān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	abhi deva ṛtāvṛdh
942	somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati	soma pū ṛṣ
942	gomat naḥ soma vīravat	gomat mad soma vīravat
942	aśvāvat vājavat sutaḥ	aśvāvat vājavat su
942	pavasva bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ	pū bṛhat iṣ
 ---
943	yaḥ atyaḥ iva mṛjyate	yad atya iva mṛj
943	gobhiḥ madāya haryataḥ	go mada haryata
943	tam gīrbhiḥ vāsayāmasi	tad gir vāsay
943	tam naḥ viśvāḥ avasyuvaḥ	tad mad viśva avasyu
943	giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā	gir śubh pūrvathā
943	indum indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
943	punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ	pū yā haryata
943	somaḥ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ	soma gir pariṣkṛ
943	viprasya medhyātitheḥ	vipra medhyātithi
943	pavamāna vidāḥ rayim	pavamāna vid rayi
943	asmabhyam soma suśriyam	mad soma su śrī
943	indo sahasravarcasam	indu sahasra varcas
943	induḥ atyaḥ na vājasṛt	indu atya na vāja sṛt
943	kanikranti pavitre ā	kanikrad pavitra ā
943	yat akṣār ati devayuḥ	yat kṣar ati devayu
943	pavasva vājasātaye	pū vāja sāti
943	viprasya gṛṇataḥ vṛdhe	vipra gṛ vṛdh
943	soma rāsva suvīryam	soma rā su vīrya
 ---
944	pra naḥ indo mahe tane	pra mad indu mah tan
944	ūrmim na bibhrat arṣasi	ūrmi na bhṛ ṛṣ
944	abhi devān ayāsyaḥ	abhi deva ayāsya
944	matī juṣTaḥ dhiyā hitaḥ	mati juṣ dhī hi
944	somaḥ hinve parāvati	soma hi parāvat
944	viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ	vipra dhārā kavi
944	ayam deveṣu jāgṛviḥ	idam deva jāgṛvi
944	sutaḥ eti pavitre ā	su i pavitra ā
944	somaḥ yāti vicarṣaṇiḥ	soma yā vicarṣaṇi
944	sa naḥ pavasva vājayuḥ	tad mad pū vājayu
944	cakrāṇaḥ cārum adhvaram	kṛ cāru adhvara
944	barhiṣmān ā vivāsati	barhiṣmat ā vivās
944	sa naḥ bhagāya vāyave	tad mad bhaga vāyu
944	vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ	vipra vīra sadāvṛdha
944	somaḥ deveṣu ā yamat	soma deva ā yam
944	sa naḥ adya vasuttaye	tad mad adya vasutti
944	kratuvit gātuvittamaḥ	kratu vid gātu vittama
944	vājam jeṣi śravaḥ bṛhat	vāja ji śravas bṛhat
 ---
945	sa pavasva madāya kam	tad pū mada kaṃ
945	nṛcakṣāḥ devavītaye	nṛ cakṣas deva vīti
945	indo indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
945	sa naḥ arṣa abhi dūtyam	tad mad ṛṣ abhi dūtī
945	tvam indrāya tośase	tvad indra tuś
945	devān sakhibhyaḥ ā varam	deva sakhi ā vara
945	uta tvām aruṇam vayam	uta tvad aruṇa mad
945	gobhiḥ añjmaḥ madāya kam	go añj mada kaṃ
945	vi naḥ rāye duraḥ vṛdhi	vi mad rai dvār vṛ
945	ati ū pavitram akramīt	ati u pavitra kram
945	vājī dhuram na yāmani	vājin dhur na yāman
945	induḥ deveṣu patyate	indu deva paty
945	sam ī sakhāyaḥ asvaran	sam ī sakhi svar
945	vane krīLantam atyavim	vana krīḍ atyavi
945	indum nāvāḥ anūṣata	indu nāva nū
945	tayā pavasva dhārayā	tad pū dhārā
945	yayā pītaḥ vicakṣase	yad pā vicakṣ
945	indo stotre suvīryam	indu stotṛ su vīrya
 ---
946	asṛgran devavītaye	sṛj deva vīti
946	atyāsaḥ kṛtvyāḥ iva	atya kṛtvya iva
946	kṣarantaḥ parvatāvṛdhaḥ	kṣar parvatāvṛdh
946	pariṣkṛtāsaḥ indavaḥ	pariṣkṛ indu
946	yoṣā iva pitryāvatī	yoṣā iva pitryāvat
946	vāyum somāḥ asṛkṣata	vāyu soma sṛj
946	ete somāsaḥ indavaḥ	etad soma indu
946	prayasvantaḥ camū sutāḥ	prayasvat camū su
946	indram vardhanti karmabhiḥ	indra vṛdh karman
946	ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ	ā dhāv suhastī
946	śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā	śukra grah manthin
946	gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram	go śrī matsara
946	sa pavasva dhanaṁjaya	tad pū dhanaṃjaya
946	prayantā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ	prayantṛ rādhas mah
946	asmabhyam soma gātuvit	mad soma gātu vid
946	etam mṛjanti marjyam	etad mṛj mṛj
946	pavamānam daśa kṣipaḥ	pū daśan kṣip
946	indrāya matsaram madam	indra matsara mada
 ---
947	ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā	idam soma su kṛtyā
947	mahaḥ cit abhi avardhata	maha cit abhi vṛdh
947	mandānaḥ ut vṛṣāyate	mad ud vṛṣāy
947	kṛtāni it asya kartvā	kṛ id idam kartva
947	cetante dasyutarhaṇā	cit dasyu tarhaṇa
947	ṛṇā ca dhṛṣṇuḥ cayate	ṛṇa ca dhṛṣṇu ci
947	āt somaḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ	āt soma indriya rasa
947	vajraḥ sahasrasāḥ bhuvat	vajra sahasra sā bhū
947	uktham yat asya jāyate	uktha yat idam jan
947	svayam kaviḥ vidhartari	svayam kavi vidhartṛ
947	viprāya ratnam icchati	vipra ratna iṣ
947	yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ	yadi marmṛj dhī
947	siṣāsatū rayīṇām	siṣāsatu rayi
947	vājeṣu arvatām iva	vāja arvant iva
947	bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi	bhara ji as
 ---
948	tam tvā nṛmṇāni bibhratam	tad tvad nṛmṇa bhṛ
948	sadhastheṣu mahaḥ divaḥ	sadhastha mah div
948	cārum sukṛtyayā īmahe	cāru su kṛtyā ī
948	saṁvṛktadhṛṣṇum ukthyam	saṃvṛj dhṛṣṇu ukthya
948	mahāmahivratam madam	mahat mahi vrata mada
948	śatam puraḥ rurukṣaṇim	śata pur rurukṣaṇi
948	ataḥ tvā rayim abhi	atas tvad rayi abhi
948	rājānam sukrato divaḥ	rājan su kratu div
948	suparṇaḥ avyathiḥ bharat	suparṇa avyathi bhṛ
948	viśvasmai it svar dṛśe	viśva id svar dṛś
948	sādhāraṇam rajasturam	sādhāraṇa rajastur
948	gopām ṛtasya viḥ bharat	gopā ṛta vi bhṛ
948	adhā hinvānaḥ indriyam	adha hi indriya
948	jyāyaḥ mahitvam ānaśe	jyāyas mahi tva aś
948	abhiṣTikṛt vicarṣaṇiḥ	abhiṣṭi kṛt vicarṣaṇi
 ---
949	pavasva vṛṣTim ā su naḥ	pū vṛṣṭi ā su mad
949	apām ūrmim divaḥ pari	ap ūrmi div pari
949	ayakṣmāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ	ayakṣman bṛhat iṣ
949	tayā pavasva dhārayā	tad pū dhārā
949	yayā gāvaḥ iha āgaman	yad go iha gam
949	janyāsaḥ upa naḥ gṛham	janya upa mad gṛha
949	ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā	ghṛta pū dhārā
949	yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ	yajña deva vītama
949	asmabhyam vṛṣTim ā pava	mad vṛṣṭi ā pū
949	sa naḥ ūrje vi avyayam	tad mad ūrj vi avyaya
949	pavitram dhāva dhārayā	pavitra dhāv dhārā
949	devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam	deva śru hi kaṃ
949	pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat	pū syand
949	rakṣāṁsi apajaṅghanat	rakṣas apajaṅghan
949	pratnavat rocayan rucaḥ	pratna vat rocay ruc
 ---
950	ut te śuṣmāsaḥ īrate	ud tvad śuṣma īr
950	sindhoḥ ūrmeḥ iva svanaḥ	sindhu ūrmi iva svana
950	vāṇasya codayā pavim	vāṇa coday pavi
950	prasave te ut īrate	prasava tvad ud īr
950	tisraḥ vācaḥ makhasyuvaḥ	tri vāc makhasyu
950	yat avye eṣi sānavi	yat avya i sānu
950	avyaḥ vāre pari priyam	avya vāra pari priya
950	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
950	pavamānam madhuścutam	pū madhuścut
950	ā pavasva madintama	ā pū madintama
950	pavitram dhārayā kave	pavitra dhārā kavi
950	arkasya yonim āsadam	arka yoni āsad
950	sa pavasva madintama	tad pū madintama
950	gobhiḥ añjānaḥ aktubhiḥ	go añj aktu
950	indo indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
 ---
951	adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutam	adhvaryu adri su
951	somam pavitre ā sṛja	soma pavitra ā sṛj
951	punīhi indrāya pātave	pū indra pā
951	divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamam	div pīyūṣa uttama
951	somam indrāya vajriṇe	soma indra vajrin
951	sunotā madhumattamam	su madhumattama
951	tava tye indo andhasaḥ	tvad tya indu andhas
951	devāḥ madhoḥ vi aśnate	deva madhu vi aś
951	pavamānasya marutaḥ	pū marut
951	tvam hi soma vardhayan	tvad hi soma vardhay
951	sutaḥ madāya bhūrṇaye	su mada bhūrṇi
951	vṛṣan stotāram ūtaye	vṛṣan stotṛ ūti
951	abhi arṣa vicakṣaṇa	abhi ṛṣ vicakṣaṇa
951	pavitram dhārayā sutaḥ	pavitra dhārā su
951	abhi vājam uta śravaḥ	abhi vāja uta śravas
 ---
952	pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayiḥ	pari dyukṣa san rayi
952	bharat vājam naḥ andhasā	bhṛ vāja mad andhas
952	suvānaḥ arṣa pavitre ā	su ṛṣ pavitra ā
952	tava pratnebhiḥ adhvabhiḥ	tvad pratna adhvan
952	avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ	avya vāra pari priya
952	sahasradhāraḥ yāt tanā	sahasra dhārā yā tan
952	caruḥ na yaḥ tam īṅkhaya	caru na yad tad īṅkhay
952	indo na dānam īṅkhaya	indu na dāna īṅkhay
952	vadhaiḥ vadhasno īṅkhaya	vadha vadhasnu īṅkhay
952	ni śuṣmam indo eṣām	ni śuṣma indu idam
952	puruhūta janānām	puru hvā jana
952	yaḥ asmān ādideśati	yad mad ādiś
952	śatam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ	śata mad indu ūti
952	sahasram vā śucīnām	sahasra vā śuci
952	pavasva maṁhayadrayiḥ	pū maṃhay rayi
 ---
953	ut te śuṣmāsaḥ asthuḥ	ud tvad śuṣma sthā
953	rakṣaḥ bhindantaḥ adrivaḥ	rakṣas bhid adrivat
953	nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ	nud yad parispṛdh
953	ayā nijaghniḥ ojasā	idam nijaghni ojas
953	rathasaṁge dhane hite	ratha saṅga dhana dhā
953	stavai abibhyuṣā hṛdā	stu a bhī hṛd
953	asya vratāni na ādhṛṣe	idam vrata na ādhṛṣ
953	pavamānasya dūḍhyā	pū dūḍhya
953	ruja yaḥ tvā pṛtanyati	ruj yad tvad pṛtany
953	tam hinvanti madacyutam	tad hi madacyut
953	harim nadīṣu vājinam	hari nadī vājin
953	indum indrāya matsaram	indu indra matsara
 ---
954	asya pratnām anu dyutam	idam pratna anu dyut
954	śukram duduhre ahrayaḥ	śukra duh ahraya
954	payaḥ sahasrasām ṛṣim	payas sahasra sā ṛṣi
954	ayam sūryaḥ iva upadṛk	idam sūrya iva upadṛś
954	ayam sarāṁsi dhāvati	idam saras dhāv
954	sapta pravataḥ ā divam	saptan pravat ā div
954	ayam viśvāni tiṣThati	idam viśva sthā
954	punānaḥ bhuvanā upari	pū bhuvana upari
954	somaḥ devaḥ na sūryaḥ	soma deva na sūrya
954	pari naḥ devavītaye	pari mad deva vīti
954	vājān arṣasi gomataḥ	vāja ṛṣ gomat
954	punānaḥ indo indrayuḥ	pū indu indrayu
 ---
955	yavaṁyavam naḥ andhasā	yava yava mad andhas
955	puṣTampuṣTam pari srava	puṣṭa puṣṭa pari sru
955	soma viśvā ca saubhagā	soma viśva ca saubhaga
955	indo yathā tava stavaḥ	indu yathā tvad stava
955	yathā te jātam andhasaḥ	yathā tvad jāta andhas
955	ni barhiṣi priye sadaḥ	ni barhis priya sad
955	uta naḥ govit aśvavit	uta mad go vid aśva vid
955	pavasva soma andhasā	pū soma andhas
955	makṣūtamebhiḥ ahabhiḥ	makṣūtama aha
955	yaḥ jināti na jīyate	yad jyā na ji
955	hanti śatrum abhītya	han śatru abhī
955	sa pavasva sahasrajit	tad pū sahasra jit
 ---
956	pari somaḥ ṛtam bṛhat	pari soma ṛta bṛhat
956	āśuḥ pavitre arṣati	āśu pavitra ṛṣ
956	vighnan rakṣāṁsi devayuḥ	vihan rakṣas devayu
956	yat somaḥ vājam arṣati	yat soma vāja ṛṣ
956	śatam dhārāḥ apasyuvaḥ	śata dhārā apasyu
956	indrasya sakhyam āviśan	indra sakhya āviś
956	abhi tvā yoṣaṇaḥ daśa	abhi tvad yoṣan daśan
956	jāram na kanyā anūṣata	jāra na kanyā nū
956	mṛjyase soma sātaye	mṛj soma sāti
956	tvam indrāya viṣṇave	tvad indra viṣṇu
956	svāduḥ indo pari srava	svādu indu pari sru
956	nṛṛn stotṛṛn pāhi aṁhasaḥ	nṛ stotṛ pā aṃhas
 ---
957	pra te dhārāḥ asaścataḥ	pra tvad dhārā asaścat
957	divaḥ na yanti vṛṣTayaḥ	div na i vṛṣṭi
957	acchā vājam sahasriṇam	acchā vāja sahasrin
957	abhi priyāṇi kāvyā	abhi priya kāvya
957	viśvā cakṣāṇaḥ arṣati	viśva cakṣ ṛṣ
957	hariḥ tuñjānaḥ āyudhā	hari tuj āyudha
957	sa marmṛjānaḥ āyubhiḥ	tad marmṛj āyu
957	ibhaḥ rājā iva suvrataḥ	ibha rājan iva suvrata
957	śyenaḥ na vaṁsu sīdati	śyena na sad
957	sa naḥ viśvā divaḥ vasu	tad mad viśva div
957	uta u pṛthivyāḥ adhi	div pṛthivī adhi
957	punānaḥ indo ā bhara	pū indu ā bhṛ
 ---
958	tarat sa mandī dhāvati	tṛ tad mandin dhāv
958	dhārā sutasya andhasaḥ	dhārā su andhas
958	tarat sa mandī dhāvati	tṛ tad mandin dhāv
958	usrā veda vasūnām	usrā vid vasu
958	martasya devī avasaḥ	marta devī avas
958	tarat sa mandī dhāvati	tṛ tad mandin dhāv
958	dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyoḥ	dhvasra puruṣanti
958	ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe	ā sahasra dā
958	tarat sa mandī dhāvati	tṛ tad mandin dhāv
958	ā yayoḥ triṁśatam tanā	ā yad triṃśat tan
958	sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe	sahasra ca dā
958	tarat sa mandī dhāvati	tṛ tad mandin dhāv
 ---
959	pavasva gojit aśvajit	pū go jit aśva jit
959	viśvajit soma raṇyajit	viśva jit soma raṇya jit
959	prajāvat ratnam ā bhara	prajāvat ratna ā bhṛ
959	pavasva adbhyaḥ adābhyaḥ	pū ap adābhya
959	pavasva oṣadhībhyaḥ	pū oṣadhī
959	pavasva dhiṣaṇābhyaḥ	pū dhiṣaṇā
959	tvam soma pavamānaḥ	tvad soma pū
959	viśvāni duritā tara	viśva durita tṛ
959	kaviḥ sīda ni barhiṣi	kavi sad ni barhis
959	pavamāna svar vidaḥ	pū svar vid
959	jāyamānaḥ abhavaḥ mahān	jan bhū mahat
959	indo viśvān abhi it asi	indu viśva abhi id as
 ---
960	pra gāyatreṇa gāyata	pra gāyatra gā
960	pavamānam vicarṣaṇim	pū vicarṣaṇi
960	indum sahasracakṣasam	indu sahasra cakṣas
960	tam tvā sahasracakṣasam	tad tvad sahasra cakṣas
960	atha u sahasrabharṇasam	atho sahasrabharṇas
960	ati vāram apāviṣuḥ	ati vāra pū
960	ati vārān pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat	ati vāra pū syand
960	kalaśān abhi dhāvati	kalaśa abhi dhāv
960	indrasya hārdi āviśan	indra hārdi āviś
960	indrasya soma rādhase	indra soma rādhas
960	śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe	śam pū vicarṣaṇi
960	prajāvat retaḥ ā bhara	prajāvat retas ā bhṛ
 ---
961	ayā vītī pari srava	idam vīti pari sru
961	yaḥ te indo madeṣu ā	yad tvad indu mada ā
961	avāhan navatīḥ nava	avahan navati navan
961	puraḥ sadyaḥ itthādhiye	pur sadyas divodāsa
961	divodāsāya śambaram	divodāsa śambara
961	adha tyam turvaśam yadum	adha tya turvaśa yadu
961	pari naḥ aśvam aśvavit	pari mad aśva aśva vid
961	gomat indo hiraṇyavat	gomat indu hiraṇyavat
961	kṣarā sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ	kṣar sahasrin iṣ
961	pavamānasya te vayam	pū tvad mad
961	pavitram abhyundataḥ	pavitra abhyund
961	sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe	sakhi tva ā vṛ
961	ye te pavitram ūrmayaḥ	yad tvad pavitra ūrmi
961	abhikṣaranti dhārayā	abhikṣar dhārā
961	tebhiḥ naḥ soma mṛLaya	tad mad soma mṛḍay
961	sa naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara	tad mad pū ā bhṛ
961	rayim vīravatīm iṣam	rayi vīravat iṣ
961	īśānaḥ soma viśvataḥ	īś soma viśvatas
961	etam u tyam daśa kṣipaḥ	etad u tya daśan kṣip
961	mṛjanti sindhumātaram	mṛj sindhu mātṛ
961	sam ādityebhiḥ akhyata	sam āditya khyā
961	sam indreṇa uta vāyunā	sam indra uta vāyu
961	sutaḥ eti pavitre ā	su i pavitra ā
961	sam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ	sam sūrya raśmi
961	sa naḥ bhagāya vāyave	tad mad bhaga vāyu
961	pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān	pūṣan pū madhumat
961	cāruḥ mitre varuṇe ca	cāru mitra varuṇa ca
961	uccā te jātam andhasaḥ	uccā tvad jāta andhas
961	divi sat bhūmī ā dade	div as bhūmi ā dā
961	ugram śarma mahi śravaḥ	ugra śarman mahi śravas
961	enā viśvāni aryaḥ ā	enad viśva ari ā
961	dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām	dyumna mānuṣa
961	siṣāsantaḥ vanāmahe	siṣās van
961	sa naḥ indrāya yajyave	tad mad indra yajyu
961	varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ	varuṇa marut
961	varivovit pari srava	varivas vid pari sru
961	upa u su jātam apturam	upa u su jan aptur
961	gobhiḥ bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam	go bhaṅga pariṣkṛ
961	indum devāḥ ayāsiṣuḥ	indu deva yā
961	tam it vardhantu naḥ giraḥ	tad id vṛdh mad gir
961	vatsam saṁśiśvarīḥ iva	vatsa saṃśiśvan iva
961	yaḥ indrasya hṛdaṁsaniḥ	yad indra hṛdaṃsani
961	arṣā naḥ soma śam gave	ṛṣ mad soma śam go
961	dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam	duh pyā iṣ
961	vardhā samudram ukthyam	vṛdh samudra ukthya
961	pavamānaḥ ajījanat	pū jan
961	divaḥ citram na tanyatum	div citra na tanyatu
961	jyotiḥ vaiśvānaram bṛhat	jyotis vaiśvānara bṛhat
961	pavamānasya te rasaḥ	pū tvad rasa
961	madaḥ rājan aducchunaḥ	mada rājan aducchuna
961	vi vāram avyam arṣati	vi vāra avya ṛṣ
961	pavamāna rasaḥ tava	pū rasa tvad
961	dakṣaḥ vi rājati dyumān	dakṣa vi rāj dyumat
961	jyotiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe	jyotis viśva svar dṛś
961	yaḥ te madaḥ vareṇyaḥ	yad tvad mada vareṇya
961	tenā pavasva andhasā	tad pū andhas
961	devāvīḥ aghaśaṁsahā	devāvī agha śaṃsa han
961	jaghniḥ vṛtram amitriyam	jaghni vṛtra amitriya
961	sasniḥ vājam divedive	sasni vāja diva diva
961	goṣāḥ u aśvasāḥ asi	go sā u aśva sā as
961	sammiślaḥ aruṣaḥ bhava	sammiśla aruṣa bhū
961	sūpasthābhiḥ na dhenubhiḥ	su upastha na dhenu
961	sīdan śyenaḥ na yonim ā	sad śyena na yoni ā
961	sa pavasva yaḥ āvitha	tad pū yad av
961	indram vṛtrāya hantave	indra vṛtra han
961	vavrivāṁsam mahīḥ apaḥ	vṛ mahi ap
961	suvīrāsaḥ vayam dhanā	su vīra mad dhana
961	jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ	ji soma mīḍhvas
961	punānaḥ vardha naḥ giraḥ	pū vṛdh mad gir
961	tvotāsaḥ tava avasā	tvota tvad avas
961	syāma vanvantaḥ āmuraḥ	as van āmur
961	soma vrateṣu jāgṛhi	soma vrata jāgṛ
961	apaghnan pavate mṛdhaḥ	apahan pū mṛdh
961	apa somaḥ arāvṇaḥ	apa soma arāvan
961	gacchan indrasya niṣkṛtam	gam indra niṣkṛta
961	mahaḥ naḥ rāyaḥ ā bhara	mah mad rai ā bhṛ
961	pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ	pū han mṛdh
961	rāsva indo vīravat yaśaḥ	rā indu vīravat yaśas
961	na tvā śatam cana hrutaḥ	na tvad śata cana hrut
961	rādhaḥ ditsantam ā minan	rādhas dits ā mī
961	yat punānaḥ makhasyase	yat pū makhasy
961	pavasva indo vṛṣā sutaḥ	pū indu vṛṣan su
961	kṛdhī naḥ yaśasaḥ jane	kṛ mad yaśas jana
961	viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ jahi	viśva apa dviṣ han
961	asya te sakhye vayam	idam tvad sakhya mad
961	tava indo dyumne uttame	tvad indu dyumna uttama
961	sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ	sah pṛtany
961	yā te bhīmāni āyudhā	yad tvad bhīma āyudha
961	tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe	tigma as dhvṛ
961	rakṣā samasya naḥ nidaḥ	rakṣ sama mad nid
 ---
962	ete asṛgram indavaḥ	etad sṛj indu
962	tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ	tiras pavitra āśu
962	viśvāni abhi saubhagā	viśva abhi saubhaga
962	vighnantaḥ duritā puru	vihan durita puru
962	sugā tokāya vājinaḥ	suga toka vājin
962	tanā kṛṇvantaḥ arvate	tan kṛ arvant
962	kṛṇvantaḥ varivaḥ gave	kṛ varivas go
962	abhi arṣanti suṣTutim	abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti
962	iLām asmabhyam saṁyatam	iḍā mad saṃyat
962	asāvi aṁśuḥ madāya	su aṃśu mada
962	apsu dakṣaḥ giriṣThāḥ	ap dakṣa giriṣṭhā
962	śyenaḥ na yonim ā asadat	śyena na yoni āsad
962	śubhram andhaḥ devavātam	śubhra andhas deva van
962	apsu dhūtaḥ nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ	ap dhū nṛ su
962	svadanti gāvaḥ payobhiḥ	svad go payas
962	āt īm aśvam na hetāraḥ	āt īṃ aśva na hetṛ
962	aśūśubhan amṛtāya	śubh amṛta
962	madhvaḥ rasam sadhamāde	madhu rasa sadhamāda
962	yāḥ te dhārāḥ madhuścutaḥ	yad tvad dhārā madhuścut
962	asṛgram indo ūtaye	sṛj indu ūti
962	tābhiḥ pavitram ā asadaḥ	tad pavitra āsad
962	saḥ arṣa indrāya pītaye	tad ṛṣ indra pā
962	tiraḥ romāṇi avyayā	tiras roman avyaya
962	sīdan yonā vaneṣu ā	sad yoni vana ā
962	tvam indo pari srava	tvad indu pari sru
962	svādiṣThaḥ aṅgirobhyaḥ	svādiṣṭha aṅgiras
962	varivovit ghṛtam payaḥ	varivas vid ghṛta payas
962	ayam vicarṣaṇiḥ hitaḥ	idam vicarṣaṇi hi
962	pavamānaḥ sa cetati	pū tad cit
962	hinvānaḥ āpyam bṛhat	hi āpya bṛhat
962	eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ	etad vṛṣan vṛṣan vrata
962	pavamānaḥ aśastihā	pū aśasti han
962	karat vasūni dāśuṣe	kṛ vasu dāś
962	ā pavasva sahasriṇam	ā pū sahasrin
962	rayim gomantam aśvinam	rayi gomat aśvin
962	puruścandram puruspṛham	puru ścandra puruspṛh
962	eṣa sya pari sicyate	etad tya pari sic
962	marmṛjyamānaḥ āyubhiḥ	marmṛj āyu
962	urugāyaḥ kavikratuḥ	uru gāya kavi kratu
962	sahasrotiḥ śatāmaghaḥ	sahasra ūti śatāmagha
962	vimānaḥ rajasaḥ kaviḥ	vimā rajas kavi
962	indrāya pavate madaḥ	indra pū mada
962	girā jātaḥ iha stutaḥ	giri jan iha stu
962	induḥ indrāya dhīyate	indu indra dhā
962	viḥ yonā vasatau iva	vi yoni vasati iva
962	pavamānaḥ sutaḥ nṛbhiḥ	pū su nṛ
962	somaḥ vājam iva asarat	soma vāja iva sṛ
962	camūṣu śakmanā āsadam	camū śakman āsad
962	tam tripṛṣThe trivandhure	tad tri pṛṣṭha tri vandhura
962	rathe yuñjanti yātave	ratha yuj yā
962	ṛṣīṇām sapta dhītibhiḥ	ṛṣi saptan dhīti
962	tam sotāraḥ dhanaspṛtam	tad sotṛ dhana spṛt
962	āśum vājāya yātave	āśu vāja yā
962	harim hinota vājinam	hari hi vājin
962	āviśan kalaśam sutaḥ	āviś kalaśa su
962	viśvāḥ arṣan abhi śriyaḥ	viśva ṛṣ abhi śrī
962	śūraḥ na goṣu tiṣThati	śūra na go sthā
962	ā te indo madāya kam	ā tvad indu mada kaṃ
962	payaḥ duhanti āyavaḥ	payas duh āyu
962	devāḥ devebhyaḥ madhu	deva deva madhu
962	ā naḥ somam pavitre ā	ā mad soma pavitra ā
962	sṛjatā madhumattamam	sṛj madhumattama
962	devebhyaḥ devaśruttamam	deva deva śruttama
962	ete somāḥ asṛkṣata	etad soma sṛj
962	gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe	gṛ śravas mah
962	madintamasya dhārayā	madintama dhārā
962	abhi gavyāni vītaye	abhi gavya vīti
962	nṛmṇā punānaḥ arṣasi	nṛmṇa pū ṛṣ
962	sanadvājaḥ pari srava	san vāja pari sru
962	uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ	uta mad gomat iṣ
962	viśvāḥ arṣa pariṣTubhaḥ	viśva ṛṣ pariṣṭubh
962	gṛṇānaḥ jamadagninā	gṛ jamadagni
962	pavasva vācaḥ agriyaḥ	pū vāc agriya
962	soma citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	soma citra ūti
962	abhi viśvāni kāvyā	abhi viśva kāvya
962	tvam samudriyāḥ apaḥ	tvad samudriya ap
962	agriyaḥ vācaḥ īrayan	agriya vāc īray
962	pavasva viśvamejaya	pū viśvamejaya
962	tubhya imā bhuvanā kave	tvad idam bhuvana kavi
962	mahimne soma tasthire	mahiman soma sthā
962	tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ	tvad ṛṣ sindhu
962	pra te divaḥ na vṛṣTayaḥ	pra tvad div na vṛṣṭi
962	dhārāḥ yanti asaścataḥ	dhārā i asaścat
962	abhi śukrām upastiram	abhi śukra upastir
962	indrāya indum punītana	indra indu pū
962	ugram dakṣāya sādhanam	ugra dakṣa sādhana
962	īśānam vītirādhasam	īś vīti rādhas
962	pavamānaḥ ṛtaḥ kaviḥ	pū ṛta kavi
962	somaḥ pavitram ā asadat	soma pavitra āsad
962	dadhat stotre suvīryam	dhā stotṛ su vīrya
 ---
963	ā pavasva sahasriṇam	ā pū sahasrin
963	rayim soma suvīryam	rayi soma su vīrya
963	asme śravāṁsi dhāraya	mad śravas dhāray
963	iṣam ūrjam ca pinvase	iṣ ūrj ca pinv
963	indrāya matsarintamaḥ	indra matsarintama
963	camūṣu ā ni sīdasi	camū ā ni sad
963	sutaḥ indrāya viṣṇave	su indra viṣṇu
963	somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat	soma kalaśa kṣar
963	madhumān astu vāyave	madhumat as vāyu
963	ete asṛgram āśavaḥ	etad sṛj āśu
963	ati hvarāṁsi babhravaḥ	ati hvaras babhru
963	somāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā	soma ṛta dhārā
963	indram vardhantaḥ apturaḥ	indra vṛdh aptur
963	kṛṇvantaḥ viśvam āryam	kṛ viśva ārya
963	apaghnantaḥ arāvṇaḥ	apahan arāvan
963	sutāḥ anu svam ā rajaḥ	su anu sva ā rajas
963	abhi arṣanti babhravaḥ	abhi ṛṣ babhru
963	indram gacchantaḥ indavaḥ	indra gam indu
963	ayā pavasva dhārayā	idam pū dhārā
963	yayā sūryam arocayaḥ	yad sūrya rocay
963	hinvānaḥ mānuṣīḥ apaḥ	hi mānuṣa ap
963	ayukta sūraḥ etaśam	yuj svar etaśa
963	pavamānaḥ manau adhi	pū manu adhi
963	antarikṣeṇa yātave	antarikṣa yā
963	uta tyāḥ haritaḥ daśa	uta tya harit daśan
963	sūraḥ ayukta yātave	svar yuj yā
963	induḥ indraḥ iti bruvan	indu indra iti brū
963	pari itaḥ vāyave sutam	pari itas vāyu su
963	giraḥ indrāya matsaram	gir indra matsara
963	avyaḥ vāreṣu siñcata	avya vāra sic
963	pavamāna vidāḥ rayim	pū vid rayi
963	asmabhyam soma duṣTaram	mad soma duṣṭara
963	yaḥ dūṇāśaḥ vanuṣyatā	yad dūṇāśa vanuṣy
963	abhi arṣa sahasriṇam	abhi ṛṣ sahasrin
963	rayim gomantam aśvinam	rayi gomat aśvin
963	abhi vājam uta śravaḥ	abhi vāja uta śravas
963	somaḥ devaḥ na sūryaḥ	soma deva na sūrya
963	adribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ	adri pū su
963	dadhānaḥ kalaśe rasam	dhā kalaśa rasa
963	ete dhāmāni āryā	etad dhāman ārya
963	śukrāḥ ṛtasya dhārayā	śukra ṛta dhārā
963	vājam gomantam akṣaran	vāja gomat kṣar
963	sutāḥ indrāya vajriṇe	su indra vajrin
963	somāsaḥ dadhyāśiraḥ	soma dadhi āśir
963	pavitram ati akṣaran	pavitra ati kṣar
963	pra soma madhumattamaḥ	pra soma madhumattama
963	rāye arṣa pavitre ā	rai ṛṣ pavitra ā
963	madaḥ yaḥ devavītamaḥ	mada yad deva vītama
963	tam ī mṛjanti āyavaḥ	tad ī mṛj āyu
963	harim nadīṣu vājinam	hari nadī vājin
963	indum indrāya matsaram	indu indra matsara
963	ā pavasva hiraṇyavat	ā pū hiraṇyavat
963	aśvāvat soma vīravat	aśvāvat soma vīravat
963	vājam gomantam ā bhara	vāja gomat ā bhṛ
963	pari vāje na vājayum	pari vāja na vājayu
963	avyaḥ vāreṣu siñcata	avya vāra sic
963	indrāya madhumattamam	indra madhumattama
963	kavim mṛjanti marjyam	kavi mṛj mṛj
963	dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ	dhī vipra avasyu
963	vṛṣā kanikrat arṣati	vṛṣan kanikrad ṛṣ
963	vṛṣaṇam dhībhiḥ apturam	vṛṣan dhī aptur
963	somam ṛtasya dhārayā	soma ṛta dhārā
963	matī viprāḥ sam asvaran	mati vipra sam svar
963	pavasva deva āyuṣak	pū deva āyuṣak
963	indram gacchatu te madaḥ	indra gam tvad mada
963	vāyum ā roha dharmaṇā	vāyu ā ruh dharman
963	pavamāna ni tośase	pū ni tuś
963	rayim soma śravāyyam	rayi soma śravāyya
963	priyaḥ samudram ā viśa	priya samudra ā viś
963	apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ	apahan pū mṛdh
963	kratuvit soma matsaraḥ	kratu vid soma matsara
963	nudasva adevayum janam	nud adevayu jana
963	pavamānāḥ asṛkṣata	pū sṛj
963	somāḥ śukrāsaḥ indavaḥ	soma śukra indu
963	abhi viśvāni kāvyā	abhi viśva kāvya
963	pavamānāsaḥ āśavaḥ	pū āśu
963	śubhrāḥ asṛgram indavaḥ	śubhra sṛj indu
963	ghnantaḥ viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ	han viśva apa dviṣ
963	pavamānāḥ divaḥ pari	pū div pari
963	antarikṣāt asṛkṣata	antarikṣa sṛj
963	pṛthivyāḥ adhi sānavi	pṛthivī adhi sānu
963	punānaḥ soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
963	indo viśvāḥ apa sridhaḥ	indu viśva apa sridh
963	jahi rakṣāṁsi sukrato	han rakṣas su kratu
963	apaghnan soma rakṣasaḥ	apahan soma rakṣas
963	abhi arṣa kanikradat	abhi ṛṣ kanikrad
963	dyumantam śuṣmam uttamam	dyumat śuṣma uttama
963	asme vasūni dhāraya	mad vasu dhāray
963	soma divyāni pārthivā	soma divya pārthiva
963	indo viśvāni vāryā	indu viśva vārya
 ---
964	vṛṣā soma dyumān asi	vṛṣan soma dyumat as
964	vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ	vṛṣan deva vṛṣan vrata
964	vṛṣā dharmāṇi dadhiṣe	vṛṣan dharma dhā
964	vṛṣṇaḥ te vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ	vṛṣan tvad vṛṣṇya śavas
964	vṛṣā vanam vṛṣā madaḥ	vṛṣan vana vṛṣan mada
964	satyam vṛṣan vṛṣā it asi	satya vṛṣan vṛṣan id as
964	aśvaḥ na cakradaḥ vṛṣā	aśva na krand vṛṣan
964	sam gāḥ indo sam arvataḥ	sam go indu sam arvant
964	vi naḥ rāye duraḥ vṛdhi	vi mad rai dvār vṛ
964	asṛkṣata pra vājinaḥ	sṛj pra vājin
964	gavyā somāsaḥ aśvayā	gavyā soma aśvayā
964	śukrāsaḥ vīrayā āśavaḥ	śukra vīrayā āśu
964	śumbhamānāḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ	śubh ṛtāyu
964	mṛjyamānāḥ gabhastyoḥ	mṛj gabhasti
964	pavante vāre avyaye	pū vāra avyaya
964	te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu	tad viśva dāś vasu
964	somāḥ divyāni pārthivā	soma divya pārthiva
964	pavantām ā antarikṣyā	pū āntarikṣa
964	pavamānasya viśvavit	pū viśva vid
964	pra te sargāḥ asṛkṣata	pra tvad sarga sṛj
964	sūryasya iva na raśmayaḥ	sūrya iva na raśmi
964	ketum kṛṇvan divaḥ pari	ketu kṛ div pari
964	viśvā rūpā abhi arṣasi	viśva rūpa abhi ṛṣ
964	samudraḥ soma pinvase	samudra soma pinv
964	hinvānaḥ vācam iṣyasi	hi vāc iṣ
964	pavamāna vidharmaṇi	pū vidharman
964	akrān devaḥ na sūryaḥ	krand deva na sūrya
964	induḥ paviṣTa cetanaḥ	indu pū cetana
964	priyaḥ kavīnām matī	priya kavi mati
964	sṛjat aśvam rathīḥ iva	sṛj aśva rathī iva
964	ūrmiḥ yaḥ te pavitre ā	ūrmi yad tvad pavitra ā
964	devāvīḥ paryakṣarat	devāvī parikṣar
964	sīdan ṛtasya yonim ā	sad ṛta yoni ā
964	sa naḥ arṣa pavitre ā	tad mad ṛṣ pavitra ā
964	madaḥ yaḥ devavītamaḥ	mada yad deva vītama
964	indo indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
964	iṣe pavasva dhārayā	iṣ pū dhārā
964	mṛjyamānaḥ manīṣibhiḥ	mṛj manīṣin
964	indo rucā abhi gāḥ ihi	indu ruci abhi go i
964	punānaḥ varivaḥ kṛdhi	pū varivas kṛ
964	ūrjam janāya girvaṇaḥ	ūrj jana girvaṇas
964	hare sṛjānaḥ āśiram	hari sṛj āśir
964	punānaḥ devavītaye	pū deva vīti
964	indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam	indra yā niṣkṛta
964	dyutānaḥ vājibhiḥ yataḥ	dyut vājin yam
964	pra hinvānāsaḥ indavaḥ	pra hi indu
964	acchā samudram āśavaḥ	acchā samudra āśu
964	dhiyā jūtāḥ asṛkṣata	dhī jū sṛj
964	marmṛjānāsaḥ āyavaḥ	marmṛj āyu
964	vṛthā samudram indavaḥ	vṛthā samudra indu
964	agman ṛtasya yonim ā	gam ṛta yoni ā
964	pari naḥ yāhi asmayuḥ	pari mad yā asmayu
964	viśvā vasūni ojasā	viśva vasu ojas
964	pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat	pā mad śarman vīravat
964	mimāti vahniḥ etaśaḥ	mā vahni etaśa
964	padam yujānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	pada yuj ṛkvan
964	pra yat samudre āhitaḥ	pra yat samudra ādhā
964	ā yat yonim hiraṇyayam	ā yat yoni hiraṇyaya
964	āśuḥ ṛtasya sīdati	āśu ṛta sad
964	jahāti apracetasaḥ	hā apracetas
964	abhi venāḥ anūṣata	abhi vena nū
964	iyakṣanti pracetasaḥ	iyakṣ pracetas
964	majjanti avicetasaḥ	majj avicetas
964	indrāya indo marutvate	indra indu marutvat
964	pavasva madhumattamaḥ	pū madhumattama
964	ṛtasya yonim āsadam	ṛta yoni āsad
964	tam tvā viprāḥ vacovidaḥ	tad tvad vipra vacas vid
964	pari skṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ	pariṣkṛ vedhas
964	sam tvā mṛjanti āyavaḥ	sam tvad mṛj āyu
964	rasam te mitraḥ aryamā	rasa tvad mitra aryaman
964	pibanti varunaḥ kave	pā varuṇa kavi
964	pavamānasya marutaḥ	pū marut
964	tvam soma vipaścitam	tvad soma vipaścit
964	punānaḥ vācam iṣyasi	pū vāc iṣ
964	indo sahasrabharṇasam	indu sahasrabharṇas
964	uta u sahasrabharṇasam	uta u sahasrabharṇas
964	vācam soma makhasyuvam	vāc soma makhasyu
964	punānaḥ indo ā bhara	pū indu ā bhṛ
964	punānaḥ indo eṣām	pū indu idam
964	puruhūta janānām	puru hvā jana
964	priyaḥ samudram ā viśa	priya samudra ā viś
964	davidyutatyā rucā	davidyut ruc
964	pariṣTobhantyā kṛpā	pariṣṭubh kṛp
964	somāḥ śukrāḥ gavāśiraḥ	soma śukra gavāśir
964	hinvānaḥ hetṛbhiḥ yataḥ	hi hetṛ yam
964	ā vājam vājī akramīt	ā vāja vājin kram
964	sīdantaḥ vanuṣaḥ yathā	sad vanus yathā
964	ṛdhak soma svastaye	ṛdhak soma svasti
964	saṁjagmānaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ	saṃgam div kavi
964	pavasva sūryaḥ dṛśe	pū sūrya dṛś
 ---
965	hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ	hi sūra usri
965	svasāraḥ jāmayaḥ patim	svasṛ jāmi pati
965	mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ	mahat indu mahīyu
965	pavamāna rucārucā	pū ruc ruc
965	devaḥ devebhyaḥ pari	deva deva pari
965	viśvā vasūni ā viśa	viśva vasu ā viś
965	ā pavamāna suṣTutim	ā pū suṣṭuti
965	vṛṣTim devebhyaḥ duvaḥ	vṛṣṭi deva duvas
965	iṣe pavasva saṁyatam	iṣ pū saṃyat
965	vṛṣā hi asi bhānunā	vṛṣan hi as bhānu
965	dyumantam tvā havāmahe	dyumat tvad hvā
965	pavamāna svādhyaḥ	pū svādhī
965	ā pavasva suvīryam	ā pū su vīrya
965	mandamānaḥ svāyudha	mad su āyudha
965	iha u su indo ā gahi	iha u su indu ā gam
965	yat adbhiḥ pariṣicyase	yat ap pariṣic
965	mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ	mṛj gabhasti
965	druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe	dru sadhastha aś
965	pra somāya vyaśvavat	pra soma vyaśva vat
965	pavamānāya gāyata	pū gā
965	mahe sahasracakṣase	mah sahasra cakṣas
965	yasya varṇam madhuścutam	yad varṇa madhuścut
965	harim hinvanti adribhiḥ	hari hi adri
965	indum indrāya pītaye	indu indra pā
965	tasya te vājinaḥ vayam	tad tvad vājin mad
965	viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ	viśva dhana ji
965	sakhitvam ā vṛṇīmahe	sakhi tva ā vṛ
965	vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā	vṛṣan pū dhārā
965	marutvate ca matsaraḥ	marutvat ca matsara
965	viśvā dadhānaḥ ojasā	viśva dhā ojas
965	tam tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ	tad tvad dhartṛ oṇi
965	pavamāna svardṛśam	pū svar dṛś
965	hinve vājeṣu vājinam	hi vāja vājin
965	ayā cittaḥ vipā anayā	idam cit vipānā
965	hariḥ pavasva dhārayā	hari pū dhārā
965	yujam vājeṣu codaya	yuj vāja coday
965	ā naḥ indo mahīm iṣam	ā mad indu mah iṣ
965	pavasva viśvadarśataḥ	pū viśva darśata
965	asmabhyam soma gātuvit	mad soma gātu vid
965	ā kalaśāḥ anūṣata	ā kalaśa nū
965	indo dhārābhiḥ ojasā	indu dhārā ojas
965	ā indrasya pītaye viśa	ā indra pā viś
965	yasya te madyam rasam	yad tvad mad rasa
965	tīvram duhanti adribhiḥ	tīvra duh adri
965	sa pavasva abhimātihā	tad pū abhimāti han
965	rājā medhābhiḥ īyate	rājan medhā ī
965	pavamānaḥ manau adhi	pavamāna manu adhi
965	antarikṣeṇa yātave	antarikṣa yā
965	ā naḥ indo śatagvinam	ā mad indu śatagvin
965	gavām poṣam svaśvyam	go poṣa su aśvya
965	vahā bhagattim ūtaye	vah bhagatti ūti
965	ā naḥ soma sahaḥ juvaḥ	ā mad soma sahas juvas
965	rūpam na varcase bhara	rūpa na varcas bhṛ
965	suṣvāṇaḥ devavītaye	su deva vīti
965	arṣā soma dyumattamaḥ	ṛṣ soma dyumattama
965	abhi droṇāni roruvat	abhi droṇa roro
965	sīdan śyenaḥ na yonim ā	sad śyena na yoni ā
965	apsāḥ indrāya vāyave	ap sā indra vāyu
965	varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ	varuṇa marut
965	somaḥ arṣati viṣṇave	soma ṛṣ viṣṇu
965	iṣam tokāya naḥ dadhat	iṣ toka mad dhā
965	asmabhyam soma viśvataḥ	mad soma viśvatas
965	ā pavasva sahasriṇam	ā pū sahasrin
965	ye somāsaḥ parāvati	yad soma parāvat
965	ye arvāvati sunvire	yad arvāvat su
965	ye vā adaḥ śaryaṇāvati	yad vā adas śaryaṇāvant
965	ye ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu	yad ārjīka kṛtvan
965	ye madhye pastyānām	yad madhya pastyā
965	ye vā janeṣu pañcasu	yad vā jana pañcan
965	te naḥ vṛṣTim divaḥ pari	tad mad vṛṣṭi div pari
965	pavantām ā suvīryam	pū ā su vīrya
965	suvānāḥ devāsaḥ indavaḥ	su deva indu
965	pavate haryataḥ hariḥ	pū haryata hari
965	gṛṇānaḥ jamadagninā	gṛ jamadagni
965	hinvānaḥ goḥ adhi tvaci	hi go adhi tvac
965	pra śukrāsaḥ vayojuvaḥ	pra śukra vayoju
965	hinvānāsaḥ na saptayaḥ	hi na sapti
965	śrīṇānāḥ apsu mṛñjata	śrī ap mṛj
965	tam tvā suteṣu ābhuvaḥ	tad tvad su ābhū
965	hinvire devatātaye	hi devatāti
965	sa pavasva anayā rucā	tad pū idam ruc
965	ā te dakṣam mayobhuvam	ā tvad dakṣa mayobhu
965	vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe	vahni adya vṛ
965	pāntam ā puruspṛham	pānta ā puruspṛh
965	ā mandram ā vareṇyam	ā mandra ā vareṇya
965	ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam	ā vipra ā manīṣin
965	pāntam ā puruspṛham	pānta ā puruspṛh
965	ā rayim ā sucetunam	ā rayi ā sucetuna
965	ā sukrato tanūṣu ā	ā su kratu tanū ā
965	pāntam ā puruspṛham	pānta ā puruspṛh

966	pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe	pū viśvacarṣaṇi
966	abhi viśvāni kāvyā	abhi viśva kāvya
966	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ	sakhi sakhi īḍ
966	tābhyām viśvasya rājasi	tad viśva rāj
966	ye pavamāna dhāmanī	yad pū dhāman
966	pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ	pratyañc soma sthā
966	pari dhāmāni yāni te	pari dhāman yad tvad
966	tvam soma asi viśvataḥ	tvad soma as viśvatas
966	pavamāna ṛtubhiḥ kave	pū ṛtu kavi
966	pavasva janayan iṣaḥ	pū janay iṣ
966	abhi viśvāni vāryā	abhi viśva vārya
966	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ ūtaye	sakhi sakhi ūti
966	tava śukrāsaḥ arcayaḥ	tvad śukra arci
966	divaḥ pṛṣThe vi tanvate	div pṛṣṭha vi tan
966	pavitram soma dhāmabhiḥ	pavitra soma dhāman
966	tava ime sapta sindhavaḥ	tvad idam saptan sindhu
966	praśiṣam soma sisrate	praśis soma sṛ
966	tubhyam dhāvanti dhenavaḥ	tvad dhāv dhenu
966	pra soma yāhi dhārayā	pra soma yā dhārā
966	sutaḥ indrāya matsaraḥ	su indra matsara
966	dadhānaḥ akṣiti śravaḥ	dhā akṣiti śravas
966	sam u tvā dhībhiḥ asvaran	sam u tvad dhī svar
966	hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ	hi saptan jāmi
966	vipram ājā vivasvataḥ	vipra āji vivasvant
966	mṛjanti tvā sam agruvaḥ	mṛj tvad sam agrū
966	avye jīrau adhi svani	avya jīri adhi svan
966	rebhaḥ yat ajyase vane	rebha yat añj vana
966	pavamānasya te kave	pū tvad kavi
966	vājin sargāḥ asṛkṣata	vājin sarga sṛj
966	arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ	arvant na śravasyu
966	acchā kośam madhuścutam	acchā kośa madhuścut
966	asṛgram vāre avyaye	sṛj vāra avyaya
966	avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ	vāś dhīti
966	acchā samudram indavaḥ	acchā samudra indu
966	astam gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ	asta go na dhenu
966	agman ṛtasya yonim ā	gam ṛta yoni ā
966	pra naḥ indo mahe raṇe	pra mad indu mah ran
966	āpaḥ arṣanti sindhavaḥ	ap ṛṣ sindhu
966	yat gobhiḥ vāsayiṣyase	yat go vāsay
966	asya te sakhye vayam	idam tvad sakhya mad
966	iyakṣantaḥ tvotayaḥ	iyakṣ tvoti
966	indo sakhitvam uśmasi	indu sakhi tva vaś
966	ā pavasva gaviṣTaye	ā pū gaviṣṭi
966	mahe soma nṛcakṣase	mah soma nṛ cakṣas
966	ā indrasya jaThare viśa	ā indra jaṭhara viś
966	mahān asi soma jyeṣThaḥ	mahat as soma jyeṣṭha
966	ugrāṇām indo ojiṣThaḥ	ugra indu ojiṣṭha
966	yudhvā san śaśvat jigetha	yudhvan as śaśvat ji
966	yaḥ ugrebhyaḥ cit ojīyān	yad ugra cit ojīyas
966	śūrebhyaḥ cit śūrataraḥ	śūra cit śūratara
966	bhūridābhyaḥ cit maṁhīyān	bhūri dā cit maṃhīyas
966	tvam soma sūraḥ ā iṣaḥ	tvad soma svar ā iṣ
966	tokasya sātā tanūnām	toka sāti tanu
966	vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya	vṛ sakhya
966	vṛṇīmahe yujyāya	vṛ yujya
966	agne āyūṁṣi pavase	agni āyus pū
966	ā suva ūrjam iṣam ca naḥ	ā sū ūrj iṣ ca mad
966	āre bādhasva ducchunām	āre bādh ducchunā
966	agniḥ ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ	agni ṛṣi pū
966	pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ	pāñcajanya purohita
966	tam īmahe mahāgayam	tad ī mahat gaya
966	agne pavasva svapāḥ	agni pū su apas
966	asme varcaḥ suvīryam	mad varcas su vīrya
966	dadhat rayim mayi poṣam	dhā rayi mad poṣa
966	pavamānaḥ ati sridhaḥ	pū ati sridh
966	abhi arṣati suṣTutim	abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti
966	sūraḥ na viśvadarśataḥ	sūra na viśva darśata
966	sa marmṛjānaḥ āyubhiḥ	tad marmṛj āyu
966	prayasvān prayase hitaḥ	prayasvat prayas hi
966	induḥ atyaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	indu atya vicakṣaṇa
966	pavamānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat	pū ṛta bṛhat
966	śukram jyotiḥ ajījanat	śukra jyotis jan
966	kṛṣṇā tamāṁsi jaṅghanat	kṛṣṇa tamas jaṅghan
966	pavamānasya jaṅghnataḥ	pū jaṅghan
966	hareḥ candrāḥ asṛkṣata	hari candra sṛj
966	jīrāḥ ajiraśociṣaḥ	jīra ajira śocis
966	pavamānaḥ rathītamaḥ	pū rathītama
966	śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ	śubhra śubhraśastama
966	hariścandraḥ marudgaṇaḥ	hari ścandra marut gaṇa
966	pavamānaḥ vi aśnavat	pū vi aś
966	raśmibhiḥ vājasātamaḥ	raśmi vāja sātama
966	dadhat stotre suvīryam	dhā stotṛ su vīrya
966	pra suvānaḥ induḥ akṣār	pra su indu kṣar
966	pavitram ati avyayam	pavitra ati avyaya
966	punānaḥ induḥ indram ā	pū indu indra ā
966	eṣa somaḥ adhi tvaci	etad soma adhi tvac

966	indram madāya johuvat	indra mada johav
966	yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ	yad tvad dyumnavat payas
966	pavamāna ābhṛtam divaḥ	pū ābhṛ div
966	tena naḥ mṛLa jīvase	tad mad mṛḍ jīv

967	tvam soma asi dhārayuḥ	tvad soma as dhārayu
967	mandraḥ ojiṣThaḥ adhvare	mandra ojiṣṭha adhvara
967	pavasva maṁhayadrayiḥ	pū maṃhay rayi
967	tvam sutaḥ nṛmādanaḥ	tvad su nṛ mādana
967	dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ	dhanv matsarintama
967	indrāya sūriḥ andhasā	indra sūri andhas
967	tvam suṣvāṇaḥ adribhiḥ	tvad su adri
967	abhi arṣa kanikradat	abhi ṛṣ kanikrad
967	dyumantam śuṣmam uttamam	dyumat śuṣma uttama
967	induḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati	indu hi ṛṣ
967	tiraḥ vārāṇi avyayā	tiras vāra avyaya
967	hariḥ vājam acikradat	hari vāja krand
967	indo vi avyam arṣasi	indu vi avya ṛṣ
967	vi śravāṁsi vi saubhagā	vi śravas vi saubhaga
967	vi vājān soma gomataḥ	vi vāja soma gomat
967	ā naḥ indo śatagvinam	ā mad indu śatagvin
967	rayim gomantam aśvinam	rayi gomat aśvin
967	bharā soma sahasriṇam	bhṛ soma sahasrin
967	pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ	pū indu
967	tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ	tiras pavitra āśu
967	indram yāmebhiḥ āśata	indra yāma aś
967	kakuhaḥ somyaḥ rasaḥ	kakuha somya rasa
967	induḥ indrāya pūrvyaḥ	indu indra pūrvya
967	āyuḥ pavate āyave	āyu pū āyu
967	hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ	hi sūra usri
967	pavamānam madhuścutam	pū madhuścut
967	abhi girā sam asvaran	abhi gir sam svar
967	avitā naḥ ajāśvaḥ	av mad aja aśva
967	pūṣā yāmaniyāmani	pūṣan yāman yāman
967	ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ	ā bhaj kanyā mad
967	ayam somaḥ kapardine	idam soma kapardin
967	ghṛtam na pavate madhu	ghṛta na pū madhu
967	ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ	ā bhaj kanyā mad
967	ayam te āghṛṇe sutaḥ	idam tvad āghṛṇi su
967	ghṛtam na pavate śuci	ghṛta na pū śuci
967	ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ	ā bhaj kanyā mad
967	vācaḥ jantuḥ kavīnām	vāc jantu kavi
967	pavasva soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
967	deveṣu ratnadhāḥ asi	deva ratna dhā as
967	ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati	ā kalaśa dhāv
967	śyenaḥ varma vi gāhate	śyena varman vi gāh
967	abhi droṇā kanikradat	abhi droṇa kanikrad
967	pari pra soma te rasaḥ	pari pra soma tvad rasa
967	asarji kalaśe sutaḥ	sṛj kalaśa su
967	śyenaḥ na taktaḥ arṣati	śyena na tak ṛṣ
967	pavasva soma mandayan	pū soma manday
967	indrāya madhumattamaḥ	indra madhumattama
967	asṛgran devavītaye	sṛj deva vīti
967	vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva	vājay ratha iva
967	te sutāsaḥ madintamāḥ	tad su madintama
967	śukrāḥ vāyum asṛkṣata	śukra vāyu sṛj
967	grāvṇā tunnaḥ abhiṣTutaḥ	grāvan tud abhiṣṭu
967	pavitram soma gacchasi	pavitra soma gam
967	dadhat stotre suvīryam	dhā stotṛ su vīrya
967	eṣa tunnaḥ abhiṣTutaḥ	etad tud abhiṣṭu
967	pavitram ati gāhate	pavitra ati gāh
967	rakṣohā vāram avyayam	rakṣas han vāra avyaya
967	yat anti yat ca dūrake	yad anti yad ca dūraka
967	bhayam vindati mām iha	bhaya vid mad iha
967	pavamāna vi tat jahi	pū vi tad han
967	pavamānaḥ saḥ adya naḥ	pū tad adya mad
967	pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ	pavitra vicarṣaṇi
967	yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ	yad potṛ tad pū mad
967	yat te pavitram arciṣi	yad tvad pavitra arcis
967	agne vitatam antar ā	agni vitan antar ā
967	brahma tena punīhi naḥ	brahman tad pū mad
967	yat te pavitram arcivat	yad tvad pavitra arcivat
967	agne tena punīhi naḥ	agni tad pū mad
967	brahmasavaiḥ punīhi naḥ	brahman sava pū mad
967	ubhābhyām deva savitar	ubh deva savitṛ
967	pavitreṇa savena ca	pavitra sava ca
967	mām punīhi viśvataḥ	mad pū viśvatas
967	tribhiḥ tvam deva savitar	tri tvad deva savitṛ
967	varṣiṣThaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ	varṣiṣṭha soma dhāman
967	agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ	agni dakṣa pū mad
967	punantu mām devajanāḥ	pū mad deva jana
967	punantu vasavaḥ dhiyā	pū vasu dhī
967	viśve devāḥ punīta mā	viśva deva pū mad
967	jātavedaḥ punīhi mā	jātavedas pū mad
967	pra pyāyasva pra syandasva	pra pyā pra syand
967	soma viśvebhiḥ aṁśubhiḥ	soma viśva aṃśu
967	devebhyaḥ uttamam haviḥ	deva uttama havis
967	upa priyam panipnatam	upa priya panipn
967	yuvānam āhutīvṛdham	yuvan āhuti vṛdh
967	aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ	gam bhṛ namas
967	alāyyasya paraśuḥ nanāśa	alāyya paraśu naś
967	tam ā pavasva deva soma	tad ā pū deva soma
967	ākhum cit eva deva soma	ākhu cit eva deva soma
967	yaḥ pāvamānīḥ adhyeti	yad pāvamāna adhī
967	ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam	ṛṣi sambhṛ rasa
967	sarvam sa pūtam aśnāti	sarva tad pū aś
967	svaditam mātariśvanā	svaday mātariśvan
967	pāvamānīḥ yaḥ adhyeti	pāvamāna yad adhī
967	ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam	ṛṣi sambhṛ rasa
967	tasmai sarasvatī duhe	tad sarasvatī duh
967	kṣīram sarpiḥ madhu udakam	kṣīra sarpis madhu udaka

968	pra devam acchā madhumantaḥ indavaḥ	pra deva acchā madhumat indu
968	asiṣyadanta gāvaḥ ā na dhenavaḥ	syand go ā na dhenu
968	barhiṣadaḥ vacanāvantaḥ ūdhabhiḥ	barhiṣad vacanāvat ūdhas
968	parisrutam usriyāḥ nirṇijam dhire	parisrut usriyā nirṇij dhā
968	sa roruvat abhi pūrvāḥ acikradat	tad roro abhi pūrva krand
968	upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ	upāruh śrathay svād hari
968	tiraḥ pavitram pariyan uru jrayaḥ	tiras pavitra parī uru jrayas
968	ni śaryāṇi dadhate devaḥ ā varam	ni śarya dhā deva ā vara
968	vi yaḥ mame yamyā saṁyatī madaḥ	vi yad mā yamya sami mada
968	sākaṁvṛdhā payasā pinvat akṣitā	sākaṃvṛdh payas pinv akṣita
968	mahī apāre rajasī vivevidat	mah apāra rajas vivevid
968	abhivrajan akṣitam pājaḥ ā dade	abhivraj akṣita pājas ā dā
968	sa mātarā vicaran vājayan apaḥ	tad mātṛ vicar vājay ap
968	pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam	pra medhira svadhā pinv pada
968	aṁśuḥ yavena pipiśe yataḥ nṛbhiḥ	aṃśu yava piś yam nṛ
968	sam jāmibhiḥ nasate rakṣate śiraḥ	sam jāmi nas rakṣ śiras
968	sam dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kaviḥ	sam dakṣa manas jan kavi
968	ṛtasya garbhaḥ nihitaḥ yamā paraḥ	ṛta garbha nidhā yama paras
968	yūnā ha santā prathamam vi jajñatuḥ	yuvan ha as prathamam vi jñā
968	guhā hitam janima nemam udyatam	guhā dhā janiman nema udyam
968	mandrasya rūpam vividuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	mandra rūpa vid manīṣin
968	śyenaḥ yat andhaḥ abharat parāvataḥ	śyena yat andhas bhṛ parāvat
968	tam marjayanta suvṛdham nadīṣu ā	tad marjay suvṛdh nadī
968	uśantam aṁśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam	vaś aṃśu parī ṛgmiya
968	tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutam	tvad mṛj daśan yoṣan su
968	soma ṛṣibhiḥ matibhiḥ dhītibhiḥ hitam	soma ṛṣi mati dhīti hi
968	avyaḥ vārebhiḥ uta devahūtibhiḥ	avya vāra uta deva hūti
968	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vājam ā darṣi sātaye	nṛ yam vāja ā dṛ sāti
968	pariprayantam vayyam suṣaṁsadam	paripre vayya suṣaṃsad
968	somam manīṣāḥ abhi anūṣata stubhaḥ	soma manīṣā abhi nū stubh
968	yaḥ dhārayā madhumān ūrmiṇā divaḥ	yad dhārā madhumat ūrmi div
968	iyarti vācam rayiṣāT amartyaḥ	ṛch vāc rayiṣah amartya
968	ayam divaḥ iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ	idam div ṛch viśva ā rajas
968	somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati	soma pū kalaśa sad
968	adbhiḥ gobhiḥ mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ	ap go mṛj adri su
968	punānaḥ induḥ varivaḥ vidat priyam	pū indu varivas vid priya
968	evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ	eva mad soma pariṣic
968	vayaḥ dadhat citratamam pavasva	vayas dhā citratama pū
968	adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema	a dveṣa dyāvāpṛthivī hvā
968	devāḥ dhatta rayim asme suvīram	deva dhā rayi mad su vīra
 ---
969	iṣuḥ na dhanvan prati dhīyate matiḥ	iṣu na dhanvan prati dhā mati
969	vatsaḥ na mātuḥ upa sarji ūdhani	vatsa na mātṛ upa sṛj ūdhas
969	urudhārā iva duhe agre āyatī	uru dhārā iva duh agra e
969	asya vrateṣu api somaḥ iṣyate	idam vrata api soma iṣ
969	upa u matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu	upa u mati pṛc sic madhu
969	mandrājanī codate antar āsani	mandrājanī cud antar āsan
969	pavamānaḥ saṁtaniḥ praghnatām iva	pū saṃtani prahan iva
969	madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati	madhumat drapsa pari vāra ṛṣ
969	avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci	avya vadhūyu pū pari tvac
969	śrathnīte naptīḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate	śrath naptī aditi ṛta i
969	hariḥ akrān yajataḥ saṁyataḥ madaḥ	hari krand yajata saṃyam mada
969	nṛmṇā śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śobhate	nṛmṇa śā mahiṣa na śubh
969	ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavaḥ	ukṣan mā prati i dhenu
969	devasya devīḥ upa yanti niṣkṛtam	deva devī upa i niṣkṛta
969	ati akramīt arjunam vāram avyayam	ati kram arjuna vāra avyaya
969	atkam na niktam pari somaḥ avyata	atka na nij pari soma vye
969	amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā hariḥ	amṛkta ruśat vāsas hari
969	amartyaḥ nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata	amartya nirṇij pari vye
969	divaḥ pṛṣTham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛta	div pṛṣṭha barhaṇā nirṇij kṛ
969	upastaraṇam camvoḥ nabhasmayam	upastaraṇa camū nabhasmaya
969	sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ drāvayitnavaḥ	sūrya iva raśmi drāvayitnu
969	matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate	matsara prasup sākam īr
969	tantum tatam pari sargāsaḥ āśavaḥ	tantu tan pari sarga āśu
969	na indrāt ṛte pavate dhāma kim cana	na indra ṛte pū dhāman kaścana
969	sindhoḥ iva pravaṇe nimne āśavaḥ	sindhu iva pravaṇa nimna āśu
969	vṛṣacyutāḥ madāsaḥ gātum āśata	vṛṣan cyu mada gātu aś
969	śam naḥ niveśe dvipade catuṣpade	śam mad niveśa dvipad catuṣpada
969	asme vājaḥ soma tiṣThantu kṛṣTayaḥ	mad vāja soma sthā kṛṣṭi
969	ā naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat	ā mad pū vasumat hiraṇyavat
969	aśvāvat gomat yavamat suvīryam	aśvāvat gomat yavamat su vīrya
969	yūyam hi soma pitaraḥ mama sthana	tvad hi soma pitṛ mad as
969	divaḥ mūrdhānaḥ prasthitāḥ vayaskṛtaḥ	div mūrdhan prasthā vayaskṛt
969	ete somāḥ pavamānāsaḥ indram	etad soma pū indra
969	rathāḥ iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha	ratha iva pra yā sāti acchā
969	sutāḥ pavitram ati yanti avyam	su pavitra ati i avya
969	hitvī vavrim haritaḥ vṛṣTim accha	hā vavri harit vṛṣṭi acchā
969	indo indrāya bṛhate pavasva	indu indra bṛhat pū
969	sumṛLīkaḥ anavadyaḥ riśādāḥ	su mṛḍīka anavadya riśādas
969	bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni	candra gṛ vasu
969	devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pra avatam naḥ	deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad
 ---
970	triḥ asmai sapta dhenavaḥ duduhre	tris idam saptan dhenu duh
970	satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani	satya āśir pūrvya vyoman
970	catvāri anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije	catur anya bhuvana nirṇij
970	cārūṇi cakre yat ṛtaiḥ avardhata	cāru kṛ yat ṛta vṛdh
970	sa bhikṣamāṇaḥ amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ	tad bhikṣ amṛta cāru
970	ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe	ubh div kāvya vi śrath
970	tejiṣThāḥ apaḥ maṁhanā pari vyata	tejiṣṭha ap maṃhanā pari vye
970	yadī devasya śravasā sadaḥ viduḥ	yadi deva śravas sadas vid
970	te asya santu ketavaḥ amṛtyavaḥ	tad idam as ketu amṛtyu
970	adābhyāsaḥ januṣī ubhe anu	adābhya janus ubh anu
970	yebhiḥ nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punate	yad nṛmṇa ca devya ca pū
970	āt it rājānam mananāḥ agṛbhṇata	āt id rājan manana grah
970	sa mṛjyamānaḥ daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ	tad mṛj daśan su karman
970	pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā	pra madhyama mātṛ pramā sacā
970	vratāni pānaḥ amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ	vrata pā amṛta cāru
970	ubhe nṛcakṣāḥ anu paśyate viśau	ubh nṛ cakṣas anu paś viś
970	sa marmṛjānaḥ indriyāya dhāyase	tad marmṛj indriya dhāyas
970	ā ubhe antar rodasī harṣate hitaḥ	ā ubh antar rodas hṛṣ hi
970	vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīḥ	vṛṣan śuṣma bādh vi durmati
970	ādediśānaḥ śaryahā iva śurudhaḥ	ādediś śaryahan iva śurudh
970	sa mātarā na dadṛśānaḥ usriyaḥ	tad mātṛ na dṛś usriya
970	nānadat eti marutām iva svanaḥ	nānad i marut iva svana
970	jānan ṛtam prathamam yat svarṇaram	jñā ṛta prathama yad svarṇṛ
970	praśastaye kam avṛṇīta sukratuḥ	praśasti kaṃ vṛ su kratu
970	ruvati bhīmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ taviṣyayā	ru bhīma vṛṣabha taviṣyā
970	śṛṅge śiśānaḥ hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ	śṛṅga śā harin vicakṣaṇa
970	ā yonim somaḥ sukṛtam ni sīdati	ā yoni soma su kṛ ni sad
970	gavyayī tvak bhavati nirṇik avyayī	gavyaya tvac bhū nirṇij avyaya
970	śuciḥ punānaḥ tanvam arepasam	śuci pū tanū arepas
970	avye hariḥ ni adhāviṣTa sānavi	avya hari ni dhāv sānu
970	juṣTaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave	juṣ mitra varuṇa vāyu
970	tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ	tri dhātu madhu kṛ sukarman
970	pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣā	pū soma deva vīti vṛṣan
970	indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa	indra hārdi soma dhāna ā viś
970	purā naḥ bādhāt duritā ati pāraya	purā mad bādha durita ati pāray
970	kṣetravit hi diśaḥ āhā vipṛcchate	kṣetra vid hi diś ah vipracch
970	hitaḥ na saptiḥ abhi vājam arṣa	hi na sapti abhi vāja ṛṣ
970	indrasya indo jaTharam ā pavasva	indra indu jaṭhara ā pū
970	nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvān	nau na sindhu ati pṛ vid
970	śūraḥ na yudhyan ava naḥ nidaḥ spar	śūra na yudh ava mad nid spṛ
 ---
971	ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmī āsadam	ā dakṣiṇā sṛj śuṣmin āsad
971	veti druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ	vī druh rakṣas pā jāgṛvi
971	hariḥ opaśam kṛṇute nabhaḥ payaḥ	hari opaśa kṛ nabhas payas
971	upastire camvoḥ brahma nirṇije	upastir camū brahman nirṇij
971	pra kṛṣTihā iva śūṣaḥ eti roruvat	pra kṛṣṭi han iva śūṣa i roro
971	asuryam varṇam ni riṇīte asya tam	asurya varṇa ni ri idam tad
971	jahāti vavrim pituḥ eti niṣkṛtam	hā vavri pitu i niṣkṛta
971	upaprutam kṛṇute nirṇijam tanā	upaprut kṛ nirṇij tan
971	adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyoḥ	adri su pū gabhasti
971	vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī	vṛṣāy nabhas vip mati
971	sa modate nasate sādhate girā	tad mud nas sādh gir
971	nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi	nenij ap yaj parīman
971	pari dyukṣam sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham	pari dyukṣa sahas parvatāvṛdh
971	madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim	madhu sic harmya sakṣaṇi
971	ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutādaḥ ūdhani	ā yad go su hutād ūdhas
971	mūrdhan śrīṇanti agriyam varīmabhiḥ	mūrdhan śrī agriya varīman
971	sam ī ratham na bhurijoḥ aheṣata	sam ī ratha na bhurij hi
971	daśa svasāraḥ aditeḥ upasthe ā	daśan svasṛ aditi upastha ā
971	jigāt upa jrayati goḥ apīcyam	gā upa jri go apīcya
971	padam yat asya matuthāḥ ajījanan	pada yat idam matutha jan
971	śyenaḥ na yonim sadanam dhiyā kṛtam	śyena na yoni sadana dhī kṛ
971	hiraṇyayam āsadam devaḥ ā īṣati	hiraṇyaya āsad deva īṣ
971	ā ī riṇanti barhiṣi priyam girā	ri barhis priya gir
971	aśvaḥ na devān api eti yajñiyaḥ	aśva na deva api i yajñiya
971	parā vyaktaḥ aruṣaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ	parā vyañj aruṣa div kavi
971	vṛṣā tripṛṣThaḥ anaviṣTa gāḥ abhi	vṛṣan tri pṛṣṭha nu go abhi
971	sahasraṇītiḥ yatiḥ parāyatiḥ	sahasraṇīti yati pare
971	rebhaḥ na pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati	rebha na pūrva uṣas vi rāj
971	tveṣam rūpam kṛṇute varṇaḥ asya sa	tveṣa rūpa kṛ varṇa idam tad
971	yatra aśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ	yatra śī samṛti sidh sridh
971	apsāḥ yāti svadhayā daivyam janam	ap sā yā svadhā daivya jana
971	sam suṣTutī nasate sam goagrayā	sam suṣṭuti nas sam go agra
971	ukṣā iva yūthā pariyan arāvīt	ukṣan iva yūtha parī ru
971	adhi tviṣīḥ adhita sūryasya	adhi tviṣi dhā sūrya
971	divyaḥ suparṇaḥ ava cakṣata kṣām	divya suparṇa ava cakṣ kṣā
971	somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ	soma pari kratu paś jā
 ---
972	harim mṛjanti aruṣaḥ na yujyate	hari mṛj aruṣa na yuj
972	sam dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somaḥ ajyate	sam dhenu kalaśa soma añj
972	ut vācam īrayati hinvate matī	ud vāc īray hi mati
972	puruṣTutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ	puruṣṭuta kati cit pariprī
972	sākam vadanti bahavaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	sākam vad bahu manīṣin
972	indrasya somam jaThare yat āduhuḥ	indra soma jaṭhara yat āduh
972	yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayaḥ naraḥ	yadi mṛj su gabhasti nṛ
972	sanīLābhiḥ daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu	sanīḍa daśan kāmya madhu
972	aramamāṇaḥ ati eti gāḥ abhi	a ram ati i go abhi
972	sūryasya priyam duhituḥ tiraḥ ravam	sūrya priya duhitṛ tiras rava
972	anu asmai joṣam abharat vinaṁgṛsaḥ	anu idam joṣa bhṛ vinaṅgṛsa
972	sam dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ	sam dvayī svasṛ kṣi jāmi
972	nṛdhūtaḥ adriṣutaḥ barhiṣi priyaḥ	nṛ dhū adriṣuta barhis priya
972	patiḥ gavām pradivaḥ induḥ ṛtviyaḥ	pati go pradiv indu ṛtviya
972	puraṁdhivān manuṣaḥ yajñasādhanaḥ	puraṃdhivat manus yajña sādhana
972	śuciḥ dhiyā pavate somaḥ indra te	śuci dhī pū soma indra tvad
972	nṛbāhubhyām coditaḥ dhārayā sutaḥ	nṛ bāhu coday dhārā su
972	anuṣvadham pavate somaḥ indra te	anuṣvadham pū soma indra tvad
972	ā aprāḥ kratūn sam ajaiḥ adhvare matīḥ	āprā kratu sam ji adhvara mati
972	veḥ na druṣat camvoḥ ā asadat hariḥ	vi na druṣad camū āsad hari
972	aṁśum duhanti stanayantam akṣitam	aṃśu duh stanay akṣit
972	kavim kavayaḥ apasaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	kavi kavi apas manīṣin
972	sam ī gāvaḥ matayaḥ yanti saṁyataḥ	sam ī go mati i saṃyat
972	ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ	ṛta yoni sadana punarbhū
972	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ dharuṇaḥ mahaḥ divaḥ	nābhi pṛthivī dharuṇa mah div
972	apām ūrmau sindhuṣu antar ukṣitaḥ	ap ūrmi sindhu antar ukṣ
972	indrasya vajraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vibhūvasuḥ	indra vajra vṛṣabha vibhūvasu
972	somaḥ hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ	soma hṛd pū cāru matsara
972	sa tū pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ	tad tu pū pari pārthiva rajas
972	stotre śikṣan ādhūnvate ca sukrato	stotṛ śikṣ ādhū ca su kratu
972	mā naḥ niḥ bhāk vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśaḥ	mā mad niḥ bhaj vasu sādana spṛś
972	rayim piśaṅgam bahulam vasīmahi	rayi piśaṅga bahula vas
972	ā tū naḥ indo śatadātu aśvyam	ā tu mad indu śata dātu aśvya
972	sahasradātu paśumat hiraṇyavat	sahasra dātu paśumat hiraṇyavat
972	upa māsva bṛhatīḥ revatīḥ iṣaḥ	upa mā bṛhat revat iṣ
972	adhi stotrasya pavamāna naḥ gahi	adhi stotra pū mad gam
 ---
973	srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvaran	srakva drapsa dham sam svar
973	ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ	ṛta yoni sam ṛch nābhi
973	trīn sa mūrdhnaḥ asuraḥ cakre ārabhe	tri tad mūrdhan asura kṛ ārabh
973	satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan	satya nau sukṛt pṛ
973	samyak samyañcaḥ mahiṣāḥ aheṣata	samyak samyañc mahiṣa hi
973	sindhoḥ ūrmau adhi venāḥ avīvipan	sindhu ūrmi adhi vena vip
973	madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ janayantaḥ arkam it	madhu dhārā janay arka id
973	priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan	priya indra tanū vṛdh
973	pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate	pavitravat pari vāc ās
973	pitā eṣām pratnaḥ abhi rakṣati vratam	pitṛ idam pratna abhi rakṣ vrata
973	mahaḥ samudram varuṇaḥ tiraḥ dadhe	maha samudra varuṇa tiras dhā
973	dhīrāḥ it śekuḥ dharuṇeṣu ārabham	dhīra id śak dharuṇa ārabh
973	sahasradhāre ava te sam asvaran	sahasra dhārā ava tad sam svar
973	divaḥ nāke madhujihvāḥ asaścataḥ	div nāka madhu jihvā asaścat
973	asya spaśaḥ na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ	idam spaś na ni miṣ bhūrṇi
973	padepade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ	pada pada pāśin as setu
973	pituḥ mātuḥ adhi ā ye samasvaran	pitṛ mātṛ adhi ā yad saṃsvar
973	ṛcā śocantaḥ saṁdahantaḥ avratān	ṛc śuc saṃdah avrata
973	indradviṣTām apa dhamanti māyayā	indra dviṣ apa dham māyā
973	tvacam asiknīm bhūmanaḥ divaḥ pari	tvac asita bhūman div pari
973	pratnāt mānāt adhi ā ye samasvaran	pratna māna adhi ā yad saṃsvar
973	ślokayantrāsaḥ rabhasasya mantavaḥ	ślokayantra rabhasa mantu
973	apa anakṣāsaḥ badhirāḥ ahāsata	apa anakṣa badhira hā
973	ṛtasya panthām na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ	ṛta pathin na tṛ duṣkṛt
973	sahasradhāre vitate pavitre ā	sahasra dhārā vitan pavitra ā
973	vācam punanti kavayaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	vāc pū kavi manīṣin
973	rudrāsaḥ eṣām iṣirāsaḥ adruhaḥ	rudra idam iṣira adruh
973	spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśaḥ nṛcakṣasaḥ	spaś svañc sudṛś nṛ cakṣas
973	ṛtasya gopāḥ na dabhāya sukratuḥ	ṛta gopā na dabh sukratu
973	trī sa pavitrā hṛdi antar ā dadhe	tri tad pavitra hṛd antar ā dhā
973	vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paśyati	vid tad viśva bhuvana abhi paś
973	ava ajuṣTān vidhyati karte avratān	ava ajuṣṭa vyadh karta avrata
973	ṛtasya tantuḥ vitataḥ pavitre ā	ṛta tantu vitan pavitra ā
973	jihvāyāḥ agre varuṇasya māyayā	jihvā agra varuṇa māyā
973	dhīrāḥ cit tat saminakṣantaḥ āśata	dhīra cit tad sam inakṣ aś
973	atrā kartam ava padāti aprabhuḥ	atra karta av pad aprabhu
 ---
974	śiśuḥ na jātaḥ ava cakradat vane	śiśu na jan ava krand vana
974	svar yat vājī aruṣaḥ siṣāsati	svar yat vājin aruṣa siṣās
974	divaḥ retasā sacate payovṛdhā	div retas sac payas vṛdh
974	tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ	tad ī sumati śarman saprathas
974	divaḥ yaḥ skambhaḥ dharuṇaḥ svātataḥ	div yad skambha dharuṇa su ātan
974	āpūrṇaḥ aṁśuḥ paryeti viśvataḥ	āp￞ aṃśu parī viśvatas
974	sa ime mahī rodasī yakṣat āvṛtā	tad idam mah rodas yaj āvṛt
974	samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ	samīcīna dhṛ sam iṣ kavi
974	mahi psaraḥ sukṛtam somyam madhu	mahi psaras su kṛ somya madhu
974	urvī gavyūtiḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate	uru gavyūti aditi ṛta i
974	īśe yaḥ vṛṣTeḥ itaḥ usriyaḥ vṛṣā	īś yad vṛṣṭi itas usriya vṛṣan
974	apām netā yaḥ itaūtiḥ ṛgmiyaḥ	ap netṛ yad itaūti ṛgmiya
974	ātmanvat nabhaḥ duhyate ghṛtam payaḥ	ātmanvat nabhas duh ghṛta payas
974	ṛtasya nābhiḥ amṛtam vi jāyate	ṛta nābhi amṛta vi jan
974	samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti tam	samīcīna sudānu prī tad
974	naraḥ hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ	nṛ hi ava mih peru
974	arāvīt aṁśuḥ sacamānaḥ ūrmiṇā	ru aṃśu sac ūrmi
974	devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam	devāvī manus pinv tvac
974	dadhāti garbham aditeḥ upasthe ā	dhā garbha aditi upastha ā
974	yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe	yad toka ca tanaya ca dhā
974	sahasradhāre ava tāḥ asaścataḥ	sahasra dhārā ava tad asaścat
974	tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ	tṛtīya as rajas prajāvat
974	catasraḥ nābhaḥ nihitāḥ avaḥ divaḥ	catur nābh nidhā avas div
974	haviḥ bharanti amṛtam ghṛtaścutaḥ	havis bhṛ amṛta ghṛtaścut
974	śvetam rūpam kṛṇute yat siṣāsati	śveta rūpa kṛ yat siṣās
974	somaḥ mīḍhvān asuraḥ veda bhūmanaḥ	soma mīḍhvas asura vid bhūman
974	dhiyā śamī sacate sa īm abhi pravat	dhī śamī sac tad īṃ abhi pravat
974	divaḥ kavandham ava darṣat udriṇam	div kabandha ava dṛ udrin
974	adha śvetam kalaśam gobhiḥ aktam	adha śveta kalaśa go añj
974	kārṣman ā vājī akramīt sasavān	kārṣman ā vājin kram san
974	ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ	ā hi manas devay
974	kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām	kakṣīvant śata hima go
974	adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te rasaḥ	ap soma pṛc tvad rasa
974	avyaḥ vāram vi pavamāna dhāvati	avya vāra vi pū dhāv
974	sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhiḥ madintama	tad mṛj kavi madintama
974	svadasva indrāya pavamāna pītaye	svad indra pū pā
 ---
975	abhi priyāṇi pavate canohitaḥ	abhi priya pū canohita
975	nāmāni yahvaḥ adhi yeṣu vardhate	nāman yahva adhi yad vṛdh
975	ā sūryasya bṛhataḥ bṛhan adhi	ā sūrya bṛhat bṛhat adhi
975	ratham viṣvañcam aruhat vicakṣaṇaḥ	ratha viṣvañc ruh vicakṣaṇa
975	ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyam	ṛta jihvā pū madhu priya
975	vaktā patiḥ dhiyaḥ asyāḥ adābhyaḥ	vaktṛ pati dhī idam adābhya
975	dadhāti putraḥ pitroḥ apīcyam	dhā putra pitṛ apīcya
975	nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ	nāman tṛtīya adhi rocana div
975	ava dyutānaḥ kalaśān acikradat	ava dyut kalaśa krand
975	nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ kośe ā hiraṇyaye	nṛ yam kośa ā hiraṇyaya
975	abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata	abhi īṃ ṛta dohana nū
975	adhi tripṛṣThaḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati	adhi tri pṛṣṭha uṣas vi rāj
975	adribhiḥ sutaḥ matibhiḥ canohitaḥ	adri su mati canohita
975	prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ	prarocay rodas mātṛ śuci
975	romāṇi avyā samayā vi dhāvati	roman avya samayā vi dhāv
975	madhoḥ dhārā pinvamānā divedive	madhu dhārā pinv diva diva
975	pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye	pari soma pra dhanv svasti
975	nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vāsaya āśiram	nṛ pū abhi vāsay āśir
975	ye te madāḥ āhanasaḥ vihāyasaḥ	yad tvad mada āhanas vihāyas
975	tebhiḥ indram codaya dātave magham	tad indra coday dā magha
 ---
976	dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ	dhartṛ div pū kṛtvya rasa
976	dakṣaḥ devānām anumādyaḥ nṛbhiḥ	dakṣa deva anumad nṛ
976	hariḥ sṛjānaḥ atyaḥ na satvabhiḥ	hari sṛj atya na satvan
976	vṛthā pājāṁsi kṛṇute nadīṣu ā	vṛthā pājas kṛ nadī ā
976	śūraḥ na dhatte āyudhā gabhastyoḥ	śūra na dhā āyudha gabhasti
976	svar siṣāsan rathiraḥ gaviṣTiṣu	svar siṣās rathira gaviṣṭi
976	indrasya śuṣmam īrayan apasyubhiḥ	indra śuṣma īray apasyu
976	induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate manīṣibhiḥ	indu hi añj manīṣin
976	indrasya soma pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā	indra soma pū ūrmi
976	taviṣyamāṇaḥ jaThareṣu ā viśa	taviṣy jaṭhara ā viś
976	pra naḥ pinva vidyut abhrā iva rodasī	pra mad pinv vidyut abhra iva rodas
976	dhiyā na vājān upa māsi śaśvataḥ	dhī na vāja upa mā śaśvat
976	viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśaḥ	viśva rājan pū svar dṛś
976	ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāT avīvaśat	ṛta dhīti ṛṣiṣah vāś
976	yaḥ sūryasya asireṇa mṛjyate	yad sūrya asira mṛj
976	pitā matīnām asamaṣTakāvyaḥ	pitṛ mati a samaś kāvya
976	vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣasi	vṛṣan iva yūtha pari kośa ṛṣ
976	apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat	ap upastha vṛṣabha kanikrad
976	saḥ indrāya pavase matsarintamaḥ	tad indra pū matsarintama
976	yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ	yathā ji samitha tvoti
 ---
977	eṣa pra kośe madhumān acikradat	etad pra kośa madhumat krand
977	indrasya vajraḥ vapuṣaḥ vapuṣTaraḥ	indra vajra vapus vapuṣṭara
977	abhi īm ṛtasya sudughāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ	abhi īṃ ṛta su dugha ghṛtaścut
977	vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ	vāśrā ṛṣ payas iva dhenu
977	sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yam divaḥ pari	tad pūrvya pū yad div pari
977	śyenaḥ mathāyat iṣitaḥ tiraḥ rajaḥ	śyena mathāy iṣ tiras rajas
977	sa madhvaḥ ā yuvate vevijānaḥ it	sa madhu as yu vevij id
977	kṛśānoḥ astuḥ manasā aha bibhyuṣā	kṛśānu astṛ manas aha bhī
