977	te naḥ pūrvāsaḥ uparāsaḥ indavaḥ	tad mad pūrva upara indu
977	mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate	mah vāja dhanv gomat
977	īkṣeṇyāsaḥ ahyaḥ na cāravaḥ	īkṣeṇya ahī na cāru
977	brahmabrahma ye jujuṣuḥ havirhaviḥ	brahman brahman yad juṣ havis havis
977	ayam naḥ vidvān vanavat vanuṣyataḥ	idam mad vid van vanuṣy
977	induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣTutaḥ	indu satrāc manas puruṣṭuta
977	inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe	ina yad sadana garbha ādhā
977	gavām urubjam abhi arṣati vrajam	go urubja abhi ṛṣ vraja
977	cakriḥ divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ	cakri div pū kṛtvya rasa
977	mahān adabdhaḥ varuṇaḥ huruk yate	mahat adabdha varuṇa huruk i
977	asāvi mitraḥ vṛjaneṣu yajñiyaḥ	su mitra vṛjana yajñiya
977	atyaḥ na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat	atya na yūtha vṛṣayu kanikrad
 ---
978	pra rājā vācam janayan asiṣyadat	pra rājan vāc janay syand
978	apaḥ vasānaḥ abhi gāḥ iyakṣati	ap vas abhi go iyakṣ
978	gṛbhṇāti ripram aviḥ asya tānvā	grah ripra avi idam tānva
978	śuddhaḥ devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam	śudh deva upa yā niṣkṛta
978	indrāya soma pari sicyase nṛbhiḥ	indra soma pari sic nṛ
978	nṛcakṣāḥ ūrmiḥ kaviḥ ajyase vane	nṛ cakṣas ūrmi kavi añj vana
978	pūrvīḥ hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave	puru hi tvad sruti as yā
978	sahasram aśvāḥ harayaḥ camūṣadaḥ	sahasra aśva hari camūṣad
978	samudriyāḥ apsarasaḥ manīṣiṇam	samudriya apsaras manīṣin
978	āsīnāḥ antar abhi somam akṣaran	ās antar abhi soma kṣar
978	tāḥ īm hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim	tad īṃ hi harmya sakṣaṇi
978	yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam	yāc sumna pū akṣita
978	gojit naḥ somaḥ rathajit hiraṇyajit	go jit mad soma ratha jit hiraṇya jit
978	svarjit abjit pavate sahasrajit	svar jit ap jit pū sahasra jit
978	yam devāsaḥ cakrire pītaye madam	yad deva kṛ pā mada
978	svādiṣTham drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam	svādiṣṭha drapsa aruṇa mayobhu
978	etāni soma pavamānaḥ asmayuḥ	etad soma pū asmayu
978	satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāni arṣasi	satya kṛ draviṇa ṛṣ
978	jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca yaḥ	han śatru antika dūraka ca yad
978	urvīm gavyūtim abhayam ca naḥ kṛdhi	uru gavyūti abhaya ca mad kṛ
 ---
979	acodasaḥ naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ	acodas mad dhanv indu
979	pra suvānāsaḥ bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ	pra su bṛhaddiva hari
979	vi ca naśan naḥ iṣaḥ arātayaḥ	vi ca naś mad iṣ arāti
979	aryaḥ naśanta saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ	ari naś san mad dhī
979	pra naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ madacyutaḥ	pra mad dhanv indu madacyut
979	dhanā vā yebhiḥ arvataḥ junīmasi	dhana vā yad arvant jū
979	tiraḥ martasya kasya cit parihvṛtim	tiras marta kaścit parihvṛti
979	vayam dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi	mad dhana viśvadhā bhṛ
979	uta svasyāḥ arātyāḥ ariḥ hi sa	uta sva arāti ari hi tad
979	uta anyasyāḥ arātyāḥ vṛkaḥ hi saḥ	uta anya arāti vṛka hi tad
979	dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tān abhi	dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam ṛch tad abhi
979	soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ	soma han pū durādhī
979	divi te nābhā paramaḥ yaḥ ādade	div tvad nābhi parama yad ādā
979	pṛthivyāḥ te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ	pṛthivī tvad ruh sānu kṣip
979	adrayaḥ tvā bapsati goḥ adhi tvaci	adri tvad bhas go adhi tvac
979	apsu tvā hastaiḥ duduhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	ap tvad hasta duh manīṣin
979	evā te indo subhvam supeśasam	eva tvad indu su bhū supeśas
979	rasam tuñjanti prathamāḥ abhiśriyaḥ	rasa tuj prathama abhiśrī
979	nidaṁnidam pavamāna ni tāriṣaḥ	nid nid pū ni tṛ
979	āviḥ te śuṣmaḥ bhavatu priyaḥ madaḥ	āvis tvad śuṣma bhū priya mada
 ---
980	somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasaḥ	soma dhārā pū nṛ cakṣas
980	ṛtena devān havate divaḥ pari	ṛta deva hvā div pari
980	bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute	bṛhaspati ravatha vi dyut
980	samudrāsaḥ na savanāni vivyacuḥ	samudra na savana vyac
980	yam tvā vājin aghnyāḥ abhi anūṣata	yad tvad vājin aghnyā abhi nū
980	ayohatam yonim ā rohasi dyumān	ayas han yoni ā ruh dyumat
980	maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śravaḥ	maghavan āyus pratṛ mahi śravas
980	indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ	indra soma pū vṛṣan mada
980	ā indrasya kukṣā pavate madintamaḥ	ā indra kukṣi pū madintama
980	ūrjam vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ	ūrj vas śravas su maṅgala
980	pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paprathe	pratyañc tad viśva bhuvana abhi prath
980	krīLan hariḥ atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā	krīḍ hari atya syand vṛṣan
980	tam tvā devebhyaḥ madhumattamam naraḥ	tad tvad deva madhumattama nṛ
980	sahasradhāram duhate daśa kṣipaḥ	sahasra dhārā duh daśan kṣip
980	nṛbhiḥ soma pracyutaḥ grāvabhiḥ sutaḥ	nṛ soma pracyu grāvan su
980	viśvān devān ā pavasvā sahasrajit	viśva deva ā pū sahasra jit
980	tam tvā hastinaḥ madhumantam adribhiḥ	tad tvad hastin madhumat adri
980	duhanti apsu vṛṣabham daśa kṣipaḥ	duh ap vṛṣabha daśan kṣip
980	indram soma mādayan daivyam janam	indra soma māday daivya jana
980	sindhoḥ iva ūrmiḥ pavamānaḥ arṣasi	sindhu iva ūrmi pū ṛṣ
 ---
981	pra somasya pavamānasya ūrmayaḥ	pra soma pū ūrmi
981	indrasya yanti jaTharam supeśasaḥ	indra i jaṭhara supeśas
981	dadhnā yat īm unnītāḥ yaśasā gavām	dadhi yat īṃ unnī yaśas go
981	dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ	dāna śūra unmad su
981	acchā hi somaḥ kalaśān asiṣyadat	acchā hi soma kalaśa syand
981	atyaḥ na voLhā raghuvartaniḥ vṛṣā	atya na voḍhṛ raghu vartani vṛṣan
981	athā devānām ubhayasya janmanaḥ	atha deva ubhaya janman
981	vidvān aśnoti amutaḥ itaḥ ca yat	vid aś amutas itas ca yad
981	ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasu	ā mad soma pū kṛ vasu
981	indo bhava maghavā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ	indu bhū maghavan rādhas mah
981	śikṣā vayodhaḥ vasave su cetunā	śikṣ vayodhas vasu su cetu
981	mā naḥ gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ	mā na u gaya āre mad parā sic
981	ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayaḥ	ā mad pūṣan pū su rāti
981	mitraḥ gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ	mitra gam varuṇa sajoṣas
981	bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ vāyuḥ aśvinā	bṛhaspati marut vāyu aśvin
981	tvaṣTā savitā suyamā sarasvatī	tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ su yama sarasvatī
981	ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve	ubh dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminva
981	aryamā devaḥ aditiḥ vidhātā	aryaman deva aditi vidhātṛ
981	bhagaḥ nṛśaṁsaḥ uru antarikṣam	bhaga nṛśaṃsa uru antarikṣa
981	viśve devāḥ pavamānam juṣanta	viśva deva pū juṣ
 ---
982	asāvi somaḥ aruṣaḥ vṛṣā harī	su soma aruṣa vṛṣan hari
982	rājā iva dasmaḥ abhi gāḥ acikradat	rājan iva dasma abhi go krand
982	punānaḥ vāram pari eti avyayam	pū vāra pari i avyaya
982	śyenaḥ na yonim ghṛtavantam āsadam	śyena na yoni ghṛtavat āsad
982	kaviḥ vedhasyā pari eṣi māhinam	kavi vedhasyā pari i māhina
982	atyaḥ na mṛṣTaḥ abhi vājam arṣasi	atya na mṛj abhi vāja ṛṣ
982	apasedhan duritā soma mṛLaya	apasidh durita soma mṛḍay
982	ghṛtam vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam	ghṛta vas pari yā nirṇij
982	parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇinaḥ	parjanya pitṛ mahiṣa parṇin
982	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ giriṣu kṣayam dadhe	nābhi pṛthivī giri kṣaya dhā
982	svasāraḥ āpaḥ abhi gāḥ uta asaran	svasṛ ap abhi go uta sṛ
982	sam grāvabhiḥ nasate vīte adhvare	sam grāvan nas vī adhvara
982	jāyā iva patyau adhi śeva maṁhase	jāyā iva pati adhi śeva mah
982	pajrāyāḥ garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te	pajra garbha śru brū tvad
982	antar vāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase	antar vāṇī pra car su jīv
982	anindyaḥ vṛjane soma jāgṛhi	anindya vṛjana soma jāgṛ
982	yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasāḥ amṛdhraḥ	yathā pūrva śata sā amṛdhra
982	sahasrasāḥ paryayāḥ vājam indo	sahasra sā pariyā vāja indu
982	evā pavasva suvitāya navyase	eva pū suvita navyas
982	tava vratam anu āpaḥ sacante	tvad vrata anu ap sac
 ---
983	pavitram te vitatam brahmaṇaḥ pate	pavitra tvad vitan brahmaṇaspati
983	prabhuḥ gātrāṇi pari eṣi viśvataḥ	prabhu gātra pari i viśvatas
983	ataptatanūḥ na tat āmaḥ aśnute	a tap tanū na tad āma aś
983	śṛtāsaḥ it vahantaḥ tat sam āśata	śrī id vah tad sam aś
983	tapoḥ pavitram vitatam divaḥ pade	tapu pavitra vitan div pada
983	śocantaḥ asya tantavaḥ vi asthiran	śuc idam tantu vi sthā
983	avanti asya pavītāram āśavaḥ	av idam pavītṛ āśu
983	divaḥ pṛṣTham adhi tiṣThanti cetasā	div pṛṣṭha adhi sthā cetas
983	arūrucat uṣasaḥ pṛśniḥ agriyaḥ	ruc uṣas pṛśni agriya
983	ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ	ukṣan bhṛ bhuvana vājayu
983	māyāvinaḥ mamire asya māyayā	māyāvin mā idam māyā
983	nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaraḥ garbham ā dadhuḥ	nṛ cakṣas pitṛ garbha ā
983	gandharvaḥ itthā padam asya rakṣati	gandharva itthā pada idam rakṣ
983	pāti devānām janimāni adbhutaḥ	pā deva janiman adbhuta
983	gṛbhṇāti ripum nidhayā nidhāpatiḥ	grah ripu nidhā nidhā pati
983	sukṛttamāḥ madhunaḥ bhakṣam āśata	su kṛttama madhu bhakṣa aś
983	haviḥ haviṣmaḥ mahi sadma daivyam	havis haviṣmat mahi sadman daivya
983	nabhaḥ vasānaḥ pari yāsi adhvaram	nabhas vas pari yā adhvara
983	rājā pavitrarathaḥ vājam ā aruhaḥ	rājan pavitra ratha vāja āruh
983	sahasrabhṛṣTiḥ jayasi śravaḥ bṛhat	sahasra bhṛṣṭi ji śravas bṛhat
 ---
984	pavasva devamādanaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ	pū deva mādana vicarṣaṇi
984	apsāḥ indrāya varuṇāya vāyave	ap sā indra varuṇa vāyu
984	kṛdhī naḥ adya varivaḥ svastimat	kṛ mad adya varivas svastimat
984	urukṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyam janam	uru kṣiti gṛ daivya jana
984	ā yaḥ tasthau bhuvanāni amartyaḥ	ā yad sthā bhuvana amartya
984	viśvāni somaḥ pari tāni arṣati	viśva soma pari tad ṛṣ
984	kṛṇvan saṁcṛtam vicṛtam abhiṣTaye	kṛ saṃcṛt vicṛt abhiṣṭi
984	induḥ siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ	indu sac uṣas na sūrya
984	ā yaḥ gobhiḥ sṛjyate oṣadhīṣu ā	ā yad go sṛj oṣadhī ā
984	devānām sumne iṣayan upāvasuḥ	deva sumna iṣay upāvasu
984	ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā sutaḥ	ā vidyut pū dhārā su
984	indram somaḥ mādayan daivyam janam	indra soma māday daivya jana
984	eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasrajit	etad tya soma pū sahasra jit
984	hinvānaḥ vācam iṣirām uṣarbudham	hi vāc iṣira uṣarbudh
984	induḥ samudram ut iyarti vāyubhiḥ	indu samudra ud ṛch vāyu
984	ā indrasya hārdi kalaśeṣu sīdati	ā indra hārdi kalaśa sad
984	abhi tyam gāvaḥ payasā payovṛdham	abhi tya go payas payas vṛdh
984	somam śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svarvidam	soma śrī mati svar vid
984	dhanaṁjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ	dhanaṃjaya pū kṛtvya rasa
984	vipraḥ kaviḥ kāvyenā svarcanāḥ	vipra kavi kāvya svar canas
 ---
985	indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari srava	indra soma suṣuta pari sru
985	apa amīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha	apa amīvā bhū rakṣas saha
985	mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvinaḥ	mā tvad rasa mad dvayāvin
985	draviṇasvantaḥ iha santu indavaḥ	draviṇasvat iha as indu
985	asmān samarye pavamāna codaya	mad samarya pū coday
985	dakṣaḥ devānām asi hi priyaḥ madaḥ	dakṣa deva as hi priya mada
985	jahi śatrūn abhi ā bhandanāyataḥ	han śatru abhi ā bhandanāy
985	piba indra somam ava naḥ mṛdhaḥ jahi	pā indra soma ava mad mṛdh han
985	adabdhaḥ indo pavase madintamaḥ	adabdha indu pū madintama
985	ātmā indrasya bhavasi dhāsiḥ uttamaḥ	ātman indra bhū dhāsi uttama
985	abhi svaranti bahavaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	abhi svar bahu manīṣin
985	rājānam asya bhuvanasya niṁsate	rājan idam bhuvana niṃs
985	sahasraṇīthaḥ śatadhāraḥ adbhutaḥ	sahasraṇītha śata dhārā adbhuta
985	indrāya induḥ pavate kāmyam madhu	indra indu pū kāmya madhu
985	jayan kṣetram abhi arṣā jayan apaḥ	ji kṣetra abhi ṛṣ ji ap
985	urum naḥ gātum kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ	uru mad gātu kṛ soma mīḍhvas
985	kanikradat kalaśe gobhiḥ ajyase	kanikrad kalaśa go añj
985	vi avyayam samayā vāram arṣasi	vi avyaya samayā vāra ṛṣ
985	marmṛjyamānaḥ atyaḥ na sānasiḥ	marmṛj atya na sānasi
985	indrasya soma jaThare sam akṣaraḥ	indra soma jaṭhara sam kṣar
985	svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane	svādu pū divya janman
985	svāduḥ indrāya suhavītunāmne	svādu indra suhavītunāman
985	svāduḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave	svādu mitra varuṇa vāyu
985	bṛhaspataye madhumān adābhyaḥ	bṛhaspati madhumat adābhya
985	atyam mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ	atya mṛj kalaśa daśan kṣip
985	pra viprāṇām matayaḥ vācaḥ īrate	pra vipra mati vāc īr
985	pavamānāḥ abhi arṣanti suṣTutim	pū abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti
985	ā indram viśanti madirāsaḥ indavaḥ	ā indra viś madira indu
985	pavamānaḥ abhi arṣā suvīryam	pū abhi ṛṣ su vīrya
985	urvīm gavyūtim mahi śarma saprathaḥ	uru gavyūti mahi śarman saprathas
985	mākiḥ naḥ asya pariṣūtiḥ īśata	mākir mad idam pariṣūti īś
985	indo jayema tvayā dhanaṁdhanam	indu ji tvad dhana dhana
985	adhi dyām asthāt vṛṣabhaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	adhi div sthā vṛṣabha vicakṣaṇa
985	arūrucat vi divaḥ rocanā kaviḥ	ruc vi div rocana kavi
985	rājā pavitram ati eti roruvat	rājan pavitra ati i roro
985	divaḥ pīyūṣam duhate nṛcakṣasaḥ	div pīyūṣa duh nṛ cakṣas
985	divaḥ nāke madhujihvāḥ asaścataḥ	div nāka madhu jihvā asaścat
985	venāḥ duhanti ukṣaṇam giriṣThām	vena duh ukṣan giriṣṭhā
985	apsu drapsam vāvṛdhānam samudre ā	ap drapsa vṛdh samudra ā
985	sindhoḥ ūrmā madhumantam pavitre ā	sindhu ūrmi madhumat pavitra ā
985	nāke suparṇam upapaptivāṁsam	nāka suparṇa upapat
985	giraḥ venānām akṛpanta pūrvīḥ	gir vena kṛp puru
985	śiśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam	śiśu rih mati panipn
985	hiraṇyayam śakunam kṣāmaṇi sthām	hiraṇyaya śakuna kṣāman sthā
985	ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ adhi nāke asthāt	ūrdhva gandharva adhi nāka sthā
985	viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇaḥ asya	viśva rūpa praticakṣ idam
985	bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vi adyaut	bhānu śukra śocis vi dyut
985	pra arūrucat rodasī mātarā śuciḥ	praruc rodasī mātṛ śuci
 ---
986	pra te āśavaḥ pavamāna dhījavaḥ	pra tvad āśu pū dhī jū
986	madāḥ arṣanti raghujāḥ iva tmanā	mada ṛṣ raghu jā iva tman
986	divyāḥ suparṇāḥ madhumantaḥ indavaḥ	divya suparṇa madhumat indu
986	madintamāsaḥ pari kośam āsate	madintama pari kośa ās
986	pra te madāsaḥ madirāsaḥ āśavaḥ	pra tvad mada madira āśu
986	asṛkṣata rathyāsaḥ yathā pṛthak	sṛj rathya yathā pṛthak
986	dhenuḥ na vatsam payasā abhi vajriṇam	dhenu na vatsa payas abhi vajrin
986	indram indavaḥ madhumantaḥ ūrmayaḥ	indra indu madhumat ūrmi
986	atyaḥ na hiyānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa	atya na hi abhi vāja ṛṣ
986	svarvit kośam divaḥ adrimātaram	svar vid kośa div adri mātṛ
986	vṛṣā pavitre adhi sānau avyaye	vṛṣan pavitra adhi sānu avyaya
986	somaḥ punānaḥ indriyāya dhāyase	soma pū indriya dhāyas
986	pra te āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhījuvaḥ	pra tvad āśvina pū dhī jū
986	divyāḥ asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi	divya sṛj payas dharīman
986	pra antar ṛṣayaḥ sthāvirīḥ asṛkṣata	pra antar ṛṣi sthāvira sṛj
986	ye tvā mṛjanti ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ	yad tvad mṛj ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhas
986	viśvā dhāmāni viśvacakṣaḥ ṛbhvasaḥ	viśva dhāman viśva cakṣas ṛbhvas
986	prabhoḥ te sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ	prabhu tvad as pari i ketu
986	vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ	vyānaśi pū soma dharman
986	patiḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi	pati viśva bhuvana rāj
986	ubhayataḥ pavamānasya raśmayaḥ	ubhayatas pū raśmi
986	dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ	dhruva as pari i ketu
986	yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ	yadi pavitra adhi mṛj hari
986	sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati	sattṛ ni yoni kalaśa sad
986	yajñasya ketuḥ pavate svadhvaraḥ	yajña ketu pū su adhvara
986	somaḥ devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam	soma deva upa yā niṣkṛta
986	sahasradhāraḥ pari kośam arṣati	sahasra dhārā pari kośa ṛṣ
986	vṛṣā pavitram ati eti roruvat	vṛṣan pavitra ati i roro
986	rājā samudram nadyaḥ vi gāhate	rājan samudra nadī vi gāh
986	apām ūrmim sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ	ap ūrmi sac sindhu śri
986	adhi asthāt sānu pavamānaḥ avyayam	adhi sthā sānu pū avyaya
986	nābhā pṛthivyāḥ dharuṇaḥ mahaḥ divaḥ	nābhi pṛthivī dharuṇa mah div
986	divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat	div na sānu stanay krand
986	dyauḥ ca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ	div ca yad pṛthivī ca dharman
986	indrasya sakhyam pavate vivevidat	indra sakhya pū vivevid
986	somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati	soma pū kalaśa sad
986	jyotiḥ yajñasya pavate madhu priyam	jyotis yajña pū madhu priya
986	pitā devānām janitā vibhūvasuḥ	pitṛ deva janitṛ vibhūvasu
986	dadhāti ratnam svadhayoḥ apīcyam	dhā ratna svadhā apīcya
986	madintamaḥ matsaraḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ	madintama matsara indriya rasa
986	abhikrandan kalaśam vājī arṣati	abhikrand kalaśa vājin ṛṣ
986	patiḥ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	pati div śata dhārā vicakṣaṇa
986	hariḥ mitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati	hari mitra sadana sad
986	marmṛjānaḥ avibhiḥ sindhubhiḥ vṛṣā	marmṛj avi sindhu vṛṣan
986	agre sindhūnām pavamānaḥ arṣati	agra sindhu pū ṛṣ
986	agre vācaḥ agriyaḥ goṣu gacchati	agra vāc agriya go gam
986	agre vājasya bhajate mahādhanam	agra vāja bhaj mahat dhana
986	svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā	su āyudha sotṛ pū vṛṣan
986	ayam matavān śakunaḥ yathā hitaḥ	idam matavat śakuna yathā hi
986	avye sasāra pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā	avya sṛ pū ūrmi
986	tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave	tvad kratu rodasī antarā kavi
986	śuciḥ dhiyā pavate somaḥ indra te	śuci dhī pū soma indra tvad
986	drāpim vasānaḥ yajataḥ divispṛśam	drāpi vas yajata divispṛś
986	antarikṣaprāḥ bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ	antarikṣa prā bhuvana arpay
986	svar jajñānaḥ nabhasā abhi akramīt	svar jan nabhas abhi kram
986	pratnam asya pitaram ā vivāsati	pratna idam pitṛ ā vivās
986	saḥ asya viśe mahi śarma yacchati	tad idam viś mahi śarman yam
986	yaḥ asya dhāma prathamam vyānaśe	yad idam dhāman prathama vyaś
986	padam yat asya parame vyomani	pada yad idam parama vyoman
986	ataḥ viśvāḥ abhi sam yāti saṁyataḥ	atas viśva abhi sam yā saṃyat
986	pra u ayāsīt induḥ indrasya niṣkṛtam	pra u yā indu indra niṣkṛta
986	sakhā sakhyuḥ na pra mināti saṁgiram	sakhi sakhi na pra mī saṃgir
986	maryaḥ iva yuvatibhiḥ sam arṣati	marya iva yuvati sam ṛṣ
986	somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmnā pathā	soma kalaśa śata yāman pathin
986	pra vaḥ dhiyaḥ mandrayuvaḥ vipanyuvaḥ	pra tvad dhī mandrayu vipanyu
986	panasyuvaḥ saṁvasaneṣu akramuḥ	panasyu saṃvasana kram
986	somam manīṣāḥ abhi anūṣata stubhaḥ	soma manīṣā abhi nū stubh
986	abhi dhenavaḥ payasā īm aśiśrayuḥ	abhi dhenu payas īṃ śri
986	ā naḥ soma saṁyatam pipyuṣīm iṣam	ā mad soma saṃyat pyā iṣ
986	indo pavasva pavamānaḥ asridham	indu pū pū asridh
986	yā naḥ dohate triḥ ahan asaścuṣī	yad mad duh tris ahar a sac
986	kṣumat vājavat madhumat suvīryam	kṣumat vājavat madhumat su vīrya
986	vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ	vṛṣan mati pū vicakṣaṇa
986	somaḥ ahnaḥ pratarītā uṣasaḥ divaḥ	soma ahar pratarītṛ uṣas div
986	krāṇā sindhūnām kalaśān avīvaśat	krāṇā sindhu kalaśa vāś
986	indrasya hārdi āviśan manīṣibhiḥ	indra hārdi āviś manīṣin
986	manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kaviḥ	manīṣin pū pūrvya kavi
986	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ pari kośān acikradat	nṛ yam pari kośa krand
986	tritasya nāma janayan madhu kṣarat	trita nāman janay madhu kṣar
986	indrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave	indra vāyu sakhya kṛ
986	ayam punānaḥ uṣasaḥ vi rocayat	idam pū uṣas vi rocay
986	ayam sindhubhyaḥ abhavat ulokakṛt	idam sindhu bhū u loka kṛt
986	ayam triḥ sapta duduhānaḥ āśiram	idam tris saptan duh āśir
986	somaḥ hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ	soma hṛd pū cāru matsara
986	pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu	pū soma divya dhāman
986	sṛjānaḥ indo kalaśe pavitre ā	sṛj indu kalaśa pavitra ā
986	sīdan indrasya jaThare kanikradat	sad indra jaṭhara kanikrad
986	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ sūryam ā arohayaḥ divi	nṛ yam sūrya ārohay div
986	adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitre ā	adri su pū pavitra
986	indo indrasya jaThareṣu āviśan	indu indra jaṭhara āviś
986	tvam nṛcakṣāḥ abhavaḥ vicakṣaṇa	tvad nṛ cakṣas bhū vicakṣaṇa
986	soma gotram aṅgirobhyaḥ avṛṇoḥ apa	soma gotra aṅgiras vṛ apa
986	tvām soma pavamānam svādhyaḥ	tvad soma pū svādhī
986	anu viprāsaḥ amadan avasyavaḥ	anu vipra mad avasyu
986	tvām suparṇaḥ ā abharat divaḥ pari	tvad suparṇa ābhṛ div pari
986	indo viśvābhiḥ matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam	indu viśva mati pariṣkṛ
986	avye punānam pari vāre ūrmiṇā	avya pū pari vāra ūrmi
986	harim navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ	hari nū abhi saptan dhenu
986	apām upasthe adhi āyavaḥ kavim	ap upastha adhi āyu kavi
986	ṛtasya yonā mahiṣāḥ aheṣata	ṛta yoni mahiṣa hi
986	induḥ punānaḥ ati gāhate mṛdhaḥ	indu pū ati gāh mṛdh
986	viśvāni kṛṇvan supathāni yajyave	viśva kṛ su patha yajyu
986	gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ nirṇijam haryataḥ kaviḥ	go kṛ nirṇij haryata kavi
986	atyaḥ na krīLan pari vāram arṣati	atya na krīḍ pari vāra ṛṣ
986	asaścataḥ śatadhārāḥ abhiśriyaḥ	asaścat śata dhārā abhiśrī
986	harim navante ava tāḥ udanyuvaḥ	hari nū ava tad udanyu
986	kṣipaḥ mṛjanti pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam	kṣip mṛj pari go āvṛ
986	tṛtīye pṛṣThe adhi rocane divaḥ	tṛtīya pṛṣṭha adhi rocana div
986	tava imāḥ prajāḥ divyasya retasaḥ	tvad idam prajā divya retas
986	tvam viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi	tvad viśva bhuvana rāj
986	atha idam viśvam pavamāna te vaśe	atha idam viśva pū tvad vaśa
986	tvam indo prathamaḥ dhāmadhāḥ asi	tvad indu prathama dhāman dhā as
986	tvam samudraḥ asi viśvavit kave	tvad samudra as viśva vid kavi
986	tava imāḥ pañca pradiśaḥ vidharmaṇi	tvad idam pañcan pradiś vidharman
986	tvam dyām ca pṛthivīm ca ati jabhriṣe	tvad div ca pṛthivī ca ati bhṛ
986	tava jyotīṁṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ	tvad jyotis pū sūrya
986	tvam pavitre rajasaḥ vidharmaṇi	tvad pavitra rajas vidharman
986	devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase	deva soma pū pū
986	tvām uśijaḥ prathamāḥ agṛbhṇata	tvad uśij prathama grah
986	tubhya imā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire	tvad idam viśva bhuvana yam
986	pra rebhaḥ eti ati vāram avyayam	pra rebha i ati vāra avyaya
986	vṛṣā vaneṣu ava cakradat hariḥ	vṛṣan vana ava krand hari
986	sam dhītayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ anūṣata	sam dhīti vāś nū
986	śiśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam	śiśu rih mati panipn
986	sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata	tad sūrya raśmi pari vye
986	tantum tanvānaḥ trivṛtam yathā vide	tantu tan trivṛt yathā vid
986	nayan ṛtasya praśiṣaḥ navīyasīḥ	nī ṛta praśis navīyas
986	patiḥ janīnām upa yāti niṣkṛtam	pati jani upa yā niṣkṛta
986	rājā sindhūnām pavate patiḥ divaḥ	rājan sindhu pū pati div
986	ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat	ṛta yā pathin kanikrad
986	sahasradhāraḥ pari sicyate hariḥ	sahasra dhārā pari sic hari
986	punānaḥ vācam janayan upāvasuḥ	pū vāc janay upāvasu
986	pavamāna mahi arṇaḥ vi dhāvasi	pū mahi arṇas vi dhāv
986	sūraḥ na citraḥ avyayāni pavyayā	sūra na citra avyaya pavyaya
986	gabhastipūtaḥ nṛbhiḥ adribhiḥ sutaḥ	gabhasti pū nṛ adri su
986	mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi	mah vāja dhanya dhanv
986	iṣam ūrjam pavamāna abhi arṣasi	iṣ ūrj pū abhi ṛṣ
986	śyenaḥ na vaṁsu kalaśeṣu sīdasi	śyena na van kalaśa sad
986	indrāya madvā madyaḥ madaḥ sutaḥ	indra madvan mad mada su
986	divaḥ viṣTambhaḥ upamaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	div viṣṭambha upama vicakṣaṇa
986	sapta svasāraḥ abhi mātaraḥ śiśum	saptan svasṛ abhi mātṛ śiśu
986	navam jajñānam jenyam vipaścitam	nava jan jenya vipaścit
986	apām gandharvam divyam nṛcakṣasam	ap gandharva divya nṛ cakṣas
986	somam viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase	soma viśva bhuvana rāj
986	īśānaḥ imā bhuvanāni vi īyase	īśāna idam bhuvana vī
986	yujānaḥ indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ	yuj indu harit suparṇī
986	tāḥ te kṣarantu madhumat ghṛtam payaḥ	tad tvad kṣar madhumat ghṛta payas
986	tava vrate soma tiṣThantu kṛṣTayaḥ	tvad vrata soma sthā kṛṣṭi
986	tvam nṛcakṣāḥ asi soma viśvataḥ	tvad nṛ cakṣas as soma viśvatas
986	pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi	pū vṛṣabha tad vi dhāv
986	sa naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat	tad mad pū vasumat hiraṇyavat
986	vayam syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase	mad as bhuvana jīv
986	govit pavasva vasuvit hiraṇyavit	go vid pū vasu vid hiraṇya vid
986	retodhāḥ indo bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ	retas dhā indu bhuvana arpay
986	tvam suvīraḥ asi soma viśvavit	tvad su vīra as soma viśva vid
986	tam tvā viprāḥ upa girā ime āsate	tad tvad vipra upa gir idam ās
986	ut madhvaḥ ūrmiḥ vananāḥ atiṣThipat	ud madhu ūrmi vanana sthāpay
986	apaḥ vasānaḥ mahiṣaḥ vi gāhate	ap vas mahiṣa vi gāh
986	rājā pavitrarathaḥ vājam ā aruhat	rājan pavitra ratha vāja āruh
986	sahasrabhṛṣTiḥ jayati śravaḥ bṛhat	sahasra bhṛṣṭi ji śravas bṛhat
986	sa bhandanāḥ ut iyarti prajāvatīḥ	tad bhandanā ud ṛch prajāvat
986	viśvāyuḥ viśvāḥ subharāḥ ahardivi	viśvāyu viśva subhara ahardivi
986	brahma prajāvat rayim aśvapastyam	brahman prajāvat rayi aśva pastya
986	pītaḥ indo indram asmabhyam yācatāt	pā indu indra mad yāc
986	saḥ agre ahnām hariḥ haryataḥ madaḥ	tad agra ahar hari haryata mada
986	pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ	pra cetas cetay anu div
986	dvā janā yātayan antar īyate	dvi jana yātay antar ī
986	narā ca śaṁsam daivyam ca dhartari	nṛ ca śaṃsa daivya ca dhartṛ
986	añjate vi añjate sam añjate	añj vi añj sam añj
986	kratum rihanti madhunā abhi añjate	kratu rih madhu abhi añj
986	sindhoḥ ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇam	sindhu ucchvāsa patay ukṣan
986	hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate	hiraṇya pāva paśu idam grah
986	vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata	vipaścit pū gā
986	mahī na dhārā ati andhaḥ arṣati	mah na dhārā ati andhas ṛṣ
986	ahiḥ na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam	ahi na jṛ ati sṛp tvac
986	atyaḥ na krīLan asarat vṛṣā hariḥ	atya na krīḍ sṛ vṛṣan hari
986	agregaḥ rājā apyaḥ taviṣyate	agrega rājan āpya taviṣy
986	vimānaḥ ahnām bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ	vimā ahar bhuvana arpay
986	hariḥ ghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīkaḥ arṇavaḥ	hari ghṛta snu su dṛśīka arṇava
986	jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāye okyaḥ	jyotīratha pū rai okya
986	asarji skambhaḥ divaḥ udyataḥ madaḥ	sṛj skambha div udyam mada
986	pari tridhātuḥ bhuvanāni arṣati	pari tri dhātu bhuvana ṛṣ
986	aṁśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam	aṃśu rih mati panipn
986	girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇaḥ yayuḥ	gir yadi nirṇij ṛgmin yā
986	pra te dhārāḥ ati aṇvāni meṣyaḥ	pra tvad dhārā ati aṇva meṣī
986	punānasya saṁyataḥ yanti raṁhayaḥ	pū saṃyat i raṃhi
986	yat gobhiḥ indo camvoḥ samajyase	yat go indu camū samañj
986	ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi	ā su soma kalaśa sad
986	pavasva soma kratuvit naḥ ukthyaḥ	pū soma kratu vid na ukthya
986	avyaḥ vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam	avya vāra pari dhāv madhu priya
986	jahi viśvān rakṣasaḥ indo atriṇaḥ	han viśva rakṣas indu atrin
986	bṛhat vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ	bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra
 ---
987	pra tu drava pari kośam ni sīda	pra tu dru pari kośa ni sad
987	nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa	nṛ pū abhi vāja ṛṣ
987	aśvam na tvā vājinam marjayantaḥ	aśva na tvad vājin marjay
987	acchā barhiḥ raśanābhiḥ nayanti	acchā barhis raśanā nī
987	svāyudhaḥ pavate devaḥ induḥ	su āyudha pū deva indu
987	aśastihā vṛjanam rakṣamāṇaḥ	aśasti han vṛjana rakṣ
987	pitā devānām janitā sudakṣaḥ	pitṛ deva janitṛ su dakṣa
987	viṣTambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	viṣṭambha div dharuṇa pṛthivī
987	ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ puraetā janānām	ṛṣi vipra puraetṛ jana
987	ṛbhuḥ dhīraḥ uśanā kāvyena	ṛbhu dhīra uśanas kāvya
987	sa cit viveda nihitam yat āsām	tad cit vid nidhā yad idam
987	apīcyam guhyam nāma gonām	apīcya guh nāman go
987	eṣa sya te madhumān indra somaḥ	etad tya tvad madhumat indra soma
987	vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣār	vṛṣan vṛṣan pari pavitra kṣar
987	sahasrasāḥ śatasāḥ bhūridāvā	sahasra sā śata sā bhūri dāvan
987	śaśvattamam barhiḥ ā vājī asthāt	śaśvattama barhis ā vājin sthā
987	ete somāḥ abhi gavyā sahasrā	etad soma abhi gavya sahasra
987	mahe vājāya amṛtāya śravāṁsi	mah vāja amṛta śravas
987	pavitrebhiḥ pavamānāḥ asṛgran	pavitra pū sṛj
987	śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanājaḥ atyāḥ	śravasyu na pṛtanāj atya
987	pari hi smā puruhūtaḥ janānām	pari hi sma puru hvā jana
987	viśvā asarat bhojanā pūyamānaḥ	viśva sṛ bhojana pū
987	atha ā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṁsi	atha bhṛ śyena bhṛ prayas
987	rayim tuñjānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa	rayi tuj abhi vāja ṛṣ
987	eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre	etad su pari soma pavitra
987	sargaḥ na sṛṣTaḥ adadhāvat arvā	sarga na sṛj dhāv arvan
987	tigme śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śṛṅge	tigma śā mahiṣa na śṛṅga
987	gāḥ gavyan abhi śūraḥ na satvā	go gavyat abhi śūra na satvan
987	eṣā ā yayau paramāt antar adreḥ	etad yā parama antar adri
987	kūcit satīḥ ūrve gāḥ viveda	kūcid as ūrva go vid
987	divaḥ na vidyut stanayantī abhraiḥ	div na vidyut stanay abhra
987	somasya te pavate indra dhārā	soma tvad pū indra dhārā
987	uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām	uta sma rāśi pari yā go
987	indreṇa soma saratham punānaḥ	indra soma sa ratha pū
987	pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ jīradāno	puru iṣ bṛhat jīra dānu
987	śikṣā śacīvaḥ tava tāḥ upaṣTut	śikṣ śacīvat tvad tad upaṣṭut
 ---
988	ayam somaḥ indra tubhyam sunve	idam soma indra tvad su
988	tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi	tvad pū tvad idam pā
988	tvam ha yam cakṛṣe tvam vavṛṣe	tvad ha yad kṛ tvad vṛ
988	indum madāya yujyāya somam	indu mada yujya soma
988	saḥ īm rathaḥ na bhuriṣāT ayoji	tad īṃ ratha na bhūriṣāh yuj
988	mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni	maha puru sāti vasu
988	āt īm viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā	āt īṃ viśva nahuṣya jāta
988	svarṣātā vane ūrdhvā navanta	svarṣāti vana ūrdhva nū
988	vāyuḥ na yaḥ niyutvān iṣTayāmā	vāyu na yad niyutvat iṣ yāman
988	nāsatyā iva have ā śambhaviṣThaḥ	nāsatya iva hava ā śambhaviṣṭha
988	viśvavāraḥ draviṇodāḥ iva tman	viśva vāra draviṇas dā iva tman
988	pūṣā iva dhījavanaḥ asi soma	pūṣan iva dhī javana as soma
988	indraḥ na yaḥ mahā karmāṇi cakriḥ	indra na yad maha karman cakri
988	hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūrbhit	hantṛ vṛtra as soma pur bhid
988	paidvaḥ na hi tvam ahināmnām	paidva na hi tvad ahi nāman
988	hantā viśvasya asi soma dasyoḥ	hantṛ viśva as soma dasyu
988	agniḥ na yaḥ vane ā sṛjyamānaḥ	agni na yad vana ā sṛj
988	vṛthā pājāṁsi kṛṇute nadīṣu	vṛthā pājas kṛ nadī
988	janaḥ na yudhvā mahataḥ upabdiḥ	jana na yudhvan mahat upabdi
988	iyarti somaḥ pavamānaḥ ūrmim	ṛch soma pū ūrmi
988	ete somāḥ ati vārāṇi avyā	etad soma ati vāra avya
988	divyāḥ na kośāsaḥ abhravarṣāḥ	divya na kośa abhra varṣa
988	vṛthā samudram sindhavaḥ na nīcīḥ	vṛthā samudra sindhu na nyāñc
988	sutāsaḥ abhi kalaśān asṛgran	su abhi kalaśa sṛj
988	śuṣmī śardhaḥ na mārutam pavasva	śuṣmin śardhas na māruta pū
988	anabhiśastā divyā yathā viT	anabhiśasta divya yathā viś
988	āpaḥ na makṣū sumatiḥ bhavā naḥ	ap na makṣū sumati bhū mad
988	sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāT na yajñaḥ	sahasra apsas pṛtanāṣāh na yajña
988	rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni	rājan nu tvad varuṇa vrata
988	bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma	bṛhat gabhīra tvad soma dhāman
988	śuciḥ tvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ	śuci tvad as priya na mitra
988	dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma	dakṣāyya aryaman iva as soma
 ---
989	pra u sya vahniḥ pathyābhiḥ asyān	pra u tya vahni pathyā syand
989	divaḥ na vṛṣTiḥ pavamānaḥ akṣār	div na vṛṣṭi pū kṣar
989	sahasradhāraḥ asadat ni asme	sahasra dhārā sad ni mad
989	mātuḥ upasthe vane ā ca somaḥ	mātṛ upastha vana ā ca soma
989	rājā sindhūnām avasiṣTa vāsaḥ	rājan sindhu vas vāsas
989	ṛtasya nāvam ā aruhat rajiṣThām	ṛta nau āruh rajiṣṭha
989	apsu drapsaḥ vāvṛdhe śyenajūtaḥ	ap drapsa vṛdh śyena jū
989	duhe īm pitā duhe īm pituḥ jām	duh īṃ pitṛ duh īṃ pitṛ jā
989	siṁham nasanta madhvaḥ ayāsam	siṃha nas madhu ayās
989	harim aruṣam divaḥ asya patim	hari aruṣa div idam pati
989	śūraḥ yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gāḥ	śūra yudh prathama pracch go
989	asya cakṣasā pari pāti ukṣā	idam cakṣas pari pā ukṣan
989	madhupṛṣTham ghoram ayāsam aśvam	madhu pṛṣṭha ghora ayās aśva
989	rathe yuñjanti urucakre ṛṣvam	ratha yuj uru cakra ṛṣva
989	svasāraḥ īm jāmayaḥ marjayanti	svasṛ īṃ jāmi marjay
989	sanābhayaḥ vājinam ūrjayanti	sanābhi vājin ūrjay
989	catasraḥ īm ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante	catur īṃ ghṛta duh sac
989	samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ	samāna antar dharuṇa niṣad
989	tāḥ īm arṣanti namasā punānāḥ	tad īṃ ṛṣ namas pū
989	tāḥ īm viśvataḥ pari santi pūrvīḥ	tad īṃ viśvatas pari as puru
989	viṣTambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	viṣṭambha div dharuṇa pṛthivī
989	viśvāḥ uta kṣitayaḥ haste asya	viśva uta kṣiti hasta idam
989	asat te utsaḥ gṛṇate niyutvān	as tvad utsa gṛ niyutvat
989	madhvaḥ aṁśuḥ pavate indriyāya	madhu aṃśu pū indriya
989	vanvan avātaḥ abhi devavītim	van avāta abhi deva vīti
989	indrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva	indra soma vṛtra han pū
989	śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ	śak mah puru ścandra rai
989	suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma	su vīrya pati as
 ---
990	pra hinvānaḥ janitā rodasyoḥ	pra hi janitṛ rodasī
990	rathaḥ na vājam saniṣyan ayāsīt	ratha na vāja san yā
990	indram gacchan āyudhā saṁśiśānaḥ	indra gam āyudha saṃśā
990	viśvā vasu hastayoḥ ādadhānaḥ	viśva vasu hasta ādhā
990	abhi tripṛṣTham vṛṣaṇam vayodhām	abhi tri pṛṣṭha vṛṣan vayas dhā
990	āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ	āṅgūṣa vāś vāṇī
990	vanā vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ na sindhūn	vana vas varuṇa na sindhu
990	vi ratnadhāḥ dayate vāryāṇi	vi ratna dhā day vārya
990	śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvān	śūra grāma sarva vīra sahāvat
990	jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni	ji pū san dhana
990	tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsu	tigma āyudha kṣipra dhanvan samad
990	aṣāLhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn	a sah sah pṛtanā śatru
990	urugavyūtiḥ abhayāni kṛṇvan	uru gavyūti abhaya kṛ
990	samīcīne ā pavasvā puraṁdhī	samīcīna ā pū puraṃdhi
990	apaḥ siṣāsan uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ	ap siṣās uṣas svar go
990	sam cikradaḥ mahaḥ asmabhyam vājān	sam krand mah mad vāja
990	matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram	mad soma varuṇa mad mitra
990	matsi indram indo pavamāna viṣṇum	mad indra indu pū viṣṇu
990	matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān	mad śardhas māruta mad deva
990	matsi mahām indram indo madāya	mad mahat indra indu mada
990	evā rājā iva kratumān amena	eva rājan iva kratumat ama
990	viśvā ghanighnat duritā pavasva	viśva jaṅghan durita pū
990	indo sūktāya vacase vayaḥ dhāḥ	indu sūkta vacas vayas dhā
990	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
 ---
991	asarji vakvā rathye yathā ājau	sṛj vakvan rathya yathā āji
991	dhiyā manotā prathamaḥ manīṣī	dhī manotṛ prathama manīṣin
991	daśa svasāraḥ adhi sānau avye	daśan svasṛ adhi sānu avya
991	ajanti vahnim sadanāni accha	aj vahni sadana acchā
991	vītī janasya divyasya kavyaiḥ	vīti jana divya kavya
991	adhi suvānaḥ nahuṣyebhiḥ induḥ	adhi su nahuṣya indu
991	pra yaḥ nṛbhiḥ amṛtaḥ martyebhiḥ	pra yad nṛ amṛta martya
991	marmṛjānaḥ avibhiḥ gobhiḥ adbhiḥ	marmṛj avi go ap
991	vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvat aṁśuḥ asmai	vṛṣan vṛṣan roro aṃśu idam
991	pavamānaḥ ruśat īrte payaḥ goḥ	pū ruśat īr payas go
991	sahasram ṛkvā pathibhiḥ vacovit	sahasra ṛkvan pathin vacas vid
991	adhvasmabhiḥ sūraḥ aṇvam vi yāti	adhvasman sūra aṇva vi yā
991	rujā dṛLhā cit rakṣasaḥ sadāṁsi	ruj dṛḍha cit rakṣas sadas
991	punānaḥ indo ūrṇuhi vi vājān	pū indu vṛ vi vāja
991	vṛśca upariṣTāt tujatā vadhena	vraśc upariṣṭāt tuj vadha
991	ye anti dūrāt upanāyam eṣām	yad anti dūrāt upanāya idam
991	sa pratnavat navyase viśvavāra	tad pratna vat navyas viśva vāra
991	sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ	sūkta pathin kṛ prāñc
991	ye duḥṣahāsaḥ vanuṣā bṛhantaḥ	yad duḥṣaha vanus bṛhat
991	tān te aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo	tad tvad aś puru kṛt purukṣu
991	evā punānaḥ apaḥ svar gāḥ	eva pū ap svar go
991	asmabhyam tokā tanayāni bhūri	mad toka tanaya bhūri
991	śam naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṁṣi soma	śam mad kṣetra uru jyotis soma
991	jyok naḥ sūryam dṛśaye rirīhi	jyok mad sūrya dṛś rā
 ---
992	pari suvānaḥ hariḥ aṁśuḥ pavitre	pari su hari aṃśu pavitra
992	rathaḥ na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ	ratha na sṛj sani hi
992	āpat ślokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ	āp śloka indriya pū
992	prati devān ajuṣata prayobhiḥ	prati deva juṣ prayas
992	acchā nṛcakṣāḥ asarat pavitre	acchā nṛ cakṣas sṛ pavitra
992	nāma dadhānaḥ kaviḥ asya yonau	nāman dhā kavi idam yoni
992	sīdan hotā iva sadane camūṣu	sad hotṛ iva sadana camū
992	upa īm agman ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ	upa īṃ gam ṛṣi saptan vipra
992	pra sumedhāḥ gātuvit viśvadevaḥ	pra sumedhas gātu vid viśva deva
992	somaḥ punānaḥ sadaḥ eti nityam	soma pū sadas i nitya
992	bhuvat viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantā	bhū viśva kāvya rantṛ
992	anu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ	anu jana yat pañcan dhīra
992	tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye	tvad tya soma pū niṇya
992	viśve devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ	viśva deva tri ekādaśa
992	daśa svadhābhiḥ adhi sānau avye	daśan svadhā adhi sānu avya
992	mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ	mṛj tvad nadī saptan yahva
992	tat nu satyam pavamānasya astu	tad nu satya pū as
992	yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṁnasanta	yatra viśva kāru saṃnas
992	jyotiḥ yat ahne akṛṇot ulokam	jyotis yat ahar kṛ u loka
992	pra āvat manum dasyave kar abhīkam	prāv manu dasyu kṛ abhīka
992	pari sadma iva paśumānti hotā	pari sadman iva paśumat hotṛ
992	rājā na satyaḥ samitīḥ iyānaḥ	rājan na satya samiti ī
992	somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśān ayāsīt	soma pū kalaśa yā
992	sīdan mṛgaḥ na mahiṣaḥ vaneṣu	sad mṛga na mahiṣa vana
 ---
993	sākamukṣaḥ marjayanta svasāraḥ	sākamukṣ marjay svasṛ
993	daśa dhīrasya dhītayaḥ dhanutrīḥ	daśan dhīra dhīti dhanutṛ
993	hariḥ pari adravat jāḥ sūryasya	hari pari dru jā sūrya
993	droṇam nanakṣe atyaḥ na vājī	droṇa nakṣ atya na vājin
993	sam mātṛbhiḥ na śiśuḥ vāvaśānaḥ	sam mātṛ na śiśu vāś
993	vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāraḥ adbhiḥ	vṛṣan dhanv puru vāra ap
993	maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtam yan	marya na yoṣā abhi niṣkṛta i
993	sam gacchate kalaśe usriyābhiḥ	sam gam kalaśa usriyā
993	uta pra pipye ūdhar aghnyāyāḥ	uta pra pyā ūdhas aghnyā
993	induḥ dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ	indu dhārā sac sumedhas
993	mūrdhānam gāvaḥ payasā camūṣu	mūrdhan go payas camū
993	abhi śrīṇanti vasubhiḥ na niktaiḥ	abhi śrī vasu na nij
993	sa naḥ devebhiḥ pavamāna rada	tad mad deva pū rad
993	indo rayim aśvinam vāvaśānaḥ	indu rayi aśvin vaś
993	rathirāyatām uśatī puraṁdhiḥ	rathirāy vaś puraṃdhi
993	asmadryak ā dāvane vasūnām	asmadryañc ā dā vasu
993	nū naḥ rayim upa māsva nṛvantam	nu mad rayi upa mā nṛvat
993	punānaḥ vātāpyam viśvaścandram	pū vātāpya viśva ścandra
993	pra vandituḥ indo tāri āyuḥ	pra vanditṛ indu tṛ āyus
993	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt	prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam
 ---
994	adhi yat asmin vājini iva śubhaḥ	adhi yat idam vājin iva śubh
994	spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ	spṛdh dhī sūrya na viś
994	apaḥ vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan	ap vṛ pū kavīy
994	vrajam na paśuvardhanāya manma	vraja na paśu vardhana manman
994	dvitā vyūrṇvan amṛtasya dhāma	dvitā vivṛ amṛta dhāman
994	svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta	svarvid bhuvana prath
994	dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāvaḥ	dhī pyā svasara na go
994	ṛtāyantīḥ abhi vāvaśre indum	ṛtāy abhi vāś indu
994	pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate	pari yat kavi kāvya bhṛ
994	śūraḥ na rathaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā	śūra na ratha bhuvana viśva
994	deveṣu yaśaḥ martāya bhūṣan	deva yaśas marta bhūṣ
994	dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ	dakṣa rai puru bhū navyas
994	śriye jātaḥ śriye ā niḥ iyāya	śrī jan śrī ā niḥ i
994	śriyam vayaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ dadhāti	śrī vayas jaritṛ dhā
994	śriyam vasānāḥ amṛtatvam āyan	śrī vas amṛta tva i
994	bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau	bhū satya samitha mitadru
994	iṣam ūrjam abhi arṣa aśvam gām	iṣ ūrj abhi ṛṣ aśva go
994	uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān	uru jyotis kṛ mad deva
994	viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam	viśva hi suṣaha tad tvad
994	pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn	pū bādh soma śatru
 ---
995	kanikranti hariḥ ā sṛjyamānaḥ	kanikrad hari ā sṛj
995	sīdan vanasya jaThare punānaḥ	sad vana jaṭhara pū
995	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijam gāḥ	nṛ yam kṛ nirṇij go
995	ataḥ matīḥ janayata svadhābhiḥ	atas mati janay svadhā
995	hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasya	hari sṛj pathyā ṛta
995	iyarti vācam aritā iva nāvam	ṛch vāc aritṛ iva nau
995	devaḥ devānām guhyāni nāma	deva deva guhya nāman
995	āviḥ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce	āviṣkṛ barhis pravac
995	apām iva it ūrmayaḥ tarturāṇāḥ	ap iva id ūrmi tartar
995	pra manīṣāḥ īrate somam accha	pra manīṣā īr soma acchā
995	namasyantīḥ upa ca yanti sam ca	namasy upa ca i sam ca
995	ā ca viśanti uśatīḥ uśantam	ā ca viś vaś vaś
995	tam marmṛjānam mahiṣam na sānau	tad marmṛj mahiṣa na sānu
995	aṁśum duhanti ukṣaṇam giriṣThām	aṃśu duh ukṣan giriṣṭhā
995	tam vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante	tad vaś mati sac
995	tritaḥ bibharti varuṇam samudre	trita bhṛ varuṇa samudra
995	iṣyan vācam upavaktā iva hotuḥ	iṣ vāc upavaktṛ iva hotṛ
995	punānaḥ indo vi syā manīṣām	pū indu vi sā manīṣā
995	indraḥ ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya	indra ca yat kṣi saubhaga
995	suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma	su vīrya pati as
 ---
996	pra senānīḥ śūraḥ agre rathānām	pra senānī śūra agra ratha
996	gavyan eti harṣate asya senā	gavyat i hṛṣ idam senā
996	bhadrān kṛṇvan indrahavān sakhibhyaḥ	bhadra kṛ indra hava sakhi
996	ā somaḥ vastrā rabhasāni datte	ā soma vastra rabhasa dā
996	sam asya harim harayaḥ mṛjanti	sam idam hari hari mṛj
996	aśvahayaiḥ aniśitam namobhiḥ	aśva haya aniśita namas
996	ā tiṣThati ratham indrasya sakhā	ā sthā ratha indra sakhi
996	vidvān enā sumatim yāti accha	vid idam sumati yā acchā
996	sa naḥ deva devatāte pavasva	tad mad deva devatāt pū
996	mahe soma psarase indrapānaḥ	mah soma psaras indra pāna
996	kṛṇvan apaḥ varṣayan dyām uta imām	kṛ ap varṣay div uta idam
996	uroḥ ā naḥ varivasyā punānaḥ	uru ā mad varivasyā pū
996	ajītaye ahataye pavasva	ajīti ahati pū
996	svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate	svasti sarvatāti bṛhat
996	tat uśanti viśve ime sakhāyaḥ	tad vaś viśva idam sakhi
996	tat aham vaśmi pavamāna soma	tad mad vaś pū soma
996	somaḥ pavate janitā matīnām	soma pū janitṛ mati
996	janitā divaḥ janitā pṛthivyāḥ	janitṛ div janitṛ pṛthivī
996	janitā agneḥ janitā sūryasya	janitṛ agni janitṛ sūrya
996	janitā indrasya janitā uta viṣṇoḥ	janitṛ indra janitṛ uta viṣṇu
996	brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām	brahman deva padavī kavi
996	ṛṣiḥ viprāṇām mahiṣaḥ mṛgāṇām	ṛṣi vipra mahiṣa mṛga
996	śyenaḥ gṛdhrāṇām svadhitiḥ vanānām	śyena gṛdhra svadhiti vana
996	somaḥ pavitram ati eti rebhan	soma pavitra ati i ribh
996	pra avīvipat vācaḥ ūrmim na sindhuḥ	pravip vāc ūrmi na sindhu
996	giraḥ somaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣāḥ	gir soma pū manīṣā
996	antar paśyan vṛjanā imā avarāṇi	antar paś vṛjana idam avara
996	ā tiṣThati vṛṣabhaḥ goṣu jānan	ā sthā vṛṣabha go jñā
996	sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvan avātaḥ	sa matsara pṛt van avāta
996	sahasraretāḥ abhi vājam arṣa	sahasra retas abhi vāja ṛṣ
996	indrāya indo pavamānaḥ manīṣī	indra indu pū manīṣin
996	aṁśoḥ ūrmim īraya gāḥ iṣaṇyan	aṃśu ūrmi īray go iṣaṇy
996	pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavātaḥ	pari priya kalaśa deva van
996	indrāya somaḥ raṇyaḥ madāya	indra soma ran mada
996	sahasradhāraḥ śatavājaḥ induḥ	sahasra dhārā śata vāja indu
996	vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti	vājin na sapti samanā gā
996	sa pūrvyaḥ vasuvit jāyamānaḥ	tad pūrvya vasu vid jan
996	mṛjānaḥ apsu duduhānaḥ adrau	mṛj ap duh adri
996	abhiśastipāḥ bhuvanasya rājā	abhiśasti pā bhuvana rājan
996	vidat gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ	vid gā brahman pū
996	tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve	tvad hi mad pitṛ soma pūrva
996	karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ	karman kṛ pū dhīra
996	vanvan avātaḥ paridhīn apa ūrṇu	van avāta paridhi apavṛ
996	vīrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ maghavā bhavā naḥ	vīra aśva maghavan bhū mad
996	yathā apavathāḥ manave vayodhāḥ	yathā pū manu vayas dhā
996	amitrahā varivovit haviṣmān	amitra han varivas vid haviṣmat
996	evā pavasva draviṇam dadhānaḥ	eva pū draviṇa dhā
996	indre sam tiṣTha janaya āyudhāni	indra sam sthā janay āyudha
996	pavasva soma madhumān ṛtāvā	pū soma madhumat ṛtāvan
996	apaḥ vasānaḥ adhi sānau avye	ap vas adhi sānu avya
996	ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda	ava droṇa ghṛtavat sad
996	madintamaḥ matsaraḥ indrapānaḥ	madintama matsara indra pāna
996	vṛṣTim divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva	vṛṣṭi div śata dhārā pū
996	sahasrasāḥ vājayuḥ devavītau	sahasra sā vājayu deva vīti
996	sam sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ	sam sindhu kalaśa vāś
996	sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran naḥ āyuḥ	sam usriyā pratṛ mad āyus
996	eṣa sya somaḥ matibhiḥ punānaḥ	etad tya soma mati pū
996	atyaḥ na vājī tarati it arātīḥ	atya na vājin tṛ id arāti
996	payaḥ na dugdham aditeḥ iṣiram	payas na duh aditi iṣira
996	uru iva gātuḥ suyamaḥ na voLhā	uru iva gātu su yama na voḍhṛ
996	svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamānaḥ	su āyudha sotṛ pū
996	abhi arṣa guhyam cāru nāma	abhi ṛṣ guhya cāru nāman
996	abhi vājam saptiḥ iva śravasyā	abhi vāja sapti iva śravasyā
996	abhi vāyum abhi gāḥ deva soma	abhi vāyu abhi go deva soma
996	śiśum jajñānam haryatam mṛjanti	śiśu jan haryata mṛj
996	śumbhanti vahnim marutaḥ gaṇena	śubh vahni marut gaṇa
996	kaviḥ gīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san	kavi gir kāvya kavi as
996	somaḥ pavitram ati eti rebhan	soma pavitra ati i ribh
996	ṛṣimanāḥ yaḥ ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ	ṛṣi manas yad ṛṣi kṛt svarṣā
996	sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām	sahasraṇītha padavī kavi
996	tṛtīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan	tṛtīya dhāman mahiṣa siṣās
996	somaḥ virājam anu rājati stup	soma virāj anu rāj stubh
996	camūṣat śyenaḥ śakunaḥ vibhṛtvā	camūṣad śyena śakuna vibhṛtvan
996	govinduḥ drapsaḥ āyudhāni bibhrat	go vindu drapsa āyudha bhṛ
996	apām ūrmim sacamānaḥ samudram	ap ūrmi sac samudra
996	turīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ vivakti	turīya dhāman mahiṣa vac
996	maryaḥ na śubhraḥ tanvam mṛjānaḥ	marya na śubhra tanū mṛj
996	atyaḥ na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām	atya na sṛ sani dhana
996	vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣan	vṛṣan iva yūtha pari kośa ṛṣ
996	kanikradat camvoḥ ā viveśa	kanikrad camū ā viś
996	pavasva indo pavamānaḥ mahobhiḥ	pū indu pū mahas
996	kanikradat pari vārāṇi arṣa	kanikrad pari vāra ṛṣ
996	krīLan camvoḥ ā viśa pūyamānaḥ	krīḍ camū ā viś pū
996	indram te rasaḥ madiraḥ mamattu	indra tvad rasa madira mad
996	pra asya dhārāḥ bṛhatīḥ asṛgran	prās dhārā bṛhat sṛj
996	aktaḥ gobhiḥ kalaśān ā viveśa	añj go kalaśa ā viś
996	sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyaḥ vipaścit	sāman kṛ sāmanya vipaścit
996	krandan eti abhi sakhyuḥ na jāmim	krand i abhi sakhi na jāmi
996	apaghnan eṣi pavamāna śatrūn	apahan i pū śatru
996	priyām na jāraḥ abhigītaḥ induḥ	priya na jāra abhigā indu
996	sīdan vaneṣu śakunaḥ na patvā	sad vana śakuna na patvan
996	somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā	soma pū kalaśa sad
996	ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma	ā tvad ruc pū soma
996	yoṣā iva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ	yoṣā iva i su dugha su dhārā
996	hariḥ ānītaḥ puruvāraḥ apsu	hari ānī puru vāra ap
996	acikradat kalaśe devayūnām	krand kalaśa devayu
 ---
997	asya preṣā hemanā pūyamānaḥ	idam preṣ heman pū
997	devaḥ devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam	deva deva sam pṛc rasa
997	sutaḥ pavitram pari eti rebhan	su pavitra pari i ribh
997	mitā iva sadma paśumānti hotā	mā iva sadman paśumat hotṛ
997	bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasānaḥ	bhadra vastra samanya vas
997	mahān kaviḥ nivacanāni śaṁsan	mahat kavi nivacana śaṃs
997	ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ	ā vañc camū pū
997	vicakṣaṇaḥ jāgṛviḥ devavītau	vicakṣaṇa jāgṛvi deva vīti
997	sam u priyaḥ mṛjyate sānau avye	sam u priya mṛj sānu avya
997	yaśastaraḥ yaśasām kṣaitaḥ asme	yaśastara yaśas kṣaita mad
997	abhi svara dhanvā pūyamānaḥ	abhi svar dhanv pū
997	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
997	pra gāyata abhi arcāma devān	pra gā abhi arc deva
997	somam hinota mahate dhanāya	soma hi mahat dhana
997	svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam	svādu pū ati vāra avya
997	ā sīdāti kalaśam devayuḥ naḥ	ā sad kalaśa devayu mad
997	induḥ devānām upa sakhyam āyan	indu deva upa sakhya e
997	sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya	sahasra dhārā pū mada
997	nṛbhiḥ stavānaḥ anu dhāma pūrvam	nṛ stu anu dhāman pūrva
997	agan indram mahate saubhagāya	gam indra mahat saubhaga
997	stotre rāye hariḥ arṣā punānaḥ	stotṛ rai hari ṛṣ pū
997	indram madaḥ gacchatu te bharāya	indra mada gam tvad bhara
997	devaiḥ yāhi saratham rādhaḥ acchā	deva yā sa ratha rādhas acchā
997	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
997	pra kāvyam uśanā iva bruvāṇaḥ	pra kāvya uśanas iva brū
997	devaḥ devānām janimā vivakti	deva deva janiman vac
997	mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ	mahi vrata śuci bandhu pāvaka
997	padā varāhaḥ abhi eti rebhan	pad varāha abhi i ribh
997	pra haṁsāsaḥ tṛpalam manyum accha	pra haṃsa tṛpala manyu acchā
997	amāt astam vṛṣagaṇāḥ ayāsuḥ	amāt asta vṛṣagaṇa yā
997	āṅgūṣyam pavamānam sakhāyaḥ	āṅgūṣya pū sakhi
997	durmarṣam sākam pra vadanti vāṇam	durmarṣa sākam pra vad vāṇa
997	sa raṁhate urugāyasya jūtim	tad raṃh urugāya jūti
997	vṛthā krīLantam mimate na gāvaḥ	vṛthā krīḍ mā na go
997	parīṇasam kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgaḥ	parīṇas kṛ tigma śṛṅga
997	divā hariḥ dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ	divā hari dṛś nakta ṛjra
997	induḥ vājī pavate gonyoghāḥ	indu vājin pū gonyoghas
997	indre somaḥ sahaḥ invan madāya	indra soma sahas inv mada
997	hanti rakṣaḥ bādhate pari arātīḥ	han rakṣas bādh pari arāti
997	varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā	varivas kṛ vṛjana rājan
997	adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānaḥ	adha dhārā madhu pṛc
997	tiraḥ roma pavate adridugdhaḥ	tiras roman pū adri dugdha
997	induḥ indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ	indu indra sakhya juṣ
997	devaḥ devasya matsaraḥ madāya	deva deva matsara mada
997	abhi priyāṇi pavate punānaḥ	abhi priya pū pū
997	devaḥ devān svena rasena pṛñcan	deva deva sva rasa pṛc
997	induḥ dharmāṇi ṛtuthā vasānaḥ	indu dharma ṛtuthā vas
997	daśa kṣipaḥ avyata sānau avye	daśan kṣip vye sānu avya
997	vṛṣā śoṇaḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ	vṛṣan śoṇa abhikanikrad go
997	nadayan eti pṛthivīm uta dyām	naday i pṛthivī uta div
997	indrasya iva vagnuḥ ā śṛṇve ājau	indra iva vagnu ā śru āji
997	pracetayan arṣati vācam ā imām	pracetay ṛṣ vāc ā idam
997	rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamānaḥ	rasāyya payas pinv
997	īrayan eṣi madhumantam aṁśum	īray i madhumat aṃśu
997	pavamānaḥ saṁtanim eṣi kṛṇvan	pū saṃtani i kṛ
997	indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ	indra soma pariṣic
997	evā pavasva madiraḥ madāya	eva pū madira mada
997	udagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ	udagrābha namay vadhasna
997	pari varṇam bharamāṇaḥ ruśantam	pari varṇa bhṛ ruśat
997	gavyuḥ naḥ arṣa pari soma siktaḥ	gavyu mad ṛṣ pari soma sic
997	juṣTvī naḥ indo supathā sugāni	juṣ mad indu supatha suga
997	urau pavasva varivāṁsi kṛṇvan	uru pū varivas kṛ
997	ghanā iva viṣvak duritāni vighnan	ghana iva viṣvañc durita vihan
997	adhi snunā dhanva sānau avye	adhi snu dhanv sānu avya
997	vṛṣTim naḥ arṣa divyām jigatnum	vṛṣṭi mad ṛṣ divya jigatnu
997	iLāvatīm śaṁgayīm jīradānum	iḍāvat śaṃgaya jīra dānu
997	stukā iva vītā dhanvā vicinvan	stukā iva vīta dhanv vici
997	bandhūn imān avarān indo vāyūn	bandhu idam avara indu vāyu
997	granthim na vi sya grathitam punānaḥ	granthi na vi sā granth pū
997	ṛjum ca gātum vṛjinam ca soma	ṛju ca gātu vṛjina ca soma
997	atyaḥ na kradaḥ hariḥ ā sṛjānaḥ	atya na krand hari ā sṛj
997	maryaḥ deva dhanva pastyāvān	marya deva dhanv pastyāvat
997	juṣTaḥ madāya devatāte indo	juṣ mada devatāt indu
997	pari snunā dhanva sānau avye	pari snu dhanv sānu avya
997	sahasradhāraḥ surabhiḥ adabdhaḥ	sahasra dhārā surabhi adabdha
997	pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye	pari sru vājasāti nṛṣahya
997	araśmānaḥ ye arathāḥ ayuktāḥ	a raśman yad a ratha a yuj
997	atyāsaḥ na sasṛjānāsaḥ ājau	atya na sṛj āji
997	ete śukrāsaḥ dhanvanti somāḥ	etad śukra dhanv soma
997	devāsaḥ tān upa yātā pibadhyai	deva tad upa yā pā
997	evā naḥ indo abhi devavītim	eva mad indu abhi deva vīti
997	pari srava nabhaḥ arṇaḥ camūṣu	pari sru nabhas arṇas camū
997	somaḥ asmabhyam kāmyam bṛhantam	soma mad kāmya bṛhat
997	rayim dadātu vīravantam ugram	rayi dā vīravat ugra
997	takṣat yadī manasaḥ venataḥ vāk	takṣ yadi manas vena vāc
997	jyeṣThasya vā dharmaṇi kṣoḥ anīke	jyeṣṭha vā dharman kṣu anīka
997	āt īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānāḥ	āt īṃ i vara ā vaś
997	juṣTam patim kalaśe gāvaḥ indum	juṣ pati kalaśa go indu
997	pra dānudaḥ divyaḥ dānupinvaḥ	pra dānuda divya dānu pinva
997	ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ	ṛta ṛta pū sumedhas
997	dharmā bhuvat vṛjanyasya rājā	dharman bhū vṛjanya rājan
997	pra raśmibhiḥ daśabhiḥ bhāri bhūma	pra raśmi daśan bhṛ bhūman
997	pavitrebhiḥ pavamānaḥ nṛcakṣāḥ	pavitra pū nṛ cakṣas
997	rājā devānām uta martyānām	rājan deva uta martya
997	dvitā bhuvat rayipatī rayīṇām	dvitā bhū rayi pati rayi
997	ṛtam bharat subhṛtam cāru induḥ	ṛta bhṛ su bhṛ cāru indu
997	arvān iva śravase sātim accha	arvat iva śravas sāti acchā
997	indrasya vāyoḥ abhi vītim arṣa	indra vāyu abhi vīti ṛṣ
997	sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ dāḥ	tad mad sahasra bṛhatī iṣ dā
997	bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ	bhū soma draviṇas vid pū
997	devāvyaḥ naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ	devāvī mad pariṣic
997	kṣayam suvīram dhanvantu somāḥ	kṣaya su vīra dhanv soma
997	āyajyavaḥ sumatim viśvavārāḥ	āyajyu sumati viśva vāra
997	hotāraḥ na diviyajaḥ mandratamāḥ	hotṛ na diviyaj mandratama
997	evā deva devatāte pavasva	eva deva devatāt pū
997	mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ	mah soma psaras deva pāna
997	mahaḥ cit hi smasi hitāḥ samarye	mah cit hi as dhā samarya
997	kṛdhi suṣThāne rodasī punānaḥ	kṛ suṣṭhāna rodas pū
997	aśvaḥ na kradaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yujānaḥ	aśva na u krand vṛṣan yuj
997	siṁhaḥ na bhīmaḥ manasaḥ javīyān	siṃha na bhīma manas javīyas
997	arvācīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ ye rajiṣThāḥ	arvācīna pathin yad rajiṣṭha
997	ā pavasva saumanasam naḥ indo	ā pū saumanasa mad indu
997	śatam dhārāḥ devajātāḥ asṛgran	śata dhārā deva jan sṛj
997	sahasram enāḥ kavayaḥ mṛjanti	sahasra enad kavi mṛj
997	indo sanitram divaḥ ā pavasva	indu sanitra div ā pū
997	puraetā asi mahataḥ dhanasya	puraetṛ as mahat dhana
997	divaḥ na sargāḥ asasṛgram ahnām	div na sarga sṛj ahar
997	rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ	rājan na mitra pra mī dhīra
997	pituḥ na putraḥ kratubhiḥ yatānaḥ	pitṛ na putra kratu yat
997	ā pavasva viśe asyai ajītim	ā pū viś idam ajīti
997	pra te dhārāḥ madhumatīḥ asṛgran	pra tvad dhārā madhumat sṛj
997	vārān yat pūtaḥ atyeṣi avyān	vāra yat pū atī avya
997	pavamāna pavase dhāma gonām	pū pū dhāman go
997	jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvaḥ arkaiḥ	jan sūrya pinv arka
997	kanikradat anu panthām ṛtasya	kanikrad anu pathin ṛta
997	śukraḥ vi bhāsi amṛtasya dhāma	śukra vi bhā amṛta dhāman
997	saḥ indrāya pavase matsaravān	tad indra pū matsaravat
997	hinvānaḥ vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām	hi vāc mati kavi
997	divyaḥ suparṇaḥ ava cakṣi soma	divya suparṇa ava cakṣ soma
997	pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau	pinv dhārā karman deva vīti
997	ā indo viśa kalaśam somadhānam	ā indu viś kalaśa soma dhāna
997	krandan ihi sūryasya upa raśmim	krand i sūrya upa raśmi
997	tisraḥ vācaḥ īrayati pra vahniḥ	tri vāc īray pra vahni
997	ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇaḥ manīṣām	ṛta dhīti brahman manīṣā
997	gāvaḥ yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ	go i gopati pracch
997	somam yanti matayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ	soma i mati vaś
997	somam gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ	soma go dhenu vaś
997	somam viprāḥ matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ	soma vipra mati pracch
997	somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ	soma su pū añj
997	some arkāḥ triṣTubhaḥ sam navante	soma arka triṣṭubh sam nū
997	evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ	eva mad soma pariṣic
997	ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti	ā pū pū svasti
997	indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa	indra ā viś bṛhat rava
997	vardhayā vācam janayā puraṁdhim	vardhay vāc janay puraṃdhi
997	ā jāgṛviḥ vipraḥ ṛtā matīnām	ā jāgṛvi vipra ṛta mati
997	somaḥ punānaḥ asadat camūṣu	soma pū sad camū
997	sapanti yam mithunāsaḥ nikāmāḥ	sap yad mithuna nikāma
997	adhvaryavaḥ rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ	adhvaryu rathira su hasta
997	sa punānaḥ upa sūre na dhātā	tad pū upa sūra na dhātṛ
997	ā ubhe aprāḥ rodasī vi saḥ āvar	ubh prā rodas vi tad vṛ
997	priyā cit yasya priyasāsaḥ ūtī	priya cit yad priyasa ūti
997	sa tū dhanam kāriṇe na pra yaṁsat	sa tu dhana kārin na pra yam
997	sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ	tad vardhitṛ vardhana pū
997	somaḥ mīḍhvān abhi naḥ jyotiṣā āvīt	soma mīḍhvas abhi mad jyotis av
997	yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ	yad mad pūrva pitṛ pada jña
997	svarvidaḥ abhi gāḥ adrim uṣṇan	svar vid abhi go adri uṣ
997	akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharman	krand samudra prathama vidharman
997	janayan prajāḥ bhuvanasya rājā	janay prajā bhuvana rājan
997	vṛṣā pavitre adhi sānau avye	vṛṣan pavitra adhi sānu avya
997	bṛhat somaḥ vāvṛdhe suvānaḥ induḥ	bṛhat soma vṛdh su indu
997	mahat tat somaḥ mahiṣaḥ cakāra	mahat tad soma mahiṣa kṛ
997	apām yat garbhaḥ avṛṇīta devān	ap yat garbha vṛ deva
997	adadhāt indre pavamānaḥ ojaḥ	dhā indra pū ojas
997	ajanayat sūrye jyotiḥ induḥ	janay sūrya jyotis indu
997	matsi vāyum iṣTaye rādhase ca	mad vāyu iṣṭi rādhas ca
997	matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ	mad mitrāvaruṇa pū
997	matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān	mad śardhas māruta mad deva
997	matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma	mad dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma
997	ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantā	ṛju pū vṛjina hantṛ
997	apa amīvām bādhamānaḥ mṛdhaḥ ca	apa amīvā bādh mṛdh ca
997	abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasā abhi gonām	abhiśrī payas payas abhi go
997	indrasya tvam tava vayam sakhāyaḥ	indra tvad tvad mad sakhi
997	madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasvaḥ utsam	madhu sūda pū vasu utsa
997	vīram ca naḥ ā pavasvā bhagam ca	vīra ca mad ā pū bhaga ca
997	svadasva indrāya pavamānaḥ indo	svad indra pū indu
997	rayim ca naḥ ā pavasvā samudrāt	rayi ca mad ā pū samudra
997	somaḥ sutaḥ dhārayā atyaḥ na hitvā	soma su dhārā atya na hā
997	sindhuḥ na nimnam abhi vājī akṣār	sindhu na nimna abhi vājin kṣar
997	ā yonim vanyam asadat punānaḥ	ā yoni vanya sad pū
997	sam induḥ gobhiḥ asarat sam adbhiḥ	sam indu go sṛ sam ap
997	eṣa sya te pavate indra somaḥ	etad tya tvad pū indra soma
997	camūṣu dhīraḥ uśate tavasvān	camū dhīra vaś tavasvat
997	svarcakṣāḥ rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ	svar cakṣas rathira satya śuṣma
997	kāmaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji	kāma na yad devay sṛj
997	eṣa pratnena vayasā punānaḥ	etad pratna vayas pū
997	tiraḥ varpāṁsi duhituḥ dadhānaḥ	tiras varpas duhitṛ dhā
997	vasānaḥ śarma trivarūtham apsu	vas śarman tri varūtha ap
997	hotā iva yāti samaneṣu rebhan	hotṛ iva yā samana ribh
997	nū naḥ tvam rathiraḥ deva soma	nu mad tvad rathira deva soma
997	pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ	pari sru camū pū
997	apsu svādiṣThaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā	ap svādiṣṭha madhumat ṛtāvan
997	devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā	deva na yad savitṛ satya manman
997	abhi vāyum vītī arṣā gṛṇānaḥ	abhi vāyu vīti ṛṣ gṛ
997	abhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ	abhi mitrāvaruṇa pū
997	abhī naram dhījavanam ratheṣThām	abhi nṛ dhī javana ratheṣṭhā
997	abhi indram vṛṣaṇam vajrabāhum	abhi indra vṛṣan vajra bāhu
997	abhi vastrā suvasanāni arṣa	abhi vastra su vasana ṛṣ
997	abhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ	abhi dhenu su dugha pū
997	abhi candrā bhartave naḥ hiraṇyā	abhi candra bhṛ mad hiraṇya
997	abhi aśvān rathinaḥ deva soma	abhi aśva rathin deva soma
997	abhī naḥ arṣa divyā vasūni	abhi mad ṛṣ divya vasu
997	abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ	abhi viśva pārthiva pū
997	abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāma	abhi yad draviṇa aś
997	abhi ārṣeyam jamadagnivat naḥ	abhi ārṣeya jamadagni vat mad
997	ayā pavā pavasva enā vasūni	idam pavā pū enad vasu
997	māWścatve indo sarasi pra dhanva	māṃścatva indu saras pra dhanv
997	bradhnaḥ cit atra vātaḥ na jūtaḥ	bradhna cit atra vāta na jū
997	purumedhaḥ cit takave naram dāt	puru medhā cit taku nṛ dā
997	uta naḥ enā pavayā pavasva	uta mad enad pavā pū
997	adhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe	adhi śru śravāyya tīrtha
997	ṣaṣTim sahasrā naigutaḥ vasūni	ṣaṣṭi sahasra naiguta vasu
997	vṛkṣam na pakvam dhūnavat raṇāya	vṛkṣa na pakva dhū raṇa
997	mahi ime asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe	mahi idam idam vṛṣa nāman śūṣa
997	māWścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre	māṃścatva vā pṛśana vā vadhatra
997	asvāpayat nigutaḥ snehayat ca	svāpay nigut snehay ca
997	apa amitrān apa acitaḥ aca itaḥ	apa amitra apa acit cit
997	sam trī pavitrā vitatāni eṣi	sam tri pavitra vitan i
997	anu ekam dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ	anu eka dhāv pū
997	asi bhagaḥ asi dātrasya dātā	as bhaga as dātra dātṛ
997	asi maghavā maghavadbhyaḥ indo	as maghavan maghavan indu
997	eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī	etad viśva vid pū manīṣin
997	somaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā	soma viśva bhuvana rājan
997	drapsān īrayan vidatheṣu induḥ	drapsa īray vidatha indu
997	vi vāram avyam samayā ati yāti	vi vāra avya samayā ati yā
997	indum rihanti mahiṣāḥ adabdhāḥ	indu rih mahiṣa adabdha
997	pade rebhanti kavayaḥ na gṛdhrāḥ	pada ribh kavi na gṛdhra
997	hinvanti dhīrāḥ daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ	hi dhīra daśan kṣipā
997	sam añjate rūpam apām rasena	sam añj rūpa ap rasa
997	tvayā vayam pavamānena soma	tvad mad pū soma
997	bhare kṛtam vi cinuyāma śaśvat	bhara kṛta vi ci śaśvat
997	tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām	tad mad mitra varuṇa mah
997	aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div
 ---
998	abhi naḥ vājasātamam	abhi mad vāja sātama
998	rayim arṣa puruspṛham	rayi ṛṣ puruspṛh
998	indo sahasrabharṇasam	indu sahasrabharṇas
998	tuvidyumnam vibhvāsaham	tuvi dyumna vibhvāsah
998	pari sya suvānaḥ avyayam	pari tya sū avyaya
998	rathe na varma avyata	ratha na varman vye
998	induḥ abhi druṇā hitaḥ	indu abhi dru dhā
998	hiyānaḥ dhārābhiḥ akṣār	hi dhārā kṣar
998	pari sya suvānaḥ akṣār	pari tya sū kṣar
998	induḥ avye madacyutaḥ	indu avya mada cyu
998	dhārā yaḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvare	dhārā yad ūrdhva adhvara
998	bhrājā na eti gavyayuḥ	bhrāj na i gavyayu
998	sa hi tvam deva śaśvate	tad hi tvad deva śaśvat
998	vasu martāya dāśuṣe	vasu marta dāś
998	indo sahasriṇam rayim	indu sahasrin rayi
998	śatātmānam vivāsasi	śata ātman vivās
998	vayam te asya vṛtrahan	mad tvad idam vṛtra han
998	vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ	vasu vasu puruspṛh
998	ni nediṣThatamāḥ iṣaḥ	ni nediṣṭhatama iṣ
998	syāma sumnasya adhrigo	as sumna adhrigu
998	dviḥ yam pañca svayaśasam	dvis yad pañcan sva yaśas
998	svasāraḥ adrisaṁhatam	svasṛ adri saṃhan
998	priyam indrasya kāmyam	priya indra kāmya
998	prasnāpayanti ūrmiṇam	prasnāpay ūrmin
998	pari tyam haryatam harim	pari tya haryata hari
998	babhrum punanti vāreṇa	babhru pū vāra
998	yaḥ devān viśvān it pari	yad deva viśva id pari
998	madena saha gacchati	mada saha gam
998	asya vaḥ hi avasā	idam tvad hi avas
998	pāntaḥ dakṣasādhanam	pā dakṣa sādhana
998	yaḥ sūriṣu śravaḥ bṛhat	yad sūri śravas bṛhat
998	dadhe svar na haryataḥ	dhā svar na haryata
998	sa vām yajñeṣu mānavī	tad tvad yajña mānavī
998	induḥ janiṣTa rodasī	indu jan rodasī
998	devaḥ devī giriṣThāḥ	deva devī giriṣṭhā
998	asredhan tam tuviṣvaṇi	sridh tad tuviṣvaṇi
998	indrāya soma pātave	indra soma pā
998	vṛtraghne pari sicyase	vṛtra han pari sic
998	nare ca dakṣiṇāvate	nṛ ca dakṣiṇāvat
998	devāya sadanāsade	deva sadanāsad
998	te pratnāsaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	tad pratna vyuṣṭi
998	somāḥ pavitre akṣaran	soma pavitra kṣar
998	apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ	apapruth sanutar huraścit
998	prātar tān apracetasaḥ	prātar tad apracetas
998	tam sakhāyaḥ purorucam	tad sakhi puroruc
998	yūyam vayam ca sūrayaḥ	tvad mad ca sūri
998	aśyāma vājagandhyam	aś vājagandhya
998	sanema vājapastyam	san vāja pastyā
 ---
999	ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave	ā haryata dhṛṣṇu
999	dhanuḥ tanvanti pauṁsyam	dhanus tan pauṃsya
999	śukrām vayanti asurāya nirṇijam	śukra ve asura nirṇij
999	vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ	vip agra mahīyu
999	adha kṣapā pariṣkṛtaḥ	adha kṣap pariṣkṛ
999	vājān abhi pra gāhate	vāja abhi pra gāh
999	yadī vivasvataḥ dhiyaḥ	yadi vivasvant dhī
999	harim hinvanti yātave	hari hi yā
999	tam asya marjayāmasi	tad idam marjay
999	madaḥ yaḥ indrapātamaḥ	mada yad indra pātama
999	yam gāvaḥ āsabhiḥ dadhuḥ	yad go āsan
999	purā nūnam ca sūrayaḥ	purā nūnam ca sūri
999	tam gāthayā purāṇyā	tad gāthā purāṇa
999	punānam abhi anūṣata	pū abhi nū
999	uta u kṛpanta dhītayaḥ	uta u kṛp dhīti
999	devānām nāma bibhratīḥ	deva nāman bhṛ
999	tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye	tad ukṣ avyaya
999	vāre punanti dharṇasim	vāra pū dharṇasi
999	dūtam na pūrvacittaye	dūta na pūrvacitti
999	ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ	ā śās manīṣin
999	sa punānaḥ madintamaḥ	tad pū madintama
999	somaḥ camūṣu sīdati	soma camū sad
999	paśau na retaḥ ādadhat	paśu na retas ādhā
999	patiḥ vacasyate dhiyaḥ	pati vacasy dhī
999	sa mṛjyate sukarmabhiḥ	tad mṛj su karman
999	devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ	deva deva su
999	vide yat āsu saṁdadiḥ	vid yat idam saṃdadi
999	mahīḥ apaḥ vi gāhate	mahi ap vi gāh
999	sutaḥ indo pavitre ā	su indu pavitra ā
999	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase	nṛ yam vi nī
999	indrāya matsarintamaḥ	indra matsarintama
999	camūṣu ā ni sīdasi	camū ā ni sad
 ---
9100	abhī navante adruhaḥ	abhi nū adruh
9100	priyam indrasya kāmyam	priya indra kāmya
9100	vatsam na pūrve āyuni	vatsa na pūrva āyu
9100	jātam rihanti mātaraḥ	jan rih mātṛ
9100	punānaḥ indo ā bhara	pū indu ā bhṛ
9100	soma dvibarhasam rayim	soma dvibarhas rayi
9100	tvam vasūni puṣyasi	tvad vasu puṣ
9100	viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	viśva dāś gṛha
9100	tvam dhiyam manoyujam	tvad dhī manas yuj
9100	sṛjā vṛṣTim na tanyatuḥ	sṛj vṛṣṭi na tanyatu
9100	tvam vasūni pārthivā	tvad vasu pārthiva
9100	divyā ca soma puṣyasi	divya ca soma puṣ
9100	pari te jigyuṣaḥ yathā	pari tvad ji yathā
9100	dhārā sutasya dhāvati	dhārā su dhāv
9100	raṁhamāṇā vi avyayam	raṃh vi avyaya
9100	vāram vājī iva sānasiḥ	vāra vājin iva sānasi
9100	kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave	kratu dakṣa mad kavi
9100	pavasva soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
9100	indrāya pātave sutaḥ	indra pā su
9100	mitrāya varuṇāya ca	mitra varuṇa ca
9100	pavasva vājasātamaḥ	pū vāja sātama
9100	pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ	pavitra dhārā su
9100	indrāya soma viṣṇave	indra soma viṣṇu
9100	devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ	deva madhumattama
9100	tvām rihanti mātaraḥ	tvad rih mātṛ
9100	harim pavitre adruhaḥ	hari pavitra adruh
9100	vatsam jātam na dhenavaḥ	vatsa jan na dhenu
9100	pavamāna vidharmaṇi	pū vidharman
9100	pavamāna mahi śravaḥ	pū mahi śravas
9100	citrebhiḥ yāsi raśmibhiḥ	citra yā raśmi
9100	śardhan tamāṁsi jighnase	śṛdh tamas han
9100	viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	viśva dāś gṛha
9100	tvam dyām ca mahivrata	tvad div ca mahi vrata
9100	pṛthivīm ca ati jabhriṣe	pṛthivī ca ati bhṛ
9100	prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ	prati drāpi muc
9100	pavamāna mahitvanā	pū mahitvana
 ---
9101	purojitī vaḥ andhasaḥ	purojiti tvad andhas
9101	sutāya mādayitnave	su mādayitnu
9101	apa śvānam śnathiṣTana	apa śvan śnath
9101	sakhāyaḥ dīrghajihvyam	sakhi dīrghajihvya
9101	yaḥ dhārayā pāvakayā	yad dhārā pāvaka
9101	pariprasyandate sutaḥ	pariprasyand su
9101	induḥ aśvaḥ na kṛtvyaḥ	indu aśva na kṛtvya
9101	tam duroṣam abhī naraḥ	tad duroṣa abhi nṛ
9101	somam viśvācyā dhiyā	soma viśvāñc dhī
9101	yajñam hinvanti adribhiḥ	yajña hi adri
9101	sutāsaḥ madhumattamāḥ	su madhumattama
9101	somāḥ indrāya mandinaḥ	soma indra mandin
9101	pavitravantaḥ akṣaran	pavitravat kṣar
9101	devān gacchantu vaḥ madāḥ	deva gam tvad mada
9101	induḥ indrāya pavate	indu indra pū
9101	iti devāsaḥ abruvan	iti deva brū
9101	vācaḥ patiḥ makhasyate	vācaspati makhasy
9101	viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā	viśva īś ojas
9101	sahasradhāraḥ pavate	sahasra dhārā pū
9101	samudraḥ vācamīṅkhayaḥ	samudra vācamīṅkhaya
9101	somaḥ patiḥ rayīṇām	soma pati rayi
9101	sakhā indrasya divedive	sakhi indra diva diva
9101	ayam pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ	idam pūṣan rayi bhaga
9101	somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati	soma pū ṛṣ
9101	patiḥ viśvasya bhūmanaḥ	pati viśva bhūman
9101	vi akhyat rodasī ubhe	vi khyā rodas ubh
9101	sam u priyāḥ anūṣata	sam u priya nū
9101	gāvaḥ madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ	go mada ghṛṣvi
9101	somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ	soma kṛ pathin
9101	pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ	pū indu
9101	yaḥ ojiṣThaḥ tam ā bhara	yad ojiṣṭha tad ā bhṛ
9101	pavamāna śravāyyam	pū śravāyya
9101	yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhi	yad pañcan carṣaṇi abhi
9101	rayim yena vanāmahai	rayi yad van
9101	somāḥ pavante indavaḥ	soma pū indu
9101	asmabhyam gātuvittamaḥ	mad gātu vittama
9101	mitrāḥ suvānāḥ arepasaḥ	mitra su arepas
9101	svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ	svādhī svar vid
9101	suṣvāṇāsaḥ vi adribhiḥ	su vi adri
9101	citānāḥ goḥ adhi tvaci	cit go adhi tvac
9101	iṣam asmabhyam abhitaḥ	iṣ mad abhitas
9101	sam asvaran vasuvidaḥ	sam svar vasu vid
9101	ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ	etad pū vipaścit
9101	somāsaḥ dadhyāśiraḥ	soma dadhi āśir
9101	sūryāsaḥ na darśatāsaḥ	sūrya na darśata
9101	jigatnavaḥ dhruvāḥ ghṛte	jigatnu dhruva ghṛta
9101	pra sunvānasya andhasaḥ	pra su andhas
9101	martaḥ na vṛta tat vacaḥ	marta na vṛ tad vacas
9101	apa śvānam arādhasam	apa śvan arādhas
9101	hatā makham na bhṛgavaḥ	han makha na bhṛgu
9101	ā jāmiḥ atke avyata	ā jāmi atka vye
9101	bhuje na putraḥ oṇyoḥ	bhuj na putra oṇi
9101	sarat jāraḥ na yoṣaṇām	sṛ jāra na yoṣaṇā
9101	varaḥ na yonim āsadam	vara na yoni āsad
9101	sa vīraḥ dakṣasādhanaḥ	tad vīra dakṣa sādhana
9101	vi yaḥ tastambha rodasī	vi yad stambh rodas
9101	hariḥ pavitre avyata	hari pavitra vye
9101	vedhāḥ na yonim āsadam	vedhas na yoni āsad
9101	avyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate	avya vāra pū
9101	somaḥ gavye adhi tvaci	soma gavya adhi tvac
9101	kanikradat vṛṣā hariḥ	kanikrad vṛṣan hari
9101	indrasya abhi eti niṣkṛtam	indra abhi i niṣkṛta
 ---
9102	krāṇā śiśuḥ mahīnām	krāṇā śiśu mahi
9102	hinvan ṛtasya dīdhitim	hi ṛta dīdhiti
9102	viśvā pari priyā bhuvat	viśva pari priya bhū
9102	adha dvitā	adha dvitā
9102	upa tritasya pāṣyoḥ	upa trita pāṣi
9102	abhakta yat guhā padam	bhaj yad guhā pada
9102	yajñasya sapta dhāmabhiḥ	yajña saptan dhāman
9102	adha priyam	adha priya
9102	trīṇi tritasya dhārayā	tri trita dhārā
9102	pṛṣTheṣu ā īrayā rayim	pṛṣṭha eray rayi
9102	mimīte asya yojanā	mā idam yojana
9102	vi sukratuḥ	vi su kratu
9102	jajñānam sapta mātaraḥ	jan saptan mātṛ
9102	vedhām aśāsata śriye	vedhas śās śrī
9102	ayam dhruvaḥ rayīṇām	idam dhruva rayi
9102	ciketa yat	cit yat
9102	asya vrate sajoṣasaḥ	idam vrata sajoṣas
9102	viśve devāsaḥ adruhaḥ	viśva deva adruh
9102	spārhāḥ bhavanti rantayaḥ	spārha bhū ranti
9102	juṣanta yat	juṣ yat
9102	yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	yad ī garbha ṛtāvṛdh
9102	dṛśe cārum ajījanan	dṛś cāru jan
9102	kavim maṁhiṣTham adhvare	kavi maṃhiṣṭha adhvara
9102	puruspṛham	puruspṛh
9102	samīcīne abhi tmanā	samīcīna abhi tman
9102	yahvī ṛtasya mātarā	yahva ṛta mātṛ
9102	tanvānāḥ yajñam ānuṣak	tan yajña ānuṣak
9102	yat añjate	yat añj
9102	kratvā śukrebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ	kratu śukra akṣa
9102	ṛṇoḥ apa vrajam divaḥ	ṛch apa vraja div
9102	hinvan ṛtasya dīdhitim	hi ṛta dīdhiti
9102	pra adhvare	pra adhvara
 ---
9103	pra punānāya vedhase	pra pū vedhas
9103	somāya vacaḥ udyatam	soma vacas udyam
9103	bhṛtim na bharā matibhiḥ jujoṣate	bhṛti na bhṛ mati juṣ
9103	pari vārāṇi avyayā	pari vāra avyaya
9103	gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣati	go añj ṛṣ
9103	trī sadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ	tri sadhastha pū kṛ hari
9103	pari kośam madhuścutam	pari kośa madhuścut
9103	avyaye vāre arṣati	avyaya vāra ṛṣ
9103	abhi vāṇīḥ ṛṣīṇām sapta nūṣata	abhi vāṇī ṛṣi saptan nū
9103	pari netā matīnām	pariṇī mati
9103	viśvadevaḥ adābhyaḥ	viśva deva adābhya
9103	somaḥ punānaḥ camvoḥ viśat hariḥ	soma pū camū viś hari
9103	pari daivīḥ anu svadhāḥ	pari daiva anu svadhā
9103	indreṇa yāhi saratham	indra yā sa ratha
9103	punānaḥ vāghat vāghadbhiḥ amartyaḥ	pū vāghant vāghant amartya
9103	pari saptiḥ na vājayuḥ	pari sapti na vājayu
9103	devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ	deva deva su
9103	vyānaśiḥ pavamānaḥ vi dhāvati	vyānaśi pū vi dhāv
 ---
9104	sakhāyaḥ ā ni sīdata	sakhi ā ni sad
9104	punānāya pra gāyata	pū pra gā
9104	śiśum na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye	śiśu na yajña pari bhūṣ śrī
9104	sam ī vatsam na mātṛbhiḥ	sam ī vatsa na mātṛ
9104	sṛjatā gayasādhanam	sṛj gaya sādhana
9104	devāvyam madam abhi dviśavasam	devāvī mada abhi dvi śavas
9104	punātā dakṣasādhanam	pū dakṣa sādhana
9104	yathā śardhāya vītaye	yathā śardha vī
9104	yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śaṁtamaḥ	yathā mitra varuṇa śaṃtama
9104	asmabhyam tvā vasuvidam	mad tvad vasu vid
9104	abhi vāṇīḥ anūṣata	abhi vāṇī nū
9104	gobhiḥ te varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi	go tvad varṇa abhi vāsay
9104	sa naḥ madānām pate	tad mad mada pati
9104	indo devapsarāḥ asi	indu deva psaras as
9104	sakhā iva sakhye gātuvittamaḥ bhava	sakhi iva sakhi gātu vittama bhū
9104	sanemi kṛdhi asmat ā	sanemi kṛ mad ā
9104	rakṣasam kam cit atriṇam	rakṣas kaścit atrin
9104	apa adevam dvayum aṁhaḥ yuyodhi naḥ	dvayu aṃhas yu mad
 ---
9105	tam vaḥ sakhāyaḥ madāya	tad tvad sakhi mada
9105	punānam abhi gāyata	pū abhi gā
9105	śiśum na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ	śiśu na yajña svaday gūrti
9105	sam vatsaḥ iva mātṛbhiḥ	sam vatsa iva mātṛ
9105	induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate	indu hi añj
9105	devāvīḥ madaḥ matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ	devāvī mada mati pariṣkṛ
9105	ayam dakṣāya sādhanaḥ	idam dakṣa sādhana
9105	ayam śardhāya vītaye	idam śardha vī
9105	ayam devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ	idam deva madhumattama su
9105	gomat naḥ indo aśvavat	gomat mad indu aśvavat
9105	sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva	su su dakṣa dhanv
9105	śucim te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam	śuci tvad varṇa adhi go dhṛ
9105	sa naḥ harīṇām pate	tad mad hari pati
9105	indo devapsarastamaḥ	indu deva psarastama
9105	sakhā iva sakhye naryaḥ ruce bhava	sakhi iva sakhi narya ruc bhū
9105	sanemi tvam asmat ā	sanemi tvad mad
9105	adevam kam cit atriṇam	adeva kaścit atrin
9105	sāhvān indo pari bādhaḥ apa dvayum	sah indu pari bādh apa dvayu
 ---
9106	indram accha sutāḥ ime	indra acchā su idam
9106	vṛṣaṇam yantu harayaḥ	vṛṣan i hari
9106	śruṣTī jātāsaḥ indavaḥ	śruṣṭi jan indu
9106	svarvidaḥ	svar vid
9106	ayam bharāya sānasiḥ	idam bhara sānasi
9106	indrāya pavate sutaḥ	indra pū su
9106	somaḥ jaitrasya cetati	soma jaitra cit
9106	yathā vide	yathā vid
9106	asya it indraḥ madeṣu ā	idam id indra mada ā
9106	grābham gṛbhṇīta sānasim	grābha grah sānasi
9106	vajram ca vṛṣaṇam bharat	vajra ca vṛṣan bhṛ
9106	sam apsujit	sam apsujit
9106	pra dhanvā soma jāgṛviḥ	pra dhanv soma jāgṛvi
9106	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9106	dyumantam śuṣmam ā bharā	dyumat śuṣma ā bhṛ
9106	svarvidam	svar vid
9106	indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam	indra vṛṣan mada
9106	pavasva viśvadarśataḥ	pū viśva darśata
9106	sahasrayāmā pathikṛt	sahasra yāman pathikṛt
9106	vicakṣaṇaḥ	vicakṣaṇa
9106	asmabhyam gātuvittamaḥ	mad gātu vittama
9106	devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ	deva madhumattama
9106	sahasram yāhi pathibhiḥ	sahasra yā pathin
9106	kanikradat	kanikrad
9106	pavasva devavītaye	pū deva vīti
9106	indo dhārābhiḥ ojasā	indu dhārā ojas
9106	ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ	ā kalaśa madhumat soma mad sad
9106	tava drapsāḥ udaprutaḥ	tvad drapsa uda prut
9106	indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ	indra mada vṛdh
9106	tvām devāsaḥ amṛtāya kam papuḥ	tvad deva amṛta kaṃ pā
9106	ā naḥ sutāsaḥ indavaḥ	ā mad su indu
9106	punānāḥ dhāvatā rayim	pū dhāv rayi
9106	vṛṣTidyāvaḥ rītyāpaḥ svarvidaḥ	rīti ap svar vid
9106	somaḥ punānaḥ ūrmiṇā	soma pū ūrmi
9106	avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvati	avya vāra vi dhāv
9106	agre vācaḥ pavamānaḥ kanikradat	agra vāc pū kanikrad
9106	dhībhiḥ hinvanti vājinam	dhī hi vājin
9106	vane krīLantam atyavim	vana krīḍ atyavi
9106	abhi tripṛṣTham matayaḥ sam asvaran	abhi tri pṛṣṭha mati sam svar
9106	asarji kalaśān abhi	sṛj kalaśa abhi
9106	mīLhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ	mīḍha sapti na vājayu
9106	punānaḥ vācam janayan asiṣyadat	pū vāc janay syand
9106	pavate haryataḥ hariḥ	pū haryata hari
9106	ati hvarāṁsi raṁhyā	ati hvaras raṃhi
9106	abhyarṣan stotṛbhyaḥ vīravat yaśaḥ	abhyṛṣ stotṛ vīravat yaśas
9106	ayā pavasva devayuḥ	idam pū devayu
9106	madhoḥ dhārāḥ asṛkṣata	madhu dhārā sṛj
9106	rebhan pavitram pari eṣi viśvataḥ	ribh pavitra pari i viśvatas
 ---
9107	pari itaḥ siñcatā sutam	pari itas sic su
9107	somaḥ yaḥ uttamam haviḥ	soma yad uttama havis
9107	dadhanvān yaḥ naryaḥ apsu antar ā	dhanv yad narya ap antar ā
9107	suṣāva somam adribhiḥ	su soma adri
9107	nūnam punānaḥ avibhiḥ pari srava	nūnam pū avi pari sru
9107	adabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ	adabdha surabhintara
9107	sute cit tvā apsu madāmaḥ andhasā	su cit tvad ap mad andhas
9107	śrīṇantaḥ gobhiḥ uttaram	śrī go uttara
9107	pari suvānaḥ cakṣase devamādanaḥ	pari su cakṣ deva mādana
9107	kratuḥ induḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	kratu indu vicakṣaṇa
9107	punānaḥ soma dhārayā	pū soma dhārā
9107	apaḥ vasānaḥ arṣasi	ap vas ṛṣ
9107	ā ratnadhāḥ yonim ṛtasya sīdasi	ā ratna dhā yoni ṛta sad
9107	utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ	utsa deva hiraṇyaya
9107	duhānaḥ ūdhar divyam madhu priyam	duh ūdhas divya madhu priya
9107	pratnam sadhastham ā asadat	pratna sadhastha āsad
9107	āpṛchyam dharuṇam vājī arṣati	āpṛcchya dharuṇa vājin ṛṣ
9107	nṛbhiḥ dhūtaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	nṛ dhū vicakṣaṇa
9107	punānaḥ soma jāgṛviḥ	pū soma jāgṛvi
9107	avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ	avya vāra pari priya
9107	tvam vipraḥ abhavaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ	tvad vipra bhū aṅgirastama
9107	madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ	madhu yajña mikṣ mad
9107	somaḥ mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittamaḥ	soma mīḍhvas pū gātu vittama
9107	ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	ṛṣi vipra vicakṣaṇa
9107	tvam kaviḥ abhavaḥ devavītamaḥ	tvad kavi bhū deva vītama
9107	ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi	ā sūrya rohay div
9107	somaḥ u suvānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ	soma u su sotṛ
9107	adhi snubhiḥ avīnām	adhi snu avi
9107	aśvayā iva haritā yāti dhārayā	aśvā iva harit yā dhārā
9107	mandrayā yāti dhārayā	mandra yā dhārā
9107	anūpe gomān gobhiḥ akṣār	anūpa gomat go kṣar
9107	somaḥ dugdhābhiḥ akṣār	soma duh kṣar
9107	samudram na saṁvaraṇāni agman	samudra na saṃvaraṇa gam
9107	mandī madāya tośate	mandin mada tuś
9107	ā soma suvānaḥ adribhiḥ	ā soma su adri
9107	tiraḥ vārāṇi avyayā	tiras vāra avyaya
9107	janaḥ na puri camvoḥ viśat hariḥ	jana na pur camū viś hari
9107	sadaḥ vaneṣu dadhiṣe	sadas vana dhā
9107	sa māmṛje tiraḥ aṇvāni meṣyaḥ	tad mṛj tiras aṇva meṣī
9107	mīLhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ	mīḍha sapti na vājayu
9107	anumādyaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣibhiḥ	anumad pū manīṣin
9107	somaḥ viprebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	soma vipra ṛkvan
9107	pra soma devavītaye	pra soma deva vīti
9107	sindhuḥ na pipye arṇasā	sindhu na pyā arṇas
9107	aṁśoḥ payasā madiraḥ na jāgṛviḥ	aṃśu payas madira na jāgṛvi
9107	acchā kośam madhuścutam	acchā kośa madhuścut
9107	ā haryataḥ arjune atke avyata	ā haryata arjuna atka vye
9107	priyaḥ sūnuḥ na marjyaḥ	priya sūnu na mṛj
9107	tam īm hinvanti apasaḥ yathā ratham	tad īṃ hi apas yathā ratha
9107	nadīṣu ā gabhastyoḥ	nadī ā gabhasti
9107	abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ	abhi soma āyu
9107	pavante madyam madam	pū mad mada
9107	samudrasya adhi viṣTapi manīṣiṇaḥ	samudra adhi viṣṭap manīṣin
9107	matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ	matsara svar vid
9107	tarat samudram pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā	tṛ samudra pū ūrmi
9107	rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat	rājan deva ṛta bṛhat
9107	arṣat mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā	ṛṣ mitra varuṇa dharman
9107	pra hinvānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat	pra hi ṛta bṛhat
9107	nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ haryataḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ	nṛ yam haryata vicakṣaṇa
9107	rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ	rājan deva samudriya
9107	indrāya pavate madaḥ	indra pū mada
9107	somaḥ marutvate sutaḥ	soma marutvat su
9107	sahasradhāraḥ ati avyam arṣati	sahasra dhārā ati avya ṛṣ
9107	tam ī mṛjanti āyavaḥ	tad ī mṛj āyu
9107	punānaḥ camū janayan matim kaviḥ	pū camū janay mati kavi
9107	somaḥ deveṣu raṇyati	soma deva ran
9107	apaḥ vasānaḥ pari gobhiḥ uttaraḥ	ap vas pari go uttara
9107	sīdan vaneṣu avyata	sad vana vye
9107	tava aham soma rāraṇa	tvad mad soma ran
9107	sakhye indo divedive	sakhya indu diva diva
9107	purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava	puru babhru ni car mad ava
9107	paridhīn ati tān ihi	paridhi ati tad i
9107	uta aham naktam uta soma te divā	uta mad nakta uta soma tvad divā
9107	sakhyāya babhro ūdhani	sakhya babhru ūdhas
9107	ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paraḥ	ghṛṇā tap ati sūrya paras
9107	śakunāḥ iva paptima	śakuna iva pat
9107	mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya	mṛj su hastya
9107	samudre vācam invasi	samudra vāc inv
9107	rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham	rayi piśaṅga bahula puruspṛh
9107	pavamāna abhi arṣasi	pū abhi ṛṣ
9107	mṛjānaḥ vāre pavamānaḥ avyaye	mṛj vāra pū avyaya
9107	vṛṣā ava cakradaḥ vane	vṛṣan ava krand vana
9107	devānām soma pavamāna niṣkṛtam	deva soma pū niṣkṛta
9107	gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣasi	go añj ṛṣ
9107	pavasva vājasātaye	pū vāja sāti
9107	abhi viśvāni kāvyā	abhi viśva kāvya
9107	tvam samudram prathamaḥ vi dhārayaḥ	tvad samudra prathama vi dhāray
9107	devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ	deva soma matsara
9107	sa tū pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ	tad tu pū pari pārthiva rajas
9107	divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ	divya ca soma dharma
9107	tvām viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ vicakṣaṇa	tvad vipra mati vicakṣaṇa
9107	śubhram hinvanti dhītibhiḥ	śubhra hi dhīti
9107	pavamānāḥ asṛkṣata	pū sṛj
9107	pavitram ati dhārayā	pavitra ati dhārā
9107	marutvantaḥ matsarāḥ indriyāḥ hayāḥ	marutvat matsara indriya haya
9107	medhām abhi prayāṁsi ca	medhā abhi prayas ca
9107	apaḥ vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati	ap vas pari kośa ṛṣ
9107	induḥ hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ	indu hi sotṛ
9107	janayan jyotiḥ mandanāḥ avīvaśat	janay jyotis mandana vāś
9107	gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ na nirṇijam	go kṛ na nirṇij
 ---
9108	pavasva madhumattamaḥ	pū madhumattama
9108	indrāya soma kratuvittamaḥ madaḥ	indra soma kratu vittama mada
9108	mahi dyukṣatamaḥ madaḥ	mahi dyukṣatama mada
9108	yasya te pītvā vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣāyate	yad tvad pā vṛṣabha vṛṣāy
9108	asya pītā svarvidaḥ	idam pīti svar vid
9108	sa supraketaḥ abhi akramīt iṣaḥ	tad su praketa abhi kram iṣ
9108	acchā vājam na etaśaḥ	acchā vāja na etaśa
9108	tvam hi aṅga daivyā	tvad hi aṅga daivya
9108	pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ	pū janiman dyumattama
9108	amṛtatvāya ghoṣayaḥ	amṛta tva ghoṣay
9108	yenā navagvaḥ dadhyaṅ aporṇute	yad navagva dadhyac apavṛ
9108	yena viprāsaḥ āpire	yad vipra āp
9108	devānām sumne amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ	deva sumna amṛta cāru
9108	yena śravāṁsi ānaśuḥ	yad śravas aś
9108	eṣa sya dhārayā sutaḥ	etad tya dhārā suta
9108	avyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ	avya vāra pū madintama
9108	krīLan ūrmiḥ apām iva	krīḍ ūrmi ap iva
9108	yaḥ usriyāḥ apyāḥ antar aśmanaḥ	yad usriyā apya antar aśman
9108	niḥ gāḥ akṛntat ojasā	niḥ go kṛt ojas
9108	abhi vrajam tatniṣe gavyam aśvyam	abhi vraja tan gavya aśvya
9108	varmī iva dhṛṣṇo ā ruja	varmin iva dhṛṣṇu ā ruj
9108	ā sotā pari siñcata	ā su pari sic
9108	aśvam na stomam apturam rajasturam	aśva na stoma aptur rajastur
9108	vanakrakṣam udaprutam	vanakrakṣa uda prut
9108	sahasradhāram vṛṣabham payovṛdham	sahasra dhārā vṛṣabha payovṛdh
9108	priyam devāya janmane	priya deva janman
9108	ṛtena yaḥ ṛtajātaḥ vivāvṛdhe	ṛta yad ṛta jan vivṛdh
9108	rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat	rājan deva ṛta bṛhat
9108	abhi dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ	abhi dyumna bṛhat yaśas
9108	iṣaḥ pate didīhi deva devayuḥ	iṣ pati dīdī deva devayu
9108	vi kośam madhyamam yuva	vi kośa madhyama yu
9108	ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ sutaḥ	ā vañc su dakṣa camū su
9108	viśām vahniḥ na viśpatiḥ	viś vahni na viśpati
9108	vṛṣTim divaḥ pavasva rītim apām	vṛṣṭi div pū rīti ap
9108	jinvā gaviṣTaye dhiyaḥ	jinv gaviṣṭi dhī
9108	etam u tyam madacyutam	etad u tya mada cyut
9108	sahasradhāram vṛṣabham divaḥ duhuḥ	sahasra dhārā vṛṣabha div duh
9108	viśvā vasūni bibhratam	viśva vasu bhṛ
9108	vṛṣā vi jajñe janayan amartyaḥ	vṛṣan vi jan janay amartya
9108	pratapan jyotiṣā tamaḥ	pratap jyotis tamas
9108	sa suṣTutaḥ kavibhiḥ nirṇijam dadhe	tad suṣṭuta kavi nirṇij dhā
9108	tridhātu asya daṁsasā	tri dhātu idam daṃsas
9108	sa sunve yaḥ vasūnām	tad su yad vasu
9108	yaḥ rāyām ānetā yaḥ iLānām	yad rai ānetṛ yad iḍā
9108	somaḥ yaḥ sukṣitīnām	soma yad su kṣiti
9108	yasya naḥ indraḥ pibāt yasya marutaḥ	yad mad indra pā yad marut
9108	yasya vā aryamaṇā bhagaḥ	yad vā aryaman bhaga
9108	ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmahe	ā yad mitrāvaruṇa kṛ
9108	ā indram avase mahe	ā indra avas mah
9108	indrāya soma pātave	indra soma pā
9108	nṛbhiḥ yataḥ svāyudhaḥ madintamaḥ	nṛ yam su āyudha madintama
9108	pavasva madhumattamaḥ	pū madhumattama
9108	indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa	indra hārdi soma dhāna ā viś
9108	samudram iva sindhavaḥ	samudra iva sindhu
9108	juṣTaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave	juṣ mitra varuṇa vāyu
9108	divaḥ viṣTambhaḥ uttamaḥ	div viṣṭambha uttama
 ---
9109	pari pra dhanva indrāya soma	pari pra dhanv indra soma
9109	svāduḥ mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya	svādu mitra pūṣan bhaga
9109	indraḥ te soma sutasya peyāḥ	indra tvad soma su pā
9109	kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ	kratu dakṣa viśva ca deva
9109	eva amṛtāya mahe kṣayāya	eva amṛta mah kṣaya
9109	sa śukraḥ arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ	tad śukra ṛṣ divya pīyūṣa
