9109	pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ	pū soma mahat samudra
9109	pitā devānām viśvā abhi dhāma	pitṛ deva viśva abhi dhāman
9109	śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma	śukra pū deva soma
9109	dive pṛthivyai śam ca prajāyai	div pṛthivī śam ca prajā
9109	divaḥ dhartā asi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ	div dhartṛ as śukra pīyūṣa
9109	satye vidharman vājī pavasva	satya vidharman vājin pū
9109	pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāraḥ	pū soma dyumnin su dhārā
9109	mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ	mah avi anu pūrvya
9109	nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ	nṛ yam jan pū
9109	kṣarat viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit	kṣar viśva mandra svar vid
9109	induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ	indu pū prajā vṛ
9109	karat viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ	kṛ viśva draviṇa mad
9109	pavasva soma kratve dakṣāya	pū soma kratu dakṣa
9109	aśvaḥ na niktaḥ vājī dhanāya	aśva na nij vājin dhana
9109	tam te sotāraḥ rasam madāya	tad tvad sotṛ rasa mada
9109	punanti somam mahe dyumnāya	pū soma mah dyumna
9109	śiśum jajñānam harim mṛjanti	śiśu jan hari mṛj
9109	pavitre somam devebhyaḥ indum	pavitra soma deva indu
9109	induḥ paviṣTa cāruḥ madāya	indu pū cāru mada
9109	apām upasthe kaviḥ bhagāya	ap upastha kavi bhaga
9109	bibharti cāru indrasya nāma	bhṛ cāru indra nāman
9109	yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna	yad viśva vṛtra han
9109	pibanti asya viśve devāsaḥ	pā idam viśva deva
9109	gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya	go śrī nṛ su
9109	pra suvānaḥ akṣār sahasradhāraḥ	pra su kṣar sahasra dhārā
9109	tiraḥ pavitram vi vāram avyam	tiras pavitra vi vāra avya
9109	sa vājī akṣār sahasraretāḥ	tad vājin kṣar sahasra retas
9109	adbhiḥ mṛjānaḥ gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ	ap mṛj go śrī
9109	pra soma yāhi indrasya kukṣā	pra soma yā indra kukṣi
9109	nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ adribhiḥ sutaḥ	nṛ yam adri su
9109	asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram	sṛj vājin tiras pavitra
9109	indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ	indra soma sahasra dhārā
9109	añjanti enam madhvaḥ rasena	añj enad madhu rasa
9109	indrāya vṛṣṇe indum madāya	indra vṛṣan indu mada
9109	devebhyaḥ tvā vṛthā pājase	deva tvad vṛthā pājas
9109	apaḥ vasānam harim mṛjanti	ap vas hari mṛj
9109	induḥ indrāya tośate	indu indra tuś
9109	ni tośate	ni tuś
9109	śrīṇan ugraḥ riṇan apaḥ	śrī ugra ri ap
 ---
9110	pari ū su pra dhanva vājasātaye	pari u su pra dhanv vāja sāti
9110	pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ	pari vṛtra sakṣaṇi
9110	dviṣaḥ taradhyai ṛṇayāḥ naḥ īyase	dviṣ tṛ ṛṇayā mad ī
9110	anu hi tvā sutam soma madāmasi	anu hi tvad su soma mad
9110	mahe samaryarājye	maha samarya rājya
9110	vājān abhi pavamāna pra gāhase	vāja abhi pū pra gāh
9110	ajījanaḥ hi pavamāna sūryam	jan hi pū sūrya
9110	vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ	vidhāra śakman payas
9110	gojīrayā raṁhamāṇaḥ puraṁdhyā	go jīra raṃh puraṃdhi
9110	ajījanaḥ amṛta martyeṣu ā	jan amṛta martya
9110	ṛtasya dharman amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ	ṛta dharman amṛta cāru
9110	sadā asaraḥ vājam acchā saniṣyadat	sadā sara vāja acchā saniṣyad
9110	abhyabhi hi śravasā tatarditha	abhi abhi hi śravas tṛd
9110	utsam na kam cit janapānam akṣitam	utsa na kaścit jana pāna akṣita
9110	śaryābhiḥ na bharamāṇaḥ gabhastyoḥ	śaryā na bhṛ gabhasti
9110	āt īm ke cit paśyamānāsaḥ āpyam	āt īṃ kaścit paś āpya
9110	vasurucaḥ divyāḥ abhi anūṣata	vasu ruc divya abhi nū
9110	vāram na devaḥ savitā vi ūrṇute	vāra na deva savitṛ vi vṛ
9110	tve soma prathamāḥ vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	tvad soma prathama vṛj barhis
9110	mahe vājāya śravase dhiyam dadhuḥ	mah vāja śravas dhī
9110	sa tvam naḥ vīra vīryāya codaya	tad tvad mad vīra vīrya coday
9110	divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyam yat ukthyam	div pīyūṣa pūrvya yat ukthya
9110	mahaḥ gāhāt divaḥ ā niḥ adhukṣata	mah gāha div ā niḥ duh
9110	indram abhi jāyamānam sam asvaran	indra abhi jan sam svar
9110	adha yat ime pavamāna rodasī	adha yat idam pū rodasī
9110	imā ca viśvā bhuvanā abhi majmanā	idam ca viśva bhuvana abhi majman
9110	yūthe na niṣThāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vi tiṣThase	yūtha na niṣṭhā vṛṣabha vi sthā
9110	somaḥ punānaḥ avyaye vāre	soma pū avyaya vāra
9110	śiśuḥ na krīLan pavamānaḥ akṣār	śiśu na krīḍ pū kṣar
9110	sahasradhāraḥ śatavājaḥ induḥ	sahasra dhārā śata vāja indu
9110	eṣa punānaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā	etad pū madhumat ṛtāvan
9110	indrāya induḥ pavate svāduḥ ūrmiḥ	indra indu pū svādu ūrmi
9110	vājasaniḥ varivovit vayodhāḥ	vāja sani varivas vid vayas dhā
9110	sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn	tad pū sah pṛtanyu
9110	sedhan rakṣāṁsi apa durgahāṇi	sidh rakṣas apa durgaha
9110	svāyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn	su āyudha sah soma śatru
 ---
9111	ayā rucā hariṇyā punānaḥ	idam ruc harin pū
9111	viśvā dveṣāṁsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ	viśva dveṣas tṛ svayugvan
9111	sūraḥ na svayugvabhiḥ	sūra na svayugvan
9111	dhārā sutasya rocate	dhārā su ruc
9111	punānaḥ aruṣaḥ hariḥ	pū aruṣa hari
9111	viśvā yat rūpā pariyāti ṛkvabhiḥ	viśva yat rūpa pariyā ṛkvan
9111	saptāsyebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	saptan āsya ṛkvan
9111	tvam tyat paṇīnām vidaḥ vasu	tvad tya paṇi vid vasu
9111	sam mātṛbhiḥ marjayasi sve ā dame	sam mātṛ marjay sva ā dama
9111	ṛtasya dhītibhiḥ dame	ṛta dhīti dama
9111	parāvataḥ na sāma tat	parāvat na sāman tad
9111	yatrā raṇanti dhītayaḥ	yatra ran dhīti
9111	tridhātubhiḥ aruṣībhiḥ vayaḥ dadhe	tri dhātu aruṣa vayas dhā
9111	rocamānaḥ vayaḥ dadhe	ruc vayas dhā
9111	pūrvām anu pradiśam yāti cekitat	pūrva anu pradiś yā cekit
9111	sam raśmibhiḥ yatate darśataḥ rathaḥ	sam raśmi yat darśata ratha
9111	daivyaḥ darśataḥ rathaḥ	daivya darśata ratha
9111	agman ukthāni pauṁsyā	gam uktha pauṃsya
9111	indram jaitrāya harṣayan	indra jaitra harṣay
9111	vajraḥ ca yat bhavathaḥ anapacyutā	vajra ca yat bhū an apacyu
9111	samatsu anapacyutā	samad an apacyu
 ---
9112	nānānam vai u naḥ dhiyaḥ	nānānam vai u na u dhī
9112	vi vratāni janānām	vi vrata jana
9112	takṣā riṣTam rutam bhiṣak	takṣan riṣṭa ru bhiṣaj
9112	brahmā sunvantam icchati	brahman su iṣ
9112	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9112	jaratībhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ	jṛ oṣadhī
9112	parṇebhiḥ śakunānām	parṇa śakuna
9112	kārmāraḥ aśmabhiḥ dyubhiḥ	kārmāra aśman div
9112	hiraṇyavantam icchati	hiraṇyavat iṣ
9112	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru

9113	śaryaṇāvati somam	śaryaṇāvant soma
9113	indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā	indra pā vṛtra han
9113	balam dadhānaḥ ātmani	bala dhā ātman
9113	kariṣyan vīryam mahat	kṛ vīrya mahat
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	ā pavasva diśām pate	ā pū diś pati
9113	ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ	ārjīka soma mīḍhvas
9113	ṛtavākena satyena	ṛta vāka satya
9113	śraddhayā tapasā sutaḥ	śraddhā tapas su
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	parjanyavṛddham mahiṣam	parjanya vṛdh mahiṣa
9113	tam sūryasya duhitā ā abharat	tad sūrya duhitṛ bhṛ
9113	tam gandharvāḥ prati agṛbhṇan	tad gandharva prati grah
9113	tam some rasam ā adadhuḥ	tad soma rasa ādhā
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	ṛtam vadan ṛtadyumna	ṛta vad ṛta dyumna
9113	satyam vadan satyakarman	satya vad satya karman
9113	śraddhām vadan soma rājan	śraddhā vad soma rājan
9113	dhātrā soma pariṣkṛtaḥ	dhātṛ soma pariṣkṛ
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	satyamugrasya bṛhataḥ	satya ugra bṛhat
9113	sam sravanti saṁsravāḥ	sam sru saṃsrava
9113	sam yanti rasinaḥ rasāḥ	sam i rasin rasa
9113	punānaḥ brahmaṇā hare	pū brahman hari
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	yatra brahmā pavamāna	yatra brahman pū
9113	chandasyām vācam vadan	chandasya vāc vad
9113	grāvṇā some mahīyate	grāvan soma mahīy
9113	somena ānandam janayan	soma ānanda janay
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	yatra jyotiḥ ajasram	yatra jyotis ajasra

9113	tasmin mām dhehi pavamāna	tad mad dhā pū
9113	amṛte loke akṣite	amṛta loka akṣita
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	yatra rājā vaivasvataḥ	yatra rājan vaivasvata

9113	tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi	tatra mad amṛta kṛ
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	yatra anukāmam caraṇam	yatra anukāma caraṇa
9113	trināke tridive divaḥ	trināka tridiva div
9113	lokāḥ yatra jyotiṣmantaḥ	loka yatra jyotiṣmat
9113	tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi	tatra mad amṛta kṛ

9113	svadhā ca yatra tṛptiḥ ca	svadhā ca yatra tṛpti ca
9113	tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi	tatra mad amṛta kṛ
9113	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9113	yatra ānandāḥ ca modāḥ ca	yatra ānanda ca moda ca

9114	yaḥ indoḥ pavamānasya	yad indu pū
9114	anu dhāmāni akramīt	anu dhāman kram
9114	tam āhuḥ suprajāḥ iti	tad ah suprajas iti
9114	yaḥ te soma avidhat manaḥ	yad tvad soma vidh manas
9114	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9114	ṛṣe mantrakṛtām stomaiḥ	ṛṣi mantra kṛt stoma
9114	kaśyapa udvardhayan giraḥ	kaśyapa udvardhay gir
9114	somam namasya rājānam	soma namasy rājan
9114	yaḥ jajñe vīrudhām patiḥ	yad jan vīrudh pati
9114	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9114	sapta diśaḥ nānāsūryāḥ	saptan diś nānā sūrya
9114	sapta hotāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ	saptan hotṛ ṛtvij
9114	devāḥ ādityāḥ ye sapta	deva āditya yad saptan
9114	tebhiḥ soma abhi rakṣa naḥ	tad soma abhi rakṣ mad
9114	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
9114	yat te rājan śṛtam haviḥ	yad tvad rājan śrī havis
9114	tena soma abhi rakṣa naḥ	tad soma abhi rakṣ mad
9114	arātīvā mā naḥ tārīt	arātīvan mā mad tṛ
9114	mā u ca naḥ kim cana amamat	mā u ca mad ka cana am
9114	indrāya indo pari srava	indra indu pari sru
101	agre bṛhan uṣasām ūrdhvaḥ asthāt	agra bṛhat uṣas ūrdhva sthā
101	nirjaganvān tamasaḥ jyotiṣā ā agāt	niḥ gam tamas jyotis gā
101	agniḥ bhānunā ruśatā svaṅgaḥ	agni bhānu ruśat su aṅga
101	ā jātaḥ viśvā sadmāni aprāḥ	ā jan viśva sadman prā
101	sa jātaḥ garbhaḥ asi rodasyoḥ	tad jan garbha as rodasī
101	agne cāruḥ vibhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu	agni cāru vi bhṛ oṣadhī
101	citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṁsi aktūn	citra śiśu pari tamas aktu
101	pra mātṛbhyaḥ adhi kanikradat gāḥ	pra mātṛ adhi kanikrad gā
101	viṣṇuḥ itthā paramam asya vidvān	viṣṇu itthā parama idam vid
101	jātaḥ bṛhan abhi pāti tṛtīyam	jan bṛhat abhi pā tṛtīya
101	āsā yat asya payaḥ akrata svam	ās yat idam payas kṛ sva
101	sacetasaḥ abhi arcanti atra	sacetas abhi arc atra
101	ataḥ u tvā pitubhṛtaḥ janitrīḥ	atas u tvad pitubhṛt janitrī
101	annāvṛdham prati caranti annaiḥ	annāvṛdh prati car anna
101	tāḥ īm prati eṣi punar anyarūpāḥ	tad īṃ prati i punar anya rūpa
101	asi tvam vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā	as tvad viś mānuṣa hotṛ
101	hotāram citraratham adhvarasya	hotṛ citra ratha adhvara
101	yajñasyayajñasya ketum ruśantam	yajña yajña ketu ruśat
101	pratyardhim devasyadevasya mahnā	pratyardhi deva deva mahan
101	śriyā tu agnim atithim janānām	śrī tu agni atithi jana
101	sa tu vastrāṇi adha peśanāni	tad tu vastra adha peśana
101	vasānaḥ agniḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ	vas agni nābhi pṛthivī
101	aruṣaḥ jātaḥ pade iLāyāḥ	aruṣa jan pada iḍā
101	purohitaḥ rājan yakṣi iha devān	purohita rājan yaj iha deva
101	ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agne ubhe	ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agni ubh
101	sadā putraḥ na mātarā tatantha	sadā putra na mātṛ tan
101	pra yāhi accha uśataḥ yaviṣTha	pra yā acchā vaś yaviṣṭha
101	atha ā vaha sahasya iha devān	atha ā vah sahasya iha deva
 ---
102	piprīhi devān uśataḥ yaviṣTha	prī deva vaś yaviṣṭha
102	vidvān ṛtūn ṛtupate yaja iha	vid ṛtu ṛtu pati yaj iha
102	ye daivyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ tebhiḥ agne	yad daivya ṛtvij tad agni
102	tvam hotṛṛṇām asi āyajiṣThaḥ	tvad hotṛ as āyajiṣṭha
102	veṣi hotram uta potram janānām	vī hotra uta potra jana
102	mandhātā asi draviṇodāḥ ṛtāvā	mandhātṛ as draviṇas dā ṛtāvan
102	svāhā vayam kṛṇavāmā havīṁṣi	svāhā mad kṛ havis
102	devaḥ devān yajatu agniḥ arhan	deva deva yaj agni arh
102	ā devānām api panthām aganma	ā deva api pathin gam
102	yat śaknavāma tat anu pravoLhum	yad śak tad anu pravah
102	agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt sa it u hotā	agni vidvas tad yaj tad id u hotṛ
102	saḥ adhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti	tad adhvara tad ṛtu kalpay
102	yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni	yat tvad mad pra mī vrata
102	viduṣām devāḥ aviduṣTarāsaḥ	vidvas deva aviduṣṭara
102	agniḥ tat viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān	agni tad viśva ā pṛ vidvas
102	yebhiḥ devān ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti	yad deva ṛtu kalpay
102	yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣāḥ	yad pākatrā manas dīna dakṣa
102	na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ	na yajña man martya
102	agniḥ tat hotā kratuvit vijānan	agni tad hotṛ kratu vid vijñā
102	yajiṣThaḥ devān ṛtuśaḥ yajāti	yajiṣṭha deva ṛtuśas yaj
102	viśveṣām hi adhvarāṇām anīkam	viśva hi adhvara anīka
102	citram ketum janitā tvā jajāna	citra ketu janitṛ tvad jan
102	saḥ ā yajasva nṛvatīḥ anu kṣāḥ	tad ā yaj nṛvat anu kṣā
102	spārhāḥ iṣaḥ kṣumatīḥ viśvajanyāḥ	spārha iṣ kṣumat viśvajanya
102	yam tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yam tvā āpaḥ	yad tvad dyāvāpṛthivī yad tvad ap
102	tvaṣTā yam tvā sujanimā jajāna	tvaṣṭṛ yad tvad su janiman jan
102	panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇam	pathin anu pravid pitṛyāṇa
102	dyumat agne samidhānaḥ vi bhāhi	dyumat agni samindh vi bhā
 ---
103	inaḥ rājan aratiḥ samiddhaḥ	ina rājan arati samindh
103	raudraḥ dakṣāya suṣumān adarśi	raudra dakṣa suṣumat dṛś
103	cikit vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatā	cikit vi bhā bhās bṛhat
103	asiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan	asiknī i ruśat apāj
103	kṛṣṇām yat enīm abhi varpasā bhūt	kṛṣṇa yat abhi varpas bhū
103	janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pituḥ jām	janay yoṣā bṛhat pitṛ jā
103	ūrdhvam bhānum sūryasya stabhāyan	ūrdhva bhānu sūrya stabhāy
103	divaḥ vasubhiḥ aratiḥ vi bhāti	div vasu arati vi bhā
103	bhadraḥ bhadrayā sacamānaḥ ā agāt	bhadra bhadra sac āgā
103	svasāram jāraḥ abhi eti paścāt	svasṛ jāra abhi i paścāt
103	supraketaiḥ dyubhiḥ agniḥ vitiṣThan	su praketa div agni viṣṭhā
103	ruśadbhiḥ varṇaiḥ abhi rāmam asthāt	ruśat varṇa abhi rāma sthā
103	asya yāmāsaḥ bṛhataḥ na vagnūn	idam yāma bṛhat na vagnu
103	indhānāḥ agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya	indh agni sakhi śiva
103	īḍyasya vṛṣṇaḥ bṛhataḥ svāsaḥ	īḍ vṛṣan bṛhat sva
103	bhāmāsaḥ yāman aktavaḥ cikitre	bhāma yāman aktu cit
103	svanāḥ na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante	svana na yad bhāma pū
103	rocamānasya bṛhataḥ sudivaḥ	ruc bṛhat su div
103	jyeṣThebhiḥ yaḥ tejiṣThaiḥ krīLumadbhiḥ	jyeṣṭha yad tejiṣṭha krīḍumat
103	varṣiṣThebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ nakṣati dyām	varṣiṣṭha bhānu nakṣ div
103	asya śuṣmāsaḥ dadṛśānapaveḥ	idam śuṣma dṛś pavi
103	jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ	jeh svanay niyut
103	pratnebhiḥ yaḥ ruśadbhiḥ devatamaḥ	pratna yad ruśat devatama
103	vi rebhadbhiḥ aratiḥ bhāti vibhvā	vi ribh arati bhā vibhvan
103	saḥ ā vakṣi mahi naḥ ā ca satsi	tad ā vah mahi mad ā ca sad
103	divaspṛthivyoḥ aratiḥ yuvatyoḥ	divaspṛthivī arati yuvati
103	agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhiḥ aśvaiḥ	agni sutuka sutuka aśva
103	rabhasvadbhiḥ rabhasvān ā iha gamyāḥ	rabhasvat rabhasvat ā iha gam
 ---
104	pra te yakṣi pra te iyarmi manma	pra tvad yaj pra tvad ṛch manman
104	bhuvaḥ yathā vandyaḥ naḥ haveṣu	bhū yathā vand mad hava
104	dhanvan iva prapā asi tvam agne	dhanvan iva prapā as tvad agni
104	iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan	iyakṣu pūru pratna rājan
104	yam tvā janāsaḥ abhi saṁcaranti	yad tvad jana abhi saṃcar
104	gāvaḥ uṣṇam iva vrajam yaviṣTha	go uṣṇa iva vraja yaviṣṭha
104	dūtaḥ devānām asi martyānām	dūta deva as martya
104	antar mahān carasi rocanena	antar mahat car rocana
104	śiśum na tvā jenyam vardhayantī	śiśu na tvad jenya vardhay
104	mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā	mātṛ bhṛ sacanasy
104	dhanoḥ adhi pravatā yāsi haryan	dhanu adhi pravat yā hary
104	jigīṣase paśuḥ iva avasṛṣTaḥ	jigīṣ paśu iva avasṛj
104	mūrāḥ amūra na vayam cikitvaḥ	mūra a mūra na mad cikitu
104	mahitvam agne tvam aṅga vitse	mahi tva agni tvad aṅga vid
104	śaye vavriḥ carati jihvayā adan	śī vavri car jihvā ad
104	rerihyate yuvatim viśpatiḥ san	rerih yuvati viśpati as
104	kūcit jāyate sanayāsu navyaḥ	kūcid jan sanaya navya
104	vane tasthau palitaḥ dhūmaketuḥ	vana sthā palita dhūma ketu
104	asnātā āpaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na pra veti	asnātṛ ap vṛṣabha na pra vī
104	sacetasaḥ yam praṇayanta martāḥ	sacetas yad praṇī marta
104	tanūtyajā iva taskarā vanargū	tanūtyaj iva taskara vanargu
104	raśanābhiḥ daśabhiḥ abhi adhītām	raśanā daśan abhi dhā
104	iyam te agne navyasī manīṣā	idam tvad agni navīyas manīṣā
104	yukṣvā ratham na śucayadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ	yuj ratha na śocay aṅga
104	brahma ca te jātavedaḥ namaḥ ca	brahman ca tvad jātavedas namas ca
104	iyam ca gīḥ sadam it vardhanī bhūt	idam ca gir sadam id vardhana bhū
104	rakṣā naḥ agne tanayāni tokā	rakṣ mad agni tanaya toka
104	rakṣa uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayucchan	rakṣ uta mad tanu aprayucchat
 ---
105	ekaḥ samudraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām	eka samudra dharuṇa rayi
105	asmat hṛdaḥ bhūrijanmā vi caṣTe	mad hṛd bhūri janman vi cakṣ
105	siṣakti ūdhar niṇyoḥ upasthe	sac ūdhas niṇya upastha
105	utsasya madhye nihitam padam veḥ	utsa madhya nidhā pada vi
105	samānam nīLam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasānāḥ	samāna nīḍa vṛṣan vas
105	sam jagmire mahiṣāḥ arvatībhiḥ	sam gam mahiṣa arvatī
105	ṛtasya padam kavayaḥ ni pānti	ṛta pada kavi ni pā
105	guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi	guhā nāman dhā para
105	ṛtāyinī māyinī sam dadhāte	ṛtāyin māyin sam dhā
105	mitvā śiśum jajñatuḥ vardhayantī	mā śiśu jan vardhay
105	viśvasya nābhim carataḥ dhruvasya	viśva nābhi car dhruva
105	kaveḥ cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ	kavi cit tantu manas vī
105	ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātam	ṛta hi vartani su jan
105	iṣaḥ vājāya pradivaḥ sacante	iṣ vāja pradiv sac
105	adhīvāsam rodasī vāvasāne	adhīvāsa rodas vas
105	ghṛtaiḥ annaiḥ vāvṛdhāte madhūnām	ghṛta anna vṛdh madhu
105	sapta svasṛṛḥ aruṣīḥ vāvaśānaḥ	saptan svasṛ aruṣa vaś
105	vidvān madhvaḥ ut jabhārā dṛśe kam	vid madhu ud bhṛ dṛś kaṃ
105	antar yeme antarikṣe purājāḥ	antar yam antarikṣa purājā
105	icchan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya	iṣ vavri vid pūṣaṇa
105	sapta maryādāḥ kavayaḥ tatakṣuḥ	saptan maryādā kavi takṣ
105	tāsām ekām it abhi aṁhuraḥ gāt	tad eka id abhi aṃhura gā
105	āyoḥ ha skambhaḥ upamasya nīLe	āyu ha skambha upama nīḍa
105	pathām visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau	pathin visarga dharuṇa sthā
105	asat ca sat ca parame vyoman	asat ca as ca parama vyoman
105	dakṣasya janman aditeḥ upasthe	dakṣa janman aditi upastha
105	agniḥ ha naḥ prathamajāḥ ṛtasya	agni ha mad prathama jā ṛta
105	pūrve āyuni vṛṣabhaḥ ca dhenuḥ	pūrva āyu vṛṣabha ca dhenu
 ---
106	ayam sa yasya śarman avobhiḥ	idam tad yad śarman avas
106	agneḥ edhate jaritā abhiṣTau	agni edh jaritṛ abhiṣṭi
106	jyeṣThebhiḥ yaḥ bhānubhiḥ ṛṣūṇām	jyeṣṭha yad bhānu ṛṣu
106	paryeti parivītaḥ vibhāvā	parī parivye vibhāvan
106	yaḥ bhānubhiḥ vibhāvā vibhāti	yad bhānu vibhāvan vibhā
106	agniḥ devebhiḥ ṛtāvā ajasraḥ	agni deva ṛtāvan ajasra
106	ā yaḥ vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyaḥ	ā yad vī sakhya sakhi
106	aparihvṛtaḥ atyaḥ na saptiḥ	aparihvṛta atya na sapti
106	īśe yaḥ viśvasyāḥ devavīteḥ	īś yad viśva deva vīti
106	īśe viśvāyuḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTau	īś viśvāyu uṣas vyuṣṭi
106	ā yasmin manā havīṁṣi agnau	ā yad manā havis agni
106	ariṣTarathaḥ skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ	ariṣṭa ratha skambh śūṣa
106	śūṣebhiḥ vṛdhaḥ juṣāṇaḥ arkaiḥ	śūṣa vṛdha juṣ arka
106	devān acchā raghupatvā jigāti	deva acchā raghu patvan gā
106	mandraḥ hotā sa juhvā yajiṣThaḥ	mandra hotṛ tad juhū yajiṣṭha
106	sammiślaḥ agniḥ ā jigharti devān	sammiśla agni ā ghṛ deva
106	tam usrām indram na rejamānam	tad usrā indra na rej
106	agnim gīrbhiḥ namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam	agni gir namas ā kṛ
106	ā yam viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ gṛṇanti	ā yad vipra mati gṛ
106	jātavedasam juhvam sahānām	jātavedas juhū saha
106	sam yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmuḥ	sam yad viśva vasu gam
106	vāje na aśvāḥ saptīvantaḥ evaiḥ	vāja na aśva saptīvat eva
106	asme ūtīḥ indravātatamāḥ	mad ūti indra vātatama
106	arvācīnāḥ agne ā kṛṇuṣva	arvācīna agni ā kṛ
106	adhā hi agne mahnā niṣadyā	adha hi agni mahan niṣad
106	sadyaḥ jajñānaḥ havyaḥ babhūtha	sadyas jan hu bhū
106	tam te devāsaḥ anu ketam āyan	tad tvad deva anu keta i
106	adha avardhanta prathamāsaḥ ūmāḥ	adha vṛdh prathama ūma
 ---
107	svasti naḥ divaḥ agne pṛthivyāḥ	svasti mad div agni pṛthivī
107	viśvāyuḥ dhehi yajathāya deva	viśvāyu dhā yajatha deva
107	sacemahi tava dasma praketaiḥ	sac tvad dasma praketa
107	uruṣyā naḥ urubhiḥ deva śaṁsaiḥ	uruṣy mad uru deva śaṃsa
107	imāḥ agne matayaḥ tubhyam jātāḥ	idam agni mati tvad jan
107	gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ	go aśva abhi gṛ rādhas
107	yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaT	yadā tvad marta anu bhoga naś
107	vaso dadhānaḥ matibhiḥ sujāta	vasu dhā mati su jan
107	agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim	agni man pitṛ agni āpi
107	agnim bhrātaram sadam it sakhāyam	agni bhrātṛ sadam id sakhi
107	agneḥ anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyam	agni anīka bṛhat sapary
107	divi śukram yajatam sūryasya	div śukra yajata sūrya
107	sidhrāḥ agne dhiyaḥ asme sanutrīḥ	sidhra agni dhī mad sanutṛ
107	yam trāyase dame ā nityahotā	yad trā dama ā nitya hotṛ
107	ṛtāvā sa rohidaśvaḥ purukṣuḥ	ṛtāvan tad rohit aśva purukṣu
107	dyubhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ vāmam astu	div idam aha vāma as
107	dyubhiḥ hitam mitram iva prayogam	div dhā mitra iva prayoga
107	pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya jāram	pratna ṛtvij adhvara jāra
107	bāhubhyām agnim āyavaḥ ajananta	bāhu agni āyu jan
107	vikṣu hotāram ni asādayanta	viś hotṛ ni sāday
107	svayam yajasva divi deva devān	svayam yaj div deva deva
107	kim te pākaḥ kṛṇavat apracetāḥ	ka tvad pāka kṛ apracetas
107	yathā ayajaḥ ṛtubhiḥ deva devān	yathā yaj ṛtu deva deva
107	evā yajasva tanvam sujāta	eva yaj tanū su jan
107	bhavā naḥ agne avitā uta gopāḥ	bhū mad agni avitṛ uta gopā
107	bhavā vayaskṛt uta naḥ vayodhāḥ	bhū vayaskṛt uta mad vayodhas
107	rāsvā ca naḥ sumahaḥ havyadātim	rā ca mad su mahas havyadāti
107	trāsva uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayucchan	trā uta mad tanū aprayucchat
 ---
108	pra ketunā bṛhatā yāti agniḥ	pra ketu bṛhat yā agni
108	ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti	ā rodas vṛṣabha roro
108	divaḥ cit antān upamān ut ānaT	div cit anta upama ud naś
108	apām upasthe mahiṣaḥ vavardha	ap upastha mahiṣa vṛdh
108	mumoda garbhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān	mud garbha vṛṣabha kakudmat
108	asremā vatsaḥ śimīvān arāvīt	asreman vatsa śimīvat ru
108	sa devatāti udyatāni kṛṇvan	tad devatāti udyam kṛ
108	sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamaḥ jigāti	sva kṣaya prathama gā
108	ā yaḥ mūrdhānam pitroḥ arabdha	ā yad mūrdhan pitṛ rabh
108	ni adhvare dadhire sūraḥ arṇaḥ	ni adhvara dhā svar arṇa
108	asya patman aruṣīḥ aśvabudhnāḥ	idam patman aruṣī aśva budhna
108	ṛtasya yonau tanvaḥ juṣanta	ṛta yoni tanū juṣ
108	uṣauṣaḥ hi vaso agram eṣi	uṣas uṣas hi vasu agra i
108	tvam yamayoḥ abhavaḥ vibhāvā	tvad yama bhū vibhāvan
108	ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni	ṛta saptan dhā pada
108	janayan mitram tanve svāyai	janay mitra tanū sva
108	bhuvaḥ cakṣuḥ mahaḥ ṛtasya gopāḥ	bhū cakṣus mah ṛta gopā
108	bhuvaḥ varuṇaḥ yat ṛtāya veṣi	bhū varuṇa yat ṛta vī
108	bhuvaḥ apām napāt jātavedaḥ	bhū ap napāt jātavedas
108	bhuvaḥ dūtaḥ yasya havyam jujoṣaḥ	bhū dūta yad havya juṣ
108	bhuvaḥ yajñasya rajasaḥ ca netā	bhū yajña rajas ca netṛ
108	yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ	yatra niyut sac śiva
108	divi mūrdhānam dadhiṣe svarṣām	div mūrdhan dhā svarṣā
108	jihvām agne cakṛṣe havyavāham	jihvā agni kṛ havyavāha
108	asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar	idam trita kratu vṛ antar
108	icchan dhītim pituḥ evaiḥ parasya	iṣ dhīti pitṛ eva para
108	sacasyamānaḥ pitroḥ upasthe	sacasy pitṛ upastha
108	jāmi bruvāṇaḥ āyudhāni veti	jāmi brū āyudha vī
108	sa pitryāṇi āyudhāni vidvān	tad pitrya āyudha vid
108	indreṣitaḥ āptyaḥ abhi ayudhyat	indra iṣ āptya abhi yudh
108	triśīrṣāṇam saptaraśmim jaghanvān	tri śīrṣan saptan raśmi han
108	tvāṣTrasya cit niḥ sasṛje tritaḥ gāḥ	tvāṣṭra cit niḥ sṛj trita go
108	bhūri it indraḥ udinakṣantam ojaḥ	bhūri id indra ud inakṣ ojas
108	ava abhinat satpatiḥ manyamānam	avabhid satpati man
108	tvāṣTrasya cit viśvarūpasya gonām	tvāṣṭra cit viśvarūpa go
108	ācakrāṇaḥ trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark	ā kṛ tri śīrṣa parā vṛj
 ---
109	āpaḥ hi sthā mayobhuvaḥ	ap hi as mayas bhū
109	tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana	tad mad ūrj dhā
109	mahe raṇāya cakṣase	mah raṇa cakṣ
109	yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ	yad tvad śivatama rasa
109	tasya bhājayata iha naḥ	tad bhājay iha mad
109	uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ	vaś iva mātṛ
109	tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ	tad aram gam tvad
109	yasya kṣayāya jinvatha	yad kṣaya jinv
109	āpaḥ janayathā ca naḥ	ap janay ca mad
109	śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣTaye	śam mad devī abhiṣṭi
109	āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye	ap bhū pīti
109	śam yoḥ abhi sravantu naḥ	śam yos abhi sru mad
109	īśānāḥ vāryāṇām	īś vārya
109	kṣayantīḥ carṣaṇīnām	kṣi carṣaṇi
109	apaḥ yācāmi bheṣajam	ap yāc bheṣaja
109	apsu me somaḥ abravīt	ap mad soma brū
109	antar viśvāni bheṣajā	antar viśva bheṣaja
109	agnim ca viśvaśambhuvam	agni ca viśva śambhu
109	āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajam	ap pṛ bheṣaja
109	varūtham tanve mama	varūtha tanū mad
109	jyok ca sūryam dṛśe	jyok ca sūrya dṛś
109	idam āpaḥ pra vahata	idam ap pra vah
109	yat kim ca duritam mayi	yad ka ca durita mad
109	yat vā aham abhidudroha	yat vā mad abhidruh
109	yat vā śepe uta anṛtam	yat vā śap uta anṛta
109	āpaḥ adya anu acāriṣam	ā ap adya anu car
109	rasena sam agasmahi	rasa sam gam
109	payasvān agne ā gahi	payasvat agni ā gam
109	tam mā sam sṛja varcasā	tad mad sam sṛj varcas
 ---
1010	ā u cit sakhāyam sakhyā vavṛtyām	ā u cit sakhi sakhya
1010	tiraḥ purū cit arṇavam jaganvān	vṛt tiras puru cit arṇava gam
1010	pituḥ napātam ā dadhīta vedhāḥ	pitṛ napāt ā dhā vedhas
1010	adhi kṣami prataram dīdhyānaḥ	adhi kṣam prataram dhī
1010	na te sakhā sakhyam vaṣTi etat	na tvad sakhi sakhya vaś etad
1010	salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti	salakṣman yat viṣurūpa bhū
1010	mahaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ	mah putra asura vīra
1010	divaḥ dhartāraḥ urviyā pari khyan	div dhartṛ urviyā pari
1010	uśanti ghā te amṛtāsaḥ etat	vaś gha tad amṛta etad
1010	ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya	eka cit tyajas martya
1010	ni te manaḥ manasi dhāyi asme	ni tvad manas manas dhā mad
1010	janyuḥ patiḥ tanvam ā viviśyāḥ	jani pati tanū ā
1010	na yat purā cakṛmā kat ha nūnam	na yad purā kṛ ka ha nūnam
1010	ṛtā vadantaḥ anṛtam rapema	ṛta vad anṛta
1010	gandharvaḥ apsu apyā ca yoṣā	gandharva ap apya ca yoṣā
1010	sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramam jāmi tat nau	tad mad nābhi parama jāmi tad mad
1010	garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kar	garbha nu mad janitṛ dampati kṛ
1010	devaḥ tvaṣTā savitā viśvarūpaḥ	deva tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ viśva rūpa
1010	nakiḥ asya pra minanti vratāni	nakir idam pra mī vrata
1010	veda nau asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ	vid mad idam pṛthivī uta div
1010	kaḥ asya veda prathamasya ahnaḥ	ka idam vid prathama ahar
1010	kaḥ īm dadarśa kaḥ iha pra vocat	ka īṃ dṛś ka iha pra vac
1010	bṛhat mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma	bṛhat mitra varuṇa dhāman
1010	kat u bravaḥ āhanaḥ vīcyā nṛṛn	ka u brū āhanas vīci nṛ
1010	yamasya mā yamyam kāmaḥ ā agan	yama mad yamī kāma āgam
1010	samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya	samāna yoni sahaśeyya
1010	jāyā iva patye tanvam riricyām	jāyā iva pati tanū ric
1010	vi cit vṛheva rathyā iva cakrā	vi cit vṛh rathya iva cakra
1010	na tiṣThanti na ni miṣanti ete	na sthā na ni miṣ etad
1010	devānām spaśaḥ iha ye caranti	deva spaś iha yad car
1010	anyena mat āhanaḥ yāhi tūyam	anya mad āhanas yā tūya
1010	tena vi vṛha rathyā iva cakrā	tad vi vṛh rathya iva cakra
1010	rātrībhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ daśasyet	rātri idam aha daśasy
1010	sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhuḥ ut mimīyāt	sūrya cakṣus muhur ud mī
1010	divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū	div pṛthivī mithuna sabandhu
1010	yamīḥ yamasya bibhṛyāt ajāmi	yamī yama bhṛ ajāmi
1010	ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni	ā gha tad gam uttara yuga
1010	yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavan ajāmi	yatra jāmi kṛ ajāmi
1010	upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum	upa barbṛh vṛṣabha bāhu
1010	anyam icchasva subhage patim mat	anya iṣ subhaga pati mad
1010	kim bhrātā asat yat anātham bhavāti	ka bhrātṛ as yat anātha bhū
1010	kim u svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchāt	ka u svasṛ yat nirṛti nigam
1010	kāmamūtā bahu etat rapāmi	kāma mūta bahu etad rap
1010	tanvā me tanvam sam pipṛgdhi	tanu mad tanū sam pṛc
1010	na vai u te tanvā tanvam sam papṛcyām	na vai u tvad tanu tanū sam pṛc
1010	pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt	pāpa ah yad svasṛ nigam
1010	anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva	anya mad pramud kalpay
1010	na te bhrātā subhage vaṣTi etat	na tvad bhrātṛ subhaga vaś etad
1010	bataḥ bata asi yama	bata bata as yama
1010	na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidāma	na eva tvad manas hṛdaya ca vid
1010	anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam	anya kila tvad kakṣyā iva yuj
1010	pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam	pari svaj libujā iva vṛkṣa
1010	anyam ū su tvam yami anyaḥ u tvām	anya u su tvad yamī anya u tvad
1010	pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam	pari svaj libujā iva vṛkṣa
1010	tasya vā tvam manaḥ icchā sa vā tava	tad vā tvad manas iṣ tad vā tvad
1010	adhā kṛṇuṣva saṁvidam subhadrām	adha kṛ saṃvid su bhadra
 ---
1011	vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ	vṛṣan vṛṣan duh dohas div
1011	payāṁsi yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ	payas yahva aditi adābhya
1011	viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā	viśva tad vid varuṇa yathā dhī
1011	sa yajñiyaḥ yajatu yajñiyān ṛtūn	tad yajñiya yaj yajñiya ṛtu
1011	rapat gandharvīḥ apyā ca yoṣaṇā	rap gandharvī apya ca yoṣaṇā
1011	nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ	nada nāda pari pā mad manas
1011	iṣTasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ	iṣṭa madhya aditi ni dhā mad
1011	bhrātā naḥ jyeṣThaḥ prathamaḥ vi vocati	bhrātṛ mad jyeṣṭha prathama vi vac
1011	sa u cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatī	tad u cit nu bhadra kṣumat yaśasvat
1011	uṣāḥ uvāsa manave svarvatī	uṣas vas manu svarvat
1011	yat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum	yat īṃ vaś vaś anu kratu
1011	agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan	agni hotṛ vidatha jan
1011	adha tyam drapsam vibhvam vicakṣaṇam	adha tya drapsa vibhu vicakṣaṇa
1011	viḥ ā abharat iṣitaḥ śyenaḥ adhvare	vi ābhṛ iṣay śyena adhvara
1011	yadī viśaḥ vṛṇate dasmam āryāḥ	yadi viś vṛ dasma ārya
1011	agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata	agni hotṛ adha dhī jan
1011	sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate	sadā as raṇva yavasa iva puṣ
1011	hotrābhiḥ agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ	hotrā agni manus su adhvara
1011	viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyam	vipra vā yat śam ukthya
1011	vājam sasavān upayāsi bhūribhiḥ	vāja san upayā bhūri
1011	ut īraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam	ud īray pitṛ jāra ā bhaga
1011	iyakṣati haryataḥ hṛttaḥ iṣyati	iyakṣ haryata hṛttas iṣ
1011	vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhaḥ	vac vahni svapasy makha
1011	taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī	taviṣy asura vip mati
1011	yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akṣat	yad tvad agni sumati marta aś
1011	sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve	sahas sūnu ati tad pra śru
1011	iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ	iṣ dhā vah aśva
1011	ā sa dyumān amavān bhūṣati dyūn	ā tad dyumat amavat bhūṣ div
1011	yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti	yat agni etad samiti bhū
1011	devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra	deva deva yajata yajatra
1011	ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvaḥ	ratna ca yat vibhaj svadhāvat
1011	bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantam vītāt	bhāga mad atra vasumat vī
1011	śrudhī naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe	śru mad agni sadana sadhastha
1011	yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum	yuj ratha amṛta dravitnu
1011	ā naḥ vaha rodasī devaputre	ā mad vah rodas deva putra
1011	mākiḥ devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ	mākir deva apa bhū iha as
 ---
1012	dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena	div ha kṣam prathama ṛta
1012	abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satyavācā	abhiśrāva bhū satya vāc
1012	devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan	deva yat marta yajatha kṛ
1012	sīdat hotā pratyaṅ svam asum yan	sad hotṛ pratyañc sva asu i
1012	devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena	deva deva paribhū ṛta
1012	vahā naḥ havyam prathamaḥ cikitvān	vah mad havya prathama cit
1012	dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ	dhūma ketu samidh bhāṛjīka
1012	mandraḥ hotā nityaḥ vācā yajīyān	mandra hotṛ nitya vāc yajīyas
1012	svāvṛk devasya amṛtam yadī goḥ	svāvṛj deva amṛta yadi go
1012	ataḥ jātāsaḥ dhārayante urvī	atas jan dhāray urvī
1012	viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ	viśva deva anu tad tvad yajus gā
1012	duhe yat enī divyam ghṛtam vār	duh yat enī divya ghṛta vār
1012	arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū	arc tvad vardha apas ghṛtasnu
1012	dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me	dyāvābhūmī śru rodas mad
1012	ahā yat dyāvaḥ asunītim ayan	aha yat div asunīti i
1012	madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām	madhu mad atra pitṛ śā
1012	kim svit naḥ rājā jagṛhe kat asya	kim svid mad rājan grah ka idam
1012	ati vratam cakṛmā kaḥ vi veda	ati vrata kṛ ka vi vid
1012	mitraḥ cit hi smā juhurāṇaḥ devān	mitra cit hi sma hvṛ deva
1012	ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti	śloka na yā api vāja as
1012	durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma	durmantu atra amṛta nāman
1012	salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti	salakṣman yat viṣurūpa bhū
1012	yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu	yama yad man sumantu
1012	agne tam ṛṣva pāhi aprayucchan	agni tad ṛṣva pā aprayucchat
1012	yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante	yad deva vidatha māday
1012	vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante	vivasvant sadana dhāray
1012	sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn	sūrya jyotis dhā mās aktu
1012	pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā	pari dyotani car ajasra
1012	yasmin devāḥ manmani saṁcaranti	yad deva manman saṃcar
1012	apīcye na vayam asya vidma	apīcya na mad idam vid
1012	mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān	mitra mad atra aditi anāga
1012	savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat	savitṛ deva varuṇa vac
1012	śrudhī naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe	śru mad agni sadana sadhastha
1012	yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum	yuj ratha amṛta dravitnu
1012	ā naḥ vaha rodasī devaputre	ā mad vah rodas deva putra
1012	mākiḥ devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ	mākir deva apa bhū iha as
 ---
1013	yuje vām brahma pūrvyam namobhiḥ	yuj tvad brahman pūrvya namas
1013	vi ślokaḥ etu pathyā iva sūreḥ	vi śloka i pathyā iva sūri
1013	śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrāḥ	śru viśva amṛta putra
1013	ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ	ā yad dhāman divya sthā
1013	yame iva yatamāne yat aitam	yama iva yat yat i
1013	pra vām bharan mānuṣāḥ devayantaḥ	pra tvad bhṛ mānuṣa devay
1013	ā sīdatam svam ulokam vidāne	ā sad sva u loka vid
1013	svāsasthe bhavatam indave naḥ	svāsastha bhū indu mad
1013	pañca padāni rupaḥ anu aroham	pañcan pada rup anu ruh
1013	catuṣpadīm anu emi vratena	catuṣpada anu i vrata
1013	akṣareṇa prati mime etām	akṣara prati mā etad
1013	ṛtasya nābhau adhi sam punāmi	ṛta nābhi adhi sam pū
1013	devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum	deva kaṃ vṛ mṛtyu
1013	prajāyai kam amṛtam na avṛṇīta	prajā kaṃ amṛta na vṛ
1013	bṛhaspatim yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim	bṛhaspati yajña kṛ ṛṣi
1013	priyām yamaḥ tanvam pra arirecīt	priya yama tanū praric
1013	sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate	saptan kṣar śiśu marutvat
1013	pitre putrāsaḥ api avīvatan ṛtam	pitṛ putra api vat ṛta
1013	ubhe it asya ubhayasya rājataḥ	ubh id idam ubhaya rāj
1013	ubhe yatete ubhayasya puṣyataḥ	ubh yat ubhaya puṣ
 ---
1014	pareyivāṁsam pravataḥ mahīḥ anu	pare pravat mahi anu
1014	bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam	bahu pathin anupaś
1014	vaivasvatam saṁgamanam janānām	vaivasvata saṃgamana jana
1014	yamam rājānam haviṣā duvasya	yama rājan havis duvasy
1014	yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda	yama mad gātu prathama vid
1014	na eṣā gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u	na etad gavyūti apabhṛ u
1014	yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ	yatra mad pūrva pitṛ pare
1014	enā jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ	enā jan pathyā anu sva
1014	mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ	mātalī kavya yama aṅgiras
1014	bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ	bṛhaspati ṛkvan vṛdh
1014	yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān	yad ca deva vṛdh yad ca deva
1014	svāhā anye svadhayā anye madanti	svāhā anya svadhā anya mad
1014	imam yama prastaram ā hi sīda	idam yama prastara ā hi sad
1014	aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṁvidānaḥ	aṅgiras pitṛ saṃvid
1014	ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastāḥ vahantu	ā tvad mantra kavi śaṃs vah
1014	enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva	idam rājan havis māday
1014	aṅgirobhiḥ ā gahi yajñiyebhiḥ	aṅgiras ā gam yajñiya
1014	yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva	yama vairūpa iha māday
1014	vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te	vivasvant hvā yad pitṛ tvad
1014	asmin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadya	idam yajña barhis ā niṣad
1014	aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ	aṅgiras mad pitṛ navagva
1014	atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ	atharvan bhṛgu somya
1014	teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām	tad mad sumati yajñiya
1014	api bhadre saumanase syāma	api bhadra saumanasa as
1014	pra ihi pra ihi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhiḥ	pre pre pathin pūrvya
1014	yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ	yatra mad pūrva pitṛ pare
1014	ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā	ubh rājan svadhā mad
1014	yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam	yama paś varuṇa ca deva
1014	sam gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena	sam gam pitṛ sam yama
1014	iṣTāpūrtena parame vyoman	iṣṭāpūrta parama vyoman
1014	hitvāya avadyam punar astam ā ihi	hā avadya punar asta e
1014	sam gacchasva tanvā suvarcāḥ	sam gam tanu suvarcas
1014	apa ita vi ita vi ca sarpata ataḥ	ape vī vi ca sṛp atas
1014	asmai etam pitaraḥ lokam akran	idam etad pitṛ loka kṛ
1014	ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam	ahar ap aktu vyañj
1014	yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai	yama dā avasāna idam
1014	ati drava sārameyau śvānau	ati dru sārameya śvan
1014	caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā	catur akṣa śabala sādhu pathin
1014	athā pitṛṛn suvidatrān upa ihi	atha pitṛ suvidatra upe
1014	yamena ye sadhamādam madanti	yama yad sadhamāda mad
1014	yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau	yad tvad śvan yama rakṣitṛ
1014	caturakṣau pathirakṣī nṛcakṣasau	catur akṣa pathi rakṣi nṛ cakṣas
1014	tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan	tad enad pari dā rājan
1014	svasti ca asmai anamīvam ca dhehi	svasti ca idam anamīva ca dhā
1014	urūṇasau asutṛpau udumbalau	urūṇasa asutṛp udumbala
1014	yamasya dūtau carataḥ janān anu	yama dūta car jana anu
1014	tau asmabhyam dṛśaye sūryāya	tad mad dṛś sūrya
1014	punar dātām asum adya iha bhadram	punar dā asu adya iha bhadra
1014	yamāya somam sunuta	yama soma su
1014	yamāya juhutā haviḥ	yama hu havis
1014	yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati	yama ha yajña gam
1014	agnidūtaḥ araṁkṛtaḥ	agni dūta alaṃkṛ
1014	yamāya ghṛtavat haviḥ	yama ghṛtavat havis
1014	juhota pra ca tiṣThata	hu pra ca sthā
1014	sa naḥ deveṣu ā yamat	tad mad deva ā yam
1014	dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase	dīrgha āyus pra jīv
1014	yamāya madhumattamam	yama madhumattama
1014	rājñe havyam juhotana	rājan havya hu
1014	idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ	idam namas ṛṣi pūrvaja
1014	pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ	pūrva pathikṛt
1014	trikadrukebhiḥ patati	trikadruka pat
1014	ṣaT urvīḥ ekam it bṛhat	ṣaṣ urvī eka id bṛhat
1014	triṣTup gāyatrī chandāṁsi	triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandas
1014	sarvā tā yame āhitā	sarva tad yama ādhā
 ---
1015	ut īratām avare ut parāsaḥ	ud īr avara ud para
1015	ut madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ	ud madhyama pitṛ somya
1015	asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛtajñāḥ	asu yad i avṛka ṛta jña
1015	te naḥ avantu pitaraḥ haveṣu	tad mad av pitṛ hava
1015	idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya	idam pitṛ namas as adya
1015	ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ īyuḥ	yad pūrva yad upara i
1015	ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣattāḥ	yad pārthiva rajas ā niṣad
1015	ye vā nūnam suvṛjanāsu vikṣu	yad vā nūnam su vṛjanā viś
1015	ā aham pitṛṛn suvidatrān avitsi	ā mad pitṛ suvidatra vid
1015	napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ	napāt ca vikramaṇa ca viṣṇu
1015	barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya	barhiṣad yad svadhā su
1015	bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣThāḥ	bhaj pā tad iha āgamiṣṭha
1015	barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk	barhiṣad pitṛ ūti arvāk
1015	imā vaḥ havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam	idam tvad havya kṛ juṣ
1015	te ā gata avasā śaṁtamena	tad ā gam avas śaṃtama
1015	athā naḥ śam yoḥ arapaḥ dadhāta	atha mad śam yos arapas dhā
1015	upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ	upahvā pitṛ somya
1015	barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu	barhiṣya nidhi priya
1015	te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu	tad ā gam tad iha śru
1015	adhi bruvantu te avantu asmān	adhi brū tad av mad
1015	ācyā jānu dakṣiṇataḥ niṣadya	āñc jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣad
1015	imam yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve	idam yajña abhi gṛ viśva
1015	mā hiṁsiṣTa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ	mā hiṃs pitṛ ka cit mad
1015	yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma	yad tvad āgas puruṣa tā kṛ
1015	āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe	ās aruṇī upastha
1015	rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya	rayi dhā dāś martya
1015	putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ	putra pitṛ tad vasu
1015	pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta	pra yam tad iha ūrj dhā
1015	ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ	yad mad pūrva pitṛ somya
1015	anūhire somapītham vasiṣThāḥ	anuvah soma pītha vasiṣṭha
1015	tebhiḥ yamaḥ saṁrarāṇaḥ havīṁṣi	tad yama sam rā havis
1015	uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu	vaś vaś pratikāma ad
1015	ye tātṛṣuḥ devatrā jehamānāḥ	yad tṛṣ devatrā jeh
1015	hotrāvidaḥ stomataṣTāsaḥ arkaiḥ	hotrāvid stoma takṣ arka
1015	ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvāṅ	ā agni yā suvidatra arvāñc
1015	satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharmasadbhiḥ	satya kavya pitṛ gharma sad
1015	ye satyāsaḥ haviradaḥ haviṣpāḥ	yad satya havirad haviṣpā
1015	indreṇa devaiḥ saratham dadhānāḥ	indra deva sa ratha dhā
1015	ā agne yāhi sahasram devavandaiḥ	ā agni yā sahasra deva vanda
1015	paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharmasadbhiḥ	para pūrva pitṛ gharma sad
1015	agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata	agniṣvātta pitṛ ā iha gam
1015	sadaḥsadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ	sadas sadas sad su praṇīti
1015	attā havīṁṣi prayatāni barhiṣi	ad havis prayam barhis
1015	athā rayim sarvavīram dadhātana	atha rayi sarva vīra dhā
1015	tvam agne īLitaḥ jātavedaḥ	tvad agni īḍ jātavedas
1015	avāT havyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī	vah havya surabhi kṛ
1015	pra adāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan	pradā pitṛ svadhā tad ghas
1015	addhi tvam deva prayatā havīṁṣi	ad tvad deva prayam havis
1015	ye ca iha pitaraḥ ye ca na iha	yad ca iha pitṛ yad ca na iha
1015	yān ca vidma yān u ca na pravidma	yad ca vid yad u ca na pravid
1015	tvam vettha yati te jātavedaḥ	tvad vid yati tad jātavedas
1015	svadhābhiḥ yajñam sukṛtam juṣasva	svadhā yajña su kṛ juṣ
1015	ye agnidagdhāḥ ye anagnidagdhāḥ	yad agnidagdha yad anagnidagdha
1015	madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante	madhya div svadhā māday
1015	tebhiḥ svarāT asunītim etām	tad svarāj asunīti etad
1015	yathāvaśam tanvam kalpayasva	yathāvaśam tanū kalpay
 ---
1016	mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śocaḥ	mā enad agni vi dah mā abhi śuc
1016	mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram	mā idam tvac kṣip mā śarīra
1016	yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ	yadā śrī kṛ jātavedas
1016	atha īm enam pra hinutāt pitṛbhyaḥ	atha īṃ enad pra hi pitṛ
1016	śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ	śrī yadā kṛ jātavedas
1016	atha īm enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ	atha īṃ enad pari dā pitṛ
1016	yadā gacchāti asunītim etām	yadā gam asunīti etad
1016	athā devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti	atha deva vaśanī bhū
1016	sūryam cakṣuḥ gacchatu vātam ātmā	sūrya cakṣus gam vāta ātman
1016	dyām ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmaṇā	div ca gam pṛthivī ca dharman
1016	apaḥ vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam	ap vā gam yadi tatra tvad dhā
1016	oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣThā śarīraiḥ	oṣadhī prati sthā śarīra
1016	ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasā tam tapasva	aja bhāga tapas tad tap
1016	tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ	tad tvad śocis tap tad tvad arcis
1016	yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ	yad tvad śiva tanu jātavedas
1016	tābhiḥ vaha enam sukṛtām ulokam	tad vah enad su kṛt u loka
1016	ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ	ava sṛj punar agni pitṛ
1016	yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhābhiḥ	yad tvad āhu car svadhā
1016	āyuḥ vasānaḥ upa vetu śeṣaḥ	āyus vas upa vī śeṣas
1016	sam gacchatām tanvā jātavedaḥ	sam gam tanu jātavedas
1016	yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ ātutoda	yad tvad kṛṣṇa śakuna ātud
1016	pipīlaḥ sarpaḥ uta vā śvāpadaḥ	pipīla sarpa uta vā śvāpada
1016	agniḥ tat viśvāt agadam kṛṇotu	agni tad viśvād agada kṛ
1016	somaḥ ca yaḥ brāhmaṇān āviveśa	soma ca yad brāhmaṇa āviś
1016	agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva	agni varman pari go vye
1016	sam pra ūrṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca	sam pra vṛ pīvas medas ca
1016	na it tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ	na id tvad dhṛṣṇu haras jarhṛṣ
1016	dadhṛk vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte	dadhṛṣ vidah paryaṅkhay
1016	imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ	idam agni camasa mā vi hvṛ
1016	priyaḥ devānām uta somyānām	priya deva uta somya
1016	eṣa yaḥ camasaḥ devapānaḥ	etad yad camasa deva pāna
1016	tasmin devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayante	tad deva amṛta māday
1016	kravyādam agnim pra hinomi dūram	kravyād agni pra hi dūram
1016	yamarājñaḥ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ	yama rājan gam ripra vāha
1016	iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ	iha eva idam itara jātavedas
1016	devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan	deva havya vah prajñā
1016	yaḥ agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vaḥ gṛham	yad agni kravyād praviś tvad gṛha
1016	imam paśyan itaram jātavedasam	idam paś itara jātavedas
1016	tam harāmi pitṛyajñāya devam	tad hṛ pitṛ yajña deva
1016	sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe	tad gharma inv parama sadhastha
1016	yaḥ agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ	yad agni kravya vāhana
1016	pitṛṛn yakṣat ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	pitṛ yaj ṛtāvṛdh
1016	pra it u havyāni vocati	pra id u havya vac
1016	devebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ā	deva ca pitṛ ā
1016	uśantaḥ tvā ni dhīmahi	vaś tvad ni dhā
1016	uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi	vaś sam indh
1016	uśan uśataḥ ā vaha	vaś vaś ā vah
1016	pitṛṛn haviṣe attave	pitṛ havis ad
1016	yam tvam agne samadahaḥ	yad tvad agni saṃdah
1016	tam u niḥ vāpayā punar	tad u niḥ vāpay punar
1016	kiyāmbu atra rohatu	kiyāmbu atra ruh
1016	pākadūrvā vyalkaśā	pākadūrvā vyalkaśā
1016	śītike śītikāvati	śītaka śītikāvat
1016	hlādike hlādikāvati	hlādaka hlādikāvat
1016	maṇḍūkyā su sam gamaḥ	maṇḍūkī su sam gam
1016	imam su agnim harṣaya	idam su agni harṣay
 ---
1017	tvaṣTā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti	tvaṣṭṛ duhitṛ vahatu kṛ
1017	iti idam viśvam bhuvanam sam eti	iti idam viśva bhuvana sam i
1017	yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā	yama mātṛ parivah
1017	mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa	mah jāyā vivasvant naś
1017	apa agūhan amṛtām martyebhyaḥ	apaguh amṛta martya
1017	kṛtvī savarṇām adaduḥ vivasvate	kṛ savarṇa dā vivasvant
1017	uta aśvinau abharat yat tat āsīt	uta aśvin bhṛ yat tad as
1017	ajahāt u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ	hā u dvi mithuna saraṇyū
1017	pūṣā tvā itaḥ cyāvayatu pra vidvān	pūṣan tvad itas cyāvay pra vid
1017	anaṣTapaśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ	a naś paśu bhuvana gopā
1017	sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ	tad tvad etad pari dā pitṛ
1017	agniḥ devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ	agni deva suvidatriya
1017	āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā	āyu viśvāyu pari pā tvad
1017	pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt	pūṣan tvad pā prapatha purastāt
1017	yatra āsate sukṛtaḥ yatra te yayuḥ	yatra ās su kṛt yatra tad yā
1017	tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu	tatra tvad deva savitṛ dhā
1017	pūṣā imā āśāḥ anu veda sarvāḥ	pūṣan idam āśā anu vid sarva
1017	saḥ asmān abhayatamena neṣat	tad mad abhayatama nī
1017	svastidāḥ āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīraḥ	svasti dā āghṛṇi sarva vīra
1017	aprayucchan puraḥ etu prajānan	aprayucchat puras i prajñā
1017	prapathe pathām ajaniṣTa pūṣā	prapatha pathin jan pūṣan
1017	prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ	prapatha div prapatha pṛthivī
1017	ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe	ubh abhi priyatama sadhastha
1017	ā ca parā ca carati prajānan	ā ca parā ca car prajñā
1017	sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante	sarasvatī devay hvā
1017	sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne	sarasvatī adhvara tan
1017	sarasvatīm sukṛtaḥ ahvayanta	sarasvatī su kṛt hvā
1017	sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt	sarasvatī dāś vārya dā
1017	sarasvati yā saratham yayātha	sarasvatī yad sa ratha yā
1017	svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī	svadhā devī pitṛ mad
1017	āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayasva	āsad idam barhis māday
1017	anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ā dhehi asme	anamīva iṣ ā dhā mad
1017	sarasvatīm yām pitaraḥ havante	sarasvatī yad pitṛ hvā
1017	dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ	dakṣiṇā yajña abhinakṣ
1017	sahasrārgham iLaḥ atra bhāgam	sahasra argha iḍ atra bhāga
1017	rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhehi	rai poṣa yajamāna dhā
1017	āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu	ap mad mātṛ śundhay
1017	ghṛtena naḥ ghṛtapvaḥ punantu	ghṛta mad ghṛta pu pū
1017	viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ	viśva hi ripra pravah devī
1017	ut it ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi	ud id idam śuci ā pū i
1017	drapsaḥ caskanda prathamān anu dyūn	drapsa skand prathama anu div
1017	imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ	idam ca yoni anu yad ca pūrva
1017	samānam yonim anu saṁcarantam	samāna yoni anu saṃcar
1017	drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ	drapsa hu anu saptan hotrā
1017	yaḥ te drapsaḥ skandati yaḥ te aṁśuḥ	yad tvad drapsa skand yad tvad aṃśu
1017	bāhucyutaḥ dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthāt	bāhu cyu dhiṣaṇā upastha
1017	adhvaryoḥ vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt	adhvaryu vā pari vā yad pavitra
1017	tam te juhomi manasā vaṣaTkṛtam	tad tvad hu manas vaṣaṭkṛ
1017	yaḥ te drapsaḥ skannaḥ yaḥ te aṁśuḥ	yad tvad drapsa skand yad tvad aṃśu
1017	avaḥ ca yaḥ paraḥ srucā	avas ca yad paras sruc
1017	ayam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ	idam deva bṛhaspati
1017	sam tam siñcatu rādhase	sam tad sic rādhas
1017	payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ	payasvat oṣadhi
1017	payasvat māmakam vacaḥ	payasvat māmaka vacas
1017	apām payasvat it payaḥ	ap payasvat id payas
1017	tena mā saha śundhata	tad mad saha śudh
 ---
1018	param mṛtyo anu parā ihi panthām	para mṛtyu anu pare pathin
1018	yaḥ te svaḥ itaraḥ devayānāt	yad tvad sva itara deva yāna
1018	cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi	cakṣuṣmat śru tvad brū
1018	mā naḥ prajām rīriṣaḥ mā uta vīrān	mā mad prajā riṣ mā uta vīra
1018	mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ yat aita	mṛtyu pada yopay yat i
1018	drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ	drāghīyas āyus prataram dhā
1018	āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena	āpyā prajā dhana
1018	śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ	śudh pū bhū yajñiya
1018	ime jīvāḥ vi mṛtaiḥ ā avavṛtran	idam jīva vi mṛ āvṛt
1018	abhūt bhadrā devahūtiḥ naḥ adya	bhū bhadra deva hūti mad adya
1018	prāñcaḥ agāma nṛtaye hasāya	prāñc gā nṛti hasa
1018	drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ	drāghīyas āyus prataram dhā
1018	imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi	idam jīva paridhi dhā
1018	mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam	mā idam nu gā apara artha etad
1018	śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ	śata jīv śarad purūcī
1018	antar mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena	antar mṛtyu dhā parvata
1018	yathā ahāni anupūrvam bhavanti	yathā ahar anupūrva bhū
1018	yathā ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti sādhu	yathā ṛtu ṛtu i sādhu
1018	yathā na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti	yathā na pūrva apara hā
1018	evā dhātar āyūṁṣi kalpaya eṣām	eva dhātṛ āyus kalpay idam
1018	ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam vṛṇānāḥ	ā ruh āyus jaras vṛ
1018	anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yati stha	anupūrva yat yati as
1018	iha tvaṣTā sujanimā sajoṣāḥ	iha tvaṣṭṛ su janiman sajoṣas
1018	dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ	dīrgha āyus kṛ jīv tvad
1018	imāḥ nārīḥ avidhavāḥ supatnīḥ	idam nārī a vidhavā su patnī
1018	āñjanena sarpiṣā sam viśantu	āñjana sarpis sam viś
1018	anaśravaḥ anamīvāḥ suratnāḥ	an aśru anamīva su ratna
1018	ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre	ā ruh jani yoni agra
1018	ut īrṣva nāri abhi jīvalokam	ud īr nārī abhi jīva loka
1018	gatāsum etam upa śeṣe ā ihi	gatāsu etad upa śī e
1018	hastagrābhasya didhiṣoḥ tava idam	hasta grābha didhiṣu tvad idam
1018	patyuḥ janitvam abhi sam babhūtha	pati jani tva abhi sam bhū
1018	dhanuḥ hastāt ādadānaḥ mṛtasya	dhanus hasta ādā mṛ
1018	asme kṣatrāya varcase balāya	mad kṣatra varcas bala
1018	atra eva tvam iha vayam suvīrāḥ	atra eva tvad iha mad su vīra
1018	viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema	viśva spṛdh abhimāti ji
1018	upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām	upa sṛp mātṛ bhūmi etad
1018	uruvyacasam pṛthivīm suśevām	uru vyacas pṛthivī su śeva
1018	ūrṇamradāḥ yuvatiḥ dakṣiṇāvate	ūrṇamrada yuvati dakṣiṇāvat
1018	eṣā tvā pātu nirṛteḥ upasthāt	etad tvad pā nirṛti upastha
1018	ut śvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ	ucchvañc pṛthivī mā ni bādh
1018	sūpāyanā asmai bhava sūpavañcanā	su upāyana idam bhū su upavañcana
1018	mātā putram yathā sicā	mātṛ putra yathā sic
1018	abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi	abhi enad bhūmi vṛ
1018	ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣThatu	ucchvañc pṛthivī su sthā
1018	sahasram mitaḥ upa hi śrayantām	sahasra mit upa hi śri
1018	te gṛhāsaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ bhavantu	tad gṛha ghṛtaścut bhū
1018	viśvāhā asmai śaraṇāḥ santu atra	viśvāhā idam śaraṇa as atra
1018	ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīm tvat pari	ud tvad stambh pṛthivī tvad pari
1018	imam logam nidadhat mā u aham riṣam	idam loga nidhā mā u mad riṣ
1018	etām sthūṇām pitaraḥ dhārayantu te	etad sthūṇā pitṛ dhāray tvad
1018	atrā yamaḥ sādanā te minotu	atra yama sādana tvad mi
1018	pratīcīne mām ahani	pratīcīna mad ahar
1018	iṣvāḥ parṇam iva ā dadhuḥ	iṣu parṇa iva ā
1018	pratīcīm jagrabhā vācam	pratyañc grah vāc
1018	aśvam raśanayā yathā	aśva raśanā yathā
 ---
1019	ni vartadhvam mā anu gāta	ni vṛt mā anu gā
1019	asmān siṣakta revatīḥ	mad sac revat
1019	agnīṣomā punarvasū	agnīṣoma punarvasu
1019	asme dhārayatam rayim	mad dhāray rayi
1019	punar enāḥ ni vartaya	punar enad ni vartay
1019	punar enāḥ ni ā kuru	punar enad ni ā kṛ
1019	indraḥ enāḥ ni yacchatu	indra enad ni yam
1019	agniḥ enāḥ upājatu	agni enad upāj
1019	punar etāḥ ni vartantām	punar etad ni vṛt
1019	asmin puṣyantu gopatau	idam puṣ gopati
1019	iha eva agne ni dhāraya	iha eva agni ni dhāray
1019	iha tiṣThatu yā rayiḥ	iha sthā yad rayi
1019	yat niyānam nyayanam	yad niyāna nyayana
1019	saṁjñānam yat parāyaṇam	saṃjñāna yad parāyaṇa
1019	āvartanam nivartanam	āvartana nivartana
1019	yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve	yad gopā api tad hvā
1019	yaḥ udānaT vyayanam	yad unnaś vyayana
1019	yaḥ udānaT parāyaṇam	yad unnaś parāyaṇa
1019	āvartanam nivartanam	āvartana nivartana
1019	api gopāḥ ni vartatām	api gopā ni vṛt
1019	ā nivarta ni vartaya	ā nivarta ni vartay
1019	punar naḥ indra gāḥ dehi	punar mad indra go dā
1019	jīvābhiḥ bhunajāmahai	jīva bhuj
1019	pari vaḥ viśvataḥ dadhe	pari tvad viśvatas dhā
1019	ūrjā ghṛtena payasā	ūrj ghṛta payas
1019	ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyāḥ	yad deva ka ca yajñiya
1019	te rayyā sam sṛjantu naḥ	tad rayi sam sṛj mad
1019	ā nivartana vartaya	ā nivartana vartay
1019	ni nivartana vartaya	ni nivartana vartay
1019	bhūmyāḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ	bhūmi catur pradiś
1019	tābhyaḥ enāḥ ni vartaya	tad enad ni vartay
 ---
1020	bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ	bhadra mad api vātay manas
1020	agnim īLe bhujām yaviṣTham	agni īḍ bhuj yaviṣṭha
1020	śāsā mitram durdharītum	śās mitra durdharītu
1020	yasya dharman svar enīḥ	yad dharman svar enī
1020	saparyanti mātuḥ ūdhar	sapary mātṛ ūdhas
1020	yam āsā kṛpanīLam	yad ās kṛpanīḍa
1020	bhāsāketum vardhayanti	bhāsā ketu vardhay
1020	bhrājate śreṇidan	bhrāj śreṇidat
1020	aryaḥ viśām gātuḥ eti	ari viś gātu i
1020	pra yat ānaT divaḥ antān	pra yat naś div anta
1020	kaviḥ abhram dīdyānaḥ	kavi abhra dīdī
1020	juṣat havyā mānuṣasya	juṣ havya mānuṣa
1020	ūrdhvaḥ tasthau ṛbhvā yajñe	ūrdhva sthā ṛbhvas yajña
1020	minvan sadma puraḥ eti	mi sadman puras i
1020	sa hi kṣemaḥ haviḥ yajñaḥ	tad hi kṣema havis yajña
1020	śruṣTī it asya gātuḥ eti	śruṣṭi id a gātu i
1020	agnim devāḥ vāśīmantam	agni deva vāśīmat
1020	yajñāsāham duvaḥ iṣe	yajñāsāha duvas iṣ
1020	agnim pūrvasya śevasya	agni pūrva śeva
1020	adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ	adri sūnu āyu ah
1020	naraḥ ye ke ca asmat ā	nṛ yad ka ca mad ā
1020	viśvā it te vāme ā syuḥ	viśva id tad vāma ā as
1020	agnim haviṣā vardhantaḥ	agni havis vṛdh
1020	kṛṣṇaḥ śvetaḥ aruṣaḥ yāmaḥ asya	kṛṣṇa śveta aruṣa yāma idam
1020	bradhnaḥ ṛjraḥ uta śoṇaḥ yaśasvān	bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇa yaśasvat
1020	hiraṇyarūpam janitā jajāna	hiraṇya rūpa janitṛ jan
1020	evā te agne vimadaḥ manīṣām	eva tvad agni vimada manīṣā
1020	ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	ūrj napāt amṛta sajoṣas
1020	giraḥ ā vakṣat sumatīḥ iyānaḥ	gir ā vah sumati i
1020	iṣam ūrjam sukṣitim viśvam ā abhār	iṣ ūrj su kṣiti viśva ābhṛ
 ---
1021	ā agnim na svavṛktibhiḥ	ā agni na svavṛkti
1021	hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe	hotṛ tvad vṛ
1021	yajñāya stīrṇabarhiṣe	yajña stṛ barhis
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	śīram pāvakaśociṣam	śīra pāvaka śocis
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	tvām u te svābhuvaḥ	tvad u tad su ābhū
1021	śumbhanti aśvarādhasaḥ	śubh aśva rādhas
1021	veti tvām upasecanī	vī tvad upasecanī
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	ṛjītiḥ agne āhutiḥ	ṛjīti agni āhuti
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	tve dharmāṇaḥ āsate	tvad dharman ās
1021	juhūbhiḥ siñcatīḥ iva	juhū sic iva
1021	kṛṣṇā rūpāṇi arjunā	kṛṣṇa rūpa arjuna
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhiṣe	viśva adhi śrī dhā
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	yam agne manyase rayim	yad agni man rayi
1021	sahasāvan amartya	sahasāvat amartya
1021	tam ā naḥ vājasātaye	tad ā mad vājasāti
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	yajñeṣu citram ā bharā	yajña citra ā bhṛ
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	agniḥ jātaḥ atharvaṇā	agni jan atharvan
1021	vidat viśvāni kāvyā	vid viśva kāvya
1021	bhuvat dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ	bhū dūta vivasvant
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	priyaḥ yamasya kāmyaḥ	priya yama kāmya
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	tvām yajñeṣu īLate	tvad yajña īḍ
1021	agne prayati adhvare	agni pre adhvara
1021	tvam vasūni kāmyā	tvad vasu kāmya
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe	viśva dhā dāś
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ
1021	tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam	tvad yajña ṛtvij
1021	cārum agne ni sedire	cāru agni ni sad
1021	ghṛtapratīkam manuṣaḥ	ghṛta pratīka manus

1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ

1021	uru prathayase bṛhat	uru prathay bṛhat
1021	abhikrandan vṛṣāyase	abhikrand vṛṣāy
1021	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1021	garbham dadhāsi jāmiṣu	garbha dhā jāmi
1021	vivakṣase	vivakṣ

1022	kuha śrutaḥ indraḥ kasmin adya	kuha śru indra ka adya
1022	jane mitraḥ na śrūyate	jana mitra na śru
1022	ṛṣīṇām vā yaḥ kṣaye	ṛṣi vā yad kṣaya
1022	guhā vā carkṛṣe girā	guhā vā carkar gir
1022	iha śrutaḥ indraḥ asme adya	iha śru indra mad adya
1022	stave vajrī ṛcīṣamaḥ	stu vajrin ṛcīṣama
1022	mitraḥ na yaḥ janeṣu ā	mitra na yad jana ā
1022	yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā	yaśas kṛ asāmi ā
1022	mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmi ā	mah yad pati śavas asāmi ā
1022	mahaḥ nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ	mah nṛmṇa tūtuji
1022	bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ	bhṛ vajra dhṛṣṇu
1022	pitā putram iva priyam	pitṛ putra iva priya
1022	yujānaḥ aśvā vātasya dhunī	yuj aśva vāta dhuni
1022	devaḥ devasya vajrivaḥ	deva deva vajrivat
1022	syantā pathā virukmatā	syand pathin virukmat
1022	sṛjānaḥ stoṣi adhvanaḥ	sṛj stu adhvan
1022	tvam tyā cit vātasya aśvā ā agāḥ	tvad tya cit vāta aśva gā
1022	ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai	ṛjra tman vah
1022	yayoḥ devaḥ na martyaḥ	yad deva na martya
1022	yantā nakiḥ vidāyyaḥ	yantṛ nakir vid
1022	adha gmantā uśanā pṛcchate vām	adha gam uśanā pracch tvad
1022	kadarthā naḥ ā gṛham	kadartha mad ā gṛha
1022	ā jagmathuḥ parākāt	ā gam parāka
1022	divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca martyam	div ca gam ca martya
1022	ā naḥ indra pṛkṣase	ā mad indra pṛkṣ
1022	asmākam brahma udyatam	mad brahman udyam
1022	tat tvā yācāmahe avaḥ	tad tvad yāc avas
1022	śuṣṇam yat han amānuṣam	śuṣṇa yat han a mānuṣa
1022	akarmā dasyuḥ abhi naḥ amantuḥ	akarman dasyu abhi mad amantu
1022	anyavrataḥ amānuṣaḥ	anya vrata a mānuṣa
1022	tvam tasya amitrahan	tvad tad amitra han
1022	vadhar dāsasya dambhaya	vadhar dāsa dambhay
1022	tvam naḥ indra śūra śūraiḥ	tvad mad indra śūra śūra
1022	uta tvotāsaḥ barhaṇā	uta tvota barhaṇā
1022	purutrā te vi pūrtayaḥ	purutrā tvad vi pūrti
1022	navanta kṣoṇayaḥ yathā	nū kṣoṇī yathā
1022	tvam tān vṛtrahatye codayaḥ nṛṛn	tvad tad vṛtra hatya coday nṛ
1022	kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ	kārpāṇa śūra vajrivat
1022	guhā yadī kavīnām	guhā yadi kavi
1022	viśām nakṣatraśavasām	viś na kṣatra śavas
1022	makṣū tā te indra dānāpnasaḥ	makṣū tad tvad indra dānāpnas
1022	ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ	akṣ śūra vajrivat
1022	yat ha śuṣṇasya dambhayaḥ	yat ha śuṣṇa dambhay
1022	jātam viśvam sayāvabhiḥ	jāta viśva sa yāvan
1022	mā akudhryak indra śūra vasvīḥ	mā akudhryañc indra śūra vasu
1022	asme bhūvan abhiṣTayaḥ	mad bhū abhiṣṭi
1022	vayaṁvayam te āsām	mad mad tvad idam
1022	sumne syāma vajrivaḥ	sumna as vajrivat
1022	asme tā te indra santu satyā	mad tad tvad indra as satya
1022	ahiṁsantīḥ upaspṛśaḥ	a hiṃs upaspṛś
1022	vidyāma yāsām bhujaḥ	vid yad bhuj
1022	dhenūnām na vajrivaḥ	dhenu na vajrivat
1022	ahastā yat apadī vardhata kṣāḥ	ahasta yat apada vṛdh kṣā
1022	śacībhiḥ vedyānām	śacī vedyā
1022	śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇit	śuṣṇa pari pradakṣiṇit
1022	viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ	viśva āyu ni śnath
1022	pibāpiba it indra śūra somam	pā pā id indra śūra soma
1022	mā riṣaṇyaḥ vasavāna vasuḥ san	mā riṣaṇy vasavāna vasu as
1022	uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ	uta trā gṛ maghavan
1022	mahaḥ ca rāyaḥ revataḥ kṛdhī naḥ	mah ca rai revat kṛ mad
 ---
1023	yajāmahe indram vajradakṣiṇam	yaj indra vajra dakṣiṇa
1023	harīṇām rathyam vivratānām	hari rathya vivrata
1023	pra śmaśru dodhuvat ūrdhvathā bhūt	pra śmaśru dodhu ūrdhvathā bhū
1023	vi senābhiḥ dayamānaḥ vi rādhasā	vi senā day vi rādhas
1023	harī nu asya yā vane vide vasu	hari nu idam yad vana vid vasu
1023	indraḥ maghaiḥ maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat	indra magha maghavan vṛtra han bhū
1023	ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavaḥ	ṛbhu vāja ṛbhukṣan paty śavas
1023	ava kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit	ava kṣṇu dāsa nāman cit
1023	yadā vajram hiraṇyam it athā ratham	yadā vajra hiraṇya id atha ratha
1023	harī yam asya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ	hari yad idam vah vi sūri
1023	ā tiṣThati maghavā sanaśrutaḥ	ā sthā maghavan sana śru
1023	indraḥ vājasya dīrghaśravasaḥ patiḥ	indra vāja dīrgha śravas pati
1023	sa u cit nu vṛṣTiḥ yūthyā svā sacā	tad u cit nu vṛṣṭi yūthya sva
1023	indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute	indra śmaśru harita abhi pruṣ
1023	ava veti sukṣayam sute madhu	av vī su kṣaya suta madhu
1023	ut it dhūnoti vātaḥ yathā vanam	ud id dhū vāta yathā vana
1023	yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ	yad vāc vivāc mṛdhravāc
1023	purū sahasrā aśivā jaghāna	puru sahasra aśiva han
1023	tattat it asya pauṁsyam gṛṇīmasi	tad tad id idam pauṃsya gṛ
1023	pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ	pitṛ iva yad taviṣī vṛdh śavas
1023	stomam te indra vimadāḥ ajījanan	stoma tvad indra vimada jan
1023	apūrvyam purutamam sudānave	apūrvya purutama su dānu
1023	vidmā hi asya bhojanam inasya	vid hi idam bhojana ina
1023	yat ā paśum na gopāḥ karāmahe	yat ā paśu na gopā kṛ
1023	mākiḥ naḥ enā sakhyā vi yauṣuḥ	mākir mad enad sakhya vi yu
1023	tava ca indra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ	tvad ca indra vimada ca ṛṣi
1023	vidmā hi te pramatim deva jāmivat	vid hi tvad pramati deva jāmi vat
1023	asme te santu sakhyā śivāni	mad tvad as sakhya śiva
 ---
1024	indra somam imam piba	indra soma idam pā
1024	madhumantam camū sutam	madhumat camū su
1024	asme rayim ni dhāraya	mad rayi ni dhāray
1024	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1024	sahasriṇam purūvaso	sahasrin purūvasu
1024	vivakṣase	vivakṣ

1024	śacīpate śacīnām	śacīpati śacī

1024	śreṣTham naḥ dhehi vāryam	śreṣṭha mad dhā vārya

1024	yaḥ patiḥ vāryāṇām	yad pati vārya

1024	dviṣaḥ naḥ pāhi aṁhasaḥ	dviṣ mad pā aṃhas

1024	samīcyoḥ niṣpatantyoḥ	samyañc niṣpat
1024	nāsatyau abruvan devāḥ	nāsatya brū deva

1025	bhadram naḥ api vātaya	bhadra mad api vātay
1025	manaḥ dakṣam uta kratum	manas dakṣa uta kratu
1025	adhā te sakhye andhasaḥ	adha tvad sakhya andhas

1025	indrasya vardhata priyaḥ	indra vṛdh priya
1025	ayam kakṣīvataḥ mahaḥ	idam kakṣīvant mah
1025	vi vaḥ made	vi tvad mada
1025	matim viprasya vardhayat	mati vipra vardhay

1026	pra hi acchā manīṣāḥ	pra hi acchā manīṣā
1026	spārhāḥ yanti niyutaḥ	spārha i niyut
1026	pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ	pra dasra niyudratha
1026	pūṣā aviṣTu māhinaḥ	pūṣan av māhina
1026	yasya tyat mahitvam	yad tya mahi tva
1026	vātāpyam ayam janaḥ	vātāpya idam jana
1026	vipraḥ ā vaṁsat dhītibhiḥ	vipra ā van dhīti
1026	ciketa suṣTutīnām	cit suṣṭuti
1026	sa veda suṣTutīnām	tad vid suṣṭuti
1026	induḥ na pūṣā vṛṣā	indu na pūṣan vṛṣan
1026	abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati	abhi psuras pruṣāy
1026	vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati	vraja mad ā pruṣāy
1026	maṁsīmahi tvā vayam	man tvad mad
1026	asmākam deva pūṣan	mad deva pūṣan
1026	matīnām ca sādhanam	mati ca sādhana
1026	viprāṇām ca ādhavam	vipra ca ādhava
1026	pratyardhiḥ yajñānām	pratyardhi yajña
1026	aśvahayaḥ rathānām	aśva haya ratha
1026	ṛṣiḥ sa yaḥ manurhitaḥ	ṛṣi tad yad manus hita
1026	viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ	vipra yāvay sakha
1026	ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ	adhīṣ pati
1026	śucāyāḥ ca śucasya ca	śuca ca śuca ca
1026	vāsovāyaḥ avīnām	vāsas vāya avi
1026	ā vāsāṁsi marmṛjat	ā vāsas marmṛj
1026	inaḥ vājānām patiḥ	ina vāja pati
1026	inaḥ puṣTīnām sakhā	ina puṣṭi sakhi
1026	pra śmaśru haryataḥ dūdhot	pra śmaśru haryata dhū
1026	vi vṛthā yaḥ adābhyaḥ	vi vṛthā yad adābhya
1026	ā te rathasya pūṣan	ā tvad ratha pūṣan
1026	ajāḥ dhuram vavṛtyuḥ	aja dhur vṛt
1026	viśvasya arthinaḥ sakhā	viśva arthin sakhi
1026	sanojāḥ anapacyutaḥ	sanojā an apacyu
1026	asmākam ūrjā ratham	mad ūrj ratha
1026	pūṣā aviṣTu māhinaḥ	pūṣan av māhina
1026	bhuvat vājānām vṛdhaḥ	bhū vāja vṛdha
1026	imam naḥ śṛṇavat havam	idam mad śru hava
 ---
1027	asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ	as su mad jaritṛ tad abhivega
1027	yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam	yat su yajamāna śikṣ
1027	anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā	an āśīrdā mad as prahan
1027	satyadhvṛtam vṛjināyantam ābhum	satyadhvṛt vṛjināy ābhu
1027	yadi it aham yudhaye saṁnayāni	yadi id mad yudh saṃnī
1027	adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān	a devayu tanu śuj
1027	amā te tumram vṛṣabham pacāni	amā tvad tumra vṛṣabha pac
1027	tīvram sutam pañcadaśam ni siñcam	tīvra suta pañcadaśa ni sic
1027	na aham tam veda yaḥ iti bravīti	na mad tad vid yad iti brū
1027	adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān	a devayu samaraṇa han
1027	yadā avākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvat	yadā avakhyā samaraṇa ṛghāvat
1027	āt it ha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti	āt id ha mad vṛṣabha pra brū
1027	yat ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣu āsam	yat ajñāta vṛjana as
1027	viśve sataḥ maghavānaḥ me āsan	viśva satas maghavan mad as
1027	jināmi vā it kṣeme ā santam ābhum	jyā vā id kṣema ā as ābhu
1027	pra tam kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya	pra tad kṣi parvata pādagṛhya
1027	na vai u mām vṛjane vārayante	na vai u mad vṛjana vāray
1027	na parvatāsaḥ yat aham manasye	na parvata yat mad manasy
1027	mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇaḥ bhayāte	mad svana kṛdhukarṇa bhī
1027	eva it anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt	eva id anu div kiraṇa sam ej
1027	darśan nu atra śṛtapān anindrān	dṛś nu atra śṛtapā an indra
1027	bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān	bāhukṣad śaru pat
1027	ghṛṣum vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam	ghṛṣu vā yad nind sakhi
1027	adhi ū nu eṣu pavayaḥ vavṛtyuḥ	adhi ū nu idam pavi vṛt
1027	abhūḥ u aukṣīḥ vi u āyuḥ ānaT	bhū u vakṣ vi u āyus naś
1027	darṣat nu pūrvaḥ aparaḥ nu darṣat	dṛ nu pūrva apara nu dṛ
1027	dve pavaste pari tam na bhūtaḥ	dvi pavasta pari tad na bhū
1027	yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ viveṣa	yad idam pāra rajas viṣ
1027	gāvaḥ yavam prayutāḥ aryaḥ akṣan	go yava prayuta ari ghas
1027	tāḥ apaśyam sahagopāḥ carantīḥ	tad paś saha gopā car
1027	havāḥ it aryaḥ abhitaḥ sam āyan	hava id ari abhitas sam i
1027	kiyat āsu svapatiḥ chandayāte	kiyat idam sva pati chanday
1027	sam yat vayam yavasādaḥ janānām	sam yat vī yavasād jana
1027	aham yavādaḥ urvajre antar	mad yavād urvajra antar
1027	atrā yuktaḥ avasātāram icchāt	atra yuj avasātṛ iṣ
1027	atha u ayuktam yunajat vavanvān	atho ayukta yuj van
1027	atra it u me maṁsase satyam uktam	atra id u mad man satya vac
1027	dvipāt ca yat catuṣpāt saṁsṛjāni	dvipād ca yat catuṣpād saṃsṛj
1027	strībhiḥ yaḥ atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyāt	strī yad atra vṛṣaṇa pṛtany
1027	ayuddhaḥ asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ	a yudh idam vi bhaj vedas
1027	yasya anakṣā duhitā jātu āsa	yad anakṣa duhitṛ jātu as
1027	kaḥ tām vidvān abhi manyāte andhām	ka tad vid abhi man andha
1027	kataraḥ menim prati tam mucāte	katara meni prati tad muc
1027	yaḥ īm vahāte yaḥ īm vā vareyāt	yad īṃ vah yad īṃ vā varey
1027	kiyatī yoṣā maryataḥ vadhūyoḥ	kiyat yoṣā marya vadhūyu
1027	pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa	pariprī panyas vārya
1027	bhadrā vadhūḥ bhavati yat supeśāḥ	bhadra vadhū bhū yat su peśas
1027	svayam sā mitram vanute jane cit	svayam tad mitra van jana cit
1027	pattaḥ jagāra pratyañcam atti	pattas gṛ pratyañc ad
1027	śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham	śīrṣan śiras prati varūtha
1027	āsīnaḥ ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti	ās ūrdhva upas kṣi
1027	nyaṅ uttānām anu eti bhūmim	nyāñc uttāna anu i bhūmi
1027	bṛhan acchāyaḥ apalāśaḥ arvā	bṛhat acchāya a palāśa arvan
1027	tasthau mātā viṣitaḥ atti garbhaḥ	sthā mātṛ viṣita ad garbha
1027	anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya	anya vatsa rih mā
1027	kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenuḥ ūdhar	ka bhū ni dhā dhenu ūdhas
1027	sapta vīrāsaḥ adharāt ut āyan	saptan vīra adharāt ud i
1027	aṣTa uttarāttāt sam ajagmiran te	aṣṭan uttarāttāt sam gam tad
1027	nava paścātāt sthivimantaḥ āyan	navan paścātāt sthivimat i
1027	daśa prāk sānu vi tiranti aśnaḥ	daśan prāk sānu vi tṛ aśan
1027	daśānām ekam kapilam samānam	daśan eka kapila samāna
1027	tam hinvanti kratave pāryāya	tad hi kratu pārya
1027	garbham mātā sudhitam vakṣaṇāsu	garbha mātṛ su dhita vakṣaṇā
1027	avenantam tuṣayantī bibharti	a ven tuṣay bhṛ
1027	pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrāḥ	pīvas meṣa pac vīra
1027	nyuptāḥ akṣāḥ anu dīve āsan	nivap akṣa anu dīv as
1027	dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsu antar	dvi dhanū bṛhat ap antar
1027	pavitravantā carataḥ punantā	pavitravat car pū
1027	vi krośanāsaḥ viṣvañcaḥ āyan	vi krośana viṣvañc i
1027	pacāti nemaḥ nahi pakṣat ardhaḥ	pac nema na hi pac ardha
1027	ayam me devaḥ savitā tat āha	idam mad deva savitṛ tad ah
1027	drvannaḥ it vanavat sarpirannaḥ	dru anna id van sarpis anna
1027	apaśyam grāmam vahamānam ārāt	paś grāma vah ārāt
1027	acakrayā svadhayā vartamānam	a cakra svadhā vṛt
1027	siṣakti aryaḥ pra yugā janānām	sac ari pra yuga jana
1027	sadyaḥ śiśnā praminānaḥ navīyān	sadyas śiśna pramī navīyas
1027	etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau	etad mad go pramara yuj
1027	mā u su pra sedhīḥ muhuḥ it mamandhi	mā u su pra sidh muhur id man
1027	āpaḥ cit asya vi naśanti artham	ap cit idam vi naś artha
1027	sūraḥ ca markaḥ uparaḥ babhūvān	svar ca marka upara bhū
1027	ayam yaḥ vajraḥ purudhā vivṛttaḥ	idam yad vajra purudhā vivṛt
1027	avaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt	avas sūrya bṛhat purīṣa
1027	śravaḥ it enā paraḥ anyat asti	śravas id enā paras anya as
1027	tat avyathī jarimāṇaḥ taranti	tad avyathi jariman tṛ
1027	vṛkṣevṛkṣe niyatā mīmayat gauḥ	vṛkṣa vṛkṣa niyam mā go
1027	tataḥ vayaḥ pra patān pūruṣādaḥ	tatas vi pra pat pūruṣa ad
1027	atha idam viśvam bhuvanam bhayāte	atha idam viśva bhuvana bhī
1027	indrāya sunvat ṛṣaye ca śikṣat	indra su ṛṣi ca śikṣ
1027	devānām māne prathamāḥ atiṣThan	deva māna prathama sthā
1027	kṛntatrāt eṣām uparāḥ ut āyan	kṛntatra idam upara ud i
1027	trayaḥ tapanti pṛthivīm anūpāḥ	tri tap pṛthivī anūpa
1027	dvā bṛbūkam vahataḥ purīṣam	dvi bṛbūka vah purīṣa
1027	sā te jīvātuḥ uta tasya viddhi	tad tvad jīvātu uta tad vid
1027	mā sma etādṛk apa gūhaḥ samarye	mā sma etādṛś apa guh samarya
1027	āviḥ svar kṛṇute gūhate busam	āvis svar kṛ guh busa
1027	sa pāduḥ asya nirṇijaḥ na mucyate	tad pādu idam nirṇij na muc
 ---
1028	viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ ariḥ ājagāma	viśva hi anya ari āgam
1028	mama it aha śvaśuraḥ na ā jagāma	mad id aha śvaśura na ā gam
1028	jakṣīyāt dhānāḥ uta somam papīyāt	ghas dhānā uta soma pā
1028	svāśitaḥ punar astam jagāyāt	su āśay punar asta gā
1028	sa roruvat vṛṣabhaḥ tigmaśṛṅgaḥ	tad roro vṛṣabha tigma śṛṅga
1028	varṣman tasthau variman ā pṛthivyāḥ	varṣman sthā variman ā pṛthivī
1028	viśveṣu enam vṛjaneṣu pāmi	viśva enad vṛjana pā
1028	yaḥ me kukṣī sutasomaḥ pṛṇāti	yad mad kukṣi su soma pṛ
1028	adriṇā te mandinaḥ indra tūyān	adri tvad mandin indra tūya
1028	sunvanti somān pibasi tvam eṣām	su soma pā tvad idam
1028	pacanti te vṛṣabhān atsi teṣām	pac tvad vṛṣabha ad tad
1028	pṛkṣeṇa yat maghavan hūyamānaḥ	pṛkṣa i maghavan hu
1028	idam su me jaritar ā cikiddhi	idam su mad jaritṛ ā cit
1028	pratīpam śāpam nadyaḥ vahanti	pratīpa śāpa nadī vah
1028	lopāśaḥ siṁham pratyañcam atsār	lopāśa siṃha pratyañc tsar
1028	kroṣTā varāham niḥ atakta kakṣāt	kroṣṭṛ varāha niḥ tak kakṣa
1028	kathā te etat aham ā ciketam	kathā tvad etad mad ā cit
1028	gṛtsasya pākaḥ tavasaḥ manīṣām	gṛtsa pāka tavas manīṣā
1028	tvam naḥ vidvān ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ	tvad mad vid ṛtuthā vi vac
1028	yam ardham te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ	yad ardha tvad maghavan kṣemya dhū
1028	evā hi mām tavasam vardhayanti	eva hi mad tavas vardhay
1028	divaḥ cit me bṛhataḥ uttarā dhūḥ	div cit mad bṛhat uttara dhū
1028	purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam	puru sahasra ni śā sākam
1028	aśatrum hi mā janitā jajāna	aśatru hi mad janitṛ jan
1028	evā hi mām tavasam jajñuḥ ugram	eva hi mad tavas jñā ugra
1028	karmankarman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ	karman karman vṛṣan indra deva
1028	vadhīm vṛtram vajreṇa mandasānaḥ	vadh vṛtra vajra mand
1028	apa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam	apa vraja mahi dāś vṛ
1028	devāsaḥ āyan paraśūn abibhran	deva i paraśu bhṛ
1028	vanā vṛścantaḥ abhi viḍbhiḥ āyan	vana vraśc abhi viś i
1028	ni sudrvam dadhataḥ vakṣaṇāsu	ni su dru dhā vakṣaṇā
1028	yatrā kṛpīTam anu tat dahanti	yatra kṛpīṭa anu tad dah
1028	śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcam jagāra	śaśa kṣura pratyañc gṛ
1028	adrim logena vi abhedam ārāt	adri loga vi bhid ārāt
1028	bṛhantam cit ṛhate randhayāni	bṛhat cit ṛhat randhay
1028	vayat vatsaḥ vṛṣabham śūśuvānaḥ	vī vatsa vṛṣabha śvi
1028	suparṇaḥ itthā nakham ā siṣāya	suparṇa itthā nakha ā sā
1028	avaruddhaḥ paripadam na siṁhaḥ	avarudh paripad na siṃha
1028	niruddhaḥ cit mahiṣaḥ tarṣyāvān	nirudh cit mahiṣa tarṣyāvat
1028	godhā tasmai ayatham karṣat etat	godhā tad ayatha kṛṣ etad
1028	tebhyaḥ godhāḥ ayatham karṣat etat	tad godhā ayatha kṛṣ etad
1028	ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanti annaiḥ	yad brahman pratipī anna
1028	sime ukṣṇaḥ avasṛṣTān adanti	sima ukṣan avasṛj ad
1028	svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ	svayam bala tanū śṛ
1028	ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan	etad śamī suśamī bhū
1028	ye hinvire tanvaḥ some ukthaiḥ	yad hi tanū soma uktha
1028	nṛvat vadan upa naḥ māhi vājān	nṛ vat vad upa mad mā vāja
1028	divi śravaḥ dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ	div śravas dhā nāman vīra
 ---
1029	vane na vā yaḥ ni adhāyi cākan	vana na vā yad ni dhā kan
1029	śuciḥ vām stomaḥ bhuraṇau ajīgar	śuci tvad stoma bhuraṇa jāgṛ
1029	yasya it indraḥ purudineṣu hotā	yad id indra puru dina hotṛ
1029	nṛṇām naryaḥ nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān	nṛ narya nṛtama kṣapāvant
1029	pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ	pra tvad idam uṣas pra apara
1029	nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām	nṛti as nṛtama nṛ
1029	anu triśokaḥ śatam ā avahan nṛṛn	anu triśoka śata āvah nṛ
1029	kutsena rathaḥ yaḥ asat sasavān	kutsa ratha yad as san
1029	kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt	ka tvad mada indra rantya bhū
1029	duraḥ giraḥ abhi ugraḥ vi dhāva	dvār gir abhi ugra vi dhāv
1029	kat vāhaḥ arvāk upa mā manīṣā	ka vāhas arvāk upa mad manīṣā
1029	ā tvā śakyām upamam rādhaḥ annaiḥ	ā tvad śak upama rādhas anna
1029	kat u dyumnam indra tvāvataḥ nṛṛn	ka u dyumna indra tvāvat nṛ
1029	kayā dhiyā karase kat naḥ ā agan	ka dhī kṛ kad mad āgam
1029	mitraḥ na satyaḥ urugāya bhṛtyai	mitra na satya urugāya bhṛti
1029	anne samasya yat asan manīṣāḥ	anna sama yat as manīṣā
1029	pra īraya sūraḥ artham na pāram	preray sūra artha na pāra
1029	ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ iva gman	yad idam kāma janidhā iva gam
1029	giraḥ ca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīḥ	gir ca yad tvad tuvi jan puru
1029	naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ	nṛ indra pratiśikṣ anna
1029	mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī	mātrā nu tvad su mā indra puru
1029	dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena	div majman pṛthivī kāvya
1029	varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ	vara tvad ghṛtavat suta
1029	svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni	svādman bhū pīti madhu
1029	ā madhvaḥ asmai asican amatram	ā madhu idam sic amatra
1029	indrāya pūrṇam sa hi satyarādhāḥ	indra pṛ tad hi satya rādhas
1029	sa vāvṛdhe variman ā pṛthivyāḥ	tad vṛdh variman ā pṛthivī
1029	abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṁsyaiḥ ca	abhi kratu narya pauṃsya ca
1029	vi ānaT indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojāḥ	vi naś indra pṛtanā su ojas
1029	ā asmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ	ā idam yat sakhya puru
1029	ā smā ratham na pṛtanāsu tiṣTha	ā sma ratha na pṛtanā sthā
1029	yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse	yad bhadra sumati coday
 ---
1030	pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātuḥ etu	pra devatrā brahman gātu i
1030	apaḥ acchā manasaḥ na prayukti	ap acchā manas na prayukti
1030	mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim	mah mitra varuṇa dhāsi
1030	pṛthujrayase rīradhā suvṛktim	pṛthu jrayas radh suvṛkti
1030	adhvaryavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ hi bhūta	adhvaryu haviṣmat hi bhū
1030	accha apaḥ ita uśatīḥ uśantaḥ	acchā ap i vaś vaś
1030	ava yāḥ caṣTe aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ	ava yad cakṣ aruṇa suparṇa
1030	tam ā asyadhvam ūrmim adyā suhastāḥ	tad ās ūrmi adya su hasta
1030	adhvaryavaḥ apaḥ itā samudram	adhvaryu apa i samudra
1030	apām napātam haviṣā yajadhvam	ap napāt havis yaj
1030	sa vaḥ dadat ūrmim adyā supūtam	tad tvad dā ūrmi adya su pū
1030	tasmai somam madhumantam sunota	tad soma madhumat su
1030	yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar	yad anidhma dīdī ap antar
1030	yam viprāsaḥ īLate adhvareṣu	yad vipra īḍ adhvara
1030	apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ	ap napāt madhumat ap dā
1030	yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāya	yad indra vṛdh vīrya
1030	yābhiḥ somaḥ modate harṣate ca	yad soma mud hṛṣ ca
1030	kalyāṇībhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ na maryaḥ	kalyāṇa yuvati na marya
1030	tāḥ adhvaryo apaḥ acchā parā ihi	tad adhvaryu ap acchā pare
1030	yat āsiñcāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt	yat āsic oṣadhī pū
1030	eva it yūne yuvatayaḥ namanta	eva id yuvan yuvati nam
1030	yat īm uśan uśatīḥ eti accha	yat īṃ vaś vaś i acchā
1030	sam jānate manasā sam cikitre	sam jñā manas sam cit
1030	adhvaryavaḥ dhiṣaṇā āpaḥ ca devīḥ	adhvaryu dhiṣaṇā ap ca deva
1030	yaḥ vaḥ vṛtābhyaḥ akṛṇot ulokam	yad tvad vṛ kṛ u loka
1030	yaḥ vaḥ mahyāḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcat	yad tvad mahi abhiśasti muc
1030	tasmai indrāya madhumantam ūrmim	tad indra madhumat ūrmi
1030	devamādanam pra hinotana āpaḥ	deva mādana pra hi ap
1030	pra asmai hinota madhumantam ūrmim	pra idam hi madhumat ūrmi
1030	garbhaḥ yaḥ vaḥ sindhavaḥ madhvaḥ utsaḥ	garbha yad tvad sindhu madhu utsa
1030	ghṛtapṛṣTham īḍyam adhvareṣu	ghṛta pṛṣṭha īḍ adhvara
1030	āpaḥ revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me	ap revat śru hava mad
1030	tam sindhavaḥ matsaram indrapānam	tad sindhu matsara indra pāna
1030	ūrmim pra heta yaḥ ubhe iyarti	ūrmi pra hi yad ubh ṛch
1030	madacyutam auśānam nabhojām	mada cyut auśāna nabhas jā
1030	pari tritantum vicarantam utsam	pari tri tantu vicar utsa
1030	āvarvṛtatīḥ adha nu dvidhārāḥ	āvarvṛt adha nu dvi dhārā
1030	goṣuyudhaḥ na niyavam carantīḥ	goṣuyudh na niyava car
1030	ṛṣe janitrīḥ bhuvanasya patnīḥ	ṛṣi janitrī bhuvana patnī
1030	apaḥ vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ	ap vand savṛdh sayoni
1030	hinotā naḥ adhvaram devayajyā	hi mad adhvara deva yajya
1030	hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām	hi brahman sani dhana
1030	ṛtasya yoge vi syadhvam ūdhar	ṛta yoga vi sā ūdhas
1030	śruṣTīvarīḥ bhūtana asmabhyam āpaḥ	śruṣṭīvan bhū mad ap
1030	āpaḥ revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ	ap revat kṣi hi vasu
1030	kratum ca bhadram bibhṛtha amṛtam ca	kratu ca bhadra bhṛ amṛta ca
1030	rāyaḥ ca stha svapatyasya patnīḥ	rai ca as su apatya patnī
1030	sarasvatī tat gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāt	sarasvatī tad gṛ vayas dhā
1030	prati yat āpaḥ adṛśram āyatīḥ	prati yat ap dṛś e
1030	ghṛtam payāṁsi bibhratīḥ madhūni	ghṛta payas bhṛ madhu
1030	adhvaryubhiḥ manasā saṁvidānāḥ	adhvaryu manas saṃvid
1030	indrāya somam suṣutam bharantīḥ	indra soma su su bhṛ
1030	ā imāḥ agman revatīḥ jīvadhanyāḥ	ā idam gam revat jīva dhanya
1030	adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ	adhvaryu sāday sakhi
1030	ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāsaḥ	ni barhis dhā somya
1030	apām naptrā saṁvidānāsaḥ enāḥ	ap naptṛ saṃvid enad
1030	ā agman āpaḥ uśatīḥ barhiḥ ā idam	āgam ap vaś barhis ā idam
1030	ni adhvare asadan devayantīḥ	ni adhvara sad devay
1030	adhvaryavaḥ sunuta indrāya somam	adhvaryu su indra soma
1030	abhūt u vaḥ suśakā devayajyā	bhū u tvad suśaka deva yajya
 ---
1031	ā naḥ devānām upa vetu śaṁsaḥ	ā mad deva upa vī śaṃsa
1031	viśvebhiḥ turaiḥ avase yajatraḥ	viśva tura av yajatra
1031	tebhiḥ vayam suṣakhāyaḥ bhavema	tad mad su sakhi bhū
1031	tarantaḥ viśvā duritā syāma	tṛ viśva durita as
1031	pari cit martaḥ draviṇam mamanyāt	pari cit marta draviṇa man
1031	ṛtasya pathā namasā ā vivāset	ṛta pathin namas vivās
1031	uta svena kratunā sam vadeta	uta sva kratu sam vad
1031	śreyāṁsam dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt	śreyas dakṣa manas grah
1031	adhāyi dhītiḥ asasṛgram aṁśāḥ	dhā dhīti sṛj aṃśa
1031	tīrthe na dasmam upa yanti ūmāḥ	tīrtha na dasma upa i ūma
1031	abhi ānaśma suvitasya śūṣam	abhi aś suvita śūṣa
1031	navedasaḥ amṛtānām abhūma	navedas amṛta bhū
1031	nityaḥ cākanyāt svapatiḥ damūnāḥ	nitya kan sva pati damūnas
1031	yasmai u devaḥ savitā jajāna	yad u deva savitṛ jan
1031	bhagaḥ vā gobhiḥ aryamā īm anajyāt	bhaga vā go aryaman īṃ añj
1031	saḥ asmai cāruḥ chadayat uta syāt	tad idam cāru chaday uta as
1031	iyam sā bhūyāḥ uṣasām iva kṣāḥ	idam tad bhū uṣas iva kṣā
1031	yat ha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan	yat ha kṣumat śavas sami
1031	asya stutim jarituḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ	idam stuti jaritṛ bhikṣ
1031	ā naḥ śagmāsaḥ upa yantu vājāḥ	ā mad śagma upa i vāja
1031	asya it eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānā	idam id etad sumati prath
1031	abhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ	bhū pūrvya bhūman go
1031	asya sanīLāḥ asurasya yonau	idam sanīḍa asura yoni
1031	samāne ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ	samāna ā bharaṇa bhṛ
1031	kim svit vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa	ka svid vana ka u tad vṛkṣa as
1031	yataḥ dyāvāpṛthivī niṣTatakṣuḥ	yatas dyāvāpṛthivī nistakṣ
1031	saṁtasthāne ajare itaūtī	saṃsthā ajara itaūti
1031	ahāni pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ jaranta	ahar puru uṣas jṛ
1031	na etāvat enā paraḥ anyat asti	na etāvat enā paras anya as
1031	ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti	ukṣan tad dyāvāpṛthivī bhṛ
1031	tvacam pavitram kṛṇuta svadhāvān	tvac pavitra kṛ svadhāvat
1031	yat īm sūryam na haritaḥ vahanti	yat īṃ sūrya na harit vah
1031	stegaḥ na kṣām ati eti pṛthvīm	stega na kṣā ati i pṛthu
1031	miham na vātaḥ vi ha vāti bhūma	mih na vāta vi ha vā bhūman
1031	mitraḥ yatra varuṇaḥ ajyamānaḥ	mitra yatra varuṇa añj
1031	agniḥ vane na vi asṛṣTa śokam	agni vana na vi sṛj śoka
1031	starīḥ yat sūta sadyaḥ ajyamānā	starī yat sū sadyas añj
1031	vyathiḥ avyathīḥ kṛṇuta svagopā	vyathi a vyathi kṛ sva gopā
1031	putraḥ yat pūrvaḥ pitroḥ janiṣTa	putra yat pūrva pitṛ jan
1031	śamyām gauḥ jagāra yat ha pṛcchān	śamyā go gṛ yat ha pracch
1031	uta kaṇvam nṛṣadaḥ putram āhuḥ	uta kaṇva nṛṣad putra ah
1031	uta śyāvaḥ dhanam ā adatta vājī	uta śyāva dhana ādā vājin
1031	pra kṛṣṇāya ruśat apinvata ūdhar	pra kṛṣṇa ruśat pinv ūdhas
1031	ṛtam atra nakiḥ asmai apīpet	ṛta atra nakir idam pyā
 ---
1032	pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi	pra su gam dhiyasāna sac
1032	varebhiḥ varān abhi su prasīdataḥ	vara vara abhi su prasad
1032	asmākam indraḥ ubhayam jujoṣati	mad indra ubhaya juṣ
1032	yat somyasya andhasaḥ bubodhati	yat somya andhas budh
1032	vi indra yāsi divyāni rocanā	vi indra yā divya rocana
1032	vi pārthivāni rajasā puruṣTuta	vi pārthiva rajas puruṣṭuta
1032	ye tvā vahanti muhuḥ adhvarān upa	yad tvad vah muhur adhvara upa
1032	te su vanvantu vagvanān arādhasaḥ	tad su van vagvana arādhas
1032	tat it me chantsat vapuṣaḥ vapuṣTaram	tad id mad chand vapus vapuṣṭara
1032	putraḥ yat jānam pitroḥ adhīyati	putra yat jāna pitṛ adhī
1032	jāyā patim vahati vagnunā sumat	jāyā pati vah vagnu sumat
1032	puṁsaḥ it bhadraḥ vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ	puṃs id bhadra vahatu pariṣkṛ
1032	tat it sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya	tad id sadhastha abhi cāru dhī
