1032	gāvaḥ yat śāsan vahatum na dhenavaḥ	go yad śās vahatu na dhenu
1032	mātā yat mantuḥ yūthasya pūrvyā	mātṛ yad mantu yūtha pūrvya
1032	abhi vāṇasya saptadhātuḥ it janaḥ	abhi vāṇa saptan dhātu id jana
1032	pra vaḥ acchā ririce devayuḥ padam	pra tvad acchā ric devayu pada
1032	ekaḥ rudrebhiḥ yāti turvaṇiḥ	eka rudra yā turvaṇi
1032	jarā vā yeṣu amṛteṣu dāvane	jarā vā yad amṛta dā
1032	pari vaḥ ūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu	pari tvad ūma sic madhu
1032	nidhīyamānam apagūLham apsu	nidhā apaguh ap
1032	pra me devānām vratapāḥ uvāca	pra mad deva vrata pā vac
1032	indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa	indra vid anu hi tvad cakṣ
1032	tena aham agne anuśiṣTaḥ ā agām	tad mad agni anuśās āgā
1032	akṣetravit kṣetravidam hi aprāT	a kṣetra vid kṣetra vid hi pracch
1032	sa pra eti kṣetravidā anuśiṣTaḥ	tad pre kṣetra vid anuśās
1032	etat vai bhadram anuśāsanasya	etad vai bhadra anuśāsana
1032	uta srutim vindati añjasīnām	uta sruti vid añjasīna
1032	adya it u pra ānīt amaman imā ahā	adya id u prāṇ man idam aha
1032	apīvṛtaḥ adhayat mātuḥ ūdhar	apivṛ dhā mātṛ ūdhas
1032	ā īm enam āpa jarimā yuvānam	ā īṃ enad āp jariman yuvan
1032	aheLan vasuḥ sumanāḥ babhūva	a hīḍ vasu su manas bhū
1032	etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma	etad bhadra kalaśa kṛ
1032	kuruśravaṇa dadataḥ maghāni	kuruśravaṇa dā magha
1032	dānaḥ it vaḥ maghavānaḥ saḥ astu	dāna id tvad maghavan tad as
1032	ayam ca somaḥ hṛdi yam bibharmi	idam ca soma hṛd yad bhṛ
 ---
1033	pra mā yuyujre prayujaḥ janānām	pra mad yuj prayuj jana
1033	vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa	vah sma pūṣan antareṇa
1033	viśve devāsaḥ adha mām arakṣan	viśva deva adha mad rakṣ
1033	duḥśāsuḥ ā agāt iti ghoṣaḥ āsīt	duḥśāsus āgā iti ghoṣa as
1033	sam mā tapanti abhitaḥ	sam mad tap abhitas
1033	sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ	sapatnī iva parśu
1033	ni bādhate amatiḥ nagnatā jasuḥ	ni bādh amati nagnatā jasu
1033	veḥ na vevīyate matiḥ	vi na vevīy mati
1033	mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vi adanti mā ādhyaḥ	mūṣa na śiśna vi ad stotṛ
1033	stotāram te śatakrato	stotṛ tvad śatakratu
1033	sakṛt su naḥ maghavan indra mṛLaya	sakṛt su mad maghavan indra mṛḍay
1033	adhā pitā iva naḥ bhava	adha pitṛ iva mad bhū
1033	kuruśravaṇam āvṛṇi	kuruśravaṇa āvṛ
1033	rājānam trāsadasyavam	rājan trāsadasyava
1033	maṁhiṣTham vāghatām ṛṣiḥ	maṃhiṣṭha vāghant ṛṣi
1033	yasya mā haritaḥ rathe	yad mad harit ratha
1033	tisraḥ vahanti sādhuyā	tri vah sādhuyā
1033	stavai sahasradakṣiṇe	stu sahasradakṣin
1033	yasya prasvādasaḥ giraḥ	yad prasvādas gir
1033	upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ	upamaśravas pitṛ
1033	kṣetram na raṇvam ūcuṣe	kṣetra na raṇva vac
1033	adhi putra upamaśravaḥ	adhi putra upamaśravas
1033	napāt mitrātitheḥ ihi	napāt mitrātithi i
1033	pituḥ te asmi vanditā	pitṛ tvad as vanditṛ
1033	yat īśīya amṛtānām	yat īś amṛta
1033	uta vā martyānām	uta vā martya
1033	jīvet it maghavā mama	jīv id maghavan mad
1033	na devānām ati vratam	na deva ati vrata
1033	śatātmā cana jīvati	śata ātman cana jīv
1033	tathā yujā vi vāvṛte	tathā yuj vi vṛt
 ---
1034	prāvepāḥ mā bṛhataḥ mādayanti	prāvepa mad bṛhat māday
1034	pravātejāḥ iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ	pravātejā iriṇa varvṛt
1034	somasya iva maujavatasya bhakṣaḥ	soma iva maujavata bhakṣa
1034	vibhīdakaḥ jāgṛviḥ mahyam acchān	vibhīdaka jāgṛvi mad chand
1034	na mā mimetha na jihīLe eṣā	na mad mith na hīḍ etad
1034	śivā sakhibhyaḥ uta mahyam āsīt	śiva sakhi uta mad as
1034	akṣasya aham ekaparasya hetoḥ	akṣa mad eka para hetu
1034	anuvratām apa jāyām arodham	anuvrata apa jāyā rudh
1034	dveṣTi śvaśrūḥ apa jāyā ruṇaddhi	dviṣ śvaśrū apa jāyā rudh
1034	na nāthitaḥ vindate marḍitāram	na nāth vid marḍitṛ
1034	aśvasya iva jarataḥ vasnyasya	aśva iva jṛ vasnya
1034	na aham vindāmi kitavasya bhogam	na mad vid kitava bhoga
1034	anye jāyām pari mṛśanti asya	anya jāyā pari mṛś idam
1034	yasya agṛdhat vedane vājī akṣaḥ	yad gṛdh vedana vājin akṣa
1034	pitā mātā bhrātaraḥ enam āhuḥ	pitṛ mātṛ bhrātṛ enad ah
1034	na jānīmaḥ nayatā baddham etam	na jñā nī bandh etad
1034	yat ādīdhye na daviṣāṇi ebhiḥ	yat ā dhī na dīv idam
1034	parāyadbhyaḥ ava hīye sakhibhyaḥ	pare ava hā sakhi
1034	nyuptāḥ ca babhravaḥ vācam akrata	nivap ca babhru vāc kṛ
1034	emi it eṣām niṣkṛtam jāriṇī iva	i id idam niṣkṛta jāriṇī iva
1034	sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamānaḥ	sabhā i kitava pracch
1034	jeṣyāmi iti tanvā śūśujānaḥ	ji iti tanū śuj
1034	akṣāsaḥ asya vi tiranti kāmam	akṣa idam vi tṛ kāma
1034	pratidīvne dadhataḥ ā kṛtāni	pratidīvan dhā ā kṛta
1034	akṣāsaḥ it aṅkuśinaḥ nitodinaḥ	akṣa id aṅkuśin nitodin
1034	nikṛtvānaḥ tapanāḥ tāpayiṣṇavaḥ	nikṛtvan tapana tāpayiṣṇu
1034	kumāradeṣṇāḥ jayataḥ punarhaṇaḥ	kumāra deṣṇa ji punarhan
1034	madhvā sampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā	madhu sampṛc kitava barhaṇā
1034	tripañcāśaḥ krīLati vrātaḥ eṣām	tripañcāśa krīḍ vrāta idam
1034	devaḥ iva savitā satyadharmā	deva iva savitṛ satya dharman
1034	ugrasya cit manyave na ā namante	ugra cit manyu na nam
1034	rājā cit ebhyaḥ namaḥ it kṛṇoti	rājan cit idam namas id kṛ
1034	nīcā vartante upari sphuranti	nīca vṛt upari sphur
1034	ahastāsaḥ hastavantam sahante	ahasta hastavat sah
1034	divyāḥ aṅgārāḥ iriṇe nyuptāḥ	divya aṅgāra iriṇa nivap
1034	śītāḥ santaḥ hṛdayam niḥ dahanti	śīta as hṛdaya niḥ dah
1034	jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā	jāyā tap kitava hā
1034	mātā putrasya carataḥ kva svit	mātṛ putra car kva svid
1034	ṛṇāvā bibhyat dhanam icchamānaḥ	ṛṇāvan bhī dhana iṣ
1034	anyeṣām astam upa naktam eti	anya asta upa nakta i
1034	striyam dṛṣTvāya kitavam tatāpa	strī dṛś kitava tap
1034	anyeṣām jāyām sukṛtam ca yonim	anya jāyā su kṛ ca yoni
1034	pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn	pūrvāhṇa aśva yuj hi babhru
1034	saḥ agneḥ ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda	tad agni anta vṛṣala pad
1034	yaḥ vaḥ senānīḥ mahataḥ gaṇasya	yad tvad senānī mahat gaṇa
1034	rājā vrātasya prathamaḥ babhūva	rājan vrāta prathama bhū
1034	tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi	tad kṛ na dhana rudh
1034	daśa aham prācīḥ tat ṛtam vadāmi	daśan mad prāñc tad ṛta vad
1034	akṣaiḥ mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣim it kṛṣasva	akṣa mā dīv kṛṣi id kṛṣ
1034	vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ	vitta ram bahu man
1034	tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā	tatra go kitava tatra jāyā
1034	tat me vi caṣTe savitā ayam aryaḥ	tad mad vi cakṣ savitṛ idam ari
1034	mitram kṛṇudhvam khalu mṛLatā naḥ	mitra kṛ khalu mṛḍ mad
1034	mā naḥ ghoreṇa carata abhi dhṛṣṇu	mā mad ghora car abhi dhṛṣṇu
1034	ni vaḥ nu manyuḥ viśatām arātiḥ	ni tvad nu manyu viś arāti
1034	anyaḥ babhrūṇām prasitau nu astu	anya babhru prasiti nu as
 ---
1035	abudhram u tye indravantaḥ agnayaḥ	budh u tya indravat agni
1035	jyotiḥ bharantaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	jyotis bhṛ uṣas vyuṣṭi
1035	mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apaḥ	mahi dyāvāpṛthivī cit apas
1035	adyā devānām avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe	adya deva avas ā vṛ
1035	divaspṛthivyoḥ avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe	divaspṛthivī avas ā vṛ
1035	mātṛṛn sindhūn parvatān śaryaṇāvataḥ	mātṛ sindhu parvata śaryaṇāvant
1035	anāgāstvam sūryam uṣāsam īmahe	anāgāstva sūrya uṣas ī
1035	bhadram somaḥ suvānaḥ adyā kṛṇotu naḥ	bhadra soma su adya kṛ mad
1035	dyāvā naḥ adya pṛthivī anāgasaḥ	div mad adya pṛthivī anāgas
1035	mahī trāyetām suvitāya mātarā	mahi trā suvita mātṛ
1035	uṣāḥ ucchantī apa bādhatām agham	uṣas vas apa bādh agha
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	iyam naḥ usrā prathamā sudevyam	idam mad usrā prathama sudevya
1035	revat sanibhyaḥ revatī vi ucchatu	revat sani revat vi vas
1035	āre manyum durvidatrasya dhīmahi	āre manyu durvidatra dhā
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhiḥ	pra yad sṛ sūrya raśmi
1035	jyotiḥ bharantīḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	jyotis bhṛ uṣas vyuṣṭi
1035	bhadrāḥ naḥ adya śravase vi ucchata	bhadra mad adya śravas vi vas
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	anamīvāḥ uṣasaḥ ā carantu naḥ	anamīva uṣas ā car mad
1035	ut agnayaḥ jihatām jyotiṣā bṛhat	ud agni hā jyotis bṛhat
1035	āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujim ratham	ā yuj aśvin tūtuji ratha
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	śreṣTham naḥ adya savitar vareṇyam	śreṣṭha mad adya savitṛ vareṇya
1035	bhāgam ā suva sa hi ratnadhāḥ asi	bhāga ā sū tad hi ratna dhā as
1035	rāyaḥ janitrīm dhiṣaṇām upa bruve	rai janitrī dhiṣaṇā upa brū
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	pipartu mā tat ṛtasya pravācanam	pṛ mad tad ṛta pravācana
1035	devānām yat manuṣyāḥ amanmahi	deva yad manuṣya man
1035	viśvāḥ it usrāḥ spaT ut eti sūryaḥ	viśva id usrā spaś ud i sūrya
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	adveṣaḥ adya barhiṣaḥ starīmaṇi	a dveṣas adya barhis starīman
1035	grāvṇām yoge manmanaḥ sādhe īmahe	grāvan yoga manman sādha ī
1035	ādityānām śarmaṇi sthāḥ bhuraṇyasi	āditya śarman sthā bhuraṇy
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	ā naḥ barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhat divi	ā mad barhis sadhamāda bṛhat div
1035	devān īLe sādayā sapta hotṛṛn	deva īḍ sāday saptan hotṛ
1035	indram mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagam	indra mitra varuṇa sāti bhaga
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	te ādityāḥ ā gatā sarvatātaye	tad āditya ā gam sarvatāti
1035	vṛdhe naḥ yajñam avatā sajoṣasaḥ	vṛdh mad yajña av sajoṣas
1035	bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagam	bṛhaspati pūṣan aśvin bhaga
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	tat naḥ devāḥ yacchata supravācanam	tad mad deva yam su pravācana
1035	chardiḥ ādityāḥ subharam nṛpāyyam	chardis āditya subhara nṛpāyya
1035	paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase	paśu toka tanaya jīv
1035	svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe	svasti agni sam indh ī
1035	viśve adya marutaḥ viśve ūtī	viśva adya marut viśva ūti
1035	viśve bhavantu agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ	viśva bhū agni sam indh
1035	viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā ā gamantu	viśva mad deva avas gam
1035	viśvam astu draviṇam vājaḥ asme	viśva as draviṇa vāja mad
1035	yam devāsaḥ avatha vājasātau	yad deva av vājasāti
1035	yam trāyadhve yam pipṛtha ati aṁhaḥ	yad trā yad pṛ ati aṃhas
1035	yaḥ vaḥ gopīthe na bhayasya veda	yad tvad gopītha na bhaya vid
1035	te syāma devavītaye turāsaḥ	tad as deva vīti tura
 ---
1036	uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā	uṣāsānaktā bṛhat supeśas
1036	dyāvākṣāmā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	dyāvākṣam varuṇa mitra aryaman
1036	indram huve marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ	indra hvā marut parvata ap
1036	ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar	āditya dyāvāpṛthivī ap svar
1036	dyauḥ ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasā	div ca mad pṛthivī ca pracetas
1036	ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṁhasaḥ riṣaḥ	ṛtāvan rakṣ aṃhas riṣ
1036	mā durvidatrā nirṛtiḥ naḥ īśata	mā durvidatra nirṛti mad īś
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	viśvasmāt naḥ aditiḥ pātu aṁhasaḥ	viśva mad aditi pā aṃhas
1036	mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ	mātṛ mitra varuṇa revat
1036	svarvat jyotiḥ avṛkam naśīmahi	svarvat jyotis avṛka naś
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	grāvā vadan apa rakṣāṁsi sedhatu	grāvan vad apa rakṣas sidh
1036	duṣvapnyam nirṛtim viśvam atriṇam	duḥṣvapnya nirṛti viśva atrin
1036	ādityam śarma marutām aśīmahi	āditya śarman marut aś
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	ā indraḥ barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iLā	ā indra barhis sad pinv iḍā
1036	bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhiḥ ṛkvaḥ arcatu	bṛhaspati sāman ṛkva arc
1036	supraketam jīvase manma dhīmahi	su praketa jīv manman dhā
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	divispṛśam yajñam asmākam aśvinā	divispṛś yajña mad aśvin
1036	jīrādhvaram kṛṇutam sumnam iṣTaye	jīra adhvara kṛ sumna iṣṭi
1036	prācīnaraśmim āhutam ghṛtena	prācīna raśmi āhu ghṛta
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	upa hvaye suhavam mārutam gaṇam	upa hvā su hava māruta gaṇa
1036	pāvakam ṛṣvam sakhyāya śambhuvam	pāvaka ṛṣva sakhya śambhū
1036	rāyaḥ poṣam sauśravasāya dhīmahi	rai poṣa sauśravasa dhā
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	apām perum jīvadhanyam bharāmahe	ap peru jīva dhanya bhṛ
1036	devāvyam suhavam adhvaraśriyam	devāvī su hava adhvara śrī
1036	suraśmim somam indriyam yamīmahi	su raśmi soma indriya yam
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhiḥ	san tad susanitā sanitvan
1036	vayam jīvāḥ jīvaputrāḥ anāgasaḥ	mad jīva jīva putra anāgas
1036	brahmadviṣaḥ viṣvak enaḥ bharerata	brahman dviṣ viṣvañc enas bhṛ
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	ye sthā manoḥ yajñiyāḥ te śṛṇotana	yad as manu yajñiya tad śru
1036	yat vaḥ devāḥ īmahe tat dadātana	yad tvad deva ī tad dā
1036	jaitram kratum rayimat vīravat yaśaḥ	jaitra kratu rayimat vīravat yaśas
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	mahat adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe	mahat adya mahat ā vṛ
1036	avaḥ devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām	avas deva bṛhat an arvan
1036	yathā vasu vīrajātam naśāmahai	yathā vasu vīra jan naś
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	mahaḥ agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇi	mah agni sam indh śarman
1036	anāgāḥ mitre varuṇe svastaye	anāga mitra varuṇa svasti
1036	śreṣThe syāma savituḥ savīmani	śreṣṭha as savitṛ savīman
1036	tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe	tad deva avas adya vṛ
1036	ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve	yad savitṛ satya sava viśva
1036	mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ	mitra vrata varuṇa deva
1036	te saubhagam vīravat gomat apnaḥ	tad saubhaga vīravat gomat apnas
1036	dadhātana draviṇam citram asme	dhā draviṇa citra mad
1036	savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt	savitṛ paścātāt savitṛ purastāt
1036	savitā uttarāttāt savitā adharāttāt	savitṛ uttarāttāt savitṛ adharāttāt
1036	savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātim	savitṛ mad sū sarvatāti
1036	savitā naḥ rāsatām dīrgham āyuḥ	savitṛ mad rā dīrgha āyus
 ---
1037	namaḥ mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase	namas mitra varuṇa cakṣas
1037	mahaḥ devāya tat ṛtam saparyata	mahas deva tad ṛta sapary
1037	dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave	dūredṛś deva jan ketu
1037	divaḥ putrāya sūryāya śaṁsata	div putra sūrya śaṃs
1037	sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvataḥ	tad mad satya ukti pari pā viśvatas
1037	dyāvā ca yatra tatanan ahāni ca	div ca yatra tan ahar ca
1037	viśvam anyat ni viśate yat ejati	viśva anya ni viś yad ej
1037	viśvāhā āpaḥ viśvāhā ut eti sūryaḥ	viśvāhā ap viśvāhā ud i sūrya
1037	na te adevaḥ pradivaḥ ni vāsate	na tvad a deva pradiv ni vās
1037	yat etaśebhiḥ pataraiḥ ratharyasi	yat etaśa patara rathary
1037	prācīnam anyat anu vartate rajaḥ	prācīna anya anu vṛt rajas
1037	ut anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya	ud anya jyotis yā sūrya
1037	yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamaḥ	yad sūrya jyotis bādh tamas
1037	jagat ca viśvam udiyarṣi bhānunā	jagant ca viśva ud ṛch bhānu
1037	tena asmat viśvām anirām anāhutim	tad mad viśva anirā anāhuti
1037	apa amīvām apa duṣvapnyam suva	apa amīvā apa duḥṣvapnya sū
1037	viśvasya hi preṣitaḥ rakṣasi vratam	viśva hi preṣ rakṣ vrata
1037	aheLayan uccarasi svadhāḥ anu	a heḍay uccar svadhā anu
1037	yat adya tvā sūrya upabravāmahai	yat adya tvad sūrya upabrū
1037	tam naḥ devāḥ anu maṁsīrata kratum	tad mad deva anu man kratu
1037	tam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī tat naḥ āpaḥ	tad mad dyāvāpṛthivī tad mad ap
1037	indraḥ śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam vacaḥ	indra śru marut hava vacas
1037	mā śūne bhūma sūryasya saṁdṛśi	mā śūna bhū sūrya saṃdṛś
1037	bhadram jīvantaḥ jaraṇām aśīmahi	bhadra jīv jaraṇā aś
1037	viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ	viśvāhā tvad su manas su cakṣas
1037	prajāvantaḥ anamīvāḥ anāgasaḥ	prajāvat anamīva anāgas
1037	udyantam tvā mitramahaḥ divedive	udi tvad mitra mahat diva diva
1037	jyok jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya	jyok jīva prati paś sūrya
1037	mahi jyotiḥ bibhratam tvā vicakṣaṇa	mahi jyotis bhṛ tvad vicakṣaṇa
1037	bhāsvantam cakṣuṣecakṣuṣe mayaḥ	bhāsvat cakṣus cakṣus mayas
1037	ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasaḥ pari	āruh bṛhat pājas pari
1037	vayam jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya	mad jīva prati paś sūrya
1037	yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā	yad tvad viśva bhuvana ketu
1037	pra ca īrate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ	pra ca īr ni ca viś aktu
1037	anāgāstvena harikeśa sūrya	anāgāstva hari keśa sūrya
1037	ahnāhnā naḥ vasyasāvasyasā ut ihi	ahar ahar mad vasyas vasyas ud i
1037	śam naḥ bhava cakṣasā śam naḥ ahnā	śam mad bhū cakṣas śam mad ahar
1037	śam bhānunā śam himā śam ghṛṇena	śam bhānu śam hima śam ghṛṇa
1037	yathā śam adhvan śam asat duroṇe	yathā śam adhvan śam as duroṇa
1037	tat sūrya draviṇam dhehi citram	tad sūrya draviṇa dhā citra
1037	asmākam devāḥ ubhayāya janmane	mad deva ubhaya janman
1037	śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade	śarman yam dvipad catuṣpada
1037	adat pibat ūrjayamānam āśitam	ad pā ūrjay āśay
1037	tat asme śam yoḥ arapaḥ dadhātana	tad mad śam yos arapas dhā
1037	yat vaḥ devāḥ cakṛma jihvayā guru	yad tvad deva kṛ jihvā guru
1037	manasaḥ vā prayutī devaheLanam	manas vā prayuti deva heḍana
1037	arāvā yaḥ naḥ abhi ducchunāyate	arāvan yad mad abhi duchunāy
1037	tasmin tat enaḥ vasavaḥ ni dhetana	tad tad enas vasu ni dhā
 ---
1038	asmin naḥ indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati	idam mad indra pṛtsuti yaśasvat
1038	śimīvati krandasi pra ava sātaye	śimīvat krandas pra av sāti
1038	yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu	yatra goṣāti dhṛṣ khādin
1038	viṣvak patanti didyavaḥ nṛṣāhye	viṣvañc pat didyu nṛṣāhya
1038	sa naḥ kṣumantam sadane vi ūrṇuhi	tad mad kṣumat sadana vi vṛ
1038	goarṇasam rayim indra śravāyyam	goarṇas rayi indra śravāyya
1038	syāma te jayataḥ śakra medinaḥ	as tvad ji śakra medin
1038	yathā vayam uśmasi tat vaso kṛdhi	yathā mad vaś tad vasu kṛ
1038	yaḥ naḥ dāsaḥ āryaḥ vā puruṣTuta	yad mad dāsa ārya vā puruṣṭuta
1038	adevaḥ indra yudhaye ciketati	deva indra yudh cit
1038	asmābhiḥ te suṣahāḥ santu śatravaḥ	mad tvad suṣaha as śatru
1038	tvayā vayam tān vanuyāma saṁgame	tvad mad tad van saṃgama
1038	yaḥ dabhrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhūribhiḥ	yad dabhra hvā yad ca bhūri
1038	yaḥ abhīke varivovit nṛṣāhye	yad abhīka varivas vid nṛṣāhya
1038	tam vikhāde sasnim adya śrutam naram	tad vikhāda sasni adya śru nṛ
1038	arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe	arvāñc indra av kṛ
1038	svavṛjam hi tvām aham indra śuśrava	svavṛj hi tvad mad indra śru
1038	anānudam vṛṣabha radhracodanam	anānuda vṛṣabha radhra codana
1038	pra muñcasva pari kutsāt iha ā gahi	pra muc pari kutsa iha ā gam
1038	kim u tvāvān muṣkayoḥ baddhaḥ āsate	kim u tvāvat muṣka bandh ās
 ---
1039	yaḥ vām parijmā suvṛt aśvinā rathaḥ	yad tvad parijman suvṛt aśvin ratha
1039	doṣām uṣāsaḥ havyaḥ haviṣmatā	doṣā uṣa hvā haviṣmat
1039	śaśvattamāsaḥ tam u vām idam vayam	śaśvattama tad u tvad idam mad
1039	pituḥ na nāma suhavam havāmahe	pitṛ na nāman su hava hvā
1039	codayatam sūnṛtāḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ	coday sūnṛtā pinv dhī
1039	ut puraṁdhīḥ īrayatam tat uśmasi	ud puraṃdhi īray tad vaś
1039	yaśasam bhāgam kṛṇutam naḥ aśvinā	yaśas bhāga kṛ mad aśvin
1039	somam na cārum maghavatsu naḥ kṛtam	soma na cāru maghavan mad kṛ
1039	amājuraḥ cit bhavathaḥ yuvam bhagaḥ	amājur cit bhū tvad bhaga
1039	anāśoḥ cit avitārā apamasya cit	anāśu cit avitṛ apama cit
1039	andhasya cit nāsatyā kṛśasya cit	andha cit nāsatya kṛśa cit
1039	yuvām it āhuḥ bhiṣajā rutasya cit	tvad id ah bhiṣaj ru cit
1039	yuvam cyavānam sanayam yathā ratham	tvad cyavāna sanaya yathā ratha
1039	punar yuvānam carathāya takṣathuḥ	punar yuvan caratha takṣ
1039	niḥ taugryam ūhathuḥ adbhyaḥ pari	niḥ taugrya vah ap pari
1039	viśvā it tā vām savaneṣu pravācyā	viśva id tad tvad savana pravac
1039	purāṇā vām vīryā pra bravā jane	purāṇa tvad vīrya pra brū jana
1039	atha u ha āsathuḥ bhiṣajā mayobhuvā	atha u ha as bhiṣaj mayobhu
1039	tā vām nu navyau avase karāmahe	tad tvad nu navya av kṛ
1039	ayam nāsatyā śrat ariḥ yathā dadhat	idam nāsatya śrath ari yathā dhā
1039	iyam vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā	idam tvad hvā śru mad aśvin
1039	putrāya iva pitarā mahyam śikṣatam	putra iva pitṛ mad śikṣ
1039	anāpiḥ ajñāḥ asajātyā amatiḥ	an āpi a jñā asajātya amati
1039	purā tasyāḥ abhiśasteḥ ava spṛtam	purā tad abhiśasti ava spṛ
1039	yuvam rathena vimadāya śundhyuvam	tvad ratha vimada śundhyu
1039	ni ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām	ni vah purumitra yoṣaṇā
1039	yuvam havam vadhrimatyāḥ agacchatam	tvad hava vadhrimatī gam
1039	yuvam suṣutim cakrathuḥ puraṁdhaye	tvad suṣuti kṛ puraṃdhi
1039	yuvam viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ	tvad vipra jaraṇā upe
1039	punar kaleḥ akṛṇutam yuvat vayaḥ	punar kali kṛ yuvat vayas
1039	yuvam vandanam ṛśyadāt ut ūpathuḥ	tvad vandana ṛśyada ud vap
1039	yuvam sadyaḥ viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ	tvad sadyas viśpalā i kṛ
1039	yuvam ha rebham vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam	tvad ha rebha vṛṣan guhā dhā
1039	ut airayatam mamṛvāṁsam aśvinā	ud īray mṛ aśvin
1039	yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraye	tvad ṛbīsa uta tap atri
1039	omanvantam cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye	omanvat kṛ saptavadhri
1039	yuvam śvetam pedave aśvinā aśvam	tvad śveta pedu aśvin aśva
1039	navabhiḥ vājaiḥ navatī ca vājinam	navan vāja navati ca vājin
1039	carkṛtyam dadathuḥ drāvayatsakham	carkar dā drāvay sakha
1039	bhagam na nṛbhyaḥ havyam mayobhuvam	bhaga na nṛ hvā mayobhu
1039	na tam rājānau adite kutaḥ cana	na tad rājan aditi kutas cana
1039	na aṁhaḥ aśnoti duritam nakiḥ bhayam	na aṃhas aś durita nakir bhaya
1039	yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī	yad aśvin su hava rudravartani
1039	puroratham kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha	puroratha kṛ patnī saha
1039	ā tena yātam manasaḥ javīyasā	ā tad yā manas javīyas
1039	ratham yam vām ṛbhavaḥ cakruḥ aśvinā	ratha yad tvad ṛbhu kṛ aśvin
1039	yasya yoge duhitā jāyate divaḥ	yad yoga duhitṛ jan div
1039	ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ	ubh ahar su dina vivasvant
1039	tā vartiḥ yātam jayuṣā vi parvatam	tad vartis yā vi parvata
1039	apinvatam śayave dhenum aśvinā	pinv śayu dhenu aśvin
1039	vṛkasya cit vartikām antar āsyāt	vṛka cit vartikā antar āsya
1039	yuvam śacībhiḥ grasitām amuñcatam	tvad śacī gras muc
1039	etam vām stomam aśvinau akarma	etad tvad stoma aśvin kṛ
1039	atakṣāma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham	takṣ bhṛgu na ratha
1039	ni amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇām na marye	ni mṛj yoṣaṇā na marya
1039	nityam na sūnum tanayam dadhānāḥ	nitya na sūnu tanaya dhā
 ---
1040	ratham yāntam kuha kaḥ ha vām narā	ratha yā kuha ka ha tvad nara
1040	prati dyumantam suvitāya bhūṣati	prati dyumat suvita bhūṣ
1040	prātaryāvāṇam vibhvam viśeviśe	prātaryāvan vibhu viś viś
1040	vastorvastoḥ vahamānam dhiyā śami	vastu vastu vah dhī śamī
1040	kuha svit doṣā kuha vastoḥ aśvinā	kuha svid doṣā kuha vastu aśvin
1040	kuha abhipitvam karataḥ kuha ūṣatuḥ	kuha abhipitva kṛ kuha vas
1040	kaḥ vām śayutrā vidhavā iva devaram	ka tvad śayutrā vidhavā iva devara
1040	maryam na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhasthe ā	marya na yoṣā kṛ sadhastha ā
1040	prātar jarethe jaraṇā iva kāpayā	prātar jṛ jaraṇa iva kāpā
1040	vastorvastoḥ yajatā gacchathaḥ gṛham	vastu vastu yajata gam gṛha
1040	kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā	ka dhvasra bhū ka vā nṛ
1040	rājaputrā iva savanā ava gacchathaḥ	rājan putra iva savana ava gam
1040	yuvām mṛgā iva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavaḥ	tvad mṛga iva vāraṇa mṛgaṇyu
1040	doṣā vastoḥ haviṣā ni hvayāmahe	doṣā vastu havis ni hvā
1040	yuvam hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate narā	tvad hotrā ṛtuthā hu nṛ
1040	iṣam janāya vahathaḥ śubhaḥ patī	iṣ jana vah śubh pati
1040	yuvām ha ghoṣā pari aśvinā yatī	tvad ha ghoṣā pari aśvin i
1040	rājñaḥ ūce duhitā pṛcche vām narā	rājan vac duhitṛ pracch tvad nara
1040	bhūtam me ahne uta bhūtam aktave	bhū mad ahar uta bhū aktu
1040	aśvāvate rathine śaktam arvate	aśvāvat rathin śak arvat
1040	yuvam kavī sthaḥ pari aśvinā ratham	tvad kavi as pari aśvin ratha
1040	viśaḥ na kutsaḥ jarituḥ naśāyathaḥ	viś na kutsa jaritṛ naśāy
1040	yuvoḥ ha makṣā pari aśvinā madhu	tvad ha makṣā pari aśvin madhu
1040	āsā bharata niṣkṛtam na yoṣaṇā	ās bhṛ niṣkṛta na yoṣaṇā
1040	yuvam ha bhujyum yuvam aśvinā vaśam	tvad ha bhujyu tvad aśvin vaśa
1040	yuvam śiñjāram uśanām upa ārathuḥ	tvad śiñjāra uśanā uparch
1040	yuvoḥ arāvā pari sakhyam āsate	tvad rarāvan pari sakhya ās
1040	yuvoḥ aham avasā sumnam ā cake	tvad mad avas sumna ā kan
1040	yuvam ha kṛśam yuvam aśvinā śayum	tvad ha kṛśa tvad aśvin śayu
1040	yuvam vidhantam vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ	tvad vidh vidhavā uruṣy
1040	yuvam sanibhyaḥ stanayantam aśvinā	tvad sani stanay aśvin
1040	apa vrajam ūrṇuthaḥ saptāsyam	apa vraja vṛ saptan āsya
1040	janiṣTa yoṣā patayat kanīnakaḥ	jan yoṣā patay kanīnaka
1040	vi ca aruhan vīrudhaḥ daṁsanāḥ anu	vi ca ruh vīrudh daṃsana anu
1040	ā asmai rīyante nivanā iva sindhavaḥ	ā idam ri nivanā iva sindhu
1040	asmai ahne bhavati tat patitvanam	idam ahar bhū tad patitvana
1040	jīvam rudanti vi mayante adhvare	jīva rud vi may adhvara
1040	dīrghām anu prasitim dīdhiyuḥ naraḥ	dīrgha anu prasiti dhī nṛ
1040	vāmam pitṛbhyaḥ ye idam samerire	vāma pitṛ yad idam sam er
1040	mayaḥ patibhyaḥ janayaḥ pariṣvaje	mayas pati jani pariṣvaj
1040	na tasya vidma tat u su pra vocata	na tad vid tad u su pra vac
1040	yuvā ha yat yuvatyāḥ kṣeti yoniṣu	yuvan ha yat yuvatī kṣi yoni
1040	priyosriyasya vṛṣabhasya retinaḥ	priya usriyā vṛṣabha retin
1040	gṛham gamema aśvinā tat uśmasi	gṛha gam aśvin tad vaś
1040	ā vām agan sumatiḥ vājinīvasū	ā tvad gam sumati vājinīvasu
1040	ni aśvinā hṛtsu kāmāḥ ayaṁsata	ni aśvin hṛd kāma yam
1040	abhūtam gopā mithunā śubhaḥ patī	bhū gopa mithuna śubh pati
1040	priyāḥ aryamṇaḥ duryān aśīmahi	priya aryaman durya aś
1040	tā mandasānā manuṣaḥ duroṇe ā	tad mand manus duroṇa ā
1040	dhattam rayim sahavīram vacasyave	dhā rayi saha vīra vacasyu
1040	kṛtam tīrtham suprapāṇam śubhaḥ patī	kṛ tīrtha su prapāṇa śubh pati
1040	sthāṇum patheṣThām apa durmatim hatam	sthāṇu patheṣṭhā apa durmati han
1040	kva svit adya katamāsu aśvinā	kva svid adya katama aśvin
1040	vikṣu dasrā mādayete śubhaḥ patī	viś dasra māday śubh pati
1040	kaḥ īm ni yeme katamasya jagmatuḥ	ka īṃ ni yam katama gam
1040	viprasya vā yajamānasya vā gṛham	vipra vā yaj vā gṛha
 ---
1041	samānam u tyam puruhūtam ukthyam	samāna u tya puru hvā ukthya
1041	ratham tricakram savanā ganigmatam	ratha tri cakra savana ganīgam
1041	parijmānam vidathyam suvṛktibhiḥ	parijman vidathya suvṛkti
1041	vayam vyuṣTau uṣasaḥ havāmahe	mad vyuṣṭi uṣas hvā
1041	prātaryujam nāsatyā adhi tiṣThathaḥ	prātar yuj nāsatya adhi sthā
1041	prātaryāvāṇam madhuvāhanam ratham	prātar yāvan madhu vāhana ratha
1041	viśaḥ yena gacchathaḥ yajvarīḥ narā	viś yad gam yajvan nara
1041	kīreḥ cit yajñam hotṛmantam aśvinā	kīri cit yajña hotṛmat aśvin
1041	adhvaryum vā madhupāṇim suhastyam	adhvaryu vā madhu pāṇi suhastya
1041	agnidham vā dhṛtadakṣam damūnasam	agnidh vā dhṛtadakṣa damūnas
1041	viprasya vā yat savanāni gacchathaḥ	vipra vā yat savana gam
1041	ataḥ ā yātam madhupeyam aśvinā	atas ā yā madhupeya aśvin
 ---
1042	astā iva su prataram lāyam asyan	astṛ iva su prataram lāya as
1042	bhūṣan iva pra bharā stomam asmai	bhūṣ iva pra bhṛ stoma idam
1042	vācā viprāḥ tarata vācam aryaḥ	vāc vipra tṛ vāc ari
1042	ni rāmaya jaritar some indram	ni rāmay jaritṛ soma indra
1042	dohena gām upa śikṣā sakhāyam	doha go upa śikṣ sakhi
1042	pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram	pra bodhay jaritṛ jāra indra
1042	kośam na pūrṇam vasunā nyṛṣTam	kośa na pṛ vasu nyṛṣ
1042	ā cyāvaya maghadeyāya śūram	ā cyāvay magha deya śūra
1042	kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ	kim aṅga tvad maghavan bhoja ah
1042	śiśīhi mā śiśayam tvā śṛṇomi	śā mad śiśaya tvad śru
1042	apnasvatī mama dhīḥ astu śakra	apnasvat mad dhī as śakra
1042	vasuvidam bhagam indra ā bharā naḥ	vasu vid bhaga indra ā bhṛ mad
1042	tvām janāḥ mamasatyeṣu indra	tvad jana mamasatya indra
1042	saṁtasthānāḥ vi hvayante samīke	saṃsthā vi hvā samīka
1042	atrā yujam kṛṇute yaḥ haviṣmān	atra yuj kṛ yad haviṣmat
1042	na asunvatā sakhyam vaṣTi śūraḥ	na a su sakhya vaś śūra
1042	dhanam na syandram bahulam yaḥ asmai	dhana na syandra bahula yad idam
1042	tīvrān somān āsunoti prayasvān	tīvra soma ā su prayasvat
1042	tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahnaḥ	tad śatru sutuka prātar ahar
1042	ni svaṣTrān yuvati hanti vṛtram	ni svaṣṭra yu han vṛtra
1042	yasmin vayam dadhimā śaṁsam indre	yad mad śaṃsa indra
1042	yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme	yad śri maghavan kāma mad
1042	ārāt cit san bhayatām asya śatruḥ	ārāt cit as bhī idam śatru
1042	ni asmai dyumnā janyā namantām	ni idam dyumna janya nam
1042	ārāt śatrum apa bādhasva dūram	ārāt śatru apa bādh dūram
1042	ugraḥ yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena	ugra yad śamba puruhūta tad
1042	asme dhehi yavamat gomat indra	mad dhā yavamat gomat indra
1042	kṛdhī dhiyam jaritre vājaratnām	kṛ dhī jaritṛ vāja ratna
1042	pra yam antar vṛṣasavāsaḥ agman	pra yad antar vṛṣan sava gam
1042	tīvrāḥ somāḥ bahulāntāsaḥ indram	tīvra soma bahula anta indra
1042	na aha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṁsat	na aha dāman maghavan ni yam
1042	ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam	ni su vah bhūri vāma
1042	uta prahām atidīvyā jayāti	uta prahā ati dīv ji
1042	kṛtam yat śvaghnī vicinoti kāle	kṛta yat śvaghnin vici kāla
1042	yaḥ devakāmaḥ na dhanā ruṇaddhi	yad deva kāma na dhana rudh
1042	sam it tam rāyā sṛjati svadhāvān	sam id tad rai sṛj svadhāvat
1042	gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām	go tṛ amati dureva
1042	yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām	yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva
1042	vayam rājabhiḥ prathamāḥ dhanāni	mad rājan prathama dhana
1042	asmākena vṛjanenā jayema	asmāka vṛjana ji
1042	bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt	bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt
1042	uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ	uta uttara adharāt aghāyu
1042	indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ	indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad
1042	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu	sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ
 ---
1043	acchā me indram matayaḥ svarvidaḥ	acchā mad indra mati svar vid
1043	sadhrīcīḥ viśvāḥ uśatīḥ anūṣata	sadhryañc viśva vaś nū
1043	pari svajante janayaḥ yathā patim	pari svaj jani yathā pati
1043	maryam na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye	marya na śundhyu maghavan ūti
1043	na ghā tvadrik apa veti me manaḥ	na gha tvadrik apa vī mad manas
1043	tve it kāmam puruhūta śiśraya	tvad id kāma puruhūta śri
1043	rājā iva dasma ni sadaḥ adhi barhiṣi	rājan iva dasma ni sad adhi barhis
1043	asmin su some avapānam astu te	idam su soma avapāna as tvad
1043	viṣūvṛt indraḥ amateḥ uta kṣudhaḥ	viṣūvṛt indra amati uta kṣudh
1043	saḥ it rāyaḥ maghavā vasvaḥ īśate	tad id rai maghavan vasu īś
1043	tasya it ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavaḥ	tad id idam pravaṇa saptan sindhu
1043	vayaḥ vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ	vayas vṛdh vṛṣabha śuṣmin
1043	vayaḥ na vṛkṣam supalāśam ā asadan	vi na vṛkṣa su palāśa āsad
1043	somāsaḥ indram mandinaḥ camūṣadaḥ	soma indra mandin camūṣad
1043	pra eṣām anīkam śavasā davidyutat	pra idam anīka śavas davidyut
1043	vidat svar manave jyotiḥ āryam	vid svar manu jyotis ārya
1043	kṛtam na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane	kṛta na śvaghnin vi ci devana
1043	saṁvargam yat maghavā sūryam jayat	saṃvargam yat maghavan sūrya ji
1043	na tat te anyaḥ anu vīryam śakat	na tad tvad anya anu vīrya śak
1043	na purāṇaḥ maghavan na uta nūtanaḥ	na purāṇa maghavan na uta nūtana
1043	viśaṁviśam maghavā pari aśāyata	viś viś maghavan pari śī
1043	janānām dhenāḥ avacākaśat vṛṣā	jana dhenā av cākaś vṛṣan
1043	yasya aha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati	yad aha śakra savana raṇ
1043	sa tīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ	tad tīvra soma sah pṛtany
1043	āpaḥ na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran	ap na sindhu abhi yat sam kṣar
1043	somāsaḥ indram kulyāḥ iva hradam	soma indra kulyā iva hrada
1043	vardhanti viprāḥ mahaḥ asya sādane	vṛdh vipra mahas idam sādana
1043	yavam na vṛṣTiḥ divyena dānunā	yava na vṛṣṭi divya dānu
1043	vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayat rajassu ā	vṛṣan na krudh patay rajas ā
1043	yaḥ aryapatnīḥ akṛṇot imāḥ apaḥ	yad arya patnī kṛ idam ap
1043	sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave	tad su maghavan jīra dānu
1043	avindat jyotiḥ manave haviṣmate	vid jyotis manu haviṣmat
1043	ut jāyatām paraśuḥ jyotiṣā saha	ud jan paraśu jyotis saha
1043	bhūyāḥ ṛtasya sudughā purāṇavat	bhū ṛta sudughā purāṇa vat
1043	vi rocatām aruṣaḥ bhānunā śuciḥ	vi ruc aruṣa bhānu śuci
1043	svar na śukram śuśucīta satpatiḥ	svar na śukra śuc satpati
1043	gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām	go tṛ amati dureva
1043	yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām	yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva
1043	vayam rājabhiḥ prathamāḥ dhanāni	mad rājan prathama dhana
1043	asmākena vṛjanenā jayema	asmāka vṛjana ji
1043	bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt	bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt
1043	uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ	uta uttara adharāt aghāyu
1043	indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ	indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad
1043	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu	sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ
 ---
1044	ā yātu indraḥ svapatiḥ madāya	ā yā indra sva pati mada
1044	yaḥ dharmaṇā tūtujānaḥ tuviṣmān	yad dharman tuj tuviṣmat
1044	pratvakṣāṇaḥ ati viśvā sahāṁsi	pratvakṣ ati viśva sahas
1044	apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena	apāra mahat vṛṣṇya
1044	suṣThāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te	suṣṭhāman ratha su yama hari tvad
1044	mimyakṣa vajraḥ nṛpate gabhastau	myakṣ vajra nṛpati gabhasti
1044	śībham rājan supathā ā yāhi arvāṅ	śībham rājan su pathin yā arvāñc
1044	vardhāma te papuṣaḥ vṛṣṇyāni	vṛdh tvad pā vṛṣṇya
1044	ā indravāhaḥ nṛpatim vajrabāhum	ā indra vāh nṛpati vajra bāhu
1044	ugram ugrāsaḥ taviṣāsaḥ enam	ugra ugra taviṣa enad
1044	pratvakṣasam vṛṣabham satyaśuṣmam	pratvakṣas vṛṣabha satya śuṣma
1044	ā īm asmatrā sadhamādaḥ vahantu	ā īṃ asmatrā sadhamād vah
1044	evā patim droṇasācam sacetasam	eva pati droṇasāc sacetas
1044	ūrjaḥ skambham dharuṇe ā vṛṣāyase	ūrj skambha dharuṇa ā vṛṣāy
1044	ojaḥ kṛṣva sam gṛbhāya tve api	ojas kṛ sam gṛbhāy tvad api
1044	asaḥ yathā kenipānām inaḥ vṛdhe	as yathā kenipa ina vṛdh
1044	gaman asme vasūni ā hi śaṁsiṣam	gam mad vasu ā hi śaṃs
1044	svāśiṣam bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ	su āśis bhara ā yā somin
1044	tvam īśiṣe sa asmin ā satsi barhiṣi	tvad īś tad idam ā sad barhis
1044	anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā	anādhṛṣya tvad pātra dharman
1044	pṛthak pra āyan prathamāḥ devahūtayaḥ	pṛthak pre prathama deva hūti
1044	akṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣTarā	kṛ śravasya duṣṭara
1044	na ye śekuḥ yajñiyām nāvam āruham	na yad śak yajñiya nau āruh
1044	īrmā eva te ni aviśanta kepayaḥ	īrma eva tad ni viś kepi
1044	eva eva apāk apare santu dūḍhyaḥ	eva eva apāk apara as dūḍhī
1044	aśvāḥ yeṣām duryujaḥ āyuyujre	aśva yad duryuj ā yuj
1044	itthā ye prāk upare santi dāvane	itthā yad prāk upara as dā
1044	purūṇi yatra vayunāni bhojanā	puru yatra vayuna bhojana
1044	girīn ajrān rejamānān adhārayat	giri ajra rej dhāray
1044	dyauḥ krandat antarikṣāṇi kopayat	div krand antarikṣa kopay
1044	samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi skabhāyati	samīcīna dhiṣaṇā vi skabhāy
1044	vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā made ukthāni śaṁsati	vṛṣan pā mada uktha śaṃs
1044	imam bibharmi sukṛtam te aṅkuśam	idam bhṛ su kṛ tvad aṅkuśa
1044	yena ārujāsi maghavan śaphārujaḥ	yad āruj maghavan śaphāruj
1044	asmin su te savane astu okyam	idam su tvad savana as okya
1044	sute iṣTau maghavan bodhi ābhagaḥ	su iṣṭi maghavan bhū ābhaga
1044	gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām	go tṛ amati dureva
1044	yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām	yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva
1044	vayam rājabhiḥ prathamāḥ dhanāni	mad rājan prathama dhana
1044	asmākena vṛjanenā jayema	asmāka vṛjana ji
1044	bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt	bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt
1044	uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ	uta uttara adharāt aghāyu
1044	indraḥ purastāt uta madhyataḥ naḥ	indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad
1044	sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu	sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ
 ---
1045	divaḥ pari prathamam jajñe agniḥ	div pari prathamam jan agni
1045	asmat dvitīyam pari jātavedāḥ	mad dvitīyam pari jātavedas
1045	tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇāḥ ajasram	tṛtīyam ap nṛmaṇas ajasram
1045	indhānaḥ enam jarate svādhīḥ	indh enad jṛ svādhī
1045	vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi	vid tvad agni tredhā traya
1045	vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā	vid tvad dhāman vibhṛ purutrā
1045	vidmā te nāma paramam guhā yat	vid tvad nāman parama guhā yad
1045	vidmā tam utsam yataḥ ājagantha	vid tad utsa yatas āgam
1045	samudre tvā nṛmaṇāḥ apsu antar	samudra tvad nṛmaṇas ap antar
1045	nṛcakṣāḥ īdhe divaḥ agne ūdhan	nṛ cakṣas indh div agni ūdhas
1045	tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṁsam	tṛtīya tvad rajas sthā
1045	apām upasthe mahiṣāḥ avardhan	ap upastha mahiṣa vṛdh
1045	akrandat agniḥ stanayan iva dyauḥ	krand agni stanay iva div
1045	kṣāmā rerihat vīrudhaḥ samañjan	kṣam rerih vīrudh samañj
1045	sadyaḥ jajñānaḥ vi hi īm iddhaḥ akhyat	sadyas jan vi hi iṃ indh khyā
1045	ā rodasī bhānunā bhāti antar	ā rodas bhānu bhā antar
1045	śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām	śrī udāra dharuṇa rayi
1045	manīṣāṇām prārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ	manīṣā prārpaṇa soma gopā
1045	vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahasaḥ apsu rājā	vasu sūnu sahas ap rājan
1045	vi bhāti agre uṣasām idhānaḥ	vi bhā agra uṣas indh
1045	viśvasya ketuḥ bhuvanasya garbhaḥ	viśva ketu bhuvana garbha
1045	ā rodasī apṛṇāt jāyamānaḥ	ā rodasī pṛ jan
1045	vīLum cit adrim abhinat parāyan	vīḍu cit adri bhid pare
1045	janāḥ yat agnim ayajanta pañca	jana yat agni yaj pañcan
1045	uśik pāvakaḥ aratiḥ sumedhāḥ	uśij pāvaka arati sumedhas
1045	marteṣu agniḥ amṛtaḥ ni dhāyi	marta agni amṛta ni dhā
1045	iyarti dhūmam aruṣam bharibhrat	ṛch dhūma aruṣa bharibhṛ
1045	ut śukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan	ud śukra śocis div inakṣ
1045	dṛśānaḥ rukmaḥ urviyā vi adyaut	dṛś rukma urviyā vi dyut
1045	durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ	durmarṣa āyus śrī ruc
1045	agniḥ amṛtaḥ abhavat vayobhiḥ	agni amṛta bhū vayas
1045	yat enam dyauḥ janayat suretāḥ	yat enad div janay su retas
1045	yaḥ te adya kṛṇavat bhadraśoce	yad tvad adya kṛ bhadra śoci
1045	apūpam deva ghṛtavantam agne	apūpa deva ghṛtavat agni
1045	pra tam naya prataram vasyaḥ accha	pra tad nī prataram vasyas acchā
1045	abhi sumnam devabhaktam yaviṣTha	abhi sumna deva bhaj yaviṣṭha
1045	ā tam bhaja sauśravaseṣu agne	ā tad bhaj sauśravasa agni
1045	ukthaukthe ā bhaja śasyamāne	uktha uktha ā bhaj śaṃs
1045	priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti	priya sūrya priya agni bhū
1045	ut jātena bhinadat ut janitvaiḥ	ud jan bhid ud jan
1045	tvām agne yajamānāḥ anu dyūn	tvad agni yaj anu div
1045	viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi	viśva vasu dhā vārya
1045	tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānāḥ	tvad saha draviṇa iṣ
1045	vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ	vraja gomat uśija vi vṛ
1045	astāvi agniḥ narām suśevaḥ	stu agni nṛ su śeva
1045	vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣibhiḥ somagopāḥ	vaiśvānara ṛṣi soma gopā
1045	adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema	a dveṣa dyāvāpṛthivī hvā
1045	devāḥ dhatta rayim asme suvīram	deva dhā rayi mad su vīra
 ---
1046	pra hotā jātaḥ mahān nabhovit	pra hotṛ jan mahat nabhas vid
1046	nṛṣadvā sīdat apām upasthe	nṛṣadvan sad ap upastha
1046	dadhiḥ yaḥ dhāyi sa te vayāṁsi	dadhi yad dhā tad tvad vayas
1046	yantā vasūni vidhate tanūpāḥ	yam vasu vidh tanū pā
1046	imam vidhantaḥ apām sadhasthe	idam vidh ap sadhastha
1046	paśum na naṣTam padaiḥ anu gman	paśu na naś pada anu gam
1046	guhā catantam uśijaḥ namobhiḥ	guhā cat uśij namas
1046	icchantaḥ dhīrāḥ bhṛgavaḥ avindan	iṣ dhīra bhṛgu vid
1046	imam tritaḥ bhūri avindat icchan	idam trita bhūri vid iṣ
1046	vaibhūvasaḥ mūrdhani aghnyāyāḥ	vaibhūvasa mūrdhan aghnyā
1046	sa śevṛdhaḥ jātaḥ ā harmyeṣu	tad śevṛdha jan ā harmya
1046	nābhiḥ yuvā bhavati rocanasya	nābhi yuvan bhū rocana
1046	mandram hotāram uśijaḥ namobhiḥ	mandra hotṛ uśij namas
1046	prāñcam yajñam netāram adhvarāṇām	prāñc yajña netṛ adhvara
1046	viśām akṛṇvan aratim pāvakam	viś kṛ arati pāvaka
1046	havyavāham dadhataḥ mānuṣeṣu	havyavāha dhā mānuṣa
1046	pra bhūḥ jayantam mahām vipodhām	pra bhū ji mah vipodhā
1046	mūrāḥ amūram purām darmāṇam	mūra amūra pur darman
1046	nayantaḥ garbham vanām dhiyam dhuḥ	nī garbha van dhī dhā
1046	hiriśmaśrum na arvāṇam dhanarcam	hiriśmaśru na arvan dhana ṛc
1046	ni pastyāsu tritaḥ stabhūyan	ni pastyā trita stabhūy
1046	parivītaḥ yonau sīdat antar	parivye yoni sad antar
1046	ataḥ saṁgṛbhyā viśām damūnāḥ	atas saṃgrah viś damūnas
1046	vidharmaṇā ayantraiḥ īyate nṛṛn	vidharman ayantra ī nṛ
1046	asya ajarāsaḥ damām aritrāḥ	idam ajara dam aritra
1046	arcaddhūmāsaḥ agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ	arc dhūma agni pāvaka
1046	śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāsaḥ bhuraṇyavaḥ	śvitīci śvātra bhuraṇyu
1046	vanarṣadaḥ vāyavaḥ na somāḥ	vanarṣad vāyu na soma
1046	pra jihvayā bharate vepaḥ agniḥ	pra jihvā bhṛ vepas agni
1046	pra vayunāni cetasā pṛthivyāḥ	pra vayuna cetas pṛthivī
1046	tam āyavaḥ śucayantam pāvakam	tad āyu śocay pāvaka
1046	mandram hotāram dadhire yajiṣTham	mandra hotṛ dhā yajiṣṭha
1046	dyāvā yam agnim pṛthivī janiṣTām	div yad agni pṛthivī jan āṃ
1046	āpaḥ tvaṣTā bhṛgavaḥ yam sahobhiḥ	ap tvaṣṭṛ bhṛgu yad sahas
1046	īLenyam prathamam mātariśvā	īḍ prathama mātariśvan
1046	devāḥ tatakṣuḥ manave yajatram	deva takṣ manu yajatra
1046	yam tvā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham	yad tvad deva dhā havya vāha
1046	puruspṛhaḥ mānuṣāsaḥ yajatram	puruspṛh mānuṣa yajatra
1046	sa yāman agne stuvate vayaḥ dhāḥ	tad yāman agni stu vayas dhā
1046	pra devayan yaśasaḥ sam hi pūrvīḥ	pra devay yaśas sam hi puru
 ---
1047	jagṛbhmā te dakṣiṇam indra hastam	grah tvad dakṣiṇa indra hasta
1047	vasūyavaḥ vasupate vasūnām	vasūyu vasu pati vasu
1047	vidmā hi tvā gopatim śūra gonām	vid hi tvad gopati śūra go
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	svāyudham svavasam sunītham	su āyudha su avas su nīthā
1047	catuḥsamudram dharuṇam rayīṇām	catur samudra dharuṇa rayi
1047	carkṛtyam śaṁsyam bhūrivāram	carkar śaṃs bhūri vāra
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	subrahmāṇam devavantam bṛhantam	su brahman devavat bṛhat
1047	urum gabhīram pṛthubudhnam indra	uru gabhīra pṛthu budhna indra
1047	śrutaṛṣim ugram abhimātiṣāham	śruta ṛṣi ugra abhimātiṣāh
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	sanadvājam vipravīram tarutram	san vāja vipra vīra tarutra
1047	dhanaspṛtam śūśuvāṁsam sudakṣam	dhana spṛt śvi su dakṣa
1047	dasyuhanam pūrbhidam indra satyam	dasyu han pūrbhid indra satya
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	aśvāvantam rathinam vīravantam	aśvāvat rathin vīravat
1047	sahasriṇam śatinam vājam indra	sahasrin śatin vāja indra
1047	bhadravrātam vipravīram svarṣām	bhadra vrāta vipra vīra svarṣā
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	pra saptagum ṛtadhītim sumedhām	pra saptagu ṛta dhīti su medhā
1047	bṛhaspatim matiḥ acchā jigāti	bṛhaspati mati acchā gā
1047	yaḥ āṅgirasaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ	yad āṅgirasa namas upasad
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	vanīvānaḥ mama dūtāsaḥ indram	vanīvan mad dūta indra
1047	stomāḥ caranti sumatīḥ iyānāḥ	stoma car sumati ī
1047	hṛdispṛśaḥ manasā vacyamānāḥ	hṛdispṛśa manas vañc
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
1047	yat tvā yāmi daddhi tat naḥ indra	yad tvad yā dā tad mad indra
1047	bṛhantam kṣayam asamam janānām	bṛhat kṣaya asama jana
1047	abhi tat dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām	abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛ
1047	asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ	mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā
 ---
1048	aham bhuvam vasunaḥ pūrvyaḥ patiḥ	mad bhū vasu pūrvya pati
1048	aham dhanāni sam jayāmi śaśvataḥ	mad dhana sam ji śaśvat
1048	mām havante pitaram na jantavaḥ	mad hvā pitṛ na jantu
1048	aham dāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam	mad dāś vi bhaj bhojana
1048	aham indraḥ rodhaḥ vakṣaḥ atharvaṇaḥ	mad indra rodhas vakṣas atharvan
1048	tritāya gāḥ ajanayam aheḥ adhi	trita go janay ahi adhi
1048	aham dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇam ā dade	mad dasyu pari nṛmṇa ā dā
1048	gotrā śikṣan dadhīce mātariśvane	gotra śikṣ dadhyac mātariśvan
1048	mahyam tvaṣTā vajram atakṣat āyasam	mad tvaṣṭṛ vajra takṣ āyasa
1048	mayi devāsaḥ avṛjan api kratum	mad deva vṛj api kratu
1048	mama anīkam sūryasya iva duṣTaram	mad anīka sūrya iva duṣṭara
1048	mām āryanti kṛtena kartvena ca	mad ār kṛ kṛ ca
1048	aham etam gavyayam aśvyam paśum	mad etad gavyaya aśvya paśu
1048	purīṣiṇam sāyakenā hiraṇyayam	purīṣin sāyaka hiraṇyaya
1048	purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe	puru sahasra ni śā dāś
1048	yat mā somāsaḥ ukthinaḥ amandiṣuḥ	yat mad soma ukthin mad
1048	aham indraḥ na parā jigye it dhanam	mad indra na parā ji id dhana
1048	na mṛtyave ava tasthe kadā cana	na mṛtyu ava sthā kadā cana
1048	somam it mā sunvantaḥ yācatā vasu	soma id mad su yāc vasu
1048	na me pūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana	na mad pūru sakhya riṣ
1048	aham etān śāśvasataḥ dvādvā	mad etad śāśvas dvi dvi
1048	indram ye vajram yudhaye akṛṇvata	indra yad vajra yudh kṛ
1048	āhvayamānān ava hanmanā ahanam	āhvā ava hanman han
1048	dṛLhā vadan anamasyuḥ namasvinaḥ	dṛḍha vad a namasyu namasvin
1048	abhi idam ekam ekaḥ asmi niṣṣāT	abhi idam eka eka as niṣṣāh
1048	abhī dvā kim u trayaḥ karanti	abhi dvi ka u tri kṛ
1048	khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri	khala na parṣa prati han bhūri
1048	kim mā nindanti śatravaḥ anindrāḥ	kim mad nind śatru an indra
1048	aham guṅgubhyaḥ atithigvam iṣkaram	mad guṅgu atithigva iṣkṛ
1048	iṣam na vṛtraturam vikṣu dhārayam	iṣ na vṛtra tura viś
1048	yat parṇayaghne uta vā karañjahe	yat parṇaya ghna uta vā karañja ha
1048	pra aham mahe vṛtrahatye aśuśravi	pra mad maha vṛtra hatya śru
1048	pra me namī sāpyaḥ iṣe bhuje bhūt	pra mad nami sāpya iṣ bhuj bhū
1048	gavām eṣe sakhyā kṛṇuta dvitā	go eṣa sakhya kṛ dvitā
1048	didyum yat asya samitheṣu maṁhayam	didyu yat idam samitha mahay
1048	āt it enam śaṁsyam ukthyam karam	āt id enad śaṃs ukthya kṛ
1048	pra nemasmin dadṛśe somaḥ antar	pra nema dṛś soma antar
1048	gopāḥ nemam āviḥ asthā kṛṇoti	gopā nema āvis kṛ
1048	sa tigmaśṛṅgam vṛṣabham yuyutsan	tad tigma śṛṅga vṛṣabha yuyuts
1048	druhaḥ tasthau bahule baddhaḥ antar	druh sthā bahula bandh antar
1048	ādityānām vasūnām rudriyāṇām	āditya vasu rudriya
1048	devaḥ devānām na mināmi dhāma	deva deva na mī dhāman
1048	te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣuḥ	tad mad bhadra śavas takṣ
1048	aparājitam astṛtam aṣāLham	aparājita astṛta aṣāḍha
 ---
1049	aham dām gṛṇate pūrvyam vasu	mad dā gṛ pūrvya vasu
1049	aham brahma kṛṇavam mahyam vardhanam	mad brahman kṛ mad vardhana
1049	aham bhuvam yajamānasya coditā	mad bhū yaj coditṛ
1049	ayajvanaḥ sākṣi viśvasmin bhare	ayajvan sah viśva bhara
1049	mām dhuḥ indram nāma devatā	mad dhā indra nāma devatā
1049	divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca apām ca jantavaḥ	div ca gam ca ap ca jantu
1049	aham harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū	mad hari vṛṣaṇa vivrata raghu
1049	aham vajram śavase dhṛṣṇu ā dade	mad vajra śavas dhṛṣṇu ā dā
1049	aham atkam kavaye śiśnatham hathaiḥ	mad atka kavi śnath hatha
1049	aham kutsam āvam ābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	mad kutsa av idam ūti
1049	aham śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadhar yamam	mad śuṣṇa śnathitṛ vadhar yam
1049	na yaḥ rare āryam nāma dasyave	na yad rā ārya nāman dasyu
1049	aham pitā iva vetasūn abhiṣTaye	mad pitṛ iva vetasu abhiṣṭi
1049	tugram kutsāya smadibham ca randhayam	tugra kutsa smadibha ca randhay
1049	aham bhuvam yajamānasya rājani	mad bhū yaj rājan
1049	pra yat bhare tujaye na priyā ādhṛṣe	pra yat bhṛ tuji na priya ādhṛṣ
1049	aham randhayam mṛgayam śrutarvaṇe	mad randhay mṛgaya śrutarvan
1049	yat mā ajihīta vayunā cana ānuṣak	yat mad hā vayuna cana ānuṣak
1049	aham veśam namram āyave akaram	mad veśa namra āyu kṛ
1049	aham savyāya paḍgṛbhim arandhayam	mad savya paḍgṛbhi randhay
1049	aham sa yaḥ navavāstvam bṛhadratham	mad tad yad navavāstva bṛhadratha
1049	sam vṛtrā iva dāsam vṛtrahā arujam	sam vṛtra iva dāsa vṛtrahan ruj
1049	yat vardhayantam prathayantam ānuṣak	yat vardhay prathay ānuṣak
1049	dūre pāre rajasaḥ rocanā akaram	dūra pāra rajas rocana kṛ
1049	aham sūryasya pari yāmi āśubhiḥ	mad sūrya pari yā āśu
1049	pra etaśebhiḥ vahamānaḥ ojasā	pra etaśa vah ojas
1049	yat mā sāvaḥ manuṣaḥ āha nirṇije	yat mad sāva manus ah nirṇij
1049	ṛdhak kṛṣe dāsam kṛtvyam hathaiḥ	ṛdhak kṛṣ dāsa kṛtvya hatha
1049	aham saptahā nahuṣaḥ nahuṣTaraḥ	mad saptan han nahus nahuṣṭara
1049	pra aśrāvayam śavasā turvaśam yadum	praśrāvay śavas turvaśa yadu
1049	aham ni anyam sahasā sahaḥ karam	mad ni anya sahas sahas kṛ
1049	nava vrādhataḥ navatim ca vakṣayam	navan vrādh navati ca vakṣay
1049	aham sapta sravataḥ dhārayam vṛṣā	mad saptan sravat dhāray vṛṣan
1049	dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyām sīrāḥ adhi	dravitnu pṛthivī sīrā adhi
1049	aham arṇāṁsi vi tirāmi sukratuḥ	mad arṇas vi tṛ su kratu
1049	yudhā vidam manave gātum iṣTaye	yudh vid manu gātu iṣṭi
1049	aham tat āsu dhārayam yat āsu na	mad tad idam dhāray yad idam na
1049	devaḥ cana tvaṣTā adhārayat ruśat	deva cana tvaṣṭṛ dhāray ruśat
1049	spārham gavām ūdhassu vakṣaṇāsu ā	spārha go ūdhas vakṣaṇā ā
1049	madhoḥ madhu śvātryam somam āśiram	madhu madhu śvātrya soma āśir
1049	evā devān indraḥ vivye nṛṛn	eva deva indra vī nṛ
1049	pra cyautnena maghavā satyarādhāḥ	pra cyautna maghavan satya rādhas
1049	viśvā it tā te harivaḥ śacīvaḥ	viśva id tad tvad harivat śacīvat
1049	abhi turāsaḥ svayaśaḥ gṛṇanti	abhi tura sva yaśas gṛ
 ---
1050	pra vaḥ mahe mandamānāya andhasaḥ	pra tvad mah mad andhas
1050	arcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve	arc viśvānara viśvābhū
1050	indrasya yasya sumakham sahaḥ mahi	indra yad su makha sahas mahi
1050	śravaḥ nṛmṇam ca rodasī saparyataḥ	śravas nṛmṇa ca rodas sapary
1050	sa u cit nu sakhyā naryaḥ inaḥ stutaḥ	tad cit nu sakhi narya ina stu
1050	carkṛtyaḥ indraḥ māvate nare	carkar indra māvat nṛ
1050	viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate	viśva dhur vājakṛtya satpati
1050	vṛtre vā apsu abhi śūra mandase	vṛtra vā ap abhi śūra mad
1050	ke te naraḥ indra ye te iṣe	ka tad nṛ indra yad tvad iṣ
1050	ye te sumnam sadhanyam iyakṣān	yad tvad sumna sa dhanya iyakṣ
1050	ke te vājāya asuryāya hinvire	ka tad vāja āsurya hi
1050	ke apsu svāsu urvarāsu pauṁsye	ka ap sva urvarā pauṃsya
1050	bhuvaḥ tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān	bhū tvad indra brahman mahat
1050	bhuvaḥ viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ	bhū viśva savana yajñiya
1050	bhuvaḥ nṛṛn cyautnaḥ viśvasmin bhare	bhū nṛ cyautna viśva bhara
1050	jyeṣThaḥ ca mantraḥ viśvacarṣaṇe	jyeṣṭha ca mantra viśvacarṣaṇi
1050	avā nu kam jyāyān yajñavanasaḥ	av nu kaṃ jyāyas yajñavanas
1050	mahīm te omātrām kṛṣTayaḥ viduḥ	mah tvad omātrā kṛṣṭi vid
1050	asaḥ nu kam ajaraḥ vardhāḥ ca	as nu kaṃ ajara vṛdh ca
1050	viśvā it etā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe	viśva id etad savana tūtuma kṛ
1050	etā viśvā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe	etad viśva savana tūtuma kṛ
1050	svayam sūno sahasaḥ yāni dadhiṣe	svayam sūnu sahas yad dhā
1050	varāya te pātram dharmaṇe tanā	vara tvad pātra dharman tan
1050	yajñaḥ mantraḥ brahma udyatam vacaḥ	yajña mantra brahman udyam vacas
1050	ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā	yad tvad vipra brahman kṛt suta sacā
1050	vasūnām ca vasunaḥ ca dāvane	vasu ca vasu ca dā
1050	pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan	pra tvad sumna manas pathin bhū
1050	made sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ	mada su somya andhas
 ---
1051	mahat tat ulbam sthaviram tat āsīt	mahat tad ulba sthavira tad as
1051	yena āviṣTitaḥ praviveśitha apaḥ	yad āviṣṭ praviś ap
1051	viśvāḥ apaśyat bahudhā te agne	viśva paś bahudhā tvad agni
1051	jātavedaḥ tanvaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ	jātavedas tanū deva eka
1051	kaḥ mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devaḥ	ka mad dṛś katama tad deva
1051	yaḥ me tanvaḥ bahudhā paryapaśyat	yad mad tanū bahudhā paripaś
1051	kva aha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanti	kva aha mitrāvaruṇa kṣi
1051	agneḥ viśvāḥ samidhaḥ devayānīḥ	agni viśva samidh deva yāna
1051	aicchāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ	iṣ tvad bahudhā jātavedas
1051	praviṣTam agne apsu oṣadhīṣu	praviś agni ap oṣadhī
1051	tam tvā yamaḥ aciket citrabhāno	tad tvad yama ci citrabhānu
1051	daśāntaruṣyāt atirocamānam	daśan antaruṣya ati ruc
1051	hotrāt aham varuṇa bibhyat āyam	hotra mad varuṇa bhī i
1051	na it eva mā yunajan atra devāḥ	na id eva mad yuj atra deva
1051	tasya me tanvaḥ bahudhā niviṣTāḥ	tad mad tanu bahudhā niviś
1051	etam artham na ciketa aham agniḥ	etad artha na cit mad agni
1051	ā ihi manuḥ devayuḥ yajñakāmaḥ	e manu devayu yajña kāma
1051	araṁkṛtyā tamasi kṣeṣi agne	araṃkṛ tamas kṣi agni
1051	sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān	su ga pathin kṛ deva yāna
1051	vaha havyāni sumanasyamānaḥ	vah havya sumanasyamāna
1051	agneḥ pūrve bhrātaraḥ artham etam	agni pūrva bhrātṛ artha etad
1051	rathī iva adhvānam anu ā avarīvuḥ	rathin iva adhvan anu āvarvṛt
1051	tasmāt bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyam	tad bhī varuṇa dūram i
1051	gauraḥ na kṣepnoḥ avije jyāyāḥ	gaura na kṣepnu vij jyā
1051	kurmaḥ te āyuḥ ajaram yat agne	kṛ tvad āyus ajara yad agni
1051	yathā yuktaḥ jātavedaḥ na riṣyāḥ	yathā yuj jātavedas na riṣ
1051	athā vahāsi sumanasyamānaḥ	atha ā vah sumanasyamāna
1051	bhāgam devebhyaḥ haviṣaḥ sujāta	bhāga deva havis su jan
1051	prayājān me anuyājān ca kevalān	prayāja mad anuyāja ca kevala
1051	ūrjasvantam haviṣaḥ datta bhāgam	ūrjasvat havis dā bhāga
1051	ghṛtam ca apām puruṣam ca oṣadhīnām	ghṛta cāpa puruṣa ca oṣadhi
1051	agneḥ ca dīrgham āyuḥ astu devāḥ	agni ca dīrgha āyus as deva
1051	tava prayājāḥ anuyājāḥ ca kevale	tvad prayāja anuyāja ca kevala
1051	ūrjasvantaḥ haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ	ūrjasvat havis as bhāga
1051	tava agne yajñaḥ ayam astu sarvaḥ	tvad agni yajña idam as sarva
1051	tubhyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ	tvad nam pradiś catur
 ---
1052	viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yathā iha	viśva deva śās mad yathā iha
1052	hotā vṛtaḥ manavai yat niṣadya	hotṛ vṛ man yad niṣad
1052	pra me brūta bhāgadheyam yathā vaḥ	pra mad brū bhāgadheya yathā tvad
1052	yena pathā havyam ā vaḥ vahāni	yad pathin havya ā tvad vah
1052	aham hotā ni asīdam yajīyān	mad hotṛ ni sad yajīyas
1052	viśve devāḥ marutaḥ mā junanti	viśva deva marut mad jū
1052	aharahar aśvinā ādhvaryavam vām	ahar ahar aśvin ādhvaryava tvad
1052	brahmā samit bhavati sā āhutiḥ vām	brahman samidh bhū tad āhuti tvad
1052	ayam yaḥ hotā kiḥ u sa yamasya	idam yad hotṛ kis u tad yama
1052	kam api ūhe yat samañjanti devāḥ	ka api ūh yat samañj deva
1052	aharahar jāyate māsimāsi	ahar ahar jan mās mās
1052	athā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham	atha deva dhā havyavāha
1052	mām devāḥ dadhire havyavāham	mad deva dhā havya vāha
1052	apamluktam bahu kṛchrā carantam	apamlukta bahu kṛcchra car
1052	agniḥ vidvān yajñam naḥ kalpayāti	agni vid yajña mad kalpay
1052	pañcayāmam trivṛtam saptatantum	pañcan yāma trivṛt saptan tantu
1052	ā vaḥ yakṣi amṛtatvam suvīram	ā tvad yaj amṛta tva su vīra
1052	yathā vaḥ devāḥ varivaḥ karāṇi	yathā tvad deva varivas kṛ
1052	ā bāhvoḥ vajram indrasya dheyām	ā bāhu vajra indra dhā
1052	atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāti	atha idam viśva pṛtanā ji
1052	trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim	tri śata tri sahasra agni
1052	triṁśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan	triṃśat ca deva navan ca sapary
1052	aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai	ukṣ ghṛta stṛ barhis idam
1052	āt it hotāram ni asādayanta	āt id hotṛ ni sāday
 ---
1053	yam aicchāma manasā saḥ ayam ā agāt	yad iṣ manas tad idam āgā
1053	yajñasya vidvān paruṣaḥ cikitvān	yajña vid parus cit
1053	sa naḥ yakṣat devatātā yajīyān	tad mad yaj devatāti yajīyas
1053	ni hi satsat antaraḥ pūrvaḥ asmat	ni hi sad antara pūrva mad
1053	arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyān	rādh hotṛ niṣad yajīyas
1053	abhi prayāṁsi sudhitāni hi khyat	abhi prayas sudhita hi khyā
1053	yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devān	yaj yajñiya hanta deva
1053	īLāmahai īḍyān ājyena	īḍ īḍ ājya
1053	sādhvīm akar devavītim naḥ adya	sādhu kṛ deva vīti mad adya
1053	yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyām	yajña jihvā vid guhya
1053	saḥ āyuḥ ā agāt surabhiḥ vasānaḥ	tad āyus āgā surabhi vas
1053	bhadrām akar devahūtim naḥ adya	bhadra kṛ deva hūti mad adya
1053	tat adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya	tad adya vāc prathama man
1053	yena asurān abhi devāḥ asāma	yad asura abhi deva as
1053	ūrjādaḥ uta yajñiyāsaḥ	ūrjād uta yajñiya
1053	pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣadhvam	pañcan jana mad hotra juṣ
1053	pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣantām	pañcan jana mad hotra juṣ
1053	gojātāḥ uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ	go jan uta yad yajñiya
1053	pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṁhasaḥ	pṛthivī mad pārthiva pā aṃhas
1053	antarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān	antarikṣa divya pā mad
1053	tantum tanvan rajasaḥ bhānum anu ihi	tantu tan rajas bhānu anu i
1053	jyotiṣmataḥ pathaḥ rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān	jyotiṣmat pathin rakṣ dhī kṛ
1053	anulbaṇam vayata joguvām apaḥ	an ulbaṇa ve jogū apas
1053	manuḥ bhava janayā daivyam janam	manu bhū janay daivya jana
1053	akṣānahaḥ nahyatana uta somyāḥ	akṣānah nah uta somya
1053	iṣkṛṇudhvam raśanāḥ ā uta piṁśata	iṣkṛ raśanā ā uta piś
1053	aṣTāvandhuram vahata abhitaḥ ratham	aṣṭāvandhura vah abhitas ratha
1053	yena devāsaḥ anayan abhi priyam	yad deva nī abhi priya
1053	aśmanvatī rīyate sam rabhadhvam	aśmanvat ri sam rabh
1053	ut tiṣThata pra taratā sakhāyaḥ	ud sthā pra tṛ sakhi
1053	atrā jahāma ye asan aśevāḥ	atra hā yad as aśeva
1053	śivān vayam ut tarema abhi vājān	śiva mad ud tṛ abhi vāja
1053	tvaṣTā māyāḥ vet apasām apastamaḥ	tvaṣṭṛ māyā vid apas apastama
1053	bibhrat pātrā devapānāni śaṁtamā	bhṛ pātra deva pāna śaṃtama
1053	śiśīte nūnam paraśum svāyasam	śā nūnam paraśu su āyasa
1053	yena vṛścāt etaśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	yad vraśc etaśa brahmaṇaspati
1053	sataḥ nūnam kavayaḥ sam śiśīta	as nūnam kavi sam śā
1053	vāśībhiḥ yābhiḥ amṛtāya takṣatha	vāśī yad amṛta takṣ
1053	vidvāṁsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana	vid pada guhya kṛ
1053	yena devāsaḥ amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ	yena deva amṛta tva aś
1053	garbhe yoṣām adadhuḥ vatsam āsani	garbha yoṣā dhā vatsa āsan
1053	apīcyena manasā uta jihvayā	apīcya manas uta jihvā
1053	sa viśvāhā sumanāḥ yogyāḥ abhi	tad viśvāhā sumanas yogya abhi
1053	siṣāsaniḥ vanate kāraḥ it jitim	siṣāsani van kāra id jiti
 ---
1054	tām su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā	tad su tvad kīrti maghavan mahitva
1054	yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām	yat tvad bhī rodas hvā
1054	pra āvaḥ devān ā atiraḥ dāsam ojaḥ	pra av deva ā tṛ dāsa ojas
1054	prajāyai tvasyai yat aśikṣaḥ indra	prajā tva yat śikṣ indra
1054	yat acaraḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ	yat car tanu vṛdh
1054	balāni indra prabruvāṇaḥ janeṣu	bala indra prabrū jana
1054	māyā it sā te yāni yuddhāni āhuḥ	māyā id tad tvad yad yuddha ah
1054	na adya śatrum nanu purā vivitse	na adya śatru nanu purā vid
1054	kaḥ u nu te mahimanaḥ samasya	ka u nu tvad mahiman sama
1054	asmat pūrve ṛṣayaḥ antam āpuḥ	mad pūrva ṛṣi anta āp
1054	yat mātaram ca pitaram ca sākam	yat mātṛ ca pitṛ ca sākam
1054	ajanayathāḥ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ	janay tanū sva
1054	catvāri te asuryāṇi nāma	catur tvad asurya nāman
1054	adābhyāni mahiṣasya santi	adābhya mahiṣa as
1054	tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse	tvad aṅga tad viśva vid
1054	yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavan cakartha	yad karman maghavan kṛ
1054	tvam viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni	tvad viśva dhā kevala
1054	yāni āviḥ yā ca guhā vasūni	yad āvis yad ca guhā vasu
1054	kāmam it me maghavan mā vi tārīḥ	kāma id mad maghavan mā vi tṛ
1054	tvam ājñātā tvam indra asi dātā	tvad ājñātṛ tvad indra as dātṛ
1054	yaḥ adadhāt jyotiṣi jyotiḥ antar	yad dhā jyotis jyotis antar
1054	yaḥ asṛjat madhunā sam madhūni	yad sṛj madhu sam madhu
1054	adha priyam śūṣam indrāya manma	adha priya śūṣa indra manman
1054	brahmakṛtaḥ bṛhadukthāt avāci	brahman kṛt bṛhaduktha vac
 ---
1055	dūre tat nāma guhyam parācaiḥ	dūra tad nāman guhya parācais
1055	yat tvā bhīte ahvayetām vayodhai	yad tvad bhī hvā
1055	ut astabhnāḥ pṛthivīm dyām abhīke	ud stambh pṛthivī div abhīka
1055	bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ	bhrātṛ putra maghavan tviṣ
1055	mahat tat nāma guhyam puruspṛk	mahat tad nāman guhya puruspṛh
1055	yena bhūtam janayaḥ yena bhavyam	yad bhū janay yad bhū
1055	pratnam jātam jyotiḥ yat asya	pratna jan jyotis yad idam
1055	priyam priyāḥ sam aviśanta pañca	priya priya sam viś pañcan
1055	ā rodasī apṛṇāt ā uta madhyam	ā rodas pṛ ā uta madhya
1055	pañca devān ṛtuśaḥ saptasapta	pañcan deva ṛtuśas saptan saptan
1055	catustriṁśatā purudhā vi caṣTe	catustriṃśat purudhā vi cakṣ
1055	sarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vivratena	sa rūpa jyotis vivrata
1055	yat uṣaḥ aucchaḥ prathamā vibhānām	yat uṣas vas prathama vibhā
1055	ajanayaḥ yena puṣTasya puṣTam	janay yena puṣṭa puṣṭa
1055	yat te jāmitvam avaram parasyāḥ	yad tvad jāmi tva avara para
1055	mahat mahatyāḥ asuratvam ekam	mahat mahat asura tva eka
1055	vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām	vidhu drā samana bahu
1055	yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra	yuvan as palita gṛ
1055	devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvā	deva paś kāvya mahitva
1055	adyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna	adya mṛ tad hyas sam an
1055	śākmanā śākaḥ aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ	śākman śāka aruṇa suparṇa
1055	ā yaḥ mahaḥ śūraḥ sanāt anīLaḥ	ā yad mah śūra sanāt anīḍa
1055	yat ciketa satyam it tat na mogham	yad cit satya id tad na mogha
1055	vasu spārham uta jetā uta dātā	vasu spārha uta ji uta dā
1055	ā ebhiḥ dade vṛṣṇyā pauṁsyāni	ā idam dā vṛṣṇya pauṃsya
1055	yebhiḥ aukṣat vṛtrahatyāya vajrī	yad vakṣ vṛtra hatya vajrin
1055	ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahnā	yad karman kṛ mahan
1055	ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ	ṛtekarmam ud jan deva
1055	yujā karmāṇi janayan viśvaujāḥ	yuj karman janay viśva ojas
1055	aśastihā viśvamanāḥ turāṣāT	aśasti han viśva manas turāṣāh
1055	pītvī somasya divaḥ ā vṛdhānaḥ	pā soma div ā vṛdh
1055	śūraḥ niḥ yudhā adhamat dasyūn	śūra niḥ yudh dham dasyu
 ---
1056	idam te ekam paraḥ ū te ekam	idam tvad eka paras u tvad eka
1056	tṛtīyena jyotiṣā sam viśasva	tṛtīya jyotis sam viś
1056	saṁveśane tanvaḥ cāruḥ edhi	saṃveśana tanū cāru as
1056	priyaḥ devānām parame janitre	priya deva parama janitra
1056	tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī	tanū tvad vājin tanū nī
1056	vāmam asmabhyam dhātu śarma tubhyam	vāma mad dhā śarman tvad
1056	ahrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devān	a hvṛ mah dharuṇa deva
1056	divi iva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāḥ	div iva jyotis sva ā mī
1056	vājī asi vājinenā suvenīḥ	vājin as vājina suvena
1056	suvitaḥ stomam suvitaḥ divam gāḥ	suvita stoma suvita div gā
1056	suvitaḥ dharma prathamā anu satyā	suvita dharman prathama anu satya
1056	suvitaḥ devān suvitaḥ anu patma	suvita deva suvita anu patman
1056	mahimnaḥ eṣām pitaraḥ cana īśire	mahiman idam pitṛ cana īś
1056	devāḥ deveṣu adadhuḥ api kratum	deva deva dhā api kratu
1056	sam avivyacuḥ uta yāni atviṣuḥ	sam vyac uta yad tviṣ
1056	ā eṣām tanūṣu ni viviśuḥ punar	ā idam tanū ni viś punar
1056	sahobhiḥ viśvam pari cakramuḥ rajaḥ	sahas viśva pari kram rajas
1056	pūrvā dhāmāni amitā mimānāḥ	pūrva dhāman amita mā
1056	tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire	tanū viśva bhuvana ni yam
1056	pra asārayanta purudha prajāḥ anu	prasāray purudhā prajā anu
1056	dvidhā sūnavaḥ asuram svarvidam	dvidhā sūnu asura svar vid
1056	ā asthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā	āsthāpay tṛtīya karman
1056	svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryam sahaḥ	sva prajā pitṛ pitrya sahas
1056	ā avareṣu adadhuḥ tantum ātatam	avara dhā tantu ātan
1056	nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	nau na kṣodas pradiś pṛthivī
1056	svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā	svasti ati durga viśva
1056	svām prajām bṛhadukthaḥ mahitvā	sva prajā bṛhaduktha mahitva
1056	ā avareṣu adadhāt ā pareṣu	avara dhā ā para
 ---
1057	mā pra gāma pathaḥ vayam	mā pra gā pathin mad
1057	mā yajñāt indra sominaḥ	mā yajña indra somin
1057	mā antar sthuḥ naḥ arātayaḥ	mā antar sthā mad arāti
1057	yaḥ yajñasya prasādhanaḥ	yad yajña prasādhana
1057	tantuḥ deveṣu ātataḥ	tantu deva ātan
1057	tam āhutam naśīmahi	tad āhu naś
1057	manaḥ nu ā huvāmahe	manas nu ā hvā
1057	nārāśaṁsena somena	nārāśaṃsa soma
1057	pitṛṛṇām ca manmabhiḥ	pitṛ ca manman
1057	ā te etu manaḥ punar	ā tvad i manas punar
1057	kratve dakṣāya jīvase	kratu dakṣa jīv
1057	jyok ca sūryam dṛśe	jyok ca sūrya dṛś
1057	punar naḥ pitaraḥ manaḥ	punar mad pitṛ manas
1057	dadātu daivyaḥ janaḥ	dā daivya jana
1057	jīvam vrātam sacemahi	jīva vrāta sac
1057	vayam soma vrate tava	mad soma vrata tvad
1057	manaḥ tanūṣu bibhrataḥ	manas tanū bhṛ
1057	prajāvantaḥ sacemahi	prajāvat sac
 ---
1058	yat te yamam vaivasvatam	yat tvad yama vaivasvata
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te divam yat pṛthivīm	yat tvad div yat pṛthivī
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te bhūmim caturbhṛṣTim	yat tvad bhūmi catur bhṛṣṭi
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te catasraḥ pradiśaḥ	yat tvad catur pradiś
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te samudram arṇavam	yat tvad samudra arṇava
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te marīcīḥ pravataḥ	yat tvad marīci pravat
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te apaḥ yat oṣadhīḥ	yat tvad ap yat oṣadhi
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te sūryam yat uṣasam	yat tvad sūrya yat uṣas
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te parvatān bṛhataḥ	yat tvad parvata bṛhat
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te viśvam idam jagat	yat tvad viśva idam jagant
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te parāḥ parāvataḥ	yat tvad para parāvat
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
1058	yat te bhūtam ca bhavyam ca	yat tvad bhū ca bhū ca
1058	manaḥ jagāma dūrakam	manas gam dūrakam
1058	tat te ā vartayāmasi	tad tvad ā vartay
1058	iha kṣayāya jīvase	iha kṣaya jīv
 ---
1059	pra tāri āyuḥ prataram navīyaḥ	pra tṛ āyus prataram navīyas
1059	sthātārā iva kratumatā rathasya	sthātṛ iva kratumat ratha
1059	adha cyavānaḥ ut tavīti artham	adha cyavāna ud tu artha
1059	parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām	parātaram su nirṛti hā
1059	sāman nu rāye nidhimat nu annam	sāman nu rai nidhimat nu anna
1059	karāmahe su purudha śravāṁsi	kṛ su purudhā śravas
1059	tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā mamattu	tad mad viśva jaritṛ mad
1059	parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām	parātaram su nirṛti hā
1059	abhī su aryaḥ pauṁsyaiḥ bhavema	abhi su ari pauṃsya bhū
1059	dyauḥ na bhūmim girayaḥ na ajrān	div na bhūmi giri na ajra
1059	tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā ciketa	tad mad viśva jaritṛ cit
1059	parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām	parātaram su nirṛti hā
1059	mā u su naḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ	mā u su mad soma mṛtyu parā dā
1059	paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam	paś nu sūrya uccar
1059	dyubhiḥ hitaḥ jarimā sū naḥ astu	div dhā jariman su mad as
1059	parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām	parātaram su nirṛti hā
1059	asunīte manaḥ asmāsu dhāraya	asunīti manas mad dhāray
1059	jīvātave su pra tirā naḥ āyuḥ	jīvātu su pra tṛ mad āyus
1059	rārandhi naḥ sūryasya saṁdṛśi	ran mad sūrya saṃdṛś
1059	ghṛtena tvam tanvam vardhayasva	ghṛta tvad tanū vardhay
1059	asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ	asunīti punar mad cakṣus
1059	punar prāṇam iha naḥ dhehi bhogam	punar prāṇa iha mad dhā bhoga
1059	jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam	jyok paś sūrya uccar
1059	anumate mṛLayā naḥ svasti	anumati mṛḍay mad svasti
1059	punar naḥ asum pṛthivī dadātu	punar mad asu pṛthivī dā
1059	punar dyauḥ devī punar antarikṣam	punar div devī punar antarikṣa
1059	punar naḥ somaḥ tanvam dadātu	punar mad soma tanū dā
1059	punar pūṣā pathyām yā svastiḥ	punar pūṣan pathyā yad svasti
1059	śam rodasī subandhave	śam rodasī subandhu
1059	yahvī ṛtasya mātarā	yahvī ṛta mātṛ
1059	bharatām apa yat rapaḥ	bhṛ apa yad rapas
1059	dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ	div pṛthivī kṣam rapas
1059	mā u su te kim cana amamat	mā u su tvad ka cana am
1059	ava dvake ava trikā	ava dvaka ava trika
1059	divaḥ caranti bheṣajā	div car bheṣaja
1059	kṣamā cariṣṇu ekakam	kṣam cariṣṇu ekaka
1059	bharatām apa yat rapaḥ	bhṛ apa yad rapas
1059	dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ	div pṛthivī kṣam rapas
1059	mā u su te kim cana amamat	mā u su tvad ka cana am
1059	sam indra īraya gām	sam indra īray go
1059	anaḍvāham yaḥ ā avahat	anaḍuh yad āvah
1059	uśīnarāṇyāḥ anaḥ	uśīnarāṇī anas
1059	bharatām apa yat rapaḥ	bhṛ apa yad rapas
1059	dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ	div pṛthivī kṣam rapas
1059	mā u su te kim cana amamat	mā u su tvad ka cana am
 ---
1060	ā janam tveṣasaṁdṛśam	ā jana tveṣa saṃdṛś
1060	māhīnānām upastutam	māhīna upastu
1060	aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ	gam bhṛ namas
1060	asamātim nitośanam	asamāti nitośana
1060	tveṣam niyayinam ratham	tveṣa niyayin ratha
1060	bhajerathasya satpatim	bhajeratha sat pati
1060	yaḥ janān mahiṣān iva	yad jana mahiṣa iva
1060	atitasthau pavīravān	atiṣṭhā pavīravat
1060	uta apavīravān yudhā	uta a pavīravat yudh
1060	yasya ikṣvākuḥ upa vrate	yad ikṣvāku upa vrata
1060	revān marāyī edhate	revat marāyin edh
1060	divi iva pañca kṛṣTayaḥ	div iva pañcan kṛṣṭi
1060	indra kṣatrā asamātiṣu	indra kṣatra asamāti
1060	rathaproṣTheṣu dhāraya	rathaproṣṭha dhāray
1060	divi iva sūryam dṛśe	div iva sūrya dṛś
1060	agastyasya nadbhyaḥ	agastya nadh
1060	saptī yunakṣi rohitā	sapti yuj rohita
1060	paṇīn ni akramīḥ abhi	paṇi ni kram abhi
1060	viśvān rājan arādhasaḥ	viśva rājan arādhas
1060	ayam mātā ayam pitā	idam mātṛ idam pitṛ
1060	ayam jīvātuḥ ā agamat	idam jīvātu āgam
1060	idam tava prasarpaṇam	idam tvad prasarpaṇa
1060	subandho ā ihi niḥ ihi	subandhu e niḥ i
1060	yathā yugam varatrayā	yathā yuga varatrā
1060	nahyanti dharuṇāya kam	nah dharuṇa kaṃ
1060	evā dādhāra te manaḥ	eva dhṛ tvad manas
1060	jīvātave na mṛtyave	jīvātu na mṛtyu
1060	atha u ariṣTatātaye	atho ariṣṭatāti
1060	yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī	yathā idam pṛthivī mah
1060	dādhāra imān vanaspatīn	dhṛ idam vanaspati
1060	evā dādhāra te manaḥ	eva dhṛ tvad manas
1060	jīvātave na mṛtyave	jīvātu na mṛtyu
1060	atha u ariṣTatātaye	atho ariṣṭatāti
1060	yamāt aham vaivasvatāt	yama mad vaivasvata
1060	subandhoḥ manaḥ ā abharam	subandhu manas ābhṛ
1060	jīvātave na mṛtyave	jīvātu na mṛtyu
1060	atha u ariṣTatātaye	atho ariṣṭatāti
1060	nyak vātaḥ ava vāti	nyāñc vāta ava vā
1060	nyak tapati sūryaḥ	nyāñc tap sūrya
1060	nīcīnam aghnyā duhe	nīcīna aghnyā duh
1060	nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ	nyāñc bhū tvad rapas
1060	ayam me hastaḥ bhagavān	idam mad hasta bhagavat
1060	ayam me bhagavattaraḥ	idam mad bhagavattara
1060	ayam me viśvabheṣajaḥ	idam mad viśva bheṣaja
1060	ayam śivābhimarśanaḥ	idam śiva abhimarśana
 ---
1061	idam itthā raudram gūrtavacāḥ	idam itthā raudra gūrta vacas
1061	brahma kratvā śacyām antar ājau	brahman kratu śacī antar āji
1061	krāṇā yat asya pitarā maṁhaneṣThāḥ	kṛ yad idam pitṛ maṃhaneṣṭhā
1061	parṣat pakthe ahan ā sapta hotṛṛn	pṛ paktha ahar ā saptan hotṛ
1061	saḥ it dānāya dabhyāya vanvan	tad id dāna dabhya van
1061	cyavānaḥ sūdaiḥ amimīta vedim	cyavāna sūda mā vedi
1061	tūrvayāṇaḥ gūrtavacastamaḥ	tūrvayāṇa gūrtavacastama
1061	kṣodaḥ na retaḥ itaūti siñcat	kṣodas na retas itaūti sic
1061	manaḥ na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmam	manas na yad havana tigma
1061	vipaḥ śacyā vanuthaḥ dravantā	vip śacī van dru
1061	ā yaḥ śaryābhiḥ tuvinṛmṇaḥ asya	ā yad śaryā tuvi nṛmṇa idam
1061	aśrīṇīta ādiśam gabhastau	āśrī ādiś gabhasti
1061	kṛṣṇā yat goṣu aruṇīṣu sīdat	kṛṣṇa yat go aruṇī sad
1061	divaḥ napātā aśvinā huve vām	div napāt aśvin hvā tvad
1061	vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annam	vī mad yajña ā gam mad anna
1061	vavanvāṁsā na iṣam asmṛtadhrū	van na iṣ asmṛtadhru
1061	prathiṣTa yasya vīrakarmam iṣṇat	prath yad vīrakarma iṣ
1061	anuṣThitam nu naryaḥ apa auhat	anuṣṭhā nu narya apoh
1061	punar tat ā vṛhati yat kanāyāḥ	punar tad ā vṛh yad kanā
1061	duhituḥ āḥ anubhṛtam anarvā	duhitṛ ā anubhṛ anarvan
1061	madhyā yat kartvam abhavat abhīke	madhyā yad kṛ bhū abhīka
1061	kāmam kṛṇvāne pitari yuvatyām	kāma kṛ pitṛ yuvati
1061	manānak retaḥ jahatuḥ viyantā	manānaś retas hā vī
1061	sānau niṣiktam sukṛtasya yonau	sānu niṣic su kṛ yoni
1061	pitā yat svām duhitaram adhiṣkan	pitṛ yat sva duhitṛ adhi skand
1061	kṣmayā retaḥ saṁjagmānaḥ ni siñcat	kṣmā retas sam gam ni sic
1061	svādhyaḥ ajanayan brahma devāḥ	su ādhī janay brahman deva
1061	vāstoḥ patim vratapām niḥ atakṣan	vāstoṣpati vrata pā niḥ takṣ
1061	saḥ īm vṛṣā na phenam asyat ājau	tad īṃ vṛṣan na phena as āji
1061	smat ā parā ait apa dabhracetāḥ	smat ā pare apa dabhra cetas
1061	sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛk	sṛ pad na dakṣiṇā parāvṛj
1061	na tāḥ nu me pṛśanyaḥ jagṛbhre	na tad nu mad pṛśana grah
1061	makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyāḥ upabdiḥ	makṣū na vahni prajā upabdi
1061	agnim na nagnaḥ upa sīdat ūdhar	agni na nagna upa sad ūdhas
1061	sanitā idhmam sanitā uta vājam	san idhma san uta vāja
1061	sa dhartā jajñe sahasā yavīyut	tad dhartṛ jan sahas yavīyudh
1061	makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navagvāḥ	makṣū kanā sakhya navagva
1061	ṛtam vadantaḥ ṛtayuktim agman	ṛta vad ṛta yukti gam
1061	dvibarhasaḥ ye upa gopam ā aguḥ	dvibarhas yad upa gopa āgā
1061	adakṣiṇāsaḥ acyutā dudukṣan	a dakṣiṇā acyuta dudukṣ
1061	makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navīyaḥ	makṣū kanā sakhya navīyas
1061	rādhaḥ na retaḥ ṛtam it turaṇyan	rādhas na retas ṛta id turaṇy
1061	śuci yat te rekṇaḥ āyajanta	śuci yad tvad rekṇas āyaj
1061	sabardughāyāḥ payaḥ usriyāyāḥ	sabardugha payas usriyā
1061	paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanta	paśu yat paścā viyuti budh
1061	iti bravīti vaktarī rarāṇaḥ	iti brū vaktṛ rā
1061	vasoḥ vasutvā kāravaḥ anehāḥ	vasu vasu tva kāru anehas
1061	viśvam viveṣTi draviṇam upa kṣu	viśva viṣ draviṇa upa kṣu
1061	tat it nu asya pariṣadvānaḥ agman	tad id nu idam pariṣadvan gam
1061	purū sadantaḥ nārṣadam bibhitsan	puru sad nārṣada bibhits
1061	vi śuṣṇasya saṁgrathitam anarvā	vi śuṣṇa saṃgranth anarvan
1061	vidat puruprajātasya guhā yat	vid puru prajan guhā yad
1061	bhargaḥ ha nāma uta yasya devāḥ	bhargas ha nāman uta yad deva
1061	svar na ye triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ	svar na yad triṣadhastha niṣad
1061	agniḥ ha nāma uta jātavedāḥ	agni ha nāman uta jātavedas
1061	śrudhī naḥ hotar ṛtasya hotā adhruk	śru mad hotṛ ṛta hotṛ adruh
1061	uta tyā me raudrau arcimantā	uta tya mad raudra arcimat
1061	nāsatyau indra gūrtaye yajadhyai	nāsatya indra gūrti yaj
1061	manuṣvat vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā	manuṣvat vṛktabarhis rā
1061	mandū hitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū	mandu hitaprayas viś yajyu
1061	ayam stutaḥ rājā vandi vedhāḥ	idam stu rājan vand vedhas
1061	apaḥ ca vipraḥ tarati svasetuḥ	ap ca vipra tṛ sva setu
1061	sa kakṣīvantam rejayat saḥ agnim	tad kakṣīvant rejay tad agni
1061	nemim na cakram arvataḥ raghudru	nemi na cakra arvant raghudru
1061	sa dvibandhuḥ vaitaraṇaḥ yaṣTā	tad dvi bandhu vaitaraṇa yaṣṭṛ
1061	sabardhum dhenum asvam duhadhyai	sabardhu dhenu duh
1061	sam yat mitrāvaruṇā vṛñje ukthaiḥ	sam yat mitrāvaruṇa vṛj uktha
1061	jyeṣThebhiḥ aryamaṇam varūthaiḥ	jyeṣṭha aryaman varūtha
1061	tadbandhuḥ sūriḥ divi te dhiyaṁdhāḥ	tad bandhu sūri div tvad
1061	nābhānediṣThaḥ rapati pra venan	nābhānediṣṭha rap pra ven
1061	sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramā asya vā gha	tad mad nābhi parama idam vā gha
1061	aham tat paścā katithaḥ cit āsa	mad tad paścā katitha cit as
1061	iyam me nābhiḥ iha me sadhastham	idam mad nābhi iha mad sadhastha
1061	ime me devāḥ ayam asmi sarvaḥ	idam mad deva idam as sarva
1061	dvijāḥ aha prathamajāḥ ṛtasya	dvija aha prathama ja ṛta
1061	idam dhenuḥ aduhat jāyamānā	idam dhenu duh jan
1061	adha āsu mandraḥ aratiḥ vibhāvā	mandra arati vibhāvan
1061	ava syati dvivartaniḥ vaneṣāT	ava sā dvi vartani vaneṣah
1061	ūrdhvā yat śreṇiḥ na śiśuḥ dan	ūrdhva yat śreṇi na śiśu
1061	makṣū sthiram śevṛdham sūta mātā	makṣū sthira śevṛdha sū mātṛ
1061	adhā gāvaḥ upamātim kanāyāḥ	adha go upamāti kanā
1061	anu śvāntasya kasya cit parā īyuḥ	anu śvānta ka cit pare
1061	śrudhi tvam sudraviṇaḥ naḥ tvam yāT	śru tvad su draviṇas mad tvad yaj
1061	āśvaghnasya vāvṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ	āśvaghna vṛdh sūnṛtā
1061	adha tvam indra viddhi asmān	adha tvad indra vid mad
1061	mahaḥ rāye nṛpate vajrabāhuḥ	mah rai nṛpati vajra bāhu
1061	rakṣā ca naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn	rakṣ ca mad maghavan pā sūri
1061	anehasaḥ te harivaḥ abhiṣTau	anehas tvad harivat abhiṣṭi
1061	adha yat rājānā gaviṣTau	adha yat rājan gaviṣṭi
1061	sarat saraṇyuḥ kārave jaraṇyuḥ	sṛ saraṇyu kāru jaraṇyu
1061	vipraḥ preṣThaḥ sa hi eṣām babhūva	vipra preṣṭha tad hi idam bhū
1061	parā ca vakṣat uta parṣat enān	parā ca vah uta pṛ enad
1061	adhā nu asya jenyasya puṣTau	adha nu idam jenya puṣṭi
1061	vṛthā rebhantaḥ īmahe tat ū nu	vṛthā ribh i tad ū nu
1061	saraṇyuḥ asya sūnuḥ aśvaḥ	saraṇyu idam sūnu aśva
1061	vipraḥ ca asi śravasaḥ ca sātau	vipra ca as śravas ca sāti
1061	yuvoḥ yadi sakhyāya asme	tvad yadi sakhya mad
1061	śardhāya stomam jujuṣe namasvān	śardha stoma juṣ namasvat
1061	viśvatra yasmin ā giraḥ samīcīḥ	viśvatra yad ā gir gātu
1061	pūrvī iva gātuḥ dāśat sūnṛtāyai	ā gir gātu dāś sūnṛtā
1061	sa gṛṇānaḥ adbhiḥ devavān	tad gṛ ap devavat
1061	iti subandhuḥ namasā sūktaiḥ	iti su bandhu namas sūkta
1061	vardhat ukthaiḥ vacobhiḥ ā hi nūnam	vṛdh uktha vacas ā hi nūnam
1061	vi adhvā eti payasaḥ usriyāyāḥ	vi adhvan i payas usriyā
1061	te ū su naḥ mahaḥ yajatrāḥ	tad ū su mad yajatra
1061	bhūta devāsaḥ ūtaye sajoṣāḥ	bhū deva ūti sa joṣa
1061	ye vājān anayatā viyantaḥ	yad vāja nī vī
1061	ye sthā nicetāraḥ amūrāḥ	yad as nicetṛ amūra
 ---
1062	ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktāḥ	yad yajña dakṣiṇā samañj
1062	indrasya sakhyam amṛtatvam ānaśa	indra sakhya amṛta tva aś
1062	tebhyaḥ bhadram aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu	tad bhadra aṅgiras tvad as
1062	prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ	prati grah mānava sumedhas
1062	ye udājan pitaraḥ gomayam vasu	yad udaj pitṛ go maya vasu
1062	ṛtena abhindan parivatsare valam	ṛta bhid parivatsara vala
1062	dīrghāyutvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu	dīrgha āyu tva aṅgiras tvad as
1062	prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ	prati grah mānava sumedhas
1062	ye ṛtena sūryam ā arohayan divi	yad ṛta sūrya ārohay div
1062	aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaram vi	prathay pṛthivī mātṛ vi
1062	suprajāstvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu	suprajāstva aṅgiras tvad as
1062	prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ	prati grah mānava sumedhas
1062	ayam nābhā vadati valgu vaḥ gṛhe	idam nābhi vad valgu tvad gṛha
1062	devaputrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ tat śṛṇotana	deva putra ṛṣi tad śru
1062	subrahmaṇyam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu	subrahmaṇya aṅgiras tvad as
1062	prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ	prati grah mānava sumedhas
1062	virūpāsaḥ it ṛṣayaḥ	virūpa id ṛṣi
1062	te it gambhīravepasaḥ	tad id gambhīra vepas
1062	te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavaḥ	tad aṅgiras sūnu
1062	te agneḥ pari jajñire	tad agni pari jan
1062	ye agneḥ pari jajñire	yad agni pari jan
1062	virūpāsaḥ divaḥ pari	virūpa div pari
1062	navagvaḥ nu daśagvaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ	navagva nu daśagva aṅgirastama
1062	sacā deveṣu maṁhate	sacā deva mah
1062	indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghataḥ	indra yuj niḥ sṛj vāghant
1062	vrajam gomantam aśvinam	vraja gomat aśvin
1062	sahasram me dadataḥ aṣTakarṇyaḥ	sahasra mad dā aṣṭakarṇī
1062	śravaḥ deveṣu akrata	śravas deva kṛ
1062	pra nūnam jāyatām ayam	pra nūnam jan idam
1062	manuḥ tokma iva rohatu	manu tokman iva ruh
1062	yaḥ sahasram śatāśvam	yad sahasra śata aśva
1062	sadyaḥ dānāya maṁhate	sadyas dāna mah
1062	na tam aśnoti kaḥ cana	na tad aś kaścana
1062	divaḥ iva sānu ārabham	div iva sānu ārabh
1062	sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā	sāvarṇya dakṣiṇā
1062	vi sindhuḥ iva paprathe	vi sindhu iva prath
1062	uta dāsā pariviṣe	uta dāsa pariviṣ
1062	smaddiṣTī goparīṇasā	smaddiṣṭi go parīṇas
1062	yaduḥ turvaḥ ca māmahe	yadu turva ca mah
1062	sahasradāḥ grāmaṇīḥ mā riṣat manuḥ	sahasra dā grāmaṇī mā riṣ manu
1062	sūryeṇa asya yatamānā etu dakṣiṇā	sūrya idam yat i dakṣiṇā
1062	sāvarṇeḥ devāḥ pra tirantu āyuḥ	sāvarṇi deva pra tṛ āyus
1062	yasmin aśrāntāḥ asanāma vājam	yad a śram san vāja
 ---
1063	parāvataḥ ye didhiṣante āpyam	parāvat yad didhiṣ āpya
1063	manuprītāsaḥ janimā vivasvataḥ	manu prī janiman vivasvant
1063	yayāteḥ ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi	yayāti yad nahuṣya barhis
1063	devāḥ āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ	deva ās tad adhi brū mad
1063	viśvā hi vaḥ namasyāni vandyā	viśva hi tvad namasya vand
1063	nāmāni devāḥ uta yajñiyāni vaḥ	nāman deva uta yajñiya tvad
1063	ye stha jātāḥ aditeḥ adbhyaḥ pari	yad as jan aditi ap pari
1063	ye pṛthivyāḥ te me iha śrutā havam	yad pṛthivī tad mad iha śru hava
1063	yebhyaḥ mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ	yad mātṛ madhumat pinv payas
1063	pīyūṣam dyauḥ aditiḥ adribarhāḥ	pīyūṣa div aditi adribarhas
1063	ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharān svapnasaḥ	uktha śuṣma vṛṣabhara svapnas
1063	tān ādityān anu madā svastaye	tad āditya anu mad svasti
1063	nṛcakṣasaḥ animiṣantaḥ arhaṇā	nṛ cakṣas a nimiṣ arhaṇa
1063	bṛhat devāsaḥ amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ	bṛhat deva amṛta tva aś
1063	jyotīrathāḥ ahimāyāḥ anāgasaḥ	jyotīratha ahi māyā anāgas
1063	divaḥ varṣmāṇam vasate svastaye	div varṣman vas svasti
1063	samrājaḥ ye suvṛdhaḥ yajñam āyayuḥ	samrāj yad suvṛdh yajña āyā
1063	aparihvṛtāḥ dadhire divi kṣayam	aparihvṛta dhā div kṣaya
1063	tān ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhiḥ	tad ā vivās namas suvṛkti
1063	mahaḥ ādityān aditim svastaye	āditya aditi svasti
1063	kaḥ vaḥ stomam rādhati yam jujoṣatha	ka tvad stoma rādh yad juṣ
1063	viśve devāsaḥ manuṣaḥ yati sthana	viśva deva manus yati as
1063	kaḥ vaḥ adhvaram tuvijātāḥ aram karat	ka tvad adhvara tu vijan aram kṛ
1063	yaḥ naḥ parṣat ati aṁhaḥ svastaye	yad mad pṛ ati aṃhas svasti
1063	yebhyaḥ hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ	yad hotrā prathama ā yaj manu
1063	samiddhāgniḥ manasā sapta hotṛbhiḥ	samindh agni manas saptan hotṛ
1063	te ādityāḥ abhayam śarma yacchata	tad āditya abhaya śarman yam
1063	sugā naḥ karta supathā svastaye	su ga mad kṛ su patha svasti
1063	ye īśire bhuvanasya pracetasaḥ	yad īś bhuvana pracetas
1063	viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ ca mantavaḥ	viśva sthātṛ jagat ca mantu
1063	te naḥ kṛtāt akṛtāt enasaḥ pari	tad mad kṛ akṛta enas pari
1063	adyā devāsaḥ pipṛtā svastaye	adya deva pṛ svasti
1063	bhareṣu indram suhavam havāmahe	bhara indra su hava hvā
1063	aṁhomucam sukṛtam daivyam janam	aṃhas muc su kṛt daivya jana
1063	agnim mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagam	agni mitra varuṇa sāti bhaga
1063	dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye	dyāvāpṛthivī marut svasti
1063	sutrāmāṇam pṛthivīm dyām anehasam	su trāman pṛthivī div anehas
1063	suśarmāṇam aditim supraṇītim	su śarman aditi su praṇīti
1063	daivīm nāvam svaritrām anāgasam	daiva nau su aritra anāgas
1063	asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye	asravat ā ruh svasti
1063	viśve yajatrāḥ adhi vocata ūtaye	viśva yajatra adhi vac ūti
1063	trāyadhvam naḥ durevāyāḥ abhihrutaḥ	trā mad dureva abhihrut
