1063	satyayā vaḥ devahūtyā huvema	satya tvad devahūti hvā
1063	śṛṇvataḥ devāḥ avase svastaye	śru deva av svasti
1063	apa amīvām apa viśvām anāhutim	apa amīvā apa viśva anāhuti
1063	apa arātim durvidatrām aghāyataḥ	apa arāti durvidatra aghāy
1063	āre devāḥ dveṣaḥ asmat yuyotana	āre deva dveṣas mad yu
1063	uru naḥ śarma yacchatā svastaye	uru mad śarman yam svasti
1063	ariṣTaḥ sa martaḥ viśvaḥ edhate	ariṣṭa tad marta viśva edh
1063	pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari	pra prajā jan dharman pari
1063	yam ādityāsaḥ nayathā sunītibhiḥ	yad āditya nī sunīti
1063	ati viśvāni duritā svastaye	ati viśva durita svasti
1063	yam devāsaḥ avatha vājasātau	yad deva av vājasāti
1063	yam śūrasātā marutaḥ hite dhane	yad śūrasāti marut dhā dhana
1063	prātaryāvāṇam ratham indra sānasim	prātaryāvan ratha indra sānasi
1063	ariṣyantam ā ruhemā svastaye	ariṣyat ā ruh svasti
1063	svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu	svasti mad pathyā dhanvan
1063	svasti apsu vṛjane svarvati	svasti ap vṛjana svarvat
1063	svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu	svasti mad putrakṛtha yoni
1063	svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana	svasti rai marut dhā
1063	svastiḥ it hi prapathe śreṣThā	svasti id hi prapatha śreṣṭha
1063	rekṇasvatī abhi yā vāmam eti	rekṇasvat abhi yad vāma i
1063	sā naḥ amā sa u araṇe ni pātu	tad mad amā tad u araṇa ni pā
1063	svāveśā bhavatu devagopā	su āveśa bhū deva gopa
1063	evā plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ	eva plati sūnu vṛdh tvad
1063	viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī	viśva āditya aditi manīṣin
1063	īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena	īśāna nṛ amartya
1063	astāvi janaḥ divyaḥ gayena	stu jan divya gaya
 ---
1064	kathā devānām katamasya yāmani	kathā deva katama yāman
1064	sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe	sumantu nāman śru man
1064	kaḥ mṛLāti katamaḥ naḥ mayaḥ karat	ka mṛḍ katama mad mayas kṛ
1064	katamaḥ ūtī abhi ā vavartati	katama ūti abhi ā vṛt
1064	kratūyanti kratavaḥ hṛtsu dhītayaḥ	kratūy kratu hṛd dhīti
1064	venanti venāḥ patayanti ā diśaḥ	ven vena patay ā diś
1064	na marḍitā vidyate anyaḥ ebhyaḥ	na marḍitṛ vid anya idam
1064	deveṣu me adhi kāmāḥ ayaṁsata	deva mad adhi kāma yam
1064	narā vā śaṁsam pūṣaṇam agohyam	nara vā śaṃsa pūṣan agohya
1064	agnim deveddham abhi arcase girā	agni deva indh abhi arc gir
1064	sūryāmāsā candramasā yamam divi	sūryāmāsa candramas yama div
1064	tritam vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā	trita vāta uṣas aktu aśvin
1064	kathā kaviḥ tuvīravān kayā girā	kathā kavi tuvīravat ka gir
1064	bṛhaspatiḥ vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ	bṛhaspati vṛdh suvṛkti
1064	ajaḥ ekapāt suhavebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	aja ekapād su hava ṛkvan
1064	ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyaḥ havīmani	ahi śru budhnya havīman
1064	dakṣasya vā adite janmani vrate	dakṣa vā aditi janman vrata
1064	rājānā mitrāvaruṇā ā vivāsasi	rājan mitrāvaruṇa vivās
1064	atūrtapanthāḥ pururathaḥ aryamā	a tṛ pathin puru ratha aryaman
1064	saptahotā viṣurūpeṣu janmasu	saptan hotṛ viṣurūpa janman
1064	te naḥ arvantaḥ havanaśrutaḥ havam	tad mad arvant havana śrut hava
1064	viśve śṛṇvantu vājinaḥ mitadravaḥ	viśva śru vājin mitadru
1064	sahasrasāḥ medhasātau iva tmanā	sahasra sā medha sāti iva tman
1064	mahaḥ ye dhanam samitheṣu jabhrire	mahat yad dhana samitha bhṛ
1064	pra vaḥ vāyum rathayujam puraṁdhim	pra tvad vāyu ratha yuj purandhi
1064	stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvam sakhyāya pūṣaṇam	stoma kṛ sakhya pūṣan
1064	te hi devasya savituḥ savīmani	tad hi deva savitṛ savīman
1064	kratum sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ	kratu sac sacit sacetas
1064	triḥ sapta sasrāḥ nadyaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ	tris saptan sasra nadī mahi ap
1064	vanaspatīn parvatān agnim ūtaye	vanaspati parvata agni ūti
1064	kṛśānum astṛṛn tiṣyam sadhasthe ā	kṛśānu astṛ tiṣya sadhastha ā
1064	rudram rudreṣu rudriyam havāmahe	rudra rudra rudriya hvā
1064	sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhuḥ ūrmibhiḥ	sarasvatī sarayu sindhu ūrmi
1064	mahaḥ mahīḥ avasā ā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ	mahas mahi avas i vakṣaṇa
1064	devīḥ āpaḥ mātaraḥ sūdayitnvaḥ	devī ap mātṛ sūdayitnu
1064	ghṛtavat payaḥ madhumat naḥ arcata	ghṛtavat payas madhumat mad arc
1064	uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu naḥ	uta mātṛ bṛhat diva śru mad
1064	tvaṣTā devebhiḥ janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ	tvaṣṭṛ deva jani pitṛ vacas
1064	ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ	ṛbhukṣan vāja rathaspati bhaga
1064	raṇvaḥ śaṁsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ	raṇva śaṃsa śaśamāna pā mad
1064	raṇvaḥ saṁdṛṣTau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ	raṇva saṃdṛṣṭi pitumat iva kṣaya
1064	bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ	bhadra rudra marut upastuti
1064	gobhiḥ syāma yaśasaḥ janeṣu ā	go as yaśas jana ā
1064	sadā devāsaḥ iLayā sacemahi	sadā deva iḍā sac
1064	yām me dhiyam marutaḥ indra devāḥ	yad mad dhī marut indra deva
1064	adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam	dā varuṇa mitra tvad
1064	tām pīpayata payasā iva dhenum	tad pyā payas iva dhenu
1064	kuvit giraḥ adhi rathe vahātha	kuvid gir adhi ratha vah
1064	kuvit aṅga prati yathā cit asya naḥ	kuvid aṅga prati yathā cit idam mad
1064	sajātyasya marutaḥ bubodhatha	sajātya marut budh
1064	nābhā yatra prathamam saṁnasāmahe	nābhi yatra prathamam sam nas
1064	tatra jāmitvam aditiḥ dadhātu naḥ	tatra jāmi tva aditi dhā mad
1064	te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī	tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātṛ mahi
1064	devī devān janmanā yajñiye itaḥ	devī deva janman yajñiya i
1064	ubhe bibhṛtaḥ ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ	ubh bhṛ ubhaya bharīman
1064	purū retāṁsi pitṛbhiḥ ca siñcataḥ	puru retas pitṛ ca sic
1064	vi sā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam	vi tad hotrā viśva aś vārya
1064	bṛhaspatiḥ aramatiḥ panīyasī	bṛhaspati aramati panīyas
1064	grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat	grāvan yatra madhuṣut vac bṛhat
1064	avīvaśanta matibhiḥ manīṣiṇaḥ	vāś mati manīṣin
1064	evā kaviḥ tuvīravān ṛtajñāḥ	eva kavi tuvīravat ṛta jñā
1064	draviṇasyuḥ draviṇasaḥ cakānaḥ	draviṇasyu draviṇas kan
1064	ukthebhiḥ atra matibhiḥ ca vipraḥ	uktha atra mati ca vipra
1064	apīpayat gayaḥ divyāni janma	pyā gaya divya janman
1064	evā plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ	eva plati sūnu vṛdh tvad
1064	viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī	viśva āditya aditi manīṣin
1064	īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena	īś nṛ amartya
1064	astāvi janaḥ divyaḥ gayena	stu jana divya gaya
 ---
1065	agniḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	agni indra varuṇa mitra aryaman
1065	vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ	vāyu pūṣan sarasvatī sajoṣas
1065	ādityāḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ svar bṛhat	āditya viṣṇu marut svar bṛhat
1065	somaḥ rudraḥ aditiḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	soma rudra aditi brahmaṇaspati
1065	indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī	indra agni vṛtra hatya sat pati
1065	mithaḥ hinvānā tanvā samokasā	mithas hi tanū samokas
1065	antarikṣam mahi ā papruḥ ojasā	antarikṣa mahi ā prā ojas
1065	somaḥ ghṛtaśrīḥ mahimānam īrayan	soma ghṛtaśrī mahiman īray
1065	teṣām hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇām	tad hi mahan mahat anarvan
1065	stomān iyarmi ṛtajñāḥ ṛtāvṛdhām	stoma ṛch ṛta jñā ṛtāvṛdh
1065	ye apsavam arṇavam citrarādhasaḥ	yad apsava arṇava citra rādhas
1065	te naḥ rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ	tad mad rā mahay sumitrya
1065	svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā	svarṇṛ antarikṣa rocana
1065	dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīm skambhuḥ ojasā	dyāvābhūmī pṛthivī skambh ojas
1065	pṛkṣāḥ iva mahayantaḥ surātayaḥ	pṛkṣa iva mahay su rāti
1065	devāḥ stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ	deva stu manuṣa sūri
1065	mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe	mitra śikṣ varuṇa dāś
1065	yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ	yad samrāj manas na pra yu
1065	yayoḥ dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhat	yad dhāman dharman ruc bṛhat
1065	yayoḥ ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau	yad ubh rodasī nādhas vṛ
1065	yā gauḥ vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam	yad go vartani parī niṣkṛta
1065	payaḥ duhānā vratanīḥ avārataḥ	payas duh vratanī avāratas
1065	sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe	tad prabrū varuṇa dāś
1065	devebhyaḥ dāśat haviṣā vivasvate	deva dāś havis vivasvant
1065	divakṣasaḥ agnijihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	divakṣas agni jihvā ṛtāvṛdh
1065	ṛtasya yonim vimṛśantaḥ āsate	ṛta yoni vimṛś ās
1065	dyām skabhitvī apaḥ ā cakruḥ ojasā	div skambh ap ā kṛ ojas
1065	yajñam janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ	yajña jan tanū ni mṛj
1065	parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī	pari kṣi pitṛ pūrvajāvan
1065	ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā	ṛta yoni kṣi samokas
1065	dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate	dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇa savrata
1065	ghṛtavat payaḥ mahiṣāya pinvataḥ	ghṛtavat payas mahiṣa pinv
1065	parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇā	parjanyāvāta vṛṣabha purīṣin
1065	indravāyū varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	indra vāyu varuṇa mitra aryaman
1065	devān ādityān aditim havāmahe	deva āditya aditi hvā
1065	ye pārthivāsaḥ divyāsaḥ apsu ye	yad pārthiva divya ap yad
1065	tvaṣTāram vāyum ṛbhavaḥ ye ohate	tvaṣṭṛ vāyu ṛbhu yad ūh
1065	daivyā hotārau uṣasam svastaye	daivya hotṛ uṣas svasti
1065	bṛhaspatim vṛtrakhādam sumedhasam	bṛhaspati vṛtra khāda sumedhas
1065	indriyam somam dhanasāḥ u īmahe	indriya soma dhana sā u ī
1065	brahma gām aśvam janayantaḥ oṣadhīḥ	brahman go aśva janay oṣadhi
1065	vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatān apaḥ	vanaspati pṛthivī parvata ap
1065	sūryam divi rohayantaḥ sudānavaḥ	sūrya div rohay sudānu
1065	āryā vratā visṛjantaḥ adhi kṣami	ārya vrata visṛj adhi kṣam
1065	bhujyum aṁhasaḥ pipṛthaḥ niḥ aśvinā	bhujyu aṃhas pṛ niḥ aśvin
1065	śyāvam putram vadhrimatyāḥ ajinvatam	śyāva putra vadhrimatī jinv
1065	kamadyuvam vimadāya ūhathuḥ yuvam	kamadyū vimada vah tvad
1065	viṣṇāpvam viśvakāya ava sṛjathaḥ	viṣṇāpū viśvaka ava sṛj
1065	pāvīravī tanyatuḥ ekapāt ajaḥ	pāvīravī tanyatu ekapād aja
1065	divaḥ dhartā sindhuḥ āpaḥ samudriyaḥ	div dhartṛ sindhu ap samudriya
1065	viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṁsi me	viśva deva śru vacas mad
1065	sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ puraṁdhyā	sarasvatī saha dhī puraṃdhi
1065	viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ puraṁdhyā	viśva deva saha dhī puraṃdhi
1065	manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛtajñāḥ	manu yajatra amṛta ṛta jñā
1065	rātiṣācaḥ abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ	rātiṣāc abhiṣāc svar vid
1065	svar giraḥ brahma sūktam juṣerata	svar gir brahman sūkta juṣ
1065	devān vasiṣThaḥ amṛtān vavande	deva vasiṣṭha amṛta vand
1065	ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ	yad viśva bhuvana abhi prasthā
1065	te naḥ rāsantām urugāyam adya	tad mad rā urugāya adya
1065	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
 ---
1066	devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye	deva hvā bṛhat śravas svasti
1066	jyotiṣkṛtaḥ adhvarasya pracetasaḥ	jyotiṣkṛt adhvara pracetas
1066	ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataram viśvavedasaḥ	yad vṛdh pratara viśva vedas
1066	indrajyeṣThāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	indra jyeṣṭha amṛta ṛtāvṛdh
1066	indraprasūtāḥ varuṇapraśiṣTāḥ	indra prasū varuṇa praśās
1066	ye sūryasya jyotiṣaḥ bhāgam ānaśuḥ	yad sūrya jyotis bhāga aś
1066	marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi	marut gaṇa vṛjana manman dhā
1066	māghone yajñam janayanta sūrayaḥ	māghona yajña janay sūri
1066	indraḥ vasubhiḥ pari pātu naḥ gayam	indra vasu pari pā mad gaya
1066	ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu	āditya mad aditi śarman yam
1066	rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ devaḥ mṛLayāti naḥ	rudra rudra deva mṛḍay mad
1066	tvaṣTā naḥ gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu	tvaṣṭṛ mad gnā suvita jinv
1066	aditiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahat	aditi dyāvāpṛthivī ṛta mahat
1066	indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat	indra viṣṇu marut svar bṛhat
1066	devān ādityān avase havāmahe	deva āditya av hvā
1066	vasūn rudrān savitāram sudaṁsasam	vasu rudra savitṛ su daṃsas
1066	sarasvān dhībhiḥ varuṇaḥ dhṛtavrataḥ	sarasvant dhī varuṇa dhṛ vrata
1066	pūṣā viṣṇuḥ mahimā vāyuḥ aśvinā	pūṣan viṣṇu mahiman vāyu aśvin
1066	brahmakṛtaḥ amṛtāḥ viśvavedasaḥ	brahman kṛt amṛta viśva vedas
1066	śarma naḥ yaṁsan trivarūtham aṁhasaḥ	śarman mad yam tri varūtha aṃhas
1066	vṛṣā yajñaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyāḥ	vṛṣan yajña vṛṣan as yajñiya
1066	vṛṣaṇaḥ devāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ	vṛṣan deva vṛṣan haviṣkṛt
1066	vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī	vṛṣan dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvan
1066	vṛṣā parjanyaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣastubhaḥ	vṛṣan parjanya vṛṣan vṛṣa stubh
1066	agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye	agnīṣoma vṛṣan vājasāti
1066	purupraśastā vṛṣaṇau upa bruve	puru praśaṃs vṛṣan upa brū
1066	yau ījire vṛṣaṇaḥ devayajyayā	yad yaj vṛṣan deva yajya
1066	tā naḥ śarma trivarūtham vi yaṁsataḥ	tad mad śarman tri varūtha vi yam
1066	dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyāḥ yajñaniṣkṛtaḥ	dhṛ vrata kṣatriya yajña niṣkṛt
1066	bṛhaddivāḥ adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ	bṛhat diva adhvara abhiśrī
1066	agnihotāraḥ ṛtasāpaḥ adruhaḥ	agni hotṛ ṛtasāp adruh
1066	apaḥ asṛjan anu vṛtratūrye	ap sṛj anu vṛtratūrya
1066	dyāvāpṛthivī janayan abhi vratā	dyāvāpṛthivī janay abhi vrata
1066	āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanināni yajñiyā	ap oṣadhi vanina yajñiya
1066	antarikṣam svar ā papruḥ ūtaye	antarikṣa svar ā prā ūti
1066	vaśam devāsaḥ tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ	vaśa deva tanū ni mṛj
1066	dhartāraḥ divaḥ ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ	dhartṛ div ṛbhu su hasta
1066	vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ	vātāparjanya mahiṣa tanyatu
1066	āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu naḥ giraḥ	ap oṣadhī pra tṛ mad gir
1066	bhagaḥ rātiḥ vājinaḥ yantu me havam	bhaga rāti vājin i mad hava
1066	samudraḥ sindhuḥ rajaḥ antarikṣam	samudra sindhu rajas antarikṣa
1066	ajaḥ ekapāt tanayitnuḥ arṇavaḥ	aja ekapād tanayitnu arṇava
1066	ahiḥ budhnyaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṁsi me	ahi budhnya śru vacas mad
1066	viśve devāsaḥ uta sūrayaḥ mama	viśva deva uta sūri mad
1066	syāma vaḥ manavaḥ devavītaye	as tvad manu deva vīti
1066	prāñcam naḥ yajñam pra nayata sādhuyā	prāñc mad yajña pra nī sādhuyā
1066	ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ	āditya rudra vasu sudānu
1066	imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata	idam brahman śaṃs jinv
1066	daivyā hotārā prathamā purohitā	daivya hotṛ prathama purohita
1066	ṛtasya panthām anu emi sādhuyā	ṛta pathin anu i sādhuyā
1066	kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe	kṣetra pati prativeśa i
1066	viśvān devān amṛtān aprayucchataḥ	viśva deva amṛta aprayucchat
1066	vasiṣThāsaḥ pitṛvat vācam akrata	vasiṣṭha pitṛ vat vāc kṛ
1066	devān īLānāḥ ṛṣivat svastaye	deva īḍ ṛṣi vat svasti
1066	prītāḥ iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etya	prī iva jñāti kāma e
1066	asme devāsaḥ ava dhūnutā vasu	mad deva ava dhū vasu
1066	devān vasiṣThaḥ amṛtān vavande	deva vasiṣṭha amṛta vand
1066	ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ	yad viśva bhuvana abhi prasthā
1066	te naḥ rāsantām urugāyam adya	tad mad rā urugāya adya
1066	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
 ---
1067	imām dhiyam saptaśīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ	idam dhī saptan śīrṣan pitṛ mad
1067	ṛtaprajātām bṛhatīm avindat	ṛta prajan bṛhat vid
1067	turīyam svit janayat viśvajanyaḥ	turīya svid janay viśvajanya
1067	ayāsyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṁsan	ayāsya uktha indra śaṃs
1067	ṛtam śaṁsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ	ṛta śaṃs ṛju dhī
1067	divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ	div putra asura vīra
1067	vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ	vipra pada aṅgiras dhā
1067	yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta	yajña dhāman prathama man
1067	haṁsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ	haṃsa iva sakhi vāvad
1067	aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan	aśmanmaya nahana vyas
1067	bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ	bṛhaspati abhi kanikrad go
1067	uta pra astaut ut ca vidvān agāyat	uta prastu ud ca vid gā
1067	avaḥ dvābhyām paraḥ ekayā gāḥ	avas dvi paras eka go
1067	guhā tiṣThantīḥ anṛtasya setau	guhā sthā anṛta setu
1067	bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ icchan	bṛhaspati tamas jyotis iṣ
1067	ut usrāḥ ā akar vi hi tisraḥ āvar	ud usrā ākṛ vi hi tri vṛ
1067	vibhidyā puram śayathā īm apācīm	vibhid pura śayatha īṃ apāñc
1067	niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat	niḥ tri sākam udadhi kṛt
1067	bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām	bṛhaspati uṣas sūrya go
1067	arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ	arka vid stanay iva div
1067	indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām	indra vala rakṣitṛ dughā
1067	kareṇa iva vi cakartā raveṇa	kara iva vi kṛt rava
1067	svedāñjibhiḥ āśiram icchamānaḥ	sveda añji āśir iṣ
1067	arodayat paṇim ā gāḥ amuṣṇāt	roday paṇi ā go muṣ
1067	saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ	tad īṃ satya sakhi śuc
1067	godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardar	go dhāyas vi dhanasā dardar
1067	brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ	brahmaṇaspati vṛṣan varāha
1067	gharmasvedebhiḥ draviṇam vi ānaT	gharma sveda draviṇa vi naś
1067	te satyena manasā gopatim gāḥ	tad satya manas gopati go
1067	iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ	ī iṣaṇay dhī
1067	bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ	bṛhaspati mithoavadyapa
1067	ut usriyāḥ asṛjata svayugbhiḥ	ud usriyā sṛj sva yuj
1067	tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ	tad vardhay mati śiva
1067	siṁham iva nānadatam sadhasthe	siṃha iva nānad sadhastha
1067	bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau	bṛhaspati vṛṣan śūrasāti
1067	bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum	bhara bhara anu mad jiṣṇu
1067	yadā vājam asanat viśvarūpam	yadā vāja san viśva rūpa
1067	ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma	ā div ruh uttara sadman
1067	bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ	bṛhaspati vṛṣan vardhay
1067	nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā	nānā as bhṛ jyotis ās
1067	satyām āśiṣam kṛṇutā vayodhai	satya āśis kṛ
1067	kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ	kīri cit hi av sva eva
1067	paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ	paścā mṛdh apa bhū viśva
1067	tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve	tad rodasī śru viśvaminva
1067	indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya	indra mahan mahat arṇava
1067	vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya	vi mūrdhan bhid arbuda
1067	ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn	han ahi ri saptan sindhu
1067	devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pra avatam naḥ	deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad
 ---
1068	udaprutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ	udan prut na vi rakṣ
1068	vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ	vāvad abhriya iva ghoṣa
1068	giribhrajaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ	giri bhraj na ūrmi mad
1068	bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan	bṛhaspati abhi arka nū
1068	sam gobhiḥ āṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ	sam go āṅgirasa nakṣ
1068	bhagaḥ iva it aryamaṇam nināya	bhaga iva id aryaman nī
1068	jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti	jana mitra na dampati añj
1068	bṛhaspate vājaya āśūn iva ājau	bṛhaspati vājay āśu iva āji
1068	sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirāḥ	sādhvarya atithin iṣira
1068	spārhāḥ suvarṇāḥ anavadyarūpāḥ	spārha su varṇa anavadya rūpa
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyaḥ vitūryā	bṛhaspati parvata vitṛ
1068	niḥ gāḥ ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ	niḥ go vap yava iva sthivi
1068	āpruṣāyan madhunā ṛtasya yonim	āpruṣāy madhu ṛta yoni
1068	avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva dyoḥ	avakṣip arka ulkā iva div
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ	bṛhaspati uddhṛ aśman go
1068	bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vi tvacam bibheda	bhūmi udan iva vi tvac bhid
1068	apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣāt	apa jyotis tamas antarikṣa
1068	udnaḥ śīpālam iva vātaḥ ājat	udan śīpāla iva vāta aj
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśyā valasya	bṛhaspati anumṛś vala
1068	abhram iva vātaḥ ā cakre ā gāḥ	abhra iva vāta ā kṛ ā go
1068	yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet	yadā vala pī jasu bhid
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ agnitapobhiḥ arkaiḥ	bṛhaspati agni tapas arka
1068	dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣTam ā adat	dat na jihvā pariviṣ ad
1068	āviḥ nidhīn akṛṇot usriyāṇām	āvis nidhi kṛ usriyā
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyat āsām	bṛhaspati man hi tya idam
1068	nāma svarīṇām sadane guhā yat	nāman svari sadana guhā yad
1068	āṇḍā iva bhittvā śakunasya garbham	āṇḍa iva bhid śakuna garbha
1068	ut usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ājat	ud usriyā parvata tman aj
1068	aśnā apinaddham madhu pari apaśyat	aśan apinah madhu pari paś
1068	matsyam na dīne udani kṣiyantam	matsya na dīna udan kṣi
1068	niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt	niḥ tad bhṛ camasa na vṛkṣa
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇā vikṛtya	bṛhaspati virava vikṛ
1068	sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim	tad uṣā vid tad svar tad agni
1068	saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṁsi	tad arka vi bādh tamas
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ govapuṣaḥ valasya	bṛhaspati go vapus vala
1068	niḥ majjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra	niḥ majjan na parvan bhṛ
1068	himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni	hima iva parṇa muṣ vana
1068	bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ	bṛhaspati kṛpay vala go
1068	anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra	anānukṛtya apunar kṛ
1068	yāt sūryāmāsā mithaḥ uccarātaḥ	yāt sūryāmāsa mithas uccar
1068	abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam	abhi śyāva na kṛśana aśva
1068	nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ dyām apiṁśan	nakṣatra pitṛ div piś
1068	rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan	rātri tamas dhā jyotis ahar
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ	bṛhaspati bhid adri vid go
1068	idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya	idam kṛ namas abhriya
1068	yaḥ pūrvīḥ anu ānonavīti	yad puru anu ā nonāv
1068	bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ	bṛhaspati tad hi go tad aśva
1068	sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt	tad vīra tad nṛ mad vayas dhā
 ---
1069	bhadrāḥ agneḥ vadhryaśvasya saṁdṛśaḥ	bhadra agni vadhryaśva saṃdṛś
1069	vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇāḥ upetayaḥ	vāma praṇīti suraṇa upeti
1069	yat īm sumitrāḥ viśaḥ agre indhate	yat īṃ sumitra viś agra indh
1069	ghṛtena āhutaḥ jarate davidyutat	ghṛta āhu jṛ davidyut
1069	ghṛtam agneḥ vadhryaśvasya vardhanam	ghṛta agni vadhryaśva vardhana
1069	ghṛtam annam ghṛtam u asya medanam	ghṛta anna ghṛta u idam medana
1069	ghṛtena āhutaḥ urviyā vi paprathe	ghṛta āhu urviyā vi prath
1069	sūryaḥ iva rocate sarpirāsutiḥ	sūrya iva ruc sarpis āsuti
1069	yat te manuḥ yat anīkam sumitraḥ	yad tvad manu yad anīka sumitra
1069	samīdhe agne tat idam navīyaḥ	samindh agni tad idam navīyas
1069	sa revat śoca sa giraḥ juṣasva	tad revat śuc tad gir juṣ
1069	sa vājam darṣi saḥ iha śravaḥ dhāḥ	tad vāja dṛ tad iha śravas dhā
1069	yam tvā pūrvam īLitaḥ vadhryaśvaḥ	yad tvad pūrvam īḍ vadhryaśva
1069	samīdhe agne saḥ idam juṣasva	samindh agni tad idam juṣ
1069	sa naḥ stipāḥ uta bhavā tanūpāḥ	tad na stipā uta bhū tanū pā
1069	dātram rakṣasva yat idam te asme	dātra rakṣ yad idam tvad mad
1069	bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśva uta gopāḥ	bhū dyumnin vādhryaśva uta gopā
1069	mā tvā tārīt abhimātiḥ janānām	mā tvad tṛ abhimāti jana
1069	śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ	śūra iva dhṛṣṇu cyavana sumitra
1069	pra nu vocam vādhryaśvasya nāma	pra nu vac vādhryaśva nāman
1069	sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni	sam ajrya parvatya vasu
1069	dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā jigetha	dāsa vṛtra ārya ji
1069	śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ janānām	śūra iva dhṛṣṇu cyavana jana
1069	tvam agne pṛtanāyūn abhi syāḥ	tvad agni pṛtanāyu abhi as
1069	dīrghatantuḥ bṛhadukṣā ayam agniḥ	dīrgha tantu bṛhat ukṣan idam agni
1069	sahasrastarīḥ śatanīthaḥ ṛbhvā	sahasra starī śata nīthā ṛbhvan
1069	dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ	dyumat dyumat nṛ mṛj
1069	sumitreṣu dīdayaḥ devayatsu	sumitra dīdī devay
1069	tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedaḥ	tvad dhenu su dugha jātavedas
1069	asaścatā iva samanā sabardhuk	asaścat iva samanā sabarduh
1069	tvam nṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇāvadbhiḥ agne	tvad nṛ dakṣiṇāvat agni
1069	sumitrebhiḥ idhyase devayadbhiḥ	sumitra indh devay
1069	devāḥ cit te amṛtāḥ jātavedaḥ	deva cit tvad amṛta jātavedas
1069	mahimānam vādhryaśva pra vocan	mahiman vādhryaśva pra vac
1069	yat sampṛccham mānuṣīḥ viśaḥ āyan	yat sampracch mānuṣa viś i
1069	tvam nṛbhiḥ ajayaḥ tvāvṛdhebhiḥ	tvad nṛ ji tvāvṛdha
1069	pitā iva putram abibhar upasthe	pitṛ iva putra bhṛ upastha
1069	tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan	tvad agni vadhryaśva sapary
1069	juṣāṇaḥ asya samidham yaviṣTha	juṣ idam samidh yaviṣṭha
1069	uta pūrvān avanoḥ vrādhataḥ cit	uta pūrva van vrādh cit
1069	śaśvat agniḥ vadhryaśvasya śatrūn	śaśvat agni vadhryaśva śatru
1069	nṛbhiḥ jigāya sutasomavadbhiḥ	nṛ ji suta somavat
1069	samanam cit adahaḥ citrabhāno	samana cit dah citrabhānu
1069	ava vrādhantam abhinat vṛdhaḥ cit	ava vrādh bhid vṛdha cit
1069	ayam agniḥ vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā	idam agni vadhryaśva vṛtra han
1069	sanakāt preddhaḥ namasā upavākyaḥ	sanaka prendh namas upavac
1069	sa naḥ ajāmīn uta vā vijāmīn	tad mad ajāmi uta vā vijāmi
1069	abhi tiṣTha śardhataḥ vādhryaśva	abhi sthā śṛdh vādhryaśva
 ---
1070	imām me agne samidham juṣasva	idam mad agni samidh juṣ
1070	iLaḥ pade prati haryā ghṛtācīm	iḍ pada prati hary ghṛtāñc
1070	varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnām	varṣman pṛthivī su dina tvad ahar
1070	ūrdhvaḥ bhava sukrato devayajyā	ūrdhva bhū su kratu deva yajya
1070	ā devānām agrayāvā iha yātu	ā deva agra yāvan iha yā
1070	narāśaṁsaḥ viśvarūpebhiḥ aśvaiḥ	narāśaṃsa viśva rūpa aśva
1070	ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedhaḥ	ṛta pathin namas miyedhas
1070	devebhyaḥ devatamaḥ suṣūdat	deva devatama sūd
1070	śaśvattamam īLate dūtyāya	śaśvattama īḍ dūtya
1070	haviṣmantaḥ manuṣyāsaḥ agnim	haviṣmat manuṣya agni
1070	vahiṣThaiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena	vahiṣṭha aśva suvṛt ratha
1070	ā devān vakṣi ni sada iha hotā	deva vah ni sad iha hotṛ
1070	vi prathatām devajuṣTam tiraścā	vi prath deva juṣ tiryañc
1070	dīrgham drāghmā surabhi bhūtu asme	dīrgha drāghman surabhi bhū mad
1070	aheLatā manasā deva barhiḥ	a hīḍ manas deva barhis
1070	indrajyeṣThān uśataḥ yakṣi devān	indra jyeṣṭha vaś yaj deva
1070	divaḥ vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ	div vā sānu spṛś varīyas
1070	pṛthivyā vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam	pṛthivī vā mātrā vi śri
1070	uśatīḥ dvāraḥ mahinā mahadbhiḥ	vaś dvār mahina mahat
1070	devam ratham rathayuḥ dhārayadhvam	deva ratha rathayu dhāray
1070	devī divaḥ duhitarā suśilpe	devī div duhitṛ su śilpa
1070	uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau	uṣāsānaktā sad ni yoni
1070	ā vām devāsaḥ uśatī uśantaḥ	ā tvad deva vaś vaś
1070	urau sīdantu subhage upasthe	uru sad subhaga upastha
1070	ūrdhvaḥ grāvā bṛhat agniḥ samiddhaḥ	ūrdhva grāvan bṛhat agni samindh
1070	priyā dhāmāni aditeḥ upasthe	priya dhāman aditi upastha
1070	purohitau ṛtvijā yajñe asmin	purohita ṛtvij yajña idam
1070	viduṣTarā draviṇam ā yajethām	viduṣṭara draviṇa ā yaj
1070	tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ idam varīyaḥ	tri devī barhis idam varīyas
1070	ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥ syonam	ā sad kṛ tvad syona
1070	manuṣvat yajñam sudhitā havīṁṣi	manuṣvat yajña sudhita havis
1070	iLā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta	iḍā devī ghṛtapadī juṣ
1070	deva tvaṣTar yat ha cārutvam ānaT	deva tvaṣṭṛ yat ha cāru tva naś
1070	yat aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ	yat aṅgiras bhū sacābhū
1070	sa devānām pāthaḥ upa pra vidvān	tad deva pāthas upa pra vid
1070	uśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ	vaś yaj draviṇas dā su ratna
1070	vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā	vanaspati raśanā niyu
1070	devānām pāthaḥ upa vakṣi vidvān	deva pāthas upa vah vid
1070	svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavat havīṁṣi	svad deva kṛ havis
1070	avatām dyāvāpṛthivī havam me	av dyāvāpṛthivī hava mad
1070	ā agne vaha varuṇam iṣTaye naḥ	ā agni vah varuṇa iṣṭi mad
1070	indram divaḥ marutaḥ antarikṣāt	indra div marut antarikṣa
1070	sīdantu barhiḥ viśve ā yajatrāḥ	sad barhis viśva ā yajatra
1070	svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām	svāhā deva amṛta māday
 ---
1071	bṛhaspate prathamam vācaḥ agram	bṛhaspati prathama vāc agra
1071	yat pra airata nāmadheyam dadhānāḥ	yat prer nāmadheya dhā
1071	yat eṣām śreṣTham yat aripram āsīt	yad idam śreṣṭha yad aripra as
1071	preṇā tat eṣām nihitam guhā āviḥ	as tad idam nidhā guhā āvis
1071	saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ	saktu iva titau pū
1071	yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vācam akrata	yatra dhīra manas vāc kṛ
1071	atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate	atra sakhi sakhya jñā
1071	bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci	bhadra idam lakṣmī nidhā adhi vāc
1071	yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan	yajña vāc padavīya i
1071	tām anu avindan ṛṣiṣu praviṣTām	tad anu vid ṛṣi praviś
1071	tām ābhṛtyā vi adadhuḥ purutrā	tad ābhṛ vi dhā purutrā
1071	tām sapta rebhāḥ abhi sam navante	tad saptan rebha abhi sam nū
1071	uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam	uta tva paś na dṛś vāc
1071	uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoti enām	uta tva śru na śru enad
1071	uta u tvasmai tanvam vi sasre	uta u tva tanū vi sṛ
1071	jāyā iva patye uśatī suvāsāḥ	jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas
1071	uta tvam sakhye sthirapītam āhuḥ	uta tva sakhya sthirapīta ah
1071	na enam hinvanti api vājineṣu	na enad hi api vājina
1071	adhenvā carati māyayā eṣa	a dhenu car māyā etad
1071	vācam śuśruvān aphalām apuṣpām	vāc śru a phala a puṣpa
1071	yaḥ tityāja sacividam sakhāyam	yad tyaj sacivid sakhi
1071	na tasya vāci api bhāgaḥ asti	na tad vāc api bhāga as
1071	yat īm śṛṇoti alakam śṛṇoti	yat īṃ śru alakam śru
1071	nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām	nahi pravid su kṛ pathin
1071	akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ	akṣaṇvat karṇavat sakhi
1071	manojaveṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ	manas java asama bhū
1071	ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve	ādaghna upakakṣa u tva
1071	hradāḥ iva snātvāḥ u tve dadṛśre	hrada iva snā u tva dṛś
1071	hṛdā taṣTeṣu manasaḥ javeṣu	hṛd takṣ manas java
1071	yat brāhmaṇāḥ saṁyajante sakhāyaḥ	yat brāhmaṇa saṃyaj sakhi
1071	atra aha tvam vi jahuḥ vedyābhiḥ	atra aha tva vi hā vedyā
1071	ohabrahmāṇaḥ vi caranti u tve	ohabrahman vi car u tva
1071	ime ye na arvāk na paraḥ caranti	idam yad na arvāk na paras car
1071	na brāhmaṇāsaḥ na sutekarāsaḥ	na brāhmaṇa na sutekara
1071	te ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā	tad etad vāc abhipad pāpa
1071	sirīḥ tantram tanvate aprajajñayaḥ	sirī tantra tan a prajajñi
1071	sarve nandanti yaśasā āgatena	sarva nand yaśas āgam
1071	sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ	sabhāsāha sakhi sakhi
1071	kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇiḥ hi eṣām	kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇi hi idam
1071	aram hitaḥ bhavati vājināya	aram dhā bhū vājina
1071	ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān	ṛc tva poṣam ās puṣ
1071	gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu	gāyatra tva gā śakvarī
1071	brahmā tvaḥ vadati jātavidyām	brahman tva vad jan vidyā
1071	yajñasya mātrām vi mimīte u tvaḥ	yajña mātrā vi mā u tva
 ---
1072	devānām nu vayam jānā	deva nu mad jāna
1072	pra vocāma vipanyayā	pra vac vipanyayā
1072	uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu	uktha śaṃs
1072	yaḥ paśyāt uttare yuge	yad paś uttara yuga
1072	brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ etā	brahman pati etad
1072	sam karmāraḥ iva adhamat	sam karmāra iva ādham
1072	devānām pūrvye yuge	deva pūrvya yuga
1072	asataḥ sat ajāyata	asat sat jan
1072	devānām yuge prathame	deva yuga prathama
1072	asataḥ sat ajāyata	asat as jan
1072	tat āśāḥ anu ajāyanta	tad āśā anu jan
1072	tat uttānapadaḥ pari	tad uttānapad pari
1072	bhūḥ jajñe uttānapadaḥ	bhū jan uttānapad
1072	bhuvaḥ āśāḥ ajāyanta	bhū āśā jan
1072	aditeḥ dakṣaḥ ajāyata	aditi dakṣa jan
1072	dakṣāt u aditiḥ pari	dakṣa u aditi pari
1072	aditiḥ hi ajaniṣTa	aditi hi jan
1072	dakṣa yā duhitā tava	dakṣa yad duhitṛ tvad
1072	tām devāḥ anu ajāyanta	tad deva anu jan
1072	bhadrāḥ amṛtabandhavaḥ	bhadra amṛta bandhu
1072	yat devāḥ adaḥ salile	yat deva adas salila
1072	susaṁrabdhāḥ atiṣThata	su saṃrabh sthā
1072	atrā vaḥ nṛtyatām iva	atra tvad nṛt iva
1072	tīvraḥ reṇuḥ apa āyata	tīvra reṇu apa i
1072	yat devāḥ yatayaḥ yathā	yat deva yati yathā
1072	bhuvanāni apinvata	bhuvana pinv
1072	atrā samudre ā gūLham	atra samudra ā guh
1072	ā sūryam ajabhartana	ā sūrya bhṛ
1072	aṣTau putrāsaḥ aditeḥ	aṣṭan putra aditi
1072	ye jātāḥ tanvaḥ pari	yad jan tanū pari
1072	devān upa pra ait saptabhiḥ	deva upa pre saptan
1072	parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat	parā mārtāṇḍa as
1072	saptabhiḥ putraiḥ aditiḥ	saptan putra aditi
1072	upa pra ait pūrvyam yugam	upa pre pūrvya yuga
1072	prajāyai mṛtyave tvat	prajā mṛtyu
1072	punar mārtāṇḍam ā abharat	punar mārtāṇḍa ābhṛ
 ---
1073	janiṣThāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya	jan ugra sahas tura
1073	mandraḥ ojiṣThaḥ bahulābhimānaḥ	mandra ojiṣṭha bahula abhimāna
1073	avardhan indram marutaḥ cit atra	vṛdh indra marut cit atra
1073	mātā yat vīram dadhanat dhaniṣThā	mātṛ yat vīra dhan dhaniṣṭha
1073	druhaḥ niṣattā pṛśanī cit evaiḥ	druh u niṣad pṛśana cit eva
1073	purū śaṁsena vāvṛdhuḥ te indram	puru śaṃsa vṛdh tad indra
1073	abhīvṛtā iva tā mahāpadena	abhīvṛta iva tad mahat pada
1073	dhvāntāt prapitvāt ut aranta garbhāḥ	dhvānta prapitva ud ṛch garbha
1073	ṛṣvā te pādā pra yat jigāsi	ṛṣva tvad pāda pra yat gā
1073	avardhan vājā uta ye cit atra	vṛdh vāja uta yad cit atra
1073	tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram	tvad indra śālāvṛka sahasra
1073	āsan dadhiṣe aśvinā ā vavṛtyāḥ	āsan dhā aśvin vṛt
1073	samanā tūrṇiḥ upa yāsi yajñam	samanā tūrṇi upa yā yajña
1073	ā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi	ā nāsatya sakhya vah
1073	vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrā	vasāvī indra dhāray sahasra
1073	aśvinā śūra dadatuḥ maghāni	aśvin śūra dā magha
1073	mandamānaḥ ṛtāt adhi prajāyai	mad ṛta adhi prajā
1073	sakhibhiḥ indraḥ iṣirebhiḥ artham	sakhī indra iṣira artha
1073	ā ābhiḥ hi māyāḥ upa dasyum ā agāt	idam hi māyā upa dasyu āgā
1073	mihaḥ pra tamrāḥ avapat tamāṁsi	mih pra tamra vap tamas
1073	sanāmānā cit dhvasayaḥ ni asmai	sanāman cit dhvasay ni idam
1073	ava ahan indraḥ uṣasaḥ yathā anaḥ	avahan indra uṣas yathā anas
1073	ṛṣvaiḥ agacchaḥ sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ	ṛṣva gam sakhī nikāma
1073	sākam pratiṣThā hṛdyā jaghantha	sākam pratiṣṭhā hṛdya han
1073	tvam jaghantha namucim makhasyum	tvad han namuci makhasyu
1073	dāsam kṛṇvānaḥ ṛṣaye vimāyam	dāsa kṛ ṛṣi vimāya
1073	tvam cakartha manave syonān	tvad kṛ manu syona
1073	pathaḥ devatrā añjasā iva yānān	pathin devatrā añjasā iva yā
1073	tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāma	tvad etad prā vi nāman
1073	īśānaḥ indra dadhiṣe gabhastau	īśāna indra dhā gabhasti
1073	anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanti	anu tvad deva śavas mad
1073	uparibudhnān vaninaḥ cakartha	uparibudhna vanin kṛ
1073	cakram yat asya apsu ā niṣattam	cakra yat idam ap ā niṣad
1073	uta u tat asmai madhu it cacchadyāt	uta u tad idam madhu id chand
1073	pṛthivyām atiṣitam yat ūdhar	pṛthivī atisā yat ūdhas
1073	payaḥ goṣu adadhāḥ oṣadhīṣu	payas go dhā oṣadhī
1073	aśvāt iyāya iti yat vadanti	aśva i iti yat vad
1073	ojasaḥ jātam uta manye enam	ojas jan uta man enad
1073	manyoḥ iyāya harmyeṣu tasthau	manyu i harmya sthā
1073	yataḥ prajajñe indraḥ asya veda	yatas prajan indra idam vid
1073	vayaḥ suparṇāḥ upa seduḥ indram	vi su parṇa upa sad indra
1073	priyamedhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nādhamānāḥ	priyamedha ṛṣi nādh
1073	apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣuḥ	apa dhvānta vṛ pṛ cakṣus
1073	mumugdhi asmān nidhayā iva baddhān	muc mad nidhā iva bandh
 ---
1074	vasūnām vā carkṛṣe iyakṣan	vasu vā carkar iyakṣ
1074	dhiyā vā yajñaiḥ vā rodasyoḥ	dhī vā yajña vā rodasī
1074	arvantaḥ vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau	arvant vā yad rayimat sāti
1074	vanum vā ye suśruṇam suśrutaḥ dhuḥ	vanu vā yad suśruṇa su śrut dhā
1074	havaḥ eṣām asuraḥ nakṣata dyām	hava idam asura nakṣ div
1074	śravasyatā manasā niṁsata kṣām	śravasy manas niṃs kṣā
1074	cakṣāṇāḥ yatra suvitāya devāḥ	cakṣ yatra suvita deva
1074	dyauḥ na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ	div na vāra kṛ sva
1074	iyam eṣām amṛtānām gīḥ	idam idam amṛta gir
1074	sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam	sarvatāti yad kṛpaṇ ratna
1074	dhiyam ca yajñam ca sādhantaḥ	dhī ca yajña ca sādh
1074	te naḥ dhāntu vasavyam asāmi	tad mad dhā vasavya asāmi
1074	ā tat te indra āyavaḥ pananta	ā tad tvad indra āyu pan
1074	abhi ye ūrvam gomantam titṛtsān	abhi yad ūrva gomanta titṛd
1074	sakṛtsvam ye puruputrām mahīm	sakṛtsū yad puru putra mah
1074	sahasradhārām bṛhatīm dudukṣan	sahasra dhārā bṛhat dudukṣ
1074	śacīvaḥ indram avase kṛṇudhvam	śacīvat indra av kṛ
1074	anānatam damayantam pṛtanyūn	an ānam damay pṛtanyu
1074	ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānam suvṛktim	ṛbhukṣan maghavan suvṛkti
1074	bhartā yaḥ vajram naryam purukṣuḥ	bhṛ yad vajra narya purukṣu
1074	yat vāvāna purutamam purāṣāT	yat van purutama purāṣah
1074	ā vṛtrahā indraḥ nāmāni aprāḥ	ā vṛtrahan indra nāman prā
1074	aceti prāsahaḥ patiḥ tuviṣmān	cit prāsah pati tuviṣmat
1074	yat īm uśmasi kartave karat tat	yad īṃ vaś kṛ kṛ tad
 ---
1075	pra su vaḥ āpaḥ mahimānam uttamam	pra su tvad ap mahiman uttama
1075	kāruḥ vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ	kāru vac sadana vivasvant
1075	pra saptasapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ	pra saptan saptan tredhā hi kram
1075	pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhuḥ ojasā	pra sṛtvara ati sindhu ojas
1075	pra te aradat varuṇaḥ yātave pathaḥ	pra tvad rad varuṇa yā pathin
1075	sindho yat vājān abhi adravaḥ tvam	sindhu yat vāja abhi dru tvad
1075	bhūmyāḥ adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā	bhūmi adhi pravat yā sānu
1075	yat eṣām agram jagatām irajyasi	yat idam agra jagant irajy
1075	divi svanaḥ yatate bhūmyā upari	div svana yat bhūmi upari
1075	anantam śuṣmam ut iyarti bhānunā	ananta śuṣma ud ṛch bhānu
1075	abhrāt iva pra stanayanti vṛṣTayaḥ	abhra iva pra stanay vṛṣṭi
1075	sindhuḥ yat eti vṛṣabhaḥ na roruvat	sindhu yat i vṛṣabha na roro
1075	abhi tvā sindho śiśum it na mātaraḥ	abhi tvad sindhu śiśu id na mātṛ
1075	vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ	vāśra ṛṣ payas iva dhenu
1075	rājā iva yudhvā nayasi tvam it sicau	rājan iva yudhvan nī tvad id sic
1075	yat āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi	yat idam agra pravat inakṣ
1075	imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati	idam mad gaṅgā yamunā sarasvatī
1075	śutudri stomam sacatā paruṣṇi ā	śutudrī stoma sac paruṣṇī ā
1075	asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayā	asiknī marudvṛdhā vitastā
1075	ārjīkīye śṛṇuhi ā suṣomayā	ārjīkīyā śru ā suṣomā
1075	tṛṣTāmayā prathamam yātave sajūḥ	tṛṣṭāmā prathamam yā sajūs
1075	susartvā rasayā śvetyā tyā	susartu rasā śvetyā tya
1075	tvam sindho kubhayā gomatīm krumum	tvad sindhu kubhā gomatī krumu
1075	mehatnvā saratham yābhiḥ īyase	mehatnū sa ratha yad ī
1075	ṛjītī enī ruśatī mahitvā	ṛjīti eta ruśat mahitva
1075	pari jrayāṁsi bharate rajāṁsi	pari jrayas bhṛ rajas
1075	adabdhā sindhuḥ apasām apastamā	adabdha sindhu apas apastama
1075	aśvā na citrā vapuṣī iva darśatā	aśvā na citra vapus iva darśata
1075	svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsāḥ	su aśva sindhu su ratha su vāsas
1075	hiraṇyayī sukṛtā vājinīvatī	hiraṇyaya su kṛ vājinīvat
1075	ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatī	ūrṇāvat yuvati sīlamāvatī
1075	uta adhi vaste subhagā madhuvṛdham	uta adhi vas subhaga madhuvṛdh
1075	sukham ratham yuyuje sindhuḥ aśvinam	sukha ratha yuj sindhu aśvin
1075	tena vājam saniṣat asmin ājau	tad vāja san idam āji
1075	mahān hi asya mahimā panasyate	mahat hi idam mahiman panasy
1075	adabdhasya svayaśasaḥ virapśinaḥ	adabdha sva yaśas virapśin
 ---
1076	ā vaḥ ṛñjase ūrjām vyuṣTiṣu	ā tvad ṛj ūrjā vyuṣṭi
1076	indram marutaḥ rodasī anaktana	indra marut rodas añj
1076	ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī sacābhuvā	ubh yathā mad ahar sacābhū
1076	sadaḥsadaḥ varivasyātaḥ udbhidā	sadas sadas varivasyā
1076	tat u śreṣTham savanam sunotana	tad u śreṣṭha savana su
1076	atyaḥ na hastayataḥ adriḥ sotari	atya na hasta yam adri sotṛ
1076	vidat hi aryaḥ abhibhūti pauṁsyam	vid hi ari abhibhūti pauṃsya
1076	mahaḥ rāye cit tarute yat arvataḥ	mah rai cit tṛ yat arvant
1076	tat it hi asya savanam viveḥ apaḥ	tad id hi idam savana apas
1076	yathā purā manave gātum aśret	yathā purā manu gātu śri
1076	goarṇasi tvāṣTre aśvanirṇiji	goarṇas tvāṣṭra aśva nirṇij
1076	pra īm adhvareṣu adhvarān aśiśrayuḥ	adhvara adhvara śri
1076	apa hata rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ	apa han rakṣas bhaṅgurāvat
1076	skabhāyata nirṛtim sedhata amatim	skabhāy nirṛti sidh amati
1076	ā naḥ rayim sarvavīram sunotana	ā mad rayi sarva vīra su
1076	devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ	devāvī bhṛ śloka adri
1076	divaḥ cit ā vaḥ amavattarebhyaḥ	div cit ā tvad amavattara
1076	vibhvanā cit āśvapastarebhyaḥ	vibhvan cit āśvapastara
1076	vāyoḥ cit ā somarabhastarebhyaḥ	vāyu cit ā somarabhastara
1076	agneḥ cit arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ	agni cit arc pitukṛttara
1076	bhurantu naḥ yaśasaḥ sotu andhasaḥ	bhur mad yaśas su andhas
1076	grāvāṇaḥ vācā divitā divitmatā	grāvan vāc divit divitmat
1076	naraḥ yatra duhate kāmyam madhu	nṛ yatra duh kāmya madhu
1076	āghoṣayantaḥ abhitaḥ mithasturaḥ	āghoṣay abhitas mithastur
1076	sunvanti somam rathirāsaḥ adrayaḥ	su soma rathira adri
1076	niḥ asya rasam gaviṣaḥ duhanti te	niḥ idam rasa gaviṣ duh tad
1076	duhanti ūdhar upasecanāya kam	duh ūdhas upasecana kaṃ
1076	naraḥ havyā na marjayante āsabhiḥ	nṛ hu na marjay āsan
1076	ete naraḥ svapasaḥ abhūtana	etad nṛ su apas bhū
1076	ye indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ	yad indra su soma adri
1076	vāmaṁvāmam vaḥ divyāya dhāmne	vāma vāma tvad divya dhāman
1076	vasuvasu vaḥ pārthivāya sunvate	vasu vasu tvad pārthiva su
 ---
1077	abhrapruṣaḥ na vācā pruṣā vasu	abhrapruṣ na vāc pruṣ vasu
1077	haviṣmantaḥ na yajñāḥ vijānuṣaḥ	haviṣmat na yajña vi jñā
1077	sumārutam na brahmāṇam arhase	su māruta na brahman arh
1077	gaṇam astoṣi eṣām na śobhase	gaṇa stu idam na śubh
1077	śriye maryāsaḥ añjīn akṛṇvata	śrī marya añji kṛ
1077	sumārutam na pūrvīḥ ati kṣapaḥ	su māruta na pūrva ati kṣap
1077	divaḥ putrāsaḥ etāḥ na yetire	div putra eta na yat
1077	ādityāsaḥ te akrāḥ na vāvṛdhuḥ	āditya tad akra na vṛdh
1077	pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ na barhaṇā	pra yad div pṛthivī na barhaṇa
1077	tmanā riricre abhrāt na sūryaḥ	tman ric abhra na sūrya
1077	pājasvantaḥ na vīrāḥ panasyavaḥ	pājasvat na vīra panasyu
1077	riśādasaḥ na maryāḥ abhidyavaḥ	riśādas na marya abhidyu
1077	yuṣmākam budhne apām na yāmani	tvad budhna ap na yāman
1077	vithuryati na mahī śratharyati	vithury na mahī śrathary
1077	viśvapsuḥ yajñaḥ arvāk ayam su vaḥ	viśvapsu yajña arvāk idam su tvad
1077	prayasvantaḥ na satrācaḥ ā gata	prayasvat na satrāc ā gam
1077	yūyam dhūrṣu prayujaḥ na raśmibhiḥ	tvad dhur prayuj na raśmi
1077	jyotiṣmantaḥ na bhāsā vyuṣTiṣu	jyotiṣmat na bhās vyuṣṭi
1077	śyenāsaḥ na svayaśasaḥ riśādasaḥ	śyena na sva yaśas riśādas
1077	pravāsaḥ na prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ	prava na prasita paripruṣ
1077	pra yat vahadhve marutaḥ parākāt	pra yat vah marut parāka
1077	yūyam mahaḥ saṁvaraṇasya vasvaḥ	tvad mah saṃvaraṇa vasu
1077	vidānāsaḥ vasavaḥ rādhyasya	vid vasu rādhya
1077	ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota	ārāt cit dveṣas sanutar yu
1077	yaḥ udṛci yajñe adhvareṣThāḥ	yad udṛc yajña adhvareṣṭhā
1077	marudbhyaḥ na mānuṣaḥ dadāśat	marut na mānuṣa dāś
1077	revat sa vayaḥ dadhate suvīram	revat tad vayas dhā su vīra
1077	sa devānām api gopīthe astu	tad deva api gopītha as
1077	te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsaḥ ūmāḥ	tad hi yajña yajñiya ūma
1077	ādityena nāmnā śambhaviṣThāḥ	āditya nāman śambhaviṣṭha
1077	te naḥ avantu rathatūḥ manīṣām	tad mad av manīṣā
1077	mahaḥ ca yāman adhvare cakānāḥ	mahas ca yāman adhvara kan
 ---
1078	viprāsaḥ na manmabhiḥ svādhyaḥ	vipra na manman su ādhī
1078	devāvyaḥ na yajñaiḥ svapnasaḥ	su ādhī na yajña svapnas
1078	rājānaḥ na citrāḥ susaṁdṛśaḥ	rājan na citra su saṃdṛś
1078	kṣitīnām na maryāḥ arepasaḥ	kṣiti na marya arepas
1078	agniḥ na ye bhrājasā rukmavakṣasaḥ	agni na yad bhrājas rukma vakṣas
1078	vātāsaḥ na svayujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ	vāta na sva yuj sadyaūti
1078	prajñātāraḥ na jyeṣThāḥ sunītayaḥ	prajñātṛ na jyeṣṭha su nīti
1078	suśarmāṇaḥ na somāḥ ṛtam yate	su śarman na soma ṛta i
1078	vātāsaḥ na ye dhunayaḥ jigatnavaḥ	vāta na yad dhuni jigatnu
1078	agnīnām na jihvāḥ virokiṇaḥ	agni na jihvā virokin
1078	varmaṇvantaḥ na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ	varmaṇvat na yodha śimīvat
1078	pitṛṛṇām na śaṁsāḥ surātayaḥ	pitṛ na śaṃsa su rāti
1078	rathānām na ye arāḥ sanābhayaḥ	ratha na yad ara sanābhi
1078	jigīvāṁsaḥ na śūrāḥ abhidyavaḥ	ji na śūra abhidyu
1078	vareyavaḥ na maryāḥ ghṛtapruṣaḥ	vareyu na marya ghṛtapruṣ
1078	abhisvartāraḥ arkam na suṣTubhaḥ	abhisvartṛ arka na suṣṭubh
1078	aśvāsaḥ na ye jyeṣThāsaḥ āśavaḥ	aśva na yad jyeṣṭha āśu
1078	didhiṣavaḥ na rathyaḥ sudānavaḥ	didhiṣu na sudānu
1078	āpaḥ na nimnaiḥ udabhiḥ jigatnavaḥ	ap na nimna udan jigatnu
1078	viśvarūpāḥ aṅgirasaḥ na sāmabhiḥ	viśva rūpa aṅgiras na sāman
1078	grāvāṇaḥ na sūrayaḥ sindhumātaraḥ	grāvan na sūri sindhu mātṛ
1078	ādardirāsaḥ adrayaḥ na viśvahā	ādardira adri na viśvahā
1078	śiśūlāḥ na krīLayaḥ sumātaraḥ	śiśūla na krīḍi su mātṛ
1078	mahāgrāmaḥ na yāman uta tviṣā	mahat grāma na yāman uta tviṣ
1078	uṣasām na ketavaḥ adhvaraśriyaḥ	uṣas na ketu adhvara śrī
1078	śubhaṁyavaḥ na añjibhiḥ vi aśvitan	śubhaṃyu na añji vi śvit
1078	sindhavaḥ na yayiyaḥ bhrājadṛṣTayaḥ	sindhu na bhrāj ṛṣṭi
1078	parāvataḥ na yojanāni mamire	parāvat na yojana mā
1078	subhāgān naḥ devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnān	subhāga mad deva kṛ su ratna
1078	asmān stotṛṛn marutaḥ vāvṛdhānāḥ	mad stotṛ marut vṛdh
1078	adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta	adhi stotra sakhya gā
1078	sanāt hi vaḥ ratnadheyāni santi	sanāt hi tvad ratna dheya as
 ---
1079	apaśyam asya mahataḥ mahitvam	paś idam mahat mahi tva
1079	amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu	amartya martya viś
1079	nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete	nānā hanu vibhṛ sam bhṛ
1079	asinvatī bapsatī bhūri attaḥ	asinvat bhas bhūri ad
1079	guhā śiraḥ nihitam ṛdhak akṣī	guhā śiras nidhā ṛdhak akṣi
1079	asinvan atti jihvayā vanāni	asinvat ad jihvā vana
1079	atrāṇi asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanti	atra idam pad sam bhṛ
1079	uttānahastāḥ namasā adhi vikṣu	uttāna hasta namas adhi viś
1079	pra mātuḥ prataram guhyam icchan	pra mātṛ prataram guhya iṣ
1079	kumāraḥ na vīrudhaḥ sarpat urvīḥ	kumāra na vīrudh sṛp uru
1079	sasam na pakvam avidat śucantam	sasa na pakva vid śuc
1079	ririhvāṁsam ripaḥ upasthe antar	rih rip upastha antar
1079	tat vām ṛtam rodasī pra bravīmi	tad tvad ṛta rodas pra brū
1079	jāyamānaḥ mātarā garbhaḥ atti	jan mātṛ garbha ad
1079	na aham devasya martyaḥ ciketa	na mad deva martya cit
1079	agniḥ aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ	agni aṅga vicetas tad pracetas
1079	yaḥ asmai annam tṛṣu ādadhāti	yad idam anna tṛṣu ādhā
1079	ājyaiḥ ghṛtaiḥ juhoti puṣyati	ājya ghṛta hu puṣ
1079	tasmai sahasram akṣabhiḥ vi cakṣe	tad sahasra akṣa vi cakṣ
1079	agne viśvataḥ pratyaṅ asi tvam	agni viśvatas pratyañc as tvad
1079	kim deveṣu tyajaḥ enaḥ cakartha	ka deva tyajas enas kṛ
1079	agne pṛcchāmi nu tvām avidvān	agni pracch nu tvad a vid
1079	akrīLan krīLan hariḥ attave adan	a krīḍ krīḍ hari ad a dat
1079	vi parvaśaḥ cakarta gām iva asiḥ	vi parvaśas kṛt go iva asi
1079	viṣūcaḥ aśvān yuyuje vanejāḥ	viṣvañc aśva yuj vanejā
1079	ṛjītibhiḥ raśanābhiḥ gṛbhītān	ṛjīti raśanā grah
1079	cakṣade mitraḥ vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ	kṣad mitra vasu su jan
1079	sam ānṛdhe parvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ	sam ṛdh parvan vṛdh
 ---
1080	agniḥ saptim vājambharam dadāti	agni sapti vājambhara dā
1080	agniḥ vīram śrutyam karmaniṣThām	agni vīra śrutya karman niṣṭhā
1080	agniḥ rodasī vi carat samañjan	agni rodas vi car samañj
1080	agniḥ nārīm vīrakukṣim puraṁdhim	agni nārī vīra kukṣi puraṃdhi
1080	agneḥ apnasaḥ samit astu bhadrā	agni apnas samidh as bhadra
1080	agniḥ mahī rodasī ā viveśa	agni mahi rodasī ā viś
1080	agniḥ ekam codayat samatsu	agni eka coday samad
1080	agniḥ vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi	agni vṛtra day puru
1080	agniḥ ha tyam jarataḥ karṇam āva	agni ha tya jṛ karṇa av
1080	agniḥ adbhyaḥ niḥ adahat jarūtham	agni ap niḥ dah jarūtha
1080	agniḥ atrim gharme uruṣyat antar	agni atri gharma uruṣy antar
1080	agniḥ nṛmedham prajayā asṛjat sam	agni nṛmedha prajā sṛj sam
1080	agniḥ dāt draviṇam vīrapeśāḥ	agni dā draviṇa vīra peśas
1080	agniḥ ṛṣim yaḥ sahasrā sanoti	agni ṛṣi yad sahasra san
1080	agniḥ divi havyam ā tatāna	agni div havya ā tan
1080	agneḥ dhāmāni vibhṛtā purutrā	agni dhāman vibhṛ purutrā
1080	agnim ukthaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ vi hvayante	agni uktha ṛṣi vi hvā
1080	agnim naraḥ yāmani bādhitāsaḥ	agni nṛ yāman bādh
1080	agnim vayaḥ antarikṣe patantaḥ	agni vi antarikṣa pat
1080	agniḥ sahasrā pari yāti gonām	agni sahasra pari yā go
1080	agnim viśaḥ īLate mānuṣīḥ yāḥ	agni viś īḍ mānuṣa yad
1080	agnim manuṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ vi jātāḥ	agni manus nahus vi jan
1080	agniḥ gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasya	agni gāndharva pathyā ṛta
1080	agneḥ gavyūtiḥ ghṛte ā niṣattā	agni gavyūti ghṛta ā niṣad
1080	agnaye brahma ṛbhavaḥ tatakṣuḥ	agni brahman ṛbhu takṣ
1080	agnim mahām avocāmā suvṛktim	agni maha vac suvṛkti
1080	agne pra ava jaritāram yaviṣTha	agni pra av jaritṛ yaviṣṭha
1080	agne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva	agni mahi draviṇa ā yaj
 ---
1081	yaḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvat	yad idam viśva bhuvana hu
1081	ṛṣiḥ hotā ni asīdat pitā naḥ	ṛṣi hotṛ ni sad pitṛ mad
1081	saḥ āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ	tad āśis draviṇa iṣ
1081	prathamacchat avarān ā viveśa	prathamacchad avara ā viś
1081	kim svit āsīt adhiṣThānam	ka svid as adhiṣṭhāna
1081	ārambhaṇam katamat svit kathā āsīt	ārambhaṇa katama svid kathā as
1081	yataḥ bhūmim janayan viśvakarmā	yatas bhūmi janay viśvakarman
1081	vi dyām aurṇot mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ	vi div vṛ mahina viśva cakṣas
1081	viśvataścakṣuḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ	viśvatas cakṣus uta viśvatomukha
1081	viśvatobāhuḥ uta viśvataspāt	viśvatobāhu uta viśvataspād
1081	sam bāhubhyām dhamati sam patatraiḥ	sam bāhu dham sam patatra
1081	dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ	dyāvābhūmī janay deva eka
1081	kim svit vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa	ka svid vana ka u tad vṛkṣa as
1081	yataḥ dyāvāpṛthivī niṣTatakṣuḥ	yatas dyāvāpṛthivī nistakṣ
1081	manīṣiṇaḥ manasā pṛcchata it u tat	manīṣin manas pracch id u tad
1081	yat adhyatiṣThat bhuvanāni dhārayan	yad adhiṣṭhā bhuvana dhāray
1081	yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yā avamā	yad tvad dhāman parama yad avama
1081	yā madhyamā viśvakarman uta imā	yad madhyama viśvakarman uta idam
1081	śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ haviṣi svadhāvaḥ	śikṣ sakhi havis svadhāvat
1081	svayam yajasva tanvam vṛdhānaḥ	svayam yaj tanū vṛdh
1081	viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ	viśvakarman havis vṛdh
1081	svayam yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām	svayam yaj pṛthivī uta div
1081	muhyantu anye abhitaḥ janāsaḥ	muh anya abhitas jana
1081	iha asmākam maghavā sūriḥ astu	iha mad maghavan sūri as
1081	vācaḥ patim viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye	vāc pati viśvakarman ūti
1081	manojuvam vāje adyā huvema	ūti vāja adya hu
1081	sa naḥ viśvāni havanāni joṣat	tad mad viśva havana juṣ
1081	viśvaśambhūḥ avase sādhukarmā	juṣ av sādhu karman
 ---
1082	cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīraḥ	cakṣus pitṛ manas hi dhīra
1082	ghṛtam ene ajanat nannamāne	ghṛta enad jan nannam
1082	yadā it antāḥ adadṛhanta pūrve	yadā id anta dṛh pūrva
1082	āt it dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām	āt id dyāvāpṛthivī prath
1082	viśvakarmā vimanāḥ āt vihāyāḥ	viśvakarman vimanas āt vihāyas
1082	dhātā vidhātā paramā uta saṁdṛk	dhātṛ vidhātṛ parama uta saṃdṛś
1082	teṣām iṣTāni sam iṣā madanti	tad iṣṭa sam iṣ mad
1082	yatrā saptaṛṣīn paraḥ ekam āhuḥ	yatra saptan ṛṣi paras eka ah
1082	yaḥ naḥ pitā janitā yaḥ vidhātā	yad mad pitṛ janitṛ yad vidhātṛ
1082	dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā	dhāman vid bhuvana viśva
1082	yaḥ devānām nāmadhāḥ ekaḥ eva	yad deva nāmadhā eka eva
1082	tam sampraśnam bhuvanā yanti anyā	tad sampraśna bhuvana i anya
1082	te ā ayajanta draviṇam sam asmai	tad āyaj draviṇa sam idam
1082	ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāraḥ na bhūnā	ṛṣi pūrva jaritṛ na bhūnā
1082	asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte	asūrta sūrta rajas niṣad
1082	ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvan imāni	yad bhūta saṃkṛ idam
1082	paraḥ divā paraḥ enā pṛthivyā	paras div paras idam pṛthivī
1082	paraḥ devebhiḥ asuraiḥ yat asti	paras deva asura yad as
1082	kam svit garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ	kaṃ svid garbha prathama dhā ap
1082	yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve	yatra deva saṃpaś viśva
1082	tam it garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ	tad id garbha prathama dhā ap
1082	yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve	yatra deva saṃgam viśva
1082	ajasya nābhau adhi ekam arpitam	aja nābhi adhi eka arpay
1082	yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ	yad viśva bhuvana sthā
1082	na tam vidātha yaḥ imā jajāna	na tad vid yad idam jan
1082	anyat yuṣmākam antaram babhūva	anya tvad antara bhū
1082	nīhāreṇa prāvṛtāḥ jalpyā ca	nīhāra prāvṛ jalpi ca
1082	asutṛpaḥ ukthaśāsaḥ caranti	asutṛp uktha śās car
 ---
1083	yaḥ te manyo avidhat vajra sāyaka	yad tvad manyu vidh vajra sāyaka
1083	sahaḥ ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak	sahas ojas puṣ viśva ānuṣak
1083	sāhyāma dāsam āryam tvayā yujā	sah dāsa ārya tvad yuj
1083	sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā	sahaskṛta sahas sahasvat
1083	manyuḥ indraḥ manyuḥ eva āsa devaḥ	manyu indra manyu eva as deva
1083	manyuḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ	manyu hotṛ varuṇa jātavedas
1083	manyum viśaḥ īLate mānuṣīḥ yāḥ	manyu viś īḍ mānuṣa yad
1083	pāhi naḥ manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ	pā mad manyu tapas sajoṣas
1083	abhi ihi manyo tavasaḥ tavīyān	abhī manyu tavas tavīyas
1083	tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn	tapas yuj vi hā śatru
1083	amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca	amitra han vṛtra han dasyu han ca
1083	viśvā vasūni ā bharā tvam naḥ	viśva vasu ā bhṛ tvad mad
1083	tvam hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ	tvad hi manyu abhibhūti ojas
1083	svayambhūḥ bhāmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ	svayaṃbhū bhāma abhimātiṣāha
1083	viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān	viśvacarṣaṇi sahuri sahāva
1083	asmāsu ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi	mad ojas pṛtanā dhā
1083	abhāgaḥ san apa paretaḥ asmi	a bhāga as apa pare as
1083	tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ	tvad kratu taviṣa pracetas
1083	tam tvā manyo akratuḥ jihīLa aham	tad tvad manyu akratu hīḍ mad
1083	svā tanūḥ baladeyāya mā ā ihi	sva tanū bala deya mad i
1083	ayam te asmi upa mā ā ihi arvāṅ	idam tvad as upa mad i arvāñc
1083	pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ	pratīcīna sahuri viśva dhāyas
1083	manyo vajrin abhi mām ā vavṛtsva	manyu vajrin abhi mad ā vṛt
1083	hanāva dasyūn uta bodhi āpeḥ	han dasyu uta budh āpi
1083	abhi pra ihi dakṣiṇataḥ bhavā me	abhi pre dakṣiṇatas bhū mad
1083	adhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri	adha vṛtra jaṅghan bhūri
1083	juhomi te dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram	hu tvad dharuṇa madhu agra
1083	ubhau upāṁśu prathamā pibāva	ubh upāṃśu prathama pā
 ---
1084	tvayā manyo saratham ārujantaḥ	tvad manyu sa ratha āruj
1084	harṣamāṇāsaḥ dhṛṣitāḥ marutvaḥ	hṛṣ dhṛṣ marutvat
1084	tigmeṣavaḥ āyudhā saṁśiśānāḥ	tigmeṣu āyudha saṃśā
1084	abhi pra yantu naraḥ agnirūpāḥ	abhi pra i nṛ agni rūpa
1084	agniḥ iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva	agni iva manyu tviṣ sah
1084	senānīḥ naḥ sahure hūtaḥ edhi	senānī mad sahuri hvā as
1084	hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva vedaḥ	han śatru vi bhaj vedas
1084	ojaḥ mimānaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva	ojas mā vi mṛdh nud
1084	sahasva manyo abhimātim asme	sah manyu abhimāti mad
1084	rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan pra ihi śatrūn	mad ruj pra i śatru
1084	ugram te pājaḥ nanu ā rurudhre	ugra tvad pājas nanu ā rudh
1084	vaśī vaśam nayase ekaja tvam	vaśin vaśa nī eka ja tvad
1084	ekaḥ bahūnām asi manyo īLitaḥ	eka bahu as manyu īḍ
1084	viśaṁviśam yudhaye sam śiśādhi	viś viś yudh sam śā
1084	akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayam	akṛtta ruc tvad yuj mad
1084	dyumantam ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmahe	dyumat ghoṣa vijaya kṛ
1084	vijeṣakṛt indraḥ iva anavabravaḥ	vijeṣa kṛt indra iva anavabrava
1084	asmākam manyo adhipāḥ bhava iha	mad manyu adhipā bhū iha
1084	priyam te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi	priya tvad nāman sahuri gṛ
1084	vidmā tam utsam yataḥ ābabhūtha	vid tad utsa yatas ābhū
1084	ābhūtyā sahajāḥ vajra sāyaka	ābhūti sahajā vajra sāyaka
1084	sahaḥ bibharṣi abhibhūte uttaram	sahas bhṛ abhibhū uttara
1084	kratvā naḥ manyo saha medī edhi	kratu mad manyu saha medin as
1084	mahādhanasya puruhūta saṁsṛji	mahat dhana puru hvā saṃsṛj
1084	saṁsṛṣTam dhanam ubhayam samākṛtam	saṃsṛj dhana ubhaya samākṛ
1084	asmabhyam dattām varuṇaḥ ca manyuḥ	mad dā varuṇa ca manyu
1084	bhiyam dadhānāḥ hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ	bhī dhā hṛdaya śatru
1084	parājitāsaḥ apa ni layantām	parāji apa ni lī
 ---
1085	satyena uttabhitā bhūmiḥ	satya uttambh bhūmi
1085	sūryeṇa uttabhitā dyauḥ	sūrya uttambh div
1085	ṛtena ādityāḥ tiṣThanti	ṛta āditya sthā
1085	divi somaḥ adhi śritaḥ	div soma adhi śri
1085	somena ādityāḥ balinaḥ	soma āditya balin
1085	somena pṛthivī mahī	soma pṛthivī mah
1085	atha u nakṣatrāṇām eṣām	atho nakṣatra idam
1085	upasthe somaḥ āhitaḥ	upastha soma ādhā
1085	somam manyate papivān	soma man pā
1085	yat sampiṁṣanti oṣadhim	yat sampiṣ oṣadhi
1085	somam yam brahmāṇaḥ viduḥ	soma yad brahman vid
1085	na tasya aśnāti kaḥ cana	na tad aś kaścana
1085	āchadvidhānaiḥ gupitaḥ	ācchad vidhāna gup
1085	bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ	bārhata soma rakṣ
1085	grāvṇām it śṛṇvan tiṣThasi	grāvan id śru sthā
1085	na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ	na tvad aś pārthiva
1085	yat tvā deva prapibanti	yat tvad deva prapā
1085	tataḥ ā pyāyase punar	tatas ā pyā punar
1085	vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā	vāyu soma rakṣitṛ
1085	samānām māsaḥ ākṛtiḥ	samā māsa ākṛti
1085	raibhī āsīt anudeyī	raibhī as anudeyī
1085	nārāśaṁsī nyocanī	nārāśaṃsī nyocanī
1085	sūryāyāḥ bhadram it vāsaḥ	sūryā bhadra id vāsas
1085	gāthayā eti pariṣkṛtam	gāthā i pariṣkṛ
1085	cittiḥ āḥ upabarhaṇam	citti as upabarhaṇa
1085	cakṣuḥ āḥ abhyañjanam	cakṣus as abhyañjana
1085	dyauḥ bhūmiḥ kośaḥ āsīt	div bhūmi kośa as
1085	yat ayāt sūryā patim	yat yā sūryā pati
1085	stomāḥ āsan pratidhayaḥ	stoma as pratidhi
1085	kurīram chandaḥ opaśaḥ	kurīra chandas opaśa
1085	sūryāyāḥ aśvinā varā	sūryā aśvin vara
1085	agniḥ āsīt purogavaḥ	agni as purogava
1085	somaḥ vadhūyuḥ abhavat	soma vadhūyu bhū
1085	aśvinā āstām ubhā varā	aśvin as ubh vara
1085	sūryām yat patye śaṁsantīm	sūryā yat pati śaṃs
1085	manasā savitā adadāt	manas savitṛ dā
1085	manaḥ asyāḥ anaḥ āsīt	manas idam anas as
1085	dyauḥ āsīt uta chadiḥ	div as uta chadis
1085	śukrau anaḍvāhau āstām	śukra anaḍuh as
1085	yat ayāt sūryā gṛham	yat yā sūryā gṛha
1085	ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau	ṛc sāman abhidhā
1085	gāvau te sāmanau itaḥ	go tvad sāmana i
1085	śrotram te cakre āstām	śrotra tvad cakra as
1085	divi panthāḥ carācaraḥ	div pathin cara ācāra
1085	śucī te cakre yātyāḥ	śuci tvad cakra yā vyāna
1085	vyānaḥ akṣaḥ āhataḥ	yā vyāna akṣa āhan
1085	anaḥ manasmayam sūryā	anas manasmaya sūryā
1085	ā arohat prayatī patim	āruh pre pati
1085	sūryāyāḥ vahatuḥ pra agāt	sūryā vahatu pragā
1085	savitā yam avāsṛjat	savitṛ yad avasṛj
1085	aghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ	aghā han go
1085	arjunyoḥ pari uhyate	arjunī pari vah
1085	yat aśvinā pṛcchamānau ayātam	yat aśvin pracch yā
1085	tricakreṇa vahatum sūryāyāḥ	tri cakra vahatu sūryā
1085	viśve devāḥ anu tat vām ajānan	viśva deva anu tad tvad jñā
1085	putraḥ pitarau avṛṇīta pūṣā	putra pitṛ vṛ pūṣan
1085	yat ayātam śubhaḥ patī	yat yā śubh pati
1085	vareyam sūryām upa	varey sūryā upa
1085	kva ekam cakram vām āsīt	kva eka cakra tvad as
1085	kva deṣTrāya tasthathuḥ	kva deṣṭra sthā
1085	dve te cakre sūrye	dvi tvad cakra sūryā
1085	brahmāṇaḥ ṛtuthā viduḥ	brahman ṛtuthā vid
1085	atha ekam cakram yat guhā	atha eka cakra yad guhā
1085	tat addhātayaḥ it viduḥ	tad addhāti id vid
1085	sūryāyai devebhyaḥ	sūryā deva
1085	mitrāya varuṇāya ca	mitra varuṇa ca
1085	ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ	yad bhū pracetas
1085	idam tebhyaḥ akaram namaḥ	idam tad kṛ namas
1085	pūrvāparam carataḥ māyayā etau	pūrva apara car māyā etad
1085	śiśū krīLantau pari yātaḥ adhvaram	śiśu krīḍ pari yā adhvara
1085	viśvāni anyaḥ bhuvanā abhicaṣTe	viśva anya bhuvana abhicakṣ
1085	ṛtūn anyaḥ vidadhat jāyate punar	ṛtu anya vidhā jan punar
1085	navonavaḥ bhavati jāyamānaḥ	nava nava bhū jan
1085	ahnām ketuḥ uṣasām eti agram	ahar ketu uṣas i agra
1085	bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāti āyan	bhāga deva vi dhā e
1085	pra candramāḥ tirate dīrgham āyuḥ	pra candramas tṛ dīrgha āyus
1085	sukiṁśukam śalmalim viśvarūpam	su kiṃśuka śalmali viśva rūpa
1085	hiraṇyavarṇam suvṛtam sucakram	hiraṇya varṇa suvṛt su cakra
1085	ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam	ā ruh sūryā amṛta loka
1085	syonam patye vahatum kṛṇuṣva	syona pati vahatu kṛ
1085	ut īrṣva ataḥ pativatī hi eṣā	ud īr atas pativat hi etad
1085	viśvāvasum namasā gīrbhiḥ īLe	viśvāvasu namas gir īḍ
1085	anyām iccha pitṛṣadam vyaktām	anya iṣ pitṛṣad vyakta
1085	sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi	tad tvad bhāga janus tad vid
1085	ut īrṣva ataḥ viśvāvaso	ud īr atas viśvāvasu
1085	namasā īLā mahe tvā	namas iḍā mah tvad
1085	anyām iccha prapharvyam	anya iṣ prapharvī
1085	sam jāyām patyā sṛja	sam jāyā pati sṛj
1085	anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthāḥ	anṛkṣara ṛju as pathin
1085	yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti naḥ vareyam	yad sakhi i mad varey
1085	sam aryamā sam bhagaḥ naḥ ninīyāt	sam aryaman sam bhaga mad nī
1085	sam jāspatyam suyamam astu devāḥ	sam jāspatya suyama as deva
1085	pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt	pra tvad muc varuṇa pāśa
1085	yena tvā abadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ	yad tvad bandh savitṛ su śeva
1085	ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke	ṛta yoni sukṛta loka
1085	ariṣTām tvā saha patyā dadhāmi	ariṣṭa tvad saha pati dhā
1085	pra itaḥ muñcāmi na amutaḥ	pre muc na amutas
1085	subaddhām amutaḥ karam	su bandh amutas kṛ
1085	yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ	yathā idam indra mīḍhvas
1085	suputrā subhagā asati	su putra subhaga as
1085	pūṣā tvā itaḥ nayatu hastagṛhya	pūṣan tvad itas nī hasta grah
1085	aśvinā tvā pra vahatām rathena	aśvin tvad pra vah ratha
1085	gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathā asaḥ	gṛha gam gṛha patnī yathā as
1085	vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi	vaśin tvad vidatha ā vad
1085	iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām	iha priya prajā tvad sam ṛdh
1085	asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi	idam gṛha gārhapatya jāgṛ
1085	enā patyā tanvam sam sṛjasva	idam pati tanū sam sṛj
1085	adhā jivrī vidatham ā vadāthaḥ	adha jivri vidatha ā vad
1085	nīlalohitam bhavati	nīla lohita bhū
1085	kṛtyā āsaktiḥ vi ajyate	kṛtyā āsakti vi añj
1085	edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ	edh idam jñāti
1085	patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate	pati bandha bandh
1085	parā dehi śāmulyam	parā dā śāmulya
1085	brahmabhyaḥ vi bhajā vasu	brahman vi bhaj vasu
1085	kṛtyā eṣā padvatī bhūtvī	kṛtyā etad padvat bhū
1085	ā jāyā viśate patim	ā jāyā viś pati
1085	aśrīrā tanūḥ bhavati	aśrīra tanū bhū
1085	ruśatī pāpayā amuyā	ruśat pāpā adas
1085	patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasā	pati yat vadhū vāsas
1085	svam aṅgam abhidhitsate	sva aṅga abhidhits
1085	ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum	yad vadhū candra vahatu
1085	yakṣmāḥ yanti janāt anu	yakṣma i jana anu
1085	punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ	punar tad yajñiya deva
1085	nayantu yataḥ āgatāḥ	nī yatas āgam
1085	mā vidan paripanthinaḥ	mā vid paripanthin
1085	ye āsīdanti dampatī	yad āsad dampati
1085	sugebhiḥ durgam ati itām	suga durga atī
1085	apa drāntu arātayaḥ	apa drā arāti
1085	sumaṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ	su maṅgala idam vadhū
1085	imām sameta paśyata	idam same paś
1085	saubhāgyam asyai dattvāya	saubhāgya idam dā
1085	atha astam vi parā itana	atha asta vi parā i
1085	tṛṣTam etat kaTukam etat	tṛṣ etad kaṭuka etad
1085	apāṣTavat viṣavat na etat attave	apāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etad ad
1085	sūryām yaḥ brahmā vidyāt	sūryā yad brahman vid
1085	saḥ it vādhūyam arhati	tad id vādhūya arh
1085	āśasanam viśasanam	āśasana viśasana
1085	atha u adhivikartanam	atho adhivikartana
1085	sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi	sūryā paś rūpa
1085	tāni brahmā tu śundhati	tad brahman tu śudh
1085	gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastam	grah tvad saubhaga tva hasta
1085	mayā patyā jaradaṣTiḥ yathā asaḥ	mad pati jaradaṣṭi yathā as
1085	bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṁdhiḥ	bhaga aryaman savitṛ purandhi
1085	mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ	mad tvad dā gārhapatya deva
1085	tām pūṣan śivatamām ā īrayasva	tad pūṣan śivatama eray
1085	yasyām bījam manuṣyāḥ vapanti	yad bīja manuṣya vap
1085	yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāte	yad mad ūru vaś viśri
1085	yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam	yad vaś prahṛ śepa
1085	tubhyam agre pari avahan	tvad agra pari vah
1085	sūryām vahatunā saha	sūryā vahatu saha
1085	punar patibhyaḥ jāyām	punar pati jāyā
1085	dāḥ agne prajayā saha	dā agni prajā saha
1085	punar patnīm agniḥ adāt	punar patnī agni dā
1085	āyuṣā saha varcasā	āyus saha varcas
1085	dīrghāyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ	dīrgha āyus idam yad pati
1085	jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam	jīv śarad śata
1085	somaḥ prathamaḥ vivide	soma prathama vid
1085	gandharvaḥ vivide uttaraḥ	gandharva vid uttara
1085	tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ	tṛtīya agni tvad pati
1085	turīyaḥ te manuṣyajāḥ	turīya tvad manuṣya jā
1085	somaḥ dadat gandharvāya	soma dā gandharva
1085	gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye	gandharva dā agni
1085	rayim ca putrān ca adāt	rayi ca putra ca dā
1085	agniḥ mahyam atha u imām	agni mad atho idam
1085	iha eva stam mā vi yauṣTam	iha eva as mā vi viśva
1085	viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnutam	viśva āyus vi aś
1085	krīLantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ	krīḍ putra naptṛ
1085	modamānau sve gṛhe	mud sva gṛha
1085	ā naḥ prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ	ā mad prajā janay prajāpati
1085	ājarasāya sam anaktu aryamā	ājarasāya sam añj aryaman
1085	adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokam ā viśa	adurmaṅgala pati loka ā viś
1085	śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade	śam mad bhū dvipad śam catuṣpada
1085	aghoracakṣuḥ apatighnī edhi	aghora cakṣus a pati ghna as
1085	śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ	śiva paśu su manas su varcas
1085	vīrasūḥ devakāmā syonā	vīrasū deva kāma syona
1085	śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade	śam mad bhū dvipad śam catuṣpada
1085	imām tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ	idam tvad indra
1085	suputrām subhagām kṛṇu	su putra subhaga kṛ
1085	daśa asyām putrān ā dhehi	daśan idam putra ā dhā
1085	patim ekādaśam kṛdhi	pati ekādaśa kṛ
1085	samrājñī śvaśure bhava	samrājñī śvaśura bhū
1085	samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava	samrājñī śvaśrū bhū
1085	nanāndari samrājñī bhava	nanāndṛ samrājñī bhū
1085	samrājñī adhi devṛṣu	samrājñī adhi devṛ
1085	sam añjantu viśve devāḥ	sam añj viśva deva
1085	sam āpaḥ hṛdayāni nau	sam ap hṛdaya mad
1085	sam mātariśvā sam dhātā	sam mātariśvan sam dhātṛ
1085	sam u deṣTrī dadhātu nau	sam u deṣṭrī dhā mad
