1086	vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata	vi hi sotu sṛj
1086	na indram devam amaṁsata	na indra deva man
1086	yatra amadat vṛṣākapiḥ	yatra mad vṛṣākapi
1086	aryaḥ puṣTeṣu matsakhā	ari puṣṭa mad sakhi
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	parā hi indra dhāvasi	parā hi indra dhāv
1086	vṛṣākapeḥ ati vyathiḥ	vṛṣākapi ati vyathis
1086	na ū aha pra vindasi	no aha pra vid
1086	anyatra somapītaye	anyatra soma pīti
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	kim ayam tvām vṛṣākapiḥ	ka idam tvad vṛṣākapi
1086	cakāra haritaḥ mṛgaḥ	kṛ harita mṛga
1086	yasmai irasyasi it u nu	yad irasy u nu
1086	aryaḥ vā puṣTimat vasu	ari vā puṣṭimat vasu
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	yam imam tvam vṛṣākapim	yad idam tvad vṛṣākapi
1086	priyam indra abhirakṣasi	priya indra abhirakṣ
1086	śvā nu asya jambhiṣat	śvan nu idam jabh
1086	api karṇe varāhayuḥ	api karṇa varāhayu
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	priyā taṣTāni me kapiḥ	priya takṣ mad kapi
1086	vyaktā vi adūduṣat	vyakta vi duṣ
1086	śiraḥ nu asya rāviṣam	śiras nu idam ru
1086	na sugam duṣkṛte bhuvam	na suga duṣkṛt bhū
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	na mat strī subhasattarā	na mad strī subhasattara
1086	na suyāśutarā bhuvat	na suyāśutara bhū
1086	na mat praticyavīyasī	na mad praticyavīyas
1086	na sakthi udyamīyasī	na sakthi udyamīyas
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	uve amba sulābhike	uve ambā sulābhikā
1086	yathā iva aṅga bhaviṣyati	yathā iva aṅga bhū
1086	bhasat me amba sakthi me	bhasad mad ambā sakthi mad
1086	śiraḥ me vi iva hṛṣyati	śiras mad vi iva hṛṣ
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	kim subāho svaṅgure	kim su bāhu su aṅguri
1086	pṛthuṣTo pṛthujāghane	pṛthuṣṭu
1086	kim śūrapatni naḥ tvam	kim śūra patnī mad tvad
1086	abhi amīṣi vṛṣākapim	abhi am vṛṣākapi
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	avīrām iva mām ayam	avīra iva mad idam
1086	śarāruḥ abhi manyate	śarāru abhi man
1086	uta aham asmi vīriṇī	uta mad as vīriṇī
1086	indrapatnī marutsakhā	indra patnī marut sakhi
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	saṁhotram sma purā nārī	saṃhotra sma purā nārī
1086	samanam vā ava gacchati	samana vāva gam
1086	vedhāḥ ṛtasya vīriṇī	vedhas ṛta vīriṇī
1086	indrapatnī mahīyate	indra patnī mahīy
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu	indrāṇī idam nārī
1086	subhagām aham aśravam	subhaga mad śru
1086	nahi asyāḥ aparam cana	nahi idam apara cana
1086	jarasā marate patiḥ	jaras mṛ pati
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	na aham indrāṇi rāraṇa	na mad indrāṇī ran
1086	sakhyuḥ vṛṣākapeḥ ṛte	sakhi vṛṣākapi ṛte
1086	yasya idam apyam haviḥ	yad idam apya havis
1086	priyam deveṣu gacchati	priya deva gam
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	vṛṣākapāyi revati	vṛṣākapāyī revatī
1086	suputre āt u susnuṣe	su putra āt u su snuṣā
1086	ghasat te indraḥ ukṣaṇaḥ	ghas tvad indra ukṣan
1086	priyam kācitkaram haviḥ	priya kācitkara havis
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	ukṣṇaḥ hi me pañcadaśa	ukṣan hi mad pañcadaśan
1086	sākam pacanti viṁśatim	sākam pac viṃśati
1086	uta aham admi pīvaḥ it	uta mad ad pīvas id
1086	ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me	ubh kukṣi pṛ mad
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	vṛṣabhaḥ na tigmaśṛṅgaḥ	vṛṣabha na tigma śṛṅga
1086	antar yūtheṣu roruvat	antar yūtha roro
1086	manthaḥ te indra śam hṛde	mantha tvad indra śam hṛd
1086	yam te sunoti bhāvayuḥ	yad tvad su bhāvayu
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	na sa īśe yasya rambate	na tad īś yad lamb
1086	antarā sakthyā kapṛt	antarā kapṛth
1086	sa it īśe yasya romaśam	tad id īś yad romaśa
1086	niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate	niṣad vijṛmbh
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	na sa īśe yasya romaśam	na tad īś yad romaśa
1086	niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate	niṣad vijṛmbh
1086	sa it īśe yasya rambate	tad id īś yad lamb
1086	antarā sakthyā kapṛt	antarā kapṛth
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ	idam indra vṛṣākapi
1086	parasvantam hatam vidat	parasvant han vid
1086	asim sūnām navam carum	asi sūnā nava caru
1086	āt edhasya anaḥ ācitam	āt āci
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	ayam emi vicākaśat	idam i vicākaśat
1086	vicinvan dāsam āryam	vici dāsa ārya
1086	pibāmi pākasutvanaḥ	pā pākasutvan
1086	abhi dhīram acākaśam	abhi dhīra cākaś
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	dhanva ca yat kṛntatram ca	dhanvan ca yad kṛntatra ca
1086	kati svit tā vi yojanā	kati svid tad vi yojana
1086	nedīyasaḥ vṛṣākape	nedīyas vṛṣākapi
1086	astam ā ihi gṛhān upa	asta e gṛha upa
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	punar ā ihi vṛṣākape	punar e vṛṣākapi
1086	suvitā kalpayāvahai	suvita kalpay
1086	yaḥ eṣa svapnanaṁśanaḥ	yad etad svapnanaṃśana
1086	astam eṣi pathā punar	asta i pathin punar
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	yat udañcaḥ vṛṣākape	yat udañc vṛṣākapi
1086	gṛham indra ajagantana	gṛha indra gam
1086	kva sya pulvaghaḥ mṛgaḥ	kva tya pulu agha mṛga
1086	kam agan janayopanaḥ	ka gam jana yopana
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
1086	parśuḥ ha nāma mānavī	parśu ha nāma mānavī
1086	sākam sasūva viṁśatim	sākam su viṃśati
1086	bhadram bhala tyasyai abhūt	bhadra bhala tya bhū
1086	yasyāḥ udaram āmayat	yad udara
1086	viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ	viśva indra uttara
 ---
1087	rakṣohaṇam vājinam ā jigharmi	rakṣas han vājin ā ghṛ
1087	mitram prathiṣTham upa yāmi śarma	mitra prathiṣṭha upa yā śarman
1087	śiśānaḥ agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ	śā agni kratu samindh
1087	sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam	tad mad divā tad riṣ pā nakta
1087	ayodaṁṣTraḥ arciṣā yātudhānān	ayas daṃṣṭra arcis yātudhāna
1087	upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ	upa spṛś jātavedas samindh
1087	ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva	ā jihvā mūradeva rabh
1087	kravyādaḥ vṛktvī api dhatsva āsan	kravyād vṛj api dhā āsan
1087	ubhā ubhayāvin upa dhehi daṁṣTrā	ubh ubhayāvin upa dhā daṃṣṭra
1087	hiṁsraḥ śiśānaḥ avaram param ca	hiṃsra śā avara para ca
1087	uta antarikṣe pari yāhi rājan	uta antarikṣa pari yā rājan
1087	jambhaiḥ sam dhehi abhi yātudhānān	jambha sam dhā abhi yātudhāna
1087	yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ saṁnamamānaḥ agne	yajña iṣu saṃnam agni
1087	vācā śalyān aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ	vāc śalya aśani dih
1087	tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān	tad vyadh hṛdaya yātudhāna
1087	pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṅdhi eṣām	pratyañc bāhu prati bhañj idam
1087	agne tvacam yātudhānasya bhindhi	agni tvac yātudhāna bhid
1087	hiṁsrā aśaniḥ harasā hantu enam	hiṃsra aśani haras han enad
1087	pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi	pra parvan jātavedas śṛ
1087	kravyāt kraviṣṇuḥ vi cinotu vṛkṇam	kravyād kraviṣṇu vi ci vraśc
1087	yatra idānīm paśyasi jātavedaḥ	yatra idānīm dṛś jātavedas
1087	tiṣThantam agne uta vā carantam	sthā agni uta vā car
1087	yat vā antarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantam	yat vā antarikṣa pathin pat
1087	tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ	tad astṛ vyadh śaru śā
1087	uta ālabdham spṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ	uta ālabh spṛ jātavedas
1087	ālebhānāt ṛṣTibhiḥ yātudhānāt	ālabh ṛṣṭi yātudhāna
1087	agne pūrvaḥ ni jahi śośucānaḥ	agni pūrva ni hā śośuc
1087	āmādaḥ kṣviṅkāḥ tam adantu enīḥ	āmād kṣviṅkā tad ad enī
1087	iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ saḥ agne	iha pra brū yatama tad agni
1087	yaḥ yātudhānaḥ yaḥ idam kṛṇoti	yad yātudhāna yad idam kṛ
1087	tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣTha	tad ā rabh samidh yaviṣṭha
1087	nṛcakṣasaḥ cakṣuṣe randhaya enam	nṛ cakṣas cakṣus randhay enad
1087	tīkṣṇena agne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam	tīkṣṇa agni cakṣus rakṣ yajña
1087	prāñcam vasubhyaḥ pra naya pracetaḥ	prāñc vasu pra nī pracetas
1087	hiṁsram rakṣāṁsi abhi śośucānam	hiṃsra rakṣas abhi śośuc
1087	mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ nṛcakṣaḥ	mā tvad dabh yātudhāna nṛ cakṣas
1087	nṛcakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu	nṛ cakṣas rakṣas pari paś viś
1087	tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhi agrā	tad tri prati śṛ agra
1087	tasya agne pṛṣTīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi	tad agni pṛṣṭi haras śṛ
1087	tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca	tredhā mūla yātudhāna vraśc
1087	triḥ yātudhānaḥ prasitim te etu	tris yātudhāna prasiti tvad i
1087	ṛtam yaḥ agne anṛtena hanti	ṛta yad agni anṛta han
1087	tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ	tad arcis sphūrjay jātavedas
1087	samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni vṛṅdhi	samakṣa enad gṛ ni vṛj
1087	tat agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe	tad agni cakṣus prati dhā rebha
1087	śaphārujam yena paśyasi yātudhānam	śaphāruj yad paś yātudhāna
1087	atharvavat jyotiṣā daivyena	atharvan vat jyotis daivya
1087	satyam dhūrvantam acitam ni oṣa	satya dhūrvat acit ni uṣ
1087	yat agne adya mithunā śapātaḥ	yad agni adya mithuna śap
1087	yat vācaḥ tṛṣTam janayanta rebhāḥ	yad vāc tṛṣṭa janay rebha
1087	manyoḥ manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā	manyu manas śaravyā jan yad
1087	tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān	tad vyadh hṛdaya yātudhāna
1087	parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān	parā śṛ tapas yātudhāna
1087	parā agne rakṣaḥ harasā śṛṇīhi	parā agni rakṣas haras śṛ
1087	parā arciṣā mūradevān śṛṇīhi	parā arcis mūradeva śṛ
1087	parā asutṛpaḥ abhi śośucānaḥ	parā asutṛp abhi śośuc
1087	parā adya devāḥ vṛjinam śṛṇantu	parā adya deva vṛjina śṛ
1087	pratyak enam śapathāḥ yantu tṛṣTāḥ	pratyañc enad śapatha i tṛṣṭa
1087	vācāstenam śaravaḥ ṛcchantu marman	vācāstena śaru ṛch marman
1087	viśvasya etu prasitim yātudhānaḥ	viśva e prasiti yātudhāna
1087	yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte	yad pauruṣeya kravis samañj
1087	yaḥ aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ	yad aśvya paśu yātudhāna
1087	yaḥ aghnyāyāḥ bharati kṣīram agne	yad aghnyā bhṛ kṣīra agni
1087	teṣām śīrṣāṇi harasā api vṛśca	tad śīrṣa haras api vraśc
1087	saṁvatsarīṇam payaḥ usriyāyāḥ	saṃvatsarīṇa payas usriyā
1087	tasya mā aśīt yātudhānaḥ nṛcakṣaḥ	tad mā aś yātudhāna nṛ cakṣas
1087	pīyūṣam agne yatamaḥ titṛpsāt	pīyūṣa agni yatama titṛps
1087	tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman	tad pratyañc arcis vyadh marman
1087	viṣam gavām yātudhānāḥ pibantu	viṣa go yātudhāna pā
1087	ā vṛścyantām aditaye durevāḥ	pā ā aditi dureva
1087	parā enān devaḥ savitā dadātu	parā enad deva savitṛ dā
1087	parā bhāgam oṣadhīnām jayantām	parā bhāga oṣadhi ji
1087	sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān	sanāt agni mṛ yātudhāna
1087	na tvā rakṣāṁsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ	na tvad rakṣas pṛtanā ji
1087	anu daha sahamūrān kravyādaḥ	anu dah sahamūra kravyād
1087	mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ	mā tvad heti muc daivya
1087	tvam naḥ agne adharāt udaktāt	tvad mad agni adharāt udaktāt
1087	tvam paścāt uta rakṣā purastāt	tvad paścāt uta rakṣ purastāt
1087	prati te te ajarāsaḥ tapiṣThāḥ	prati tvad tad ajara tapiṣṭha
1087	aghaśaṁsam śośucataḥ dahantu	agha śaṃsa śośuc dah
1087	paścāt purastāt adharāt udaktāt	paścāt purastāt adharāt udaktāt
1087	kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhi rājan	kavi kāvya pari pā rājan
1087	sakhe sakhāyam ajaraḥ jarimṇe	sakhi sakhi ajara jariman
1087	agne martān amartyaḥ tvam naḥ	agni marta amartya tvad mad
1087	pari tvā agne puram vayam	pari tvad agni pur mad
1087	vipram sahasya dhīmahi	vipra sahasya dhā
1087	dhṛṣadvarṇam divedive	dhṛṣat varṇa diva diva
1087	hantāram bhaṅgurāvatām	hantṛ bhaṅgurāvat
1087	viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ	viṣa bhaṅgurāvat
1087	prati sma rakṣasaḥ daha	prati sma rakṣas dah
1087	agne tigmena śociṣā	agni tigma śocis
1087	tapuragrābhiḥ ṛṣTibhiḥ	tapus agra ṛṣṭi
1087	prati agne mithunā daha	prati agni mithuna dah
1087	yātudhānā kimīdinā	yātudhāna kimīdin
1087	sam tvā śiśāmi jāgṛhi	sam tvad śā jāgṛ
1087	adabdham vipra manmabhiḥ	adabdha vipra manman
1087	prati agne harasā haraḥ	prati agni haras haras
1087	śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati	śṛ viśvatas prati
1087	yātudhānasya rakṣasaḥ	yātudhāna rakṣas
1087	balam vi ruja vīryam	bala vi ruj vīrya
 ---
1088	haviḥ pāntam ajaram svarvidi	havis pānta ajara svar vid
1088	divispṛśi āhutam juṣTam agnau	divispṛś āhu juṣ agni
1088	tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devāḥ	tad bharman bhuvana deva
1088	dharmaṇe kam svadhayā paprathanta	dharman kaṃ svadhā prath
1088	gīrṇam bhuvanam tamasā apagūLham	gṛ bhuvana tamas apaguh
1088	āviḥ svar abhavat jāte agnau	āvis svar bhū jan agni
1088	tasya devāḥ pṛthivī dyauḥ uta āpaḥ	tad deva pṛthivī div uta ap
1088	araṇayan oṣadhīḥ sakhye asya	raṇay oṣadhī sakhya idam
1088	devebhiḥ nu iṣitaḥ yajñiyebhiḥ	deva nu iṣ yajñiya
1088	agnim stoṣāṇi ajaram bṛhantam	agni stu ajara bṛhat
1088	yaḥ bhānunā pṛthivīm dyām uta imām	yad bhānu pṛthivī div uta idam
1088	ātatāna rodasī antarikṣam	ātan rodas antarikṣa
1088	yaḥ hotā āsīt prathamaḥ devajuṣTaḥ	yad hotṛ as prathama deva juṣ
1088	yam samāñjan ājyenā vṛṇānāḥ	yad samañj ājya ā vṛ
1088	sa patatri itvaram sthāḥ jagat yat	tad patatrin itvara sthā jagat yad
1088	śvātram agniḥ akṛṇot jātavedāḥ	śvātra agni kṛ jātavedas
1088	yat jātavedaḥ bhuvanasya mūrdhan	yat jātavedas bhuvana mūrdhan
1088	atiṣThaḥ agne saha rocanena	sthā agni saha rocana
1088	tam tvā ahema matibhiḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ	tad tvad hi mati gir uktha
1088	sa yajñiyaḥ abhavaḥ rodasiprāḥ	tad yajñiya bhū rodasiprā
1088	mūrdhā bhuvaḥ bhavati naktam agniḥ	mūrdhan bhū bhū nakta agni
1088	tataḥ sūryaḥ jāyate prātar udyan	tatas sūrya jan prātar udi
1088	māyām ū tu yajñiyānām etām	māyā u tu yajñiya etad
1088	apaḥ yat tūrṇiḥ carati prajānan	apas yat tūrṇi car prajñā
1088	dṛśenyaḥ yaḥ mahinā samiddhaḥ	dṛśenya yad mahina samindh
1088	arocata diviyoniḥ vibhāvā	ruc diviyoni vibhāvan
1088	tasmin agnau sūktavākena devāḥ	tad agni su vac vāka deva
1088	haviḥ viśve ā ajuhavuḥ tanūpāḥ	havis viśva āhu tanū pā
1088	sūktavākam prathamam āt it agnim	su vac vāka prathama āt id agni
1088	āt it haviḥ ajanayanta devāḥ	āt id havis janay deva
1088	saḥ eṣām yajñaḥ abhavat tanūpāḥ	tad idam yajña bhū tanū pā
1088	tam dyauḥ veda tam pṛthivī tam āpaḥ	tad div vid tad pṛthivī tad ap
1088	yam devāsaḥ ajanayanta agnim	yad deva janay agni
1088	yasmin ā ajuhavuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā	yad āhu bhuvana viśva
1088	saḥ arciṣā pṛthivīm dyām uta imām	tad arcis pṛthivī div uta idam
1088	ṛjūyamānaḥ atapat mahitvā	ṛjūy tap mahi tva
1088	stomena hi divi devāsaḥ agnim	stoma hi div deva agni
1088	ajījanan śaktibhiḥ rodasiprām	jan śakti rodasiprā
1088	tam ū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kam	tad u kṛ tredhā bhū kaṃ
1088	saḥ oṣadhīḥ pacati viśvarūpāḥ	tad oṣadhi pac viśva rūpa
1088	yadā it enam adadhuḥ yajñiyāsaḥ	yadā id enad dhā yajñiya
1088	divi devāḥ sūryam āditeyam	div deva sūrya āditeya
1088	yadā cariṣṇū mithunau abhūtām	yadā cariṣṇu mithuna bhū
1088	āt it pra apaśyan bhuvanāni viśvā	āt id prapaś bhuvana viśva
1088	viśvasmai agnim bhuvanāya devāḥ	viśva agni bhuvana deva
1088	vaiśvānaram ketum ahnām akṛṇvan	vaiśvānara ketu ahar kṛ
1088	ā yaḥ tatāna uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ	ā yad tan uṣas vibhā
1088	apa u ūrṇoti tamaḥ arciṣā yan	apa u vṛ tamas arcis i
1088	vaiśvānaram kavayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ	vaiśvānara kavi yajñiya
1088	agnim devāḥ ajanayan ajuryam	agni deva janay ajurya
1088	nakṣatram pratnam aminat cariṣṇu	nakṣatra pratna a mī cariṣṇu
1088	yakṣasya adhyakṣam taviṣam bṛhantam	yakṣa adhyakṣa taviṣa bṛhat
1088	vaiśvānaram viśvahā dīdivāṁsam	vaiśvānara viśvahā dīdī
1088	mantraiḥ agnim kavim acchā vadāmaḥ	mantra agni kavi acchā vad
1088	yaḥ mahimnā paribabhūva urvī	yad mahiman paribhū urvī
1088	uta avastāt uta devaḥ parastāt	uta avastāt uta deva parastāt
1088	dve srutī aśṛṇavam pitṛṛṇām	dvi sruti śru pitṛ
1088	aham devānām uta martyānām	mad deva uta martya
1088	tābhyām idam viśvam ejat sam eti	tad idam viśva ej sam i
1088	yat antarā pitaram mātaram ca	yad antarā pitṛ mātṛ ca
1088	dve samīcī bibhṛtaḥ carantam	dvi samyañc bhṛ car
1088	śīrṣataḥ jātam manasā vimṛṣTam	śīrṣa jan manas vimṛś
1088	sa pratyaṅ viśvā bhuvanāni tasthau	tad pratyañc viśva bhuvana sthā
1088	aprayucchan taraṇiḥ bhrājamānaḥ	aprayucchat taraṇi bhrāj
1088	yatrā vadete avaraḥ paraḥ ca	yatra vad avara para ca
1088	yajñanyoḥ kataraḥ nau vi veda	yajñanī katara mad vi vid
1088	ā śekuḥ it sadhamādam sakhāyaḥ	ā śak id sadhamāda sakhi
1088	nakṣanta yajñam kaḥ idam vi vocat	nakṣ yajña ka idam vi vac
1088	kati agnayaḥ kati sūryāsaḥ	kati agni kati sūrya
1088	kati uṣāsaḥ kati u svit āpaḥ	kati uṣa kati u svid ap
1088	na upaspijam vaḥ pitaraḥ vadāmi	na upaspij tvad pitṛ vad
1088	pṛcchāmi vaḥ kavayaḥ vidmane kam	pracch tvad kavi vid kaṃ
1088	yāvanmātram uṣasaḥ na pratīkam	yāvanmātra uṣas na pratīka
1088	suparṇyaḥ vasate mātariśvaḥ	suparṇī vas mātariśvan
1088	tāvat dadhāti upa yajñam āyan	tāvat dhā upa yajña e
1088	brāhmaṇaḥ hotuḥ avaraḥ niṣīdan	brāhmaṇa hotṛ avara niṣad
 ---
1089	indram stavā nṛtamam yasya mahnā	indra stu nṛtama yad mahan
1089	vibabādhe rocanā vi jmaḥ antān	vibādh rocana vi jm anta
1089	ā yaḥ paprau carṣaṇīdhṛt varobhiḥ	ā yad prā carṣaṇī dhṛt varas
1089	pra sindhubhyaḥ riricānaḥ mahitvā	pra sindhu ric mahitva
1089	sa sūryaḥ pari urū varāṁsi	tad sūrya pari uru varas
1089	ā indraḥ vavṛtyāt rathyā iva cakrā	ā indra vṛt rathya iva cakra
1089	atiṣThantam apasyam na sargam	atiṣṭhat apasya na sarga
1089	kṛṣṇā tamāṁsi tviṣyā jaghāna	kṛṣṇa tamas tviṣi han
1089	samānam asmai anapāvṛt arca	samāna idam anapāvṛt arc
1089	kṣmayā divaḥ asamam brahma navyam	kṣmā div asama brahman navya
1089	vi yaḥ pṛṣThā iva janimāni aryaḥ	vi yad pṛṣṭha iva janiman arya
1089	indraḥ cikāya na sakhāyam īṣe	indra ci na sakhi iṣ
1089	indrāya giraḥ aniśitasargāḥ	indra gir aniśita sarga
1089	apaḥ pra īrayam sagarasya budhnāt	sarga ap sagara budhna
1089	yaḥ akṣeṇa iva cakriyā śacībhiḥ	yad akṣa iva cakriya śacī
1089	viṣvak tastambha pṛthivīm uta dyām	viṣvañc stambh pṛthivī uta div
1089	āpāntamanyuḥ tṛpalaprabharmā	āpāntamanyu tṛpala prabharman
1089	dhuniḥ śimīvān śarumān ṛjīṣī	dhuni śimīvat śarumat ṛjīṣin
1089	somaḥ viśvāni atasā vanāni	soma viśva atasa vana
1089	na arvāk indram pratimānāni debhuḥ	na arvāk indra pratimāna dabh
1089	na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanva	na yad dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanvan
1089	na antarikṣam na adrayaḥ somaḥ akṣār	na antarikṣa na adri soma kṣar
1089	yat asya manyuḥ adhinīyamānaḥ	yat idam manyu adhi nī
1089	śṛṇāti vīLu rujati sthirāṇi	śṛ vīḍu ruj sthira
1089	jaghāna vṛtram svadhitiḥ vanā iva	han vṛtra svadhiti vana iva
1089	ruroja puraḥ aradat na sindhūn	ruj puras rad na sindhu
1089	bibheda girim navam it na kumbham	bhid giri nava id na kumbha
1089	ā gāḥ indraḥ akṛṇuta svayugbhiḥ	ā go indra kṛ sva yuj
1089	tvam ha tyat ṛṇayāḥ indra dhīraḥ	tvad ha tya ṛṇayā indra dhīra
1089	asiḥ na parva vṛjinā śṛṇāsi	asi na parvan vṛjina śṛ
1089	pra ye mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma	pra yad mitra varuṇa dhāman
1089	yujam na janāḥ minanti mitram	yuj na jana mī mitra
1089	pra ye mitram pra aryamaṇam durevāḥ	pra yad mitra pra aryaman dureva
1089	pra saṁgiraḥ pra varuṇam minanti	pra saṃgir pra varuṇa mī
1089	ni amitreṣu vadham indra tumram	ni amitra vadha indra tumra
1089	vṛṣan vṛṣāṇam aruṣam śiśīhi	vṛṣan vṛṣan aruṣa śā
1089	indraḥ divaḥ indraḥ īśe pṛthivyāḥ	indra div indra īś pṛthivī
1089	indraḥ apām indraḥ it parvatānām	indra ap indra id parvata
1089	indraḥ vṛdhām indraḥ it medhirāṇām	indra vṛdh indra id medhira
1089	indraḥ kṣeme yoge havyaḥ indraḥ	indra kṣema yoga hu indra
1089	pra aktubhyaḥ indraḥ pra vṛdhaḥ ahabhyaḥ	pra aktu indra pra vṛdha pra
1089	pra antarikṣāt pra samudrasya dhāseḥ	pra antarikṣa pra samudra dhāsi
1089	pra vātasya prathasaḥ pra jmaḥ antāt	pra vāta prathas pra jm anta
1089	pra sindhubhyaḥ ririce pra kṣitibhyaḥ	pra sindhu ric pra kṣiti
1089	pra śośucatyāḥ uṣasaḥ na ketuḥ	pra śośuc uṣas na ketu
1089	asinvā te vartatām indra hetiḥ	na ketu tvad vṛt indra heti
1089	aśmā iva vidhya divaḥ ā sṛjānaḥ	aśman iva vyadh div ā sṛj
1089	tapiṣThena heṣasā droghamitrān	tapiṣṭha heṣas droghamitra
1089	anu aha māsāḥ anu it vanāni	anu aha māsa anu id vana
1089	anu oṣadhīḥ anu parvatāsaḥ	anu oṣadhī anu parvata
1089	anu indram rodasī vāvaśāne	anu indra rodas vaś
1089	anu āpaḥ ajihata jāyamānam	anu ap hā jan
1089	karhi svit sā te indra cetyā asat	karhi svid tad tvad indra cetyā as
1089	aghasya yat bhinadaḥ rakṣaḥ eṣat	agha yat bhid rakṣas
1089	mitrakruvaḥ yat śasane na gāvaḥ	mitrakrū yat śasana na go
1089	pṛthivyāḥ āpṛk amuyā śayante	pṛthivī āpṛk adas śī
1089	śatrūyantaḥ abhi ye naḥ tatasre	śatrūy abhi yad mad taṃs
1089	mahi vrādhantaḥ ogaṇāsaḥ indra	mahi vrādh ogaṇa indra
1089	andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām	andha amitra tamas sac
1089	sujyotiṣaḥ aktavaḥ tān abhi syuḥ	su jyotis aktu tad abhi as
1089	purūṇi hi tvā savanā janānām	puru hi tvad savana jana
1089	brahmāṇi mandan gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām	brahman mad gṛ ṛṣi
1089	imām āghoṣan avasā sahūtim	idam āghuṣ avas sahūti
1089	tiraḥ viśvān arcataḥ yāhi arvāṅ	tiras viśva arc yā arvāñc
1089	evā te vayam indra bhuñjatīnām	eva tvad mad indra bhuj
1089	vidyāma sumatīnām navānām	vid sumati nava
1089	vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ	vid vastu avas gṛ
1089	viśvāmitrāḥ uta te indra nūnam	viśvāmitra uta tvad indra nūnam
1089	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
1089	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
1089	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
1089	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
1090	sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ	sahasra śīrṣan puruṣa
1090	sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt	sahasra akṣa sahasra pād
1090	sa bhūmim viśvataḥ vṛtvā	tad bhūmi viśvatas vṛ
1090	ati atiṣThat daśāṅgulam	ati sthā daśan aṅgula
1090	puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam	puruṣa eva idam sarva
1090	yat bhūtam yat ca bhavyam	yad bhū yad ca bhū
1090	uta amṛtatvasya īśānaḥ	uta amṛta tva īś
1090	yat annena atirohati	yat anna atiruh
1090	etāvān asya mahimā	etāvat idam mahiman
1090	ataḥ jyāyān ca pūruṣaḥ	atas jyāyas ca pūruṣa
1090	pādaḥ asya viśvā bhūtāni	pāda idam viśva bhūta
1090	tripāt asya amṛtam divi	tri pād idam amṛta div
1090	tripāt ūrdhvaḥ ut ait puruṣaḥ	tri pād ūrdhva ud i puruṣa
1090	pādaḥ asya iha abhavat punar	pāda idam iha bhū punar
1090	tataḥ viṣvaṅ vi akrāmat	tatas viṣvañc vi kram
1090	sāśanānaśane abhi	sa aśana anaśana abhi
1090	tasmāt virāT ajāyata	tad virāj jan
1090	virājaḥ adhi pūruṣaḥ	virāj adhi pūruṣa
1090	sa jātaḥ ati aricyata	tad jan ati ric
1090	paścāt bhūmim atha u puraḥ	paścāt bhūmi atha u puras
1090	yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā	yat puruṣa havis
1090	devāḥ yajñam atanvata	deva yajña tan
1090	vasantaḥ asya āsīt ājyam	vasanta idam as ājya
1090	grīṣmaḥ idhmaḥ śarat haviḥ	grīṣma idhma śarad havis
1090	tam yajñam barhiṣi pra aukṣan	tad yajña barhis prokṣ
1090	puruṣam jātam agrataḥ	puruṣa jan agratas
1090	tena devāḥ ayajanta	tad deva yaj
1090	sādhyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca ye	sādhya ṛṣi ca yad
1090	tasmāt yajñāt sarvahutaḥ	tad yajña sarva hu
1090	sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam	sambhṛ pṛṣadājya
1090	paśūn tān cakre vāyavyān	paśu tad kṛ vāyavya
1090	āraṇyān grāmyāḥ ca ye	āraṇya grāmya ca yad
1090	tasmāt yajñāt sarvahutaḥ	tad yajña sarva hu
1090	ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire	ṛc sāman jan
1090	chandāṁsi jajñire tasmāt	chandas jan tad
1090	yajuḥ tasmāt ajāyata	yajus tad jan
1090	tasmāt aśvāḥ ajāyanta	tad aśva jan
1090	ye ke ca ubhayādataḥ	yad ka ca ubhaya ad
1090	gāvaḥ ha jajñire tasmāt	go ha jan tad
1090	tasmāt jātāḥ ajāvayaḥ	tad jan aja avi
1090	yat puruṣam vi adadhuḥ	yat puruṣa vi dhā
1090	katidhā vi akalpayan	katidhā vi kalpay
1090	mukham kim asya kau bāhū	mukha ka idam ka bāhu
1090	kau ūrū pādau ucyete	ka ūru pāda vac
1090	brāhmaṇaḥ asya mukham āsīt	brāhmaṇa idam mukha as
1090	bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ	bāhu rājanya kṛ
1090	ūrū tat asya yat vaiśyaḥ	ūru tad idam yad vaiśya
1090	padbhyām śūdraḥ ajāyata	pad śūdra jan
1090	candramāḥ manasaḥ jātaḥ	candramas manas jan
1090	cakṣoḥ sūryaḥ ajāyata	cakṣu sūrya jan
1090	mukhāt indraḥ ca agniḥ ca	mukha indra ca agni ca
1090	prāṇāt vāyuḥ ajāyata	prāṇa vāyu jan
1090	nābhyāḥ āsīt antarikṣam	nābhi as antarikṣa
1090	śīrṣṇaḥ dyauḥ sam avartata	śīrṣan div sam vṛt
1090	padbhyām bhūmiḥ diśaḥ śrotrāt	pad bhūmi diś śrotra
1090	tathā lokān akalpayan	tathā loka kalpay
1090	sapta asya āsan paridhayaḥ	saptan idam as paridhi
1090	triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ	tris saptan samidh kṛ
1090	devāḥ yat yajñam tanvānāḥ	deva yat yajña tan
1090	abadhnan puruṣam paśum	bandh puruṣa paśu
1090	yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ	yajña yajña yaj deva
1090	tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan	tad dharma prathama as
1090	te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta	tad ha nāka mahiman sac
1090	yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ	yatra pūrva sādhya as deva
 ---
1091	sam jāgṛvadbhiḥ jaramāṇaḥ idhyate	sam jāgṛ jṛ indh
1091	dame damūnāḥ iṣayan iLaḥ pade	dama damūnas iṣay iḍ pada
1091	viśvasya hotā haviṣaḥ vareṇyaḥ	viśva hotṛ havis vareṇya
1091	vibhuḥ vibhāvā suṣakhā sakhīyate	vibhu vibhāvan su sakhi sakhīy
1091	sa darśataśrīḥ atithiḥ gṛhegṛhe	tad darśata śrī atithi gṛha gṛha
1091	vanevane śiśriye takvavīḥ iva	vana vana śri iva
1091	janaṁjanam janyaḥ na ati manyate	jana jana janya na ati man
1091	viśaḥ ā kṣeti viśyaḥ viśaṁviśam	viś ā kṣi viśya viś viś
1091	sudakṣaḥ dakṣaiḥ kratunā asi sukratuḥ	su dakṣa dakṣa kratu as su kratu
1091	agne kaviḥ kāvyena asi viśvavit	agni kavi kāvya as viśva vid
1091	vasuḥ vasūnām kṣayasi tvam ekaḥ it	vasu vasu kṣi tvad eka id
1091	dyāvā ca yāni pṛthivī ca puṣyataḥ	div ca yad pṛthivī ca puṣ
1091	prajānan agne tava yonim ṛtviyam	prajñā agni tvad yoni ṛtviya
1091	iLāyāḥ pade ghṛtavantam ā asadaḥ	iḍā pada ghṛtavat āsad
1091	ā te cikitre uṣasām iva etayaḥ	ā tvad cit uṣas iva īti
1091	arepasaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ	arepas sūrya iva raśmi
1091	tava śriyaḥ varṣyasya iva vidyutaḥ	tvad śrī varṣya iva vidyut
1091	citrāḥ cikitre uṣasām na ketavaḥ	citra cit uṣas na ketu
1091	yat oṣadhīḥ abhisṛṣTaḥ vanāni ca	yat oṣadhi abhisṛj vana ca
1091	pari svayam cinuṣe annam āsye	pari svayam ci anna āsya
1091	tam oṣadhīḥ dadhire garbham ṛtviyam	tad oṣadhi dhā garbha ṛtviya
1091	tam āpaḥ agnim janayanta mātaraḥ	tad ap agni janay mātṛ
1091	tam it samānam vaninaḥ ca vīrudhaḥ	tad id samāna vanin ca vīrudh
1091	antarvatīḥ ca suvate ca viśvahā	antarvat ca sū ca viśvahā
1091	vātopadhūtaḥ iṣitaḥ vaśān anu	vāta upadhū iṣay vaś anu
1091	tṛṣu yat annā veviṣat vitiṣThase	tṛṣu yat anna veviṣ viṣṭhā
1091	ā te yatante rathyaḥ yathā pṛthak	ā tvad yat rathī yathā pṛthak
1091	śardhāṁsi agne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ	śardhas agni ajara dah
1091	medhākāram vidathasya prasādhanam	medhā kāra vidatha prasādhana
1091	agnim hotāram paribhūtamam matim	agni hotṛ paribhūtama mati
1091	tam it arbhe haviṣi ā samānam it	tad id arbha havis ā samāna id
1091	tam it mahe vṛṇate na anyam tvat	tad id maha vṛ na anya tvad
1091	tvām it atra vṛṇate tvāyavaḥ	tvad id atra vṛ tvāyu
1091	hotāram agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ	hotṛ agni vidatha vedhas
1091	yat devayantaḥ dadhati prayāṁsi te	yat devay dhā prayas tad
1091	haviṣmantaḥ manavaḥ vṛktabarhiṣaḥ	haviṣmat manu vṛj barhis
1091	tava agne hotram tava potram ṛtviyam	tvad agni hotra tvad potra ṛtviya
1091	tava neṣTram tvam agnit ṛtāyataḥ	tvad neṣṭra tvad agnidh ṛta āyam
1091	tava praśāstram tvam adhvarīyasi	tvad praśāstra tvad adhvarīy
1091	brahmā ca asi gṛhapatiḥ ca naḥ dame	brahman ca as gṛhapati ca mad dama
1091	yaḥ tubhyam agne amṛtāya martyaḥ	yad tvad agni amṛta martya
1091	samidhā dāśat uta vā haviṣkṛti	samidh dāś uta vā haviṣkṛt
1091	tasya hotā bhavasi yāsi dūtyam	tad hotṛ bhū yā dūtya
1091	upa brūṣe yajasi adhvarīyasi	upa brū yaj adhvarīy
1091	imāḥ asmai matayaḥ vācaḥ asmat ā	idam idam mati vāc mad
1091	ṛcaḥ giraḥ suṣTutayaḥ sam agmata	ṛc gir suṣṭuti sam gam
1091	vasūyavaḥ vasave jātavedase	vasūyu vasu jātavedas
1091	vṛddhāsu cit vardhanaḥ yāsu cākanat	vṛdh cit vardhana yad kan
1091	imām pratnāya suṣTutim navīyasīm	idam pratna suṣṭuti navīyas
1091	voceyam asmai uśate śṛṇotu naḥ	vac idam vaś śru mad
1091	bhūyāḥ antarā hṛdi asya nispṛśe	bhū antarā hṛd idam nispṛś
1091	jāyā iva patye uśatī suvāsāḥ	jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas
1091	yasmin aśvāsaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ	yad aśva ṛṣabha ukṣan
1091	vaśāḥ meṣāḥ avasṛṣTāsaḥ āhutāḥ	vaśā meṣa avasṛj āhu
1091	kīlālape somapṛṣThāya vedhase	kīlāla pā soma pṛṣṭha vedhas
1091	hṛdā matim janaye cārum agnaye	hṛd mati janay cāru agni
1091	ahāvi agne haviḥ āsye te	hu agni havis āsya tvad
1091	sruci iva ghṛtam camvī iva somaḥ	sruc iva ghṛta camū iva soma
1091	vājasanim rayim asme suvīram	vāja sani rayi mad su vīra
1091	praśastam dhehi yaśasam bṛhantam	praśaṃs dhā yaśasa bṛhat
 ---
1092	yajñasya vaḥ rathyam viśpatim viśām	yajña tvad rathya viśpati viś
1092	hotāram aktoḥ atithim vibhāvasum	hotṛ aktu atithi vibhāvasu
1092	śocan śuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurat	śuc śuṣka hariṇī jarbhur
1092	vṛṣā ketuḥ yajataḥ dyām aśāyata	vṛṣan ketu yajata div śī
1092	imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata	idam añjaspā ubhaya kṛ
1092	dharmāṇam agnim vidathasya sādhanam	dharman agni vidatha sādhana
1092	aktum na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitam	aktu na yahva uṣas purohita
1092	tanūnapātam aruṣasya niṁsate	tanū napāt aruṣa niṃs
1092	baT asya nīthā vi paṇeḥ ca manmahe	baṭ idam nīthā vi paṇi ca man
1092	vayāḥ asya prahutāḥ āsuḥ attave	vayā idam prahu as ad
1092	yadā ghorāsaḥ amṛtatvam āśata	yadā ghora amṛta tva aś
1092	āt it janasya daivyasya carkiran	āt id jana daivya carkar
1092	ṛtasya hi prasitiḥ dyauḥ uru vyacaḥ	ṛta hi prasiti div uru vyacas
1092	namaḥ mahī aramatiḥ panīyasī	namas mah aramati panīyas
1092	indraḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ sam cikitrire	indra mitra varuṇa sam cit
1092	atha u bhagaḥ savitā pūtadakṣasaḥ	atho bhaga savitṛ pū dakṣas
1092	pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavaḥ	pra rudra yayin i sindhu
1092	tiraḥ mahīm aramatim dadhanvire	tiras mah aramati dhanv
1092	yebhiḥ parijmā pariyan uru jrayaḥ	yad parijman parī uru jrayas
1092	vi roruvat jaThare viśvam ukṣate	vi roro jaṭhara viśva ukṣ
1092	krāṇāḥ rudrāḥ marutaḥ viśvakṛṣTayaḥ	kṛ rudra marut viśvakṛṣṭi
1092	divaḥ śyenāsaḥ asurasya nīLayaḥ	div śyena asura nīḍi
1092	tebhiḥ caṣTe varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	tad cakṣ varuṇa mitra aryaman
1092	indraḥ devebhiḥ arvaśebhiḥ arvaśaḥ	indra deva arvaśa arvaśa
1092	indre bhujam śaśamānāsaḥ āśata	indra bhuj śaśamāna aś
1092	sūraḥ dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaḥ ca pauṁsye	aś dṛśīka vṛṣan ca pauṃsya
1092	pra ye nu asya arhaṇā tatakṣire	pra yad nu idam arhaṇa takṣ
1092	yujam vajram nṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ	yuj vajra nṛṣadana kāru
1092	sūraḥ cit ā haritaḥ asya rīramat	sūra cit ā harit idam ram
1092	indrāt ā kaḥ cit bhayate tavīyasaḥ	indra ā kaścit bhī tavīyas
1092	bhīmasya vṛṣṇaḥ jaTharāt abhiśvasaḥ	bhīma vṛṣan jaṭhara diva
1092	divedive sahuriḥ stan abādhitaḥ	diva diva sahuri stan a bādh
1092	stomam vaḥ adya rudrāya śikvase	stoma tvad adya rudra śikvas
1092	kṣayadvīrāya namasā didiṣTana	kṣayadvīra namas diś
1092	yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavān evayāvabhiḥ	yad śiva svavat eva yāvan
1092	divaḥ siṣakti svayaśāḥ nikāmabhiḥ	div sac sva yaśas nikāman
1092	te hi prajāyāḥ abharanta vi śravaḥ	tad hi prajā bhṛ vi śravas
1092	bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ somajāmayaḥ	bṛhaspati vṛṣabha soma jāmi
1092	yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ vi dhārayat	yajña atharvan prathama vi dhāray
1092	devāḥ dakṣaiḥ bhṛgavaḥ sam cikitrire	deva dakṣa bhṛgu sam cit
1092	te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā	tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retas
1092	narāśaṁsaḥ caturaṅgaḥ yamaḥ aditiḥ	narāśaṃsa catur aṅga yama aditi
1092	devaḥ tvaṣTā draviṇodāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ	deva tvaṣṭṛ draviṇas dā ṛbhukṣan
1092	pra rodasī marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ arhire	pra rodas marut viṣṇu arh
1092	uta sya naḥ uśijām urviyā kaviḥ	uta tya mad uśij urviyā kavi
1092	ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyaḥ havīmani	ahi śru budhnya havīman
1092	sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā	sūrya māsa vicar divikṣit
1092	dhiyā śamīnahuṣī asya bodhatam	dhī śamī nahus idam budh
1092	pra naḥ pūṣā caratham viśvadevyaḥ	pra mad pūṣan caratha viśvadevya
1092	apām napāt avatu vāyuḥ iṣTaye	ap napāt av vāyu iṣṭi
1092	ātmānam vasyaḥ abhi vātam arcata	ātman vasyas abhi vāta arc
1092	tat aśvinā suhavā yāmani śrutam	tad aśvin su hava yāman śru
1092	viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitam	viś idam abhaya adhikṣit
1092	gīrbhiḥ u svayaśasam gṛṇīmasi	gir u sva yaśas gṛ
1092	gnābhiḥ viśvābhiḥ aditim anarvaṇam	gnā viśva aditi anarvaṇa
1092	aktoḥ yuvānam nṛmaṇāḥ adhā patim	aktu yuvan nṛmaṇas adha pati
1092	rebhat atra januṣā pūrvaḥ aṅgirāḥ	ribh atra janus pūrva aṅgiras
1092	grāvāṇaḥ ūrdhvāḥ abhi cakṣuḥ adhvaram	grāvan ūrdhva abhi cakṣ adhvara
1092	yebhiḥ vihāyāḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ	yad vihāyas bhū vicakṣaṇa
1092	pāthaḥ sumekam svadhitiḥ vananvati	pāthas sumeka svadhiti vananvat
 ---
1093	mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī	mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhū uru
1093	nārī yahvī na rodasī sadam naḥ	nārī yahu na rodas sadam mad
1093	tebhiḥ naḥ pātam sahyasaḥ	tad mad pā sahyas
1093	ebhiḥ naḥ pātam śūṣaṇi	idam mad pā śvi
1093	yajñeyajñe sa martyaḥ	yajña yajña tad martya
1093	devān saparyati	deva sapary
1093	yaḥ sumnaiḥ dīrghaśruttamaḥ	yad sumna dīrghaśruttama
1093	āvivāsati enān	ā vivās enad
1093	viśveṣām irajyavaḥ	viśva irajyu
1093	devānām vār mahaḥ	deva vār maha
1093	viśve hi viśvamahasaḥ	viśva hi viśva mahas
1093	viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ	viśva yajña yajñiya
1093	te ghā rājānaḥ amṛtasya mandrāḥ	tad gha rājan amṛta mandra
1093	aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ parijmā	aryaman mitra varuṇa parijman
1093	kat rudraḥ nṛṇām stutaḥ	kad rudra nṛ stu
1093	marutaḥ pūṣaṇaḥ bhagaḥ	marut pūṣaṇa bhaga
1093	uta naḥ naktam apām vṛṣaṇvasū	uta mad nakta ap vṛṣaṇvasu
1093	sūryāmāsā sadanāya sadhanyā	sūryāmāsa sadana sa dhanya
1093	sacā yat sādi eṣām	sacā yat sad idam
1093	ahiḥ budhneṣu budhnyaḥ	ahi budhna budhnya
1093	uta naḥ devau aśvinā śubhaḥ patī	uta mad deva aśvin śubh pati
1093	dhāmabhiḥ mitrāvaruṇau uruṣyatām	dhāman mitrāvaruṇa uruṣy
1093	mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ ā īṣate	mah tad rai īṣ
1093	ati dhanva iva duritā	ati dhanvan iva durita
1093	uta naḥ rudrā cit mṛLatām aśvinā	uta mad rudra cit mṛḍ aśvin
1093	viśve devāsaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ	viśva deva rathaspati bhaga
1093	ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ	ṛbhu vāja ṛbhukṣan
1093	parijmā viśvavedasaḥ	parijman viśva vedas
1093	ṛbhuḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ ṛbhuḥ vidhataḥ madaḥ	ṛbhu ṛbhukṣan ṛbhu vidh mada
1093	ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā	ā tvad hari jū vājin
1093	duṣTaram yasya sāma cit	duṣṭara yad sāman cit
1093	ṛdhak yajñaḥ na mānuṣaḥ	ṛdhak yajña na mānuṣa
1093	kṛdhī naḥ ahrayaḥ deva savitar	kṛ mad ahraya deva savitṛ
1093	sa ca stuṣe maghonām	tad ca stu maghavan
1093	saha u naḥ indraḥ vahnibhiḥ ni eṣām	saha u mad indra vahni ni idam
1093	carṣaṇīnām cakram raśmim na yoyuve	carṣaṇi cakra raśmi na yoyu
1093	ā eṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahat	ā idam dyāvāpṛthivī dhā mahat
1093	asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ	mad vīra viśvacarṣaṇi śravas
1093	pṛkṣam vājasya sātaye	pṛkṣ vāja sāti
1093	pṛkṣam rāyā uta turvaṇe	pṛkṣ rai uta tur
1093	etam śaṁsam indra asmayuḥ tvam	etad śaṃsa indra asmayu tvad
1093	kūcit santam sahasāvan abhiṣTaye	kūcid as sahasāvat abhiṣṭi
1093	sadā pāhi abhiṣTaye	sadā pā abhiṣṭi
1093	medatām vedatā vaso	med vedatā vasu
1093	etam me stomam tanā na sūrye	etad mad stoma tan na sūrya
1093	dyutadyāmānam vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām	dyut yāman vṛdh nṛ
1093	saṁvananam na aśvyam	saṃvanana na aśvya
1093	taṣTā iva anapacyutam	taṣṭṛ iva an apacyu
1093	vāvarta yeṣām rāyā	vṛt yad rai
1093	yuktā eṣām hiraṇyayī	yuj idam hiraṇyaya
1093	nemadhitā na pauṁsyā	nemadhiti na pauṃsya
1093	vṛthā iva viṣTāntā	vṛthā iva viś anta
1093	pra tat duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene	pra tad duḥśīma pṛthavāna vena
1093	pra rāme vocam asure maghavatsu	pra rāma vac asura maghavan
1093	ye yuktvāya pañca śatā asmayu	yad yuj pañcan śata asmayu
1093	pathā viśrāvi eṣām	pathin viśrāvin idam
1093	adhi it nu atra saptatim ca sapta ca	adhi id nu atra saptati ca saptan ca
1093	sadyaḥ didiṣTa tānvaḥ	sadyas diś tānva
1093	sadyaḥ didiṣTa pārthyaḥ	sadyas diś pārthya
1093	sadyaḥ didiṣTa māyavaḥ	sadyas diś māyava
 ---
1094	pra ete vadantu pra vayam vadāma	pra etad vad pra mad vad
1094	grāvabhyaḥ vācam vadatā vadadbhyaḥ	grāvan vāc vad vad
1094	yat adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākam āśavaḥ	yat adri parvata sākam āśu
1094	ślokam ghoṣam bharatha indrāya sominaḥ	śloka ghoṣa bhṛ indra somin
1094	ete vadanti śatavat sahasravat	etad vad śatavat sahasravat
1094	abhi krandanti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ	abhi krand harita āsan
1094	viṣTvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā	viṣ grāvan su kṛt su kṛtyā
1094	hotuḥ cit pūrve haviradyam āśata	hotṛ cit pūrva havis adya aś
1094	ete vadanti avidan anā madhu	etad vad vid anā madhu
1094	ni ūṅkhayante adhi pakve āmiṣi	ni ūṅkhay adhi pakva āmis
1094	vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsataḥ	vṛkṣa śākhā aruṇa bhas
1094	te sūbharvāḥ vṛṣabhāḥ pra īm arāviṣuḥ	tad sūbharva vṛṣabha pra iṃ ru
1094	bṛhat vadanti madireṇa mandinā	bṛhat vad madira mandin
1094	indram krośantaḥ avidan anā madhu	indra kruś vid anā madhu
1094	saṁrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhiḥ anartiṣuḥ	saṃrabh dhīra svasṛ nṛt
1094	āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ	āghoṣay pṛthivī upabdi
1094	suparṇāḥ vācam akrata upa dyavi	suparṇa vāc kṛ upa div
1094	ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ	ākhara kṛṣṇa iṣira nṛt
1094	nyak ni yanti uparasya niṣkṛtam	ni i upara niṣkṛta
1094	purū retaḥ dadhire sūryaśvitaḥ	puru retas dhā sūryaśvit
1094	ugrāḥ iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ	ugra iva pravah samāyam
1094	sākam yuktāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ bibhrataḥ dhuraḥ	sākam yuj vṛṣan bhṛ dhur
1094	yat śvasantaḥ jagrasānāḥ arāviṣuḥ	yat śvas gras ru
1094	śṛṇve eṣām prothathaḥ arvatām iva	śru idam prothatha arvant iva
1094	daśāvanibhyaḥ daśakakṣyebhyaḥ	daśan avani daśan kakṣyā
1094	daśayoktrebhyaḥ daśayojanebhyaḥ	daśan yoktra daśan yojana
1094	daśābhīśubhyaḥ arcata ajarebhyaḥ	daśan abhīśu arc ajara
1094	daśa dhuraḥ daśa yuktāḥ vahadbhyaḥ	daśan dhur daśan yuj vah
1094	te adrayaḥ daśayantrāsaḥ āśavaḥ	tad adri daśan yantra āśu
1094	teṣām ādhānam pari eti haryatam	tad ādhāna pari i haryata
1094	te ū sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ	tad u su somya andhas
1094	aṁśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire	aṃśu pīyūṣa prathama bhaj
1094	te somādaḥ harī indrasya niṁsate	tad somād hari indra niṃs
1094	aṁśum duhantaḥ adhi āsate gavi	aṃśu duh adhi ās go
1094	tebhiḥ dugdham papivān somyam madhu	tad duh pā somya madhu
1094	indraḥ vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate	indra vṛdh prath vṛṣāy
1094	vṛṣā vaḥ aṁśuḥ na kilā riṣāthana	vṛṣan tvad aṃśu na kila riṣ
1094	iLāvantaḥ sadam it sthana āśitāḥ	iḍāvat sadam id as āśay
1094	raivatyā iva mahasā cāravaḥ sthana	raivatī iva mahas cāru as
1094	yasya grāvāṇaḥ ajuṣadhvam adhvaram	yad grāvan juṣ adhvara
1094	tṛdilāḥ atṛdilāsaḥ adrayaḥ	tṛdila atṛdila adri
1094	aśramaṇāḥ aśṛthitāḥ amṛtyavaḥ	aśramaṇa aśṛthita amṛtyu
1094	anāturāḥ ajarāḥ stha amaviṣṇavaḥ	anātura ajara as amaviṣṇu
1094	supīvasaḥ atṛṣitāḥ atṛṣṇajaḥ	su pīvas atṛṣita atṛṣṇaj
1094	dhruvāḥ eva vaḥ pitaraḥ yugeyuge	dhruva eva tvad pitṛ yuga yuga
1094	kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadasaḥ na yuñjate	kṣema kāma sadas na yuj
1094	ajuryāsaḥ hariṣācaḥ haridravaḥ	ajurya haridru
1094	ā dyām raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ	ā div rava pṛthivī śru
1094	tat it vadanti adrayaḥ vimocane	tad id vad adri vimocana
1094	yāman añjaspāḥ iva gha it upabdibhiḥ	yāman añjaspā iva gha id upabdi
1094	vapantaḥ bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ	vap bīja iva dhānyākṛt
1094	pṛñcanti somam na minanti bapsataḥ	pṛc soma na mī bhas
1094	sute adhvare adhi vācam akrata	su adhvara adhi vāc kṛ
1094	ā krīLayaḥ na mātaram tudantaḥ	krīḍi na mātṛ tud
1094	vi sū muñcā suṣuvuṣaḥ manīṣām	vi su muc su manīṣā
1094	vi vartantām adrayaḥ cāyamānāḥ	vi vṛt adri cāy
 ---
1095	haye jāye manasā tiṣTha ghore	haye jāyā manas sthā ghora
1095	vacāṁsi miśrā kṛṇavāvahai nu	vacas miśra kṛ nu
1095	na nau mantrāḥ anuditāsaḥ ete	na mad mantra anudita etad
1095	mayaḥ karan paratare cana ahan	mayas kṛ paratara ca na ahar
1095	kim etā vācā kṛṇavā tava aham	ka etad vāc kṛ tvad mad
1095	pra akramiṣam uṣasām agriyā iva	prakram uṣas agriya iva
1095	purūravaḥ punar astam parā ihi	purūravas punar asta pare
1095	durāpanā vātaḥ iva aham asmi	durāpana vāta iva mad as
1095	iṣuḥ na śriye iṣudheḥ	iṣu na śrī iṣudhi
1095	asanā goṣāḥ śatasāḥ na raṁhiḥ	asanā na raṃhi
1095	avīre kratau vi davidyutan na	avīra kratu vi davidyut na
1095	urā na māyum citayanta dhunayaḥ	urā na māyu citay dhuni
1095	sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya	tad vasu dhā śvaśura
1095	vayaḥ uṣaḥ yadi vaṣTi antigṛhāt	vayas uṣa yadi vaś antigṛha
1095	astam nanakṣe yasmin cākan	asta nakṣ yad kan
1095	divā naktam śnathitā vaitasena	divā nakta śnath vaitasa
1095	triḥ sma mā ahnaḥ śnathayaḥ vaitasena	tris sma mad ahar śnathay vaitasa
1095	uta sma me avyatyai pṛṇāsi	uta sma mad a vī pṛ
1095	purūravaḥ anu te ketam āyam	purūravas anu tvad keta e
1095	rājā me vīra tanvaḥ tat āsīḥ	rājan mad vīra tanū tad as
1095	yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpiḥ	yad sujūrṇi śreṇi sumnaāpi
1095	hradecakṣuḥ na granthinī caraṇyuḥ	hradecakṣus na granthin caraṇyu
1095	tāḥ añjayaḥ aruṇayaḥ na sasruḥ	tad añji aruṇa na sṛ
1095	śriye gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ anavanta	śrī go na dhenu nū
1095	sam asmin jāyamāne āsata gnāḥ	sam idam jan ās gnā
1095	uta īm avardhan nadyaḥ svagūrtāḥ	uta īṃ vṛdh nadī sva gūrta
1095	mahe yat tvā purūravaḥ raṇāya	mah yat tvad purūravas raṇa
1095	avardhayan dasyuhatyāya devāḥ	vardhay dasyu hatya deva
1095	sacā yat āsu jahatīṣu atkam	sacā yat idam hā atka
1095	amānuṣīṣu mānuṣaḥ niṣeve	amānuṣa mānuṣa niṣev
1095	apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyuḥ	apa sma mad na bhujyu
1095	tāḥ atrasan rathaspṛśaḥ na aśvāḥ	tad tras ratha spṛś na aśva
1095	yat āsu martaḥ amṛtāsu nispṛk	yat idam marta amṛta nispṛh
1095	sam kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhiḥ na pṛṅkte	sam kṣoṇī kratu na pṛc
1095	tāḥ ātayaḥ na tanvaḥ śumbhata svāḥ	tad āti na tanū śubh sva
1095	aśvāsaḥ na krīLayaḥ dandaśānāḥ	aśva na krīḍi dandaś
1095	vidyut na yā patantī davidyot	vidyut na yad pat davidyut
1095	bharantī me apyā kāmyāni	bhṛ mad apya kāmay
1095	janiṣTa u apaḥ naryaḥ sujātaḥ	jan u ap narya su jan
1095	pra urvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ	pra urvaśī tṛ dīrgha āyus
1095	jajñiṣe itthā gopīthyāya hi	jan itthā gopīthya hi
1095	dadhātha tat purūravaḥ me ojaḥ	hi tad purūravas mad ojas
1095	aśāsam tvā viduṣī sasmin ahan	śās tvad vid ahar
1095	na me ā aśṛṇoḥ kim abhuk vadāsi	na mad āśru ka abhuj vad
1095	kadā sūnuḥ pitaram jātaḥ icchāt	kadā sūnu pitṛ jan iṣ
1095	cakram na aśru vartayat vijānan	iṣ na aśru vartay vijñā
1095	kaḥ dampatī samanasā vi yūyot	ka dampati samanas vi
1095	adha yat agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat	adha yat agni śvaśura dīdī
1095	prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru	prati brū vartay aśru
1095	cakram na krandat ādhye śivāyai	aśru na krand śiva
1095	pra tat te hinavā yat te asme	pra tad tvad hi yad tvad mad
1095	parā ihi astam nahi mūra mā āpaḥ	pare asta nahi mūra mad āp
1095	sudevaḥ adya prapatet anāvṛt	sudeva adya prapat anāvṛt
1095	parāvatam paramām gantavai u	parāvat parama gam u
1095	adhā śayīta nirṛteḥ upasthe	adha śī nirṛti upastha
1095	adha enam vṛkāḥ rabhasāsaḥ adyuḥ	adha enad vṛka rabhasa ad
1095	purūravaḥ mā mṛthāḥ mā pra paptaḥ	purūravas mā mṛ mā pra pat
1095	mā tvā vṛkāsaḥ aśivāsaḥ u kṣan	mā tvad vṛka aśiva u ghas
1095	na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi	na vai straiṇa sakhya as
1095	sālāvṛkāṇām hṛdayāni etā	śālāvṛka hṛdaya etad
1095	yat virūpā acaram martyeṣu	yat virūpa car martya
1095	avasam rātrīḥ śaradaḥ catasraḥ	vas rātri śarad catur
1095	ghṛtasya stokam sakṛt ahnaḥ āśnām	ghṛta stoka sakṛt ahar aś
1095	tāt eva idam tātṛpāṇā carāmi	eva idam tṛp car
1095	antarikṣaprām rajasaḥ vimānīm	antarikṣa prā rajas vimāna
1095	upa śikṣāmi urvaśīm vasiṣThaḥ	upa śikṣ urvaśī vasiṣṭha
1095	upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣThāt	upa tvad rāti sukṛta sthā
1095	ni vartasva hṛdayam tapyate me	ni vṛt hṛdaya tap mad
1095	iti tvā devāḥ ime āhuḥ aiLa	iti tvad deva idam ah aiḍa
1095	yathā īm etat bhavasi mṛtyubandhuḥ	yathā īṃ etad bhū mṛtyu bandhu
1095	prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti	prajā tvad deva havis yaj
1095	svarge u tvam api mādayāse	svarga u tvad api māday
 ---
1096	pra te mahe vidathe śaṁsiṣam harī	pra tvad maha vidatha śaṃs hari
1096	pra te vanve vanuṣaḥ haryatam madam	pra tvad van vanus haryata mada
1096	ghṛtam na yaḥ haribhiḥ cāru secate	ghṛta na yad hari cāru sac
1096	ā tvā viśantu harivarpasam giraḥ	ā tvad viś hari varpas gir
1096	harim hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran	hari hi yoni abhi yad saṃsvar
1096	hinvantaḥ harī divyam yathā sadaḥ	hi hari divya yathā sadas
1096	ā yam pṛṇanti haribhiḥ na dhenavaḥ	ā yad pṛ hari na dhenu
1096	indrāya śūṣam harivantam arcata	indra śūṣa harivat arc
1096	saḥ asya vajraḥ haritaḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ	tad idam vajra harita yad āyasa
1096	hariḥ nikāmaḥ hariḥ ā gabhastyoḥ	hari nikāma hari ā gabhasti
1096	dyumnī suśipraḥ harimanyusāyakaḥ	dyumnin su śiprā harimanyusāyaka
1096	indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire	indra ni rūpa harita mikṣ
1096	divi na ketuḥ adhi dhāyi haryataḥ	div na ketu adhi dhā haryata
1096	vivyacat vajraḥ haritaḥ na raṁhyā	vyac vajra harita na raṃhi
1096	tudat ahim hariśipraḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ	tud ahi hari śiprā yad āyasa
1096	sahasraśokāḥ abhavat harimbharaḥ	sahasraśokas bhū harimbhara
1096	tvaṁtvam aharyathāḥ upastutaḥ	tvad tvad hary upastu
1096	pūrvebhiḥ indra harikeśa yajvabhiḥ	pūrva indra hari keśa yajvan
1096	tvam haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam	tvad hary tvad viśva ukthya
1096	asāmi rādhaḥ harijāta haryatam	asāmi rādhas hari jan haryata
1096	tā vajriṇam mandinam stomyam made	tad vajrin mandin stomya mada
1096	indram rathe vahataḥ haryatā harī	indra ratha vah haryata hari
1096	purūṇi asmai savanāni haryate	puru idam savana hary
1096	indrāya somāḥ harayaḥ dadhanvire	indra soma hari dhanv
1096	aram kāmāya harayaḥ dadhanvire	aram kāma hari dhanv
1096	sthirāya hinvan harayaḥ harī turā	sthira hi hari hari tura
1096	arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ joṣam īyate	arvant yad hari joṣam i
1096	saḥ asya kāmam harivantam ānaśe	tad idam kāma harivat aś
1096	hariśmaśāruḥ harikeśaḥ āyasaḥ	hari śmaśāru hari keśa āyasa
1096	turaspeye yaḥ haripāḥ avardhata	turaspeya yad hari pā vṛdh
1096	arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ vājinīvasuḥ	arvant yad hari vājinīvasu
1096	ati viśvā duritā pāriṣat harī	ati viśva durita pṛ hari
1096	sruvā iva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ	sruva iva yad hari vipat
1096	śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ	śiprā vāja hari dodhu
1096	pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjat harī	pra yat kṛ camasa marmṛj hari
1096	pītvā madasya haryatasya andhasaḥ	pā mada haryata andhas
1096	uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyoḥ	uta sma sadman haryata pastya
1096	atyaḥ na vājam harivān acikradat	atya na vāja harivat krand
1096	mahī cit hi dhiṣaṇā aharyat ojasā	mah cit hi dhiṣaṇā hary ojas
1096	bṛhat vayaḥ dadhiṣe haryataḥ cit ā	bṛhant vayas dhā haryata cit ā
1096	ā rodasī haryamāṇaḥ mahitvā	ā rodas hary mahitva
1096	navyaṁnavyam haryasi manma nu priyam	navya navya hary manman nu priya
1096	pra pastyam asura haryatam goḥ	pra pastya asura haryata go
1096	āviḥ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya	āvis kṛ hari sūrya
1096	ā tvā haryantam prayujaḥ janānām	ā tvad hary prayuj jana
1096	rathe vahantu hariśipram indra	ratha vah hari śiprā indra
1096	pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ	pā yathā pratibhṛ madhu
1096	haryan yajñam sadhamāde daśoṇim	hary yajña sadhamāda daśan ūṇi
1096	apāḥ pūrveṣām harivaḥ sutānām	pā pūrva harivat suta
1096	atha u idam savanam kevalam te	atho idam savana kevala tvad
1096	mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra	mad soma madhumat indra
1096	satrā vṛṣan jaThare ā vṛṣasva	satrā vṛṣan jaṭhara ā vṛṣ
 ---
1097	yāḥ oṣadhīḥ pūrvāḥ jātāḥ	yad oṣadhī pūrva jan
1097	devebhyaḥ triyugam purā	deva tri yuga purā
1097	manai nu babhrūṇām aham	nu babhru mad
1097	śatam dhāmāni sapta ca	śata dhāman saptan ca
1097	śatam vaḥ amba dhāmāni	śata tvad ambā dhāman
1097	sahasram uta vaḥ ruhaḥ	sahasra uta tvad ruh
1097	adhā śatakratvaḥ yūyam	adha śata kratu tvad
1097	imam me agadam kṛta	idam mad agada kṛ
1097	oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam	oṣadhī prati mud
1097	puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ	puṣpavat
1097	aśvāḥ iva sajitvarīḥ	aśva iva sa jitvan
1097	vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ	vīrudh pārayiṣṇu
1097	oṣadhīḥ iti mātaraḥ	oṣadhī iti mātṛ
1097	tat vaḥ devīḥ upa bruve	tad tvad devī upa brū
1097	saneyam aśvam gām vāsaḥ	san aśva go vāsas
1097	ātmānam tava pūruṣa	ātman tvad pūruṣa
1097	aśvatthe vaḥ niṣadanam	aśvattha tvad niṣadana
1097	parṇe vaḥ vasatiḥ kṛtā	parṇa tvad vasati kṛ
1097	gobhājaḥ it kila asatha	go bhāj id kila as
1097	yat sanavatha pūruṣam	yat san pūruṣa
1097	yatra oṣadhīḥ samagmata	yatra oṣadhī sam gam
1097	rājānaḥ samitau iva	rājan samiti iva
1097	vipraḥ saḥ ucyate bhiṣak	vipra tad vac bhiṣaj
1097	rakṣohā amīvacātanaḥ	rakṣohan amīva cātana
1097	aśvāvatīm somāvatīm	aśvāvat somāvat
1097	ūrjayantīm udojasam	ūrjay udojas
1097	ā avitsi sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ	vid sarva oṣadhi
1097	asmai ariṣTatātaye	idam ariṣṭatāti
1097	ut śuṣmāḥ oṣadhīnām	ud śuṣma oṣadhī
1097	gāvaḥ goṣThāt iva īrate	go goṣṭha iva īr
1097	dhanam saniṣyantīnām	dhana san
1097	ātmānam tava pūruṣa	ātman tvad pūruṣa
1097	iṣkṛtiḥ nāma vaḥ mātā	iṣkṛti nāma tvad mātṛ
1097	atha u yūyam stha niṣkṛtīḥ	atho tvad as niṣkṛti
1097	sīrāḥ patatriṇīḥ sthana	sīra patatrin as
1097	yat āmayati niḥ kṛtha	yad āmay niḥ kṛ
1097	ati viśvāḥ pariṣThāḥ	ati viśva pariṣṭhā
1097	stenaḥ iva vrajam akramuḥ	stena iva vraja kram
1097	oṣadhīḥ pra acucyavuḥ	oṣadhī pra cyu
1097	yat kim ca tanvaḥ rapaḥ	yad ka ca tanu rapas
1097	yat imāḥ vājayan aham	yat idam vājay mad
1097	oṣadhīḥ haste ādadhe	oṣadhī hasta ādhā
1097	ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati	ātman yakṣma naś
1097	purā jīvagṛbhaḥ yathā	purā jīvagṛbh yathā
1097	yasya oṣadhīḥ prasarpatha	yad oṣadhī prasṛp
1097	aṅgamaṅgam paruṣparuḥ	aṅga aṅga parus parus
1097	tataḥ yakṣmam vi bādhadhve	tatas yakṣma vi bādh
1097	ugraḥ madhyamaśīḥ iva	ugra madhyamaśī iva
1097	sākam yakṣma pra pata	sākam yakṣma pra pat
1097	cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā	cāṣa kikidīvi
1097	sākam vātasya dhrājyā	sākam vāta dhrāji
1097	sākam naśya nihākayā	sākam naś nihākā
1097	anyā vaḥ anyām avatu	anya tvad anya av
1097	anyā anyasyai upa avata	anya anya upāv
1097	tāḥ sarvāḥ saṁvidānāḥ	tad sarva saṃvid
1097	idam me pra avatā vacaḥ	idam mad prāv vacas
1097	yāḥ phalinīḥ yāḥ aphalāḥ	yad phalin yad aphala
1097	apuṣpāḥ yāḥ ca puṣpiṇīḥ	apuṣpa yad ca puṣpin
1097	bṛhaspatiprasūtāḥ	bṛhaspati prasū
1097	tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṁhasaḥ	tad mad muc aṃhas
1097	muñcantu mā śapathyāt	muc mad śapathya
1097	atha u varuṇyāt uta	atho varuṇya uta
1097	atha u yamasya paḍbīśāt	atho yama paḍvīśa
1097	sarvasmāt devakilbiṣāt	sarva deva kilbiṣa
1097	avapatantīḥ avadan	avapat vad
1097	divaḥ oṣadhayaḥ pari	div oṣadhi pari
1097	yam jīvam aśnavāmahai	yad jīva na tad
1097	na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ	na tad riṣ pūruṣa
1097	yāḥ oṣadhīḥ somarājñīḥ	yad oṣadhī soma rājñī
1097	bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ	bahu śata vicakṣaṇa
1097	tāsām tvam asi uttamā	tad tvad as uttama
1097	aram kāmāya śam hṛde	aram kāma śam hṛd
1097	yāḥ oṣadhīḥ somarājñīḥ	yad oṣadhī soma rājñī
1097	viṣThitāḥ pṛthivīm anu	viṣṭhā pṛthivī anu
1097	bṛhaspatiprasūtāḥ	bṛhaspati prasū
1097	asyai sam datta vīryam	idam sam dā vīrya
1097	mā vaḥ riṣat khanitā	mā tvad riṣ khanitṛ
1097	yasmai ca aham khanāmi vaḥ	yad ca mad khan tvad
1097	dvipat catuṣpat asmākam	dvipad catuṣpada mad
1097	sarvam astu anāturam	sarva as anātura
1097	yāḥ ca idam upaśṛṇvanti	yad ca idam upaśru
1097	yāḥ ca dūram parāgatāḥ	yad ca dūram parāgam
1097	sarvāḥ saṁgatya vīrudhaḥ	sarva saṃgam vīrudh
1097	asyai sam datta vīryam	idam sam dā vīrya
1097	oṣadhayaḥ sam vadante	oṣadhi sam vad
1097	somena saha rājñā	soma saha rājan
1097	yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇaḥ	yad kṛ brāhmaṇa
1097	tam rājan pārayāmasi	tad rājan pāray
1097	tvam uttamā asi oṣadhe	tvad uttama as oṣadhi
1097	tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ	tvad vṛkṣa upasti
1097	upastiḥ astu saḥ asmākam	upasti as tad mad
1097	yaḥ asmān abhidāsati	yad mad abhidās
 ---
1098	bṛhaspate prati me devatām ihi	bṛhaspati prati mad devatā i
1098	mitraḥ vā yat varuṇaḥ vā asi pūṣā	mitra vā yat varuṇa vā as pūṣan
1098	ādityaiḥ vā yat vasubhiḥ marutvān	āditya vā yat vasu marutvat
1098	sa parjanyam śaṁtanave vṛṣāya	tad parjanya śaṃtanu vṛṣāy
1098	ā devaḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ cikitvān	ā deva dūta ajira cit
1098	tvat devāpe abhi mām agacchat	tvad devāpi abhi mad gam
1098	pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva	pratīcīna prati mad ā vṛt
1098	dadhāmi te dyumatīm vācam āsan	dhā tvad dyumat vāc āsan
1098	asme dhehi dyumatīm vācam āsan	mad dhā dyumat vāc āsan
1098	bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām	bṛhaspati anamīva iṣira
1098	yayā vṛṣTim śaṁtanave vanāva	yad vṛṣṭi śaṃtanu van
1098	divaḥ drapsaḥ madhumān ā viveśa	div drapsa madhumat ā viś
1098	ā naḥ drapsāḥ madhumantaḥ viśantu	ā mad drapsa madhumat viś
1098	indra dehi adhiratham sahasram	indra dā adhiratha sahasra
1098	ni sīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva	ni sad hotra ṛtuthā yaj
1098	devān devāpe haviṣā saparya	deva devāpi havis sapary
1098	ārṣTiṣeṇaḥ hotram ṛṣiḥ niṣīdan	ārṣṭiṣeṇa hotra ṛṣi niṣad
1098	devāpiḥ devasumatim cikitvān	devāpi deva sumati cit
1098	saḥ uttarasmāt adharam samudram	tad uttara adhara samudra
1098	apaḥ divyāḥ asṛjat varṣyāḥ abhi	ap divya sṛj varṣya abhi
1098	asmin samudre adhi uttarasmin	idam samudra adhi uttara
1098	āpaḥ devebhiḥ nivṛtāḥ atiṣThan	ap deva nivṛ sthā
1098	tāḥ adravan ārṣTiṣeṇena sṛṣTāḥ	tad dru ārṣṭiṣeṇa sṛj
1098	devāpinā preṣitāḥ mṛkṣiṇīṣu	devāpi preṣay mṛkṣiṇī
1098	yat devāpiḥ śaṁtanave purohitaḥ	yat devāpi śaṃtanu purohita
1098	hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayan adīdhet	hotra vṛ kṛpay dhī
1098	devaśrutam vṛṣTivanim rarāṇaḥ	deva śrut vṛṣṭi vani rā
1098	bṛhaspatiḥ vācam asmai ayacchat	bṛhaspati vāc idam yam
1098	yam tvā devāpiḥ śuśucānaḥ agne	yad tvad devāpi śuc agni
1098	ārṣTiṣeṇaḥ manuṣyaḥ samīdhe	ārṣṭiṣeṇa manuṣya samindh
1098	viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anumadyamānaḥ	viśva deva anumad
1098	pra parjanyam īrayā vṛṣTimantam	pra parjanya īray vṛṣṭimat
1098	tvām pūrve ṛṣayaḥ gīrbhiḥ āyan	tvad pūrva ṛṣi gir i
1098	tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve	tvad adhvara puru hvā viśva
1098	sahasrāṇi adhirathāni asme	sahasra adhiratha mad
1098	ā naḥ yajñam rohidaśva upa yāhi	ā mad yajña rohit aśva upa yā
1098	etāni agne navatiḥ nava tve	etad agni navati navan tvad
1098	āhutāni adhirathā sahasrā	āhu adhiratha sahasra
1098	tebhiḥ vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīḥ	tad vṛdh tanū śūra puru
1098	divaḥ naḥ vṛṣTim iṣitaḥ rirīhi	div mad vṛṣṭi iṣay rā
1098	etāni agne navatim sahasrā	etad agni navati sahasra
1098	sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇe indrāya bhāgam	sam pra yam vṛṣan indra bhāga
1098	vidvān pathaḥ ṛtuśaḥ devayānān	vid pathin ṛtuśas deva yāna
1098	api aulānam divi deveṣu dhehi	api aulāna div deva dhā
1098	agne bādhasva vi mṛdhaḥ vi durgahā	agni bādh vi mṛdh vi durgaha
1098	apa amīvām apa rakṣāṁsi sedha	apa amīvā apa rakṣas sidh
1098	asmāt samudrāt bṛhataḥ divaḥ naḥ	idam samudra bṛhat div mad
1098	apām bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛja iha	ap bhūman upa mad sṛj iha
 ---
1099	kam naḥ citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān	ka mad citra iṣaṇy cit
1099	pṛthugmānam vāśram vāvṛdhadhyai	pṛthugman vāśra vṛdh
1099	kat tasya dātu śavasaḥ vyuṣTau	ka tad dātu śavas vyuṣṭi
1099	takṣat vajram vṛtraturam apinvat	takṣ vajra vṛtra tur pinv
1099	sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma	tad hi dyut vidyut vī sāman
1099	pṛthum yonim asuratvā ā sasāda	pṛthu yoni asura tva sad
1099	sa sanīLebhiḥ prasahānaḥ asya	tad sanīḍa prasah idam
1099	bhrātuḥ na ṛte saptathasya māyāḥ	bhrātṛ na ṛte saptatha māyā
1099	sa vājam yātā apaduṣpadā yan	tad vāja yā apaduṣpad i
1099	svarṣātā pari sadat saniṣyan	svarṣāti pari sad san
1099	anarvā yat śatadurasya vedaḥ	anarvan yat śatadura vedas
1099	ghnan śiśnadevān abhi varpasā bhūt	han śiśna deva abhi varpas bhū
1099	sa yahvyaḥ avanīḥ goṣu arvā	tad yahu avani go arvan
1099	ā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ	hu pradhanya sasri
1099	apādaḥ yatra yujyāsaḥ arathāḥ	a pād yatra yujya a ratha
1099	droṇyaśvāsaḥ īrate ghṛtam vār	droṇī aśva īr ghṛta vār
1099	sa rudrebhiḥ aśastavāraḥ ṛbhvā	tad rudra a śaṃs vāra ṛbhvan
1099	hitvī gayam āreavadyaḥ ā agāt	hā gaya āreavadya āgā
1099	vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī	vamra man mithuna vivavri
1099	annam abhītya arodayat muṣāyan	anna abhī roday muṣāy
1099	saḥ it dāsam tuvīravam patiḥ dan	tad id dāsa tuvīrava pati dan
1099	ṣaLakṣam triśīrṣāṇam damanyat	ṣaṣ akṣa tri śīrṣan damany
1099	asya tritaḥ nu ojasā vṛdhānaḥ	idam trita nu ojas vṛdh
1099	vipā varāham ayoagrayā han	vip varāha ayoagra han
1099	sa druhvaṇe manuṣe ūrdhvasānaḥ	tad druhvan manus ūrdhvasāna
1099	ā sāviṣat arśasānāya śarum	ā sū arśasāna śaru
1099	sa nṛtamaḥ nahuṣaḥ asmat sujātaḥ	tad nṛtama nahus mad su jan
1099	puraḥ abhinat arhan dasyuhatye	pur bhid arh dasyu hatya
1099	saḥ abhriyaḥ na yavase udanyan	tad abhriya na yavasa udany
1099	kṣayāya gātum vidat naḥ asme	kṣaya gā vid mad mad
1099	upa yat sīdat indum śarīraiḥ	upa yat sad indu śarīra
1099	śyenaḥ ayopāṣTiḥ hanti dasyūn	śyena ayopāṣṭi han dasyu
1099	sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhiḥ asya	tad vrādh śavasāna idam
1099	kutsāya śuṣṇam kṛpaṇe parā adāt	kutsa śuṣṇa kṛpaṇa parādā
1099	ayam kavim anayat śasyamānam	idam kavi nī śaṃs
1099	atkam yaḥ asya sanitā uta nṛṇām	atka yad idam san uta nṛ
1099	ayam daśasyan naryebhiḥ asya	idam daśasy narya idam
1099	dasmaḥ devebhiḥ varuṇaḥ na māyī	dasma deva varuṇa na māyin
1099	ayam kanīnaḥ ṛtupāḥ avedi	idam kanīna ṛtu pā vid
1099	amimīta ararum yaḥ catuṣpāt	mā araru yad catuṣpād
1099	asya stomebhiḥ auśijaḥ ṛjiśvā	idam stoma auśija ṛjiśvan
1099	vrajam darayat vṛṣabheṇa piproḥ	vraja daray vṛṣabha pipru
1099	sutvā yat yajataḥ dīdayat gīḥ	su yat yajata dīdī gir
1099	puraḥ iyānaḥ abhi varpasā bhūt	pur ī abhi varpas bhū
1099	evā mahaḥ asura vakṣathāya	eva mah asura vakṣatha
1099	vamrakaḥ paḍbhiḥ upa sarpat indram	vamraka pad upa sṛp indra
1099	saḥ iyānaḥ karati svastim asmai	tad ī kṛ svasti idam
1099	iṣam ūrjam sukṣitim viśvam ā abhār	iṣ ūrj su kṣiti viśva ābhṛ
 ---
10100	indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvat it bhuje	indra dṛh maghavan tvāvat id bhuj
10100	iha stutaḥ sutapāḥ bodhi naḥ vṛdhe	iha stu suta pā bhū mad vṛdh
10100	devebhiḥ naḥ savitā pra avatu śrutam	deva mad savitṛ prāv śru
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam	bhara su bhṛ bhāga ṛtviya
10100	pra vāyave śucipe krandadiṣTaye	pra vāyu śuci pā krand iṣṭi
10100	gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītim ānaśe	gaura yad payas pīti aś
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	ā naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat vayaḥ	ā mad deva savitṛ sū vayas
10100	ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate	ṛjūy yaj su
10100	yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavat	yathā deva pratibhūṣ pākavat
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	indraḥ asme sumanāḥ astu viśvahā	indra mad sumanas as viśvahā
10100	rājā somaḥ suvitasya adhi etu naḥ	rājan soma suvita adhi i mad
10100	yathāyathā mitradhitāni saṁdadhuḥ	yathā yathā mitradhita saṃdhā
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	indraḥ ukthena śavasā paruḥ dadhe	indra uktha śavas parus dhā
10100	bṛhaspate pratarītā asi āyuṣaḥ	bṛhaspati pratarītṛ as āyus
10100	yajñaḥ manuḥ pramatiḥ naḥ pitā hi kam	yajña manu pramati mad pitṛ hi kaṃ
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	indrasya nu sukṛtam daivyam sahaḥ	indra nu su kṛ daivya sahas
10100	agniḥ gṛhe jaritā medhiraḥ kaviḥ	agni gṛha jaritṛ medhira kavi
10100	yajñaḥ ca bhūt vidathe cāruḥ antamaḥ	yajña ca bhū vidatha cāru antama
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	na vaḥ guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtam	na tvad guhā kṛ bhūri duṣkṛta
10100	na āviṣTyam vasavaḥ devaheLanam	na āviṣṭya vasu deva heḍana
10100	mākiḥ naḥ devāḥ anṛtasya varpasaḥ	mākir mad deva anṛta varpas
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	apa amīvām savitā sāviṣat nyak	apa amīvā savitṛ sū
10100	varīyaḥ it apa sedhantu adrayaḥ	varīyas id apa sidh adri
10100	grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat	grāvan yatra madhuṣut vac bṛhat
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	ūrdhvaḥ grāvā vasavaḥ astu sotari	ūrdhva grāvan vasu as sotṛ
10100	viśvā dveṣāṁsi sanutar yuyota	viśva dveṣas sanutar yu
10100	sa naḥ devaḥ savitā pāyuḥ īḍyaḥ	tad mad deva savitṛ pāyu īḍ
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	ūrjam gāvaḥ yavase pīvaḥ attana	ūrj go yavasa pīvas ad
10100	ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve	ṛta yad sadana kośa añj
10100	tanūḥ eva tanvaḥ astu bheṣajam	tanū eva tanū as bheṣaja
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām avaḥ	kratuprāvan jaritṛ śaśvat avas
10100	indraḥ it bhadrā pramatiḥ sutāvatām	indra id bhadra pramati sutāvat
10100	pūrṇam ūdhar divyam yasya siktaye	pṛ ūdhas divya yad sikti
10100	ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe	ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ
10100	citraḥ te bhānuḥ kratuprāḥ abhiṣTiḥ	citra tvad bhānu kratu prā abhiṣṭi
10100	santi spṛdhaḥ jaraṇiprāḥ adhṛṣTāḥ	as spṛdh jaraṇi prā adhṛṣṭa
10100	rajiṣThayā rajyā paśvaḥ ā goḥ	rajiṣṭha raji paśu ā go
10100	tūtūrṣati pari agram duvasyuḥ	tūtūrṣ pari agra duvasyu
 ---
10101	ut budhyadhvam samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ	ud budh samanas sakhi
10101	sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīLāḥ	sam agni indh bahu sanīḍa
10101	dadhikrām agnim uṣasam ca devīm	dadhikrā agni uṣas ca devī
10101	indrāvataḥ avase ni hvaye vaḥ	indrāvat avas ni hvā tvad
10101	mandrā kṛṇudhvam dhiyaḥ ā tanudhvam	mandra kṛ dhī ā tan
10101	nāvam aritraparaṇīm kṛṇudhvam	nau aritra paraṇa kṛ
10101	iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhā aram kṛṇudhvam	iṣkṛ āyudha aram kṛ
10101	prāñcam yajñam pra nayatā sakhāyaḥ	prāñc yajña pra nī sakhi
10101	yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvam	yuj sīra vi yuga tan
10101	kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam	kṛ yoni vap iha bīja
10101	girā ca śruṣTiḥ sabharāḥ asat naḥ	gir ca śruṣṭi sabharas as mad
10101	nedīyaḥ it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā iyāt	nedīyas id sṛṇi pakva e
10101	sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ	sīra yuj kavi
10101	yugā vi tanvate pṛthak	yuga vi tan pṛthak
10101	dhīrāḥ deveṣu sumnayā	dhīra deva sumnayā
10101	niḥ āhāvān kṛṇotana	niḥ āhāva kṛ
10101	sam varatrāḥ dadhātana	sam varatrā dhā
10101	siñcāmahai avatam udriṇam vayam	sic avata udrin mad
10101	suṣekam anupakṣitam	suṣeka an upakṣi
10101	iṣkṛtāhāvam avatam	iṣkṛ āhāva avata
10101	suvaratram suṣecanam	su varatrā suṣecana
10101	udriṇam siñce akṣitam	udrin sic a kṣi
10101	prīṇīta aśvān hitam jayātha	prī aśva dhā ji
10101	svastivāham ratham it kṛṇudhvam	svasti vāha ratha id kṛ
10101	droṇāhāvam avatam aśmacakram	droṇa āhāva avata aśman cakra
10101	aṁsatrakośam siñcatā nṛpāṇam	aṃsatra kośa sic nṛpāṇa
10101	vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ	vraja kṛ tad hi tvad nṛpāṇa
10101	varma sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni	varman sīv bahula pṛthu
10101	puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ adhṛṣTāḥ	pur kṛ āyasa adhṛṣṭa
10101	mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṁhatā tam	mā tvad sru camasa dṛh tad
10101	ā vaḥ dhiyam yajñiyām varte ūtaye	ā tvad dhī yajñiya vṛt ūti
10101	devāḥ devīm yajatām yajñiyām iha	deva deva yajata yajñiya iha
10101	sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī	tad mad duh yavasa iva gam
10101	sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ	sahasra dhārā payas mah go
10101	ā tū siñca harim īm droḥ upasthe	ā tu sic hari īṃ dru upastha
10101	vāśībhiḥ takṣata aśmanmayībhiḥ	vāśī takṣ aśmanmaya
10101	pari svajadhvam daśa kakṣyābhiḥ	pari svaj daśan kakṣyā
10101	ubhe dhurau prati vahnim yunakta	ubh dhur prati vahni yuj
10101	ubhe dhurau vahniḥ āpibdamānaḥ	ubh dhur vahni āpibd
10101	antar yonā iva carati dvijāniḥ	antar yoni iva car dvi jānī
10101	vanaspatim vane ā asthāpayadhvam	vanaspati vana āsthāpay
10101	ni sū dadhidhvam akhanantaḥ utsam	ni su dhā a khan utsa
10101	kapṛt naraḥ kapṛtham ut dadhātana	kapṛth nṛ kapṛth ud dhā
10101	codayata khudata vājasātaye	coday khud vājasāti
10101	niṣTigryaḥ putram ā cyāvaya ūtaye	niṣṭigrī putra ā cyāvay ūti
10101	indram sabādhaḥ iha somapītaye	indra sabādh iha soma pīti
 ---
10102	pra te ratham mithūkṛtam	pra tvad ratha mithūkṛt
10102	indraḥ avatu dhṛṣṇuyā	indra av dhṛṣṇuyā
10102	asmin ājau puruhūta śravāyye	idam āji puruhūta śravāyya
10102	dhanabhakṣeṣu naḥ ava	dhana bhakṣa mad av
10102	ut sma vātaḥ vahati vāsaḥ asyāḥ	ud sma vāta vah vāsas idam
10102	adhiratham yat ajayat sahasram	adhiratha yat ji sahasra
10102	rathīḥ abhūt mudgalānī gaviṣTau	rathī bhū mudgalānī gaviṣṭi
10102	bhare kṛtam vi acet indrasenā	bhara kṛta vi ci indrasenā
10102	antar yaccha jighāṁsataḥ	antar yam jighāṃs
10102	vajram indra abhidāsataḥ	vajra indra abhidās
10102	dāsasya vā maghavan āryasya vā	dāsa vā maghavan ārya vā
10102	sanutar yavayā vadham	sanutar yavay vadha
10102	udnaḥ hradam apibat jarhṛṣāṇaḥ	udan hrada pā jarhṛṣ
10102	kūTam sma tṛṁhat abhimātim eti	kūṭa sma tṛh abhimāti i
10102	pra muṣkabhāraḥ śravaḥ icchamānaḥ	pra muṣka bhāra śravas iṣ
10102	ajiram bāhū abharat siṣāsan	ajira bāhu bhṛ siṣās
10102	ni akrandayan upayantaḥ enam	ni kranday upe enad
10102	amehayan vṛṣabham madhye ājeḥ	mehay vṛṣabha madhya āji
10102	tena sūbharvam śatavat sahasram	tad sūbharva śatavat sahasra
10102	gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya	go mudgala pradhana ji
10102	kakardave vṛṣabhaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt	kakardu vṛṣabha yuj as
10102	avāvacīt sārathiḥ asya keśī	vāvac sārathi idam keśin
10102	dudheḥ yuktasya dravataḥ saha anasā	dudhi yuj dru saha anas
10102	ṛcchanti smā niṣpadaḥ mudgalānīm	ṛch sma niṣpad mudgalānī
10102	uta pradhim ut ahan asya vidvān	uta pradhi ud han idam vid
10102	upa ayunak vaṁsagam atra śikṣan	upayuj vaṃsaga atra śikṣ
10102	indraḥ ut āvat patim aghnyānām	indra ud av pati aghnyā
10102	araṁhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān	raṃh padyā kakudmant
10102	śunam aṣTrāvī acarat kapardī	śuna aṣṭrāvin car kapardin
10102	varatrāyām dāru ānahyamānaḥ	varatrā dāru ānah
10102	nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya	nṛmṇa kṛ bahu jana
10102	gāḥ paspaśānaḥ taviṣīḥ adhatta	go paś taviṣī dhā
10102	imam tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjam	idam tad paś vṛṣabha
10102	kāṣThāyāḥ madhye drughaṇam śayānam	kāṣṭhā madhya drughaṇa śī
10102	yena jigāya śatavat sahasram	yad ji śatavat sahasra
10102	gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu	go mudgala pṛtanājya
10102	āre aghā kaḥ nu itthā dadarśa	āre agha ka nu itthā dṛś
10102	yam yuñjanti tam u ā sthāpayanti	yad yuj tad u ā sthāpay
10102	na asmai tṛṇam na udakam ā bharanti	na idam tṛṇa na udaka ā bhṛ
10102	uttaraḥ dhuraḥ vahati pradediśat	uttara dhur vah pradediś
10102	parivṛktā iva patividyam ānaT	parivṛj iva pati vidyā naś
10102	pīpyānā kūcakreṇa iva siñcan	pyā kūcakra iva sic
10102	eṣaiṣyā cit rathyā jayema	eṣaiṣya cit rathī ji
10102	sumaṅgalam sinavat astu sātam	su maṅgala sinavat as sāta
10102	tvam viśvasya jagataḥ	tvad viśva jagant
10102	cakṣuḥ indra asi cakṣuṣaḥ	cakṣus indra as cakṣus
10102	vṛṣā yat ājim vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi	vṛṣan yat āji vṛṣaṇa siṣās
10102	codayan vadhriṇā yujā	coday vadhri yuj
 ---
10103	āśuḥ śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ	āśu śā vṛṣabha na bhīma
10103	ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaḥ carṣaṇīnām	ghanāghana kṣobhaṇa carṣaṇi
10103	saṁkrandanaḥ animiṣaḥ ekavīraḥ	saṃkrandana animiṣa eka vīra
10103	śatam senāḥ ajayat sākam indraḥ	śata senā ji sākam indra
10103	saṁkrandanena animiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā	saṃkrandana animiṣa jiṣṇu
10103	yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā	yutkāra duścyavana dhṛṣṇu
10103	tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam	tad indra ji tad sah
10103	yudhaḥ naraḥ iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā	yudh nṛ iṣu hasta vṛṣan
10103	saḥ iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī	sa iṣu hasta sa niṣaṅgin vaśin
10103	saṁsraṣTā sa yudhaḥ indraḥ gaṇena	saṃsraṣṭṛ tad yudh indra gaṇa
10103	saṁsṛṣTajit somapāḥ bāhuśardhī	saṃsṛj jit soma pā bāhuśardhin
10103	ugradhanvā pratihitābhiḥ astā	ugra dhanvan pratihitā as
10103	bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena	bṛhaspati pari dī ratha
10103	rakṣohā amitrān apabādhamānaḥ	rakṣas han amitra apabādh
10103	prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇaḥ yudhā jayan	prabhañj senā pramṛṇa yudh ji
10103	asmākam edhi avitā rathānām	mad as av ratha
10103	balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ	bala vijñā sthavira pravīra
10103	sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ	sahasvat vājin sah ugra
10103	abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahojāḥ	abhivīra abhisatvan sahas jā
10103	jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣTha govit	jaitra indra ratha ā sthā go vid
10103	gotrabhidam govidam vajrabāhum	gotra bhid go vid vajra bāhu
10103	jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā	ji ajman pramṛ ojas
10103	imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam	idam sajāta anu vīray
10103	indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam	indra sakhi anu sam rabh
10103	abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ	abhi gotra sahas gāh
10103	adayaḥ vīraḥ śatamanyuḥ indraḥ	adaya vīra śatamanyu indra
10103	duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāT ayudhyaḥ	duścyavana pṛtanāṣāh ayudhya
10103	asmākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu	mad senā av pra yudh
10103	indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ	indra idam netṛ bṛhaspati
10103	dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puraḥ etu somaḥ	dakṣiṇā yajña puras i soma
10103	devasenānām abhibhañjatīnām	deva senā abhibhañj
10103	jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram	ji marut i agra
10103	indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ	indra vṛṣan varuṇa rājan
10103	ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram	āditya marut śardhas ugra
10103	mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām	mahāmanas bhuvanacyava
10103	ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām ut asthāt	ghoṣa deva ji ud sthā
10103	ut harṣaya maghavan āyudhāni	ud dharṣay maghavan āyudha
10103	ut satvanām māmakānām manāṁsi	ud satvan māmaka manas
10103	ut vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni	ud vṛtrahan vājin vājina
10103	ut rathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ	ud ratha ji i ghoṣa
10103	asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu	mad indra samṛch dhvaja
10103	asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tāḥ jayantu	mad yad iṣu tad ji
10103	asmākam vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu	mad vīra uttara bhū
10103	asmān u devāḥ avatā haveṣu	mad u deva av hava
10103	amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī	adas citta pratilobhay
10103	gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parā ihi	grah aṅga apvā pare
10103	abhi pra ihi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ	abhi pre niḥ dah hṛd śoka
10103	andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām	andha amitra tamas sac
10103	pra itā jayatā naraḥ	pre ji nṛ
10103	indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu	indra tvad śarman yam
10103	ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ	ugra tvad as bāhu
10103	anādhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha	anādhṛṣya yathā as

10104	asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyam	su soma puruhūta tvad
10104	haribhyām yajñam upa yāhi tūyam	hari yajña upa yā tūya
10104	tubhyam giraḥ vipravīrāḥ iyānāḥ	tvad gir vipra vīra i
10104	dadhanvire indra pibā sutasya	dhanv indra pā suta
10104	apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ piba iha	ap dhū harivat pā iha
10104	nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaTharam pṛṇasva	nṛ suta jaṭhara pṛ
10104	mimikṣuḥ yam adrayaḥ indra tubhyam	myakṣ yad adri indra tvad
10104	tebhiḥ vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ	tad vṛdh mada uktha vāhas
10104	pra ugrām pītim vṛṣṇe iyarmi satyām	pra ugra pīti vṛṣan ṛch satya
10104	prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam	prayā suta haryaśva tvad
10104	indra dhenābhiḥ iha mādayasva	indra dhenā iha māday
10104	dhībhiḥ viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ	dhī viśva śacī gṛ
10104	ūtī śacīvaḥ tava vīryeṇa	ūti śacīvat tvad vīrya
10104	vayaḥ dadhānāḥ uśijaḥ ṛtajñāḥ	vayas dhā uśij ṛta jña
10104	prajāvat indra manuṣaḥ duroṇe	prajāvat indra manus duroṇa
10104	tasthuḥ gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ	sthā gṛ sadhamādya
10104	praṇītibhiḥ te haryaśva suṣToḥ	praṇīti tvad haryaśva suṣṭu
10104	suṣumnasya pururucaḥ janāsaḥ	suṣumna puru ruc jana
10104	maṁhiṣThām ūtim vitire dadhānāḥ	maṃhiṣṭha ūti dhā
10104	stotāraḥ indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ	stotṛ indra tvad sūnṛtā
10104	upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ haribhyām	upa brahman harivat hari
10104	somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya	soma yā pā su
10104	indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaT	indra tvad yajña kṣam naś
10104	dāśvān asi adhvarasya praketaḥ	dāś as adhvara praketa
10104	sahasravājam abhimātiṣāham	sahasra vāja abhimātiṣāh
10104	suteraṇam maghavānam suvṛktim	suteraṇa maghavan suvṛkti
10104	upa bhūṣanti giraḥ apratītam	upa bhūṣ gir apratīta
10104	indram namasyāḥ jarituḥ pananta	indra namasyā jaritṛ pan
10104	sapta āpaḥ devīḥ suraṇāḥ amṛktāḥ	saptan ap devī suraṇa amṛkta
10104	yābhiḥ sindhum ataraḥ indra pūrbhit	yad sindhu tṛ indra pūrbhid
10104	navatim srotyāḥ nava ca sravantīḥ	navati srotyā navan ca sru
10104	devebhyaḥ gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ	deva gātu manus ca vid
10104	apaḥ mahīḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ	ap mahi abhiśasti muc
10104	ajāgar āsu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ	jāgṛ idam adhi deva eka
10104	indra yāḥ tvam vṛtratūrye cakartha	indra yad tvad vṛtratūrya kṛ
10104	tābhiḥ viśvāyuḥ tanvam pupuṣyāḥ	tad viśvāyu tanū puṣ
10104	vīreṇyaḥ kratuḥ indraḥ suśastiḥ	vīreṇya kratu indra su śasti
10104	uta api dhenā puruhūtam īTTe	uta api dhenā puruhūta īḍ
10104	ārdayat vṛtram akṛṇot ulokam	arday vṛtra kṛ u loka
10104	sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣTiḥ	sah śakra pṛtanā abhiṣṭi
10104	śunam huvema maghavānam indram	śuna hu maghavan indra
10104	asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau	idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti
10104	śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu	śru ugra ūti samad
10104	ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṁjitam dhanānām	han vṛtra saṃjit dhana
 ---
10105	kadā vaso stotram haryate ā	kadā vasu stotra hary
10105	ava śmaśāru dhat vār	ava śmaśā rudh vār
10105	dīrgham sutam vātāpyāya	dīrgha su vātāpya
10105	harī yasya suyujā vivratā veḥ	hari yad su yuj vivrata vi
10105	arvantā anu śepā	arvat anu śepa
10105	ubhā rajī na keśinā patiḥ dan	ubh raji na keśin pati
10105	apa yoḥ indraḥ pāpaje ā martaḥ na	apa indra pāpaja ā marta na
10105	śaśramāṇaḥ bibhīvān	śram bhī
10105	śubhe yat yuyuje taviṣīvān	śubha yat yuj taviṣīvat
10105	sacā ayoḥ indraḥ carkṛṣe ā	sacā idam indra carkar
10105	upānasaḥ saparyan	upānasa sapary
10105	nadayoḥ vivratayoḥ śūraḥ indraḥ	nada vivrata śūra indra
10105	adhi yaḥ tasthau keśavantā	adhi yad sthā keśavat
10105	vyacasvantā na puṣTyai	vyacasvat na puṣṭi
10105	vanoti śiprābhyām śipriṇīvān	van śiprā śipriṇīvat
10105	pra astaut ṛṣvaujāḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ	prastu ṛṣva ojas ṛṣva
10105	tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā	takṣ śūra śavas
10105	ṛbhuḥ na kratubhiḥ mātariśvā	ṛbhu na kratu mātariśvan
10105	vajram yaḥ cakre suhanāya dasyave	vajra yad kṛ su hana dasyu
10105	hirīmaśaḥ hirīmān	hirīmaśa hirīmat
10105	arutahanuḥ adbhutam na rajaḥ	a ru hanu adbhuta na rajas
10105	ava naḥ vṛjinā śiśīhi	ava mad vṛjina śā
10105	ṛcā vanema anṛcaḥ	ṛc van anṛc
10105	na abrahmā yajñaḥ ṛdhak joṣati tve	na abrahman yajña ṛdhak juṣ tvad
10105	ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūt	ūrdhva yat tvad tretinī bhū
10105	yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman	yajña dhur sadman
10105	sajūḥ nāvam svayaśasam sacā ayoḥ	sajūs nau sva yaśas sacā idam
10105	śriye te pṛśniḥ upasecanī bhūt	śrī tvad pṛśni upasecanī bhū
10105	śriye darviḥ arepāḥ	śrī darvī arepas
10105	yayā sve pātre siñcase ut	yad sva pātra sic ud
10105	śatam vā yat asurya prati tvā	śata vā yat asurya prati tvad
10105	sumitraḥ itthā astaut	sumitra itthā stu
10105	durmitraḥ itthā astaut	durmitra itthā stu
10105	āvaḥ yat dasyuhatye kutsaputram	av yat dasyu hatya kutsa putra
10105	pra āvaḥ yat dasyuhatye kutsavatsam	pra av yat dasyu hatya kutsa vatsa
 ---
10106	ubhau u nūnam tat it arthayethe	ubh u nūnam tad id arthay
10106	vi tanvāthe dhiyaḥ vastrā apasā iva	vi tan dhī vastra apas iva
10106	sadhrīcīnā yātave pra īm ajīgar	sadhrīcīna yā pra iṃ jāgṛ
10106	sudinā iva pṛkṣaḥ ā taṁsayethe	su dina iva pṛkṣ ā taṃsay
10106	uṣTārā iva pharvareṣu śrayethe	uṣṭṛ iva pharvara śri
10106	prāyogā iva śvātryā śāsuḥ ā ithaḥ	prāyoga iva śvātrya śāsus e
10106	dūtā iva hi sthaḥ yaśasā janeṣu	dūta iva hi as yaśas jana
10106	mā apa sthātam mahiṣā iva avapānāt	mā apa sthā mahiṣa iva avapāna
10106	sākaṁyujā śakunasya iva pakṣā	sākaṃyuj śakuna iva pakṣa
10106	paśvā iva citrā yajuḥ ā gamiṣTam	paśu eva citra yajus ā gam
10106	agniḥ iva devayoḥ dīdivāṁsā	agni iva devayu dīdī
10106	parijmānā iva yajathaḥ purutrā	parijman iva yaj purutrā
10106	āpī vaḥ asme pitarā iva putrā	āpi tvad mad pitṛ iva putra
10106	ugrā iva rucā nṛpatī iva turyai	ugra iva ruc nṛpati iva turī
10106	iryā iva puṣTyai kiraṇā iva bhujyai	irya iva puṣṭi kiraṇa iva bhuji
10106	śruṣTīvānā iva havam ā gamiṣTam	bhuji hava ā gam
10106	vaṁsagā iva pūṣaryā śimbātā	vaṃsaga iva śimbāta
10106	mitrā iva ṛtā śatarā śātapantā	mitra iva ṛta śatarā
10106	vājā iva uccā vayasā gharmyeṣThā	vāja iva ucca vayas gharmyeṣṭhā
10106	meṣā iva iṣā saparyā purīṣā	meṣa iva īṣā saparyā purīṣa
10106	sṛṇyā iva jarbharī turpharītū	sṛṇya iva jarbhari
10106	naitośā iva turpharī parpharīkā	naitośa iva turphari parpharīka
10106	udanyajā iva jemanā maderū	udanya ja iva jeman maderu
10106	tā me jarāyu ajaram marāyu	tad mad jarāyu ajara marāyu
10106	pajrā iva carcaram jāram marāyu	carcara jāra marāyu
10106	kṣadma iva artheṣu tartarīthaḥ ugrā	kṣadman iva artha tartar ugra
10106	ṛbhū na āpat kharamajrā kharajruḥ	ṛbhu kharamajra kharajru
10106	vāyuḥ na parpharat kṣayat rayīṇām	vāyu na kṣi rayi
10106	gharmā iva madhu jaThare sanerū	gharma iva madhu jaṭhara saneru
10106	bhagevitā turpharī phārivā aram	saneru turphari
10106	patarā iva cacarā candranirṇik	patara iva cacara candra nirṇij
10106	manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī	manaṛṅga mananya na jagmi
10106	bṛhantā iva gambhareṣu pratiṣThām	bṛhat iva gambhara pratiṣṭhā
10106	pādā iva gādham tarate vidāthaḥ	pāda iva gādha tṛ vid
10106	karṇā iva śāsuḥ anu hi smarāthaḥ	karṇa iva śāsus anu hi smṛ
10106	aṁśā iva naḥ bhajatam citram apnaḥ	aṃśa iva mad bhaj citra apnas
10106	āraṅgarā iva madhu ā īrayethe	āraṅgara iva madhu eray
10106	sāraghā iva gavi nīcīnabāre	sāragha iva go nīcīna bāra
10106	kīnārā iva svedam āsiṣvidānā	kīnāra iva sveda āsvid
10106	kṣāma iva ūrjā sūyavasāt sacethe	kṣāma iva ūrj su yavasa sac
10106	ṛdhyāma stomam sanuyāma vājam	ṛdh stoma san vāja
10106	ā naḥ mantram sarathā iha upa yātam	ā mad mantra sa ratha iha upa yā
10106	yaśaḥ na pakvam madhu goṣu antar	yaśas na pakva madhu go antar
10106	ā bhūtāṁśaḥ aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ	ā bhūtāṃśa aśvin kāma prā
 ---
10107	āviḥ abhūt mahi māghonam eṣām	āvis bhū mahi māghona idam
10107	viśvam jīvam tamasaḥ niḥ amoci	viśva jīva tamas niḥ muc
10107	mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhiḥ dattam ā agāt	mahi jyotis pitṛ dā āgā
10107	uruḥ panthāḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ adarśi	uru pathin dakṣiṇā dṛś
10107	uccā divi dakṣiṇāvantaḥ asthuḥ	uccā div dakṣiṇāvat sthā
10107	ye aśvadāḥ saha te sūryeṇa	yad aśva da saha tad sūrya
10107	hiraṇyadāḥ amṛtatvam bhajante	hiraṇya da amṛta tva bhaj
10107	vāsodāḥ soma pra tirante āyuḥ	vāsas da soma pra tṛ āyus
10107	daivī pūrtiḥ dakṣiṇā devayajyā	daiva pūrti dakṣiṇā deva yajya
10107	na kavāribhyaḥ nahi te pṛṇanti	na kavāri nahi tad pṛ
10107	athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāsaḥ	atha nṛ prayam dakṣiṇā
10107	avadyabhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti	avadya bhī bahu pṛ
10107	śatadhāram vāyum arkam svarvidam	śata dhārā vāyu arka svarvid
10107	nṛcakṣasaḥ te abhi cakṣate haviḥ	nṛ cakṣas tad abhi cakṣ havis
10107	ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṁgame	yad pṛ pra ca yam saṃgama
10107	te dakṣiṇām duhate saptamātaram	tad dakṣiṇā duh saptan mātṛ
10107	dakṣiṇāvān prathamaḥ hūtaḥ eti	dakṣiṇāvat prathama hvā i
10107	dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīḥ agram eti	dakṣiṇāvat grāmaṇī agra i
10107	tam eva manye nṛpatim janānām	tad eva man nṛpati jana
10107	yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇām āvivāya	yad prathama dakṣiṇā āvī
10107	tam eva ṛṣim tam u brahmāṇam āhuḥ	tad eva ṛṣi tad u brahman ah
10107	yajñanyam sāmagām ukthaśāsam	yajñanī sāman gā uktha śās
10107	sa śukrasya tanvaḥ veda tisraḥ	tad śukra tanū vid tri
10107	yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇayā rarādha	yad prathama dakṣiṇā rādh
10107	dakṣiṇā aśvam dakṣiṇā gām dadāti	dakṣiṇā aśva dakṣiṇā go dā
10107	dakṣiṇā candram uta yat hiraṇyam	dakṣiṇā candra uta yad hiraṇya
10107	dakṣiṇā annam vanute yaḥ naḥ ātmā	dakṣiṇā anna van yad mad ātman
10107	dakṣiṇām varma kṛṇute vijānan	dakṣiṇā varman kṛ vijñā
10107	na bhojāḥ mamruḥ na nyartham īyuḥ	na bhoja mṛ na nyartha i
10107	na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ	na riṣ na vyath ha bhoja
10107	idam yat viśvam bhuvanam svar ca	idam yad viśva bhuvana svar ca
10107	etat sarvam dakṣiṇā ebhyaḥ dadāti	etad sarva dakṣiṇā idam dā
10107	bhojāḥ jigyuḥ surabhim yonim agre	bhoja ji surabhi yoni agra
10107	bhojāḥ jigyuḥ vadhvam yā suvāsāḥ	bhoja ji vadhū yad su vāsas
10107	bhojāḥ jigyuḥ antaḥpeyam surāyāḥ	bhoja ji antaḥpeya surā
10107	bhojāḥ jigyuḥ ye ahūtāḥ prayanti	bhoja ji yad a hvā pre
10107	bhojāya aśvam sam mṛjanti āśum	bhoja aśva sam mṛj āśu
10107	bhojāya āste kanyā śumbhamānā	bhoja ās kanyā śubh
10107	bhojasya idam puṣkariṇī iva veśma	bhoja idam puṣkariṇī iva veśman
10107	pariṣkṛtam devamānā iva citram	pariṣkṛ deva māna iva citra
10107	bhojam aśvāḥ suṣThuvāhaḥ vahanti	bhoja aśva suṣṭhuvāh vah
10107	suvṛt rathaḥ vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ	suvṛt ratha vṛt dakṣiṇā
10107	bhojam devāsaḥ avatā bhareṣu	bhoja deva av bhara
10107	bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā	bhoja śatru samanīka ji
 ---
10108	kim icchantī saramā pra idam ānaT	ka iṣ saramā pra idam naś
10108	dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ parācaiḥ	dūra hi adhvan jaguri parācais
10108	kā asmehitiḥ kā paritakmyā āsīt	ka asmehiti ka paritakmyā as
10108	katham rasāyāḥ ataraḥ payāṁsi	katham rasā tṛ payas
10108	indrasya dūtīḥ iṣitā carāmi	indra dūtī iṣay car
10108	mahaḥ icchantī paṇayaḥ nidhīn vaḥ	mah iṣ paṇi nidhi tvad
10108	atiṣkadaḥ bhiyasā tat naḥ āvat	atiṣkad bhiyas tad mad av
10108	tathā rasāyāḥ ataram payāṁsi	tathā rasā tṛ payas
10108	kīdṛṅ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā	kīdṛś indra saramā ka dṛśīkā
10108	yasya idam dūtīḥ asaraḥ parākāt	yad idam dūtī sṛ parāka
10108	ā ca gacchāt mitram enā dadhāma	ā ca gam mitra idam dhā
10108	athā gavām gopatiḥ naḥ bhavāti	atha go gopati mad bhū
10108	na aham tam veda dabhyam dabhat sa	na mad tad vid dabhya dabh tad
10108	yasya idam dūtīḥ asaram parākāt	yad idam dūtī sṛ parāka
10108	na tam gūhanti sravataḥ gabhīrāḥ	na tad guh sru gabhīra
10108	hatāḥ indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve	han indra paṇi śī
10108	imāḥ gāvaḥ sarame yāḥ aicchaḥ	idam go saramā yad iṣ
10108	pari divaḥ antān subhage patantī	pari div anta subhaga pat
10108	kaḥ te enāḥ ava sṛjāt ayudhvī	ka tvad enad ava sṛj a yudh
10108	uta asmākam āyudhā santi tigmā	uta mad āyudha as tigma
10108	asenyā vaḥ paṇayaḥ vacāṁsi	asenya tvad paṇi vacas
10108	aniṣavyāḥ tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ	aniṣavya tanū as pāpa
10108	adhṛṣTaḥ vaḥ etavai astu panthāḥ	adhṛṣṭa tvad i as pathin
10108	bṛhaspatiḥ vaḥ ubhayā na mṛLāt	bṛhaspati tvad ubhayā na mṛḍ
10108	ayam nidhiḥ sarame adribudhnaḥ	idam nidhi saramā adri budhna
10108	gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ nyṛṣTaḥ	go aśva vasu ni ṛṣ
10108	rakṣanti tam paṇayaḥ ye sugopāḥ	rakṣ tad paṇi yad su gopa
10108	reku padam alakam ā jagantha	reku pada alakam ā gam
10108	ā iha gaman ṛṣayaḥ somaśitāḥ	ā iha gam ṛṣi soma śā
10108	ayāsyaḥ aṅgirasaḥ navagvāḥ	ayāsya aṅgiras navagva
10108	te etam ūrvam vi bhajanta gonām	tad etad ūrva vi bhaj go
10108	atha etat vacaḥ paṇayaḥ vaman it	atha etad vacas paṇi vam id
10108	evā ca tvam sarame ājagantha	eva ca tvad saramā āgam
10108	prabādhitā sahasā daivyena	prabādh sahas daivya
10108	svasāram tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gāḥ	svasṛ tvad kṛ mā punar gā
10108	apa te gavām subhage bhajāma	apa tvad go subhaga bhaj
10108	na aham veda bhrātṛtvam na u svasṛtvam	na mad vid bhrātṛ tva no svasṛ tva
