10108	indraḥ viduḥ aṅgirasaḥ ca ghorāḥ	indra vid aṅgiras ca ghora
10108	gokāmāḥ me acchadayan yat āyam	go kāma mad chaday yat i
10108	apa ataḥ ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ	apa atas i paṇi varīyas
10108	dūram ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ	dūra i paṇi varīyas
10108	ut gāvaḥ yantu minatīḥ ṛtena	ud go i mī ṛta
10108	bṛhaspatiḥ yāḥ avindat nigūLhāḥ	bṛhaspati yad vid niguh
10108	somaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ	soma grāvan ṛṣi ca vipra
 ---
10109	te avadan prathamāḥ brahmakilbiṣe	tad vad prathama brahman kilbiṣa
10109	akūpāraḥ salilaḥ mātariśvā	akūpāra salila mātariśvan
10109	vīLuharāḥ tapaḥ ugraḥ mayobhūḥ	vīḍu hara tapas ugra mayas bhū
10109	āpaḥ devīḥ prathamajāḥ ṛtena	ap devī prathama ja ṛta
10109	somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahmajāyām	soma rājan prathama brahman jāyā
10109	punar pra ayacchat ahṛṇīyamānaḥ	punar prayam a hṛṇīy
10109	anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt	anvartitṛ varuṇa mitra as
10109	agniḥ hotā hastagṛhya ā nināya	agni hotṛ hasta grah nī
10109	hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ	hasta eva grah ādhi idam
10109	brahmajāyā iyam iti ca it avocan	brahman jāyā idam iti ced vac
10109	na dūtāya prahye tasthe eṣā	na dūta prahi sthā etad
10109	tathā rāṣTram gupitam kṣatriyasya	tathā rāṣṭra gup kṣatriya
10109	devāḥ etasyām avadanta pūrve	deva etad vad pūrva
10109	saptaṛṣayaḥ tapase ye niṣeduḥ	saptan ṛṣi tapas yad niṣad
10109	bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya upanītā	bhīma jāyā brāhmaṇa upanī
10109	durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman	durdhā dhā parama vyoman
10109	brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ	brahmacārin car veviṣ viṣ
10109	sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam	tad deva bhū eka aṅga
10109	tena jāyām anu avindat bṛhaspatiḥ	tena jāyā anu vid bṛhaspati
10109	somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ	soma nī juhū na deva
10109	punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ	punar vai deva dā
10109	punar manuṣyāḥ uta	punar manuṣya uta
10109	rājānaḥ satyam kṛṇvānāḥ	rājan satya kṛ
10109	brahmajāyām punar daduḥ	brahman jāyā punar dā
10109	punardāya brahmajāyām	punar dā brahman jāyā
10109	kṛtvī devaiḥ nikilbiṣam	kṛ deva nikilbiṣa
10109	ūrjam pṛthivyā bhaktvāya	ūrj pṛthivī bhaj
10109	urugāyam upa āsate	urugāya upās
 ---
10110	samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe	samindh adya manus duroṇa
10110	devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ	deva deva yaj jātavedas
10110	ā ca vaha mitramahaḥ cikitvān	ā ca vah mitra mahat cit
10110	tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ	tvad dūta kavi as pracetas
10110	tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānān	tanūnapāt pathin ṛta yāna
10110	madhvā samañjan svadayā sujihva	madhu samañj svaday sujihva
10110	manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan	manman dhī uta yajña ṛdh
10110	devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ	devatrā ca kṛ adhvara mad
10110	ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca	āhu īḍ vand ca
10110	ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ	ā yā agni vasu sajoṣas
10110	tvam devānām asi yahva hotā	tvad deva as yahva hotṛ
10110	saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān	tad enad yaj iṣay yajīyas
10110	prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ	prācīna barhis pradiś pṛthivī
10110	vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām	vastu idam vṛj agra ahar
10110	vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ	vi u prath vitaram varīyas
10110	devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam	deva aditi syona
10110	vyacasvatīḥ urviyā vi śrayantām	vyacasvat urviyā vi śri
10110	patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ	pati na jani śubh
10110	devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ	devī dvār bṛhat viśvaminva
10110	devebhyaḥ bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ	deva bhū su prāyaṇa
10110	ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke	ā yajata upāka
10110	uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau	uṣāsānaktā sad ni yoni
10110	divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme	divya yoṣaṇā bṛhat su rukma
10110	adhi śriyam śukrapiśam dadhāne	adhi śrī śukrapiś dhā
10110	daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā	daivya hotṛ prathama su vāc
10110	mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai	mā yajña manus yaj
10110	pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū	pracoday vidatha kāru
10110	prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā	prācīna jyotis pradiś diś
10110	ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu	ā mad yajña bhāratī tūya i
10110	iLā manuṣvat iha cetayantī	iḍā manuṣvat iha cetay
10110	tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam	tri devī barhis ā idam syona
10110	sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu	sarasvatī su apas sad
10110	yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī	yad idam dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī
10110	rūpaiḥ apiṁśat bhuvanāni viśvā	rūpa piś bhuvana viśva
10110	tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān	tad adya hotṛ iṣay yajīyas
10110	devam tvaṣTāram iha yakṣi vidvān	deva tvaṣṭṛ iha yaj vid
10110	upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan	upa avasṛj samañj
10110	devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṁṣi	deva pāthas ṛtuthā havis
10110	vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ	vanaspati śamitṛ deva agni
10110	svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena	svad havya madhu ghṛta
10110	sadyaḥ jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam	sadyas jan vi mā yajña
10110	agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ	agni deva bhū purogā
10110	asya hotuḥ pradiśi ṛtasya vāci	idam hotṛ pradiś ṛta vāc
10110	svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ	svāhākṛta havis ad deva
 ---
10111	manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣām	manīṣin pra bhṛ manīṣā
10111	yathāyathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām	yathā yathā mati as nṛ
10111	indram satyaiḥ ā īrayāmā kṛtebhiḥ	indra satya ā īray kṛ
10111	sa hi vīraḥ girvaṇasyuḥ vidānaḥ	tad hi vīra girvaṇasyu vid
10111	ṛtasya hi sadasaḥ dhītiḥ adyaut	ṛta hi sadas dhīti dyut
10111	sam gārṣTeyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ gobhiḥ ānaT	sam gārṣṭeya vṛṣabha go naś
10111	ut atiṣThat taviṣeṇā raveṇa	ud sthā taviṣa rava
10111	mahānti cit sam vivyācā rajāṁsi	mahat cit sam vyac rajas
10111	indraḥ kila śrutyai asya veda	indra kila śruti idam vid
10111	sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya	tad hi jiṣṇu pathikṛt sūrya
10111	āt menām kṛṇvan acyutaḥ bhuvat goḥ	āt menā kṛ acyuta bhū go
10111	patiḥ divaḥ sanajāḥ apratītaḥ	pati div sanajā apratīta
10111	indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya	indra mahan mahat arṇava
10111	vratā amināt aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ	vrata mī aṅgiras gṛ
10111	purūṇi cit ni tatānā rajāṁsi	puru cit ni tan rajas
10111	dādhāra yaḥ dharuṇam satyatātā	dhṛ yad dharuṇa satyatāti
10111	indraḥ divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ	indra div pratimāna pṛthivī
10111	viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam	viśva vid savana han śuṣṇa
10111	mahīm cit dyām ā atanot sūryeṇa	mah cit div ātan sūrya
10111	cāskambha cit skambhanena skabhīyān	skambh cit kambhana skabhīyas
10111	vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar	vajra hi vṛtrahan vṛtra stṛ
10111	adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ	adeva śvi māyā
10111	vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghantha	vi dhṛṣṇa atra dhṛṣat han
10111	atha abhavaḥ maghavan bāhvojāḥ	atha bhū maghavan bāhu ojas
10111	sacanta yat uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa	sac yat uṣas sūrya
10111	citrām asya ketavaḥ rām avindan	citra idam ketu rai vid
10111	ā yat nakṣatram dadṛśe divaḥ na	ā yat nakṣatra dṛś div na
10111	punar yataḥ nakiḥ addhā nu veda	punar i nakir addhā nu vid
10111	dūram kila prathamāḥ jagmuḥ āsām	dūram kila prathama gam idam
10111	indrasya yāḥ prasave sasruḥ āpaḥ	indra yad prasava sṛ ap
10111	kva svit agram kva budhnaḥ āsām	kva svid agra kva budhna idam
10111	āpaḥ madhyam kva vaḥ nūnam antaḥ	ap madhya kva tvad nūnam anta
10111	sṛjaḥ sindhūn ahinā jagrasānān	sṛj sindhu ahi gras
10111	āt it etāḥ pra vivijre javena	āt id etad pra vij java
10111	mumukṣamāṇāḥ uta yāḥ mumucre	mumukṣ uta yad muc
10111	adha it etāḥ na ramante nitiktāḥ	adha id etad na ram nitikta
10111	sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīḥ iva āyan	sadhryañc sindhu vaś iva i
10111	sanāt jāraḥ āritaḥ pūrbhit āsām	sanāt jāra ār pūrbhid idam
10111	astam ā te pārthivā vasūni	asta ā tvad pārthiva vasu
10111	asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtāḥ indra pūrvīḥ	mad gam sūnṛtā indra puru
 ---
10112	indra piba pratikāmam sutasya	indra pā pratikāma suta
10112	prātaḥsāvaḥ tava hi pūrvapītiḥ	prātaḥsāva tvad hi pūrva pīti
10112	harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn	hṛṣ han śūra śatru
10112	ukthebhiḥ te vīryā pra bravāma	uktha tvad vīrya pra brū
10112	yaḥ te rathaḥ manasaḥ javīyān	yad tvad ratha manas javīyas
10112	ā indra tena somapeyāya yāhi	ā indra tad soma peya yā
10112	tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu	tūya ā tvad hari pra dru
10112	yebhiḥ yāsi vṛṣabhiḥ mandamānaḥ	yad yā vṛṣan mad
10112	haritvatā varcasā sūryasya	haritvat varcas sūrya
10112	śreṣThaiḥ rūpaiḥ tanvam sparśayasva	śreṣṭha rūpa tanū sparśay
10112	asmābhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ huvānaḥ	mad indra sakhi hvā
10112	sadhrīcīnaḥ mādayasvā niṣadya	sadhrīcīna māday niṣad
10112	yasya tyat te mahimānam madeṣu	yad tya tvad mahiman mada
10112	ime mahī rodasī na aviviktām	idam mah rodas na vyac
10112	tat okaḥ ā haribhiḥ indra yuktaiḥ	tad oka ā hari indra yuj
10112	priyebhiḥ yāhi priyam annam accha	priya yā priya anna acchā
10112	yasya śaśvat papivān indra śatrūn	yad śaśvat pā indra śatru
10112	anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha	anānukṛtya raṇya kṛ
10112	sa te puraṁdhim taviṣīm iyarti	tad tvad puraṃdhi taviṣī ṛch
10112	sa te madāya sutaḥ indra somaḥ	tad tvad mada su indra soma
10112	idam te pātram sanavittam indra	idam tvad pātra sanavitta indra
10112	pibā somam enā śatakrato	pā soma idam śatakratu
10112	pūrṇaḥ āhāvaḥ madirasya madhvaḥ	pṛ āhāva madira madhu
10112	yam viśve it abhiharyanti devāḥ	yad viśva id abhihary deva
10112	vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāsaḥ	vi hi tvad indra purudhā jana
10112	hitaprayasaḥ vṛṣabha hvayante	dhā prayas vṛṣabha hvā
10112	asmākam te madhumattamāni	mad tvad madhumattama
10112	imā bhuvan savanā teṣu harya	idam bhū savana tad hary
10112	pra te indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnam	pra tvad indra pūrvya pra nūnam
10112	vīryā vocam prathamā kṛtāni	vīrya vac prathama kṛ
10112	satīnamanyuḥ aśrathāyaḥ adrim	satīna manyu adri
10112	suvedanām akṛṇoḥ brahmaṇe gām	su vedana kṛ brahman go
10112	ni su sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu	ni su sad gaṇapati gaṇa
10112	tvām āhuḥ vipratamam kavīnām	tvad ah vipratama kavi
10112	na ṛte tvat kriyate kim cana āre	na ṛte tvad kṛ ka cana are
10112	mahām arkam maghavan citram arca	are arka maghavan citra arc
10112	abhikhyā naḥ maghavan nādhamānān	mad maghavan nādh
10112	sakhe bodhi vasupate sakhīnām	sakhi bhū vasupati sakhi
10112	raṇam kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣma	raṇa kṛ raṇa kṛt satya śuṣma
10112	abhakte cit ā bhajā rāye asmān	a bhaj cit ā bhaj rai mad
 ---
10113	tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā	tad idam dyāvāpṛthivī sacetas
10113	viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anu śuṣmam āvatām	viśva deva anu śuṣma av
10113	yat ait kṛṇvānaḥ mahimānam indriyam	yat i kṛ mahiman indriya
10113	pītvī somasya kratumān avardhata	pā soma kratumat vṛdh
10113	tam asya viṣṇuḥ mahimānam ojasā	tad idam viṣṇu mahiman ojas
10113	aṁśum dadhanvān madhunaḥ vi rapśate	aṃśu dhanv madhu vi rapś
10113	devebhiḥ indraḥ maghavā sayāvabhiḥ	deva indra maghavan sa yāvan
10113	vṛtram jaghanvān abhavat vareṇyaḥ	vṛtra han bhū vareṇya
10113	vṛtreṇa yat ahinā bibhrat āyudhā	vṛtra yat ahi bhṛ āyudha
10113	samasthithāḥ yudhaye śaṁsam āvide	saṃsthā yudh śaṃsa āvid
10113	viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanā	viśva tvad atra marut saha tman
10113	avardhan ugra mahimānam indriyam	vṛdh ugra mahiman indriya
10113	jajñānaḥ eva vi abādhata spṛdhaḥ	jan eva vi bādh spṛdh
10113	pra apaśyat vīraḥ abhi pauṁsyam raṇam	prapaś vīra abhi pauṃsya raṇa
10113	avṛścat adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjat	vraśc adri ava sṛj
10113	astabhnāt nākam svapasyayā pṛthum	stambh nāka svapasyā pṛthu
10113	āt indraḥ satrā taviṣīḥ apatyata	āt indra satrā taviṣī paty
10113	varīyaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata	varīyas dyāvāpṛthivī bādh
10113	ava abharat dhṛṣitaḥ vajram āyasam	avabhṛ dhṛṣ vajra āyasa
10113	śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe	śeva mitra varuṇa dāś
10113	indrasya atra taviṣībhyaḥ virapśinaḥ	indra atra taviṣī virapśin
10113	ṛghāyataḥ araṁhayanta manyave	ṛghāy raṃhay manyu
10113	vṛtram yat ugraḥ vi avṛścat ojasā	vṛtra yat ugra vi vraśc ojas
10113	apaḥ bibhratam tamasā parīvṛtam	ap bhṛ tamas parīvṛ
10113	yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā	yad vīrya prathama kṛ
10113	mahitvebhiḥ yatamānau samīyatuḥ	mahi tva yat sami
10113	dhvāntam tamaḥ ava dadhvase hate	dhvānta tamas ava dhvaṃs han
10113	indraḥ mahnā pūrvahūtau apatyata	indra mahan pūrva hūti paty
10113	viśve devāsaḥ adha vṛṣṇyāni te	viśva deva adha vṛṣṇya tvad
10113	avardhayan somavatyā vacasyayā	vardhay somavat vacasyā
10113	raddham vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanā	radh vṛtra ahi indra hanman
10113	agniḥ na jambhaiḥ tṛṣu annam āvayat	agni na jambha tṛṣu anna āvay
10113	bhūri dakṣebhiḥ vacanebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ	bhūri dakṣa vacana ṛkvan
10113	sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata	sakhya sakhya pra vac
10113	indraḥ dhunim ca cumurim ca dambhayan	indra dhuni ca cumuri ca dambhay
10113	śraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye	śraddhāmanasyā śru dabhīti
10113	tvam purūṇi ā bharā svaśvyā	tvad puru ā bhṛ su aśvya
10113	yebhiḥ maṁsai nivacanāni śaṁsan	yad man nivacana śaṃs
10113	sugebhiḥ viśvā duritā tarema	suga viśva durita tṛ
10113	vida u su naḥ urviyā gādham adya	vid su mad urviyā gādha adya
 ---
10114	gharmā samantā trivṛtam vi āpatuḥ	gharma samanta trivṛt vi āp
10114	tayoḥ juṣTim mātariśvā jagāma	tad juṣṭi mātariśvan gam
10114	divaḥ payaḥ didhiṣāṇāḥ aveṣan	div payas didhiṣ viṣ
10114	viduḥ devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam	vid deva sahasāman arka
10114	tisraḥ deṣTrāya nirṛtīḥ upa āsate	tri deṣṭra nirṛti upās
10114	dīrghaśrutaḥ vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ	dīrgha śrut vi hi jñā vahni
10114	tāsām ni cikyuḥ kavayaḥ nidānam	tad ni ci kavi nidāna
10114	pareṣu yāḥ guhyeṣu vrateṣu	para yad guhya vrata
10114	catuṣkapardā yuvatiḥ supeśāḥ	catur kaparda yuvati su peśas
10114	ghṛtapratīkā vayunāni vaste	ghṛta pratīka vayuna vas
10114	tasyām suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni sedatuḥ	tad suparṇa vṛṣan ni sad
10114	yatra devāḥ dadhire bhāgadheyam	yatra deva dhā bhāgadheya
10114	ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram ā viveśa	eka suparṇa tad samudra ā viś
10114	saḥ idam viśvam bhuvanam vi caṣTe	tad idam viśva bhuvana vi cakṣ
10114	tam pākena manasā apaśyam antitaḥ	tad pāka manas paś antitas
10114	tam mātā reLhi saḥ u reLhi mātaram	tad mātṛ rih tad u rih mātṛ
10114	suparṇam viprāḥ kavayaḥ vacobhiḥ	suparṇa vipra kavi vacas
10114	ekam santam bahudhā kalpayanti	eka as bahudhā kalpay
10114	chandāṁsi ca dadhataḥ adhvareṣu	chandas ca dhā adhvara
10114	grahān somasya mimate dvādaśa	graha soma mā dvādaśan
10114	ṣaTtriṁśān ca caturaḥ kalpayantaḥ	ṣaṭtriṃśa ca catur kalpay
10114	chandāṁsi ca dadhataḥ ādvādaśam	chandas ca dhā ādvādaśam
10114	yajñam vimāya kavayaḥ manīṣā	yajña vimā kavi manīṣā
10114	ṛksāmābhyām pra ratham vartayanti	ṛc sāman pra ratha vartay
10114	caturdaśa anye mahimānaḥ asya	caturdaśan anya mahiman idam
10114	tam dhīrāḥ vācā pra nayanti sapta	tad dhīra vāc pra nī saptan
10114	āpnānam tīrtham kaḥ iha pra vocat	āpnāna tīrtha ka iha pra vac
10114	yena pathā prapibante sutasya	yad pathin prapā su
10114	sahasradhā pañcadaśāni ukthā	sahasradhā pañcadaśan uktha
10114	yāvat dyāvāpṛthivī tāvat it tat	yāvat dyāvāpṛthivī tāvat id tad
10114	sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasram	sahasradhā mahiman sahasra
10114	yāvat brahma viṣThitam tāvatī vāk	yāvat brahman viṣṭhā tāvat vāc
10114	kaḥ chandasām yogam ā veda dhīraḥ	ka chandas yoga ā vid dhīra
10114	kaḥ dhiṣṇyām prati vācam papāda	ka dhiṣṇya prati vāc pad
10114	kam ṛtvijām aṣTamam śūram āhuḥ	ka ṛtvij aṣṭama śūra ah
10114	harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit	hari indra ni ci ka svid
10114	bhūmyāḥ antam pari eke caranti	bhūmi anta pari eka car
10114	rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāsaḥ asthuḥ	ratha dhur yuj sthā
10114	śramasya dāyam vi bhajanti ebhyaḥ	śrama dāya vi bhaj idam
10114	yadā yamaḥ bhavati harmye hitaḥ	yadā yama bhū harmya dhā
 ---
10115	citraḥ it śiśoḥ taruṇasya vakṣathaḥ	citra id śiśu taruṇa vakṣatha
10115	na yaḥ mātarau apyeti dhātave	na yad mātṛ apī dhā
10115	anūdhāḥ yadi jījanat adhā ca nu	anūdhas yadi jan adha ca nu
10115	vavakṣa sadyaḥ mahi dūtyam caran	vakṣ sadyas mahi dūtya car
10115	agniḥ ha nāma dhāyi dan apastamaḥ	agni ha nāma dhā apastama
10115	sam yaḥ vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā	sam yad vana yu bhasman dat
10115	abhipramurā juhvā svadhvaraḥ	abhipramur juhū su adhvara
10115	inaḥ na prothamānaḥ yavase vṛṣā	ina na pruth yavasa vṛṣan
10115	tam vaḥ vim na druṣadam devam andhasaḥ	tad tvad vi na druṣad deva andhas
10115	indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam	indu pruth pravap arṇava
10115	āsā vahnim na śociṣā virapśinam	ās vahni na śocis virapśin
10115	mahivratam na sarajantam adhvanaḥ	mahi vrata na sarajat adhvan
10115	vi yasya te jrayasānasya ajara	vi yad tad jrayasāna ajara
10115	dhakṣoḥ na vātāḥ pari santi acyutāḥ	dhakṣu na vāta pari as acyuta
10115	ā raṇvāsaḥ yuyudhayaḥ na satvanam	ā raṇva yuyudhi na satvana
10115	tritam naśanta pra śiṣantaḥ iṣTaye	trita naś pra śās iṣṭi
10115	saḥ it agniḥ kaṇvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhā	tad id agni kaṇvatama kaṇva sakhi
10115	aryaḥ parasya antarasya taruṣaḥ	ārya para antara taruṣa
10115	agniḥ pātu gṛṇataḥ agniḥ sūrīn	agni pā gṛ agni sūri
10115	agniḥ dadātu teṣām avaḥ naḥ	agni dā tad avas mad
10115	vājintamāya sahyase supitrya	vājintama sahyas su pitrya
10115	tṛṣu cyavānaḥ anu jātavedase	tṛṣu cyavāna anu jātavedas
10115	anudre cit yaḥ dhṛṣatā varam sate	anudra cit yad dhṛṣat vara as
10115	mahintamāya dhanvanā it aviṣyate	mahintama dhanvan id aviṣy
10115	eva agniḥ martaiḥ saha sūribhiḥ	eva agni marta saha sūri
10115	vasuḥ stave sahasaḥ sūnaraḥ nṛbhiḥ	vasu sahas sūnara nṛ
10115	mitrāsaḥ na ye sudhitāḥ ṛtāyavaḥ	mitra na yad sudhita ṛtāyu
10115	dyāvaḥ na dyumnaiḥ abhi santi mānuṣān	div na dyumna abhi as mānuṣa
10115	ūrjaḥ napāt sahasāvan iti tvā	ūrj napāt sahasāvat iti tvad
10115	upastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk	upastuta vand vṛṣan vāc
10115	tvām stoṣāma tvayā suvīrāḥ	tvad stu tvad su vīra
10115	drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ	drāghīyas āyus pratara dhā
10115	iti tvā agne vṛṣTihavyasya putrāḥ	iti tvad agni vṛṣṭihavya putra
10115	upastutāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ avocan	upastuta ṛṣi vac
10115	tān ca pāhi gṛṇataḥ ca sūrīn	tad ca pā gṛ ca sūri
10115	vaṣaT vaṣaT iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan	vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ iti ūrdhva nakṣ
10115	namaḥ namaḥ iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan	namas namas iti ūrdhva nakṣ
 ---
10116	pibā somam mahate indriyāya	pā soma mahat indriya
10116	pibā vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣTha	pā vṛtra han śaviṣṭha
10116	piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ	pā rai śavas hvā
10116	piba madhvaḥ tṛpat indra ā vṛṣasva	pā madhu tṛp indra vṛṣ
10116	asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasya	idam pā kṣumat prasthā
10116	indra somasya varam ā sutasya	indra soma vara ā su
10116	svastidāḥ manasā mādayasva	svasti dā manas māday
10116	arvācīnaḥ revate saubhagāya	arvācīna revat saubhaga
10116	mamattu tvā divyaḥ somaḥ indra	mad tvad divya soma indra
10116	mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu	mad yad su pārthiva
10116	mamattu yena varivaḥ cakartha	mad yad varivas kṛ
10116	mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn	mad yad nirī śatru
10116	ā dvibarhāḥ aminaḥ yātu indraḥ	ā dvibarhas amina yā indra
10116	vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ	vṛṣan hari pariṣic andhas
10116	gavi ā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ	go ā su prabhṛ madhu
10116	satrā khedām aruśahā ā vṛṣasva	satrā khedā aruśa han vṛṣ
10116	ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyāni	ni tigma bhrāśay bhrāśya
10116	ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnām	ava sthira tan yātu jū
10116	ugrāya te sahaḥ balam dadāmi	ugra tvad sahas bala dā
10116	pratītyā śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca	pratīti śatru vigada vraśc
10116	vi aryaḥ indra tanuhi śravāṁsi	vi ari indra tan śravas
10116	ojaḥ sthirā iva dhanvanaḥ abhimātīḥ	ojas sthira iva dhanvan abhimāti
10116	asmadryak vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhiḥ	asmadryañc vṛdh sahas
10116	anibhṛṣTaḥ tanvam vāvṛdhasva	a nibhraṃś tanū vṛdh
10116	idam haviḥ maghavan tubhyam rātam	idam havis maghavan tvad rā
10116	prati samrāT ahṛṇānaḥ gṛbhāya	prati samrāj a hṛ gṛbhāy
10116	tubhyam sutaḥ maghavan tubhyam pakvaḥ	tvad su maghavan tvad pakva
10116	addhi indra piba ca prasthitasya	ad indra pā ca prasthā
10116	addhi it indra prasthitā imā havīṁṣi	ad id indra prasthā idam havis
10116	canaḥ dadhiṣva pacatā uta somam	canas dhā pacata uta soma
10116	prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā	prayasvat prati hary tvad
10116	satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ	satya as yaj kāma
10116	pra indrāgnibhyām suvacasyām iyarmi	pra indra agni su vacasyā ṛch
10116	sindhau iva pra īrayam nāvam arkaiḥ	sindhu iva preray nau arka
10116	ayāḥ iva pari caranti devāḥ	idam iva pari car deva
10116	ye asmabhyam dhanadāḥ udbhidaḥ ca	yad mad dhana dā udbhid ca
 ---
10117	na vai u devāḥ kṣudham it vadham daduḥ	na vai u deva kṣudh id vadha dā
10117	uta āśitam upa gacchanti mṛtyavaḥ	uta āśay upa gam mṛtyu
10117	uta u rayiḥ pṛṇataḥ na upa dasyati	uta u rayi pṛ na upa das
10117	uta apṛṇan marḍitāram na vindate	uta a pṛ marḍitṛ na vid
10117	yaḥ ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvaḥ	yad ādhra kam pā
10117	annavān san raphitāya upajagmuṣe	annavat as raphita upagam
10117	sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate purā	sthira manas kṛ sev purā
10117	uta u cit sa marḍitāram na vindate	uta u cit tad marḍitṛ na vid
10117	saḥ it bhojaḥ yaḥ gṛhave dadāti	tad id bhoja yad gṛhu dā
10117	annakāmāya carate kṛśāya	anna kāma car kṛśa
10117	aram asmai bhavati yāmahūtau	aram idam bhū yāmahūti
10117	uta aparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam	yāmahūti kṛ sakhi
10117	na sa sakhā yaḥ na dadāti sakhye	na tad sakhi yad na dā sakhi
10117	sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ	sacābhū sac pā
10117	apa asmāt pra iyāt na tat okaḥ asti	apa idam pre na tad oka as
10117	pṛṇantam anyam araṇam cit icchet	pṛ anya araṇa cit iṣ
10117	pṛṇīyāt it nādhamānāya tavyān	pṛ id nādh tavyas
10117	drāghīyāṁsam anu paśyeta panthām	drāghīyas anu paś pathin
10117	ā u hi vartante rathyā iva cakrā	ā u hi vṛt rathya iva cakra
10117	anyamanyam upa tiṣThanta rāyaḥ	anya anya upa sthā rai
10117	mogham annam vindate apracetāḥ	mogha anna vid apracetas
10117	satyam bravīmi vadhaḥ it sa tasya	satya brū vadha id tad tad
10117	na aryamaṇam puṣyati na u sakhāyam	na aryaman puṣ no sakhi
10117	kevalāghaḥ bhavati kevalādī	kevala agha bhū kevala ādin
10117	kṛṣan it phālaḥ āśitam kṛṇoti	kṛṣ id phāla āśay kṛ
10117	yan adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ	i adhvan apa vṛj caritra
10117	vadan brahmā avadataḥ vanīyān	vad brahman a vad vanīyas
10117	pṛṇan āpiḥ apṛṇantam abhi syāt	pṛ āpi a pṛ abhi as
10117	ekapāt bhūyaḥ dvipadaḥ vi cakrame	ekapād bhūyas dvipad vi kram
10117	dvipāt tripādam abhi eti paścāt	dvipād tripād abhi i paścāt
10117	catuṣpāt eti dvipadām abhisvare	catuṣpād i dvipad abhisvara
10117	sampaśyan paṅktīḥ upatiṣThamānaḥ	saṃdṛś paṅkti upasthā
10117	samau cit hastau na samam viviṣTaḥ	sama cit hasta na sama viṣ
10117	sammātarā cit na samam duhāte	saṃmātarṛ cit na sama duh
10117	yamayoḥ cit na samā vīryāṇi	yama cit na sama vīrya
10117	jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ	jñāti cit as na sama pṛ
 ---
10118	agne haṁsi ni atriṇam	agni han ni atrin
10118	dīdyat martyeṣu ā	dīdī martya ā
10118	sve kṣaye śucivrata	sva kṣaya śuci vrata
10118	ut tiṣThasi svāhutaḥ	ud sthā su āhu
10118	ghṛtāni prati modase	ghṛta prati mud
10118	yat tvā srucaḥ samasthiran	yat tvad sruc saṃsthā
10118	saḥ āhutaḥ vi rocate	tad āhu vi ruc
10118	agniḥ īLenyaḥ girā	agni īḍ gir
10118	srucā pratīkam ajyate	sruc pratīka añj
10118	ghṛtena agniḥ sam ajyate	ghṛta agni sam añj
10118	madhupratīkaḥ āhutaḥ	madhu pratīka āhu
10118	rocamānaḥ vibhāvasuḥ	ruc vibhāvasu
10118	jaramāṇaḥ sam idhyase	jṛ sam indh
10118	devebhyaḥ havyavāhana	deva havya vāhana
10118	tam tvā havanta martyāḥ	tad tvad hvā martya
10118	tam martāḥ amartyam	tad marta amartya
10118	ghṛtena agnim saparyata	ghṛta agni sapary
10118	adābhyam gṛhapatim	adābhya gṛhapati
10118	adābhyena śociṣā	adābhya śocis
10118	agne rakṣaḥ tvam daha	agni rakṣas tvad dah
10118	gopāḥ ṛtasya dīdihi	gopā ṛta dīdī
10118	sa tvam agne pratīkena	tad tvad agni pratīka
10118	prati oṣa yātudhānyaḥ	prati uṣ yātudhānī
10118	urukṣayeṣu dīdyat	urukṣaya dīdī
10118	tam tvā gīrbhiḥ urukṣayā	tad tvad gir urukṣaya
10118	havyavāham sam īdhire	havyavāha sam indh
10118	yajiṣTham mānuṣe jane	yajiṣṭha mānuṣa jana
 ---
10119	iti vai iti me manaḥ	iti vai iti mad manas
10119	gām aśvam sanuyām iti	go aśva san iti
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	pra vātāḥ iva dodhataḥ	pra vāta iva ud mad pā
10119	ut mā pītāḥ ayaṁsata	ud mad pā yam
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	ut mā pītāḥ ayaṁsata	ud mad pā yam
10119	ratham aśvāḥ iva āśavaḥ	ratha aśva iva āśu
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	upa mā matiḥ asthita	upa mad mati sthā
10119	vāśrā putram iva priyam	vāśrā putra iva priya
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	aham taṣTā iva vandhuram	mad taṣṭṛ iva vandhura
10119	pari acāmi hṛdā matim	pari hṛd mati
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	nahi me akṣipat cana	nahi mad akṣipat cana
10119	acchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣTayaḥ	chand pañcan kṛṣṭi
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	nahi me rodasī ubhe	nahi mad rodas ubh
10119	anyam pakṣam cana prati	anya pakṣa cana prati
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam	abhi div mahi bhū
10119	abhi imām pṛthivīm mahīm	abhi idam pṛthivī mahī
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	hanta aham pṛthivīm imām	hanta mad pṛthivī idam
10119	ni dadhāni iha vā iha vā	ni dhā iha vā iha vā
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	oṣam it pṛthivīm aham	oṣam id pṛthivī mad
10119	jaṅghanāni iha vā iha vā	jaṅghan iha vā iha vā
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	divi me anyaḥ pakṣaḥ	div mad anya pakṣa
10119	adhaḥ anyam acīkṛṣam	adhas anya kṛṣ
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	aham asmi mahāmahaḥ	mad as mahat maha
10119	abhinabhyam udīṣitaḥ	abhinabhyam udīṣita
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
10119	gṛhaḥ yāmi araṁkṛtaḥ	gṛha yā alaṃkṛ
10119	devebhyaḥ havyavāhanaḥ	deva havya vāhana
10119	kuvit somasya apām iti	kuvid soma pā iti
 ---
10120	tat it āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣTham	tad id as bhuvana jyeṣṭha
10120	yataḥ jajñe ugraḥ tveṣanṛmṇaḥ	yatas jan ugra tveṣa nṛmṇa
10120	sadyaḥ jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn	sadyas jan ni ri śatru
10120	anu yam viśve madanti ūmāḥ	anu yad viśva mad ūma
10120	vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ	vṛdh śavas bhūri ojas
10120	śatruḥ dāsāya bhiyasam dadhāti	śatru dāsa bhiyas dhā
10120	avyanat ca vyanat ca sasni	a vyan ca vyan ca sasni
10120	sam te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu	sam tvad nū prabhṛ mada
10120	tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve	tvad kratu api vṛj viśva
10120	dviḥ yat ete triḥ bhavanti ūmāḥ	dvis yat etad tris bhū ūma
10120	svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam	svādu svādīyas svādu sṛj sam
10120	adaḥ su madhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ	adas su madhu madhu abhi yudh
10120	iti cit hi tvā dhanā jayantam	iti cit hi tvad dhana ji
10120	mademade anumadanti viprāḥ	mada mada anumad vipra
10120	ojīyaḥ dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva	ojīyas dhṛṣṇu sthira ā tan
10120	mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ durevāḥ	mā tvad dabh yātudhāna dureva
10120	tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu	tvad mad śad raṇa
10120	prapaśyantaḥ yudhenyāni bhūri	prapaś yudhenya bhūri
10120	codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ	coday tvad āyudha vacas
10120	sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṁsi	sam tvad śā brahman vayas
10120	stuṣeyyam puruvarpasam ṛbhvam	stuṣeyya puru varpas ṛbhva
10120	inatamam āptyam āptyānām	inatama āptya āptya
10120	ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn	ā dṛ śavas saptan dānu
10120	pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri	pra sah pratimāna bhūri
10120	ni tat dadhiṣe avaram param ca	ni tad dhā avara para ca
10120	yasmin āvitha avasā duroṇe	yad av avas duroṇa
10120	ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū	ā mātṛ sthāpay jigatnu
10120	ataḥ inoṣi karvarā purūṇi	atas i karvara puru
10120	imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ vivakti	idam brahman bṛhaddiva vac
10120	indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ	indra śūṣa agriya svarṣā
10120	mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati svarājaḥ	mah gotra kṣi svarāj
10120	duraḥ ca viśvāḥ avṛṇot apa svāḥ	dvār ca viśva vṛ apa sva
10120	evā mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā	eva mahat bṛhaddiva atharvan
10120	avocat svām tanvam indram eva	vac sva tanū indra eva
10120	svasāraḥ mātaribhvarīḥ ariprāḥ	svasṛ mātaribhvarī aripra
10120	hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca	hi ca śavas vardhay ca
 ---
10121	hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartata agre	hiraṇya garbha sam vṛt agra
10121	bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt	bhūta jan pati eka as
10121	sa dādhāra pṛthivīm dyām uta imām	tad dhṛ pṛthivī div uta idam
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yaḥ ātmadāḥ baladāḥ yasya viśve	yad ātman dā bala dā yad viśva
10121	upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ	upās praśis yad deva
10121	yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ	yad chāyā amṛta yad mṛtyu
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā	yad prāṇ nimiṣ mahitva
10121	ekaḥ it rājā jagataḥ babhūva	eka id rājan jagant bhū
10121	yaḥ īśe asya dvipadaḥ catuṣpadaḥ	yad īś idam dvipad catuṣpada
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yasya ime himavantaḥ mahitvā	yad idam himavant mahitva
10121	yasya samudram rasayā saha āhuḥ	yad samudra rasā saha ah
10121	yasya imāḥ pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū	yad idam pradiś yad bāhu
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yena dyauḥ ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛLhā	yad div ugra pṛthivī ca dṛh
10121	yena svar stabhitam yena nākaḥ	yad sva stambh yad nāka
10121	yaḥ antarikṣe rajasaḥ vimānaḥ	yad antarikṣa rajas vimāna
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yam krandasī avasā tastabhāne	yad krandas avas stambh
10121	abhi aikṣetām manasā rejamāne	abhi īkṣ manas rej
10121	yatra adhi sūraḥ uditaḥ vibhāti	yatra adhi sūra udi vibhā
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	āpaḥ ha yat bṛhatīḥ viśvam āyan	ap ha yat bṛhat viśva i
10121	garbham dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ agnim	garbha dhā janay agni
10121	tataḥ devānām sam avartata asuḥ ekaḥ	tatas deva sam vṛt asu eka
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	yaḥ cit āpaḥ mahinā paryapaśyat	yad cit ap mahi paripaś
10121	dakṣam dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ yajñam	dakṣa dhā janay yajña
10121	yaḥ deveṣu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ āsīt	yad deva adhi deva eka as
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	mā naḥ hiṁsīt janitā yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ	mā mad hiṃs janitṛ yad pṛthivī
10121	yaḥ vā divam satyadharmā jajāna	yad vā div satya dharman jan
10121	yaḥ ca apaḥ candrāḥ bṛhatīḥ jajāna	yad ca ap candra bṛhat jan
10121	kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema	ka deva havis vidh
10121	prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ	prajāpati na tvad etad anya
10121	viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva	viśva jan pari tad bhū
10121	yatkāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu	yad kāma tvad hu tad mad as
10121	vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām	mad as pati rayi
 ---
10122	vasum na citramahasam gṛṇīṣe	vasu na citra mahas gṛ
10122	vāmam śevam atithim adviṣeṇyam	vāma śeva atithi adviṣeṇya
10122	sa rāsate śurudhaḥ viśvadhāyasaḥ	tad rā śurudh viśva dhāyas
10122	agniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ suvīryam	agni hotṛ gṛhapati su vīrya
10122	juṣāṇaḥ agne prati harya me vacaḥ	juṣ agni prati hary mad vacas
10122	viśvāni vidvān vayunāni sukrato	viśva vid vayuna su kratu
10122	ghṛtanirṇik brahmaṇe gātum ā īraya	ghṛta nirṇij brahman gā eray
10122	tava devāḥ ajanayan anu vratam	tvad deva janay anu vrata
10122	sapta dhāmāni pariyan amartyaḥ	saptan dhāman parī amartya
10122	dāśat dāśuṣe sukṛte māmahasva	dāś dāś su kṛt mah
10122	suvīreṇa rayiṇā agne svābhuvā	su vīra rayi agni
10122	yaḥ te ānaT samidhā tam juṣasva	yad tvad naś samidh tad juṣ
10122	yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam	yajña ketu prathama purohita
10122	haviṣmantaḥ īLate sapta vājinam	haviṣmant īḍ saptan vājin
10122	śṛṇvantam agnim ghṛtapṛṣTham ukṣaṇam	śru agni ghṛta pṛṣṭha ukṣan
10122	pṛṇantam devam pṛṇate suvīryam	pṛ deva pṛ su vīrya
10122	tvam dūtaḥ prathamaḥ vareṇyaḥ	tvad dūta prathama vareṇya
10122	sa hūyamānaḥ amṛtāya matsva	tad hu amṛta mad
10122	tvām marjayan marutaḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe	tvad marjay marut dāś gṛha
10122	tvām stomebhiḥ bhṛgavaḥ vi rurucuḥ	tvad stoma bhṛgu vi ruc
10122	iṣam duhan sudughām viśvadhāyasam	iṣ duh sudughā viśva dhāyas
10122	yajñapriye yajamānāya sukrato	yajña priya yajamāna su kratu
10122	agne ghṛtasnuḥ triḥ ṛtāni dīdyat	agni ghṛta snu tris ṛta dīdī
10122	vartiḥ yajñam pariyan sukratūyase	vartis yajña parī sukratūy
10122	tvām it asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣTiṣu	tvad id idam uṣas vyuṣṭi
10122	dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta mānuṣāḥ	dūta kṛ yaj mānuṣa
10122	tvām devāḥ mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhuḥ	tvad deva mahayāyya vṛdh
10122	ājyam agne nimṛjantaḥ adhvare	ājya agni nimṛj adhvara
10122	ni tvā vasiṣThāḥ ahvanta vājinam	ni tvad vasiṣṭha hvā vājin
10122	gṛṇantaḥ agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ	gṛ agni vidatha vedhas
10122	rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhāraya	rāyaspoṣa yajamāna dhāray
10122	yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ	tvad pā svasti sadā mad
 ---
10123	ayam venaḥ codayat pṛśnigarbhāḥ	idam vena coday pṛśni garbha
10123	jyotirjarāyuḥ rajasaḥ vimāne	jyotis jarāyu rajas vimāna
10123	imam apām saṁgame sūryasya	idam ap saṃgama sūrya
10123	śiśum na viprāḥ matibhiḥ rihanti	śiśu na vipra mati rih
10123	samudrāt ūrmim ut iyarti venaḥ	samudra ūrmi ud ṛch vena
10123	nabhojāḥ pṛṣTham haryatasya darśi	nabhas jā pṛṣṭha haryata dṛś
10123	ṛtasya sānau adhi viṣTapi bhrāT	ṛta sānu adhi viṣṭap bhrāj
10123	samānam yonim abhi anūṣata vrāḥ	samāna yoni abhi nū vrā
10123	samānam pūrvīḥ abhi vāvaśānāḥ	samāna pūrva abhi vaś
10123	tiṣThan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīLāḥ	sthā vatsa mātṛ sanīḍa
10123	ṛtasya sānau adhi cakramāṇāḥ	ṛta sānu adhi kram
10123	rihanti madhvaḥ amṛtasya vāṇīḥ	rih madhu amṛta vāṇī
10123	jānantaḥ rūpam akṛpanta viprāḥ	jñā rūpa kṛp vipra
10123	mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya hi gman	mṛga ghoṣa mahiṣa hi gam
10123	ṛtena yantaḥ adhi sindhum asthuḥ	ṛta i adhi sindhu sthā
10123	vidat gandharvaḥ amṛtāni nāma	vid gandharva amṛta nāman
10123	apsarāḥ jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā	apsaras jāra upasmi
10123	yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman	yoṣā bhṛ parama vyoman
10123	carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san	car priya yoni priya as
10123	sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyaye sa venaḥ	sad pakṣa hiraṇyaya tad vena
10123	nāke suparṇam upa yat patantam	nāka suparṇa upa yat pat
10123	hṛdā venantaḥ abhi acakṣata tvā	hṛd ven abhi cakṣ tvad
10123	hiraṇyapakṣam varuṇasya dūtam	hiraṇya pakṣa varuṇa dūta
10123	yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum	yama yoni śakuna bhuraṇyu
10123	ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ adhi nāke asthāt	ūrdhva gandharva adhi nāka sthā
10123	pratyaṅ citrā bibhrat asya āyudhāni	pratyañc citra bhṛ idam āyudha
10123	vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe kam	vas atka surabhi dṛś kaṃ
10123	svar na nāma janata priyāṇi	svar na nāman jan priya
10123	drapsaḥ samudram abhi yat jigāti	drapsa samudra abhi yat gā
10123	paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā vidharman	paś gṛdhra cakṣas vidharman
10123	bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānaḥ	bhānu śukra śocis kan
10123	tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi	tṛtīya kṛ rajas priya
 ---
10124	imam naḥ agne upa yajñam ā ihi	idam mad agni upa yajña e
10124	pañcayāmam trivṛtam saptatantum	pañcan yāma trivṛt saptan tantu
10124	asaḥ havyavāT uta naḥ purogāḥ	as havyavah uta mad purogā
10124	jyok eva dīrgham tamaḥ ā aśayiṣThāḥ	jyok eva dīrgha tamas āśī
10124	adevāt devaḥ pracatā guhā yan	adeva deva pracatā guhā i
10124	prapaśyamānaḥ amṛtatvam emi	prapaś amṛta tva i
10124	śivam yat santam aśivaḥ jahāmi	śiva yat as aśiva hā
10124	svāt sakhyāt araṇīm nābhim emi	sva sakhya araṇa nābhi i
10124	paśyan anyasyāḥ atithim vayāyāḥ	paś anya atithi vayā
10124	ṛtasya dhāma vi mime purūṇi	ṛta dhāman vi mā puru
10124	śaṁsāmi pitre asurāya śevam	śaṃs pitṛ asura śeva
10124	ayajñiyāt yajñiyam bhāgam emi	ayajñiya yajñiya bhāga i
10124	bahvīḥ samāḥ akaram antar asmin	bahu samā kṛ antar idam
10124	indram vṛṇānaḥ pitaram jahāmi	indra vṛ pitṛ hā
10124	agniḥ somaḥ varuṇaḥ te cyavante	agni soma varuṇa tad cyu
10124	paryāvart rāṣTram tat avāmi āyan	tad cyu paryāvṛt rāṣṭra tad av e
10124	nirmāyāḥ u tye asurāḥ abhūvan	nirmāya u tya asura bhū
10124	tvam ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse	tvad ca mad varuṇa kāmay
10124	ṛtena rājan anṛtam viviñcan	ṛta rājan anṛta vivic
10124	mama rāṣTrasya ādhipatyam ā ihi	mad rāṣṭra ādhipatya e
10124	idam svar idam it āsa vāmam	idam svar idam id as vāma
10124	ayam prakāśaḥ uru antarikṣam	idam prakāśa uru antarikṣa
10124	hanāva vṛtram nirehi soma	han vṛtra nire soma
10124	haviḥ tvā santam haviṣā yajāma	havis tvad as havis yaj
10124	kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpam ā asajat	kavi kavi tva div rūpa āsañj
10124	aprabhūtī varuṇaḥ niḥ apaḥ sṛjat	a prabhūti varuṇa niḥ ap sṛj
10124	kṣemam kṛṇvānāḥ janayaḥ na sindhavaḥ	kṣema kṛ jani na sindhu
10124	tāḥ asya varṇam śucayaḥ bharibhrati	tad idam varṇa śuci bharibhṛ
10124	tāḥ asya jyeṣTham indriyam sacante	tad idam jyeṣṭha indriya sac
10124	tāḥ īm ā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ	tad īṃ ā kṣi svadhā mad
10124	tāḥ īm viśaḥ na rājānam vṛṇānāḥ	tad īṃ viś na rājan vṛ
10124	bībhatsuvaḥ apa vṛtrāt atiṣThan	bībhatsu apa vṛtra sthā
10124	bībhatsūnām sayujam haṁsam āhuḥ	bībhatsu sayuj haṃsa ah
10124	apām divyānām sakhye carantam	ap divya sakhya car
10124	anuṣTubham anu carcūryamāṇam	anuṣṭubh anu carcar
10124	indram ni cikyuḥ kavayaḥ manīṣā	indra ni ci kavi manīṣā
 ---
10125	aham rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ carāmi	mad rudra vasu car
10125	aham ādityaiḥ uta viśvadevaiḥ	mad āditya uta viśvadeva
10125	aham mitrāvaruṇā ubhā bibharmi	mad mitrāvaruṇa ubh bhṛ
10125	aham indrāgnī aham aśvinā ubhā	mad indra agni mad aśvin ubh
10125	aham somam āhanasam bibharmi	mad soma āhanas bhṛ
10125	aham tvaṣTāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam	mad tvaṣṭṛ uta pūṣan bhaga
10125	aham dadhāmi draviṇam haviṣmate	mad dhā draviṇa haviṣmat
10125	suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate	haviṣmat suprāvī yajamāna su
10125	aham rāṣTrī saṁgamanī vasūnām	mad rāṣṭrī saṃgamana vasu
10125	cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām	cit prathama yajñiya
10125	tām mā devāḥ vi adadhuḥ purutrā	tad mad deva vi dhā purutrā
10125	bhūristhātrām bhūri āveśayantīm	bhūri sthātra bhūri āveśay
10125	mayā saḥ annam atti yaḥ vipaśyati	mad tad anna ad yad vipaś
10125	yaḥ prāṇiti yaḥ īm śṛṇoti uktam	yad prāṇ yad īṃ śru vac
10125	amantavaḥ mām te upa kṣiyanti	amantu mad tad upa kṣi
10125	śrudhi śruta śraddhivam te vadāmi	śru śruta śraddhiva tvad vad
10125	aham eva svayam idam vadāmi	mad eva svayam idam vad
10125	juṣTam devebhiḥ uta mānuṣebhiḥ	juṣ deva uta mānuṣa
10125	yam kāmaye taṁtam ugram kṛṇomi	yad kāmay tad tad ugra kṛ
10125	tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam sumedhām	tad brahman tad ṛṣi tad su medhā
10125	aham rudrāya dhanuḥ ā tanomi	mad rudra dhanus ā tan
10125	brahmadviṣe śarave hantavai u	brahman dviṣ śaru han u
10125	aham janāya samadam kṛṇomi	mad jana samad kṛ
10125	aham dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa	mad dyāvāpṛthivī ā viś
10125	aham suve pitaram asya mūrdhan	mad sū pitṛ idam mūrdhan
10125	mama yoniḥ apsu antar samudre	mad yoni ap antar samudra
10125	tataḥ vi tiṣThe bhuvanā anu viśvā	tatas vi sthā bhuvana anu viśva
10125	uta amūm dyām varṣmaṇā upa spṛśāmi	uta adas div varṣman upa spṛś
10125	aham eva vātaḥ iva pra vāmi	mad eva vāta iva pra vā
10125	ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā	ārabh bhuvana viśva
10125	paraḥ divā paraḥ enā pṛthivyā	paras div paras idam pṛthivī
10125	etāvatī mahinā sam babhūva	etāvat mahi sam bhū
 ---
10126	na tam aṁhaḥ na duritam	na tad aṃhas na durita
10126	devāsaḥ aṣTa martyam	deva aś martya
10126	sajoṣasaḥ yam aryamā	sajoṣas yad aryaman
10126	mitraḥ nayanti varuṇaḥ	mitra nī varuṇa
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	tat hi vayam vṛṇīmahe	tad hi mad vṛ
10126	varuṇa mitra aryaman	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	yenā niḥ aṁhasaḥ yūyam	yad niḥ aṃhas tvad
10126	pātha nethā ca martyam	pā nī ca martya
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	te nūnam naḥ ayam ūtaye	tad nūnam mad idam ūti
10126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	nayiṣThāḥ u naḥ neṣaṇi	nayiṣṭha u mad nī
10126	parṣiṣThāḥ u naḥ parṣaṇi	parṣiṣṭha u mad pṛ
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	yūyam viśvam pari pātha	tvad viśva pari pā
10126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	yuṣmākam śarmaṇi priye	tvad śarman priya
10126	syāma supraṇītayaḥ	as su praṇīti
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	ādityāsaḥ ati sridhaḥ	āditya ati sridh
10126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	ugram marudbhiḥ rudram huvema	ugra marut rudra hu
10126	indram agnim svastaye	indra agni svasti
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	netāraḥ ū su naḥ tiraḥ	nī u su mad tiras
10126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	ati viśvāni duritā	ati viśva durita
10126	rājānaḥ carṣaṇīnām	rājan carṣaṇi
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	śunam asmabhyam ūtaye	śuna mad ūti
10126	varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā	varuṇa mitra aryaman
10126	śarma yacchantu saprathaḥ	śarman yam saprathas
10126	ādityāsaḥ yat īmahe	āditya yad i
10126	ati dviṣaḥ	ati dviṣ
10126	yathā ha tyat vasavaḥ gauryam cit	yathā ha tya vasu gaurī cit
10126	padi sitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ	pad sā muc yajatra
10126	eva u su asmat muñcatā vi aṁhaḥ	eva u su mad muc vi aṃhas
10126	pra tāri agne prataram naḥ āyuḥ	pra tṛ agni pratara mad āyus
 ---
10127	rātrī vi akhyat āyatī	rātri vi khyā e
10127	purutrā devī akṣabhiḥ	purutrā devī akṣa
10127	viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ adhita	viśva adhi śrī dhā
10127	ā uru aprāḥ amartyā	ā uru prā amartya
10127	nivataḥ devī udvataḥ	nivat devī udvat
10127	jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ	jyotis bādh tamas
10127	niḥ u svasāram askṛta	niḥ u svasṛ kṛ
10127	uṣasam devī āyatī	uṣas devī e
10127	apa it u hāsate tamaḥ	apa id u hā tamas
10127	sā naḥ adya yasyāḥ vayam	tad mad adya yad mad
10127	ni te yāman avikṣmahi	ni tvad yāman viś
10127	vṛkṣe na vasatim vayaḥ	vṛkṣa na vasati vi
10127	ni grāmāsaḥ avikṣata	ni grāma viś
10127	ni padvantaḥ ni pakṣiṇaḥ	ni padvat ni pakṣin
10127	ni śyenāsaḥ cit arthinaḥ	ni śyena cit arthin
10127	yāvayā vṛkyam vṛkam	yāvay vṛkī vṛka
10127	yavaya stenam ūrmye	yavay stena ūrmyā
10127	athā naḥ sutarā bhava	atha mad sutara bhū
10127	upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ	upa mad pepiś tamas
10127	kṛṣṇam vyaktam asthita	kṛṣṇa vyañj sthā
10127	uṣaḥ ṛṇā iva yātaya	uṣas ṛṇa iva yātay
10127	upa te gāḥ iva ā akaram	upa tvad go iva kṛ
10127	vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ	vṛ duhitṛ div
10127	rātri stomam na jigyuṣe	rātri stoma na ji
 ---
10128	mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu	mad agni varcas vihava as
10128	vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema	mad tvad indh tanū puṣ
10128	mahyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ	mad nam pradiś catur
10128	tvayā adhyakṣeṇa pṛtanāḥ jayema	tvad adhyakṣa pṛtanā ji
10128	mama devāḥ vihave santu sarve	mad deva vihava as sarva
10128	indravantaḥ marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ agniḥ	indravat marut viṣṇu agni
10128	mama antarikṣam urulokam astu	mad antarikṣa uru loka as
10128	mahyam vātaḥ pavatām kāme asmin	mad vāta pū kāma idam
10128	mayi devāḥ draviṇam ā yajantām	mad deva draviṇa ā yaj
10128	mayi āśīḥ astu mayi devahūtiḥ	mad āśī as mad deva hūti
10128	daivyāḥ hotāraḥ vanuṣanta pūrve	daivya hotṛ pūrva
10128	ariṣTāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ	ariṣṭa as tanū su vīra
10128	mahyam yajantu mama yāni havyā	mad yaj mad yad havya
10128	ākūtiḥ satyā manasaḥ me astu	ākūti satya manas mad as
10128	enaḥ mā ni gām katamat cana aham	enas mā ni gā katama cana mad
10128	viśve devāsaḥ adhi vocatā naḥ	viśva deva adhi vac mad
10128	devīḥ ṣaT urvīḥ uru naḥ kṛṇota	devī ṣaṣ uru uru mad kṛ
10128	viśve devāsaḥ iha vīrayadhvam	viśva deva iha vīray
10128	mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhiḥ	mā hā prajā mā tanū
10128	mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan	mā radh dviṣ soma rājan
10128	agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām	agni manyu pratinud para
10128	adabdhaḥ gopāḥ pari pāhi naḥ tvam	adabdha gopā pari pā mad tvad
10128	pratyañcaḥ yantu nigutaḥ punar te	pratyañc i nigut punar tad
10128	amā eṣām cittam prabudhām vi neśat	amā idam citta prabudh vi naś
10128	dhātā dhātṛṛṇām bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ	dhātṛ dhātṛ bhuvana yad pati
10128	devam trātāram abhimātiṣāham	deva trātṛ abhimātiṣāh
10128	imam yajñam aśvinā ubhā bṛhaspatiḥ	idam yajña aśvin ubh bṛhaspati
10128	devāḥ pāntu yajamānam nyarthāt	deva pā yajamāna nyartha
10128	uruvyacā naḥ mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṁsat	uru vyacas mad mahiṣa śarman yam
10128	asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ	idam hava puru hvā puru kṣu
10128	sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛLaya	tad mad prajā haryaśva mṛḍay
10128	indra mā naḥ rīriṣaḥ mā parā dāḥ	indra mā mad riṣ mā parā dā
10128	ye naḥ sapatnāḥ apa te bhavantu	yad mad sapatna apa tad bhū
10128	indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān	indra agni ava bādh tad
10128	vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityāḥ uparispṛśam mā	vasu rudra āditya uparispṛś mad
10128	ugram cettāram adhirājam akran	ugra cettṛ adhirāj kṛ
 ---
10129	na asat āsīt na u sat āsīt tadānīm	na asat as na u as as tadānīm
10129	na āsīt rajaḥ na u vyomā paraḥ yat	na as rajas na u vyoman paras yad
10129	kim ā avarīvar kuha kasya śarman	ka āvarvṛt kuha ka śarman
10129	ambhaḥ kim āsīt gahanam gabhīram	ambhas ka as gahana gabhīra
10129	na mṛtyuḥ āsīt amṛtam na tarhi	na mṛtyu as amṛta na tarhi
10129	na rātryāḥ ahnaḥ āsīt praketaḥ	na rātri ahar as praketa
10129	ānīt avātam svadhayā tat ekam	an a vāta svadhā tad eka
10129	tasmāt ha anyat na paraḥ kim cana āsa	tad ha anya na paras ka cana as
10129	tamaḥ āsīt tamasā gūLham agre	tamas as tamas guh agra
10129	apraketam salilam sarvam āḥ idam	a praketa salila sarva as idam
10129	tuchyena ābhu apihitam yat āsīt	tucchya ābhu apidhā yad as
10129	tapasaḥ tat mahinā ajāyata ekam	tapas tad mahi jan eka
10129	kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata adhi	kāma tad agra sam vṛt adhi
10129	manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt	manas retas prathama yad as
10129	sataḥ bandhum asati niḥ avindan	as bandhu asat niḥ vid
10129	hṛdi pratīṣyā kavayaḥ manīṣā	hṛd pratīṣ kavi manīṣā
10129	tiraścīnaḥ vitataḥ raśmiḥ eṣām	tiraścīna vitan raśmi idam
10129	adhaḥ svit āsīt upari svit āsīt	adhas svid as upari svid as
10129	retodhāḥ āsan mahimānaḥ āsan	retas dhā as mahiman as
10129	svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt	svadhā avastāt prayati parastāt
10129	kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat	ka addhā vid ka iha pra vac
10129	kutaḥ ājātā kutaḥ iyam visṛṣTiḥ	kutas ājan kutas idam visṛṣṭi
10129	arvāk devāḥ asya visarjanena	arvāk deva idam visarjana
10129	athā kaḥ veda yataḥ ābabhūva	atha ka vid yatas ābhū
10129	iyam visṛṣTiḥ yataḥ ābabhūva	idam visṛṣṭi yatas ābhū
10129	yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na	yadi vā dhā yadi vā na
10129	yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman	yad idam adhyakṣa parama vyoman
10129	saḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda	tad aṅga vid yadi vā na vid
 ---
10130	yaḥ yajñaḥ viśvataḥ tantubhiḥ tataḥ	yad yajña viśvatas tantu tan
10130	ekaśatam devakarmebhiḥ āyataḥ	eka śata devakarma āyam
10130	ime vayanti pitaraḥ ye āyayuḥ	idam ve pitṛ yad āyā
10130	pra vaya apa vaya iti āsate tate	pra ve apa ve iti ās tan
10130	pumān enam tanute ut kṛṇatti	puṃs enad tan ud kṛt
10130	pumān vi tatne adhi nāke asmin	puṃs vi tan adhi nāka idam
10130	ime mayūkhāḥ upa seduḥ ū sadaḥ	idam mayūkha upa sad u sadas
10130	sāmāni cakruḥ tasarāṇi otave	sāman kṛ tasara ve
10130	kā āsīt pramā pratimā kim nidānam	ka as pramā pratimā ka nidāna
10130	ājyam kim āsīt paridhiḥ kaḥ āsīt	ājya ka as paridhi ka as
10130	chandaḥ kim āsīt praugam kim uktham	chandas ka as prauga ka uktha
10130	yat devāḥ devam ayajanta viśve	yat deva deva yaj viśva
10130	agneḥ gāyatrī abhavat sayugvā	agni gāyatrī bhū sayugvan
10130	uṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva	uṣṇihā savitṛ sam bhū
10130	anuṣTubhā somaḥ ukthaiḥ mahasvān	anuṣṭubh soma uktha mahasvat
10130	bṛhaspateḥ bṛhatī vācam āvat	bṛhaspati bṛhatī vāc av
10130	virāT mitrāvaruṇayoḥ abhiśrīḥ	virāj mitrāvaruṇa abhiśrī
10130	indrasya triṣTup iha bhāgaḥ ahnaḥ	indra triṣṭubh iha bhāga ahar
10130	viśvān devān jagatī ā viveśa	viśva deva jagatī ā viś
10130	tena cākQpre ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ	tena kﾱp ṛṣi manuṣya
10130	cākQpre tena ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ	kﾱp tena ṛṣi manuṣya
10130	yajñe jāte pitaraḥ naḥ purāṇe	yajña jan pitṛ mad purāṇa
10130	paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān	paś man manas cakṣas tad
10130	ye imam yajñam ayajanta pūrve	yad idam yajña yaj pūrva
10130	sahastomāḥ sahacchandasaḥ āvṛtaḥ	saha stoma saha chandas āvṛt
10130	sahapramāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ	saha pramā ṛṣi saptan daivya
10130	pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrāḥ	pūrva pathin anudṛś dhīra
10130	anvālebhire rathyaḥ na raśmīn	anvālabh rathī na raśmi
 ---
10131	apa prācaḥ indra viśvān amitrān	apa prāñc indra viśva amitra
10131	apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva	apa apāñc abhibhūti nud
10131	apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ	apa udañc apa śūra adharāñc
10131	urau yathā tava śarman madema	uru yathā tvad śarman mad
10131	kuvit aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit	kuvid aṅga yavamat yava cit
10131	yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya	yathā dā anupūrva viyu
10131	iheha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni	iha iha idam kṛ bhojana
10131	ye barhiṣaḥ namovṛktim na jagmuḥ	yad barhis namovṛkti na gam
10131	nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yātam asti	nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yā as
10131	na uta śravaḥ vivide saṁgameṣu	na uta śravas vid saṃgama
10131	gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ	gavyat indra sakhya vipra
10131	aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ	aśvāyat vṛṣan vājay
10131	yuvam surāmam aśvinā	tvad surāma aśvin
10131	namucau āsure sacā	namuci āsura sacā
10131	vipipānā śubhaḥ patī	vipā śubh pati
10131	indram karmasu āvatam	indra karman av
10131	putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā	putra iva pitṛ aśvin ubh
10131	indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṁsanābhiḥ	indra av kāvya daṃsanā
10131	yat surāmam vi apibaḥ śacībhiḥ	yat surāma vi pā śacī
10131	sarasvatī tvā maghavan abhiṣṇak	sarasvatī tvad maghavan bhiṣaj
10131	indraḥ sutrāmā svavān avobhiḥ	indra sutrāman svavat avas
10131	sumṛLīkaḥ bhavatu viśvavedāḥ	su mṛḍīka bhū viśva vedas
10131	bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam kṛṇotu	bādh dveṣas abhaya kṛ
10131	suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma	su vīrya pati as
10131	tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya	tad mad sumati yajñiya
10131	api bhadre saumanase syāma	api bhadra saumanasa as
10131	sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asme	tad sutrāman svavat indra mad
10131	ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu	ārāt cit dveṣas sanutar yu
 ---
10132	ījānam it dyauḥ gūrtāvasuḥ	yaj id div gūrtāvasu
10132	ījānam bhūmiḥ abhi prabhūṣaṇi	yaj bhūmi abhi prabhū
10132	ījānam devau aśvinau	yaj deva aśvin
10132	abhi sumnaiḥ avardhatām	abhi sumna vṛdh
10132	tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī	tad tvad mitrāvaruṇa dhāray kṣiti
10132	suṣumnā iṣitatvatā yajāmasi	suṣumna iṣitatvatā yaj
10132	yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyaiḥ	tvad kṛ sakhya
10132	abhi syāma rakṣasaḥ	abhi as rakṣas
10132	adhā cit nu yat didhiṣāmahe vām	adha cit nu yat didhiṣ tvad
10132	abhi priyam rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ	abhi priya rekṇas pat
10132	dadvān vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ	vā yat puṣ rekṇas
10132	sam u āran nakiḥ asya maghāni	sam nakir idam magha
10132	asau anyaḥ asura sūyata dyauḥ	adas anya asura div
10132	tvam viśveṣām varuṇa asi rājā	tvad viśva varuṇa as rājan
10132	mūrdhā rathasya cākan	mūrdhan ratha kan
10132	na etāvatā enasā antakadhruk	na etāvat enas antakadruh
10132	asmin su etat śakapūte enaḥ	idam su etad śakapūta enas
10132	hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān	dhā mitra nigam han vīra
10132	avoḥ vā yat dhāt tanūṣu	vā yat dhā tanū
10132	avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsu arvā	avas priya yajñiya arvan
10132	yuvoḥ hi mātā aditiḥ vicetasā	tvad hi mātṛ aditi vicetas
10132	dyauḥ na bhūmiḥ payasā pupūtani	div na bhūmi payas pū
10132	ava priyā didiṣTana	ava priya diś
10132	sūraḥ ninikta raśmibhiḥ	sūra nij raśmi
10132	yuvam hi apnarājau asīdatam	tvad hi apnarāj sad
10132	tiṣThat ratham na dhūrṣadam vanarṣadam	sthā ratha na dhūrṣad vanarṣad
10132	tāḥ naḥ kaṇūkayantīḥ	tad mad kaṇūkay
10132	nṛmedhaḥ tatre aṁhasaḥ	nṛmedha tṛ aṃhas
10132	sumedhaḥ tatre aṁhasaḥ	sumedha tṛ aṃhas
 ---
10133	pra u su asmai puroratham	pra u su idam puroratha
10133	indrāya śūṣam arcata	indra śūṣa arc
10133	abhīke cit ulokakṛt	abhīka cit u loka kṛt
10133	saṁge samatsu vṛtrahā	saṃga samad vṛtrahan
10133	asmākam bodhi coditā	mad bhū coditṛ
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	tvam sindhūn ava asṛjaḥ	tvad sindhu avasṛj
10133	adharācaḥ ahan ahim	adharāñc han ahi
10133	aśatruḥ indra jajñiṣe	aśatru indra jan
10133	viśvam puṣyasi vāryam	viśva puṣ vārya
10133	tam tvā pari svajāmahe	tad tvad pari svaj
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	vi su viśvāḥ arātayaḥ	vi su viśva arāti
10133	aryaḥ naśanta naḥ dhiyaḥ	ari naś mad dhī
10133	astā asi śatrave vadham	as śatru vadha
10133	yaḥ naḥ indra jighāṁsati	yad mad indra jighāṃs
10133	yā te rātiḥ dadiḥ vasu	yad tvad rāti dadi vasu
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	yaḥ naḥ indra abhitaḥ janaḥ	yad mad indra abhitas jana
10133	vṛkāyuḥ ādideśati	vṛkāyu ādiś
10133	adhaspadam tam īm kṛdhi	adhaspada tad īṃ kṛ
10133	vibādhaḥ asi sāsahiḥ	vibādha as sāsahi
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	yaḥ naḥ indra abhidāsati	yad mad indra abhidās
10133	sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣTyaḥ	sanābhi yad ca niṣṭya
10133	ava tasya balam tira	ava tad bala tṛ
10133	mahī iva dyauḥ adha tmanā	mah iva div adha tman
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	vayam indra tvāyavaḥ	mad indra tvāyu
10133	sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe	sakhitva ā rabh
10133	ṛtasya naḥ pathā naya	ṛta mad pathin nī
10133	ati viśvāni duritā	ati viśva durita
10133	nabhantām anyakeṣām	nabh anyaka
10133	jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu	jyākā adhi dhanvan
10133	asmabhyam su tvam indra tām śikṣa	mad su tvad indra tad śikṣ
10133	yā dohate prati varam jaritre	yad duh prati vara jaritṛ
10133	acchidrodhnī pīpayat yathā naḥ	acchidra udhan pyā yathā mad
10133	sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ	sahasra dhārā payas mah go
 ---
10134	ubhe yat indra rodasī	ubh yat indra rodas
10134	āpaprātha uṣāḥ iva	āprā uṣas iva
10134	mahāntam tvā mahīnām	mahat tvad mahi
10134	samrājam carṣaṇīnām	samrāj carṣaṇi
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	ava sma durhaṇāyataḥ	ava sma durhaṇāy
10134	martasya tanuhi sthiram	marta tan sthira
10134	adhaspadam tam īm kṛdhi	adhaspada tad īṃ kṛ
10134	yaḥ asmān ādideśati	yad mad ādiś
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	ava tyāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ	ava tya bṛhat iṣ
10134	viśvaścandrāḥ amitrahan	viśvaścandra amitra han
10134	śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhi	śacī śakra dhū
10134	indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	indra viśva ūti
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	ava yat tvam śatakrato	ava yat tvad śatakratu
10134	indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe	indra viśva dhū
10134	rayim na sunvate sacā	rayi na su sacā
10134	sahasriṇībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ	sahasrin ūti
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	ava svedāḥ iva abhitaḥ	ava sveda iva abhitas
10134	viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ	viṣvañc pat didyu
10134	dūrvāyāḥ iva tantavaḥ	dūrvā iva tantu
10134	vi asmat etu durmatiḥ	vi mad i durmati
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	dīrgham hi aṅkuśam yathā	dīrgha hi aṅkuśa yathā
10134	śaktim bibharṣi mantumaḥ	śakti bhṛ mantumat
10134	pūrveṇa maghavan padā	pūrva maghavan pad
10134	ajaḥ vayām yathā yamaḥ	aja vayā yathā yam
10134	devī janitrī ajījanat	devī janitrī jan
10134	bhadrā janitrī ajījanat	bhadra janitrī jan
10134	nakiḥ devāḥ minīmasi	nakir deva mī
10134	nakiḥ ā yopayāmasi	nakir ā yopay
10134	mantraśrutyam carāmasi	mantraśrutya car
10134	pakṣebhiḥ apikakṣebhiḥ	pakṣa apikakṣa
10134	atra abhi sam rabhāmahe	atra abhi sam rabh
 ---
10135	yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe	yad vṛkṣa su palāśa
10135	devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ	deva sampā yama
10135	atrā naḥ viśpatiḥ pitā	atra mad viśpati pitṛ
10135	purāṇān anu venati	purāṇa anu ven
10135	purāṇān anuvenantam	purāṇa anuven
10135	carantam pāpayā amuyā	car pāpa adas
10135	asūyan abhi acākaśam	asūy abhi cākaś
10135	tasmai aspṛhayam punar	tad spṛhay punar
10135	yam kumāra navam ratham	yad kumāra nava ratha
10135	acakram manasā akṛṇoḥ	acakra manas kṛ
10135	ekeṣam viśvataḥ prāñcam	ekeṣa viśvatas prāñc
10135	apaśyan adhi tiṣThasi	apaśyat adhi sthā
10135	yam kumāra pra avartayaḥ	yad kumāra pravartay
10135	ratham viprebhyaḥ pari	ratha vipra pari
10135	tam sāma anu pra avartata	tad sāman anu pravṛt
10135	sam itaḥ nāvi āhitam	sam itas nau ādhā
10135	kaḥ kumāram ajanayat	ka kumāra janay
10135	ratham kaḥ niḥ avartayat	ratha ka niḥ vartay
10135	kaḥ svit tat adya naḥ brūyāt	ka svid tad adya mad brū
10135	anudeyī yathā abhavat	anudeyī yathā bhū
10135	yathā abhavat anudeyī	yathā bhū anudeyī
10135	tataḥ agram ajāyata	tatas agra jan
10135	purastāt budhnaḥ ātataḥ	purastāt budhna ātan
10135	paścāt nirayaṇam kṛtam	paścāt nirayaṇa kṛ
10135	idam yamasya sādanam	idam yama sādana
10135	devamānam yat ucyate	deva māna yad vac
10135	iyam asya dhamyate nāLīḥ	idam idam dham nāḍī
10135	ayam gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ	idam gir pariṣkṛ
 ---
10136	keśī agnim keśī viṣam	keśin agni keśin viṣa
10136	keśī bibharti rodasī	keśin bhṛ rodasī
10136	keśī viśvam svar dṛśe	keśin viśva svar dṛś
10136	keśī idam jyotiḥ ucyate	keśin idam jyotis vac
10136	munayaḥ vātaraśanāḥ	muni vāta raśanā
10136	piśaṅgā vasate malā	piśaṅga vas mala
10136	vātasya anu dhrājim yanti	vāta anu dhrāji i
10136	yat devāsaḥ avikṣata	yat deva viś
10136	unmaditāḥ mauneyena	unmaday mauneya
10136	vātān ā tasthimā vayam	vāta ā sthā mad
10136	śarīrā it asmākam yūyam	śarīra id mad tvad
10136	martāsaḥ abhi paśyatha	marta abhi paś
10136	antarikṣeṇa patati	antarikṣa pat
10136	viśvā rūpā avacākaśat	viśva rūpa avacākaś
10136	muniḥ devasyadevasya	muni deva deva
10136	saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ	saukṛtya sakhi dhā
10136	vātasya aśvaḥ vāyoḥ sakhā	vāta aśva vāyu sakhi
10136	atha u deveṣitaḥ muniḥ	atho deva iṣ muni
10136	ubhau samudrau ā kṣeti	ubh samudra ā kṣi
10136	yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ uta aparaḥ	yad ca pūrva uta apara
10136	apsarasām gandharvāṇām	apsaras gandharva
10136	mṛgāṇām caraṇe caran	mṛga caraṇa car
10136	keśī ketasya vidvān	keśin keta vid
10136	sakhā svāduḥ madintamaḥ	sakhi svādu madintama
10136	vāyuḥ asmai upa amanthat	vāyu idam upamath
10136	pinaṣTi smā kunannamā	piṣ sma kunannama
10136	keśī viṣasya pātreṇa	keśin viṣa pātra
10136	yat rudreṇa apibat saha	yat rudra pā saha
 ---
10137	uta devāḥ avahitam	uta deva avadhā
10137	devāḥ ut nayathā punar	deva ud nī punar
10137	uta āgaḥ cakruṣam devāḥ	uta āgas kṛ deva
10137	devāḥ jīvayathā punar	deva jīvay punar
10137	dvau imau vātau vātaḥ	dvi idam vāta vā
10137	ā sindhoḥ ā parāvataḥ	ā sindhu ā parāvat
10137	dakṣam te anyaḥ ā vātu	dakṣa tvad anya as vā
10137	parā anyaḥ vātu yat rapaḥ	parā anya vā yad rapas
10137	ā vāta vāhi bheṣajam	ā vāta vā bheṣaja
10137	vi vāta vāhi yat rapaḥ	vi vāta vā yad rapas
10137	tvam hi viśvabheṣajaḥ	tvad hi viśva bheṣaja
10137	devānām dūtaḥ īyase	deva dūta i
10137	ā tvā agamam śaṁtātibhiḥ	ā tvad gam śaṃtāti
10137	atha u ariṣTatātibhiḥ	atho ariṣṭatāti
10137	dakṣam te bhadram ā abhārṣam	dakṣa tvad bhadra ābhṛ
10137	parā yakṣmam suvāmi te	parā yakṣma sū tvad
10137	trāyantām iha devāḥ	trā iha deva
10137	trāyatām marutām gaṇaḥ	trā marut gaṇa
10137	trāyantām viśvā bhūtāni	trā viśva bhūta
10137	yathā ayam arapāḥ asat	yathā idam arapas as
10137	āpaḥ it vai u bheṣajīḥ	ap id vai u bheṣaja
10137	āpaḥ amīvacātanīḥ	ap amīva cātana
10137	āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīḥ	ap sarva bheṣaja
10137	tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam	tad tvad kṛ bheṣaja
10137	hastābhyām daśaśākhābhyām	hasta daśan śākhā
10137	jihvā vācaḥ purogavī	jihvā vāc purogavī
10137	anāmayitnubhyām tvā	anāmayitnu tvad
10137	tābhyām tvā upa spṛśāmasi	tad tvad upa spṛś
 ---
10138	tava tye indra sakhyeṣu vahnayaḥ	tvad tya indra sakhya vahni
10138	ṛtam manvānāḥ vi adardiruḥ valam	ṛta man vi dardar vala
10138	yatrā daśasyan uṣasaḥ riṇan apaḥ	yatra daśasy uṣas ri ap
10138	kutsāya manman ahyaḥ ca daṁsayaḥ	kutsa manman hi ca daṃsay
10138	ava asṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayaḥ girīn	avasṛj prasū śvañcay giri
10138	ut ājaḥ usrāḥ apibaḥ madhu priyam	ud aj usrā pā madhu priya
10138	avardhayaḥ vaninaḥ asya daṁsasā	vardhay vanin idam daṃsas
10138	śuśoca sūryaḥ ṛtajātayā girā	śuc sūrya ṛta jan gir
10138	vi sūryaḥ madhye amucat ratham divaḥ	vi sūrya madhya muc ratha div
10138	vidat dāsāya pratimānam āryaḥ	vid dāsa pratimāna ārya
10138	dṛLhāni piproḥ asurasya māyinaḥ	dṛḍha pipru asura māyin
10138	indraḥ vi āsyat cakṛvān ṛjiśvanā	indra vi as kṛ ṛjiśvan
10138	anādhṛṣTāni dhṛṣitaḥ vi āsyat	anādhṛṣṭa dhṛṣ vi as
10138	nidhīn adevān amṛṇat ayāsyaḥ	nidhi adeva mṛ ayāsya
10138	māsā iva sūryaḥ vasu puryam ā dade	mās iva sūrya vasu purya ā dā
10138	gṛṇānaḥ śatrūn aśṛṇāt virukmatā	gṛ śatru śṛ virukmant
10138	ayuddhasenaḥ vibhvā vibhindatā	a yudh senā vibhu vibhid
10138	dāśat vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate	dāś vṛtrahan tujya tij
10138	indrasya vajrāt abibhet abhiśnathaḥ	indra vajra bhī abhiśnath
10138	pra akrāmat śundhyuḥ ajahāt uṣāḥ anaḥ	prakram śundhyu hā uṣas anas
10138	etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā	etad tya tvad śrutya kevala
10138	yat ekaḥ ekam akṛṇoḥ ayajñam	yat eka eka kṛ a yajña
10138	māsām vidhānam adadhāḥ adhi dyavi	mās vidhāna dhā adhi div
10138	tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā	tvad vibhid bhṛ pradhi pitṛ
 ---
10139	sūryaraśmiḥ harikeśaḥ purastāt	sūrya raśmi hari keśa purastāt
10139	savitā jyotiḥ ut ayān ajasram	savitṛ jyotis ud yam ajasra
10139	tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān	tad pūṣan prasava yā vid
10139	sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ	saṃpaś viśva bhuvana gopā
10139	nṛcakṣāḥ eṣa divaḥ madhye āste	nṛ cakṣas etad div madhya ās
10139	āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam	āprā rodas antarikṣa
10139	sa viśvācīḥ abhi caṣTe ghṛtācīḥ	tad viśvāñc abhi cakṣ ghṛtāñc
10139	antarā pūrvam aparam ca ketum	antarā pūrva apara ca ketu
10139	rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṁgamanaḥ vasūnām	rai budhna saṃgamana vasu
10139	viśvā rūpā abhi caṣTe śacībhiḥ	viśva rūpa abhi cakṣ śacī
10139	devaḥ iva savitā satyadharmā	deva iva savitṛ satya dharman
10139	indraḥ na tasthau samare dhanānām	indra na sthā samara dhana
10139	viśvāvasum soma gandharvam āpaḥ	viśvāvasu soma gandharva ap
10139	dadṛśuṣīḥ tat ṛtenā vi āyan	dṛś tad ṛta vi i
10139	tat anvavait indraḥ rārahāṇaḥ āsām	tad anvave indra raṃh idam
10139	pari sūryasya paridhīn apaśyat	pari sūrya paridhi paś
10139	viśvāvasuḥ abhi tat naḥ gṛṇātu	viśvāvasu abhi tad mad gṛ
10139	divyaḥ gandharvaḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ	divya gandharva rajas vimāna
10139	yat vā ghā satyam uta yat na vidma	yat vā gha satya uta yat na vid
10139	dhiyaḥ hinvānaḥ dhiyaḥ it naḥ avyāḥ	dhī hi dhī id mad av
10139	sasnim avindat caraṇe nadīnām	sasni vid caraṇa nadī
10139	apa avṛṇot duraḥ aśmavrajānām	apāvṛ dvār aśman vraja
10139	pra āsām gandharvaḥ amṛtāni vocat	pra idam gandharva amṛta vac
10139	indraḥ dakṣam pari jānāt ahīnām	indra dakṣa pari jñā ahi
 ---
10140	agne tava śravaḥ vayaḥ	agni tvad śravas vayas
10140	mahi bhrājante arcayaḥ vibhāvaso	mahi bhrāj arci vibhāvasu
10140	bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyam	bṛhadbhānu śavas vāja ukthya
10140	dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave	dhā dāś kavi
10140	pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcāḥ	pāvaka varcas śukra varcas
10140	anūnavarcāḥ ut iyarṣi bhānunā	anūna varcas ud ṛch bhānu
10140	putraḥ mātarā vicaran upa avasi	putra mātṛ vicar upa av
10140	pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe	pṛc rodas ubh
10140	ūrjaḥ napāt jātavedaḥ suśastibhiḥ	ūrj napāt jātavedas su śasti
10140	mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ	mand dhīti hi
10140	tve iṣaḥ sam dadhuḥ bhūrivarpasaḥ	tvad iṣ sam bhūri varpas
10140	citrotayaḥ vāmajātāḥ	citra ūti vāma jan
10140	irajyan agne prathayasva jantubhiḥ	irajy agni prathay jantu
10140	asme rāyaḥ amartya	mad rai amartya
10140	sa darśatasya vapuṣaḥ vi rājasi	tad darśata vapus vi rāj
10140	pṛṇakṣi sānasim kratum	pṛc sānasi kratu
10140	iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasam	iṣkartṛ adhvara pracetas
10140	kṣayantam rādhasaḥ mahaḥ	kṣi rādhas mah
10140	rātim vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣam	rāti vāma subhaga mah iṣ
10140	dadhāsi sānasim rayim	dhā sānasi rayi
10140	ṛtāvānam mahiṣam viśvadarśatam	ṛtāvan mahiṣa viśva darśata
10140	agnim sumnāya dadhire puraḥ janāḥ	agni sumna dhā puras jana
10140	śrutkarṇam saprathastamam tvā girā	śrut karṇa saprathastama tvad giri
10140	daivyam mānuṣā yugā	daivya mānuṣa yuga
 ---
10141	agne acchā vada iha naḥ	agni acchā vad iha mad
10141	pratyaṅ naḥ sumanāḥ bhava	pratyañc mad su manas bhū
10141	pra naḥ yaccha viśaḥ pate	pra mad yam viś pati
10141	dhanadāḥ asi naḥ tvam	dhana dā as mad tvad
10141	pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā	pra mad yam aryaman
10141	pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ	pra bhaga pra bṛhaspati
10141	pra devāḥ pra uta sūnṛtā	pra deva pra uta sūnṛtā
10141	rāyaḥ devī dadātu naḥ	rai devī dā mad
10141	somam rājānam avase	soma rājan av
10141	agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe	agni gir hvā
10141	ādityān viṣṇum sūryam	āditya viṣṇu sūrya
10141	brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim	brahman ca bṛhaspati
10141	indravāyū bṛhaspatim	indra vāyu bṛhaspati
10141	suhavā iha havāmahe	su hava iha hvā
10141	yathā naḥ sarvaḥ it janaḥ	yathā mad sarva id jana
10141	saṁgatyām sumanāḥ asat	saṃgati su manas as
10141	aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim	aryaman bṛhaspati
10141	indram dānāya codaya	indra dāna coday
10141	vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm	vāta viṣṇu sarasvatī
10141	savitāram ca vājinam	savitṛ ca vājin
10141	tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ	tvad mad agni agni
10141	brahma yajñam ca vardhaya	brahman yajña ca vardhay
10141	tvam naḥ devatātaye	tvad mad devatāti
10141	rāyaḥ dānāya codaya	rai dāna coday
 ---
10142	ayam agne jaritā tve abhūt api	idam agni jaritṛ tvad bhū api
10142	sahasaḥ sūno nahi anyat asti āpyam	sahas sūnu nahi anya as āpya
10142	bhadram hi śarma trivarūtham asti te	bhadra hi śarman tri varūtha as tvad
10142	āre hiṁsānām apa didyum ā kṛdhi	āre hiṃsa apa didyu ā kṛ
10142	pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ	pravat tvad agni janiman pitūy
10142	sācī iva viśvā bhuvanā ni ṛñjase	sāci iva viśva bhuvana ni ṛj
10142	pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ	pra sapti pra san mad dhī
10142	puraḥ caranti paśupāḥ iva tmanā	puras car paśupa iva tman
10142	uta vai u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsat	uta vā u pari vṛj bhas
10142	bahoḥ agne ulapasya svadhāvaḥ	bahu agni ulapa svadhāvat
10142	uta khilyāḥ urvarāṇām bhavanti	uta khilya urvarā bhū
10142	mā te hetim taviṣīm cukrudhāma	mā tvad heti taviṣī krudh
10142	yat udvataḥ nivataḥ yāsi bapsat	yat udvat nivat yā bhas
10142	pṛthak eṣi pragardhinī iva senā	pṛthak i pragardhin iva senā
10142	yadā te vātaḥ anuvāti śociḥ	yadā tvad vāta anuvā śocis
10142	vaptā iva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma	vaptṛ iva śmaśru vap pra bhūman
10142	prati asya śreṇayaḥ dadṛśre	prati idam śreṇi dṛś
10142	ekam niyānam bahavaḥ rathāsaḥ	eka niyāna bahu ratha
10142	bāhū yat agne anumarmṛjānaḥ	bāhu yat agni anumarmṛj
10142	nyaṅ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim	uttāna anvi bhūmi
10142	ut te śuṣmāḥ jihatām ut te arciḥ	ud tvad śuṣma hā ud tvad arcis
10142	ut te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ	ud tvad agni śam vāja
10142	ut śvañcasva ni nama vardhamānaḥ	ucchvañc ni nam vṛdh
10142	ā tvā adya viśve vasavaḥ sadantu	ā tvad adya viśva vasu sad
10142	apām idam nyayanam	ap idam nyayana
10142	samudrasya niveśanam	samudra niveśana
10142	anyam kṛṇuṣva itaḥ panthām	anya kṛ itas pathin
10142	tena yāhi vaśān anu	tad yā vaśa anu
10142	āyane te parāyaṇe	āyana tvad parāyaṇa
10142	dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ	dūrvā ruh puṣpin
10142	hradāḥ ca puṇḍarīkāṇi	hrada ca puṇḍarīka
10142	samudrasya gṛhāḥ ime	samudra gṛha idam
 ---
10143	tyam cit atrim ṛtajuram	tya cit atri ṛta jur
10143	artham aśvam na yātave	artha aśva na yā
10143	kakṣīvantam yadī punar	kakṣīvant yadi punar
10143	ratham na kṛṇuthaḥ navam	ratha na kṛ nava
10143	tyam cit aśvam na vājinam	tya cit aśva na vājin
10143	areṇavaḥ yam atnata	areṇu yad tan
10143	dṛLham granthim na vi syatam	dṛḍha granthi na vi sā
10143	atrim yaviṣTham ā rajaḥ	atri yaviṣṭha ā rajas
10143	narā daṁsiṣThau atraye	nara daṃsiṣṭha atri
10143	śubhrā siṣāsatam dhiyaḥ	śubhra siṣās dhī
10143	athā hi vām divaḥ narā	atha hi tvad div nara
10143	punar stomaḥ na viśase	punar stoma na
10143	cite tat vām surādhasā	cit tad tvad su rādhas
10143	rātiḥ sumatiḥ aśvinā	rāti sumati aśvin
10143	ā yat naḥ sadane pṛthau	ā yat mad sadana pṛthu
10143	samane parṣathaḥ narā	samana pṛ nara
10143	yuvam bhujyum samudre ā	tvad bhujyu samudra ā
10143	rajasaḥ pāre īṅkhitam	rajas pāra īṅkhay
10143	yātam acchā patatribhiḥ	yā acchā patatrin
10143	nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam	nāsatya sāti kṛ
10143	ā vām sumnaiḥ śaṁyū iva	ā tvad sumna śaṃyu iva
10143	maṁhiṣThā viśvavedasā	maṃhiṣṭha viśva vedas
10143	sam asme bhūṣatam narā	sam mad bhūṣ nara
10143	utsam na pipyuṣīḥ iṣaḥ	utsa na pyā iṣ
 ---
10144	ayam hi te amartyaḥ	idam hi tvad amartya
10144	induḥ atyaḥ na patyate	indu atya na paty
10144	dakṣaḥ viśvāyuḥ vedhase	dakṣa viśva āyus vedhas
10144	ayam asmāsu kāvyaḥ	idam mad kāvya
10144	ṛbhuḥ vajraḥ dāsvate	ṛbhu vajra dāsvat
10144	ayam bibharti ūrdhvakṛśanam madam	idam bhṛ ūrdhva kṛśana mada
10144	ṛbhuḥ na kṛtvyam madam	ṛbhu na kṛtvya mada
10144	ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvane	ghṛṣu śyena kṛtvan
10144	āsu svāsu vaṁsagaḥ	idam sva vaṃsaga
10144	ava dīdhet ahīśuvaḥ	ava dhī ahīśuva
10144	yam suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ	yad suparṇa parāvat
10144	śyenasya putraḥ ā abharat	śyena putra ābhṛ
10144	śatacakram yaḥ ahyaḥ vartaniḥ	śata cakra yad vartani
10144	yam te śyenaḥ cārum avṛkam padā ā abharat	yad tvad śyena cāru avṛka pad bhṛ
10144	aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ	aruṇa māna andhas
10144	enā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ jīvase	idam vayas vi tṛ āyus jīv
10144	enā jāgāra bandhutā	idam jāgṛ bandhu tā
10144	evā tat indraḥ indunā	eva tad indra indu
10144	deveṣu cit dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ	deva cit dhāray mahi tyajas
10144	kratvā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ sukrato	kratu vayas vi tṛ āyus su kratu
10144	kratvā ayam asmat ā sutaḥ	kratu idam mad su
 ---
10145	imām khanāmi oṣadhim	idam khan oṣadhi
10145	vīrudham balavattamām	vīrudh balavattama
10145	yayā sapatnīm bādhate	yad sapatnī bādh
10145	yayā saṁvindate patim	yad saṃvid pati
10145	uttānaparṇe subhage	uttāna parṇa subhaga
10145	devajūte sahasvati	deva jū sahasvat
10145	sapatnīm me parā dhama	sapatnī mad parā dham
10145	patim me kevalam kuru	pati mad kevala kṛ
10145	uttarā aham uttare	uttara mad uttara
10145	uttarā it uttarābhyaḥ	uttara id uttara
10145	athā sapatnī yā mama	atha sapatnī yad mad
10145	adharā sā adharābhyaḥ	adhara tad adhara
10145	nahi asyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi	nahi idam nāman grah
10145	na u asmin ramate jane	na u idam ram jana
10145	parām eva parāvatam	para eva parāvat
10145	sapatnīm gamayāmasi	sapatnī gamay
10145	aham asmi sahamānā	mad as sah
10145	atha tvam asi sāsahiḥ	atha tvad as sāsahi
10145	ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī	ubh sahasvat bhū
10145	sapatnīm me sahāvahai	sapatnī mad sah
10145	upa te adhām sahamānām	upa tvad dhā sahamānā
10145	abhi tvā adhām sahīyasā	abhi tvad dhā sahīyas
10145	mām anu pra te manaḥ	mad anu pra tvad manas
10145	vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu	vatsa go iva dhāv
10145	pathā vār iva dhāvatu	pathin vār iva dhāv
 ---
10146	araṇyāni araṇyāni	araṇyānī araṇyānī
10146	asau yā pra iva naśyasi	adas yad pra iva naś
10146	kathā grāmam na pṛcchasi	kathā grāma na pracch
10146	na tvā bhīḥ iva vindati	na tvad bhī iva vid
10146	vṛṣāravāya vadate	vṛṣārava vad
10146	yat upāvati ciccikaḥ	yat upa av ciccika
10146	āghāTibhiḥ iva dhāvayan	āghāṭi iva dhāvay
10146	araṇyāniḥ mahīyate	araṇyāni mahīy
10146	uta gāvaḥ iva adanti	uta go iva ad
10146	uta veśma iva dṛśyate	uta veśman iva dṛś
10146	uta u araṇyāniḥ sāyam	uta u araṇyāni sāyam
10146	śakaTīḥ iva sarjati	śakaṭī iva sarj
10146	gām aṅga eṣaḥ ā hvayati	go aṅga etad ā hvā
10146	dāru aṅga eṣaḥ apa avadhīt	dāru aṅga etad apavadh
10146	vasan araṇyānyām sāyam	vas araṇyānī sāyam
10146	akrukṣat iti manyate	kruś iti man
10146	na vai araṇyāniḥ hanti	na vā araṇyāni han
10146	anyaḥ ca it na abhigacchati	anya ced na abhigam
10146	svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya	svādu phala jakṣ
10146	yathākāmam ni padyate	yathākāma ni pad
10146	āñjanagandhim surabhim	āñjana gandhi surabhi
10146	bahvannām akṛṣīvalām	bahu anna a kṛṣīvala
10146	pra aham mṛgāṇām mātaram	pra mad mṛga mātṛ
10146	araṇyānim aśaṁsiṣam	araṇyāni śaṃs
 ---
10147	śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave	śrath tvad dhā prathama manyu
10147	ahan yat vṛtram naryam viveḥ apaḥ	han yat vṛtra narya viṣ apas
10147	ubhe yat tvā bhavataḥ rodasī anu	ubh yat tvad bhū rodas anu
10147	rejate śuṣmāt pṛthivī cit adrivaḥ	rej śuṣma pṛthivī cit adrivat
10147	tvam māyābhiḥ anavadya māyinam	tvad māyā anavadya māyin
10147	śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ	śravasy manas vṛtra arday
10147	tvām it naraḥ vṛṇate gaviṣTiṣu	tvad id nṛ vṛ gaviṣṭi
10147	tvām viśvāsu havyāsu iṣTiṣu	tvad viśva hu iṣṭi
10147	ā eṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu	ā idam kan puruhūta sūri
10147	vṛdhāsaḥ ye maghavan ānaśuḥ magham	vṛdha yad maghavan aś magha
10147	arcanti toke tanaye pariṣTiṣu	arc toka tanaya pariṣṭi
10147	medhasātā vājinam ahraye dhane	medhasāti vājin ahraya dhana
10147	saḥ it nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanat	tad id nu rai su bhṛ kan
10147	madam yaḥ asya raṁhyam ciketati	mada yad idam raṃh cit
10147	tvāvṛdhaḥ maghavan dāśvadhvaraḥ	tvāvṛdha maghavan dāśu adhvara
10147	makṣū sa vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ	makṣū tad vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ
10147	tvam śardhāya mahinā gṛṇānaḥ	tvad śardha mahina gṛ
10147	uru kṛdhi maghavan śagdhi rāyaḥ	uru kṛ maghavan śak rai
10147	tvam naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ na māyī	tvad mad mitra varuṇa na māyin
10147	pitvaḥ na dasma dayase vibhaktā	pitu na dasma day vibhaktṛ
 ---
10148	suṣvāṇāsaḥ indra stumasi tvā	su indra stu tvad
10148	sasavāṁsaḥ ca tuvinṛmṇa vājam	san ca tuvi nṛmṇa vāja
10148	ā naḥ bhara suvitam yasya cākan	ā mad bhṛ suvita yad kan
10148	tmanā tanā sanuyāma tvotāḥ	tman tan san tvota
10148	ṛṣvaḥ tvam indra śūra jātaḥ	ṛṣva tvad indra śūra jan
10148	dāsīḥ viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ	dāsa viś sūrya sah
10148	guhā hitam guhyam gūLham apsu	guhā dhā guh guh ap
10148	bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam	bhṛ prasravaṇa na soma
10148	aryaḥ vā giraḥ abhi arca vidvān	ari vā gir abhi arc vid
10148	ṛṣīṇām vipraḥ sumatim cakānaḥ	ṛṣi vipra sumati kan
10148	te syāma ye raṇayanta somaiḥ	tad as yad raṇay soma
10148	enā uta tubhyam rathoLha bhakṣaiḥ	enā uta tvad ratha vah bhakṣa
10148	imā brahma indra tubhyam śaṁsi	idam brahman indra tvad śaṃs
10148	dāḥ nṛbhyaḥ nṛṇām śūra śavaḥ	dā nṛ nṛ śūra śavas
10148	tebhiḥ bhava sakratuḥ yeṣu cākan	tad bhū sakratu yad kan
10148	uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ uta stīn	uta trā gṛ uta sti
10148	śrudhī havam indra śūra pṛthyāḥ	śru hava indra śūra pṛthi
10148	uta stavase venyasya arkaiḥ	uta stu venya arka
10148	ā yaḥ te yonim ghṛtavantam asvār	ā yad tvad yoni ghṛtavat svar
10148	ūrmiḥ na nimnaiḥ dravayanta vakvāḥ	ūrmi na nimna dravay vakva
 ---
10149	savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇāt	savitṛ yantra pṛthivī ram
10149	askambhane savitā dyām adṛṁhat	askambhana savitṛ div dṛh
10149	aśvam iva adhukṣat dhunim antarikṣam	aśva iva duh dhuni antarikṣa
10149	atūrte baddham savitā samudram	atūrta bandh savitṛ samudra
10149	yatrā samudraḥ skabhitaḥ vi aunat	yatra samudra skambh vi und
10149	apām napāt savitā tasya veda	ap napāt savitṛ tad vid
10149	ataḥ bhūḥ ataḥ āḥ utthitam rajaḥ	atas bhū atas ā utthā rajas
10149	ataḥ dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām	atas dyāvāpṛthivī prath
10149	paścā idam anyat abhavat yajatram	paścā idam anya bhū yajatra
10149	amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā	amartya bhuvana bhūman
10149	suparṇaḥ aṅga savituḥ garutmān	suparṇa aṅga savitṛ garutmant
10149	pūrvaḥ jātaḥ saḥ u asya anu dharma	pūrva jan tad u idam anu dharman
10149	gāvaḥ iva grāmam yūyudhiḥ iva aśvān	go iva grāma yūyudhi iva aśva
10149	vāśrā iva vatsam sumanāḥ duhānā	vāśrā iva vatsa sumanas duh
10149	patiḥ iva jāyām abhi naḥ ni etu	pati iva jāyā abhi mad ni i
10149	dhartā divaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ	dhartṛ div savitṛ viśva vāra
10149	hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitar yathā tvā	hiraṇyastūpa savitṛ yathā tu
10149	āṅgirasaḥ juhve vāje asmin	āṅgirasa hvā vāja idam
10149	evā tvā arcan avase vandamānaḥ	eva tvad arc av vand
10149	somasya iva aṁśum prati jāgara aham	soma iva aṃśu prati jāgṛ mad
 ---
10150	samiddhaḥ cit sam idhyase	samindh cit sam indh
10150	devebhyaḥ havyavāhana	deva havya vāhana
10150	ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ naḥ ā gahi	āditya rudra vasu mad ā gam
10150	mṛLīkāya naḥ ā gahi	mṛḍīka mad ā gam
10150	imam yajñam idam vacaḥ	idam yajña idam vacas
10150	jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi	juṣ upāgam
10150	martāsaḥ tvā samidhāna havāmahe	marta tvad samindh hvā
10150	mṛLīkāya havāmahe	mṛḍīka hvā
10150	tvām u jātavedasam	tvad u jātavedas
10150	viśvavāram gṛṇe dhiyā	viśva vāra gṛ dhī
10150	agne devān ā vaha naḥ priyavratān	agni deva ā vah mad priya vrata
10150	mṛLīkāya priyavratān	mṛḍīka priya vrata
10150	agniḥ devaḥ devānām abhavat purohitaḥ	agni deva deva bhū purohita
10150	agnim manuṣyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sam īdhire	agni manuṣya ṛṣi sam indh
10150	agnim mahaḥ dhanasātau aham huve	agni mah dhana sāti mad hvā
10150	mṛLīkam dhanasātaye	mṛḍīka dhana sāti
10150	agniḥ atrim bharadvājam gaviṣThiram	agni atri bharadvāja gaviṣṭhira
10150	pra āvat naḥ kaṇvam trasadasyum āhave	prāv mad kaṇva trasadasyu āhava
10150	agnim vasiṣThaḥ havate purohitaḥ	agni vasiṣṭha hvā purohita
10150	mṛLīkāya purohitaḥ	mṛḍīka purohita
 ---
10151	śraddhayā agniḥ sam idhyate	śraddhā agni sam indh
10151	śraddhayā hūyate haviḥ	śraddhā hu havis
10151	śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani	śraddhā bhaga mūrdhan
10151	vacasā ā vedayāmasi	vacas veday
10151	priyam śraddhe dadataḥ	priya śraddhā dā
10151	priyam śraddhe didāsataḥ	priya śraddhā didās
10151	priyam bhojeṣu yajvasu	priya bhoja yajvan
10151	idam me uditam kṛdhi	idam mad vad kṛ
10151	yathā devāḥ asureṣu	yathā deva asura
10151	śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire	śraddhā ugra kṛ
10151	evam bhojeṣu yajvasu	evam bhoja yajvan
10151	asmākam uditam kṛdhi	mad vad kṛ
10151	śraddhām devāḥ yajamānāḥ	śraddhā deva yaj
10151	vāyugopāḥ upa āsate	vāyu gopā upās
10151	śraddhām hṛdayyayā ākūtyā	śraddhā hṛdayya ākūti
10151	śraddhayā vindate vasu	śraddhā vid vasu
10151	śraddhām prātar havāmahe	śraddhā prātar hvā
10151	śraddhām madhyaṁdinam pari	śraddhā madhyaṃdina pari
10151	śraddhām sūryasya nimruci	śraddhā sūrya nimruc
10151	śraddhe śrat dhāpaya iha naḥ	śraddhā śrath dhāpay iha mad
 ---
10152	śāsaḥ itthā mahān asi	śāsa itthā mahat as
10152	amitrakhādaḥ adbhutaḥ	amitra khāda adbhuta
10152	na yasya hanyate sakhā	na yad han sakhi
10152	na jīyate kadā cana	na ji kadācana
10152	svastidāḥ viśaḥ patiḥ	svasti dā viś pati
10152	vṛtrahā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī	vṛtra han vimṛdha vaśin
10152	vṛṣā indraḥ puraḥ etu naḥ	vṛṣan indra puras i mad
10152	somapāḥ abhayaṁkaraḥ	soma pā abhayaṃkara
10152	vi rakṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi	vi rakṣas vi mṛdh han
10152	vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja	vi vṛtra hanu ruj
10152	vi manyum indra vṛtrahan	vi manyu indra vṛtrahan
10152	amitrasya abhidāsataḥ	amitra abhidās
10152	vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi	vi mad indra mṛdh han
10152	nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ	nīcā yam pṛtany
10152	yaḥ asmān abhidāsati	yad mad abhidās
10152	adharam gamayā tamaḥ	adhara gamay tamas
10152	apa indra dviṣataḥ manaḥ	apa indra dviṣ manas
10152	apa jijyāsataḥ vadham	apa jijyās vadha
10152	vi manyoḥ śarma yaccha	vi manyu śarman yam
10152	varīyaḥ yavayā vadham	varīyas yavay vadha
 ---
10153	īṅkhayantīḥ apasyuvaḥ	īṅkhay apasyu
10153	indram jātam upa āsate	indra jan upās
10153	bhejānāsaḥ suvīryam	bhaj su vīrya
10153	tvam indra balāt adhi	tvad indra bala adhi
10153	sahasaḥ jātaḥ ojasaḥ	sahas jan ojas
10153	tvam vṛṣan vṛṣā it asi	tvad vṛṣan vṛṣan id as
10153	tvam indra asi vṛtrahā	tvad indra as vṛtrahan
10153	vi antarikṣam atiraḥ	vi antarikṣa tṛ
10153	ut dyām astabhnāḥ ojasā	ud div stambh ojas
10153	tvam indra sajoṣasam	tvad indra sajoṣas
10153	arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ	arka bhṛ bāhu
10153	vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā	vajra śā ojas
10153	tvam indra abhibhūḥ asi	tvad as
10153	viśvā jātāni ojasā	viśva jāta ojas
10153	sa viśvā bhuvaḥ ā abhavaḥ	tad viśva bhū ābhū
 ---
10154	somaḥ ekebhyaḥ pavate	soma eka pū
10154	ghṛtam eke upa āsate	ghṛta eka upās
10154	yebhyaḥ madhu pradhāvati	yad madhu pradhāv
10154	tān cit eva api gacchatāt	tad cit eva api gam
10154	tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāḥ	tapas yad anādhṛṣya
10154	tapasā ye svar yayuḥ	tapas yad svar yā
10154	tapaḥ ye cakrire mahaḥ	tapas yad kṛ mahas
10154	tān cit eva api gacchatāt	tad cit eva api gam
10154	ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu	yad yudh pradhana
10154	śūrāsaḥ ye tanūtyajaḥ	śūra yad tanūtyaj
10154	ye vā sahasradakṣiṇāḥ	yad vā sahasra dakṣiṇā
10154	tān cit eva api gacchatāt	tad cit eva api gam
10154	ye cit pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ	yad cit pūrva ṛtasāp
10154	ṛtāvānaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ	ṛtāvan ṛtāvṛdh
10154	pitṛṛn tapasvataḥ yama	pitṛ tapasvat yama
10154	tān cit eva api gacchatāt	tad cit eva api gam
10154	sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayaḥ	sahasraṇītha kavi
10154	ye gopāyanti sūryam	yad gopāy sūrya
10154	ṛṣīn tapasvataḥ yama	ṛṣi tapasvat yama
10154	tapojān api gacchatāt	tapas ja api gam
 ---
10155	arāyi kāṇe vikaTe	arāyī kāṇa vikaṭa
10155	girim gaccha sadānve	giri gam sadānvā
10155	śirimbiThasya satvabhiḥ	śirimbiṭha satvan
10155	tebhiḥ tvā cātayāmasi	tad tvad cātay
10155	cattā u itaḥ cattā amutaḥ	cat u itas cat amutas
10155	sarvā bhrūṇāni āruṣī	sarva bhrūṇa ṛch
10155	arāyyam brahmaṇaḥ pate	arāyī brahman pati
10155	tīkṣṇaśṛṇga udṛṣan ihi	tīkṣṇa śṛṅga udṛṣ i
10155	adaḥ yat dāru plavate	adas yad dāru plu
10155	sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam	sindhu pāra apūruṣa
10155	tat ā rabhasva durhaṇo	tad ā rabh durhaṇu
10155	tena gaccha parastaram	tad gam parastara
10155	yat ha prācīḥ ajaganta	yat ha prāñc gam
10155	uraḥ maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ	uras maṇḍūradhāṇikī
10155	hatāḥ indrasya śatravaḥ	han indra śatru
10155	sarve budbudayāśavaḥ	sarva budbuda yāśu
10155	pari ime gām aneṣata	pari idam go nī
10155	pari agnim ahṛṣata	pari agni hṛ
10155	deveṣu akrata śravaḥ	deva kṛ śravas
10155	kaḥ imān ā dadharṣati	ka idam ā dhṛṣ
 ---
10156	agnim hinvantu naḥ dhiyaḥ	agni hi mad dhī
10156	saptim āśum iva ājiṣu	sapti āśu iva āji
10156	tena jeṣma dhanaṁdhanam	tad ji dhana dhana
10156	yayā gāḥ ākarāmahe	yad go ākṛ
10156	senayā agne tava ūtyā	senā agni tvad ūti
10156	tām naḥ hinva maghattaye	tad mad hi maghatti
10156	ā agne sthūram rayim bhara	ā agni sthūra rayi bhṛ
10156	pṛthum gomantam aśvinam	pṛthu gomat aśvin
10156	aṅdhi kham vartayā paṇim	añj kha vartay paṇi
10156	agne nakṣatram ajaram	agni nakṣatra ajara
10156	ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi	ā sūrya rohay div
10156	dadhat jyotiḥ janebhyaḥ	dhā jyotis jana
10156	agne ketuḥ viśām asi	agni ketu viś as

10156	bodhā stotre vayaḥ dadhat	budh stotṛ vayas dhā
 ---
10157	imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma	idam nu kaṃ bhuvana sādh
10157	indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ	indra ca viśva ca deva
