 ---
10158	sūryaḥ naḥ divaḥ pātu	sūrya mad div pā
10158	vātaḥ antarikṣāt	vāta antarikṣa
10158	agniḥ naḥ pārthivebhyaḥ	agni mad pārthiva
10158	joṣā savitar yasya te	juṣ savitṛ yad tvad
10158	haraḥ śatam savān arhati	haras śata sava arh
10158	pāhi naḥ didyutaḥ patantyāḥ	pā mad didyut pat
10158	cakṣuḥ naḥ devaḥ savitā	cakṣus mad deva savitṛ
10158	cakṣuḥ naḥ uta parvataḥ	cakṣus mad uta parvata
10158	cakṣuḥ dhātā dadhātu naḥ	cakṣus dhātṛ dhā mad
10158	cakṣuḥ naḥ dhehi cakṣuṣe	cakṣus mad dhā cakṣus
10158	cakṣuḥ vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ	cakṣus vikhyā tanū

10159	ut asau sūryaḥ agāt	ud adas sūrya gā
10159	ut ayam māmakaḥ bhagaḥ	ud idam māmaka bhaga
10159	aham tat vidvalā patim	mad tad vidvala pati
10159	abhi asākṣi viṣāsahiḥ	abhi sah viṣāsahi
10159	aham ketuḥ aham mūrdhā	mad ketu mad mūrdhan
10159	aham ugrā vivācanī	mad ugra vivācana
10159	mama it anu kratum patiḥ	mad id anu kratu pati
10159	sehānāyāḥ upācaret	sah upācar

10159	virājāni janasya ca	virāj jana ca

10160	tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya pāhi	tīvra abhivayas idam pā
10160	sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca	sarva ratha vi hari iha muc
10160	indra mā tvā yajamānāsaḥ anye	indra mā tvad yajamāna anya
10160	ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ	ni ram tvad idam su
10160	tubhyam sutāḥ tubhyam u sotvāsaḥ	tvad su tvad u sotva
10160	tvām giraḥ śvātryāḥ ā hvayanti	tvad gir śvātrya ā hvā
10160	indra idam adya savanam juṣāṇaḥ	indra idam adya savana juṣ
10160	viśvasya vidvān iha pāhi somam	viśva vid iha pā soma
10160	yaḥ uśatā manasā somam asmai	yad vaś manas soma idam
10160	sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti	sarva hṛd deva kāma su
10160	na gāḥ indraḥ tasya parā dadāti	na go indra tad parā dā
10160	praśastam it cārum asmai kṛṇoti	praśaṃs id cāru idam kṛ
10160	anuspaṣTaḥ bhavati eṣaḥ asya	anupaś bhū etad idam
10160	yaḥ asmai revān na sunoti somam	yad idam revat na su soma
10160	niḥ aratnau maghavā tam dadhāti	niḥ aratni maghavan tad dhā
10160	brahmadviṣaḥ hanti anānudiṣTaḥ	brahman dviṣ han anānudiṣṭa
10160	aśvāyantaḥ gavyantaḥ vājayantaḥ	aśvāyat gavyat vājay
10160	havāmahe tvā upagantavai u	hvā tvad upagam u

10160	vayam indra tvā śunam huvema	mad indra tvad śuna hu
 ---
10161	muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam	muc tvad havis jīvana kaṃ
10161	ajñātayakṣmāt uta rājayakṣmāt	ajñāta yakṣma uta rājayakṣman
10161	grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi vā etat enam	grāhi grah yadi vā etad enad
10161	tasyāḥ indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam	tad indra agni pra muc enad
10161	yadi kṣitāyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ	yadi kṣi āyus yadi vā pare
10161	yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva	yadi mṛtyu antika nī eva
10161	tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt	tad ā hṛ nirṛti upastha
10161	aspārṣam enam śataśāradāya	spṛ enad śata śārada
10161	sahasrākṣeṇa śataśāradena	sahasra akṣa śata śārada
10161	śatāyuṣā haviṣā ā ahārṣam enam	śata āyus havis hṛ enad
10161	śatam yathā imam śaradaḥ nayāti	śata yathā idam śarad nī ati
10161	indraḥ viśvasya duritasya pāram	indra viśva durita pāra

10161	śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān	śata hemanta śata u vasanta
10161	śatam indrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ	śata indra agni savitṛ bṛhaspati
10161	śatāyuṣā haviṣā imam punar duḥ	śata āyus havis idam punar dā
10161	ā ahārṣam tvā avidam tvā	āhṛ tvad vid tvad
10161	punar ā agāḥ punarnava	punar āgā punarnava
10161	sarvāṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ	sarva aṅga sarva tvad cakṣus
10161	sarvam āyuḥ ca te avidam	sarva āyus ca tvad vid
 ---
10162	brahmaṇā agniḥ saṁvidānaḥ	brahman agni saṃvid
10162	rakṣohā bādhatām itaḥ	rakṣas han bādh itas
10162	amīvā yaḥ te garbham	amīvā yad tvad garbha
10162	durṇāmā yonim āśaye	durṇāman yoni āśī
10162	yaḥ te garbham amīvā	yad tvad garbha amīvā
10162	durṇāmā yonim āśaye	durṇāman yoni āśī
10162	agniḥ tam brahmaṇā saha	agni tad brahman saha
10162	niḥ kravyādam anīnaśat	niḥ kravyād naś
10162	yaḥ te hanti patayantam	yad tvad han patay
10162	niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam	niṣatsnu yad sarīsṛpa

10162	tam itaḥ nāśayāmasi	tad itas nāśay

10162	antarā dampatī śaye	antarā dampati śī
10162	yonim yaḥ antar āreLhi	yoni yad antar ārih
10162	tam itaḥ nāśayāmasi	tad itas nāśay

10162	jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate	jāra bhū nipad

10162	tam itaḥ nāśayāmasi	tad itas nāśay

10162	tam itaḥ nāśayāmasi	tad itas nāśay

10163	akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām	akṣi tvad nāsikā
10163	karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi	karṇa chubuka adhi

10163	yakṣmam matasnābhyām yaknaḥ	yakṣma matasna yakṛt

10163	bhaṁsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te	bhaṃsas vi vṛh tvad
10163	mehanāt vanaṁkaraṇāt	mehana vanaṃkaraṇa
10163	lomabhyaḥ te nakhebhyaḥ	loman tvad nakha

10163	yakṣmam sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ	yakṣma sarva ātman

10164	apa ihi manasaḥ pate	ape manas pati
10164	apa krāma paraḥ cara	apa kram paras car
10164	paraḥ nirṛtyai ā cakṣva	paras nirṛti ā cakṣ
10164	bahudhā jīvataḥ manaḥ	bahudhā jīv manas
10164	bhadram vai varam vṛṇate	bhadra vai vara vṛ
10164	bhadram yuñjanti dakṣiṇam	bhadra yuj dakṣiṇa
10164	bhadram vaivasvate cakṣuḥ	bhadra vaivasvata cakṣus
10164	bahutrā jīvataḥ manaḥ	bahutrā jīv manas
10164	yat āśasā niḥśasā abhiśasā	yad āśas niḥśas abhiśas
10164	upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ	upa ṛch jāgṛ yad svap
10164	agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni	agni viśva apa duṣkṛta
10164	ajuṣTāni āre asmat dadhātu	ajuṣṭa āre mad dhā
10164	yat indra brahmaṇaḥ pate	yat indra brahman pati
10164	abhidroham carāmasi	abhidroha car
10164	pracetāḥ naḥ āṅgirasaḥ	pracetas mad āṅgirasa
10164	dviṣatām pātu aṁhasaḥ	dviṣ pā aṃhas
10164	ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca	ji adya san ca
10164	abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam	bhū anāgas mad
10164	jāgratsvapnaḥ saṁkalpaḥ pāpaḥ	jāgrant svapna saṃkalpa pāpa
10164	yam dviṣmaḥ tam saḥ ṛcchatu	yad dviṣ tad tad ṛch
10164	yaḥ naḥ dveṣTi tam ṛcchatu	yad mad dviṣ tad ṛch
 ---
10165	devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat icchan	deva kapota iṣay yad iṣ
10165	dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma	dūta nirṛti idam āgam
10165	tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim	tad arc kṛ niṣkṛti
10165	śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade	śam mad as dvipad śam catuṣpada
10165	śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu	śiva kapota iṣay mad as
10165	anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛheṣu	anāgas deva śakuna gṛha
10165	agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ	agni hi vipra juṣ havis mad
10165	pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu	pari heti pakṣin mad vṛj
10165	hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān	heti pakṣin na dabh mad
10165	āṣTryām padam kṛṇute agnidhāne	āṣṭrī pada kṛ agnidhāna
10165	śam naḥ gobhyaḥ ca puruṣebhyaḥ ca astu	śam mad go ca puruṣa ca as
10165	mā naḥ hiṁsīt iha devāḥ kapotaḥ	mā mad hiṃs iha deva kapota
10165	yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat	yad ulūka vad mogha etad
10165	yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti	yat kapota pada agni kṛ
10165	yasya dūtaḥ prahitaḥ eṣaḥ etat	yad dūta prahi etad etad
10165	tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave	tad yama namas as mṛtyu
10165	ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam	ṛc kapota nud praṇoda
10165	iṣam madantaḥ pari gām nayadhvam	iṣ mad pari go nī
10165	saṁyopayantaḥ duritāni viśvā	saṃyopay durita viśva
10165	hitvā naḥ ūrjam pra patāt patiṣThaḥ	hā mad ūrj pra pat patiṣṭha
 ---
10166	ṛṣabham mā samānānām	ṛṣabha mad samāna
10166	sapatnānām viṣāsahim	sapatna viṣāsahi
10166	hantāram śatrūṇām kṛdhi	hantṛ śatru kṛ
10166	virājam gopatim gavām	virāj go pati go
10166	aham asmi sapatnahā	mad as sapatna han
10166	indraḥ iva ariṣTaḥ akṣataḥ	indra iva ariṣṭa akṣata
10166	adhaḥ sapatnāḥ me padoḥ	adhas sapatna mad pad
10166	ime sarve abhiṣThitāḥ	idam sarva abhiṣṭhā
10166	atra eva vaḥ api nahyāmi	atra eva tvad api nah
10166	ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā	ubh ārtnī iva jyā
10166	vācaḥ pate ni sedha imān	vācaspati ni sidh idam
10166	yathā mat adharam vadān	yathā mad adhara vad
10166	abhibhūḥ aham ā agamam	abhibhū mad āgam
10166	viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā	viśvakarma dhāman
10166	ā vaḥ cittam ā vaḥ vratam	ā tvad citta ā tvad vrata
10166	ā vaḥ aham samitim dade	ā tvad mad samiti dā
10166	yogakṣemam vaḥ ādāya	yogakṣema tvad ādā
10166	aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ	mad bhū uttama
10166	ā vaḥ mūrdhānam akramīm	ā tvad mūrdhan kram
10166	adhaspadāt me ut vadata	adhas pada mad ud vad
10166	maṇḍūkāḥ iva udakāt	maṇḍūka iva udaka
10166	maṇḍūkāḥ udakāt iva	maṇḍūka udaka iva
 ---
10167	tubhya idam indra pari sicyate madhu	tvad idam indra pari sic madhu
10167	tvam sutasya kalaśasya rājasi	tvad su kalaśa rāj
10167	tvam rayim puruvīrām u naḥ kṛdhi	tvad rayi puru vīra u mad kṛ
10167	tvam tapaḥ paritapya ajayaḥ svar	tvad tapas paritap ji svar
10167	svarjitam mahi mandānam andhasaḥ	svar jit mahi mad andhas
10167	havāmahe pari śakram sutān upa	hvā pari śakra suta upa
10167	imam naḥ yajñam iha bodhi ā gahi	idam mad yajña iha budh ā gam
10167	spṛdhaḥ jayantam maghavānam īmahe	spṛdh ji maghavan ī
10167	somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya dharmaṇi	soma rājan varuṇa dharman
10167	bṛhaspateḥ anumatyāḥ u śarmaṇi	bṛhaspati anumati u śarman
10167	tava aham adya maghavan upastutau	tvad mad adya maghavan upastuti
10167	dhātar vidhātar kalaśān abhakṣayam	dhātṛ vidhātṛ kalaśa bhakṣay
10167	prasūtaḥ bhakṣam akaram carau api	prasū bhakṣa kṛ caru api
10167	stomam ca imam prathamaḥ sūriḥ ut mṛje	stoma ca idam prathama sūri ud mṛj
10167	sute sātena yadi ā agamam vām	su sāta yadi āgam tvad
10167	prati viśvāmitrajamadagnī dame	prati viśvāmitra jamadagni dama
 ---
10168	vātasya nu mahimānam rathasya	vāta nu mahiman ratha
10168	rujan eti stanayan asya ghoṣaḥ	ruj i stanay idam ghoṣa
10168	divispṛk yāti aruṇāni kṛṇvan	divispṛś yā aruṇa kṛ
10168	uta u eti pṛthivyā reṇum asyan	uta u i pṛthivī reṇu as
10168	sam pra īrate anu vātasya viṣThāḥ	sam prer anu vāta viṣṭhā
10168	ā enam gacchanti samanam na yoṣāḥ	ā enad gam samana na yoṣā
10168	tābhiḥ sayuk saratham devaḥ īyate	tad sayuj sa ratha deva i
10168	asya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā	idam viśva bhuvana rājan
10168	antarikṣe pathibhiḥ īyamānaḥ	antarikṣa pathin i
10168	na ni viśate katamat cana ahar	na ni viś katama cana ahar
10168	apām sakhā prathamajāḥ ṛtāvā	ap sakhi prathama jā ṛtāvan
10168	kva svit jātaḥ kutaḥ ā babhūva	kva svid jan kutas ā bhū
10168	ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbhaḥ	ātman deva bhuvana garbha
10168	yathāvaśam carati devaḥ eṣaḥ	yathāvaśam car deva etad
10168	ghoṣāḥ it asya śṛṇvire na rūpam	ghoṣa id idam śru na rūpa
10168	tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema	tad vāta havis vidh
 ---
10169	mayobhūḥ vātaḥ abhi vātu usrāḥ	mayas bhū vāta abhi vā usrā
10169	ūrjasvatīḥ oṣadhīḥ ā riśantām	ūrjasvat oṣadhi ā riś
10169	pīvasvatīḥ jīvadhanyāḥ pibantu	pīvasvat jīva dhanya pā
10169	avasāya padvate rudra mṛLa	avasa padvat rudra mṛḍ
10169	yāḥ sarūpāḥ virūpāḥ ekarūpāḥ	yad sarūpa virūpa eka rūpa
10169	yāsām agniḥ iṣTyā nāmāni veda	yad agni iṣṭi nāman vid
10169	yāḥ aṅgirasaḥ tapasā iha cakruḥ	yad aṅgiras tapas iha kṛ
10169	tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha	tad parjanya mahi śarman yam
10169	yāḥ deveṣu tanvam airayanta	yad deva tanū īray
10169	yāsām somaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi veda	yad soma viśva rūpa vid
10169	tāḥ asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ	tad mad payas pinv
10169	prajāvatīḥ indra goṣThe rirīhi	prajāvat indra goṣṭha rā
10169	prajāpatiḥ mahyam etāḥ rarāṇaḥ	prajāpati mad etad rā
10169	viśvaiḥ devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṁvidānaḥ	viśva deva pitṛ saṃvid
10169	śivāḥ satīḥ upa naḥ goṣTham ā akar	śiva sat upa mad goṣṭha ā kṛ
10169	tāsām vayam prajayā sam sadema	tad mad prajā sam sad
 ---
10170	vibhrāT bṛhat pibatu somyam madhu	vibhrāj bṛhat pā somya madhu
10170	āyuḥ dadhat yajñapatau avihrutam	āyus dhā yajñapati avihruta
10170	vātajūtaḥ yaḥ abhirakṣati tmanā	vāta jū yad abhirakṣ tman
10170	prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati	prajā puṣ purudhā vi rāj
10170	vibhrāT bṛhat subhṛtam vājasātamam	vibhrāj bṛhat su bhṛ vāja sātama
10170	dharman divaḥ dharuṇe satyam arpitam	dharman div dharuṇa satya arpay
10170	amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamam	amitra han vṛtra han dasyu hantama
10170	jyotiḥ jajñe asurahā sapatnahā	jyotis jan asura han sapatna han
10170	idam śreṣTham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ uttamam	idam śreṣṭha jyotis jyotis uttama
10170	viśvajit dhanajit ucyate bṛhat	viśva jit dhana jit vac bṛhat
10170	viśvabhrāT bhrājaḥ mahi sūryaḥ dṛśe	viśva bhrāj bhrāja mahi sūrya dṛś
10170	uru paprathe sahaḥ ojaḥ acyutam	uru prath sahas ojas acyuta
10170	vibhrājan jyotiṣā svar	vibhrāj jyotis svar
10170	agacchaḥ rocanam divaḥ	gam rocana div
10170	yena imā viśvā bhuvanāni ābhṛtā	yad idam viśva bhuvana ābhṛ
10170	viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā	viśvakarman viśvadevyāvat
 ---
10171	tvam tyam iTataḥ ratham	tvad tya iṭa ratha
10171	indra pra āvaḥ sutāvataḥ	indra prāv sutāvat
10171	aśṛṇoḥ sominaḥ havam	śru somin hava
10171	tvam makhasya dodhataḥ	tvad makha dudh
10171	śiraḥ ava tvacaḥ bharaḥ	śiras ava tvac bhṛ
10171	agacchaḥ sominaḥ gṛham	gam somin gṛha
10171	tvam tyam indra martyam	tvad tya indra martya
10171	āstrabudhnāya venyam	āstrabudhna venya
10171	muhuḥ śrathnāḥ manasyave	muhur śrath manasyu
10171	tvam tyam indra sūryam	tvad tya indra sūrya
10171	paścā santam puraḥ kṛdhi	paścā as puras kṛ
10171	devānām cit tiraḥ vaśam	deva cit tiras vaśa
 ---
10172	ā yāhi vanasā saha	ā yā vanas saha
10172	gāvaḥ sacanta vartanim	go sac vartani
10172	yat ūdhabhiḥ	yat ūdhas
10172	ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā	ā yā vasu dhī
10172	maṁhiṣThaḥ jārayanmakhaḥ	maṃhiṣṭha jāray makha
10172	sudānubhiḥ	sudānu
10172	pitubhṛtaḥ na tantum it	pitu bhṛt na tantu id
10172	sudānavaḥ	sudānu
10172	prati dadhmaḥ yajāmasi	prati dhā yaj
10172	uṣāḥ apa svasuḥ tamaḥ	uṣas apa svasṛ tamas
10172	sam vartayati vartanim	sam vartay vartani
10172	sujātatā	su jan tā
 ---
10173	ā tvā ahārṣam antar edhi	ā tvad hṛ antar as
10173	dhruvaḥ tiṣTha avicācaliḥ	dhruva sthā avicācali
10173	viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu	viś tvad sarva vāñch
10173	mā tvat rāṣTram adhi bhraśat	mā tvad rāṣṭra adhi bhraṃś
10173	iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣThāḥ	iha eva as mā apa cyu
10173	parvataḥ iva avicācaliḥ	parvata iva avicācali
10173	indraḥ iva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣTha	indra iva iha dhruva sthā
10173	iha rāṣTram u dhāraya	iha rāṣṭra u dhāray
10173	imam indraḥ adīdharat	idam indra dhṛ
10173	dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā	dhruva dhruva havis
10173	tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat	tad soma adhi brū
10173	tasmai u brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ	tad u brahman pati
10173	dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī	dhruva div dhruva pṛthivī
10173	dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime	dhruva parvata idam
10173	dhruvam viśvam idam jagat	dhruva viśva idam jagant
10173	dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam	dhruva rājan viś idam
10173	dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ	dhruva tvad rājan varuṇa
10173	dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ	dhruva deva bṛhaspati
10173	dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca	dhruva tvad indra ca agni ca
10173	rāṣTram dhārayatām dhruvam	rāṣṭra dhāray dhruva
10173	dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā	dhruva dhruva havis
10173	abhi somam mṛśāmasi	abhi soma mṛś
10173	atha u te indraḥ kevalīḥ	atho tvad indra kevala
10173	viśaḥ balihṛtaḥ karat	viś bali hṛt kṛ
 ---
10174	abhīvartena haviṣā	abhīvarta havis
10174	yena indraḥ abhivāvṛte	yad indra abhivṛt
10174	tena asmān brahmaṇaḥ pate	tad mad brahmaṇaspati
10174	abhi rāṣTrāya vartaya	abhi rāṣṭra vartay
10174	abhivṛtya sapatnān	abhivṛt sapatna
10174	abhi yāḥ naḥ arātayaḥ	abhi yad mad arāti
10174	abhi pṛtanyantam tiṣTha	abhi pṛtany sthā
10174	abhi yaḥ naḥ irasyati	abhi yad mad irasy
10174	abhi tvā devaḥ savitā	abhi tvad deva savitṛ
10174	abhi somaḥ avīvṛtat	abhi soma vṛt
10174	abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāni	abhi tvad viśva bhūta
10174	abhīvartaḥ yathā asasi	abhīvarta yathā as
10174	yena indraḥ haviṣā kṛtvī	yad indra havis kṛ
10174	abhavat dyumnī uttamaḥ	bhū dyumnin uttama
10174	idam tat akri devāḥ	idam tad kṛ deva
10174	asapatnaḥ kila abhuvam	asapatna kila bhū
10174	asapatnaḥ sapatnahā	asapatna sapatna han
10174	abhirāṣTraḥ viṣāsahiḥ	abhirāṣṭra viṣāsahi
10174	yathā aham eṣām bhūtānām	yathā mad idam bhūta
10174	virājāni janasya ca	virāj jana ca
 ---
10175	pra vaḥ grāvāṇaḥ savitā	pra tvad grāvan savitṛ
10175	devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā	deva sū dharman
10175	dhūrṣu yujyadhvam sunuta	dhur yuj su
10175	grāvāṇaḥ apa ducchunām	grāvan apa ducchunā
10175	apa sedhata durmatim	apa sidh durmati
10175	usrāḥ kartana bheṣajam	usrā kṛ bheṣaja
10175	grāvāṇaḥ upareṣu ā	grāvan upara ā
10175	mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ	mahīy sajoṣas
10175	vṛṣṇe dadhataḥ vṛṣṇyam	vṛṣan dhā vṛṣṇya
10175	grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vaḥ	grāvan savitṛ nu tvad
10175	devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā	deva sū dharman
10175	yajamānāya sunvate	yajamāna su
 ---
10176	pra sūnavaḥ ṛbhūṇām	pra sūnu ṛbhu
10176	bṛhat navanta vṛjanā	bṛhat nū vṛjana
10176	kṣāmā ye viśvadhāyasaḥ	kṣāman yad viśva dhāyas
10176	aśnan dhenum na mātaram	aś dhenu na mātṛ
10176	pra devam devyā dhiyā	pra deva deva dhī
10176	bharatā jātavedasam	bhṛ jātavedas
10176	havyā naḥ vakṣat ānuṣak	havya mad vah ānuṣak
10176	ayam u sya pra devayuḥ	idam u tya pra devayu
10176	hotā yajñāya nīyate	hotṛ yajña nī
10176	rathaḥ na yoḥ abhīvṛtaḥ	ratha na yos abhīvṛta
10176	ghṛṇīvān cetati tmanā	ghṛṇīvat cit tman
10176	ayam agniḥ uruṣyati	idam agni uruṣy
10176	amṛtāt iva janmanaḥ	amṛta iva janman
10176	sahasaḥ cit sahīyān	sahas cit sahīyas
10176	devaḥ jīvātave kṛtaḥ	deva jīvātu kṛ
 ---
10177	pataṁgam aktam asurasya māyayā	pataṃga añj asura māyā
10177	hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ	hṛd paś manas vipaścit
10177	samudre antar kavayaḥ vi cakṣate	samudra antar kavi vi cakṣ
10177	marīcīnām padam icchanti vedhasaḥ	marīci pada iṣ vedhas
10177	pataṁgaḥ vācam manasā bibharti	pataṃga vāc manas bhṛ
10177	tām gandharvaḥ avadat garbhe antar	tad gandharva vad garbha antar
10177	tām dyotamānām svaryam manīṣām	tad dyut svarya manīṣā
10177	ṛtasya pade kavayaḥ ni pānti	ṛta pada kavi ni pā
10177	apaśyam gopām anipadyamānam	paś gopā a nipad
10177	ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam	ā ca parā ca pathin car
10177	sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ	tad sadhryañc tad viṣvañc vas
10177	ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar	ā varvṛt bhuvana antar
 ---
10178	tyam ū su vājinam devajūtam	tya u su vājin deva jū
10178	sahāvānam tarutāram rathānām	sahāvan tarutṛ ratha
10178	ariṣTanemim pṛtanājam āśum	ariṣṭa nemi pṛtanāj āśu
10178	svastaye tārkṣyam ihā huvema	svasti tārkṣya iha hvā
10178	indrasya iva rātim ājohuvānāḥ	indra iva rāti ājohav
10178	svastaye nāvam iva ā ruhema	svasti nau iva ruh
10178	urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre	uru na pṛthu bahula gabhīra
10178	mā vām etau mā paretau riṣāma	mā tvad eti mā pareti riṣ
10178	sadyaḥ cit yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣTīḥ	sadyas cit yad śavas pañcan kṛṣṭi
10178	sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna	sūrya iva jyotis ap tan
10178	sahasrasāḥ śatasāḥ asya raṁhiḥ	sahasra sā śata sā idam raṃhi
10178	na smā varante yuvatim na śaryām	na sma vṛ yuvati na śaryā
 ---
10179	ut tiṣThata ava paśyata	ud sthā ava paś
10179	indrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam	indra bhāga ṛtviya
10179	yadi śrātaḥ juhotana	yadi śrī hu
10179	yadi aśrātaḥ mamattana	yadi a śrī mad
10179	śrātam haviḥ ā u su indra pra yāhi	śrī havis ā u su indra pra yā
10179	jagāma sūraḥ adhvanaḥ vimadhyam	gam sūra adhvan vimadhya
10179	pari tvā āsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ	pari tvad ās nidhi sakhi
10179	kulapāḥ na vrājapatim carantam	kulapā na vrāja pati car
10179	śrātam manye ūdhani śrātam agnau	śrī man ūdhas śrī agni
10179	suśrātam manye tat ṛtam navīyaḥ	su śrī man tad ṛta navīyas
10179	mādhyaṁdinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ	mādhyaṃdina savana dadhi
10179	piba indra vajrin purukṛt juṣāṇaḥ	pā indra vajrin puru kṛt juṣ
 ---
10180	pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūn	pra sah puruhūta śatru
10180	jyeṣThaḥ te śuṣmaḥ iha rātiḥ astu	jyeṣṭha tvad śuṣma iha rāti as
10180	indra ā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni	indra ā bhṛ dakṣiṇa vasu
10180	patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām	pati sindhu as revat
10180	mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣThāḥ	mṛga na bhīma kucara giriṣṭhā
10180	parāvataḥ ā jaganthā parasyāḥ	parāvat ā gam para
10180	sṛkam saṁśāya pavim indra tigmam	sṛka saṃśā pavi indra tigma
10180	vi śatrūn tāLhi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva	vi śatru takṣ vi mṛdh nud
10180	indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojaḥ	indra kṣatra abhi vāma ojas
10180	ajāyathāḥ vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām	jan vṛṣabha carṣaṇi
10180	apa anudaḥ janam amitrayantam	apanud jana amitray
10180	urum devebhyaḥ akṛṇoḥ ulokam	uru deva kṛ u loka
 ---
10181	prathaḥ ca yasya saprathaḥ ca nāma	prathas ca yad sa prathas ca nāman
10181	ānuṣTubhasya haviṣaḥ haviḥ yat	ānuṣṭubha havis havis yad
10181	dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ	dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu
10181	rathaṁtaram ā jabhārā vasiṣThaḥ	rathaṃtara ā bhṛ vasiṣṭha
10181	avindan te atihitam yat āsīt	vid tad atidhā yad as
10181	yajñasya dhāma paramam guhā yat	yajña dhāman parama guhā yad
10181	dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ	dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu
10181	bharadvājaḥ bṛhat ā cakre agneḥ	bharadvāja bṛhant ā kṛ agni
10181	te avindan manasā dīdhyānāḥ	tad vid manas dhī
10181	yajuḥ skannam prathamam devayānam	yajus skand prathama deva yāna
10181	dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ	dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu
10181	ā sūryāt abharan gharmam ete	ā sūrya bhṛ gharma etad
 ---
10182	bṛhaspatiḥ nayatu durgahā tiraḥ	bṛhaspati nī durgaha tiras
10182	punar neṣat aghaśaṁsāya manma	punar nī agha śaṃsa manman
10182	kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han	kṣip aśasti apa durmati han
10182	athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ	atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos
10182	narāśaṁsaḥ naḥ avatu prayāje	narāśaṃsa mad av prayāja
10182	śam naḥ astu anuyājaḥ haveṣu	śam mad as anuyāja hava
10182	kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han	kṣip aśasti apa durmati han
10182	athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ	atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos
10182	tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣasaḥ ye	tapurmūrdhan tap rakṣas yad
10182	brahmadviṣaḥ śarave hantavai u	brahman dviṣ śaru han u
10182	kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han	kṣip aśasti apa durmati han
10182	athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ	atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos
 ---
10183	apaśyam tvā manasā cekitānam	paś tvad manas cekit
10183	tapasaḥ jātam tapasaḥ vibhūtam	tapas jan tapas vibhū
10183	iha prajām iha rayim rarāṇaḥ	iha prajā iha rayi rā
10183	pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāma	pra jan prajā putra kāma
10183	apaśyam tvā manasā dīdhyānām	paś tvad manas dhī
10183	svāyām tanū ṛtvye nādhamānām	sva tanū ṛtvya nādh
10183	upa mām uccā yuvatiḥ babhūyāḥ	upa mad uccā yuvati bhū
10183	pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāme	pra jan prajā putra kāma
10183	aham garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣu	mad garbha dhā oṣadhī
10183	aham viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar	mad viśva bhuvana antar
10183	aham prajāḥ ajanayam pṛthivyām	mad prajā janay pṛthivī
10183	aham janibhyaḥ aparīṣu putrān	mad jani aparī putra
 ---
10184	viṣṇuḥ yonim kalpayatu	viṣṇu yoni kalpay
10184	tvaṣTā rūpāṇi piṁśatu	tvaṣṭṛ rūpa piś
10184	ā siñcatu prajāpatiḥ	ā sic prajāpati
10184	dhātā garbham dadhātu te	dhātṛ garbha dhā tvad
10184	garbham dhehi sinīvāli	garbha dhā sinīvālī
10184	garbham dhehi sarasvati	garbha dhā sarasvatī
10184	garbham te aśvinau devau	garbha tvad aśvin deva
10184	ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā	ā dhā puṣkarasraj
10184	hiraṇyayī araṇī	hiraṇyaya araṇī
10184	yam nirmanthataḥ aśvinā	yad nirmath aśvin
10184	tam te garbham havāmahe	tad tvad garbha hvā
10184	daśame māsi sūtave	daśama mās sū
 ---
10185	mahi trīṇām avaḥ astu	mahi tri avas as
10185	dyukṣam mitrasya aryamṇaḥ	dyukṣa mitra aryaman
10185	durādharṣam varuṇasya	durādharṣa varuṇa
10185	nahi teṣām amā cana	nahi tad amā cana
10185	na adhvasu vāraṇeṣu	na adhvan vāraṇa
10185	īśe ripuḥ aghaśaṁsaḥ	īś ripu agha śaṃsa
10185	yasmai putrāsaḥ aditeḥ	yad putra aditi
10185	pra jīvase martyāya	pra jīv martya
10185	jyotiḥ yacchanti ajasram	jyotis yam ajasra
 ---
10186	vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam	vāta ā vā bheṣaja
10186	śambhu mayobhu naḥ hṛde	śambhu mayobhu mad hṛd
10186	pra naḥ āyūṁṣi tāriṣat	pra mad āyus tṛ
10186	uta vāta pitā asi naḥ	uta vāta pitṛ as mad
10186	uta bhrātā uta naḥ sakhā	uta bhrātṛ uta mad sakhi
10186	sa naḥ jīvātave kṛdhi	tad mad jīvātu kṛ
10186	yat adaḥ vāta te gṛhe	yad adas vāta tvad gṛha
10186	amṛtasya nidhiḥ hitaḥ	amṛta nidhi dhā
10186	tataḥ naḥ dehi jīvase	tatas mad dā jīv
 ---
10187	pra agnaye vācam īraya	pra agni vāc īray
10187	vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām	vṛṣabha kṣiti
10187	sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ
10187	yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ	yad para parāvat
10187	tiraḥ dhanva atirocate	tiras dhanvan atiruc
10187	sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ
10187	yaḥ rakṣāṁsi nijūrvati	yad rakṣas nijūrv
10187	vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā	vṛṣa śukra śocis
10187	sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ
10187	yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati	yad viśva abhi vipaś
10187	bhuvanā sam ca paśyati	bhuvana sam ca paś
10187	sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ
10187	yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ	yad idam pāra rajas
10187	śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata	śukra agni jan
10187	sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ	tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ
 ---
10188	pra nūnam jātavedasam	pra nūnam jātavedas
10188	aśvam hinota vājinam	aśva hi vājin
10188	idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade	idam mad barhis āsad
10188	asya pra jātavedasaḥ	idam pra jātavedas
10188	vipravīrasya mīLhuṣaḥ	vipra vīra mīḍhvas
10188	mahīm iyarmi suṣTutim	mah ṛch suṣṭuti
10188	yāḥ rucaḥ jātavedasaḥ	yad ruc jātavedas
10188	devatrā havyavāhanīḥ	devatrā havya vāhana
10188	tābhiḥ naḥ yajñam invatu	tad mad yajña inv
 ---
10189	ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt	ā idam go pṛśni kram
10189	asadat mātaram puraḥ	sad mātṛ puras
10189	pitaram ca prayan svar	pitṛ ca pre svar
10189	antar carati rocanā	antar car rocana
10189	asya prāṇāt apānatī	idam prāṇa apān
10189	vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ divam	vi khyā mahiṣa div
10189	triṁśat dhāma vi rājati	triṃśat dhāman vi rāj
10189	vāk pataṁgāya dhīyate	vāc pataṃga dhā
10189	prati vastoḥ aha dyubhiḥ	prati vastu aha div
 ---
10190	ṛtam ca satyam ca abhīddhāt	ṛta ca satya ca abhīndh
10190	tapasaḥ adhi ajāyata	tapas adhi jan
10190	tataḥ rātri ajāyata	tatas rātri jan
10190	tataḥ samudraḥ arṇavaḥ	tatas samudra arṇava
10190	samudrāt arṇavāt adhi	samudra arṇava adhi
10190	saṁvatsaraḥ ajāyata	saṃvatsara jan
10190	ahorātrāṇi vidadhat	ahorātra vidhā
10190	viśvasya miṣataḥ vaśī	viśva miṣ vaśin
10190	sūryācandramasau dhātā	sūryācandramas dhātṛ
10190	yathāpūrvam akalpayat	yathāpūrvam kalpay
10190	divam ca pṛthivīm ca	div ca pṛthivī ca
10190	antarikṣam atha u svar	antarikṣa atho svar
 ---
10191	saṁsam it yuvase vṛṣan	sam sam id yu vṛṣan
10191	agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā	agni viśva ari ā
10191	iLaḥ pade sam idhyase	iḍ pada sam indh
10191	sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara	tad mad vasu ā bhṛ
10191	sam gacchadhvam sam vadadhvam	sam gam sam vad
10191	sam vaḥ manāṁsi jānatām	sam tvad manas jñā
10191	devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve	deva bhāga yathā pūrva
10191	saṁjānānāḥ upāsate	saṃjñā upās
10191	samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī	samāna mantra samiti samāna
10191	samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām	samāna manas saha citta idam
10191	samānam mantram abhi mantraye vaḥ	samāna mantra abhi mantray tvad
10191	samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi	samāna tvad havis hu
